rɒ ɣɒjm ŋɒh mj‌dɒrm v آn rɒ trk nxvɒhm nmvd، v dlm tɒzndh bɒʃm، mrɒ mzmt nxvɒhd krd dʃmn mn msl ʃrjr bɒʃd، v mɣɒvmt knndɡɒnm msl xtɒkɒrɒn zjrɒ ɒmjd ʃrjr t͡ʃjst hŋɒmj kh xdɒ ɒv rɒ mnɣtʔ mj‌sɒzd؟ v hjnj kh xdɒ d͡ʒɒn ɒvrɒ mj‌ɡjrd؟ آjɒ xdɒ frjɒd ɒv rɒ xvɒhd ʃnjd، hŋɒmj kh msjbt br ɒv ʔɒrz ʃvd؟ آjɒ drɣɒdrmtlɣ tlzz xvɒhd jɒft، v dr hmh ɒvɣɒt ɒzxdɒ msɒlt xvɒhd nmvd؟ «ʃmɒ rɒ drbɒrh dst xdɒ tʔljm xvɒhd dɒdv ɒz ɒʔmɒl ɣɒdrmtlɣ t͡ʃjzj mxfj nxvɒhm dɒʃt ɒjnk d͡ʒmjʔ ʃmɒ ɒjn rɒ mlɒhzh krdh‌ɒjd، پs t͡ʃrɒ bɒlkl bɒtl ʃdh‌ɒjd ɒjn ɒst nsjb mrd ʃrjr ɒz d͡ʒɒnb xdɒ، v mjrɒs zɒlmɒn kh آn rɒ ɒz ɣɒdrmtlɣ mj‌jɒbnd ɒɡrfrzndɒnʃ bsjɒr ʃvnd ʃmʃjr brɒj ɒjʃɒn ɒst، v zrjt ɒv ɒz nɒn sjr nxvɒhnd ʃd bɒzmɒndɡɒn ɒv ɒz vbɒ dfn xvɒhnd ʃd، v bjvh‌znɒnʃ ɡrjh nxvɒhnd krd ɒɡr‌t͡ʃh nɣrh rɒ msl ɣbɒr ɒndvxth knd، v lbɒs rɒ msl ɡl آmɒdh sɒzd ɒv آmɒdh mj‌knd ljkn mrd ʔɒdl آn rɒ xvɒhd پvʃjd، vsɒlhɒn nɣrh ɒv rɒ tɣsjm xvɒhnd nmvd xɒnh xvd rɒ msl bjd bnɒ mj‌knd، v msl sɒjbɒnj kh dʃtbɒn mj‌sɒzd ɒv dvltmnd mj‌xvɒbd ɒmɒ dfn nxvɒhd ʃd t͡ʃʃmɒn xvd rɒ mj‌ɡʃɒjd v njst mj‌bɒʃd trshɒ msl آb ɒv rɒ frv mj‌ɡjrd، v ɡrdbɒd ɒv rɒ dr ʃb mj‌rbɒjd bɒd ʃrɣj ɒv rɒbrmj dɒrd v nɒbvd mj‌ʃvd v ɒv rɒ ɒz mkɒnʃ dvrmj ɒndɒzd، zjrɒ xdɒ br ɒv tjr xvɒhdɒndɒxt v ʃfɣt nxvɒhd nmvd ɒɡr‌t͡ʃh ɒvmj xvɒhd ɒz dst vj frɒr krdh، bɡrjzdmrdm kfhɒj xvd rɒ br ɒv bhm mj‌znnd v ɒv rɒ ɒzmkɒnʃ sfjr zdh، bjrvn mj‌knnd mrdm kfhɒj xvd rɒ br ɒv bhm mj‌znnd v ɒv rɒ ɒzmkɒnʃ sfjr zdh، bjrvn mj‌knnd «jɣjn brɒj nɣrh mʔdnj ɒst، v bh d͡ʒht tlɒ d͡ʒɒjj ɒst kh آn rɒ ɣɒl mj‌ɡzɒrnd آhn ɒz xɒk ɡrfth mj‌ʃvd v ms ɒzsŋ ɡdɒxth mj‌ɡrdd mrdm brɒj tɒrjkj hdmj ɡzɒrnd v tɒ nhɒjt tmɒm tfhs mj‌nmɒjnd، tɒbh sŋhɒj zlmt ɣljz v sɒjh mvt kɒnj dvr ɒz sɒknɒn zmjn mj‌knnd، ɒz rɒh ɡzrjɒn frɒmvʃ mj‌ʃvnd v dvr ɒz mrdmɒn آvjxth ʃdh، bh hr trf mthrk mj‌ɡrdnd ɒz zmjn nɒn bjrvn mj‌آjd، v ʒrfjhɒjʃ msl آtʃ srŋvn mj‌ʃvd sŋhɒjʃ mkɒn jɒɣvt kbvd ɒst vʃmʃhɒj tlɒ dɒrd آn rɒh rɒ hjt͡ʃ mrɣ ʃkɒrj nmj dɒnd، v t͡ʃʃm ʃɒhjn آn rɒ ndjdh ɒst، vd͡ʒɒnvrɒn drndh br آn ɣdm nzdh‌ɒnd، v ʃjr ɣrɒn brآn ɡzr nkrdh dst xvd rɒ bh sŋ xɒrɒ drɒzmj knnd، v kvhhɒ rɒ ɒz bjx brmj knnd nhrhɒ ɒzsxrh‌hɒ mj‌knnd v t͡ʃʃm ɒjʃɒn hr t͡ʃjz nfjs rɒmj bjnd nhrhɒ rɒ ɒz trɒvʃ mj‌bndnd vt͡ʃjzhɒj پnhɒn ʃdh rɒ bh rvʃnɒjj bjrvn mj‌آvrnd ɒmɒ hkmt ɒz kd͡ʒɒ پjdɒ mj‌ʃvd؟ vd͡ʒɒj ftɒnt kd͡ʒɒ ɒst؟ ɒnsɒn ɣjmt آn rɒnmj dɒnd v dr zmjn zndɡɒn پjdɒ nmj ʃvd ld͡ʒh mj‌ɡvjd kh dr mn njst، v drjɒ mj‌ɡvjd kh nzdmn nmj bɒʃd zr xɒls bh ʔvzʃ dɒdh nmj ʃvd v nɣrh brɒj ɣjmtʃ snd͡ʒjdh nmj ɡrdd bh zr xɒls ɒvfjr آn rɒ ɣjmt ntvɒn krd، v nh bh d͡ʒzʔ ɡrɒnbhɒ v jɒɣvt kbvd bɒ tlɒ v آbɡjnh آn rɒ brɒbr ntvɒn krd، v zjvrhɒj tlɒj xɒls bdl آn nmj ʃvd mrd͡ʒɒn v blvr mzkvrnmj ʃvd v ɣjmt hkmt ɒz lʔl ɡrɒntr ɒst zbrd͡ʒd hbʃ bɒ آn msɒvj nmj ʃvd v bh zrxɒls snd͡ʒjdh nmj ɡrdd پs hkmt ɒzkd͡ʒɒ mj‌آjd؟ v mkɒn ftɒnt kd͡ʒɒ ɒst؟ ɒzt͡ʃʃm tmɒmj zndɡɒn پnhɒn ɒst، v ɒz mrɣɒn hvɒmxfj mj‌bɒʃd ɒbdvn v mvt mj‌ɡvjnd kh آvɒzh آn rɒ bh ɡvʃ xvd ʃnjdh‌ɒjm xdɒ rɒh آn rɒ drk mj‌knd v ɒv mkɒnʃ rɒ mj‌dɒnd zjrɒkh ɒv tɒ krɒnh hɒj zmjn mj‌ŋrd v آnt͡ʃh rɒ kh zjrtmɒmj آsmɒn ɒst mj‌bjnd tɒ vzn ɒz brɒj bɒdɣrɒr dhd، v آbhɒ rɒ bh mjzɒn bپjmɒjd hŋɒmj kh ɣɒnvnj brɒj bɒrɒn ɣrɒr dɒd، v rɒhj brɒj shɒm rʔd، آŋɒh آn rɒ djd v آn rɒ bjɒn krd آn rɒmhjɒ sɒxt v hm tftjʃʃ nmvdv bh ɒnsɒn ɡft ɒjnk trs xdɒvnd hkmt ɒst، v ɒzbdj ɒd͡ʒtnɒb nmvdn، ftɒnt mj‌bɒʃd» v bh ɒnsɒn ɡft ɒjnk trs xdɒvnd hkmt ɒst، v ɒzbdj ɒd͡ʒtnɒb nmvdn، ftɒnt mj‌bɒʃd» v ɒjvb bɒz msl xvd rɒ آvrdh، ɡft «kɒʃ kh mn msl mɒhhɒj پjʃ mj‌bvdm v msl rvzhɒjj kh xdɒ mrɒ dr آnhɒ ŋɒh mj‌dɒʃt hŋɒmj kh t͡ʃrɒɣ ɒv br sr mn mj‌tɒbjd، v bɒ nvr ɒv bh tɒrjkj rɒh mj‌rftm t͡ʃnɒnkh dr rvzhɒj kɒmrɒnj xvd mj‌bvdm، hŋɒmj kh sr xdɒ br xjmh mn mj‌mɒnd vɣtj kh ɣɒdr mtlɣ hnvz bɒ mn mj‌bvd، v frzndɒnm bh ɒtrɒf mn mj‌bvdnd hjnj kh ɣdmhɒj xvd rɒ bɒkrh mj‌ʃstm v sxrh، nhrhɒj rvɣn rɒ brɒj mn mj rjxt t͡ʃvn bh drvɒzh ʃhr bjrvn mj‌rftm vkrsj xvd rɒ dr t͡ʃhɒr svɣ hɒzr mj‌sɒxtm d͡ʒvɒnɒn mrɒ djdh، xvd rɒ mxfj mj‌sɒxtnd، vپjrɒn brxɒsth، mj‌ɒjstɒdnd srvrɒn ɒz sxn‌ɡftn bɒzmj ɒjstɒdnd، v dst bh dhɒn xvdmj ɡzɒʃtnd آvɒz ʃrjfɒn sɒkt mj‌ʃd vzbɒn bh kɒm ɒjʃɒn mj‌t͡ʃsbjd zjrɒ ɡvʃj kh mrɒ mj‌ʃnjd، mrɒ xvʃhɒl mj‌xvɒnd v t͡ʃʃmj kh mrɒ mj‌djd، brɒjm ʃhɒdt mj‌dɒd zjrɒfɣjrj kh ɒstɣɒsh mj‌krd ɒv rɒ mj‌rhɒnjdm، vjtjmj kh njz mʔɒvn ndɒʃt brkt ʃxsj kh dr hlɒkt bvd، bh mn mj‌rsjd v dl bjvh‌zn rɒxvʃ mj‌sɒxtm ʔdɒlt rɒ پvʃjdm v mrɒmlbs sɒxt، v ɒnsɒf mn msl rdɒ v tɒd͡ʒ bvd mn bh d͡ʒht kvrɒn t͡ʃʃm bvdm، v bh d͡ʒht lŋɒn پɒj brɒj mskjnɒn پdr bvdm، v dʔvɒjj rɒ kh nmj dɒnstm، tfhs mj‌krdm dndɒnhɒj آsjɒj ʃrjr rɒ mj‌ʃkstm v ʃkɒr rɒ ɒzdndɒnhɒjʃ mj‌rbvdm «v mj‌ɡftm، dr آʃjɒnh xvd d͡ʒɒn xvɒhm sپrd v ɒjɒm xvjʃ rɒ msl ʔnɣɒ tvjl xvɒhm sɒxt rjʃh mn bh svj آbhɒ kʃjdh xvɒhdɡʃt، v ʃbnm br ʃɒxh hɒjm sɒkn xvɒhd ʃd d͡ʒlɒl mn dr mn tɒzh xvɒhd ʃd، v kmɒnm drdstm nv xvɒhd mɒnd mrɒ mj‌ʃnjdnd v ɒntzɒrmj kʃjdnd، v brɒj mʃvrt mn sɒkt mj‌mɒndnd bʔd ɒz klɒm mn djɡr sxn nmj ɡftnd v ɣvl mn br ɒjʃɒn frv mj‌t͡ʃkjd v brɒj mn msl bɒrɒn ɒntzɒr mj‌kʃjdnd v dhɒn xvjʃ rɒ msl bɒrɒn آxrjn bɒz mj‌krdnd ɒɡr br ɒjʃɒn mj‌xndjdm bɒvr nmj krdnd، v nvr t͡ʃhrh mrɒ tɒrjk nmj sɒxtndrɒh rɒ brɒj ɒjʃɒn ɒxtjɒr krdh، bh rjɒst mj‌nʃstm، v dr mjɒn lʃkr، msl پɒdʃɒh sɒkn mj‌bvdm، v msl ksj‌kh nvhh‌ɡrɒn rɒ tslj mj‌bxʃd rɒh rɒ brɒj ɒjʃɒn ɒxtjɒr krdh، bh rjɒst mj‌nʃstm، v dr mjɒn lʃkr، msl پɒdʃɒh sɒkn mj‌bvdm، v msl ksj‌kh nvhh‌ɡrɒn rɒ tslj mj‌bxʃd «v ɒmɒ ɒlɒn ksɒnj kh ɒz mn xrdsɒltrndbr mn ɒsthzɒ mj‌knnd، kh krɒht mj‌dɒʃtm ɒz ɒjnkh پdrɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ bɒ sɡɒn ɡlh xvd bɡzɒrm ɣvt dsthɒj ɒjʃɒn njz brɒj mn t͡ʃh fɒjdh dɒʃt؟ ksɒnj kh tvɒnɒjj ɒjʃɒn zɒjʔ ʃdh bvd، ɒz ɒhtjɒd͡ʒ v ɣhtj bj‌tɒb ʃdh، zmjn xʃk rɒ dr zlmt xrɒbj v vjrɒnj mj‌xɒjjdnd xbɒzj rɒ dr mjɒn bvth‌hɒ mj‌t͡ʃjdnd، v rjʃh ʃvrɡjɒh nɒn ɒjʃɒn bvd ɒz mjɒn mrdmɒn rɒndh mj‌ʃdnd ɒz ʔɣb ɒjʃɒn msl dzdɒn، hjɒhvmj krdnd dr ɡrjvh hɒj vɒdjhɒ sɒkn mj‌ʃdnd dr hfrh hɒj zmjn v dr sxrh‌hɒ dr mjɒn bvth‌hɒ ʔrʔr mj‌krdnd، zjr xɒrhɒ bɒ hm d͡ʒmʔ mj‌ʃdnd ɒbnɒj ɒhmɣɒn v ɒbnɒj mrdm bj‌nɒm، bjrvn ɒz zmjn rɒndh mj‌ɡrdjdnd v ɒmɒ ɒlɒn srvd ɒjʃɒn ʃdh‌ɒm v ɒz brɒj ɒjʃɒn zrb‌ɒlmsl ɡrdjdh‌ɒm mrɒ mkrvh dɒʃth، ɒz mn dvrmj ʃvnd، v ɒz آb dhɒn br rvjm ɒndɒxtn، bɒznmj ɒjstnd t͡ʃvnkh zh rɒ br mn bɒz krdh، mrɒmbtlɒ sɒxt پs lɡɒm rɒ پjʃ rvjm rhɒ krdnd ɒz trf rɒst mn ɒnbvh ʔvɒm ɒlnɒs brxɒsth، پɒhɒjm rɒ ɒz پjʃ dr mj‌brnd، v rɒhhɒj hlɒkt xvjʃ rɒ br mn mhjɒ mj‌sɒznd rɒh mrɒ xrɒb krdh، bh ɒzjtm ɒɣdɒm mj‌nmɒjnd، v xvd mʔɒvnj ndɒrnd ɡvjɒ ɒz slmh hɒj vsjʔ mj‌آjnd، v ɒzmjɒn xrɒbh‌hɒ br mn hd͡ʒvm mj‌آvrnd trshɒ brmn brɡʃth، آbrvj mrɒ msl bɒd tʔɒɣb mj‌knnd، v fjrvzj mn msl ɒbr mj‌ɡzrd v ɒlɒn d͡ʒɒnm br mn rjxth ʃdh ɒst، v rvzhɒj msjbt، mrɒ ɡrftɒrnmvdh ɒst ʃbɒŋɒh ɒstxvɒnhɒjm dr ɒndrvn mn sfth mj‌ʃvd، v پjhɒjm آrɒm ndɒrd ɒzʃdt sxtj lbɒsm mtɣjr ʃdh ɒst، v mrɒ msl ɡrjbɒn پjrɒhnm tŋ mj‌ɡjrd mrɒ dr ɡl ɒndɒxth ɒst، kh msl xɒk v xɒkstr ɡrdjdh‌ɒm «nzd tv tzrʔ mj‌nmɒjm v mrɒ mstd͡ʒɒb nmj knj، v brmj xjzm v br mn nzr nmj ɒndɒzj xvjʃtn rɒ mtbdl sɒxth، br mn bjrhm ʃdh‌ɒj، bɒ ɣvt dst xvd bh mn d͡ʒfɒ mj‌nmɒjj mrɒ bh bɒd brdɒʃth، brآn svɒr ɡrdɒnjdj، v mrɒdr tndbɒd پrɒkndh sɒxtj zjrɒ mj‌dɒnm kh mrɒbh mvt bɒz xvɒhj ɡrdɒnjd، v bh xɒnh‌ɒj kh brɒj hmh zndɡɒn mʔjn ɒst jɣjn br tvdh vjrɒn dst xvd rɒ drɒz nxvɒhd krd، v t͡ʃvn ksj drblɒ ɡrftɒr ʃvd، آjɒ bh ɒjn sbb ɒstɣɒsh nmj knd؟ آjɒ brɒj hr mstmndj ɡrjh nmj krdm، v dlm bh d͡ʒht mskjn rnd͡ʒjdh nmj ʃd lkn t͡ʃvn ɒmjd njkvjj dɒʃtm bdj آmd، v t͡ʃvn ɒntzɒr nvrkʃjdm zlmt rsjd ɒhʃɒjm mj‌d͡ʒvʃd vآrɒm nmj ɡjrd، v rvzhɒj msjbt mrɒ drɡrfth ɒst mɒtm‌knɒn bj‌آftɒb ɡrdʃ mj‌knm v drd͡ʒmɒʔt brxɒsth، tzrʔ mj‌nmɒjm brɒdrʃɣɒlɒn ʃdh‌ɒm، v rfjɣ ʃtrmrɣ ɡrdjdh‌ɒm پvst mn sjɒh ɡʃth، ɒz mn mj‌rjzd، vɒstxvɒnhɒjm ɒz hrɒrt svxth ɡrdjdh ɒstbrbt mn bh nvhh ɡrj mbdl ʃdh v nɒj mn bh آvɒz ɡrjh knndɡɒn brbt mn bh nvhh ɡrj mbdl ʃdh v nɒj mn bh آvɒz ɡrjh knndɡɒn «bɒ t͡ʃʃmɒn xvd ʔhd bsth‌ɒm، پs t͡ʃɡvnh br dvʃjzh‌ɒj nzr ɒfknm؟ zjrɒɣsmt xdɒ ɒz ɒʔlj t͡ʃjst؟ v nsjb ɣɒdrmtlɣ، ɒz ɒʔlj ʔljjn؟ آjɒ آn brɒj ʃrjrɒn hlɒkt njst؟ v bh d͡ʒht ʔɒmlɒn bdj msjbt nj؟ آjɒ ɒv rɒhhɒj mrɒ nmj bjnd؟ v d͡ʒmjʔ ɣdmhɒjm rɒ nmj ʃmɒrd؟ ɒɡr bɒ drvɣ rɒh mj‌rftm jɒ پɒjhɒjm bɒ frjb mj‌ʃtɒbjd، mrɒ bh mjzɒn ʔdɒlt bsnd͡ʒd، tɒ xdɒ kɒmljt mrɒ bdɒnd ɒɡrɣdmhɒjm ɒz trjɣ آvɒrh ɡrdjdh، v ɣlbm dr‌پj t͡ʃʃmɒnm rfth، v lkh‌ɒj bh‌dsthɒjm t͡ʃsbjdh bɒʃd، پs mn kʃt knm v djɡrj bxvrd، vmhsvl mn ɒz rjʃh‌kndh ʃvd ɒɡr ɣlbm bh znj frjfth ʃdh، jɒ nzd dr hmsɒjh xvd dr kmjn nʃsth bɒʃm، پs zn mn brɒj ʃxsj djɡrآsjɒ knd، v djɡrɒn br ɒv xm ʃvnd zjrɒ kh آn ɣbɒht mj‌bvd v tɣsjrj szɒvɒr hkm dɒvrɒn t͡ʃvnkh ɒjn آtʃj mj‌bvd kh tɒ ɒbdvn mj‌svzɒnjd، v tmɒmj mhsvl mrɒ ɒz rjʃh mj‌knd ɒɡr dʔvj bndh v knjz xvd rɒ rdmj krdm، hŋɒmj kh br mn mdʔj mj‌ʃdnd پs t͡ʃvn xdɒ bh zd mn brxjzd t͡ʃh xvɒhm krd؟ v hŋɒmj kh tftjʃ nmɒjd bh ɒv t͡ʃh d͡ʒvɒb xvɒhm dɒd؟ آjɒ آn ks kh mrɒ dr rhm آfrjdɒv rɒ njz njɒfrjd؟ v آjɒ ks vɒhd، mɒ rɒ dr rhm nsrʃt؟ «ɒɡr mrɒd mskjnɒn rɒ ɒz ɒjʃɒn mnʔ nmvdh bɒʃm، v t͡ʃʃmɒn bjvh‌znɒn rɒ tɒr ɡrdɒnjdh، ɒɡrlɣmh xvd rɒ bh tnhɒjj xvrdh bɒʃm، v jtjm ɒz آn tnɒvl nnmvdh، v hɒl آnkh ɒv ɒz d͡ʒvɒnjm bɒ mn msl پdr پrvrʃ mj‌jɒft، v ɒz btn mɒdrm bjvh‌zn rɒ rhbrj mj‌nmvdm ɒɡr ksj rɒ ɒz brhŋj hlɒk djdh bɒʃm، v mskjn rɒ bdvn پvʃʃ، ɒɡr kmrhɒj ɒv mrɒ brkt ndɒdh bɒʃd، v ɒz پʃm ɡvsfndɒn mn ɡrm nʃdh، ɒɡr dst xvd rɒ br jtjm blnd krdh bɒʃm، hŋɒmj kh ɒʔɒnt xvd rɒ drdrvɒzh mj‌djdm، پs bɒzvj mn ɒz ktfm bjftd، v sɒʔdm ɒz ɣlm آn ʃksth ʃvd zjrɒ kh hlɒkt ɒz xdɒ brɒj mn trs mj‌bvd v bh‌sbb kbrjɒjj ɒv tvɒnɒjj ndɒʃtm ɒɡr tlɒ rɒ ɒmjdxvd mj‌sɒxtm v bh zr xɒls mj‌ɡftm tv ɒʔtmɒdmn hstj، ɒɡr ɒz frɒvɒnj dvlt xvjʃ ʃɒdj mj‌nmvdm، v ɒz ɒjnkh dst mn bsjɒr ksb nmvdh bvd، ɒɡr t͡ʃvn آftɒb mj‌tɒbjd br آn nzrmj krdm v br mɒh، hŋɒmj kh bɒ drxʃndɡj sjrmj krd v dl mn xfjh frjfth mj‌ʃd v dhɒnm dstm rɒ mj‌bvsjd ɒjn njz ɡnɒhj mstvd͡ʒb ɣsɒs mj‌bvd zjrɒ xdɒj mtʔɒl rɒ mnkrmj ʃdm ɒɡr ɒz msjbt dʃmn xvd ʃɒdj mj‌krdm jɒ hjnj kh blɒ bh ɒv ʔɒrz mj‌ʃd vd͡ʒdmj nmvdm، v hɒl آnkh zbɒn xvd rɒ ɒz ɡnɒh vrzjdn bɒzdɒʃth، br d͡ʒɒn ɒv lʔnt rɒ svɒl nnmvdm ɒɡr ɒhl xjmh mn nmj ɡftnd kjst kh ɒz ɡvʃt ɒv sjr nʃdh bɒʃd، ɣrjb drkvt͡ʃh ʃb rɒ bh‌sr nmj brd v dr xvd rɒ bh rvj msɒfr mj‌ɡʃvdm ɒɡr msl آdm، tɣsjr xvd rɒmj پvʃɒnjdm v ʔsjɒn xvjʃ rɒ dr sjnh xvdmxfj mj‌sɒxtm، ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht kh ɒz ɒnbvh ksjrmj trsjdm v ɒhɒnt ɣbɒjl mrɒ hrɒsɒn mj‌sɒxt، پs sɒkt mɒndh، ɒz dr xvd bjrvn nmj rftm kɒʃ ksj bvd kh mrɒ mj‌ʃnjd، ɒjnk ɒmzɒj mn hɒzr ɒst پs ɣɒdr mtlɣ mrɒ d͡ʒvɒb dhd v ɒjnk ktɒbtj kh mdʔj mn nvʃth ɒst jɣjn kh آn rɒ br dvʃ xvd brmj dɒʃtm v msl tɒd͡ʒ brxvd mj‌bstm ʃmɒrh ɣdmhɒj xvd rɒ brɒj ɒvbjɒn mj‌krdm v msl ɒmjrj bh ɒv tɣrb mj‌d͡ʒstm ɒɡr zmjn mn br mn frjɒd mj‌krd v mrzhɒjʃ bɒ hm ɡrjh mj‌krdnd، ɒɡr mhsvlɒtʃ rɒ bdvn ɣjmt mj‌xvrdm v d͡ʒɒn mɒlkɒnʃ rɒ tlf mj‌nmvdm،پs xɒrhɒ bh ʔvz ɡndm vkrkɒs bh ʔvz d͡ʒv brvjd»sxnɒn ɒjvb tmɒm ʃd پs xɒrhɒ bh ʔvz ɡndm vkrkɒs bh ʔvz d͡ʒv brvjd»sxnɒn ɒjvb tmɒm ʃd پs آn sh mrd ɒz d͡ʒvɒb dɒdn bh ɒjvb bɒz mɒndnd t͡ʃvnkh ɒv dr nzr xvd ʔɒdl bvd آŋɒh xʃm ɒljhv ɒbn brkئjl bvzj kh ɒzɣbjlh rɒm bvd mʃtʔl ʃd، v ɣzbʃ br ɒjvb ɒfrvxth ɡrdjd، ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht kh xvjʃtn rɒ ɒzxdɒ ʔɒdltr mj‌nmvd v xʃmʃ br sh rfjɣ xvd ɒfrvxth ɡrdjd، ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht kh hr‌t͡ʃndd͡ʒvɒb nmj jɒftnd، ɒmɒ ɒjvb rɒ md͡ʒrm mj‌ʃmrdnd v ɒljhv ɒz sxn‌ɡftn bɒ ɒjvb drŋ nmvdh bvd zjrɒ kh ɒjʃɒn dr ʔmr، ɒz vj bzrɡtrbvdnd ɒmɒ t͡ʃvn ɒljhv djd kh bh zbɒn آn sh mrdd͡ʒvɒbj njst، پs xʃmʃ ɒfrvxth ʃd v ɒljhv ɒbn brkئjl bvzj bh sxn آmdh، ɡft «mn dr ʔmr sɣjr hstm، v ʃmɒ mvsfjd bnɒbrɒjn trsjdh، d͡ʒrɒt nkrdm kh rɒj xvd rɒ brɒj ʃmɒbjɒn knm v ɡftm rvzhɒ sxn ɡvjd، v ksrt sɒlhɒ، hkmt rɒ ɒʔlɒm nmɒjd ljkn dr ɒnsɒn rvhj hst، v nfxh ɣɒdrmtlɣ، ɒjʃɒn rɒ ftɒnt mj‌bxʃd bzrɡɒn njstnd kh hkmt dɒrnd، v nh پjrɒn kh ɒnsɒf rɒ mj‌fhmnd bnɒbrɒjn mj‌ɡvjm kh mrɒ bʃnv v mn njz rɒj xvd rɒ bjɒn xvɒhm nmvd ɒjnk ɒz sxn‌ɡftn bɒ ʃmɒ drŋ nmvdm، v brɒhjn ʃmɒ rɒ ɡvʃ ɡrftm tɒ sxnɒn rɒ kɒvʃ ɡrdjd v mn dr ʃmɒ tɒml nmvdm v ɒjnk ksj ɒz ʃmɒ nbvd kh ɒjvb rɒ mlzm sɒzd jɒ sxnɒn ɒv rɒ d͡ʒvɒb dhd mbɒdɒ bɡvjjd kh hkmt rɒdrjɒft nmvdh‌ɒjm، xdɒ ɒv rɒ mɣlvb mj‌sɒzd v nh ɒnsɒn zjrɒ kh sxnɒn xvd rɒ bh zd mn trtjb ndɒdh ɒst، v bh sxnɒn ʃmɒ ɒv rɒ d͡ʒvɒb nxvɒhm dɒd ɒjʃɒn hjrɒn ʃdh، djɡr d͡ʒvɒb ndɒdnd، vsxn ɒz ɒjʃɒn mnɣtʔ ʃd پs آjɒ mn ɒntzɒrbkʃm t͡ʃvnkh sxn nmj ɡvjnd؟ v sɒkt ʃdh، djɡr d͡ʒvɒb nmj dhnd؟ پs mn njz ɒz hsh xvd d͡ʒvɒb xvɒhm dɒd، v mn njz rɒj xvd rɒbjɒn xvɒhm nmvd zjrɒ kh ɒz sxnɒn، mmlvhstm v rvh bɒtn mn، mrɒ bh tŋ mj‌آvrd ɒjnk dl mn msl ʃrɒbj ɒst kh mftvh nʃdh bɒʃd، v msl mʃkhɒj tɒzh nzdjk ɒst btrkd sxn xvɒhm rɒnd tɒ rɒht jɒbm v lbhɒj xvdrɒ ɡʃvdh، d͡ʒvɒb xvɒhm dɒd hɒʃɒ ɒz mn kh trfdɒrj nmɒjm v bh ɒhdj klɒm tmlɣ‌آmjz ɡvjmt͡ʃvnkh bh ɡftn sxnɒn tmlɣ‌آmjz ʔɒrf njstm vɒlɒ xɒlɣm mrɒ bh zvdj xvɒhd brdɒʃt t͡ʃvnkh bh ɡftn sxnɒn tmlɣ‌آmjz ʔɒrf njstm vɒlɒ xɒlɣm mrɒ bh zvdj xvɒhd brdɒʃt «ljkn‌ɒj ɒjvb، sxnɒn mrɒ ɒstmɒʔ nmɒ v bh tmɒmj klɒm mn ɡvʃ bɡjr ɒjnk ɒlɒn dhɒn xvd rɒ ɡʃvdm، v zbɒnm dr kɒmm mtklm ʃd klɒm mn mvɒfɣ rɒstj ɣlbm xvɒhdbvd v lbhɒjm bh mʔrft xɒls tntɣ xvɒhdnmvd rvh xdɒ mrɒ آfrjdh، v nfxh ɣɒdrmtlɣ mrɒ zndh sɒxth ɒst ɒɡr mj‌tvɒnj mrɒ d͡ʒvɒb dh، v پjʃ rvj mn، klɒm rɒ trtjb dɒdh bɒjst ɒjnk mn msl tv ɒz xdɒ hstm v njst ɒjnk ɒv ʔlthɒ brmn mj‌d͡ʒvjd v mrɒ dʃmn xvdmj ʃmɒrd پɒjhɒjm rɒ dr kndh mj‌ɡzɒrd v hmh rɒhhɒjm rɒ mrɒɣbt mj‌nmɒjd hɒn dr ɒjn ɒmr tvsɒdɣ njstj mn tv rɒ d͡ʒvɒb mj‌dhm، zjrɒ xdɒɒz ɒnsɒn bzrɡtr ɒst t͡ʃrɒ bɒ ɒv mʔɒrzh mj‌nmɒjj، ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht kh ɒz hmh ɒʔmɒl xvdɒtlɒʔ nmj dhd؟ zjrɒ xdɒ jk dfʔh tklm mj‌knd، blkh dv dfʔh v ɒnsɒn mlɒhzh nmj nmɒjd dr xvɒb، dr rvjɒj ʃb، t͡ʃvn xvɒb sŋjn br ɒnsɒn mstvlj mj‌ʃvd، hjnj kh drbstr xvd dr xvɒb mj‌bɒʃd آŋɒh ɡvʃhɒj ɒnsɒn rɒ mj‌ɡʃɒjd v tɒdjb ɒjʃɒn rɒ xtm mj‌sɒzd tɒ ɒnsɒn rɒ ɒz ɒʔmɒlʃ brɡrdɒnd vtkbr rɒ ɒz mrdmɒn bپvʃɒnd d͡ʒɒn ɒv rɒ ɒz hfrh ŋɒh mj‌dɒrd v hjɒt ɒv rɒ ɒz hlɒkt ʃmʃjr bɒdrd dr bstr xvd srznʃ mj‌jɒbd، v ɒztrɒb dɒjmj dr ɒstxvɒnhɒj vj ɒst پs d͡ʒɒn ɒvnɒn rɒ mkrvh mj‌dɒrd v nfs ɒv xvrɒk ltjf rɒ ɡvʃt ɒv t͡ʃnɒn frsvdh ʃd kh djdh nmj ʃvdv ɒstxvɒnhɒj vj kh djdh nmj ʃd brhnh ɡrdjdh ɒst d͡ʒɒn ɒv bh hfrh nzdjk mj‌ʃvd v hjɒt ɒv bh hlɒk knndɡɒn «ɒɡr brɒj vj jkj bh mnzlh hzɒr frʃth jɒmtvstj bɒʃd، tɒ آnt͡ʃh rɒ kh brɒj ɒnsɒn rɒst ɒst bh vj ɒʔlɒn nmɒjd، xvɒhd frmvd، v rvj ɒv rɒ bɒ ʃɒdmɒnj xvɒhd djd v ʔdɒlt ɒnsɒn rɒ bh ɒv rd xvɒhdnmvd پs dr mjɒn mrdmɒn srvd xvɒndh، xvɒhd ɡft ɡnɒh krdm v rɒstj rɒ mnhrf sɒxtm، v mkɒfɒt آn bh mn nrsjd nfs mrɒ ɒzfrvrftn mtvd͡ʒh ʃdh، mrɒɒstmɒʔ nmɒ، v xɒmvʃ bɒʃ tɒ mn sxn rɒnm ɒɡr sxnj dɒrj bh mn d͡ʒvɒb bdh، mtklm ʃvzjrɒ mj‌xvɒhm tv rɒ mbrj sɒzmv ɒɡr nh، tvmrɒ bʃnv xɒmvʃ bɒʃ tɒ hkmt rɒ bh tv tʔljm dhm» v ɒɡr nh، tvmrɒ bʃnv xɒmvʃ bɒʃ tɒ hkmt rɒ bh tv tʔljm dhm» پs ɒljhv tklm nmvdh، ɡft «ɒj hkjmɒn sxnɒn mrɒ bʃnvjd، v‌ɒj ʔɒrfɒn، bh mn ɡvʃ ɡjrjd zjrɒ ɡvʃ، sxnɒn rɒ ɒmthɒn mj‌knd، t͡ʃnɒnkh kɒm، tʔɒm rɒ zvɣ mj‌nmɒjd ɒnsɒf rɒ brɒj xvd ɒxtjɒr knjm، v drmjɒn xvd njkvjj rɒ bfhmjm t͡ʃvnkh ɒjvb ɡfth ɒst kh bj‌ɡnɒh hstm v xdɒ dɒd mrɒ ɒz mn brdɒʃth ɒst hrt͡ʃnd ɒnsɒf bɒ mn ɒst drvɣɡv ʃmrdh ʃdh‌ɒm، v hrt͡ʃnd bj‌tɣsjrm، d͡ʒrɒht ɒlɒn‌ɒj sɒhbɒn ftɒnt mrɒ bʃnvjd، hɒʃɒɒz xdɒ kh bdj knd v ɒz ɣɒdrmtlɣ، kh zlm nmɒjd zjrɒ kh ɒnsɒn rɒ bh hsb ʔmlʃ mkɒfɒt mj‌dhd، v br hrks mvɒfɣ rɒhʃ mj‌rsɒnd vbh drstj kh xdɒ bdj nmj knd، v ɣɒdr mtlɣ ɒnsɒf rɒ mnhrf nmj sɒzd kjst kh zmjn rɒbh ɒv tfvjz nmvdh، v kjst kh tmɒmj rbʔ mskvn rɒ bh ɒv sپrdh bɒʃd ɒɡr ɒv dl xvd rɒbh vj mʃɣvl sɒzd، ɒɡr rvh v nfxh xvjʃ rɒnzd xvd bɒzɡjrd، tmɒmj bʃr bɒ hm hlɒk mj‌ʃvnd v ɒnsɒn bh xɒk rɒd͡ʒʔ mj‌ɡrdd پs ɒɡr fhm dɒrj ɒjn rɒ bʃnv، v bh آvɒz klɒm mn ɡvʃ dh آjɒ ksj‌kh ɒz ɒnsɒf nfrt dɒrd sltnt xvɒhd nmvd؟ v آjɒ ʔɒdl kbjr rɒ bh ɡnɒh ɒsnɒdmj dhj؟ آjɒ bh پɒdʃɒh ɡfth mj‌ʃvd kh lئjm hstj، jɒ bh nd͡ʒjbɒn kh ʃrjr mj‌bɒʃjd؟ پs t͡ʃɡvnh bh آnkh ɒmjrɒn rɒ trfdɒrj nmj nmɒjd vdvltmnd rɒ br fɣjr trd͡ʒjh nmj dhd zjrɒ kh d͡ʒmjʔ ɒjʃɒn ʔml dsthɒj vj‌ɒnd drlhzh‌ɒj dr nsf ʃb mj‌mjrnd ɣvm mʃvʃ ʃdh، mj‌ɡzrnd، v zvrآvrɒn bj‌vɒsth dst ɒnsɒn hlɒk mj‌ʃvnd «zjrɒ t͡ʃʃmɒn ɒv br rɒhhɒj ɒnsɒn mj‌bɒʃd، v tmɒmj ɣdmhɒjʃ rɒ mj‌ŋrd zlmtj njst v sɒjh mvt nj، kh xtɒkɒrɒn xvjʃtn rɒ drآn پnhɒn nmɒjnd zjrɒ ɒndk zmɒnj br ɒhdj tɒml nmj knd tɒ ɒv پjʃ xdɒ bh mhɒkmh bjɒjd zvrآvrɒn rɒ bdvn tfhs xrd mj‌knd، vdjɡrɒn rɒ bh‌d͡ʒɒj ɒjʃɒn ɣrɒr mj‌dhd hrآjnh ɒʔmɒl ɒjʃɒn rɒ tʃxjs mj‌nmɒjd، v ʃbɒŋɒh ɒjʃɒn rɒ vɒʒɡvn mj‌sɒzd tɒ hlɒk ʃvnd bh‌d͡ʒɒj ʃrjrɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ mj‌znd، dr mkɒn nzrknndɡɒn ɒz آn d͡ʒht kh ɒz mtɒbʔt ɒvmnhrf ʃdnd، v dr hmh trjɣhɒj vj tɒml nnmvdnd tɒ frjɒd fɣjr rɒ bh ɒv brsɒnnd، v ɒvfɣɒn mskjnɒn rɒ bʃnvd t͡ʃvn ɒv آrɒmj dhdkjst kh dr ɒztrɒb ɒndɒzd، v t͡ʃvn rvj xvdrɒ bپvʃɒnd kjst kh ɒv rɒ tvɒnd djd xvɒh bh ɒmtj xvɒh bh ɒnsɒnj msɒvj ɒst، tɒ mrdmɒn fɒd͡ʒrsltnt nnmɒjnd v ɣvm rɒ ɡft t͡ʃvnkh tv rd mj‌knj پs tvɒxtjɒr kn v nh mn v آnt͡ʃh svɒb mj‌dɒnj bɡv sɒhbɒn ftɒnt bh mn xvɒhnd ɡft، blkh hrmrd hkjmj kh mrɒ mj‌ʃnvd kh ɒjvb bdvn mʔrft hrf mj‌znd v klɒm ɒv ɒz rvj tʔɣl njst kɒʃ kh ɒjvb tɒ bh آxr آzmvdh ʃvd، zjrɒ kh msl ʃrjrɒn d͡ʒvɒb mj‌dhdt͡ʃvnkh brɡnɒh xvd tɣjɒn rɒ mzjd mj‌knd v dr mjɒn mɒdstk mj‌znd v bh zd xdɒ sxnɒn bsjɒrmj ɡvjd» t͡ʃvnkh brɡnɒh xvd tɣjɒn rɒ mzjd mj‌knd v dr mjɒn mɒdstk mj‌znd v bh zd xdɒ sxnɒn bsjɒrmj ɡvjd» v ɒlejhv bɒz mtكlّm‌ ʃdh‌، ɡft‌ «آjɒ ɒjn rɒ ɒnsɒf mj‌ʃmɒrj kh ɡftj mn ɒz xdɒ ʔɒdl tr hstm؟ zjrɒ ɡfth‌ɒj brɒj tvt͡ʃh fɒjdh xvɒhd ʃd، v bh t͡ʃh t͡ʃjz bjʃtr ɒz ɡnɒhm mnfʔt xvɒhm jɒft mn tv rɒ d͡ʒvɒb mj‌ɡvjm vrfɣɒjt rɒ bɒ tv bh svj آsmɒnhɒ nzr kn v bbjn vɒflɒk rɒ mlɒhzh nmɒ kh ɒz tv blndtrnd ɒɡr ɡnɒh krdj bh ɒv t͡ʃh rsɒnjdj؟ v ɒɡr tɣsjrhɒj tv bsjɒr ʃd brɒj vj t͡ʃh krdj؟ ɒɡr bj‌ɡnɒh ʃdj bh ɒv t͡ʃh bxʃjdj؟ v jɒ ɒz dst tv t͡ʃh t͡ʃjz rɒ ɡrfth ɒst؟ ʃrɒrt tv bh mrdj t͡ʃvn tv zrr mj‌rsɒnd v ʔdɒlt tv bh bnj آdm fɒjdh mj‌rsɒnd ɒz ksrt zlmhɒ frjɒd ɣvt dɒdh v ɡrdn ɒv rɒ bh jɒl mlbs ɡrdɒnjdh‌ɒj؟ آjɒ ɒv rɒ msl mlx bh d͡ʒst vxjz آvrdh‌ɒj؟ xrvʃ ʃjhh ɒv mhjb ɒst dr vɒdj پɒ zdh، ɒz ɣvt xvd vd͡ʒdmj nmɒjd v bh mɣɒblh mslhɒn bjrvn mj‌rvd brxvf ɒsthzɒء krdh، hrɒsɒn nmj ʃvd، v ɒz dm ʃmʃjr brnmj ɡrdd trkʃ br ɒv t͡ʃkt͡ʃk mj‌knd، v njzh drxʃndh v mzrɒɣ bɒ xʃm vɣjz zmjn rɒ mj‌nvrdd v t͡ʃvn krnɒ sdɒ mj‌kndnmj ɒjstd، vɣtj kh krnɒ nvɒxth ʃvd hh hh mj‌ɡvjd v d͡ʒŋ rɒ ɒz dvr ɒstʃmɒm mj‌knd، vxrvʃ srdɒrɒn v ɣvɣɒ rɒ آjɒ ɒz hkmt tvʃɒhjn mj‌پrd؟ v bɒlhɒj xvd rɒ btrf d͡ʒnvb پhn mj‌knd؟ آjɒ ɒz frmɒn tv ʔɣɒb sʔvdmj nmɒjd v آʃjɒnh xvd rɒ bh‌d͡ʒɒj blnd mj‌sɒzd؟ br sxrh sɒkn ʃdh، mɒvɒ mj‌sɒzd br sxrh tjz v br mlɒz mnjʔ ɒz آnd͡ʒɒ xvrɒk xvd rɒ bh nzr mj‌آvrd v t͡ʃʃmɒnʃ ɒz dvr mj‌ŋrdbt͡ʃh hɒjʃ xvn rɒ mj‌mknd v d͡ʒɒjj kh kʃtɡɒnnd ɒv آnd͡ʒɒ ɒst» bt͡ʃh hɒjʃ xvn rɒ mj‌mknd v d͡ʒɒjj kh kʃtɡɒnnd ɒv آnd͡ʒɒ ɒst» v xdɒvnd mكrّr كrdh‌، ɒjvb‌ rɒ ɡft‌ «آjɒ md͡ʒɒdlh knndh bɒ ɣɒdrmtlɣ mxɒsmh nmɒjd؟ ksj‌kh bɒ xdɒ mhɒd͡ʒh knd آn rɒ d͡ʒvɒb bdhd» آŋɒh ɒjvb xdɒvnd rɒ d͡ʒvɒb dɒdh، ɡft «ɒjnk mn hɣjr hstm v bh tv t͡ʃh d͡ʒvɒb dhm؟ dst xvd rɒ bh dhɒnm ɡzɒʃth‌ɒm jk mrtbh ɡftm v tkrɒr nxvɒhm krd blkh dv mrtbh v nxvɒhm ɒfzvd» پs xdɒvnd ɒjvb rɒ ɒz ɡrdbɒd xtɒb krd vɡft «ɒlɒn kmr xvd rɒ msl mrd bbnd ɒz tvsvɒl mj‌nmɒjm v mrɒ ɒʔlɒm kn آjɒ dɒvrj mrɒnjz bɒtl mj‌nmɒjj؟ v mrɒ mlzm mj‌sɒzj tɒxvjʃtn rɒ ʔɒdl bnmɒjj؟ آjɒ tv rɒ msl xdɒbɒzvjj hst؟ v bh آvɒz msl ɒv rʔd tvɒnj krd؟ ɒlɒn xvjʃtn rɒ bh d͡ʒlɒl v ʔzmt zjnt bdh v bh ʔzt v ʃvkt mlbs sɒz ʃdt ɣzb xvd rɒ brjz v bh hrkh mtkbr ɒst nzr ɒfkndh، ɒvrɒ bh zjr ɒndɒz br hrkh mtkbr ɒst nzr kn v ɒvrɒ zljl bsɒz v ʃrjrɒn rɒ dr d͡ʒɒj ɒjʃɒn پɒjmɒl kn ɒjʃɒn rɒ bɒ hm dr xɒk پnhɒn nmɒ v rvjhɒj ɒjʃɒn rɒ drd͡ʒɒj mxfj mhbvs kn آŋɒh mn njz drbɒrh tv ɒɣrɒr xvɒhm krd، kh dst rɒstt tv rɒ nd͡ʒɒt tvɒnd dɒd ɒjnk bhjmvt kh ɒv rɒ bɒtv آfrjdh‌ɒm kh ʔlf rɒ msl ɡɒv mj‌xvrd، hmɒnɒ ɣvt ɒv dr kmrʃ mj‌bɒʃd، v tvɒnɒjj vj dr rɡhɒj ʃkmʃ dm xvd rɒ msl srvآzɒd mj‌d͡ʒnbɒnd rɡhɒj rɒnʃ bhm پjt͡ʃjdh ɒst ɒstxvɒnhɒjʃ msl lvlh hɒj brnd͡ʒjn vɒʔzɒjʃ msl tjrhɒj آhnjn ɒst ɒv ɒfzl snɒjʔ xdɒ ɒst آn kh ɒv rɒ آfrjd hrbh‌ɒʃ rɒ bh ɒv dɒdh ɒst bh drstj kh kvhhɒ brɒjʃ ʔlvfh mj‌rvjɒnd، kh dr آnhɒ tmɒmj hjvɒnɒt shrɒbɒzj mj‌knnd zjr drxthɒj knɒr mj‌xvɒbd dr sɒjh njzɒr v dr xlɒb drxthɒj knɒr ɒv rɒ bh sɒjh xvd mj‌پvʃɒnd، v bjdhɒj nhr، vj rɒɒhɒth mj‌nmɒjd ɒjnk rvdxɒnh tɣjɒn mj‌knd، ljkn ɒv nmj trsd v ɒɡr‌t͡ʃh ɒrdn drdhɒnʃ rjxth ʃvd ɒjmn xvɒhd bvdآjɒ t͡ʃvn ŋrɒn ɒst ɒv rɒ ɡrftɒr tvɒn krd؟ jɒ bjnj vj rɒ bɒɣlɒb tvɒn sft؟ آjɒ t͡ʃvn ŋrɒn ɒst ɒv rɒ ɡrftɒr tvɒn krd؟ jɒ bjnj vj rɒ bɒɣlɒb tvɒn sft؟ «آjɒ lvjɒtɒn rɒ bɒ ɣlɒb tvɒnj kʃjd؟ jɒzbɒnʃ rɒ bɒ rjsmɒn tvɒnj fʃrd؟ آjɒdr bjnj ɒv mhɒr tvɒnj kʃjd؟ jɒ t͡ʃɒnh‌ɒʃ rɒ bɒɣlɒb tvɒnj sft؟ آjɒ ɒv nzd tv tzrʔ zjɒdxvɒhd nmvd؟ jɒ sxnɒn mlɒjm bh tv xvɒhdɡft؟ آjɒ bɒ tv ʔhd xvɒhd bst jɒ ɒv rɒ brɒj bndɡj dɒjmj xvɒhj ɡrft؟ آjɒ bɒ ɒv msl ɡnd͡ʒʃk bɒzj tvɒnj krd؟ jɒ ɒv rɒ brɒj knjzɒn xvd tvɒnj bst؟ آjɒ d͡ʒmɒʔt sjɒdɒn ɒz ɒvdɒd v std xvɒhnd krd؟ jɒ ɒv rɒ dr mjɒn tɒd͡ʒrɒn tɣsjm xvɒhnd nmvd؟ آjɒ پvst ɒv rɒ bɒ njzh hɒmmlv tvɒnj krd؟ jɒ srʃ rɒ bɒ xtɒfhɒj mɒhj ɡjrɒn؟ ɒɡr dst xvd rɒ br ɒv bɡzɒrj d͡ʒŋ rɒ bh jɒd xvɒhj dɒʃt v djɡr nxvɒhj krd ɒjnk ɒmjd bh ɒv bɒtl ɒst آjɒ ɒz rvjtʃ njz آdmj bh rvj drɒfkndh nmj ʃvd؟ ksj ɒjnɣdr mthvr njst kh ɒv rɒ brɒŋjzɒnd پs kjst kh dr hzvr mn bɒjstd؟ kjst kh sbɣt d͡ʒsth، t͡ʃjzj bh mn dɒdh، tɒbh ɒv rd nmɒjm؟ hrt͡ʃh zjr آsmɒn ɒst ɒz آn mn mj‌bɒʃd «drbɒrh ɒʔzɒjʃ xɒmvʃ nxvɒhm ʃd v ɒzd͡ʒbrvt v d͡ʒmɒl trkjb ɒv xbr xvɒhm dɒd kjst kh rvj lbɒs ɒv rɒ bɒz tvɒnd nmvd؟ vkjst kh dr mjɒn dv sf dndɒnʃ dɒxl ʃvd؟ kjst kh drhɒj t͡ʃhrh‌ɒʃ rɒ bɡʃɒjd؟ dɒjrh dndɒnhɒjʃ hvlnɒk ɒst sپrhɒj zvrآvrʃ fxr ɒv mj‌bɒʃd، bɒ mhr mhkm vsl ʃdh ɒst bɒ jkdjɡr t͡ʃnɒn t͡ʃsbjdh‌ɒnd kh bɒd ɒz mjɒn آnhɒnmj ɡzrd bɒ hmdjɡr t͡ʃnɒn vsl ʃdh‌ɒnd v bɒhm mltsɣnd kh d͡ʒdɒ nmj ʃvnd ɒz ʔtsh hɒj ɒv nvr sɒtʔ mj‌ɡrdd v t͡ʃʃmɒn ɒv msl پlkhɒj fd͡ʒr ɒst ɒz dhɒnʃ mʃʔlhɒ bjrvn mj‌آjd vʃʔlh hɒj آtʃ brmj d͡ʒhd ɒz bjnj hɒj ɒv dvdbrmj آjd msl djɡ d͡ʒvʃndh v پɒtjl ɒz nfs ɒv ɒxɡrhɒ ɒfrvxth mj‌ʃvd v ɒz dhɒnʃ ʃʔlh bjrvn mj‌آjd br ɡrdnʃ ɣvt nʃjmn dɒrd، vhjbt پjʃ rvjʃ rɣs mj‌nmɒjd tbɣɒt ɡvʃt ɒv bhm t͡ʃsbjdh ɒst، v br vj msthkm ɒst kh mthrk nmj ʃvd dlʃ msl sŋ msthkm ɒst، v mɒnnd sŋ zjrjn آsjɒ mhkm mj‌bɒʃd t͡ʃvn ɒv brmj xjzd njrvmndɒn hrɒsɒn mj‌ʃvnd، v ɒz xvf bj‌xvd mj‌ɡrdnd ɒɡr ʃmʃjr bh ɒv ɒndɒxth ʃvd ɒsr nmj knd، v nh njzh v nh mzrɒɣ v nh tjr آhn rɒ msl kɒh mj‌ʃmɒrd v brnd͡ʒ rɒ mɒnnd t͡ʃvb پvsjdh tjrhɒj kmɒn ɒv rɒ frɒr nmj dhd v sŋhɒj flɒxn nzd ɒv bh kɒh mbdl mj‌ʃvd ʔmvd msl kɒh ʃmrdh mj‌ʃvd v br hrkt mzrɒɣ mj‌xndd dr zjrʃ پɒrh hɒj sfɒl tjz ɒst v ɡrdvn پrmjx rɒ br ɡl پhn mj‌knd ld͡ʒh rɒ msl djɡ mj‌ɒfkndv br d͡ʒmjʔ hjvɒnɒt srkʃ پɒdʃɒh ɒst» br hrt͡ʃjz blnd nzr mj‌ɒfkndv br d͡ʒmjʔ hjvɒnɒt srkʃ پɒdʃɒh ɒst» v ɒjvb xdɒvnd rɒ d͡ʒvɒb dɒdh، ɡft «mj‌dɒnm kh bh hr t͡ʃjz ɣɒdr hstj، vɒbdɒ ɣsd tv rɒ mnʔ ɡvʃ drbɒrh tv ʃnjdh bvdm ljkn ɒlɒn t͡ʃʃm mn tv rɒ mj‌bjnd ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht ɒz xvjʃtn krɒht dɒrm v dr xɒk v xɒkstr tvbh mj‌nmɒjm» v vɒɣʔ ʃd bʔd ɒz ɒjnkh xdɒvnd ɒjn sxnɒn rɒ bh ɒjvb ɡfth bvd kh xdɒvnd bh ɒljfɒz tjmɒnj frmvd «xʃm mn br tv v br dv rfjɣt ɒfrvxth ʃdh، zjrɒ kh drbɒrh mn آnt͡ʃh rɒst ɒst msl bndh‌ɒm ɒjvb ŋftjd پs hɒl hft ɡvsɒlh vhft ɣvt͡ʃ brɒj xvd bɡjrjd v nzd bndh mn ɒjvb rfth، ɣrbɒnj svxtnj bh d͡ʒht xvjʃtn bɡzrɒnjd v bndh‌ɒm ɒjvb bh d͡ʒht ʃmɒ dʔɒ xvɒhdnmvd، zjrɒ kh ɒv rɒ mstd͡ʒɒb xvɒhm frmvd، mbɒdɒپɒdɒʃ hmɒɣt ʃmɒ rɒ bh ʃmɒ brsɒnm t͡ʃvnkh drbɒrh mn آnt͡ʃh rɒst ɒst msl bndh‌ɒm ɒjvb ŋftjd» پs ɒljfɒz tjmɒnj v bldd ʃvhj v svfrnʔmɒtj rfth، bh nvʔj kh xdɒvnd bh ɒjʃɒn ɒmr frmvdh bvd ʔml nmvdnd v xdɒvnd ɒjvb rɒmstd͡ʒɒb frmvd v t͡ʃvn ɒjvb brɒj ɒshɒb xvd dʔɒ krd xdɒvnd msjbt ɒv rɒ dvr sɒxt vxdɒvnd bh ɒjvb dv t͡ʃndɒn آnt͡ʃh پjʃ dɒʃth bvdʔtɒ frmvd v d͡ʒmjʔ brɒdrɒnʃ v hmh xvɒhrɒnʃ v tmɒmj آʃnɒjɒn ɣdjmʃ nzd vj آmdh، dr xɒnh‌ɒʃ bɒ vj nɒn xvrdnd v ɒv rɒ drbɒrh tmɒmj msjbtj kh xdɒvnd v hzɒr ɒlɒɣ mɒdh bvd v ɒv rɒ hft پsr v sh dxtr bvd v dxtr ɒvl rɒ jmjmh vdvm rɒ ɣsjʔh v svm rɒ ɣrn hfvk nɒm nhɒd v dr tmɒmj zmjn msl dxtrɒn ɒjvb znɒn njkvsvrt jɒft nʃdnd v پdr ɒjʃɒn، ɒjʃɒn rɒdr mjɒn brɒdrɒnʃɒn ɒrsj dɒdv bʔd ɒz آn ɒjvb sd v t͡ʃhl sɒl zndɡɒnj nmvd v پsrɒn xvd v پsrɒn پsrɒn xvd rɒ tɒ پʃt t͡ʃhɒrm djd v bʔd ɒz آn ɒjvb sd v t͡ʃhl sɒl zndɡɒnj nmvd v پsrɒn xvd v پsrɒn پsrɒn xvd rɒ tɒ پʃt t͡ʃhɒrm djd xvʃɒbhɒl ksj‌kh bh mʃvrt ʃrjrɒn nrvd v bh rɒh ɡnɒhkɒrɒn nɒjstd، v drmd͡ʒls ɒsthzɒknndɡɒn nnʃjnd؛ blkh rɣbt ɒvdr ʃrjʔt xdɒvnd ɒst v rvz v ʃb drʃrjʔt ɒv tfkr mj‌knd پs msl drxtj nʃɒndh nzd nhrhɒj آb xvɒhd bvd، kh mjvh xvdrɒ dr mvsmʃ mj‌dhd، v brɡʃ پʒmrdh nmj ɡrdd v hr‌آnt͡ʃh mj‌knd njk ɒnd͡ʒɒm xvɒhdbvd ʃrjrɒn t͡ʃnjn njstnd، blkh msl kɒhnd kh bɒdآn rɒ پrɒkndh mj‌knd lhzɒ ʃrjrɒn dr dɒvrj nxvɒhnd ɒjstɒd v nh ɡnɒhkɒrɒn dr d͡ʒmɒʔt ʔɒdlɒnzjrɒ xdɒvnd trjɣ ʔɒdlɒn rɒ mj‌dɒnd، vlj trjɣ ɡnɒhkɒrɒn hlɒk xvɒhd ʃd zjrɒ xdɒvnd trjɣ ʔɒdlɒn rɒ mj‌dɒnd، vlj trjɣ ɡnɒhkɒrɒn hlɒk xvɒhd ʃd t͡ʃrɒ ɒmt‌hɒ ʃvrʃ nmvdh‌ɒnd v tvɒئf dr bɒtl tfkr mj‌knnd؟ پɒdʃɒhɒn zmjn brmj xjznd v srvrɒn bɒ hm mʃvrt nmvdh‌ɒnd، bh zd xdɒvnd v bh zd msjh ɒv؛ kh bndhɒj ɒjʃɒn rɒ bɡsljm v znd͡ʒjrhɒj ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz xvdbjndɒzjm ɒv kh br آsmɒnhɒ nʃsth ɒst mj xndd xdɒvnd br ɒjʃɒn ɒsthzɒ mj‌knd آŋɒh dr xʃm xvd bdjʃɒn tklm xvɒhd krd vbh ɣzb xvjʃ ɒjʃɒn rɒ آʃfth xvɒhd sɒxt «v mn پɒdʃɒh xvd rɒ nsb krdh‌ɒm، br kvh mɣds xvd shjvn» frmɒn rɒ ɒʔlɒm mj‌knm xdɒvnd bh mn ɡfth ɒst «tv پsr mn hstj ɒmrvztv rɒ tvljd krdm ɒz mn drxvɒst kn v ɒmt hɒrɒ bh mjrɒs tv xvɒhm dɒd v ɒɣsɒj zmjn rɒ mlk tv xvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh ʔsɒj آhnjn xvɒhj ʃkst؛ msl kvzh kvzh‌ɡr آnhɒ rɒ xrdxvɒhj nmvd» v ɒlɒn‌ɒj پɒdʃɒhɒn tʔɣl nmɒjjd ɒj dɒvrɒn d͡ʒhɒn mtnbh ɡrdjd xdɒvnd rɒ bɒ trs ʔbɒdt knjd v bɒ lrz ʃɒdj nmɒjjdپsr rɒbbvsjd mbɒdɒ ɣzbnɒk ʃvd، v ɒz trjɣ hlɒk ʃvjd، zjrɒ ɣzb ɒv bh ɒndkj ɒfrvxth mj‌ʃvd xvʃɒbhɒl hmh آnɒnj kh br ɒv tvkl dɒrnd پsr rɒbbvsjd mbɒdɒ ɣzbnɒk ʃvd، v ɒz trjɣ hlɒk ʃvjd، zjrɒ ɣzb ɒv bh ɒndkj ɒfrvxth mj‌ʃvd xvʃɒbhɒl hmh آnɒnj kh br ɒv tvkl dɒrnd ɒj xdɒvnd dʃmnɒnm t͡ʃh bsjɒr ʃdh‌ɒnd bsjɒrj bh zd mn brmj xjznd bsjɒrj brɒj d͡ʒɒn mn mj‌ɡvjnd «bh d͡ʒht ɒv dr xdɒxlɒsj njst» slɒh ljkn tv‌ɒj xdɒvnd ɡrdɒɡrd mn sپr hstj، d͡ʒlɒl mn v frɒzndh sr mn bh آvɒz xvd nzdxdɒvnd mj‌xvɒnm v mrɒ ɒz kvh mɣds xvdɒd͡ʒɒbt mj‌nmɒjd slɒh v ɒmɒ mn xsbjdh، bh xvɒb rftm v bjdɒrʃdm zjrɒ xdɒvnd mrɒ tɣvjt mj‌dhd ɒzkrvrhɒj mxlvɣ nxvɒhm trsjd dl xvd ɡfth ɒst «hrɡzd͡ʒnbʃ nxvɒhm xvrd، v dvr bh dvr bdj rɒnxvɒhm djd» dhn ɒv ɒz lʔnt v mkr v zlm پr ɒst؛ zjrzbɒnʃ mʃɣt v ɡnɒh ɒst؛ dr kmjnhɒj dhɒt mj‌nʃjnd؛ dr d͡ʒɒjhɒj mxfj bj‌ɡnɒh rɒ mj‌kʃd؛ d͡ʒbɒrɒn ɒvmj ɒftnd dr dl xvd ɡft «xdɒ frɒmvʃ krdh ɒst؛ rvj xvd rɒ پvʃɒnjdh v hrɡznxvɒhd djd» ‌ɒj xdɒvnd brxjz ɒj xdɒ dst xvd rɒbrɒfrɒz v mskjnɒn rɒ frɒmvʃ mkn t͡ʃrɒʃrjr xdɒ rɒ ɒhɒnt krdh، dr dl xvd mj‌ɡvjd «tv bɒzxvɒst nxvɒhj krd؟» ɒlbth djdh‌ɒj zjrɒ kh tv br mʃɣt v ɣm mj‌ŋrj، tɒ bh‌dst xvd mkɒfɒt brsɒnj mskjn ɒmr xvjʃ rɒ bh tvtsljm krdh ɒst mddkɒr jtjmɒn، tv hstj bɒzvj ɡnɒhkɒr rɒ bʃkn v ɒmɒ ʃrjr rɒ ɒzʃrɒrt ɒv bɒzxvɒst kn tɒ آn rɒ njɒbj xdɒvnd پɒdʃɒh ɒst tɒ ɒbdɒlɒbɒd ɒmt‌hɒ ɒzzmjn ɒv hlɒk xvɒhnd ʃd ‌ɒj xdɒvndmsɒlt mskjnɒn rɒ ɒd͡ʒɒbt krdh‌ɒj، dl ɒjʃɒn rɒɒstvɒr nmvdh‌ɒj v ɡvʃ xvd rɒ frɒɡrfth‌ɒj،tɒjtjmɒn v kvfth ʃdɡɒn rɒ dɒdrsj knj ɒnsɒnj kh ɒz zmjn ɒst، djɡr ntrsɒnd tɒjtjmɒn v kvfth ʃdɡɒn rɒ dɒdrsj knj ɒnsɒnj kh ɒz zmjn ɒst، djɡr ntrsɒnd br xdɒvnd tvkl mj‌dɒrm t͡ʃrɒ bh‌d͡ʒɒnm mj ɡvjjd «msl mrɣ bh kvh xvdbɡrjzjd zjrɒ ɒjnk ʃrjrɒn kmɒn rɒ mj‌kʃnd vtjr rɒ bh zh nhɒdh‌ɒnd، tɒ br rɒst dlɒn dr tɒrjkj bjndɒznd zjrɒ kh ɒrkɒn mnhdm mj‌ʃvnd v mrdʔɒdl t͡ʃh knd؟» xdɒvnd dr hjkl ɣds xvd ɒst v krsj xdɒvnd dr آsmɒn t͡ʃʃmɒn ɒv mj‌ŋrd، پlkhɒj vj bnj آdm rɒ mj‌آzmɒjd xdɒvnd mrd ʔɒdl rɒɒmthɒn mj‌knd؛ v ɒmɒ ɒz ʃrjr v zlm dvst، d͡ʒɒn ɒv nfrt mj‌dɒrd br ʃrjr dɒmhɒ v آtʃ vkbrjt xvɒhd bɒrɒnjd، v bɒd smvm hsh پjɒlh ɒjʃɒn xvɒhd bvdzjrɒ xdɒvnd ʔɒdl ɒst vʔdɒlt rɒ dvst mj‌dɒrd، v rɒstɒn rvj ɒv rɒxvɒhnd djd zjrɒ xdɒvnd ʔɒdl ɒst vʔdɒlt rɒ dvst mj‌dɒrd، v rɒstɒn rvj ɒv rɒxvɒhnd djd ɒj sɒxt، v hr zbɒnj rɒ kh sxnɒn tkbrآmjz bɡvjd kh mj‌ɡvjnd «bh zbɒn xvjʃ ɣɒlb mj‌آjjm lbhɒj mɒ bɒ mɒ ɒst kjst kh br mɒxdɒvnd bɒʃd؟» xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd «bh‌sbb ɣɒrt mskjnɒn v nɒlh fɣjrɒn، ɒlɒn brmj xjzm v mhɒfzt xvɒhj frmvdʃrjrɒn bh hr d͡ʒɒnb mj‌xrɒmnd، vɣtj kh xbɒst dr bnj آdm blnd mj‌ʃvd ʃrjrɒn bh hr d͡ʒɒnb mj‌xrɒmnd، vɣtj kh xbɒst dr bnj آdm blnd mj‌ʃvd ɒj xdɒvnd tɒ bh kj hmjʃh mrɒfrɒmvʃ mj‌knj؟ mbɒdɒ bh xvɒb mvt bxsbm mbɒdɒ dʃmnm ɡvjd br ɒv ɣɒlb آmdm vmxɒlfɒnm ɒz پrjʃɒnj‌ɒm ʃɒdj nmɒjnd v ɒmɒ mn bh rhmt tv tvkl mj‌dɒrm؛ dl mn dr nd͡ʒɒt tv ʃɒdj xvɒhd krdbrɒj xdɒvndsrvd xvɒhm xvɒnd zjrɒ kh bh zvrآvr sɒxt v ɒmɒ mn msl zjtvn sbz dr xɒnh xdɒ hstm bh rhmt xdɒ tvkl mj‌dɒrm tɒ ɒbdɒlɒbɒdtv rɒ hmjʃh hmd xvɒhm ɡft، zjrɒ tv ɒjn rɒ krdh‌ɒj v ɒntzɒr nɒm tv rɒ xvɒhm kʃjd zjrɒ nzdmɣdsɒn tv njkvst tv rɒ nmj xvɒnnd؟ آŋɒh sxt‌trsɒn ʃdnd، d͡ʒɒjj kh hjt͡ʃ trs nbvd zjrɒ xdɒɒstxvɒnhɒj mhɒsrh knndh tv rɒ ɒz hm پɒʃjd آnhɒ rɒ xd͡ʒl sɒxth‌ɒj zjrɒ xdɒ ɒjʃɒn rɒ rdnmvdh ɒstkɒʃ kh nd͡ʒɒt ɒsrɒئjl ɒz shjvn zɒhr xdɒ rɒ dr md nzr xvdŋzɒʃth‌ɒnd، slɒh ɒjnk xdɒ mddkɒr mn ɒst xdɒvnd ɒz tɒjjd knndɡɒn d͡ʒɒn mn ɒst bdj rɒbr dʃmnɒn mn xvɒhd brɡrdɒnjd bh rɒstj xvdrjʃh ɒjʃɒn rɒ bkn ɣrbɒnj hɒj tbrʔj nzd tvxvɒhm ɡzrɒnjd v nɒm tv rɒ‌ɒj xdɒvnd hmdxvɒhm ɡft zjrɒ njkvstt͡ʃvnkh ɒz d͡ʒmjʔ tŋjhɒ mrɒ xlɒsj dɒdh‌ɒj، v t͡ʃʃm mn brdʃmnɒnm ŋrjsth ɒst t͡ʃvnkh ɒz d͡ʒmjʔ tŋjhɒ mrɒ xlɒsj dɒdh‌ɒj، v t͡ʃʃm mn brdʃmnɒnm ŋrjsth ɒst ɒj xdɒ d͡ʒŋ djdh‌ɒm rvz v ʃb br hsɒrhɒjʃ ɡrdʃ mj‌knnd vʃrɒrt v mʃɣt dr mjɒnʃ mj‌bɒʃd fsɒdhɒdr mjɒn vj ɒst v d͡ʒvr v hjlh ɒz kvt͡ʃh hɒjʃ dvr nmj ʃvd zjrɒ dʃmn nbvd kh mrɒ mlɒmt mj‌krd vɒlɒ thml mj‌krdm؛ v xsm xvɒhdʃnjd d͡ʒɒnm rɒ ɒz d͡ʒŋj kh br mn ʃdh bvd، bslɒmtj fdjh dɒdh ɒst zjrɒ bsjɒrj bɒ mn mɣɒvmt mj‌krdnd xdɒ xvɒhd ʃnjd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ d͡ʒvɒb xvɒhd dɒd، ɒv kh ɒz ɒzl nʃsth ɒst، slɒh zjrɒkh dr ɒjʃɒn tbdjlhɒ kh ɡvʃ xvd rɒ mj‌bndd kh آvɒzɒfsvŋrɒn rɒ nmj ʃnvd، hr‌t͡ʃnd bh mhɒrt ɒfsvn mj‌knd ‌ɒj xdɒ dndɒnhɒjʃɒn rɒ drdhɒnʃɒn bʃkn ɒj xdɒvnd dndɒnhɒj ʃjrɒn rɒxrd bʃkn ɡdɒxth ʃdh، msl آb bɡzrnd t͡ʃvn ɒv tjrhɒj t͡ʃvn ɒntɣɒm rɒ djd ʃɒdj xvɒhd nmvd پɒjhɒj xvd rɒ bh xvn ʃrjrxvɒhd ʃstv mrdm xvɒhnd ɡft «hrآjnh smrh‌ɒj brɒj ʔɒdlɒn hst hr آjnh xdɒjj hst kh dr d͡ʒhɒn dɒvrj mj‌knd» v mrdm xvɒhnd ɡft «hrآjnh smrh‌ɒj brɒj ʔɒdlɒn hst hr آjnh xdɒjj hst kh dr d͡ʒhɒn dɒvrj mj‌knd» tɒ ɒv rɒ bkʃnd ɒj xdɒjm mrɒ ɒz dʃmnɒnm brhɒn mrɒ ɒzmɣɒvmt knndɡɒnm brɒfrɒz mrɒ ɒzɡnɒhkɒrɒn xlɒsj dh v ɒz mrdmɒn xvn rjzrhɒjj bxʃ zjrɒ ɒjnk brɒj d͡ʒɒnm kmjn mj‌sɒznd v zvrآvrɒn bh zd mn d͡ʒmʔ ʃdh‌ɒnd، bdvn tɣsjr mn‌ɒj xdɒvnd v bdvn ɡnɒh mn bj ɣsvr mn mj‌ʃtɒbnd v xvd rɒ آmɒdh mj‌knnd پs brɒj mlɒɣɒt mn bjdɒr ʃv v bbjn ɒmɒ tv‌ɒj jhvh، xdɒj sbɒjvt، xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl bjdɒrʃdh، hmh ɒmt‌hɒ rɒ mkɒfɒt brsɒn v br ɣdɒrɒn bdkɒr ʃfɣt mfrmɒ، slɒh ʃɒmɡɒhɒn brmj ɡrdnd v msl sɡ bɒŋ mj‌knnd v dr ʃhrdvr mj‌znnd ɒz dhɒn xvd bdj rɒ frvmj rjznd dr lbhɒj ɒjʃɒn ʃmʃjrhɒst zjrɒ mj‌ɡvjnd «kjst kh bʃnvd؟» v ɒmɒ tv‌ɒj xdɒvnd، br ɒjʃɒn xvɒhj xndjd v tmɒmj ɒmt‌hɒ rɒ ɒsthzɒ xvɒhj nmvd ‌ɒj ɣvt mn bsvj tv ɒntzɒr xvɒhm kʃjd zjrɒxdɒ ɣlʔh blnd mn ɒst xdɒj rhmt mn پjʃ rvj mn xvɒhd rft xdɒ mrɒ brdʃmnɒnm ŋrɒn xvɒhd sɒxt ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh ɣtl mrsɒn bh‌sbb ɡnɒh zbɒn v sxnɒn lbhɒj xvd، dr tkbr xvjʃ ɡrftɒr ʃvnd v bh ʔvz lʔnt v drvɣj kh mj‌ɡvjnd، ɒjʃɒn rɒ fɒnj kn dr ɣzb fɒnj kn tɒ njst ɡrdnd v bdɒnnd kh xdɒdr jʔɣvb tɒ ɒɣsɒj zmjn sltnt mj‌knd slɒh v ʃɒmɡɒhɒn brɡrdjdh، msl sɡ bɒŋ znnd vdr ʃhr ɡrdʃ knnd v brɒj xvrɒk پrɒkndh ʃvnd v sjr nʃdh، ʃb rɒ bsr brnd v ɒmɒ mn ɣvt tv rɒ xvɒhm srɒjjd v bɒmdɒdɒn ɒz rhmt tv trnm xvɒhm nmvd zjrɒ ɣlʔh blnd mn hstj vdr rvz tŋj mld͡ʒɒj mnj‌ɒj ɣvt mn brɒj tv srvd mj‌xvɒnm، zjrɒ xdɒ ɣlʔh blnd mn ɒst vxdɒj rhmt mn ‌ɒj ɣvt mn brɒj tv srvd mj‌xvɒnm، zjrɒ xdɒ ɣlʔh blnd mn ɒst vxdɒj rhmt mn ɒj xdɒ mɒ rɒ dvr ɒndɒxth، پrɒkndh sɒxth‌ɒj xʃmnɒk bvdj، bsvj mɒrd͡ʒvʔ frmɒ zmjn rɒ mtzlzl sɒxth، آn rɒʃkɒfth‌ɒj ʃkstɡjhɒjʃ rɒ ʃfɒ dh zjrɒ bh d͡ʒnbʃ آmdh ɒst t͡ʃjzhɒj mʃkl rɒ bh ɣvm xvd nʃɒn dɒdh‌ɒj bɒdh srɡrdɒnj bh mɒnvʃɒnjdh‌ɒj ʔlmj bh trsndɡɒn xvd dɒdh‌ɒj tɒآn rɒ brɒj rɒstj brɒfrɒznd، slɒh tɒ hbjbɒn tvnd͡ʒɒt jɒbnd bh‌dst rɒst xvd sltnt mn mvآb zrf thɒrt mn ɒst v br ɒdvm kfʃ xvd rɒ xvɒhm‌ɒndɒxt ɒj flstjn brɒj mn bɒŋ brآvr kjst kh mrɒbh ʃhr hsjn drآvrd؟ v kjst kh mrɒ bh ɒdvm rhbrj knd؟ mɡr nh tv‌ɒj xdɒ kh mɒ rɒ dvrɒndɒxth‌ɒj v bɒ lʃkrhɒj mɒ‌ɒj xdɒ bjrvn nmj آjj؟ mrɒ ɒz dʃmn ɒʔɒnt frmɒ zjrɒmʔɒvnt ɒnsɒn bɒtl ɒstbɒ xdɒ zfr xvɒhjm jɒft zjrɒ ɒvst kh dʃmnɒn mɒ rɒ پɒjmɒl xvɒhdkrd bɒ xdɒ zfr xvɒhjm jɒft zjrɒ ɒvst kh dʃmnɒn mɒ rɒ dr‌پjʃ rv، mɣnjɒn mj‌xrɒmnd v drʔɣb، sɒzndɡɒn v dr vst dvʃjzɡɒn df zn xdɒ rɒ dr d͡ʒmɒʔt‌hɒ mtbɒrk xvɒnjd vxdɒvnd rɒ ɒz t͡ʃʃmh ɒsrɒئjl آnd͡ʒɒst bnjɒmjn sɣjr، hɒkm ɒjʃɒn v rvsɒj jhvdɒmhfl ɒjʃɒn rvsɒj frmɒ v rmh ɡɒvɒn rɒ bɒ ɡvsɒlh hɒj ɣvm kh bɒ ʃmʃhɒj nɣrh nzd tv ɡrdn mj‌nhnd vɣvm hɒjj kh d͡ʒŋ rɒ dvst mj‌dɒrnd پrɒkndh sɒxth ɒst srvrɒn ɒz msr xvɒhnd آmd vhbʃh dsthɒj xvd rɒ nzd xdɒ bzvdj drɒzxvɒhd ɣdshɒj xvd mhjb hstj xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl ɣvm xvd rɒɣvt v ʔzmt mj‌dhd mtbɒrk bɒd xdɒ xdɒjɒ mrɒ nd͡ʒɒt dh zjrɒ آbhɒ bh‌d͡ʒɒn mn drآmdh ɒst dr xlɒb ʒrf frvrfth‌ɒm، d͡ʒɒjj kh ntvɒn ɒjstɒd bh آbhɒj ʔmjɣ drآmdh‌ɒm v sjl mrɒ mj‌پvʃɒnd ɒz frjɒd xvdxsth ʃdh‌ɒm v ɡlvj mn svxth v t͡ʃʃmɒnm ɒzɒntzɒr xdɒ tɒr ɡrdjdh ɒst آnɒnj kh bj‌sbb ɒzmn nfrt dɒrnd، ɒz mvjhɒj srm zjɒdh‌ɒnd vdʃmnɒn nɒhɣ mn kh ɣsd hlɒkt mn dɒrndzvrآvrnd پs آnt͡ʃh ŋrfth bvdm، rd krdm ‌ɒj xdɒ، tv hmɒɣt mrɒ mj‌dɒnj v ɡnɒhɒnm ɒz tvmxfj njst ‌ɒj xdɒvnd jhvh sbɒjvt، mntzrjn tv bh‌sbb mn xd͡ʒl nʃvnd ɒj xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl، tɒlbɒn tv bh‌sbb mn rsvɒ ŋrdnd zjrɒ bh‌xɒtr tv mthml ʔɒr ɡrdjdh‌ɒm vrsvɒjj rvj mn، mrɒ پvʃjdh ɒst nzdbrɒdrɒnm ɒd͡ʒnbj ʃdh‌ɒm v nzd پsrɒn mɒdr xvdɣrjb zjrɒ ɣjrt xɒnh tv mrɒ xvrdh ɒst vmlɒmt hɒj mlɒmt knndɡɒn tv br mn tɒrj dr tŋj hstm mrɒ bzvdj mstd͡ʒɒb frmɒ bh‌d͡ʒɒnm nzdjk ʃdh، آn rɒ rstɡɒr sɒz bh‌sbb dʃmnɒnm mrɒ fdjh dh tv ʔɒr v xd͡ʒɒlt v rsvɒjj mrɒ mj‌dɒnj vd͡ʒmjʔ xsmɒnm پjʃ nzr tvɒnd ʔɒr، dl mrɒʃksth ɒst v bh ʃdt brksj‌kh tv zdh‌ɒj d͡ʒfɒmj knnd v drdhɒj kvftɡɒn tv rɒ ɒʔlɒn mj nmɒjnd ɡnɒh br ɡnɒh ɒjʃɒn mzjd kn v drʔdɒlt tv dɒxl nʃvnd ɒz dftr hjɒt mhvʃvnd v bɒ sɒlhjn mrɣvm ŋrdnd v ɒmɒ mn، mskjn v drdmnd hstm dɒئm ɡvjnd «xdɒ mtʔɒl bɒd»v ɒmɒ mn mskjn v fɣjr hstm xdɒjɒ brɒj mn tʔd͡ʒjl kn tv mddkɒr vnd͡ʒɒt‌dhndh mn hstj ɒj xdɒvnd tɒxjr mnmɒ v ɒmɒ mn mskjn v fɣjr hstm xdɒjɒ brɒj mn tʔd͡ʒjl kn tv mddkɒr vnd͡ʒɒt‌dhndh mn hstj ɒj xdɒvnd tɒxjr mnmɒ dr tv‌ɒj xdɒvnd پnɒh brdh‌ɒm، پs tɒ bh ɒbd xd͡ʒl nxvɒhm ʃd bh ʔdɒlt xvdmrɒ xlɒsj dh v brhɒn ɡvʃ xvd rɒ bh mn frɒɡjr v mrɒ nd͡ʒɒt dh brɒj mn sxrh skvnt bɒʃ tɒ krdh‌ɒm پs‌ɒj xdɒ، mrɒ tɒ zmɒn پjrj vsfjd mvjj njz trk mkn، tɒ ɒjn tbɣh rɒ ɒz bɒzvj tv xbr dhm v d͡ʒmjʔ آjndɡɒn rɒ ɒz tvɒnɒjj tv xdɒjɒ ʔdɒlt tv tɒ ɒʔlj ʔljjn ɒst tvkɒrhɒj ʔzjm krdh‌ɒj xdɒjɒ mɒnnd tv kjst؟ ‌ɒj kh tŋjhɒj bsjɒr v sxt rɒ bh mɒ nʃɒn dɒdh‌ɒj، rd͡ʒvʔ krdh، bɒz mɒ rɒ zndh xvɒhj sɒxt؛ v brɡʃth، mɒ rɒ ɒz ʔmɣ hɒj zmjn brxvɒhj آvrd bzrɡj mrɒ mzjd xvɒhj krd vbrɡʃth، mrɒ tslj xvɒhj bxʃjd پs xdɒ brɒj ɒsrɒئjl njkvst، jʔnj brɒj آnɒnj kh پɒk dl hstnd vɒmɒ mn nzdjk bvd kh پɒjhɒjm ɒz rɒh dr rvd vnzdjk bvd kh ɣdmhɒjm blɣzd zjrɒ br mtkbrɒn hsd brdm t͡ʃvn slɒmtj ʃrjrɒn rɒ djdm zjrɒkh dr mvt bdjnd͡ʒɒ brmj ɡrdnd v آbhɒj frɒvɒn، bdjʃɒn nvʃɒnjdh mj‌ʃvd v ɒjʃɒn mj‌ɡvjnd «xdɒ t͡ʃɡvnh bdɒnd v آjɒ hzrt ɒʔlj ʔlm dɒrd؟» ɒjnk ɒjnɒn ʃrjr hstnd kh hmjʃh mtmئn bvdh، dr dvltmndj ɒfzvdh mj‌ʃvnd jɣjn frʃtɡɒn ʃrjr v rɒhj brɒj ɣzb xvd mhjɒ sɒxth، d͡ʒɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz mvt ŋɒh ndɒʃt، blkh d͡ʒɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh vbɒ tsljm nmvd v hmh nxst zɒdɡɒn msr rɒ kʃt، ɒvɒjl ɣvt ɒjʃɒn rɒ dr xjmh hɒj hɒm v ɣvm xvd rɒ msl ɡvsfndɒn kvt͡ʃɒnjd vɒjʃɒn rɒ dr shrɒ msl ɡlh rɒhnmɒjj nmvd vɒjʃɒn rɒ dr ɒmnjt rhbrj krd tɒ ntrsnd v drjɒdʃmnɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ پvʃɒnjd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh hdvdmɣds xvd آvrd، bdjn kvhj kh bh‌dst rɒst xvd thsjl ɣvmhɒrɒ bh rɒstj bh hzvr xdɒvnd zjrɒ bh dɒvrj d͡ʒhɒn mj‌آjd rbʔ mskvn rɒ bh ɒnsɒf dɒvrj xvɒhd krd v ɣvmhɒrɒ bh rɒstj xdɒvnd sltnt ɡrfth ɒst، پs ɣvm‌hɒ blrznd br krvbjjn d͡ʒlvs mj‌frmɒjd، zmjn mtzlzl nmɒjjd v bh hzvr ɒv bɒ trnm bjɒjd bdɒnjd kh jhvh xdɒst، ɒv mɒ rɒ آfrjd mɒ ɣvm ɒvhstjm v ɡvsfndɒn mrtʔ ɒv bh drvɒzh hɒj ɒv bɒhmd bjɒjjd v bh shnhɒj ɒv bɒ tsbjh ɒv rɒ hmdɡvjjd v nɒm ɒv rɒ mtbɒrk trjɣ kɒml sɒlk bɒʃd xɒdm mn xvɒhd bvd hjlh ɡr dr xɒnh mn sɒkn nxvɒhdʃd drvɣ ɡv پjʃ nzr mn nxvɒhd mɒndhmh ʃrjrɒn zmjn rɒ sbhɡɒhɒn hlɒk xvɒhm krd tɒd͡ʒmjʔ bdkɒrɒn rɒ ɒz ʃhr xdɒvnd mnɣtʔ sɒzm hmh ʃrjrɒn zmjn rɒ sbhɡɒhɒn hlɒk xvɒhm krd tɒd͡ʒmjʔ bdkɒrɒn rɒ ɒz ʃhr xdɒvnd mnɣtʔ sɒzm ɒj xdɒvnd dʔɒj mrɒ bʃnv، v frjɒdmn nzd tv brsd dr rvz tŋj‌ɒm rvj xvd rɒ ɒz mn mپvʃɒn ɡvʃ xvd rɒ bh mn frɒɡjr، v rvzj kh bxvɒnm mrɒ bh zvdj ɒd͡ʒɒbt frmɒ zjrɒ rvzhɒjm msl dvd tlf ʃd vɒstxvɒnhɒjm msl hjzm svxth ɡrdjd dl mn msl ɡjɒh zdh ʃdh v xʃk ɡrdjdh ɒst zjrɒxvrdn ɣzɒj xvd rɒ frɒmvʃ mj‌knm bh‌sbb آvɒz nɒlh xvd، rɒ ɒz tŋjhɒj ɒjʃɒn rhɒjj bxʃjd tvfɒn rɒ bh آrɒmj sɒkt sɒxt kh mvd͡ʒhɒjʃ sɒkn ɡrdjd پs msrvr ʃdndzjrɒ kh آsɒjʃ jɒftnd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh bndr mrɒdɒjʃɒn rsɒnjd پs xdɒvnd rɒ bh‌sbb rhmtʃ tʃkrnmɒjnd v bh‌sbb kɒrhɒj ʔd͡ʒjb ɒv bɒ bnj آdm v ɒv rɒ dr md͡ʒmʔ ɣvm mtʔɒl bxvɒnnd v drmd͡ʒls mʃɒjx ɒv rɒ tsbjh bɡvjnd ɒv nhrhɒ rɒbh bɒdjh mbdl krd v t͡ʃʃmh hɒj آb rɒ bh zmjn tʃnh v zmjn bɒrvr rɒ njz bh ʃvrh zɒr، bh‌sbb ʃrɒrt sɒknɒn آn bɒdjh rɒ bh drjɒt͡ʃh آb mbdl krd v zmjn xʃk rɒ bh t͡ʃʃmh hɒj آb v ɡrsŋɒn rɒ dr آnd͡ʒɒ sɒkn sɒxt tɒ ʃhrj brɒj skvnt bnɒ nmvdnd v mzrʔh‌hɒ kɒʃtnd vtɒkstɒnhɒ ɣrs nmvdnd v hɒsl آvɒrh mj‌sɒzd ɒmɒ mskjn rɒ ɒzmʃɣtʃ brmj ɒfrvzd v ɣbjlh‌hɒ rɒ msl ɡlh hɒbrɒjʃ پjdɒ mj‌knd sɒlhɒn ɒjn rɒ djdh، ʃɒdmɒn mj‌ʃvnd v tmɒmj ʃrɒrt dhɒn xvd rɒxvɒhd bstkjst xrdmnd tɒ bdjn t͡ʃjzhɒtfkr nmɒjd؟ kh brbt bjdɒr ʃvjd mn njz dr shrɡɒh bjdɒr xvɒhm ʃd ‌ɒj xdɒvnd، tv rɒ dr mjɒn ɣvm‌hɒ hmd xvɒhm ɡft v dr mjɒn tɒjfh‌hɒ tv rɒ xvɒhm srɒjjd zjrɒ kh rhmt tvʔzjm ɒst، fvɣ آsmɒnhɒ v rɒstj tv tɒ ɒflɒk mj‌rsd nmvd kjst kh mrɒ bh ʃhr hsjn drآvrd؟ kjst kh mrɒ bh ɒdvm rhbrj nmɒjd؟ آjɒ nh tv‌ɒj xdɒkh mɒ rɒ trk krdh‌ɒj؟ v tv‌ɒj xdɒ kh bɒlʃkrhɒj mɒ bjrvn nmj آjj؟ mɒ rɒ br dʃmn ɒmdɒd frmɒ، zjrɒ kh mdd ɒnsɒn bɒtl ɒstdrxdɒ bɒ ʃd͡ʒɒʔt kɒr xvɒhjm krd v ɒv dʃmnɒn mɒrɒ پɒjmɒl xvɒhd nmvd drxdɒ bɒ ʃd͡ʒɒʔt kɒr xvɒhjm krd v ɒv dʃmnɒn mɒrɒ پɒjmɒl xvɒhd nmvd xdɒj tsbjh mn، xɒmvʃ mbɒʃ zjrɒ kh dhɒn ʃrɒrt vdhɒn frjb rɒ xvɒst، ɒz ɒv dvr ʃdh ɒst v lʔnt rɒmsl rdɒj xvd dr br‌ɡrft v msl آb bh ʃkmʃ drآmd v msl rvɣn dr ɒstxvɒnhɒj vj پs msl d͡ʒɒmh‌ɒj kh ɒv rɒ mj‌پvʃɒnd، v t͡ʃvn kmrbndj kh bh آn hmjʃh bsth mj‌ʃvd، xvɒhdbvd ɒjn ɒst ɒd͡ʒrt mxɒlfɒnm ɒz d͡ʒɒnb xdɒvnd v brɒj آnɒnj kh br d͡ʒɒn mn bdj mj‌ɡvjnd ɒmɒ tv‌ɒj jhvh xdɒvnd bh‌xɒtr nɒm xvd bɒmn ʔml nmɒ؛ t͡ʃvn kh rhmt tv njkvst، mrɒxlɒsj dh zjrɒ kh mn fɣjr v trsndɡɒn xdɒvnd، br xdɒvnd tvkl nmɒjjd ɒv mʔɒvn v sپr ɒjʃɒn ɒst xdɒvnd mɒ rɒ bh jɒdآvrdh، brkt mj‌dhd xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl rɒ brkt xvɒhd dɒd v xɒndɒn hɒrvn rɒ brkt xvɒhd dɒd trsndɡɒn xdɒvnd rɒ brkt xvɒhd mrdɡɒn njstnd kh jɒh rɒ tsbjh mj‌xvɒnnd؛ v nh آnɒnj kh bh xɒmvʃj frv mj‌rvndljkn mɒ jɒh rɒ mtbɒrk xvɒhjm xvɒnd، ɒz ɒlɒn v tɒ ɒbdɒlɒbɒd hllvjɒh ljkn mɒ jɒh rɒ mtbɒrk xvɒhjm xvɒnd، ɒz ɒlɒn v tɒ mrɒ drjɒft، tŋj v ɣm پjdɒ krdm آŋɒh nɒm xdɒvnd rɒ xvɒndm آh‌ɒj xdɒvnd d͡ʒɒn mrɒrhɒjj dh xdɒvnd rئvf v ʔɒdl ɒst v xdɒj mɒ rhjm ɒst xdɒvnd sɒdh dlɒn rɒ mhɒfzt mj‌knd zljl bvdm v mrɒ nd͡ʒɒt dɒd ‌ɒj sɒxtm، tɒɒbdɒlɒbɒd v tɒ nhɒjt mrdmɒn dv rv rɒ mkrvh dɒʃth‌ɒm، ljkn ʃrjʔt tv rɒ dvst mj‌dɒrm str v sپr mn tv hstj bh klɒm tv ɒntzɒr mj‌kʃm ‌ɒj bdkɒrɒn، ɒz mn dvr ʃvjd v ɒvɒmr xdɒj xvjʃ rɒ ŋɒh xvɒhm t͡ʃjz rɒst mj‌dɒnm، vhr rɒh drvɣ rɒ mkrvh mj‌dɒrm ʃhɒdɒt tv ʔd͡ʒjb ɒst ɒzjn sbb d͡ʒɒn mn آnhɒ rɒ ŋɒh mj‌dɒrd kʃf klɒm tv nvrmj bxʃd v sɒdh dlɒn rɒ fhjm mj‌ɡrdɒnd dhɒn xvd rɒ njkv bɒz krdh، nfs zdm zjrɒ kh mʃtɒɣ vsɒjɒj tv bvdm br mn nzr kn v krm frmɒ، brhsb ʔɒdt tv bh آnɒnj kh nɒm tv rɒdvst mj‌dɒrnd ɣdm hɒj mrɒ dr klɒm xvdt پɒjdɒr sɒz، tɒ hjt͡ʃ bdj br mn tslt njɒbd mrɒ ɒz zlm ɒnsɒn xlɒsj dh، tɒ *trd͡ʒmh drst ɒjn آjh ɒjnst «t͡ʃʃmɒn xvdrɒ bsvj kvhhɒ brmj ɒfrɒzm ɒʔɒnt mn ɒz kd͡ʒɒ mj‌آjd؟» ɒʔɒnt mn ɒz d͡ʒɒnb xdɒvnd ɒst، kh آsmɒn v zmjn rɒ آfrjd ɒv nxvɒhd ɡzɒʃt kh پɒj tv lɣzʃ xvrd ɒv kh hɒfz tvst nxvɒhdxvɒbjd ɒjnk ɒv kh hɒfz ɒsrɒئjl ɒst، nmj xvɒbd v bh xvɒb nmj rvd xdɒvnd hɒfz tv mj‌bɒʃd xdɒvnd bh‌dst rɒstt sɒjh tv ɒst آftɒb dr rvz bh tv ɒzjt nxvɒhd rsɒnjd v nh mɒhtɒb dr ʃb xdɒvndtv rɒ ɒz hr bdj ŋɒh mj‌dɒrd ɒv d͡ʒɒn tv rɒ hfzxvɒhd krdxdɒvnd xrvd͡ʒ v dxvlt rɒ ŋɒh xvɒhd dɒʃt، ɒz ɒlɒn v tɒ ɒbdɒlɒbɒd xdɒvnd xrvd͡ʒ v dxvlt rɒ ŋɒh xvɒhd dɒʃt، ɒz ɒlɒn v tɒ ɒbdɒlɒbɒd ʃɒdmɒn mj‌ʃdm t͡ʃvn bh mn mj ɡftnd «bh xɒnh xdɒvnd brvjm» پɒjhɒj mɒ xvɒhd ɒjstɒd، bh ɒndrvn drvɒzh hɒj tv، ɒj ɒvrʃljm ‌ɒj ɒvrʃljm kh bnɒ ʃdh‌ɒj msl ʃhrj kh tmɒm bɒ hm پjvsth bɒʃd، kh bdɒnd͡ʒɒɒsbɒt bɒlɒ mj‌rvnd، jʔnj ɒsbɒt jɒh، tɒ ʃhɒdt bɒʃd brɒj ɒsrɒئjl v tɒ nɒm jhvh rɒ tsbjh bxvɒnnd zjrɒ kh dr آnd͡ʒɒ krsjhɒj dɒvrj br پɒʃdh ɒst، jʔnj krsjhɒj xɒndɒn dɒvd brɒj slɒmtj ɒvrʃljm msɒlt knjd آnɒnj kh tv rɒ dvst mj‌dɒrnd، xd͡ʒsth hɒl xvɒhndʃd slɒmtj dr bɒrh hɒj tv bɒʃd، v rfɒhjt drɣsrhɒj tv bh‌xɒtr brɒdrɒn v jɒrɒn xvjʃ، mj‌ɡvjm kh slɒmtj br tv bɒdbh‌xɒtrxɒnh jhvh xdɒj mɒ، sʔɒdt tv rɒ xvɒhm tlbjd bh‌xɒtrxɒnh jhvh xdɒj mɒ، sʔɒdt tv rɒ xvɒhm tlbjd bh svj tv t͡ʃʃmɒn xvd rɒbrmj ɒfrɒzm، ɒj kh br آsmɒnhɒd͡ʒlvs frmvdh‌ɒj ɒjnk msl t͡ʃʃmɒn ɣlɒmɒn bh svj آɣɒjɒn xvd، v msl t͡ʃʃmɒn knjzj bh svj xɒtvn xvjʃ، hmt͡ʃnɒn t͡ʃʃmɒn mɒ bh svj jhvh xdɒj mɒst tɒ br mɒ krm bfrmɒjd ‌ɒj xdɒvnd br mɒ krm frmɒ، br mɒ krm frmɒ zjrɒt͡ʃh bsjɒr ɒz ɒhɒnt پr ʃdh‌ɒjmt͡ʃh bsjɒr d͡ʒɒn mɒپr ʃdh ɒst، ɒz ɒsthzɒj mstrjhɒn v ɒhɒnt mtkbrɒn t͡ʃh bsjɒr d͡ʒɒn mɒپr ʃdh ɒst، ɒz ɒsthzɒj mstrjhɒn v ɒhɒnt mtkbrɒn ɒɡr xdɒvnd bɒ mɒ nmj bvd، ɒsrɒئjl ɒlɒn bɡvjd؛ ɒɡr xdɒvnd bɒ mɒnmj bvd، vɣtj kh آdmjɒn bɒ mɒ mɣɒvmt nmvdnd، آŋɒh hr آjnh mɒ rɒ zndh frv mj‌brdnd، t͡ʃvn xʃm ɒjʃɒn br mɒ ɒfrvxth bvd آŋɒh آbhɒ mɒ rɒɣrɣ mj‌krd v nhrhɒ br d͡ʒɒn mɒ mj‌ɡzʃt آŋɒh آbhɒj پr zvr، ɒz d͡ʒɒn mɒ mj‌ɡzʃt mtbɒrk bɒd xdɒvnd kh mɒ rɒ ʃkɒr brɒj dndɒnhɒj ɒjʃɒn nsɒxt d͡ʒɒn mɒ msl mrɣ ɒz dɒm sjɒdɒn xlɒs ʃd dɒm ɡssth ʃd v mɒ xlɒsj jɒftjmɒʔɒnt mɒ bh nɒm jhvh ɒst، kh آsmɒn vzmjn rɒ آfrjd ɒʔɒnt mɒ bh nɒm jhvh ɒst، kh آsmɒn vzmjn rɒ آfrjd آnɒnj kh br xdɒvnd tvkl dɒrnd، msl kvh shjvn‌ɒnd kh d͡ʒnbʃ nmj xvrd v پɒjdɒr ɒst tɒ ɒbdɒlɒbɒd kvhhɒɡrdɒɡrd ɒvrʃljm ɒst؛ v xdɒvnd ɡrdɒɡrd ɣvm xvd، ɒz ɒlɒn v tɒ ɒbdɒlɒbɒd ɒst zjrɒ kh ʔsɒj ʃrjrɒn br nsjb ʔɒdlɒn ɣrɒr nxvɒhd ɡrft، mbɒdɒ ʔɒdlɒn dst xvd rɒ bh ɡnɒh drɒz knnd ‌ɒj xdɒvnd bh sɒlhɒn ɒhsɒn frmɒ v bh آnɒnj kh rɒst dl mj‌bɒʃndv ɒmɒ آnɒnj kh bh rɒhhɒj kd͡ʒ xvd mɒjl mj‌bɒʃnd، xdɒvnd ɒjʃɒn rɒ bɒ bdkɒrɒn rhbrj xvɒhd nmvd slɒmtj br ɒsrɒئjl bɒd v ɒmɒ آnɒnj kh bh rɒhhɒj kd͡ʒ xvd mɒjl mj‌bɒʃnd، xdɒvnd ɒjʃɒn rɒ bɒ bdkɒrɒn rhbrj xvɒhd nmvd slɒmtj br ɒsrɒئjl bɒd t͡ʃvn xdɒvnd ɒsjrɒn shjvn rɒ bɒzآvrd، msl xvɒb bjnndɡɒn ʃdjm آŋɒh dhɒn mɒ ɒz xndh پr ʃd v zbɒn mɒ ɒz trnm آŋɒh dr mjɒn ɒmthɒ ɡftnd kh «xdɒvnd bɒ ɒjʃɒn kɒrhɒj ʔzjm krdh ɒst» xdɒvnd brɒj mɒ kɒrhɒj ʔzjm krdh ɒst kh ɒz آnhɒ ʃɒdmɒn hstjm ‌ɒj xdɒvnd ɒsjrɒn mɒ rɒbɒz آvr، msl nhrhɒ dr d͡ʒnvb آnɒnj kh bɒ ɒʃkhɒmj kɒrnd، bɒ trnm drv xvɒhnd nmvdآnkh bɒɡrjh bjrvn mj‌rvd v txm brɒj zrɒʔt mj‌brd، hr آjnh bɒ trnm xvɒhd brɡʃt v bɒfh hɒj xvjʃ rɒ xvɒhd آvrd آnkh bɒɡrjh bjrvn mj‌rvd v txm brɒj zrɒʔt mj‌brd، hr آjnh bɒ trnm xvɒhd brɡʃt v bɒfh hɒj xvjʃ rɒ xvɒhd آvrd ɒɡr xdɒvnd xɒnh rɒ bnɒ nknd، bnɒjɒnʃ zhmt bj‌fɒjdh mj‌kʃnd ɒɡr xdɒvnd ʃhr rɒ پɒsbɒnj nknd، پɒsbɒnɒn bj‌fɒjdh پɒsbɒnj mj‌knnd bj‌fɒjdh ɒst kh ʃmɒsbh zvd brmj xjzjd v ʃb djr mj‌xvɒbjd v nɒn mʃɣt rɒ mj‌xvrjd hmt͡ʃnɒn mhbvbɒn xvjʃ rɒ xvɒb mj‌bxʃd ɒjnk پsrɒn mjrɒs ɒzd͡ʒɒnb xdɒvnd xvrd xvʃɒbhɒl tv v sʔɒdt bɒ tv xvɒhd bvd zn tvmsl mv bɒrآvr bh ɒtrɒf xɒnh tv xvɒhd bvd vپsrɒnt msl nhɒlhɒj zjtvn، ɡrdɒɡrd sfrh tv ɒjnk hmt͡ʃnjn mbɒrk xvɒhd bvd ksj‌kh ɒzxdɒvnd mj‌trsd xdɒvnd tv rɒ ɒz bvdnd، ʃɒdmɒnj xvɒstnd kh «jkj ɒz srvdhɒj shjvn rɒ brɒj mɒ bsrɒjjd» t͡ʃɡvnh srvd xdɒvnd rɒ، dr zmjn bjɡɒnh bxvɒnjm؟ ɒɡr tv rɒ‌ɒj ɒvrʃljm frɒmvʃ knm، آŋɒh dst rɒst mn frɒmvʃ knd ɒɡr tv rɒ bh jɒdnjɒvrm، آŋɒh zbɒnm bh kɒmm bt͡ʃsbd، ɒɡr ɒvrʃljm rɒbr hmh ʃɒdmɒnj xvd trd͡ʒjh ndhm ɒj xdɒvnd، rvz ɒvrʃljm rɒ brɒj bnj ɒdvm bh jɒdآvr، kh ɡftnd «mnhdm sɒzjd، tɒ bnjɒdʃ mnhdm sɒzjd» ‌ɒj dxtr bɒbl kh xrɒb xvɒhj ʃd، xvʃɒbhɒl آnkh bh tv d͡ʒzɒ dhd t͡ʃnɒnkh tv bh mɒd͡ʒzɒ dɒdjxvʃɒbhɒl آnkh ɒtfɒl tv rɒ bɡjrd vɒjʃɒn rɒ bh sxrh‌hɒ bznd xvʃɒbhɒl آnkh ɒtfɒl tv rɒ bɡjrd vɒjʃɒn rɒ bh sxrh‌hɒ bznd tv rɒ bh tmɒmj dl xvd hmdxvɒhm ɡft bh hzvr xdɒjɒn tvrɒ hmd xvɒhm ɡft bh svj hjkl ɣds tvʔbɒdt xvɒhm krd v nɒm tv rɒ hmd xvɒhm ɡft، bh‌sbb rhmt v rɒstj tv zjrɒ klɒm xvd rɒ brtmɒm ɒsm xvd tmd͡ʒjd nmvdh‌ɒj dr rvzj kh tvrɒ xvɒndm mrɒ ɒd͡ʒɒbt frmvdj v mrɒ bɒ ɣvt drd͡ʒɒnm ʃd͡ʒɒʔ sɒxtj ‌ɒj xdɒvnd، tmɒm پɒdʃɒhɒn d͡ʒhɒn tv rɒhmd xvɒhnd ɡft، t͡ʃvn klɒm dhɒn tv rɒbʃnvnd v trjɣ hɒj xdɒvnd rɒ xvɒhndsrɒjjd، zjrɒ kh d͡ʒlɒl nɒbvdmj ʃvd xvʃɒbhɒl آnkh xdɒj jʔɣvb mddkɒr ɒvst، kh ɒmjd ɒv br jhvh xdɒj vj mj‌bɒʃd، kh آsmɒn v zmjn rɒ آfrjd v drjɒ v آnt͡ʃh rɒ kh dr آnhɒst؛ kh rɒstj rɒ ŋɒh dɒrd tɒ ɒbdɒlɒbɒd؛ kh mzlvmɒn rɒ msthzئjn ɒz ɒsthzɒ ʃɒdj mj‌knnd v ɒhmɣɒn ɒz mʔrft nfrt mj‌nmɒjnd؟ bh‌sbb ʔtɒb mn bɒzɡʃt nmɒjjd ɒjnk rvh xvd rɒ br ʃmɒ ɒfɒzh xvɒhm nmvd v klmɒt xvd rɒ br ʃmɒ ɒʔlɒm xvɒhm krd zjrɒ kh t͡ʃvn xvɒndm، ʃmɒ xvɒhdbvd، v ɒz trs blɒ mstrjh xvɒhd mɒnd» ɒj پsr mn ɒɡr sxnɒn mrɒ ɣbvl mj‌nmvdj v ɒvɒmr mrɒ nzd xvd ŋɒh mj‌dɒʃtj، tɒɡvʃ xvd rɒ bh hkmt frɒ ɡjrj v dl xvd rɒ bh ftɒnt mɒjl ɡrdɒnj، ɒɡr fhm rɒ dʔvt rɒ hkjm mپndɒr، ɒz xdɒvnd btrs v ɒz bdj ɒd͡ʒtnɒb nmɒ ɒjn brɒj nɒf tv ʃfɒ، vbrɒj ɒstxvɒnhɒjt mɣz xvɒhd bvd ɒz mɒjmlk xvd xdɒvnd rɒ tkrjm nmɒ v ɒz nvbrhɒj hmh mhsvl xvjʃ آŋɒh ɒnbɒrhɒj tv bh vfvrnʔmt پr xvɒhd ʃd، v t͡ʃrxʃthɒj tv ɒz ʃjrh ɒŋvr lbrjz xvɒhd ɡʃt ‌ɒj پsr mn، tɒdjb xdɒvnd rɒ xvɒr mʃmɒr، v tvbjx ɒv rɒ mkrvh mdɒr zjrɒ xdɒvnd hr‌kh rɒ dvst dɒrdtɒdjb mj‌nmɒjd، msl پdr پsr xvjʃ rɒ kh ɒz ɒvmsrvr mj‌bɒʃd xvʃɒbhɒl ksj‌kh hkmt rɒ پjdɒ knd، v ʃxsj kh ftɒnt rɒ thsjl nmɒjd zjrɒ kh td͡ʒɒrt آn ɒz td͡ʒɒrt nɣrh vmhsvlʃ ɒz tlɒj xɒls njkvtr ɒst ɒzlʔlhɒ ɡrɒnbhɒtr ɒst v d͡ʒmjʔ nfɒjs tv bɒ آn brɒbrj ntvɒnd krd bh‌dst rɒst vj tvl ɒjɒm ɒst، v bh‌dst t͡ʃپʃ dvlt v d͡ʒlɒl trjɣhɒj vj trjɣhɒj ʃɒdmɒnj ɒst v hmh rɒhhɒj vj slɒmtj mj‌bɒʃd bh d͡ʒht آnɒnj kh ɒv rɒ bh‌dst ɡjrnd، drxt hjɒt‌ɒst vksj‌kh bh ɒv mtmsk mj‌bɒʃd xd͡ʒsth ɒst xdɒvnd bh hkmt xvd zmjn rɒ bnjɒd nhɒd، v bh ʔɣl xvjʃ آsmɒn rɒ ɒstvɒr nmvd bh ʔlm ɒv ld͡ʒh‌hɒ mnʃɣ ɡrdjd، v ɒflɒk ʃbnm rɒmj t͡ʃkɒnjd ‌ɒj پsr mn، ɒjn t͡ʃjzhɒ ɒz nzr tvdvr nʃvd hkmt kɒml v tmjz rɒ ŋɒh dɒr پs brɒj d͡ʒɒn tv hjɒt، v brɒj ɡrdnt zjnt xvɒhd bvd آŋɒh dr rɒh xvd bh ɒmnjt sɒlk xvɒhj ʃd، v پɒjt nxvɒhd lɣzjd hŋɒmj kh bxvɒbj، nxvɒhj trsjd v t͡ʃvn drɒz ʃvj xvɒbt ʃjrjn xvɒhd ʃd ɒz xvf nɒɡhɒn nxvɒhj trsjd، v nh ɒz xrɒbj ʃrjrɒn t͡ʃvn vɒɣʔ ʃvd zjrɒ xdɒvnd ɒʔtmɒd tv xvɒhd bvd v پɒj tv rɒ ɒz dɒm hfz xvɒhd nmvd ɒhsɒn rɒ ɒzɒhlʃ bɒz mdɒr، hŋɒmj kh bd͡ʒɒ آvrdnʃ dr ɣvt dst tvst bh hmsɒjh xvd mɡv brv vbɒzɡrd، v frdɒ bh tv xvɒhm dɒd، bɒ آnkh nzd tvhɒzr ɒst br hmsɒjh ɒt ɣsd bdj mkn، hŋɒmj kh ɒv nzd tv dr ɒmnjt sɒkn ɒst bɒksj‌kh bh tv bdj nkrdh ɒst، bj‌sbb mxɒsmh mnmɒ br mrd zɒlm hsd mbr vhjt͡ʃkdɒm ɒz rɒhhɒjʃ rɒ ɒxtjɒr mkn zjrɒkd͡ʒ xlɣɒn nzd xdɒvnd mkrvhnd، ljkn sr ɒv nzdrɒstɒn ɒst، lʔnt xdɒvnd br xɒnh ʃrjrɒn ɒst ɒmɒ mskn ʔɒdlɒn rɒ brkt mj‌dhd jɣjn kh msthzئjn rɒ ɒsthzɒ mj‌nmɒjd، ɒmɒ mtvɒzʔɒn rɒfjz mj‌bxʃdhkjmɒn vɒrs d͡ʒlɒl xvɒhnd ʃd، ɒmɒ ɒhmɣɒn xd͡ʒɒlt rɒ xvɒhnd brd hkjmɒn vɒrs d͡ʒlɒl xvɒhnd ʃd، ɒmɒ ɒhmɣɒn xd͡ʒɒlt rɒ xvɒhnd brd ɒj پsrɒn، tɒdjb پdr rɒ bʃnvjd v ɡvʃ dhjd tɒ ftɒnt rɒ bfhmjd، t͡ʃvnkh tʔljm njkv bh ʃmɒ mj‌dhm پs ʃrjʔt mrɒ trk mnmɒjjd zjrɒ kh mn brɒj پdr xvd پsr bvdm، vdr nzr mɒdrm ʔzjz v jɡɒnh v ɒv mrɒ tʔljm dɒdh، mj‌ɡft «dl tv bh sxnɒn mn mtmsk ʃvd، vɒvɒmr mrɒ ŋɒh dɒr tɒ zndh bmɒnj hkmt rɒthsjl nmɒ v fhm rɒ پjdɒ kn frɒmvʃ mkn v ɒz klmɒt dhɒnm ɒnhrɒf mvrz آn rɒ trk mnmɒ kh tv rɒ mhɒfzt xvɒhd nmvd آn rɒ dvst dɒr kh tv rɒ ŋɒh xvɒhd dɒʃt hkmt ɒz hmh‌t͡ʃjzɒfzl ɒst پs hkmt rɒ thsjl nmɒ v bh hrآnt͡ʃh thsjl nmvdh bɒʃj، fhm rɒ thsjl kn آn rɒ mhtrm dɒr، v tv rɒ blnd xvɒhd sɒxt vɒɡr ɒv rɒ dr آɣvʃ bkʃj tv rɒ mʔzm xvɒhdɡrdɒnjd br sr tv tɒd͡ʒ zjbɒjj xvɒhd nhɒd vɒfsr d͡ʒlɒl bh tv ʔtɒ xvɒhd nmvd» ‌ɒj پsr mn bʃnv v sxnɒn mrɒ ɣbvl nmɒ، kh sɒlhɒj ʔmrt bsjɒr xvɒhd ʃd rɒh hkmt rɒ bh tv tʔljm dɒdm، v bh trjɣhɒj rɒstj tv rɒhdɒjt nmvdm t͡ʃvn dr rɒh brvj ɣdmhɒj tvtŋ nxvɒhd ʃd، v t͡ʃvn bdvj lɣzʃ nxvɒhj xvrd ɒdb rɒ bh t͡ʃŋ آvr v آn rɒ frv mɡzɒr آn rɒ ŋɒh dɒr zjrɒ kh hjɒt tv ɒst bh rɒh ʃrjrɒn dɒxl mʃv، v dr trjɣ ɡnɒhkɒrɒn sɒlk mbɒʃ آn rɒ trk kn v bh آn ɡzr mnmɒ، v ɒz آn ɒd͡ʒtnɒb krdh، bɡzr zjrɒ kh ɒjʃɒn tɒ bdj nkrdh bɒʃnd، nmj xvɒbnd v ɒɡr ksj rɒ nlɣzɒnjdh bɒʃnd، xvɒb ɒz ɒjʃɒn mnɣtʔ mj‌ʃvd t͡ʃvnkh nɒn ʃrɒrt rɒ mj‌xvrnd، v ʃrɒb zlm rɒmj nvʃnd ljkn trjɣ ʔɒdlɒn msl nvr mʃrɣ ɒst kh tɒ nhɒr kɒml rvʃnɒjj آn dr tzɒjdmj bɒʃd v ɒmɒ trjɣ ʃrjrɒn msl zlmt ɣljzɒst، v nmj dɒnnd kh ɒz t͡ʃh t͡ʃjz mj‌lɣznd ‌ɒj پsr mn، bh sxnɒn mn tvd͡ʒh nmɒ v ɡvʃ xvd rɒ bh klmɒt mn frɒ ɡjr آnhɒ ɒz nzr tv dvrnʃvd آnhɒ rɒ dr ɒndrvn dl xvd ŋɒh dɒr zjrɒhr‌kh آnhɒ rɒ bjɒbd brɒj ɒv hjɒt‌ɒst، v brɒj tmɒmj d͡ʒsd ɒv ʃfɒ mj‌bɒʃd dl xvd rɒ bh hfz tmɒm ŋɒh dɒr، zjrɒ kh mxrd͡ʒ hɒj hjɒt ɒzآn ɒst dhɒn drvɣɡv rɒ ɒz xvd bjndɒz، vlbhɒj kd͡ʒ rɒ ɒz xvjʃtn dvr nmɒ t͡ʃʃmɒnt bh ɒstɣɒmt ŋrɒn bɒʃd، v mʒɡɒnt پjʃ rvj tvrɒst bɒʃd trjɣ پɒjhɒj xvd rɒ hmvɒrbsɒz، tɒ hmh trjɣhɒj tv mstɣjm bɒʃdbh trf rɒst jɒ t͡ʃپ mnhrf mʃv، v پɒj xvd rɒɒz bdj ŋɒh dɒr bh trf rɒst jɒ t͡ʃپ mnhrf mʃv، v پɒj xvd rɒɒz bdj ŋɒh dɒr ɒj پsr mn، bh hkmt mn tvd͡ʒh nmɒ، v ɡvʃ xvd rɒ bh ftɒnt mn frɒɡjr، tɒtdɒbjr rɒ mhɒfzt nmɒjj، v lbhɒjt mʔrft rɒŋɒh dɒrd zjrɒ kh lbhɒj zn ɒd͡ʒnbj ʔsl rɒmj t͡ʃkɒnd، v dhɒn ɒv ɒz rvɣn mlɒjm tr ɒst ljkn آxr ɒv msl ɒfsntjn tlx ɒst v brndh msl ʃmʃjr dvdm پɒjhɒjʃ bh mvt frv mj‌rvd، vɣdmhɒjʃ bh hɒvjh mtmsk mj‌bɒʃd bh trjɣ hjɒt hrɡz sɒlk nxvɒhd ʃd ɣdmhɒjʃ آvɒrh ʃdh ɒst v ɒv nmj dɒnd v ɒlɒn‌ɒj پsrɒnm mrɒbʃnvjd، v ɒz sxnɒn dhɒnm ɒnhrɒf mvrzjd trjɣ xvd rɒ ɒz ɒv dvr sɒz، v bh dr xɒnh ɒvnzdjk mʃv mbɒdɒ ʔnfvɒn d͡ʒvɒnj xvd rɒ bh djɡrɒn bdhj، v sɒlhɒj xvjʃ rɒ bh stm kjʃɒn v ɣrjbɒn ɒz ɒmvɒl tv sjr ʃvnd، v smrh mhnt tv bh xɒnh bjɡɒnh rvd kh dr ʔɒɣbt xvdnvhh ɡrj nmɒjj، hŋɒmj kh ɡvʃt v bdnt fɒnj ʃdh bɒʃd، v ɡvjj t͡ʃrɒ ɒdb rɒ mkrvh dɒʃtm، v dl mn tnbjh rɒ xvɒr ʃmrd، v آvɒz mrʃdɒn xvd rɒ nʃnjdm، v bh mʔlmɒn xvd ɡvʃ ndɒdm nzdjk bvd kh hr ɡvnh bdj rɒ mrtkb ʃvm، dr mjɒn ɣvm v d͡ʒmɒʔt آb rɒ ɒz mnbʔ xvd bnvʃ، v nhrhɒj d͡ʒɒrj rɒ ɒz t͡ʃʃmh xvjʃ d͡ʒvjhɒj tv bjrvn xvɒhd rjxt، v nhrhɒj آb dr ʃvɒrʔ ʔɒm، v ɒz آn xvdt bh tnhɒjj xvɒhd bvd، v nh ɒz آn ɣrjbɒn bɒ tv t͡ʃʃmh tv mbɒrk bɒʃd، v ɒz zn d͡ʒvɒnj xvjʃ msrvr bɒʃ، msl ɣzɒl mhbvb v آhvj d͡ʒmjl پstɒnhɒjʃ tv rɒ hmjʃh xrm sɒzd، v ɒz mhbt ɒv dɒئm mhfvz bɒʃ ljkn‌ɒj پsr mn، t͡ʃrɒ ɒz zn bjɡɒnh frjfth ʃvj؟ v sjnh zn ɣrjb rɒ dr br‌ɡjrj؟ zjrɒkh rɒhhɒj ɒnsɒn dr mdnzr xdɒvnd ɒst، vtmɒmj trjɣhɒj vj rɒ mj‌snd͡ʒd tɣsjrhɒj ʃrjr ɒv rɒ ɡrftɒr mj‌sɒzd، v bh bndhɒj ɡnɒhɒn xvd bsth mj‌ʃvdɒv bdvn ɒdb xvɒhd mrd، v bh ksrt hmɒɣt xvjʃ tlf xvɒhd ɡrdjd ɒv bdvn ɒdb xvɒhd mrd، v bh ksrt hmɒɣt xvjʃ tlf xvɒhd ɡrdjd ɒj پsrm، ɒɡr brɒj hmsɒjh xvd zɒmn ʃdh، v bh d͡ʒht ʃxs bjɡɒnh dst dɒdh bɒʃj، v ɒz sxnɒn dhɒn xvd dr dɒm ɒftɒdh، v ɒzsxnɒn dhɒnt ɡrftɒr ʃdh bɒʃj، پs‌ɒj پsrmn، ɒjn rɒ bkn v xvjʃtn rɒ rhɒjj dh t͡ʃvnkh bh‌dst hmsɒjh ɒt ɒftɒdh‌ɒj brv v xvjʃtn rɒfrvtn sɒz v ɒz hmsɒjh xvd ɒltmɒs nmɒ xvɒb rɒ bh t͡ʃʃmɒn xvd rɒh mdh، v nh پjnkj rɒbh mʒɡɒn xvjʃ msl آhv xvjʃtn rɒ ɒz kmndv mɒnnd ɡnd͡ʒʃk ɒz dst sjɒd xlɒs kn ‌ɒj ʃxs kɒhl nzd mvrt͡ʃh brv، v drrɒhhɒj ɒv tɒml kn v hkmt rɒ bjɒmvz، kh vj rɒ پjʃvɒjj njst v nh srvr v nh hɒkmj ɒmɒxvrɒk xvd rɒ tɒbstɒn mhjɒ mj‌sɒzd v آzvɣh xvjʃ rɒ dr mvsm hsɒd d͡ʒmʔ mj‌knd ‌ɒj kɒhl، tɒ bh t͡ʃnd xvɒhj xvɒbjd v ɒz xvɒb xvdkj xvɒhj brxɒst؟ ɒndkj xft v ɒndkj xvɒb، v ɒndkj br hm nhɒdn dsthɒ bh d͡ʒht xvɒb پs fɣr msl rɒhzn br tv xvɒhd آmd، v njɒzmndj br tv mɒnnd mrd mslh mrd lئjm v mrd zʃt xvj، bɒ ɒʔvd͡ʒɒd͡ʒ dhɒn rftɒr mj‌knd bɒ t͡ʃʃmɒn xvd ɣmzh mj‌znd v bɒ پɒjhɒj xvjʃ hrf mj‌znd bɒɒŋʃthɒj xvjʃ ɒʃɒrh blkh hft t͡ʃjz kh nzd d͡ʒɒn vj mkrvh ɒst t͡ʃʃmɒn mtkbr v zbɒn drvɣɡv، vdsthɒjj kh xvn bj‌ɡnɒh rɒ mj‌rjzd dlj kh tdɒbjr fɒsd rɒ ɒxtrɒʔ mj‌knd پɒjhɒjj kh drzjɒn kɒrj tjzrv mj‌bɒʃnd ʃɒhd drvɣɡv kh bh kzb mtklm ʃvd v ksj‌kh dr mjɒn brɒdrɒn nzɒʔhɒ bپɒʃd ‌ɒj پsr mn ɒvɒmr پdr xvd rɒ ŋɒh dɒr vtʔljm mɒdr xvjʃ rɒ trk mnmɒ آnhɒ rɒ br dl xvd dɒئm bbnd، v آnhɒ rɒ br ɡrdn xvjʃ bjɒvjz hjnj kh bh rɒh mj‌rvj tv rɒ hdɒjt xvɒhd nmvd، v hjnj kh mj‌xvɒbj br tv djdh bɒnj xvɒhd krd، v vɣtj kh bjdɒr ʃvj bɒ tv mkɒlmh xvɒhd nmvd zjrɒ kh ɒhkɒm ɒjʃɒn t͡ʃrɒɣ vtʔljm ɒjʃɒn nvr ɒst، v tvbjx tdbjrآmjz trjɣ hjɒt‌ɒst tɒ tv rɒ ɒz zn xbjsh ŋɒh dɒrd، v ɒzt͡ʃɒپlvsj zbɒn zn bjɡɒnh dr dlt mʃtɒɣ d͡ʒmɒl vj mbɒʃ، v ɒz پlkhɒjʃ frjfth mʃv، zjrɒ kh bh‌sbb zn zɒnjh، ʃxs brɒj jk ɣrs nɒn mhtɒd͡ʒ mj‌ʃvd، v zn mrd djɡr، d͡ʒɒn ɡrɒnbhɒ rɒ sjd mj‌knd آjɒ ksj آtʃ rɒ drآɣvʃ xvd bɡjrd v d͡ʒɒmh‌ɒʃ svxth nʃvd؟ jɒ ksj br ɒxɡrhɒj svzndh rɒh rvd vپɒjhɒjʃ svxth ŋrdd؟ hmt͡ʃnjn ɒst ksj‌kh nzd zn hmsɒjh xvjʃ dɒxl ʃvd، zjrɒ hr‌kh ɒv rɒ lms nmɒjd bj‌ɡnɒh nxvɒhd mɒnd dzd rɒ ɒhɒnt nmj knnd ɒɡr dzdj knd tɒd͡ʒɒn xvd rɒ sjr nmɒjd vɣtj kh ɡrsnh bɒʃd ljkn ɒɡr ɡrfth ʃvd، hft t͡ʃndɒn rd xvɒhdnmvd v tmɒmj ɒmvɒl xɒnh xvd rɒ xvɒhd dɒd ɒmɒ ksj‌kh bɒ znj znɒ knd، nɒɣs ɒlʔɣl ɒst vhr‌kh t͡ʃnjn ʔml nmɒjd، d͡ʒɒn xvd rɒ hlɒk xvɒhd sɒxt ɒv zrb v rsvɒjj xvɒhdjɒft، v nŋ ɒv mhv nxvɒhd ʃd zjrɒ kh ɣjrt، ʃdt xʃm mrd ɒst v dr rvz ɒntɣɒm، ʃfɣt nxvɒhd nmvdbr hjt͡ʃ kfɒrh‌ɒj nzrnxvɒhd krd v hr‌t͡ʃnd ʔtɒjɒ rɒ zjɒdh knj، ɣbvl nxvɒhd nmvd br hjt͡ʃ kfɒrh‌ɒj nzrnxvɒhd krd v hr‌t͡ʃnd ʔtɒjɒ rɒ zjɒdh knj، ɣbvl nxvɒhd nmvd ɒj پsr mn sxnɒn mrɒ ŋɒh dɒr، v ɒvɒmr mrɒnzd xvd zxjrh nmɒ ɒvɒmr mrɒ ŋɒh dɒr tɒzndh bmɒnj، v tʔljm mrɒ msl mrdmk t͡ʃʃm xvjʃ آnhɒ rɒ br ɒŋʃthɒj xvd bbnd v آnhɒ rɒbr lvh ɣlb xvd mrɣvm dɒr bh hkmt bɡv kh tv xvɒhr mn hstj v fhm rɒ dvst xvjʃ bxvɒn tɒ tv rɒ ɒz zn ɒd͡ʒnbj ŋɒh dɒrd، v ɒz zn ɣrjbj kh sxnɒn tmlɣ‌آmjz mj‌ɡvjd zjrɒ kh ɒz drjt͡ʃh xɒnh xvd ŋɒh krdm، v ɒzپʃt ʃbkh xvjʃ dr mjɒn d͡ʒɒhlɒn djdm، vdr mjɒn d͡ʒvɒnɒn، d͡ʒvɒnj nɒɣs ɒlʔɣl mʃɒhdh nmvdm، kh dr kvt͡ʃh bsvj ɡvʃh ɒv mj‌ɡzʃt v bh rɒh xɒnh vj mj‌rft، dr ʃɒm dr hjn zvɒl rvz، dr sjɒhj ʃb v dr zlmt ɣljz، kh ɒjnk znj bh ɒstɣbɒl vj mj‌آmd، dr lbɒs zɒnjh vdr xbɒst dl znj jɒvh‌ɡv v srkʃ kh پɒjhɒjʃ dr xɒnh‌ɒʃ ɣrɒr nmj ɡjrd ɡɒhj drkvt͡ʃh‌hɒ v ɡɒhj dr ʃvɒrʔ ʔɒm، v nzd hr ɡvʃh‌ɒj dr kmjn mj‌bɒʃd پs ɒv rɒ bɡrft v bvsjd vt͡ʃhrh xvd rɒ bj‌hjɒ sɒxth، ɒv rɒ ɡft «nzdmn zbɒjh slɒmtj ɒst، zjrɒ kh ɒmrvz nzrhɒj xvd rɒ vfɒ nmvdm ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht bh ɒstɣbɒl tvbjrvn آmdm، tɒ rvj tv rɒ bh sʔj tmɒm btlbm vhɒl tv rɒ jɒftm br bstr xvd dvʃkhɒɡstrɒnjdh‌ɒm، bɒ djbɒhɒ ɒz ktɒn msrj bstrxvd rɒ bɒ mr v ʔvd v sljxh mʔtr sɒxth‌ɒm bjɒtɒ sbh ɒz ʔʃɣ sjr ʃvjm، v xvjʃtn rɒ ɒzmhbt xrm sɒzjm zjrɒ sɒhbxɒnh dr xɒnh njst، v sfr dvr rfth ɒst kjsh nɣrh‌ɒj bh‌dst ɡrfth v tɒ rvz bdr tmɒm mrɒd͡ʒʔt nxvɒhdnmvd» پs ɒv rɒ ɒz zjɒdtj sxnɒnʃ frjfth krd، vɒz tmlɣ lbhɒjʃ ɒv rɒ ɒɣvɒ nmvd dr sɒʔt ɒzʔɣb ɒv msl ɡɒvj kh bh slɒx xɒnh mj‌rvd، rvɒnh ʃd v mɒnnd ɒhmɣ bh znd͡ʒjrhɒj ɣsɒs tɒ tjr bh d͡ʒɡrʃ frv rvd، msl ɡnd͡ʒʃkj kh bh dɒm mj‌ʃtɒbd v nmj dɒnd kh bh xtr d͡ʒɒn xvd mj‌rvd پs hɒl‌ɒj پsrɒn mrɒ bʃnvjd، v bh sxnɒn dhɒnm tvd͡ʒh nmɒjjd dl tv bh rɒhhɒjʃ mɒjl nʃvd، v bh trjɣhɒjʃ ɡmrɒh mʃv، zjrɒkh ɒv bsjɒrj rɒ md͡ʒrvh‌ɒndɒxth ɒst، v d͡ʒmjʔ kʃtɡɒnʃ zvrآvrɒnndxɒnh ɒv trjɣ hɒvjh ɒst v bh hd͡ʒrh hɒj mvt mvdj mj‌bɒʃd xɒnh ɒv trjɣ hɒvjh ɒst v bh hd͡ʒrh hɒj mvt mvdj mj‌bɒʃd آjɒ hkmt ndɒ nmj knd، v ftɒnt آvɒzxvd rɒ blnd nmj nmɒjd؟ bh‌sr mkɒn hɒj blnd، bh knɒrh rɒh، dr mjɒn trjɣhɒ mj‌ɒjstd bh‌d͡ʒɒnb drvɒzh‌hɒ bh dhnh ʃhr، nzd mdxl drvɒzh‌hɒ sdɒ mj‌znd kh ʃmɒ rɒ‌ɒj mrdɒn mj‌xvɒnm v آvɒz mn bh bnj آdm ɒst ‌ɒj d͡ʒɒhlɒn zjrkj rɒ bfhmjd v‌ɒj ɒhmɣɒn ʔɣl rɒdrk nmɒjjd bʃnvjd zjrɒ kh bh ɒmvr ʔɒljh tklm mj‌nmɒjm v ɡʃɒdn lbhɒjm ɒstɣɒmt ɒst dhɒnm bh rɒstj tntɣ mj‌knd v lbhɒjm ʃrɒrt rɒ mkrvh mj‌dɒrd hmh sxnɒn dhɒnm br‌hɣ ɒst v drآnhɒ hjt͡ʃ‌t͡ʃjz kd͡ʒ jɒ mʔvd͡ʒ njst tmɒmj آnhɒnzd mrd fhjm vɒzh ɒst v nzd jɒbndɡɒn mʔrft mstɣjm ɒst tɒdjb mrɒ ɣbvl knjd v nh nɣrh rɒ، v mʔrft rɒ bjʃtr ɒz tlɒj xɒls zjrɒ kh hkmt ɒz lʔlhɒ bhtr ɒst، v d͡ʒmjʔ nfɒjs rɒ bh ɒv brɒbr ntvɒn krd mn hkmtm v dr zjrkj skvnt dɒrm، v mʔrft tdbjr rɒ jɒfth‌ɒm trs xdɒvnd، mkrvh dɒʃtn bdj ɒst ɣrvr v tkbr vrɒh bd v dhɒn drvɣɡv rɒ mkrvh mj‌dɒrm mʃvrt v hkmt kɒml ɒz آn mn ɒst mn fhm hstm v ɣvt ɒz آn mn ɒst bh mn پɒdʃɒhɒn sltnt mj‌knnd، v dɒvrɒn bh ʔdɒlt ftvɒ mj‌dhnd bh mn srvrɒn hkmrɒnj mj‌nmɒjnd v ʃrjfɒn v d͡ʒmjʔ dɒvrɒn d͡ʒhɒn mn dvst mj‌dɒrm آnɒnj rɒ kh mrɒ dvst mj‌dɒrnd vhr‌kh mrɒ bh d͡ʒd v d͡ʒhd btlbd mrɒ xvɒhd jɒft dvlt v d͡ʒlɒl bɒ mn ɒst tvɒŋrj d͡ʒɒvdɒnj vʔdɒlt smrh mn ɒz tlɒ v zr nɒb bhtr ɒst، vhɒsl mn ɒz nɣrh xɒls dr trjɣ ʔdɒlt mj‌xrɒmm، dr mjɒn rɒhhɒj ɒnsɒf، tɒ mɒl hɣjɣj rɒ nsjb mhbɒn xvd ɡrdɒnm، vxzjnh hɒj ɒjʃɒn rɒ mmlv sɒzm xdɒvnd mrɒ mbdɒء trjɣ xvd dɒʃt، ɣbl ɒz ɒʔmɒl xvjʃ ɒz ɒzl mn ɒz ɒzl brɣrɒr bvdm، ɒz ɒbtdɒ پjʃ ɒz bvdn d͡ʒhɒn hŋɒmj kh ld͡ʒh hɒnbvd mn mvlvd ʃdm، vɣtj kh t͡ʃʃmh hɒj پr ɒzآb vd͡ʒvd ndɒʃt ɣbl ɒz آŋɒh kvhhɒ brپɒʃvd، پjʃ ɒz tlhɒ mvlvd ɡrdjdm t͡ʃvn zmjn vshrɒhɒ rɒ hnvz nsɒxth bvd، v nh ɒvl ɣbɒr rbʔ mskvn rɒ vɣtj kh ɒv آsmɒn rɒ msthkm sɒxt mn آnd͡ʒɒ bvdm، v hŋɒmj kh dɒjrh rɒ brsth ld͡ʒh ɣrɒr dɒd vɣtj kh ɒflɒk rɒ bɒlɒɒstvɒr krd، v t͡ʃʃmh hɒj ld͡ʒh rɒ ɒstvɒr ɡrdɒnjd t͡ʃvn bh drjɒ hd ɣrɒr dɒd، tɒ آbhɒ ɒz frmɒn ɒvtd͡ʒɒvz nknnd، v zmɒnj kh bnjɒd zmjn rɒ nhɒd آŋɒh nzd ɒv mʔmɒr bvdm، v rvzbrvz ʃɒdj mj‌nmvdm، v hmjʃh bh hzvr ɒv ɒhtzɒz mj‌krdm v ɒhtzɒz mn dr آbɒdj zmjn vj، v ʃɒdj mn bɒbnj آdm mj‌bvd پs ɒlɒn‌ɒj پsrɒn mrɒ bʃnvjd، vxvʃɒbhɒl آnɒnj kh trjɣhɒj mrɒ ŋɒh dɒrnd tɒdjb rɒ bʃnvjd v hkjm bɒʃjd، v آn rɒ rdmnmɒjjd xvʃɒbhɒl ksj‌kh mrɒ bʃnvd، v hrrvz nzd drhɒj mn djdh bɒnj knd، v bɒhvhɒj drvɒzh hɒj mrɒ mhɒfzt nmɒjd zjrɒ hr‌kh mrɒjɒbd hjɒt rɒ thsjl knd، v rzɒmndj xdɒvndrɒ hɒsl nmɒjdv ɒmɒ ksj‌kh mrɒ xtɒ knd، bh‌d͡ʒɒn xvd zrr rsɒnd، v hr‌kh mrɒ dʃmn dɒrd، mvt rɒ dvst dɒrd v ɒmɒ ksj‌kh mrɒ xtɒ knd، bh‌d͡ʒɒn xvd zrr rsɒnd، v hr‌kh mrɒ dʃmn dɒrd، mvt rɒ dvst dɒrd hkmt، xɒnh xvd rɒ bnɒ krdh، v hft stvnhɒj xvjʃ rɒ trɒʃjdh ɒst zbɒjh xvd rɒ zbh nmvdh v ʃrɒb xvd rɒ mmzvd͡ʒ sɒxth v sfrh xvd rɒ njz آrɒsth ɒst knjzɒn xvd rɒ frstɒdh، ndɒ krdh ɒst، br پʃthɒj blndʃhr hr‌kh d͡ʒɒhl bɒʃd bh ɒjnd͡ʒɒ bjɒjd، v hr‌kh nɒɣs ɒlʔɣl ɒst ɒv rɒ mj‌ɡvjd bjɒjjd ɒz ɣzɒj mn bxvrjd، v ɒz ʃrɒbj kh mmzvd͡ʒ sɒxth‌ɒm bnvʃjd d͡ʒhɒlt rɒ trk krdh، zndh bmɒnjd، v bh trjɣ fhm slvk nmɒjjd hr‌kh ɒsthzɒknndh rɒtɒdjb nmɒjd، brɒj xvjʃtn rsvɒjj rɒ thsjl knd، v hr‌kh ʃrjr rɒ tnbjh nmɒjd brɒj ɒv ʔjb mj‌bɒʃd ɒsthzɒknndh rɒ tnbjh mnmɒ mbɒdɒ ɒz tvnfrt knd، ɒmɒ mrd hkjm rɒ tnbjh nmɒ kh tv rɒdvst xvɒhd dɒʃt mrd hkjm rɒ پnd dh kh zjɒdh hkjm xvɒhd ʃd mrd ʔɒdl rɒ tʔljm dh kh ʔlmʃ xvɒhd ɒfzvd ɒbtdɒj hkmt trs xdɒvnd ɒst، v mʔrft ɣdvs ftɒnt mj‌bɒʃd zjrɒ kh bh vɒsth mn rvzhɒj tv ksjr xvɒhdʃd، v sɒlhɒj ʔmr ɒz brɒjt zjɒdh xvɒhdɡrdjd ɒɡr hkjm hstj، brɒj xvjʃtn hkjm hstj v ɒɡr ɒsthzɒ nmɒjj bh tnhɒjj mthml آn xvɒhj bvd zn ɒhmɣ jɒvh‌ɡv ɒst، d͡ʒɒhl ɒst v hjt͡ʃ nmj dɒnd، v nzd dr xɒnh xvd mj‌nʃjnd، drmkɒnhɒj blnd ʃhr br krsj، tɒ rɒh rvndɡɒn rɒbxvɒnd، v آnɒnj rɒ kh bh rɒhhɒj xvd brɒstj mj‌rvnd hr‌kh d͡ʒɒhl bɒʃd bh ɒjnd͡ʒɒ brɡrdd، vbh nɒɣs ɒlʔɣl mj‌ɡvjd «آbhɒj dzdjdh ʃdh ʃjrjn ɒst، v nɒn xfjh lzjz mj‌bɒʃd»v ɒvnmj dɒnd kh mrdɡɒn dr آnd͡ʒɒ hstnd، vdʔvt‌ʃdɡɒnʃ dr ʔmɣhɒj hɒvjh mj‌bɒʃnd v ɒvnmj dɒnd kh mrdɡɒn dr آnd͡ʒɒ hstnd، vdʔvt‌ʃdɡɒnʃ dr ʔmɣhɒj hɒvjh mj‌bɒʃnd ɒmsɒl sljmɒn پsr hkjm پdr xvd rɒmsrvr mj‌sɒzd، ɒmɒ پsr ɒhmɣ bɒʔs hzn mɒdrʃ mj‌ʃvd ɡnd͡ʒhɒj ʃrɒrt mnfʔt ndɒrd، ɒmɒ ʔdɒlt ɒz mvt rhɒjj mj‌dhd xdɒvnd d͡ʒɒn mrd ʔɒdl rɒ nmj ɡzɒrd ɡrsnh bʃvd، ɒmɒ آrzvj ʃrjrɒn rɒ bɒtl mj‌sɒzd ksj‌kh bh‌dst sst kɒr mj‌knd fɣjrmj ɡrdd، ɒmɒ dst t͡ʃɒbk ɣnj mj‌sɒzd ksj‌kh dr tɒbstɒn d͡ʒmʔ knd پsr ʔɒɣl ɒst، ɒmɒ ksj‌kh dr mvsm hsɒd mj‌xvɒbd، پsr ʃrm‌آvrndh ɒst br sr ʔɒdlɒn brkt‌hɒ ɒst، ɒmɒ zlm dhɒn ʃrjrɒn rɒ mj‌پvʃɒnd jɒdɡɒr ʔɒdlɒn mbɒrk ɒst، ɒmɒ ɒsm ʃrjrɒn xvɒhd ɡndjd dɒnɒdl، ɒhkɒm rɒ ɣbvl mj‌knd، ɒmɒ ɒhmɣ پrɡv tlf xvɒhd ʃd ksj‌kh bh rɒstj rɒh rvd، dr ɒmnjt sɒlk ɡrdd، v ksj‌kh rɒh xvd rɒ kd͡ʒ mj‌sɒzd آʃkɒrxvɒhd ʃd hr‌kh t͡ʃʃmk mj‌znd ɒlm mj‌rsɒnd، ɒmɒɒhmɣ پrɡv tlf mj‌ʃvd dhɒn ʔɒdlɒn t͡ʃʃmh hjɒt‌ɒst، ɒmɒ zlm dhɒn ʃrjrɒn rɒ mj‌پvʃɒnd bɣz nzɒʔhɒ mj‌ɒŋjzɒnd، ɒmɒ mhbt hr ɡnɒh rɒ mstvr mj‌sɒzd dr lbhɒj ftɒnt پjʃɡɒn hkmt jɒft mj‌ʃvd، ɒmɒ t͡ʃvb bh d͡ʒht پʃt mrdnɒɣs ɒlʔɣl ɒst hkjmɒn ʔlm rɒ zxjrh mj‌knnd، ɒmɒ dhɒn ɒhmɣ nzdjk bh hlɒkt ɒst ɒmvɒl dvltmndɒn ʃhr hsɒrdɒr ɒjʃɒn mj‌bɒʃd، ɒmɒ bjnvɒjj fɣjrɒn hlɒkt ɒjʃɒn ɒst ʔml mrd ʔɒdl mvdj bh hjɒt‌ɒst، ɒmɒmhsvl ʃrjr bh ɡnɒh mj‌ɒnd͡ʒɒmd ksj‌kh tɒdjb rɒ ŋɒh dɒrd dr trjɣ hjɒt‌ɒst، ɒmɒ ksj‌kh tnbjh rɒ trk nmɒjd ɡmrɒh mj‌ʃvd ksj‌kh bɣz rɒ mj‌پvʃɒnd drvɣɡvmj bɒʃd ksj‌kh bhtɒn rɒ ʃjvʔ dhd ɒhmɣ ɒst ksrt klɒm ɒz ɡnɒh xɒlj nmj bɒʃd، ɒmɒ آnkh lbhɒjʃ rɒ zbt nmɒjd ʔɒɣl ɒst zbɒn ʔɒdlɒn nɣrh xɒls ɒst، ɒmɒ dl ʃrjrɒn lɒʃj mj‌bɒʃd lbhɒj ʔɒdlɒn bsjɒrj rɒ rʔɒjt mj‌knd، ɒmɒ ɒhmɣɒn ɒz bj‌ʔɣlj mj‌mjrnd brkt xdɒvnd dvltmnd mj‌sɒzd، v hjt͡ʃ zhmt br آn nmj ɒfzɒjd d͡ʒɒhl dr ʔml bd ɒhtzɒz dɒrd، v sɒhb ftɒnt dr hkmt xvf ʃrjrɒn bh ɒjʃɒn mj‌rsd، v آrzvj ʔɒdlɒn bh ɒjʃɒn ʔtɒ xvɒhd ʃd msl ɡzʃtn ɡrdbɒd، ʃrjr nɒbvd mj‌ʃvd، ɒmɒmrd ʔɒdl bnjɒd d͡ʒɒvdɒnj ɒst t͡ʃnɒnkh srkh brɒj dndɒn v dvd brɒj t͡ʃʃmɒn ɒst، hmt͡ʃnjn ɒst mrd kɒhl brɒj آnɒnj kh ɒv rɒ mj‌frstnd trs xdɒvnd ʔmr rɒ tvjl mj‌sɒzd، ɒmɒsɒlhɒj ʃrjrɒn kvtɒh xvɒhd ʃd ɒntzɒr ʔɒdlɒn ʃɒdmɒnj ɒst، ɒmɒ ɒmjdʃrjrɒn zɒjʔ xvɒhd ʃd trjɣ xdɒvnd bh d͡ʒht kɒmlɒn ɣlʔh ɒst، ɒmɒ bh d͡ʒht ʔɒmlɒn ʃr hlɒkt mj‌bɒʃd mrd ʔɒdl hrɡz mthrk nxvɒhd ʃd، ɒmɒʃrjrɒn dr zmjn sɒkn nxvɒhnd ɡʃt dhɒn sdjɣɒn hkmt rɒ mj‌rvjɒnd، ɒmɒzbɒn drvɣɡvjɒn ɒz rjʃh‌kndh xvɒhd ʃdlbhɒj ʔɒdlɒn bh ɒmvr mrzjh ʔɒrf ɒst، ɒmɒ dhɒn ʃrjrɒn پr ɒz drvɣ‌hɒ ɒst lbhɒj ʔɒdlɒn bh ɒmvr mrzjh ʔɒrf ɒst، ɒmɒ dhɒn ʃrjrɒn پr ɒz drvɣ‌hɒ ɒst trɒzvj bɒ tɣlb nzd xdɒvnd mkrvh ɒst، ɒmɒ sŋ tmɒm پsndjdh ɒv ɒst t͡ʃvn tkbr mj‌آjd xd͡ʒɒlt mj‌آjd، ɒmɒ hkmt bɒ mtvɒzʔɒn ɒst kɒmljt rɒstɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ hdɒjt mj‌knd، ɒmɒkd͡ʒj xjɒntkɒrɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ hlɒk mj‌sɒzd tvɒŋrj dr rvz ɣzb mnfʔt ndɒrd، ɒmɒʔdɒlt ɒz mvt rhɒjj mj‌bxʃd ʔdɒlt mrd kɒml trjɣ ɒv rɒ rɒst mj‌sɒzd، ɒmɒ ʃrjr ɒz ʃrɒrt xvd hlɒk mj‌ɡrdd ʔdɒlt rɒstɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ xlɒsj mj‌bxʃd، ɒmɒ xjɒntkɒrɒn dr xjɒnt xvd ɡrftɒr mj‌ʃvnd t͡ʃvn mrd ʃrjr bmjrd ɒmjd ɒv nɒbvd mj‌ɡrdd، v ɒntzɒr zvrآvrɒn tlf mj‌ʃvd mrd ʔɒdl ɒz tŋj xlɒs mj‌ʃvd v ʃrjrbh‌d͡ʒɒj ɒv mj‌آjd mrd mnɒfɣ bh dhɒnʃ hmsɒjh xvd rɒ hlɒk mj‌sɒzd، v ʔɒdlɒn bh mʔrft xvjʃ nd͡ʒɒt mj‌jɒbnd ɒz sʔɒdtmndj ʔɒdlɒn، ʃhr ʃɒdj mj‌knd، v ɒz hlɒkt ʃrjrɒn ɒbthɒd͡ʒ mj‌nmɒjd ɒz brkt rɒstɒn، ʃhr mrtfʔ mj‌ʃvd، ɒmɒ ɒzdhɒn ʃrjrɒn mnhdm mj‌ɡrdd ksj‌kh hmsɒjh xvd rɒ hɣjr ʃmɒrdnɒɣs ɒlʔɣl mj‌bɒʃd، ɒmɒ sɒhb ftɒnt sɒkt mj‌mɒnd ksj‌kh bh nmɒmj ɡrdʃ mj‌knd، srhɒ rɒfɒʃ mj‌sɒzd، ɒmɒ ʃxs ɒmjn dl، ɒmr rɒ mxfj mj‌dɒrd d͡ʒɒjj kh tdbjr njst mrdm mj‌ɒftnd، ɒmɒslɒmtj ɒz ksrt mʃjrɒn ɒst ksj‌kh brɒj ɣrjb zɒmn ʃvd ɒlbth zrrxvɒhd jɒft، v ksj‌kh zmɒnt rɒ mkrvh dɒrdɒjmn mj‌bɒʃd zn njkvsjrt ʔzt rɒ ŋɒh mj‌dɒrd، t͡ʃnɒnkh zvrآvrɒn dvlt rɒ mhɒfzt mj‌nmɒjnd mrd rhjm bh xvjʃtn ɒhsɒn mj‌nmɒjd، ɒmɒmrd stm kjʃ d͡ʒsd xvd rɒ mj‌rnd͡ʒɒnd ʃrjr ɒd͡ʒrt frjbndh thsjl mj‌knd، ɒmɒkɒrndh ʔdɒlt mzd hɣjɣj rɒ t͡ʃnɒnkh ʔdɒlt mvdj bh hjɒt‌ɒst، hmt͡ʃnjn hr‌kh ʃrɒrt rɒ پjrvj nmɒjd ɒv rɒ bh mvt mj‌rsɒnd kd͡ʒ xlɣɒn nzd xdɒvnd mkrvhnd، ɒmɒkɒmlɒn trjɣ پsndjdh ɒv mj‌bɒʃnd jɣjn ʃrjr mbrɒ nxvɒhd ʃd، ɒmɒ zrjt ʔɒdlɒn nd͡ʒɒt xvɒhnd jɒft zn d͡ʒmjlh bj‌ʔɣl hlɣh zrjn ɒst dr bjnj ɡrɒz آrzvj ʔɒdlɒn njkvjj mhz ɒst، ɒmɒɒntzɒr ʃrjrɒn، ɣzb mj‌bɒʃd hstnd kh mj‌پɒʃnd v bjʃtr mj‌ɒndvznd vhstnd kh zjɒdh ɒz آnt͡ʃh ʃɒjd ŋɒh mj‌dɒrnd ɒmɒ bh njɒzmndj mj‌ɒnd͡ʒɒmd ʃxs sxj frbh mj‌ʃvd، v hr‌kh sjrɒb mj‌knd xvd njz sjrɒb xvɒhd ɡʃt hr‌kh ɣlh rɒ ŋɒh dɒrd mrdm ɒv rɒ lʔnt xvɒhnd krd، ɒmɒ br sr frvʃndh آn brkt xvɒhdbvd ksj‌kh njkvjj rɒ btlbd rzɒmndj rɒmj d͡ʒvjd، v hr‌kh bdj rɒ btlbd br ɒv ʔɒrz xvɒhd ʃd ksj‌kh br tvɒŋrj xvd tvkl knd، xvɒhd ɒftɒd، ɒmɒ ʔɒdlɒn msl brɡ sbz ʃkvfh xvɒhnd‌آvrd hr‌kh ɒhl xɒnh xvd rɒ brnd͡ʒɒnd nsjb ɒv bɒd xvɒhd bvd، v ɒhmɣ bndh hkjm dlɒn xvɒhdʃd smrh mrd ʔɒdl drxt hjɒt‌ɒst، vksj‌kh d͡ʒɒnhɒ rɒ sjd knd hkjm ɒstɒjnk mrd ʔɒdl br zmjn d͡ʒzɒ xvɒhd jɒft، پs t͡ʃnd mrtbh zjɒdh mrd ʃrjr v ɡnɒhkɒr ɒjnk mrd ʔɒdl br zmjn d͡ʒzɒ xvɒhd jɒft، پs t͡ʃnd mrtbh zjɒdh mrd ʃrjr v ɡnɒhkɒr hr‌kh tɒdjb rɒ dvst mj‌dɒrd mʔrft rɒ dvst mj‌dɒrd، ɒmɒ hr‌kh ɒz ɒmɒ mrdɒhmɣ mɒdr xvjʃ rɒ hɣjr mj‌ʃmɒrd hmɒɣt dr nzr ʃxs nɒɣs ɒlʔɣl xvʃj ɒst، ɒmɒ mrd fhjm bh rɒstj slvk mj‌nmɒjd ɒz ʔdm mʃvrt، tdbjrhɒ bɒtl mj‌ʃvd، ɒmɒ ɒz ksrt mʃvrt dhndɡɒn brɣrɒr mj‌mɒnd brɒj ɒnsɒn ɒz d͡ʒvɒb dhɒnʃ ʃɒdj hɒsl mj‌ʃvd، v sxnj kh dr mhlʃ ɡfth ʃvdt͡ʃh bsjɒr njkv ɒst trjɣ hjɒt brɒj ʔɒɣlɒn bh svj bɒlɒɒst، tɒ ɒz hɒvjh ɒsfl dvr ʃvd xdɒvnd xɒnh mtkbrɒn rɒ mnhdm mj‌sɒzd، ɒmɒ hdvd bjvh‌zn rɒ tfkr mj‌knd، ɒmɒ dhɒn ʃrjrɒn، t͡ʃjzhɒj bd rɒ d͡ʒɒrj mj‌sɒzd xdɒvnd ɒz ʃrjrɒn dvr ɒst، ɒmɒ dʔɒj ʔɒdlɒn rɒ mj‌ʃnvd nvr t͡ʃʃmɒn dl rɒ ʃɒdmɒn mj‌sɒzd، v xbrnjkv ɒstxvɒnhɒ rɒ پr mɣz mj‌nmɒjd ɡvʃj kh tnbjh hjɒt rɒ bʃnvd، dr mjɒn hkjmɒn sɒkn xvɒhd ʃd hr‌kh tɒdjb rɒ trk nmɒjd، d͡ʒɒn xvd rɒhɣjr mj‌ʃmɒrd، ɒmɒ hr‌kh tnbjh rɒ bʃnvd ʔɣl rɒthsjl mj‌nmɒjdtrs xdɒvnd ɒdjb hkmt ɒst، vtvɒzʔ پjʃrv hrmt mj‌bɒʃd trs xdɒvnd ɒdjb hkmt ɒst، vtvɒzʔ پjʃrv hrmt mj‌bɒʃd tdbjrhɒj dl ɒz آn ɒnsɒn ɒst، ɒmɒtntɣ zbɒn ɒz d͡ʒɒnb xdɒvnd mj‌bɒʃd hmh rɒhhɒj ɒnsɒn dr nzr xvdʃ پɒk ɒst، ɒmɒ xdɒvnd rvhhɒ rɒ sɒbt mj‌sɒzd ɒʔmɒl xvd rɒ ɡnɒh kfɒrh mj‌ʃvd، v bh trs xdɒvnd، ɒz bdj ɒd͡ʒtnɒb mj‌ʃvd t͡ʃvn rɒhhɒj ʃxs پsndjdh xdɒvndbɒʃd، dʃmnɒnʃ rɒ njz bɒ vj bh msɒlhh mj‌آvrd ɒmvɒl ɒndk kh bɒ ɒnsɒf bɒʃd bhtr ɒst، ɒzdxl frɒvɒn bdvn ɒnsɒf dl ɒnsɒn dr trjɣʃ tfkr mj‌knd، ɒmɒxdɒvnd ɣdmhɒjʃ rɒ ɒstvɒr mj‌sɒzd vhj br lbhɒj پɒdʃɒh ɒst، v dhɒn ɒv drdɒvrj td͡ʒɒvz nmj nmɒjd trɒzv v sŋhɒj rɒst ɒz آn xdɒvndɒst v tmɒmj sŋhɒj kjsh snʔt vj mj‌bɒʃd ʔml t͡ʃhrh پɒdʃɒh hjɒt‌ɒst، vrzɒmndj ɒv msl ɒbr nvbhɒrj ɒst thsjl hkmt ɒz zr xɒls t͡ʃh bsjɒrbhtr ɒst، v thsjl fhm ɒz nɣrh brɡzjdh tr trjɣ rɒstɒn، ɒd͡ʒtnɒb nmvdn ɒz bdj ɒst، v hr‌kh rɒh xvd rɒ ŋɒh dɒrd ʔlm rɒ br lbhɒjʃ mj‌ɒfzɒjd sxnɒn پsndjdh msl‌ʃɒn ʔsl ɒst، brɒj d͡ʒɒn ʃjrjn ɒst v brɒj ɒstxvɒnhɒʃfɒdhndh rɒhj hst kh dr nzr ɒnsɒn rɒst ɒst، ɒmɒ ʔɒɣbt آn rɒh، mvt mj‌bɒʃd ɒʃthɒj kɒrɡr brɒjʃ kɒr mj‌knd، zjrɒ kh dhɒnʃ ɒv rɒ br آn thrjz mj‌nmɒjd mrd lئjm ʃrɒrt rɒ mj‌ɒndjʃd، v brlbhɒjʃ msl آtʃ svzndh ɒst mrd drvɣɡv nzɒʔ mj‌پɒʃd، v nmɒm dvstɒn xɒls rɒ ɒz hmdjɡr d͡ʒdɒ mj‌knd mrd zɒlm hmsɒjh xvd rɒ ɒɣvɒ ʃvd ksj‌kh djrɣzb bɒʃd ɒz d͡ʒbɒr bhtr ɒst، v hr‌kh br rvh xvd mɒlk bɒʃd ɒz tsxjrknndh ʃhr ɒfzl ɒstɣrʔh dr dɒmn‌ɒndɒxth mj‌ʃvd، ljkn tmɒmj hkm آn ɒz xdɒvnd ɒst ɣrʔh dr dɒmn‌ɒndɒxth mj‌ʃvd، ljkn tmɒmj hkm آn ɒz xdɒvnd ɒst lɣmh xʃk bɒ slɒmtj، bhtr ɒst ɒzxɒnh پr ɒz zjɒft bɒ mxɒsmt bndh ʔɒɣl br پsr پst ftrt mslt xvɒhdbvd، v mjrɒs rɒ bɒ brɒdrɒn tɣsjm xvɒhd nmvd bvth brɒj nɣrh v kvrh bh d͡ʒht tlɒ ɒst، brxvrdɒr mj‌ʃvd hr‌kh ɡnɒhj rɒ mstvr knd tɒlb mhbt mj‌bɒʃd، ɒmɒ hr‌kh ɒmrj rɒ tkrɒr knd dvstɒn xɒls rɒ ɒz hm d͡ʒdɒ mj‌sɒzd jk mlɒmt bh mrd fhjm ɒsr mj‌knd، bjʃtrɒz sd tɒzjɒnh bh mrd d͡ʒɒhl mrd ʃrjr tɒlb ftnh ɒst v bs lhzɒɣɒsd stmkjʃ nzd ɒv frstɒdh mj‌ʃvd ɒɡr xrsj kh bt͡ʃh hɒjʃ kʃth ʃvd bh ɒnsɒn brxvrd، bhtr ɒst ɒz mrd ɒhmɣ dr hmɒɣt xvd ksj‌kh bh ʔvz njkvjj bdj mj‌knd blɒɒz xɒnh ɒv dvr nxvɒhd ʃd ɒbtdɒj nzɒʔ msl rxnh krdn آb ɒst، پs mxɒsmh rɒ trk kn ɣbl ɒz آnkh bh md͡ʒɒdlh brsd hr‌kh ʃrjr rɒ ʔɒdl ʃmɒrd v hr‌kh ʔɒdl rɒ mlzm sɒzd، hr dvj ɒjʃɒn nzd xdɒvndmkrvhnd ɣjmt bh d͡ʒht xrjdn hkmt t͡ʃrɒ hr‌kh lbhɒj xvd rɒ mj‌bnddfhjm ɒst mj bɒʃd، v bh hr hkmt shjh md͡ʒɒdlh mj‌knd ɒhmɣ ɒz ftɒnt msrvr nmj ʃvd، mɡr tɒآnkh ʔɣl xvd rɒ zɒhr sɒzd hŋɒmj kh ʃrjr mj‌آjd، hɣɒrt hm mj‌آjd، v bɒ ɒhɒnt، xd͡ʒɒlt vj ɒst، v lbhɒjʃ brɒj d͡ʒɒn xvdʃ dɒm ɒst sxnɒn nmɒm msl lɣmh hɒj ʃjrjn ɒst، v bh ʔmɣ ʃkm frv mj‌rvd ɒv njz kh dr kɒr xvd ɒhmɒl mj‌knd brɒdrhlɒk knndh ɒst ɒsm xdɒvnd brd͡ʒ hsjn ɒst kh mrd ʔɒdl dr آn hzvr bzrɡɒn mj‌rsɒnd hr‌kh dr dʔvj xvd ɒvl آjd sɒdɣ mj‌nmɒjd، ɒmɒ hrjfʃ mj‌آjd v ɒv rɒ mj‌آzmɒjd ɣrʔh nzɒʔhɒ rɒ sɒkt mj‌nmɒjd v zvrآvrɒn rɒ ɒz hm d͡ʒdɒ mj‌knd brɒdr rnd͡ʒjdh ɒz ʃhr ɣvj sxttr ɒst، vmnɒzʔt bɒ ɒv msl پʃt bndhɒj ɣsr ɒst dl آdmj ɒz mjvh dhɒnʃ پr mj‌ʃvd v ɒzmhsvl lbhɒjʃ، sjr mj‌ɡrdd mvt v hjɒt dr ɣdrt zbɒn ɒst، v آnɒnj kh آn rɒ dvst mj‌dɒrnd mjvh‌ɒʃ rɒ xvɒhndxvrd hr‌kh zvd͡ʒh‌ɒj brɒdrt͡ʃsbndh tr mj‌bɒʃd ksj‌kh dvstɒn bsjɒr dɒrd xvjʃtn rɒhlɒk mj‌knd، ɒmɒ dvstj hst kh ɒz brɒdrt͡ʃsbndh tr mj‌bɒʃd fɣjrj kh dr kɒmljt xvd sɒlk ɒst، ɒz drvɣɡvjj kh ɒhmɣ bɒʃd bhtr ɒst dlj njz kh mʔrft drvɣɡv bj‌szɒ nxvɒhd mɒnd، v ksj‌kh bh drvɣ tntɣ knd rhɒjj nxvɒhd jɒft bsjɒrj پjʃ ɒmjrɒn tzll mj‌nmɒjnd، v hmh ks dvst bzl knndh ɒst d͡ʒmjʔ brɒdrɒn mrd fɣjr ɒz ɒv nfrt dɒrnd، vbh trjɣ ɒvlj dvstɒnʃ ɒz tntɣ nmɒjd hlɒk xvɒhd ɡrdjd ʔjʃ v ʔʃrt ɒhmɣ rɒ nmj ʃɒjd، tɒ t͡ʃh rsd bh ɣlɒmj kh br nd͡ʒbɒ hkmrɒnj mj‌knd ʔɣl ɒnsɒn xʃm ɒv rɒ ŋɒh mj‌dɒrd، vɡzʃtn ɒz tɣsjr d͡ʒlɒl ɒv ɒst xʃm پɒdʃɒh msl ɣrʃ ʃjr ɒst، vrzɒmndj ɒv msl ʃbnm br ɡjɒh ɒst پsr d͡ʒɒhl bɒʔs ɒlm پdrʃ ɒst، vnzɒʔhɒj zn msl آbj ɒst kh dɒئm dr t͡ʃkjdn bɒʃd xɒnh v dvlt ɒrs ɒd͡ʒdɒdj ɒst، ɒmɒzvd͡ʒh ʔɒɣlh ɒz d͡ʒɒnb xdɒvnd ɒst kɒhlj xvɒb sŋjn mj‌آvrd، v ʃxs ɒhmɒl kɒr، ɡrsnh xvɒhd mɒnd hr‌kh hkm rɒ ŋɒh dɒrd d͡ʒɒn xvjʃ rɒmhɒfzt mj‌nmɒjd، ɒmɒ hr‌kh trjɣ xvd rɒ sbk ɡjrd، xvɒhd mrd hr‌kh br fɣjr trhm nmɒjd bh xdɒvnd ɣrz mj‌dhd، v ɒhsɒn ɒv rɒ nmɒ، tɒ drʔɒɣbt xvd hkjm bʃvj fkrhɒj bsjɒr dr dl ɒnsɒn ɒst، ɒmɒ آnt͡ʃh sɒbt mɒnd mʃvrt xdɒvnd ɒst zjnt ɒnsɒn ɒhsɒn ɒv ɒst، v fɣjr ɒzdrvɣɡv bhtr ɒst trs xdɒvnd mvdj bh hjɒt‌ɒst، v hrkh آn rɒ dɒrd dr sjrj sɒkn mj‌mɒnd، v bh hjt͡ʃ blɒɡrftɒr nxvɒhd ʃd mrd kɒhl dst xvd rɒ dr bɣlʃ پnhɒn mj‌knd، v آn rɒ hm bh dhɒn xvd brnmj آvrd ɒsthzɒknndh rɒ tɒdjb kn tɒ d͡ʒɒhlɒn zjrk ʃvnd، v ʃxs fhjm rɒ tnbjh nmɒ v mskrɒt ʔrbdh mj‌آvrd، v hr‌kh bh آn frjfth ʃvd hkjm njst hjbt پɒdʃɒh msl ɣrʃ ʃjr ɒst، v hr‌kh xʃm ɒv rɒ bh hjd͡ʒɒn آvrd، bh‌d͡ʒɒn xvd xtɒmj vrzd ɒz nzɒʔ dvr ʃdn brɒj ɒnsɒn ʔzt ɒst، ɒmɒhr mrd ɒhmɣ xvdɡrfth bɒʃd آhn، آhn rɒ tjz mj‌knd، hmt͡ʃnjn mrd rvj dvst xvd rɒ tjz mj‌sɒzd hr‌kh drxt ɒnd͡ʒjr rɒ ŋɒh dɒrd mjvh‌ɒʃ rɒxvɒhd xvrd، v hr‌kh آɣɒj xvd rɒ mlɒzmt nmɒjd mhtrm xvɒhd ʃd، t͡ʃnɒnkh dr آb svrt bh svrt ɒst، hmt͡ʃnɒn dl ɒnsɒn bh ɒnsɒn hɒvjh v ɒbdvn sjr nmj ʃvnd، hmt͡ʃnɒn t͡ʃʃmɒn ɒnsɒn sjr nxvɒhnd ʃd bvth brɒj nɣrh v kvrh bh d͡ʒht tlɒst، hmt͡ʃnɒn ɒnsɒn ɒz dhɒn stɒjʃ knndɡɒn xvdآzmvdh mj‌ʃvd ɒhmɣ rɒ mjɒn blɣvr dr hɒvn bɒ dsth bkvb، v hmɒɣtʃ ɒz آn bjrvn nxvɒhd rft bh hɒlt ɡlh xvd njkv tvd͡ʒh nmɒ، v dl xvd rɒ bh rmh xvd mʃɣvl sɒz، zjrɒ kh dvlt dɒئmj njst، v tɒd͡ʒ hm nslɒbʔd nsl پɒjdɒr nj ʔlf rɒ mj‌brnd v ɡjɒh sbz mj‌rvjd، vʔlvfh kvhhɒ d͡ʒmʔ mj‌ʃvd، brh‌hɒ brɒj lbɒs tv، v bzhɒ bh d͡ʒht ɒd͡ʒɒrh zmjn bh‌kɒr mj‌آjnd،v ʃjr bzhɒ brɒj xvrɒk tv v xvrɒk xɒndɒnt، v mʔjʃt knjzɒnt kfɒjt xvɒhd krd v ʃjr bzhɒ brɒj xvrɒk tv v xvrɒk xɒndɒnt، v mʔjʃt knjzɒnt kfɒjt xvɒhd krd tʔɒɣb knndh‌ɒj njst، ɒmɒ ʔɒdlɒn msl ʃjr ʃd͡ʒɒʔnd ɒz mʔsjt ɒhl zmjn hɒkmɒnʃ bsjɒrmj ʃvnd، ɒmɒ mrd fhjm v dɒnɒ ɒstɣɒmtʃ brɣrɒrxvɒhd mɒnd mrd rئjs kh br mskjnɒn zlm mj‌knd msl bɒrɒn ɒst kh sjlɒn krdh، xvrɒk bɒɣj ŋzɒrd hr‌kh ʃrjʔt rɒ trk mj‌knd ʃrjrɒn rɒmj stɒjd، ɒmɒ hr‌kh ʃrjʔt rɒ ŋɒh dɒrd ɒz ɒjʃɒn nfrt dɒrd mrdmɒn ʃrjr ɒnsɒf rɒ drk nmj nmɒjnd، ɒmɒtɒlbɒn xdɒvnd hmh‌t͡ʃjz rɒ mj‌fhmnd fɣjrj kh dr kɒmljt xvd slvk nmɒjd bhtrɒst ɒz kd͡ʒ rvndh dv rɒh ɒɡr‌t͡ʃh dvltmnd bɒʃd hr‌kh ʃrjʔt rɒ ŋɒh dɒrd پsrj hkjm ɒst، ɒmɒ msɒhb msrfɒn، پdr xvjʃ rɒ rsvɒmj sɒzd hr‌kh mɒl xvd rɒ bh rbɒ v svd bjfzɒjd، آn rɒbrɒj ksj‌kh br fɣjrɒn trhm nmɒjd، d͡ʒmʔ mj‌nmɒjd hr‌kh ɡvʃ xvd rɒ ɒz ʃnjdn ʃrjʔt brɡrdɒnd، dʔɒj ɒv hm mkrvh mj‌ʃvd hr‌kh rɒstɒn rɒ bh rɒh bd ɡmrɒh knd bh hfrh xvd xvɒhd ɒftɒd، ɒmɒ sɒlhɒn nsjb njkvxvɒhnd jɒft mrd dvltmnd dr nzr xvd hkjm ɒst، ɒmɒfɣjr xrdmnd ɒv rɒ tftjʃ xvɒhd nmvd t͡ʃvn ʔɒdlɒn ʃɒdmɒn ʃvnd fxr ʔzjm ɒst، ɒmɒ t͡ʃvn ʃrjrɒn brɒfrɒʃth ʃvnd mrdmɒn xvd rɒ mxfj mj‌sɒznd hr‌kh ɡnɒh xvd rɒ bپvʃɒnd brxvrdɒrnxvɒhd ʃd، ɒmɒ hr‌kh آn rɒ ɒʔtrɒf knd v trk nmɒjd rhmt xvɒhd jɒft xvʃɒbhɒl ksj‌kh dɒئm mj‌trsd، ɒmɒ hrkh dl xvd rɒ sxt sɒzd bh blɒ ɡrftɒr xvɒhdʃd hɒkm ʃrjr br ɣvm mskjn، msl ʃjr ɣrndh v xrs ɡrdndh ɒst hɒkm nɒɣs ɒlʔɣl bsjɒr zlm mj‌knd، ɒmɒhr‌kh ɒz rʃvh nfrt knd ʔmr xvd rɒ drɒzxvɒhd sɒxt ksj‌kh mthml bɒr xvn ʃxsj ʃvd، bh hɒvjh mj‌ʃtɒbd znhɒr ksj ɒv rɒ bɒz ndɒrd hr‌kh bh ɒstɣɒmt slvk nmɒjd rstɡɒrxvɒhd ʃd، ɒmɒ hr‌kh dr dv rɒh kd͡ʒ rv bɒʃd drjkj ɒz آnhɒ xvɒhd ɒftɒd hr‌kh zmjn xvd rɒ zrʔ nmɒjd ɒz nɒn sjrxvɒhd ʃd، ɒmɒ hr‌kh پjrvj bɒtlɒn knd ɒz fɣrsjr xvɒhd ʃd mrd ɒmjn brkt bsjɒr xvɒhd jɒft، ɒmɒآnkh dr‌پj dvlt mj‌ʃtɒbd bj‌szɒ nxvɒhd mɒnd trfdɒrj njkv njst، v bh d͡ʒht lɣmh‌ɒj nɒn، آdmj xtɒkɒr mj‌ʃvd mrd tŋ nzr dr‌پj dvlt mj‌ʃtɒbd vnmj dɒnd kh njɒzmndj ɒv rɒ drxvɒhd jɒft ksj‌kh آdmj rɒ tnbjh nmɒjd، آxr ʃkrxvɒhd jɒft، bjʃtr ɒz آnkh bh zbɒn xvdt͡ʃɒپlvsj mj‌knd ksj‌kh پdr v mɒdr xvd rɒ ɣɒrt nmɒjd vɡvjd ɡnɒh njst، msɒhb hlɒk knndɡɒn xvɒhdʃd mrd hrjs nzɒʔ rɒ brmj ɒŋjzɒnd، ɒmɒ hr‌kh br xdɒvnd tvkl nmɒjd ɣvj xvɒhd ʃd آnkh br dl xvd tvkl nmɒjd ɒhmɣ mj‌bɒʃd، ɒmɒ ksj‌kh bh hkmt slvk nmɒjdnd͡ʒɒt xvɒhd jɒft hr‌kh bh fɣrɒ bzl nmɒjd mhtɒd͡ʒ nxvɒhdʃd، ɒmɒ آnkh t͡ʃʃmɒn xvd rɒ bپvʃɒnd lʔnt bsjɒrxvɒhd jɒftvɣtj kh ʃrjrɒn brɒfrɒʃth ʃvnd mrdm xvjʃtn rɒ پnhɒn mj‌knnd، ɒmɒ t͡ʃvn ɒjʃɒn hlɒk ʃvnd ʔɒdlɒn ɒfzvdh xvɒhnd ʃd vɣtj kh ʃrjrɒn brɒfrɒʃth ʃvnd mrdm xvjʃtn rɒ پnhɒn mj‌knnd، ɒmɒ t͡ʃvn ɒjʃɒn hlɒk ʃvnd ʔɒdlɒn ɒfzvdh xvɒhnd ʃd ksj‌kh bʔd ɒz tnbjh bsjɒr ɡrdnkʃj mj knd، nɒɡhɒn mnksr xvɒhd ʃd vʔlɒd͡ʒj nxvɒhd bvd t͡ʃvn ʔɒdlɒn ɒfzvdh ɡrdnd ɣvm ʃɒdj mj‌knnd، ɒmɒ t͡ʃvn ʃrjrɒn tslt jɒbnd mrdm nɒlh mj‌nmɒjnd ksj‌kh hkmt rɒ dvst dɒrd پdr xvjʃ rɒ msrvr mj‌sɒzd، ɒmɒ ksj‌kh bɒ fɒhʃh hɒmʔɒʃrt knd ɒmvɒl rɒ tlf mj‌nmɒjd پɒdʃɒh vlɒjt rɒ bh ɒnsɒf پɒjdɒr mj‌knd، ɒmɒmrd rʃvh xvɒr آn rɒ vjrɒn mj‌sɒzd ʃxsj kh hmsɒjh xvd rɒ t͡ʃɒپlvsj mj‌knd dɒm brɒj پɒjhɒjʃ mj‌ɡstrɒnd dr mʔsjt mrd ʃrjr dɒmj ɒst، ɒmɒ ʔɒdl trnm v ʃɒdj xvɒhd nmvd mrd ʔɒdl dʔvj fɣjr rɒ drk mj‌knd، ɒmɒʃrjr brɒj dɒnstn آn fhm ndɒrd ɒsthzɒknndɡɒn ʃhr rɒ bh آʃvb mj‌آvrnd، ɒmɒ hkjmɒn xʃm rɒ frvmj nʃɒnnd ɒɡr mrd hkjm bɒ ɒhmɣ dʔvj dɒrd، xvɒh ɣzbnɒk ʃvd xvɒh bxndd ɒv rɒ rɒht nxvɒhd bvd mrdɒn xvn rjz ɒz mrd kɒml nfrt dɒrnd، ɒmɒ rɒstɒn slɒmtj d͡ʒɒn ɒv rɒ tɒlbnd ɒhmɣ tmɒmj xʃm xvd rɒ zɒhr mj‌sɒzd، ɒmɒ mrd hkjm bh tɒxjr آn rɒ frvmj nʃɒnd hɒkmj kh bh sxnɒn drvɣ ɡvʃ ɡjrd، d͡ʒmjʔ xɒdmɒnʃ ʃrjr xvɒhnd ʃd fɣjr v zɒlm bɒ hm d͡ʒmʔ xvɒhnd ʃd، vxdɒvnd t͡ʃʃmɒn hr dvj ɒjʃɒn rɒ rvʃn xvɒhdsɒxt پɒdʃɒhj kh mskjnɒn rɒ bh rɒstj dɒvrj nmɒjd، krsj vj tɒ rɒ tɒdjb nmɒ kh tv rɒ rɒht xvɒhd rsɒnjd، v bh‌d͡ʒɒn tv lzɒt xvɒhdbxʃjd d͡ʒɒjj kh rvjɒ njst ɣvm ɡrdnkʃ mj‌ʃvnd، ɒmɒ xvʃɒbhɒl ksj‌kh ʃrjʔt rɒ ŋɒh mj‌dɒrd xɒdm، mhz sxn mtnbh nmj ʃvd، zjrɒɒɡr‌t͡ʃh bfhmd ɒd͡ʒɒbt nmj nmɒjd آjɒ ksj rɒ mj‌bjnj kh dr sxn‌ɡftn ʔd͡ʒvl ɒst، ɒmjd br ɒhmɣ zjɒdh ɒst ɒz ɒmjd brɒv hr‌kh xɒdm xvd rɒ ɒz tfvljt bh nɒzmj پrvrd، آxr پsr ɒv xvɒhd ʃd mrd tndxv nzɒʔ brmj ɒŋjzɒnd، v ʃxs kd͡ʒ xlɣ dr tɣsjr mj‌ɒfzɒjd tkbr ʃxs ɒv rɒ پst mj‌knd، ɒmɒ mrdhljm dl، bh d͡ʒlɒl xvɒhd rsjd hr‌kh bɒ dzd mʔɒʃrt knd xvjʃtn rɒdʃmn dɒrd، zjrɒ kh lʔnt mj‌ʃnvd v ɒʔtrɒf nmj nmɒjd trs ɒz ɒnsɒn dɒm mj‌ɡstrɒnd، ɒmɒ hr‌kh brxdɒvnd tvkl nmɒjd srɒfrɒz xvɒhd ʃd bsjɒrj ltf hɒkm rɒ mj‌tlbnd، ɒmɒdɒvrj ɒnsɒn ɒz d͡ʒɒnb xdɒvnd ɒstmrd zɒlm nzd ʔɒdlɒn mkrvh ɒst، v hr‌kh dr trjɣ، mstɣjm ɒst nzd ʃrjrɒn mkrvh mj‌bɒʃd mrd zɒlm nzd ʔɒdlɒn mkrvh ɒst، v hr‌kh dr trjɣ، mstɣjm ɒst nzd ʃrjrɒn mkrvh mj‌bɒʃd klmɒt v پjɣɒm آkvr bn jɒɣh vhj آn mrd bh ɒjtjئjl jʔnj bh ɒjtjئjl v ɒkɒl jɣjn mn ɒz hr آdmj vhʃj tr hstm، v fhm ɒnsɒn rɒ ndɒrm mn hkmt rɒ njɒmvxth‌ɒm v mʔrft ɣdvs rɒ ndɒnsth‌ɒm kjst kh bh آsmɒn sʔvd nmvd v ɒz آnd͡ʒɒnzvl krd؟ kjst kh bɒd rɒ dr mʃt xvd d͡ʒmʔ nmvd؟ v kjst kh آb rɒ dr d͡ʒɒmh bnd nmvd؟ kjst kh tmɒmj ɒɣsɒj zmjn rɒ ɒstvɒr sɒxt؟ nɒm ɒv t͡ʃjst v پsr ɒv t͡ʃh ɒsm dɒrd؟ bɡv ɒɡrɒtlɒʔ dɒrj tmɒmj klmɒt xdɒ msfj ɒst ɒv bh d͡ʒht mtvklɒn xvd sپr ɒst bh sxnɒn ɒv t͡ʃjzj mjfzɒ، mbɒdɒ tv rɒ tvbjx nmɒjd v tkzjb ʃvj dv t͡ʃjz ɒz tv drxvɒst nmvdm، آnhɒ rɒ ɣbl ɒz آnkh bmjrm ɒz mn bɒzmdɒr btɒlt v drvɣ rɒ ɒz mn dvr kn، mrɒ nh fɣr dh v nh dvlt bh xvrɒkj kh nsjb mn bɒʃd mrɒbپrvr، mbɒdɒ sjr ʃdh، tv rɒ ɒnkɒr nmɒjm v bɡvjm kh xdɒvnd kjst v mbɒdɒ fɣjr ʃdh، dzdj nmɒjm، vɒsm xdɒj xvd rɒ bh bɒtl brm bndh rɒ nzd آɣɒjʃ mthm msɒz، mbɒdɒ tv rɒlʔnt knd v md͡ʒrm ʃvj ɡrvhj mj‌bɒʃnd kh پdr xvd rɒ lʔnt mj‌nmɒjnd، v mɒdr xvjʃ rɒ brkt nmj dhnd ɡrvhj mj‌bɒʃnd kh dr nzr xvd پɒk‌ɒnd، ɒmɒ ɒz nd͡ʒɒst xvd ɣsl njɒfth‌ɒnd ɡrvhj mj‌bɒʃnd kh t͡ʃʃmɒnʃɒn t͡ʃh ɣdrblnd ɒst، v mʒɡɒnʃɒn t͡ʃh ɣdr brɒfrɒʃth ɡrvhj mj‌bɒʃnd kh dndɒnhɒjʃɒn ʃmʃjrhɒ ɒst، v dndɒnhɒj آsjɒj ɒjʃɒn kɒrdhɒtɒ fɣjrɒn rɒ ɒz rvj zmjn v mskjnɒn rɒ ɒz mjɒn mrdmɒn bxvrnd zɒlv rɒ dv dxtr ɒst kh bdh bdh mj‌ɡvjnd sh t͡ʃjz ɒst kh sjr nmj ʃvd، blkh t͡ʃhɒr t͡ʃjzkh nmj ɡvjd kh kɒfj ɒst hɒvjh v rhm nɒzɒd، v zmjnj kh ɒz آb sjrnmj ʃvd، v آtʃ kh nmj ɡvjd kh kɒfj ɒst t͡ʃʃmj kh پdr rɒ ɒsthzɒ mj‌knd v ɒtɒʔt mɒdr rɒ xvɒr mj‌ʃmɒrd، ɣrɒbhɒj vɒdj آn rɒxvɒhnd knd v bt͡ʃh hɒj ʔɣɒb آn rɒ xvɒhndxvrd sh t͡ʃjz ɒst kh brɒj mn zjɒdh ʔd͡ʒjb ɒst، blkh t͡ʃhɒr t͡ʃjz kh آnhɒ rɒ ntvɒnm fhmjd trjɣ ʔɣɒb dr hvɒ v trjɣ mɒr br sxrh، v rɒh kʃtj dr mjɒn drjɒ v rɒh mrd bɒ dxtrbɒkrh hmt͡ʃnɒn ɒst trjɣ zn zɒnjh، mj‌xvrd vdhɒn xvd rɒ پɒk mj‌knd v mj‌ɡvjd ɡnɒh nkrdm bh‌sbb sh t͡ʃjz zmjn mtzlzl mj‌ʃvd، v bh‌sbb t͡ʃhɒr kh آnhɒ rɒ thml ntvɒnd krd bh‌sbb ɣlɒmj kh sltnt mj‌knd، vɒhmɣj kh ɒz ɣzɒ sjr ʃdh bɒʃd، bh‌sbb zn mkrvhh t͡ʃvn mnkvhh ʃvd، vknjz vɣtj kh vɒrs xɒtvn xvd ɡrdd t͡ʃhɒr t͡ʃjz ɒst kh dr zmjn bsjɒr kvt͡ʃk ɒst، ljkn bsjɒr hkjm mj‌bɒʃd mvrt͡ʃh‌hɒ tɒjfh mj‌ɡjrnd v drɣsrhɒj پɒdʃɒhɒn mj‌bɒʃnd sh t͡ʃjz ɒst kh xvʃ xrɒm ɒst، blkh t͡ʃhɒr t͡ʃjz kh xvʃ ɣdm mj‌bɒʃd ʃjr kh dr mjɒn hjvɒnɒt tvɒnɒtr ɒst، v ɒzhjt͡ʃkdɒm rvɡrdɒn njst tɒzj v bz nr، v پɒdʃɒh kh bɒ ɒv mɣɒvmt ntvɒn krd ɒɡr ɒz rvj hmɒɣt xvjʃtn rɒbrɒfrɒʃth‌ɒj v ɒɡr bd ɒndjʃjdh‌ɒj، پs dst brdhɒn xvd bɡzɒr،zjrɒ t͡ʃnɒnkh ɒz fʃrdn ʃjr، پnjr bjrvn mj‌آjd، v ɒz fʃrdn bjnj، xvn bjrvn mj‌آjd، hmt͡ʃnɒn ɒz fʃrdn ɣzb nzɒʔ bjrvn mj‌آjd zjrɒ t͡ʃnɒnkh ɒz fʃrdn ʃjr، پnjr bjrvn mj‌آjd، v ɒz fʃrdn bjnj، xvn bjrvn mj‌آjd، hmt͡ʃnɒn ɒz fʃrdn ɣzb nzɒʔ bjrvn mj‌آjd klɒm lmvئjl پɒdʃɒh، پjɣɒmj kh mɒdrʃ bh ɒv tʔljm dɒd t͡ʃh ɡvjm‌ɒj پsr mn، t͡ʃh ɡvjm‌ɒj پsr rhm mn v t͡ʃh ɡvjm‌ɒj پsr nzrhɒj mn ɣvt xvd rɒ bh znɒn mdh، v nh trjɣhɒj xvjʃ rɒ bh آnt͡ʃh bɒʔs hlɒkt پɒdʃɒhɒn ɒst پɒdʃɒhɒn rɒ nmj ʃɒjd‌ɒj lmvئjl، پɒdʃɒhɒn rɒ nmj ʃɒjd kh ʃrɒb bnvʃnd، v nh ɒmjrɒn rɒ kh mskrɒt rɒ bxvɒhnd mbɒdɒ bnvʃnd v frɒjz rɒ frɒmvʃ knnd، vdɒvrj d͡ʒmjʔ zljlɒn rɒ mnhrf sɒznd mskrɒt rɒ bh آnɒnj kh mʃrf bh hlɒktndbdh v ʃrɒb rɒ bh tlx d͡ʒɒnɒn، tɒ bnvʃnd v fɣr xvd rɒ frɒmvʃ knnd، vmʃɣt xvjʃ rɒ djɡr bjɒd njɒvrnd dhɒn xvd rɒ brɒj ɡŋɒn bɒz kn، v brɒj dɒdrsj d͡ʒmjʔ bjt͡ʃɒrɡɒn dhɒn xvd rɒ bɒz krdh، bh ɒnsɒf dɒvrj nmɒ، v fɣjr v mskjn rɒ dɒdrsj frmɒ zn sɒlhh rɒ kjst kh پjdɒ tvɒnd krd؟ ɣjmt ɒv ɒz lʔlhɒ ɡrɒntr ɒst dl ʃvhrʃ br ɒv ɒʔtmɒd dɒrd، v mhtɒd͡ʒ mnfʔt nxvɒhd bvd brɒjʃ tmɒmj rvzhɒj ʔmr xvd، xvbj xvɒhd krd v nh bdj پʃm v ktɒn rɒ mj‌d͡ʒvjd v bh‌dsthɒj xvdbɒ rɣbt kɒr mj‌knd ɒv msl kʃtjhɒj td͡ʒɒr ɒst، kh xvrɒk xvd rɒ ɒz dvr mj‌آvrd vɣtj kh hnvz ʃb ɒst brmj xjzd، v bh ɒhl xɒnh‌ɒʃ xvrɒk v bh knjzɒnʃ hsh ɒjʃɒn rɒ mj dhd drbɒrh mzrʔh fkr krdh، آn rɒ mj‌xrd، v ɒzksb dsthɒj xvd tɒkstɒn ɣrs mj‌nmɒjd kmr xvd rɒ bɒ ɣvt mj‌bndd، v bɒzvhɒj xvjʃ rɒ ɣvj mj‌sɒzd td͡ʒɒrt xvd rɒ mj‌bjnd kh njkv ɒst، vt͡ʃrɒɣʃ dr ʃb xɒmvʃ nmj ʃvd dsthɒj ɒv bh ɒtls mlbs hstnd brɒj xvd ɒsbɒbhɒj zjnt mj‌sɒzd lbɒsʃ ɒz ktɒn nɒzk v ɒrɣvɒn mj‌bɒʃd ʃvhrʃ dr drbɒrhɒ mʔrvf mj‌bɒʃd، v dr mjɒn mʃɒjx vlɒjt mj‌nʃjnd d͡ʒɒmh hɒj ktɒn sɒxth آnhɒ rɒ mj‌frvʃd، vkmrbndhɒ bh tɒd͡ʒrɒn mj‌dhd ɣvt v ʔzt، lbɒs ɒv ɒst، v drbɒrh vɣt آjndh mj‌xndd dhɒn xvd rɒ bh hkmt mj‌ɡʃɒjd، v tʔljm mhbt‌آmjz br zbɒn vj ɒst bh rftɒr ɒhl xɒnh xvd mtvd͡ʒh mj‌ʃvd، vxvrɒk kɒhlj nmj kh vɣɒjʔ bnj آdm msl vɣɒjʔ bhɒjm ɒst brɒj ɒjʃɒn jk vɒɣʔh ɒst؛ t͡ʃnɒnkh ɒjn mj‌mjrd bh hmɒntvrآn njz mj‌mjrd v brɒj hmh jk nfs ɒst v ɒnsɒn br bhɒjm brtrj ndɒrd t͡ʃvnkh hmh bɒtl hstnd hmh bh jkd͡ʒɒ
