msrvr ʃvd، t͡ʃvnkh nsjbʃ hmjn ɒst v kjst kh ɒv rɒ bɒzآvrd tɒآnt͡ʃh rɒ kh bʔd ɒz ɒv vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd mʃɒhdh nmɒjd؟ پs mn brɡʃth، tmɒmj zlmhɒjj rɒ kh zjrآftɒb krdh mj‌ʃvd، mlɒhzh krdm vɒjnk ɒʃkhɒj mzlvmɒn v brɒj ɒjʃɒn tslj dhndh‌ɒj nbvd v zvr btrf d͡ʒfɒknndɡɒn ɒjʃɒn bvd ɒmɒ brɒj ɒjʃɒn tslj dhndh‌ɒj nbvd vmn mrdɡɒnj rɒ kh ɣbl ɒz آn mrdh bvdnd، bjʃtr ɒzzndɡɒnj kh tɒ bhɒl zndh‌ɒnd آfrjn ɡftm v ksj rɒ kh tɒ bhɒl bvd͡ʒvd njɒmdh ɒst، ɒz hr dv ɒjʃɒn bhtr dɒnstm t͡ʃvnkh ʔml bd rɒ kh zjr آftɒb krdh mj‌ʃvd، ndjdh ɒst v tmɒmj mhnt v hr kɒmjɒbj rɒ djdm kh brɒj ɒnsɒn bɒʔs hsd ɒz hmsɒjh ɒv mj‌bɒʃd vآn njz btɒlt v dr‌پj bɒd zhmt kʃjdn ɒst mrd kɒhl dsthɒj xvd rɒ br hm nhɒdh، ɡvʃt xvjʃtn rɒ mj‌xvrd jk kf پr ɒz rɒht ɒzdv kf پr ɒz mʃɣt v dr‌پj bɒd zhmt kʃjdn bhtr ɒst پs brɡʃth، btɒlt djɡr rɒ zjr آsmɒn mlɒhzh nmvdm jkj hst kh sɒnj ndɒrd v ɒv rɒپsrj jɒ brɒdrj njst v mʃɣtʃ rɒ ɒnthɒ nj v t͡ʃʃmʃ njz ɒz dvlt sjr nmj ʃvd v mj‌ɡvjd ɒzbrɒj kh zhmt kʃjdh، d͡ʒɒn xvd rɒ ɒz njkvjj mhrvm sɒzm؟ ɒjn njz btɒlt v mʃɣt sxt ɒst dv ɒz jk bhtrnd t͡ʃvnkh ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒzmʃɣtʃɒn ɒd͡ʒrt njkv mj‌bɒʃd؛ zjrɒ ɒɡrbjftnd، jkj ɒz آnhɒ rfjɣ xvd rɒ xvɒhdbrxjzɒnjd lkn vɒj br آn jkj kh t͡ʃvn bjftddjɡrj nbɒʃd kh ɒv rɒ brxjzɒnd v ɒɡr dv nfrnjz bxvɒbnd، ɡrm xvɒhnd ʃd ɒmɒ jk nfr t͡ʃɡvnh ɡrm ʃvd v ɒɡr ksj br jkj ɒz ɒjʃɒn hmlh آvrd، hr dv bɒ ɒv mɣɒvmt xvɒhnd nmvd vrjsmɒn sh lɒ bzvdj ɡsjxth nmj ʃvd d͡ʒvɒn fɣjr v hkjm ɒz پɒdʃɒh پjr v xrf kh پzjrftn nsjht rɒ djɡr nmj dɒnd bhtr ɒst zjrɒ kh ɒv ɒz zndɒn bh پɒdʃɒhj bjrvn mj‌آjd vآnkh bh پɒdʃɒhj mvlvd ʃdh ɒst fɣjr mj‌ɡrdd djdm kh tmɒmj zndɡɒnj kh zjr آsmɒn rɒh mj‌rvnd، btrf آn پsr dvm kh bd͡ʒɒj ɒv brxjzd، mj‌ʃvndv tmɒmj ɣvm jʔnj hmh ksɒnj rɒ kh ɒv br ɒjʃɒn hɒkm ʃvd ɒnthɒ njst ljkn ɒʔɣɒb ɒjʃɒn bh ɒv rɣbt ndɒrnd bh drstj kh ɒjn njzbtɒlt v dr‌پj bɒd zhmt kʃjdn ɒst v tmɒmj ɣvm jʔnj hmh ksɒnj rɒ kh ɒv br ɒjʃɒn hɒkm ʃvd ɒnthɒ njst ljkn ɒʔɣɒb ɒjʃɒn bh ɒv rɣbt ndɒrnd bh drstj kh ɒjn njzbtɒlt v dr‌پj bɒd zhmt kʃjdn ɒst t͡ʃvn bh xɒnh xdɒ brvj، پɒj xvd rɒ ŋɒh dɒr zjrɒ tɣrb d͡ʒstn bh d͡ʒht ɒstmɒʔ، ɒzɡzrɒnjdn ɣrbɒnj hɒj ɒhmɣɒn bhtr ɒst، t͡ʃvnkh ɒjʃɒn nmj dɒnnd kh ʔml bd mj‌knnd bɒ dhɒn xvd tʔd͡ʒjl mnmɒ v dlt brɒj ɡftn sxnj bh hzvr xdɒ nʃtɒbd zjrɒ xdɒ dr آsmɒn ɒst v tv br zmjn hstj پs sxnɒnt km bɒʃd zjrɒxvɒb ɒz ksrt mʃɣt پjdɒ mj‌ʃvd v آvɒz ɒhmɣ ɒz ksrt sxnɒn t͡ʃvn brɒj xdɒ nzr nmɒjj drvfɒj آn tɒxjr mnmɒ zjrɒ kh ɒv ɒz ɒhmɣɒn xʃnvdnjst؛ پs bh آnt͡ʃh nzr krdj vfɒ nmɒ bhtrɒst kh nzr nnmɒjj ɒz ɒjnkh nzr nmvdh، vfɒ nknj mɡzɒr kh dhɒnt d͡ʒsd tv rɒ xtɒkɒr sɒzd v drhzvr frʃth mɡv kh ɒjn shv ʃdh ɒst t͡ʃrɒxdɒ bh‌sbb ɣvl tv ɣzbnɒk ʃdh، ʔml dsthɒjt rɒ bɒtl sɒzd؟ zjrɒ kh ɒjn ɒz ksrt xvɒbhɒ v ɒbɒtjl v ksrt sxnɒn ɒst؛ ljkn tv ɒzxdɒ btrs ɒɡr zlm rɒ br fɣjrɒn v brkndn ɒnsɒf vʔdɒlt rɒ dr kʃvrj bjnj، ɒz ɒjn ɒmr mʃvʃ mbɒʃ zjrɒ آnkh bɒlɒtr ɒz bɒlɒ ɒst mlɒhzh mj‌kndv hzrt ɒʔlj fvɣ ɒjʃɒn ɒst v mnfʔt zmjn brɒj hmh ɒst blkh mzrʔh، پɒdʃɒh rɒ njzxdmt mj‌knd آnkh nɣrh rɒ dvst dɒrd ɒznɣrh sjr nmj ʃvd، v hr‌kh tvɒŋrj rɒ dvst dɒrd ɒz dxl sjr nmj ʃvd ɒjn njz btɒlt ɒst t͡ʃvn nʔmt zjɒdh ʃvd، xvrndɡɒnʃ zjɒdmj ʃvnd؛ v bh d͡ʒht mɒlkʃ t͡ʃh mnfʔt ɒst ɣjrɒz آnkh آn rɒ bh t͡ʃʃm xvd mj‌bjnd؟ xvɒb ʔmlh ʃjrjn ɒst xvɒh km v xvɒh zjɒd bxvrd، ɒmɒ sjrj mrd dvltmnd ɒv rɒnmj ɡzɒrd kh bxvɒbd blɒjj sxt bvd kh آn rɒ zjr آftɒb djdm jʔnj dvltj kh sɒhbʃ آn rɒ brɒj zrr xvd ŋɒh dɒʃth bvd v آn dvlt ɒz hɒdsh bd zɒjʔ ʃd v پsrj آvrd ɒmɒ t͡ʃjzj dr dst xvdndɒʃt t͡ʃnɒnkh ɒz rhm mɒdrʃ bjrvn آmd، hmt͡ʃnɒn brhnh bh hɒltj kh آmd xvɒhd brɡʃt vɒz mʃɣt xvd t͡ʃjzj nxvɒhd jɒft kh bh‌dst xvd bbrd v ɒjn njz blɒj sxt ɒst kh ɒz hrd͡ʒht t͡ʃnɒnkh آmd hmt͡ʃnjn xvɒhd rft؛ v ɒv rɒt͡ʃh mnfʔt xvɒhd bvd ɒz ɒjnkh dr‌پj bɒd zhmt kʃjdh ɒst؟ v tmɒmj ɒjɒm xvd rɒ dr tɒrjkj mj‌xvrd v bɒ bjmɒrj v xʃm، bsjɒr mhzvn mj‌ʃvd ɒjnk آnt͡ʃh mn djdm kh xvb v njkvmj bɒʃd، ɒjn ɒst kh ɒnsɒn dr tmɒmj ɒjɒm ʔmrxvd kh xdɒ آn rɒ bh ɒv mj‌bxʃd bxvrd v bnvʃdv ɒz tmɒmj mʃɣtj kh zjr آsmɒn mj‌kʃd bh njkvjj tmtʔ bbrd zjrɒ kh nsjbʃ hmjn ɒst v njz hr ɒnsɒnj kh xdɒ dvlt v ɒmvɒl bh ɒvbbxʃd v ɒv rɒ ɣvt ʔtɒ frmɒjd kh ɒz آn bxvrd vnsjb xvd rɒ brdɒʃth، ɒz mhnt xvd msrvrʃvd، ɒjn bxʃʃ xdɒ ɒstzjrɒ rvzhɒj ʔmr xvd rɒ bsjɒr bh jɒd nmj آvrd t͡ʃvnkh xdɒ ɒvrɒ ɒz ʃɒdj dlʃ ɒd͡ʒɒbt frmvdh ɒst zjrɒ rvzhɒj ʔmr xvd rɒ bsjɒr bh jɒd nmj آvrd t͡ʃvnkh xdɒ ɒvrɒ ɒz ʃɒdj dlʃ ɒd͡ʒɒbt frmvdh ɒst msjbtj hst kh zjr آftɒb djdm v آn brmrdmɒn sŋjn ɒst ksj‌kh xdɒ bh ɒvdvlt v ɒmvɒl v ʔzt dhd، bh hdj kh hr‌t͡ʃh d͡ʒɒnʃ آrzv knd brɒjʃ bɒɣj nbɒʃd، ɒmɒ xdɒ ɒv rɒɣvt ndɒdh bɒʃd kh ɒz آn bxvrd blkh mrd ɣrjbj ɒz آn bxvrd ɒjn njz btɒlt v msjbt sxt ɒst ɒɡr ksj sd پsr bjɒvrd v sɒlhɒj bsjɒr zndɡɒnj nmɒjd، bh tvrj kh ɒjɒm sɒlhɒjʃ bsjɒrbɒʃd ɒmɒ d͡ʒɒnʃ ɒz njkvjj sjr nʃvd v brɒjʃ d͡ʒnɒzh‌ɒj brپɒ nknnd، mj‌ɡvjm kh sɣtʃdh ɒz ɒvbhtr ɒst zjrɒ kh ɒjn bh btɒlt آmd v bh tɒrjkj rft v nɒm ɒv dr zlmt mxfj ʃd v آftɒb rɒnjz ndjd v ndɒnst ɒjn bjʃtr ɒz آn آrɒmj dɒrd v ɒɡr hzɒr sɒl blkh dv t͡ʃndɒn آn zjst knd vnjkvjj rɒ nbjnd، آjɒ hmh bh jkd͡ʒɒ nmj rvnd؟ tmɒmj mʃɣt ɒnsɒn brɒj dhɒnʃ mj‌bɒʃd؛ vmʔhzɒ d͡ʒɒn ɒv sjr nmj ʃvd zjrɒ kh mrd hkjm rɒ ɒz ɒhmɣ t͡ʃh brtrj ɒst؟ v brɒj fɣjrj kh mj‌dɒnd t͡ʃh tvr پjʃ zndɡɒn slvk nmɒjd، t͡ʃh fɒjdh ɒst؟ rvjt t͡ʃʃm ɒz ʃhvt nfs bhtr ɒst ɒjn njz btɒlt v dr‌پj bɒd zhmt kʃjdn ɒst hrt͡ʃh bvdh ɒst bh ɒsm xvd ɒz zmɒn ɣdjm msmj ʃdh ɒst v dɒnsth ʃdh ɒst kh ɒv آdm ɒst v bh آn ksj‌kh ɒz آn tvɒnɒtr ɒst mnɒzʔh ntvɒnd nmvd t͡ʃvnkh t͡ʃjzhɒj bsjɒr hst kh btɒlt rɒmj ɒfzɒjd پs ɒnsɒn rɒ t͡ʃh fzjlt ɒst؟zjrɒkjst kh bdɒnd t͡ʃh t͡ʃjz brɒj zndɡɒnj ɒnsɒn njkvɒst، dr mdt ɒjɒm hjɒt bɒtl vj kh آnhɒ rɒmsl sɒjh srf mj‌nmɒjd؟ v kjst kh ɒnsɒn rɒ ɒzآnt͡ʃh bʔd ɒz ɒv zjr آftɒb vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd mxbrsɒzd؟ zjrɒkjst kh bdɒnd t͡ʃh t͡ʃjz brɒj zndɡɒnj ɒnsɒn njkvɒst، dr mdt ɒjɒm hjɒt bɒtl vj kh آnhɒ rɒmsl sɒjh srf mj‌nmɒjd؟ v kjst kh ɒnsɒn rɒ ɒzآnt͡ʃh bʔd ɒz ɒv zjr آftɒb vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd mxbrsɒzd؟ njk nɒmj ɒz rvɣn mʔtr bhtr ɒst v rvzmmɒt ɒz rvz vlɒdt rftn bh xɒnh mɒtm ɒz rftn bh xɒnh zjɒft bhtr ɒst zjrɒ kh ɒjn آxrt hmh mrdmɒn ɒst v zndɡɒn ɒjn rɒ dr dl xvd mj‌nhnd hzn ɒz xndh bhtr ɒst zjrɒ kh ɒzɣmɡjnj svrt dl ɒslɒh mj‌ʃvd dl hkjmɒn dr xɒnh mɒtm ɒst v dl ɒhmɣɒn dr xɒnh ʃɒdmɒnj ʃnjdn ʔtɒb hkjmɒn bhtr ɒst ɒz ʃnjdn srvd ɒhmɣɒn، zjrɒ xndh ɒhmɣɒn msl sdɒj xɒrhɒ dr zjr djɡ ɒst v ɒjn njz btɒlt ɒst bh drstj kh zlm، mrd hkjm rɒ d͡ʒɒhl mj‌ɡrdɒnd v rʃvh، dl rɒ fɒsd mj‌sɒzd ɒnthɒj ɒmr ɒz ɒbtdɒjʃ bhtr ɒst v dl hljm ɒz dl mɣrvr njkvtr dr dl xvd bh zvdj xʃmnɒk mʃv zjrɒ xʃm dr sjnh ɒhmɣɒn mstɣrmj ʃvd mɡv t͡ʃrɒ rvzhɒj ɣdjm ɒz ɒjn zmɒn bhtrbvd zjrɒ kh dr ɒjn xsvs ɒz rvj hkmt svɒl nmj knj hkmt msl mjrɒs njkv ɒst blkh bh d͡ʒht bjnndɡɒn آftɒb njkvtr zjrɒ kh hkmt mld͡ʒɒjj ɒst v nɣrh mld͡ʒɒjj؛ ɒmɒ fzjlt mʔrft ɒjn ɒst kh hkmt sɒhbɒnʃ rɒ zndɡj mj‌bxʃd ɒʔmɒl xdɒ rɒ mlɒhzh nmɒ zjrɒ kjst kh btvɒnd آnt͡ʃh rɒ kh ɒv kd͡ʒ sɒxth ɒst rɒst nmɒjd؟ dr rvz sʔɒdtmndj ʃɒdmɒn bɒʃ v drrvz ʃɣɒvt tɒml nmɒ zjrɒ xdɒ ɒjn rɒ bh ɒzɒء آn ɣrɒr dɒd kh ɒnsɒn hjt͡ʃ‌t͡ʃjz rɒ kh bʔd ɒz ɒv xvɒhdʃd drjɒft ntvɒnd krd ɒjn hmh rɒ dr rvzhɒj btɒlt xvd djdm mrd ʔɒdl hst kh dr ʔdɒltʃ hlɒk mj‌ʃvd v mrd ʃrjr hst kh dr ʃrɒrtʃ ʔmr drɒz dɒrd پs ɡftm bh ɒfrɒt ʔɒdl mbɒʃ v xvd rɒ zjɒdh hkjm mپndɒr mbɒdɒ xvjʃtn rɒ hlɒk knj v bh ɒfrɒt ʃrjr mbɒʃ v ɒhmɣ mʃv mbɒdɒ پjʃ ɒzɒd͡ʒlt bmjrj njkv ɒst kh bh ɒjn mtmsk ʃvj v ɒz آn njz dst xvd rɒ brndɒrj zjrɒ hrkh ɒz xdɒ btrsd، ɒz ɒjn hr dv bjrvn xvɒhd آmd hkmt mrd hkjm rɒ tvɒnɒjj mj‌bxʃdbjʃtr ɒz dh hɒkm kh dr jk ʃhr bɒʃnd zjrɒmrd ʔɒdlj dr dnjɒ njst kh njkvjj vrzd v hjt͡ʃ xtɒ nnmɒjd v njz bh hmh sxnɒnj kh ɡfth ʃvd dl xvdrɒ mnh، mbɒdɒ bndh xvd rɒ kh tv rɒ lʔnt mj‌kndbʃnvj zjrɒ dlt mj‌dɒnd kh tv njz bsjɒr bɒrhɒdjɡrɒn rɒ lʔnt nmvdh‌ɒj ɒjn hmh rɒ bɒ hkmt آzmvdm v ɡftm bh hkmt xvɒhm پrdɒxt ɒmɒ آn ɒz mn dvr bvd آnt͡ʃh hst dvr v bsjɒr ʔmjɣ ɒst پs kjst kh آn rɒ drjɒft nmɒjd؟ پs brɡʃth dl xvd rɒ br mʔrft v bhs v tlb hkmt vʔɣl mʃɣvl sɒxtm tɒ bdɒnm kh ʃrɒrt hmɒɣt ɒst v hmɒɣt djvɒŋj ɒst v drjɒftm kh znj kh dlʃ dɒmhɒ v tlh‌hɒ ɒst v dsthɒjʃ kmndhɒ mj‌bɒʃd، t͡ʃjz tlxtr ɒz mvt ɒst hr‌kh mɣbvl xdɒ ɒst، ɒz vj rstɡɒr xvɒhd ʃd ɒmɒxtɒkɒr ɡrftɒr vj xvɒhd ɡrdjd d͡ʒɒmʔh mj‌ɡvjd kh ɒjnk t͡ʃvn ɒjn rɒ bɒ آn mɣɒblh krdm tɒ ntjd͡ʒh rɒ drjɒbm ɒjn rɒ drjɒftm، kh d͡ʒɒn mn tɒ bh hɒl آn rɒ d͡ʒstd͡ʒv mj‌knd vnjɒftm jk mrd ɒz hzɒr jɒftm ɒmɒ ɒz d͡ʒmjʔ آnhɒ znj njɒftmhmɒnɒ ɒjn rɒ fɣt drjɒftm kh xdɒ آdmj rɒ rɒst آfrjd، ɒmɒ ɒjʃɒn mxtrʔɒt bsjɒr tlbjdnd hmɒnɒ ɒjn rɒ fɣt drjɒftm kh xdɒ آdmj rɒ rɒst آfrjd، ɒmɒ ɒjʃɒn mxtrʔɒt bsjɒr tlbjdnd kjst kh msl mrd hkjm bɒʃd vkjst kh tfsjr ɒmr rɒ bfhmd؟ hkmt rvj ɒnsɒn rɒrvʃn mj‌sɒzd v sxtj t͡ʃhrh ɒv tbdjl mj‌ʃvd mn tv rɒ mj‌ɡvjm hkm پɒdʃɒh rɒ ŋɒh dɒr vɒjn rɒ bh‌sbb svɡnd xdɒ ʃtɒb mkn tɒ ɒzhzvr vj brvj v dr ɒmr bd d͡ʒzm mnmɒ zjrɒ kh ɒvhr‌t͡ʃh mj‌xvɒhd bh ʔml mj‌آvrd d͡ʒɒjj kh sxn پɒdʃɒh ɒst ɣvt hst v kjst kh bh ɒvbɡvjd t͡ʃh mj‌knj؟ hr‌kh hkm rɒ ŋɒh dɒrdhjt͡ʃ ɒmr bd rɒ nxvɒhd djd v dl mrd hkjm vɣt v ɣɒnvn rɒ mj‌dɒnd zjrɒ kh brɒj hr mtlb vɣtj v ɣɒnvnj ɒst t͡ʃvnkh ʃrɒrt ɒnsɒn br vj sŋjn ɒst zjrɒ آnt͡ʃh rɒ kh vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃdɒv nmj dɒnd؛ v kjst kh ɒv rɒ xbr dhd kh t͡ʃɡvnh xvɒhd ʃd؟ ksj njst kh br rvh tsltdɒʃth bɒʃd tɒ rvh xvd rɒ ŋɒh dɒrd v ksj brrvz mvt tslt ndɒrd؛ v dr vɣt d͡ʒŋ mrxsj njst v ʃrɒrt sɒhbʃ rɒ nd͡ʒɒt nmj dhd ɒjn hmh rɒ djdm v dl xvd rɒ br hr ʔmlj kh zjr آftɒb krdh ʃvd mʃɣvl sɒxtm، vɣtj kh ɒnsɒn br ɒnsɒn bh d͡ʒht zrrʃ hkmrɒnj mj‌knd v hmt͡ʃnjn djdm kh ʃrjrɒn dfn ʃdnd، v آmdnd v ɒz mkɒn mɣds rftnd v drʃhrj kh dr آn t͡ʃnjn ʔml nmvdnd frɒmvʃ ʃdnd ɒjn njz btɒlt ɒst t͡ʃvnkh ftvj brʔml bd bzvdj md͡ʒrɒ nmj ʃvd، ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht dl bnj آdm dr ɒndrvn ɒjʃɒn brɒj bdkrdɒrj d͡ʒɒzm mj ʃvd ɒɡr‌t͡ʃh ɡnɒhkɒr sd mrtbh ʃrɒrt vrzd v ʔmr drɒz knd، mʔhzɒ mj‌dɒnm brɒj آnɒnj kh ɒz xdɒ btrsnd v bh hzvr vj xɒئf bɒʃndsʔɒdtmndj xvɒhd bvd ɒmɒ brɒj ʃrjrsʔɒdtmndj nxvɒhd bvd v msl sɒjh، ʔmr drɒznxvɒhd krd t͡ʃvnkh ɒz xdɒ nmj trsd btɒltj hst kh br rvj zmjn krdh mj‌ʃvd، jʔnj ʔɒdlɒn hstnd kh br ɒjʃɒn msl ʔml ʃrjrɒn vɒɣʔ mj‌ʃvd v ʃrjrɒn‌ɒnd kh br ɒjʃɒn msl ʔml ʔɒdlɒn vɒɣʔ mj‌ʃvd پs ɡftm kh ɒjn njz btɒlt ɒst آŋɒh ʃɒdmɒnj rɒ mdh krdm zjrɒ kh brɒj ɒnsɒn zjr آsmɒn t͡ʃjzj bhtr ɒz ɒjn njst kh bxvrd v bnvʃd v ʃɒdj nmɒjd v ɒjn dr tmɒmj ɒjɒm ʔmrʃ kh xdɒ dr zjr آftɒb bh vj dhd drmhntʃ bɒ ɒv bɒɣj mɒnd t͡ʃvnkh dl xvd rɒ br آn nhɒdm tɒ hkmt rɒbfhmm v tɒ ʃɣlj rɒ kh br rvj zmjn krdh ʃvdbbjnm t͡ʃvnkh hstnd kh ʃb v rvz xvɒb rɒ bh t͡ʃʃmɒn xvd nmj bjnnd،آŋɒh tmɒmj snʔt xdɒ rɒ djdm kh ɒnsɒn، kɒrj rɒ kh zjr آftɒb krdh mj‌ʃvd nmj tvɒnd drk nmɒjd v hr‌t͡ʃnd ɒnsɒn brɒj td͡ʒss آn zjɒdh tr tfhs nmɒjd آn rɒkmtr drk mj‌nmɒjd v ɒɡr‌t͡ʃh mrd hkjm njz ɡmɒn brd kh آn rɒ mj‌dɒnd ɒmɒ آn rɒ drk nxvɒhd nmvd آŋɒh tmɒmj snʔt xdɒ rɒ djdm kh ɒnsɒn، kɒrj rɒ kh zjr آftɒb krdh mj‌ʃvd nmj tvɒnd drk nmɒjd v hr‌t͡ʃnd ɒnsɒn brɒj td͡ʒss آn zjɒdh tr tfhs nmɒjd آn rɒkmtr drk mj‌nmɒjd v ɒɡr‌t͡ʃh mrd hkjm njz ɡmɒn brd kh آn rɒ hmh‌t͡ʃjz پjʃ rvj ɒjʃɒn ɒst hmh‌t͡ʃjz brɒj hmh ks msɒvj ɒst brɒj ʔɒdlɒn v ʃrjrɒn jk vɒɣʔh ɒst؛ brɒj xvbɒn v tɒhrɒn v nd͡ʒsɒn؛ brɒj آnkh zbh mj‌knd v brɒj آnkh zbh nmj kndvɒɣʔh jkj ɒst t͡ʃnɒnkh njkɒnnd hmt͡ʃnɒn ɡnɒhkɒrɒnnd؛ v آnkh ɣsm mj‌xvrd v آnkh ɒz ɣsm xvrdn mj‌trsd msɒvj‌ɒnd dr tmɒmj ɒʔmɒlj kh zjr آftɒb krdh mj‌ʃvd، ɒz hmh bdtr ɒjn ɒst kh jk vɒɣʔh brhmh mj‌ʃvd v ɒjnkh dl bnj آdm ɒz ʃrɒrt پrɒst v mɒdɒmj kh zndh hstnd، djvɒŋj dr dl ɒjʃɒn ɒst v bʔd ɒz آn bh mrdɡɒn mj‌پjvndnd zjrɒ brɒj آnkh bɒ tmɒmj zndɡɒn mj‌پjvndd، ɒmjdhst t͡ʃvnkh sɡ zndh ɒz ʃjr mrdh bhtr ɒst zɒnrv kh zndɡɒn hr‌آnt͡ʃh zjrآftɒb krdh mj‌ʃvd، nsjbj nxvɒhd bvd پs rfth، nɒn xvd rɒ bh ʃɒdj bxvr vʃrɒb xvd rɒ bh xvʃdlj bnvʃ t͡ʃvnkh xdɒɒʔmɒl tv rɒ ɣbl ɒz ɒjn ɣbvl frmvdh ɒst lbɒs tv hmjʃh sfjd bɒʃd v br sr tv ʃjrjn hstj‌ɒj mhbvb mn v txt mɒ hm sbz ɒsttjrhɒj xɒnh mɒ ɒz srv آzɒd ɒst v sɣf mɒ ɒz t͡ʃvb snvbr tjrhɒj xɒnh mɒ ɒz srv آzɒd ɒst v sɣf mɒ ɒz t͡ʃvb snvbr mn nrɡs ʃɒrvn v svsn vɒdjhɒ hstm t͡ʃnɒnkh svsn dr mjɒn xɒrhɒ hmt͡ʃnɒn mhbvbh mn dr mjɒn dxtrɒn ɒst t͡ʃnɒnkh sjb dr mjɒn drxtɒn d͡ʒŋl hmt͡ʃnɒn mhbvb mn dr mjɒn پsrɒn ɒst drsɒjh vj bh ʃɒdmɒnj nʃstm v mjvh‌ɒʃ brɒj kɒmm ʃjrjn bvd mrɒ bh mjxɒnh آvrd v ʔlm vj bɒlɒj sr mn mhbt bvd mrɒ bh ɣrshɒj kʃmʃ tɣvjt dhjd v mrɒ bh sjbhɒ tɒzh sɒzjd، zjrɒ kh mn ɒz ʔʃɣ bjmɒr hstm dst t͡ʃپʃ dr zjr sr mn ɒst v dst rɒstʃ mrɒ dr آɣvʃ mj‌kʃd ‌ɒj dxtrɒn ɒvrʃljm، ʃmɒ rɒ ʔɣb djvɒr mɒ ɒjstɒdh، ɒz پnd͡ʒrh‌hɒ mj‌ŋrd v ɒz ʃbkh‌hɒ xvjʃtn rɒnmɒjɒn mj‌sɒzd mhbvb mn mrɒ xtɒb krdh، ɡft «ɒj mhbvbh mn v‌ɒj zjbɒjj mn brxjz v bjɒ zjrɒ ɒjnk zmstɒn ɡzʃth v bɒrɒn tmɒm ʃdh vrfth ɒst ɡlhɒ br zmjn zɒhr ʃdh v zmɒn ɒlhɒn rsjdh v آvɒz fɒxth dr vlɒjt mɒ ʃnjdh mj‌ʃvd drxt ɒnd͡ʒjr mjvh xvd rɒ mj‌rsɒndv mvhɒ ɡl آvrdh، rɒjhh xvʃ mj‌dhd ɒj mhbvbh mn v‌ɒj zjbɒjj mn، brxjz v bjɒ» ‌ɒj kbvtr mn kh dr ʃkɒfhɒj sxrh v drstr sŋhɒj xɒrɒ hstj، t͡ʃhrh xvd rɒ bh mn bnmɒ v آvɒzt rɒ bh mn bʃnvɒn zjrɒ kh آvɒz tv lzjzv t͡ʃhrh ɒt xvʃnmɒ ɒst ʃɣɒlhɒ، ʃɣɒlhɒj kvt͡ʃk rɒ kh tɒkstɒnhɒ rɒ xrɒb mj‌knnd brɒj mɒbɡjrjd، zjrɒ kh tɒkstɒnhɒj mɒ ɡl آvrdh ɒst mhbvbm ɒz آn mn ɒst v mn ɒz آn vj hstm dr mjɒn svsnhɒ mj‌t͡ʃrɒnd‌ɒj mhbvb mn، brɡrd v tɒ nsjm rvz bvzd v sɒjh‌hɒ bɡrjzd، mɒnnd ɣzɒl jɒ bt͡ʃh آhv br kvhhɒj bɒtr bɒʃ ‌ɒj mhbvb mn، brɡrd v tɒ nsjm rvz bvzd v sɒjh‌hɒ bɡrjzd، mɒnnd ɣzɒl jɒ bt͡ʃh آhv br kvhhɒj bɒtr bɒʃ ʃbɒŋɒh dr bstr xvd ɒv rɒ kh d͡ʒɒnm dvst mj dɒrd tlbjdm ɒv rɒ d͡ʒstd͡ʒv krdm ɒmɒnjɒftm ɡftm ɒlɒn brxɒsth، dr kvt͡ʃh‌hɒ v ʃvɒrʔ ʃhr ɡʃth، ɒv rɒ kh d͡ʒɒnm dvst mj‌dɒrd xvɒhm tlbjd ɒv rɒ d͡ʒstd͡ʒv krdm ɒmɒ njɒftm kʃjkt͡ʃjɒnj kh dr ʃhr ɡrdʃ mj‌knnd mrɒjɒftnd ɡftm kh «آjɒ mhbvb d͡ʒɒn mrɒ djdh‌ɒjd؟» ɒz ɒjʃɒn t͡ʃndɒn پjʃ nrfth bvdm kh ɒv rɒ kh d͡ʒɒnm dvst mj‌dɒrd jɒftm v ɒv rɒ ɡrfth، rhɒ nkrdm tɒbh xɒnh mɒdr xvd v bh hd͡ʒrh vɒldh xvjʃ drآvrdm ‌ɒj dxtrɒn ɒvrʃljm، ʃmɒ rɒ bh ɣzɒlhɒ vآhvhɒj shrɒ ɣsm mj‌dhm kh mhbvb mrɒ tɒxvdʃ nxvɒhd bjdɒr mknjd v brmjŋjzɒnjd ɒjn kjst kh msl stvnhɒj dvd ɒz bjɒbɒn brmj آjd vbh mr v bxvr v bh hmh ʔtrjɒt tɒd͡ʒrɒn mʔtrɒst؟ ɒjnk txt rvɒn sljmɒn ɒst kh ʃst d͡ʒbɒr ɒz d͡ʒbɒrɒn ɒsrɒئjl bh ɒtrɒf آn mj‌bɒʃnd hmɡj ɒjʃɒn ʃmʃjr ɡrfth v d͡ʒŋ آzmvdh hstnd ʃmʃjr hr jk bh‌sbb xvf ʃb br rɒnʃ bsth ɒst sljmɒn پɒdʃɒh txt rvɒnj brɒj xvjʃtn ɒz t͡ʃvb lbnɒn sɒxt stvnhɒjʃ rɒ ɒz nɣrh v sɣfʃ rɒ ɒz tlɒ vkrsj‌ɒʃ rɒ ɒz ɒrɣvɒn sɒxt، v vstʃ bh mhbt dxtrɒn ɒvrʃljm mʔrɣ bvd‌ɒj dxtrɒn shjvn، bjrvn آjjd v sljmɒn پɒdʃɒh rɒbbjnjd، bɒ tɒd͡ʒj kh mɒdrʃ dr rvz ʔrvsj vj vdr rvz ʃɒdj dlʃ آn rɒ br sr vj nhɒd ‌ɒj dxtrɒn shjvn، bjrvn آjjd v sljmɒn پɒdʃɒh rɒbbjnjd، bɒ tɒd͡ʒj kh mɒdrʃ dr rvz ʔrvsj vj vdr rvz ʃɒdj dlʃ آn rɒ br sr vj nhɒd ɒjnk tv zjbɒ hstj‌ɒj mhbvbh mn، ɒjnk tv zjbɒ hstj v t͡ʃʃmɒnt ɒz پʃt brɣʔ tvmsl t͡ʃʃmɒn kbvtr ɒst v mvhɒjt msl ɡlh bzhɒɒst kh br d͡ʒɒnb kvh d͡ʒlʔɒd xvɒbjdh‌ɒnd dndɒnhɒjt msl ɡlh ɡvsfndɒn پʃm brjdh kh ɒzʃstn brآmdh bɒʃnd v dr آn hzɒr sپr jʔnj hmh sپrhɒj ʃd͡ʒɒʔɒn آvjzɒn ɒst dv پstɒnt msl dv bt͡ʃh tvɒm آhv mj‌bɒʃd kh dr mjɒn svsnhɒ mj‌t͡ʃrnd، tɒ nsjm rvz bvzd v sɒjh‌hɒ bɡrjzd bh kvh mr vbh tl kndr xvɒhm rft ‌ɒj mhbvbh zʔfrɒn v nj v dɒrt͡ʃjnj bɒ ɒnvɒʔ drxtɒn kndr، mr v ʔvd bɒ d͡ʒmjʔ ʔtrhɒj nfjsh t͡ʃʃmh bɒɣhɒ v brkh آb zndh v nhrhɒjj kh ɒzlbnɒn d͡ʒɒrj ɒst‌ɒj bɒd ʃmɒl، brxjz v‌ɒj bɒd d͡ʒnvb، bjɒ brbɒɣ mn bvz tɒ ʔtrhɒjʃ mntʃr ʃvd mhbvb mn bh bɒɣ xvd bjɒjd v mjvh nfjsh xvd rɒ bxvrd ‌ɒj bɒd ʃmɒl، brxjz v‌ɒj bɒd d͡ʒnvb، bjɒ brbɒɣ mn bvz tɒ ʔtrhɒjʃ mntʃr ʃvd mhbvb mn bh bɒɣ xvd bjɒjd v mjvh nfjsh xvd rɒ bxvrd ɒj xvɒhr v ʔrvs mn، bh bɒɣ xvd آmdm mr xvd rɒ bɒ ʔtrhɒjm t͡ʃjdm ʃɒnh ʔsl xvd rɒ bɒ ʔsl xvjʃ xvrdm ʃrɒb xvd rɒ bɒʃjr xvjʃ nvʃjdmɒj dvstɒn bxvrjd v‌ɒj jɒrɒn bnvʃjd v bh sjrj bjɒʃɒmjd mn dr xvɒb hstm ɒmɒ dlm bjdɒr ɒst آvɒzmhbvb mn ɒst kh dr rɒ mj‌kvbd v mj‌ɡvjd «ɒz brɒj mn bɒz kn‌ɒj xvɒhr mn ɒj mhbvbh mn vkbvtrm v‌ɒj kɒmlh mn zjrɒ kh sr mn ɒz ʃbnm v zlfhɒjm ɒz trʃhɒt ʃb پr ɒst» rxt xvdrɒ kndm t͡ʃɡvnh آn rɒ bپvʃm؟ پɒjhɒj xvd rɒʃstm t͡ʃɡvnh آnhɒ rɒ t͡ʃrkjn nmɒjm؟ mhbvb mn dst xvjʃ rɒ ɒz svrɒx dr dɒxl sɒxt vɒhʃɒjm brɒj vj bh d͡ʒnbʃ آmd mn brxɒstm tɒdr rɒ bh d͡ʒht mhbvb xvd bɒz knm، v ɒz dstm mrv kʃjkt͡ʃjɒnj kh dr ʃhrɡrdʃ mj‌knnd mrɒ jɒftnd، bzdnd v md͡ʒrvh sɒxtnd djdh bɒnhɒj hsɒrhɒ brɣʔ mrɒ ɒz mn ɡrftnd ‌ɒj dxtrɒn ɒvrʃljm، ʃmɒ rɒ ɣsm mj‌dhm kh ɒɡr mhbvb mrɒ bjɒbjd vj rɒ ɡvjjd kh mn mrjz ʔʃɣ hstm ‌ɒj zjbɒtrjn znɒn، mhbvb tv ɒz sɒjrmhbvbɒn t͡ʃh brtrj dɒrd v mhbvb tv rɒ br sɒjrmhbvbɒn t͡ʃh fzjlt ɒst kh mɒ rɒ t͡ʃnjn ɣsm mj‌dhj؟ mhbvb mn sfjd v srx‌fɒm ɒst، v brhzɒrhɒ ɒfrɒʃth ʃdh ɒst sr ɒv tlɒj xɒls ɒst v zlfhɒjʃ bh hm پjt͡ʃjdh v mɒnndɣrɒb sjɒh fɒm ɒst t͡ʃʃmɒnʃ kbvtrɒn nzdnhrhɒj آb ɒst، bɒ ʃjr ʃsth ʃdh v drt͡ʃʃmxɒnh xvd nʃsth rxsɒrhɒjʃ msl bɒɣt͡ʃh blsɒn v پʃth hɒj rjɒhjn mj‌bɒʃd lbhɒjʃ ɒst jɒr mn‌ɒj dxtrɒn ɒvrʃljm mhbvb tv kd͡ʒɒ rfth ɒst‌ɒj zjbɒtrjn znɒn؟ mhbvb tv kd͡ʒɒ tvd͡ʒh nmvdh ɒst tɒɒv rɒ bɒ tv btlbjm؟ mhbvb mn bh bɒɣ xvjʃ v nzd bɒɣt͡ʃh hɒj blsɒn frvd ʃdh ɒst، tɒ dr bɒɣɒt bt͡ʃrɒnd vsvsnhɒ bt͡ʃjnd mn ɒz آn mhbvb xvd vmhbvbm ɒz آn mn ɒst dr mjɒn svsnhɒ ɡlh rɒmj t͡ʃrɒnd ‌ɒj mhbvbh mn، tv msl trsh d͡ʒmjl v mɒnndɒvrʃljm zjbɒ v msl lʃkrhɒj bjdɣ dɒr mhjb hstj t͡ʃʃmɒnt rɒ ɒz mn brɡrdɒn zjrɒ آnhɒ brmn ɣɒlb ʃdh ɒst mvjhɒjt msl ɡlh bzhɒ ɒst kh br d͡ʒɒnb kvh d͡ʒlʔɒd xvɒbjdh bɒʃnd dndɒnhɒjt mɒnnd ɡlh ɡvsfndɒn ɒst kh ɒzʃstn brآmdh bɒʃnd v hmɡj آnhɒ tvɒm zɒjjdh vdr آnhɒ jkj xd͡ʒsth ɡftnd mlkh‌hɒ v mtʔh‌hɒ br ɒvŋrjstnd v ɒv rɒ mdh nmvdnd ɒjn kjst kh msl sbh mj‌drxʃd؟ vmɒnnd mɒh d͡ʒmjl v msl آftɒb tɒhr v mɒnnd lʃkrbjdɣ dɒr mhjb ɒst؟ bh bɒɣ drxtɒn d͡ʒvz frvd ʃdm tɒ sbzjhɒj vɒdj rɒ bŋrm v bbjnm kh آjɒ mv ʃkvfh آvrdh vɒnɒr ɡl krdh ɒst bj‌آnkh mltft ʃvm kh nɒɡɒh d͡ʒɒnm mrɒ msl ʔrɒbh hɒj ʔmjnɒdɒb sɒxtbrɡrd، brɡrd‌ɒj ʃvlmjt brɡrd، brɡrd tɒbr tv bŋrjm brɡrd، brɡrd‌ɒj ʃvlmjt brɡrd، brɡrd tɒbr tv bŋrjm dr ʃvlmjt t͡ʃh mj‌bjnj؟ msl mhfl dvlʃkr nɒf tv msl kɒsh mdvr ɒst kh ʃrɒb mmzvd͡ʒ dr آn km nbɒʃd br tv tvdh ɡndm ɒst kh svsnhɒ آn rɒ ɒhɒth krdh bɒʃd dv پstɒn tvmsl dv bt͡ʃh tvɒm ɣzɒl ɒst ɡrdn tv msl brd͡ʒ ʔɒd͡ʒ v t͡ʃʃmɒnt msl brkh hɒj hʃbvn nzddrvɒzh bjt rbjm bjnj tv msl brd͡ʒ lbnɒn ɒst kh bsvj dmʃɣ mʃrf mj‌bɒʃd srt br tv msl krml v mvj srt mɒnnd ɒrɣvɒn ɒst v پɒdʃɒh dr trh hɒjʃ ɒsjr mj‌bɒʃd ‌ɒj mhbvbh، t͡ʃh bsjɒr zjbɒ v t͡ʃh bsjɒr ʃjrjn bh‌sbb lzthɒhstj ɒjn ɣɒmt tv mɒnnd drxt xrmɒ vپstɒnhɒjt msl xvʃh hɒj ɒŋvr mj‌bɒʃd ɡftm kh bh drxt xrmɒ brآmdh، ʃɒxh hɒjʃ rɒxvɒhm ɡrft v پstɒnhɒjt msl xvʃh hɒj ɒŋvr v bvj nfs tv msl sjbhɒ bɒʃd v dhɒn tvmɒnnd ʃrɒb bhtrjn brɒj mhbvbm kh bh mlɒjmt frv rvd v lbhɒj xftɡɒn rɒ mtklm sɒzd mn ɒz آn mhbvb xvd hstm v ɒʃtjɒɣ vj br mn ɒst bjɒ‌ɒj mhbvb mn bh shrɒ bjrvn brvjm، v dr dhɒt sɒkn ʃvjm v sbh zvd bh tɒkstɒnhɒ brvjm v bbjnjm kh آjɒ ɒŋvr ɡl krdh vɡlhɒjʃ ɡʃvdh v ɒnɒrhɒ ɡl dɒdh bɒʃd dr آnd͡ʒɒmhbt xvd rɒ bh tv xvɒhm dɒdmhr ɡjɒhhɒbvj xvd rɒ mj‌dhd v nzd drhɒj mɒ hr ɣsm mjvh nfjs tɒzh v khnh hst kh آnhɒ rɒ brɒj tv‌ɒj mhbvb mn d͡ʒmʔ krdh‌ɒm mhr ɡjɒhhɒbvj xvd rɒ mj‌dhd v nzd drhɒj mɒ hr ɣsm mjvh nfjs tɒzh v khnh hst kh آnhɒ rɒ brɒj tv‌ɒj mhbvb mn d͡ʒmʔ krdh‌ɒm kɒʃ kh msl brɒdr mn kh پstɒnhɒj mɒdr mrɒmkjd mj‌bvdj، tɒ t͡ʃvn tv rɒ bjrvn mj‌jɒftm tv rɒ mj‌bvsjdm v mrɒ rsvɒnmj sɒxtnd tv rɒ rhbrj mj‌krdm v bh xɒnh mɒdrm dr mj‌آvrdm tɒ mrɒ tʔljm mj‌dɒdj tɒ ʃrɒb mmzvd͡ʒ v ʔsjr ɒnɒr xvd rɒ bh tv mj‌nvʃɒnjdm dst t͡ʃپ ɒv zjr sr mn mj‌bvd v dst rɒstʃ mrɒ dr آɣvʃ mj‌kʃjd ‌ɒj dxtrɒn ɒvrʃljm ʃmɒ rɒ ɣsm mj‌dhm kh mhbvb mrɒ tɒ xvdʃ nxvɒhd bjdɒr nknjd v brnjŋjzɒnjd ɒjn kjst kh br mhbvb xvd tkjh krdh، ɒzshrɒ brmj آjd؟ mrɒ msl xɒtm br dlt v msl ŋjn br bɒzvjt bɡzɒr، zjrɒ kh mhbt msl mvt zvrآvr ɒst v ɣjrt msl hɒvjh stm kjʃ mj‌bɒʃd ʃʔlh hɒjʃ ʃʔlh hɒj آtʃ v lhjb jhvh ɒst آbhɒj bsjɒr mhbt rɒ xɒmvʃ ntvɒnd krd v sjlhɒ آn rɒ ntvɒnd frv nʃɒnjd ɒɡr ksj tmɒmj ɒmvɒl xɒnh xvjʃ rɒbrɒj mhbt bdhd آn rɒ ɒlbth xvɒr xvɒhndʃmrd mɒ rɒ xvɒhrj kvt͡ʃk ɒst kh پstɒn ndɒrd bh d͡ʒht xvɒhr xvd dr rvzj kh ɒv rɒxvɒstɡɒrj knnd t͡ʃh bknjm؟ ɒɡr djvɒr mj‌bvd، br ɒv brd͡ʒ nɣrh‌ɒj bnɒ mj‌krdjm v ɒɡr drvɒzh mj‌bvd، ɒv rɒ bh txth hɒj srv آzɒdmj پvʃɒnjdjm mn djvɒr hstm v پstɒnhɒjm msl brd͡ʒhɒɒst lhzɒ dr nzr ɒv ɒz‌d͡ʒmlh jɒbndɡɒn slɒmtj ʃdh‌ɒm sljmɒn tɒkstɒnj dr bʔl hɒmvn dɒʃt v tɒkstɒn rɒ bh nɒtvrɒn sپrd، kh hr ks brɒj mjvh‌ɒʃ hzɒr nɣrh bdhd tɒkstɒnm kh ɒz آn mn ɒst پjʃ rvj mn mj‌bɒʃd brɒj tv‌ɒj sljmɒn hzɒr v brɒj nɒtvrɒn mjvh‌ɒʃ، dvjst xvɒhdbvd‌ɒj mhbvbh kh dr bɒɣɒt mj‌nʃjnj، rfjɣɒn آvɒz tv rɒ mj‌ʃnvnd، mrɒ njz bʃnvɒn ‌ɒj mhbvbh kh dr bɒɣɒt mj‌nʃjnj، rfjɣɒn آvɒz tv rɒ mj‌ʃnvnd، mrɒ njz bʃnvɒn rvjɒj ɒʃʔjɒ ɒbn آmvs kh آn rɒ drbɒrh jhvdɒ v ɒvrʃljm، dr rvzhɒj ʔzjɒ v jvtɒm v آhɒz v hzɣjɒ پɒdʃɒhɒn jhvdɒ djd ‌ɒj آsmɒn bʃnv v‌ɒj zmjn ɣvmj kh zjrbɒr ɡnɒh mj‌bɒʃnd v br zrjt ʃrjrɒn v پsrɒn mfsd xdɒvnd rɒ trk krdnd v ɣdvs ɒsrɒئjl rɒɒhɒnt nmvdnd v bsvj ʔɣb mnhrf ʃdnd t͡ʃrɒ djɡr zrb jɒbjd v zjɒdh ftnh nmɒjjd؟ tmɒmj sr bjmɒr ɒst v tmɒmj zmjn ʃmɒ rɒ dr nzrʃmɒ mj‌xvrnd v آn msl vɒʒɡvnj bjɡɒŋɒn xrɒb ɡrdjdh ɒst v dxtr shjvn msl sɒjh bɒn dr tɒkstɒn v mɒnnd kپr dr bvstɒn xjɒr vmsl ʃhr mhɒsrh ʃdh، mtrvk ɒst ɒɡr jhvh sbɒjvt bɣjh ɒndkj brɒj hdɒjɒj bɒtl djɡr mjɒvrjd bxvr nzdmn mkrvh ɒst v ɣrh mɒh v sbt v dʔvt d͡ʒmɒʔt njz ɡnɒh rɒ bɒ mhfl mɣds nmj tvɒnm thml nmɒjm ɣrh‌hɒ v ʔjdhɒj ʃmɒ rɒ d͡ʒɒn mn nfrt dɒrd؛ آnhɒ brɒj mn bɒr sŋjn ɒst kh rɒ kh brɒj ʔbɒdt xvjʃ sɒxth‌ɒnd، nzd mvʃ kvrɒn v xfɒʃhɒ xvɒhndɒndɒxt، tɒ bh mɣɒrh hɒj sxrh‌hɒ v ʃkɒfhɒj sŋ xɒrɒ dɒxl ʃvnd، bh‌sbb trs xdɒvnd v kbrjɒj d͡ʒlɒl vj hŋɒmj kh ɒv brxjzd tɒ zmjn rɒ mtzlzl xdɒvnd jhvh sbɒjvt پɒjh vrkn rɒ ɒz ɒvrʃljm v jhvdɒ، jʔnj tmɒmj پɒjh nɒn v tmɒmj پɒjh آb rɒ dvr xvɒhd krd، vʃd͡ʒɒʔɒn v mrdɒn d͡ʒŋj v dɒvrɒn v ɒnbjɒ vfɒlɡjrɒn v mʃɒjx rɒ، v srdɒrɒn پnd͡ʒɒhh vʃrjfɒn v d͡ʒlɒl ɒvrɒ bh nŋ‌آvrnd sjmɒj rvjhɒj ɒjʃɒn bh zdɒjʃɒn ʃɒhd ɒst v msl sdvm ɡnɒhɒn xvd rɒfɒʃ krdh، آnhɒ rɒ mxfj nmj dɒrnd vɒj brd͡ʒɒnhɒj ɒjʃɒn zjrɒ kh bh d͡ʒht xvjʃtn ʃrɒrt rɒ bʔml آvrdh‌ɒnd ʔɒdlɒn rɒ xrd mj‌nmɒjjd؟» v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd «ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht kh dxtrɒn shjvn mtkbrnd v bɒ ɡrdn ɒfrɒʃth vɣmzɒt t͡ʃʃm rɒh mj‌rvnd v bh nɒz mj‌xrɒmnd v bh پɒjhɒj xvjʃ xlxɒlhɒ rɒ bh sdɒ mj‌آvrnd» bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd frɣ sr dxtrɒn shjvn rɒ kl xvɒhd sɒxt v xdɒvnd ʔvrt ɒjʃɒn rɒ brhnh xvɒhd nmvd v dr آn rvz xdɒvnd zjnt xlxɒlhɒ v پjʃɒnj bndhɒ v hlɒlhɒ rɒ dvr xvɒhdkrd v ɡvʃvɒrh‌hɒ v dstbndhɒ v rvbndhɒ rɒ، v dstɒrhɒ v znd͡ʒjrhɒ v kmrbndhɒ v ʔtrdɒnhɒ vtʔvjzhɒ rɒ، v ɒŋʃtrhɒ v hlɣh hɒj bjnj rɒ، v rxvt nfjsh v rdɒhɒ v ʃɒlhɒ v kjsh‌hɒ rɒ، v آjnh‌hɒ v ktɒn nɒzk v ʔmɒmh‌hɒ v brɣʔ‌hɒ rɒ v vɒɣʔ mj‌ʃvd kh bh ʔvz ʔtrjɒt، ʔfvnt xvɒhd ʃd v bh ʔvz kmrbnd، rjsmɒn v bh ʔvz mvjhɒj bɒfth، klj v bh ʔvz sjnh bnd، znɒr پlɒs v bh ʔvz zjbɒjj، svxtɡj xvɒhdbvd mrdɒnt bh ʃmʃjr v ʃd͡ʒɒʔɒnt dr d͡ʒŋ xvɒhnd ɒftɒdv drvɒzh hɒj vj nɒlh v mɒtm xvɒhnd krd، v ɒv xrɒb ʃdh، br zmjn xvɒhdnʃst v drvɒzh hɒj vj nɒlh v mɒtm xvɒhnd krd، v ɒv xrɒb ʃdh، br zmjn xvɒhdnʃst v dr آn rvz hft zn bh jk mrd mtmsk ʃdh، xvɒhnd ɡft «nɒn xvd rɒ xvɒhjm xvrd v rxt xvd rɒ xvɒhjm پvʃjd، fɣt nɒm tvbr mɒ xvɒndh ʃvd v ʔɒr mɒ rɒ brdɒr» dr آn rvz ʃɒxh xdɒvnd zjbɒ v d͡ʒljl vmjvh zmjn bh d͡ʒht nɒd͡ʒjɒn ɒsrɒئjl fxr v zjnt xvɒhd bvd v vɒɣʔ mj‌ʃvd kh hrkh dr shjvn bɒɣj mɒnd v hr‌kh dr ɒvrʃljm trk ʃvd mɣds xvɒndh xvɒhd ʃd jʔnj hrkh dr ɒvrʃljm drdftr hjɒt mktvb bɒʃd hŋɒmj kh xdɒvndt͡ʃrk dxtrɒn shjvn rɒ bʃvjd v xvn ɒvrʃljm rɒ bh rvh ɒnsɒf v rvh svxtɡj ɒz mjɒnʃ rfʔ nmɒjd، xdɒvnd br d͡ʒmjʔ msɒkn kvh shjvn vbr mhflhɒjʃ ɒbr v dvd dr rvz v drxʃndɡj آtʃ mʃtʔl dr ʃb xvɒhd آfrjd، zjrɒ kh brtmɒmj d͡ʒlɒl آn پvʃʃj xvɒhd bvdv dr vɣt rvz sɒjh bɒnj bh d͡ʒht sɒjh ɒz ɡrmɒ v bh d͡ʒht mld͡ʒɒء v پnɒhɡɒh ɒz tvfɒn v bɒrɒn xvɒhd bvd v dr vɣt rvz sɒjh bɒnj bh d͡ʒht sɒjh ɒz ɡrmɒ v bh d͡ʒht mld͡ʒɒء v پnɒhɡɒh ɒz tvfɒn v bɒrɒn xvɒhd bvd srvd mhbvb xvd rɒ drbɒrh tɒkstɒnʃ brɒj mhbvb xvd bsrɒjm v آn rɒ kndh ɒz sŋhɒ پɒk krdh v mvbhtrjn dr آn ɣrs nmvd v brd͡ʒj dr mjɒnʃ bnɒkrd v t͡ʃrxʃtj njz dr آn knd پs mntzr mj‌bvdtɒ ɒŋvr bjɒvrd ɒmɒ ɒŋvr bd آvrd پs ɒlɒn‌ɒj sɒknɒn ɒvrʃljm v mrdɒn jhvdɒ، dr mjɒn mn vtɒkstɒn mn hkm knjd brɒj tɒkstɒn mn djɡrt͡ʃh tvɒn krd kh dr آn nkrdm؟ پs t͡ʃvn mntzrbvdm kh ɒŋvr bjɒvrd t͡ʃrɒ ɒŋvr bd آvrd؟ lhzɒɒlɒn ʃmɒ rɒ ɒʔlɒm mj‌nmɒjm kh mn bh tɒkstɒn xvdt͡ʃh xvɒhm krd hsɒrʃ rɒ brmj dɒrm v t͡ʃrɒɡɒh xvɒhd ʃd؛ v djvɒrʃ rɒ mnhdm mj‌sɒzm vپɒjmɒl xvɒhd ɡrdjd v آn rɒ xrɒb mj‌knm kh nh پɒzʃ v nh kndh xvɒhd ʃd v xɒr v xs dr آn xvɒhd rvjjd، v ɒbrhɒ rɒ ɒmr mj‌frmɒjm kh br آn bɒrɒn nbɒrɒnd zjrɒ kh tɒkstɒn jhvh sbɒjvt xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl ɒst v mrdɒn jhvdɒ nhɒl ʃɒdmɒnj ɒv mj‌bɒʃnd v brɒj ɒnsɒf ɒntzɒrkʃjd v ɒjnk tʔdj v brɒj ʔdɒlt v ɒjnk frjɒdʃd vɒj br آnɒnj kh xɒnh rɒ bh xɒnh mlhɣ vmzrʔh rɒ bh mzrʔh mlsɣ sɒznd tɒ mkɒnj bɒɣj nmɒnd v ʃmɒ dr mjɒn zmjn bh tnhɒjj sɒkn mj‌ʃvjd jhvh sbɒjvt dr ɡvʃ mn ɡft «bh drstj kh xɒnh hɒj bsjɒr xrɒb xvɒhd ʃd، vxɒnh hɒj bzrɡ v xvʃ nmɒ ɣjrmskvn xvɒhdɡrdjd zjrɒ kh dh d͡ʒft ɡɒv zmjn jk bt xvɒhd آvrd v jk hvmr txm jk ɒjfh xvɒhddɒd» vɒj br آnɒnj kh sbh zvd brmj xjznd tɒdr‌پj mskrɒt brvnd، v ʃb djr mj‌nʃjnnd tɒʃrɒb ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɡrm nmɒjd v dr bzmhɒj ɒjʃɒn ʔvd v brbt v df v nɒj v ʃrɒb mj‌bɒʃd ɒmɒ bh fʔl xdɒvnd nzr nmj knnd v bh ʔml dsthɒj vj nmj ŋrnd bnɒbrɒjn ɣvm mn bh‌sbb ʔdm mʔrft ɒsjr ʃdh‌ɒnd v ʃrjfɒn ɒjʃɒn ɡrsnh vʔvɒm ɒjʃɒn ɒz tʃŋj xʃk ɡrdjdh ɒz ɒjn sbb hɒvjh hrs xvd rɒ zjɒd krdh v dhɒn xvjʃ rɒ bj‌hd bɒz nmvdh ɒst v d͡ʒlɒl vd͡ʒmhvr v ʃvkt ɒjʃɒn v hr‌kh dr ɒjʃɒn ʃɒdmɒn bɒʃd dr آn frv mj‌rvd v mrdm xm xvɒhndʃd v mrdɒn zljl xvɒhnd ɡrdjd v t͡ʃʃmɒn mtkbrɒn پst xvɒhd ʃd v jhvh sbɒjvt bh ɒnsɒf mtʔɒl xvɒhd bvd v xdɒj ɣdvs bh ʔdɒlt tɣdjs krdh xvɒhd ʃd آŋɒh brh hɒj ɣrbɒ dr mrtʔ hɒj ɒjʃɒn xvɒhnd t͡ʃrjdv ɣrjbɒn vjrɒnh hɒj پrvɒrjhɒj ɒjʃɒn rɒ xvɒhndxvrd vɒj brآnɒnj kh ʔsjɒn rɒ bh rjsmɒnhɒj btɒlt v ɡnɒh rɒ ɡvjɒ bh tnɒb ɒrɒbh mj‌kʃnd vmj ɡvjnd bɒʃd kh ɒv tʔd͡ʒjl nmvdh، kɒr xvd rɒbʃtɒbɒnd tɒ آn rɒ bbjnjm v mɣsvd ɣdvs ɒsrɒئjl nzdjk ʃdh، bjɒjd tɒ آn rɒ bdɒnjm vɒj br آnɒnj kh bdj rɒ njkvjj v njkvjj rɒ bdj mj‌nɒmnd، kh zlmt rɒ bh‌d͡ʒɒj nvr v nvr rɒ bh‌d͡ʒɒj zlmt mj‌ɡzɒrnd، v tlxj rɒ bh‌d͡ʒɒj ʃjrjnj v ʃjrjnj rɒ bh‌d͡ʒɒj tlxj mj‌nhnd vɒj brآnɒnj kh drnzr xvd hkjmnd، v پjʃ rvj xvd fhjm mj‌nmɒjnd vɒj br آnɒnj kh brɒj nvʃjdn ʃrɒb zvrآvrnd، v bh d͡ʒht mmzvd͡ʒ sɒxtn mskrɒt mrdɒn ɣvj mj‌bɒʃnd kh ʃrjrɒn rɒbrɒj rʃvh ʔɒdl mj‌ʃmɒrnd، v ʔdɒlt ʔɒdlɒn rɒɒz ɒjʃɒn brmj dɒrnd bnɒbrɒjn bh nhd͡ʒj kh ʃrɒrh آtʃ kɒh rɒ mj‌xvrd v ʔlf xʃk dr ʃʔlh mj‌ɒftd، hmt͡ʃnɒn rjʃh ɒjʃɒn ʔfvnt xvɒhd ʃd v ʃkvfh ɒjʃɒn msl ɣbɒr brɒfʃɒndh xvɒhd ɡrdjd t͡ʃvnkh ʃrjʔt jhvh sbɒjvt rɒtrk krdh، klɒm ɣdvs ɒsrɒئjl rɒ xvɒrʃmrdh‌ɒnd bnɒbrɒjn xʃm xdɒvnd br ɣvm xvdmʃtʔl ʃdh v dst xvd rɒ br ɒjʃɒn drɒz krdh، ɒjʃɒn rɒ mbtlɒ sɒxth ɒst v kvhhɒ blrzjdnd vlɒʃhɒj ɒjʃɒn dr mjɒn kvt͡ʃh‌hɒ msl fzlɒt ɡrdjdh‌ɒnd bɒ vd͡ʒvd ɒjn hmh، ɣzb ɒv brŋrdjdv dst vj tɒ knvn drɒz ɒst v ʔlmj bh d͡ʒht ɒmt hɒj bʔjd brپɒ xvɒhd krd v ɒz ɒɣsɒj zmjn brɒj ɒjʃɒn sfjr xvɒhd zd v ɒjʃɒn tʔd͡ʒjl nmvdh، bzvdj xvɒhnd آmd، v drmjɒn ɒjʃɒn ɒhdj xsth v lɣzʃ xvrndh nxvɒhd bvdv ɒhdj nh پjŋj xvɒhd zd v nh xvɒhd xvɒbjd v kmrbnd kmr ɒhdj ɒz ɒjʃɒn bɒz nʃdh، dvɒl nʔljn ɒhdj ɡsjxth nxvɒhd ʃd kh tjrhɒj ɒjʃɒn، tjz v tmɒmj kmɒnhɒj ɒjʃɒn، zdh ʃdh ɒst smhɒj ɒsbɒn ɒjʃɒn msl sŋ xɒrɒ vt͡ʃrxhɒj ɒjʃɒn msl ɡrdbɒd ʃmrdh xvɒhnd ʃd ɣrʃ ɒjʃɒn msl ʃjr mɒdh v mɒnnd ʃjrɒn ʒjɒn ɣrʃ xvɒhnd krd v ɒjʃɒn nʔrh xvɒhnd zdv sjd rɒ ɡrfth، bslɒmtj xvɒhnd brd vrhɒnndh‌ɒj nxvɒhd bvdv dr آn rvz brɒjʃɒn msl ʃvrʃ drjɒ ʃvrʃ xvɒhnd krd vɒɡr ksj bh zmjn bŋrd، ɒjnk tɒrjkj v tŋj ɒst v nvr dr ɒflɒk آn bh zlmt mbdl ʃdh ɒst v dr آn rvz brɒjʃɒn msl ʃvrʃ drjɒ ʃvrʃ xvɒhnd krd vɒɡr ksj bh zmjn bŋrd، ɒjnk tɒrjkj v tŋj ɒst v nvr dr ɒflɒk آn bh zlmt mbdl ʃdh ɒst dr sɒlj kh ʔzjɒ پɒdʃɒh mrd، xdɒvnd rɒdjdm kh br krsj blnd v ʔɒlj nʃsth bvd، v hjkl ɒz dɒmnhɒj vj پr bvd v srɒfjn bɒlɒj آn ɒjstɒdh bvdnd kh hr jk ɒz آnhɒ ʃʃ bɒl dɒʃt، v bɒ dv ɒz آnhɒ rvj xvd rɒ mj‌پvʃɒnjd v bɒdv پɒjhɒj xvd rɒ mj‌پvʃɒnjd v bɒ dv پrvɒzmj nmvd v jkj djɡrj rɒ sdɒ zdh، mj‌ɡft «ɣdvs ɣdvs ɣdvs jhvh sbɒjvt، tmɒmj zmjn ɒz d͡ʒlɒl ɒv mmlv ɒst» v ɒsɒs آstɒnh ɒzآvɒz ɒv kh sdɒ mj‌zd mj‌lrzjd v xɒnh ɒz dvd پrʃd پs ɡftm «vɒj br mn kh hlɒk ʃdh‌ɒm zjrɒkh mrd nɒپɒk lb hstm v dr mjɒn ɣvm nɒپɒk lb sɒknm v t͡ʃʃmɒnm jhvh sbɒjvt پɒdʃɒh rɒ djdh ɒst» آŋɒh jkj ɒz srɒfjn nzd mn پrjd v dr dst xvd ɒxɡrj kh bɒ ɒnbr ɒz rvj mzbh ɡrfth bvd، dɒʃt v آn rɒ br dhɒnm ɡzɒrdh، ɡft kh «ɒjnk ɒjn lbhɒjt rɒ lms krdh ɒst v ʔsjɒnt rfʔ ʃdh v ɡnɒht kfɒrh ɡʃth ɒst» آŋɒh آvɒz xdɒvnd rɒ ʃnjdm kh mj‌ɡft «kh rɒ bfrstm v kjst kh brɒj mɒ brvd؟» ɡftm «lbjk mrɒ bfrst» ɡft «brv v bh ɒjn ɣvm bɡv ɒlbth xvɒhjd ʃnjd، ɒmɒ nxvɒhjd fhmjd v hrآjnh xvɒhjd ŋrjst ɒmɒ drk nxvɒhjd krd dl ɒjn ɣvm rɒ frbh sɒz v ɡvʃhɒj ɒjʃɒn rɒ sŋjn nmɒ v t͡ʃʃmɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ bbnd، mbɒdɒ bɒ t͡ʃʃmɒn xvdbbjnnd v bɒ ɡvʃhɒj xvd bʃnvnd v bɒ dl xvd bfhmnd v bɒzɡʃt nmvdh، ʃfɒ jɒbnd» پs mn ɡftm «ɒj xdɒvnd tɒ bh kj؟» ɒv ɡft «tɒ vɣtj kh ʃhrhɒ vjrɒn ɡʃth، ɣjr mskvn bɒʃd v xɒnh hɒbdvn آdmj v zmjn xrɒb v vjrɒn ʃvd vxdɒvnd mrdmɒn rɒ dvr knd v dr mjɒn zmjn xrɒbjhɒj bsjɒr ʃvdɒmɒ bɒz ʔʃrj dr آn xvɒhd bvd v آn njz bɒr djɡr tlf xvɒhd ɡrdjdmsl drxt blvt v t͡ʃnɒr kh t͡ʃvn ɣtʔ mj‌ʃvdkndh آnhɒ bɒɣj mj‌mɒnd، hmt͡ʃnɒn zrjt mɣds kndh آn xvɒhd bvd» ɒmɒ bɒz ʔʃrj dr آn xvɒhd bvd v آn njz bɒr djɡr tlf xvɒhd ɡrdjdmsl drxt blvt v t͡ʃnɒr kh t͡ʃvn ɣtʔ mj‌ʃvdkndh آnhɒ bɒɣj mj‌mɒnd، hmt͡ʃnɒn zrjt mɣds kndh آn xvɒhd bvd» v dr ɒjɒm آhɒz bn jvtɒm bn ʔzjɒ پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ، vɒɣʔ ʃd kh rsjn، پɒdʃɒh آrɒm vfɣh bn rmljɒ پɒdʃɒh ɒsrɒئjl br ɒvrʃljm brآmdndtɒ bɒ آn d͡ʒŋ nmɒjnd، ɒmɒ ntvɒnstnd آn rɒ fth nmɒjnd v bh xɒndɒn dɒvd xbr dɒdh، ɡftnd kh ɒrɒm dr ɒfrɒjm ɒrdv zdh‌ɒnd v dl ɒv v dl mrdmɒnʃ blrzjd bh tvrj kh drxtɒn d͡ʒŋl ɒz bɒd mj‌lrzd آŋɒh xdɒvnd bh ɒʃʔjɒ ɡft «tv bɒ پsr xvdʃɒrjɒʃvb bh ɒnthɒj ɣnɒt brkh fvɣɒnj bh rɒh mzrʔh ɡɒzr bh ɒstɣbɒl آhɒz bjrvn ʃv v vj rɒbɡv bɒhzr v آrɒm bɒʃ mtrs v dlt zʔjf nʃvd ɒz ɒjn dv‌dm mʃʔl dvdɒfʃɒn، jʔnj ɒzʃdt xʃm rsjn v ɒrɒm v پsr rmljɒ zjrɒ kh ɒrɒm bɒ ɒfrɒjm v پsr rmljɒ brɒj zrr tv mʃvrt krdh، mj‌ɡvjnd br jhvdɒ brآjjm v آn rɒmhɒsrh krdh، bh d͡ʒht xvjʃtn tsxjr nmɒjjm v پsr tbئjl rɒ dr آn bh پɒdʃɒhj nsb knjm» xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd kh «ɒjn bd͡ʒɒ آvrdh nmj ʃvd v vɒɣʔ nxvɒhd ɡrdjd zjrɒ kh srɒrɒm، dmʃɣ v sr dmʃɣ، rsjn ɒst v bʔd ɒzʃst v پnd͡ʒ sɒl ɒfrɒjm ʃksth mj‌ʃvd bh tvrj kh djɡr ɣvmj nxvɒhd bvd v sr ɒfrɒjm sɒmrh v sr sɒmrh پsr rmljɒ ɒst v ɒɡr bɒvrnknjd hrآjnh sɒbt nxvɒhjd mɒnd» v xdɒvnd bɒr djɡr آhɒz rɒ xtɒb krdh، ɡft «آjtj bh d͡ʒht xvd ɒz jhvh xdɒjt btlb آn rɒ jɒ ɒz ʔmɣ‌hɒ btlb jɒ ɒz ɒʔlj ʔljjn bɒlɒ» آhɒz ɡft «nmj tlbm v xdɒvnd rɒɒmthɒn nxvɒhm nmvd» ɡft «ɒj xɒndɒn dɒvd bʃnvjd آjɒ ʃmɒ rɒt͡ʃjzj shl ɒst kh mrdmɒn rɒ bjzɒr knjd blkh mj‌xvɒhjd xdɒj mrɒ njz bjzɒr knjd bnɒbrɒjn xvd xdɒvnd bh ʃmɒ آjtj xvɒhd dɒd ɒjnk bɒkrh hɒmlh ʃdh، پsrj xvɒhd zɒjjd v nɒm ɒv rɒʔmɒnvئjl xvɒhd xvɒnd krh v ʔsl xvɒhdxvrd tɒ آnkh trk krdn bdj v ɒxtjɒr krdn xvbj rɒ bdɒnd zjrɒ ɣbl ɒz آnkh پsr، trk nmvdn bdj v ɒxtjɒr krdn xvbj rɒ bdɒnd، zmjnj kh ʃmɒ ɒz hr dv پɒdʃɒh آn mj‌trsjd، mtrvk xvɒhd ʃd xdɒvnd br tv v br ɣvmt v brxɒndɒn پdrt ɒjɒmj rɒ xvɒhd آvrd kh ɒz ɒjɒmj kh ɒfrɒjm ɒz jhvdɒ d͡ʒdɒ ʃd tɒ hɒl njɒmdh bɒʃdjʔnj پɒdʃɒh آʃvr rɒ» v dr آn rvz vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd kh xdɒvnd brɒj mɡshɒjj kh bh knɒrh hɒj nhrhɒj msrnd v znbvrhɒjj kh drzmjn آʃvrnd sfjr xvɒhd zd v tmɒmj آnhɒbrآmdh، dr vɒdjhɒj vjrɒn v ʃkɒfhɒj sxrh vbr hmh bvth hɒj xɒrdɒr v br hmh mrtʔ‌hɒ frvd xvɒhnd آmd v dr آn rvz xdɒvnd bh vɒsth ɒstrh‌ɒj kh ɒz mɒvrɒj nhr ɒd͡ʒjr mj‌ʃvd jʔnj bh vɒsth پɒdʃɒh آʃvr mvj sr v mvj پɒjhɒ rɒxvɒhd trɒʃjd v rjʃ hm strdh xvɒhd ʃd v dr آn rvz vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd kh ʃxsj jk ɡɒv d͡ʒvɒn v dv ɡvsfnd zndh ŋɒh xvɒhd dɒʃt v ɒz frɒvɒnj ʃjrj kh mj‌dhnd krh xvɒhdxvrd zjrɒ hrkh dr mjɒn zmjn bɒɣj mɒnd xvrɒkʃ krh v ʔsl xvɒhd bvd v dr آn rvz hr mkɒnj kh hzɒr mv bh d͡ʒht hzɒr پɒrh nɣrh dɒdh mj‌ʃd پrɒz xɒr v xs xvɒhd bvd bɒ tjrhɒ v kmɒnhɒmrdm bh آnd͡ʒɒ xvɒhnd آmd zjrɒ kh tmɒmj zmjn پrɒz xɒr v xs xvɒhd ʃdv d͡ʒmjʔ kvhhɒjj kh bɒ bjl kndh mj‌ʃd، ɒz trs xɒr v xs bh آnd͡ʒɒnxvɒhnd آmd blkh ɡɒvɒn rɒ bh آnd͡ʒɒ xvɒhndfrstɒd v ɡvsfndɒn آn rɒ پɒjmɒl xvɒhnd krd v d͡ʒmjʔ kvhhɒjj kh bɒ bjl kndh mj‌ʃd، ɒz trs xɒr v xs bh آnd͡ʒɒnxvɒhnd آmd blkh ɡɒvɒn rɒ bh آnd͡ʒɒ xvɒhndfrstɒd v ɡvsfndɒn آn rɒ پɒjmɒl xvɒhnd krd v xdɒvnd mrɒ ɡft «lvhj bzrɡ bh d͡ʒht xvd bɡjr v br آn bɒ ɣlm ɒnsɒn brɒj mhjrʃlɒl hɒʃ bz bnvjs v mn ʃhvd ɒmjn jʔnj ɒvrjɒj kɒhn v zkrjɒ ɒbn jbrkjɒ rɒ bh d͡ʒht xvdbrɒj ʃhɒdt mj‌ɡjrm» پs mn bh nbjh nzdjkj krdm v ɒv hɒmlh ʃdh، پsrj zɒjjd آŋɒh xdɒvnd bh mn ɡft «ɒv rɒmhjr ʃlɒl hɒʃ bz bnɒm، zjrɒ ɣbl ɒz آnkh tfl btvɒnd‌ɒj پdrm v‌ɒj mɒdrm bɡvjd، ɒmvɒl dmʃɣ vɣnjmt sɒmrh rɒ پjʃ پɒdʃɒh آʃvr bh jɣmɒxvɒhnd brd» v xdɒvnd bɒr djɡr mrɒ bɒz xtɒb krdh، ɡft «t͡ʃvnkh ɒjn ɣvm آbhɒj ʃjlvh rɒ kh bh mlɒjmt d͡ʒɒrj mj‌ʃvd xvɒr ʃmrdh، ɒz rsjn vپsr rmljɒ msrvr ʃdh‌ɒnd، bnɒbrɒjn ɒjnk xdɒvnd آbhɒj zvrآvr bsjɒr nhr jʔnj پɒdʃɒh آʃvr v tmɒmj hʃmt ɒv rɒ br ɒjʃɒn brxvɒhdآvrd v ɒv ɒz d͡ʒmjʔ d͡ʒvjhɒj xvd brxvɒhd آmd vɒz tmɒmj knɒrh hɒj xvjʃ srʃɒr xvɒhd ʃd، v br jhvdɒ td͡ʒɒvz nmvdh، sjlɒn krdh، ʔbvrxvɒhd nmvd tɒ آnkh bh ɡrdnhɒ brsd v bɒlhɒj xvdrɒ پhn krdh، tvl v ʔrz vlɒjtt rɒ‌ɒj ʔmɒnvئjl پr xvɒhd sɒxt» bh hjd͡ʒɒn آjjd‌ɒj ɣvmhɒ v ʃkst xvɒhjdjɒft v ɡvʃ ɡjrjd‌ɒj ɒɣsɒj zmjn v kmr xvdrɒ bbndjd v ʃkst xvɒhjd jɒft kmr xvd rɒbbndjd v ʃkst xvɒhjd jɒft bɒ hm mʃvrt knjd v bɒtl xvɒhd ʃd v sxn ɡvjjd vbd͡ʒɒ آvrdh nxvɒhd ʃd zjrɒ xdɒ bɒ mɒ ɒst t͡ʃvnkh xdɒvnd bɒ dst ɣvj bh mn t͡ʃnjn ɡft v mrɒ tʔljm dɒd kh bh rɒh ɒjn ɣvm slvk nnmɒjm vɡft «hrآnt͡ʃh rɒ kh ɒjn ɣvm ftnh mj‌nɒmnd، ʃmɒ آn rɒ ftnh nnɒmjd v ɒz trs ɒjʃɒn trsɒn vxɒئf mbɒʃjd jhvh sbɒjvt rɒ tɣdjs nmɒjjd v ɒv trs v xvf ʃmɒ bɒʃd v ɒvbrɒj ʃmɒ mkɒn mɣds xvɒhd bvd ɒmɒ brɒj hrdv xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl sŋ msɒdm v sxrh lɣzʃ dhndh v brɒj sɒknɒn ɒvrʃljm dɒm v tlh vbsjɒrj ɒz ɒjʃɒn lɣzʃ xvrdh، xvɒhnd ɒftɒd vʃksth ʃdh v bdɒm ɒftɒdh، ɡrftɒr xvɒhnd ɡrdjd» ʃhɒdt rɒ bh hm bپjt͡ʃ v ʃrjʔt rɒ drʃɒɡrdɒnm mxtvm sɒz v mn brɒj xdɒvnd kh rvj xvd rɒ ɒz xɒndɒn jʔɣvb mxfj mj‌sɒzdɒntzɒr kʃjdh، ɒmjdvɒr ɒv xvɒhm bvd ɒjnk mn v پsrɒnj kh xdɒvnd bh mn dɒdh ɒst، ɒz d͡ʒɒnb jhvh sbɒjvt kh dr kvh shjvn sɒkn ɒst bh d͡ʒht ɒsrɒئjl آjɒt v ʔlɒmɒt hstjm vt͡ʃvn ɒjʃɒn bh ʃmɒ ɡvjnd kh ɒz ɒshɒb ɒd͡ʒnh vd͡ʒɒdvɡrɒnj kh d͡ʒjk d͡ʒjk v zmzm mj‌knnd svɒl knjd، ɡvjjd «آjɒ ɣvm ɒz xdɒj xvd svɒl nnmɒjnd v آjɒ ɒz mrdɡɒn bh d͡ʒht zndɡɒn svɒl bɒjd nmvd؟» bh ʃrjʔt v ʃhɒdt tvd͡ʒh nmɒjjd vɒɡr mvɒfɣ ɒjn klɒm sxn ŋvjnd، پs brɒj ɒjʃɒn rvʃnɒjj nxvɒhd bvd v bɒ ʔsrt v ɡrsŋj dr آn xvɒhnd ɡʃt v hŋɒmj kh ɡrsnh ʃvnd xvjʃtn rɒ mʃvʃ xvɒhnd sɒxt v پɒdʃɒh v xdɒj xvd rɒ lʔnt krdh، bh bɒlɒxvɒhnd ŋrjstv bh zmjn nzr xvɒhndɒndɒxt v ɒjnk tŋj v tɒrjkj v zlmt پrjʃɒnj xvɒhd bvd v bh tɒrjkj ɣljz rɒndh xvɒhnd ʃd v bh zmjn nzr xvɒhndɒndɒxt v ɒjnk tŋj v tɒrjkj v zlmt پrjʃɒnj xvɒhd bvd v bh tɒrjkj ɣljz rɒndh xvɒhnd ʃd ljkn brɒj ɒv kh dr tŋj mj‌bvd، tɒrjkj nxvɒhd ʃd dr zmɒn پjʃjn zmjn zbvlvn vzmjn nftɒlj rɒ zljl sɒxt، ɒmɒ dr zmɒn آxr آn rɒ bh rɒh drjɒ bh آn trf ɒrdn dr d͡ʒljl ɒmt hɒmhtrm xvɒhd ɡrdɒnjd ɣvmj kh dr tɒrjkj sɒlk mj‌bvdnd، nvr ʔzjmj xvɒhnd djd v br sɒknɒn zmjn sɒjh mvt nvr sɒtʔ xvɒhd ʃd tv ɣvm rɒ bsjɒr sɒxth، ʃɒdj ɒjʃɒn rɒ zjɒdɡrdɒnjdj bh hzvr tv ʃɒdj xvɒhnd krd msl ʃɒdmɒnj vɣt drv v mɒnnd ksɒnj kh dr tɣsjm nmvdn ɣnjmt vd͡ʒd mj‌nmɒjnd zjrɒ kh jvɣ bɒrɒv rɒ v ʔsɒj ɡrdnʃ jʔnj ʔsɒj d͡ʒfɒ knndh vj rɒ ʃkstj t͡ʃnɒnkh dr rvz mdjɒn krdj zjrɒ hmh ɒslhh mslhɒn dr ɣvɣɒ ɒst vrxvt ɒjʃɒn bh xvn آɣʃth ɒst ɒmɒ brɒj svxtn v hjzm آtʃ xvɒhnd bvd zjrɒ kh brɒj mɒ vldj zɒjjdh v پsrj bh mɒ bxʃjdh ʃd vsltnt br dvʃ ɒv xvɒhd bvd v ɒsm ɒv ʔd͡ʒjb vmʃjr v xdɒj ɣdjr v پdr srmdj v srvrslɒmtj xvɒndh xvɒhd ʃd trɣj sltnt vslɒmtj ɒv rɒ br krsj dɒvd v br mmlkt vj ɒnthɒnxvɒhd bvd tɒ آn rɒ bh ɒnsɒf v ʔdɒlt ɒz ɒlɒn tɒɒbdɒlɒbɒd sɒbt v ɒstvɒr nmɒjd ɣjrt jhvh sbɒjvt ɒjn rɒ bd͡ʒɒ xvɒhd آvrd xdɒvnd klɒmj nzd jʔɣvb frstɒd v آn brɒsrɒئjl vɒɣʔ ɡrdjd v tmɒmj ɣvm xvɒhnddɒnst jʔnj ɒfrɒjm v sɒknɒn sɒmrh kh ɒz ɣrvr vtkbr dl xvd mj‌ɡvjnd xʃthɒ ɒftɒdh ɒst ɒmɒbɒ sŋhɒj trɒʃjdh bnɒ xvɒhjm nmvd؛ t͡ʃvbhɒj ɒfrɒɣ dr hm ʃkst ɒmɒ srv آzɒd bd͡ʒɒj آnhɒmj ɡzɒrjm bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd dʃmnɒn rsjn rɒbzd ɒv xvɒhd brɒfrɒʃt v xsmɒn ɒv rɒ xvɒhdbrɒŋjxt ɒrɒmjɒn rɒ ɒz mʃrɣ v flstjnjɒn rɒɒz mɣrb v ɒjʃɒn ɒsrɒئjl rɒ bɒ dhɒn ɡʃvdh xvɒhnd xvrd ɒmɒ bɒ ɒjn hmh xʃm ɒv brɡrdɒnjdh nʃdh v dst ɒv hnvz drɒz ɒst v ɒjn ɣvm bsvj znndh xvdʃɒn bɒzɡʃt nnmvdh v jhvh sbɒjvt rɒ ntlbjdh‌ɒnd bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd sr vdm v nxl v nj rɒ ɒz ɒsrɒئjl dr jk rvz xvɒhdbrjd mrd پjr v mrd ʃrjf sr ɒst v nbj‌ɒj kh tʔljm drvɣ mj‌dhd، dm mj‌bɒʃd zjrɒ kh hɒdjɒn ɒjn ɣvm ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɡmrɒh mj‌knnd v پjrvɒn ɒjʃɒn blʔjdh mj‌ʃvnd ɒz ɒjn sbb xdɒvnd ɒz d͡ʒvɒnɒn ɒjʃɒn msrvr nxvɒhd ʃd v br jtjmɒn v bjvh‌znɒn ɒjʃɒn trhm nxvɒhd nmvd t͡ʃvnkh d͡ʒmjʔ ɒjʃɒn mnɒfɣ vʃrjrnd v hr dhɒnj bh hmɒɣt mtklm mj‌ʃvd bɒɒjnhmh ɣzb ɒv brɡrdɒnjdh nʃdh v dst ɒv hnvzdrɒz ɒst zjrɒ kh ʃrɒrt msl آtʃ mj‌svzɒnd v xɒr v xs rɒ mj‌xvrd، v drbvth hɒj d͡ʒŋl ɒfrvxth ʃdh، dvd ɣljz پjt͡ʃɒn mj‌ʃvd ɒz ɣzb jhvh sbɒjvt zmjn svxth ʃdh ɒst v ɣvm hjzm آtʃ ɡʃth‌ɒnd v ksj brbrɒdr xvd ʃfɣt ndɒrd ɒz d͡ʒɒnb rɒst mj‌rbɒjnd v ɡrsnh mj‌mɒnnd v ɒz trf t͡ʃپ mj‌xvrnd v sjr nmj ʃvnd v hrks ɡvʃt bɒzvj xvd rɒ mj‌xvrdmnsj ɒfrɒjm rɒ vɒfrɒjm mnsj rɒ v hr dvj ɒjʃɒn bzd jhvdɒ mthdmj ʃvnd bɒ ɒjnhmh ɣzb ɒv brɡrdɒnjdh nʃdh vdst ɒv hnvz drɒz ɒst mnsj ɒfrɒjm rɒ vɒfrɒjm mnsj rɒ v hr dvj ɒjʃɒn bzd jhvdɒ mthdmj ʃvnd bɒ ɒjnhmh ɣzb ɒv brɡrdɒnjdh nʃdh vdst ɒv hnvz drɒz ɒst vɒj br آnɒnj kh ɒhkɒm ɣjr ʔɒdlh rɒd͡ʒɒrj mj‌sɒznd v kɒtbɒnj kh zlm rɒmrɣvm mj‌dɒrnd، tɒ mskjnɒn rɒ ɒz dɒvrj mnhrf sɒznd v hɣ fɣjrɒn ɣvm mrɒ brbɒjnd tɒ آnkh bjvh‌znɒn ɣɒrt ɒjʃɒn bʃvnd v jtjmɒn rɒtɒrɒd͡ʒ nmɒjnd پs dr rvz bɒzxvɒst dr hjnj kh xrɒbj ɒz dvr mj‌آjd، t͡ʃh xvɒhjd krd vbsvj kh brɒj mʔɒvnt xvɒhjd ɡrjxt v d͡ʒlɒl xvd rɒ kd͡ʒɒ xvɒhjd ɒndɒxt؟ ɣjr ɒz آnkh zjrɒsjrɒn xm ʃvnd v zjr kʃtɡɒn bjftnd bɒ ɒjnhmh ɣzb ɒv brɡrdɒnjdh nʃdh v dst ɒv hnvz drɒzɒst vɒj br آʃvr kh ʔsɒj ɣzb mn ɒst vʔsɒjj kh dr dst ɒjʃɒn ɒst xʃm mn mj‌bɒʃd ɒv rɒ br ɒmt mnɒfɣ mj‌frstm v nzd ɣvm mɣzvb xvd mɒmvr mj‌dɒrm، tɒ ɣnjmtj brbɒjndv ɣɒrtj bbrnd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ msl ɡl kvt͡ʃh‌hɒ پɒjmɒl sɒznd ɒmɒ ɒv t͡ʃnjn ɡmɒn nmj knd v dlʃ bdjŋvnh ɣjɒs nmj nmɒjd، blkh mrɒd dlʃ ɒjn ɒst kh ɒmt hɒj bsjɒr rɒ hlɒk v mnɣtʔ bsɒzd zjrɒ mj‌ɡvjd آjɒ srdɒrɒn mn d͡ʒmjʔ پɒdʃɒh njstnd؟ آjɒ klnv msl krkmjʃ njst v آjɒhmɒt msl ɒrfɒd nj، v آjɒ sɒmrh mɒnnd dmʃɣ nmj bɒʃd؟ t͡ʃnɒnkh dst mn br mmɒlk bthɒɒstjlɒ jɒft v bthɒj trɒʃjdh آnhɒ ɒz bthɒj ɒvrʃljm v sɒmrh bjʃtr bvdnd پs آjɒ bh nhd͡ʒj kh bh sɒmrh v bthɒjʃ ʔml nmvdm bh ɒvrʃljm v bthɒjʃ t͡ʃnjn ʔml nxvɒhm nmvd؟ v vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd bʔd ɒz آnkh xdɒvndtmɒmj kɒr xvd rɒ bɒ kvh shjvn v ɒvrʃljm bh ɒnd͡ʒɒm rsɒnjdh bɒʃd kh mn ɒz smrh dl mɣrvrپɒdʃɒh آʃvr v ɒz fxr t͡ʃʃmɒn mtkbr vj ɒntɣɒm xvɒhm kʃjd zjrɒ mj‌ɡvjd «bh ɣvt dst xvd v bh hkmt xvjʃ t͡ʃvnkh fhjm hstm ɒjn rɒ krdm v hdvd ɣvmhɒ rɒ mntɣl sɒxtm v xzɒjn ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɣɒrt nmvdm v msl d͡ʒbɒr srvrɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh zjr ɒndɒxtm v dst mn dvlt ɣvm‌hɒ rɒmsl آʃjɒnh‌ɒj ɡrfth ɒst v bh tvrj kh txmhɒj mtrvk rɒ d͡ʒmʔ knnd mn tmɒmj zmjn rɒd͡ʒmʔ krdm v ksj nbvd kh bɒl rɒ bd͡ʒnbɒnd jɒ dhɒn xvd rɒ bɡʃɒjd jɒ d͡ʒk d͡ʒk bnmɒjd» آjɒ tbr br ksj‌kh bh آn mj‌ʃknd fxrxvɒhd nmvd jɒ ɒrh br ksj‌kh آn rɒ mj‌kʃdɒftxɒr xvɒhd krd، kh ɡvjɒ ʔsɒ blnd knndh xvdrɒ bd͡ʒnbɒnd jɒ t͡ʃvb dst آnt͡ʃh rɒ kh t͡ʃvb nbɒʃdblnd nmɒjd؟ bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd jhvh sbɒjvt brfrbhɒn ɒv lɒɣrj xvɒhd frstɒd v zjr d͡ʒlɒl ɒvsvxtnj msl svxtn آtʃ ɒfrvxth xvɒhd ʃd v nvr ɒsrɒئjl nɒr v ɣdvs vj ʃʔlh xvɒhdʃd، v dr jkrvz xɒr v xsʃ rɒ svzɒnjdh، xvɒhd xvrd v ʃvkt d͡ʒŋl v bstɒn ɒv hm rvh v hm bdn rɒ tbɒh xvɒhd sɒxt v msl ɡdɒxtn mrjz xvɒhd ʃd v bɣjh drxtɒn vd͡ʒŋlʃ ɣljl ɒlʔdd xvɒhd bvd kh tflj آnhɒ rɒsbt tvɒnd krd v dr آn rvz vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd kh bɣjh ɒsrɒئjl v nɒd͡ʒjɒn xɒndɒn jʔɣvb bɒr djɡr brznndh xvdʃɒn ɒʔtmɒd nxvɒhnd nmvd blkh brxdɒvnd kh ɣdvs ɒsrɒئjl ɒst bh ɒxlɒs ɒʔtmɒd xvɒhnd nmvd v bɣjh‌ɒj jʔnj bɣjh jʔɣvb bsvj xdɒj ɣɒdr mtlɣ bɒzɡʃt xvɒhnd krd zjrɒ hrt͡ʃnd ɣvm tv ɒsrɒئjl msl rjɡ drjɒ bɒʃnd fɣt ɒz ɒjʃɒn bɣjtj bɒzɡʃt xvɒhnd nmvd hlɒktj kh mɣdr ɒst bh ʔdɒlt md͡ʒrɒ xvɒhd ʃd zjrɒ xdɒvnd jhvh sbɒjvt hlɒkt v tɣdjrj dr mjɒn tmɒm zmjn bh ʔml xvɒhd آvrd bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «ɒj ɣvm mn kh dr shjvn sɒknjdɒz آʃvr mtrsjd، ɒɡr‌t͡ʃh ʃmɒ rɒ bh t͡ʃvb bznd vʔsɒj xvd rɒ msl msrjɒn br ʃmɒ blnd nmɒjd zjrɒ bʔd ɒz zmɒn bsjɒr kmj ɣzb tmɒm xvɒhd ʃd v xʃm mn brɒj hlɒkt ɒjʃɒn xvɒhd bvd» v jhvh sbɒjvt tɒzjɒnh‌ɒj br vj xvɒhd brɒŋjxt t͡ʃnɒnkh dr kʃtɒr mdjɒn brsxrh ɣrɒb v ʔsɒj ɒv br drjɒ xvɒhd bvd vآn rɒ blnd xvɒhd krd bh tvrj kh br msrjɒn krdh bvd v dr آn rvz vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd kh bɒrɒv ɒz dvʃ tv v jvɣ ɒv ɒz ɡrdn tv rfʔ xvɒhd ʃdv jvɣ ɒz frbhj ɡssth xvɒhd ʃd ɒv bh ʔjɒt rsjd v ɒz md͡ʒrvn ɡzʃt v drmkmɒʃ ɒsbɒb xvd rɒ ɡzɒʃt ɒz mʔbr ʔbvrkrdnd v dr d͡ʒbʔ mnzl ɡzjdnd، ɒhl rɒmh kvʃkhɒj xvʃ nmɒ sdɒ xvɒhnd zd v zmɒnʃ nzdjk ɒst kh brsd v rvzhɒjʃ tvl nxvɒhd kʃjd v ʃɣɒlhɒdr ɣsrhɒj ɒjʃɒn v ɡrɡhɒ dr kvʃkhɒj xvʃ nmɒ sdɒ xvɒhnd zd v zmɒnʃ nzdjk ɒst kh brsd v rvzhɒjʃ tvl nxvɒhd kʃjd zjrɒ xdɒvnd br jʔɣvb trhm frmvdh، ɒsrɒئjl rɒ bɒr djɡr xvɒhd brɡzjd vɒjʃɒn rɒ dr zmjnʃɒn آrɒmj xvɒhd dɒd v ɣrbɒ bɒɒjʃɒn mlhɣ ʃdh، bɒ xɒndɒn jʔɣvb mlsɣ xvɒhnd ɡrdjd v ɣvm‌hɒ ɒjʃɒn rɒ brdɒʃth، bh mkɒn xvdʃɒn xvɒhnd‌آvrd v xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl ɒjʃɒn rɒ dr zmjn xdɒvnd brɒj bndɡj v knjzj، mmlvk xvd xvɒhnd sɒxt v ɒsjrknndɡɒn xvd rɒ ɒsjr krdh، br stmkɒrɒn xvjʃ hkmrɒnj xvɒhnd nmvd v dr rvzj kh xdɒvnd tv rɒ srvhɒj آzɒd lbnɒn drbɒrh tvʃɒdmɒn ʃdh، mj‌ɡvjnd «ɒz zmɒnj kh tvxvɒbjdh‌ɒj ɣtʔ knndh‌ɒj br mɒ brnjɒmdh ɒst» hɒvjh ɒz zjr brɒj tv mthrk ɒst tɒ t͡ʃvn bjɒjj tv rɒ ɒstɣbɒl nmɒjd، v mrdɡɒn jʔnj d͡ʒmjʔ bzrɡɒn zmjn rɒ brɒj tv bjdɒr mj‌sɒzd v d͡ʒmjʔ پɒdʃɒhɒn ɒmt‌hɒ rɒ ɒz krsjhɒj ɒjʃɒn brmj dɒrd d͡ʒmjʔ ɒjnhɒ tv rɒ xtɒb krdh، mj‌ɡvjnd «آjɒtv njz msl mɒ zʔjf ʃdh‌ɒj v mɒnnd mɒɡrdjdh‌ɒj» d͡ʒlɒl tv v sdɒj brbthɒj tv bh hɒvjh frvd ʃdh ɒst krmhɒ zjr tv ɡstrɒnjdh ʃdh v mvrhɒ tv rɒ mj‌پvʃɒnnd ‌ɒj zhrh dxtrsbh t͡ʃɡvnh ɒz آsmɒn ɒftɒdh‌ɒj؟ ɒj kh ɒmt‌hɒ rɒzljl mj‌sɒxtj t͡ʃɡvnh bh zmjn ɒfkndh ʃdh‌ɒj؟ v tv dr dl xvd mj‌ɡftj «bh آsmɒn sʔvdnmvdh، krsj xvd rɒ bɒlɒj stɒrɡɒn xdɒ xvɒhm ɒfrɒʃt v br kvh ɒd͡ʒtmɒʔ dr ɒtrɒf ʃmɒl d͡ʒlvs xvɒhm nmvd bɒlɒj blndjhɒj ɒbrhɒ sʔvd krdh، msl hzrt ɒʔlj xvɒhm ʃd» lkn bh hɒvjh ʃhrhɒjʃ rɒ mnhdm mj‌sɒxt v ɒsjrɒn xvdrɒ bh xɒnh hɒj ɒjʃɒn rhɒ nmj krd؟» hmh پɒdʃɒhɒn ɒmt‌hɒ d͡ʒmjʔ hr jk dr xɒnh xvd bɒ d͡ʒlɒl mj‌xvɒbnd ɒmɒ tv ɒz ɣbr xvdbjrvn ɒfkndh mj‌ʃvj v msl ʃɒxh mkrvh vmɒnnd lbɒs kʃtɡɒnj kh bɒ ʃmʃjr zdh ʃdh bɒʃnd، kh bh sŋhɒj hfrh frv mj‌rvnd v msl lɒʃh پɒjmɒl ʃdh bɒ ɒjʃɒn dr dfn mthdnxvɒhj bvd t͡ʃvnkh zmjn xvd rɒ vjrɒn krdh، ɣvm xvjʃ rɒ kʃth‌ɒj zrjt ʃrjrɒn tɒ bh ɒbd mzkvrnxvɒhnd ʃd brɒj پsrɒnʃ bh‌sbb ɡnɒh پdrɒn ɒjʃɒn ɣtl rɒ mhjɒ sɒzjd، tɒ ɒjʃɒn brnxjznd v dr zmjn tsrf nnmɒjnd v rvj rbʔ mskvn rɒ ɒz ʃhrhɒ پr nsɒznd v jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd «mn bh zdɒjʃɒn xvɒhm brxɒst» v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd «ɒsm v bɣjh rɒ v nsl v zrjt rɒ ɒz bɒbl mnɣtʔ xvɒhm sɒxt v آn rɒ nsjb xɒrپʃthɒ v xlɒbhɒj آb xvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd v آn rɒbɒ d͡ʒɒrvb hlɒkt xvɒhm rft» jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd jhvh sbɒjvt ɣsm xvrdh، mj‌ɡvjd «jɣjn bh tvrj kh ɣsd nmvdh‌ɒm hmt͡ʃnɒn vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd v bh nhd͡ʒj kh tɣdjr krdh‌ɒm hmt͡ʃnɒn bd͡ʒɒ آvrdh xvɒhd ɡʃt v آʃvr rɒ dr zmjn xvdm xvɒhm ʃkst v ɒv rɒ br kvhhɒj xvjʃ پɒjmɒl xvɒhm krd v jvɣ ɒv ɒz ɒjʃɒn rfʔ ʃdh، bɒr vj ɒz ɡrdn ɒjʃɒn brdɒʃth xvɒhd ʃd» tɣdjrj kh br tmɒmj zmjn mɣdr ɡʃth، ɒjn ɒst v dstj kh br d͡ʒmjʔ ɒmt‌hɒ drɒz ʃdh، hmjn ɒst zjrɒ kh jhvh sbɒjvt tɣdjrnmvdh ɒst، پs kjst kh آn rɒ bɒtl ɡrdɒnd؟ vdst ɒvst kh drɒz ʃdh ɒst پs kjst kh آn rɒ brɡrdɒnd؟ dr sɒlj kh آhɒz پɒdʃɒh mrd ɒjn vhj nɒzl ʃd ‌ɒj d͡ʒmjʔ flstjn ʃɒdj mkn ɒz ɒjnkh ʔsɒjj kh tv rɒ mj‌zd ʃksth ʃdh ɒst zjrɒ kh ɒz rjʃh mɒr ɒfʔj bjrvn mj‌آjd v ntjd͡ʒh ɒv ɒʒdhɒj آtʃjn پrndh xvɒhd bvd v nxst zɒdɡɒn mskjnɒn xvɒhnd t͡ʃrjd v fɣjrɒn dr ɒtmjnɒn xvɒhnd xvɒbjd v rjʃh tv rɒ bɒ ɣhtj xvɒhm kʃt v bɒɣj mɒndɡɒn tv mɣtvl xvɒhnd ʃd ‌ɒj drvɒzh vlvlh nmɒ v‌ɒj ʃhr frjɒd brآvr ɒj tmɒmj flstjn tv ɡdɒxth xvɒhj ʃd zjrɒkh ɒz trf ʃmɒl dvd mj‌آjd v ɒz sfvf vj ksj dvr nxvɒhd ɒftɒdپs bh rsvlɒn ɒmt hɒt͡ʃh d͡ʒvɒb dɒdh ʃvd «ɒjnkh xdɒvnd shjvn rɒbnjɒd nhɒdh ɒst v mskjnɒn ɣvm vj dr آn پnɒh xvɒhnd brd» پs bh rsvlɒn ɒmt hɒt͡ʃh d͡ʒvɒb dɒdh ʃvd «ɒjnkh xdɒvnd shjvn rɒbnjɒd nhɒdh ɒst v mskjnɒn ɣvm vj dr آn پnɒh xvɒhnd brd» vhj drbɒrh mvآb zjrɒ kh dr ʃbj ʔɒr mvآb xrɒb vhlɒk ʃdh ɒst zjrɒ dr ʃbj ɣjr mvآb xrɒb vhlɒk ʃdh ɒst bh btkdh v djbvn bh mkɒn hɒj blnd bh d͡ʒht ɡrjstn brآmdh‌ɒnd mvآb brɒj nbvv mjdbɒ vlvlh mj‌knd br sr hrjkj ɒz ɒjʃɒn ɡrj ɒst v rjʃhɒj hmh trɒʃjdh ʃdh ɒst drkvt͡ʃh hɒj xvd kmr xvd rɒ bh پlɒs mj‌bndnd vbr پʃt bɒmhɒ v dr t͡ʃhɒrsvhɒj xvd hrks vlvlh mj‌nmɒjd v ɒʃkhɒ mj‌rjzd v hʃbvn vɒlʔɒlh frjɒd brmj آvrnd آvɒz ɒjʃɒn tɒ jɒhs msmvʔ mj‌ʃvd bnɒbrɒjn mslhɒn mvآb nɒlh mj‌knnd v d͡ʒɒn ɒjʃɒn dr ɒjʃɒn mj‌lrzd dl mn bh d͡ʒht mvآb frjɒd brmj آvrd frɒrjɒnʃ tɒ bh svɣr v ʔd͡ʒlt ʃlʃjɒ nʔrh mj‌znnd zjrɒ kh ɒjʃɒn bh frɒz lvhjt bɒ ɡrjh brmj آjnd zjrɒ kh ɒz rɒh hvrvnɒjm sdɒj hlɒkt brmj آvrnd zjrɒ kh آbhɒj nmrjm xrɒb ʃdh، t͡ʃvnkh ʔlf xʃkjdh v ɡjɒh tlf ʃdh v hjt͡ʃ‌t͡ʃjz sbz bɒɣj nmɒndh ɒst bnɒbrɒjn dvltj rɒ kh thsjl nmvdh‌ɒnd v ɒndvxth hɒj xvd rɒ br vɒdj bjdhɒ mj‌brnd zjrɒ kh frjɒdɒjʃɒn hdvd mvآb rɒ ɒhɒth nmvdh v vlvlh ɒjʃɒn tɒ ɒd͡ʒlɒjm v vlvlh ɒjʃɒn tɒ bئr ɒjljm rsjdh ɒstt͡ʃvnkh آbhɒj djmvn ɒz xvn پr ʃdh zɒnrv kh br djmvn blɒjɒj zjɒd xvɒhm آvrdjʔnj ʃjrj rɒ br frɒrjɒn mvآb v br bɣjh zmjnʃ xvɒhm ɡmɒʃt t͡ʃvnkh آbhɒj djmvn ɒz xvn پr ʃdh zɒnrv kh br djmvn blɒjɒj zjɒd xvɒhm آvrdjʔnj ʃjrj rɒ br frɒrjɒn mvآb v br bɣjh zmjnʃ xvɒhm ɡmɒʃt brh‌hɒ rɒ kh xrɒd͡ʒ hɒkm zmjn ɒst ɒzsɒlʔ bsvj bjɒbɒn bh kvh dxtr shjvn bfrstjd v dxtrɒn mvآb msl mrɣɒn آvɒrh vmɒnnd آʃjɒnh trk ʃdh nzd mʔbrhɒj ɒrnvn xvɒhnd ʃd mʃvrt bdhjd v ɒnsɒf rɒ bd͡ʒɒآvrjd، v sɒjh xvd rɒ dr vɣt zhr msl ʃb bɡrdɒn rɒndh ʃdɡɒn rɒ پnhɒn kn v frɒrjɒn rɒtsljm mnmɒ ‌ɒj mvآb bɡzɒr kh rɒndh ʃdɡɒn mn nzd tv mɒvɒ ɡzjnnd v brɒj ɒjʃɒn ɒz rvj tɒrɒd͡ʒ knndh پnɒh ɡɒh bɒʃ zjrɒ zɒlm nɒbvd mj‌ʃvd vtɒrɒd͡ʒ knndh tmɒm mj‌ɡrdd v stmkɒr ɒz zmjn tlf xvɒhd ʃd v krsj bh rhmt ɒstvɒr xvɒhdɡʃt v ksj bh rɒstj br آn dr xjmh dɒvdxvɒhd nʃst kh dɒvrj knd v bnjɒdhɒj ɣjr hɒrst nɒlh mj‌knjd zjrɒ kh bɒlkl mzrvb mj‌ʃvd zjrɒ kh mzrʔh hɒj hʃbvn v mvhɒj sbmh پʒmrdh ʃd v srvrɒn ɒmt‌hɒ tɒkhɒjʃ rɒʃkstnd آnhɒ tɒ bh jʔzjr rsjdh bvd v dr bjɒbɒn پrɒkndh mj‌ʃd v ʃɒxh hɒjʃ mntʃr ʃdh، ɒz drjɒmj ɡzʃt bnɒbrɒjn brɒj mv sbmh bh ɡrjh jʔzjrxvɒhm ɡrjst ɒj hʃbvn v ɒlʔɒlh ʃmɒ rɒ bɒɒʃkhɒj xvd sjrɒb xvɒhm sɒxt zjrɒ kh brmjvh‌hɒ v ɒŋvrhɒjt ɡlbɒŋ ɒftɒdh ɒst ʃɒdj v ɒbthɒd͡ʒ ɒz bstɒnhɒ brdɒʃth ʃd v dr tɒkstɒnhɒ trnm v آvɒz ʃɒdmɒnj nxvɒhd bvd vksj ʃrɒb rɒ dr t͡ʃrxʃthɒ پɒjmɒl nmj knd sdɒj ʃɒdmɒnj rɒ xɒmvʃ ɡrdɒnjdm lhzɒɒhʃɒj mn msl brbt bh d͡ʒht mvآb sdɒ mj‌zndv btn mn brɒj mtrvk mj‌ʃvd v bh d͡ʒht xvɒbjdn ɡlh‌hɒ xvɒhd bvd v ksj آnhɒ rɒ nxvɒhd trsɒnjd v hsɒr ɒz ɒfrɒjm tlf xvɒhd ʃd v sltnt ɒzdmʃɣ v ɒz bɣjh ɒrɒm v msl d͡ʒlɒl bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl xvɒhnd bvd zjrɒ kh jhvh sbɒjvt vɒdj rfɒjm snblh‌hɒ rɒ bt͡ʃjnnd v xvʃh hɒj t͡ʃnd dr آn bɒɣj mɒnd v msl vɣtj kh zjtvn rɒ btkɒnnd kh dv jɒsh dɒnh br sr ʃɒxh blnd v t͡ʃhɒr jɒ پnd͡ʒ dɒnh brʃɒxt͡ʃh hɒj bɒrvr آn bɒɣj mɒnd jhvh xdɒj xvd rɒ bh ʃkvfh xvɒhj آvrd ɒmɒ mhsvlʃ dr rvz آft mhlk vhzn ʔlɒd͡ʒ nɒپzjr br bɒd xvɒhd rft vɒj br ʃvrʃ ɣvm hɒj bsjɒr kh msl ʃvrʃ drjɒ ʃvrʃ mj‌nmɒjnd v xrvʃ tvɒjfj kh msl xrvʃ آbhɒj zvrآvr xrvʃ mj‌knnd tvɒjf msl xrvʃ آbhɒj bsjɒrmj xrvʃnd ɒmɒ ɒjʃɒn rɒ ʔtɒb xvɒhd krd v bh‌d͡ʒɒj dvr xvɒhnd ɡrjxt v msl kɒh kvhhɒ drbrɒbr bɒd rɒndh xvɒhnd ʃd v msl ɣbɒr dr brɒbrɡrdbɒddr vɣt ʃɒm ɒjnk xvf ɒst v ɣbl kh dr آn آvɒz bɒlhɒ ɒst kh bh آn trf nhrhɒj kvʃ mj‌bɒʃd v ɒjlt͡ʃjɒn bh drjɒ v dr kʃtjhɒj brdj br rvj آbhɒ mj‌frstd v mj‌ɡvjd ɒj rsvlɒn tjzrvbrvjd nzd ɒmt blnd ɣd v brɒɣ، nzd ɣvmj kh ɒzɒbtdɒjʃ tɒ knvn mhjb bvdh‌ɒnd jʔnj ɒmt zvrآvrv پɒjmɒl knndh kh nhrhɒ zmjn ɒjʃɒn rɒ tɣsjm mj‌knd ‌ɒj tmɒmj sɒknɒn rbʔ mskvn v sknh d͡ʒhɒn، t͡ʃvn ʔlmj br kvhhɒ blnd ɡrdd bŋrjd vt͡ʃvn krnɒ nvɒxth ʃvd bʃnvjd zjrɒ xdɒvnd bh mn t͡ʃnjn ɡfth ɒst kh mn xvɒhm آrɒmjd v ɒzmkɒn xvd nzr xvɒhm nmvd msl ɡrmɒj sɒf brnbɒtɒt v msl ɒbr ʃbnm dɒr dr hrɒrt hsɒd zjrɒ ɣbl ɒz hsɒd vɣtj kh ʃkvfh tmɒm ʃvd vɡl bh ɒŋvr rsjdh، mbdl zmjn ɒjʃɒn rɒ tɣsjm mj‌knd bh mkɒn ɒsm jhvh sbɒjvt jʔnj bh kvh shjvn آvrdh xvɒhd ʃd vhj drbɒrh msr ɒjnk xdɒvnd br ɒbr tjzrv svɒr ʃdh، bh msr mj‌آjd v bthɒj msr ɒz hzvr vj xvɒhdlrzjd v dlhɒj msrjɒn dr ɒndrvn ɒjʃɒn ɡdɒxth xvɒhd ʃd v msrjɒn rɒ br msrjɒn xvɒhm brɒŋjxt brɒdr bɒ brɒdr xvd v hmsɒjh bɒhmsɒjh xvjʃ v ʃhr bɒ ʃhr v kʃvr bɒ kʃvrd͡ʒŋ xvɒhnd nmvd v rvh msr dr ɒndrvnʃ ɒfsrdh ʃdh، mʃvrtʃ rɒ bɒtl xvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd vɒjʃɒn ɒz bthɒ v fɒlɡjrɒn v sɒhbɒn ɒd͡ʒnh vd͡ʒɒdvɡrɒn svɒl xvɒhnd nmvd v msrjɒn rɒ bh‌dst آɣɒj stm kjʃ tsljm xvɒhm nmvd vپɒdʃɒh zvrآvr br ɒjʃɒn hkmrɒnj xvɒhd krd xdɒvnd jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd v آb ɒz drjɒ njl km ʃdh، nhr xrɒb vxʃk xvɒhd ɡrdjd v nhrhɒ mtʔfn ʃdh، d͡ʒvjhɒj mɒsvr km ʃdh mj‌xʃkd v nj v bvrjɒپʒmrdh xvɒhd ʃd v mrɣzɒrj kh br knɒr njl vbr dhnh njl ɒst v hmh mzrʔh hɒj njl xʃk vrɒndh ʃdh v nɒbvd xvɒhd ɡrdjd v mɒhj ɡjrɒn mɒtm mj‌ɡjrnd v hmh آnɒnj kh ɣlɒb bh njl ɒndɒzndzɒrj mj‌knnd v آnɒnj kh dɒm br rvj آb ɡstrɒnnd ɒfsrdh xvɒhnd ʃd v ʔɒmlɒn ktɒn ʃɒnh zdh v bɒfndɡɒn پɒrt͡ʃh sfjd xd͡ʒl xvɒhndʃd v ɒrkɒn ɒv sɒjjdh v d͡ʒmjʔ mzdvrɒn rnd͡ʒjdh dl xvɒhnd ʃd srvrɒn svʔn bɒlkl ɒhmɣ mj‌ʃvnd vmʃvrt mʃjrɒn dɒnʃmnd frʔvn vhʃj mj ɡrdd پs t͡ʃɡvnh bh frʔvn mj‌ɡvjjd kh mn پsr hkmɒ v پsr پɒdʃɒhɒn ɣdjm mj‌bɒʃm پs hkjmɒn tv kd͡ʒɒjnd tɒ ɒjʃɒn tv rɒ ɒtlɒʔ dhnd vbdɒnnd kh jhvh sbɒjvt drbɒrh msr t͡ʃh tɣdjrnmvdh ɒst srvrɒn svʔn ɒblh ʃdh vsrvrɒn nvf frjb xvrdh‌ɒnd v آnɒnj kh sŋ zɒvjh ɒsbɒt msr hstnd آn rɒ ɡmrɒh krdh‌ɒnd v xdɒvnd rvh xjrɡj dr vst آn آmjxth ɒst kh ɒjʃɒn msrjɒn rɒ dr hmh kɒrhɒj ɒjʃɒn ɡmrɒh krdh‌ɒnd msl mstɒn kh dr ɣj xvd ɒftɒn vxjzɒn rɒh mj‌rvnd v msrjɒn rɒ kɒrj nxvɒhd mɒnd kh sr jɒ dm nxl jɒ bvrjɒ bknd dr آn rvz ɒhl msr msl znɒn mj‌bɒʃnd v ɒzhrkt dst jhvh sbɒjvt kh آn rɒ br msr bh hrkt mj‌آvrd lrzɒn v hrɒsɒn xvɒhnd ʃd v zmjn jhvdɒ bɒʔs xvf msr xvɒhd ʃd kh hrkh zkr آn rɒ bʃnvd xvɒhd trsjd bh‌sbb tɣdjrj kh jhvh sbɒjvt br آn mɣdr nmvdh ɒst dr آn rvz پnd͡ʒ ʃhr dr zmjn msr bh zbɒn knʔɒn mtklm ʃdh، brɒj jhvh sbɒjvt ɣsm xvɒhnd xvrd v jkj ʃhr hlɒkt nɒmjdh xvɒhdʃd dr آn rvz mzbhj brɒj xdɒvnd dr mjɒn zmjn msr v stvnj nzd hdvdʃ brɒj xdɒvndxvɒhd bvd v آn آjtj v ʃhɒdtj brɒj jhvh sbɒjvt dr zmjn msr xvɒhd bvd zjrɒ kh nzdxdɒvnd bh‌sbb d͡ʒfɒknndɡɒn xvjʃ ɒstɣɒsh xvɒhd nmvd v ɒv nd͡ʒɒt‌dhndh v hmɒjt knndh‌ɒj brɒj ɒjʃɒn xvɒhd frstɒd v ɒjʃɒn rɒxvɒhd rhɒnjd v xdɒvnd br msrjɒn mʔrvf xvɒhd ʃd v dr آn rvz msrjɒn xdɒvnd rɒxvɒhnd ʃnɒxt v bɒ zbɒjh v hdɒjɒ ɒv rɒ ʔbɒdt xvɒhnd krd v brɒj xdɒvnd nzr krdh، آn rɒ vfɒxvɒhnd nmvd v xdɒvnd msrjɒn rɒ xvɒhdzd v bh zdn ʃfɒ xvɒhd dɒd zjrɒ t͡ʃvn bsvj xdɒvnd bɒzɡʃt nmɒjnd ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒd͡ʒɒbt nmvdh، ʃfɒ xvɒhd dɒd dr آn rvz ʃɒhrɒhj ɒz msr bh آʃvrxvɒhd bvd v آʃvrjɒn bh msr v msrjɒn bh آʃvrxvɒhnd rft v msrjɒn bɒ آʃvrjɒn ʔbɒdt xvɒhnd nmvd dr آn rvz ɒsrɒئjl svm msr vآʃvr xvɒhd ʃd v آnhɒ dr mjɒn d͡ʒhɒn brkt xvɒhnd bvdzjrɒ kh jhvh sbɒjvt آnhɒ rɒbrkt dɒdh xvɒhd ɡft ɣvm mn msr v snʔt dst mn آʃvr v mjrɒs mn ɒsrɒئjl mbɒrk bɒʃnd zjrɒ kh jhvh sbɒjvt آnhɒ rɒbrkt dɒdh xvɒhd ɡft ɣvm mn msr v snʔt dst mn آʃvr v mjrɒs mn ɒsrɒئjl mbɒrk bɒʃnd dr sɒlj kh trtɒn bh ɒʃdvd آmd hŋɒmj kh srd͡ʒvn پɒdʃɒh آʃvr ɒv rɒfrstɒd، پs bɒ ɒʃdvd d͡ʒŋ krdh، آn rɒ ɡrft dr آn vɣt xdɒvnd bh vɒsth ɒʃʔjɒ ɒbn آmvs tklm nmvdh، ɡft «brv v پlɒs rɒ ɒz kmr xvdbɡʃɒ v nʔljn rɒ ɒz پɒj xvd bjrvn kn» v ɒv t͡ʃnjn krdh، ʔrjɒn v پɒ brhnh rɒh mj‌rft v xdɒvnd ɡft «t͡ʃnɒnkh bndh mn ɒʃʔjɒ sh sɒl ʔrjɒn v پɒ brhnh rɒh rfth ɒst tɒ آjtj vʔlɒmtj drbɒrh msr v kvʃ bɒʃd، bhmɒn tvrپɒdʃɒh آʃvr ɒsjrɒn msr v d͡ʒlɒء vtnɒn kvʃ rɒɒz d͡ʒvɒnɒn vپjrɒn ʔrjɒn v پɒbrhnh v mkʃvf srjn xvɒhd brd tɒ rsvɒjj msr bɒʃd v ɒjʃɒn bh‌sbb kvʃ kh mld͡ʒɒj ɒjʃɒn ɒst v msr kh fxr ɒjʃɒn bɒʃd mztrb v xd͡ʒl xvɒhnd ʃdv sɒknɒn ɒjn sɒhl dr آn rvz xvɒhnd ɡft ɒjnk mld͡ʒɒj mɒ kh brɒj ɒʔɒnt bh آn frɒr krdjm tɒɒz dst پɒdʃɒh آʃvr nd͡ʒɒt jɒbjm t͡ʃnjn ʃdh ɒst، پs mɒ t͡ʃɡvnh nd͡ʒɒt xvɒhjm jɒft؟» v sɒknɒn ɒjn sɒhl dr آn rvz xvɒhnd ɡft ɒjnk mld͡ʒɒj mɒ kh brɒj ɒʔɒnt bh آn frɒr krdjm tɒɒz dst پɒdʃɒh آʃvr nd͡ʒɒt jɒbjm t͡ʃnjn ʃdh ɒst، پs mɒ t͡ʃɡvnh nd͡ʒɒt xvɒhjm ʔjlɒm brآj v‌ɒj mdjɒn mhɒsrh nmɒ tmɒm nɒlh آn rɒ sɒkt ɡrdɒnjdm ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht kmr mn ɒz ʃdt drd پr ʃdh ɒst v drd zh msl drd znj kh mj‌zɒjd mrɒdrɡrfth ɒst پjt͡ʃ v tɒb mj‌xvrm kh nmj tvɒnm bʃnvm، mdhvʃ mj‌ʃvm kh nmj tvɒnm bbjnm dl mn mj‌tپjd v hjbt mrɒ trsɒnjd ɒv ʃb lzt mrɒbrɒjm bh xvf mbdl sɒxth ɒst sfrh rɒ mhjɒsɒxth v frʃ rɒ ɡstrɒnjdh bh ɒkl v ʃrb mʃɣvl mj‌bɒʃnd ɒj srvrɒn brxjzjd v sپrhɒrɒ rvɣn bmɒljd zjrɒ xdɒvnd bh mn t͡ʃnjn ɡfth ɒst «brv vdjdh bɒn rɒ ɣrɒr bdh tɒ آnt͡ʃh rɒ kh bjnd ɒʔlɒm nmɒjd v t͡ʃvn fvd͡ʒ svɒrɒn d͡ʒft d͡ʒft v fvd͡ʒ ɒlɒɣɒn vfvd͡ʒ ʃtrɒn rɒ bjnd آŋɒh bh dɣt tmɒm tvd͡ʒh bnmɒjd» پs ɒv msl ʃjr sdɒ zd kh «ɒj آɣɒ mn dɒئm dr rvz br mhrs ɒjstɒdh‌ɒm v tmɒmj ʃb brdjdh bɒŋɒh xvd brɣrɒr mj‌bɒʃm v ɒjnk fvd͡ʒ mrdɒn v svɒrɒn d͡ʒft d͡ʒft mj‌آjnd v ɒv mzjdkrdh، ɡft bɒbl ɒftɒd ɒftɒdh ɒst v tmɒmj tmsɒl hɒj trɒʃjdh xdɒjɒnʃ rɒ br zmjn ʃksth‌ɒnd» ‌ɒj kvfth ʃdh mn v‌ɒj mhsvl xrmn mn آnt͡ʃh ɒz jhvh sbɒjvt xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl ʃnjdm bh ʃmɒ ɒʔlɒm mj‌nmɒjm vhj drbɒrh dvmh ksj ɒz sʔjr bh mn ndɒ mj‌knd kh «ɒj djdh bɒn ɒz ʃb t͡ʃh xbr؟ ɒj djdh bɒn ɒz ʃb t͡ʃh xbr؟» djdh bɒn mj‌ɡvjd kh sbh mj‌آjd v ʃɒm njz ɒɡr پrsjdn mj‌xvɒhjd bپrsjd v bɒzɡʃt nmvdh، bjɒjjd» vhj drbɒrh ʔrb ɒj ɣɒflh hɒj ddɒnjɒn dr d͡ʒŋl ʔrb mnzl knjd ‌ɒj sɒknɒn zmjn tjmɒ tʃŋɒn rɒ bh آb ɒstɣbɒl knjd v frɒrjɒn rɒ bh xvrɒk ɒjʃɒn پzjrh ʃvjd zjrɒ kh ɒjʃɒn ɒz ʃmʃjrhɒ frɒrmj knnd ɒz ʃmʃjr brhnh v kmɒn zh ʃdh v ɒzsxtj d͡ʒŋ zɒnrv kh xdɒvnd bh mn ɡfth ɒst bʔd ɒzjksɒl mvɒfɣ sɒlhɒj mzdvrɒn tmɒmj ʃvkt ɣjdɒr tlf xvɒhd ʃdv bɣjh ʃmɒrh tjrɒndɒzɒn v d͡ʒbɒrɒn bnj ɣjdɒr ɣljl xvɒhd ʃdt͡ʃvnkh jhvh xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl ɒjn rɒ ɡfth ɒst v bɣjh ʃmɒrh tjrɒndɒzɒn v d͡ʒbɒrɒn bnj ɣjdɒr ɣljl xvɒhd ʃdt͡ʃvnkh jhvh xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl ɒjn rɒ ɡfth ɒst vhj drbɒrh vɒdj rvjɒ ɒlɒn tv rɒ t͡ʃh ʃd kh kljh br bɒmhɒbrآmdj؟ ‌ɒj kh پr ɒz ʃvrʃhɒ hstj v‌ɒj ʃhrپrɣvɣɒ v‌ɒj ɣrjh mftxr kʃtɡɒnt kʃth ʃmʃjr njstnd v dr d͡ʒŋ hlɒk nʃdh‌ɒnd d͡ʒmjʔ srvrɒnt bɒ hm ɡrjxtnd v bdvn tjrɒndɒzɒn ɒsjr ɡʃtnd hmɡɒnj kh dr tv jɒft ʃdnd bɒ hm ɒsjr ɡrdjdnd v bh‌d͡ʒɒj dvr frɒrkrdnd bnɒbrɒjn ɡftm nzr xvd rɒ ɒz mn bɡrdɒnjdzjrɒ kh bɒ tlxj ɡrjh mj‌knm brɒj tslj mn drbɒrh xrɒbj dxtr ɣvmm ɒlhɒh mknjd zjrɒ xdɒvnd jhvh sbɒjvt rvz آʃftɡj vپɒjmɒlj v پrjʃɒnj‌ɒj dr vɒdj rvjɒ dɒrd djvɒrhɒ rɒ mnhdm mj‌sɒznd v sdɒj ɒstɣɒsh tɒ bh kvhhɒ mj‌rsd v ʔjlɒm bɒ ɒfvɒd͡ʒ mrdɒn v svɒrɒn trkʃ rɒ brdɒʃth ɒst v ɣjr sپr rɒ mkʃvf nmvdh ɒst، v vɒdjhɒj bhtrjnt ɒz ɒrɒbh‌hɒ پrʃdh، svɒrɒn پjʃ drvɒzh hɒjt sf آrɒjj mj‌nmɒjnd، v پvʃʃ jhvdɒ brdɒʃth mj‌ʃvd vdr آn rvz bh ɒslhh xɒnh d͡ʒŋl ŋɒh xvɒhjdkrd v rxnh hɒj ʃhr dɒvd rɒ kh bsjɒrndxvɒhjd djd v آb brkh thtɒnj rɒ d͡ʒmʔ xvɒhjdnmvd v xɒnh hɒj ɒvrʃljm rɒ xvɒhjd ʃmrd vxɒnh‌hɒ rɒ bh d͡ʒht hsɒrbndj djvɒrhɒ xrɒb xvɒhjd nmvd v drmjɒn dv djvɒr hvzj brɒj آb brkh ɣdjm xvɒhjd sɒxt ɒmɒ bh sɒnʔ آn nxvɒhjd ŋrjst v bh آnkh آn rɒ ɒz ɒjɒm پjʃjn sɒxth ɒst ŋrɒn nxvɒhjd ʃd v dr آn rvzxdɒvnd jhvh sbɒjvt ʃmɒ rɒ bh ɡrjstn v mɒtm krdn v kndn mv v پvʃjdn پlɒs xvɒhdxvɒnd v ɒjnk ʃɒdmɒnj v xvʃj v kʃtn ɡɒvɒn v zbh krdn ɡvsfndɒn v xvrdn ɡvʃt vnvʃjdn ʃrɒb xvɒhd bvd kh bxvrjm v bnvʃjm zjrɒ kh frdɒ mj‌mjrjm v jhvh sbɒjvt drɡvʃ mn ɒʔlɒm krdh ɒst kh ɒjn ɡnɒh ʃmɒ tɒbmjrjd hrɡz kfɒrh nxvɒhd ʃd xdɒvnd jhvh sbɒjvt ɒjn rɒ ɡfth ɒst xdɒvnd jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «brv v nzd ɒjn xzɒnh‌dɒr jʔnj ʃbnɒ kh nɒzr xɒnh ɒst dɒxl ʃv v bh ɒv bɡv tv rɒ dr ɒjnd͡ʒɒ t͡ʃh‌kɒr ɒst v dr ɒjnd͡ʒɒ kh rɒ dɒrj kh dr ɒjnd͡ʒɒ ɣbrj brɒj xvd kndh‌ɒj؟ ɒj ksj‌kh ɣbr xvd rɒ drmkɒn blnd mj‌knj v msknj brɒj xvjʃtn drsxrh mj‌trɒʃj» ɒjnk‌ɒj mrd، xdɒvnd ɒlbth tv rɒ dvrxvɒhd ɒndɒxt v ɒlbth tv rɒ xvɒhd پvʃɒnjd vɒlbth tv rɒ msl ɡvj sxt xvɒhd پjt͡ʃjd v bh zmjn vsjʔ tv rɒ xvɒhd ɒfknd v dr آnd͡ʒɒ xvɒhj mrd v dr آnd͡ʒɒ ɒrɒbh hɒj ʃvkt tv rsvɒjj xɒnh آɣɒjt xvɒhd ʃd v tv rɒ ɒz mnsbt xvɒhm rɒnd v ɒz mkɒnt bh zjr ɒfkndh xvɒhj ʃd v dr آn rvz vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd kh bndh xvjʃ ɒljɒɣjm bn hlɣjɒ rɒ dʔvt xvɒhm nmvd v ɒv rɒ bh‌d͡ʒɒmh tv mlbs sɒxth bh kmrbndt mhkm xvɒhm sɒxt v ɒɣtdɒr tv rɒ bh‌dst ɒvxvɒhm dɒd v ɒv sɒknɒn ɒvrʃljm v xɒndɒn jhvdɒrɒ پdr xvɒhd bvd v kljd xɒnh dɒvd rɒ br dvʃ vj xvɒhm nhɒd v t͡ʃvn bɡʃɒjd ɒhdj nxvɒhdbst v t͡ʃvn bbndd، ɒhdj nxvɒhd ɡʃɒd v ɒv rɒ dr d͡ʒɒj mhkm msl mjx xvɒhm dvxt v brɒj xɒndɒn پdr xvd krsj d͡ʒlɒl xvɒhd bvd vtmɒmj d͡ʒlɒl xɒndɒn پdrʃ rɒ ɒz ɒvlɒd v ɒhfɒd vhmh zrvf kvt͡ʃk rɒ ɒz zrvf kɒsh‌hɒ tɒ zrvf tŋhɒ br ɒv xvɒhnd آvjxtv jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd kh dr آn rvz آn mjxj kh dr mkɒn mhkm dvxth ʃdh mthrk xvɒhd ɡrdjd v ɣtʔ ʃdh، xvɒhd ɒftɒd v bɒrj kh br آn ɒst، tlf xvɒhd ʃd zjrɒ xdɒvnd ɒjn rɒɡfth ɒst v jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd kh dr آn rvz آn mjxj kh dr mkɒn mhkm dvxth ʃdh mthrk xvɒhd ɡrdjd v ɣtʔ ʃdh، xvɒhd ɒftɒd v bɒrj kh br آn ɒst، tlf xvɒhd ʃd zjrɒ xdɒvnd ɒjn rɒɡfth ɒst vhj drbɒrh svr ɒj kʃtjhɒj trʃjʃ vlvlh nmɒjjd zjrɒkh bhdj xrɒb ʃdh ɒst kh nh xɒnh‌ɒj v nh mdxlj bɒɣj‌mɒndh ɒz zmjn ktjm xbr bh ɒjʃɒn rsjdh ɒst ‌ɒj sɒknɒn sɒhl kh tɒd͡ʒrɒn sjdvn kh ɒz drjɒ ʔbvr mj‌knnd tv rɒ پrsɒxth‌ɒnd آrɒm ɡjrjd v dxl ɒv ɒz mhsvl ʃjhvr v hsɒd njl br آbhɒj bsjɒr mj‌bvd پs ɒvtd͡ʒɒrt ɡɒh ɒmt‌hɒ ʃdh ɒst ‌ɒj sjdvn xd͡ʒl ʃv zjrɒ kh drjɒ jʔnj ɣlʔh drjɒ mtklm ʃdh، mj‌ɡvjd drd zh nkʃjdh‌ɒm v nzɒjjdh‌ɒm vd͡ʒvɒnɒn rɒ nپrvrdh‌ɒm v dvʃjzɡɒn rɒ trbjt nkrdh‌ɒm t͡ʃvn ɒjn xbr bh msr brsd ɒz ɒxbɒrsvr bsjɒr drdnɒk xvɒhnd ʃd ‌ɒj sɒknɒn sɒhl drjɒ bh trʃjʃ bɡzrjd vvlvlh nmɒjjd آjɒ ɒjn ʃhr mftxr ʃmɒ ɒst kh ɣdjmj v ɒz ɒjɒm slf bvdh ɒst v پɒjhɒjʃ ɒv rɒbh‌d͡ʒɒj dvr brdh، tɒ dr آnd͡ʒɒ mɒvɒ ɡzjnd؟ kjst kh ɒjn ɣsd rɒ drbɒrh svr آn ʃhr tɒd͡ʒ bxʃ kh td͡ʒɒr vj srvrɒn v bɒzrɡɒnɒn ɒv ʃrfɒj d͡ʒhɒn bvdh‌ɒnd nmvdh ɒst jhvh sbɒjvt ɒjn ɣsd rɒnmvdh ɒst tɒ tkbr tmɒmj d͡ʒlɒl rɒ xvɒr sɒzd vd͡ʒmjʔ ʃrfɒj d͡ʒhɒn rɒ mhɣr nmɒjd ‌ɒj dxtr trʃjʃ ɒz zmjn xvd msl njl bɡzr zjrɒ kh djɡr hjt͡ʃ bnd brɒj tv njst ɒvdst xvd rɒ br drjɒ drɒz krdh، mmlkthɒ rɒmthrk sɒxth ɒst xdɒvnd drbɒrh knʔɒn ɒmrfrmvdh ɒst tɒ ɣlʔh hɒjʃ rɒ xrɒb nmɒjnd vɡfth ɒst ɒj dvʃjzh stm rsjdh v‌ɒj dxtrsjdvn djɡr mftxr nxvɒhj ʃd brxɒsth، bh ktjm bɡzr ɒmɒ dr آnd͡ʒɒ njz rɒht brɒj tv nxvɒhdbvd ɒjnk zmjn kldɒnjɒn kh ɣvmj nbvdnd vآʃvr آn rɒ bh d͡ʒht shrɒnʃjnɒn bnjɒd nhɒd ɒjʃɒn mnd͡ʒnjɣhɒj xvd rɒ ɒfrɒʃth، ɣsrhɒj آn rɒ mnhdm v آn rɒ bh xrɒbj mbdl xvɒhnd sɒxt ‌ɒj kʃtjhɒj trʃjʃ vlvlh nmɒjjd zjrɒ kh ɣlʔh ʃmɒ xrɒb ʃdh ɒst v dr آn rvz vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd kh svr، hftɒd sɒl msl ɒjɒm jk پɒdʃɒh frɒmvʃ xvɒhdʃd v bʔd ɒz ɒnɣzɒj hftɒd sɒl brɒj svr msl srvd zɒnjh xvɒhd bvd ‌ɒj zɒnjh frɒmvʃ ʃdh brbt rɒ ɡrfth، dr ʃhr ɡrdʃ nmɒ xvʃ bnvɒz vsrvdhɒj bsjɒr bxvɒn tɒ bh jɒd آvrdh ʃvj vbʔd ɒz ɒnɣzɒj hftɒd sɒl vɒɣʔ mj‌ʃvd kh xdɒvnd ɒz svr tfɣd xvɒhd nmvd v bh ɒd͡ʒrt xvjʃ brɡʃth bɒ d͡ʒmjʔ mmɒlk d͡ʒhɒn kh br rvj zmjn ɒst znɒ xvɒhd nmvdv td͡ʒɒrt vɒd͡ʒrt آn brɒj xdɒvnd vɣf ʃdh zxjrh v ɒndvxth nxvɒhd ʃd blkh td͡ʒɒrtʃ brɒj mɣrbɒn drɡɒh xdɒvnd xvɒhd bvd tɒ bh sjrj bxvrnd vlbɒs fɒxr bپvʃnd v td͡ʒɒrt vɒd͡ʒrt آn brɒj xdɒvnd vɣf ʃdh zxjrh v ɒndvxth nxvɒhd ʃd blkh td͡ʒɒrtʃ brɒj mɣrbɒn drɡɒh xdɒvnd xvɒhd bvd tɒ bh sjrj bxvrnd vlbɒs fɒxr bپvʃnd ɒjnk xdɒvnd zmjn rɒ xɒlj v vjrɒn mj knd، v آn rɒ vɒʒɡvn sɒxth، sɒknɒnʃ rɒ پrɒkndh mj‌sɒzd v msl ɣvm، msl kɒhn v msl bndh، msl آɣɒjʃ v msl knjz، msl xɒtvnʃ v msl mʃtrj، msl frvʃndh v msl ɣrz dhndh، msl ɣrz ɡjrndh v msl svdxvɒr، msl svd dhndh xvɒhd bvd v zmjn bɒlkl xɒlj v bɒlkl ɣɒrt xvɒhd ʃd zjrɒ xdɒvnd ɒjn sxn rɒ ɡfth ɒst zmjn mɒtm mj‌knd v پʒmrdh mj‌ʃvd rbʔ mskvn kɒhjdh v پʒmrdh mj‌ɡrdd، ʃrjfɒn ɒz پstɒnhɒ ɡrfth ʃdh‌ɒnd؟ zjrɒ kh hkm br hkm v hkm br hkm، ɣɒnvn br ɣɒnvn vɣɒnvn br ɣɒnvn ɒjnd͡ʒɒ ɒndkj v آnd͡ʒɒ ɒndkj xvɒhdbvd zjrɒ kh bɒ lbhɒj ɒlkn v zbɒn ɣrjb bɒ ɒjn ɣvm tklm xvɒhd nmvd kh bh ɒjʃɒn ɡft «rɒht hmjn ɒst پs xsth ʃdɡɒn rɒ mstrjh sɒzjd v آrɒmj hmjn ɒst» ɒmɒnxvɒstnd kh bʃnvnd v klɒm xdɒvnd brɒj ɒjʃɒn hkm br hkm v hkm brhkm، ɣɒnvn brɣɒnvn v ɣɒnvn br ɣɒnvn ɒjnd͡ʒɒ ɒndkj v آnd͡ʒɒ ɒndkj xvɒhd bvd tɒ brvnd v bh پʃt ɒftɒdh، mnksrɡrdnd v bh dɒm ɒftɒdh، ɡrftɒr ʃvnd bnɒbrɒjn‌ɒj mrdɒn ɒsthzɒ knndh v‌ɒj hɒkmɒn ɒjn ɣvm kh drɒvrʃljm‌ɒnd klɒm xdɒvnd rɒ bʃnvjd ɒz آnd͡ʒɒkh ɡfth‌ɒjd bɒ mvt ʔhd bsth‌ɒjm v bɒ hɒvjh hmdɒstɒn ʃdh‌ɒjm، پs t͡ʃvn tɒzjɒnh mhlk bɡzrd bh mɒ nxvɒhd rsjd zjrɒ kh drvɣhɒ rɒmld͡ʒɒj xvd nmvdjm v xvjʃtn rɒ zjr mkrmstvr sɒxtjm bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «ɒjnk dr shjvn sŋ bnjɒdj nhɒdm jʔnj sŋ آzmvdh v sŋ zɒvjh‌ɒj ɡrɒnbhɒ v ɒsɒs mhkm پs hr‌kh ɒjmɒn آvrd tʔd͡ʒjl nxvɒhd nmvd vɒnsɒf rɒ rjsmɒn mj‌ɡrdɒnm v ʔdɒlt rɒ trɒzv vtɡrɡ mld͡ʒɒj drvɣ rɒ xvɒhd rft v آbhɒ str ʃmɒmhkm ɡrdd، zjrɒ hlɒkt v tɣdjrj rɒ kh ɒzd͡ʒɒnb xdɒvnd jhvh sbɒjvt br tmɒmj zmjn mj‌آjd ʃnjdh‌ɒm ɡvʃ ɡjrjd v آvɒz mrɒ bʃnvjd v mtvd͡ʒh ʃdh، klɒm mrɒ ɒstmɒʔ nmɒjjd آjɒ brzɡr، hmh rvz bh d͡ʒht txm پɒʃjdn ʃjɒr mj‌knd v آjɒ hmh vɣt zmjn xvd rɒ mj‌ʃkɒfd v hmvɒr mj‌nmɒjd؟ آjɒ bʔd ɒz آnkh rvjʃ rɒ hmvɒr krd ɡʃnjz rɒnmj پɒʃd v zjrh rɒ nmj ɒfʃɒnd v ɡndm rɒ drʃjɒrhɒ v d͡ʒv rɒ dr d͡ʒɒj mʔjn v zrt rɒ drhdvdʃ nmj ɡzɒrd؟ zjrɒ kh xdɒjʃ ɒv rɒ bh rɒstj mj‌آmvzd v ɒv rɒ tʔljm mj‌dhd t͡ʃvnkh ɡʃnjz bɒ ɡrdvn tjz kvbjdh nmj ʃvd v t͡ʃrx ɒrɒbh br zjrh ɡrdɒnjdh nmj ɡrdd، blkh ɡʃnjz bh ʔsɒ vzjrh bh t͡ʃvb آnɒnj kh mʃvrt xvd rɒ ɒz xdɒvndbsjɒr ʔmjɣ پnhɒn mj‌knnd v ɒʔmɒl ɒjʃɒn drtɒrjkj mj‌bɒʃd v mj‌ɡvjnd «kjst kh mɒrɒ bbjndv kjst kh mɒ rɒ bʃnɒsd؟» ‌ɒj zjr v zbrknndɡɒn hrt͡ʃjz آjɒ kvzh‌ɡr msl ɡl mhsvb پsrɒn drvɣɡvmj bɒʃnd پsrɒnj kh nmj xvɒhnd ʃrjʔt xdɒvnd rɒ ɒstmɒʔ nmɒjnd kh bh rɒئjɒn mj‌ɡvjnd rvjt mknjd v bh ɒnbjɒ kh brɒj mɒ bh rɒstj nbvt nnmɒjjd blkh sxnɒn ʃjrjn bh mɒɡvjjd v bh mkɒjd nbvt knjd nmvdjd، ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht ɒjn ɡnɒh brɒj ʃmɒ msl ʃkɒf nzdjk bh ɒftɒdn kh dr djvɒr blnd پjʃ آmdh bɒʃd v xrɒbj آn dr lhzh‌ɒj bɣth پdjd آjd xvɒhd bvd vʃkstɡj آn msl ʃkstɡj kvzh kvzh‌ɡrxvɒhd bvd kh bj‌mhɒbɒ xrd mj‌ʃvd btvrj kh ɒzپɒrh hɒjʃ پɒrh‌ɒj bh d͡ʒht ɡrftn آtʃ ɒz آtʃdɒn jɒ brdɒʃtn آb ɒz hvz jɒft nxvɒhd ʃd» zjrɒ xdɒvnd jhvh ɣdvs ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «bh ɒnɒbt v آrɒmj nd͡ʒɒt mj‌jɒftjd vɣvt ʃmɒ xdɒj ɒnsɒf ɒst xvʃɒbhɒl hmɡɒnj kh mntzr vj bɒʃnd zjrɒ kh ɣvm dr shjvn dr ɒvrʃljm sɒkn xvɒhnd bvd v hrɡz ɡrjh nxvɒhj krd v bh آvɒzfrjɒdt br tv trhm xvɒhd krd، v t͡ʃvn bʃnvd tvrɒ ɒd͡ʒɒbt xvɒhd nmvd v hrt͡ʃnd xdɒvnd ʃmɒrɒ nɒn zjɣ v آb msjbt bdhd ɒmɒ mʔlmɒnt bɒrdjɡr mxfj nxvɒhnd ʃd blkh t͡ʃʃmɒnt mʔlmɒn tv rɒ xvɒhd djd v ɡvʃhɒjt sxnj rɒ ɒzʔɣb tv xvɒhd ʃnjd kh mj‌ɡvjd rɒh ɒjn ɒst، dr آn slvk bnmɒ hŋɒmj kh bh trf rɒst jɒt͡ʃپ mj‌ɡrdj v پvʃʃ bthɒj rjxth nɣrh xvjʃ rɒ v str ɒsnɒm trɒʃjdh tlɒj xvd rɒnd͡ʒs xvɒhjd sɒxt v آnhɒ rɒ msl t͡ʃjz nd͡ʒs dvr ɒndɒxth، bh آn xvɒhj ɡft dvr ʃv v bɒrɒn txmt rɒ kh zmjn xvjʃ rɒ bh آn zrʔ mj‌knj v nɒn mhsvl zmjnt rɒ xvɒhd dɒd vآn پr mɣz v frɒvɒn xvɒhd ʃd v dr آn zmɒn mvɒʃj tv dr mrtʔ vsjʔ xvɒhnd t͡ʃrjd vɡɒvɒn v ɒlɒɣɒnt kh zmjn rɒ ʃjɒr mj‌nmɒjnd، آzvɣh nmk dɒr rɒ kh bɒ ɣrbɒl v ɒvt͡ʃvm پɒk ʃdh ɒst xvɒhnd xvrd v dr rvz kʃtɒr ʔzjm kh brd͡ʒhɒ dr آn xvɒhd ɒftɒd nhrhɒ v d͡ʒvjhɒj آb brhr kvh blnd v bh hr tl mrtfʔ d͡ʒɒrj xvɒhd ʃd v dr rvzj kh xdɒvnd ʃkstɡj ɣvm xvd rɒbbndd v zrb d͡ʒrɒht ɒjʃɒn rɒ ʃfɒ dhdrvʃnɒjj mɒh msl rvʃnɒjj آftɒb v rvʃnɒjj آftɒb hft t͡ʃndɒn msl rvʃnɒjj hft rvzxvɒhd bvd ɒjnk ɒsm xdɒvnd ɒz d͡ʒɒj dvr mj‌آjd، drɣzb xvd svzndh v dr stvn ɣljz v lbhɒjʃ پr ɒz xʃm v zbɒnʃ msl آtʃ svzɒn ɒst vnfxh ɒv msl nhr srʃɒr tɒ bh ɡrdn mj‌rsd tɒ آnkh ɒmt‌hɒ rɒ bh ɣrbɒl msjbt bbjzd v dhnh zlɒlt rɒbr t͡ʃɒnh ɣvm‌hɒ bɡzɒrd v ʃmɒ rɒ srvdj xvɒhd bvd msl ʃb tɣdjs nmvdn ʔjd vʃɒdmɒnj dl msl آnɒnj kh rvɒnh mj‌ʃvnd tɒ bh آvɒznj bh kvh xdɒvnd nzd sxrh ɒsrɒئjl bjɒjnd vxdɒvnd d͡ʒlɒl آvɒz xvd rɒ xvɒhd ʃnvɒnjd vfrvd آvrdn bɒzvj xvd rɒ bɒ ʃdt ɣzb vʃʔlh آtʃ svzndh v tvfɒn v sjl v sŋhɒj tɡrɡ zɒhr xvɒhd sɒxt zjrɒ kh آʃvr bh آvɒz xdɒvnd ʃksth xvɒhd ʃd v ɒv rɒ bɒ ʔsɒxvɒhd zd v hr zrb ʔsɒj ɣzɒ kh xdɒvndbh vj xvɒhd آvrd bɒ df v brbt xvɒhd bvd v bɒd͡ʒŋhɒj پr ʃvrʃ bɒ آn mɣɒtlh xvɒhd nmvdzjrɒ kh tvft ɒz ɣbl mhjɒ ʃdh v brɒj پɒdʃɒh آmɒdh ɡrdjdh ɒst آn rɒ ʔmjɣ v vsjʔ sɒxth ɒst kh tvdh‌ɒʃ آtʃ v hjzm bsjɒr ɒst v nfxh xdɒvnd msl nhr kbrjt آn rɒ mʃtʔl xvɒhdsɒxt zjrɒ kh tvft ɒz ɣbl mhjɒ ʃdh v brɒj پɒdʃɒh آmɒdh ɡrdjdh ɒst آn rɒ ʔmjɣ v vsjʔ sɒxth ɒst kh tvdh‌ɒʃ آtʃ v hjzm bsjɒr ɒst v nfxh xdɒvnd msl nhr kbrjt آn rɒ mʃtʔl xvɒhdsɒxt vɒj br آnɒnj kh bh d͡ʒht ɒʔɒnt bh msrfrvd آjnd v br ɒsbɒn tkjh nmɒjnd v brɒrɒbh‌hɒ zɒnrv kh ksjrnd v br svɒrɒn zɒnrv kh bsjɒrɣvj‌ɒnd tvkl knnd ɒmɒ bsvj ɣdvs ɒsrɒئjl nzrnknnd v xdɒvnd rɒ tlb nnmɒjnd v ɒv njz hkjm ɒst v blɒ rɒ mj‌آvrd v klɒm xvd rɒ brnxvɒhdɡrdɒnjd v bh zd xɒndɒn ʃrjrɒn v ɒʔɒnt bdkɒrɒn xvɒhd brxɒst ɒmɒ msrjɒn ɒnsɒnnd v nh xdɒv ɒsbɒn ɒjʃɒn d͡ʒsdnd v nh rvh v xdɒvnd dst xvd rɒ drɒz mj‌knd v ɒʔɒnt knndh rɒ lɣzɒn v ɒʔɒnt krdh ʃdh rɒ ɒftɒn ɡrdɒnjdh hr dvj ɒjʃɒn hlɒk xvɒhnd ʃd zjrɒ xdɒvnd bh mn t͡ʃnjn ɡfth ɒst t͡ʃnɒnkh ʃjr v ʃjr ʒjɒn br ʃkɒr xvd ɣrʃ mj‌nmɒjdhŋɒmj kh ɡrvh ʃbɒnɒn brvj d͡ʒmʔ ʃvnd v ɒzsdɒj ɒjʃɒn ntrsjdh ɒz ɣvɣɒj ɒjʃɒn sr frvnmj آvrd hmt͡ʃnɒn jhvh sbɒjvt nzvl mj‌frmɒjd tɒ brɒj kvh shjvn v tl آn mɣɒtlh nmɒjd msl mrɣɒn kh dr tjrɒn bɒʃnd hmt͡ʃnɒn jhvh sbɒjvt ɒvrʃljm rɒ hmɒjt xvɒhd nmvd vhmɒjt krdh، آn rɒ rstɡɒr xvɒhd sɒxt v ɒzآn drɡzʃth، xlɒsj xvɒhd dɒd ‌ɒj bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl bsvj آn ks kh br vj bjnhɒjt ʔsjɒn vrzjdh‌ɒjd bɒzɡʃt nmɒjjd zjrɒ kh dr آn rvz hr kdɒm ɒz ɒjʃɒn bthɒj nɣrh vbthɒj tlɒj xvd rɒ kh dsthɒj ʃmɒ آnhɒ rɒ bh d͡ʒht ɡnɒh xvjʃ sɒxth ɒst trk xvɒhndnmvd آŋɒh آʃvr bh ʃmʃjrj kh ɒz ɒnsɒn nbɒʃd xvɒhd ɒftɒd v tjɣj kh ɒz ɒnsɒn nbɒʃd ɒv rɒhlɒk xvɒhd sɒxt v ɒv ɒz ʃmʃjr xvɒhdɡrjxt v d͡ʒvɒnɒnʃ xrɒd͡ʒ ɡzɒr xvɒhnd ʃdvsxrh ɒv ɒz trs zɒjl xvɒhd ʃd v srvrɒnʃ ɒzʔlm mbhvt xvɒhnd ɡrdjd jhvh kh آtʃ ɒv drshjvn v kvrh vj dr ɒvrʃljm ɒst ɒjn rɒmj ɡvjd vsxrh ɒv ɒz trs zɒjl xvɒhd ʃd v srvrɒnʃ ɒzʔlm mbhvt xvɒhnd ɡrdjd jhvh kh آtʃ ɒv drshjvn v kvrh vj dr ɒvrʃljm ɒst ɒjn rɒmj ɡvjd ɒjnk پɒdʃɒhj bh ʔdɒlt sltnt xvɒhd nmvd v srvrɒn bh ɒnsɒf hkmrɒnj xvɒhnd krd v mrdj msl پnɒh ɡɒhj ɒz bɒd v پvʃʃj ɒz tvfɒn xvɒhd bvd v mɒnndd͡ʒvjhɒj آb dr d͡ʒɒj xʃk v sɒjh sxrh ʔzjm dr zmjn tʔb آvrndh xvɒhd bvd vt͡ʃʃmɒn bjnndɡɒn tɒr nxvɒhd ʃd v ɡvʃhɒj ʃnvndɡɒn ɒsɣɒ xvɒhd krd v dl ʃtɒbndɡɒn mʔrft rɒ xvɒhd fhmjd v zbɒn ɒlknɒn klɒm fsjh rɒ bh ɒrtd͡ʒɒl xvɒhd ɡft v mrd lئjm bɒr djɡrkrjm xvɒndh nxvɒhd ʃd v mrd xsjs nd͡ʒjb ɡfth nxvɒhd ɡrdjd zjrɒ mrd lئjm bh lɒmt mtklm xvɒhd ʃd v dlʃ ʃrɒrt rɒ bʔml xvɒhd آvrd tɒ nfɒɣ rɒ bd͡ʒɒ آvrdh، bh zd xdɒvndbh zlɒlt sxn ɡvjd v d͡ʒɒn ɡrsŋɒn rɒ thj knd v آb tʃŋɒn rɒ dvr nmɒjd آlɒt mrd lئjm njz zʃt ɒst v tdɒbjr ɣbjh mj‌nmɒjd tɒ mskjnɒn rɒ bh sxnɒn drvɣ hlɒk nmɒjd، hŋɒmj kh mskjnɒn bh ɒnsɒf sxn mj‌ɡvjnd ɒmɒ mrdkrjm tdbjrhɒj krjmɒnh mj‌nmɒjd v bh krm پɒjdɒrxvɒhd ʃd ‌ɒj znɒn mtmئn brxɒsth، آvɒz mrɒ bʃnvjd vɒj dxtrɒn ɒjmn sxn mrɒ ɡvʃ ɡjrjd ‌ɒj dxtrɒn ɒjmn bʔd ɒz jk sɒl v t͡ʃnd rvzj mztrb xvɒhjd ʃd zɒnrv kh t͡ʃjdn ɒŋvr ɣtʔ mj‌ʃvd v d͡ʒmʔ krdn mjvh‌hɒ nxvɒhd bvd ‌ɒj znɒn mtmئn blrzjd v‌ɒj dxtrɒn ɒjmn mztrb ʃvjd lbɒs rɒ kndh، brhnh ʃvjd v پlɒs br mjɒn xvd bbndjd brɒj mzrʔh hɒj dlپsnd vmvhɒj bɒrvr sjnh xvɒhnd zd br zmjn ɣvm mn xɒr v xs xvɒhd rvjjd blkh br hmh xɒnh hɒj ʃɒdmɒnj dr ʃhr mftxr zjrɒ kh ɣsr mnhdm vʃhr mʔmvr mtrvk xvɒhd ʃd v ʔvfl vdjdh bɒŋɒh bh bjʃh‌ɒj sbɒʔ v mhl tfrd͡ʒ xrɒn vhʃj v mrtʔ ɡlh‌hɒ tɒ bh ɒbd mbdl xvɒhd ʃd tɒ zmɒnj kh rvh ɒz ɒʔlj ʔljjn br mɒ rjxth ʃvd v bjɒbɒn bh bvstɒn mbdl ɡrdd v bvstɒn bh d͡ʒŋl mhsvb ʃvd آŋɒh ɒnsɒf dr bjɒbɒn sɒkn xvɒhd ʃd v ʔdɒlt dr bvstɒn mɣjm xvɒhd ɡrdjd v ʔml ʔdɒlt slɒmtj vntjd͡ʒh ʔdɒlt آrɒmj v ɒtmjnɒn xvɒhd bvd tɒɒbdɒlɒbɒd v ɣvm mn dr mskn slɒmtj v drmsɒkn mtmئn v dr mnzlhɒj آrɒmj sɒkn xvɒhnd ʃd v hjn frvd آmdn d͡ʒŋl tɡrɡ xvɒhd bɒrjd v ʃhr bh drkh ɒsfl xvɒhd ɒftɒdxvʃɒbhɒl ʃmɒ kh br hmh آbhɒ txm mj‌kɒrjdv پɒjhɒj ɡɒv v ɒlɒɣ rɒ rhɒ mj‌sɒzjd xvʃɒbhɒl ʃmɒ kh br hmh آbhɒ txm mj‌kɒrjdv پɒjhɒj ɡɒv v ɒlɒɣ rɒ rhɒ mj‌sɒzjd vɒj br tv‌ɒj ɣɒrtɡr kh ɣɒrt nʃdj vɒj xjɒnt kɒrj kh bɒ tv xjɒnt nvrzjdnd hŋɒmj kh ɣɒrt rɒ bh ɒtmɒm rsɒnjdj ɣɒrt xvɒhj ʃd v zmɒnj kh ɒz xjɒnt nmvdn dst brdɒʃtj bh tv xjɒnt xvɒhnd vrzjd ‌ɒj xdɒvnd br mɒ trhm frmɒ zjrɒ kh mntzr tvmj bɒʃjm v hr bɒmdɒd bɒzvj ɒjʃɒn bɒʃ v dr zmɒn tŋj njz nd͡ʒɒt mɒ bʃv ɒz آvɒz ɣvɣɒ، ɣvm hɒɡrjxtnd v t͡ʃvn xvjʃtn rɒ brɒfrɒzj ɒmt hɒپrɒkndh xvɒhnd ʃd v ɣɒrt ʃmɒ rɒ d͡ʒmʔ xvɒhnd krd btvrj kh mvrɒn d͡ʒmʔ mj‌nmɒjnd vbr آn xvɒhnd d͡ʒhjd btvrj kh mlxhɒ mj‌d͡ʒhnd xdɒvnd mtʔɒl mj‌bɒʃd zɒnrv kh drɒʔlj ʔljjn sɒkn ɒst v shjvn rɒ ɒz ɒnsɒf vʔdɒlt mmlv xvɒhd sɒxt v frɒvɒnj nd͡ʒɒt vhkmt v mʔrft ɒstɣɒmt ɒvɣɒt tv xvɒhd ʃd v trs xdɒvnd xzjnh ɒv xvɒhd bvd ɒjnk ʃd͡ʒɒʔɒn ɒjʃɒn dr bjrvn frjɒd mj‌knnd v rsvlɒn slɒmtj zɒr‌zɒr ɡrjh mj‌nmɒjnd ʃɒhrɒhhɒvjrɒn
