brɡhɒj xvd rɒ rjxth‌ɒnd xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh ɒlɒn brmj xjzm v hɒl xvd rɒ brmj ɒfrɒzm v ɒknvn mtʔɒl xvɒhm ɡrdjd v ʃmɒ ɒz kɒh hɒmlh ʃdh، xs xvɒhjd zɒjjd v nfs ʃmɒ آtʃj ɒst kh ʃmɒ rɒ xvɒhdsvzɒnjd v ɣvm‌hɒ msl آhk svxth v mɒnndxɒrhɒj ɣtʔ ʃdh kh ɒz آtʃ mʃtʔl ɡrddxvɒhnd ʃd ‌ɒj ʃmɒ kh dvr hstjd آnt͡ʃh rɒ kh krdh‌ɒm bʃnvjd v‌ɒj ʃmɒ kh nzdjk mj‌bɒʃjd d͡ʒbrvt mrɒ bdɒnjd ɡnɒh kɒrɒnj kh dr shjvn ɒndmj trsnd v lrzh mnɒfɣɒn rɒ frv ɡrfth ɒst، vmj ɡvjnd kjst ɒz mɒ kh dr آtʃ svzndh sɒkn xvɒhd ʃd v kjst ɒz mɒ kh dr nɒrhɒj d͡ʒɒvdɒnj sɒkn xvɒhd ɡrdjd؟ ɒmɒ آnkh bh sdɒɣt sɒlk bɒʃd v bh ɒstɣɒmt tklm nmɒjd v svd zlm rɒ xvɒr ʃmɒrd v dst xvjʃ rɒ ɒz ɡrftn rʃvh bjfʃɒnd v ɡvʃ xvd rɒ ɒz ɒsɣɒj xvn rjzj bbndd v t͡ʃʃmɒn xvd rɒ ɒz djdn bdjhɒ br hm knd، ɒv dr mkɒn hɒj blnd sɒkn xvɒhd ʃd vmld͡ʒɒj ɒv mlɒz sxrh‌hɒ xvɒhd bvd nɒn ɒv dɒdh xvɒhd ʃd v آb ɒv ɒjmn xvɒhd bvd t͡ʃʃmɒnt پɒdʃɒh rɒ dr zjbɒjjʃ xvɒhddjd v zmjn bj‌پɒjɒn rɒ xvɒhd ŋrjst dl tvmtzkr آn xvf xvɒhd ʃd vxvɒhj ɡft kd͡ʒɒ ɒst nvjsndh v kd͡ʒɒ ɒst vzn knndh xrɒd͡ʒ v kd͡ʒɒ ɒst ʃmɒrndh brd͡ʒhɒ ɣvm stm پjʃh v ɣvm dʃvɒr lɣt rɒ kh nmj tvɒnj ʃnjd vɒlkn zbɒn rɒ kh nmj tvɒnj fhmjd bɒr djɡrnxvɒhj djd shjvn ʃhr d͡ʒʃn mɣds mɒ rɒmlɒhzh nmɒ v t͡ʃʃmɒnt ɒvrʃljm mskn slɒmtj rɒ xvɒhd djd jʔnj xjmh‌ɒj rɒ kh mntɣl nʃvd vmjxhɒjʃ kndh ŋrdd v hjt͡ʃkdɒm ɒz tnɒbhɒjʃ ɡsjxth nʃvd blkh dr آnd͡ʒɒ xdɒvndzvɒld͡ʒlɒl brɒj mɒ mkɒn d͡ʒvjhɒj آb v nhrhɒj vsjʔ xvɒhd bvd kh dr آn hjt͡ʃ kʃtj bɒ پɒrvhɒdɒxl nxvɒhd ʃd v sfjnh bzrɡ ɒz آn ʔbvrnxvɒhd krd zjrɒ xdɒvnd dɒvr mɒ ɒst xdɒvnd ʃrjʔt dhndh mɒ ɒst xdɒvnd پɒdʃɒh mɒ ɒst پs mɒ rɒ nd͡ʒɒt xvɒhd dɒd rjsmɒnhɒj tv sst bvd kh پɒjh dkl xvd rɒntvɒnst mhkm ŋɒh dɒrd v bɒdbɒn rɒ ntvɒnst bɡʃɒjd، آŋɒh ɣɒrt bsjɒr tɣsjm ʃd v lŋɒn ɣnjmt rɒ brdndljkn sɒkn آn nxvɒhd ɡft kh bjmɒr hstm v ɡnɒh ɣvmj kh dr آn sɒkn bɒʃndآmrzjdh xvɒhd ʃd ljkn sɒkn آn nxvɒhd ɡft kh bjmɒr hstm v ɡnɒh ɣvmj kh dr آn sɒkn bɒʃndآmrzjdh xvɒhd ʃd ɒj ɒmt‌hɒ nzdjk آjjd tɒ bʃnvjd v‌ɒj ɣvm‌hɒ ɒsɣɒ nmɒjjd d͡ʒhɒn v پrj آn bʃnvnd rbʔ mskvn v hrt͡ʃh ɒz آn sɒdr bɒʃd zjrɒ kh ɣzb xdɒvnd br tmɒmj ɒmt‌hɒ v xʃm vj br d͡ʒmjʔ lʃkrhɒj ɒjʃɒn ɒst پs ɒjʃɒn rɒbh hlɒkt sپrdh، bɣtl tsljm nmvdh ɒst vkʃtɡɒn ɒjʃɒn dvr ɒfkndh mj‌ʃvnd v ʔfvnt lɒʃhɒj ɒjʃɒn brmj آjd v ɒz xvn ɒjʃɒn kvhhɒɡdɒxth mj‌ɡrdd v tmɒmj lʃkr آsmɒn ɒz hm xvɒhnd پɒʃjd v آsmɒn msl tvmɒr پjt͡ʃjdh xvɒhd ʃd v tmɒmj lʃkr آn پʒmrdh xvɒhndɡʃt، btvrjkh brɡ ɒz mv brjzd v msl mjvh nɒrs ɒz drxt ɒnd͡ʒjr zjrɒ kh ʃmʃjr mn drآsmɒn sjrɒb ʃdh ɒst v ɒjnk br ɒdvm v brɣvm mɣzvb mn brɒj dɒvrj nɒzl mj‌ʃvd ʃmʃjr xdɒvnd پr xvn ʃdh v ɒz پjh frbh ɡrdjdh ɒst jʔnj ɒz xvn brh‌hɒ v bzhɒ v ɒz پjh ɡrdh ɣvt͡ʃhɒ zjrɒ xdɒvnd rɒ dr bsrh ɣrbɒnj ɒst v zbh ʔzjmj dr zmjn ɒdvm v ɡɒvɒn vhʃj bɒآnhɒ xvɒhnd ɒftɒd v ɡvsɒlh‌hɒ bɒ ɡɒvɒn nr v zmjn ɒjʃɒn ɒz xvn sjrɒb ʃdh، xɒk ɒjʃɒn ɒz پjh frbh xvɒhd ʃd zjrɒ xdɒvnd rɒ rvz ɒntɣɒm v sɒl ʔɣvbt bh d͡ʒht dʔvj shjvn xvɒhd bvd v nhrhɒj آn bh ɣjr v ɣbɒr آn bh kbrjt mbdl xvɒhd ʃd vzmjnʃ ɣjr svzndh xvɒhd ɡʃt ʃb v rvzxɒmvʃ nʃdh، dvdʃ tɒ bh ɒbd xvɒhd brآmd nslɒ bʔd nsl xrɒb xvɒhd mɒnd kh ksj tɒɒbdɒlɒbɒd dr آn ɡzr nknd blkh mrɣ sɣɒ vxɒrپʃt آn rɒ tsrf xvɒhnd krd v bvm vɣrɒb dr آn sɒkn xvɒhnd ʃd v rjsmɒn xrɒbj v ʃɒɣvl vjrɒnj rɒ br آn xvɒhd kʃjd v ɒzɒʃrɒf آn ksj dr آnd͡ʒɒ nxvɒhd bvd kh ɒv rɒ bh پɒdʃɒhj bxvɒnnd v d͡ʒmjʔ rvsɒjʃ njst xvɒhnd ʃd v dr ɣsrhɒjʃ xɒrhɒ xvɒhdrvjjd v dr ɣlʔh hɒjʃ xsk v ʃtr xɒr v mskn ɡrɡ v xɒnh ʃtrmrɣ xvɒhd ʃd v vhvʃ bjɒbɒn bɒ ʃɣɒl xvɒhnd brxvrd v ɣvl bh rfjɣ xvd ndɒ xvɒhd dɒd v ʔfrjt njz dr آnd͡ʒɒ mɒvɒɡzjdh، brɒj xvd آrɒmɡɒhj xvɒhd jɒft drآnd͡ʒɒ tjrmɒr آʃjɒnh sɒxth، txm xvɒhd nhɒd v brآn nʃsth، bt͡ʃh hɒj xvd rɒ zjr sɒjh xvd d͡ʒmʔ xvɒhd krd v dr آnd͡ʒɒ krkshɒ bɒ jkdjɡr d͡ʒmʔ xvɒhnd ʃd ɒz ktɒb xdɒvnd tftjʃ nmvdh، mtɒlʔh knjd jkj ɒz ɒjnhɒ ɡm nxvɒhd ʃd v jkj d͡ʒft xvd rɒ mfɣvd nxvɒhd jɒft zjrɒ kh dhɒn ɒv ɒjn rɒ ɒmr frmvdh v rvh ɒv ɒjnhɒ rɒ d͡ʒmʔ krdh ɒstv ɒv brɒj آnhɒ ɣrʔh ɒndɒxth v dst ɒvآn rɒ bh d͡ʒht آnhɒ bɒ rjsmɒn tɣsjm nmvdh ɒst v tɒ ɒbdɒlɒbɒd mtsrf آn xvɒhnd ʃd v nslɒ bʔdnsl dr آn skvnt xvɒhnd dɒʃt v ɒv brɒj آnhɒ ɣrʔh ɒndɒxth v dst ɒvآn rɒ bh d͡ʒht آnhɒ bɒ rjsmɒn tɣsjm nmvdh ɒst v tɒ ɒbdɒlɒbɒd mtsrf آn xvɒhnd ʃd v nslɒ bʔdnsl dr آn skvnt xvɒhnd dɒʃt bjɒbɒn v zmjn xʃk ʃɒdmɒn xvɒhdʃd v shrɒ bh vd͡ʒd آmdh، msl ɡl srx xvɒhd ʃkft ʃkvfh bsjɒr nmvdh، bɒʃɒdmɒnj v trnm ʃɒdj xvɒhd krd ʃvkt lbnɒn v zjbɒjj krml v ʃɒrvn bh آn ʔtɒ xvɒhd ʃd d͡ʒlɒl jhvh v zjbɒjj xdɒj mɒ rɒ mʃɒhdh xvɒhndnmvd dsthɒj sst rɒ ɣvj sɒzjd v zɒnvhɒj lrzndh rɒ mhkm ɡrdɒnjd bh dlhɒj xɒئf bɡvjjd ɣvj ʃvjd v mtrsjd ɒjnk xdɒj ʃmɒ bɒɒntɣɒm mj‌آjd ɒv bɒ ʔɣvbt ɒlhj mj‌آjd v ʃmɒ rɒnd͡ʒɒt xvɒhd dɒd آŋɒh t͡ʃʃmɒn kvrɒn bɒz xvɒhd ʃd vɡvʃhɒj krɒn mftvh xvɒhd ɡrdjd آŋɒh lŋɒn msl ɣzɒl d͡ʒst v xjz xvɒhnd nmvd vzbɒn ɡŋ xvɒhd srɒjjd zjrɒ kh آbhɒ dr bjɒbɒn vnhrhɒ dr shrɒ xvɒhd d͡ʒvʃjd v srɒb bh brkh v mkɒn hɒj xʃk bh t͡ʃʃmh hɒj آb mbdl xvɒhd ɡrdjd dr msknj kh ʃɣɒlhɒ mj‌xvɒbndʔlf v bvrjɒ v nj xvɒhd bvd v dr آnd͡ʒɒʃɒhrɒhj v trjɣj xvɒhd bvd v bh trjɣ mɣds nɒmjdh xvɒhd ʃd v nd͡ʒsɒn ɒz آn ʔbvr nxvɒhndkrd blkh آn bh d͡ʒht ɒjʃɒn xvɒhd bvd v hrkh dr آn rɒh sɒlk ʃvd ɒɡrt͡ʃh hm d͡ʒɒhl bɒʃdɡmrɒh nxvɒhd ɡrdjd ʃjrj dr آn nxvɒhd bvdv hjvɒn drndh‌ɒj br آn brnxvɒhd آmd v dr آnd͡ʒɒjɒft nxvɒhd ʃd blkh nɒd͡ʒjɒn br آn sɒlk xvɒhnd ɡʃtv fdjh ʃdɡɒn xdɒvndbɒzɡʃt nmvdh، bɒ trnm bh shjvn xvɒhnd آmd vxvʃj d͡ʒɒvdɒnj br sr ɒjʃɒn xvɒhd bvd vʃɒdmɒnj v xvʃj rɒ xvɒhnd jɒft v ɣm v nɒlh frɒr xvɒhd krd v fdjh ʃdɡɒn xdɒvndbɒzɡʃt nmvdh، bɒ trnm bh shjvn xvɒhnd آmd vxvʃj d͡ʒɒvdɒnj br sr ɒjʃɒn xvɒhd bvd vʃɒdmɒnj v xvʃj rɒ xvɒhnd jɒft v ɣm v nɒlh frɒr xvɒhd krd v dr sɒl t͡ʃhɒrdhm hzɣjɒ پɒdʃɒh vɒɣʔ ʃd kh snhɒrjb پɒdʃɒh آʃvr brtmɒmj ʃhrhɒj hsɒrdɒr jhvdɒ brآmdh، آnhɒ rɒtsxjr nmvd v پɒdʃɒh آʃvr rbʃɒɣj rɒ ɒzlɒkjʃ bh ɒvrʃljm nzd hzɣjɒ پɒdʃɒh bɒ mvkb ʔzjm frstɒd v ɒv nzd ɣnɒt brkh fvɣɒnj bh rɒh mzrʔh ɡɒzr ɒjstɒd v ɒljɒɣjm bn hlɣjɒ kh nɒzrxɒnh bvd v ʃbnɒj kɒtb v jvآx bn آsɒf vɣɒjʔ ŋɒr nzd vj bjrvn آmdnd v rbʃɒɣj bh ɒjʃɒn ɡft «bh hzɣjɒ bɡvjjd sltɒn ʔzjm پɒdʃɒh آʃvr t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒjn ɒʔtmɒd ʃmɒ kh brآn tvkl mj‌nmɒjjd t͡ʃjst؟ mj‌ɡvjm kh mʃvrt v ɣvt d͡ʒŋ sxnɒn bɒtl ɒst ɒlɒn kjst kh br ɒv tvkl nmvdh‌ɒj kh bh mn ʔɒsj ʃdh‌ɒj؟ hɒn br ʔsɒj ɒjn nj xrd ʃdh jʔnj br msr tvkl mj‌nmɒjj kh ɒɡr ksj br آn tkjh knd bh‌dstʃ frv rfth، آn rɒ md͡ʒrvh mj‌sɒzd hmt͡ʃnɒn ɒst frʔvn پɒdʃɒh msr brɒj hmɡɒnj kh br vj tvkl nmɒjnd v ɒɡr mrɒ ɡvjj kh brjhvh xdɒj xvd tvkl dɒrjm آjɒ ɒv آn njst kh hzɣjɒ mkɒn hɒj blnd v mzbh hɒj ɒv rɒ brdɒʃth ɒst v bh jhvdɒ v ɒvrʃljm ɡfth kh پjʃ ɒjn mzbh sd͡ʒdh nmɒjjd؟ پs hɒl bɒ آɣɒjm پɒdʃɒh آʃvrʃrt bbnd v mn dv hzɒr ɒsb bh tv mj‌dhm ɒɡr ɒzd͡ʒɒnb xvd svɒrɒn br آnhɒ tvɒnj ɡzɒʃt پs t͡ʃɡvnh rvj jk vɒlj ɒz kvt͡ʃktrjn bndɡɒn آɣɒjm rɒ xvɒhj brɡrdɒnjd v br msr bh d͡ʒht ɒrɒbh‌hɒ vsvɒrɒn tvkl dɒrj؟ v آjɒ mn ɒlɒn bj‌ɒzn jhvh br ɒjn zmjn bh d͡ʒht xrɒbj آn brآmdh‌ɒm؟ jhvh mrɒ ɡfth ɒst br ɒjn zmjn brآj v آn rɒ xrɒb kn» آŋɒh ɒljɣɒjm v ʃbnɒ v jvآx bh rbʃɒɣj ɡftnd «tmnɒ ɒjnkh bɒ bndɡɒnt bh zbɒn آrɒmj ɡftɡvnmɒjj zjrɒ آn rɒ mj‌fhmjm v bɒ mɒ bh zbɒn jhvd drɡvʃ mrdmj kh br hsɒrnd ɡftɡv mnmɒj» rbʃɒɣj ɡft «آjɒ آɣɒjm mrɒ nzd آɣɒjt v tvfrstɒdh ɒst tɒ ɒjn sxnɒn rɒ bɡvjm؟ mɡr mrɒnzd mrdɒnj kh br hsɒr nʃsth‌ɒnd nfrstɒdh، tɒɒjʃɒn bɒ ʃmɒ nd͡ʒɒst xvd rɒ bxvrnd v bvl xvdrɒ bnvʃnd» پs rbʃɒɣj bɒjstɒd v bh آvɒz blnd bh zbɒn jhvd sdɒ zdh، ɡft «sxnɒn sltɒn ʔzjm پɒdʃɒh آʃvr rɒ bʃnvjd پɒdʃɒh t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd hzɣjɒ ʃmɒ rɒ frjb ndhd zjrɒ kh ʃmɒrɒ nmj tvɒnd rhɒnjd v hzɣjɒ ʃmɒ rɒ br jhvh mtmئn nsɒzd v ŋvjd kh jhvh ɒlbth mɒ rɒ xvɒhdrhɒnjd v ɒjn ʃhr bh‌dst پɒdʃɒh آʃvr tsljm nxvɒhd ʃd bh hzɣjɒ ɡvʃ mdhjd zjrɒ kh پɒdʃɒh آʃvr t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd bɒ mn slh knjd vnzd mn bjrvn آjjd tɒ hrks ɒz mv xvd v hr ks ɒz ɒnd͡ʒjr xvd bxvrd v hr ks ɒz آb t͡ʃʃmh xvd bnvʃd tɒ bjɒjm v ʃmɒ rɒ bh zmjn mɒnndzmjn xvdtɒn bjɒvrm jʔnj bh zmjn ɣlh v ʃjrh vzmjn nɒn v tɒkstɒnhɒ mbɒdɒ hzɣjɒ ʃmɒ rɒ frjb dhd v ɡvjd jhvh mɒ rɒ xvɒhd rhɒnjd آjɒhjt͡ʃkdɒm ɒz xdɒjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ zmjn xvd rɒ ɒz dst پɒdʃɒh آʃvr rhɒnjdh ɒst؟ xdɒjɒn hmɒt vɒrfɒd kd͡ʒɒjnd v xdɒjɒn sfrvɒjm kd͡ʒɒ v آjɒ sɒmrh rɒ ɒz dst mn rhɒnjdh‌ɒnd؟ ɒz d͡ʒmjʔ xdɒjɒn ɒjn zmjnhɒ kdɒmnd kh zmjn xvjʃ rɒ ɒz dst mn nd͡ʒɒt dɒdh‌ɒnd tɒ jhvh ɒvrʃljm rɒ ɒz dst mn nd͡ʒɒt dhd؟» ɒmɒ ɒjʃɒn skvt nmvdh، bh ɒvhjt͡ʃ d͡ʒvɒb ndɒdnd zjrɒ kh پɒdʃɒh ɒmr frmvdh vɡfth bvd kh ɒv rɒ d͡ʒvɒb ndhjdپs ɒljɒɣjm bn hlɣjɒ kh nɒzr xɒnh bvd v ʃbnɒj kɒtb v jvآx bn آsɒf vɣɒjʔ ŋɒr bɒ d͡ʒɒmh drjdh nzd hzɣjɒ آmdndv sxnɒn rbʃɒɣj rɒ bh ɒv bɒz‌ɡftnd پs ɒljɒɣjm bn hlɣjɒ kh nɒzr xɒnh bvd v ʃbnɒj kɒtb v jvآx bn آsɒf vɣɒjʔ ŋɒr bɒ d͡ʒɒmh drjdh nzd hzɣjɒ آmdndv sxnɒn rbʃɒɣj rɒ bh ɒv bɒz‌ɡftnd v vɒɣʔ ʃd kh t͡ʃvn hzɣjɒ پɒdʃɒh ɒjn rɒʃnjd lbɒs xvd rɒ t͡ʃɒk zdh v پlɒs پvʃjdh، bh xɒnh xdɒvnd dɒxl ʃd v ɒljɒɣjm nɒzr xɒnh v ʃbnɒj kɒtb v mʃɒjx khnh rɒ mlbs bh پlɒs nzd ɒʃʔjɒ ɒbn آmvs nbj frstɒd v bh vj ɡftnd «hzɣjɒ t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd kh ɒmrvz rvztŋj v tɒdjb v ɒhɒnt ɒst zjrɒ kh پsrɒn bfm rhm rsjdh‌ɒnd v ɣvt zɒjjdn njst ʃɒjdjhvh xdɒjt sxnɒn rbʃɒɣj rɒ kh آɣɒjʃ پɒdʃɒh آʃvr ɒv rɒ brɒj ɒhɒnt nmvdn xdɒj hj frstɒdh ɒst bʃnvd v sxnɒnj rɒ kh jhvh xdɒjt ʃnjdh ɒst tvbjx nmɒjd پs brɒj bɣjh‌ɒj kh jɒft mj‌ʃvnd tzrʔ nmɒ» v bndɡɒn hzɣjɒ پɒdʃɒh nzd ɒʃʔjɒ آmdnd vɒʃʔjɒ bh ɒjʃɒn ɡft «bh آɣɒj xvd t͡ʃnjn ɡvjjdkh jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd ɒz sxnɒnj kh ʃnjdj kh bndɡɒn پɒdʃɒh آʃvr mrɒ bdɒnhɒ kfr ɡfth ɒndmtrs hmɒnɒ rvhj br ɒv mj‌frstm kh xbrj ʃnjdh، bh vlɒjt xvd xvɒhd brɡʃt v ɒv rɒ drvlɒjt xvdʃ bh ʃmʃjr hlɒk xvɒhm sɒxt» پs rbʃɒɣj mrɒd͡ʒʔt krdh، پɒdʃɒh آʃvr rɒjɒft kh bɒ lbnh d͡ʒŋ mj‌krd zjrɒ ʃnjdh bvd kh ɒzlɒkjʃ kvt͡ʃ krdh ɒst v ɒv drbɒrh trhɒɣh پɒdʃɒh kvʃ xbrj ʃnjd kh bh d͡ʒht mɣɒtlh bɒ tvbjrvn آmdh ɒst پs t͡ʃvn ɒjn rɒ ʃnjd bɒzɒjlt͡ʃjɒn nzd hzɣjɒ frstɒdh، ɡft «bh hzɣjɒپɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ t͡ʃnjn ɡvjjd xdɒj tv kh bh ɒv tvkl mj‌nmɒjj tv rɒ frjb ndhd v ŋvjd kh ɒvrʃljm bh‌dst پɒdʃɒh آʃvr tsljm nxvɒhd ʃd ɒjnk tv ʃnjdh‌ɒj kh پɒdʃɒhɒn آʃvr bɒ hmh vlɒjthɒ t͡ʃh krdh v t͡ʃɡvnh آnhɒ rɒ bɒlkl hlɒk sɒxth‌ɒnd v آjɒtv rhɒjj xvɒhj jɒft؟ v آjɒ xdɒjɒn ɒmt hɒjj kh پdrɒn mn آnhɒ rɒ hlɒk sɒxtnd msl d͡ʒvzɒn v hɒrɒn v rsf v bnj ʔdn kh dr tlsɒrmj bɒʃnd ɒjʃɒn rɒ nd͡ʒɒt dɒdnd پɒdʃɒh hmɒt kd͡ʒɒ ɒst v پɒdʃɒh ɒrfɒd v پɒdʃɒh ʃhr sfrvɒjm vhjnʔ v ʔvɒ؟» v hzɣjɒ mktvb rɒ ɒz dst ɒjlt͡ʃjɒn ɡrfth، آn rɒ xvɒnd v hzɣjɒ bh xɒnh xdɒvnd drآmdh، آn rɒ bh hzvr xdɒvnd پhn krd v hzɣjɒ nzdxdɒvnd dʔɒ krdh، ɡft «ɒj jhvh sbɒjvt xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl kh br krvbjɒn d͡ʒlvs mj‌nmɒjj tvjj kh btnhɒjj br tmɒmj mmɒlk d͡ʒhɒn xdɒhstj v tv آsmɒn v zmjn rɒ آfrjdh‌ɒj ‌ɒj xdɒvnd ɡvʃ xvd rɒ frɒ‌ɡrfth، bʃnv v‌ɒj xdɒvnd t͡ʃʃmɒn xvd rɒ ɡʃvdh، bbjn v hmh sxnɒn snhɒrjb rɒ kh bh d͡ʒht ɒhɒnt nmvdn xdɒj hj frstɒdh ɒst ɒstmɒʔ nmɒ ‌ɒj xdɒvnd rɒst ɒst kh پɒdʃɒhɒn آʃvr hmh mmɒlk v zmjn ɒjʃɒn rɒ xrɒb krdh v xdɒjɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh آtʃ ɒndɒxth‌ɒnd zjrɒ kh xdɒ nbvdndblkh sɒxth dst ɒnsɒn ɒz t͡ʃvb v sŋ پs bh ɒjn sbb آnhɒ rɒ tbɒh sɒxtnd پs hɒl‌ɒj jhvh xdɒj mɒ mɒ rɒ ɒz dst ɒv rhɒjj dh tɒ d͡ʒmjʔ mmɒlk d͡ʒhɒn bdɒnnd kh tv tnhɒ jhvh hstj» پs ɒʃʔjɒ ɒbn آmvs nzd hzɣjɒ frstɒdh، ɡft «jhvh xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd t͡ʃvnkh drbɒrh snhɒrjb پɒdʃɒh آʃvr nzd mn dʔɒnmvdj، klɒmj kh xdɒvnd dr bɒrh‌ɒʃ ɡfth ɒjn ɒst آn bɒkrh dxtr shjvn tv rɒ hɣjr ʃmrdh، ɒsthzɒ nmvdh ɒst v dxtr ɒvrʃljm sr xvd rɒ bh tv d͡ʒnbɒnjdh ɒst kjst kh ɒv rɒ ɒhɒnt krdh، kfr ɡfth‌ɒj v kjst kh br vj آvɒz blnd krdh، t͡ʃʃmɒn xvd rɒ bh ʔljjn ɒfrɒʃth‌ɒj؟ mɡr ɣdvs ɒsrɒئjl njst؟ bh vɒsth bndɡɒnt xdɒvnd rɒɒhɒnt krdh، ɡfth‌ɒj bh ksrt ɒrɒbh hɒj xvd brblndj kvhhɒ v bh ɒtrɒf lbnɒn brآmdh‌ɒm vblndtrjn srvhɒj آzɒdʃ v bhtrjn snvbrhɒjʃ rɒ ɣtʔ nmvdh، bh blndj ɒɣsɒjʃ v bh drxtstɒn bvstɒnʃ dɒxl ʃdh‌ɒm v mn hfrh zdh، آb nvʃjdm v bh kf پɒj xvd tmɒmj nhrhɒj msr rɒxʃk xvɒhm krd «آjɒ nʃnjdh‌ɒj kh mn ɒjn rɒ ɒz zmɒn slf krdh‌ɒm v ɒz ɒjɒm ɣdjm svrt dɒdh‌ɒm v ɒlɒn آn rɒbh vɣvʔ آvrdh‌ɒm tɒ tv bh zhvr آmdh v ʃhrhɒj hsɒr dɒr rɒ xrɒb nmvdh bh tvdh hɒj vjrɒn mbdl sɒzj ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht sɒknɒn آnhɒ km ɣvt bvdh، trsɒn v xd͡ʒl ʃdnd msl ʔlf shrɒ vɡjɒh sbz v ʔlf پʃt bɒm v msl mzrʔh ɣbl ɒz nmvkrdnʃ ɡrdjdnd ɒmɒ mn nʃstn tv rɒ v xrvd͡ʒ v dxvlt v xʃmj rɒ kh br mn dɒrj mj‌dɒnm t͡ʃvnkh xʃmj kh bh mn dɒrj v ɣrvr tv bh ɡvʃ mn brآmdh ɒst bnɒbrɒjn mhɒr xvd rɒ bh bjnj tv v lɡɒm xvd rɒ bh lbhɒjt ɡzɒʃth، tv rɒ bh rɒhj kh آmdh‌ɒj brxvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd v ʔlɒmt brɒj tv ɒjn xvɒhd bvd kh ɒmsɒl ɣlh xvdrvxvɒhjd xvrd v sɒl dvm آnt͡ʃh ɒz آn brvjd v drsɒl svm bkɒrjd v bdrvjd v tɒkstɒnhɒ ɣrs nmvdh، mjvh آnhɒ rɒ bxvrjd v bɣjh‌ɒj kh ɒzxɒndɒn jhvdɒ rstɡɒr ʃvnd bɒr djɡr bh پɒjjn rjʃh xvɒhnd zd v bh bɒlɒ mjvh xvɒhnd‌آvrd zjrɒ kh bɣjh‌ɒj ɒz ɒvrʃljm v rstɡɒrɒn ɒz kvh shjvn bjrvn xvɒhnd آmd ɣjrt jhvh sbɒjvt ɒjn rɒ bd͡ʒɒ xvɒhd آvrd bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd drbɒrh پɒdʃɒh آʃvr t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd kh bh ɒjn ʃhrdɒxl nxvɒhd ʃd v bh ɒjnd͡ʒɒ tjr nxvɒhd ɒndɒxt v dr mɣɒblʃ bɒ sپr nxvɒhd آmd v mnd͡ʒnjɣ drپjʃ ɒv brnxvɒhd ɒfrɒʃt bh rɒhj kh آmdh ɒst bh hmɒn brxvɒhd ɡʃt v bh ɒjn ʃhr dɒxl nxvɒhd ʃd xdɒvnd ɒjn rɒ mj‌ɡvjd zjrɒ kh ɒjn ʃhr rɒ hmɒjt krdh، bh‌xɒtr xvd v bh‌xɒtr bndh xvjʃ dɒvd آn rɒ nd͡ʒɒt xvɒhm dɒd» پs frʃth xdɒvnd bjrvn آmdh، sd vhʃtɒd v پnd͡ʒhzɒr nfr ɒz ɒrdvj آʃvr rɒ zd vbɒmdɒdɒn t͡ʃvn brxɒstnd ɒjnk d͡ʒmjʔ آnhɒlɒʃhɒj mrdh bvdnd v snhɒrjb پɒdʃɒh آʃvr kvt͡ʃ krdh، rvɒnh ɡrdjd v brɡʃth dr njnvj sɒkn ʃdv vɒɣʔ ʃd kh t͡ʃvn ɒv dr xɒnh xdɒj xvjʃ nsrvk ʔbɒdt mj‌krd، پsrɒnʃ ɒdrmlk v ʃrآsr ɒv rɒ bh ʃmʃjr zdnd v ɒjʃɒn bh zmjn ɒrɒrɒt frɒr krdnd v پsrʃ آsrhdvn bh‌d͡ʒɒjʃ sltnt nmvd v vɒɣʔ ʃd kh t͡ʃvn ɒv dr xɒnh xdɒj xvjʃ nsrvk ʔbɒdt mj‌krd، پsrɒnʃ ɒdrmlk v ʃrآsr ɒv rɒ bh ʃmʃjr zdnd v ɒjʃɒn bh zmjn ɒrɒrɒt frɒr krdnd v پsrʃ آsrhdvn bh‌d͡ʒɒjʃ sltnt nmvd dr آn ɒjɒm hzɣjɒ bjmɒr v mʃrf bh mvt ʃd v ɒʃʔjɒ ɒbn آmvs nbj nzd vj آmdh، ɒv rɒ ɡft «xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd tdɒrk xɒnh xvd rɒ bbjn zjrɒ kh mj‌mjrj v zndh nxvɒhj mɒnd» آŋɒh hzɣjɒ rvj xvd rɒ bsvj djvɒrbrɡrdɒnjdh، nzd xdɒvnd dʔɒ nmvd، v ɡft «ɒj xdɒvnd mstdʔj ɒjnkh bjɒd آvrj kh t͡ʃɡvnh bh hzvr tv bh ɒmɒnt v bh dl kɒml slvk nmvdh‌ɒm vآnt͡ʃh dr nzr tv پsnd bvdh ɒst bd͡ʒɒ آvrdh‌ɒm» پs hzɣjɒ zɒr‌zɒr bɡrjst v klɒm xdɒvnd br ɒʃʔjɒ nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «brv v bh hzɣjɒ bɡv jhvh xdɒj پdrt dɒvd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd dʔɒj tv rɒʃnjdm v ɒʃkhɒjt rɒ djdm ɒjnk mn br rvzhɒj tv پɒnzdh sɒl ɒfzvdm v tv rɒ v ɒjn ʃhr rɒ ɒzdst پɒdʃɒh آʃvr xvɒhm rhɒnjd v ɒjn ʃhr rɒhmɒjt xvɒhm nmvd v ʔlɒmt ɒz d͡ʒɒnb xdɒvnd kh xdɒvnd ɒjn klɒm rɒ kh ɡfth ɒst bd͡ʒɒxvɒhd آvrd ɒjn ɒst ɒjnk sɒjh drd͡ʒɒtj kh ɒz آftɒb br sɒʔt آftɒbj آhɒz پɒjjn rfth ɒst dh drd͡ʒh bh ʔɣb brmj ɡrdɒnm» پs آftɒb ɒzdrd͡ʒɒtj kh br sɒʔt آftɒbj پɒjjn rfth bvd، dh drd͡ʒh brɡʃt mktvb hzɣjɒ پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ vɣtj kh bjmɒrʃd v ɒz bjmɒrjʃ ʃfɒ jɒft mn ɡftm «ɒjnk dr fjrvzj ɒjɒm xvd bh drhɒj hɒvjh mj‌rvm v ɒzbɣjh sɒlhɒj xvd mhrvm mj‌ʃvm ɡftm xdɒvnd rɒ mʃɒhdh nmj nmɒjm xdɒvnd rɒ dr zmjn zndɡɒn nxvɒhm djd mn bɒ sɒknɒn ʔɒlm fnɒ ɒnsɒn rɒ djɡr nxvɒhm djd xɒnh mn kndh ɡrdjd vmsl xjmh ʃbɒn ɒz mn brdh ʃd msl nsɒd͡ʒ ʔmrxvd rɒ پjt͡ʃjdm ɒv mrɒ ɒz nvrd xvɒhd brjd rvz vʃb mrɒ tmɒm xvɒhj krd tɒ sbh ɒntzɒrkʃjdm msl ʃjr hmt͡ʃnjn tmɒmj ɒstxvɒnhɒjm rɒmj ʃknd rvz v ʃb mrɒ tmɒm xvɒhj krd msl پrstvk kh d͡ʒjk d͡ʒjk mj‌knd sdɒmj nmɒjm v mɒnnd fɒxth nɒlh mj‌knm v t͡ʃʃmɒnm ɒzŋrjstn bh bɒlɒ zʔjf mj‌ʃvd ɒj xdɒvnd drtŋj hstm kfjl mn bɒʃ «t͡ʃh bɡvjm t͡ʃvnkh ɒv bh mn ɡfth ɒst vxvd ɒv krdh ɒst tmɒmj sɒlhɒj xvd rɒ bh‌sbb tlxj d͡ʒɒnm آhsth xvɒhm rft ‌ɒj xdɒvnd bh ɒjn t͡ʃjzhɒ mrdmɒn zjst mj‌knnd v bh ɒjnhɒ v bs hjɒt rvh mn mj‌bɒʃd پs mrɒ ʃfɒbdh v mrɒ zndh ŋɒh dɒr ɒjnk tlxj sxt mn bɒʔs slɒmtj mn ʃd ɒz rɒh ltf d͡ʒɒnm rɒ ɒz t͡ʃɒh hlɒkt brآvrdj zjrɒ kh tmɒmj ɡnɒhɒnm rɒ bh پʃt sr xvd ɒndɒxtj zjrɒ kh hɒvjh tv rɒhmd nmj ɡvjd v mvt tv rɒ tsbjh nmj xvɒnd vآnɒnj kh bh hfrh frv mj‌rvnd bh ɒmɒnt tv ɒmjdvɒrnmj bɒʃnd zndɡɒnnd، zndɡɒnnd kh tv rɒ hmdmj ɡvjnd، t͡ʃnɒnkh mn ɒmrvz mj‌ɡvjm پdrɒn bh پsrɒn rɒstj tv rɒ tʔljm xvɒhnd dɒd xdɒvndbh d͡ʒht nd͡ʒɒt mn hɒzr ɒst، پs srvdhɒjm rɒ dr tmɒmj rvzhɒj ʔmr xvd dr xɒnh xdɒvndxvɒhjm srɒjjd» v ɒʃʔjɒ ɡfth bvd kh ɣrsj ɒz ɒnd͡ʒjr bɡjrjdv آn rɒ br dml bnhjd kh ʃfɒ xvɒhd jɒftvhzɣjɒ ɡfth bvd ʔlɒmtj kh bh xɒnh xdɒvndbrxvɒhm آmd t͡ʃjst؟ vhzɣjɒ ɡfth bvd ʔlɒmtj kh bh xɒnh xdɒvndbrxvɒhm آmd t͡ʃjst؟ dr آn zmɒn mrvdk bldɒn bn bldɒn پɒdʃɒh bɒbl mktvbj v hdjh‌ɒj nzdhzɣjɒ frstɒd zjrɒ ʃnjdh bvd kh bjmɒr ʃdh vsht jɒfth ɒst v hzɣjɒ ɒz ɒjʃɒn msrvrʃdh، xɒnh xzɒjn xvd rɒ ɒz nɣrh v tlɒ v ʔtrjɒt v rvɣn mʔtr v tmɒm xɒnh ɒslhh xvjʃ v hrt͡ʃh rɒ kh dr xzɒjn ɒv jɒft mj‌ʃd bh ɒjʃɒn nʃɒn dɒdv dr xɒnh‌ɒʃ v dr tmɒmj mmlktʃ t͡ʃjzj nbvdkh hzɣjɒ آn rɒ bh ɒjʃɒn nʃɒn ndɒd پs ɒʃʔjɒnbj nzd hzɣjɒ پɒdʃɒh آmdh، vj rɒ ɡft «ɒjn mrdmɒn t͡ʃh ɡftnd v nzd tv ɒz kd͡ʒɒ آmdnd؟» hzɣjɒɡft «ɒz d͡ʒɒj dvr jʔnj ɒz bɒbl nzd mn آmdnd» ɒv ɡft «dr xɒnh tv t͡ʃh djdnd؟» hzɣjɒ ɡft «hrt͡ʃh dr xɒnh mn ɒst djdnd v t͡ʃjzj drxzɒjn mn njst kh bh ɒjʃɒn nʃɒn ndɒdm» پs ɒʃʔjɒ bh hzɣjɒ ɡft «klɒm jhvh sbɒjvt rɒ bʃnv ɒjnk rvzhɒ mj‌آjd kh hrt͡ʃh dr xɒnh tv ɒst v آnt͡ʃh پdrɒnt tɒ ɒmrvz zxjrh krdh‌ɒnd bh bɒbl brdh xvɒhd ʃd v xdɒvndmj ɡvjd kh t͡ʃjzj ɒz آnhɒ bɒɣj nxvɒhd mɒnd vbʔzj ɒz پsrɒnt rɒ kh ɒz tv پdjd آjnd v ɒjʃɒn rɒtvljd nmɒjj xvɒhnd ɡrft v dr ɣsr پɒdʃɒh bɒbl xvɒd͡ʒh‌srɒ xvɒhnd ʃd»hzɣjɒ bh ɒʃʔjɒ ɡft «klɒm xdɒvnd kh ɡftj njkv ɒst v djɡr ɡft hrآjnh dr ɒjɒm mn slɒmtj v ɒmɒn xvɒhd bvd» hzɣjɒ bh ɒʃʔjɒ ɡft «klɒm xdɒvnd kh ɡftj njkv ɒst v djɡr ɡft hrآjnh dr ɒjɒm mn slɒmtj v ɒmɒn xvɒhd bvd» tslj dhjd ɣvm mrɒ tslj dhjd xdɒj ʃmɒ mj‌ɡvjd sxnɒn dlɒvjzbh ɒvrʃljm ɡvjjd v ɒvrɒ ndɒ knjd kh ɒd͡ʒthɒd ɒvtmɒm ʃdh v ɡnɒh vj آmrzjdh ɡrdjdh، v ɒz dst xdɒvnd brɒj tmɒmj ɡnɒhɒnʃ dv t͡ʃndɒn jɒfth ɒst sdɒj ndɒ knndh‌ɒj dr bjɒbɒn، rɒh xdɒvndrɒ mhjɒ sɒzjd v trjɣj brɒj xdɒj mɒ dr shrɒrɒst nmɒjjd hr drh‌ɒj brɒfrɒʃth v hr kvh vtlj پst xvɒhd ʃd v kd͡ʒjhɒ rɒst vnɒhmvɒrjhɒ hmvɒr xvɒhd ɡrdjd v d͡ʒlɒl xdɒvnd mkʃvf ɡʃth، tmɒmj bʃr آn rɒ bɒ hm xvɒhnd djd zjrɒ kh dhɒn xdɒvnd ɒjn rɒ ɡfth ɒst hɒtfj mj‌ɡvjd «ndɒ kn» vj ɡft «t͡ʃh t͡ʃjz rɒ ndɒ knm؟ tmɒmj bʃr ɡjɒh ɒst v hmɡj zjbɒjj‌ɒʃ msl ɡl shrɒ ɡjɒh xʃk v ɡlʃ پʒmrdh mj‌ʃvd zjrɒ nfxh xdɒvnd br آn dmjdh mj‌ʃvd ɒlbth mrdmɒn ɡjɒh hstnd ɡjɒh xʃk ʃd v ɡl پʒmrdh ɡrdjd، ljkn klɒm xdɒj mɒ tɒɒbdɒlɒbɒd ɒstvɒr xvɒhd mɒnd» ‌ɒj shjvn kh bʃɒrt mj‌dhj bh kvh blnd brآj v‌ɒj ɒvrʃljm kh bʃɒrt mj‌dhj آvɒzt rɒ bɒ ɣvt blnd kn آn rɒ blnd kn v mtrs v bh ʃhrhɒj jhvdɒ bɡv kh «hɒn xdɒj ʃmɒ ɒst» ɒjnk xdɒvnd jhvh bɒɣvt mj‌آjd v bɒzvj vj brɒjʃ hkmrɒnj mj‌nmɒjd ɒjnk ɒd͡ʒrt ɒv bɒ vj ɒst v ʔɣvbt vj پjʃ rvj ɒv mj‌آjd ɒv msl ʃbɒn ɡlh xvd rɒ xvɒhd t͡ʃrɒnjd v bh bɒzvj xvd brh‌hɒ rɒd͡ʒmʔ krdh، bh آɣvʃ xvjʃ xvɒhd ɡrft vʃjr dhndɡɒn rɒ bh mlɒjmt rhbrj xvɒhd krd kjst kh آbhɒ rɒ bh kf dst xvd پjmvdh vɒflɒk rɒ bɒ vd͡ʒb ɒndɒzh krdh v ɣbɒr zmjn rɒ drkjl ɡnd͡ʒɒnjdh v kvhhɒ rɒ bh ɣپɒn v tlhɒ rɒ bh trɒzvvzn nmvdh ɒst؟ kjst kh rvh xdɒvnd rɒ ɣɒnvn dɒdh jɒ mʃjrɒv bvdh ɒv rɒ tʔljm dɒdh bɒʃd ɒv ɒz kh mʃvrt xvɒst tɒ bh ɒv fhm bxʃd v trjɣ rɒstj rɒ bh ɒvbjɒmvzd؟ v kjst kh ɒv rɒ mʔrft آmvxt v rɒh ftɒnt rɒ bh ɒv tʔljm dɒd؟ ɒjnk ɒmt‌hɒ msl ɣtrh dlv v mɒnnd ɣbɒr mjzɒn ʃmrdh mj‌ʃvnd ɒjnk d͡ʒzjrh‌hɒ rɒ msl ɡrd brmj dɒrd v lbnɒn bh d͡ʒht hjzm kɒfj njst v hjvɒnɒtʃ brɒj ɣrbɒnj svxtnj kfɒjt nmj knd tmɒmj ɒmt‌hɒ bnzrvj hjt͡ʃnd v ɒz ʔdm v btɒlt nzd vj kmtrmj nmɒjnd پs xdɒ rɒ bh kh tʃbjh mj‌knjd v kdɒm ʃbh rɒ bɒ ɒv brɒbr mj‌tvɒnjd krd؟ snʔtɡrbt rɒ mj‌rjzd v zrɡr آn rɒ bh tlɒ mj‌پvʃɒnd، vznd͡ʒjrhɒj nɣrh brɒjʃ mj‌rjzd ksj‌kh ɒsttɒʔt t͡ʃnjn hdɒjɒ ndɒʃth bɒʃd drxtj rɒ kh nmj پvsd ɒxtjɒr mj‌knd v snʔtɡr mɒhrj rɒmj tlbd tɒ btj rɒ kh mthrk nʃvd brɒj ɒv bsɒzd آjɒ ndɒnsth vnʃnjdh‌ɒjd v ɒz ɒbtdɒ bh ʃmɒxbr dɒdh nʃdh ɒst v ɒz bnjɒd zmjn nfhmjdh‌ɒjd؟ ɒv ɒst kh br krh zmjn nʃsth ɒst vsɒknɒnʃ msl mlx mj‌bɒʃnd ɒvst kh آsmɒnhɒrɒ msl پrdh mj‌ɡstrɒnd v آnhɒ rɒ msl xjmh bh d͡ʒht skvnt پhn mj‌knd kh ɒmjrɒn rɒ lɒʃj mj‌ɡrdɒnd v dɒvrɒn d͡ʒhɒn rɒ mɒnnd btɒlt mj‌sɒzd hnvz ɣrs nʃdh v kɒʃth ŋrdjdh‌ɒnd v tnh آnhɒ hnvz dr zmjn rjʃh nzdh ɒst، kh fɣt br آnhɒ mj‌dmd v پʒmrdh mj‌ʃvnd vɡrd bɒd آnhɒ rɒ msl kɒh mj‌rbɒjd پs mrɒ bh kh tʃbjh mj‌knjd tɒ bɒ vj msɒvj bɒʃm؟ ɣdvs mj‌ɡvjd t͡ʃʃmɒn xvdrɒ bh ʔljjn brɒfrɒʃth bbjnjd kjst kh ɒjnhɒ rɒآfrjd v kjst kh lʃkr ɒjnhɒ rɒ bʃmɒrh bjrvn آvrdh، d͡ʒmjʔ آnhɒ rɒ bnɒm mj‌xvɒnd؟ ɒz ksrt ɣvt v ɒz ʔzmt tvɒnɒjj vj jkj ɒz آnhɒ ɡm nxvɒhd ʃd ‌ɒj jʔɣvb t͡ʃrɒ fkr mj‌knj v‌ɒj ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃrɒ mj‌ɡvjj «rɒh mn ɒz xdɒvnd mxfj ɒst v xdɒj mn ɒnsɒf mrɒ ɒz dst dɒdh ɒst» آjɒ ndɒnsth v nʃnjdh‌ɒj kh xdɒj srmdj jhvh آfrjnndh ɒɣsɒj zmjn drmɒndh v xsth nmj ʃvd v fhm ɒv rɒ tfhs ntvɒn krd؟ zʔjfɒn rɒ ɣvt mj‌bxʃd v nɒtvɒnɒn rɒ ɣdrt zjɒdh ʔtɒ mj‌nmɒjd htj d͡ʒvɒnɒn hm drmɒndh v xsth mj‌ɡrdnd v ʃd͡ʒɒʔɒn bklj mj‌ɒftndɒmɒ آnɒnj kh mntzr xdɒvnd mj‌bɒʃnd ɣvt tɒzh xvɒhnd jɒft v msl ʔɣɒb پrvɒz xvɒhnd krd xvɒhnd dvjd v xsth nxvɒhnd ʃd xvɒhndxrɒmjd v drmɒndh nxvɒhnd ɡrdjd ɒmɒ آnɒnj kh mntzr xdɒvnd mj‌bɒʃnd ɣvt tɒzh xvɒhnd jɒft v msl ʔɣɒb پrvɒz xvɒhnd krd xvɒhnd dvjd v xsth nxvɒhnd ʃd xvɒhndxrɒmjd v drmɒndh nxvɒhnd ɡrdjd ɒj d͡ʒzjrh‌hɒ bh hzvr mn xɒmvʃ ʃvjd v ɣbjlh‌hɒ ɣvt tɒzh bhm rsɒnnd nzdjk bjɒjnd آŋɒh tklm nmɒjnd bɒ hm bh mhɒkmh nzdjk bjɒjjm kjst kh ksj rɒ ɒz mʃrɣ brɒŋjxt kh ʔdɒlt ɒv rɒ nzd پɒjhɒj vj mj‌xvɒnd؟ ɒmt‌hɒ rɒ bh vj tsljm mj‌knd v ɒv rɒbr پɒdʃɒhɒn mslt mj‌ɡrdɒnd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ msl ɣbɒr bh ʃmʃjr vj v msl kɒh kh پrɒkndh mj‌ɡrddbh kmɒn vj tsljm xvɒhd nmvd ɒjʃɒn rɒtʔɒɣb nmvdh، bh rɒhj kh bɒ پɒjhɒj xvd nrfth bvdbslɒmtj xvɒhd ɡzʃt kjst kh ɒjn rɒ ʔml nmvdh v bd͡ʒɒ آvrdh، v tbɣɒt rɒ ɒz ɒbtdɒ dʔvt nmvdh ɒst؟ mn kh jhvh v ɒvl v bɒ آxrjn mj‌bɒʃm mn hstm d͡ʒzjrh‌hɒ djdnd v trsjdnd vɒɣsɒj zmjn blrzjdnd v tɣrb d͡ʒsth، آmdnd hr ks hmsɒjh xvd rɒ ɒʔɒnt krd v bh brɒdrxvd ɡft ɣvj‌dl bɒʃ nd͡ʒɒr zrɡr rɒ v آnkh bɒt͡ʃkʃ sjɣl mj‌knd sndɒn znndh rɒ tɣvjt mj‌nmɒjd v dr bɒrh lhjm mj‌ɡvjd kh xvb ɒst v آn rɒ bh mjxhɒ mhkm mj‌sɒzd tɒ mthrk nʃvd ɒmɒ tv‌ɒj ɒsrɒئjl bndh mn v‌ɒj jʔɣvb kh tvrɒ brɡzjdh‌ɒm v‌ɒj zrjt dvst mn ɒbrɒhjm kh tv rɒ ɒz ɒɣsɒj zmjn ɡrfth، tv rɒ ɒz krɒnh hɒjʃ xvɒndh‌ɒm v bh tv ɡfth‌ɒm tv bndh mn hstj، tv rɒbrɡzjdm v trk nnmvdm mtrs zjrɒ kh mn bɒ tvhstm v mʃvʃ mʃv zjrɒ mn xdɒj tv hstm tvrɒ tɣvjt xvɒhm nmvd v ɒlbth tv rɒ mʔɒvnt xvɒhm dɒd v tv rɒ bh‌dst rɒst ʔdɒlt xvddstɡjrj xvɒhm krd ɒjnk hmh آnɒnj kh brtv xʃm dɒrnd xd͡ʒl v rsvɒ xvɒhnd ʃd v آnɒnj kh bɒ tv mʔɒrzh nmɒjnd nɒt͡ʃjz ʃdh، hlɒk xvɒhnd ɡrdjd آnɒnj rɒ kh bɒ tv md͡ʒɒdlh nmɒjndd͡ʒstd͡ʒv krdh، nxvɒhj jɒft v آnɒnj kh bɒ tvd͡ʒŋ knnd njst v nɒbvd xvɒhnd ʃd zjrɒ mn kh jhvh xdɒj tv hstm dst rɒst tv rɒ ɡrfth، bh tv mj‌ɡvjm mtrs zjrɒ mn tv rɒ nsrt xvɒhm dɒd ‌ɒj krm jʔɣvb v ʃrzmh ɒsrɒئjl mtrs zjrɒ xdɒvnd v ɣdvs ɒsrɒئjl kh vlj tvmj bɒʃd mj‌ɡvjd mn tv rɒ nsrt xvɒhm dɒd ɒjnk tv rɒ ɡrdvn tjz nv dndɒnh dɒr xvɒhm sɒxt v kvhhɒ rɒ پɒjmɒl krdh، xrd xvɒhj nmvd v tlhɒ rɒ msl kɒh xvɒhj sɒxt آnhɒ rɒxvɒhj ɒfʃɒnd v bɒd آnhɒ rɒ brdɒʃth، ɡrdbɒd آnhɒ rɒپrɒkndh xvɒhd sɒxt ljkn tv ɒz xdɒvndʃɒdmɒn xvɒhj ʃd v bh ɣdvs ɒsrɒئjl fxrxvɒhj nmvd fɣjrɒn v mskjnɒn آb rɒ mj‌d͡ʒvjnd vnmj jɒbnd v zbɒn ɒjʃɒn ɒz tʃŋj xʃk mj‌ʃvd mn kh jhvh hstm ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒd͡ʒɒbt xvɒhm nmvd xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl hstm ɒjʃɒn rɒ trk nxvɒhm krd br tlhɒj xʃk nhrhɒ v dr mjɒn vɒdjhɒt͡ʃʃmh‌hɒ d͡ʒɒrj xvɒhm nmvd v bjɒbɒn rɒ bh brkh آb v zmjn xʃk rɒ bh t͡ʃʃmh hɒj آb mbdl xvɒhm sɒxt dr bjɒbɒn srv آzɒd v ʃtjm v آs v drxt zjtvn rɒ xvɒhm ɡzɒʃt v drshrɒ snvbr v kɒd͡ʒ v t͡ʃnɒr rɒ bɒ hm ɣrs xvɒhm nmvd tɒ bbjnnd v bdɒnnd v tfkr nmvdh، bɒ hm tɒml nmɒjnd kh dst xdɒvnd ɒjn rɒ krdh vɣdvs ɒsrɒئjl ɒjn rɒ ɒjd͡ʒɒd nmvdh ɒst xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd dʔvj xvd rɒ پjʃ آvrjdv پɒdʃɒh jʔɣvb mj‌ɡvjd brɒhjn ɣvj xvjʃ rɒʔrzh dɒrjd آnt͡ʃh rɒ kh vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃdnzdjk آvrdh، brɒj mɒ ɒʔlɒm nmɒjnd t͡ʃjzhɒj پjʃjn rɒ v kjfjt آnhɒ rɒ bjɒn knjd tɒ tfkr nmvdh، آxr آnhɒ rɒ bdɒnjm jɒ t͡ʃjzhɒj آjndh rɒ bh mɒbʃnvɒnjd v t͡ʃjzhɒ rɒ kh bʔd ɒz ɒjn vɒɣʔ xvɒhdʃd bjɒn knjd tɒ bdɒnjm kh ʃmɒ xdɒjɒnjd bɒrj njkvjj jɒ bdj rɒ bd͡ʒɒ آvrjd tɒ mltft ʃdh، bɒ hm mlɒhzh nmɒjjm ɒjnk ʃmɒ nɒt͡ʃjz hstjd vʔml ʃmɒ hjt͡ʃ ɒst v hr‌kh ʃmɒ rɒ ɒxtjɒr kndrd͡ʒs ɒst ksj rɒ ɒz ʃmɒl brɒŋjxtm v ɒv xvɒhdآmd v ksj rɒ ɒz mʃrɣ آftɒb kh ɒsm mrɒ xvɒhdxvɒnd v ɒv br srvrɒn msl brɡl xvɒhd آmd vmɒnnd kvzh‌ɡrj kh ɡl rɒ پɒjmɒl mj‌knd kjst kh ɒz ɒbtdɒ xbr dɒd tɒ bdɒnjm v ɒz ɣbl tɒbɡvjjm kh ɒv rɒst ɒst ɒlbth xbr dhndh‌ɒj njst v ɒʔlɒm knndh‌ɒj nj v ksj hm njst kh sxnɒn ʃmɒ rɒ bʃnvd ɒvl bh shjvn ɡftm kh ɒjnk hɒn ɒjn t͡ʃjzhɒ xvɒhd rsjd v bh ɒvrʃljm bʃɒrt dhndh‌ɒj bxʃjdm v ŋrjstm v ksj jɒft nʃd v dr mjɒn ɒjʃɒn njz mʃvrt dhndh‌ɒj nbvd kh t͡ʃvn ɒz ɒjʃɒn svɒl nmɒjm d͡ʒvɒb tvɒnddɒdɒjnk d͡ʒmjʔ ɒjʃɒn bɒtlnd v ɒʔmɒl ɒjʃɒn hjt͡ʃ ɒst v bthɒj rjxth ʃdh ɒjʃɒn bɒd v btɒlt ɒst ɒjnk d͡ʒmjʔ ɒjʃɒn bɒtlnd v ɒʔmɒl ɒjʃɒn hjt͡ʃ ɒst v bthɒj rjxth ʃdh ɒjʃɒn bɒd v btɒlt ɒst ɒjnk bndh mn kh ɒv rɒ dstɡjrj nmvdm v brɡzjdh mn kh d͡ʒɒnm ɒz ɒv xʃnvdɒst، mn rvh xvd rɒ br ɒv mj‌nhm tɒ ɒnsɒf rɒbrɒj ɒmt‌hɒ sɒdr sɒzd ɒv frjɒd nxvɒhd zd vآvɒz xvd rɒ blnd nxvɒhd nmvd v آn rɒ drkvt͡ʃh‌hɒ nxvɒhd ʃnvɒnjd nj xrd ʃdh rɒnxvɒhd ʃkst v ftjlh zʔjf rɒ xɒmvʃ nxvɒhd sɒxt tɒ ʔdɒlt rɒ bh rɒstj sɒdrɡrdɒnd ɒv zʔjf nxvɒhd ɡrdjd v mnksrnxvɒhd ʃd tɒ ɒnsɒf rɒ br zmjn ɣrɒr dhd vd͡ʒzjrh‌hɒ mntzr ʃrjʔt ɒv bɒʃnd xdɒ jhvh kh آsmɒnhɒ rɒ آfrjd v آnhɒ rɒ پhn krd v zmjn v ntɒjd͡ʒ آn rɒ ɡstrɒnjd v nfs rɒ bh ɣvmj kh dr آn bɒʃndv rvh rɒ br آnɒnj kh dr آn sɒlknd mj‌dhd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «mn kh jhvh hstm tv rɒ bh ʔdɒlt xvɒndh‌ɒm v dst tv rɒ ɡrfth، tv rɒ ŋɒh xvɒhm dɒʃt v tv rɒ ʔhd ɣvm v nvr ɒmt‌hɒ xvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd tɒ t͡ʃʃmɒn kvrɒn rɒ bɡʃɒjj v ɒsjrɒn rɒ ɒz zndɒn v nʃjnndɡɒn dr zlmt rɒ ɒz mhbs bjrvn آvrj mn jhvh hstm v ɒsm mn hmjn ɒst v d͡ʒlɒl xvd rɒ bh ksj djɡr v stɒjʃ xvjʃ rɒ bh bthɒj trɒʃjdh nxvɒhm dɒd ɒjnk vɣɒjʔ nxstjn vɒɣʔ ʃd v mn ɒz t͡ʃjzhɒj nv ɒʔlɒm mj‌knm v ɣbl ɒz آnkh bvd͡ʒvd آjd ʃmɒ rɒ ɒz آnhɒxbr mj‌dhm» ‌ɒj ʃmɒ kh bh drjɒ frvd mj‌rvjd v ɒj آnt͡ʃh dr آn ɒst ɒj d͡ʒzjrh‌hɒ v sɒknɒn آnhɒsrvd nv rɒ bh xdɒvnd v stɒjʃ vj rɒ ɒz ɒɣsɒj zmjn bsrɒjjd shrɒ v ʃhrhɒjʃ vɣrjh hɒjj kh ɒhl ɣjdɒr dr آnhɒ sɒkn bɒʃnd آvɒzxvd rɒ blnd nmɒjnd v sɒknɒn sɒlʔ trnm nmvdh، ɒzɣlh kvhhɒ nʔrh znnd brɒj xdɒvnd d͡ʒlɒl rɒtvsjf nmɒjnd v tsbjh ɒv rɒ dr d͡ʒzjrh hɒbxvɒnnd xdɒvnd msl d͡ʒbɒr bjrvn mj‌آjd vmɒnnd mrd d͡ʒŋj ɣjrt xvjʃ rɒ brmj ɒŋjzɒnd frjɒd krdh، nʔrh xvɒhd zd v br dʃmnɒn xvjʃ ɣlbh xvɒhd nmvd ɒz zmɒn ɣdjm xɒmvʃ vsɒkt mɒndh، xvddɒrj nmvdm ɒlɒn msl znj kh mj‌zɒjd nʔrh xvɒhm zd v dm zdh آh xvɒhm kʃjd kvhhɒ v tlhɒ rɒ xrɒb krdh، tmɒmj ɡjɒh آnhɒ rɒxʃk xvɒhm sɒxt v nhrhɒ rɒ d͡ʒzɒjr xvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd v brkh‌hɒ rɒ xʃk xvɒhm sɒxt vkvrɒn rɒ bh rɒhj kh ndɒnsth‌ɒnd rhbrj nmvdh، ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh trjɣ hɒjj kh ʔɒrf njstnd hdɒjt xvɒhm nmvd zlmt rɒ پjʃ ɒjʃɒn bh nvr v kd͡ʒj rɒ bh rɒstj mbdl xvɒhm sɒxt ɒjn kɒrhɒ rɒ bd͡ʒɒآvrdh، ɒjʃɒn rɒ rhɒ nxvɒhm nmvd آnɒnj kh brbthɒj trɒʃjdh ɒʔtmɒd dɒrnd v bh ɒsnɒm rjxth ʃdh mj‌ɡvjnd kh xdɒjɒn mɒ ʃmɒjjd bh ʔɣb brɡrdɒnjdh، bsjɒr xd͡ʒl xvɒhnd ʃd ‌ɒj krɒn bʃnvjd v‌ɒj kvrɒn nzr knjd tɒbbjnjd kjst kh msl bndh mn kvr bɒʃd vkjst kh kr bɒʃd msl rsvl mn kh mj‌frstm؟ t͡ʃjzhɒj bsjɒr mj‌bjnj ɒmɒ ŋɒh nmj dɒrj ɡvʃhɒ rɒ mj‌ɡʃɒjd ljkn xvdnmj ʃnvd xdɒvnd rɒ bh‌xɒtr ʔdl xvdپsnd آmd kh ʃrjʔt xvjʃ rɒ tʔzjm v tkrjm nmɒjd ljkn ɒjnɒn ɣvm ɣɒrt v tɒrɒd͡ʒ ʃdh‌ɒnd vd͡ʒmjʔ ɒjʃɒn dr hfrh‌hɒ sjd ʃdh v dr zndɒnhɒmxfj ɡrdjdh‌ɒnd ɒjʃɒn ɣɒrt ʃdh v rhɒnndh‌ɒj njst tɒrɒd͡ʒ ɡʃth v ksj nmj ɡvjd kh bɒz dh kjst dr mjɒn ʃmɒ kh bh ɒjn ɡvʃ dhd vtvd͡ʒh nmvdh، brɒj zmɒn آjndh bʃnvd kjst kh jʔɣvb rɒ bh tɒrɒd͡ʒ v ɒsrɒئjl rɒ bh ɣɒrt tsljm nmvd؟ آjɒ xdɒvnd nbvd kh bh ɒv ɡnɒh vrzjdjm t͡ʃvnkh ɒjʃɒn bh rɒhhɒj ɒv nxvɒstndslvk nmɒjnd v ʃrjʔt ɒv rɒ ɒtɒʔt nnmvdndbnɒbrɒjn hdt ɣzb xvd v ʃdt d͡ʒŋ rɒ brɒjʃɒn rjxt v آn ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz hr trf mʃtʔl sɒxt v ndɒnstnd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ svzɒnjd ɒmɒ tfkrnnmvdnd bnɒbrɒjn hdt ɣzb xvd v ʃdt d͡ʒŋ rɒ brɒjʃɒn rjxt v آn ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz hr trf mʃtʔl sɒxt v ndɒnstnd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ svzɒnjd ɒmɒ tfkrnnmvdnd v ɒlɒn xdɒvnd kh آfrjnndh tv‌ɒj jʔɣvb، v sɒnʔ tv‌ɒj ɒsrɒئjl ɒst t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «mtrs zjrɒ kh mn tv rɒ fdjh dɒdm v tv rɒ bh ɒsmt xvɒndm پs tv ɒz آn mn hstj t͡ʃvn ɒz آbhɒ bɡzrj mn bɒ tv xvɒhm bvd v t͡ʃvn ɒz nhrhɒ ʔbvrnmɒjj tv rɒ frvnxvɒhnd ɡrft vt͡ʃvn ɒz mjɒn آtʃ rvj، svxth nxvɒhj ʃd vʃʔlh‌ɒʃ tv rɒ nxvɒhd svzɒnjd zjrɒ mn jhvh xdɒj tv v ɣdvs ɒsrɒئjl nd͡ʒɒt‌dhndh tvhstm msr rɒ fdjh tv sɒxtm v hbʃ v sbɒ rɒ bh ʔvz tv dɒdm t͡ʃvnkh dr nzr mn ɡrɒnbhɒ v mkrm bvdj v mn tv rɒ dvst mj‌dɒʃtm پs mrdmɒn rɒ bh ʔvz tv v tvɒjf rɒ dr ʔvz d͡ʒɒn tv tsljm xvɒhm nmvd mtrs zjrɒ kh mn bɒ tvhstm v zrjt tv rɒ ɒz mʃrɣ xvɒhm آvrd v tv rɒɒz mɣrb d͡ʒmʔ xvɒhm nmvd bh ʃmɒl xvɒhm ɡft kh bdh v bh d͡ʒnvb kh mmɒnʔt mkn پsrɒn mrɒ ɒz d͡ʒɒj dvr v dxtrɒnm rɒ ɒz krɒnhɒj zmjn bjɒvr jʔnj hr‌kh rɒ bh ɒsm mn nɒmjdh ʃvdv ɒv rɒ bh d͡ʒht d͡ʒlɒl xvjʃ آfrjdh v ɒv rɒmsvr nmvdh v sɒxth bɒʃm» ɣvmj rɒ kh t͡ʃʃm dɒrnd ɒmɒ kvr hstnd v ɡvʃ dɒrnd ɒmɒ krmj bɒʃnd bjrvn آvr d͡ʒmjʔ ɒmt‌hɒ bɒ hm d͡ʒmʔ ʃvnd v ɣbjlh‌hɒ frɒhm آjnd پs dr mjɒn آnhɒkjst kh ɒz ɒjn xbr dhd v ɒmvr ɒvljn rɒ bh mɒɒʔlɒm nmɒjd ʃhvd xvd rɒ bjɒvrnd tɒ tsdjɣ ʃvnd jɒ ɒstmɒʔ nmvdh، ɒɣrɒr bknnd kh ɒjn rɒst ɒst jhvh mj‌ɡvjd kh «ʃmɒ v bndh mn kh ɒv rɒbrɡzjdh‌ɒm ʃhvd mn mj‌bɒʃjd tɒ dɒnsth، bh mn ɒjmɒn آvrjd v bfhmjd kh mn ɒv hstm v پjʃ ɒz mn xdɒjj msvr nʃdh v bʔd ɒz mn hm nxvɒhd ʃd mn، mn jhvh hstm v ɣjr ɒz mn nd͡ʒɒt‌dhndh‌ɒj njst mn ɒxbɒr nmvdh v nd͡ʒɒt dɒdh‌ɒm v ɒʔlɒm nmvdh v drmjɒn ʃmɒ xdɒj ɣjr nbvdh ɒst xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh ʃmɒ ʃhvd mn hstjd v mn xdɒ hstm v ɒz ɒmrvz njz mn ɒv mj‌bɒʃm vksj‌kh ɒz dst mn tvɒnd rhɒnjd njst mn ʔml xvɒhm nmvd v kjst kh آn rɒ rd nmɒjd؟» xdɒvnd kh vlj ʃmɒ v ɣdvs ɒsrɒئjl ɒst t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «bxɒtr ʃmɒ bh bɒbl frstɒdm v hmh ɒjʃɒn rɒ msl frɒrjɒn frvd xvɒhm آvrd vkldɒnjɒn rɒ njz dr kʃtjhɒj vd͡ʒd ɒjʃɒn mn xdɒvnd ɣdvs ʃmɒ hstm آfrjnndh ɒsrɒئjl v پɒdʃɒh ʃmɒ» xdɒvnd kh rɒhj dr drjɒ v trjɣj drآbhɒj ʔzjm mj‌sɒzd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «آnkh ɒrɒbh‌hɒ v ɒsbhɒ v lʃkr v ɣvt آn rɒ bjrvn mj‌آvrd، ɒjʃɒn bɒ hm xvɒhnd xvɒbjd v nxvɒhndbrxɒst v mntfj ʃdh، msl ftjlh xɒmvʃ xvɒhnd ʃd t͡ʃjzhɒj ɒvljn rɒ bjɒd njɒvrjd vdr ɒmvr ɣdjm tfkr nnmɒjjd ɒjnk mn t͡ʃjznvjj bvd͡ʒvd mj‌آvrm v آn ɒlɒn bzhvr mj‌آjd آjɒآn rɒ nxvɒhjd dɒnst؟ bdrstj kh rɒhj drbjɒbɒn v nhrhɒ dr hɒmvn ɣrɒr xvɒhm dɒd hjvɒnɒt shrɒ ɡrɡɒn v ʃtrmrɣhɒ mrɒ tmd͡ʒjdxvɒhnd nmvd t͡ʃvnkh آb dr bjɒbɒn v nhrhɒ drshrɒ bvd͡ʒvd mj‌آvrm tɒ ɣvm xvd v brɡzjdɡɒn xvjʃ rɒ sjrɒb nmɒjm ɒjn ɣvm rɒ brɒj xvdɒjd͡ʒɒd krdm tɒ tsbjh mrɒ bxvɒnnd ɒmɒ tv‌ɒj jʔɣvb mrɒ nxvɒndj v tv‌ɒj ɒsrɒئjl ɒz mn bh tŋ آmdj ɡvsfndɒn ɣrbɒnj hɒj svxtnj xvd rɒ brɒj mn njɒvrdj v bh zbɒjh xvd mrɒtkrjm nnmvdj bh hdɒjɒ bndɡj br tv nnhɒdm v bh bxvr tv rɒ bh tŋ njɒvrdm nj mʔtr rɒ bh d͡ʒht mn bh nɣrh nxrjdj v bh پjh zbɒjh xvjʃ mrɒ sjr nsɒxtj blkh bh ɡnɒhɒn xvd br mn bndɡj nhɒdj v bh xtɒjɒj xvjʃ mrɒ bh tŋ آvrdj mn hstm mn kh bxɒtr xvd xtɒjɒj tv rɒmhv sɒxtm v ɡnɒhɒn tv rɒ bjɒd nxvɒhm آvrd mrɒ jɒd bdh tɒ bɒ hm mhɒkmh nmɒjjm hd͡ʒt xvdrɒ bjɒvr tɒ tsdjɣ ʃvj ɒd͡ʒdɒd ɒvljn tv ɡnɒh vrzjdnd v vɒsth hɒj tv bh mn ʔɒsj ʃdndbnɒbrɒjn mn srvrɒn ɣds rɒ bj‌ɒhtrɒm xvɒhm sɒxt v jʔɣvb rɒ bh lʔnt v ɒsrɒئjl rɒ bh dʃnɒm tsljm xvɒhm nmvd bnɒbrɒjn mn srvrɒn ɣds rɒ bj‌ɒhtrɒm xvɒhm sɒxt v jʔɣvb rɒ bh lʔnt v ɒsrɒئjl rɒ bh dʃnɒm tsljm xvɒhm nmvd ɒmɒ ɒlɒn‌ɒj bndh mn jʔɣvb bʃnv v‌ɒj ɒsrɒئjl kh tv rɒ brɡzjdh‌ɒm xdɒvndkh tv rɒ آfrjdh v tv rɒ ɒz rhm bsrʃt v mʔɒvn tv mj‌bɒʃd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒj bndh mn jʔɣvb mtrs v‌ɒj jʃrvn kh tv rɒ brɡzjdh‌ɒm ɒjnk brzmjn tʃnh آb xvɒhm rjxt v nhrhɒbrxʃk rvh xvd rɒ br zrjt tv xvɒhm rjxt v brkt xvjʃ rɒ br ɒvlɒd tv v ɒjʃɒn dr mjɒn sbzh‌hɒ، msl drxtɒn bjd br d͡ʒvjhɒj آb xvɒhndrvjjd jkj xvɒhd ɡft kh mn ɒz آn xdɒvndhstm v djɡrj xvjʃtn rɒ bh nɒm jʔɣvb xvɒhdxvɒnd v djɡrj bdst xvd brɒj xdɒvndxvɒhd nvʃt v xvjʃtn rɒ bh nɒm ɒsrɒئjl mlɣb xvɒhd sɒxt xdɒvnd پɒdʃɒh ɒsrɒئjl v jhvh sbɒjvt kh vlj ɒjʃɒn ɒst t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd mn ɒvl hstm vmn آxr hstm v ɣjr ɒz mn xdɒjj njst v msl mn kjst kh آn rɒ ɒʔlɒn knd v bjɒn nmɒjd v آn rɒtrtjb dhd، ɒz zmɒnj kh ɣvm ɣdjm rɒ brɣrɒrnmvdm پs t͡ʃjzhɒj آjndh v آnt͡ʃh rɒ kh vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd ɒʔlɒn bnmɒjnd trsɒn v hrɒsɒn mbɒʃjd آjɒ ɒz zmɒn ɣdjm tv rɒ ɒxbɒr v ɒʔlɒm nnmvdm v آjɒ ʃmɒ ʃhvd mn njstjd؟ آjɒ ɣjr ɒz mn xdɒjj hst؟ ɒlbth sxrh‌ɒj njst v ɒhdj rɒ nmj ʃnɒsm» آnɒnj kh bthɒj trɒʃjdh mj‌sɒzndd͡ʒmjʔ bɒtlnd v t͡ʃjzhɒjj kh ɒjʃɒn mj‌پsndndfɒjdh‌ɒj ndɒrd v ʃhvd ɒjʃɒn nmj bjnnd vnmj dɒnnd tɒ xd͡ʒɒlt bkʃnd kjst kh xdɒjj sɒxth jɒ btj rjxth bɒʃd kh nfʔj ndɒrd؟ ɒjnk d͡ʒmjʔ jɒrɒn ɒv xd͡ʒl xvɒhnd ʃd vsnʔtɡrɒn ɒz ɒnsɒn mj‌bɒʃnd پs d͡ʒmjʔ ɒjʃɒn d͡ʒmʔ ʃdh، bɒjstnd tɒ bɒ hm trsɒn v xd͡ʒl ɡrdnd آhn rɒ bɒ tjʃh mj‌trɒʃd v آn rɒ dr zɣɒl kɒr mj‌knd v bɒ t͡ʃkʃ svrt mj‌dhd v bɒ ɣvt bɒzvj xvjʃ آn rɒ mj‌sɒzd v njz ɡrsnh ʃdh، bj‌ɣvt mj‌ɡrdd v آb nnvʃjdh، zʔf bhm mj‌rsɒnd t͡ʃvb rɒ mj‌trɒʃd v rjsmɒn rɒkʃjdh، bɒ ɣlm آn rɒ nʃɒn mj‌knd v bɒ rndh آn rɒsɒf mj‌sɒzd v bɒ پrɡɒr nʃɒn mj‌knd پs آn rɒ bh ʃbjh ɒnsɒn v bh d͡ʒmɒl آdmj mj‌sɒzd tɒ dr xɒnh sɒkn ʃvd srvhɒj آzɒd brɒj xvd ɣtʔ mj‌knd v sndjɒn v blvt rɒ ɡrfth، آnhɒ rɒ ɒzdrxtɒn d͡ʒŋl brɒj xvd ɒxtjɒr mj‌knd vʃmʃɒd rɒ ɣrs nmvdh، bɒrɒn آn rɒ nmv mj‌dhd پs brɒj ʃxs bh d͡ʒht svxt bkɒrmj آjd v ɒz آn ɡrfth، xvd rɒ ɡrm mj‌knd v آn rɒɒfrvxth nɒn mj‌پzd v xdɒjj sɒxth، آn rɒmj پrstd v ɒz آn btj sɒxth، پjʃ آn sd͡ʒdh mj‌knd bʔzj ɒz آn rɒ dr آtʃ mj‌svzɒnd vbr bʔzj ɡvʃt پxth mj‌xvrd v kbɒb rɒ brʃth krdh، sjr mj‌ʃvd v ɡrm ʃdh، mj‌ɡvjd vh ɡrm ʃdh، آtʃ rɒ djdm v ɒz bɣjh آn xdɒjj jʔnj bt xvjʃ rɒ mj‌sɒzd v پjʃ آn sd͡ʒdh krdh، ʔbɒdt mj‌knd v nzd آn dʔɒ nmvdh، mj‌ɡvjd mrɒ nd͡ʒɒt bdh t͡ʃvnkh tv xdɒj mn hstj ɒjʃɒn nmj dɒnnd v nmj fhmnd zjrɒ kh t͡ʃʃmɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒbsth ɒst tɒ nbjnnd v dl ɒjʃɒn rɒ tɒ tʔɣl nnmɒjnd v tfkr nnmvdh، mʔrft v ftɒntj ndɒrnd tɒbɡvjnd nsf آn rɒ dr آtʃ svxtjm v br zɣɒlʃ njz nɒn پxtjm v ɡvʃt rɒ kbɒb krdh، xvrdjm پs آjɒ ɒz bɣjh آn btj bsɒzjm v bh tnh drxt sd͡ʒdh nmɒjjm؟ xɒkstr rɒ xvrɒk xvdmj sɒzd v dl frjb xvrdh ɒv rɒ ɡmrɒh mj‌knd kh d͡ʒɒn xvd rɒ ntvɒnd rhɒnjd v fkr nmj nmɒjd kh آjɒdr dst rɒst mn drvɣ njst «ɒj jʔɣvb v‌ɒj ɒsrɒئjl ɒjnhɒ rɒ bjɒdآvrt͡ʃvnkh tv bndh mn hstj tv rɒ srʃtm‌ɒj ɒsrɒئjl tv bndh mn hstj ɒz mn frɒmvʃ nxvɒhj ʃd tɣsjrhɒj tv rɒ msl ɒbr ɣljz v ɡnɒhɒnt rɒ mɒnnd ɒbr mhv sɒxtm پs nzd mn bɒzɡʃt nmɒzjrɒ tv rɒ fdjh krdh‌ɒm ‌ɒj آsmɒnhɒ trnm nmɒjjd zjrɒ kh xdɒvnd ɒjn rɒ krdh ɒst v‌ɒj ɒsflhɒj zmjn frjɒd brآvrjd v‌ɒj kvhhɒ vd͡ʒŋlhɒ v hr drxtj kh dr آnhɒ bɒʃd bsrɒjjd zjrɒ xdɒvnd jʔɣvb rɒ fdjh krdh ɒst vxvjʃtn rɒ dr ɒsrɒئjl tmd͡ʒjd xvɒhd nmvd» xdɒvnd kh vlj tv ɒst v tv rɒ ɒz rhm srʃth ɒst t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd mn jhvh hstm vhmh‌t͡ʃjz rɒ sɒxtm آsmɒnhɒ rɒ bh tnhɒjj ɡstrɒnjdm v zmjn rɒ پhn krdm v bɒ mn kh bvd آnkh آjɒt kɒzbɒn rɒ bɒtl mj‌sɒzd vd͡ʒɒdvɡrɒn rɒ ɒhmɣ mj‌ɡrdɒnd v hkjmɒn rɒbʔɣb brmj ɡrdɒnd v ʔlm ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh d͡ʒhɒlt tbdjl mj‌knd kh sxnɒn bndɡɒn xvd rɒ brɣrɒr mj‌dɒrd v mʃvrt rsvlɒn xvjʃ rɒ bh ɒnd͡ʒɒm mj‌rsɒnd، kh drbɒrh ɒvrʃljm mj‌ɡvjdmʔmvr xvɒhd ʃd v drbɒrh ʃhrhɒj jhvdɒ kh bnɒxvɒhd ʃd v xrɒbj hɒj آn rɒ brپɒ xvɒhm dɒʃt آnkh bh ld͡ʒh mj‌ɡvjd kh xʃk ʃv vnhrhɒjt rɒ xʃk xvɒhm sɒxtv drbɒrh kvrʃ mj‌ɡvjd kh ɒv ʃbɒn mn ɒst v tmɒmj msrt mrɒ bh ɒtmɒm xvɒhd rsɒnjd v drbɒrh ɒvrʃljm mj‌ɡvjd bnɒ xvɒhd ʃd v drbɒrh hjkl kh bnjɒd tv nhɒdh xvɒhd ɡʃt» v drbɒrh kvrʃ mj‌ɡvjd kh ɒv ʃbɒn mn ɒst v tmɒmj msrt mrɒ bh ɒtmɒm xvɒhd rsɒnjd v drbɒrh ɒvrʃljm mj‌ɡvjd bnɒ xvɒhd ʃd v drbɒrh hjkl kh bnjɒd tv nhɒdh xvɒhd ɡʃt» xdɒvnd bh msjh xvjʃ jʔnj bh kvrʃ kh dst rɒst ɒv rɒ ɡrftm tɒ bh hzvr vj ɒmt‌hɒ rɒ mɣlvb sɒzm v kmrhɒj پɒdʃɒhɒn rɒ bɡʃɒjm tɒ drhɒ rɒ bh hzvr vj mftvh nmɒjm v drvɒzh‌hɒ djɡr bsth nʃvd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd kh «mn پjʃ rvj tv xvɒhm xrɒmjd vd͡ʒɒjhɒj nɒhmvɒr rɒ hmvɒr xvɒhm sɒxt vdrhɒj brnd͡ʒjn rɒ ʃksth، پʃt bndhɒj آhnjn rɒxvɒhm brjd v ɡnd͡ʒhɒj zlmt v xzɒjn mxfj rɒ bh tv xvɒhm bxʃjd tɒ bdɒnj kh mn jhvh kh tv rɒbh ɒsmt xvɒndh‌ɒm xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl mj‌bɒʃm bh‌xɒtr bndh xvd jʔɣvb v brɡzjdh xvjʃ ɒsrɒئjl، hŋɒmj kh mrɒ nʃnɒxtj tv rɒ bh ɒsmt xvɒndm v mlɣb sɒxtm mn jhvh hstm vdjɡrj njst v ɣjr ɒz mn xdɒjj nj mn kmr tvrɒ bstm hŋɒmj kh mrɒ nʃnɒxtj tɒ ɒz mʃrɣ آftɒb v mɣrb آn bdɒnnd kh svɒj mn ɒhdj njst mn jhvh hstm v djɡrj nj پdjdآvrndh nvr v آfrjnndh zlmt sɒnʔ slɒmtj vآfrjnndh bdj mn jhvh sɒnʔ hmh ɒjn t͡ʃjzhɒ hstm ‌ɒj آsmɒnhɒ ɒz bɒlɒ bbɒrɒnjd tɒ ɒflɒk ʔdɒlt rɒ frv rjzd v zmjn bʃkɒfd tɒ nd͡ʒɒt vʔdɒlt nmv knnd v آnhɒ rɒ bɒ hm brvjɒnd zjrɒ kh mn jhvh ɒjn rɒ آfrjdh‌ɒm vɒj brksj‌kh bɒ sɒnʔ xvd t͡ʃvn sfɒlj bɒ sfɒlhɒj zmjn mxɒsmh nmɒjd آjɒ kvzh bh kvzh‌ɡr bɡvjd t͡ʃh t͡ʃjz rɒsɒxtj؟ jɒ msnvʔ tv drbɒrh tv bɡvjd kh ɒvdst ndɒrd؟ vɒj br ksj‌kh bh پdr xvdɡvjd t͡ʃh t͡ʃjz rɒ tvljd nmvdj v bh zn kh t͡ʃh zɒjjdj xdɒvnd kh ɣdvs ɒsrɒئjl v sɒnʔ آn mj‌bɒʃd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd drbɒrh ɒmvr آjndh ɒzmn svɒl nmɒjjd v پsrɒn mrɒ v ɒʔmɒl dsthɒj mrɒbh mn tfvjz nmɒjjd mn zmjn rɒ sɒxtm vɒnsɒn rɒ br آn آfrjdm dsthɒj mn آsmɒnhɒ rɒɡstrɒnjd v mn tmɒmj lʃkrhɒj آnhɒ rɒ ɒmrfrmvdm mn ɒv rɒ bh ʔdɒlt brɒŋjxtm v tmɒmj rɒhhɒjʃ rɒ rɒst xvɒhm sɒxt ʃhr mrɒ bnɒkrdh، ɒsjrɒnm rɒ آzɒd xvɒhd nmvd، ɒmɒ nh brɒj ɣjmt v nh brɒj hdjh jhvh sbɒjvt ɒjn rɒmj ɡvjd» xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «hɒsl msr vtd͡ʒɒrt hbʃ v ɒhl sbɒ kh mrdɒn blnd ɣdmj bɒʃnd nzd tv ʔbvr nmvdh، ɒz آn tv xvɒhndbvd v tɒbʔ tv ʃdh dr znd͡ʒjrhɒ xvɒhnd آmd vپjʃ tv xm ʃdh v nzd tv ɒltmɒs nmvdh، xvɒhndɡft ɒlbth xdɒ dr tv ɒst v djɡrj njst vxdɒjj nj» ‌ɒj xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl v nd͡ʒɒt‌dhndh jɣjn xdɒjj hstj kh xvd rɒ پnhɒn mj‌knj d͡ʒmjʔ ɒjʃɒn xd͡ʒl v rsvɒ xvɒhndʃd v آnɒnj kh bthɒ mj‌sɒznd bɒ hm bh rsvɒjj xvɒhnd rft ɒmɒ ɒsrɒئjl bh nd͡ʒɒt d͡ʒɒvdɒnj ɒz xdɒvnd nɒd͡ʒj xvɒhnd ʃd v tɒ ɒbdɒlɒbɒd xd͡ʒl v rsvɒ nxvɒhnd ɡrdjd zjrɒ jhvh آfrjnndh آsmɒn kh xdɒ ɒst kh zmjn rɒ srʃt v sɒxt v آn rɒ ɒstvɒr nmvd v آn rɒ ʔbs njɒfrjd blkh bh d͡ʒht skvnt msvr nmvd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «mn jhvh hstm v djɡrj njst dr xfɒ v drd͡ʒɒjj ɒz zmjn tɒrjk tklm nnmvdm v bh zrjh jʔɣvb ŋftm kh mrɒ ʔbs btlbjd mn jhvh bh ʔdɒlt sxn mj‌ɡvjm v t͡ʃjzhɒj rɒst rɒ ɒʔlɒn mj‌nmɒjm ‌ɒj rhɒʃdɡɒn ɒz ɒmt‌hɒ d͡ʒmʔ ʃdh، bjɒjjd v bɒ hm nzdjk ʃvjd آnɒnj kh t͡ʃvb bthɒj xvd rɒ brmj dɒrnd v nzd xdɒjj kh ntvɒnd rhɒnjddʔɒ mj‌nmɒjnd mʔrft ndɒrnd پs ɒʔlɒn nmvdh، ɒjʃɒn rɒ nzdjk آvrjd tɒ bɒ jkdjɡrmʃvrt nmɒjnd kjst kh ɒjn rɒ ɒz ɒjɒm ɣdjm ɒʔlɒn nmvdh v ɒz zmɒn slf ɒxbɒr krdh ɒst؟ آjɒ nh mn kh jhvh hstm v ɣjr ɒz mn xdɒjj djɡrnjst؟ xdɒj ʔɒdl v nd͡ʒɒt‌dhndh v svɒj mn njst ‌ɒj d͡ʒmjʔ krɒnh hɒj zmjn bh mn tvd͡ʒh nmɒjjd v nd͡ʒɒt jɒbjd zjrɒ mn xdɒ hstm v djɡrj njst bh zɒt xvd ɣsm xvrdm v ɒjn klɒm bh ʔdɒlt ɒz dhɒnm sɒdr ɡʃth brnxvɒhd ɡʃt kh hr zɒnv پjʃ mn xm xvɒhd ʃd v hr zbɒn bh mn ɣsm xvɒhd xvrdv mrɒ xvɒhnd ɡft ʔdɒlt v ɣvt fɣt dr xdɒvnd mj‌bɒʃd» v bsvj ɒv xvɒhnd آmd v hmɡɒnj kh bh ɒv xʃmnɒkndxd͡ʒl xvɒhnd ɡrdjd v tmɒmj zrjt ɒsrɒئjl dr xdɒvnd ʔɒdl ʃmrdh ʃdh، fxr xvɒhndkrd v mrɒ xvɒhnd ɡft ʔdɒlt v ɣvt fɣt dr xdɒvnd mj‌bɒʃd» v bsvj ɒv xvɒhnd آmd v hmɡɒnj kh bh ɒv xʃmnɒkndxd͡ʒl xvɒhnd ɡrdjd v tmɒmj zrjt ɒsrɒئjl dr xdɒvnd ʔɒdl ʃmrdh ʃdh، fxr xvɒhndkrd bjl xm ʃdh v nbv mnhnj ɡrdjdh bthɒj آnhɒ br hjvɒnɒt v bhɒjm nhɒdh ʃd آnhɒjj kh ʃmɒ brmj dɒʃtjd hml ɡʃth v bɒrhjvɒnɒt zʔjf ʃdh ɒst آnhɒ d͡ʒmjʔ mnhnj v xm ʃdh، آn bɒr rɒ nmj tvɒnnd rhɒnjdblkh xvd آnhɒ bh ɒsjrj mj‌rvnd ‌ɒj xɒndɒn jʔɣvb v tmɒmj bɣjh xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl kh ɒz btn brmn hml ʃdh v ɒz rhm brdɒʃth mn bvdh‌ɒjd vtɒ bh پjrj ʃmɒ mn hmɒn hstm v tɒ bh ʃjxvxjt mn ʃmɒ rɒ xvɒhm brdɒʃt mn آfrjdm v mn brxvɒhm dɒʃt v mn hml krdh، xvɒhm rhɒnjd mrɒ bɒ kh ʃbjh v msɒvj mj‌sɒzjd v mrɒ bɒ kh mɣɒbl mj‌nmɒjjd tɒ mʃɒbh ʃvjm؟ آnɒnj kh tlɒ rɒɒz kjsh mj‌rjznd v nɣrh rɒ bh mjzɒn mj‌snd͡ʒnd، zrɡrj rɒ ɒd͡ʒjr mj‌knnd tɒ xdɒjj ɒz آn bsɒzdپs sd͡ʒdh krdh، ʔbɒdt njz mj‌nmɒjnd آn rɒ brdvʃ brdɒʃth، mj‌brnd v bh‌d͡ʒɒjʃ mj‌ɡzɒrnd v ɒvmj ɒjstd v ɒz d͡ʒɒj xvd hrkt nmj tvɒnd krd nzd ɒv ɒstɣɒsh hm mj‌nmɒjnd ɒmɒ d͡ʒvɒb nmj dhd vɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz tŋj ɒjʃɒn ntvɒnd rhɒnjd ɒjn rɒ bjɒd آvrjd v mrdɒnh bkvʃjd v‌ɒj ʔɒsjɒn آn rɒ dr dl xvd tfkr nmɒjjd t͡ʃjzhɒj ɒvl rɒ ɒz zmɒn ɣdjm bh jɒd آvrjd zjrɒ mn ɣɒdrmtlɣ hstm v djɡrj njst xdɒ hstm v nzjrmn nj آxr rɒ ɒz ɒbtdɒ v آnt͡ʃh rɒ kh vɒɣʔ nʃdh ɒz ɣdjm bjɒn mj‌knm v mj‌ɡvjm kh ɒrɒdh mn brɣrɒrxvɒhd mɒnd v tmɒmj msrt xvjʃ rɒ bd͡ʒɒxvɒhm آvrd mrɣ ʃkɒrj rɒ ɒz mʃrɣ v hm mʃvrt xvjʃ rɒ ɒz d͡ʒɒj dvr mj‌xvɒnm mn ɡftm v ɒlbth bd͡ʒɒ xvɒhm آvrd v tɣdjr nmvdm vɒlbth bh vɣvʔ xvɒhm rsɒnjd ‌ɒj sxtdlɒn kh ɒz ʔdɒlt dvr hstjd mrɒ bʃnvjdʔdɒlt xvdrɒ nzdjk آvrdm v dvr nmj bɒʃd v nd͡ʒɒt mn tɒxjr nxvɒhd nmvd v nd͡ʒɒt rɒ bh d͡ʒht ɒsrɒئjl kh d͡ʒlɒl mn ɒst dr shjvn xvɒhm ɡzɒʃt ʔdɒlt xvdrɒ nzdjk آvrdm v dvr nmj bɒʃd v nd͡ʒɒt mn tɒxjr nxvɒhd nmvd v nd͡ʒɒt rɒ bh d͡ʒht ɒsrɒئjl kh d͡ʒlɒl mn ɒst dr shjvn xvɒhm ɡzɒʃt ɒj bɒkrh dxtr bɒbl frvd ʃdh، br xɒk bnʃjn v‌ɒj dxtr kldɒnjɒn br zmjn bj‌krsj bnʃjn zjrɒ tv rɒ djɡr nɒznjn v ltjf nxvɒhnd xvɒhnd dstɒs rɒ ɡrfth، آrd rɒ xrdkn nɣɒb rɒ brdɒʃth، dɒmnt rɒ br kʃ v sɒɣhɒ rɒbrhnh krdh، ɒz nhrhɒ ʔbvr kn ʔvrt tv kʃf ʃdh، rsvɒjj tv zɒhr xvɒhd ʃd mn ɒntɣɒm kʃjdh، br ɒhdj ʃfɣt nxvɒhm nmvd v ɒmɒnd͡ʒɒt‌dhndh mɒ ɒsm ɒv jhvh sbɒjvt v ɣdvs ɒsrɒئjl mj‌bɒʃd ‌ɒj dxtr kldɒnjɒn xɒmvʃ bnʃjn v bh zlmt dɒxl ʃv zjrɒ kh djɡr tv rɒmlkh mmɒlk nxvɒhnd xvɒnd br ɣvm xvd xʃm nmvdh v mjrɒs xvjʃ rɒ bj‌hrmt krdh، ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh‌dst tv tsljm nmvdm br ɒjʃɒn rhmt nkrdh، jvɣ xvd rɒ br پjrɒn bsjɒr sŋjn sɒxtj v ɡftj tɒ bh ɒbd mlkh xvɒhm bvd v ɒjn t͡ʃjzhɒ rɒdr dl xvd d͡ʒɒ ndɒdj v ʔɒɣbt آnhɒ rɒ bh jɒdnjɒvrdj پs ɒlɒn‌ɒj kh dr ʔʃrt bsr mj‌brj v drɒtmjnɒn sɒkn hstj ɒjn rɒ bʃnv ɒj kh dr dl xvd mj‌ɡvjj mn hstm v ɣjr ɒz mn djɡrj njst v bjvh nxvɒhm ʃd v bj‌ɒvlɒdj rɒ nxvɒhm dɒnst پs ɒjn dv t͡ʃjz jʔnj bj‌ɒvlɒdj vbjvɡj bɣth dr jkrvz bh tv ʔɒrz xvɒhd ʃd v bɒvd͡ʒvd ksrt shr tv v ɒfrɒt ɒfsvŋrj zjɒd tvآnhɒ bʃdt br tv ɒstjlɒ xvɒhd jɒft zjrɒ kh br ʃrɒrt xvd ɒʔtmɒd nmvdh، ɡftj ksj njst kh mrɒ bjnd v hkmt v ʔlm tv، tv rɒ ɡmrɒh sɒxt v dr dl xvd ɡftj mn hstm v ɣjr ɒz mn djɡrj njst پs blɒjj kh ɒfsvn آn rɒnxvɒhj dɒnst br tv ʔɒrz xvɒhd ʃd vmsjbtj kh bh dfʔ آn ɣɒdr nxvɒhj ʃd tv rɒ frvxvɒhd ɡrft v hlɒktj kh ndɒnsth‌ɒj nɒɡhɒn brtv ɒstjlɒ xvɒhd jɒft پs dr ɒfsvŋrj xvd v ksrt shr xvjʃ kh dr آnhɒ ɒztfvljt mʃɣt kʃjdh‌ɒj ɣɒئm bɒʃ ʃɒjd kh mnfʔt tvɒnj brd v ʃɒjd kh ɣɒlb tvɒnj ʃd ɒz frɒvɒnj mʃvrthɒjt xsth ʃdh‌ɒj پs tɣsjm knndɡɒn ɒflɒk v rsd bndɒn kvɒkb vآnɒnj kh dr ɣrh mɒhhɒ ɒxbɒr mj‌dhnd bɒjstnd vtv rɒ ɒz آnt͡ʃh br tv vɒɣʔ ʃdnj ɒst nd͡ʒɒt dhnd ɒjnk msl kɒhbn ʃdh، آtʃ ɒjʃɒn rɒ xvɒhdsvzɒnjd kh xvjʃtn rɒ ɒz svrt zbɒnh آn nxvɒhnd rhɒnjd v آn ɒxɡrj kh xvd rɒ nzd آn ɡrm sɒznd v آtʃj kh dr brɒbrʃ bnʃjnndnxvɒhd bvdآnɒnj kh ɒz ɒjʃɒn mʃɣt kʃjdj brɒj tv t͡ʃnjn xvɒhnd ʃd v آnɒnj kh ɒz tfvljt bɒ tv td͡ʒɒrt mj‌krdnd hr ks bd͡ʒɒj xvd آvɒrh xvɒhd ɡrdjd v ksj‌kh tv rɒ rhɒjj dhdnxvɒhd bvd آnɒnj kh ɒz ɒjʃɒn mʃɣt kʃjdj brɒj tv t͡ʃnjn xvɒhnd ʃd v آnɒnj kh ɒz tfvljt bɒ tv td͡ʒɒrt mj‌krdnd hr ks bd͡ʒɒj xvd آvɒrh xvɒhd ɡrdjd v ksj‌kh tv rɒ rhɒjj dhdnxvɒhd bvd ɒj xɒndɒn jʔɣvb kh bh nɒm ɒsrɒئjl msmj hstjd v ɒz آb jhvdɒ sɒdrʃdh‌ɒjd، v bh ɒsm jhvh ɣsm mj‌xvrjd v xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl rɒ zkr mj‌nmɒjjd، ɒmɒ nh bh sdɒɣt vrɒstj، ɒjn rɒ bʃnvjd zjrɒ kh xvjʃtn rɒ ɒzʃhr mɣds mj‌xvɒnnd v br xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl kh ɒsmʃ jhvh sbɒjvt ɒst ɒʔtmɒd mj‌dɒrnd t͡ʃjzhɒj ɒvl rɒ ɒz ɣdjm ɒxbɒr krdm v ɒz dhɒn mn sɒdr ʃdh، آnhɒ rɒ ɒʔlɒm nmvdm bɣth bh ʔml آvrdm v vɒɣʔ ʃd t͡ʃvnkh dɒnstm kh tv sxt dl hstj v ɡrdnt bnd آhnjn v پjʃɒnj tv brnd͡ʒjn ɒst bnɒbrɒjn tv rɒ ɒz ɣdjm mxbr sɒxtm v ɣbl ɒz vɣvʔ tv rɒ ɒʔlɒm nmvdm mbɒdɒ bɡvjj kh bt mn آnhɒ rɒ bd͡ʒɒ آvrdh v bt trɒʃjdh v snm rjxth ʃdh mn آnhɒ rɒ ɒmr frmvdh ɒst t͡ʃvnkh hmh ɒjn t͡ʃjzhɒ rɒ ʃnjdj آnhɒ rɒ mlɒhzh nmɒ پs آjɒʃmɒ ɒʔtrɒf nxvɒhjd krd، v ɒz ɒjn zmɒn t͡ʃjzhɒj tɒzh rɒ bh ʃmɒ ɒʔlɒm nmvdm v t͡ʃjzhɒj mxfj rɒ kh ndɒnsth bvdjd dr ɒjn zmɒn v nh dr ɒjɒm ɣdjm آnhɒ آfrjdh ʃd v ɣbl ɒz ɒmrvz آnhɒ rɒ nʃnjdh bvdj mbɒdɒ bɡvjj ɒjnk ɒjn t͡ʃjzhɒ rɒ mj‌dɒnstm ɒlbth nʃnjdh v hr آjnh ndɒnsth v ɒlbth ɡvʃ tvɣbl ɒz ɒjn bɒz nʃdh bvd zjrɒ mj‌dɒnstm kh bsjɒrxjɒntkɒr hstj v ɒz rhm mɒdrt ʔɒsj xvɒndh ʃdj bh‌xɒtr ɒsm xvd ɣzb xvjʃ rɒ bh tɒxjr xvɒhm‌ɒndɒxt v bh‌xɒtrd͡ʒlɒl xvjʃ br tv ʃfɣt xvɒhm krd tɒ tv rɒmnɣtʔ nsɒzm ɒjnk tv rɒ ɣɒl ɡzɒʃtm ɒmɒ nh msl nɣrh v tv rɒ dr kvrh msjbt آzmvdm bh xɒtr zɒt xvd، bh‌xɒtr zɒt xvd ɒjn rɒmj knm zjrɒ kh ɒsm mn t͡ʃrɒ bɒjd bj‌hrmt ʃvd vd͡ʒlɒl xvjʃ rɒ bh djɡrj nxvɒhm dɒd ‌ɒj jʔɣvb v‌ɒj dʔvt ʃdh mn ɒsrɒئjl bʃnv mn ɒv hstm mn ɒvl hstm v آxr hstm bh thɣjɣ dst mn bnjɒd zmjn rɒ nhɒd v dst rɒst mn آsmɒnhɒ rɒ ɡstrɒnjd vɣtj kh آnhɒ rɒmj xvɒnm bɒ hm brɣrɒr mj‌bɒʃnd پs hmɡj ʃmɒ d͡ʒmʔ ʃdh، bʃnvjd kjst ɒz ɒjʃɒn kh ɒjnhɒrɒ ɒxbɒr krdh bɒʃd xdɒvnd ɒv rɒ dvst mj‌dɒrd، پs msrt xvd rɒ br bɒbl bd͡ʒɒ xvɒhd آvrd vbɒzvj ɒv br kldɒnjɒn frvd xvɒhd آmd mn tklm nmvdm v mn ɒv rɒ xvɒndm v ɒv rɒ آvrdm tɒ rɒh xvd rɒ kɒmrɒn sɒzd bh mn nzdjk ʃdh، ɒjn rɒbʃnvjd ɒz ɒbtdɒ dr xfɒ tklm nnmvdm v ɒz zmɒnj kh ɒjn vɒɣʔ ʃd mn dr آnd͡ʒɒ hstm v ɒlɒn xdɒvndjhvh mrɒ v rvh xvd rɒ frstɒdh ɒst xdɒvndkh vlj tv v ɣdvs ɒsrɒئjl ɒst t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «mn jhvh xdɒj tv hstm v tv rɒ tʔljm mj‌dhm tɒsvd bbrj v tv rɒ bh rɒhj kh bɒjd brvj hdɒjt mj‌nmɒjm kɒʃ kh bh ɒvɒmr mn ɡvʃ mj‌dɒdj، آŋɒh slɒmtj tv msl nhr v ʔdɒlt tv mɒnnd ɒmvɒd͡ʒ drjɒ mj‌bvd آŋɒh zrjt tv msl rjɡ v smrh slb tv mɒnnd zrɒt آn mj‌bvd v nɒm ɒv ɒz hzvrmn mnɣtʔ v hlɒk nmj ɡrdjd» ɒz bɒbl bjrvn ʃdh، ɒz mjɒn kldɒnjɒn bɡrjzjd v ɒjn rɒ bh آvɒz trnm ɒxbɒr v ɒʔlɒm nmɒjjdv آn rɒ tɒ ɒɣsɒj zmjn ʃɒjʔ sɒxth، bɡvjjd kh xdɒvnd bndh xvd jʔɣvb rɒ fdjh dɒdh ɒst vtʃnh nxvɒhnd ʃd ɒɡr‌t͡ʃh ɒjʃɒn rɒ dr vjrɒnh hɒrhbrj nmɒjd، zjrɒ kh آb ɒz sxrh brɒj ɒjʃɒn d͡ʒɒrj xvɒhd sɒxt v sxrh rɒ xvɒhdʃkɒft tɒ آbhɒ bd͡ʒvʃdv xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh brɒj ʃrjrɒn slɒmtj nxvɒhd bvd v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh brɒj ʃrjrɒn slɒmtj nxvɒhd bvd ɒj d͡ʒzjrh‌hɒ ɒz mn bʃnvjd v‌ɒj tvɒjf ɒz d͡ʒɒj dvr ɡvʃ dhjd xdɒvnd mrɒ ɒz rhm dʔvt krdh vɒz ɒhʃɒj mɒdrm ɒsm mrɒ zkr nmvdh ɒst v dhɒn mrɒ msl ʃmʃjr tjz sɒxth، mrɒ zjr sɒjh dst xvdپnhɒn krdh ɒst v mrɒ tjr sjɣlj sɒxth drtrkʃ xvd mxfj nmvdh ɒst v mrɒ ɡft ɒj ɒsrɒئjl tv bndh mn hstj kh ɒz tv xvjʃtn rɒtmd͡ʒjd nmvdh‌ɒm ɒmɒ mn ɡftm kh ʔbs zhmt kʃjdm v ɣvt xvd rɒ bj‌fɒjdh v bɒtl srf krdm ljkn hɣ mn bɒ xdɒvnd v ɒd͡ʒrt mn bɒ xdɒj mn mj‌bɒʃd v ɒlɒn xdɒvnd kh mrɒ ɒz rhm brɒj bndɡj xvjʃ srʃt tɒ jʔɣvb rɒ nzd ɒvbɒzآvrm v tɒ ɒsrɒئjl nzd vj d͡ʒmʔ ʃvnd mj‌ɡvjdv dr nzr xdɒvnd mhtrm hstm v xdɒj mn ɣvt mn ɒst پs mj‌ɡvjd ɒjn t͡ʃjz ɣljlj ɒst kh bndh mn bʃvj tɒ ɒsbɒt jʔɣvb rɒ brپɒknj v nɒd͡ʒjɒn ɒsrɒئjl rɒ bɒz آvrj blkh tv rɒ nvrɒmt‌hɒ xvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd v tɒ ɒɣsɒj zmjn nd͡ʒɒt mn xvɒhj bvd xdɒvnd kh vlj v ɣdvs ɒsrɒئjl mj‌bɒʃd bh ɒv kh nzd mrdm mhɣr v nzd ɒmt hɒ mkrvh v bndh hɒkmɒn ɒst t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd پɒdʃɒhɒn djdh brپɒ xvɒhnd ʃd v srvrɒn sd͡ʒdh xvɒhnd nmvd، bh‌sbb xdɒvnd kh ɒmjn ɒst vɣdvs ɒsrɒئjl kh tv rɒ brɡzjdh ɒst xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «dr zmɒn rzɒmndj tv rɒ ɒd͡ʒɒbt nmvdm v dr rvz nd͡ʒɒt tv rɒ ɒʔɒnt krdm v tv rɒ hfz nmvdh ʔhd ɣvm xvɒhm sɒxt tɒ zmjn rɒ mʔmvr sɒzj v nsjb hɒj xrɒb ʃdh rɒ bh ɒjʃɒn tɣsjm nmɒjj v bh ɒsjrɒn bɡvjj bjrvn rvjd v bh آnɒnj kh drzlmtnd xvjʃtn rɒ zɒhr sɒzjd v ɒjʃɒn drrɒhhɒ xvɒhnd t͡ʃrjd v mrtʔhɒj ɒjʃɒn br hmh shrɒhɒj kvhj xvɒhd bvd ɡrsnh v tʃnh nxvɒhnd bvd v hrɒrt v آftɒb bh ɒjʃɒn zrrnxvɒhd rsɒnjd zjrɒ آnkh br ɒjʃɒn trhm dɒrdɒjʃɒn rɒ hdɒjt xvɒhd krd v nzd t͡ʃʃmh hɒj آb ɒjʃɒn rɒ rhbrj xvɒhd nmvd v tmɒmj kvhhɒj xvd rɒ trjɣ‌hɒ xvɒhm sɒxt vrɒhhɒj mn blnd xvɒhd ʃd xvd trhm mj‌frmɒjd ɒmɒ shjvn mj‌ɡvjd «jhvh mrɒ trk nmvdh v xdɒvnd mrɒ frɒmvʃ krdh ɒst» آjɒ zn bt͡ʃh ʃjr xvɒrh xvd rɒ frɒmvʃ krdh br پsr rhm xvjʃ trhm nnmɒjd؟ ɒjnɒn frɒmvʃ mj‌knnd ɒmɒmn tv rɒ frɒmvʃ nxvɒhm nmvd ɒjnk tv rɒ brkf dsthɒj xvd nɣʃ nmvdm v hsɒrhɒjt dɒئm dr nzr mn ɒst پsrɒnt bh tʔd͡ʒjl xvɒhnd آmd v آnɒnj kh tv rɒ xrɒb v vjrɒn krdnd ɒz tv bjrvn xvɒhnd rft t͡ʃʃmɒn xvdrɒ bh hr trf blnd krdh، bbjn d͡ʒmjʔ ɒjnhɒ d͡ʒmʔ ʃdh، nzd tv mj‌آjnd xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd «bh hjɒt xvdm ɣsm kh xvd rɒ bh d͡ʒmjʔ ɒjnhɒ msl zjvrmlbs xvɒhj sɒxt v msl ʔrvs xvjʃtn rɒbh آnhɒ xvɒhj آrɒst zjrɒ xrɒbh‌hɒ vvjrɒnh hɒj tv v zmjn tv kh tbɒh ʃdh bvd، ɒmɒ ɒlɒn tv ɒz ksrt sɒknɒn tŋ xvɒhj ʃd v hlɒk knndɡɒnt dvr xvɒhnd ɡrdjd پsrɒn tv kh bj‌ɒvlɒd mj‌bvdj dr smʔ tv bh jkdjɡrxvɒhnd ɡft ɒjn mkɒn brɒj mn tŋ ɒst، mrɒd͡ʒɒjj bdh tɒ sɒkn ʃvm v tv drdl xvdxvɒhj ɡft kjst kh ɒjnhɒ rɒ brɒj mn zɒjjdh ɒst v hɒl آnkh mn bj‌ɒvlɒd v nɒzɒd v d͡ʒlɒj vtn v mtrvk mj‌bvdm پs kjst kh ɒjnhɒ rɒپrvrʃ dɒd ɒjnk mn bh tnhɒjj trk ʃdh bvdm پs ɒjnhɒ kd͡ʒɒ bvdnd؟» xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «ɒjnk mn dst xvd rɒ bsvj ɒmt hɒdrɒz xvɒhm krd v ʔlm xvjʃ rɒ bsvj ɣvm hɒxvɒhm brɒfrɒʃt v ɒjʃɒn پsrɒnt rɒ drآɣvʃ xvd xvɒhnd‌آvrd v dxtrɒnt br dvʃ ɒjʃɒn brdɒʃth xvɒhnd ʃd v پɒdʃɒhɒn lɒlɒhɒj tv v mlkh hɒj ɒjʃɒn dɒjh hɒj tvxvɒhnd bvd v nzd tv rv bh zmjn ɒftɒdh، xɒk پɒj tv rɒ xvɒhnd ljsjd v tv xvɒhj dɒnst kh mn jhvh hstm v آnɒnj kh mntzr mn bɒʃnd xd͡ʒl nxvɒhnd ɡrdjd آjɒ ɣnjmt ɒz d͡ʒbɒr ɡrfth ʃvd jɒ ɒsjrɒn ɒzmrd ɣɒhr rhɒnjdh ɡrdnd zjrɒ xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «ɒsjrɒn njz ɒz d͡ʒbɒr ɡrfth xvɒhnd ʃd vɣnjmt ɒz dst stm پjʃh rhɒnjdh xvɒhdɡrdjd zjrɒ kh mn bɒ dʃmnɒn tv mɣɒvmt xvɒhm nmvd v mn پsrɒn tv rɒ nd͡ʒɒt xvɒhm dɒdv bh آnɒnj kh br tv zlm nmɒjnd ɡvʃt xvdʃɒn rɒxvɒhm xvrɒnjd v bh xvn xvd msl ʃrɒb mst xvɒhnd ʃd v tmɒmj bʃr xvɒhnd dɒnst kh mn jhvh nd͡ʒɒt‌dhndh tv v vlj tv v ɣdjr jʔɣvb hstm» v bh آnɒnj kh br tv zlm nmɒjnd ɡvʃt xvdʃɒn rɒxvɒhm xvrɒnjd v bh xvn xvd msl ʃrɒb mst xvɒhnd ʃd v tmɒmj bʃr xvɒhnd dɒnst kh mn jhvh nd͡ʒɒt‌dhndh tv v vlj tv v ɣdjr jʔɣvb hstm» xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «tlɒɣ nɒmh mɒdr ʃmɒ kh ɒv rɒ tlɒɣ dɒdm kd͡ʒɒɒst؟ jɒ kjst ɒz tlbkɒrɒn mn kh ʃmɒ rɒ bh ɒvfrvxtm؟ ɒjnk ʃmɒ bh‌sbb ɡnɒhɒn xvd frvxth ʃdjd v mɒdr ʃmɒ bh d͡ʒht tɣsjrhɒj ʃmɒ tlɒɣ dɒdh ʃd t͡ʃvn آmdm t͡ʃrɒ ksj nbvd؟ v t͡ʃvn ndɒ krdm t͡ʃrɒ ksj d͡ʒvɒb ndɒd؟ آjɒ dst mn bh hjt͡ʃ vd͡ʒh kvtɒh ʃdh kh ntvɒnd nd͡ʒɒt dhd jɒ drmn ɣdrtj njst kh rhɒjj dhm؟ ɒjnk bh ʔtɒb xvd drjɒ rɒ xʃk mj‌knm v nhrhɒ rɒbjɒbɒn mj‌sɒzm kh mɒhj آnhɒ ɒz bj‌آbj mtʔfn ʃvd v ɒz tʃŋj bmjrd آsmɒn rɒ bh zlmt mlbs mj‌sɒzm v پlɒs rɒ پvʃʃ آn mj‌ɡrdɒnm» xdɒvnd jhvh zbɒn tlɒmjz rɒ bh mn dɒdh ɒst tɒ bdɒnm kh t͡ʃɡvnh xstɡɒn rɒ bh klɒm tɣvjt dhm hr bɒmdɒd bjdɒr mj‌knd ɡvʃ mrɒ bjdɒrmj knd tɒ msl tlɒmjz bʃnvm xdɒvnd jhvh ɡvʃ mrɒ ɡʃvd v mxɒlft nkrdm v bh ʔɣb brŋʃtm پʃt xvd rɒ bh znndɡɒn v rxsɒrxvd rɒ bh mvknɒn dɒdm v rvj xvd rɒ ɒz rsvɒjj v آb dhɒn پnhɒn nkrdm t͡ʃvnkh xdɒvnd jhvh mrɒ ɒʔɒnt mj‌knd پs rsvɒ nxvɒhm ʃd ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht rvj xvd rɒ msl sŋ xɒrɒ sɒxtm vmj dɒnm kh xd͡ʒl nxvɒhm ɡrdjd آnkh mrɒtsdjɣ mj‌knd nzdjk ɒst پs kjst kh bɒ mn mxɒsmh nmɒjd tɒ bɒ hm bɒjstjm v kjst kh br mn dʔvj nmɒjd پs ɒv nzdjk mn bjɒjd ɒjnk xdɒvnd jhvh mrɒ ɒʔɒnt mj‌knd پs kjst mrɒmlzm sɒzd hmɒnɒ hmɡj ɒjʃɒn msl rxt mndrs ʃdh، bjd ɒjʃɒn rɒ xvɒhd xvrd kjst ɒz ʃmɒ kh ɒz xdɒvnd mj‌trsd vآvɒz bndh ɒv rɒ mj‌ʃnvd؟ hrkh dr zlmt sɒlk bɒʃd v rvʃnɒjj ndɒrd، ɒv bh ɒsm jhvh tvkl nmɒjd v bh xdɒj xvjʃ ɒʔtmɒd bkndhɒn d͡ʒmjʔ ʃmɒ kh آtʃ mj‌ɒfrvzjd v kmr xvd rɒ bh mʃʔlhɒ mj‌bndjd، dr rvʃnɒjj آtʃ xvjʃ v drmʃʔlhɒjj kh xvd ɒfrvxth‌ɒjd sɒlk bɒʃjd، ɒmɒɒjn ɒz dst mn bh ʃmɒ xvɒhd rsjd kh dr ɒndvh xvɒhjd xvɒbjd hɒn d͡ʒmjʔ ʃmɒ kh آtʃ mj‌ɒfrvzjd v kmr xvd rɒ bh mʃʔlhɒ mj‌bndjd، dr rvʃnɒjj آtʃ xvjʃ v drmʃʔlhɒjj kh xvd ɒfrvxth‌ɒjd sɒlk bɒʃjd، ɒmɒɒjn ɒz dst mn bh ʃmɒ xvɒhd rsjd kh dr ɒndvh xvɒhjd xvɒbjd ɒj پjrvɒn ʔdɒlt v tɒlbɒn xdɒvnd mrɒbʃnvjd bh sxrh‌ɒj kh ɒz آn ɣtʔ ɡʃth v bh hfrh t͡ʃɒhj kh ɒz آn kndh ʃdh‌ɒjd nzrknjd bh پdr xvd ɒbrɒhjm v bh sɒrh kh ʃmɒ rɒzɒjjd nzr nmɒjjd zjrɒ ɒv jk nfr bvd hjnj kh ɒv rɒdʔvt nmvdm v ɒv rɒ brkt dɒdh، ksjr ɡrdɒnjdm bh thɣjɣ xdɒvnd shjvn rɒ tslj dɒdh، tmɒmj xrɒbh hɒjʃ rɒ tslj bxʃjdh ɒst v bjɒbɒn ɒv rɒmsl ʔdn v hɒmvn ɒv rɒ mɒnnd d͡ʒnt xdɒvndsɒxth ɒst xvʃj v ʃɒdj dr آn jɒft mj‌ʃvd v tsbjh v آvɒz trnm ‌ɒj ɣvm mn bh mn tvd͡ʒh nmɒjjd v‌ɒj tɒjfh mn bh mn ɡvʃ dhjd zjrɒ kh ʃrjʔt ɒz nzd mn sɒdrmj ʃvd v dɒvrj xvd rɒ brɣrɒr mj‌knm tɒ ɣvm hɒrɒ rvʃnɒjj bʃvd ʔdɒlt mn nzdjk ɒst vnd͡ʒɒt mn zɒhr ʃdh، bɒzvj mn ɣvm‌hɒ rɒ dɒvrj xvɒhd nmvd v d͡ʒzjrh‌hɒ mntzr mn ʃdh، bh bɒzvj mn ɒʔtmɒd xvɒhnd krd t͡ʃʃmɒn xvd rɒ bsvj آsmɒn brɒfrɒzjd v پɒjjn bsvj zmjn nzr knjdzjrɒ kh آsmɒn msl dvd ɒz hm xvɒhd پɒʃjd vzmjn msl d͡ʒɒmh mndrs xvɒhd ɡrdjd vsɒknɒnʃ hmt͡ʃnjn xvɒhnd mrd ɒmɒ nd͡ʒɒt mn tɒ bh ɒbd xvɒhd mɒnd v ʔdɒlt mn zɒjl nxvɒhd ɡrdjd ‌ɒj ʃmɒ kh ʔdɒlt rɒ mj‌ʃnɒsjd v‌ɒj ɣvmj kh ʃrjʔt mn dr dl ʃmɒ ɒst mrɒbʃnvjd ɒz mzmt mrdmɒn mtrsjd v ɒz dʃnɒm ɒjʃɒn hrɒsɒn mʃvjd zjrɒ kh bjd ɒjʃɒn rɒ msl d͡ʒɒmh xvɒhd zd v krm ɒjʃɒn rɒ msl پʃm xvɒhdxvrd ɒmɒ ʔdɒlt mn tɒ ɒbdɒlɒbɒd v nd͡ʒɒt mn nslɒbʔd nsl bɒɣj xvɒhd mɒnd bjdɒr ʃv‌ɒj bɒzvj xdɒvnd bjdɒr ʃv v xvjʃtn rɒ bɒ ɣvt mlbs sɒz msl ɒjɒm ɣdjm v dvrh hɒj slf bjdɒr ʃv آjɒ tv آn njstj kh rhb rɒ ɣtʔ nmvdh، ɒʒdhɒ rɒmd͡ʒrvh sɒxtj آjɒ tv آn njstj kh drjɒ vآbhɒj ld͡ʒh ʔzjm rɒ xʃk krdj v ʔmɣ hɒj drjɒ rɒ rɒh sɒxtj tɒ fdjh ʃdɡɒn ʔbvr nmɒjnd؟ v fdjh ʃdɡɒn xdɒvnd bɒzɡʃt nmvdh، bɒ trnm bh shjvn xvɒhnd آmd v xvʃj d͡ʒɒvdɒnj br srɒjʃɒn xvɒhd bvd v ʃɒdmɒnj v xvʃj rɒ xvɒhndjɒft v ɣm v nɒlh frɒr xvɒhd krd mn hstm، mn kh ʃmɒ rɒ tslj mj‌dhm پs tv kjstj kh ɒz ɒnsɒnj kh mj‌mjrd mj‌trsj v ɒzپsr آdm kh msl ɡjɒh xvɒhd ɡrdjd v xdɒvndrɒ kh آfrjnndh tv ɒst kh آsmɒnhɒ rɒ ɡstrɒnjd vbnjɒd zmjn rɒ nhɒd frɒmvʃ krdh‌ɒj v dɒئm tmɒmj rvz ɒz xʃm stmkɒr vɣtj kh bh d͡ʒht hlɒk krdn mhjɒ mj‌ʃvd mj‌trsj v xʃm stmkɒrkd͡ʒɒ ɒst؟ ɒsjrɒn zljl bzvdj rhɒ xvɒhndʃd v dr hfrh nxvɒhnd mrd v nɒn ɒjʃɒn km nxvɒhd ʃd zjrɒ mn jhvh xdɒj tv hstm kh drjɒ rɒ bh tlɒtm mj‌آvrm tɒ ɒmvɒd͡ʒʃ nʔrh znnd، jhvh sbɒjvt ɒsm mn ɒst v mn klɒm xvd rɒdr dhɒn tv ɡzɒʃtm v tv rɒ zjr sɒjh dst xvjʃ پnhɒn krdm tɒ آsmɒnhɒ ɣrs nmɒjm v bnjɒdzmjnj nhm v shjvn rɒ ɡvjm kh tv ɣvm mn hstj xvjʃtn rɒ brɒŋjz‌ɒj ɒvrʃljm xvjʃtn rɒ brɒŋjxth، brxjz ɒj kh ɒz dst xdɒvndkɒsh ɣzb ɒv rɒ nvʃjdj v drd kɒsh srɡjd͡ʒj rɒ nvʃjdh، آn rɒ tɒ th آʃɒmjdj ɒz d͡ʒmjʔ پsrɒnj kh zɒjjdh ɒst jkj njst kh ɒv rɒrhbrj knd v ɒz tmɒmj پsrɒnj kh trbjt nmvdh، ksj njst kh ɒv rɒ dstɡjrj nmɒjd ɒjn dvblɒ br tv ʔɒrz xvɒhd ʃd، kjst kh brɒj tvmɒtm knd؟ jʔnj xrɒbj v hlɒkt v ɣht vʃmʃjr، پs t͡ʃɡvnh tv rɒ tslj dhm پsrɒn tv rɒ zʔf ɡrfth، bsr hmh kvt͡ʃh‌hɒ msl آhv drdɒm xvɒbjdh‌ɒnd v ɒjʃɒn ɒz ɣzb xdɒvnd v ɒzʔtɒb xdɒj tv mmlv ʃdh‌ɒnd پs‌ɒj zhmt kʃjdh ɒjn rɒ bʃnv v‌ɒj mst ʃdh ɒmɒ nh ɒzʃrɒb xdɒvnd tv jhvh v xdɒj tv kh drdʔvj ɣvm xvd ɒjstɒdɡj mj‌knd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnk kɒsh srɡjd͡ʒj rɒ v drd kɒsh ɣzb xvjʃ rɒ ɒz tv xvɒhm ɡrft v آn rɒ bɒr djɡrnxvɒhj آʃɒmjdv آn rɒ bh‌dst آnɒnj kh brtv stm mj‌nmɒjnd mj‌ɡzɒrm kh bh‌d͡ʒɒn tvmj ɡvjnd xm ʃv tɒ ɒz tv bɡzrjm v tv پʃt xvdrɒ msl zmjn v msl kvt͡ʃh bh d͡ʒht rɒh ɡzrjɒn ɡzɒʃth‌ɒj v آn rɒ bh‌dst آnɒnj kh brtv stm mj‌nmɒjnd mj‌ɡzɒrm kh bh‌d͡ʒɒn tvmj ɡvjnd xm ʃv tɒ ɒz tv bɡzrjm v tv پʃt xvdrɒ msl zmjn v msl kvt͡ʃh bh d͡ʒht rɒh ɡzrjɒn ɡzɒʃth‌ɒj bjdɒr ʃv‌ɒj shjvn bjdɒr ʃv v ɣvt xvd rɒ bپvʃ‌ɒj ʃhr mɣds ɒvrʃljm lbɒs zjbɒjj xvjʃ rɒ dr br kn zjrɒ kh nɒmxtvn v nɒپɒk bɒr djɡr dɒxl tv nxvɒhd ʃd ‌ɒj ɒvrʃljm xvd rɒ ɒz ɡrd bjfʃɒn v brxɒsth، bnʃjn v‌ɒj dxtr shjvn kh ɒsjr ʃdh‌ɒj bndhɒj ɡrdn xvd rɒ bɡʃɒ zjrɒ xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd mft frvxth kʃtjd v bj‌nɣrh fdjh dɒdh xvɒhjdʃd t͡ʃvnkh xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd kh drɒjɒm sɒbɣ ɣvm mn bh msr frvd ʃdnd tɒ dr آnd͡ʒɒsɒkn ʃvnd v bʔd ɒz آn آʃvr br ɒjʃɒn bj‌sbb zlm nmvdnd ɒmɒ ɒlɒn xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd dr ɒjnd͡ʒɒmrɒ t͡ʃh‌kɒr ɒst kh ɣvm mn md͡ʒɒn ɡrftɒr ʃdh‌ɒnd v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd آnɒnj kh br ɒjʃɒn tslt dɒrndsjhh mj‌znnd v nɒm mn dɒئm hr rvz ɒhɒnt mj‌ʃvd bnɒbrɒjn ɣvm mn ɒsm mrɒ xvɒhndʃnɒxt v dr آn rvz xvɒhnd fhmjd kh tklm knndh mn hstm، hɒn mn hstm t͡ʃh zjbɒ ɒst br kvhhɒ پɒjhɒj mbʃr kh slɒmtj rɒ ndɒ mj‌knd v bh xjrɒt bʃɒrt mj‌dhdv nd͡ʒɒt rɒ ndɒ mj‌knd v bh shjvn mj‌ɡvjd kh xdɒj tv sltnt mj‌nmɒjd آvɒz djdh bɒnɒn tvɒst kh آvɒz xvd rɒ blnd krdh، bɒ hm trnm mj‌nmɒjnd zjrɒ vɣtj kh xdɒvnd bh shjvn rd͡ʒʔt mj‌knd ɒjʃɒn mʔɒjnh xvɒhnd djd ‌ɒj xrɒbh hɒj ɒvrʃljm bh آvɒz blnd bɒ hm trnm nmɒjjd، zjrɒ xdɒvnd ɣvm xvd rɒ tslj dɒdh، v ɒvrʃljm rɒ fdjh nmvdh ɒst xdɒvnd sɒʔd ɣdvs xvd rɒ dr nzr tmɒmj ɒmt‌hɒ bɒlɒ zdh ɒst vd͡ʒmjʔ krɒnh hɒj zmjn nd͡ʒɒt xdɒj mɒ rɒ djdh‌ɒnd ‌ɒj ʃmɒ kh zrvf xdɒvnd rɒ brmj dɒrjdbjksv ʃvjd bjksv ʃvjd v ɒz ɒjnd͡ʒɒ bjrvn rvjdv t͡ʃjz nɒپɒk rɒ lms mnmɒjjd v ɒz mjɒn آn bjrvn rfth، xvjʃtn rɒ tɒhr sɒzjd zjrɒ kh bh tʔd͡ʒjl bjrvn nxvɒhjd rft v ɡrjzɒn rvɒnh nxvɒhjd ʃd، t͡ʃvnkh jhvh پjʃ rvj ʃmɒxvɒhd xrɒmjd v xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl sɒɣh ʃmɒxvɒhd bvd ɒjnk bndh mn bɒ ʔɣl rftɒr xvɒhd krd vʔɒlj v rfjʔ v bsjɒr blnd xvɒhd ʃd t͡ʃnɒnkh bsjɒrj ɒz tv dr ʔd͡ʒb bvdnd ɒz آn d͡ʒht kh mnzr ɒv ɒz mrdmɒn v svrt ɒv ɒz bnj آdm bjʃtrtbɒh ɡrdjdh bvdhmt͡ʃnɒn br ɒmt hɒj bsjɒrxvɒhd پɒʃjd v bh‌sbb ɒv پɒdʃɒhɒn dhɒn xvd rɒ xvɒhnd bst zjrɒ t͡ʃjzhɒjj rɒ kh brɒj ɒjʃɒn bjɒn nʃdh bvd xvɒhnd djd v آnt͡ʃh rɒ kh nʃnjdh bvdnd xvɒhnd fhmjd hmt͡ʃnɒn br ɒmt hɒj bsjɒrxvɒhd پɒʃjd v bh‌sbb ɒv پɒdʃɒhɒn dhɒn xvd rɒ xvɒhnd bst zjrɒ t͡ʃjzhɒjj rɒ kh brɒj ɒjʃɒn bjɒn nʃdh bvd xvɒhnd djd v آnt͡ʃh rɒ kh nʃnjdh bvdnd xvɒhnd fhmjd kjst kh xbr mɒ rɒ tsdjɣ nmvdh vkjst kh sɒʔd xdɒvnd br ɒv mnkʃf ʃdh bɒʃd؟ zjrɒ bh hzvr vj msl nhɒl v mɒnndrjʃh dr zmjn xʃk xvɒhd rvjjd ɒv rɒ nh svrtj v nh d͡ʒmɒlj mj‌bɒʃd v t͡ʃvn ɒv rɒmj ŋrjm mnzrj ndɒrd kh mʃtɒɣ ɒv bɒʃjm xvɒr v nzd mrdmɒn mrdvd v sɒhb ɣmhɒ vrnd͡ʒ djdh v msl ksj‌kh rvjhɒ rɒ ɒz ɒv bپvʃɒnnd vxvɒr ʃdh kh ɒv rɒ bh hsɒb njɒvrdjm lkn ɒv ɣm hɒj mɒ rɒ br xvd ɡrft v drdhɒj mɒ rɒ br xvjʃ hml nmvd v mɒ ɒv rɒ ɒz d͡ʒɒnb xdɒ zhmt kʃjdh v mzrvb v mbtlɒ ɡmɒn brdjm v hɒl آnkh bh‌sbb tɣsjrhɒj mɒmd͡ʒrvh v bh‌sbb ɡnɒhɒn mɒ kvfth ɡrdjd vtɒdjb slɒmtj mɒ br vj آmd v ɒz zxmhɒj ɒv mɒʃfɒ jɒftjm d͡ʒmjʔ mɒ msl ɡvsfndɒn ɡmrɒh ʃdh bvdjm v hrjkj ɒz mɒ bh rɒh xvd brɡʃth bvd vxdɒvnd ɡnɒh d͡ʒmjʔ mɒ rɒ brvj nhɒd ɒv mzlvm ʃd ɒmɒ tvɒzʔ nmvdh، dhɒn xvd rɒŋʃvd msl brh‌ɒj kh brɒj zbh mj‌brnd v mɒnndɡvsfndj kh nzd پʃm brndh‌ɒʃ bj‌zbɒn ɒst hmt͡ʃnɒn dhɒn xvd rɒ ŋʃvd ɒz zlm v ɒzdɒvrj ɡrfth ʃd v ɒz tbɣh ɒv kh tfkr nmvd kh ɒvɒz zmjn zndɡɒn mnɣtʔ ʃd v bh d͡ʒht ɡnɒh ɣvm mn mzrvb ɡrdjd؟ v ɣbr ɒv rɒ bɒ ʃrjrɒn tʔjjn nmvdnd v bʔd ɒz mrdnʃ bɒ dvltmndɒn hrt͡ʃnd hjt͡ʃ zlm nkrd v dr dhɒn vj hjlh‌ɒj nbvd ɒmɒ xdɒvnd rɒ پsnd آmd kh ɒv rɒ mzrvb nmvdh، bh drdhɒ mbtlɒ sɒzd t͡ʃvn d͡ʒɒn ɒv rɒɣrbɒnj ɡnɒh sɒxt آŋɒh zrjt xvd rɒ xvɒhddjd v ʔmr ɒv drɒz xvɒhd ʃd v msrt xdɒvnddr dst ɒv mjsr xvɒhd bvd smrh mʃɣt d͡ʒɒn xvjʃ rɒ xvɒhd djd v sjr xvɒhd ʃd vbndh ʔɒdl mn bh mʔrft xvd bsjɒrj rɒ ʔɒdl xvɒhd ɡrdɒnjd zjrɒ kh ɒv ɡnɒhɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ brxvjʃtn hml xvɒhd nmvdbnɒbrɒjn ɒv rɒ drmjɒn bzrɡɒn nsjb xvɒhm dɒd v ɣnjmt rɒ bɒzvrآvrɒn tɣsjm xvɒhd nmvd، bh d͡ʒht ɒjnkh d͡ʒɒn xvd rɒ bh mrɡ rjxt v ɒz xtɒkɒrɒn mhsvb ʃd v ɡnɒhɒn bsjɒrj rɒ br xvd ɡrft vbrɒj xtɒkɒrɒn ʃfɒʔt nmvd bnɒbrɒjn ɒv rɒ drmjɒn bzrɡɒn nsjb xvɒhm dɒd v ɣnjmt rɒ bɒzvrآvrɒn tɣsjm xvɒhd nmvd، bh d͡ʒht ɒjnkh d͡ʒɒn xvd rɒ bh mrɡ rjxt v ɒz xtɒkɒrɒn mhsvb ʃd v ɡnɒhɒn bsjɒrj rɒ br xvd ɡrft vbrɒj xtɒkɒrɒn ʃfɒʔt nmvd ɒj ʔɒɣrh‌ɒj kh nzɒjjdh‌ɒj bsrɒ ɒj kh drd zh nkʃjdh‌ɒj bh آvɒz blnd trnm nmɒv frjɒd brآvr zjrɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd پsrɒn zn bjks ɒz پsrɒn zn mnkvhh zjɒdh‌ɒnd mkɒn xjmh xvd rɒ vsjʔ ɡrdɒn v پrdh hɒj mskn hɒj tv پhn bʃvd drjɣ mdɒr v tnɒbhɒj xvd rɒ drɒzkrdh، mjxhɒjt rɒ mhkm bsɒz zjrɒ kh btrf rɒst v t͡ʃپ mntʃr xvɒhj ʃd v zrjt tvɒmt‌hɒ rɒ tsrf xvɒhnd nmvd v ʃhrhɒj vjrɒn rɒ mskvn xvɒhnd sɒxt mtrs zjrɒ kh xd͡ʒl nxvɒhj ʃd v mʃvʃ mʃv zjrɒ kh rsvɒnxvɒhj ɡrdjd t͡ʃvnkh xd͡ʒɒlt d͡ʒvɒnj xvjʃ rɒ frɒmvʃ xvɒhj krd v ʔɒr bjvɡj xvd rɒ djɡrbh jɒd nxvɒhj آvrd zjrɒ kh آfrjnndh tv kh ɒsmʃ jhvh sbɒjvt ɒst ʃvhr tv ɒst vɣdvs ɒsrɒئjl kh bh xdɒj tmɒm d͡ʒhɒn msmj ɒst vlj tv mj‌bɒʃd zjrɒ xdɒvnd tv rɒ msl zn mhd͡ʒvr v rnd͡ʒjdh dl xvɒndh ɒst v mɒnndzvd͡ʒh d͡ʒvɒnj kh trk ʃdh bɒʃd xdɒj tv ɒjn rɒmj ɡvjd zjrɒ tv rɒ bh ɒndk lhzh‌ɒj trk krdm ɒmɒ bh rhmt hɒj ʔzjm tv rɒ d͡ʒmʔ xvɒhm nmvd v xdɒvnd vlj tv mj‌ɡvjd «bd͡ʒvʃʃ ɣzbj xvd rɒ ɒz tv brɒj lhzh‌ɒj پvʃɒnjdm ɒmɒ bh ɒhsɒn d͡ʒɒvdɒnj brtv rhmt xvɒhm frmvd zjrɒ kh ɒjn brɒj mn msl آbhɒj nvh mj‌bɒʃd t͡ʃnɒnkh ɣsm xvrdm kh آbhɒj nvh bɒr djɡr br zmjn d͡ʒɒrj nxvɒhd ʃd hmt͡ʃnɒn ɣsm xvrdm kh br tvɣzb nknm v tv rɒ ʔtɒb nnmɒjm hrآjnh kvhhɒ zɒjl xvɒhd ʃd v tlhɒ mthrk xvɒhdɡrdjd، ljkn ɒhsɒn mn ɒz tv zɒjl nxvɒhd ʃd vʔhd slɒmtj mn mthrk nxvɒhd ɡrdjd» xdɒvnd kh br tv rhmt mj‌knd ɒjn rɒ mj‌ɡvjd «ɒj rnd͡ʒɒnjdh v mztrb ʃdh kh tslj njɒfth‌ɒj ɒjnk mn sŋhɒj tv rɒ dr sŋ srmh nsb xvɒhm krd v bnjɒd tv rɒ dr jɒɣvt zrdxvɒhm nhɒd v mnɒrh hɒj tv rɒ ɒz lʔl vdrvɒzh hɒjt rɒ ɒz sŋhɒj bhrmɒn v tmɒmj hdvd tv rɒ ɒz sŋhɒj ɡrɒn ɣjmt xvɒhm sɒxt v d͡ʒmjʔ پsrɒnt ɒz xdɒvnd tʔljm xvɒhnd jɒft v پsrɒnt rɒ slɒmtj ʔzjm xvɒhdbvd dr ʔdɒlt sɒbt ʃdh v ɒz zlm dvr mɒndh، nxvɒhj trsjd v hm ɒz آʃftɡj dvr xvɒhj mɒnd v bh tv nzdjkj nxvɒhd nmvd hmɒnɒ d͡ʒmʔ xvɒhnd ʃd ɒmɒ nh bh ɒzn mn آnɒnj kh bh zd tvd͡ʒmʔ ʃvnd bh‌sbb tv xvɒhnd ɒftɒd ɒjnk mn آhŋrj rɒ kh zɣɒl rɒ bh آtʃ dmjdh، آltj brɒj kɒr xvd bjrvn mj‌آvrd، آfrjdm v mn njz hlɒk knndh rɒ brɒj xrɒb nmvdn آfrjdmhr آltj kh bh zd tv sɒxth ʃvd پjʃ nxvɒhd brd v hrzbɒnj rɒ kh brɒj mhɒkmh bh zd tv brxjzdtkzjb xvɒhj nmvd ɒjn ɒst nsjb bndɡɒn xdɒvnd v ʔdɒlt ɒjʃɒn ɒz d͡ʒɒnb mn» xdɒvndmj ɡvjd hr آltj kh bh zd tv sɒxth ʃvd پjʃ nxvɒhd brd v hrzbɒnj rɒ kh brɒj mhɒkmh bh zd tv brxjzdtkzjb xvɒhj nmvd ɒjn ɒst nsjb bndɡɒn xdɒvnd v ʔdɒlt ɒjʃɒn ɒz d͡ʒɒnb mn» xdɒvndmj ɡvjd «ɒj d͡ʒmjʔ tʃŋɒn nzd آbhɒ bjɒjjd vhmh ʃmɒ kh nɣrh ndɒrjd bjɒjjd bxrjd vbxvrjd bjɒjjd v ʃrɒb v ʃjr rɒ bj‌nɣrh vbj ɣjmt bxrjd t͡ʃrɒ nɣrh rɒ brɒj آnt͡ʃh nɒn njst v mʃɣt xvjʃ rɒ brɒj آnt͡ʃh sjrnmj knd srf mj‌knjd ɡvʃ dɒdh، ɒz mn bʃnvjdv t͡ʃjzhɒj njkv rɒ bxvrjd tɒ d͡ʒɒn ʃmɒ ɒz frbhj mtlzz ʃvd ɡvʃ xvd rɒ frɒ dɒʃth، nzd mn bjɒjjd v tɒ d͡ʒɒn ʃmɒ zndh ɡrdd bʃnvjd v mn bɒʃmɒ ʔhd d͡ʒɒvdɒnj jʔnj rhmt hɒj ɒmjn dɒvd rɒxvɒhm bst ɒjnk mn ɒv rɒ brɒj tvɒjf ʃɒhdɡrdɒnjdm rئjs v hɒkm tvɒjf hɒn ɒmtj rɒ kh nʃnɒxth bvdj dʔvt xvɒhj nmvd v ɒmtj kh tvrɒ nʃnɒxth bvdnd nzd tv xvɒhnd dvjd bh‌xɒtrjhvh kh xdɒj tv ɒst v ɣdvs ɒsrɒئjl kh tv rɒtmd͡ʒjd nmvdh ɒst» xdɒvnd rɒ mɒdɒmj kh jɒft mj‌ʃvd btlbjd vmɒdɒmj kh nzdjk ɒst ɒv rɒ bxvɒnjd ʃrjr rɒh xvd rɒ v ɡnɒh kɒr ɒfkɒr xvjʃ rɒ trk nmɒjd vbsvj xdɒvnd bɒzɡʃt knd v br vj rhmt xvɒhd nmvd v bsvj xdɒj mɒ kh mɣfrt ʔzjm xvɒhd krd zjrɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh ɒfkɒr mn ɒfkɒr ʃmɒ njst v trjɣ hɒj ʃmɒ trjɣ hɒj mn nj zjrɒ t͡ʃnɒnkh آsmɒn ɒz zmjn blndtr ɒst hmt͡ʃnɒn trjɣ hɒj mn ɒz trjɣ hɒj ʃmɒ v ɒfkɒrmn ɒz ɒfkɒr ʃmɒ blndtr mj‌bɒʃd v t͡ʃnɒnkh bɒrɒn v brf ɒz آsmɒn mj‌bɒrd v bh آnd͡ʒɒbrnmj ɡrdd blkh zmjn rɒ sjrɒb krdh، آn rɒ bɒrvrv brvmnd mj‌sɒzd v brzɡr rɒ txm v xvrndh rɒnɒn mj‌bxʃd، hmt͡ʃnɒn klɒm mn kh ɒz dhɒnm sɒdr ɡrdd xvɒhd bvd nzd mn bj‌smr nxvɒhdbrɡʃt blkh آnt͡ʃh rɒ kh xvɒstm bd͡ʒɒ xvɒhdآvrd v brɒj آnt͡ʃh آn rɒ frstɒdm kɒmrɒn xvɒhdɡrdjd zjrɒ kh ʃmɒ bɒ ʃɒdmɒnj bjrvn xvɒhjdrft v bɒ slɒmtj hdɒjt xvɒhjd ʃd kvhhɒ vtlhɒ dr hzvr ʃmɒ bh ʃɒdj trnm xvɒhnd nmvd vd͡ʒmjʔ drxtɒn shrɒ dstk xvɒhnd zdbh‌d͡ʒɒj drxt xɒr snvbr v bh‌d͡ʒɒj xs آs xvɒhd rvjjd v brɒj xdɒvnd ɒsm v آjt d͡ʒɒvdɒnj kh mnɣtʔ nʃvd xvɒhd bvd bh‌d͡ʒɒj drxt xɒr snvbr v bh‌d͡ʒɒj xs آs xvɒhd rvjjd v brɒj xdɒvnd ɒsm v آjt d͡ʒɒvdɒnj kh mnɣtʔ nʃvd xvɒhd bvd v xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «ɒnsɒf rɒŋɒh dɒʃth، ʔdɒlt rɒ d͡ʒɒrj nmɒjjd، zjrɒ kh آmdn nd͡ʒɒt mn v mnkʃf ʃdn ʔdɒlt mn nzdjk ɒst xvʃɒbhɒl ɒnsɒnj kh ɒjn rɒ bd͡ʒɒ آvrd v bnj آdmj kh bh ɒjn mtmsk ɡrdd، kh sbt rɒ ŋɒh dɒʃth، آn rɒ bj‌hrmt nknd v dst xvjʃ rɒ ɒz hr ʔml bd bɒz‌dɒrd» پs ɣrjbj kh bɒ xdɒvnd mɣtrn ʃdh bɒʃd tklm nknd v ŋvjdkh xdɒvnd mrɒ ɒz ɣvm xvd d͡ʒdɒ nmvdh ɒst vxsj hm ŋvjd kh ɒjnk mn drxt xʃk hstm zjrɒ xdɒvnd drbɒrh xsjhɒjj kh sbt hɒj mrɒ ŋɒh dɒrnd v آnt͡ʃh rɒ kh mn xvʃ dɒrm ɒxtjɒr nmɒjnd v bh ʔhd mn mtmsk ɡrdnd، t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd kh «bh ɒjʃɒn dr xɒnh xvd v drɒndrvn djvɒrhɒj xvjʃ jɒdɡɒrj v ɒsmj bhtrɒz پsrɒn v dxtrɒn xvɒhm dɒd ɒsmj d͡ʒɒvdɒnj kh mnɣtʔ nxvɒhd ʃd bh ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm bxʃjd v ɣrjbɒnj kh bɒ xdɒvnd mɣtrn ʃdh، ɒv rɒxdmt nmɒjnd v ɒsm xdɒvnd rɒ dvst dɒʃth، bndh ɒv bʃvnd jʔnj hmh ksɒnj kh sbt rɒ ŋɒh dɒʃth، آn rɒ bj‌hrmt nsɒznd v bh ʔhd mn mtmsk ʃvnd ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh kvh ɣds xvdxvɒhm آvrd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ dr xɒnh ʔbɒdt xvdʃɒdmɒn xvɒhm sɒxt v ɣrbɒnj hɒj svxtnj vzbɒjh ɒjʃɒn br mzbh mn ɣbvl xvɒhd ʃd، zjrɒxɒnh mn bh xɒnh ʔbɒdt brɒj tmɒmj ɣvm‌hɒ msmj xvɒhd ʃd» v xdɒvnd jhvh kh d͡ʒmʔ knndh rɒndh ʃdɡɒn ɒsrɒئjl ɒst mj‌ɡvjd kh «bʔd ɒz ɒjn djɡrɒn rɒ bɒ ɒjʃɒn d͡ʒmʔ xvɒhm krd ʔlɒvh brآnɒnj kh ɒz ɒjʃɒn d͡ʒmʔ ʃdh‌ɒnd» ‌ɒj tmɒm hjvɒnɒt shrɒ v‌ɒj d͡ʒmjʔ hjvɒnɒt d͡ʒŋl bjɒjjd v bxvrjd djdh bɒnɒn ɒvkvrnd، d͡ʒmjʔ ɒjʃɒn mʔrft ndɒrnd v hmɡj ɒjʃɒn sɡɒn ɡŋ‌ɒnd kh nmj tvɒnnd bɒŋ knnd v ɒjn sɡɒn hrjsnd kh nmj tvɒnndsjr bʃvnd v ɒjʃɒn ʃbɒnnd kh nmj tvɒnndbfhmnd d͡ʒmjʔ ɒjʃɒn bh rɒh xvd mjl krdh، hrjkj btrf xvd tɒlb svd xvjʃ mj‌bɒʃdv mj‌ɡvjnd bjɒjjd ʃrɒb bjɒvrjm v ɒzmskrɒt mst ʃvjm v frdɒ msl ɒmrvz rvzʔzjm blkh bsjɒr zjɒdh xvɒhd bvd v mj‌ɡvjnd bjɒjjd ʃrɒb bjɒvrjm v ɒzmskrɒt mst ʃvjm v frdɒ msl ɒmrvz rvzʔzjm blkh bsjɒr zjɒdh xvɒhd bvd mrd ʔɒdl tlf ʃd v ksj njst kh ɒjn rɒ dr dl xvd bɡzrɒnd v mrdɒn rvf brdɒʃth ʃdnd v ksj fkr nmj knd kh ʔɒdlɒn ɒzmʔrz blɒ brdɒʃth mj‌ʃvnd آnɒnj kh bh ɒstɣɒmt sɒlk mj‌bɒʃnd bslɒmtj dɒxl ʃdh، brbstrhɒj xvjʃ آrɒmj xvɒhnd jɒft v ɒmɒʃmɒ‌ɒj پsrɒn sɒhrh v ɒvlɒd fɒsɣ v zɒnjh bh ɒjnd͡ʒɒ nzdjk آjjd br kh tmsxr mj‌knjd v brkh dhɒn xvd rɒ bɒz mj‌knjd v zbɒn rɒ drɒzmj nmɒjjd؟ آjɒ ʃmɒ ɒvlɒd ʔsjɒn v zrjt kzb njstjd kh dr mjɒn blvthɒ v zjr hr drxt sbzxvjʃtn rɒ bh hrɒrt mj‌آvrjd v ɒtfɒl rɒ drvɒdjhɒ zjr ʃkɒf sxrh‌hɒ zbh mj‌nmɒjjd؟ dr mjɒn sŋhɒj mlsɒj vɒdj nsjb tvɒst hmjnhɒ ɣsmt tv mj‌bɒʃd brɒj آnhɒ njzhdjh rjxtnj rjxtj v hdjh آrdj ɡzrɒnjdj آjɒ mn ɒz ɒjnhɒ tslj xvɒhm jɒft؟ br kvh blnd vrfjʔ bstr xvd rɒ ɡstrdj v bh آnd͡ʒɒ njz brآmdh، ɣrbɒnj ɡzrɒnjdj v پʃt drhɒ v bɒhvhɒ jɒdɡɒrxvd rɒ vɒɡzɒʃtj zjrɒ kh xvd rɒ bh ksj djɡrɣjr ɒz mn mkʃvf sɒxtj v brآmdh، bstr xvdrɒ پhn krdj v drmjɒn xvd v ɒjʃɒn ʔhd bsth، bstr ɒjʃɒn rɒ dvst dɒʃtj d͡ʒɒjj kh آn rɒdjdj v bɒ rvɣn dr hzvr پɒdʃɒh rfth، ʔtrjɒt xvd rɒ bsjɒr krdj v rsvlɒn xvd rɒbd͡ʒɒj dvr frstɒdh، xvjʃtn rɒ tɒ bh hɒvjh پst ɡrdɒnjdj ɒz tvlɒnj bvdn rɒh drmɒndh ʃdj ɒmɒ ŋftj kh ɒmjd njst tɒzɡj ɣvt xvd rɒjɒftj پs ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht zʔf bhm nrsɒnjdj ɒz kh trsɒn v hrɒsɒn ʃdj kh xjɒnt vrzjdj v mrɒ bjɒd njɒvrdh، ɒjn rɒ dr dl xvd d͡ʒɒndɒdj؟ آjɒ mn ɒz zmɒn ɣdjm njz sɒkt nmɒndm پs ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht ɒz mn ntrsjdj؟ mn ʔdɒlt vɒʔmɒl tv rɒ bjɒn xvɒhm nmvd kh tv rɒ mnfʔt nxvɒhd dɒd t͡ʃvn frjɒd brmj آvrj ɒndvxth hɒj xvdt tv rɒ xlɒsj bdhd v lkn bɒd d͡ʒmjʔ آnhɒ rɒ xvɒhd brdɒʃt v nfs آnhɒ rɒxvɒhd brd ɒmɒ hr‌kh br mn tvkl dɒrd mɒlk zmjn xvɒhd bvd v vɒrs d͡ʒbl ɣds mn xvɒhd ɡrdjd v ɡfth xvɒhd ʃd brɒfrɒzjd rɒh rɒ brɒfrɒzjd vmhjɒ sɒzjd v sŋ msɒdm rɒ ɒz trjɣ ɣvm mn brdɒrjd zjrɒ ɒv kh ʔɒlj v blnd ɒst v sɒkn drɒbdjt mj‌bɒʃd v ɒsm ɒv ɣdvs ɒst t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «mn dr mkɒn ʔɒlj v mɣds sɒknm v njzbɒ ksj‌kh rvh ɒfsrdh v mtvɒzʔ dɒrd tɒ rvh mtvɒzʔɒn rɒ ɒhjɒ nmɒjm v dl ɒfsrdɡɒn rɒ zndh sɒzm zjrɒ kh tɒ bh ɒbd mxɒsmh nxvɒhm nmvdv hmjʃh xʃm nxvɒhm krd mbɒdɒ rvhhɒ vd͡ʒɒnhɒjj kh mn آfrjdm bh hzvr mn zʔf bh hm rsɒnnd bh‌sbb ɡnɒh tmʔ vj ɣzbnɒk ʃdh، ɒv rɒ zdm v xvd rɒ mxfj sɒxth، xʃm nmvdm v ɒv bh rɒh dl xvd rv ɡrdɒnjdh، brft trjɣ hɒj ɒv rɒ djdm v ɒv rɒ ʃfɒ xvɒhm dɒd vɒv rɒ hdɒjt nmvdh، bh ɒv v bh آnɒnj kh bɒ vj mɒtm ɡjrnd tslj bsjɒr xvɒhm dɒd» xdɒvnd kh آfrjnndh smrh lbhɒ ɒst mj‌ɡvjd «br آnɒnj kh dvrnd slɒmtj bɒd v br آnɒnj kh nzdjknd slɒmtj bɒd v mn ɒjʃɒn rɒ ʃfɒ xvɒhm bxʃjd» ɒmɒʃrjrɒn msl drjɒj mtlɒtm kh nmj tvɒnd آrɒm ɡjrd v آbhɒjʃ ɡl v ld͡ʒn brmj ɒndɒzd mj‌bɒʃndxdɒj mn mj‌ɡvjd kh ʃrjrɒn rɒ slɒmtj njst xdɒj mn mj‌ɡvjd kh ʃrjrɒn rɒ slɒmtj njst آvɒz xvd rɒ blnd kn v drjɣ mdɒr v آvɒzxvd rɒ msl krnɒ blnd krdh، bh ɣvm mn tɣsjr ɒjʃɒn rɒ v bh xɒndɒn jʔɣvb ɡnɒhɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒʔlɒm nmɒ v ɒjʃɒn hr rvz mrɒ mj‌tlbnd v ɒzdɒnstn trjɣ hɒj mn msrvr mj‌bɒʃnd msl ɒmtj kh ʔdɒlt rɒ bd͡ʒɒ آvrdh، hkm xdɒj xvd rɒ trk nnmvdnd ɒhkɒm ʔdɒlt rɒ ɒz mn svɒl nmvdh، ɒztɣrb d͡ʒstn bh xdɒ msrvr mj‌ʃvnd vmj ɡvjnd t͡ʃrɒ rvzh dɒʃtjm v ndjdj v d͡ʒɒnhɒj xvjʃ rɒ rnd͡ʒɒnjdjm v ndɒnstj ɒjnk ʃmɒ drrvz rvzh xvjʃ xvʃj xvd rɒ mj‌jɒbjd v brʔmlh hɒj xvd zlm mj‌nmɒjjd ɒjnk bh d͡ʒht nzɒʔ v mxɒsmh rvzh mj‌ɡjrjd v bh ltmh ʃrɒrt mj‌znjd «ɒmrvz rvzh nmj ɡjrjd kh آvɒz xvd rɒdr ɒʔlj ʔljjn bʃnvɒnjd آjɒ rvzh‌ɒj kh mn mj‌پsndm msl ɒjn ɒst، rvzj kh آdmj d͡ʒɒn xvd rɒ brnd͡ʒɒnd v sr xvd rɒ msl nj xm sɒxth، پlɒs v xɒkstr zjr xvd bɡstrɒnd؟ آjɒ ɒjn rɒrvzh v rvz mɣbvl xdɒvnd mj‌xvɒnj؟ «mɡr rvzh‌ɒj kh mn mj‌پsndm ɒjn njst kh bndhɒj ʃrɒrt rɒ bɡʃɒjjd v ɡrh hɒj jvɣ rɒ bɒzknjd v mzlvmɒn rɒ آzɒd sɒzjd v hr jvɣ rɒbʃknjd؟ mɡr ɒjn njst kh nɒn xvd rɒ bh ɡrsŋɒn tɣsjm nmɒjj v fɣjrɒn rɒndh ʃdh rɒ bh xɒnh xvd bjɒvrj v t͡ʃvn brhnh rɒ bbjnj ɒv rɒbپvʃɒnj v xvd rɒ ɒz آnɒnj kh ɒz ɡvʃt tvmj bɒʃnd mxfj nsɒzj؟ آŋɒh nvr tv msl fd͡ʒrtɒlʔ xvɒhd ʃd v sht tv bzvdj xvɒhdrvjjd v ʔdɒlt tv پjʃ tv xvɒhd xrɒmjd vd͡ʒlɒl xdɒvnd sɒɣh tv xvɒhd bvd آŋɒh dʔɒxvɒhj krd v xdɒvnd tv rɒ ɒd͡ʒɒbt xvɒhd frmvdv ɒstɣɒsh xvɒhj nmvd v ɒv xvɒhd xrɒbh hɒj ɣdjm rɒ bnɒxvɒhnd nmvd v tv ɒsɒshɒj dvrh hɒj bsjɒr rɒbrپɒ xvɒhj dɒʃt v tv rɒ ʔmɒrt knndh rxnh hɒv mrmt knndh kvt͡ʃh‌hɒ brɒj skvnt xvɒhndxvɒnd «ɒɡr پɒj xvd rɒ ɒz sbt ŋɒh dɒrj vxvʃj xvd rɒ dr msmj xvɒhnd nmvd dvlt ɒmt‌hɒ rɒ xvɒhjd xvrd v dr d͡ʒlɒl ɒjʃɒn fxrxvɒhjd nmvd bh ʔvz xd͡ʒɒlt، nsjb mzɒʔf xvɒhjd jɒft v bh ʔvz rsvɒjj ɒznsjb xvd msrvr xvɒhnd ʃd bnɒbrɒjn ɒjʃɒn drzmjn xvd nsjb mzɒʔf xvɒhnd jɒft v ʃɒdj d͡ʒɒvdɒnj brɒj ɒjʃɒn xvɒhd bvd zjrɒ mn kh jhvh hstm ʔdɒlt rɒ dvst mj‌dɒrm v ɒz ɣɒrt v stm nfrt mj‌dɒrm v ɒd͡ʒrt ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh rɒstj bh ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm dɒd v ʔhd d͡ʒɒvdɒnj bɒ ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm vd͡ʒd mj‌nmɒjd zjrɒ kh mrɒ bh‌d͡ʒɒmh nd͡ʒɒt mlbs sɒxth، rdɒj ʔdɒlt rɒ bh mn پvʃɒnjd t͡ʃnɒnkh dɒmɒd xvjʃtn rɒ bh tɒd͡ʒ آrɒjʃ mj‌dhd v ʔrvs، xvd rɒ bh zjvrhɒ zjnt mj‌bxʃdzjrɒ t͡ʃnɒnkh zmjn، nbɒtɒt xvd rɒmj rvjɒnd v bɒɣ، zrʔ xvjʃ rɒ nmv mj‌dhd، hmt͡ʃnɒn xdɒvnd jhvh ʔdɒlt v tsbjh rɒ پjʃ rvj tmɒmj ɒmt‌hɒ xvɒhd rvjɒnjd zjrɒ t͡ʃnɒnkh zmjn، nbɒtɒt xvd rɒmj rvjɒnd v bɒɣ، zrʔ xvjʃ rɒ nmv mj‌dhd، hmt͡ʃnɒn xdɒvnd jhvh ʔdɒlt v tsbjh rɒ پjʃ rvj tmɒmj ɒmt‌hɒ xvɒhd rvjɒnjd bh‌xɒtr shjvn skvt nxvɒhm krd vbh‌xɒtr ɒvrʃljm xɒmvʃ nxvɒhm ʃdtɒ ʔdɒltʃ msl nvr tlvʔ knd v nd͡ʒɒtʃ msl t͡ʃrɒɣj kh ɒfrvxth bɒʃd v ɒmt‌hɒ، ʔdɒlt tvrɒ v d͡ʒmjʔ پɒdʃɒhɒn، d͡ʒlɒl tv rɒ mʃɒhdh xvɒhnd nmvd v tv bh ɒsm d͡ʒdjdj kh dhɒn xdɒvnd آn rɒ ɣrɒr mj‌dhd msmj xvɒhj ʃd v tv tɒd͡ʒ d͡ʒlɒl، dr dst xdɒvnd v ɒfsrmlvkɒnh، dr dst xdɒj xvd xvɒhj bvd v tvdjɡr bh mtrvk msmj nxvɒhj ʃd v zmjnt rɒbɒr djɡr xrɒbh nxvɒhnd ɡft، blkh tv rɒ hfsjbh v zmjnt rɒ bʔvlh xvɒhnd nɒmjd zjrɒ xdɒvnd ɒz tvmsrvr xvɒhd ʃd v zmjn tv mnkvhh xvɒhdɡrdjd zjrɒ t͡ʃnɒnkh mrdj d͡ʒvɒn dvʃjzh‌ɒj rɒbh nkɒh xvjʃ dr mj‌آvrd hm t͡ʃnɒn پsrɒnt tv rɒ mnkvhh xvd xvɒhnd sɒxt v t͡ʃnɒnkh dɒmɒdɒz ʔrvs mbthd͡ʒ mj‌ɡrdd hm t͡ʃnɒn xdɒjt ɒz tvmsrvr xvɒhd bvd ‌ɒj ɒvrʃljm djdh bɒnɒn brhsɒrhɒj tv ɡmɒʃth‌ɒm kh hr rvz v hrʃb hmjʃh skvt nxvɒhnd krd ɒj mtzkrɒn xdɒvnd xɒmvʃ mbɒʃjd v ɒv rɒ آrɒmj ndhjdtɒ ɒvrʃljm rɒ ɒstvɒr krdh، آn rɒ dr d͡ʒhɒn mhl tsbjh bsɒzd xdɒvnd bh‌dst rɒst xvd v bh bɒzvj ɣvj xvjʃ ɣsm xvrdh، ɡfth ɒst kh bɒr djɡrɣlh tv rɒ mɒkvl dʃmnɒnt nsɒzm v ɣrjbɒn، ʃrɒb tv rɒ kh brɒjʃ zhmt kʃjdh‌ɒj nxvɒhndnvʃjd blkh آnɒnj kh آn rɒ mj‌t͡ʃjnnd آn rɒxvrdh، xdɒvnd rɒ tsbjh xvɒhnd nmvd v آnɒnj kh آn rɒ d͡ʒmʔ mj‌knnd آn rɒ dr shnhɒj ɣds mn xvɒhnd nvʃjd bɡzrjd ɒz drvɒzh hɒbɡzrjd trjɣ ɣvm rɒ mhjɒ sɒzjd v ʃɒhrɒh rɒ blndkrdh، mrtfʔ sɒzjd v sŋhɒ rɒ brt͡ʃjdh ʔlm rɒ bh d͡ʒht ɣvm‌hɒ brپɒ nmɒjjd ɒjnk xdɒvnd tɒɒɣsɒj zmjn ɒʔlɒn krdh ɒst، پs bh dxtrshjvn bɡvjjd ɒjnk nd͡ʒɒt tv mj‌آjd hmɒnɒɒd͡ʒrt ɒv hmrɒhʃ v mkɒfɒt ɒv پjʃ rvjʃ mj‌bɒʃdv ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh ɣvm mɣds v fdjh ʃdɡɒn xdɒvnd msmj xvɒhnd sɒxt v tv bh mtlvb v ʃhr ɣjr mtrvk nɒmjdh xvɒhj ʃd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh ɣvm mɣds v fdjh ʃdɡɒn xdɒvnd msmj xvɒhnd sɒxt v tv bh mtlvb v ʃhr ɣjr mtrvk nɒmjdh xvɒhj ʃd ɒjn kjst kh ɒz ɒdvm bɒ lbɒs srx ɒzbsrh mj‌آjd؟ jʔnj‌ɒjn kh bh lbɒs d͡ʒljl xvd mlbs ɒst v dr ksrt ɣvt xvjʃ mj‌xrɒmd؟ mn kh bh ʔdɒlt tklm mj‌knm v brɒj nd͡ʒɒt، zvrآvr mj‌bɒʃm t͡ʃrɒ lbɒs tv srx ɒst v d͡ʒɒmh tv msl ksj‌kh t͡ʃrxʃt rɒ پɒjmɒl knd؟ mn t͡ʃrxʃt rɒ tnhɒ پɒjmɒl nmvdm vɒhdj ɒz ɣvm‌hɒ bɒ mn nbvd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ bɣzb xvdپɒjmɒl krdm v bhdt xʃm xvjʃ lɡd kvb nmvdm v xvn ɒjʃɒn bh lbɒs mn پɒʃjdh ʃdh، tmɒmj d͡ʒɒmh xvd rɒ آlvdh sɒxtm zjrɒ kh jvm ɒntɣɒm dr dl mn bvd v sɒl fdjh ʃdɡɒnm rsjdh bvd v ŋrjstm v ɒʔɒnt knndh‌ɒj nbvd v tʔd͡ʒb nmvdm zjrɒ dstɡjrj nbvd lhzɒ bɒzvj mn mrɒnd͡ʒɒt dɒd v hdt xʃm mn mrɒ dstɡjrj nmvd v ɣvm‌hɒ rɒ bh ɣzb xvd پɒjmɒl nmvdh، ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz hdt xʃm xvjʃ mst sɒxtm v xvn ɒjʃɒn rɒ br zmjn rjxtm ɒhsɒnhɒj xdɒvnd v tsbjhɒt xdɒvnd rɒzkr xvɒhm nmvd brhsb hr‌آnt͡ʃh xdɒvnd brɒj mɒ ʔml nmvdh ɒst v bh mvd͡ʒb ksrt ɒhsɒnj kh brɒj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl mvɒfɣ rhmt‌hɒ v vfvrrɒft xvd bd͡ʒɒ آvrdh ɒst zjrɒ ɡfth ɒst ɒjʃɒn ɣvm mn v پsrɒnj kh xjɒnt nxvɒhnd krdmj bɒʃnd، پs nd͡ʒɒt‌dhndh ɒjʃɒn ʃdh ɒst ɒv dr hmh tŋjhɒj ɒjʃɒn bh tŋ آvrdh ʃd vfrʃth hzvr vj ɒjʃɒn rɒ nd͡ʒɒt dɒd dr mhbt v hlm xvd ɒjʃɒn rɒ fdjh dɒd v dr d͡ʒmjʔ ɒjɒm ɣdjm، mthml ɒjʃɒn ʃdh، ɒjʃɒn rɒ brdɒʃt ɒmɒ ɒjʃɒn ʔɒsj ʃdh، rvh ɣdvs ɒv rɒmhzvn sɒxtnd، پs brɡʃth، dʃmn ɒjʃɒn ʃd vɒv xvd bɒ ɒjʃɒn d͡ʒŋ nmvd آŋɒh ɒjɒm ɣdjm v mvsj v ɣvm xvjʃ rɒbjɒd آvrd v ɡft kd͡ʒɒst آnkh ɒjʃɒn rɒ bɒ ʃbɒn ɡlh xvd ɒz drjɒ brآvrd v kd͡ʒɒ ɒst آnkh rvh ɣdvs xvd rɒ dr mjɒn ɒjʃɒn nhɒd؟ kh bɒzvj d͡ʒljl xvd rɒ bh‌dst rɒst mvsj xrɒmɒn sɒxt v آbhɒ rɒ پjʃ rvj ɒjʃɒn mnʃɣ ɡrdɒnjdtɒ ɒsm d͡ʒɒvdɒnj brɒj xvjʃ پjdɒ knd؟ آnkh ɒjʃɒn rɒ dr ld͡ʒh‌hɒ msl ɒsb dr bjɒbɒn rhbrj nmvd kh lɣzʃ nxvrnd msl bhɒjmj kh bh vɒdj frvd mj‌rvnd rvh xdɒvnd ɒjʃɒn rɒ آrɒmj bxʃjd hm t͡ʃnɒn ɣvm xvd rɒ rhbrj nmvdj tɒbrɒj xvd ɒsm md͡ʒjd پjdɒ nmɒjj ɒz آsmɒn bŋr v ɒz mskn ɣdvsjt vd͡ʒlɒl xvjʃ nzr ɒfkn ɣjrt d͡ʒbrvt tv kd͡ʒɒɒst؟ d͡ʒvʃʃ dl v rhmt hɒj tv kh bh mn nmvdj bɒzdɒʃth ʃdh ɒst bh drstj kh tvپdr mɒ hstj ɒɡr‌t͡ʃh ɒbrɒhjm mɒ rɒ nʃnɒsd vɒsrɒئjl mɒ rɒ bd͡ʒɒ njɒvrd، ɒmɒ tv‌ɒj jhvh، پdr mɒ vvlj mɒ hstj v nɒm tv ɒz ɒzl mj‌bɒʃd پs‌ɒj xdɒvnd mɒ rɒ ɒz trjɣ hɒj xvd t͡ʃrɒ ɡmrɒh sɒxtj v dlhɒj mɒ rɒ sxt ɡrdɒnjdj tɒ ɒz tvntrsjm bh‌xɒtr bndɡɒnt v ɒsbɒt mjrɒs xvdrd͡ʒʔt nmɒ ɣvm mɣds tv ɒndk zmɒnj آn rɒmtsrf bvdnd v dʃmnɒn mɒ mkɒn ɣds tv rɒپɒjmɒl nmvdndv mɒ msl ksɒnj kh tv hrɡz brɒjʃɒn hkmrɒnj nkrdh bɒʃj v bh nɒm tv nɒmjdh nʃdh bɒʃnd ɡrdjdh‌ɒjm v mɒ msl ksɒnj kh tv hrɡz brɒjʃɒn hkmrɒnj nkrdh bɒʃj v bh nɒm tv nɒmjdh nʃdh bɒʃnd ɡrdjdh‌ɒjm kɒʃ kh آsmɒnhɒ rɒ mnʃɣ sɒxth، nɒzl mj ʃdj v kvhhɒ ɒz rvjt tv mtzlzl mj‌ɡʃt msl آtʃj kh xvrdh t͡ʃvbhɒ rɒmʃtʔl sɒzd v nɒrj kh آb rɒ bh d͡ʒvʃ آvrd tɒnɒm xvd rɒ br dʃmnɒnt mʔrvf sɒzj v ɒmt‌hɒ ɒzrvjt tv lrzɒn ɡrdnd hjnj kh kɒrhɒj hvlnɒk rɒ kh mntzr آnhɒ nbvdjm bd͡ʒɒ آvrdj آŋɒh nzvl frmvdj v kvhhɒ ɒz rvjt tv mtzlzl ɡrdjd zjrɒ kh ɒz ɒjɒm ɣdjm nʃnjdnd v ɒstmɒʔ nnmvdnd v t͡ʃʃm xdɒjj rɒ ɣjr ɒz tv kh brɒj mntzrɒn xvjʃ bپrdɒzd ndjd tv آnɒnj rɒ kh ʃɒdmɒnnd v ʔdɒlt rɒ bd͡ʒɒ mj‌آvrnd v bh rɒhhɒj tv tv rɒ bh jɒd mj‌آvrnd mlɒɣɒt mj‌knj ɒjnk tvɣzbnɒk ʃdj v mɒ ɡnɒh krdh‌ɒjm dr ɒjnhɒ mdt mdjdj bsr brdjm v آjɒ nd͡ʒɒt tvɒnjm jɒft؟ zjrɒ kh d͡ʒmjʔ mɒ msl ʃxs nd͡ʒs ʃdh‌ɒjm vhmh ɒʔmɒl ʔɒdlh mɒ mɒnnd lth mlvs mj‌bɒʃd vhmɡj mɒ msl brɡ، پʒmrdh ʃdh، ɡnɒhɒn mɒ msl bɒd، mɒ v tv sɒnʔ mɒ hstj v d͡ʒmjʔ mɒ msnvʔ dsthɒj tv mj‌bɒʃjm ‌ɒj xdɒvnd bʃdt ɣzbnɒk mbɒʃ v ɡnɒh rɒ tɒ bh ɒbd bxɒtr mdɒr hɒn mlɒhzh nmɒ kh hmɡj mɒ ɣvm tv hstjm ʃhrhɒj mɣds tv bjɒbɒn ʃdh shjvn، bjɒbɒn v vxɒmvʃ ʃdh، mɒ rɒ bʃdt rnd͡ʒvr mj‌sɒzj؟ ‌ɒj xdɒvndآjɒ bɒ vd͡ʒvd ɒjn hmh، xvddɒrj mj‌knj vxɒmvʃ ʃdh، mɒ rɒ bʃdt rnd͡ʒvr mj‌sɒzj؟ «آnɒnj kh mrɒ tlb nnmvdnd mrɒ d͡ʒstndv آnɒnj kh mrɒ ntlbjdnd mrɒ jɒftnd v bh ɣvmj kh bh ɒsm mn nɒmjdh nʃdnd ɡftm lbjk lbjk tmɒmj rvz dsthɒj xvd rɒ bsvj ɣvm mtmrdj kh mvɒfɣ xjɒlɒt xvd bh rɒh nɒپsndjdh slvk mj‌nmvdnd drɒz krdm ɣvmj kh پjʃ rvjm ɣzb mrɒ hmjʃh bhjd͡ʒɒn mj‌آvrnd، kh drbɒɣɒt ɣrbɒnj mj‌ɡzrɒnnd v br آd͡ʒrhɒ bxvrmj svzɒnnd kh dr ɣbrhɒ sɒkn ʃdh، dr mɣɒrh hɒmnzl dɒrnd، kh ɡvʃt xnzjr mj‌xvrnd vxvrʃ nd͡ʒɒsɒt dr zrvf ɒjʃɒn ɒst kh mj‌ɡvjnd «dr d͡ʒɒj xvd bɒjst v nzdjk mn mjɒzjrɒ kh mn ɒz tv mɣds tr hstm» ɒjnɒn dvd drbjnj mn mj‌bɒʃnd v آtʃj kh tmɒmj rvz mʃtʔl ɒst hmɒnɒ ɒjn پjʃ mn mktvb ɒst پs sɒkt nxvɒhm ʃd blkh پɒdɒʃ xvɒhm dɒd v bh آɣvʃ ɒjʃɒn mkɒfɒt xvɒhm rsɒnjd xdɒvndmj ɡvjd drbɒrh ɡnɒhɒn ʃmɒ v ɡnɒhɒn پdrɒn ʃmɒ bɒhm kh br kvhhɒ bxvr‌svzɒnjdjd v mrɒ br tlhɒɒhɒnt nmvdjd پs d͡ʒzɒj ɒʔmɒl ʃmɒ rɒ ɒvl bh آɣvʃ ʃmɒ xvɒhm rsɒnjd» xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «t͡ʃnɒnkh ʃjrh drxvʃh jɒft mj‌ʃvd v mj‌ɡvjnd آn rɒ fɒsdmsɒz zjrɒ kh brkt dr آn ɒst hmt͡ʃnɒn bh‌xɒtr bndɡɒn xvd ʔml xvɒhm nmvd tɒ ɒjʃɒn rɒbɒlkl hlɒk nsɒzm blkh nslj ɒz jʔɣvb vvɒrsj brɒj kvhhɒj xvjʃ ɒz jhvdɒ bh zhvrxvɒhm آvrd v brɡzjdɡɒnm vrsh آn v bndɡɒnm sɒkn آn xvɒhnd ʃd v ʃɒrvn، mrtʔ ɡlh‌hɒ vvɒdj ʔɒkvr، xvɒbɡɒh rmh‌hɒ bh d͡ʒht ɣvm mn kh mrɒ tlbjdh‌ɒnd xvɒhd ʃd v ɒmɒ ʃmɒ kh xdɒvnd rɒ trk krdh v kvh mɣds mrɒ frɒmvʃ nmvdh‌ɒjd، v mɒئdh‌ɒj bh d͡ʒht bxt mhjɒ sɒxth vʃrɒb mmzvd͡ʒ bh d͡ʒht ɒtfɒɣ rjxth‌ɒjd، پs ʃmɒ rɒ bh d͡ʒht ʃmʃjr mɣdr sɒxtm v d͡ʒmjʔ ʃmɒ brɒj ɣtl xm xvɒhjd ʃd zjrɒ kh t͡ʃvn xvɒndm d͡ʒvɒb ndɒdjd v t͡ʃvn sxn ɡftm nʃnjdjd v آnt͡ʃh rɒ kh dr nzr mn nɒپsnd bvd bʔml آvrdjd v آnt͡ʃh rɒ kh nxvɒstm brɡzjdjd» bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd jhvh mj‌ɡvjd «hɒn bndɡɒn mn xvɒhnd xvrd ɒmɒ ʃmɒ ɡrsnh xvɒhjd bvd ɒjnk bndɡɒnm xvɒhnd nvʃjd ɒmɒ ʃmɒ tʃnh xvɒhjd bvd hmɒnɒ bndɡɒnm ʃɒdj xvɒhnd krd ɒmɒ ʃmɒ xd͡ʒl xvɒhjd ɡrdjd ɒjnk bndɡɒnm ɒz xvʃj dl، trnm xvɒhnd nmvd ɒmɒ ʃmɒ ɒz kdvrt dl، frjɒdxvɒhjd nmvd v ɒz ʃkstɡj rvh، vlvlh xvɒhjdkrd v nɒm xvd rɒ brɒj brɡzjdɡɒn mn bh‌d͡ʒɒj lʔnt، trk xvɒhjd nmvd پs xdɒvnd jhvh tv rɒbɣtl xvɒhd rsɒnjd v bndɡɒn xvjʃ rɒ bh ɒsm djɡr xvɒhd nɒmjd پs hrkh xvjʃtn rɒbrvj zmjn brkt dhd xvjʃtn rɒ bh xdɒj hɣ brkt xvɒhd dɒd v hrkh brvj zmjn ɣsm xvrdbh xdɒj hɣ ɣsm xvɒhd xvrd zjrɒ kh tŋjhɒj ɒvljn frɒmvʃ ʃdh v ɒz nzr mn پnhɒn ɡrdjdh ɒst zjrɒ ɒjnk mn آsmɒnj d͡ʒdjd v zmjnj d͡ʒdjd xvɒhm آfrjd v t͡ʃjzhɒj پjʃjn bjɒdnxvɒhd آmd v bxɒtr nxvɒhd ɡzʃt blkh ɒzآnt͡ʃh mn xvɒhm آfrjd، ʃɒdj knjd v tɒ bh ɒbdvd͡ʒd nmɒjjd zjrɒ ɒjnk ɒvrʃljm rɒ mhl vd͡ʒd vɣvm ɒv rɒ mhl ʃɒdmɒnj xvɒhm آfrjd v ɒzɒvrʃljm vd͡ʒd xvɒhm nmvd v ɒz ɣvm xvd ʃɒdj xvɒhm krd v آvɒz ɡrjh v آvɒz nɒlh bɒr djɡr dr ɒvʃnjdh nxvɒhd ʃd v bɒr djɡr tfl km rvz ɒzآnd͡ʒɒ nxvɒhd bvd v nh mrd پjr kh ʔmr xvd rɒ bh ɒtmɒm nrsɒnjdh bɒʃd zjrɒ kh tfl dr sn sdsɒlɡj xvɒhd mrd ljkn ɡnɒhkɒr sd sɒlh mlʔvn xvɒhd bvd v xɒnh‌hɒ bnɒ krdh، dr آnhɒ sɒkn xvɒhnd ʃd v tɒkstɒnhɒ ɣrs nmvdh، mjvh آnhɒ rɒxvɒhnd xvrd bnɒ nxvɒhnd krd tɒ djɡrɒn skvnt nmɒjnd v آnt͡ʃh rɒ kh ɣrs mj‌nmɒjnddjɡrɒn nxvɒhnd xvrd zjrɒ kh ɒjɒm ɣvm mn msl ɒjɒm drxt xvɒhd bvd v brɡzjdɡɒn mn ɒz ʔml dsthɒj xvd tmtʔ xvɒhnd brd zhmt bjd͡ʒɒnxvɒhnd kʃjd v ɒvlɒd bh d͡ʒht ɒztrɒb nxvɒhnd zɒjjd zjrɒ kh ɒvlɒd brkt jɒftɡɒn xdɒvnd hstnd v zrjt ɒjʃɒn bɒ ɒjʃɒnnd vɣbl ɒz آnkh bxvɒnnd mn d͡ʒvɒb xvɒhm dɒd v پjʃ ɒz آnkh sxn ɡvjnd mn xvɒhm ʃnjdɡrɡ vbrh bɒ hm xvɒhnd t͡ʃrjd v ʃjr msl ɡɒv kɒh xvɒhd xvrd v xvrɒk mɒr xɒk xvɒhd bvdxdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh dr tmɒmj kvh mɣds mn، zrr nxvɒhnd rsɒnjd v fsɒd nxvɒhndnmvd» ɡrɡ vbrh bɒ hm xvɒhnd t͡ʃrjd v ʃjr msl ɡɒv kɒh xvɒhd xvrd v xvrɒk mɒr xɒk xvɒhd bvdxdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh dr tmɒmj kvh mɣds mn، zrr nxvɒhnd rsɒnjd v fsɒd nxvɒhndnmvd» xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «آsmɒnhɒkrsj mn v zmjn پɒj ɒndɒz mn ɒst، پs xɒnh‌ɒj kh brɒj mn bnɒ mj‌knjd kd͡ʒɒ ɒst؟ vmkɒn آrɒm mn kd͡ʒɒ؟» xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd «dst mn hmh ɒjn t͡ʃjzhɒ rɒ sɒxt پs d͡ʒmjʔ ɒjnhɒbvd͡ʒvd آmd ɒmɒ bh ɒjn ʃxs kh mskjn v ʃksth dl v ɒz klɒm mn lrzɒn bɒʃd، nzr xvɒhm krd ksj‌kh ɡɒvj zbh nmɒjd msl ɣɒtl ɒnsɒn ɒst v ksj‌kh ɡvsfndj zbh knd msl ʃxsj ɒst kh ɡrdn sɡ rɒ bʃknd v آnkh hdjh‌ɒj bɡzrɒndmsl ksj ɒst kh xvn xnzjrj rɒ brjzd v آnkh bxvr‌svzɒnd msl ʃxsj ɒst kh btj rɒ tbrjk nmɒjd v ɒjʃɒn rɒhhɒj xvd rɒ ɒxtjɒr krdh‌ɒnd vd͡ʒɒn ɒjʃɒn ɒz rd͡ʒɒsɒt xvdʃɒn msrvr ɒst پs mn njz msjbt hɒj ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒxtjɒr xvɒhm krd v trshɒj ɒjʃɒn rɒ br ɒjʃɒn ʔɒrz xvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd، zjrɒ t͡ʃvn xvɒndm ksj d͡ʒvɒb ndɒd vt͡ʃvn tklm nmvdm ɒjʃɒn nʃnjdnd blkh آnt͡ʃh rɒ kh dr nzr mn nɒپsnd bvd bʔml آvrdnd v آnt͡ʃh rɒ kh nxvɒstm ɒxtjɒr krdnd» ‌ɒj آnɒnj kh ɒz klɒm xdɒvnd mj‌lrzjd sxn ɒv rɒ bʃnvjd brɒdrɒn ʃmɒ kh ɒz ʃmɒ nfrt dɒrndv ʃmɒ rɒ bxɒtr ɒsm mn ɒz xvd mj‌rɒnndmj ɡvjnd xdɒvnd tmd͡ʒjd krdh ʃvd tɒ ʃɒdj ʃmɒ rɒ bbjnm ljkn ɒjʃɒn xd͡ʒl xvɒhnd ʃd آvɒz ɣvɣɒ ɒz ʃhr، sdɒjj ɒz hjkl، آvɒzxdɒvnd ɒst kh bh dʃmnɒn xvd mkɒfɒt mj‌rsɒnd ɣbl ɒz آnkh drd zh bkʃd، zɒjjd پjʃ ɒz آnkh drd ɒv rɒ frv‌ɡjrd ɒvlɒd nrjnh‌ɒj آvrd kjst kh msl ɒjn rɒ ʃnjdh v kjst kh msl ɒjn rɒ djdh bɒʃd؟ آjɒ vlɒjtj dr jk rvzmvlvd ɡrdd v ɣvmj jkdfʔh zɒjjdh ʃvd؟ zjrɒ shjvn bh md͡ʒrd drd zh kʃjdn پsrɒn xvd rɒ zɒjjd xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd «آjɒ mn bfm rhm brsɒnm v nzɒjɒnm؟» v xdɒj tvmj ɡvjd «آjɒ mn kh zɒjɒnndh hstm، rhm rɒbbndm؟» ‌ɒj hmh آnɒnj kh ɒvrʃljm rɒ dvst mj‌dɒrjd bɒ ɒv ʃɒdj knjd v brɒjʃ vd͡ʒd nmɒjjd vɒj hmh آnɒnj kh brɒj ɒv mɒtm mj‌ɡjrjd، bɒ ɒvʃɒdj bsjɒr nmɒjjd tɒ ɒz پstɒnhɒj tsljɒt ɒvbmkjd v sjr ʃvjd v bdvʃjd v ɒz frɒvɒnj d͡ʒlɒl ɒv mhzvz ɡrdjd zjrɒ xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «ɒjnk mn slɒmtj rɒ msl nhr v d͡ʒlɒl ɒmt‌hɒ rɒ mɒnnd nhr srʃɒr bh ɒv xvɒhm rsɒnjd vʃmɒ xvɒhjd mkjd v dr آɣvʃ ɒv brdɒʃth ʃdh، br zɒnvhɒjʃ bnɒz پrvrdh xvɒhjd ʃd» v msl ksj‌kh mɒdrʃ ɒv rɒ tslj dhd hmt͡ʃnjn mn ʃmɒrɒ tslj xvɒhm dɒd vdr ɒvrʃljm tslj xvɒhjdjɒft» پs t͡ʃvn ɒjn rɒ bjnjd dl ʃmɒ ʃɒdmɒn xvɒhd ʃd v ɒstxvɒnhɒj ʃmɒ msl ɡjɒh sbz vxrm xvɒhd ɡrdjd v dst xdɒvnd br bndɡɒnʃ mʔrvf xvɒhd ʃd ɒmɒ br dʃmnɒn xvd ɣzb xvɒhd nmvd zjrɒ ɒjnk xdɒvnd bɒ آtʃ xvɒhd آmd v ɒrɒbh hɒj ɒv msl ɡrdbɒd tɒɣzb xvd rɒ bɒ hdt v ʔtɒb xvjʃ rɒ bɒʃʔlh آtʃ bh ɒnd͡ʒɒm rsɒnd zjrɒ xdɒvnd bɒآtʃ v ʃmʃjr xvd br tmɒmj bʃr dɒvrj xvɒhd nmvd v mɣtvlɒn xdɒvnd bsjɒr xvɒhndbvd v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd «آnɒnj kh ɒz ʔɣb jknfr kh dr vst bɒʃd xvjʃtn rɒ dr bɒɣɒt tɣdjs v tthjr mj‌nmɒjnd v ɡvʃt xnzjr vrd͡ʒɒsɒt v ɡvʃt mvʃ mj‌xvrnd bɒ hm tlf xvɒhnd ʃd v mn ɒʔmɒl v xjɒlɒt ɒjʃɒn rɒd͡ʒzɒ xvɒhm dɒd v آmdh، d͡ʒmjʔ ɒmt‌hɒ v zbɒnhɒ rɒd͡ʒmʔ xvɒhm krd v ɒjʃɒn آmdh، d͡ʒlɒl mrɒxvɒhnd djd v آjtj dr mjɒn ɒjʃɒn brپɒxvɒhm dɒʃt v آnɒnj rɒ kh ɒz ɒjʃɒn nd͡ʒɒt jɒbndnzd ɒmt‌hɒ bh trʃjʃ v fvl v tjrɒndɒzɒn lvd vtvbɒl v jvnɒn v d͡ʒzɒjr bʔjdh kh آvɒzh mrɒnʃnjdh‌ɒnd v d͡ʒlɒl mrɒ ndjdh‌ɒnd xvɒhm frstɒd tɒd͡ʒlɒl mrɒ dr mjɒn bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl hdjh xvd rɒ dr zrf پɒk bh xɒnh xdɒvnd mj‌آvrnd v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjdkh ɒz ɒjʃɒn njz kɒhnɒn v lɒvjɒn xvɒhnd ɡrft zjrɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd «t͡ʃnɒnkh آsmɒnhɒj d͡ʒdjd v zmjn d͡ʒdjdj kh mn آnhɒ rɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh ɒz ɣrh mɒh tɒɣrh djɡr v ɒz sbt tɒ sbt djɡr tmɒmj bʃrxvɒhnd آmd tɒ bh hzvr mn sd͡ʒdh nmɒjnd klɒm ɒrmjɒ ɒbn hlɣjɒ ɒz kɒhnɒnj kh drʔnɒtvt dr zmjn bnjɒmjn bvdnd kh klɒm xdɒvnd dr ɒjɒm jvʃjɒ ɒbn آmvn پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ drsɒl sjzdhm ɒz sltnt ɒv br vj nɒzl ʃd v drɒjɒm jhvjɒɣjm bn jvʃjɒ پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ tɒ آxr sɒl jɒzdhm sdɣjɒ ɒbn jvʃjɒ پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ nɒzl mj‌ʃd tɒ zmɒnj kh ɒvrʃljm dr mɒh پnd͡ʒm
