jhvh ɒjnk mn tklm krdn rɒ nmj dɒnm t͡ʃvnkh tfl hstm» ɒmɒxdɒvnd mrɒ ɡft «mɡv mn tfl hstm، zjrɒ hrd͡ʒɒjj kh tv rɒ bfrstm xvɒhj rft v bhr‌t͡ʃh tvrɒ ɒmr frmɒjm tklm xvɒhj nmvd ɒz ɒjʃɒn mtrs zjrɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd mn bɒ tv hstm v tvrɒ rhɒjj xvɒhm dɒd» آŋɒh xdɒvnd dst xvd rɒ drɒz krdh، dhɒn mrɒ lms krd v xdɒvndbh mn ɡft «ɒjnk klɒm xvd rɒ dr dhɒn tv nhɒdm bdɒn kh tv rɒ ɒmrvz br ɒmt‌hɒ v mmɒlk mbʔvs krdm tɒ ɒz rjʃh brknj v mnhdm sɒzj v hlɒk knj v xrɒb nmɒjj v bnɒ nmɒjj v ɣrs knj» پs klɒm xdɒvnd br mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «ɒj ɒrmjɒ t͡ʃh mj‌bjnj؟ ɡftm «ʃɒxh‌ɒj ɒz drxt bɒdɒm mj‌bjnm» xdɒvnd mrɒ ɡft «njkv djdj zjrɒ kh mn br klɒm xvd djdh bɒnj mj‌knm tɒ آn rɒbh ɒnd͡ʒɒm rsɒnm» پs klɒm xdɒvnd bɒr djɡr bh mn rsjdh، ɡft «t͡ʃh t͡ʃjz mj‌bjnj؟» ɡftm «djɡj d͡ʒvʃndh mj‌bjnm kh rvjʃ ɒz trf ʃmɒl ɒst» v xdɒvnd mrɒ ɡft «blɒjj ɒz trf ʃmɒl br d͡ʒmjʔ sknh ɒjn zmjn mnbst xvɒhdʃd zjrɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnk mn d͡ʒmjʔ ɣbɒjl mmɒlk ʃmɒlj rɒ xvɒhm xvɒnd v ɒjʃɒn آmdh، hr ks krsj xvd rɒ dr dhnh drvɒzh ɒvrʃljm v br tmɒmj hsɒrhɒjʃ ɡrdɒɡrd v bh zd tmɒmj ʃhrhɒj jhvdɒ brپɒ xvɒhd dɒʃt v br ɒjʃɒn ɒhkɒm xvd rɒ drbɒrh hmh ʃrɒrtʃɒn d͡ʒɒrj xvɒhm sɒxt t͡ʃvnkh mrɒ trk krdnd v brɒj xdɒjɒn ɣjr bxvr‌svzɒnjdnd vɒʔmɒl dsthɒj xvd rɒ sd͡ʒdh nmvdnd پs tvkmr xvd rɒ bbnd v brxɒsth، hr‌آnt͡ʃh rɒ mn bh tvɒmr frmɒjm bh ɒjʃɒn bɡv v ɒz ɒjʃɒn hrɒsɒn mbɒʃ، mbɒdɒ tv rɒ پjʃ rvj ɒjʃɒn mʃvʃ sɒzm zjrɒɒjnk mn tv rɒ ɒmrvz ʃhr hsɒrdɒr v stvn آhnjn v hsɒrhɒj brnd͡ʒjn bh zd tmɒmj zmjn brɒj پɒdʃɒhɒn jhvdɒ v srvrɒn v kɒhnɒnʃ v ɣvm zmjn sɒxtmv ɒjʃɒn bɒ tv d͡ʒŋ xvɒhnd krdɒmɒ br tv ɣɒlb nxvɒhnd آmd، zjrɒ xdɒvnd mj ɡvjd mn bɒ tv hstm v tv rɒ rhɒjj xvɒhm dɒd» v ɒjʃɒn bɒ tv d͡ʒŋ xvɒhnd krdɒmɒ br tv ɣɒlb nxvɒhnd آmd، zjrɒ xdɒvnd mj ɡvjd mn bɒ tv hstm v tv rɒ rhɒjj xvɒhm dɒd» v klɒm xdɒvnd br mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «brv v bh ɡvʃ ɒvrʃljm ndɒ krdh، bɡvxdɒvnd kh ɒvrɒ bxvrnd md͡ʒrm xvɒhnd ʃd v blɒ br ɒjʃɒn mstvlj xvɒhd ɡrdjd» ‌ɒj xɒndɒn jʔɣvb v d͡ʒmjʔ ɣbɒjl xɒnvɒdh ɒsrɒئjl klɒm xdɒvnd rɒ bʃnvjd xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «پdrɒn ʃmɒ dr mn t͡ʃh bj‌ɒnsɒfj jɒftndkh ɒz mn dvrj vrzjdnd v ɒbɒtjl rɒ پjrvj krdh، bɒtl ʃdnd؟ v ŋftnd jhvh kd͡ʒɒ ɒst kh mɒ rɒɒz zmjn msr brآvrd v mɒ rɒ dr bjɒbɒn v zmjn vjrɒn v پr ɒz hfrh‌hɒ v zmjn xʃk v sɒjh mvt vzmjnj kh ksj ɒz آn ɡzr nknd v آdmj dr آn sɒkn nʃvd rhbrj nmvd؟ v mn ʃmɒ rɒ bh zmjn bstɒnhɒ آvrdm tɒ mjvh‌hɒ v tjbɒt آn rɒ bxvrjd، ɒmɒ t͡ʃvn dɒxl آn ʃdjd zmjn mrɒ nd͡ʒs sɒxtjdvmjrɒs mrɒ mkrvh ɡrdɒnjdjd kɒhnɒn ŋftnd jhvh kd͡ʒɒst v xvɒnndɡɒn tvrɒt mrɒ nʃnɒxtndv ʃbɒnɒn br mn ʔɒsj ʃdnd v ɒnbjɒ brɒj bʔl nbvt krdh، dr ʔɣb t͡ʃjzhɒj bj‌fɒjdh rftnd bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd bɒr djɡr bɒ ʃmɒ mxɒsmh xvɒhm nmvd v bɒ پsrɒn پsrɒn ʃmɒ mxɒsmh xvɒhm krd پs bh d͡ʒzjrh hɒj ktjm ɡzrkrdh، mlɒhzh nmɒjjd v bh ɣjdɒr frstɒdh bh dɣt tʔɣl nmɒjjd v drjɒft knjd kh آjɒ hɒdsh‌ɒj msl ɒjn vɒɣʔ ʃdh bɒʃd؟ kh آjɒ hjt͡ʃ ɒmtj xdɒjɒn xvjʃ rɒ ʔvz krdh bɒʃnd bɒ آnkh آnhɒ xdɒnjstnd؟ ɒmɒ ɣvm mn d͡ʒlɒl xvjʃ rɒ bh آnt͡ʃh fɒjdh‌ɒj ndɒrd ʔvz nmvdnd پs xdɒvndmj ɡvjd ɒj آsmɒnhɒ ɒz ɒjn mthjr bɒʃjd v bh xvd lrzjdh، bh ʃdt mʃvʃ ʃvjd zjrɒ ɣvm mn dv kɒr bd krdh‌ɒnd mrɒ kh t͡ʃʃmh آb hjɒtm trk nmvdh v brɒj xvd hvzhɒ kndh‌ɒnd، jʔnj hvzhɒj ʃksth kh آb rɒ ŋɒh ndɒrd آjɒɒsrɒئjl ɣlɒm jɒ xɒnh zɒd ɒst پs t͡ʃrɒ ɣɒrt ʃdh bɒʃd؟ ʃjrɒn ʒjɒn br ɒv ɣrʃ nmvdh، آvɒz xvd rɒ blnd krdnd v zmjn ɒv rɒ vjrɒn sɒxtnd v ʃhrhɒjʃ svxth v ɣjrmskvn ɡrdjdh ɒst v پsrɒn nvf v thfnjs frɣ tvrɒ ʃksth‌ɒnd آjɒ ɒjn rɒ br xvjʃtn vɒrdnjɒvrdj t͡ʃvnkh jhvh xdɒj xvd rɒ hjnj kh tvrɒ rhbrj mj‌nmvd trk krdj؟ v ɒlɒn tv rɒ bɒrɒh msr t͡ʃh‌kɒr ɒst tɒ آb ʃjhvr rɒ bnvʃj؟ vtv rɒ bɒ rɒh آʃvr t͡ʃh‌kɒr ɒst tɒ آb frɒt rɒbnvʃj؟» xdɒvnd jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «ʃrɒrt tv، tv rɒ tnbjh krdh v ɒrtdɒd tv، tv rɒtvbjx nmvdh ɒst پs bdɒn v bbjn kh ɒjn ɒmrzʃt v tlx ɒst kh jhvh xdɒj xvd rɒ trk nmvdj v trs mn dr tv njst zjrɒ ɒz zmɒn ɣdjm jvɣ tv rɒ ʃkstm v bndhɒj tv rɒ ɡsjxtm vɡftj bndɡj nxvɒhm nmvd zjrɒ br hr tl blnd vzjr hr drxt sbz xvɒbjdh، znɒ krdj v mn tv rɒ mv ɒsjl v txm tmɒm njkv ɣrs nmvdm پs t͡ʃɡvnh nhɒl mv bjɡɒnh brɒj mn ɡrdjdh‌ɒj؟ پs ɒɡr‌t͡ʃh xvjʃtn rɒ bɒ ɒʃnɒn bʃvjj v sɒbvn brɒj xvd zjɒdh bkɒr brj، ɒmɒ xdɒvnd jhvh mj‌ɡvjdkh ɡnɒh tv پjʃ mn rɣm ʃdh ɒst t͡ʃɡvnh mj‌ɡvjj kh nd͡ʒs nʃdm v dr ʔɣb bʔljm nrftm؟ trjɣ xvjʃ rɒ dr vɒdj bŋr v bh آnt͡ʃh krdj ɒʔtrɒf nmɒ‌ɒj ʃtr tjzrv kh dr rɒhhɒj xvdmj dvj msl ɡvrxr hstj kh bh bjɒbɒn ʔɒdt dɒʃth، dr ʃhvt dl xvd bɒd rɒ bv mj‌kʃd kjst kh ɒz ʃhvtʃ ɒv rɒ brɡrdɒnd؟ آnɒnj kh ɒvrɒ mj‌tlbnd xsth nxvɒhnd ʃd v ɒv rɒ dr mɒhʃ xvɒhnd jɒft پɒj xvd rɒ ɒz xvɒhj krd؟ ɒɡr‌t͡ʃh xvjʃtn rɒ bh ɣrmz mlbs sɒzj v bh zjvrhɒj tlɒ bjɒrɒjj v t͡ʃʃmɒn xvd rɒ ɒz srmh d͡ʒlɒ dhj ljkn xvd rɒ ʔbs zjbɒjj dɒdh‌ɒj t͡ʃvnkh jɒrɒn tv tv rɒ xvɒr ʃmrdh، ɣsdd͡ʒɒn tv dɒrndzjrɒ kh آvɒzj ʃnjdm msl آvɒzznj kh drd zh dɒrd v tŋj msl znj kh nxst zɒdh xvjʃ rɒ bzɒjd jʔnj آvɒz dxtrshjvn rɒ kh آh mj‌kʃd v dsthɒj xvd rɒ drɒzkrdh، mj‌ɡvjd vɒj br mn zjrɒ kh d͡ʒɒn mn bh‌sbb ɣɒtlɒn bjhvʃ ʃdh ɒst zjrɒ kh آvɒzj ʃnjdm msl آvɒzznj kh drd zh dɒrd v tŋj msl znj kh nxst zɒdh xvjʃ rɒ bzɒjd jʔnj آvɒz dxtrshjvn rɒ kh آh mj‌kʃd v dsthɒj xvd rɒ drɒzkrdh، mj‌ɡvjd vɒj br mn zjrɒ kh d͡ʒɒn mn bh‌sbb ɣɒtlɒn bjhvʃ ʃdh ɒst «dr kvt͡ʃh hɒj ɒvrʃljm ɡrdʃ krdh، bbjnjd v bfhmjd v dr t͡ʃhɒrsvhɒjʃ tftjʃ nmɒjjd kh آjɒ ksj rɒ kh bh ɒnsɒf ʔml nmɒjd v tɒlb rɒstj bɒʃd tvɒnjd jɒft tɒ mn آn rɒbjɒmrzm؟ v ɒɡr‌t͡ʃh bɡvjnd ɣsm bh hjɒt jhvh، ljkn bh drvɣ ɣsm mj‌xvrnd» ‌ɒj xdɒvnd آjɒ t͡ʃʃmɒn tv brɒstj ŋrɒn njst؟ ɒjʃɒn rɒ zdj ɒmɒ mhzvn nʃdnd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ tlf nmvdj ɒmɒ nxvɒstnd tɒdjb rɒ bپzjrnd rvjhɒj xvd rɒ ɒz sxrh sxttr ɡrdɒnjdnd vnxvɒstnd bɒzɡʃt nmɒjnd v mn ɡftm «bh drstj kh ɒjnɒn fɣjrnd v d͡ʒɒhl hstnd kh rɒh xdɒvnd v ɒhkɒm xdɒj xvd rɒ nmj dɒnnd پs nzd bzrɡɒn mj‌rvm v bɒ ɒjʃɒn tklm xvɒhm nmvdzjrɒ kh ɒjʃɒn trjɣ xdɒvnd v ɒhkɒm xdɒj xvd rɒ mj‌dɒnnd» ljkn ɒjʃɒn mtfɣ jvɣ rɒʃksth v bndhɒ rɒ ɡsjxth‌ɒnd ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht ʃjrj ɒz d͡ʒŋl ɒjʃɒn rɒ xvɒhd kʃt v ɡrɡ bjɒbɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ tɒrɒd͡ʒ xvɒhd krd v پlŋ brʃhrhɒj ɒjʃɒn dr kmjn xvɒhd nʃst v hr‌kh ɒz آnhɒ bjrvn rvd drjdh xvɒhd ʃd، zjrɒ kh tɣsjrhɒj ɒjʃɒn bsjɒr v ɒrtdɒdhɒj ɒjʃɒn ʔzjm ɒst «t͡ʃɡvnh tv rɒ brɒj ɒjn bjɒmrzm kh پsrɒnt mrɒ trk krdnd v bh آnt͡ʃh xdɒ njst ɣsm xvrdnd v t͡ʃvn mn ɒjʃɒn rɒ sjr nmvdm mrtkb znɒ ʃdnd v dr xɒnh hɒj fɒhʃh‌hɒ ɒzdhɒm nmvdnd msl ɒsbɒn پrvrdh ʃdh mst ʃdnd kh hr jkj ɒz ɒjʃɒn brɒj zn hmsɒjh xvd ʃjhh mj‌znd v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd «آjɒ bh‌sbb ɒjn kɒrhɒʔɣvbt nxvɒhm rsɒnjd v آjɒ d͡ʒɒn mn ɒz t͡ʃnjn tɒjfh‌ɒj ɒntɣɒm nxvɒhd kʃjd؟» brhsɒrhɒjʃ brآjjd v آnhɒ rɒ xrɒb knjd ɒmɒbɒlkl hlɒk mknjd v ʃɒxh hɒjʃ rɒ ɣtʔ nmɒjjdzjrɒ kh ɒz آn xdɒvnd njstnd xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd «hr آjnh xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl v xɒndɒn jhvdɒ bh mn bh ʃdt xjɒnt vrzjdh‌ɒnd» xdɒvnd rɒ ɒnkɒr nmvdh، mj‌ɡvjndkh ɒv njst v blɒ bh mɒ nxvɒhd rsjd v ʃmʃjr vɣht rɒ nxvɒhjm djd v ɒnbjɒ bɒd mj‌ʃvnd vklɒm dr ɒjʃɒn njst پs bh ɒjʃɒn t͡ʃnjn vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd bnɒbrɒjn jhvh xdɒj sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «t͡ʃvnkh ɒjn klɒm rɒ ɡftjd hmɒnɒmn klɒm xvd rɒ dr dhɒn tv آtʃ v ɒjn ɣvm rɒhjzm xvɒhm sɒxt v ɒjʃɒn rɒ xvɒhd svzɒnjd» xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd «ɒj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl، ɒjnk mn ɒmtj rɒ ɒz dvr br ʃmɒ xvɒhm آvrd ɒmtj kh zvrآvrnd v ɒmtj kh ɣdjmnd v ɒmtj kh zbɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ nmj dɒnj v ɡftɒr ɒjʃɒn rɒ nmj fhmj trkʃ ɒjʃɒn ɣbr ɡʃɒdh ɒst v d͡ʒmjʔ ɒjʃɒn d͡ʒbɒrnd v xrmn v nɒn tv rɒ kh پsrɒn v dxtrɒnt آn rɒ mj bɒjd bxvrnd xvɒhnd xvrd v ɡvsfndɒn vɡɒvɒn tv rɒ xvɒhnd xvrd v ɒŋvrhɒ v ɒnd͡ʒjrhɒj tv rɒ xvɒhnd xvrd v ʃhrhɒj hsɒrdɒr tv rɒ kh bh آnhɒ tvkl mj‌nmɒjj bɒ ʃmʃjr hlɒk xvɒhndsɒxt» ljkn xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd «dr آn rvzhɒ njz ʃmɒ rɒ bɒlkl hlɒk nxvɒhm sɒxt v t͡ʃvn ʃmɒ ɡvjjd kh jhvh xdɒj mɒ t͡ʃrɒtmɒmj ɒjn blɒhɒ rɒ br mɒ vɒrd آvrdh ɒst آŋɒh tvbh ɒjʃɒn bɡv ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht kh mrɒ trk krdjd vxdɒjɒn ɣjr rɒ dr zmjn xvjʃ ʔbɒdt nmvdjd پs ɣrjbɒn rɒ dr zmjnj kh ɒz آn ʃmɒ nbɒʃdbndɡj xvɒhjd nmvd «ɒjn rɒ bh xɒndɒn jʔɣvb ɒxbɒr nmɒjjd v bh jhvdɒ ɒʔlɒn krdh، ɡvjjd kh‌ɒj ɣvm d͡ʒɒhl vbj fhm kh t͡ʃʃm dɒrjd ɒmɒ nmj bjnjd v ɡvʃ dɒrjdɒmɒ nmj ʃnvjd ɒjn rɒ bʃnvjd xdɒvndmj ɡvjd آjɒ ɒz mn nmj trsjd v آjɒ ɒz hzvr mn nmj lrzjd kh rjɡ rɒ bh ɣɒnvn d͡ʒɒvdɒnj، hd drjɒɡzɒʃth‌ɒm kh ɒz آn ntvɒnd ɡzʃt v ɒɡr‌t͡ʃh ɒmvɒd͡ʒʃ mtlɒtm ʃvd ɣɒlb nxvɒhd آmd v hrt͡ʃnd ʃvrʃ nmɒjd ɒmɒ ɒz آn td͡ʒɒvz nmj tvɒndkrd؟ ɒmɒ ɒjn ɣvm، dl ftnh ɒŋjz v mtmrd dɒrnd ɒjʃɒn ftnh ɒŋjxth v rfth‌ɒnd v dr dlhɒj xvdnmj ɡvjnd kh ɒz jhvh xdɒj xvd btrsjm kh bɒrɒn ɒvl v آxr rɒ dr mvsmʃ mj‌bxʃd v hfth hɒj mʔjn hsɒd rɒ bh d͡ʒht mɒ ŋɒh mj‌dɒrd xtɒjɒj ʃmɒ ɒjn t͡ʃjzhɒ rɒ dvr krdh v ɡnɒhɒn ʃmɒ njkvjj rɒ ɒz ʃmɒ mnʔ nmvdh ɒst zjrɒdr mjɒn ɣvm mn ʃrjrɒn پjdɒ ʃdh‌ɒnd kh msl kmjn nʃstn sjɒdɒn dr kmjn mj‌nʃjnnd dɒmhɒ ɡstrɒnjdh، mrdm rɒ sjd mj‌knnd msl ɣfsj kh پr ɒz پrndɡɒn bɒʃd، hmt͡ʃnjn xɒnh hɒj ɒjʃɒn پr ɒz frjb ɒst v ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht bzrɡ v dvltmndʃdh‌ɒnd frbh v drxʃndh mj‌ʃvnd v dr ɒʔmɒl zʃt hm ɒz hd td͡ʒɒvz mj‌knnd dʔvj jʔnj dʔvj jtjmɒn rɒ fjsl nmj dhnd v bɒ vd͡ʒvd آn kɒmjɒb mj‌ʃvnd v fɣjrɒn rɒ dɒdrsj nmj knnd v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd آjɒ bh‌sbb ɒjn kɒrhɒʔɣvbt nxvɒhm rsɒnjd v آjɒ d͡ʒɒn mn ɒz t͡ʃnjn tɒjfh‌ɒj ɒntɣɒm nxvɒhd kʃjd؟ ɒmrj ʔd͡ʒjb v hvlnɒk dr zmjn vɒɣʔ ʃdh ɒstɒnbjɒ bh drvɣ nbvt mj‌knnd v kɒhnɒn bh vɒsth ɒjʃɒn hkmrɒnj mj‌nmɒjnd v ɣvm mn ɒjn hɒlt rɒ dvst mj‌dɒrnd v ʃmɒ dr آxr ɒjn t͡ʃh xvɒhjd krd؟» ɒnbjɒ bh drvɣ nbvt mj‌knnd v kɒhnɒn bh vɒsth ɒjʃɒn hkmrɒnj mj‌nmɒjnd v ɣvm mn ɒjn hɒlt rɒ dvst mj‌dɒrnd v ʃmɒ dr آxr ɒjn t͡ʃh xvɒhjd krd؟» ɒj bnj bnjɒmjn ɒz ɒvrʃljm frɒr knjd v krnɒrɒ dr tɣvʔ bnvɒzjd v ʔlɒmtj br bjt hkɒrjm brɒfrɒzjd zjrɒ kh blɒjj ɒz trf ʃmɒl vʃkst ʔzjmj rv xvɒhd dɒd v mn آn dxtrd͡ʒmjl v ltjf jʔnj dxtr shjvn rɒ mnɣtʔ xvɒhm sɒxt v ʃbɒnɒn bɒ ɡlh hɒj xvjʃ nzdvj xvɒhnd آmd v xjmh hɒj xvd rɒ ɡrdɒɡrd ɒvbrپɒ nmvdh، hr jk dr d͡ʒɒj xvd xvɒhnd t͡ʃrɒnjd bɒ ɒv d͡ʒŋ rɒ mhjɒ sɒzjd v brxɒsth، dr vɣt zhr brآjjm vɒj br mɒ zjrɒ kh rvz rv bh zvɒl nhɒdh ɒst v sɒjh hɒj ʔsr drɒz mj‌ʃvd brxjzjd v dr ʃb brآjjm tɒ ɣsrhɒjʃ rɒmnhdm sɒzjm zjrɒ kh jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj frmɒjd «drxtɒn rɒ ɣtʔ nmvdh، mɣɒbl ɒvrʃljm sŋr brپɒ nmɒjjd zjrɒ ɒjn ɒst ʃhrj kh szɒvɒr ʔɣvbt ɒst t͡ʃvnkh ɒndrvnʃ tmɒm zlm ɒst msl t͡ʃʃmh‌ɒj kh آb xvd rɒmj d͡ʒvʃɒnd hmt͡ʃnɒn ɒv ʃrɒrt xvjʃ rɒmj d͡ʒvʃɒnd zlm v tɒrɒd͡ʒ dr ɒndrvnʃ ʃnjdh mj‌ʃvd v bjmɒrjhɒ v d͡ʒrɒhɒt dɒjm dr nzr mn ɒst ‌ɒj ɒvrʃljm، tɒdjb rɒ bپzjr mbɒdɒ d͡ʒɒn mn ɒz tv bjzɒr ʃvd v tv rɒ vjrɒn v zmjn ɣjrmskvn ɡrdɒnm» jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd kh «bɣjh ɒsrɒئjl rɒ msl mv xvʃh t͡ʃjnj xvɒhnd krd پs msl ksj‌kh ɒŋvr mj‌t͡ʃjnddst xvd rɒ br ʃɒxh hɒjʃ brɡrdɒn» kjstnd kh bh ɒjʃɒn tklm nmvdh، ʃhɒdt dhm tɒ bʃnvnd hɒn ɡvʃ ɒjʃɒn nɒmxtvn ɒst kh ntvɒnnd ʃnjd ɒjnk klɒm xdɒvnd brɒj ɒjʃɒn ʔɒrɡrdjdh ɒst v dr آn rɣbt ndɒrnd v mn ɒzhdt xʃm xdɒvnd پr ʃdh‌ɒm v ɒz xvddɒrj xsth ɡrdjdh‌ɒm پs آn rɒ dr kvt͡ʃh‌hɒ br ɒtfɒl vbr md͡ʒls d͡ʒvɒnɒn bɒ hm brjz zjrɒ kh ʃvhr v zn hr dv ɡrftɒr xvɒhnd ʃd v ʃjx bɒ djrjnh rvz v xɒnh‌hɒ v mzrʔh‌hɒ v znɒn ɒjʃɒn bɒ hm ɒz آn djɡrɒn xvɒhnd ʃd zjrɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh «dst xvd rɒ bh zd sɒknɒn ɒjn zmjn drɒzxvɒhm krd t͡ʃvnkh d͡ʒmjʔ ɒjʃɒn t͡ʃh xrd vt͡ʃh bzrɡ، پr ɒz tmʔ ʃdh‌ɒnd v hmɡj ɒjʃɒn t͡ʃh nbj v t͡ʃh kɒhn، frjb rɒ bʔml mj‌آvrnd vd͡ʒrɒht ɣvm mrɒ ɒndk ʃfɒjj dɒdnd، t͡ʃvnkh mj‌ɡvjnd slɒmtj ɒst، slɒmtj ɒst bɒ آnkh slɒmtj njst» آjɒ t͡ʃvn mrtkb rd͡ʒɒsɒt ʃdnd xd͡ʒl ɡrdjdnd؟ nj ɒbd xd͡ʒl nʃdnd blkh hjɒ rɒ ɒhsɒs nnmvdnd bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvndmj ɡvjd kh «dr mjɒn ɒftɒdɡɒn xvɒhnd ɒftɒd vhjnj kh mn bh ɒjʃɒn ʔɣvbt rsɒnm xvɒhndlɣzjd» xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «br trjɣ hɒbɒjstjd v mlɒhzh nmɒjjd v drbɒrh trjɣ hɒj ɣdjm svآl nmɒjjd kh trjɣ njkv kdɒm ɒst tɒ drآn slvk nmvdh، brɒj d͡ʒɒn xvd rɒht bjɒbjd، ljkn ɒjʃɒn d͡ʒvɒb dɒdnd kh dr آn slvk nxvɒhjm krd v mn پɒsbɒnɒn br ʃmɒ ɡmɒʃtm kh mj‌ɡftnd bh آvɒz krnɒ ɡvʃ dhjd، ɒmɒ ɒjʃɒn ɡftnd ɡvʃ nxvɒhjm dɒd پs‌ɒj ɒmt hɒbʃnvjd v‌ɒj d͡ʒmɒʔt آnt͡ʃh rɒ kh dr mjɒn ɒjʃɒn ɒst bdɒnjd ‌ɒj zmjn bʃnv ɒjnk mn blɒjj brɒjn ɣvm mj‌آvrm kh smrh xjɒlɒt ɒjʃɒn xvɒhdbvd zjrɒ kh bh klɒm mn ɡvʃ ndɒdnd v ʃrjʔt mrɒnjz trk nmvdnd t͡ʃh fɒjdh dɒrd kh bxvr ɒz sbɒv ɣsb ɒlzrjrh ɒz zmjn bʔjd brɒj mn آvrdh mj‌ʃvd ɣrbɒnj hɒj svxtnj ʃmɒ mɣbvl njst v zbɒjh ʃmɒ پsndjdh mn nj» bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «ɒjnk mn پjʃ rvj ɒjn ɣvm sŋhɒj lɣzʃ dhndh xvɒhm nhɒd v پdrɒn vپsrɒn bɒ hm ɒz آnhɒ lɣzʃ xvɒhnd xvrd v sɒkn zmjn bɒ hmsɒjh‌ɒʃ hlɒk xvɒhnd ʃd» xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «ɒjnk ɣvmj ɒzzmjn ʃmɒl mj‌آvrm v ɒmtj ʔzjm ɒz ɒɣsɒj zmjn xvɒhnd brxɒst v kmɒn v njzh xvɒhndɡrft ɒjʃɒn mrdɒn stmkjʃ mj‌bɒʃnd kh trhm ndɒrnd bh آvɒz xvd msl drjɒ ʃvrʃ xvɒhndnmvd v br ɒsbɒn svɒr ʃdh، msl mrdɒn d͡ʒŋj bh zd tv‌ɒj dxtr shjvn sf آrɒjj xvɒhndkrd» آvɒzh ɒjn rɒ ʃnjdjm v dsthɒj mɒ sst ɡrdjd tŋj v drd msl znj kh mj‌zɒjd mɒ rɒ drɡrfth ɒst bh shrɒ bjrvn mʃvjd v bh rɒh mrvjd zjrɒ kh ʃmʃjr dʃmnɒn v xvf ɒz hrtrf ɒst ‌ɒj dxtr ɣvm mn پlɒs bپvʃ vxvjʃtn rɒ dr xɒkstr bɣltɒn mɒtm پsr jɡɒnh vnvhh ɡrj tlx brɒj xvd bkn zjrɒ kh tɒrɒd͡ʒ knndh nɒɡhɒn br mɒ mj‌آjd tv rɒ dr mjɒn ɣvm xvdɒmthɒn knndh v ɣlʔh ɣrɒr dɒdm tɒ rɒhhɒj ɒjʃɒn rɒbfhmj v ɒmthɒn knj hmh ɒjʃɒn sxt mtmrd ʃdh‌ɒnd v brɒj nmɒmj krdn ɡrdʃ mj‌knnd brnd͡ʒ v آhn mj‌bɒʃnd v d͡ʒmjʔ ɒjʃɒn fsɒd knndh‌ɒnd dm پr zvr mj‌dmd v srb drآtʃ fɒnj mj‌ɡrdd v ɣɒlɡr ʔbs ɣɒl mj‌ɡzɒrdzjrɒ kh ʃrjrɒn d͡ʒdɒ nmj ʃvndnɣrh trk ʃdh nɒmjdh mj‌ʃvnd zjrɒ xdɒvnd ɒjʃɒn rɒ trk krdh ɒst nɣrh trk ʃdh nɒmjdh mj‌ʃvnd zjrɒ xdɒvnd ɒjʃɒn rɒ trk krdh ɒst klɒmj kh ɒz d͡ʒɒnb xdɒvnd bh ɒrmjɒ nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «bh drvɒzh xɒnh xdɒvndbɒjst v ɒjn klɒm rɒ dr آnd͡ʒɒ ndɒ krdh، bɡv ɒj tmɒmj jhvdɒ kh bh ɒjn drvɒzh‌hɒ dɒxl ʃdh، xdɒvnd rɒ sd͡ʒdh mj‌nmɒjjd klɒm xdɒvnd rɒbʃnvjd jhvh sbɒjvt xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd trjɣ‌hɒ v ɒʔmɒl xvd rɒ ɒslɒh knjd vmn ʃmɒ rɒ dr ɒjn mkɒn sɒkn xvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd bh sxnɒn drvɣ tvkl mnmɒjjd v mɡvjjd kh hjkl jhvh، hjkl jhvh، hjkl jhvh ɒjn ɒst zjrɒ ɒɡr bh thɣjɣ trjɣ‌hɒ v ɒʔmɒl xvd rɒ ɒslɒh knjd v ɒnsɒf rɒ dr mjɒn jkdjɡr bʔml آvrjd، v br ɣrjbɒn v jtjmɒn v bjvh‌znɒn zlm nnmɒjjd vxvn bj‌ɡnɒhɒn rɒ dr ɒjn mkɒn nrjzjd v xdɒjɒn ɣjr rɒ bh d͡ʒht zrr xvjʃ پjrvj nnmɒjjd، آŋɒh ʃmɒ rɒ dr ɒjn mkɒn dr zmjnj kh bh پdrɒn ʃmɒ ɒz ɒzl tɒ bh ɒbd dɒdh‌ɒm sɒkn xvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd ɒjnk ʃmɒ bh sxnɒn drvɣj kh mnfʔt ndɒrdtvkl mj‌nmɒjjd آjɒ mrtkb dzdj v znɒ v ɣtl nmj ʃvjd v bh drvɣ ɣsm nmj xvrjd v brɒj bʔl bxvr nmj svzɒnjd؟ v آjɒ xdɒjɒn ɣjr rɒ kh nmj ʃnɒsjd پjrvj nmj nmɒjjd؟ v dɒxl ʃdh، bh hzvr mn dr ɒjn xɒnh‌ɒj kh bh ɒsm mn msmj ɒst mj‌ɒjstjd v mj‌ɡvjjd kh bh ɡrdn tmɒm ɒjn rd͡ʒɒsɒt sپrdh ʃdh‌ɒjm آjɒ ɒjn xɒnh‌ɒj kh bh ɒsm mn msmj ɒst dr nzr ʃmɒmɣɒrh dzdɒn ʃdh ɒst؟ v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnk mn njz ɒjn rɒ djdh‌ɒm lkn bh mkɒn mn kh dr ʃjlv bvd v nɒm xvd rɒ ɒvl dr آnd͡ʒɒ ɣrɒr dɒdh bvdm brvjd v آnt͡ʃh rɒ kh bh‌sbb ʃrɒrt ɣvm xvd ɒsrɒئjl bh آnd͡ʒɒ krdh‌ɒm mlɒhzh nmɒjjd پs hɒl xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd ɒz آnrv kh tmɒm ɒjn ɒʔmɒl rɒ bd͡ʒɒ آvrdjd bɒ آnkh mn sbh zvdbrxɒsth، bh ʃmɒ tklm nmvdh، sxn rɒndm ɒmɒnʃnjdjd v ʃmɒ rɒ xvɒndm ɒmɒ d͡ʒvɒb ndɒdjd ɒzɒjn d͡ʒht bh ɒjn xɒnh‌ɒj kh bh ɒsm mn msmj ɒst v ʃmɒ bh آn tvkl dɒrjd v bh mkɒnj kh bh ʃmɒ v bh پdrɒn ʃmɒ dɒdm bh nvʔj kh bh ʃjlv ʔml nmvdm ʔml xvɒhm krd v ʃmɒ rɒ ɒz hzvrxvd xvɒhm rɒnd bh nvʔj kh d͡ʒmjʔ brɒdrɒn ʃmɒ jʔnj tmɒm zrjt ɒfrɒjm rɒ rɒndm پs tv brɒj ɒjn ɣvm dʔɒ mkn v bh d͡ʒht ɒjʃɒn آvɒz tzrʔ vɒstɣɒsh blnd mnmɒ v nzd mn ʃfɒʔt mkn zjrɒ kh mn tv rɒ ɒd͡ʒɒbt nxvɒhm nmvd آjɒ آnt͡ʃh rɒ kh ɒjʃɒn dr ʃhrhɒj jhvdɒ v kvt͡ʃh hɒj ɒvrʃljm mj‌knnd nmj bjnj؟ پsrɒn، hjzm d͡ʒmʔ mj‌knndv پdrɒn، آtʃ mj‌ɒfrvznd v znɒn، xmjrmj srʃnd tɒ ɣrshɒ brɒj mlkh آsmɒn bsɒznd vhdɒjɒj rjxtnj brɒj xdɒjɒn ɣjr rjxth mrɒmtɣjr sɒznd ɒmɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd آjɒ mrɒmtɣjr mj‌sɒznd؟ nj blkh xvjʃtn rɒ tɒ rvjhɒj xvd rɒ rsvɒ sɒznd bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnk xʃm v ɣzb mn br ɒjn mkɒn brɒnsɒn v br bhɒjm v br drxtɒn shrɒ v brmhsvl zmjn rjxth xvɒhd ʃd v ɒfrvxth ʃdh، xɒmvʃ nxvɒhd ɡrdjd «jhvh sbɒjvt xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɣrbɒnj hɒj svxtnj xvd rɒ br zbɒjh xvjʃ mzjd knjd v ɡvʃt bxvrjd zjrɒ kh bh پdrɒn ʃmɒ sxn ŋftm v dr rvzj kh ɒjʃɒn rɒɒz zmjn msr bjrvn آvrdm آnhɒ rɒ drbɒrh ɣrbɒnj hɒj svxtnj v zbɒjh ɒmr nfrmvdm blkh ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh ɒjn t͡ʃjz ɒmr frmvdh، ɡftm kh ɣvl mrɒbʃnvjd vmn xdɒj ʃmɒ xvɒhm bvd v ʃmɒ ɣvm mn xvɒhjd bvd v bhr trjɣj kh bh ʃmɒ hkm nmɒjm slvk nmɒjjd tɒ brɒj ʃmɒ njkv bɒʃd ɒmɒɒjʃɒn nʃnjdnd v ɡvʃ xvd rɒ frɒ ndɒʃtnd blkh brhsb mʃvrthɒ v srkʃj dl ʃrjr xvd rftɒrnmvdnd v bh ʔɣb ɒftɒdnd v پjʃ njɒmdnd ɒzrvzj kh پdrɒn ʃmɒ ɒz zmjn msr bjrvn آmdnd tɒ ɒmrvz d͡ʒmjʔ bndɡɒn xvd ɒnbjɒ rɒ nzd ʃmɒ frstɒdm blkh hr rvz sbh zvd brxɒsth، ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒrsɒl nmvdm ɒmɒ ɒjʃɒn nʃnjdnd v ɡvʃ xvd rɒ frɒndɒʃtnd blkh ɡrdn xvjʃ rɒ sxt nmvdh، ɒzپdrɒn xvd bdtr ʔml nmvdnd پs tv tmɒmj ɒjn sxnɒn rɒ bh ɒjʃɒn bɡv ɒmɒ tv rɒ nxvɒhnd ʃnjdv ɒjʃɒn rɒ bxvɒn ɒmɒ ɒjʃɒn tv rɒ d͡ʒvɒb nxvɒhnddɒd v bh ɒjʃɒn bɡv ɒjnɒn ɣvmj mj‌bɒʃnd kh ɣvl jhvh xdɒj xvjʃ rɒ nmj ʃnvnd v tɒdjb nmj پzjrnd zjrɒ rɒstj nɒbvd ɡrdjdh v ɒz dhɒn ɒjʃɒn ɣtʔ ʃdh ɒst ɒj ɒvrʃljm mvj xvd rɒ trɒʃjdh، dvr bjndɒz v br blndjhɒ آvɒznvhh brɒfrɒz zjrɒ xdɒvnd tbɣh mɣzvb xvd rɒrd v trk nmvdh ɒst «t͡ʃvnkh xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd bnj jhvdɒ آnt͡ʃh rɒ kh dr nzr mn nɒپsnd ɒst bʔml آvrdnd vrd͡ʒɒsɒt xvjʃ rɒ dr xɒnh‌ɒj kh bh ɒsm mn msmj ɒst brپɒnmvdh، آn rɒ nd͡ʒs sɒxtnd vmkɒn hɒj blnd xvd rɒ dr tvft kh dr vɒdj ɒbn hnvm ɒst bnɒ nmvdnd tɒ پsrɒn v dxtrɒn xvjʃ rɒ dr آtʃ bsvzɒnnd kh mn ɒjnkɒr rɒ ɒmr nfrmvdh bvdm v bxɒtr xvjʃ njɒvrdh bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnk rvzhɒ mj‌آjd kh آn bɒrdjɡr bh tvft v vɒdj ɒbn hnvm msmj nxvɒhdʃd blkh bh vɒdj ɣtl v dr tvft dfn xvɒhnd krdtɒ d͡ʒɒjj bɒɣj nmɒnd v lɒʃhɒj ɒjn ɣvm xvrɒk mrɣɒn hvɒ v d͡ʒɒnvrɒn zmjn xvɒhd bvd vksj آnhɒrɒ nxvɒhd trsɒnjdv ɒz ʃhrhɒj jhvdɒ v kvt͡ʃh hɒj ɒvrʃljm آvɒz ʃɒdmɒnj v آvɒz xvʃj v sdɒj dɒmɒd v sdɒj ʔrvs rɒ nɒbvd xvɒhm sɒxt zjrɒ kh آn zmjn vjrɒn xvɒhd ʃd» v ɒz ʃhrhɒj jhvdɒ v kvt͡ʃh hɒj ɒvrʃljm آvɒz ʃɒdmɒnj v آvɒz xvʃj v sdɒj dɒmɒd v sdɒj ʔrvs rɒ nɒbvd xvɒhm sɒxt zjrɒ kh آn zmjn vjrɒn xvɒhd ʃd» ɒstxvɒnhɒj پɒdʃɒhɒn jhvdɒ vɒstxvɒnhɒj srvrɒnʃ v ɒstxvɒnhɒj khnh vɒstxvɒnhɒj ɒnbjɒ v ɒstxvɒnhɒj sknh ɒvrʃljm rɒ ɒz ɣbrhɒj ɒjʃɒn bjrvn xvɒhnd‌آvrd v آnhɒrɒ پjʃ آftɒb v mɒh v tmɒmj lʃkr آsmɒn kh آnhɒrɒ dvst dɒʃth v ʔbɒdt krdh v پjrvj nmvdh vd͡ʒstd͡ʒv v sd͡ʒdh krdh‌ɒnd پhn xvɒhnd krd v آnhɒrɒ d͡ʒmʔ nxvɒhnd nmvd v dfn nxvɒhnd krd blkh brrvj zmjn srɡjn xvɒhd bvd v jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd kh tmɒmj bɣjh ɒjn ɣbjlh ʃrjr kh bɒɣj mj‌mɒnnd dr hr mkɒnj kh bɒɣj‌mɒndh bɒʃnd v mn ɒjʃɒn rɒ bsvj آn rɒndh bɒʃm mrɡ rɒ br hjɒt trd͡ʒjh xvɒhnd dɒd «v ɒjʃɒn rɒ bɡv xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd ɒɡr ksj bjftd آjɒ nxvɒhd brxɒst v ɒɡr ksj mrtd ʃvd آjɒ bɒzɡʃt nxvɒhd nmvd؟ پs t͡ʃrɒɒjn ɣvm ɒvrʃljm bh ɒrtdɒd dɒjmj mrtd ʃdh‌ɒnd vbh frjb mtmsk ʃdh، ɒz bɒzɡʃt nmvdn ɒbɒmj nmɒjnd؟ mn ɡvʃ xvd rɒ frɒ dɒʃth، ʃnjdm ɒmɒ brɒstj tklm nnmvdnd v ksj ɒz ʃrɒrt xvjʃ tvbh nkrdh v ŋfth ɒst t͡ʃh krdh‌ɒm blkh hr jk msl ɒsbj kh bh d͡ʒŋ mj‌dvd bh rɒh xvdrd͡ʒvʔ mj‌knd lɣlɣ njz dr hvɒ mvsm xvd rɒmj dɒnd v fɒxth v پrstvk v klnk zmɒn آmdn xvd rɒ ŋɒh mj‌dɒrnd ljkn ɣvm mn ɒhkɒm xdɒvndrɒ nmj dɒnnd t͡ʃɡvnh mj‌ɡvjjd kh mɒ hkjm hstjm v ʃrjʔt xdɒvnd bɒ mɒ ɒst bh thɣjɣ ɣlm kɒzb kɒtbɒn bh drvɣ ʔml mj‌nmɒjd hkjmɒn ʃrmndh v mdhvʃ v ɡrftɒr ʃdh‌ɒnd ɒjnk klɒm xdɒvnd rɒ trk nmvdh‌ɒnd پs t͡ʃh nvʔ hkmtj dɒrnd bnɒbrɒjn znɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh djɡrɒn xvɒhm dɒd v mzrʔh hɒj ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh mɒlkɒn djɡr zjrɒ kh d͡ʒmjʔ ɒjʃɒn t͡ʃh xrd v t͡ʃh bzrɡ پr ɒz tmʔ mj‌bɒʃnd v hmɡj ɒjʃɒn t͡ʃh nbj v t͡ʃh kɒhn bh frjb ʔml mj‌nmɒjnd vd͡ʒrɒhɒt ɣvm mrɒ ɒndk ʃfɒjj dɒdh‌ɒnd t͡ʃvnkh mj‌ɡvjnd slɒmtj ɒst، slɒmtj ɒst، bɒ آnkh slɒmtj njst آjɒ t͡ʃvn mrtkb rd͡ʒɒsɒt ʃdnd xd͡ʒl ɡrdjdnd؟ nj ɒbd xd͡ʒl nʃdnd blkh hjɒ rɒ ɒhsɒs nnmvdnd bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvndmj ɡvjd dr mjɒn ɒftɒdɡɒn xvɒhnd ɒftɒd v hjnj kh mn bh ɒjʃɒn ʔɣvbt rsɒnm xvɒhnd lɣzjd» xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd «ɒjʃɒn rɒ bɒlkl tlf xvɒhm nmvd kh nh ɒŋvr br mv v nh ɒnd͡ʒjr brdrxt ɒnd͡ʒjr jɒft ʃvd v brɡhɒ پʒmrdh xvɒhdʃd v آnt͡ʃh bh ɒjʃɒn bdhm ɒz ɒjʃɒn zɒjl xvɒhdʃd» پs mɒ t͡ʃrɒ mj‌nʃjnjm؟ d͡ʒmʔ bʃvjd tɒ bh ʃhrhɒj hsɒrdɒr dɒxl ʃvjm v dr آnhɒ sɒkt bɒʃjm zjrɒ kh jhvh xdɒj mɒ mɒ rɒ sɒkt ɡrdɒnjdh v آb tlx bh mɒ nvʃɒnjdh ɒst zɒnrv kh bh xdɒvndɡnɒh vrzjdh‌ɒjm brɒj slɒmtj ɒntzɒr kʃjdjm ɒmɒ hjt͡ʃ xjr hɒsl nʃd v brɒj zmɒn ʃfɒ v ɒjnk آʃftɡj پdjd آmd shjl ɒsbɒn ɒv ɒz dɒn ʃnjdh ʃd v ɒz sdɒj ʃjhh zvrآvrɒnʃ tmɒmj zmjn mtzlzl ɡrdjd zjrɒ kh آmdh‌ɒnd v zmjn v hrt͡ʃh dr آn ɒst v ʃhr v sɒknɒnʃ rɒ xvrdh‌ɒnd zjrɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd «ɒjnk mn dr mjɒn ʃmɒmɒrhɒ v ɒfʔjhɒ xvɒhm frstɒd kh آnhɒ rɒ ɒfsvn ntvɒn krd v ʃmɒ rɒ xvɒhnd ɡzjd» kɒʃ kh ɒzɣm xvd tslj mj‌jɒftm dl mn dr ɒndrvnm zʔf bhm rsɒnjdh ɒst ɒjnk آvɒz tzrʔ dxtr ɣvm mn ɒz zmjn dvr mj‌آjd kh آjɒ xdɒvnd dr shjvn njst v mɡr پɒdʃɒhʃ dr آn njst پs t͡ʃrɒxʃm mrɒ bh bthɒj xvd v ɒbɒtjl bjɡɒnh bh hjd͡ʒɒn آvrdnd؟ mvsm hsɒd ɡzʃt v tɒbstɒn tmɒm ʃd v mɒ nd͡ʒɒt njɒftjm bh‌sbb d͡ʒrɒht dxtrɣvm xvd md͡ʒrvh ʃdh v mɒtm ɡrfth‌ɒm v hjrt mrɒ frv ɡrfth ɒstآjɒ blsɒn dr d͡ʒlʔɒd njst v tbjbj dr آn nj؟ پs dxtr ɣvm mn t͡ʃrɒ ʃfɒnjɒfth ɒst؟ آjɒ blsɒn dr d͡ʒlʔɒd njst v tbjbj dr آn nj؟ پs dxtr ɣvm mn t͡ʃrɒ ʃfɒnjɒfth ɒst؟ t͡ʃʃmh ɒʃk tɒ rvz v ʃb brɒj kʃtɡɒn dxtr ɣvm xvd ɡrjh mj‌krdm kɒʃ kh dr bjɒbɒn mnzl msɒfrɒn mj‌dɒʃtm tɒ ɣvm xvd rɒ trk krdh، ɒz nzd ɒjʃɒn mj‌rftm t͡ʃvnkh hmɡj ɒjʃɒn znɒkɒrv d͡ʒmɒʔt xjɒnt kɒrnd zbɒn xvjʃ rɒ msl kmɒn xvd bh drvɣ mj‌kʃnd dr zmjn ɣvj ʃdh‌ɒnd ɒmɒ nh brɒj rɒstj zjrɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd «ɒz ʃrɒrt bh ʃrɒrt trɣj mj‌knnd v mrɒnmj ʃnɒsnd» hr jk ɒz hmsɒjh xvjʃ bɒhzr bɒʃjd v bh hjt͡ʃ brɒdr ɒʔtmɒd mnmɒjjd zjrɒhr brɒdr ɒz پɒ drmj آvrd v hr hmsɒjh bh nmɒmj ɡrdʃ mj‌knd v hr ks hmsɒjh xvd rɒ frjb mj‌dhd v ɒjʃɒn brɒstj tklm nmj nmɒjnd v zbɒn xvd rɒ bh drvɣɡvjj آmvxth‌ɒnd v ɒz kd͡ʒ rftɒrj xsth ʃdh‌ɒnd xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh «mskn tvdr mjɒn frjb ɒst v ɒz mkr xvjʃ nmj xvɒhndkh mrɒ bʃnɒsnd» bnɒbrɒjn jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «ɒjnk mn ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɣɒl ɡzɒʃth، ɒmthɒn xvɒhm nmvd zjrɒ bh‌xɒtr dxtr ɣvm xvd t͡ʃh tvɒnm krd؟ zbɒn ɒjʃɒn tjr mhlk ɒst kh bh frjb sxn mj‌rɒnd bh zbɒn xvd bɒ hmsɒjh xvjʃ sxnɒn slh‌آmjz mj‌ɡvjnd، ɒmɒ dr dl xvdbrɒj ɒv kmjn mj‌ɡzɒrnd» پs xdɒvndmj ɡvjd «آjɒ bh‌sbb ɒjn t͡ʃjzhɒ ɒjʃɒn rɒʔɣvbt nrsɒnm v آjɒ d͡ʒɒnm ɒz t͡ʃnjn ɣvmj ɒntɣɒm nkʃd؟» brɒj kvhhɒ ɡrjh v nvhh ɡrj v brɒj mrtʔhɒj bjɒbɒn mɒtm brپɒ mj‌knm zjrɒ kh svxth ʃdh ɒst v ɒhdj ɒz آnhɒ ɡzr nmj knd v sdɒj mvɒʃj ʃnjdh nmj ʃvd hm mrɣɒn hvɒ v hm bhɒjm frɒr krdh v rfth‌ɒnd v ɒvrʃljm rɒ bh tvdh‌hɒ v mɒvɒj ʃɣɒlhɒ mbdl mj‌knm v ʃhrhɒj jhvdɒ rɒ vjrɒn v ɣjrmskvn xvɒhm sɒxt kjst mrd hkjm kh ɒjn rɒ bfhmd v kjst kh dhɒn xdɒvnd bh vj sxn ɡfth bɒʃd tɒ ɒz ɒjn t͡ʃjzhɒ ɒxbɒr nmɒjd kh t͡ʃrɒ zmjn xrɒb v msl bjɒbɒn svxth ʃdh ɒst kh ɒhdj ɒz آn ɡzrnmj knd پs xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd «t͡ʃvnkh ʃrjʔt mrɒ kh پjʃ rvj ɒjʃɒn ɡzɒʃth bvdm trk krdnd vآvɒz mrɒ nʃnjdnd v dr آn slvk nnmvdnd، blkh پjrvj srkʃj dl xvd rɒ nmvdnd، v ɒz ʔɣb bʔljm kh پdrɒn ɒjʃɒn آnhɒ rɒ bh ɒjʃɒn آmvxtndrftnd» ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht jhvh sbɒjvt xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «ɒjnk mn ɒfsntjn rɒxvrɒk ɒjn ɣvm xvɒhm sɒxt v آb tlx bh ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm nvʃɒnjd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ dr mjɒn ɒmt hɒjj kh ɒjʃɒn v پdrɒn ɒjʃɒn آnhɒ rɒnʃnɒxtnd پrɒkndh xvɒhm sɒxt v ʃmʃjr rɒ drʔɣb ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm frstɒd tɒ ɒjʃɒn rɒ hlɒk nmɒjm» jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «tfkr knjdv znɒn nvhh ɡr rɒ bxvɒnjd tɒ bjɒjnd v dr‌پj znɒn hkjm bfrstjd tɒ bjɒjnd» v ɒjʃɒn tʔd͡ʒjl nmvdh، brɒj mɒ mɒtm brپɒ knnd tɒ t͡ʃʃmɒn mɒ ɒʃkhɒbrjzd v mʒɡɒn mɒ آbhɒ d͡ʒɒrj sɒzd zjrɒ kh آvɒz nvhh ɡrj ɒz shjvn ʃnjdh mj‌ʃvd kh t͡ʃɡvnh ɣɒrt ʃdjm v t͡ʃh bsjɒr xd͡ʒl ɡrdjdjm t͡ʃvnkh zmjn rɒ trk krdjm v mskn hɒj mɒ mɒ rɒbjrvn ɒndɒxth‌ɒnd پs‌ɒj znɒn، klɒm xdɒvnd rɒ bʃnvjd v ɡvʃhɒj ʃmɒ klɒm dhɒn ɒvrɒ bپzjrd v ʃmɒ bh dxtrɒn xvd nvhh ɡrj rɒtʔljm dhjd v hr zn bh hmsɒjh xvjʃ mɒtm rɒ zjrɒ mvt bh پnd͡ʒrh hɒj mɒ brآmdh، bh ɣsrhɒj mɒ dɒxl ʃdh ɒst tɒ ɒtfɒl rɒ ɒz bjrvn v d͡ʒvɒnɒn rɒ ɒz t͡ʃhɒrsvhɒ mnɣtʔ sɒzd xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «bɡv kh lɒʃhɒj mrdmɒn msl srɡjn br rvj shrɒ v mɒnnd bɒfh drʔɣb drvɡr ɒftɒdh ɒst v ksj njst kh آn rɒbrt͡ʃjnd» xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «hkjm، ɒzhkmt xvd fxr nnmɒjd v d͡ʒbɒr، ɒz tnvmndj xvjʃ mftxr nʃvd v dvltmnd ɒz dvlt xvdɒftxɒr nknd blkh hr‌kh fxr nmɒjd ɒz ɒjn fxrbknd kh fhm dɒrd v mrɒ mj‌ʃnɒsd kh mn jhvh hstm kh rhmt v ɒnsɒf v ʔdɒlt rɒ dr zmjn bd͡ʒɒ mj‌آvrm zjrɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd dr ɒjn t͡ʃjzhɒmsrvr mj‌bɒʃm» xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd «ɒjnk ɒjɒmj mj‌آjd kh nɒmxtvnɒn rɒ bɒ mxtvnɒn ʔɣvbt xvɒhm rsɒnjdjʔnj msr v jhvdɒ v ɒdvm v bnj ʔmvn vmvآb v آnɒnj rɒ kh ɡvʃh hɒj mvj xvd rɒmj trɒʃnd v dr shrɒ sɒknnd zjrɒ kh d͡ʒmjʔ ɒjn ɒmt‌hɒ nɒmxtvnnd v tmɒmj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl dr dl nɒmxtvnnd» jʔnj msr v jhvdɒ v ɒdvm v bnj ʔmvn vmvآb v آnɒnj rɒ kh ɡvʃh hɒj mvj xvd rɒmj trɒʃnd v dr shrɒ sɒknnd zjrɒ kh d͡ʒmjʔ ɒjn ɒmt‌hɒ nɒmxtvnnd v tmɒmj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl dr dl nɒmxtvnnd» ɒj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl klɒmj rɒ kh xdɒvnd bh ʃmɒ mj‌ɡvjd bʃnvjd xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «trjɣ ɒmt‌hɒ rɒ jɒdmɡjrjd v ɒz ʔlɒmɒt ɒflɒk mtrsjd zjrɒ kh ɒmt‌hɒ ɒz آnhɒ mj‌trsnd t͡ʃvnkh rsvm ɣvmhɒbɒtl ɒst kh ɒjʃɒn drxtj ɒz d͡ʒŋl bɒ tbrmj brnd kh snʔt dsthɒj nd͡ʒɒr mj‌bɒʃd v آn rɒ bh nɣrh v tlɒ zjnt dɒdh، bɒ mjx v t͡ʃkʃ mhkm mj‌knnd tɒ mthrk nʃvd v آnhɒ msl mtrs drbvstɒn xjɒr mj‌bɒʃnd kh sxn nmj tvɒnnd ɡft vآnhɒ rɒ mj‌bɒjd brdɒʃt t͡ʃvnkh rɒh nmj tvɒnndrft ɒz آnhɒ mtrsjd zjrɒ kh zrr ntvɒnnd rsɒnjdv ɣvt nfʔ rsɒnjdn hm ndɒrnd» ‌ɒj jhvh msl tv ksj njst tv ʔzjm hstj v ɒsm tv dr ɣvt ʔzjm ɒst ‌ɒj پɒdʃɒh ɒmt hɒkjst kh ɒz tv ntrsd zjrɒ kh ɒjn bh tv mj‌ʃɒjdt͡ʃvnkh dr d͡ʒmjʔ hkjmɒn ɒmt‌hɒ v dr tmɒmj mmɒlk ɒjʃɒn mɒnnd tv ksj njst d͡ʒmjʔ ɒjʃɒn vhʃj v ɒhmɣ mj‌bɒʃnd tɒdjb ɒbɒtjl t͡ʃvb bt ɒst nɣrh kvbjdh ʃdh ɒz trʃjʃ v tlɒ ɒz ɒvfɒz kh snʔt snʔtɡr v ʔml dsthɒj zrɡr bɒʃd mj‌آvrnd lɒd͡ʒvrd v ɒrɣvɒn lbɒs آnhɒ v hmh ɒjnhɒ ʔml hkmt پjʃɡɒn ɒst ɒmɒ jhvh xdɒj hɣ ɒst v ɒv xdɒj hj v پɒdʃɒh srmdj mj‌bɒʃd ɒz ɣzb ɒv zmjn mtzlzl mj‌ʃvd v ɒmt‌hɒ ɣhr ɒv rɒ mthml ntvɒnndʃd bh ɒjʃɒn t͡ʃnjn bɡvjjd «xdɒjɒnj kh آsmɒn v zmjn rɒ nsɒxth‌ɒnd ɒz rvj zmjn v ɒz zjrآsmɒn tlf xvɒhnd ʃd» ɒv zmjn rɒ bh ɣvt xvd sɒxt v rbʔ mskvn rɒ bh hkmt xvjʃ ɒstvɒr nmvd vآsmɒn rɒ bh ʔɣl xvd ɡstrɒnjd t͡ʃvn آvɒzmj dhd ɣvɣɒj آbhɒ dr آsmɒn پdjd mj‌آjd ɒbrhɒ ɒz ɒɣsɒj zmjn brmj آvrd v brɣhɒ brɒj bɒrɒn mj‌sɒzd v bɒd rɒ ɒz xzɒnh hɒj xvd bjrvn mj‌آvrd d͡ʒmjʔ mrdmɒn vhʃj‌ɒnd v mʔrft ndɒrnd v hr‌kh tmsɒlj mj‌sɒzd xd͡ʒl xvɒhdʃd zjrɒ kh bt rjxth ʃdh ɒv drvɣ ɒst v dr آn hjt͡ʃ nfs njst آnhɒ bɒtl v kɒr msxrɡj mj‌bɒʃd dr rvzj kh bh mhɒkmh mj‌آjnd tlf xvɒhnd ʃd ɒv kh nsjb jʔɣvb ɒst msl آnhɒ nmj bɒʃd zjrɒ kh ɒv sɒzndh hmh mvd͡ʒvdɒt ɒst v ɒsrɒئjl ʔsɒj mjrɒs vj ɒst v ɒsm ɒvjhvh sbɒjvt mj‌bɒʃd ‌ɒj kh dr tŋj sɒkn hstj، bsth xvd rɒɒz zmjn brdɒr zjrɒ xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «ɒjnk mn ɒjn mrtbh sɒknɒn ɒjn zmjn rɒ ɒz flɒxn xvɒhm‌ɒndɒxt v ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh tŋ xvɒhm آvrd tɒbfhmnd» vɒj br mn bh‌sbb sdmh mn xjmh mn xrɒb ʃd v tmɒmj tnɒbhɒj mn ɡsjxth ɡrdjd، پsrɒnm ɒz mn bjrvn rfth، nɒjɒb ʃdnd ksj njst kh xjmh mrɒ پhn knd v پrdh hɒj mrɒbrپɒ nmɒjd zjrɒ kh ʃbɒnɒn vhʃj ʃdh‌ɒnd vxdɒvnd rɒ tlb nmj nmɒjnd bnɒbrɒjn kɒmjɒb nxvɒhnd ʃd v hmh ɡlh hɒj ɒjʃɒn پrɒkndh xvɒhd ɡrdjd ɒjnk sdɒj xbrj mj‌آjd vɒztrɒb ʔzjmj ɒz djɒr ʃmɒl tɒ ʃhrhɒj jhvdɒ rɒ vjrɒn v mɒvɒj ʃɣɒlhɒ sɒzd ‌ɒj xdɒvnd mj‌dɒnm kh trjɣ ɒnsɒn ɒz آn ɒvnjst v آdmj kh rɒh mj‌rvd ɣɒdr br hdɒjt ɣdmhɒj xvjʃ nmj bɒʃd ‌ɒj xdɒvnd mrɒtɒdjb nmɒ ɒmɒ bh ɒnsɒf v nh bh ɣzb xvd mbɒdɒmrɒ zljl sɒzjɣzb xvjʃ rɒ br ɒmt hɒjj kh tv rɒ nmj ʃnɒsnd brjz v br ɣbjlh hɒjj kh ɒsm tv rɒ nmj xvɒnnd، zjrɒ kh ɒjʃɒn jʔɣvb rɒxvrdnd v ɒv rɒ blʔjdh، tbɒh sɒxtnd v mskn ɒv rɒxrɒb nmvdnd ɣzb xvjʃ rɒ br ɒmt hɒjj kh tv rɒ nmj ʃnɒsnd brjz v br ɣbjlh hɒjj kh ɒsm tv rɒ nmj xvɒnnd، zjrɒ kh ɒjʃɒn jʔɣvb rɒxvrdnd v ɒv rɒ blʔjdh، tbɒh sɒxtnd v mskn ɒv rɒxrɒb nmvdnd ɒjn ɒst klɒmj kh ɒz d͡ʒɒnb xdɒvnd bh ɒrmjɒ nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «klɒm ɒjn ʔhdrɒ bʃnvjd v bh mrdɒn jhvdɒ v sɒknɒn ɒvrʃljm bɡvjjd v tv bh ɒjʃɒn bɡv jhvh xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd mlʔvn bɒd ksj‌kh klɒm ɒjn ʔhdrɒ nʃnvd kh آn rɒ bh پdrɒn ʃmɒ dr rvzj kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz zmjn msr ɒz kvrh آhnjn bjrvn آvrdm ɒmr frmvdh، ɡftm ɣvl mrɒ bʃnvjd v mvɒfɣ hr آnt͡ʃh bh ʃmɒ ɒmr bfrmɒjm آn rɒ bd͡ʒɒ bjɒvrjd tɒ ʃmɒɣvm mn bɒʃjd v mn xdɒj ʃmɒ bɒʃm v tɒ ɣsmj rɒ kh brɒj پdrɒn ʃmɒ xvrdm vfɒ nmɒjm kh zmjnj rɒ kh bh ʃjr v ʔsl d͡ʒɒrj ɒst t͡ʃnɒnkh ɒmrvzʃdh ɒst bh ɒjʃɒn bdhm» پs mn dr d͡ʒvɒb ɡftm «ɒj xdɒvnd آmjn» پs xdɒvnd mrɒ ɡft «tmɒm ɒjn sxnɒn rɒdr ʃhrhɒj jhvdɒ v kvt͡ʃh hɒj ɒvrʃljm ndɒkrdh، bɡv kh sxnɒn ɒjn ʔhd rɒ bʃnvjd v آnhɒ rɒbd͡ʒɒ آvrjd zjrɒ ɒz rvzj kh پdrɒn ʃmɒ rɒ ɒzzmjn msr brآvrdm tɒ ɒmrvz ɒjʃɒn rɒ tɒkjd sxt nmvdm v sbh zvd brxɒsth، tɒkjd nmvdh، ɡftm ɣvl mrɒ bʃnvjd ɒmɒ nʃnjdnd v ɡvʃ xvd rɒ frɒndɒʃtnd blkh پjrvj srkʃj dl ʃrjr xvd rɒnmvdnd پs tmɒm sxnɒn ɒjn ʔhd rɒ br ɒjʃɒn vɒrd آvrdm t͡ʃvnkh ɒmr frmvdh bvdm kh آn rɒ vfɒnmɒjnd ɒmɒ vfɒ nnmvdnd» v xdɒvnd mrɒ ɡft «ftnh‌ɒj dr mjɒn mrdɒn jhvdɒ v sɒknɒn ɒvrʃljm پjdɒ ʃdh ɒst bh xtɒjɒj پdrɒn پjʃjn xvd kh ɒz ʃnjdn ɒjn sxnɒn ɒbɒ nmvdnd brɡʃtnd v ɒjʃɒn xdɒjɒn ɣjr rɒپjrvj nmvdh، آnhɒ rɒ ʔbɒdt nmvdnd v xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl v xɒndɒn jhvdɒ ʔhdj rɒ kh bɒ پdrɒn ɒjʃɒn bsth bvdm ʃkstnd» bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvndt͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «ɒjnk mn blɒjj rɒ kh ɒz آn ntvɒnndrst br ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm آvrd v nzd mn ɒstɣɒsh xvɒhnd krd ɒmɒ ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒd͡ʒɒbt nxvɒhm nmvd v ʃhrhɒj jhvdɒ v sɒknɒn ɒvrʃljm rfth، nzdxdɒjɒnj kh brɒj آnhɒ bxvr mj‌svzɒnjdnd frjɒdxvɒhnd krd ɒmɒ آnhɒ dr vɣt msjbt ɒjʃɒn hrɡzɒjʃɒn rɒ nd͡ʒɒt nxvɒhnd dɒd zjrɒ kh‌ɒj jhvdɒʃmɒrh xdɒjɒn tv bɣdr ʃhrhɒj tv mj‌bɒʃd v brhsb ʃmɒrh kvt͡ʃh hɒj ɒvrʃljm mzbh hɒj rsvɒjj brپɒ dɒʃtjd jʔnj mzbh‌hɒ bh d͡ʒht bxvrsvzɒnjdn brɒj bʔl پs tv brɒj ɒjn ɣvm dʔɒmkn v bh d͡ʒht ɒjʃɒn آvɒz tzrʔ v ɒstɣɒsh blndmnmɒ zjrɒ kh t͡ʃvn dr vɣt msjbt xvjʃ mrɒbxvɒnnd ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒd͡ʒɒbt nxvɒhm nmvd mhbvbh mrɒ dr xɒnh mn t͡ʃh‌kɒr ɒst t͡ʃvnkh ʃrɒrt vrzjdh ɒst آjɒ tzrʔɒt v ɡvʃt mɣds mj‌tvɒnd ɡnɒh tv rɒ ɒz tv dvr bknd؟ آŋɒh mj‌tvɒnstj vd͡ʒd nmɒjj» xdɒvnd tv rɒ zjtvn ʃɒdɒb kh bh mjvh njkvxvʃnmɒ bɒʃd msmj nmvdh ɒmɒ bh آvɒz ɣvɣɒj ʔzjm آtʃ dr آn ɒfrvxth ɒst kh ʃɒxh hɒjʃ ʃksth ɡrdjd zjrɒ jhvh sbɒjvt kh tv rɒɣrs nmvdh bvd blɒjj br tv frmvdh ɒst bh‌sbb ʃrɒrtj kh xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl v xɒndɒn jhvdɒ bh zd xvjʃtn krdnd v brɒj bʔl bxvr‌svzɒnjdh، xʃm mrɒ bh hjd͡ʒɒn آvrdnd v xdɒvnd mrɒ tʔljm dɒd پs dɒnstm آŋɒh ɒʔmɒl ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh mn nʃɒn dɒdj v mn msl brh dst آmvz kh bh mzbh brnd bvdm v nmj dɒnstm kh tdbjrɒt bh zd mn nmvdh، mj‌ɡftnd «drxt rɒ bɒmjvh‌ɒʃ zɒjʔ sɒzjm v آn rɒ ɒz zmjn zndɡɒn ɣtʔ nmɒjjm tɒ ɒsmʃ djɡr mzkvr nʃvd» ɒmɒ‌ɒj jhvh sbɒjvt kh dɒvr ʔɒdl v ɒmthɒn knndh bɒtn v dl hstj، bʃvd kh ɒntɣɒm kʃjdn tv rɒ ɒz ɒjʃɒn bbjnm zjrɒ kh dʔvj xvd rɒ nzd tv zɒhr sɒxtm lhzɒ xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «drbɒrh ɒhl ʔnɒtvt kh ɣsd d͡ʒɒn tv dɒrnd v mj‌ɡvjnd bh nɒm jhvh nbvt mkn mbɒdɒ ɒz dst mɒ kʃth ʃvj ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnk br ɒjʃɒn ʔɣvbt xvɒhm rsɒnjd v d͡ʒvɒnɒn ɒjʃɒn bh ʃmʃjr xvɒhnd mrd v پsrɒn v dxtrɒn ɒjʃɒn ɒz ɡrsŋj hlɒk xvɒhnd ʃdv brɒj ɒjʃɒn bɣjh‌ɒj nxvɒhd mɒnd zjrɒ kh mn br ɒhl ʔnɒtvt dr sɒl ʔɣvbt ɒjʃɒn blɒjj xvɒhm rsɒnjd» v brɒj ɒjʃɒn bɣjh‌ɒj nxvɒhd mɒnd zjrɒ kh mn br ɒhl ʔnɒtvt dr sɒl ʔɣvbt ɒjʃɒn blɒjj xvɒhm rsɒnjd» ɒj xdɒvnd tv ʔɒdl tr hstj ɒz ɒjnkh mn bɒ tv mhɒd͡ʒh nmɒjm ljkn drbɒrh ɒhkɒmt bɒ tv sxn xvɒhm rɒnd t͡ʃrɒ rɒh ʃrjrɒn brxvrdɒr mj‌ʃvd v d͡ʒmjʔ xjɒntkɒrɒn ɒjmn mj‌bɒʃnd؟ tv ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɣrs nmvdj پs rjʃh zdnd v nmv krdh، mjvh njz آvrdnd tv bh dhɒn ɒjʃɒn nzdjkj، ɒmɒ ɒz ɣlb ɒjʃɒn dvr ɒmɒ tv‌ɒj xdɒvnd mrɒ mj‌ʃnɒsj v mrɒ djdh، dl mrɒ nzdxvd ɒmthɒn krdh‌ɒj ɒjʃɒn rɒ msl ɡvsfndɒn brɒj zbh bjrvn kʃ v ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh d͡ʒht rvz ɣtl tʔjjn nmɒ zmjn tɒ bh kj mɒtm xvɒhd nmvd v ɡjɒh tmɒmj shrɒ xʃk xvɒhd mɒnd hjvɒnɒt vmrɣɒn bh‌sbb ʃrɒrt sɒknɒnʃ tlf ʃdh ɒndzjrɒ mj‌ɡvjnd kh ɒv آxrt mɒ rɒ nxvɒhd djd ɒɡr vɣtj kh bɒ پjɒdɡɒn dvjdj tv rɒ xsth krdnd پs t͡ʃɡvnh bɒ ɒsbɒn mj‌tvɒnj brɒbrj knj؟ v hr‌t͡ʃnd dr zmjn sɒlm، ɒjmn hstj dr tɣjɒn ɒrdn t͡ʃh xvɒhj krd؟ zjrɒ kh hm brɒdrɒnt vhm xɒndɒn پdrt bh tv xjɒnt nmvdnd v ɒjʃɒn njzdr ʔɣb tv sdɒj blnd mj‌knnd پs ɒɡr‌t͡ʃh sxnɒn njkv bh tv bɡvjnd ɒjʃɒn rɒ bɒvr mkn mn xɒnh xvd rɒ trk krdh، mjrɒs xvjʃ rɒdvr ɒndɒxtm v mhbvbh xvd rɒ bh‌dst dʃmnɒnʃ tsljm nmvdm v mjrɒs mn msl ʃjrd͡ʒŋl brɒj mn ɡrdjd v bh zd mn آvɒz xvd rɒblnd krd ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht ɒz ɒv nfrt krdm آjɒmjrɒs mn brɒjm msl mrɣ ʃkɒrj rŋɒrŋ kh mrɣɒn dvr ɒv rɒ ɡrfth bɒʃnd ʃdh ɒst؟ brvjd vd͡ʒmjʔ hjvɒnɒt shrɒ rɒ d͡ʒmʔ krdh، آnhɒ rɒbjɒvrjd tɒ bxvrnd ʃbɒnɒn bsjɒr tɒkstɒn mrɒxrɒb krdh، mjrɒs mrɒ پɒjmɒl nmvdnd v mjrɒs mrɣvb mrɒ bh bjɒbɒn vjrɒn mbdl sɒxtnd آn rɒ vjrɒn sɒxtnd v آn vjrɒn ʃdh nzd mn mɒtm ɡrfth ɒst tmɒmj zmjn vjrɒn ʃdh، t͡ʃvnkh ksj ɒjn rɒ dr dl xvd rɒh nmj dhd br tmɒmj blndjhɒj shrɒ، tɒrɒd͡ʒ knndɡɒn hd͡ʒvm آvrdndzjrɒ kh ʃmʃjr xdɒvnd ɒz knɒr zmjn tɒ knɒrdjɡrʃ hlɒk mj‌knd v brɒj hjt͡ʃ bʃrj ɒjmnj njst ɡndm kɒʃtnd v xɒr drvjdnd، xvjʃtn rɒ bh rnd͡ʒ آvrdh، nfʔ nbrdnd v ɒz mhsvl ʃmɒ bh‌sbb hdt xʃm xdɒvnd xd͡ʒl ɡrdjdnd xdɒvnd drbɒrh d͡ʒmjʔ hmsɒjɡɒn ʃrjrxvd kh zrr mj‌rsɒnnd bh mlkj kh ɣvm xvdɒsrɒئjl rɒ mɒlk آn sɒxth ɒst t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «ɒjnk ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz آn zmjn brmj knm v xɒndɒn jhvdɒ rɒ ɒz mjɒn ɒjʃɒn brmj knm v bʔd ɒzbrkndn ɒjʃɒn rd͡ʒvʔ xvɒhm krd v br ɒjʃɒn trhm xvɒhm nmvd v hr ks ɒz ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh mlk xvjʃ v hr ks rɒ bh zmjn xvd bɒz xvɒhm آvrd v ɒɡr ɒjʃɒn trjɣ hɒj ɣvm mrɒ njkv jɒdɡrfth، bh ɒsm mn jʔnj bh hjɒt jhvh ɣsm xvrndt͡ʃnɒnkh ɒjʃɒn ɣvm mrɒ tʔljm dɒdnd kh bh bʔl ɣsm xvrnd، آŋɒh ɒjʃɒn dr mjɒn ɣvm mn bnɒ xvɒhnd ʃdɒmɒ ɒɡr nʃnvnd آŋɒh آn ɒmt rɒ bɒlkl brkndh، hlɒk xvɒhm sɒxt» klɒm xdɒvnd ɒjn ɒst ɒmɒ ɒɡr nʃnvnd آŋɒh آn ɒmt rɒ bɒlkl brkndh، hlɒk xvɒhm sɒxt» klɒm xdɒvnd ɒjn ɒst xdɒvnd bh mn t͡ʃnjn ɡft kh «brv vkmrbnd ktɒnj brɒj xvd bxr v آn rɒ bh kmr xvd bbnd v آn rɒ dr آb frv mbr» پs kmrbnd rɒ mvɒfɣ klɒm xdɒvnd xrjdm v bh kmrxvd bstm v klɒm xdɒvnd bɒr djɡr bh mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «ɒjn kmrbnd rɒ kh xrjdj v bh kmrxvd bstj bɡjr v bh frɒt rfth، آn rɒ dr ʃkɒf sxrh پnhɒn kn» پs rftm v آn rɒ dr frɒt brhsb آnt͡ʃh xdɒvnd bh mn frmvdh bvd پnhɒn krdm v bʔd ɒzmrvr ɒjɒm bsjɒr xdɒvnd mrɒ ɡft «brxɒsth، bh frɒt brv v kmrbndj rɒ kh tv rɒ ɒmr frmvdm kh drآnd͡ʒɒ پnhɒn knj ɒz آnd͡ʒɒ bɡjr» پs bh frɒt rftm v kndh kmrbnd rɒ ɒz d͡ʒɒjj kh آn rɒ پnhɒn krdh bvdm ɡrftm v ɒjnk kmrbnd پvsjdh v lɒjɣ hjt͡ʃkɒr nbvd v klɒm xdɒvnd bh mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd tkbr jhvdɒ v tkbrʔzjm ɒvrʃljm rɒ hmt͡ʃnjn tbɒh xvɒhm sɒxt v ɒjn ɣvm ʃrjrj kh ɒz ʃnjdn ɣvl mn ɒbɒnmvdh، srkʃj dl xvd rɒ پjrvj mj‌nmɒjnd v drʔɣb xdɒjɒn ɣjr rfth، آnhɒ rɒ ʔbɒdt v sd͡ʒdh mj‌knnd، msl ɒjn kmrbndj kh lɒjɣ hjt͡ʃkɒrnjst xvɒhnd ʃd zjrɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd t͡ʃnɒnkh kmrbnd bh kmr آdmj mj‌t͡ʃsbd، hmt͡ʃnɒn tmɒmj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl v tmɒmj xɒndɒn jhvdɒ rɒbh xvjʃtn t͡ʃsbɒnjdm tɒ brɒj mn ɣvm v ɒsm v fxr v zjnt bɒʃnd ɒmɒ nʃnjdnd پs ɒjn klɒm rɒ bh ɒjʃɒn bɡv jhvh xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd hr mʃk ɒz ʃrɒb پr xvɒhd ʃd vɒjʃɒn bh tv xvɒhnd ɡft mɡr mɒnmj dɒnjm kh hrmʃk ɒz ʃrɒb پr xvɒhd ʃd؟ پs bh ɒjʃɒn bɡv xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd d͡ʒmjʔ sɒknɒn ɒjn zmjn rɒ bɒ پɒdʃɒhɒnj kh br krsj dɒvd mj‌nʃjnndv kɒhnɒn v ɒnbjɒ v d͡ʒmjʔ sknh ɒvrʃljm rɒ bh mstj پr xvɒhm sɒxt v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd ɒjʃɒn rɒ jʔnj پdrɒn v پsrɒn rɒ bɒ jkdjɡr bhm xvɒhm‌ɒndɒxt ɒz hlɒk sɒxtn ɒjʃɒn ʃfɣt v rɒft vrhmt nxvɒhm nmvd» bʃnvjd v ɡvʃ frɒ‌ɡjrjd v mɣrvr mʃvjdzjrɒ xdɒvnd tklm mj‌nmɒjd brɒj jhvh xdɒj xvd d͡ʒlɒl rɒ tvsjf nmɒjjd ɣbl ɒz آnkh tɒrjkj rɒ پdjd آvrd v پɒjhɒj ʃmɒ br kvhhɒj zlmt blɣzd v t͡ʃvn mntzr nvr bɒʃjd آn rɒ bh sɒjh mvt mbdl sɒxth، bh zlmt ɣljz tbdjl nmɒjd vɒɡr ɒjn rɒ nʃnvjd، d͡ʒɒn mn dr xfɒ bh‌sbb tkbrʃmɒ ɡrjh xvɒhd krd v t͡ʃʃm mn zɒrzɒr ɡrjsth، ɒʃkhɒ xvɒhd rjxt ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht kh ɡlh xdɒvndbh ɒsjrj brdh ʃdh ɒst bh پɒdʃɒh v mlkh bɡv «xvjʃtn rɒ frvtn sɒxth، bnʃjnjd zjrɒ kh ɒfsrhɒ jʔnj tɒd͡ʒhɒj d͡ʒlɒl ʃmɒ ɒftɒdh ɒst ʃhrhɒj d͡ʒnvb msdvd ʃdh، ksj njst kh آnhɒ rɒ mftvh sɒzd v tmɒmj jhvdɒ ɒsjrʃdh، bɒlkl bh ɒsjrj rfth ɒst t͡ʃʃmɒn xvd rɒ blnd krdh، آnɒnj rɒ kh ɒz trf ʃmɒl mj‌آjnd bŋrjd ɡlh‌ɒj kh bh tv dɒdh ʃd vɡvsfndɒn zjbɒjj tv kd͡ʒɒ ɒst؟ ɒmɒ t͡ʃvn ɒv jɒrɒnt rɒ bh hkmrɒnj tv nsb knd t͡ʃh xvɒhj ɡft؟ t͡ʃvnkh tv ɒjʃɒn rɒ br zrr xvd آmvxth krdh‌ɒj آjɒ drdhɒ msl znj kh mj‌zɒjd tv rɒ frvnxvɒhd ɡrft؟ v ɒɡr dr dl xvd ɡvjj ɒjn t͡ʃjzhɒ t͡ʃrɒ bh mn vɒɣʔ ʃdh ɒst، bdɒnkh bh‌sbb ksrt ɡnɒhɒnt dɒmnhɒjt ɡʃɒdh ʃdh vپɒʃnh hɒjt bh zvr brhnh ɡrdjdh ɒst آjɒhbʃj، پvst xvd rɒ tbdjl tvɒnd nmvd jɒپlŋ، پjsh hɒj xvjʃ rɒ؟ آŋɒh ʃmɒ njz kh bh bdj krdn mʔtɒd ʃdh‌ɒjd njkvjj tvɒnjd krd؟ vmn ɒjʃɒn rɒ msl kɒh kh پjʃ rvj bɒd shrɒ rɒndh ʃvd پrɒkndh xvɒhm sɒxt» xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd «ɣrʔh tv v nsjbj kh ɒzd͡ʒɒnb mn brɒj tv پjmvdh ʃdh ɒjn ɒst، t͡ʃvnkh mrɒ frɒmvʃ krdj v bh drvɣ ɒʔtmɒd nmvdj پs mn njz dɒmnhɒjt rɒ پjʃ rvj tv mnkʃf xvɒhm sɒxt v rsvɒjj tv djdh xvɒhd ʃdfsɣ v ʃjhh hɒj tv v zʃtj znɒkɒrj tv vrd͡ʒɒsɒt tv rɒ br tlhɒj bjɒbɒn mʃɒhdh nmvdm vɒj br tv‌ɒj ɒvrʃljm tɒ bh kj djɡr tɒhrnxvɒhj ʃd» fsɣ v ʃjhh hɒj tv v zʃtj znɒkɒrj tv vrd͡ʒɒsɒt tv rɒ br tlhɒj bjɒbɒn mʃɒhdh nmvdm vɒj br tv‌ɒj ɒvrʃljm tɒ bh kj djɡr tɒhrnxvɒhj ʃd» klɒm xdɒvnd kh drbɒrh xʃk sɒlj bh ɒrmjɒ nɒzl ʃd «jhvdɒ nvhh ɡrj mj‌knd v drvɒzh hɒjʃ kɒhjdh ʃdh، mɒtm‌knɒn br zmjn mj‌nʃjnnd v frjɒdɒvrʃljm bɒlɒ mj‌rvd v ʃrfɒj ɒjʃɒn sɣjrɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ brɒj آb mj‌frstnd v nzd hfrh hɒmj rvnd v آb nmj jɒbnd v bɒ zrfhɒj xɒlj brɡʃth، xd͡ʒl v rsvɒ mj‌ʃvnd v srhɒj xvd rɒmj پvʃɒnnd bh‌sbb ɒjnkh zmjn mnʃɣ ʃdh ɒst t͡ʃvnkh bɒrɒn br d͡ʒhɒn nbɒrjdh ɒst flɒhɒn xd͡ʒl ʃdh، srhɒj xvd rɒ mj‌پvʃɒnnd blkh ɣzɒlhɒ njz dr shrɒ mj‌zɒjnd v ɒvlɒd xvd rɒtrk mj‌knnd t͡ʃvnkh hjt͡ʃ ɡjɒh njst vɡvrxrɒn br blndjhɒ ɒjstɒdh، msl ʃɣɒlhɒ brɒj bɒddm mj‌znnd v t͡ʃʃmɒn آnhɒ kɒhjdh mj‌ɡrdd t͡ʃvnkh hjt͡ʃ ʔlfj njst» ‌ɒj xdɒvnd ɒɡr‌t͡ʃh ɡnɒhɒn mɒ br mɒ ʃhɒdt mj‌dhd ɒmɒ bh‌xɒtr ɒsm xvd ʔml nmɒ zjrɒ kh ɒrtdɒdhɒj mɒ bsjɒr ʃdh ɒst v bh tv ɡnɒh vrzjdh‌ɒjm ‌ɒj tv kh ɒmjd ɒsrɒئjl vnd͡ʒɒt‌dhndh ɒv dr vɣt tŋj mj‌bɒʃj t͡ʃrɒ msl ɣrjbj dr zmjn v mɒnnd msɒfrj kh brɒj ʃbj xjmh mj‌znd ʃdh‌ɒj؟ t͡ʃrɒ msl ʃxs mthjrv mɒnnd d͡ʒbɒrj kh nmj tvɒnd nd͡ʒɒt dhd hstj؟ ɒmɒ tv‌ɒj xdɒvnd dr mjɒn mɒ hstj v mɒ bh nɒm tvnɒmjdh ʃdh‌ɒjm پs mɒ rɒ trk mnmɒ xdɒvnd bh ɒjn ɣvm t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «ɒjʃɒn bh آvɒrh ɡʃtn t͡ʃnjn mɒjl bvdh‌ɒnd v پɒjhɒj xvdrɒ bɒz ndɒʃtnd bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd ɒjʃɒn rɒ mɣbvl nnmvd v hɒl ʔsjɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh jɒd آvrdh، ɡnɒh ɒjʃɒn rɒ d͡ʒzɒ xvɒhd dɒd» v xdɒvnd bh mn ɡft «brɒj xjrjt ɒjn ɣvm dʔɒ mnmɒ t͡ʃvn rvzh ɡjrnd nɒlh ɒjʃɒn rɒ nxvɒhm ʃnjd v t͡ʃvn ɣrbɒnj svxtnj v hdjh آrdj ɡzrɒnnd ɒjʃɒn rɒɣbvl nxvɒhm frmvd blkh mn ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh ʃmʃjr vɣht v vbɒ hlɒk xvɒhm sɒxt» پs ɡftm «آh‌ɒj xdɒvnd jhvh ɒjnk ɒnbjɒ bh ɒjʃɒn mj‌ɡvjnd kh ʃmʃjr rɒ nxvɒhjd djd vɣhtj bh ʃmɒ nxvɒhd rsjd blkh ʃmɒ rɒ dr ɒjn mkɒn slɒmtj پɒjdɒr xvɒhm dɒd» پs xdɒvnd mrɒ ɡft «ɒjn ɒnbjɒ bh ɒsm mn bh drvɣ nbvt mj‌knnd mn ɒjʃɒn rɒ nfrstɒdm v bh ɒjʃɒn ɒmrj nfrmvdm v tklm nnmvdm، blkh ɒjʃɒn bh rvjɒhɒj kɒzb v shr v btɒlt v mkr dlhɒj xvjʃ brɒj ʃmɒ nbvt mj‌knnd bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd drbɒrh ɒjn ɒnbjɒ kh bh ɒsm mn nbvt mj‌knnd v mn ɒjʃɒn rɒ nfrstɒdh‌ɒm v mj‌ɡvjnd kh ʃmʃjr v ɣht dr ɒjn zmjn nxvɒhd ʃd mj‌ɡvjdkh ɒjn ɒnbjɒ bh ʃmʃjr v ɣht kʃth xvɒhnd ʃd v ɒjn ɣvmj kh brɒj ɒjʃɒn nbvt mj‌knnd drkvt͡ʃh hɒj ɒvrʃljm bh‌sbb ɣht v ʃmʃjrɒndɒxth xvɒhnd ʃd v ksj nxvɒhd bvd kh ɒjʃɒn v znɒn ɒjʃɒn v پsrɒn v dxtrɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ dfn kndzjrɒ kh ʃrɒrt ɒjʃɒn rɒ br ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm rjxt پs ɒjn klɒm rɒ bh ɒjʃɒn bɡv t͡ʃʃmɒn mn ʃbɒnh‌rvz ɒʃk mj‌rjzd v آrɒmj ndɒrd zjrɒ kh آn dvʃjzh jʔnj dxtr ɣvm mn bh ʃkstɡj ʔzjm vsdmh bjnhɒjt sxt ʃksth ʃdh ɒst ɒɡrbh shrɒ bjrvn rvm ɒjnk kʃtɡɒn ʃmʃjr v ɒɡrbh ʃhr dɒxl ʃvm ɒjnk bjmɒrɒn ɒz ɡrsŋj zjrɒkh hm ɒnbjɒ v khnh dr zmjn td͡ʒɒrt mj‌knnd v hjt͡ʃ nmj dɒnnd» آjɒ jhvdɒ rɒ bɒlkl trk krdh‌ɒj v آjɒ d͡ʒɒnt shjvn rɒ mkrvh dɒʃth ɒst؟ t͡ʃrɒ mɒ rɒ t͡ʃnɒn zdh‌ɒj kh brɒj mɒ hjt͡ʃ ʔlɒd͡ʒj njst؟ brɒj slɒmtj ɒntzɒr kʃjdjm ɒmɒ hjt͡ʃ xjrj njɒmd vbrɒj zmɒn ʃfɒ v ɒjnk ɒztrɒb پdjd آmd ‌ɒj xdɒvnd bh ʃrɒrt xvd v bh ʔsjɒn پdrɒn xvjʃ ɒʔtrɒf mj‌nmɒjjm zjrɒ kh bh tv ɡnɒh vrzjdh‌ɒjm bh‌xɒtr ɒsm xvd mɒ rɒ rd mnmɒ krsj d͡ʒlɒl xvjʃ rɒ xvɒr mʃmɒr ʔhd xvdrɒ kh bɒ mɒ bstj bh jɒd آvrdh، آn rɒ mʃknآjɒdr mjɒn ɒbɒtjl ɒmt‌hɒ hstnd kh bɒrɒn bbɒrɒnnd v آjɒ آsmɒn mj‌tvɒnd bɒrʃ bdhd؟ mɡr tv‌ɒj jhvh xdɒj mɒ hmɒn njstj v bh tv ɒmjdvɒr hstjm t͡ʃvnkh tv fɒʔl hmh ɒjnkɒrhɒ mj‌bɒʃj آjɒdr mjɒn ɒbɒtjl ɒmt‌hɒ hstnd kh bɒrɒn bbɒrɒnnd v آjɒ آsmɒn mj‌tvɒnd bɒrʃ bdhd؟ mɡr tv‌ɒj jhvh xdɒj mɒ hmɒn njstj v bh tv ɒmjdvɒr hstjm t͡ʃvnkh tv fɒʔl hmh ɒjnkɒrhɒ mj‌bɒʃj v xdɒvnd mrɒ ɡft «ɒɡr‌t͡ʃh hm mvsj v smvئjl bh hzvr mn mj‌ɒjstɒdndd͡ʒɒn mn bh ɒjn ɣvm mɒjl nmj ʃd ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒzhzvr mn dvr ɒndɒz tɒ bjrvn rvnd v ɒɡr bh tvbɡvjnd bh kd͡ʒɒ bjrvn rvjm، bh ɒjʃɒn bɡv xdɒvndt͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd آnkh mstvd͡ʒb mvt ɒst bh mvt v آnkh msthɣ ʃmʃjr ɒst bh ʃmʃjr vآnkh szɒvɒr ɣht ɒst bh ɣht v آnkh lɒjɣ ɒsjrj ɒst bh ɒsjrj v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd brɒjʃɒn t͡ʃhɒr ɣsm xvɒhm ɡmɒʃt jʔnj ʃmʃjrbrɒj kʃtn v sɡɒn brɒj drjdn v mrɣɒn hvɒ vhjvɒnɒt shrɒ brɒj xvrdn v hlɒk sɒxtn vɒjʃɒn rɒ dr tmɒmj mmɒlk d͡ʒhɒn mʃvʃ xvɒhm sɒxt bh‌sbb mnsj ɒbn hzɣjɒ پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ vkɒrhɒjj kh ɒv dr ɒvrʃljm krd zjrɒ‌ɒj ɒvrʃljm kjst kh br tv trhm nmɒjd v kjst kh brɒj tv mɒtm ɡjrd v kjst kh jksv brvd tɒ ɒzslɒmtj tv bپrsd؟ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd t͡ʃvnkh tvmrɒ trk krdh، bh ʔɣb brɡʃtj mn njz dst xvdrɒ br tv drɒz krdh، tv rɒ hlɒk sɒxtm zjrɒ kh ɒzپʃjmɒn ʃdn bjzɒr ɡʃtm v ɒjʃɒn rɒ drdrvɒzh hɒj zmjn bɒ ɣrbɒl xvɒhm bjxt v ɣvm xvd rɒ bj‌ɒvlɒd sɒxth، hlɒk xvɒhm nmvdt͡ʃvnkh ɒz rɒhhɒj xvd bɒzɡʃt nkrdnd bjvh‌znɒn ɒjʃɒn brɒjm ɒz rjɡ drjɒ zjɒdh ʃdh‌ɒnd، پs br ɒjʃɒn dr vɣt zhr br mɒdr d͡ʒvɒnɒn tɒrɒd͡ʒ knndh‌ɒj xvɒhm آvrd v trs v آʃftɡj rɒbr ʃhr nɒɡhɒn mstvlj xvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd zɒjndh hft vld zbvn ʃdh، d͡ʒɒn bdɒd v آftɒb ɒv kh hnvz rvz bɒɣj bvd ɣrvb krd v ɒv xd͡ʒl v rsvɒɡrdjd v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd mn bɣjh ɒjʃɒn rɒ پjʃ rvj dʃmnɒn ɒjʃɒn bh ʃmʃjr xvɒhm sپrd» vɒj br mn kh tv‌ɒj mɒdrm mrɒ mrd d͡ʒŋd͡ʒvv nzɒʔ knndh‌ɒj brɒj tmɒmj d͡ʒhɒn zɒjjdj nh bh rbvɒ dɒdm vnh bh rbvɒ ɡrftm mʔhzɒ hr jk ɒz ɒjʃɒn mrɒ lʔnt mj‌knnd xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd «ɒlbth tvrɒ brɒj njkvjj rhɒ xvɒhm sɒxt v hr آjnh dʃmn rɒ dr vɣt blɒ v dr zmɒn tŋj nzd tvmtzll xvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd آjɒ آhn mj‌tvɒnd آhn ʃmɒlj v brnd͡ʒ rɒ bʃknd؟ tvɒŋrj vxzjnh hɒjt rɒ nh bh ɣjmt، blkh bh hmh ɡnɒhɒnt v dr tmɒmj hdvdt bh tɒrɒd͡ʒ xvɒhm dɒd v tvrɒ hmrɒh dʃmnɒnt bh zmjnj kh nmj dɒnj xvɒhm kvt͡ʃɒnjd zjrɒ kh nɒrj dr ɣzb mn ɒfrvxth ʃdh ʃmɒ rɒ xvɒhd svxt» ‌ɒj xdɒvnd tv ɒjn rɒ mj‌dɒnj پs mrɒ bjɒdآvrdh، ɒz mn tfɣd nmɒ v ɒntɣɒm mrɒ ɒz stmkɒrɒnm bɡjr v bh djrɣzbj xvjʃ mrɒ tlf mnmɒ v bdɒn kh bh‌xɒtr tv rsvɒjj rɒ kʃjdh‌ɒm sxnɒn tvjɒft ʃd v آnhɒ rɒ xvrdm v klɒm tv ʃɒdj vɒbthɒd͡ʒ dl mn ɡrdjd zjrɒ kh bh nɒm tv‌ɒj jhvh xdɒj sbɒjvt nɒmjdh ʃdh‌ɒm dr md͡ʒls ʔʃrt knndɡɒn nnʃstm v ʃɒdj nnmvdm bh‌sbb dst tv bh tnhɒjj nʃstm zjrɒ kh mrɒ ɒzxʃm mmlv sɒxtj drd mn t͡ʃrɒ dɒjmj ɒst v d͡ʒrɒht mn t͡ʃrɒ mhlk v ʔlɒd͡ʒ nɒپzjr mj‌bɒʃd؟ آjɒ tv brɒj mn msl t͡ʃʃmh frjbndh v آb nɒپɒjdɒrxvɒhj ʃd؟ bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «ɒɡrbɒzɡʃt nmɒjj mn bɒr djɡr tv rɒ bh hzvr xvdɣɒjm xvɒhm sɒxt v ɒɡr nfɒjs rɒ ɒz rzɒjl bjrvn knj، آŋɒh tv msl dhɒn mn xvɒhj bvd vɒjʃɒn nzd tv xvɒhnd brɡʃt v tv nzd ɒjʃɒn bɒzɡʃt nxvɒhj nmvd v mn tv rɒ brɒj ɒjn ɣvm djvɒr brnd͡ʒjn hsɒrdɒr xvɒhm sɒxt v bɒtv d͡ʒŋ xvɒhnd nmvd، ɒmɒ br tv ɣɒlb nxvɒhndآmd zjrɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd mn brɒj nd͡ʒɒt dɒdn vrhɒnjdn tv bɒ tv hstmv tv rɒ ɒz dst ʃrjrɒn xvɒhm rhɒnjd v tv rɒ ɒz kf stmkjʃɒn fdjh xvɒhm nmvd» v tv rɒ ɒz dst ʃrjrɒn xvɒhm rhɒnjd v tv rɒ ɒz kf stmkjʃɒn fdjh xvɒhm nmvd» v klɒm xdɒvnd br mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «brɒj xvd znj mɡjr v tv rɒ dr ɒjn mkɒn پsrɒn v dxtrɒn nbɒʃd zjrɒ xdɒvnddrbɒrh پsrɒn v dxtrɒnj kh dr ɒjn mkɒn mvlvdʃvnd v drbɒrh mɒdrɒnj kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ bzɒjnd vپdrɒnj kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ dr ɒjn zmjn tvljd nmɒjnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd bh bjmɒrjhɒj mhlk xvɒhnd mrd brɒj ɒjʃɒn mɒtm nxvɒhnd ɡrft v dfn nxvɒhndʃd blkh br rvj zmjn srɡjn xvɒhnd bvd v bh ʃmʃjr v ɣht tbɒh xvɒhnd ʃd v lɒʃhɒj ɒjʃɒn ɣzɒj mrɣɒn hvɒ v vhvʃ zmjn xvɒhd bvd zjrɒ xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd bh xɒnh nvhh ɡrj dɒxl mʃv v brɒj mɒtm ɡrftn nrv v brɒj ɒjʃɒn tʔzjt mnmɒ zjrɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh slɒmtj xvd jʔnj ɒhsɒn v mrɒhm xvjʃ rɒ ɒz ɒjn ɣvm xvɒhm brdɒʃt hm bzrɡ v hm kvt͡ʃk dr ɒjn zmjn xvɒhnd mrd v dfn nxvɒhnd ʃd v brɒj ɒjʃɒn mɒtm nxvɒhnd ɡrft v xvjʃtn rɒ md͡ʒrvh nxvɒhnd sɒxt v mvj xvd rɒ nxvɒhnd trɒʃjd v brɒj mɒtm ɡrj nɒn rɒ پɒrh nxvɒhnd krd tɒɒjʃɒn rɒ brɒj mrdɡɒn tʔzjt nmɒjnd v kɒsh tʔzjt rɒ bɒ ɒjʃɒn brɒj پdr jɒ mɒdr ɒjʃɒn hm nxvɒhnd nvʃjd v tv bh xɒnh bzm dɒxl mʃv v bɒɒjʃɒn brɒj ɒkl v ʃrb mnʃjn zjrɒ kh jhvh sbɒjvt xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnk mn dr ɒjɒm ʃmɒ v dr nzr ʃmɒ آvɒz xvʃj v آvɒzʃɒdmɒnj v آvɒz dɒmɒd v آvɒz ʔrvs rɒ ɒz ɒjn mkɒn xvɒhm brdɒʃt v hŋɒmj kh hmh ɒjn sxnɒn rɒ bh ɒjn ɣvm bjɒn knj v ɒjʃɒn ɒz tvbپrsnd kh xdɒvnd ɒz t͡ʃh sbb tmɒmj ɒjn blɒj ʔzjm rɒ bh zd mɒ ɡfth ɒst v ʔsjɒn v ɡnɒhj kh bh jhvh xdɒj xvd vrzjdh‌ɒjm t͡ʃjst؟ آŋɒh tv bh ɒjʃɒn bɡv xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht kh پdrɒn ʃmɒ mrɒ trk krdnd v xdɒjɒn ɣjr rɒ پjrvj nmvdh، آnhɒ rɒʔbɒdt v sd͡ʒdh nmvdnd v mrɒ trk krdh، ʃrjʔt mrɒ ŋɒh ndɒʃtnd v ʃmɒ ɒzپdrɒn xvjʃ zjɒdh ʃrɒrt vrzjdjd t͡ʃvnkh hrjk ɒz ʃmɒ srkʃj dl ʃrjr xvd rɒ پjrvj nmvdjd v bh mn ɡvʃ ŋrftjd bnɒbrɒjn mn ʃmɒrɒ ɒz ɒjn zmjn bh zmjnj kh ʃmɒ v پdrɒn ʃmɒndɒnsth‌ɒjd xvɒhm‌ɒndɒxt v dr آnd͡ʒɒ ʃbɒnh‌rvzxdɒjɒn ɣjr rɒ ʔbɒdt xvɒhjd nmvd zjrɒ kh mn brʃmɒ trhm nxvɒhm nmvd «bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnk ɒjɒmj mj‌آjd kh bɒr djɡr ɡfth nxvɒhd ʃd ɣsm bh hjɒt jhvh kh bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl rɒ ɒz zmjn msr bjrvn آvrd blkh ɣsm bh hjɒt jhvh kh bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl rɒ ɒz zmjn ʃmɒl v hmh zmjnhɒjj kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh آnhɒ rɒndh bvd brآvrd zjrɒ mn ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh zmjnj kh bh پdrɒn ɒjʃɒn dɒdh‌ɒm bɒz xvɒhm آvrd xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnk mɒhj ɡjrɒn bsjɒr rɒxvɒhm frstɒd tɒ ɒjʃɒn rɒ sjd nmɒjnd v bʔd ɒz آn sjɒdɒn bsjɒr rɒ xvɒhm frstɒd tɒ ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz hrkvh v hr tl v ɒz svrɒxhɒj sxrh‌hɒ ʃkɒrknnd zjrɒ t͡ʃʃmɒnm br hmh rɒhhɒj ɒjʃɒn ɒst v آnhɒ ɒz nzr mn پnhɒn njst v ʔsjɒn ɒjʃɒn ɒz t͡ʃʃmɒn rvztŋj پnɒhɡɒh mn hstj ɒmt‌hɒ ɒz krɒnhɒj zmjn nzd tv آmdh، xvɒhnd ɡft پdrɒn mɒ d͡ʒz drvɣ vɒbɒtjl v t͡ʃjzhɒjj rɒ kh fɒjdh ndɒʃt vɒrs hjt͡ʃ nʃdnd آjɒ mj‌ʃvd kh ɒnsɒn brɒj xvdxdɒjɒn bsɒzd v hɒl آnkh آnhɒ xdɒ njstnd؟«bnɒbrɒjn hɒn ɒjn mrtbh ɒjʃɒn rɒ ʔɒrf xvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd blj dst xvd v d͡ʒbrvt xvjʃ rɒ mʔrvf ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm sɒxt vxvɒhnd dɒnst kh ɒsm mn jhvh ɒst» «bnɒbrɒjn hɒn ɒjn mrtbh ɒjʃɒn rɒ ʔɒrf xvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd blj dst xvd v d͡ʒbrvt xvjʃ rɒ mʔrvf ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm sɒxt vxvɒhnd dɒnst kh ɒsm mn jhvh ɒst» «ɡnɒh jhvdɒ bh ɣlm آhnjn v nvk ɒlmɒs mrɣvm ɒst v br lvh dl ɒjʃɒn v br ʃɒxhɒj mzbh hɒj ʃmɒ mnɣvʃ ɒst mɒdɒmj kh پsrɒn ɒjʃɒn mzbh hɒj xvd v ɒʃjrjm xvjʃ rɒ nzd drxtɒn sbz v br tlhɒj blnd jɒd mj‌dɒrnd، ‌ɒj kvh mn kh dr shrɒ hstj tvɒŋrj vtmɒmj xzɒjn tv rɒ bh tɒrɒd͡ʒ xvɒhm dɒd vmkɒn hɒj blnd tv rɒ njz bh‌sbb ɡnɒhj kh dr hmh hdvd xvd vrzjdh‌ɒj v tv ɒz xvdt njz mlk xvjʃ rɒ kh bh tv dɒdh‌ɒm bj‌zrʔ xvɒhj ɡzɒʃt v dʃmnɒnt rɒ dr zmjnj kh nmj dɒnj xdmt xvɒhj nmvd zjrɒ آtʃj dr ɣzb mn ɒfrvxth‌ɒjd kh tɒ bh nxvɒhd djd blkh dr mkɒn hɒj xʃk bjɒbɒn dr zmjn ʃvrh ɣjrmskvn sɒkn xvɒhdʃd» mbɒrk bɒd ksj‌kh br xdɒvnd tvkl dɒrd vxdɒvnd ɒʔtmɒd ɒv bɒʃd ɒv msl drxt nʃɒndh br knɒr آb xvɒhd bvd kh rjʃh hɒj xvjʃ rɒbsvj nhr پhn mj‌knd v t͡ʃvn ɡrmɒ bjɒjd nxvɒhdtrsjd v brɡʃ ʃɒdɒb xvɒhd mɒnd v drxʃksɒlj ɒndjʃh nxvɒhd dɒʃt v ɒz آvrdn mjvh bɒz nxvɒhd mɒnd dl ɒz hmh‌t͡ʃjz frjbndh trɒst v bsjɒr mrjz ɒst kjst kh آn rɒ bdɒnd؟ «mn jhvh tftjʃ knndh dl v آzmɒjndh ɡrdh hɒhstm tɒ bhr ks br‌hsb rɒhhɒjʃ v br vfɣ smrh ɒʔmɒlʃ d͡ʒzɒ dhm» msl kbk kh br txmhɒjj kh nnhɒdh bɒʃdbnʃjnd، hmt͡ʃnɒn ɒst ksj‌kh mɒl rɒ bh bj ɒnsɒfj d͡ʒmʔ knd dr nsf rvzhɒjʃ آn rɒtrk xvɒhd krd v dr آxrt xvd ɒhmɣ xvɒhdbvd mvzʔ ɣds mɒ krsj d͡ʒlɒl v ɒz ɒzl mrtfʔ ɒst ‌ɒj xdɒvnd kh ɒmjd ɒsrɒئjl hstj hmɡɒnj kh tv rɒ trk nmɒjnd xd͡ʒl xvɒhnd ʃd آnɒnj kh ɒz mn mnhrf ʃvnd drzmjn mktvb xvɒhnd ʃd t͡ʃvnkh xdɒvnd rɒ kh t͡ʃʃmh آb hjɒt‌ɒst trk nmvdh‌ɒnd ‌ɒj xdɒvnd mrɒ ʃfɒ bdh، پs ʃfɒ xvɒhm jɒft mrɒnd͡ʒɒt bdh، پs nɒd͡ʒj xvɒhm ʃd zjrɒ kh tvtsbjh mn hstj ɒjnk ɒjʃɒn bh mn mj‌ɡvjnd «klɒm xdɒvnd kd͡ʒɒst؟ ɒlɒn vɒɣʔ bʃvd» vɒmɒ mn ɒz bvdn ʃbɒn brɒj پjrvj tv tʔd͡ʒjl nnmvdm v tv mj‌dɒnj kh jvm blɒ rɒ nxvɒstm آnt͡ʃh ɒz lbhɒjm bjrvn آmd bh hzvr tv zɒhr bvd brɒj mn bɒʔs trs mbɒʃ kh dr rvz blɒmld͡ʒɒj mn tvjj stmkɒrɒn mn xd͡ʒl ʃvndɒmɒ mn xd͡ʒl nʃvm ɒjʃɒn hrɒsɒn ʃvnd ɒmɒ mn hrɒsɒn nʃvm rvz blɒ rɒ br ɒjʃɒn bjɒvr v ɒjʃɒn rɒbh hlɒkt mzɒʔf hlɒk kn xdɒvnd bh mn t͡ʃnjn ɡft kh «brv v nzddrvɒzh پsrɒn ɣvm kh پɒdʃɒhɒn jhvdɒ ɒz آn dɒxl mj‌ʃvnd v ɒz آn bjrvn mj‌rvnd v nzd hmh drvɒzh hɒj ɒvrʃljm bɒjst v bh ɒjʃɒn bɡv ɒj پɒdʃɒhɒn jhvdɒ v tmɒmj jhvdɒ v d͡ʒmjʔ sknh ɒvrʃljm kh ɒz ɒjn drvɒzh‌hɒ dɒxl mj‌ʃvjd klɒm xdɒvnd rɒ bʃnvjd xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd brxvjʃtn bɒ hzr bɒʃjd v dr rvz sbt hjt͡ʃ bɒrj hml nknjd v آn rɒ dɒxl drvɒzh hɒj ɒvrʃljm msɒzjd v dr rvz sbt hjt͡ʃ bɒrj ɒzxɒnh hɒj xvd bjrvn mjɒvrjd v hjt͡ʃkɒr mknjdblkh rvz sbt rɒ tɣdjs nmɒjjd t͡ʃnɒnkh bh پdrɒn ʃmɒ ɒmr frmvdm» ɒmɒ ɒjʃɒn nʃnjdnd v ɡvʃ xvd rɒ frɒndɒʃtnd blkh ɡrdnhɒj xvd rɒ sxt sɒxtnd tɒnʃnvnd v tɒdjb rɒ nپzjrnd v xdɒvndmj ɡvjd «ɒɡr mrɒ hɣjɣt bʃnvjd v dr rvz sbt، hjt͡ʃ bɒrj ɒz drvɒzh hɒj ɒjn ʃhr dɒxl nsɒzjd vrvz sbt rɒ tɣdjs nmvdh، hjt͡ʃkɒr dr آn nknjd، آŋɒh پɒdʃɒhɒn v srvrɒn br krsj dɒvd nʃsth v br ɒrɒbh‌hɒ v ɒsbɒn svɒr ʃdh، ɒjʃɒn v srvrɒn ɒjʃɒn mrdɒn jhvdɒ v sɒknɒn ɒvrʃljm ɒz drvɒzh hɒj ɒjn ʃhr dɒxl xvɒhnd ʃd v ɒjn ʃhr tɒ bh ɒbd mskvn xvɒhd bvd v ɒzʃhrhɒj jhvdɒ v ɒz nvɒhj ɒvrʃljm v ɒz zmjn bnjɒmjn v ɒz hmvɒrj v kvhstɒn v d͡ʒnvb xvɒhnd آmd v ɣrbɒnj hɒj svxtnj v zbɒjh vhdɒjɒj آrdj v bxvr xvɒhnd‌آvrd v zbɒjh tʃkr rɒ bh xɒnh xdɒvnd xvɒhnd‌آvrdv ɒɡrmrɒ nʃnjdh rvz sbt rɒ tɣdjs nnmɒjjd v dr rvzsbt bɒrj brdɒʃth، bh ʃhrhɒj ɒvrʃljm dɒxl sɒzjd آŋɒh dr drvɒzh hɒjʃ آtʃj xvɒhm ɒfrvxt kh ɣsrhɒj ɒvrʃljm rɒ xvɒhd svxt v xɒmvʃ nxvɒhd ʃd» v ɒɡrmrɒ nʃnjdh rvz sbt rɒ tɣdjs nnmɒjjd v dr rvzsbt bɒrj brdɒʃth، bh ʃhrhɒj ɒvrʃljm dɒxl sɒzjd آŋɒh dr drvɒzh hɒjʃ آtʃj xvɒhm ɒfrvxt kh ɣsrhɒj ɒvrʃljm rɒ xvɒhd svxt v xɒmvʃ nxvɒhd ʃd» klɒmj kh ɒz d͡ʒɒnb xdɒvnd bh ɒrmjɒ nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «brxjz v bh xɒnh kvzh‌ɡr frvd آj kh dr آnd͡ʒɒ klɒm xvd rɒ bh tv xvɒhm ʃnvɒnjd» پs bh xɒnh kvzh‌ɡr frvd ʃdm v ɒjnk ɒv brt͡ʃrxhɒ kɒr mj‌krd v zrfj kh ɒz ɡl mj‌sɒxt dr dst kvzh‌ɡr zɒjʔ ʃd پs dvbɒrh zrfj djɡr ɒz آn sɒxt btvrj kh bh nzrkvzh‌ɡr پsnd آmd kh bsɒzd آŋɒh klɒm xdɒvndbh mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd ɒj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl آjɒ mn msl ɒjn kvzh‌ɡr bɒ ʃmɒʔml ntvɒnm nmvd zjrɒ t͡ʃnɒnkh ɡl dr dst kvzh‌ɡr ɒst، hmt͡ʃnɒn ʃmɒ‌ɒj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl dr dst mn mj‌bɒʃjd hŋɒmj kh drbɒrh ɒmtj jɒ mmlktj brɒj kndn v mnhdm sɒxtn v hlɒk nmvdn sxnj ɡfth bɒʃm، ɒɡr آn ɒmtj kh drbɒrh ɒjʃɒn ɡfth bɒʃm ɒz ʃrɒrt xvjʃ bɒzɡʃt nmɒjnd، آŋɒh ɒz آn blɒjj kh bh آvrdn آn ɣsdnmvdh‌ɒm xvɒhm brɡʃt v hŋɒmj kh drbɒrh ɒmtj jɒmmlktj bh d͡ʒht bnɒ krdn v ɣrs nmvdn sxn ɡfth bɒʃm، ɒɡr ɒjʃɒn dr nzr mn ʃrɒrt vrznd v ɣvl mrɒ nʃnvnd آŋɒh ɒz آn njkvjj kh ɡfth bɒʃm kh brɒj ɒjʃɒn bknm xvɒhm brɡʃt ɒlɒn mrdɒn jhvdɒ v sɒknɒn ɒvrʃljm rɒ xtɒb krdh، bɡv kh xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnk mn bh zd ʃmɒ blɒjj mhjɒ mj‌sɒzm v ɣsdj bh xlɒf ʃmɒ mj‌nmɒjm پs ʃmɒ hr kdɒm ɒz rɒh zʃt xvdbɒzɡʃt nmɒjjd v rɒhhɒ v ɒʔmɒl xvd rɒ ɒslɒh knjd ɒmɒ ɒjʃɒn xvɒhnd ɡft ɒmjd njst zjrɒkh ɒfkɒr xvd rɒ پjrvj xvɒhjm nmvd v hr kdɒm mvɒfɣ srkʃj dl ʃrjr xvd rftɒr xvɒhjm krd bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd dr mjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ svɒl knjd kjst kh msl ɒjn t͡ʃjzhɒ rɒʃnjdh bɒʃd؟ dvʃjzh ɒsrɒئjl kɒr bsjɒr zʃt krdh ɒst آjɒ brf lbnɒn ɒz sxrh shrɒ bɒzɒjstd jɒ آbhɒj srd kh ɒz d͡ʒɒj dvr d͡ʒɒrj mj‌ʃvd xʃk ɡrdd؟ zjrɒ kh ɣvm mn mrɒfrɒmvʃ krdh brɒj ɒbɒtjl bxvr mj‌svzɒnnd vآnhɒ ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz rɒhhɒj ɒjʃɒn jʔnj ɒz trjɣ hɒj ɣdjm mj‌lɣzɒnnd tɒ dr kvrh rɒhhɒ bh rɒhhɒjj kh sɒxth nʃdh ɒst rɒh brvnd tɒ zmjn xvd rɒmɒjh hjrt v sxrjh ɒbdj bɡrdɒnnd bh hdj kh hr‌kh ɒz آn ɡzr knd mthjr ʃdh، sr xvd rɒxvɒhd d͡ʒnbɒnjd mn msl bɒd ʃrɣj ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒzhzvr dʃmnɒn پrɒkndh xvɒhm sɒxt v dr rvzmsjbt ɒjʃɒn پʃt rɒ bh ɒjʃɒn nʃɒn xvɒhm dɒdv nh rv rɒ» آŋɒh ɡftnd «bjɒjjd tɒ bh zd ɒrmjɒ tdbjrhɒnmɒjjm zjrɒ kh ʃrjʔt ɒz kɒhnɒn v mʃvrt ɒzhkjmɒn v klɒm ɒz ɒnbjɒ zɒjʔ nxvɒhd ʃd پs bjɒjjd tɒ ɒv rɒ bh zbɒn xvd bznjm v hjt͡ʃ sxnʃ rɒɡvʃ ndhjm» ‌ɒj xdɒvnd mrɒ ɡvʃ bdh v آvɒz dʃmnɒn mrɒ bʃnv آjɒ bdj bh ʔvz njkvjj ɒdɒ xvɒhdʃd zjrɒ kh hfrh‌ɒj brɒj d͡ʒɒn mn kndh‌ɒnd bjɒdآvr kh t͡ʃɡvnh bh hzvr tv ɒjstɒdh bvdm tɒ drbɒrh ɒjʃɒn sxn njkv ɡfth، hdt xʃm tv rɒ ɒzɒjʃɒn bɡrdɒnm پs پsrɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh ɣhtbsپɒr v ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh dm ʃmʃjr tsljm nmɒ v znɒn ɒjʃɒn، bj‌ɒvlɒd v bjvh ɡrdnd v mrdɒn ɒjʃɒn bh sxtj kʃth ʃvnd v d͡ʒvɒnɒn ɒjʃɒn، dr d͡ʒŋ bh ʃmʃjr mɣtvl ɡrdnd v t͡ʃvn fvd͡ʒj br ɒjʃɒn nɒɡhɒn bjɒvrj nʔrh‌ɒj ɒz xɒnh hɒj ɒjʃɒn ʃnjdh ʃvd zjrɒ bh d͡ʒht ɡrftɒr krdnm hfrh‌ɒj kndh ɒndv dɒmhɒ brɒj پɒjhɒjm پnhɒn nmvdhɒmɒ tv‌ɒj xdɒvnd tmɒmj mʃvrthɒjj rɒ kh ɒjʃɒn bh ɣsd d͡ʒɒn mn nmvdh‌ɒnd mj‌dɒnj پs ʔsjɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒmjɒmrz v ɡnɒh ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz nzr xvjʃ mhv msɒzblkh ɒjʃɒn bh hzvr tv lɣzɒnjdh ʃvnd v dr hjn ɣzb xvjʃ، bɒ ɒjʃɒn ʔml nmɒ ɒmɒ tv‌ɒj xdɒvnd tmɒmj mʃvrthɒjj rɒ kh ɒjʃɒn bh ɣsd d͡ʒɒn mn nmvdh‌ɒnd mj‌dɒnj پs ʔsjɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒmjɒmrz v ɡnɒh ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz nzr xvjʃ mhv msɒzblkh ɒjʃɒn bh hzvr tv lɣzɒnjdh ʃvnd v dr hjn ɣzb xvjʃ، bɒ ɒjʃɒn ʔml nmɒ xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn ɡft «brv v kvzh sfɒljn ɒz kvzh‌ɡr bxr v bʔzj ɒz mʃɒjx ɣvm vmʃɒjx khnh rɒ hmrɒh xvd brdɒr v bh vɒdj ɒbn hnvm kh nzd dhnh drvɒzh kvzh‌ɡrɒn ɒst bjrvn rfth، sxnɒnj rɒ kh bh tv xvɒhm ɡft dr آnd͡ʒɒ ndɒkn v bɡv ɒj پɒdʃɒhɒn jhvdɒ v sknh ɒvrʃljm klɒm xdɒvnd rɒ bʃnvjd jhvh sbɒjvt xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnk br ɒjn mkɒn t͡ʃnɒn blɒjj xvɒhm آvrd kh ɡvʃ hr ks kh آn rɒbʃnvd sdɒ xvɒhd krd zɒnrv kh mrɒ trk krdndv ɒjn mkɒn rɒ xvɒr ʃmrdnd v bxvr dr آn brɒj xdɒjɒn ɣjr kh nh xvd ɒjʃɒn v nh پdrɒn ɒjʃɒn vnh پɒdʃɒhɒn jhvdɒ آnhɒ rɒ ʃnɒxth bvdndsvzɒnjdnd v ɒjn mkɒn rɒ ɒz xvn bj‌ɡnɒhɒn mmlvsɒxtnd v mkɒn hɒj blnd brɒj bʔl bnɒ krdnd tɒپsrɒn xvd rɒ bh‌d͡ʒɒj ɣrbɒnj hɒj svxtnj brɒj bʔl bsvzɒnnd kh mn آn rɒ ɒmr nfrmvdh v ŋfth vdr dlm ŋzʃth bvd bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnk ɒjɒmj mj‌آjd kh ɒjn mkɒn bh tvft jɒ bh vɒdj ɒbn hnvm djɡr nɒmjdh nxvɒhd ʃd blkh bh vɒdj ɣtl v mʃvrt jhvdɒ v ɒvrʃljm rɒ dr ɒjn mkɒn bɒtl xvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz hzvrdʃmnɒn ɒjʃɒn v bh‌dst آnɒnj kh ɣsd d͡ʒɒn ɒjʃɒn dɒrnd xvɒhm‌ɒndɒxt v lɒʃhɒj ɒjʃɒn rɒxvrɒk mrɣɒn hvɒ v hjvɒnɒt zmjn xvɒhm sɒxt v ɒjn ʃhr rɒ mɒjh hjrt v sxrjh xvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd bh hdj kh hr‌kh ɒz آn ʔbvr kndmthjr ʃdh، bh‌sbb d͡ʒmjʔ blɒjɒjʃ sxrjh xvɒhd nmvd v ɡvʃt پsrɒn ɒjʃɒn v ɡvʃt dxtrɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm xvrɒnjd v drmhɒsrh v tŋj kh dʃmnɒn ɒjʃɒn v d͡ʒvjndɡɒn d͡ʒɒn ɒjʃɒn br ɒjʃɒn xvɒhnd‌آvrd، hr ks ɡvʃt hmsɒjh xvd rɒ xvɒhd xvrd آŋɒh kvzh rɒ bh nzr آnɒnj kh hmrɒh tv mj‌rvnd bʃkn v ɒjʃɒn rɒ bɡv jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd bh nvʔj kh ksj kvzh kvzh‌ɡr rɒ mj‌ʃknd v آn rɒdjɡr ɒslɒh ntvɒn krd hmt͡ʃnɒn ɒjn ɣvm v ɒjn ʃhr rɒ xvɒhm ʃkst v ɒjʃɒn rɒ dr tvft dfn xvɒhnd krd tɒ d͡ʒɒjj brɒj dfn krdn bɒɣj nmɒnd xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd bh ɒjn mkɒn v bh sɒknɒnʃ t͡ʃnjn ʔml xvɒhm nmvd v ɒjn ʃhr rɒ msl tvft xvɒhm sɒxt v xɒnh hɒj ɒvrʃljm vxɒnh hɒj پɒdʃɒhɒn jhvdɒ msl mkɒn tvft nd͡ʒs xvɒhd ʃd jʔnj hmh xɒnh hɒjj kh br bɒmhɒj آnhɒbxvr brɒj tmɒmj lʃkr آsmɒn svzɒnjdnd vhdɒjɒj rjxtnj brɒj xdɒjɒn ɣjr rjxtnd» پs ɒrmjɒ ɒz tvft kh xdɒvnd ɒv rɒ bh d͡ʒht nbvt krdn bh آnd͡ʒɒ frstɒdh bvd bɒz آmd v drshn xɒnh xdɒvnd ɒjstɒdh، bh tmɒmj ɣvm ɡft«jhvh sbɒjvt xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnk mn br ɒjn ʃhr v br hmh ɣrjh hɒjʃ، tmɒmj blɒjɒ rɒ kh drbɒrh‌ɒʃ ɡfth‌ɒm vɒrd xvɒhm آvrd zjrɒ kh ɡrdn xvd rɒ sxt ɡrdɒnjdh، klɒm mrɒ nʃnjdnd» «jhvh sbɒjvt xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnk mn br ɒjn ʃhr v br hmh ɣrjh hɒjʃ، tmɒmj blɒjɒ rɒ kh drbɒrh‌ɒʃ ɡfth‌ɒm vɒrd xvɒhm آvrd zjrɒ kh ɡrdn xvd rɒ sxt ɡrdɒnjdh، klɒm mrɒ nʃnjdnd» v fʃhvr bn ɒmjr kɒhn kh nɒzr ɒvl xɒnh xdɒvnd bvd، ɒrmjɒ nbj rɒ kh bh ɒjn ɒmvrnbvt mj‌krd ʃnjd پs fʃhvr ɒrmjɒj nbj rɒzdh، ɒv rɒ dr kndh‌ɒj kh nzd drvɒzh ʔɒlj bnjɒmjn kh nzd xɒnh xdɒvnd bvd ɡzɒʃt v dr frdɒj آn rvz fʃhvr ɒrmjɒ rɒ ɒz kndh bjrvn آvrd v ɒrmjɒvj rɒ ɡft «xdɒvnd ɒsm tv rɒ nh fʃhvr blkh mɒd͡ʒvr msɒbjb xvɒndh ɒst zjrɒ xdɒvndt͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnk mn tv rɒ mvrs trs xvdt v d͡ʒmjʔ dvstɒnt mj‌ɡrdɒnm v ɒjʃɒn bh ʃmʃjr dʃmnɒn xvd xvɒhnd ɒftɒd v t͡ʃʃmɒnt xvɒhd djd v tmɒmj jhvdɒ rɒ bh‌dst پɒdʃɒh bɒbl tsljm xvɒhm krd kh ɒv ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh bɒbl bh ɒsjrj brdh، ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh ʃmʃjr bh ɣtl xvɒhd rsɒnjd v tmɒmj dvlt ɒjn ʃhr v tmɒmj mʃɣt آn rɒ vd͡ʒmjʔ nfɒjs آn rɒ tsljm xvɒhm krd v hmh xzɒnh hɒj پɒdʃɒhɒn jhvdɒ rɒ bh‌dst dʃmnɒn ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm sپrd kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɣɒrt krdh vɡrftɒr nmvdh، bh bɒbl xvɒhnd brd v tv‌ɒj fʃhvr bɒ d͡ʒmjʔ sknh xɒnh ɒt bh ɒsjrj xvɒhjdrft v tv bɒ d͡ʒmjʔ dvstɒnt kh nzd ɒjʃɒn bh drvɣ nbvt krdj، bh bɒbl dɒxl ʃdh، dr آnd͡ʒɒxvɒhjd mrd v dr آnd͡ʒɒ dfn xvɒhjd ʃd» ‌ɒj xdɒvnd mrɒ frjftj پs frjfth ʃdm ɒzmn zvrآvrtr bvdj v ɣɒlb ʃdj tmɒmj rvzmzhkh ʃdm v hr ks mrɒ ɒsthzɒ mj‌knd zjrɒhr ɡɒh mj‌xvɒhm tklm nmɒjm nɒlh mj‌knm v bh zlm v ɣɒrt ndɒ mj‌nmɒjm zjrɒ klɒm xdɒvnd tmɒmj rvz brɒj mn mvd͡ʒb ʔɒr v ɒsthzɒ ɡrdjdh ɒst پs ɡftm kh ɒv rɒ zkr nxvɒhm nmvd v bɒr djɡr bh ɒsm ɒv sxn nxvɒhm ɡft، آŋɒh dr dl mn msl آtʃ ɒfrvxth ʃd v dr ɒstxvɒnhɒjm bsth ɡrdjdv ɒz xvddɒrj xsth ʃdh، bɒz ntvɒnstm ɒjstɒd zjrɒ kh ɒz bsjɒrj mzmt ʃnjdm v ɒz hr d͡ʒɒnb xvf bvd v d͡ʒmjʔ ɒsdɣɒj mn ɡftnd br ɒvʃkɒjt knjd v mɒ ʃkɒjt xvɒhjm nmvd v mrɒɣb lɣzjdn mn mj‌bɒʃnd v mj‌ɡvjnd kh ʃɒjd ɒvfrjfth xvɒhd ʃd tɒ br vj ɣɒlb آmdh، ɒntɣɒm xvd rɒ ɒz ɒv bkʃjm ljkn xdɒvnd bɒ mn msl d͡ʒbɒr ɣɒhr ɒst ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht stmkɒrɒn mn xvɒhnd lɣzjd v ɣɒlb nxvɒhnd آmd v t͡ʃvnkh bh ftɒnt rftɒr nnmvdnd bh rsvɒjj ɒbdj kh frɒmvʃ nxvɒhnd ʃd bj‌nhɒjt xd͡ʒl xvɒhndɡrdjd ɒmɒ‌ɒj jhvh sbɒjvt kh ʔɒdlɒn rɒmj آzmɒjj v ɡrdh‌hɒ v dlhɒ rɒ mʃɒhdh mj‌knj، bʃvd kh ɒntɣɒm tv rɒ ɒz ɒjʃɒn bbjnm zjrɒ kh dʔvj xvjʃ rɒ nzd tv kʃf nmvdm brɒj xdɒvndbsrɒjjd v xdɒvnd rɒ tsbjh bxvɒnjd zjrɒ kh d͡ʒɒn mskjnɒn rɒ ɒz dst ʃrjrɒn rhɒjj dɒdh ɒst mlʔvn bɒd rvzj kh dr آn mvlvd ʃdm vmbɒrk mbɒd rvzj kh mɒdrm mrɒ zɒjjd mlʔvn bɒd ksj‌kh پdr mrɒ mʒdh dɒd v ɡft kh brɒj tvvld nrjnh‌ɒj zɒjjdh ʃdh ɒst v ɒv rɒ bsjɒrʃɒdmɒn ɡrdɒnjd v آnks msl ʃhrhɒjj kh xdɒvnd آnhɒ rɒ ʃfɣt nnmvdh vɒʒɡvn sɒxt bʃvd v frjɒdj dr sbh v nʔrh‌ɒj dr vɣt zhrbʃnvd zjrɒ kh mrɒ ɒz rhm nkʃt tɒ mɒdrm ɣbr mn bɒʃd v rhm ɒv hmjʃh آbstn mɒndt͡ʃrɒ ɒzrhm bjrvn آmdm tɒ mʃɣt v ɣm rɒ mʃɒhdh nmɒjm v rvzhɒjm dr xd͡ʒɒlt tlf ʃvd؟ t͡ʃrɒ ɒzrhm bjrvn آmdm tɒ mʃɣt v ɣm rɒ mʃɒhdh nmɒjm v rvzhɒjm dr xd͡ʒɒlt tlf ʃvd؟ klɒmj kh bh ɒrmjɒ ɒz d͡ʒɒnb xdɒvnd nɒzl ʃd vɣtj kh sdɣjɒ پɒdʃɒh، fʃhvr bn mlkjɒ v sfnjɒ ɒbn mʔsjɒj kɒhn rɒ nzd vj frstɒdh، ɡft «brɒj mɒ ɒz xdɒvnd msɒlt nmɒzjrɒ kh nbvkdrsr پɒdʃɒh bɒbl bɒ mɒ d͡ʒŋ mj‌kndʃɒjd kh xdɒvnd mvɒfɣ kɒrhɒj ʔd͡ʒjb xvd bɒ mɒʔml nmɒjd tɒ ɒv ɒz mɒ brɡrdd» v ɒrmjɒ bh ɒjʃɒn ɡft «bh sdɣjɒ t͡ʃnjn bɡvjjd jhvh xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd ɒjnk mn ɒslhh d͡ʒŋ rɒ kh bh‌dst ʃmɒst v ʃmɒ bɒ آnhɒ bɒ پɒdʃɒh bɒbl v kldɒnjɒnj kh ʃmɒ rɒ ɒz bjrvn djvɒrhɒ mhɒsrh nmvdh‌ɒnd d͡ʒŋ mj‌knjd brmj ɡrdɒnm v ɒjʃɒn rɒdr ɒndrvn ɒjn ʃhr d͡ʒmʔ xvɒhm krd v mn bh‌dst drɒz v bɒzvj ɣvj v bh ɣzb v hdt vxʃm ʔzjm bɒ ʃmɒ mɣɒtlh xvɒhm nmvd vsɒknɒn ɒjn ʃhr rɒ hm ɒz ɒnsɒn v hm ɒz bhɒjm xvɒhm zd kh bh vbɒj sxt xvɒhnd mrd vxdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh bʔd ɒz آn sdɣjɒ پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ v bndɡɒnʃ v ɒjn ɣvm jʔnj آnɒnj rɒ kh ɒz vbɒv ʃmʃjr v ɣht dr ɒjn ʃhr bɒɣj‌mɒndh bɒʃnd bh‌dst nbvkdrsr پɒdʃɒh bɒbl v bh‌dst dʃmnɒn ɒjʃɒn v bh‌dst d͡ʒvjndɡɒn d͡ʒɒn ɒjʃɒn tsljm xvɒhm nmvd tɒ ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh dm ʃmʃjr bkʃd v ɒvbr ɒjʃɒn rɒft v ʃfɣt v trhm nxvɒhd nmvd v bh ɒjn ɣvm bɡv kh xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd ɒjnk mn trjɣ hjɒt v trjɣ mvt rɒ پjʃ ʃmɒmj ɡzɒrm؛ hrkh dr ɒjn ʃhr bmɒnd ɒz ʃmʃjr vɣht v vbɒ xvɒhd mrd، ɒmɒ hr‌kh bjrvn rvd v bh‌dst kldɒnjɒnj kh ʃmɒ rɒ mhɒsrh nmvdh ɒndbjftd، zndh xvɒhd mɒnd v d͡ʒɒnʃ brɒj ɒv ɣnjmt xvɒhd ʃd zjrɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd mn rvj xvd rɒ br ɒjn ʃhr bh bdj v nh bh njkvjj brɡrdɒnjdm v bh‌dst پɒdʃɒh bɒbl tsljm ʃdh، آn rɒ bh آtʃ xvɒhd svzɒnjd «v drbɒrh xɒndɒn پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ bɡv klɒm xdɒvnd rɒ bʃnvjd ‌ɒj xɒndɒn dɒvd xdɒvndt͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd bɒmdɒdɒn bh ɒnsɒf dɒvrj nmɒjjd v mɣsvbɒn rɒ ɒz dst zɒlmɒn brhɒnjdmbɒdɒ hdt xʃm mn bh‌sbb bdj ɒʔmɒl ʃmɒmsl آtʃ sɒdr ɡrdd v mʃtʔl ʃdh، xɒmvʃ knndh‌ɒj nbɒʃd xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd ɒj sɒknh vɒdj v‌ɒj sxrh hɒmvn kh mj‌ɡvjjdkjst kh bh zd mɒ frvd آjd v kjst kh bh msknhɒj mɒ dɒxl ʃvd ɒjnk mn bh zd tvhstmv xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd br‌hsb smrh ɒʔmɒl ʃmɒ bh ʃmɒ ʔɣvbt xvɒhm rsɒnjd vآtʃj dr d͡ʒŋl ɒjn ʃhr xvɒhm ɒfrvxt kh tmɒmj hvɒlj آn rɒ xvɒhd svzɒnjd» v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd br‌hsb smrh ɒʔmɒl ʃmɒ bh ʃmɒ ʔɣvbt xvɒhm rsɒnjd vآtʃj dr d͡ʒŋl ɒjn ʃhr xvɒhm ɒfrvxt kh tmɒmj hvɒlj آn rɒ xvɒhd svzɒnjd» xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn ɡft «bh xɒnh پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ frvd آj v dr آnd͡ʒɒ bh ɒjn klɒm mtklm ʃv v bɡv ɒj پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ kh br krsj dɒvd nʃsth‌ɒj، tv v bndɡɒnt v ɣvmt kh bh ɒjn drvɒzh‌hɒ dɒxl mj‌ʃvjd klɒm xdɒvnd rɒ bʃnvjd xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒnsɒf vʔdɒlt rɒ ɒd͡ʒrɒ dɒrjd v mɣsvbɒn rɒ ɒz dst zɒlmɒn brhɒnjd v br ɣrbɒ v jtjmɒn v bjvh‌znɒn stm v d͡ʒvr mnmɒjjd v xvn bj‌ɡnɒhɒn rɒ dr ɒjn mkɒn mrjzjd zjrɒ ɒɡr ɒjn kɒr rɒ bd͡ʒɒ آvrjd hmɒnɒپɒdʃɒhɒnj kh br krsj dɒvd bnʃjnnd، ɒzdrvɒzh hɒj ɒjn xɒnh dɒxl xvɒhnd ʃd v hr jk bɒ bndɡɒn v ɣvm xvd br ɒrɒbh‌hɒ v ɒsbɒn svɒrxvɒhnd ɡrdjd ɒmɒ ɒɡr ɒjn sxnɒn rɒ nʃnvjdxdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh bh zɒt xvd ɣsm xvrdm kh ɒjn xɒnh xrɒb xvɒhd ʃd zjrɒ xdɒvnddrbɒrh xɒndɒn پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒɡrt͡ʃh tv nzd mn d͡ʒlʔɒd v ɣlh lbnɒn mj‌bɒʃj ljkn mn tv rɒ bh bjɒbɒn v ʃhrhɒj ɣjrmskvn mbdl xvɒhm sɒxt v br tv xrɒb knndɡɒn kh hrjk bɒ آlɒtʃ bɒʃd mʔjn mj‌knm v ɒjʃɒn bhtrjn srvhɒj آzɒd tv rɒ ɣtʔ nmvdh، bh آtʃ xvɒhndɒfknd v ɒmt hɒj bsjɒr t͡ʃvn ɒz ɒjn ʃhr ʔbvrnmɒjnd bh jkdjɡr xvɒhnd ɡft kh xdɒvnd bh ɒjn ʃhr ʔzjm t͡ʃrɒ t͡ʃnjn krdh ɒst v d͡ʒvɒb xvɒhnd dɒd ɒz ɒjn sbb kh ʔhd jhvh xdɒj xvdrɒ trk krdnd v xdɒjɒn ɣjr rɒ sd͡ʒdh v ʔbɒdt nmvdnd «brɒj mrdh ɡrjh mnmɒjjd v brɒj ɒv mɒtm mɡjrjd zɒrzɒr bɡrjjd brɒj ɒv kh mj‌rvd zjrɒ kh djɡr mrɒd͡ʒʔt nxvɒhd krd v zmjn mvld xvjʃ rɒ nxvɒhd djd zjrɒ xdɒvnd drbɒrh ʃlvm bn jvʃjɒ پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ kh bd͡ʒɒj پdr xvd jvʃjɒپɒdʃɒh ʃdh v ɒz ɒjn mkɒn bjrvn rfth ɒst t͡ʃnjn mj ɡvjd kh djɡr bh ɒjnd͡ʒɒ brnxvɒhd ɡʃt blkh dr mkɒnj kh ɒv rɒ bh ɒsjrj brdh ɒndxvɒhd mrd v ɒjn zmjn rɒ bɒz nxvɒhd djd «vɒj br آn ksj‌kh xɒnh xvd rɒ bh bj‌ɒnsɒfj v kvʃkhɒj xvjʃ rɒ bh nɒhɣ bnɒmj knd kh ɒz hmsɒjh xvd md͡ʒɒn xdmt mj‌ɡjrdv mzdʃ rɒ bh ɒv nmj dhd kh mj‌ɡvjd xɒnh vsjʔ v ɒtɒɣhɒj mrvh brɒj xvd bnɒ mj‌knm vپnd͡ʒrh‌hɒ brɒj xvjʃtn mj‌ʃkɒfd v sɣf آn rɒ ɒz srv آzɒd mj‌پvʃɒnd v bɒ ʃnd͡ʒrf rŋ mj‌knd آjɒ ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht kh bɒ srvhɒj آzɒdmkɒrmt mj‌nmɒjj، sltnt xvɒhj krd؟ آjɒپdrt ɒkl vʃrb nmj nmvd v ɒnsɒf v ʔdɒlt rɒbd͡ʒɒ nmj آvrd، آŋɒh brɒjʃ sʔɒdtmndj mj‌bvd؟ fɣjr v mskjn rɒ dɒdrsj mj‌nmvd، آŋɒh sʔɒdtmndj mj‌ʃd mɡr dvrɒndɒxth ʃdh bh dfn ɒlɒɣ mdfvn xvɒhd ɡrdjd «bh frɒz lbnɒn brآmdh، frjɒd brآvr v آvɒzxvd rɒ dr bɒʃɒn blndkn v ɒz ʔbɒrjm frjɒd kn zjrɒ kh d͡ʒmjʔ dvstɒnt tlf ʃdh‌ɒnd dr hjn sʔɒdtmndj tv bh tv sxn ɡftm، ɒmɒ ɡftj ɡvʃ nxvɒhm ɡrft hmjn ɒz tfvljtt ʔɒdt tv bvdh ɒst kh bh آvɒz mn ɡvʃ ndhj bɒd tmɒmj ʃbɒnɒnt rɒ xvɒhd t͡ʃrɒnjd v dvstɒnt bh ɒsjrj xvɒhnd rft پs dr آn vɣt bh‌sbb tmɒmj ʃrɒrtt xd͡ʒl v rsvɒ xvɒhj ʃd ‌ɒj kh drlbnɒn sɒkn hstj v آʃjɒnh xvjʃ rɒ drsrvhɒj آzɒd mj‌sɒzj hŋɒmj kh ɒlmhɒ v drdmsl znj kh mj‌zɒjd tv rɒ frv‌ɡjrd t͡ʃh ɣdr br tvɒfsvs xvɒhnd krd؟ jhvh mj‌ɡvjd bh hjɒt mn ɣsm kh ɒɡr‌t͡ʃh knjɒhv ɒbn jhvjɒɣjm پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ xɒtm br dst rɒst mn mj‌bvd hrآjnh tv rɒ ɒz آnd͡ʒɒ mj‌kndm v tv rɒ bh‌dst آnɒnj kh ɣsd d͡ʒɒn tv dɒrnd v bh‌dst آnɒnj kh ɒzɒjʃɒn trsɒnj v bh‌dst nbvkdrsr پɒdʃɒh bɒbl vbh‌dst kldɒnjɒn tsljm xvɒhm nmvd v tv vmɒdr tv rɒ kh tv rɒ zɒjjd، bh zmjn ɣrjbj kh dr آn tvld njɒftjd xvɒhm‌ɒndɒxt kh dr آnd͡ʒɒ xvɒhjdmrd ɒmɒ bh zmjnj kh ɒjʃɒn bsjɒr آrzv dɒrnd kh bh آn brɡrdnd xdɒvnd rɒbʃnvxdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd «ɒjn ʃxs rɒ bj‌ɒvlɒd v ksj‌kh dr rvzɡɒr xvd kɒmjɒb nxvɒhd ʃd bnvjs، zjrɒ kh hjt͡ʃks ɒz zrjt vj kɒmjɒb nxvɒhd ʃd v br krsj dɒvd nxvɒhdnʃst، v bɒr djɡr dr jhvdɒ jhvdɒ sltnt nxvɒhd nmvd» xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd «vɒj br ʃbɒnɒnj kh ɡlh mrtʔ mrɒ hlɒk v پrɒkndh mj‌sɒznd» bnɒbrɒjn، jhvh xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl drbɒrh ʃbɒnɒnj kh ɣvm mrɒ mj‌t͡ʃrɒnnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «ʃmɒ ɡlh mrɒ پrɒkndh sɒxth v rɒndh ɒjdv bh آnhɒ tvd͡ʒh nnmvdh‌ɒjd پs xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjdɒjnk mn ʔɣvbt bdj ɒʔmɒl ʃmɒ rɒ br ʃmɒxvɒhm rsɒnjd v mn bɣjh ɡlh xvjʃ rɒ ɒz hmh zmjnhɒjj kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh آnhɒ rɒndh‌ɒm d͡ʒmʔ xvɒhm krd v
