ɒst xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd «ɒjnk ɒjɒmj mj‌آjd kh ʃɒxh‌ɒj ʔɒdl brɒj dɒvd brپɒ mj‌knm v پɒdʃɒhj sltnt nmvdh، bh ftɒnt rftɒr xvɒhd krd vɒnsɒf v ʔdɒlt rɒ dr zmjn md͡ʒrɒ xvɒhd dɒʃt dr ɒjɒm vj jhvdɒ nd͡ʒɒt xvɒhd jɒft v ɒsrɒئjl bɒ ɒmnjt sɒkn xvɒhd ʃd v ɒsmj kh bh آn nɒmjdh mj‌ʃvd ɒjn ɒst jhvh sdɣjnv jhvh ʔdɒlt mɒ bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnk ɒjɒmj mj‌آjd kh djɡr nxvɒhnd ɡft ɣsm bh hjɒt jhvh kh bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl rɒ ɒz zmjn msr brآvrd blkh ɣsm bh hjɒt jhvh kh zrjt xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl rɒ ɒz zmjn ʃmɒl v ɒz hmh zmjnhɒjj kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh آnhɒ rɒndh bvdm bjrvn آvrdh، rhbrj nmvdh ɒst v dr zmjn xvd sɒkn xvɒhnd ʃd» bh‌sbb ɒnbjɒ dl mn dr ɒndrvnm ʃksth vhmh ɒstxvɒnhɒjm mstrxj ʃdh ɒst، msl ʃxs mst v mɒnnd mrd mɣlvb ʃrɒb ɒzd͡ʒht xdɒvnd v ɒz d͡ʒht klɒm mɣds ɒvɡrdjdh‌ɒm zjrɒ kh zmjn پr ɒz znɒkɒrɒn ɒst v bh‌sbb lʔnt zmjn mɒtm mj‌knd v mrtʔ hɒj bjɒbɒn xʃk ʃdh ɒst zjrɒ kh trjɣ ɒjʃɒn bd vtvɒnɒjj ɒjʃɒn bɒtl ɒst t͡ʃvnkh hm ɒnbjɒ v hm kɒhnɒn mnɒfɣ‌ɒnd v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd ʃrɒrt ɒjʃɒn rɒ hm dr xɒnh xvd jɒfth‌ɒm bnɒbrɒjn trjɣ ɒjʃɒn msl d͡ʒɒjhɒj lɣzndh dr tɒrjkj ɣljz brɒj ɒjʃɒn xvɒhd bvd kh ɒjʃɒn rɒndh ʃdh dr آn xvɒhnd ɒftɒd zjrɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh «drsɒl ʔɣvbt ɒjʃɒn blɒ br ɒjʃɒn ʔɒrz xvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd v dr ɒnbjɒj sɒmrh hmɒɣtj djdh‌ɒm kh brɒj bʔl nbvt krdh، ɣvm mn ɒsrɒئjl rɒ ɡmrɒh ɡrdɒnjdh‌ɒnd v dr ɒnbjɒj ɒvrʃljm njz t͡ʃjzhvlnɒk djdm mrtkb znɒ ʃdh، bh drvɣ slvk mj‌nmɒjnd v dsthɒj ʃrjrɒn rɒ tɣvjt mj‌dhndmbɒdɒ hr jk ɒz ɒjʃɒn ɒz ʃrɒrt xvjʃ bɒzɡʃt nmɒjd v d͡ʒmjʔ ɒjʃɒn brɒj mn msl sdvm vsɒknɒn آn mɒnnd ʔmvrh ɡrdjdh‌ɒnd» bnɒbrɒjn jhvh sbɒjvt drbɒrh آn ɒnbjɒ t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «ɒjnk mn bh ɒjʃɒn ɒfsntjn xvɒhm xvrɒnjd v آb tlx bh ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm nvʃɒnjd zjrɒkh ɒz ɒnbjɒj ɒvrʃljm nfɒɣ dr tmɒmj zmjn mntʃrʃdh ɒst» jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «bh sxnɒn ɒjn ɒnbjɒjj kh brɒj ʃmɒ nbvt mj‌knndɡvʃ mdhjd zjrɒ ʃmɒ rɒ bh btɒlt tʔljm mj‌dhndv rvjɒj dl xvd rɒ bjɒn mj‌knnd v nh ɒz dhɒn xdɒvnd v bh آnɒnj kh mrɒ hɣjr mj‌ʃmɒrndپjvsth mj‌ɡvjnd xdɒvnd mj‌frmɒjd kh brɒj ʃmɒ slɒmtj xvɒhd bvd v bh آnɒnj kh bh‌srkʃj dl xvd slvk mj‌nmɒjnd mj‌ɡvjnd kh blɒ bh ʃmɒnxvɒhd rsjd zjrɒ kjst kh bh mʃvrt xdɒvnd vɒɣf ʃdh bɒʃd tɒ bbjnd v klɒm ɒv rɒbʃnvd v kjst kh bh klɒm ɒv ɡvʃ frɒ dɒʃth، ɒstmɒʔ nmvdh bɒʃd ɒjnk bɒd ʃdjd ɣzb xdɒvnd sɒdr ʃdh v ɡrdbɒdj dvr mj‌znd v brsr ʃrjrɒn frvd xvɒhd آmd ɣzb xdɒvndtɒ mɣɒsd dl ɒv rɒ bd͡ʒɒ njɒvrd v bh ɒnd͡ʒɒm nrsɒndbrnxvɒhd ɡʃt dr ɒjɒm آxr ɒjn rɒ njkv xvɒhjdfhmjd mn ɒjn ɒnbjɒ rɒ nfrstɒdm ljkn dvjdnd bh ɒjʃɒn sxn ŋftm ɒmɒ ɒjʃɒn nbvt nmvdnd ɒmɒɒɡr dr mʃvrt mn ɣɒjm mj‌mɒndnd، klɒm mrɒ bh ɣvm mn bjɒn mj‌krdnd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz rɒh bd v ɒz ɒʔmɒl ʃrjr ɒjʃɒn brmj ɡrdɒnjdnd jhvh mj‌ɡvjd آjɒ mn xdɒj nzdjk hstm v xdɒj dvr nj؟ v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd آjɒ ksj xvjʃtn rɒ drd͡ʒɒj mxfj پnhɒn tvɒnd nmvd kh mn ɒv rɒ nbjnm mɡr mn آsmɒn v zmjn rɒ mmlv nmj sɒzm؟ klɒm xdɒvnd ɒjn ɒst sxnɒn ɒnbjɒ rɒ kh bh ɒsm mn kɒzbɒnh nbvt krdnd ʃnjdm kh ɡftnd xvɒb djdm xvɒb djdm ɒjn tɒ bh kj dr dl ɒnbjɒjj kh kɒzbɒnh nbvt mj‌knnd xvɒhd bvd kh ɒnbjɒj frjb dl xvdʃɒn mj‌bɒʃnd، kh bh xvɒbhɒj xvjʃ kh hr kdɒm ɒz ɒjʃɒn bh hmsɒjh xvd bɒz mj‌ɡvjnd xjɒl dɒrnd kh ɒsm mrɒ ɒz jɒd ɣvm mn bbrnd، t͡ʃnɒnkh پdrɒn ɒjʃɒn ɒsm mrɒ brɒj bʔl frɒmvʃ krdnd آn nbj‌ɒj kh xvɒb djdh ɒst xvɒb rɒ bjɒn knd v آn kh klɒm mrɒ dɒrd klɒm mrɒ brɒstj bjɒn nmɒjd xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kɒh rɒ bɒ ɡndm t͡ʃh‌kɒrɒst؟» v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd «آjɒ klɒm mn msl آtʃ njst v mɒnnd t͡ʃkʃj kh sxrh rɒ xrdmj knd؟» lhzɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd «ɒjnk mn bh zd ɒjn ɒnbjɒjj kh klɒm mrɒ ɒz bkdjɡr mj‌dzdndhstm» v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd «ɒjnk mn bh zdɒjn ɒnbjɒ hstm kh zbɒn xvjʃ rɒ bkɒr brdh، mj‌ɡvjnd ɒv ɡfth ɒst» v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd «ɒjnk mn bh zd ɒjnɒn hstm kh bh xvɒbhɒj drvɣ nbvt mj‌knnd v آnhɒ rɒ bjɒn krdh، ɣvm mrɒ bh drvɣhɒ v xjɒlhɒj xvd ɡmrɒh mj‌nmɒjnd v mn ɒjʃɒn rɒ nfrstɒdm v mɒmvr nkrdm پs xdɒvndmj ɡvjd kh bh ɒjn ɣvm hjt͡ʃ nfʔ nxvɒhnd rsɒnjd v t͡ʃvn ɒjn ɣvm jɒ nbj jɒ kɒhnj ɒz tv svɒl nmvdh، ɡvjnd kh vhj xdɒvnd t͡ʃjst؟ پs bh ɒjʃɒn bɡv kdɒm vhj؟ ɣvl xdɒvnd ɒjn ɒst kh ʃmɒ rɒ trk xvɒhm nmvd v آn nbj jɒ kɒhn jɒɣvmj kh ɡvjnd vhj jhvh، hmɒnɒ br آn mrd v brxɒnh‌ɒʃ ʔɣvbt xvɒhm rsɒnjd v hr kdɒm ɒzʃmɒ bh hmsɒjh xvjʃ v hr kdɒm bh brɒdr xvdt͡ʃnjn ɡvjjd kh xdɒvnd t͡ʃh d͡ʒvɒb dɒdh ɒst vxdɒvnd t͡ʃh ɡfth ɒst؟ ljkn vhj jhvh rɒdjɡr zkr mnmɒjjd zjrɒ klɒm hr ks vhj ɒvxvɒhd bvd t͡ʃvnkh klɒm xdɒj hj jʔnj jhvh sbɒjvt xdɒj mɒ rɒ mnhrf sɒxth‌ɒjd v bh nbj t͡ʃnjn bɡv kh xdɒvnd bh tv t͡ʃh d͡ʒvɒb dɒdh vxdɒvnd bh tv t͡ʃh ɡfth ɒst؟ v ɒɡr mj‌ɡvjjd vhj jhvh، پs jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd t͡ʃvnkh ɒjn sxn jʔnj vhj jhvh rɒ ɡftjd bɒ آnkh nzd ʃmɒfrstɒdh، frmvdm kh vhj jhvh rɒ mɡvjjd، lhzɒ ɒjnk mn ʃmɒ rɒ bɒlkl frɒmvʃ xvɒhm krd v ʃmɒ rɒ bɒ آn ʃhrj kh bh ʃmɒ v bh پdrɒn dɒdh bvdm ɒz hzvr xvd dvr xvɒhm‌ɒndɒxtv ʔɒr ɒbdj v rsvɒjj d͡ʒɒvdɒnj rɒ kh frɒmvʃ nxvɒhd ʃd br ʃmɒ ʔɒrz xvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd» v ʔɒr ɒbdj v rsvɒjj d͡ʒɒvdɒnj rɒ kh frɒmvʃ nxvɒhd ʃd br ʃmɒ ʔɒrz xvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd» v bʔd ɒz آnkh nbvkdrsr پɒdʃɒh bɒbl jknjɒ ɒbn jhvjɒɣjm پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ rɒ bɒrvsɒj jhvdɒ v snʔtɡrɒn v آhŋrɒn ɒzɒvrʃljm ɒsjr nmvdh، bh bɒbl brd، xdɒvnd dv sbdɒnd͡ʒjr rɒ kh پjʃ hjkl xdɒvnd ɡzɒʃth ʃdh bvdbh mn nʃɒn dɒd kh dr sbd ɒvl، ɒnd͡ʒjr bsjɒr njkvmsl ɒnd͡ʒjr nvbr bvd v dr sbd djɡr ɒnd͡ʒjr bsjɒr bdbvd kh t͡ʃnɒn zʃt bvd kh nmj ʃvd xvrd vxdɒvnd mrɒ ɡft «ɒj ɒrmjɒ t͡ʃh mj‌bjnj؟» ɡftm «ɒnd͡ʒjr ɒmɒ ɒnd͡ʒjrhɒj njkv، bsjɒr njkv ɒst vɒnd͡ʒjrhɒj bd bsjɒr bd ɒst kh ɒz bdj آn rɒnmj tvɒn xvrd» v klɒm xdɒvnd bh mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «jhvh xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd msl ɒjn ɒnd͡ʒjrhɒj xvb hmt͡ʃnɒn ɒsjrɒn jhvdɒ rɒ kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz ɒjnd͡ʒɒ bh zmjn kldɒnjɒn brɒj njkvjj frstɒdm mnzvr xvɒhm dɒʃt v t͡ʃʃmɒn xvdrɒ br ɒjʃɒn bh njkvjj xvɒhm‌ɒndɒxt v ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh ɒjn zmjn bɒz xvɒhm آvrd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ bnɒ krdh، mnhdm nxvɒhm sɒxt v ɣrs nmvdh، rjʃh ɒjʃɒn rɒ nxvɒhm knd v dlj bh ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm bxʃjd tɒ mrɒ bʃnɒsnd kh mn jhvh hstm v ɒjʃɒn ɣvm mn xvɒhnd bvd v mn xdɒj ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm bvd، zjrɒ kh bh tmɒmj dl bsvj mn bɒzɡʃt xvɒhnd nmvd» xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «msl ɒnd͡ʒjrhɒj bdkh t͡ʃnɒn bd ɒst kh nmj tvɒn xvrd، ɒlbth hmt͡ʃnɒn sdɣjɒ پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ v rvsɒj ɒv v bɣjh ɒvrʃljm rɒ kh dr ɒjn zmjn bɒɣj‌mɒndh‌ɒnd v آnɒnj rɒkh dr msr sɒkn‌ɒnd tsljm xvɒhm nmvd vɒjʃɒn rɒ dr tmɒmj mmɒlk zmjn mɒjh tʃvjʃ vblɒ v dr tmɒmj mkɒn hɒjj kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ rɒndh‌ɒm ʔɒrv zrb‌ɒlmsl v msxrh v lʔnt xvɒhm sɒxtv dr mjɒn ɒjʃɒn ʃmʃjr v ɣht v vbɒ xvɒhm frstɒd tɒ ɒz zmjnj kh bh ɒjʃɒn v bh پdrɒn ɒjʃɒn dɒdh‌ɒm nɒbvd ʃvnd» v dr mjɒn ɒjʃɒn ʃmʃjr v ɣht v vbɒ xvɒhm frstɒd tɒ ɒz zmjnj kh bh ɒjʃɒn v bh پdrɒn ɒjʃɒn dɒdh‌ɒm nɒbvd ʃvnd» klɒmj kh dr sɒl t͡ʃhɒrm jhvjɒɣjm bn jvʃjɒ، پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ kh sɒl ɒvl nbvkdrsr پɒdʃɒh bɒbl bvd br ɒrmjɒ drbɒrh tmɒmj ɣvm jhvdɒ nɒzl ʃd v ɒrmjɒj nbj tmɒmj ɣvm jhvdɒ v d͡ʒmjʔ sknh ɒvrʃljm rɒ bh آn xtɒb krdh، ɡft «ɒz sɒl sjzdhm jvʃjɒ ɒbn آmvn پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ tɒ ɒmrvz kh bjst v sh sɒl bɒʃdklɒm xdɒvnd br mn nɒzl mj‌ʃd v mn bh ʃmɒ sxn mj‌ɡftm v sbh zvd brxɒsth، tklm mj‌nmvdm ɒmɒ ʃmɒ ɡvʃ nmj dɒdjd v xdɒvnd d͡ʒmjʔ bndɡɒn xvd ɒnbjɒ rɒ nzd ʃmɒ frstɒd v sbh zvdbrxɒsth، ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒrsɒl nmvd ɒmɒ nʃnjdjd vɡvʃ xvd rɒ frɒ ŋrftjd tɒ ɒstmɒʔ nmɒjjd vɡftnd hr jk ɒz ʃmɒ ɒz rɒh bd xvd v ɒʔmɒl ʃrjrxvjʃ bɒzɡʃt nmɒjjd v dr zmjnj kh xdɒvnd bh ʃmɒ v bh پdrɒn ʃmɒ ɒz ɒzl tɒ bh ɒbd bxʃjdh ɒst sɒkn bɒʃjd v ɒz ʔɣb xdɒjɒn ɣjr nrvjd v آnhɒrɒ ʔbɒdt v sd͡ʒdh mnmɒjjd v bh ɒʔmɒl dsthɒj xvd ɣzb mrɒ bh hjd͡ʒɒn mjɒvrjd mbɒdɒ br ʃmɒ blɒbrsɒnm» ɒmɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd «mrɒ ɒtɒʔt nnmvdjd blkh xʃm mrɒ bh ɒʔmɒl dsthɒj xvjʃ brɒj blɒj xvd bh hjd͡ʒɒn آvrdjd» bnɒbrɒjn jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «t͡ʃvnkh klɒm mrɒ nʃnjdjd، xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnk mn frstɒdh، tmɒmj ɣbɒjl ʃmɒl rɒ bɒ bndh xvd nbvkdrsr پɒdʃɒh bɒbl ɡrfth، ɒjʃɒn rɒ br ɒjn zmjn v br sɒknɒnʃ v br hmh ɒmt hɒjj kh bh ɒtrɒf آn mj‌bɒʃnd xvɒhm آvrd v آnhɒ rɒ bɒlkl hlɒk krdh، dhʃt v msxrh v xrɒbj ɒbdj xvɒhm sɒxt v ɒz mjɒn ɒjʃɒn آvɒz ʃɒdmɒnj v آvɒz xvʃj v sdɒj dɒmɒd v sdɒj ʔrvs vsdɒj آsjɒ v rvʃnɒjj t͡ʃrɒɣ rɒ nɒbvd xvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd v tmɒmj ɒjn zmjn xrɒb v vjrɒn xvɒhd ʃd v ɒjn ɣvm‌hɒ hftɒd sɒl پɒdʃɒh bɒbl rɒbndɡj xvɒhnd nmvd» v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh «bʔd ɒz ɒnɣzɒj hftɒd sɒl mn br پɒdʃɒh bɒbl v brآn ɒmt v br zmjn kldɒnjɒn ʔɣvbt ɡnɒh ɒjʃɒn rɒxvɒhm rsɒnjd v آn rɒ bh xrɒbj ɒbdj mbdl xvɒhm sɒxt v br ɒjn zmjn tmɒmj sxnɒn xvd rɒ kh bh zd آn ɡfth‌ɒm jʔnj hr‌t͡ʃh dr ɒjn ktɒb mktvb ɒst kh ɒrmjɒ آn rɒ drbɒrh d͡ʒmjʔ ɒmt‌hɒ nbvt krdh ɒst xvɒhm آvrd zjrɒ kh ɒmt hɒj bsjɒr v پɒdʃɒhɒn ʔzjm ɒjʃɒn rɒ bndh xvd xvɒhnd sɒxt v ɒjʃɒn rɒ mvɒfɣ ɒfʔɒl ɒjʃɒn v mvɒfɣ ɒʔmɒl dsthɒj ɒjʃɒn mkɒfɒt xvɒhm rsɒnjd» zɒnrv kh jhvh xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl bh mn t͡ʃnjn ɡft kh «kɒsh ʃrɒb ɒjn ɣzb rɒ ɒz dst mn bɡjr v آn rɒ bh d͡ʒmjʔ ɒmt hɒjj kh tv rɒ nzd آnhɒmj frstm bnvʃɒn tɒ bjɒʃɒmnd v bh‌sbb ʃmʃjrj kh mn dr mjɒn ɒjʃɒn mj‌frstm nvɒn ʃvnd v djvɒnh ɡrdnd» پs kɒsh rɒ ɒz dst xdɒvnd ɡrftm v bh d͡ʒmjʔ ɒmt hɒjj kh xdɒvnd mrɒ nzd آnhɒ frstɒdnvʃɒnjdm jʔnj bh ɒvrʃljm v ʃhrhɒj jhvdɒv پɒdʃɒhɒnʃ v srvrɒnʃ tɒ آnhɒ rɒ xrɒbj vdhʃt v sxrjh v lʔnt t͡ʃnɒnkh ɒmrvz ʃdh ɒst ɡrdɒnm v bh frʔvn پɒdʃɒh msr vbndɡɒnʃ v srvrɒnʃ v tmɒmj ɣvmʃ v bh d͡ʒmjʔ ɒmt hɒj mxtlf v bh d͡ʒmjʔ پɒdʃɒhɒn zmjn ʔvs v bh hmh پɒdʃɒhɒn zmjn flstjnjɒn jʔnj ɒʃɣlvn v ɣzh v ʔɣrvn v bɣjh ɒʃdvd vbh ɒdvm v mvآb v bnj ʔmvn v bh d͡ʒmjʔ پɒdʃɒhɒn svr v hmh پɒdʃɒhɒn sjdvn v bh پɒdʃɒhɒn d͡ʒzɒjrj kh bh آn trf drjɒ mj‌bɒʃnd v bh ddɒn v tjmɒ v bvz v bh hmɡɒnj kh ɡvʃh hɒj mvj xvd rɒ mj‌trɒʃnd v bh hmh پɒdʃɒhɒn ʔrb v bh d͡ʒmjʔ پɒdʃɒhɒn ɒmt hɒj mxtlf kh dr bjɒbɒn sɒknnd v bh d͡ʒmjʔ پɒdʃɒhɒn zmrj v hmh پɒdʃɒhɒn ʔjlɒm v hmh پɒdʃɒhɒn mɒdj v bh d͡ʒmjʔ پɒdʃɒhɒn ʃmɒl xvɒh ɣrjb v xvɒh bʔjd hr jk bɒ md͡ʒɒvr xvd vbh tmɒmj mmɒlk d͡ʒhɒn kh br rvj zmjnnd vپɒdʃɒh ʃjʃk bʔd ɒz ɒjʃɒn xvɒhd آʃɒmjd v bh ɒjʃɒn bɡv jhvh sbɒjvt xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd «bnvʃjd v mst ʃvjdv ɣj knjd tɒ ɒz ʃmʃjrj kh mn dr mjɒn ʃmɒmj frstm bjftjd v brnxjzjd v ɒɡr ɒz ɡrftn kɒsh ɒz dst tv v nvʃjdnʃ ɒbɒ nmɒjnd آŋɒh bh ɒjʃɒn bɡv jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒlbth xvɒhjd nvʃjd zjrɒ ɒjnk mn bh rsɒnjdn blɒ brɒjn ʃhrj kh bh ɒsm mn msmj ɒst ʃrvʔ xvɒhm nmvd v آjɒ ʃmɒ bɒlkl bj‌ʔɣvbt xvɒhjdmɒnd؟ bj‌ʔɣvbt nxvɒhjd mɒnd zjrɒ jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd kh mn ʃmʃjrj br d͡ʒmjʔ sɒknɒn d͡ʒhɒn mɒmvr mj‌knm پs tv bh tmɒmj ɒjn sxnɒn brɒjʃɒn nbvt krdh، bh ɒjʃɒn bɡv xdɒvnd ɒz ɒʔlj ʔljjn ɣrʃ mj‌nmɒjd v ɒz mkɒn ɣds xvjʃ آvɒz xvd rɒ mj‌dhd v bh zd mrtʔ xvjʃ bh ʃdt ɣrʃ mj‌nmɒjd v msl آnɒnj kh ɒŋvr rɒmj ɒfʃrnd، br tmɒmj sɒknɒn d͡ʒhɒn nʔrh mj‌znd، v sdɒ bh krɒnhɒj zmjn xvɒhd rsjd zjrɒxdɒvnd rɒ bɒ ɒmt‌hɒ dʔvj ɒst v ɒv br hrzj d͡ʒsd dɒvrj xvɒhd nmvd v ʃrjrɒn rɒ bh ʃmʃjr tsljm xvɒhd krd» ɣvl xdɒvnd ɒjn ɒst jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn ɡft «ɒjnk blɒ ɒzɒmt bh ɒmt srɒjt mj‌knd v bɒd ʃdjd ʔzjmj ɒzkrɒnhɒj zmjn brɒŋjxth xvɒhd ʃd» v dr آn rvz kʃtɡɒn xdɒvnd ɒz krɒn zmjn tɒ krɒn djɡrʃ xvɒhnd bvd brɒj ɒjʃɒn mɒtm nxvɒhndɡrft v ɒjʃɒn rɒ d͡ʒmʔ nxvɒhnd krd v dfn nxvɒhnd nmvd blkh br rvj zmjn srɡjn xvɒhndbvd ‌ɒj ʃbɒnɒn vlvlh nmɒjjd v frjɒd brآvrjd vɒj rvsɒj ɡlh bɣltjd zjrɒ kh ɒjɒm kʃth ʃdn ʃmɒ rsjdh ɒst v mn ʃmɒ rɒ پrɒkndh xvɒhm sɒxt v msl zrf mrɣvb xvɒhjd ɒftɒd vmld͡ʒɒ brɒj ʃbɒnɒn v mfr brɒj rvsɒj ɡlh nxvɒhdbvd hjn frjɒd ʃbɒnɒn v nʔrh rvsɒj ɡlh zjrɒxdɒvnd mrtʔhɒj ɒjʃɒn rɒ vjrɒn sɒxth ɒst v mrtʔhɒj slɒmtj bh‌sbb hdt xʃm xdɒvnd xrɒb ʃdh ɒstmsl ʃjr bjʃh xvdrɒ trk krdh ɒst zjrɒ kh zmjn ɒjʃɒn bh‌sbb xʃm hlɒk knndh v bh‌sbb hdt ɣzbʃ vjrɒn ʃdh ɒst msl ʃjr bjʃh xvdrɒ trk krdh ɒst zjrɒ kh zmjn ɒjʃɒn bh‌sbb xʃm hlɒk knndh v bh‌sbb hdt ɣzbʃ vjrɒn ʃdh ɒst dr ɒbtdɒj sltnt jhvjɒɣjm bn jvʃjɒپɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ ɒjn klɒm ɒz d͡ʒɒnb xdɒvndnɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd drshn xɒnh xdɒvnd bɒjst v bh zd tmɒmj ʃhrhɒj jhvdɒ kh bh xɒnh xdɒvnd brɒj ʔbɒdt mj‌آjnd hmh sxnɒnj rɒ kh tv rɒ ɒmr frmvdm kh bh ɒjʃɒn bɡvjj bɡv v sxnj km mkn ʃɒjdbʃnvnd v hr ks ɒz rɒh bd xvjʃ brɡrdd tɒ ɒzblɒjj kh mn ɣsd nmvdh‌ɒm kh bh‌sbb ɒʔmɒl bdɒjʃɒn bh ɒjʃɒn brsɒnm پʃjmɒn ɡrdm پs ɒjʃɒn rɒ bɡv xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd ɒɡr bh mn ɡvʃ ndhjd v dr ʃrjʔt mn kh پjʃ ʃmɒ nhɒdh‌ɒm slvk nnmɒjjd، v ɒɡr klɒm bndɡɒnm ɒnbjɒ rɒ kh mn ɒjʃɒn rɒ nzd ʃmɒ frstɒdm ɒtɒʔt nnmɒjjd bɒ آnkh mn sbh zvd brxɒsth، ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒrsɒl nmvdm ɒmɒʃmɒ ɡvʃ ŋrftjd آŋɒh ɒjn xɒnh rɒ msl ʃjlvh xvɒhm sɒxt v ɒjn ʃhr rɒ brɒj d͡ʒmjʔ ɒmt hɒj zmjn lʔnt xvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd» v kɒhnɒn v ɒnbjɒ v tmɒmj ɣvm، ɒjn sxnɒn rɒkh ɒrmjɒ dr xɒnh xdɒvnd ɡft ʃnjdnd v t͡ʃvn ɒrmjɒ ɒz ɡftn hr‌آnt͡ʃh xdɒvnd ɒv rɒ mɒmvr frmvdh bvd kh bh tmɒmj ɣvm bɡvjd fɒrɣ ʃd، kɒhnɒn vɒnbjɒ v tmɒmj ɣvm ɒv rɒ ɡrfth، ɡftnd «ɒlbth xvɒhj mrd t͡ʃrɒ bh ɒsm jhvh nbvt krdh، ɡftj kh ɒjn xɒnh msl ʃjlvh xvɒhd ʃd v ɒjn ʃhr xrɒb vɣjrmskvn xvɒhd ɡrdjd؟» پs tmɒmj ɣvm drxɒnh xdɒvnd nzd ɒrmjɒ d͡ʒmʔ ʃdnd v t͡ʃvn rvsɒj jhvdɒ ɒjn t͡ʃjzhɒ rɒ ʃnjdndɒz xɒnh پɒdʃɒh bh xɒnh xdɒvnd brآmdh، bh dhnh drvɒzh d͡ʒdjd xɒnh xdɒvnd nʃstnd پs kɒhnɒn v ɒnbjɒ، rvsɒ vtmɒmj ɣvm rɒ xtɒb krdh، ɡftnd «ɒjn ʃxs mstvd͡ʒb ɣtl ɒst zjrɒt͡ʃnɒnkh bh ɡvʃhɒj xvd ʃnjdjd bh xlɒf ɒjn ʃhr nbvt krd» پs ɒrmjɒ d͡ʒmjʔ srvrɒn v tmɒmj ɣvm rɒmxɒtb sɒxth، ɡft «xdɒvnd mrɒ frstɒdh ɒst tɒ hmh sxnɒnj rɒ kh ʃnjdjd bh zd ɒjn xɒnh v bh zd ɒjn ʃhr nbvt nmɒjm پs ɒlɒn rɒhhɒ v ɒʔmɒl xvd rɒ ɒslɒh nmɒjjd v ɣvl jhvh xdɒj xvd rɒ bʃnvjd tɒ xdɒvnd ɒz ɒjn blɒjj kh drbɒrh ʃmɒ frmvdh ɒst پʃjmɒn ʃvd ɒmɒ mn ɒjnk dr dst ʃmɒ hstm mvɒfɣ آnt͡ʃh dr nzrʃmɒ پsnd v svɒb آjd bʔml آrjd ljkn ɒɡr ʃmɒ mrɒ bh ɣtl rsɒnjd jɣjn bdɒnjd kh xvn bj‌ɡnɒhj rɒ br xvjʃtn v br ɒjn ʃhr v sɒknɒnʃ vɒrd xvɒhjd آvrd zjrɒ hɣjɣt xdɒvnd mrɒ nzdʃmɒ frstɒdh ɒst tɒ hmh ɒjn sxnɒn rɒ bh ɡvʃ ʃmɒ brsɒnm» آŋɒh rvsɒ v tmɒmj ɣvm bh kɒhnɒn v ɒnbjɒɡftnd kh «ɒjn mrd mstvd͡ʒb ɣtl njst zjrɒ bh ɒsm jhvh xdɒj mɒ bh mɒ sxn ɡfth ɒst» vbʔzj ɒz mʃɒjx zmjn brxɒsth، tmɒmj d͡ʒmɒʔt ɣvm rɒ xtɒb krdh، ɡftnd kh «mjkɒj mvrʃtj dr ɒjɒm hzɣjɒ پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ nbvt krd vbh tmɒmj ɣvm jhvdɒ tklm nmvdh، ɡft jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd kh shjvn rɒ msl mzrʔh ʃjɒr xvɒhnd krd v ɒvrʃljm xrɒb ʃdh، kvh ɒjn xɒnh bh blndjhɒj d͡ʒŋl mbdl xvɒhd ɡrdjd آjɒ hzɣjɒ پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ v tmɒmj jhvdɒ ɒv rɒkʃtnd؟ nj blkh ɒz xdɒvnd btrsjd v nzd xdɒvndɒstdʔɒ nmvd v xdɒvnd ɒz آn blɒjj kh drbɒrh ɒjʃɒn ɡfth bvd پʃjmɒn ɡrdjd پs mɒ blɒj ʔzjmj br d͡ʒɒn xvd vɒrd xvɒhjm آvrd» v njz ʃxsj ɒvrjɒ nɒm ɒbn ʃmʔjɒ ɒz ɣrjt jʔɒrjm bvd kh bh nɒm jhvh nbvt krd v ɒv bh zd ɒjn ʃhr v ɒjn zmjn mvɒfɣ hmh sxnɒn ɒrmjɒ nbvt krd v t͡ʃvn jhvjɒɣjm پɒdʃɒh v d͡ʒmjʔ ʃd͡ʒɒʔɒnʃ v tmɒmj srvrɒnʃ sxnɒn ɒv rɒʃnjdnd پɒdʃɒh ɣsd d͡ʒɒn ɒv nmvd v t͡ʃvn ɒvrjɒ ɒjn rɒ ʃnjd btrsjd v frɒr krdh، bh msr rft vjhvjɒɣjm پɒdʃɒh ksɒn bh msr frstɒd jʔnj ɒlnɒtɒn bn ʔkbvr v t͡ʃnd nfr rɒ bɒ ɒv bh msrfrstɒd v ɒjʃɒn ɒvrjɒ rɒ ɒz msr bjrvn آvrdh، ɒv rɒ nzd jhvjɒɣjm پɒdʃɒh rsɒnjdnd v ɒv rɒbh ʃmʃjr kʃth، bdn ɒv rɒ bh ɣbrstɒn ʔvɒm ɒlnɒs ɒndɒxtljkn dst ɒxjɣɒm bn ʃɒfɒn bɒ ɒrmjɒbvd tɒ ɒv rɒ bh‌dst ɣvm nsپɒrnd kh ɒv rɒ bh ɣtl rsɒnnd ljkn dst ɒxjɣɒm bn ʃɒfɒn bɒ ɒrmjɒbvd tɒ ɒv rɒ bh‌dst ɣvm nsپɒrnd kh ɒv rɒ bh ɣtl rsɒnnd dr ɒbtdɒj sltnt jhvjɒɣjm bn jvʃjɒپɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ ɒjn klɒm ɒz d͡ʒɒnb xdɒvndbr ɒrmjɒ nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft xdɒvnd bh mn t͡ʃnjn ɡft «bndhɒ v jvɣhɒ brɒj xvd bsɒz v آnhɒ rɒ brɡrdn xvd bɡzɒr v آnhɒ rɒ nzd پɒdʃɒh ɒdvm vپɒdʃɒh mvآb v پɒdʃɒh bnj ʔmvn v پɒdʃɒh svr vپɒdʃɒh sjdvn bh‌dst rsvlɒnj kh bh ɒvrʃljm nzd sdɣjɒ پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ xvɒhnd آmd bfrst vɒjʃɒn rɒ brɒj آɣɒjɒn ɒjʃɒn ɒmr frmvdh، bɡv jhvh sbɒjvt xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd bh آɣɒjɒn xvd bdjn mzmvn bɡvjjd mn d͡ʒhɒn vɒnsɒn v hjvɒnɒt rɒ kh br rvj zmjnnd bh ɣvt ʔzjm v bɒzvj ɒfrɒʃth xvd آfrjdm v آn rɒ bhr‌kh dr nzr mn پsnd آmd bxʃjdm v ɒlɒn mn tmɒmj ɒjn zmjnhɒ rɒ bh‌dst bndh xvd nbvkdnsr پɒdʃɒh bɒbl dɒdm v njz hjvɒnɒt shrɒ rɒ bh ɒv bxʃjdm tɒɒv rɒ bndɡj nmɒjnd v tmɒmj ɒmt‌hɒ ɒv rɒ vپsrʃ v پsr پsrʃ rɒ xdmt xvɒhnd nmvd tɒvɣtj kh nvbt zmjn ɒv njz brsd پs ɒmt hɒj bsjɒr v پɒdʃɒhɒn ʔzjm ɒv rɒ bndh xvd xvɒhndsɒxt v vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd kh hr ɒmtj vmmlktj kh nbvkdnsr پɒdʃɒh bɒbl rɒ xdmt nnmɒjnd v ɡrdn xvjʃ rɒ zjr jvɣ پɒdʃɒh bɒbl ŋzɒrnd xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh آn ɒmt rɒ bh ʃmʃjr v ɣht v vbɒ szɒ xvɒhm dɒd tɒ ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh‌dst ɒv hlɒk krdh bɒʃm v ɒmɒ ʃmɒ bh ɒnbjɒ vfɒlɡjrɒn v xvɒb bjnndɡɒn v sɒhrɒn v d͡ʒɒdvɡrɒn xvd kh bh ʃmɒ hrf mj‌znnd v mj‌ɡvjnd پɒdʃɒh bɒbl rɒ xdmt mnmɒjjd ɡvʃ mɡjrjd zjrɒ kh ɒjʃɒn brɒj ʃmɒ kɒzbɒnh nbvt mj‌knnd tɒ ʃmɒ rɒ ɒzzmjn ʃmɒ dvr nmɒjnd v mn ʃmɒ rɒ پrɒkndh sɒzm tɒhlɒk ʃvjd ɒmɒ آn ɒmtj kh ɡrdn xvd rɒ zjrjvɣ پɒdʃɒh bɒbl bɡzɒrnd v ɒv rɒ xdmt nmɒjndxdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh آn ɒmt rɒ dr zmjn xvdɒjʃɒn mɣjm xvɒhm sɒxt v آn rɒ zrʔ nmvdh، drآn sɒkn xvɒhnd ʃd» v bh sdɣjɒ پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ hmh ɒjn sxnɒn rɒbjɒn krdh، ɡftm «ɡrdnhɒj xvd rɒ zjr jvɣ پɒdʃɒh bɒbl bɡzɒrjd v ɒv rɒ v ɣvm ɒv rɒ xdmt nmɒjjd tɒzndh bmɒnjd t͡ʃrɒ tv v ɣvmt bh ʃmʃjr v ɣhtv vbɒ bmjrjd t͡ʃnɒnkh xdɒvnd drbɒrh ɣvmj kh پɒdʃɒh bɒbl rɒ xdmt nnmɒjnd ɡfth ɒst vɡvʃ mɡjrjd bh sxnɒn ɒnbjɒjj kh bh ʃmɒmj ɡvjnd پɒdʃɒh bɒbl rɒ xdmt nnmɒjjd zjrɒ kh ɒjʃɒn brɒj ʃmɒ kɒzbɒnh nbvt mj‌knnd zjrɒxdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd mn ɒjʃɒn rɒ nfrstɒdm blkh ɒjʃɒn bh ɒsm mn bh drvɣ nbvt mj‌knnd tɒ mn ʃmɒrɒ ɒxrɒd͡ʒ knm v ʃmɒ bɒ ɒnbjɒjj kh brɒj ʃmɒ nbvt mj‌nmɒjnd hlɒk ʃvjd» v bh kɒhnɒn v tmɒmj ɒjn ɣvm njz xtɒb krdh، ɡftm «xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɡvʃ mɡjrjd bh sxnɒn ɒnbjɒjj kh brɒj ʃmɒ nbvt krdh، mj‌ɡvjnd ɒjnk zrvf xɒnh xdɒvnd bʔd ɒz ɒndk mdtj ɒz bɒbl bɒz آvrdh xvɒhd ʃd zjrɒ kh ɒjʃɒn kɒzbɒnh brɒj ʃmɒ nbvt mj‌knnd ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɡvʃ mɡjrjdblkh پɒdʃɒh bɒbl rɒ xdmt nmɒjjd tɒ zndh bmɒnjd t͡ʃrɒ ɒjn ʃhr xrɒb ʃvd؟ v ɒɡr ɒjʃɒn ɒnbjɒ mj‌bɒʃnd v klɒm xdɒvnd bɒɒjʃɒn ɒst پs ɒlɒn ɒz jhvh sbɒjvt ɒstdʔɒbknnd tɒ zrvfj kh dr xɒnh xdɒvnd v dr xɒnh پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ v ɒvrʃljm bɒɣj ɒst bh bɒbl brdh nʃvd zjrɒ kh jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd drbɒrh stvnhɒ v drjɒt͡ʃh v پɒjh hɒv sɒjr zrvfj kh dr ɒjn ʃhr bɒɣj‌mɒndh ɒst، v nbvkdnsrپɒdʃɒh bɒbl آnhɒ rɒ hjnj kh jknjɒ ɒbn jhvjɒɣjm پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ v d͡ʒmjʔ ʃrfɒ jhvdɒ v ɒvrʃljm rɒ ɒzɒvrʃljm bh bɒbl brd ŋrft bh drstj kh jhvh sbɒjvt xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl drbɒrh ɒjn zrvfj kh drxɒnh xdɒvnd v dr xɒnh پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ v ɒvrʃljm bɒɣj‌mɒndh ɒst t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjdkh آnhɒ bh bɒbl brdh xvɒhd ʃd v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd tɒ rvzj kh ɒzɒjʃɒn tfɣd nmɒjm dr آnd͡ʒɒ xvɒhd mɒnd v bʔd ɒz آn آnhɒ rɒ bjrvn آvrdh، bh ɒjn mkɒn bɒz xvɒhm آvrd» kh آnhɒ bh bɒbl brdh xvɒhd ʃd v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd tɒ rvzj kh ɒzɒjʃɒn tfɣd nmɒjm dr آnd͡ʒɒ xvɒhd mɒnd v bʔd ɒz آn آnhɒ rɒ bjrvn آvrdh، bh ɒjn mkɒn bɒz xvɒhm آvrd» v dr hmɒn sɒl dr ɒbtdɒj sltnt sdɣjɒ پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ dr mɒh پnd͡ʒm ɒzsɒl t͡ʃhɒrm vɒɣʔ ʃd kh hnnjɒ ɒbn ʔzvr nbj kh ɒzd͡ʒbʔvn bvd mrɒ dr xɒnh xdɒvnd dr hzvr kɒhnɒn v tmɒmj ɣvm xtɒb krdh، ɡft «jhvh sbɒjvt xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl bdjn mzmvn tklm nmvdh v ɡfth ɒst mn jvɣ پɒdʃɒh bɒbl rɒ ʃksth‌ɒm bʔd ɒz ɒnɣzɒj dv sɒl mn hmh zrf hɒj xɒnh xdɒvnd rɒ kh nbvkdnsr پɒdʃɒh bɒbl ɒz ɒjn mkɒn ɡrfth، bh bɒbl brd bh ɒjnd͡ʒɒ bɒzxvɒhm آvrd v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd mn jknjɒ ɒbn jhvjɒɣjm پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ v d͡ʒmjʔ ɒsjrɒn jhvdɒ rɒ kh bh bɒbl rfth‌ɒnd bh ɒjnd͡ʒɒ bɒz xvɒhm آvrd zjrɒ kh jvɣ پɒdʃɒh bɒbl rɒ xvɒhm ʃkst» آŋɒh ɒrmjɒ nbj bh hnnjɒ nbj dr hzvrkɒhnɒn v tmɒmj ɣvmj kh dr xɒnh xdɒvnd hɒzrbvdnd ɡft؛ پs ɒrmjɒ nbj ɡft «آmjn xdɒvndt͡ʃnjn bknd v xdɒvnd sxnɒnt rɒ kh bh آnhɒ nbvt krdj ɒstvɒr nmɒjd v zrvf xɒnh xdɒvnd vd͡ʒmjʔ ɒsjrɒn rɒ ɒz bɒbl bh ɒjnd͡ʒɒ bɒz bjɒvrd ljkn ɒjn klɒm rɒ kh mn bh ɡvʃ tv v bh smʔ tmɒmj ɣvm mj‌ɡvjm bʃnv ɒnbjɒjj kh ɒz zmɒn ɣdjm ɣbl ɒzmn v ɣbl ɒz tv bvdh‌ɒnd drbɒrh zmjnhɒj bsjɒrvmmɒlk ʔzjm bh d͡ʒŋ v blɒ v vbɒ nbvt krdh‌ɒnd ɒmɒ آn nbj‌ɒj kh bslɒmtj nbvt knd ɒɡr klɒm آn nbj vɒɣʔ ɡrdd، آŋɒh آn nbj mʔrvf xvɒhd ʃdkh xdɒvnd fj ɒlhɣjɣh ɒv rɒ frstɒdh ɒst» پs hnnjɒ nbj jvɣ rɒ ɒz ɡrdn ɒrmjɒ nbj ɡrfth، آn rɒ ʃkst v hnnjɒ bh hzvr tmɒmj ɣvm xtɒb krdh، ɡft «xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd bhmjn tvr jvɣ nbvkdnsr پɒdʃɒh bɒbl rɒ bʔd ɒzɒnɣzɒj dv sɒl ɒz ɡrdn d͡ʒmjʔ ɒmt‌hɒ xvɒhm ʃkst» v ɒrmjɒ nbj bh rɒh xvd rft v bʔd ɒz آnkh hnnjɒ nbj jvɣ rɒ ɒz ɡrdn ɒrmjɒnbj ʃksth bvd klɒm xdɒvnd br ɒrmjɒ nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «brv v hnnjɒ nbj rɒ bɡv xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd jvɣhɒj t͡ʃvbj rɒ ʃkstj ɒmɒ bd͡ʒɒj آnhɒ jvɣhɒj آhnjn rɒ xvɒhj sɒxt zjrɒ kh jhvh sbɒjvt xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd mn jvɣj آhnjn br ɡrdn d͡ʒmjʔ ɒjn ɒmt‌hɒ nhɒdm tɒnbvkdnsr پɒdʃɒh bɒbl rɒ xdmt nmɒjnd پs ɒv rɒxdmt xvɒhnd nmvd v njz hjvɒnɒt shrɒ rɒ bh ɒv dɒdm» آŋɒh ɒrmjɒ nbj bh hnnjɒ nbj ɡft «ɒj hnnjɒ bʃnv xdɒvnd tv rɒ nfrstɒdh ɒst blkh tvɒjn ɣvm rɒ vɒmjdɒrj kh bh drvɣ tvkl nmɒjnd bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnk mn tv rɒɒz rvj ɒjn zmjn dvr mj‌ɒndɒzm v tv ɒmsɒl xvɒhj mrd zjrɒ kh sxnɒn ftnh ɒŋjz bh zdxdɒvnd ɡftj»پs dr mɒh hftm hmɒnsɒl hnnjɒ nbj mrd پs dr mɒh hftm hmɒnsɒl hnnjɒ nbj mrd ɒjn ɒst sxnɒn rsɒlh‌ɒj kh ɒrmjɒnbj ɒz ɒvrʃljm nzd bɣjh mʃɒjx ɒsjrɒn vkɒhnɒn v ɒnbjɒ v tmɒmj ɣvmj kh nbvkdnsr ɒzɒvrʃljm bh bɒbl bh ɒsjrj brdh bvd frstɒd bʔdɒz آnkh jknjɒ پɒdʃɒh v mlkh v xvɒd͡ʒh‌srɒjɒn vsrvrɒn jhvdɒ v ɒvrʃljm v snʔtɡrɒn v آhŋrɒn ɒz ɒvrʃljm bjrvn rfth bvdnd پs آn rɒ bh‌dst ɒlʔɒsh bn ʃɒfɒn v d͡ʒmrjɒ ɒbn hlɣjɒ kh sdɣjɒ پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ ɒjʃɒn rɒ nzd nbvkdnsrپɒdʃɒh bɒbl bh bɒbl frstɒd ɒrsɒl nmvdh ɡft «jhvh sbɒjvt xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl bh tmɒmj ɒsjrɒnj kh mn ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz ɒvrʃljm bh bɒbl bh ɒsjrj frstɒdm، t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd xɒnh‌hɒ sɒxth dr آnhɒ sɒkn ʃvjd v bɒɣhɒ ɣrs nmvdh، mjvh آnhɒ rɒ bxvrjd znɒn ɡrfth، پsrɒn v dxtrɒn bh hm rsɒnjd v znɒn brɒj پsrɒn xvd bɡjrjd vdxtrɒn xvd rɒ bh ʃvhr bdhjd tɒ پsrɒn vdxtrɒn bzɒjnd v dr آnd͡ʒɒ zjɒd ʃvjd v km ŋrdjd v slɒmtj آn ʃhr rɒ kh ʃmɒ rɒ bh آn bh ɒsjrj frstɒdh‌ɒm btlbjd v brɒjʃ nzd xdɒvnd msɒlt nmɒjjd zjrɒ kh dr slɒmtj آn ʃmɒ rɒ slɒmtj xvɒhd bvd zjrɒ kh jhvh sbɒjvt xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd mɡzɒrjd kh ɒnbjɒj ʃmɒkh dr mjɒn ʃmɒɒnd v fɒlɡjrɒn ʃmɒ ʃmɒ rɒ frjb dhnd v bh xvɒbhɒjj kh ʃmɒ ɒjʃɒn rɒ vɒmj dɒrjdkh آnhɒ rɒ bbjnnd، ɡvʃ mɡjrjd zjrɒ xdɒvndmj ɡvjd kh ɒjʃɒn brɒj ʃmɒ bh ɒsm mn kɒzbɒnh nbvt mj‌knnd v mn ɒjʃɒn rɒ nfrstɒdh‌ɒm vxdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd t͡ʃvn mdt hftɒd sɒl bɒbl sپrj ʃvd mn ɒz ʃmɒ tfɣd xvɒhm nmvd vsxnɒn njkv rɒ kh brɒj ʃmɒ ɡftm ɒnd͡ʒɒm xvɒhm dɒd؛ bh ɒjnkh ʃmɒ rɒ bh ɒjn mkɒn bɒz xvɒhm آvrd zjrɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd fkrhɒjj rɒ kh brɒj ʃmɒ dɒrm mj‌dɒnm kh fkrhɒj slɒmtj mj‌bɒʃd vnh bdj tɒ ʃmɒ rɒ dr آxrt ɒmjd bxʃm v mrɒxvɒhjd xvɒnd v آmdh، nzd mn tzrʔ xvɒhjd krdv mn ʃmɒ rɒ ɒd͡ʒɒbt xvɒhm nmvd v mrɒxvɒhjd tlbjd v t͡ʃvn mrɒ bh tmɒmj dl xvdd͡ʒstd͡ʒv nmɒjjd، mrɒ xvɒhjd jɒft v xdɒvndmj ɡvjd kh mrɒ xvɒhjd jɒft v ɒsjrɒn ʃmɒ rɒ bɒzxvɒhm آvrd v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh ʃmɒ rɒ ɒzd͡ʒmjʔ ɒmt‌hɒ v ɒz hmh mkɒn hɒjj kh ʃmɒ rɒ drآnhɒ rɒndh‌ɒm، d͡ʒmʔ xvɒhm nmvd v ʃmɒ rɒ ɒz d͡ʒɒjj kh bh ɒsjrj frstɒdh‌ɒm، bɒz xvɒhm آvrd ɒz آn rv kh ɡftjd xdɒvnd brɒj mɒ dr bɒbl ɒnbjɒ mbʔvs nmvdh ɒst «پs xdɒvnd bh پɒdʃɒhj kh br krsj dɒvdnʃsth ɒst v bh tmɒmj ɣvmj kh dr ɒjn ʃhrsɒknnd، jʔnj brɒdrɒn ʃmɒ kh hmrɒh ʃmɒ bh ɒsjrj nrfth‌ɒnd، t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd blj jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnk mn ʃmʃjr vɣht v vbɒ rɒ br ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm frstɒd v ɒjʃɒn rɒmsl ɒnd͡ʒjrhɒj bd kh آnhɒ rɒ ɒz bdj ntvɒn xvrd، xvɒhm sɒxt v ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh ʃmʃjr v ɣht vvbɒ tʔɒɣb xvɒhm nmvd v dr mjɒn d͡ʒmjʔ mmɒlk d͡ʒhɒn mʃvʃ xvɒhm sɒxt tɒ brɒj hmh ɒmt hɒjj kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ dr mjɒn آnhɒ rɒndh‌ɒm، lʔnt v dhʃt v msxrh v ʔɒr bɒʃnd t͡ʃvnkh xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd klɒm mrɒ kh bh vɒsth bndɡɒn xvd ɒnbjɒ nzd ɒjʃɒn frstɒdm nʃnjdnd bɒ آnkh sbh zvd brxɒsth، آn rɒ frstɒdm ɒmɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjdkh ʃmɒ nʃnjdjd v ʃmɒ‌ɒj d͡ʒmjʔ ɒsjrɒnj kh ɒz ɒvrʃljm bh bɒbl frstɒdm klɒm xdɒvnd rɒbʃnvjd jhvh sbɒjvt xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl drbɒrh ɒxɒb bn ɣvlɒjɒ v drbɒrh sdɣjɒ ɒbn mʔsjɒ kh brɒj ʃmɒ bh ɒsm mn kɒzbɒnh nbvt mj‌knnd، t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnk mn ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh‌dst nbvkdnsrپɒdʃɒh bɒbl tsljm xvɒhm krd v ɒv ɒjʃɒn rɒ drhzvr ʃmɒ xvɒhd kʃt v ɒz ɒjʃɒn brɒj tmɒmj ɒsjrɒn jhvdɒ kh dr bɒbl mj‌bɒʃnd lʔnt ɡrfth، xvɒhnd ɡft kh xdɒvnd tv rɒ msl sdɣjɒv ɒxɒb kh پɒdʃɒh bɒbl ɒjʃɒn rɒ dr آtʃ svzɒnjd، bɡrdɒnd t͡ʃvnkh ɒjʃɒn dr ɒsrɒئjl hmɒɣt nmvdnd v bɒ znɒn hmsɒjɡɒn xvd znɒ krdnd v bh ɒsm mn klɒmj rɒ kh bh ɒjʃɒn ɒmrnfrmvdh bvdm kɒzbɒnh ɡftnd v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh mn ʔɒrf v ʃɒhd hstm «v ʃmʔjɒj nhlɒmj rɒ xtɒb krdh، bɡv jhvh sbɒjvt xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl tklm nmvdh، t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒz آnd͡ʒɒjj kh tv rsɒjl bh ɒsm xvd nzd tmɒmj ɣvm kh dr ɒvrʃljm‌ɒnd v nzdsfnjɒ ɒbn mʔsjɒ kɒhn v nzd d͡ʒmjʔ kɒhnɒn frstɒdh، ɡftj kh xdɒvnd tv rɒ bh‌d͡ʒɒj jhvjɒdɒʔ kɒhn bh khɒnt nsb nmvdh ɒst tɒ brxɒnh xdɒvnd vklɒ bɒʃjd brɒj hr ʃxs md͡ʒnvn kh xvjʃtn rɒ nbj mj‌nmɒjd tɒ ɒv rɒ drkndh‌hɒ v znd͡ʒjrhɒ bbndj پs ɒlɒn t͡ʃrɒ ɒrmjɒʔnɒtvtj rɒ kh xvd rɒ brɒj ʃmɒ nbj mj‌nmɒjdtvbjx nmj knj؟ zjrɒ kh ɒv nzd mɒ bh bɒbl frstɒdh، ɡft kh ɒjn ɒsjrj btvl xvɒhdɒnd͡ʒɒmjd پs xɒnh‌hɒ bnɒ krdh، sɒkn ʃvjd v bɒɣhɒɣrs nmvdh، mjvh آnhɒ rɒ bxvrjd» v sfnjɒj kɒhn ɒjn rsɒlh rɒ bh ɡvʃ ɒrmjɒnbj xvɒnd پs klɒm xdɒvnd br ɒrmjɒ nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «nzd d͡ʒmjʔ ɒsjrɒn frstɒdh، bɡvkh xdɒvnd drbɒrh ʃmʔjɒj nhlɒmj t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd t͡ʃvnkh ʃmʔjɒ brɒj ʃmɒ nbvt mj‌knd vmn ɒv rɒ nfrstɒdh‌ɒm v ɒv ʃmɒ rɒ vɒmjdɒrd kh bh drvɣ ɒʔtmɒd nmɒjjd،bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnk mn br ʃmʔjɒj nhlɒmj v zrjt vj ʔɣvbt xvɒhm rsɒnjd v brɒjʃ ksj‌kh drmjɒn ɒjn ɣvm sɒkn bɒʃd، nxvɒhd mɒnd v xdɒvndmj ɡvjd ɒv آn ɒhsɒnj rɒ kh mn brɒj ɣvm xvdmj knm nxvɒhd djd، zjrɒ kh drbɒrh xdɒvnd sxnɒn ftnh ɒŋjz ɡfth ɒst» bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnk mn br ʃmʔjɒj nhlɒmj v zrjt vj ʔɣvbt xvɒhm rsɒnjd v brɒjʃ ksj‌kh drmjɒn ɒjn ɣvm sɒkn bɒʃd، nxvɒhd mɒnd v xdɒvndmj ɡvjd ɒv آn ɒhsɒnj rɒ kh mn brɒj ɣvm xvdmj knm nxvɒhd djd، zjrɒ kh drbɒrh xdɒvnd sxnɒn ftnh ɒŋjz ɡfth ɒst» klɒmj kh ɒz d͡ʒɒnb xdɒvnd br ɒrmjɒ nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «jhvh xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl tklm nmvdh، t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd tmɒmj sxnɒnj rɒ kh mn bh tv ɡfth‌ɒm، dr tvmɒrj bnvjs zjrɒxdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnk ɒjɒmj mj‌آjd kh ɒsjrɒn ɣvm xvd ɒsrɒئjl v jhvdɒ rɒ bɒz xvɒhm آvrd vxdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh zmjnj kh bh پdrɒn ɒjʃɒn dɒdh‌ɒm، bɒz xvɒhm rsɒnjd tɒ آn rɒ bh tsrf آvrnd» v ɒjn ɒst klɒmj kh xdɒvnd drbɒrh ɒsrɒئjl v jhvdɒ ɡfth ɒst zjrɒ xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «sdɒj ɒrtʔɒʃ ʃnjdjm xvf ɒst vslɒmtj nj svɒl knjd v mlɒhzh nmɒjjd kh آjɒzkvr ɒvlɒd mj‌zɒjd؟ پs t͡ʃrɒ hr mrd rɒ mj‌bjnm kh msl znj kh mj‌zɒjd dst xvd rɒ br kmrʃ nhɒdh v hmh t͡ʃhrh‌hɒ bh zrdj mbdl ʃdh ɒst؟» vɒj br mɒ zjrɒ kh آn rvz، ʔzjm ɒst v msl آn djɡrj njst v آn zmɒn tŋj jʔɣvb ɒst ɒmɒ ɒz آn nd͡ʒɒt xvɒhd jɒft v jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd «hr آjnh dr آn rvz jvɣ ɒv rɒ ɒz ɡrdnt xvɒhm ʃkst vbndhɒj tv rɒ xvɒhm ɡsjxt v ɣrjbɒn bɒr djɡrɒv rɒ bndh xvd nxvɒhnd sɒxt v ɒjʃɒn xdɒj xvd jhvh v پɒdʃɒh xvjʃ dɒvd rɒ kh brɒj ɒjʃɒn brmj ɒŋjzɒnm xdmt xvɒhnd krd پs xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh‌ɒj bndh mn jʔɣvb mtrs vɒj ɒsrɒئjl hrɒsɒn mbɒʃ zjrɒ ɒjnk mn tv rɒ ɒz d͡ʒɒj dvr v zrjt tv rɒ ɒz zmjn ɒsjrj ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm rhɒnjd v jʔɣvb mrɒd͡ʒʔt nmvdh، drrfɒhjt v ɒmnjt xvɒhd bvd v ksj ɒv rɒ nxvɒhdtrsɒnjd zjrɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd mn bɒ tv hstm tɒ tv rɒ nd͡ʒɒt‌bxʃm v d͡ʒmjʔ ɒmt‌hɒ rɒ kh tv rɒ drmjɒn آnhɒ پrɒkndh sɒxtm، tlf xvɒhm krd ɒmɒ tvrɒ tlf nxvɒhm nmvd، blkh tv rɒ bh ɒnsɒf tɒdjb xvɒhm krd v tv rɒ bj‌szɒ nxvɒhm ɡzɒʃt zjrɒ xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd d͡ʒrɒht tvʔlɒd͡ʒ nɒپzjr v zrbt tv mhlk mj‌bɒʃd ksj njst kh dʔvj tv rɒ fjsl dhd tɒ ɒltjɒm jɒbj vbrɒjt dvɒhɒj ʃfɒbxʃndh‌ɒj njst d͡ʒmjʔ dvstɒnt tv rɒ frɒmvʃ krdh، drbɒrh tvɒhvɒl پrsj nmj nmɒjnd zjrɒ kh tv rɒ bh sdmh dʃmn v bh tɒdjb bjrhmj bh‌sbb ksrt ʔsjɒnt v zjɒdtj ɡnɒhɒnt mbtlɒ sɒxth‌ɒm t͡ʃrɒ drbɒrh d͡ʒrɒht xvd frjɒd mj‌nmɒjj؟ drdtv ʔlɒd͡ʒ nɒپzjr ɒst bh‌sbb zjɒdtj ʔsjɒnt vksrt ɡnɒhɒnt ɒjn kɒrhɒ rɒ bh tv krdh‌ɒm «bnɒbrɒjn آnɒnj kh tv rɒ mj‌blʔnd، blʔjdh xvɒhnd ʃd v آnɒnj kh tv rɒ bh tŋ mj‌آvrnd، d͡ʒmjʔ bh ɒsjrj xvɒhnd rft v آnɒnj kh tv rɒtɒrɒd͡ʒ mj‌knnd، tɒrɒd͡ʒ xvɒhnd ʃd v hmh ɣɒrt knndɡɒnt rɒ bh ɣɒrt tsljm xvɒhm krd zjrɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd bh tv ʔɒfjt xvɒhm rsɒnjd v d͡ʒrɒhɒt tv rɒ ʃfɒ xvɒhm dɒd، ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht kh tv rɒ ʃhr mtrvk mj‌nɒmnd vmj ɡvjnd kh ɒjn shjvn ɒst kh ɒhdj drbɒrh آn ɒhvɒl پrsj nmj knd xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnk xjmh hɒj ɒsjrj jʔɣvb rɒ bɒzxvɒhm آvrd v bh msknhɒjʃ trhm xvɒhm nmvdv ʃhr br tlʃ bnɒ ʃdh، ɣsrʃ brhsb ʔɒdt xvd mskvn xvɒhd ʃd v tsbjh v آvɒzmtrbɒn ɒz آnhɒ bjrvn xvɒhd آmd v ɒjʃɒn rɒxvɒhm ɒfzvd v km nxvɒhnd ʃd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ mʔzzxvɒhm sɒxt v پst nxvɒhnd ɡrdjd vپsrɒnʃ mɒnnd ɒjɒm پjʃjn ʃdh، d͡ʒmɒʔtʃ drhzvr mn brɣrɒr xvɒhnd mɒnd v br d͡ʒmjʔ stmɡrɒnʃ ʔɣvbt xvɒhm rsɒnjd v hɒkm ɒjʃɒn ɒz xvd ɒjʃɒn bvdh، sltɒn ɒjʃɒn ɒz mjɒn ɒjʃɒn bjrvn xvɒhd آmd v ɒv rɒ mɣrb mj‌ɡrdɒnm tɒ nzdjk mn bjɒjd zjrɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kjst kh d͡ʒrɒt knd nzd mn آjd؟ v ʃmɒ ɣvm mn xvɒhjd bvd v mn xdɒj ʃmɒ xvɒhm bvd ɒjnk bɒd ʃdjd xdɒvnd bɒ hdt ɣzb vɡrdbɒdhɒj sxt bjrvn mj‌آjd kh br sr ʃrjrɒn hd͡ʒvm آvrdtɒ xdɒvnd tdbjrɒt dl xvd rɒbd͡ʒɒ njɒvrd v ɒstvɒr nfrmɒjd، hdt xʃm ɒvnxvɒhd brɡʃt dr ɒjɒm آxr ɒjn rɒ xvɒhjdfhmjd» tɒ xdɒvnd tdbjrɒt dl xvd rɒbd͡ʒɒ njɒvrd v ɒstvɒr nfrmɒjd، hdt xʃm ɒvnxvɒhd brɡʃt dr ɒjɒm آxr ɒjn rɒ xvɒhjdfhmjd» xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd «dr آn zmɒn mn xdɒj tmɒmj ɣbɒjl ɒsrɒئjl xvɒhm bvd v ɒjʃɒn ɣvm mn xvɒhnd bvd xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɣvmj kh ɒz ʃmʃjr rstnd dr bjɒbɒn fjz jɒftnd، hŋɒmj kh mn rftm tɒ brɒj ɒsrɒئjl آrɒmɡɒhj پjdɒ knm» xdɒvnd ɒz d͡ʒɒj dvr bh mn zɒhr ʃd vɡft «bɒ mhbt ɒzlj tv rɒ dvst dɒʃtm، ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht tv rɒ bh rhmt d͡ʒzb nmvdm ‌ɒj bɒkrh ɒsrɒئjl tv rɒ bɒr djɡr bnɒ xvɒhm krd v tv bnɒxvɒhj ʃd v bɒr djɡr bɒ dfhɒj xvd xvjʃtn rɒxvɒhj آrɒst v dr rɣshɒj mtrbɒn bjrvn xvɒhj آmd bɒr djɡr tɒkstɒnhɒ br kvhhɒj sɒmrh ɣrs xvɒhj nmvd v ɣrs knndɡɒn ɣrs nmvdh، mjvh آnhɒ rɒ xvɒhnd xvrd zjrɒ rvzj xvɒhd bvd kh djdh bɒnɒn br kvhstɒn ɒfrɒjm ndɒxvɒhnd krd kh brxjzjd v nzd jhvh xdɒj xvdbh shjvn brآjjm» zjrɒ xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «bh d͡ʒht jʔɣvb bh ʃɒdmɒnj trnm nmɒjjd v bh d͡ʒht sr ɒmt‌hɒ آvɒz ʃɒdj dhjd ɒʔlɒm nmɒjjdv tsbjh bxvɒnjd v bɡvjjd ɒj xdɒvnd ɣvm xvdbɣjh ɒsrɒئjl rɒ nd͡ʒɒt bdh ɒjnk mn ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒzzmjn ʃmɒl xvɒhm آvrd v ɒz krɒnh hɒj zmjn d͡ʒmʔ xvɒhm nmvd v bɒ ɒjʃɒn kvrɒn v lŋɒn vآbstnɒn v znɒnj kh mj‌zɒjnd bɒ hm ɡrvh ʔzjmj bh ɒjnd͡ʒɒ bɒz xvɒhnd آmd bɒ ɡrjh xvɒhnd آmd v mn ɒjʃɒn rɒ bɒ tzrʔɒt xvɒhm آvrd nzd nhrhɒj آb ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh rɒh sɒf kh dr آn nxvɒhnd lɣzjdrhbrj xvɒhm nmvd zjrɒ kh mn پdr ɒsrɒئjl hstm v ɒfrɒjm nxst zɒdh mn ɒst ‌ɒj ɒmt‌hɒ klɒm xdɒvnd rɒ bʃnvjd v dr mjɒn d͡ʒzɒjrbʔjdh ɒxbɒr nmɒjjd v bɡvjjd آnkh ɒsrɒئjl rɒپrɒkndh sɒxt ɒjʃɒn rɒ d͡ʒmʔ xvɒhd nmvd vt͡ʃnɒnkh ʃbɒn ɡlh xvd rɒ ŋɒh dɒrd ɒjʃɒn rɒmhɒfzt xvɒhd nmvd zjrɒ xdɒvnd jʔɣvb rɒ fdjh dɒdh v ɒv rɒ ɒz dst ksj‌kh ɒz ɒv ɣvj trbvd rhɒnjdh ɒst v ɒjʃɒn آmdh، br blndj shjvn xvɒhnd srɒjjd v nzd ɒhsɒn xdɒvndjʔnj nzd ɣlh v ʃjrh v rvɣn v ntɒd͡ʒ ɡlh v rmh rvɒn xvɒhnd ʃd v d͡ʒɒn ɒjʃɒn msl bɒɣ sjrآb xvɒhd ʃd v bɒr djɡr hrɡz ɣmɡjn nxvɒhndɡʃt آŋɒh bɒkrh‌hɒ bh rɣs ʃɒdj xvɒhndkrd v d͡ʒvɒnɒn v پjrɒn bɒ jkdjɡr zjrɒ kh mn mɒtm ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh ʃɒdmɒnj mbdl xvɒhm krd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz ɒlmj kh kʃjdh‌ɒnd tslj dɒdh، frhnɒk xvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd» v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd «d͡ʒɒn kɒhnɒn rɒɒz پjh tr v tɒzh xvɒhm sɒxt v ɣvm mn ɒz ɒhsɒn mn sjr xvɒhnd ʃd» xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «آvɒzj dr rɒmh ʃnjdh ʃd mɒtm v ɡrjh bsjɒr tlx kh rɒhjl brɒj frzndɒn xvd ɡrjh mj‌knd v brɒj frzndɒn xvd tslj nmj پzjrd zjrɒ kh njstnd» xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «آvɒz xvd rɒ ɒzɡrjh v t͡ʃʃmɒn xvjʃ rɒ ɒz ɒʃk bɒz dɒr zjrɒxdɒvnd mj‌frmɒjd kh brɒj ɒʔmɒl xvd ɒd͡ʒrt xvɒhj ɡrft v ɒjʃɒn ɒz zmjn dʃmnɒn mrɒd͡ʒʔt xvɒhnd nmvd v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh bh d͡ʒht ʔɒɣbt tv ɒmjd hst v frzndɒnt bh hdvdxvjʃ xvɒhnd brɡʃt bh thɣjɣ ɒfrɒjm rɒʃnjdm kh brɒj xvd mɒtm ɡrfth، mj‌ɡft mrɒtnbjh nmvdj v mtnbh ʃdm msl ɡvsɒlh‌ɒj kh kɒrآzmvdh nʃdh bɒʃd mrɒ brɡrdɒn tɒ brɡrdɒnjdh ʃvm zjrɒ kh tv jhvh xdɒj mn hstj bh drstj kh bʔd ɒz آnkh brɡrdɒnjdh ʃdm پʃjmɒn ɡʃtm v bʔd ɒz آnkh tʔljm jɒftm br rɒn xvd zdm xd͡ʒl ʃdm v rsvɒjj hm kʃjdm t͡ʃvnkh ʔɒrd͡ʒvɒnj xvjʃ rɒ mthml ɡrdjdm آjɒ ɒfrɒjm پsr ʔzjz mn jɒ vld ɒbthɒd͡ʒ mn ɒst؟ zjrɒ hr ɡɒh bh zd ɒv sxn mj‌ɡvjm ɒv rɒ tɒ bhɒl bh jɒdmj آvrm bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh ɒhʃɒj mn brɒj ɒv bh hrkt mj‌آjd v hr آjnh br ɒv trhm xvɒhm nmvd nʃɒnh‌hɒ brɒj xvd nsb nmɒ vʔlɒmt‌hɒ bh d͡ʒht xvjʃtn brپɒ kn v dl xvd rɒbsvj ʃɒh rɒh bh rɒhj kh rfth‌ɒj mtvd͡ʒh sɒz ɒj bɒkrh ɒsrɒئjl brɡrd v bh ɒjn ʃhrhɒj xvd mrɒd͡ʒʔt nmɒ ‌ɒj dxtr mrtd tɒ bh kj bh ɒjntrf v bh آntrf ɡrdʃ xvɒhj nmvd؟ zjrɒxdɒvnd ɒmr tɒzh‌ɒj dr d͡ʒhɒn ɒbdɒʔ nmvdh ɒst kh zn mrd rɒ ɒhɒth xvɒhd krd» jhvh sbɒjvt xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «bɒr djɡr hŋɒmj kh ɒsjrɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒbrmj ɡrdɒnm، ɒjn klɒm rɒ dr zmjn jhvdɒ vʃhrhɒjʃ xvɒhnd ɡft kh‌ɒj mskn ʔdɒlt vɒj kvh ɣdvsjt، xdɒvnd tv rɒ mbɒrk sɒzd vjhvdɒ v tmɒmj ʃhrhɒjʃ bɒ hm v flɒhɒn v آnɒnj kh bɒ ɡlh‌hɒ ɡrdʃ mj‌knnd، dr آn sɒkn xvɒhndʃd zjrɒ kh d͡ʒɒn xstɡɒn rɒ tɒzh sɒxth‌ɒm vd͡ʒɒn hmh mhzvnɒn rɒ sjr krdh‌ɒm» dr ɒjn hɒl bjdɒr ʃdm v ŋrjstm v xvɒbm brɒj mn ʃjrjn bvd ɒjnk xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd «ɒjɒmj mj‌آjd kh xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl v xɒndɒn jhvdɒ rɒ bh bzr ɒnsɒn vbzr hjvɒn xvɒhm kɒʃt v vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃdt͡ʃnɒnkh br ɒjʃɒn brɒj kndn v xrɒb nmvdn vmnhdm sɒxtn v hlɒk krdn v blɒ rsɒnjdn mrɒɣbt nmvdm، bh hmjntvr xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd brɒjʃɒn brɒj bnɒ nmvdn v ɣrs krdn mrɒɣb xvɒhm ʃd v dr آn ɒjɒm bɒr djɡr nxvɒhndɡft kh پdrɒn ɒŋvr trʃ xvrdnd v dndɒn پsrɒn knd ɡrdjd blkh hr ks bh ɡnɒh xvdxvɒhd mrd v hr‌kh ɒŋvr trʃ xvrd dndɒn vj knd xvɒhd ʃd» xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd «ɒjnk ɒjɒmj mj‌آjd kh bɒxɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl v xɒndɒn jhvdɒ ʔhd tɒzh‌ɒj xvɒhm bst nh msl آn ʔhdj kh bɒ پdrɒn ɒjʃɒn bstm dr rvzj kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ dstɡjrj nmvdm tɒ ɒz zmjn msr bjrvn آvrm zjrɒ kh ɒjʃɒn ʔhd mrɒ ʃkstnd، bɒ آnkh xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd mn ʃvhr ɒjʃɒn bvdm» ɒmɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd «ɒjnst ʔhdj kh bʔd ɒz ɒjn ɒjɒm bɒ xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl xvɒhm bst ʃrjʔt xvd rɒ dr bɒtn ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm nhɒd v آn rɒ br dl ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm nvʃt v mn xdɒj ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm bvd v ɒjʃɒn ɣvm mn xvɒhnd bvd v bɒr djɡr ksj bh hmsɒjh‌ɒʃ v ʃxsj bh brɒdrʃ tʔljm nxvɒhddɒd v nxvɒhd ɡft xdɒvnd rɒ bʃnɒs zjrɒxdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd d͡ʒmjʔ ɒjʃɒn ɒz xrd v bzrɡ mrɒ xvɒhnd ʃnɒxt، t͡ʃvnkh ʔsjɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒxvɒhm آmrzjd v ɡnɒh ɒjʃɒn rɒ djɡr bh jɒdnxvɒhm آvrd» xdɒvnd kh آftɒb rɒ bh d͡ʒht rvʃnɒjj rvz v ɣɒnvnhɒj mɒh v stɒrɡɒn rɒ brɒj rvʃnɒjj ʃb ɣrɒr dɒdh ɒst v drjɒ rɒ bh hrkt mj‌آvrd tɒɒmvɒd͡ʒʃ xrvʃ nmɒjnd v ɒsm ɒv jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌bɒʃd، t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd پs xdɒvndmj ɡvjd «ɒɡr ɒjn ɣɒnvnhɒ ɒz hzvr mn brdɒʃth ʃvd، آŋɒh zrjt ɒsrɒئjl njz zɒjl xvɒhnd ʃdtɒ bh hzvr mn ɣvm dɒjmj nbɒʃnd» xdɒvndt͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «ɒɡr آsmɒnhɒj ʔlvj پjmvdh ʃvnd v ɒsɒs zmjn sflj rɒ tfhs tvɒn nmvd، آŋɒh mn njz tmɒmj zrjt ɒsrɒئjl rɒ bh‌sbb آnt͡ʃh ʔml nmvdnd trk xvɒhm krd klɒm xdɒvnd ɒjn ɒst» jhvh mj‌ɡvjd «ɒjnk ɒjɒmj mj‌آjd kh ɒjn ʃhr ɒz brd͡ʒ hnnئjl tɒ drvɒzh zɒvjh bnɒ xvɒhdʃd v rjsmɒn kɒr bh xt mstɣjm tɒ tl d͡ʒɒrb bjrvn xvɒhd rft v bsvj d͡ʒvʔt dvr xvɒhdzdv tmɒmj vɒdj lɒʃhɒ v xɒkstr v tmɒmj zmjnhɒ tɒ vɒdj ɣdrvn v btrf mʃrɣ tɒ zɒvjh drvɒzh ɒsbɒn، brɒj xdɒvnd mɣds xvɒhd ʃd vbɒr djɡr tɒ ɒbdɒlɒbɒd kndh v mnhdm nxvɒhdɡrdjd» v tmɒmj vɒdj lɒʃhɒ v xɒkstr v tmɒmj zmjnhɒ tɒ vɒdj ɣdrvn v btrf mʃrɣ tɒ zɒvjh drvɒzh ɒsbɒn، brɒj xdɒvnd mɣds xvɒhd ʃd vbɒr djɡr tɒ ɒbdɒlɒbɒd kndh v mnhdm nxvɒhdɡrdjd» klɒmj kh dr sɒl dhm sdɣjɒ پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ kh sɒl hd͡ʒdhm nbvkdrsr bɒʃdɒz d͡ʒɒnb xdɒvnd br ɒrmjɒ nɒzl ʃd v dr آn vɣt lʃkr پɒdʃɒh bɒbl ɒvrʃljm rɒ mhɒsrh krdh bvdndv ɒrmjɒ nbj dr shn zndɒnj kh dr xɒnh پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ bvd mhbvs bvd zjrɒ sdɣjɒ پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ ɒv rɒ bh zndɒn ɒndɒxth، ɡft «t͡ʃrɒ nbvt mj‌knj v mj‌ɡvjj kh xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd ɒjnk mn ɒjn ʃhr rɒ bh‌dst پɒdʃɒh bɒbl tsljm xvɒhm krd v آn rɒ tsxjr xvɒhd nmvd vsdɣjɒ پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ ɒz dst kldɒnjɒn nxvɒhdrst blkh ɒlbth bh‌dst پɒdʃɒh bɒbl tsljm ʃdh، dhɒnʃ bɒ dhɒn vj tklm xvɒhd nmvd v t͡ʃʃmʃ t͡ʃʃm vj rɒ xvɒhd djd v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh sdɣjɒ rɒ bh bɒbl xvɒhd brd v ɒv dr آnd͡ʒɒ tɒ hjnj kh ɒz ɒv tfɣd nmɒjm xvɒhd mɒnd zjrɒ kh ʃmɒ bɒkldɒnjɒn d͡ʒŋ xvɒhjd krd، ɒmɒ kɒmjɒb nxvɒhjdʃd» v ɒrmjɒ ɡft «klɒm xdɒvnd br mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft ɒjnk hnmئjl پsr ʔmvj tv ʃlvm nzd tv آmdh، xvɒhd ɡft mzrʔh mrɒ kh dr ʔnɒtvt ɒst brɒj xvd bxr zjrɒ hɣ ɒnfkɒk ɒz آn tvɒst kh آn rɒ bxrj» پs hnmئjl پsr ʔmvj mn br vfɣ klɒm xdɒvnd nzd mn dr shn zndɒn آmdh، mrɒ ɡft «tmnɒ ɒjnkh mzrʔh mrɒ kh dr ʔnɒtvt dr zmjn bnjɒmjn ɒst bxrj zjrɒ kh hɣ ɒrsjt v hɣ ɒnfkɒkʃ ɒz آn tv ɒst پs آn rɒ brɒj xvdbxr» آŋɒh dɒnstm kh ɒjn klɒm ɒz d͡ʒɒnb xdɒvndɒst پs mrzʔh‌ɒj rɒ kh dr ʔnɒtvt bvd ɒzhnmئjl پsr ʔmvj xvd xrjdm v vd͡ʒh آn rɒhfdh msɣɒl nɣrh brɒj vj vzn nmvdm v ɣbɒlh rɒ nvʃth، mhr krdm v ʃɒhdɒn ɡrfth، nɣrh rɒ drmjzɒn vzn nmvdm پs ɣbɒlh hɒj xrjd rɒ hm آn rɒ kh brhsb ʃrjʔt v frjzh mxtvm bvd vhm آn rɒ kh bɒz bvd ɡrftm v ɣbɒlh xrjd rɒ bh bɒrvk bn njrjɒ ɒbn mhsjɒ bh hzvr پsr ʔmvj xvd hnmئjl v bh hzvr ʃhvdj kh ɣbɒlh xrjdrɒ ɒmzɒ krdh bvdnd v bh hzvr hmh jhvdjɒnj kh dr shn zndɒn nʃsth bvdnd، sپrdm v bɒrvk rɒ bh hzvr ɒjʃɒn vsjt krdh، ɡftm «jhvh sbɒjvt xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒjn ɣbɒlh‌hɒ jʔnj ɣbɒlh ɒjn xrjd rɒ، hm آn rɒ kh mxtvm ɒst v hm آn rɒ kh bɒz ɒst، bɡjrv آnhɒ rɒ dr zrf sfɒljn bɡzɒr tɒ rvzhɒj bsjɒrbmɒnd zjrɒ jhvh sbɒjvt xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd djɡrbɒrh xɒnh‌hɒ v mzrʔh‌hɒ vtɒkstɒnhɒ dr ɒjn zmjn xrjdh xvɒhd ʃd» v bʔd ɒz آnkh ɣbɒlh xrjd rɒ bh bɒrvk bn njrjɒ dɒdh bvdm، nzd xdɒvnd tzrʔ nmvdh، ɡftm «آh‌ɒj xdɒvnd jhvh ɒjnk tv آsmɒn v zmjn rɒbh ɣvt ʔzjm v bɒzvj blnd xvd آfrjdj vt͡ʃjzj brɒj tv mʃkl njst kh bh hzɒrɒn ɒhsɒn mj‌nmɒjj v ʔɣvbt ɡnɒh پdrɒn rɒ bh آɣvʃ پsrɒnʃɒn bʔd ɒz ɒjʃɒn mj‌rsɒnj xdɒj ʔzjm d͡ʒbɒr kh ɒsm tv jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌bɒʃd ʔzjm ɒlmʃvrt v ɣvj ɒlʔml kh t͡ʃʃmɒnt brtmɒmj rɒhhɒj bnj آdm mftvh ɒst tɒ bhr ks brhsb rɒhhɒjʃ v br vfɣ smrh ɒʔmɒlʃ d͡ʒzɒdhj kh آjɒt v ʔlɒmɒt dr zmjn msr v drɒsrɒئjl v dr mjɒn mrdmɒn tɒ ɒmrvz ɣrɒr dɒdj v ɒzbrɒj xvd msl ɒmrvz ɒsmj پjdɒ nmvdj vɣvm xvd ɒsrɒئjl rɒ bh آjɒt v ʔlɒmɒt v bh‌dst ɣvj v bɒzvj blnd v hjbt ʔzjm ɒz zmjn msrbjrvn آvrdj v ɒjn zmjn rɒ kh brɒj پdrɒn ɒjʃɒn ɣsm xvrdj kh bh ɒjʃɒn bdhj bh ɒjʃɒn dɒdj zmjnj kh bh ʃjr v ʃhd d͡ʒɒrj ɒst vɒjʃɒn t͡ʃvn dɒxl ʃdh، آn rɒ bh tsrf آvrdndklɒm tv rɒ nʃnjdnd v bh ʃrjʔt tv slvk nnmvdnd v bh آnt͡ʃh ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒmr frmvdj kh bknndʔml nnmvdnd bnɒbrɒjn tv tmɒm ɒjn blɒ rɒ bh ɒjʃɒn vɒrd آvrdj ɒjnk sŋrhɒ bh ʃhr rsjdh ɒst tɒ آn rɒ tsxjr nmɒjnd v ʃhr bh‌dst kldɒnjɒnj kh bɒ آn d͡ʒŋ mj‌knnd bh ʃmʃjr vɣht v vbɒ tsljm mj‌ʃvd v آnt͡ʃh ɡfth bvdj vɒɣʔ ʃdh ɒst v ɒjnk tv آn rɒ mj‌bjnj v tv‌ɒj xdɒvnd jhvh bh mn ɡftj kh ɒjn mzrʔh rɒ brɒj xvd bh nɣrh bxr v ʃɒhdɒn bɡjr v hɒl آnkh ʃhrbh‌dst kldɒnjɒn tsljm ʃdh ɒst» پs klɒm xdɒvnd bh ɒrmjɒ nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «ɒjnk mn jhvh xdɒj tmɒmj bʃr hstm آjɒhjt͡ʃ ɒmr brɒj mn mʃkl mj‌bɒʃd؟ bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnk mn ɒjn ʃhr rɒ bh‌dst kldɒnjɒn v bh‌dst nbvkdrsr پɒdʃɒh bɒbl tsljm mj‌knm v ɒv آn rɒ xvɒhd ɡrft vkldɒnjɒnj kh bɒ ɒjn ʃhr d͡ʒŋ mj‌knnd آmdh، ɒjn ʃhr rɒ آtʃ xvɒhnd zd v آn rɒ bɒ xɒnh hɒjj kh brbɒmhɒj آnhɒ brɒj bʔl bxvr‌svzɒnjdnd v hdɒjɒj rjxtnj brɒj xdɒjɒn ɣjr rjxth xʃm mrɒbhjd͡ʒɒn آvrdnd، xvɒhnd svzɒnjd zjrɒ kh bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl v bnj jhvdɒ ɒz tfvljt xvd پjvsth ʃrɒrt vrzjdnd v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl bh ɒʔmɒl dsthɒj xvd xʃm mrɒdɒjm bhjd͡ʒɒn آvrdnd zjrɒ kh ɒjn ʃhr ɒzrvzj kh آn rɒ bnɒ krdnd tɒ ɒmrvz bɒʔs hjd͡ʒɒn xʃm v ɣzb mn bvdh ɒst tɒ آn rɒ ɒz hzvrxvd dvr ɒndɒzm bh‌sbb tmɒm ʃrɒrtj kh bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl v bnj jhvdɒ، ɒjʃɒn v پɒdʃɒhɒn vsrvrɒn v kɒhnɒn v ɒnbjɒj ɒjʃɒn v mrdɒn jhvdɒ vsɒknɒn ɒvrʃljm krdh، xʃm mrɒ bhjd͡ʒɒn آvrdh‌ɒnd v پʃt bh mn dɒdh‌ɒnd v nh rv v hrt͡ʃnd ɒjʃɒn rɒ tʔljm dɒdm blkh sbh zvdbrxɒsth، tʔljm dɒdm ljkn ɡvʃ ŋrftnd vtɒdjb nپzjrftnd blkh rd͡ʒɒsɒt xvd rɒ drxɒnh‌ɒj kh bh ɒsm mn msmj ɒst brپɒ krdh، آn rɒnd͡ʒs sɒxtnd v mkɒn hɒj blnd bʔl rɒ kh drvɒdj ɒbn hnvm ɒst bnɒ krdnd tɒ پsrɒn v dxtrɒn xvd rɒ brɒj mvlk ɒz آtʃ bɡzrɒnnd ʔmlj kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒmr nfrmvdm v bh‌xɒtrm xtvr nnmvd kh t͡ʃnjn rd͡ʒɒsɒt rɒ bd͡ʒɒ آvrdh، jhvdɒ rɒ mrtkb ɡnɒh ɡrdɒnnd پs ɒlɒn ɒz ɒjn sbb jhvh xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl dr hɣ ɒjn ʃhr‌kh ʃmɒ drbɒrh‌ɒʃ mj‌ɡvjjd kh bh‌dst پɒdʃɒh bɒbl bh ʃmʃjr v ɣht v vbɒ tsljm ʃdh ɒst، t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd «ɒjnk mn ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz hmh zmjnhɒjj kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ dr xʃm v hdt v ɣzb ʔzjm xvd rɒndh‌ɒm d͡ʒmʔ xvɒhm krd vɒjʃɒn rɒ bh ɒjn mkɒn bɒz آvrdh، bh ɒtmjnɒn sɒkn xvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd v ɒjʃɒn ɣvm mn xvɒhnd bvd vmn xdɒj ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm bvd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ jk dl v jk trjɣ xvɒhm dɒd tɒ bh d͡ʒht xjrjt xvjʃ v پsrɒn xvjʃ kh bʔd ɒz ɒjʃɒn xvɒhndbvd hmjʃh ɒvɣɒt ɒz mn btrsnd v ʔhdd͡ʒɒvdɒnj bɒ ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm bst kh ɒz ɒhsɒn nmvdn bh ɒjʃɒn brnxvɒhm ɡʃt v trs xvd rɒdr dl ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm nhɒd tɒ ɒz mn dvrj nvrznd v ɒz ɒhsɒn nmvdn bh ɒjʃɒn msrvr xvɒhm ʃd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ brɒstj v bh tmɒmj dl v d͡ʒɒn xvddr ɒjn zmjn ɣrs xvɒhm nmvd zjrɒ xdɒvndt͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd bh nvʔj kh tmɒmj ɒjn blɒj ʔzjm rɒ bh ɒjn ɣvm rsɒnjdm، hmt͡ʃnɒn tmɒmj ɒhsɒnj rɒkh bh ɒjʃɒn vʔdh dɒdh‌ɒm bh ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm rsɒnjd v dr ɒjn zmjn kh ʃmɒ drbɒrh‌ɒʃ mj‌ɡvjjd kh vjrɒn v ɒz ɒnsɒn v bhɒjm xɒlj ʃdh v bh‌dst kldɒnjɒn tsljm ɡrdjdh ɒst، mzrʔh‌hɒ xrjdh xvɒhd ʃdv mzrʔh‌hɒ bh nɣrh xrjdh، ɣbɒlh hɒxvɒhnd nvʃt v mxtvm xvɒhnd nmvd v ʃɒhdɒn xvɒhnd ɡrft، dr zmjn bnjɒmjn v hvɒlj ɒvrʃljm v ʃhrhɒj jhvdɒ v dr ʃhrhɒj kvhstɒn v ʃhrhɒj hmvɒrj v ʃhrhɒj d͡ʒnvb zjrɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd ɒsjrɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ bɒz xvɒhm آvrd» v mzrʔh‌hɒ bh nɣrh xrjdh، ɣbɒlh hɒxvɒhnd nvʃt v mxtvm xvɒhnd nmvd v ʃɒhdɒn xvɒhnd ɡrft، dr zmjn bnjɒmjn v hvɒlj ɒvrʃljm v ʃhrhɒj jhvdɒ v dr ʃhrhɒj kvhstɒn v ʃhrhɒj hmvɒrj v ʃhrhɒj d͡ʒnvb zjrɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd ɒsjrɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ bɒz xvɒhm آvrd» v hŋɒmj kh ɒrmjɒ dr shn zndɒn mhbvs bvd klɒm xdɒvnd bɒr djɡr brɒv nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «xdɒvnd kh ɒjn kɒr rɒmj knd v xdɒvnd kh آn rɒ msvr sɒxth، msthkm mj‌sɒzd v ɒsm ɒv jhvh ɒst t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd mrɒ bxvɒn v tv rɒ ɒd͡ʒɒbt xvɒhm nmvdv tv rɒ ɒz t͡ʃjzhɒj ʔzjm v mxfj kh آnhɒ rɒndɒnsth‌ɒj mxbr xvɒhm sɒxt zjrɒ kh jhvh xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl drbɒrh xɒnh hɒj ɒjn ʃhr v drbɒrh xɒnh hɒj پɒdʃɒhɒn jhvdɒ kh dr mɣɒbl sŋrhɒ vmnd͡ʒnjɣhɒ mnhdm ʃdh ɒst، v mj‌آjnd tɒ bɒkldɒnjɒn mɣɒtlh nmɒjnd v آnhɒ rɒ bh lɒʃhɒj ksɒnj kh mn dr xʃm v ɣzb xvd ɒjʃɒn rɒ kʃtm پrmj knnd zjrɒ kh rvj xvd rɒ ɒz ɒjn ʃhr bh‌sbb tmɒmj ʃrɒrt ɒjʃɒn mstvr sɒxth‌ɒm ɒjnk bh ɒjn ʃhr ʔɒfjt v ʔlɒd͡ʒ bɒz xvɒhm dɒd v ɒjʃɒn rɒʃfɒ xvɒhm bxʃjd v frɒvɒnj slɒmtj v ɒmɒnt rɒbh ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm rsɒnjd v ɒsjrɒn jhvdɒ vɒsjrɒn ɒsrɒئjl rɒ bɒz آvrdh، ɒjʃɒn rɒ msl ɒvl bnɒxvɒhm nmvd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz tmɒmj ɡnɒhɒnj kh bh mn vrzjdh‌ɒnd، tɒhr xvɒhm sɒxt v tmɒmj tɣsjrhɒj ɒjʃɒn rɒ kh bdɒnhɒ br mn ɡnɒh vrzjdh vɒz mn td͡ʒɒvz krdh‌ɒnd، xvɒhm آmrzjd v ɒjn ʃhr brɒj mn ɒsm ʃɒdmɒnj v tsbjh v d͡ʒlɒl xvɒhd bvd nzd d͡ʒmjʔ ɒmt hɒj zmjn kh t͡ʃvn آnhɒhmh ɒhsɒnj rɒ kh bh ɒjʃɒn nmvdh bɒʃm bʃnvndxvɒhnd trsjd v bh‌sbb tmɒm ɒjn ɒhsɒn vtmɒmj slɒmtj kh mn bh ɒjʃɒn rsɒnjdh bɒʃm xvɒhnd lrzjd xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd kh drɒjn mkɒn kh ʃmɒ drbɒrh‌ɒʃ mj‌ɡvjjd kh آn vjrɒn v xɒlj ɒz ɒnsɒn v bhɒjm ɒst jʔnj dr ʃhrhɒj jhvdɒ v kvt͡ʃh hɒj ɒvrʃljm kh vjrɒn v xɒlj ɒzɒnsɒn v sɒknɒn v bhɒjm ɒst، dr آnhɒ آvɒzʃɒdmɒnj v آvɒz srvr v آvɒz dɒmɒd v آvɒz ʔrvs v آvɒz ksɒnj kh mj‌ɡvjnd jhvh sbɒjvt rɒtsbjh bxvɒnjd zjrɒ xdɒvnd njkv ɒst v rhmt ɒv tɒ ɒbdɒlɒbɒd ɒst، bɒr djɡr ʃnjdh xvɒhd ʃd vآvɒz آnɒnj kh hdɒjɒj tʃkr bh xɒnh xdɒvndmj آvrnd zjrɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd ɒsjrɒn ɒjn zmjn rɒ msl sɒbɣ bɒz xvɒhm آvrd jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd dr ɒjnd͡ʒɒjj kh vjrɒn v ɒz ɒnsɒn vbhɒjm xɒlj ɒst v dr hmh ʃhrhɒjʃ bɒr djɡrmskn ʃbɒnɒnj kh ɡlh‌hɒ rɒ mj‌xvɒbɒnnd xvɒhdbvd v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh dr ʃhrhɒj kvhstɒn v ʃhrhɒj hmvɒrj v ʃhrhɒj d͡ʒnvb v dr zmjn bnjɒmjn v dr hvɒlj ɒvrʃljm vʃhrhɒj jhvdɒ ɡvsfndɒn bɒr djɡr ɒz zjrdst ʃmɒrndɡɒn xvɒhnd ɡzʃt ɒjnk xdɒvndmj ɡvjd ɒjɒmj mj‌آjd kh آn vʔdh njkv rɒ kh drbɒrh xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl v xɒndɒn jhvdɒ dɒdm vfɒxvɒhm nmvd dr آn ɒjɒm v dr آn zmɒn ʃɒxh ʔdɒlt brɒj dɒvd xvɒhm rvjɒnjd v ɒv ɒnsɒf vʔdɒlt rɒ dr zmjn d͡ʒɒrj xvɒhd sɒxt drآn ɒjɒm jhvdɒ nd͡ʒɒt xvɒhd jɒft v ɒvrʃljm bh ɒmnjt mskvn xvɒhd ʃd v ɒsmj kh bh آn nɒmjdh mj‌ʃvd ɒjn ɒst jhvh sdɣjnv zjrɒ xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd kh ɒz dɒvd ksj‌kh brkrsj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl bnʃjnd km nxvɒhd ʃd v ɒz lɒvjɒn khnh ksj‌kh ɣrbɒnj hɒj svxtnj bɡzrɒnd v hdɒjɒj آrdj bsvzɒnd vzbɒjh hmjʃh zbh nmɒjd ɒz hzvr mn km nxvɒhdʃd» v klɒm xdɒvnd br ɒrmjɒ nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒɡr ʔhd mrɒ bɒ rvz vʔhd mrɒ bɒ ʃb bɒtl tvɒnjd krd kh rvz v ʃb drvɣt xvd nʃvd، آŋɒh ʔhd mn bɒ bndh mn dɒvdbɒtl xvɒhd ʃd tɒ brɒjʃ پsrj kh br krsj ɒvsltnt nmɒjd nbɒʃd v bɒ lɒvjɒn khnh kh xɒdm mn mj‌bɒʃnd t͡ʃnɒnkh lʃkr آsmɒn rɒ ntvɒn ʃmrdv rjɡ drjɒ rɒ ɣjɒs ntvɒn krd، hmt͡ʃnɒn zrjt bndh xvd dɒvd v lɒvjɒn rɒ kh mrɒ xdmt mj‌nmɒjnd zjɒdh xvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd» v klɒm xdɒvnd br ɒrmjɒ nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «آjɒ nmj bjnj kh ɒjn ɣvm t͡ʃh hrf mj‌znnd؟ mj‌ɡvjnd kh xdɒvnd آn dv xɒndɒn rɒ kh brɡzjdh bvd trk nmvdh ɒst پs ɣvm mrɒ xvɒrmj ʃmɒrnd kh dr nzr ɒjʃɒn djɡr ɣvmj nbɒʃnd xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒɡr ʔhd mn bɒ rvz vʃb nmj bvd v ɣɒnvn hɒj آsmɒn v zmjn rɒ ɣrɒrnmj dɒdm،آŋɒh njz zrjt jʔɣvb vnsl bndh xvd dɒvd rɒ trk mj‌nmvdm v ɒz zrjt ɒv br ɒvlɒdɒbrɒhjm v ɒshɒɣ v jʔɣvb hɒkmɒn nmj ɡrftm zjrɒ kh ɒsjrɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ bɒz xvɒhm آvrd v brɒjʃɒn trhm xvɒhm nmvd» آŋɒh njz zrjt jʔɣvb vnsl bndh xvd dɒvd rɒ trk mj‌nmvdm v ɒz zrjt ɒv br ɒvlɒdɒbrɒhjm v ɒshɒɣ v jʔɣvb hɒkmɒn nmj ɡrftm zjrɒ kh ɒsjrɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ bɒz xvɒhm آvrd v brɒjʃɒn trhm xvɒhm nmvd» klɒmj kh ɒz d͡ʒɒnb xdɒvnd dr hjnj kh nbvkdnsr پɒdʃɒh bɒbl v tmɒmj lʃkrʃ v d͡ʒmjʔ mmɒlk d͡ʒhɒn kh zjr hkm ɒvbvdnd v d͡ʒmjʔ ɣvmhɒ bɒ ɒvrʃljm v tmɒmj ʃhrhɒjʃ d͡ʒŋ mj‌nmvdnd br ɒrmjɒ nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «jhvh xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd brvv sdɣjɒ پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ rɒ xtɒb krdh، vj rɒ bɡvxdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd ɒjnk mn ɒjn ʃhr rɒ bh‌dst پɒdʃɒh bɒbl tsljm mj‌knm v ɒv آn rɒ bh آtʃ xvɒhd svzɒnjd v tv ɒz dstʃ nxvɒhj rst blkh ɒlbth ɡrftɒr ʃdh، bh‌dst ɒv tsljm xvɒhj ɡrdjd v t͡ʃʃmɒn tv t͡ʃʃmɒn پɒdʃɒh bɒbl rɒxvɒhd djd v dhɒnʃ bɒ dhɒn tv ɡftɡv xvɒhdkrd v bh bɒbl xvɒhj rft ljkn‌ɒj sdɣjɒپɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ klɒm xdɒvnd rɒ bʃnv xdɒvnddrbɒrh tv t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd bh ʃmʃjr nxvɒhj mrd، blkh bslɒmtj xvɒhj mrd v t͡ʃnɒnkh brɒj پdrɒnt jʔnj پɒdʃɒhɒn پjʃjn kh ɣbl ɒz tv bvdndʔtrjɒt svzɒnjdnd، hmt͡ʃnɒn brɒj tv xvɒhndsvzɒnjd v brɒj tv mɒtm ɡrfth، xvɒhnd ɡft آh‌ɒj آɣɒ zjrɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd mn ɒjn sxn rɒɡftm» پs ɒrmjɒ nbj tmɒmj ɒjn sxnɒn rɒ bh sdɣjɒپɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ dr ɒvrʃljm ɡft، hŋɒmj kh lʃkr پɒdʃɒh bɒbl bɒ ɒvrʃljm v bɒ hmh ʃhrhɒj bɒɣj jhvd jʔnj bɒ lɒkjʃ v ʔzjɣh d͡ʒŋ mj‌nmvdnd zjrɒ kh ɒjn dv ʃhr ɒz ʃhrhɒj hsɒrdɒr jhvdɒ fɣt bɒɣj‌mɒndh bvd klɒmj kh ɒzd͡ʒɒnb xdɒvnd br ɒrmjɒ nɒzl ʃd bʔd ɒz آnkh sdɣjɒ پɒdʃɒh bɒ tmɒmj ɣvmj kh dr ɒvrʃljm bvdnd ʔhd bst kh ɒjʃɒn bh آzɒdj ndɒ nmɒjnd، tɒ hr ks ɣlɒm ʔbrɒnj xvd v hr ks knjzʔbrɒnjh xvjʃ rɒ bh آzɒdj rhɒ knd v hjt͡ʃks brɒdr jhvd xvjʃ rɒ ɣlɒm xvd nsɒzd پs d͡ʒmjʔ srvrɒn v tmɒmj ɣvmj kh dɒxl ɒjn ʔhdʃdnd ɒtɒʔt nmvdh، hr kdɒm ɣlɒm xvd rɒ v hrkdɒm knjz xvjʃ rɒ bh آzɒdj rhɒ krdnd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ djɡr bh ɣlɒmj ŋɒh ndɒʃtnd blkh ɒtɒʔt nmvdh، ɒjʃɒn rɒ rhɒjj dɒdnd lkn bʔd ɒz آn ɒjʃɒn brɡʃth، ɣlɒmɒn v knjzɒn xvd rɒ kh bh آzɒdj rhɒ krdh bvdnd، bɒz آvrdnd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh ʔnf bh ɣlɒmj v knjzj xvd ɡrftnd v klɒm xdɒvnd br ɒrmjɒ ɒz d͡ʒɒnb xdɒvndnɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «jhvh xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd mn bɒ پdrɒn ʃmɒ dr rvzj kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒzzmjn msr ɒz xɒnh bndɡj bjrvn آvrdm ʔhd bsth، ɡftm kh dr آxr hr hft sɒl hr kdɒm ɒz ʃmɒbrɒdr ʔbrɒnj xvd rɒ kh xvjʃtn rɒ bh tv frvxth bɒʃd rhɒ knjd v t͡ʃvn tv rɒ ʃʃ sɒl bndɡj krdh bɒʃd، ɒv rɒ ɒz nzd xvd bh آzɒdj rhɒjj dhj ɒmɒ پdrɒn ʃmɒ mrɒ ɒtɒʔt nnmvdnd v ɡvʃ xvd rɒ bh mn frɒ ndɒʃtnd v ʃmɒ dr ɒjn zmɒn bɒzɡʃt nmvdjd v آnt͡ʃh dr nzr mn پsnd ɒst bd͡ʒɒ آvrdjd v hr ks brɒj hmsɒjh xvd bh آzɒdj ndɒ nmvdh، dr xɒnh‌ɒj kh bh ɒsm mn nɒmjdh ʃdh ɒst ʔhd bstjd ɒmɒ ɒz آn rvtɒfth ɒsm mrɒ bj‌ʔsmt krdjd v hr kdɒm ɒz ʃmɒ ɣlɒm xvdrɒ v hr ks knjz xvjʃ rɒ kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ brhsb mjl ɒjʃɒn bh آzɒdj rhɒ krdh bvdjd، bɒz آvrdjd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh ʔnf bh ɣlɒmj v knjzj xvdɡrftjd bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd t͡ʃvnkh ʃmɒ mrɒ ɒtɒʔt nnmvdjd v hr ks brɒj brɒdr xvd v hr kdɒm brɒj hmsɒjh xvjʃ bh آzɒdj ndɒ nkrdjd، ɒjnk xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd mn brɒj ʃmɒ آzɒdj rɒ bh ʃmʃjr v vbɒ v ɣht ndɒmj knm v ʃmɒ rɒ dr mjɒn tmɒmj mmɒlk d͡ʒhɒn mʃvʃ xvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd v tsljm xvɒhm krdksɒnj rɒ kh ɒz ʔhd mn td͡ʒɒvz nmvdnd v vfɒnnmvdnd bh klɒm ʔhdj kh bh hzvr mn bstnd، hjnj kh ɡvsɒlh rɒ dv پɒrh krdh، dr mjɒn پɒrh hɒjʃ ɡzɒʃtnd jʔnj srvrɒn jhvdɒ vsrvrɒn ɒvrʃljm v xvɒd͡ʒh‌srɒjɒn v kɒhnɒn vtmɒmj ɣvm zmjn rɒ kh dr mjɒn پɒrh hɒj ɡvsɒlh ɡzr nmvdnd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh‌dst dʃmnɒn ɒjʃɒn v bh‌dst آnɒnj kh ɣsd d͡ʒɒn ɒjʃɒn dɒrnd، xvɒhm sپrd v lɒʃhɒj ɒjʃɒn xvrɒk mrɣɒn hvɒv hjvɒnɒt zmjn xvɒhd ʃd v sdɣjɒ پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ v srvrɒnʃ rɒ bh‌dst dʃmnɒn ɒjʃɒn v bh‌dst آnɒnj kh ɣsd d͡ʒɒn ɒjʃɒn dɒrnd v bh‌dst lʃkr پɒdʃɒh bɒbl kh ɒz nzd ʃmɒ rfth‌ɒnd tsljm xvɒhm krdɒjnk xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd mn ɒmrmj frmɒjm v ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh ɒjn ʃhr bɒz xvɒhm آvrdv bɒ آn d͡ʒŋ krdh، آn rɒ xvɒhnd ɡrft v bh آtʃ xvɒhnd svzɒnjd v ʃhrhɒj jhvdɒ rɒ vjrɒn vɣjrmskvn xvɒhm sɒxt» ɒjnk xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd mn ɒmrmj frmɒjm v ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh ɒjn ʃhr bɒz xvɒhm آvrdv bɒ آn d͡ʒŋ krdh، آn rɒ xvɒhnd ɡrft v bh آtʃ xvɒhnd svzɒnjd v ʃhrhɒj jhvdɒ rɒ vjrɒn vɣjrmskvn xvɒhm sɒxt» klɒmj kh ɒz d͡ʒɒnb xdɒvnd dr ɒjɒm jhvjɒɣjm bn jvʃjɒ پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ br ɒrmjɒ nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «bh xɒnh rkɒbjɒn brv v bh ɒjʃɒn sxn ɡfth، ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh jkj ɒz hd͡ʒrh hɒj xɒnh xdɒvnd bjɒvr v bh ɒjʃɒn ʃrɒb bnvʃɒn» پs jɒznjɒ ɒbn ɒrmjɒ ɒbn hbsnjɒ v brɒdrɒnʃ vd͡ʒmjʔ پsrɒnʃ v tmɒmj xɒndɒn rkɒbjɒn rɒbrdɒʃtm، v ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh xɒnh xdɒvnd bh hd͡ʒrh پsrɒn hɒnɒn bn jd͡ʒdljɒ mrd xdɒ kh bh پhlvj hd͡ʒrh srvrɒn v bɒlɒj hd͡ʒrh mʔsjɒ ɒbn ʃlvm، msthfz آstɒnh bvd آvrdm v kvzh hɒj پr ɒzʃrɒb v پjɒlh‌hɒ پjʃ rkɒbjɒn nhɒdh، bh ɒjʃɒn ɡftm «ʃrɒb bnvʃjd» ɒjʃɒn ɡftnd «ʃrɒb nmj nvʃjm zjrɒ kh پdrmɒ jvnɒdɒb bn rkɒb mɒ rɒ vsjt nmvdh، ɡft kh ʃmɒ v پsrɒn ʃmɒ ɒbd ʃrɒb nnvʃjd v xɒnh hɒbnɒ mknjd v kʃt mnmɒjjd v tɒkstɒnhɒ ɣrs mknjd v آnhɒ rɒ ndɒʃth bɒʃjd blkh tmɒmj rvzhɒj xvd rɒ dr xjmh‌hɒ sɒkn ʃvjd tɒ rvzhɒj bsjɒrbh rvj zmjnj kh ʃmɒ dr آn ɣrjb hstjd zndh bmɒnjd v mɒ bh sxn پdr xvd jvnɒdɒb bn rkɒb v bhr‌t͡ʃh ɒv bh mɒ ɒmr frmvd ɒtɒʔt nmvdh، drtmɒmj ʔmr xvd ʃrɒb nnvʃjdjm، nh mɒ v nh znɒn mɒ v nh پsrɒn mɒ v nh dxtrɒn mɒ v xɒnh‌hɒ brɒj skvnt xvd bnɒ nkrdjm v tɒkstɒnhɒ v ɒmlɒk vmzrʔh‌hɒ brɒj xvd ŋrftjm v dr xjmh hɒsɒkn ʃdh، ɒtɒʔt nmvdjm v bh آnt͡ʃh پdr mɒjvnɒdɒb mɒ rɒ ɒmr frmvd ʔml nmvdjm ljkn vɣtj kh nbvkdrsr پɒdʃɒh bɒbl bh zmjn brآmdɡftjm bjɒjjd ɒz trs lʃkr kldɒnjɒn v lʃkrɒrɒmjɒn bh ɒvrʃljm dɒxl ʃvjm پs dr ɒvrʃljm sɒkn ʃdjm» پs klɒm xdɒvnd br ɒrmjɒ nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «jhvh sbɒjvt xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd brv v bh mrdɒn jhvdɒ v sɒknɒn ɒvrʃljm bɡv kh xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd آjɒ tɒdjb nmj پzjrjd vbh klɒm mn ɡvʃ nmj ɡjrjd؟ sxnɒn jvnɒdɒb bn rkɒb kh bh پsrɒn xvd vsjt nmvd kh ʃrɒb nnvʃjd ɒstvɒr ɡrdjdh ɒst v tɒ ɒmrvz ʃrɒb nmj nvʃnd v vsjt پdr xvd rɒ ɒtɒʔt mj‌nmɒjnd، ɒmɒ mn bh ʃmɒ sxn ɡftm v sbh zvdbrxɒsth، tklm nmvdm v mrɒ ɒtɒʔt nkrdjd vbndɡɒn xvd ɒnbjɒ rɒ nzd ʃmɒ frstɒdm v sbh zvdbrxɒsth، ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒrsɒl nmvdh، ɡftm hr kdɒm ɒzrɒh bd xvd bɒzɡʃt nmɒjjd v ɒʔmɒl xvd rɒɒslɒh knjd v xdɒjɒn ɣjr rɒ پjrvj mnmɒjjd vآnhɒ rɒ ʔbɒdt mknjd tɒ dr zmjnj kh bh ʃmɒ v bh پdrɒn ʃmɒ dɒdh‌ɒm sɒkn ʃvjd ɒmɒ ʃmɒ ɡvʃ ŋrftjd v mrɒ ɒtɒʔt nnmvdjd پs t͡ʃvnkh پsrɒn jvnɒdɒb bn rkɒb vsjt پdr xvjʃ rɒkh bh ɒjʃɒn frmvdh ɒst ɒtɒʔt mj‌nmɒjnd v ɒjn ɣvm bhr‌آnt͡ʃh ɒv bh ʃmɒɒmr frmvd ʔml nmvdjd،bnɒbrɒjn jhvh sbɒjvt xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒzjvnɒdɒb bn rkɒb ksj‌kh dɒjm bh hzvr mn bɒjstd km nxvɒhd ʃd» bnɒbrɒjn jhvh sbɒjvt xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn vɒrdbjɒvrm ɡvʃ bɡjrnd tɒ hr kdɒm ɒz ɒjʃɒn ɒz rɒh bdxvd bɒzɡʃt nmɒjnd v mn ʔsjɒn v ɡnɒhɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ bjɒmrzm» پs ɒrmjɒ bɒrvk bn njrjɒ rɒ xvɒnd v bɒrvk ɒzdhɒn ɒrmjɒ tmɒmj klɒm xdɒvnd rɒ kh bh ɒv ɡfth bxvɒn vnjz آnhɒ rɒ dr ɡvʃ tmɒmj jhvdɒ kh ɒz ʃhrhɒj xvd mj‌آjnd bxvɒn ʃɒjd kh bh hzvrxdɒvnd ɒstɣɒsh nmɒjnd v hr kdɒm ɒz ɒjʃɒn ɒz rɒh bd xvd bɒzɡʃt knnd zjrɒ kh xʃm v ɣzbj kh xdɒvnd drbɒrh ɒjn ɣvm nmj rvm» ljkn jrئjɒ bh vj ɡvʃ ndɒd v ɒrmjɒ rɒɡrfth ɒv rɒ nzd srvrɒn آvrd v srvrɒn brɒrmjɒ xʃm nmvdh، ɒv rɒ zdnd v ɒv rɒ dr xɒnh jvnɒtɒn kɒtb bh zndɒn ɒndɒxtnd zjrɒ آn rɒ zndɒn sɒxth bvdnd v t͡ʃvn
