mlkjɒsxnɒn ɒrmjɒ rɒ ʃnjdnd kh tmɒmj ɣvm rɒ bdɒnhɒmxɒtb sɒxth، ɡft «xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd hr‌kh dr ɒjn ʃhr bmɒnd ɒz ʃmʃjr vɣht v vbɒ xvɒhd mrd ɒmɒ hr‌kh nzd kldɒnjɒn bjrvn rvd xvɒhd zjst v d͡ʒɒnʃ brɒj ɒvɣnjmt ʃdh، zndh xvɒhd mɒnd xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒjn ʃhr ɒlbth bh‌dst lʃkr پɒdʃɒh bɒbl tsljm ʃdh، آn rɒ tsxjr xvɒhd nmvd» پs آn srvrɒn bh پɒdʃɒh ɡftnd «tmnɒ ɒjnkh ɒjn mrd kʃth ʃvd zjrɒ kh bdjn mnvɒl dsthɒj mrdɒn d͡ʒŋj rɒ kh dr ɒjn ʃhr bɒɣj‌mɒndh‌ɒnd vdsthɒj tmɒmj ɣvm rɒ sst mj‌knd t͡ʃvnkh msl ɒjn sxnɒn bh ɒjʃɒn mj‌ɡvjd zjrɒ kh ɒjn mrdslɒmtj ɒjn ɣvm rɒ nmj tlbd blkh zrr ɒjʃɒn rɒ» sdɣjɒ پɒdʃɒh ɡft «ɒjnk ɒv dr dst ʃmɒɒst zjrɒ پɒdʃɒh bh xlɒf ʃmɒ kɒrj nmj tvɒndkrd» پs ɒrmjɒ rɒ ɡrfth ɒv rɒ dr sjɒh t͡ʃɒl mlkjɒ ɒbn mlk kh dr shn zndɒn bvd ɒndɒxtnd v ɒrmjɒ rɒ bh rjsmɒnhɒ frv hʃtnd v dr آn sjɒh t͡ʃɒl آb nbvdljkn ɡl bvd v ɒrmjɒ bh ɡl frv rft v t͡ʃvn ʔbdmlk hbʃj kh jkj ɒz xvɒd͡ʒh‌srɒjɒn v drxɒnh پɒdʃɒh bvd ʃnjd kh ɒrmjɒ rɒ bh sjɒh t͡ʃɒl ɒndɒxtnd v bh drvɒzh bnjɒmjn nʃsth bvd، آŋɒh ʔbdmlk ɒz xɒnh پɒdʃɒh bjrvn آmd v bh پɒdʃɒh ʔrz krdh، ɡft «kh‌ɒj آɣɒjm پɒdʃɒh ɒjn mrdɒn dr آnt͡ʃh bh ɒrmjɒj nbj krdh v ɒv rɒ bh sjɒh t͡ʃɒl ɒndɒxth‌ɒnd ʃrjrɒnh ʔml nmvdh‌ɒnd v ɒvdr d͡ʒɒjj kh hst ɒz ɡrsŋj xvɒhd mrd zjrɒkh dr ʃhr hjt͡ʃ nɒn bɒɣj njst» پs پɒdʃɒh bh ʔbdmlk hbʃj ɒmr frmvdh، ɡft «sj nfr ɒz ɒjnd͡ʒɒ hmrɒh xvd brdɒr vɒrmjɒj nbj rɒ ɣbl ɒz آnkh bmjrd ɒz sjɒh t͡ʃɒl brآvr» پs ʔbdmlk آn ksɒn rɒ hmrɒh xvdbrdɒʃth، bh xɒnh پɒdʃɒh ɒz zjr xzɒnh dɒxl ʃd vɒz آnd͡ʒɒ پɒrt͡ʃh hɒj mndrs v rɣʔh hɒj پvsjdh ɡrfth، آnhɒ rɒ bɒ rjsmɒnhɒ bh sjɒh t͡ʃɒl nzd ɒrmjɒfrvhʃt v ʔbdmlk hbʃj bh ɒrmjɒ ɡft «ɒjn پɒrt͡ʃh hɒj mndrs v rɣʔh hɒj پvsjdh rɒzjr bɣl xvd dr zjr rjsmɒnhɒ bɡzɒr» v ɒrmjɒ t͡ʃnjn krd پs ɒrmjɒ rɒ bɒ rjsmɒnhɒ kʃjdh، ɒvrɒ ɒz sjɒh t͡ʃɒl brآvrdnd v ɒrmjɒ dr shn zndɒn sɒkn ʃd v sdɣjɒ پɒdʃɒh frstɒdh، ɒrmjɒ nbj rɒ bh mdxl svmj kh dr xɒnh xdɒvnd bvd nzd xvdآvrd v پɒdʃɒh bh ɒrmjɒ ɡft «mn ɒz tv mtlbj mj‌پrsm، ɒz mn t͡ʃjzj mxfj mdɒr» ɒrmjɒ bh sdɣjɒ ɡft «ɒɡr tv rɒ xbr dhm آjɒ hr آjnh mrɒnxvɒhj kʃt v ɒɡr tv rɒ پnd dhm mrɒ nxvɒhj ʃnjd؟» آŋɒh sdɣjɒ پɒdʃɒh brɒj ɒrmjɒ xfjh ɣsm xvrdh، ɡft «bh hjɒt jhvh kh ɒjn‌d͡ʒɒn rɒbrɒj mɒ آfrjd ɣsm kh tv rɒ nxvɒhm kʃt v tv rɒbh‌dst ɒjn ksɒnj kh ɣsd d͡ʒɒn tv dɒrnd tsljm nxvɒhm krd» پs ɒrmjɒ bh sdɣjɒ ɡft «jhvh xdɒj sbɒjvt xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒɡrhɣjɣt nzd srvrɒn پɒdʃɒh bɒbl bjrvn rvj، d͡ʒɒn tv zndh xvɒhd mɒnd v ɒjn ʃhr bh آtʃ svxth nxvɒhd ʃd blkh tv v ɒhl xɒnh ɒt zndh xvɒhjdmɒnd ɒmɒ ɒɡr nzd srvrɒn پɒdʃɒh bɒbl bjrvn nrvj ɒjn ʃhr bh‌dst kldɒnjɒn tsljm xvɒhdʃd v آn rɒ bh آtʃ xvɒhnd svzɒnjd v tv ɒz dst ɒjʃɒn nxvɒhj rst» ɒmɒ sdɣjɒ پɒdʃɒh bh ɒrmjɒ ɡft «mn ɒzjhvdjɒnj kh btrf kldɒnjɒn ʃdh‌ɒnd mj‌trsm، mbɒdɒ mrɒ bh‌dst ɒjʃɒn tsljm nmvdh، ɒjʃɒn mrɒtfzjh nmɒjnd» ɒrmjɒ dr d͡ʒvɒb ɡft «tv rɒtsljm nxvɒhnd krd mstdʔj آnkh klɒm xdɒvndrɒ kh bh tv mj‌ɡvjm ɒtɒʔt nmɒjj tɒ tv rɒ xjrjt ʃvd v d͡ʒɒn tv zndh bmɒnd ɒmɒ ɒɡr ɒz bjrvn rftn ɒbɒ nmɒjj klɒmj kh xdɒvnd br mn kʃf nmvdh ɒjn ɒst ɒjnk tmɒmj znɒnj kh dr xɒnh پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ bɒɣj‌mɒndh‌ɒnd nzd srvrɒn پɒdʃɒh bɒbl bjrvn brdh xvɒhnd ʃdv ɒjʃɒn xvɒhnd ɡft ɒsdɣɒj tv tv rɒ ɒɣvɒ nmvdh، br tv ɣɒlb آmdnd v ɒlɒn t͡ʃvnkh پɒjhɒj tv dr ld͡ʒn frv rfth ɒst ɒjʃɒn bh ʔɣb brɡʃth‌ɒnd v d͡ʒmjʔ znɒnt v frzndɒnt rɒnzd kldɒnjɒn bjrvn xvɒhnd brd v tv ɒz dst ɒjʃɒn nxvɒhj rst blkh bh‌dst پɒdʃɒh bɒbl ɡrftɒr xvɒhj ʃd v ɒjn ʃhr rɒ bh آtʃ xvɒhj svzɒnjd» آŋɒh sdɣjɒ bh ɒrmjɒ ɡft «znhɒr ksj ɒzɒjn sxnɒn ɒtlɒʔ njɒbd v nxvɒhj mrd v ɒɡrsrvrɒn bʃnvnd kh bɒ tv ɡftɡv krdh‌ɒm v nzdtv آmdh، tv rɒ ɡvjnd tmnɒ ɒjnkh mɒ rɒ ɒz آnt͡ʃh bh پɒdʃɒh ɡftj v آnt͡ʃh پɒdʃɒh bh tv ɡft ɒtlɒʔ dhj v آn rɒ ɒz mɒ mxfj ndɒrj tɒ tv rɒbh ɣtl nrsɒnjm، آŋɒh bh ɒjʃɒn bɡv mn ʔrz xvd rɒ bh hzvr پɒdʃɒh rsɒnjdm tɒ mrɒbh xɒnh jvnɒtɒn bɒz nfrstd tɒ dr آnd͡ʒɒnmjrm» پs d͡ʒmjʔ srvrɒn nzd ɒrmjɒ آmdh، ɒz ɒvsvɒl nmvdnd v ɒv mvɒfɣ hmh ɒjn sxnɒnj kh پɒdʃɒh bh ɒv ɒmr frmvdh bvd bh ɒjʃɒn ɡft پs ɒzsxn‌ɡftn bɒ ɒv bɒz ɒjstɒdnd t͡ʃvnkh mtlb fhmjdh nʃdv ɒrmjɒ dr shn zndɒn tɒ rvz fth ʃdn ɒvrʃljm mɒnd v hŋɒmj kh ɒvrʃljm ɡrfth ʃd dr آnd͡ʒɒ bvd v ɒrmjɒ dr shn zndɒn tɒ rvz fth ʃdn ɒvrʃljm mɒnd v hŋɒmj kh ɒvrʃljm ɡrfth ʃd dr آnd͡ʒɒ bvd dr mɒh dhm ɒz sɒl nhm sdɣjɒپɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ، nbvkdrsr پɒdʃɒh bɒbl bɒ tmɒmj lʃkr xvd br ɒvrʃljm آmdh، آn rɒ mhɒsrh nmvdnd v dr rvz nhm mɒh t͡ʃhɒrm ɒz sɒl jɒzdhm sdɣjɒ dr ʃhr rxnh krdnd v tmɒm srvrɒn پɒdʃɒh bɒbl dɒxl ʃdh، dr drvɒzh vstj nʃstnd jʔnj nrd͡ʒl ʃrɒsr v smd͡ʒrnbv vsrskjm rئjs xvɒd͡ʒh‌srɒjɒn v nrd͡ʒl ʃrɒsrrئjs md͡ʒvsjɒn v sɒjr srdɒrɒn پɒdʃɒh bɒbl vt͡ʃvn sdɣjɒ پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ v tmɒmj mrdɒn d͡ʒŋj ɒjn rɒ djdnd frɒr krdh، bh rɒh bɒɣ ʃɒh ɒz drvɒzh‌ɒj kh dr mjɒn dv hsɒr bvd dr vɣt ʃb ɒz ʃhrbjrvn rftnd v پɒdʃɒh bh rɒh ʔrbh rft vlʃkr kldɒnjɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ tʔɒɣb nmvdh، dr ʔrbh ɒrjhɒ bh sdɣjɒ rsjdnd v ɒv rɒ ɡrftɒr krdh، nzdnbvkdrsr پɒdʃɒh bɒbl bh rblh dr zmjn hmɒt آvrdnd v ɒv br vj ftvj dɒd v پɒdʃɒh bɒbl پsrɒn sdɣjɒ rɒ پjʃ rvjʃ dr rblh bh ɣtl rsɒnjd v پɒdʃɒh bɒbl tmɒmj ʃrfɒj jhvdɒ rɒkʃt v t͡ʃʃmɒn sdɣjɒ rɒ kvr krd v ɒv rɒ bh znd͡ʒjrhɒ bsth، bh bɒbl brd v kldɒnjɒn xɒnh پɒdʃɒh v xɒnh hɒj ɣvm rɒ bh آtʃ svzɒnjdnd vhsɒrhɒj ɒvrʃljm rɒ mnhdm sɒxtnd vnbvzrdɒn rئjs d͡ʒlɒdɒn، bɣjh ɣvm rɒ kh dr ʃhrbɒɣj‌mɒndh bvdnd v xɒrd͡ʒjn rɒ kh btrf ɒv ʃdh bvdnd v bɣjh ɣvm rɒ kh mɒndh bvdnd bh bɒbl bh ɒsjrj brd ljkn nbvzrdɒn rئjs d͡ʒlɒdɒn fɣjrɒn ɣvm rɒ kh t͡ʃjzj ndɒʃtnd dr zmjn jhvdɒ vɒɡzɒʃt vtɒkstɒnhɒ v mzrʔh‌hɒ dr آn rvz bh ɒjʃɒn dɒd v nbvkdrsr پɒdʃɒh bɒbl drbɒrh ɒrmjɒ bh nbvzrdɒn rئjs d͡ʒlɒdɒn ɒmr frmvdh، ɡft «ɒv rɒ bɡjr v bh ɒv njk mtvd͡ʒh ʃdh، hjt͡ʃ ɒzjtj bh vj mrsɒn blkh hr‌t͡ʃh bh tv bɡvjd brɒjʃ bʔml آvr» پs nbvzrdɒn rئjs d͡ʒlɒdɒn v nbvʃzbɒn rئjs xvɒd͡ʒh‌srɒjɒn v nrd͡ʒl ʃrɒsr rئjs md͡ʒvsjɒn v sɒjr srvrɒn پɒdʃɒh bɒbl frstɒdnd v ɒrsɒl nmvdh، ɒrmjɒ rɒ ɒz shn zndɒn brdɒʃtnd v ɒv rɒ bh d͡ʒdljɒ ɒbn ɒxjɣɒm bn ʃɒfɒn sپrdnd tɒ ɒv rɒ bh xɒnh xvd bbrd پs dr mjɒn ɣvm sɒkn ʃd v t͡ʃvn ɒrmjɒ hnvz dr shn zndɒn mhbvs bvd، klɒm xdɒvnd br vj nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «brvv ʔbdmlk hbʃj rɒ xtɒb krdh، bɡv jhvh sbɒjvt xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd ɒjnk klɒm xvd rɒ br ɒjn ʃhr bh blɒ vɒrd xvɒhm آvrd vnh bxvbj v dr آn rvz dr nzr tv vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd ljkn xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd mn tv rɒ dr آn rvznd͡ʒɒt xvɒhm dɒd v bh‌dst ksɒnj kh ɒz ɒjʃɒn mj‌trsj tsljm nxvɒhj ʃdzjrɒ xdɒvndmj ɡvjd kh tv rɒ ɒlbth rhɒjj xvɒhm dɒd v bh ʃmʃjr nxvɒhj ɒftɒd، blkh ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht kh br mn tvkl nmvdj d͡ʒɒn tv brɒjt ɣnjmt xvɒhd ʃd» zjrɒ xdɒvndmj ɡvjd kh tv rɒ ɒlbth rhɒjj xvɒhm dɒd v bh ʃmʃjr nxvɒhj ɒftɒd، blkh ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht kh br mn tvkl nmvdj d͡ʒɒn tv brɒjt ɣnjmt xvɒhd ʃd» klɒmj kh ɒz d͡ʒɒnb xdɒvnd br ɒrmjɒ nɒzl ʃd bʔd ɒz آnkh nbvzrdɒn rئjs d͡ʒlɒdɒn ɒv rɒ ɒz rɒmh rhɒjj dɒd v vj rɒ ɒz mjɒn tmɒmj ɒsjrɒn ɒvrʃljm v jhvdɒ kh bh bɒbl d͡ʒlɒj vtn mj‌ʃdnd v ɒv dr mjɒn ɒjʃɒn bh znd͡ʒjrhɒ bsth ʃdh bvd brɡrft v rئjs d͡ʒlɒdɒn ɒrmjɒ rɒ ɡrfth، vj rɒ ɡft «jhvh xdɒjt ɒjn blɒ rɒ drbɒrh ɒjn mkɒn frmvdh ɒst v xdɒvnd brhsb klɒm xvd ɒjn rɒ bh vɣvʔ آvrdh، ʔml nmvdh ɒst vhɒl ɒjnk mn ɒmrvz tv rɒ ɒz znd͡ʒjrhɒjj kh brdsthɒj tv ɒst rhɒ mj‌knm پs ɒɡr dr nzrt پsnd آjd kh bɒ mn bh bɒbl bjɒjj bjɒ v tv rɒ njkvmtvd͡ʒh xvɒhm ʃd v ɒɡr dr nzrt پsnd njɒjd kh hmrɒh mn bh bɒbl آjj، پs mjɒ v bdɒn kh tmɒmj zmjn پjʃ tv ɒst hr d͡ʒɒjj kh dr nzrt xvʃ v پsnd آjd kh brvj bh آnd͡ʒɒ brv» v vɣtj kh ɒv hnvz brŋʃth bvd vj rɒɡft «nzd d͡ʒdljɒ ɒbn ɒxjɣɒm bn ʃɒfɒn kh پɒdʃɒh bɒbl ɒv rɒ br ʃhrhɒj jhvdɒ nsb krdh ɒst brɡrd v nzd ɒv dr mjɒn ɣvm sɒkn ʃv jɒ hr d͡ʒɒjj kh mj‌xvɒhj brvj brv» پs rئjs d͡ʒlɒdɒn ɒvrɒ tvʃh rɒh v hdjh dɒd v ɒv rɒ rhɒ nmvd v ɒrmjɒnzd d͡ʒdljɒ ɒbn ɒxjɣɒm bh msfh آmdh، nzd ɒv dr mjɒn ɣvmj kh dr zmjn bɒɣj‌mɒndh bvdnd sɒkn ʃd v t͡ʃvn tmɒmj srdɒrɒn lʃkr kh dr shrɒbvdnd v mrdɒn ɒjʃɒn ʃnjdnd kh پɒdʃɒh bɒbl d͡ʒdljɒɒbn ɒxjɣɒm rɒ br zmjn nsb krdh v mrdɒn v znɒn vɒtfɒl v fɣjrɒn zmjn rɒ kh bh bɒbl brdh nʃdh bvdndbh ɒv sپrdh ɒst، آŋɒh ɒjʃɒn nzd d͡ʒdljɒ bh msfh آmdnd jʔnj ɒsmɒʔjl bn ntnjɒ v jvhɒnɒn vjvnɒtɒn پsrɒn ɣɒrjh v srɒjɒ ɒbn tnhvmt vپsrɒn ʔjfɒj ntvfɒtj v jznjɒ پsr mʔkɒtj ɒjʃɒn v mrdɒn ɒjʃɒn v d͡ʒdljɒ ɒbn ɒxjɣɒm bn ʃɒfɒn brɒj ɒjʃɒn v ksɒn ɒjʃɒn ɣsm xvrdh، ɡft «ɒzxdmt nmvdn bh kldɒnjɒn mtrsjd dr zmjn sɒkn ʃvjd v پɒdʃɒh bɒbl rɒ bndɡj nmɒjjd v brɒj ʃmɒnjkv xvɒhd ʃd v ɒmɒ mn ɒjnk dr msfh sɒkn xvɒhm ʃd tɒ bh hzvr kldɒnjɒnj kh nzd mɒ آjndhɒzr ʃvm v ʃmɒ ʃrɒb v mjvh d͡ʒɒt v rvɣn d͡ʒmʔ krdh، dr zrvf xvd bɡzɒrjd v drʃhrhɒjj kh brɒj xvd ɡrfth‌ɒjd sɒkn bɒʃjd» v njz t͡ʃvn tmɒmj jhvdjɒnj kh dr mvآb vdr mjɒn bnj ʔmvn v dr ɒdvm v sɒjr vlɒjɒt bvdndʃnjdnd kh پɒdʃɒh bɒbl v bɣjh‌ɒj ɒz jhvd rɒvɒɡzɒʃth v d͡ʒdljɒ ɒbn ɒxjɣɒm bn ʃɒfɒn rɒ br ɒjʃɒn ɡmɒʃth ɒst، آŋɒh d͡ʒmjʔ jhvdjɒn ɒz hrd͡ʒɒjj kh پrɒkndh ʃdh bvdnd mrɒd͡ʒʔt krdnd v bh zmjn jhvdɒ nzd d͡ʒdljɒ bh msfh آmdnd v ʃrɒb vmjvh d͡ʒɒt bsjɒr v frɒvɒn d͡ʒmʔ nmvdnd v jvhɒnɒn bn ɣɒrjh v hmh srdɒrɒn lʃkrj kh dr bjɒbɒn bvdnd nzd d͡ʒdljɒ bh msfh آmdnd، v ɒv rɒ ɡftnd «آjɒ hjt͡ʃ mj‌dɒnj kh bʔljs پɒdʃɒh bnj ʔmvn ɒsmɒʔjl bn ntnjɒ rɒfrstɒdh ɒst tɒ tv rɒ bkʃd؟» ɒmɒ d͡ʒdljɒ ɒbn ɒxjɣɒm ɒjʃɒn rɒ bɒvr nkrd پs jvhɒnɒn bn ɣɒrjh d͡ʒdljɒ rɒ dr msfh xfjh xtɒb krdh، ɡft «ɒzn bdh kh brvm v ɒsmɒʔjl bn ntnjɒ rɒbkʃm v ksj آɡɒh nxvɒhd ʃd t͡ʃrɒ ɒv tv rɒbkʃd v d͡ʒmjʔ jhvdjɒnj kh nzd tv frɒhm آmdh ɒndپrɒkndh ʃvnd v bɣjh jhvdjɒn tlf ɡrdnd؟»ɒmɒd͡ʒdljɒ ɒbn ɒxjɣɒm bh jvhɒnɒn bn ɣɒrjh ɡft «ɒjn kɒr rɒ mkn zjrɒ kh drbɒrh ɒsmɒʔjl drvɣ mj‌ɡvjj» ɒmɒd͡ʒdljɒ ɒbn ɒxjɣɒm bh jvhɒnɒn bn ɣɒrjh ɡft «ɒjn kɒr rɒ mkn zjrɒ kh drbɒrh ɒsmɒʔjl drvɣ mj‌ɡvjj» v dr mɒh hftm vɒɣʔ ʃd kh ɒsmɒʔjl bn ntnjɒ ɒbn ɒljʃɒmɒʔ kh ɒz nsl پɒdʃɒhɒn bvd bɒ bʔzj ɒz rvsɒj پɒdʃɒh v dh nfr hmrɒhʃ nzd d͡ʒdljɒ ɒbn ɒxjɣɒm bh msfh آmdnd v آnd͡ʒɒ drmsfh bɒ hm nɒn xvrdnd v ɒsmɒʔjl bn ntnjɒ vآn dh nfr kh hmrɒhʃ bvdnd brxɒsth، d͡ʒdljɒ ɒbn ɒxjɣɒm bn ʃɒfɒn rɒ bh ʃmʃjr zdnd v ɒv rɒ kh پɒdʃɒh bɒbl bh hkvmt zmjn nsb krdh bvdkʃt v ɒsmɒʔjl tmɒmj jhvdjɒnj rɒ kh hmrɒh ɒv jʔnj bɒ d͡ʒdljɒ dr msfh bvdnd v kldɒnjɒnj rɒ kh dr آnd͡ʒɒ jɒft ʃdnd v mrdɒn d͡ʒŋj rɒ kʃt v dr rvz dvm bʔd ɒz آnkh d͡ʒdljɒ rɒ kʃth bvdv ksj ɒz آn ɒtlɒʔ njɒfth bvd، hʃtɒd nfr bɒ rjʃ trɒʃjdh v ɡrjbɒn drjdh v bdn xrɒʃjdh hdɒjɒ vbxvr bɒ xvd آvrdh، ɒz ʃkjm v ʃjlvh v sɒmrh آmdnd tɒ bh xɒnh xdɒvnd bbrnd v ɒsmɒʔjl bn ntnjɒ bh ɒstɣbɒl ɒjʃɒn ɒz msfh bjrvn آmd v drrftn ɡrjh mj‌krd v t͡ʃvn bh ɒjʃɒn rsjd ɡft «nzd d͡ʒdljɒ ɒbn ɒxjɣɒm bjɒjjd» v hŋɒmj kh ɒjʃɒn bh mjɒn ʃhr rsjdnd ɒsmɒʔjl bn ntnjɒ vksɒnj kh hmrɒhʃ bvdnd ɒjʃɒn rɒ kʃth، drhfrh ɒndɒxtnd ɒmɒ dr mjɒn ɒjʃɒn dh nfr پjdɒʃdnd kh bh ɒsmɒʔjl ɡftnd «mɒ rɒ mkʃ zjrɒ kh mɒ rɒ zxjrh‌ɒj ɒz ɡndm v d͡ʒv v rvɣn v ʔsl drshrɒ mj‌bɒʃd» پs ɒjʃɒn rɒ vɒɡzɒʃth، dr mjɒn brɒdrɒn ɒjʃɒn nkʃt v hfrh‌ɒj kh ɒsmɒʔjl bdnhɒj hmh ksɒnj rɒ kh bh‌sbb d͡ʒdljɒ kʃth dr آn ɒndɒxth bvd hmɒn ɒst kh آsɒ پɒdʃɒh bh‌sbb bʔʃɒ پɒdʃɒh ɒsrɒئjl sɒxth bvd v ɒsmɒʔjl bn ntnjɒ آn rɒ ɒz kʃtɡɒn پrkrd پs ɒsmɒʔjl tmɒmj bɣjh ɣvm rɒ kh drmsfh bvdnd bɒ dxtrɒn پɒdʃɒh v d͡ʒmjʔ ksɒnj kh dr msfh bɒɣj‌mɒndh bvdnd kh nbvzrdɒn rئjs d͡ʒlɒdɒn bh d͡ʒdljɒ ɒbn ɒxjɣɒm sپrdh bvd، ɒsjr sɒxt v ɒsmɒʔjl bn ntnjɒ ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒsjr sɒxth، mj‌rft tɒ nzd bnj ʔmvn bɡzrd ɒmɒ t͡ʃvn jvhɒnɒn bn ɣɒrjh v tmɒmj srdɒrɒn lʃkrj kh hmrɒhʃ bvdnd ɒz tmɒmj ftnh‌ɒj kh ɒsmɒʔjl bn ntnjɒ krdh bvd xbr jɒftnd، آŋɒh d͡ʒmjʔ ksɒn xvd rɒ brdɒʃtnd v bh ɣsd mɣɒtlh bɒ ɒsmɒʔjl bn ntnjɒ rvɒnh ʃdh، ɒv rɒ nzd drjɒt͡ʃh bzrɡ kh drd͡ʒbʔvn ɒst jɒftnd v t͡ʃvn d͡ʒmjʔ ksɒnj kh bɒɒsmɒʔjl bvdnd jvhɒnɒn bn ɣɒrjh v tmɒmj srdɒrɒn lʃkr rɒ kh hmrɒhʃ bvdnd djdndxvʃhɒl ʃdnd v tmɒmj ksɒnj kh ɒsmɒʔjl ɒz msfh bh ɒsjrj mj‌brd rvtɒfth، brɡʃtnd v nzdjvhɒnɒn bn ɣɒrjh آmdnd ɒmɒ ɒsmɒʔjl bn ntnjɒbɒ hʃt nfr ɒz dst jvhɒnɒn frɒr krd v nzdbnj ʔmvn rft v jvhɒnɒn bn ɣɒrjh bɒ hmh srdɒrɒn lʃkrkh hmrɒhʃ bvdnd، tmɒmj bɣjh ɣvmj rɒ kh ɒzdst ɒsmɒʔjl bn ntnjɒ ɒz msfh bʔd ɒz kʃth ʃdn d͡ʒdljɒ ɒbn ɒxjɣɒm xlɒsj dɒdh bvd bɡrft، jʔnj mrdɒn dljr d͡ʒŋj v znɒn v ɒtfɒl v xvɒd͡ʒh‌srɒjɒn rɒ kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ dr d͡ʒbʔvn xlɒsj dɒdh bvd؛ v ɒjʃɒn rfth، dr d͡ʒjrvt kmhɒm kh nzdbjt lhm ɒst mnzl ɡrftnd tɒ brvnd v bh msrdɒxl ʃvnd،bh‌sbb kldɒnjɒn zjrɒ kh ɒz ɒjʃɒn mj‌trsjdnd t͡ʃvnkh ɒsmɒʔjl bn ntnjɒ d͡ʒdljɒ ɒbn ɒxjɣɒm rɒ kh پɒdʃɒh bɒbl ɒv rɒ hɒkm zmjn ɣrɒr dɒdh bvd kʃth bvd bh‌sbb kldɒnjɒn zjrɒ kh ɒz ɒjʃɒn mj‌trsjdnd t͡ʃvnkh ɒsmɒʔjl bn ntnjɒ d͡ʒdljɒ ɒbn ɒxjɣɒm rɒ kh پɒdʃɒh bɒbl ɒv rɒ hɒkm zmjn ɣrɒr dɒdh bvd kʃth bvd پs tmɒmj srdɒrɒn lʃkr v jvhɒnɒn bn ɣɒrjh v jznjɒ ɒbn hvʃʔjɒ v tmɒmj xlɣ ɒz xrd v bzrɡ پjʃ آmdnd، v bh ɒrmjɒ nbj ɡftnd «tmnɒ ɒjnkh ɒltmɒs mɒ nzd tv پzjrfth ʃvdv bh d͡ʒht mɒ v bh d͡ʒht tmɒmj ɒjn bɣjh nzd jhvh xdɒj xvd msɒlt nmɒjj zjrɒ kh mɒ ɣljlj ɒzksjr bɒɣj‌mɒndh‌ɒjm t͡ʃnɒnkh t͡ʃʃmɒnt mɒ rɒ mj‌bjnd tɒ jhvh xdɒjt mɒ rɒ bh rɒhj kh bɒjd brvjm v bh‌kɒrj kh bɒjd bknjm ɒʔlɒm nmɒjd» پs ɒrmjɒj nbj bh ɒjʃɒn ɡft «ʃnjdm ɒjnk mn brhsb آnt͡ʃh bh mn ɡfth‌ɒjd، nzd jhvh xdɒj ʃmɒ msɒlt xvɒhm nmvd v hr‌t͡ʃh xdɒvnd dr d͡ʒvɒb ʃmɒ bɡvjd bh ʃmɒ ɒtlɒʔ xvɒhm dɒd v t͡ʃjzj ɒz ʃmɒ bɒz nxvɒhm dɒʃt» ɒjʃɒn bh ɒrmjɒ ɡftnd «xdɒvnd dr mjɒn mɒʃɒhd rɒst v ɒmjn bɒʃd kh brhsb tmɒmj klɒmj kh jhvh xdɒjt bh vɒsth tv nzd mɒ bfrstdʔml xvɒhjm nmvd xvɒh njkv bɒʃd v xvɒh bd، klɒm jhvh xdɒj xvd rɒ kh tv rɒ nzd ɒvmj frstjm ɒtɒʔt xvɒhjm nmvd tɒ آnkh ɣvl jhvh xdɒj xvd rɒ ɒtɒʔt nmvdh، brɒj mɒsʔɒdtmndj bʃvd» v bʔd ɒz dh rvz vɒɣʔ ʃd kh klɒm xdɒvnd brɒrmjɒ nɒzl ʃd پs jvhɒnɒn bn ɣɒrjh v hmh srdɒrɒn lʃkr kh hmrɒhʃ bvdnd v tmɒmj ɣvm rɒɒz kvt͡ʃk v bzrɡ xtɒb krdh، bh ɒjʃɒn ɡft «jhvh xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl kh ʃmɒ mrɒ nzd vj frstɒdjd tɒ dʔɒj ʃmɒ rɒ bh hzvr ɒv brsɒnm t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd ɒɡr fj ɒlhɣjɣh dr ɒjn zmjn bmɒnjd آŋɒh ʃmɒ rɒ bnɒ nmvdh، mnhdm nxvɒhm sɒxt v ɣrs krdh، nxvɒhm knd، zjrɒ ɒz blɒjj kh bh ʃmɒ rsɒnjdm پʃjmɒn ʃdm ɒz پɒdʃɒh bɒbl kh ɒz ɒv bjm dɒrjd trsɒn mbɒʃjd blj xdɒvndmj ɡvjd ɒz ɒv trsɒn mbɒʃjd zjrɒ kh mn bɒ ʃmɒhstm tɒ ʃmɒ rɒ nd͡ʒɒt‌bxʃm v ʃmɒ rɒ ɒz dst ɒv rhɒjj dhm v mn br ʃmɒ rhmt xvɒhm frmvd tɒ ɒv br ʃmɒ ltf nmɒjd v ʃmɒ rɒ bh zmjn xvdtɒn پs bfrstd ɒmɒ ɒɡr ɡvjjd kh dr ɒjn zmjn nxvɒhjm mɒnd v ɒɡr sxn jhvh xdɒj xvdrɒ ɡvʃ ŋjrjd، v bɡvjjd nj blkh bh zmjn msr xvɒhjm rft zjrɒ kh dr آnd͡ʒɒ d͡ʒŋ nxvɒhjm djd v آvɒz krnɒ nxvɒhjm ʃnjd v brɒj nɒn ɡrsnh nxvɒhjm ʃd v dr آnd͡ʒɒ sɒkn xvɒhjm ʃd، پs hɒl bnɒbrɒjn‌ɒj bɣjh jhvdɒ klɒm xdɒvnd rɒ bʃnvjd jhvh sbɒjvt xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒɡr bh rftn bh msr d͡ʒɒzm mj‌bɒʃjd v ɒɡr dr آnd͡ʒɒ rfth، sɒkn ʃvjd، آŋɒh ʃmʃjrj kh ɒz آn mj‌trsjd ɒlbth آnd͡ʒɒdr msr bh ʃmɒ xvɒhd rsjd v ɣhtj kh ɒz آn hrɒsɒn hstjd آnd͡ʒɒ dr msr ʃmɒ rɒ xvɒhddrjɒft v dr آnd͡ʒɒ xvɒhjd mrd v d͡ʒmjʔ ksɒnj kh brɒj rftn bh msr v skvnt dr آnd͡ʒɒd͡ʒɒzm ʃdh‌ɒnd، ɒz ʃmʃjr v ɣht v vbɒ xvɒhndmrd v ɒhdj ɒz ɒjʃɒn ɒz آn blɒjj kh mn br ɒjʃɒn mj‌rsɒnm bɒɣj nxvɒhd mɒnd v xlɒsj nxvɒhdjɒft zjrɒ kh jhvh sbɒjvt xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd t͡ʃnɒnkh xʃm v ɣzb mn brsɒknɒn ɒvrʃljm rjxth ʃd، hmt͡ʃnɒn ɣzb mn bh md͡ʒrd vrvd ʃmɒ bh msr br ʃmɒ rjxth xvɒhdʃd v ʃmɒ mvrd nfrjn v dhʃt v lʔnt v ʔɒrxvɒhjd ʃd v ɒjn mkɒn rɒ djɡr nxvɒhjd djd» ‌ɒj bɣjh jhvdɒ xdɒvnd bh ʃmɒ mj‌ɡvjd bh msrmrvjd، jɣjn bdɒnjd kh mn ɒmrvz ʃmɒ rɒ thdjdnmvdm zjrɒ xvjʃtn rɒ frjb dɒdjd t͡ʃvnkh mrɒ nzd jhvh xdɒj xvd frstɒdh، ɡftjd kh brɒj mɒ nzd jhvh xdɒj mɒ msɒlt nmɒ v mɒ rɒ mvɒfɣ hrآnt͡ʃh jhvh xdɒj mɒ bɡvjd، mxbr sɒz v آn rɒ bʔml xvɒhjm آvrd پs ɒmrvz ʃmɒ rɒ mxbrsɒxtm ɒmɒ ʃmɒ nh bh ɣvl jhvh xdɒj xvd v nh bhjt͡ʃ‌t͡ʃjzj kh bh vɒsth mn nzd ʃmɒ frstɒdɡvʃ ɡrftjdپs ɒlɒn jɣjn bdɒnjd kh ʃmɒ drmkɒnj kh mj‌xvɒhjd brvjd v dr آn sɒkn ʃvjdɒz ʃmʃjr v ɣht v vbɒ xvɒhjd mrd» پs ɒlɒn jɣjn bdɒnjd kh ʃmɒ drmkɒnj kh mj‌xvɒhjd brvjd v dr آn sɒkn ʃvjdɒz ʃmʃjr v ɣht v vbɒ xvɒhjd mrd» v t͡ʃvn ɒrmjɒ fɒrɣ ʃd ɒz ɡftn bh tmɒmj ɣvm، tmɒmj klɒm jhvh xdɒj ɒjʃɒn rɒkh jhvh xdɒj ɒjʃɒn آn rɒ bh vɒsth ɒv nzd ɒjʃɒn frstɒdh bvd jʔnj d͡ʒmjʔ ɒjn sxnɒn rɒ، آŋɒh ʔzrjɒ ɒbn hvʃʔjɒ v jvhɒnɒn bn ɣɒrjh v d͡ʒmjʔ mrdɒn mtkbr، ɒrmjɒ rɒ xtɒb krdh، ɡftnd «tvdrvɣ mj‌ɡvjj، jhvh xdɒj mɒ tv rɒ nfrstɒdh ɒst tɒ bɡvjj bh msr mrvjd v dr آnd͡ʒɒ skvnt mnmɒjjd blkh bɒrvk bn njrjɒ tv rɒ br mɒbrɒŋjxth ɒst tɒ mɒ rɒ bh‌dst kldɒnjɒn tsljm nmvdh، ɒjʃɒn mɒ rɒ bkʃnd v bh bɒbl bh ɒsjrj bbrnd» v jvhɒnɒn bn ɣɒrjh v hmh srdɒrɒn lʃkr vtmɒmj ɣvm frmɒn xdɒvnd rɒ kh dr zmjn jhvdɒbmɒnnd، ɒtɒʔt nnmvdnd blkh jvhɒnɒn bn ɣɒrjh v hmh srdɒrɒn lʃkr، bɣjh jhvdɒ rɒ kh ɒz mjɒn tmɒmj ɒmt hɒjj kh dr mjɒn آnhɒ پrɒkndh ʃdh bvdnd brɡʃth، dr zmjn jhvdɒ sɒkn ʃdh bvdndɡrftnd jʔnj mrdɒn v znɒn v ɒtfɒl v dxtrɒn پɒdʃɒh v hmh ksɒnj rɒ kh nbvzrdɒn rئjs d͡ʒlɒdɒn، bh d͡ʒdljɒ ɒbn ɒxjɣɒm bn ʃɒfɒn sپrdh bvd vɒrmjɒj nbj v bɒrvk bn njrjɒ rɒ v bh zmjn msrrftnd zjrɒ kh ɣvl xdɒvnd rɒ ɡvʃ ŋrftnd v bh thfnhjs آmdnd پs klɒm xdɒvnd dr thfnhjs br ɒrmjɒnɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «sŋhɒj bzrɡ bh‌dst xvdbɡjr v آnhɒ rɒ dr nzr mrdɒn jhvdɒ dr sʔh‌ɒj kh nzd drvɒzh xɒnh frʔvn dr thfnhjs ɒst bɒ ɡt͡ʃ bپvʃɒn v bh ɒjʃɒn bɡv kh jhvh sbɒjvt xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnk mn frstɒdh، bndh xvd nbvkdrsr پɒdʃɒh bɒbl rɒ xvɒhm ɡrft v krsj ɒv rɒ br ɒjn sŋhɒjj kh پvʃɒnjdm xvɒhm nhɒd v ɒv sɒjbɒn xvd rɒ br آnhɒ xvɒhdbrɒfrɒʃt v آmdh، zmjn msr rɒ xvɒhd zd vآnɒnj rɒ kh mstvd͡ʒb mvt‌ɒnd bh mvt v آnɒnj rɒkh mstvd͡ʒb ɒsjrj‌ɒnd bh ɒsjrj v آnɒnj rɒ kh mstvd͡ʒb ʃmʃjrnd bh ʃmʃjr xvɒhd sپrd v آtʃj dr xɒnh hɒj xdɒjɒn msr xvɒhm ɒfrvxt v آnhɒ rɒ xvɒhd svzɒnjd v bh ɒsjrj xvɒhd brd v xvjʃtn rɒ bh zmjn msr mlbs xvɒhd sɒxt msl ʃbɒnj kh xvjʃtn rɒ bh‌d͡ʒɒmh xvd mlbs sɒzd v ɒz آnd͡ʒɒ bh slɒmtj bjrvn xvɒhd rftv tmsɒlhɒj bjt ʃms rɒ kh drzmjn msr ɒst xvɒhd ʃkst v xɒnh hɒj xdɒjɒn msr rɒ bh آtʃ xvɒhd svzɒnjd» v tmsɒlhɒj bjt ʃms rɒ kh drzmjn msr ɒst xvɒhd ʃkst v xɒnh hɒj xdɒjɒn msr rɒ bh آtʃ xvɒhd svzɒnjd» klɒmj kh drbɒrh tmɒmj jhvd kh drzmjn msr sɒkn bvdnd v dr md͡ʒdl vthfnhjs v nvf v zmjn ftrvs skvnt dɒʃtnd، bh ɒrmjɒ nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «jhvh sbɒjvt xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd ʃmɒtmɒmj blɒjj rɒ kh mn br ɒvrʃljm v tmɒmj ʃhrhɒj jhvdɒ vɒrd آvrdm djdjd kh ɒjnk ɒmrvz xrɒb ʃdh ɒst v sɒknj dr آnhɒ njst bh‌sbb ʃrɒrtj kh krdnd v xʃm mrɒ bhjd͡ʒɒn آvrdnd ɒz ɒjnkh rfth، bxvr‌svzɒnjdnd v xdɒjɒn ɣjr rɒ kh nh ɒjʃɒn v nh ʃmɒ v nh پdrɒn ʃmɒ آnhɒ rɒʃnɒxth bvdjd ʔbɒdt nmvdnd v mn d͡ʒmjʔ bndɡɒn xvd ɒnbjɒ rɒ nzd ʃmɒ frstɒdm v sbh zvdbrxɒsth، ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒrsɒl nmvdh، ɡftm ɒjn rd͡ʒɒst rɒ kh mn ɒz آn nfrt dɒrm bʔml njɒvrjd ɒmɒ ɒjʃɒn nʃnjdnd v ɡvʃ xvd rɒ frɒ ndɒʃtnd tɒɒz ʃrɒrt xvd bɒzɡʃt nmɒjnd v brɒj xdɒjɒn ɣjr bxvr nsvzɒnnd bnɒbrɒjn xʃm v ɣzb mn rjxth v br ʃhrhɒj jhvdɒ v kvt͡ʃh hɒj ɒvrʃljm ɒfrvxth ɡrdjd kh آnhɒ msl ɒmrvz xrɒb v vjrɒn ɡrdjdh ɒst پs hɒl jhvh xdɒj sbɒjvt xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ʃmɒ t͡ʃrɒ ɒjn ʃrɒrt ʔzjm rɒ br d͡ʒɒn xvd vɒrd mj‌آvrjd tɒxvjʃtn rɒ ɒz mrd v zn v tfl v ʃjrxvɒrh ɒzmjɒn jhvdɒ mnɣtʔ sɒzjd v ɒz brɒj xvd bɣjh‌ɒj ŋzɒrjd؟ zjrɒ kh dr zmjn msr kh bh آnd͡ʒɒ brɒj skvnt rfth‌ɒjd brɒj xdɒjɒn ɣjr bxvrsvzɒnjdh، xʃm mrɒ bh ɒʔmɒl dsthɒj xvd bh hjd͡ʒɒn mj‌آvrjd tɒ mn ʃmɒ rɒ mnɣtʔ sɒzm v ʃmɒdr mjɒn tmɒmj ɒmt hɒj zmjn mvrd lʔnt v ʔɒrbʃvjd آjɒ ʃrɒrt پdrɒn xvd v ʃrɒrt پɒdʃɒhɒn jhvdɒ v ʃrɒrt znɒn ɒjʃɒn v ʃrɒrt xvd v ʃrɒrt znɒn xvjʃ rɒ kh dr zmjn jhvdɒ vkvt͡ʃh hɒj ɒvrʃljm bʔml آvrdjd، frɒmvʃ krdh‌ɒjd؟ v tɒ ɒmrvz mtvɒzʔ nʃdh v trsɒn ŋʃth‌ɒnd v bh ʃrjʔt v frɒjz mn kh bh hzvrʃmɒ v bh hzvr پdrɒn ʃmɒ ɡzɒʃth‌ɒm، sɒlk ŋrdjdh‌ɒnd «bnɒbrɒjn jhvh sbɒjvt xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnk mn rvj xvd rɒ br ʃmɒ bh blɒ mj‌ɡrdɒnm tɒ tmɒmj jhvdɒ rɒ hlɒk knm vbɣjh jhvdɒ rɒ kh rftn bh msr v sɒkn ʃdn dr آnd͡ʒɒrɒ d͡ʒzm nmvdh‌ɒnd، xvɒhm ɡrft tɒ d͡ʒmjʔ ɒjʃɒn dr zmjn msr hlɒk ʃvnd v ɒjʃɒn bh ʃmʃjr vɣht xvɒhnd ɒftɒd v ɒz xrd v bzrɡ bh ʃmʃjr vɣht tlf ʃdh، xvɒhnd mrd v mvrd nfrjn vdhʃt v lʔnt v ʔɒr xvɒhnd ɡrdjd v bh آnɒnj kh dr zmjn msr sɒkn ʃvnd bh ʃmʃjrvɣht v vbɒ ʔɣvbt xvɒhm rsɒnjd t͡ʃnɒnkh bh ɒvrʃljm ʔɣvbt rsɒnjdm v ɒz bɣjh jhvdɒ kh bh zmjn msr rfth، dr آnd͡ʒɒ skvnt پzjrnd ɒhdj xlɒsj nxvɒhd jɒft v bɒɣj nxvɒhd mɒnd tɒ bh zmjn jhvdɒ kh ɒjʃɒn mʃtɒɣ brɡʃtn v sɒkn ʃdn dr آnd͡ʒɒ xvɒhnd ʃd mrɒd͡ʒʔt nmɒjd zjrɒ ɒhdj ɒz ɒjʃɒn ɣjr ɒz nɒd͡ʒjɒn mrɒd͡ʒʔt nxvɒhd krd» آŋɒh tmɒmj mrdɒnj kh آɡɒh bvdnd kh znɒn ɒjʃɒn brɒj xdɒjɒn ɣjr bxvr mj‌svzɒnnd vd͡ʒmjʔ znɒnj kh hɒzr bvdnd bɒ ɡrvhj ʔzjm vtmɒmj ksɒnj kh dr zmjn msr dr ftrvs sɒkn bvdnd، dr d͡ʒvɒb ɒrmjɒ ɡftnd «mɒ tv rɒ dr ɒjn klɒmj kh bh ɒsm xdɒvnd bh mɒ ɡftj ɡvʃ nxvɒhjm ɡrft blkh bhr t͡ʃjzj kh ɒz dhɒn mɒsɒdr ʃvd ɒlbth ʔml xvɒhjm nmvd v brɒj mlkh آsmɒn bxvr‌svzɒnjdh، hdjh rjxtnj bh d͡ʒht ɒv xvɒhjm rjxt t͡ʃnɒnkh xvd mɒ v پdrɒn mɒ vپɒdʃɒhɒn v srvrɒn mɒ dr ʃhrhɒj jhvdɒ vkvt͡ʃh hɒj ɒvrʃljm mj‌krdjm zjrɒ kh dr آn zmɒn ɒz nɒn sjr ʃdh، sʔɒdtmnd mj‌bvdjm v blɒ rɒnmj djdjm ɒmɒ ɒz zmɒnj kh bxvr‌svzɒnjdn rɒbrɒj mlkh آsmɒn v rjxtn hdɒjɒj rjxtnj rɒ bh d͡ʒht ɒv trk nmvdjm، mhtɒd͡ʒ hmh‌t͡ʃjz ʃdjm v bh ʃmʃjr v ɣht hlɒk ɡrdjdjm v t͡ʃvn bh d͡ʒht mlkh آsmɒn bxvr mj‌svzɒnjdjm v hdjh rjxtnj brɒj ɒv mj‌rjxtjm، آjɒ bj‌ɒtlɒʔ ʃvhrɒn xvjʃ ɣrshɒ bh ʃbjh ɒv mj‌پxtjm vhdjh rjxtnj bh d͡ʒht ɒv mj‌rjxtjm؟» پs ɒrmjɒ tmɒmj ɣvm rɒ ɒz mrdɒn v znɒn vhmh ksɒnj kh ɒjn d͡ʒvɒb rɒ bdv dɒdh bvdndxtɒb krdh، ɡft «آjɒ xdɒvnd bxvrj rɒ kh ʃmɒ v پdrɒn ʃmɒ v پɒdʃɒhɒn v srvrɒn ʃmɒ vɒhl mlk dr ʃhrhɒj jhvdɒ v kvt͡ʃh hɒj ɒvrʃljm svzɒnjdnd، bjɒd njɒvrdh v آjɒ bh‌xɒtr ɒvxtvr nkrdh ɒst؟ t͡ʃnɒnkh xdɒvnd bh‌sbb ʃrɒrt ɒʔmɒl ʃmɒ v rd͡ʒɒsɒtj kh bʔml آvrdh bvdjd، djɡr ntvɒnst thml nmɒjd lhzɒ zmjn ʃmɒ vjrɒn v mvrd dhʃt v lʔnt v ɣjrmskvn ɡrdjdh، t͡ʃnɒnkh ɒmrvz ʃdh ɒst t͡ʃvnkh bxvr‌svzɒnjdjd v bh xdɒvnd ɡnɒh vrzjdh، bh ɣvl xdɒvnd ɡvʃ ndɒdjd v bh ʃrjʔt v frɒjz v ʃhɒdɒt ɒv slvk nnmvdjd، bnɒbrɒjn ɒjn blɒ msl ɒmrvz br ʃmɒ vɒrd ʃdh ɒst» v ɒrmjɒ bh tmɒmj ɣvm v bh d͡ʒmjʔ znɒn ɡft «ɒj tmɒmj jhvdɒ kh dr zmjn msr hstjd klɒm xdɒvnd rɒ bʃnvjd jhvh sbɒjvt xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ʃmɒ v znɒn ʃmɒ hm bɒdhɒn xvd tklm mj‌nmɒjjd v hm bɒ dsthɒj xvdbd͡ʒɒ mj‌آvrjd v mj‌ɡvjjd nzrhɒjj rɒ kh krdjm ɒlbth vfɒ xvɒhjm nmvd v bxvr brɒj mlkh آsmɒn xvɒhjm svzɒnjd v hdɒjɒj rjxtnj brɒj ɒvxvɒhjm rjxt پs nzrhɒj xvd rɒ ɒstvɒrxvɒhjd krd v nzrhɒj xvd rɒ vfɒ xvɒhjd nmvd bnɒbrɒjn‌ɒj tmɒmj jhvdɒ kh dr zmjn msrsɒkn hstjd klɒm xdɒvnd rɒ bʃnvjd ɒjnk xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd mn bh ɒsm ʔzjm xvd ɣsm xvrdm kh ɒsm mn bɒr djɡr bh dhɒn hjt͡ʃkdɒm ɒzjhvd dr tmɒmj zmjn msr آvrdh nxvɒhd ʃd vnxvɒhnd ɡft bh hjɒt xdɒvnd jhvh ɣsm ɒjnk mn br ɒjʃɒn bh bdj mrɒɣb xvɒhm bvd vnh bh njkvjj tɒ d͡ʒmjʔ mrdɒn jhvdɒ kh dr zmjn msr mj‌bɒʃnd bh ʃmʃjr v ɣht hlɒk ʃdh، tmɒm ʃvnd ljkn ʔdd ɣljlj ɒz ʃmʃjr rhɒjj jɒfth، ɒz zmjn msr bh zmjn jhvdɒ mrɒd͡ʒʔt xvɒhnd nmvd v tmɒmj bɣjh jhvdɒ kh bh d͡ʒht skvnt آnd͡ʒɒ dr zmjn msr rfth‌ɒnd، xvɒhnddɒnst kh klɒm kdɒm‌jk ɒz mn v ɒjʃɒn ɒstvɒrxvɒhd ʃd v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd ɒjn ɒst ʔlɒmt brɒj ʃmɒ kh mn dr ɒjnd͡ʒɒ bh ʃmɒ ʔɣvbt xvɒhm rsɒnjd tɒ bdɒnjd kh klɒm mn drbɒrh ʃmɒɒlbth bh bdj ɒstvɒr xvɒhd ʃdxdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnk mn frʔvn hfrʔ پɒdʃɒh msr rɒ bh‌dst dʃmnɒnʃ v bh‌dst آnɒnj kh ɣsd d͡ʒɒn ɒvdɒrnd tsljm xvɒhm krd t͡ʃnɒnkh sdɣjɒ پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ rɒ bh‌dst dʃmnʃ nbvkdrsr پɒdʃɒh bɒbl kh ɣsd d͡ʒɒn ɒv mj‌dɒʃt، tsljm nmvdm» xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnk mn frʔvn hfrʔ پɒdʃɒh msr rɒ bh‌dst dʃmnɒnʃ v bh‌dst آnɒnj kh ɣsd d͡ʒɒn ɒvdɒrnd tsljm xvɒhm krd t͡ʃnɒnkh sdɣjɒ پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ rɒ bh‌dst dʃmnʃ nbvkdrsr پɒdʃɒh bɒbl kh ɣsd d͡ʒɒn ɒv mj‌dɒʃt، tsljm nmvdm» klɒmj kh ɒrmjɒ nbj bh bɒrvk bn njrjɒxtɒb krdh، ɡft، hŋɒmj kh ɒjn sxnɒn rɒ ɒz dhɒn ɒrmjɒ dr sɒl t͡ʃhɒrm jhvjɒɣjm bn jvʃjɒ پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ dr tvmɒr nvʃt «ɒj bɒrvk jhvh xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl bh tv t͡ʃnjn mj frmɒjd tv ɡfth‌ɒj vɒj br mn zjrɒ xdɒvnd brdrd mn ɣm ɒfzvdh ɒst ɒz nɒlh kʃjdn xsth ʃdh‌ɒm v ɒstrɒht nmj jɒbm ɒv rɒ t͡ʃnjn bɡv، xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd آnt͡ʃh bnɒ krdh‌ɒm، mnhdm xvɒhm sɒxt v آnt͡ʃh ɣrs nmvdh‌ɒm jʔnj tmɒmj ɒjn zmjn rɒ، ɒz rjʃh xvɒhm kndv آjɒ tvt͡ʃjzhɒj bzrɡ brɒj xvjʃtn mj‌tlbj؟ آnhɒ rɒtlb mnmɒ zjrɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnk mn brtmɒmj bʃr blɒ xvɒhm rsɒnjd ɒmɒ dr hr d͡ʒɒjj kh brvj d͡ʒɒnt rɒ bh tv bh ɣnjmt xvɒhm bxʃjd» v آjɒ tvt͡ʃjzhɒj bzrɡ brɒj xvjʃtn mj‌tlbj؟ آnhɒ rɒtlb mnmɒ zjrɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnk mn brtmɒmj bʃr blɒ xvɒhm rsɒnjd ɒmɒ dr hr d͡ʒɒjj kh brvj d͡ʒɒnt rɒ bh tv bh ɣnjmt xvɒhm bxʃjd» klɒm xdɒvnd drbɒrh ɒmt‌hɒ kh bh ɒrmjɒnɒzl ʃd؛ drbɒrh msr v lʃkr frʔvn nkv kh nzd nhr frɒt dr krkmjʃ bvdnd vnbvkdrsr پɒdʃɒh bɒbl ɒjʃɒn rɒ dr sɒl t͡ʃhɒrm jhvjɒɣjm bn jvʃjɒ پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ ʃkst dɒd «md͡ʒn v sپr rɒ hɒzr knjd v brɒj d͡ʒŋ nzdjk آjjd ‌ɒj svɒrɒn ɒsbɒn rɒ bjɒrɒjjd v svɒr ʃvjdv bɒ xvdhɒj xvd bɒjstjd njzh‌hɒ rɒ sjɣl dhjdv zrh‌hɒ rɒ bپvʃjd xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd t͡ʃrɒ ɒjʃɒn rɒ mj‌bjnm kh hrɒsɒn ʃdh، bh ʔɣb brmj ɡrdnd vʃd͡ʒɒʔɒn ɒjʃɒn xrd ʃdh، bɒlkl mnhzm mj‌ʃvndv bh ʔɣb nmj ŋrnd، zjrɒ kh xvf ɒz hr trf mj‌bɒʃd tjzrvɒn frɒr nknnd v zvrآvrɒn rhɒjj njɒbnd btrf ʃmɒl bh knɒr nhr frɒt mj‌lɣznd vmj ɒftnd ɒjn kjst kh mɒnnd rvd njl sjlɒn krdh ɒst v آbhɒj ɒv msl nhrhɒjʃ mtlɒtm mj‌ɡrdd؟ msr mɒnnd rvd njl sjlɒn krdh ɒst v آbhɒjʃ msl nhrhɒ mtlɒtm ɡʃth، mj‌ɡvjd mn sjlɒn krdh، zmjn rɒ xvɒhm پvʃɒnjd v ʃhr vsɒknɒnʃ rɒ hlɒk xvɒhm sɒxt ‌ɒj ɒsbɒn، brآjjd v‌ɒj ɒrɒbh‌hɒ tnd brvjd v ʃd͡ʒɒʔɒn bjrvn brvnd ɒj ɒhl hbʃ v fvt kh sپrdɒrɒn hstjdv‌ɒj lvdjɒn kh kmɒn rɒ mj‌ɡjrjd v آn rɒmj kʃjd zjrɒ kh آn rvz rvz ɒntɣɒm xdɒvndjhvh sbɒjvt mj‌bɒʃd kh ɒz dʃmnɒn xvd ɒntɣɒm bɡjrd پs ʃmʃjr hlɒk krdh، sjr mj‌ʃvd v ɒzxvn ɒjʃɒn mst mj‌ɡrdd zjrɒ xdɒvnd jhvh sbɒjvt dr zmjn ʃmɒl nzd nhr frɒt zbhj dɒrd ‌ɒj bɒkrh dxtr msr bh d͡ʒlʔɒd brآj vblsɒn bɡjr drmɒnhɒj zjɒd rɒ ʔbs bh‌kɒr mj‌brj brɒj tv ʔlɒd͡ʒ njst ɒmt‌hɒ rsvɒjj tv rɒmj ʃnvnd v d͡ʒhɒn ɒz nɒlh tv پr ʃdh ɒst zjrɒ kh ʃd͡ʒɒʔ br ʃd͡ʒɒʔ mj‌lɣzd v hr dvj ɒjʃɒn bɒ hm mj‌ɒftnd» klɒmj kh xdɒvnd drbɒrh آmdn nbvkdrsrپɒdʃɒh bɒbl v mɣlvb sɒxtn zmjn msr bh ɒrmjɒnbj ɡft «bh msr xbr dhjd v bh md͡ʒdl ɒʔlɒm nmɒjjd v bh nvf v thfnhjs ɒtlɒʔ dhjd bɡvjjd brپɒ ʃvjd v xvjʃtn rɒ آmɒdh sɒzjd zjrɒkh ʃmʃjr md͡ʒɒvrɒnt rɒ hlɒk krdh ɒst zvrآvrɒnt t͡ʃrɒ bh zjr ɒfkndh mj‌ʃvnd vnmj tvɒnnd ɒjstɒd؟ zjrɒ xdɒvnd ɒjʃɒn rɒ پrɒkndh sɒxth ɒst bsjɒrj rɒ lɣzɒnjdh ɒst v ɒjʃɒn br jkdjɡr mj‌ɒftnd، v mj‌ɡvjnd brxjzjd v ɒzʃmʃjr brɒn nzd ɣvm xvd v bh zmjn mvld xvjʃ brɡrdjm dr آnd͡ʒɒ frʔvn، پɒdʃɒh msr rɒ hɒlk mj‌nɒmnd v frst rɒ ɒz dst dɒdh ɒst پɒdʃɒh kh nɒm ɒv jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌bɒʃd mj ɡvjd bh hjɒt xvdm ɣsm kh ɒv msl tɒbvr، drmjɒn kvhhɒ v mɒnnd krml، nzd drjɒ xvɒhd آmd ‌ɒj dxtr msr kh dr ɒmnjt sɒkn hstj، ɒsbɒb d͡ʒlɒj vtn rɒ brɒj xvd mhjɒ sɒz zjrɒ kh nvf vjrɒn v svxth v ɣjrmskvn ɡrdjdh ɒst msr ɡvsɒlh bsjɒr njkv mnzr ɒst ɒmɒ hlɒkt ɒz trf ʃmɒl mj‌آjd v mj‌آjd sپɒhjɒn bh mzd ɡrfth ɒv dr mjɒnʃ msl ɡvsɒlh hɒj پrvɒrj mj‌bɒʃnd zjrɒ kh ɒjʃɒn njz rvtɒfth، bɒ hm frɒrmj knnd v nmj ɒjstnd t͡ʃvnkh rvz hlɒkt ɒjʃɒn v vɣt ʔɣvbt ɒjʃɒn br ɒjʃɒn rsjdh ɒst آvɒzh آn msl mɒr mj‌rvd zjrɒ kh آnhɒ bɒ ɣvt mj‌xrɒmnd v bɒ tbrhɒ msl t͡ʃvb brɒn br ɒvmj آjnd xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh d͡ʒŋl ɒv rɒ ɣtʔ xvɒhnd nmvd ɒɡr‌t͡ʃh lɒjhsj mj‌bɒʃd zjrɒ kh ɒjʃɒn ɒz mlxhɒ zjɒdh v ɒz hd ʃmɒrh ɒfzvnnd dxtr msr xd͡ʒl ʃdh، bh‌dst ɣvm ʃmɒlj tsljm ɡrdjdh ɒst jhvh sbɒjvt xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnk mn br آmvn nv v frʔvn vmsr v xdɒjɒnʃ v پɒdʃɒhɒnʃ jʔnj br frʔvn vآnɒnj kh br vj tvkl dɒrnd، ʔɣvbt xvɒhm rsɒnjd v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh‌dst آnɒnj kh ɣsd d͡ʒɒn ɒjʃɒn dɒrnd، jʔnj bh‌dst nbvkdrsr پɒdʃɒh bɒbl v bh‌dst bndɡɒnʃ tsljm xvɒhm krd v bʔd ɒz آn، msl ɒjɒm sɒbɣ mskvn xvɒhd ʃd ɒmɒ tv‌ɒj bndh mn jʔɣvb mtrs v‌ɒj ɒsrɒئjl hrɒsɒn mʃv zjrɒ ɒjnk mn tv rɒ ɒz d͡ʒɒj dvr v zrjt tv rɒ ɒz zmjn ɒsjrj ɒjʃɒn nd͡ʒɒt xvɒhm dɒd v jʔɣvb brɡʃth، drɒmnjt v ɒstrɒht xvɒhd bvd v ksj ɒv rɒ nxvɒhd trsɒnjdv xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd ɒj bndh mn jʔɣvb mtrs zjrɒ kh mn bɒ tv hstm v ɒɡr‌t͡ʃh tmɒm ɒmt‌hɒ rɒ kh tv rɒ dr mjɒn آnhɒ پrɒkndh sɒxth‌ɒm bɒlkl hlɒk sɒzm ljkn tv rɒ bɒlkl hlɒk nxvɒhm sɒxt blkh tv rɒ bh ɒnsɒf tɒdjb xvɒhm nmvd v tv rɒ hrɡz bj‌szɒ nxvɒhm ɡzɒʃt» v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd ɒj bndh mn jʔɣvb mtrs zjrɒ kh mn bɒ tv hstm v ɒɡr‌t͡ʃh tmɒm ɒmt‌hɒ rɒ kh tv rɒ dr mjɒn آnhɒ پrɒkndh sɒxth‌ɒm bɒlkl hlɒk sɒzm ljkn tv rɒ bɒlkl hlɒk nxvɒhm sɒxt blkh tv rɒ bh ɒnsɒf tɒdjb xvɒhm nmvd v tv rɒ hrɡz bj‌szɒ nxvɒhm ɡzɒʃt» klɒm xdɒvnd drbɒrh flstjnjɒn kh brɒrmjɒ nbj nɒzl ʃd ɣbl ɒz آnkh frʔvn ɣzh rɒ mɣlvb bsɒzd xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «ɒjnk آbhɒ ɒz ʃmɒl brmj آjd v msl nhrj sjlɒn mj‌knd v zmjn rɒ bɒ آnt͡ʃh dr آn ɒst v ʃhr vsɒknɒnʃ rɒ drmj ɡjrd v mrdmɒn frjɒdbrmj آvrnd v d͡ʒmjʔ sknh zmjn vlvlh mj‌nmɒjnd ɒz sdɒj smhɒj ɒsbɒn zvrآvrʃ v ɒzɣvɣɒj ɒrɒbh hɒjʃ v ʃvrʃ t͡ʃrxhɒjʃ vپdrɒn bh‌sbb sstj dsthɒj xvd bh frzndɒn xvjʃ ɒʔtnɒ nmj knnd bh‌sbb rvzj kh brɒj hlɒkt d͡ʒmjʔ flstjnjɒn mj‌آjd kh hrnsrt knndh‌ɒj rɒ kh bɒɣj mj‌mɒnd ɒz svr vsjdvn mnɣtʔ xvɒhd sɒxt zjrɒ xdɒvndflstjnjɒn jʔnj bɣjh d͡ʒzjrh kftvr rɒ hlɒk xvɒhd sɒxt ɒhl ɣzh brjdh mv ɡʃth‌ɒnd vɒʃɣlvn v bɣjh vɒdj ɒjʃɒn hlɒk ʃdh ɒst tɒ bh kj bdn xvd rɒ xvɒhj xrɒʃjd؟ آh‌ɒj ʃmʃjr xdɒvnd tɒ bh kj آrɒm nxvɒhj ɡrft؟ bh ɣlɒf xvd brɡʃth، mstrjh v آrɒm ʃvt͡ʃɡvnh mj‌tvɒnj آrɒm bɡjrj، bɒ آnkh xdɒvnd tv rɒ br ɒʃɣlvn v br sɒhl drjɒ mɒmvr frmvdh v tv rɒ bh آnd͡ʒɒ tʔjjn nmvdh ɒst؟» t͡ʃɡvnh mj‌tvɒnj آrɒm bɡjrj، bɒ آnkh xdɒvnd tv rɒ br ɒʃɣlvn v br sɒhl drjɒ mɒmvr frmvdh v tv rɒ bh آnd͡ʒɒ tʔjjn nmvdh ɒst؟» drbɒrh mvآb، jhvh sbɒjvt xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «vɒj br nbvzjrɒ kh xrɒb ʃdh ɒst ɣrjh tɒjm xd͡ʒl vɡrftɒr ɡrdjdh ɒst v msd͡ʒɒb rsvɒ v mnhdm ɡʃth ɒst fxr mvآb zɒjl ʃdh، dr hʃbvn brɒj vj tɣdjrhɒj bd krdnd bjɒjjd v ɒv rɒmnɣtʔ sɒzjm tɒ djɡr ɣvm nbɒʃd tv njz‌ɒj mdmjn sɒkt xvɒhj ʃd v ʃmʃjr tv rɒ tʔɒɣb xvɒhdnmvd آvɒz nɒlh ɒz hvrvnɒjm msmvʔ mj‌ʃvd hlɒkt v ʃkstɡj ʔzjm mvآb bhm ʃksth ɒst v sɣjrhɒj ɒv frjɒd brmj آvrnd zjrɒ kh bh frɒz lvhjt bɒ ɡrjh sxt brmj آjnd v ɒzsrɒzjrj hvrvnɒjm sdɒj ʃkst jɒftn ɒzdʃmnɒn ʃnjdh mj‌ʃvd bɡrjzjd v d͡ʒɒnhɒj xvd rɒ brhɒnjd v msl drxt ʔrʔr dr bjɒbɒn bɒʃjd zjrɒ ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht kh bh ɒʔmɒl v ɡnd͡ʒhɒj xvjʃ tvkl nmvdj tv njz ɡrftɒr xvɒhj ʃd vkmvʃ bɒ kɒhnɒn v srvrɒnʃ bɒ hm bh ɒsjrj xvɒhnd rft v ɣɒrt knndh bh hmh ʃhrhɒxvɒhd آmd v hjt͡ʃ ʃhr xlɒsj nxvɒhd jɒft vbrhsb frmɒn xdɒvnd ɒhl vɒdj tlf xvɒhndʃd v ɒhl hmvɒrj hlɒk xvɒhnd ɡrdjd bɒlhɒbh mvآb bdhjd tɒ پrvɒz nmvdh، bɡrjzd vʃhrhɒjʃ xrɒb v ɣjrmskvn xvɒhd ʃd mlʔvn bɒd ksj‌kh kɒr xdɒvnd rɒ bɒ ɣflt ʔml nmɒjd v mlʔvn bɒd ksj‌kh ʃmʃjr xvd rɒ ɒz xvn bɒz‌dɒrd mvآb ɒz tfvljt xvdmstrjh bvdh v br drdhɒj xvd nʃsth ɒst v ɒzzrf bh zrf rjxth nʃdh v bh ɒsjrj nrfth ɒst ɒz ɒjn sbb tʔmʃ dr ɒv mɒndh ɒst vxvʃbvjj ɒv tɣjjr njɒfth ɒst bnɒbrɒjn ɒjnk xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd rvzhɒ mj‌آjd kh mn rjzndɡɒn mj‌frstm kh ɒv rɒ brjznd v zrvf ɒv rɒ xɒlj krdh، mʃkhɒjʃ rɒ پɒrh xvɒhnd nmvd vmvآb ɒz kmvʃ ʃrmndh xvɒhd ʃd t͡ʃnɒnkh xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl ɒz bjt ئjl kh ɒʔtmɒd ɒjʃɒn bvd، ʃrmndh ʃdh‌ɒnd t͡ʃɡvnh mj‌ɡvjjd kh mɒʃd͡ʒɒʔɒn v mrdɒn ɣvj brɒj d͡ʒŋ mj‌bɒʃjm؟ mvآb xrɒb ʃdh dvd ʃhrhɒjʃ mtsɒʔdmj ʃvd v d͡ʒvɒnɒn brɡzjdh‌ɒʃ bh ɣtl frvdmj آjnd پɒdʃɒh kh nɒm ɒv jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌bɒʃdɒjn rɒ mj‌ɡvjd rsjdn hlɒkt mvآb nzdjk ɒst v blɒj ɒv bzvdj hr‌t͡ʃh tmɒmtr mj‌آjd ‌ɒj d͡ʒmjʔ md͡ʒɒvrɒnʃ v hmɡɒnj kh nɒm ɒv rɒmj dɒnjd brɒj vj mɒtm ɡjrjd bɡvjjd ʔsɒj ɣvt v t͡ʃvbdstj zjbɒjj t͡ʃɡvnh ʃksth ʃdh ɒst ‌ɒj dxtr djbvn kh dr ɒmnjt sɒkn hstj ɒz d͡ʒlɒl xvd frvd آj v dr d͡ʒɒj xʃk bnʃjn zjrɒ kh ɣɒrt knndh mvآb br tv hd͡ʒvm mj‌آvrd v ɣlʔh hɒj tv rɒ mnhdm mj‌sɒzd ‌ɒj tv kh dr ʔrvʔjr sɒkn hstj bh‌sr rɒh bɒjst vŋɒh kn v ɒz frɒrjɒn v nɒd͡ʒjɒn bپrs v bɡv kh t͡ʃh ʃdh ɒst؟ mvآb xd͡ʒl ʃdh، zjrɒ kh ʃkst jɒfth ɒst پs vlvlh v frjɒd brآvrjd dr ɒrnvn ɒxbɒr nmɒjjd kh mvآb hlɒk ɡʃth ɒst v dɒvrj br zmjn hmvɒrj rsjdh ɒst v br djbvn v nbvv bjt dbltɒjm، v br ɣrjh tɒjm v bjt d͡ʒɒmvl vbjt mʔvn، v br ɣrjvt v bsrh v br tmɒmj ʃhrhɒj bʔjd v ɣrjb zmjn mvآb «xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh ʃɒx mvآb brjdh vbɒzvjʃ ʃksth ʃdh ɒst ɒv rɒ mst sɒzjdzjrɒ bh zd xdɒvnd tkbr mj‌nmɒjd v mvآb drɣj xvd ɣvth mj‌xvrd v ɒv njz mzhkh xvɒhdʃd آjɒ ɒsrɒئjl brɒj tv mzhkh nbvd؟ v آjɒɒv dr mjɒn dzdɒn jɒft ʃd bh hdj kh hr vɣt kh drbɒrh ɒv sxn mj‌ɡftj sr xvd rɒmj d͡ʒnbɒnjdj؟ ‌ɒj sɒknɒn mvآb ʃhrhɒ rɒtrk krdh، dr sxrh sɒkn ʃvjd v msl fɒxth‌ɒj bɒʃjd kh آʃjɒnh xvd rɒ dr knɒr dhnh mɣɒrh mj‌sɒzd ɣrvr mvآb v bsjɒrj tkbr ɒv rɒ vʔzmt v xjlɒ v kbr v blndj dl ɒv rɒ ʃnjdjm xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd xʃm ɒv rɒ mj‌dɒnm kh hjt͡ʃ ɒst v fxrhɒj ɒv rɒ kh ɒz آnhɒ hjt͡ʃ brnmj آjd bnɒbrɒjn brɒj mvآb vlvlh xvɒhm krd v bh d͡ʒht tmɒmj mvآb frjɒd brxvɒhm آvrd brɒj mrdɒn ɣjrhɒrs mɒtm ɡrfth xvɒhd ʃd brɒj tv‌ɒj mv sbmh bh ɡrjh jʔzjr xvɒhm ɡrjst ʃɒxh hɒj tv ɒz drjɒ ɡzʃth bvd v bh drjɒt͡ʃh jʔzjr rsjdh، br mjvh‌hɒ v ɒŋvrhɒjt ɣɒrt knndh hd͡ʒvm آvrdh ɒst ʃɒdj vɒbthɒd͡ʒ ɒz bstɒnhɒ v zmjn mvآb brdɒʃth ʃd vʃrɒb rɒ ɒz t͡ʃrxʃthɒ zɒjl sɒxtm v ksj آnhɒrɒ bh sdɒj ʃɒdmɒnj bh پɒ nxvɒhd fʃrd sdɒj ʃɒdmɒnj sdɒj ʃɒdmɒnj njst bh frjɒdhʃbvn آvɒz xvd rɒ tɒ ɒlʔɒlh v jɒhs blnd krdndv ɒz svɣr tɒ hvrvnɒjm ʔd͡ʒlt ʃljʃjɒ، zjrɒ kh آbhɒj nmrjm njz xrɒbh ʃdh ɒst v xdɒvnd mj ɡvjd mn آnɒnj rɒ kh dr mkɒn hɒj blnd ɣrbɒnj mj‌ɡzrɒnnd v brɒj xdɒjɒn xvd bxvrmj svzɒnnd ɒz mvآb nɒbvd xvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd lhzɒ dl mn bh d͡ʒht mvآb msl nɒj sdɒmj knd v dl mn bh d͡ʒht mrdɒn ɣjrhɒrs msl nɒj sdɒ mj‌knd، t͡ʃvnkh dvltj kh thsjl nmvdnd tlf ʃdh ɒst v hr sr bj‌mv ɡʃth vhr rjʃ trɒʃjdh ʃdh ɒst v hmh dsthɒxrɒʃjdh v br hr kmr پlɒs ɒst br hmh پʃt bɒmhɒj mvآb v dr d͡ʒmjʔ kvt͡ʃh hɒjʃ mɒtm ɒst zjrɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd mvآb rɒ msl zrf nɒپsnd ʃksth‌ɒm t͡ʃɡvnh mnhdm ʃdh v ɒjʃɒn t͡ʃɡvnh vlvlh mj‌knnd؟ v mvآb t͡ʃɡvnh bh rsvɒjj پʃt dɒdh ɒst؟ پs mvآb brɒj d͡ʒmjʔ md͡ʒɒvrɒn xvd mzhkh v bɒʔs trs ʃdh ɒst zjrɒ xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒv msl ʔɣɒb پrvɒz xvɒhd krd v bɒlhɒj xvjʃ rɒ br mvآb پhn xvɒhd nmvd ʃhrhɒjʃ ɡrftɒr vɣlʔh hɒjʃ tsxjrʃdh، v dl ʃd͡ʒɒʔɒn mvآb drآn rvz msl dl znj kh drd zh dɒʃth bɒʃd xvɒhdʃd v mvآb xrɒb ʃdh، djɡr ɣvm nxvɒhdbvd t͡ʃvnkh bh zd xdɒvnd tkbr nmvdh ɒst xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd ɒj sɒkn mvآb xvf vhfrh v dɒm پjʃ rvj tv ɒst آnkh ɒz trs bɡrjzd dr hfrh xvɒhd ɒftɒd v آnkh ɒz hfrh brآjd ɡrftɒr dɒm xvɒhd ʃd، zjrɒ xdɒvndfrmvdh ɒst kh sɒl ʔɣvbt ɒjʃɒn rɒ br ɒjʃɒn jʔnj br mvآb xvɒhm آvrd frɒrjɒn bj‌tɒb ʃdh، dr sɒjh hʃbvn ɒjstɒdh‌ɒnd zjrɒ kh آtʃ ɒzhʃbvn v nɒr ɒz mjɒn sjhvn bjrvn آmdh، hdvdmvآb v frɣ sr ftnh ɒŋjzɒn rɒ xvɒhd svzɒnjd vɒj br tv‌ɒj mvآb ɣvm kmvʃ hlɒk ʃdh‌ɒnd zjrɒ kh پsrɒnt bh ɒsjrj v dxtrɒnt bh d͡ʒlɒj vtn ɡrftɒr ɡrdjdh‌ɒndljkn xdɒvndmj ɡvjd kh dr ɒjɒm آxr، ɒsjrɒn mvآb rɒ bɒzxvɒhm آvrd hkm drbɒrh mvآb tɒ ɒjnd͡ʒɒst» ljkn xdɒvndmj ɡvjd kh dr ɒjɒm آxr، ɒsjrɒn mvآb rɒ bɒzxvɒhm آvrd hkm drbɒrh mvآb tɒ ɒjnd͡ʒɒst» drbɒrh bnj ʔmvn، xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj ɡvjd «آjɒ ɒsrɒئjl پsrɒn ndɒrd vآjɒ ɒv rɒ vɒrsj njst؟ پs t͡ʃrɒ mlkm d͡ʒɒd rɒ bh tsrf آvrdh v ɣvm ɒv dr ʃhrhɒjʃ sɒkn ʃdh‌ɒnd؟ lhzɒ ɒjnk xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd ɒjɒmj mj‌آjd kh nʔrh d͡ʒŋ rɒ dr rbh bnj ʔmvn xvɒhm ʃnvɒnjd v tl vjrɒn xvɒhd ɡʃt v dhɒtʃ bh آtʃ svxth xvɒhd ʃd v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh ɒsrɒئjl mtsrfɒn xvjʃ rɒ bh tsrf xvɒhdآvrd» ‌ɒj hʃbvn vlvlh kn، zjrɒ kh ʔɒj xrɒb ʃdh ɒst ɒj dhɒt rbh frjɒd brآvrjd vپlɒs پvʃjdh، mɒtm ɡjrjd v br hsɒrhɒ ɡrdʃ nmɒjjd zjrɒ kh mlkm bɒ kɒhnɒn v srvrɒn xvd bɒhm bh ɒsjrj mj‌rvnd ‌ɒj dxtr mrtd t͡ʃrɒ ɒzvɒdjhɒ jʔnj vɒdjhɒj brvmnd xvd fxrmj nmɒjj؟ ɒj tv kh bh xzɒjn xvd tvkl mj‌nmɒjj v mj‌ɡvjj kjst kh nzd mn tvɒndآmd؟ ɒjnk xdɒvnd jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd «mn ɒz d͡ʒmjʔ md͡ʒɒvrɒnt xvf br tv xvɒhm آvrdv hr jkj ɒz ʃmɒ پjʃ rvj xvd پrɒkndh xvɒhdʃd v ksj nxvɒhd bvd kh پrɒkndɡɒn rɒ d͡ʒmʔ nmɒjd ljkn xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd bʔd ɒz ɒjn ɒsjrɒn bnj ʔmvn rɒ bɒz xvɒhm آvrd» drbɒrh ɒdvm jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «آjɒ djɡr hkmt dr tjmɒn njst؟ v آjɒmʃvrt ɒz fhjmɒn zɒjl ʃdh v hkmt ɒjʃɒn nɒbvd ɡrdjdh ɒst؟ ‌ɒj sɒknɒn ddɒn bɡrjzjd vrv tɒfth dr d͡ʒɒjhɒj ʔmjɣ sɒkn ʃvjd zjrɒ kh blɒj ʔjsv v zmɒn ʔɣvbt vj rɒ br ɒv xvɒhm آvrd ɒɡr ɒŋvrt͡ʃjnɒn nzd tv آjnd، آjɒ bʔzj xvʃh‌hɒ rɒ nmj ɡzɒrnd؟ v ɒɡr dzdɒn dr ʃb آjnd، آjɒ bh ɣdr kfɒjt ɣɒrt nmj nmɒjnd؟ ɒmɒ mn ʔjsv rɒ brhnh sɒxth v d͡ʒɒjhɒj mxfj ɒv rɒ mkʃvf ɡrdɒnjdh‌ɒm kh xvjʃtn rɒ ntvɒndپnhɒn krd zrjt ɒv v brɒdrɒn v hmsɒjɡɒnʃ hlɒk ʃdh‌ɒnd v xvdʃ nɒbvd ɡrdjdh ɒst jtjmɒn xvd rɒ trk kn v mn ɒjʃɒn rɒ zndh ŋɒh xvɒhm dɒʃt v bjvh‌znɒnt br mn tvkl bnmɒjnd zjrɒ xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnk آnɒnj kh rsm ɒjʃɒn nbvd kh ɒjn‌d͡ʒɒm rɒ bnvʃnd، ɒlbth xvɒhnd nvʃjd v آjɒ tv bj‌szɒ xvɒhj mɒnd؟ bj‌szɒ nxvɒhj mɒnd blkh ɒlbth xvɒhj nvʃjd zjrɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd bh zɒt xvdm ɣsm mj‌xvrm kh bsrh mvrd dhʃt v ʔɒr v xrɒbj vlʔnt xvɒhd ʃd v d͡ʒmjʔ ʃhrhɒjʃ xrɒbh ɒbdj xvɒhd ɡʃt ɒz d͡ʒɒnb xdɒvnd xbrj ʃnjdm kh rsvlj nzd ɒmt‌hɒ frstɒdh ʃdh، mj ɡvjd «d͡ʒmʔ ʃvjd v br ɒv hd͡ʒvm آvrjd v brɒj d͡ʒŋ brxjzjd zjrɒ kh hɒn mn tv rɒ kvt͡ʃktrjn ɒmt‌hɒ v dr mjɒn mrdm xvɒr xvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd ‌ɒj kh dr ʃkɒfhɒj sxrh sɒkn hstj v blndj tlhɒ rɒ ɡrfth‌ɒj، hjbt tv v tkbr dlt tv rɒfrjb dɒdh ɒst ɒɡr‌t͡ʃh msl ʔɣɒb آʃjɒnh xvd rɒblnd bsɒzj، xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh mn tv rɒ ɒz آnd͡ʒɒfrvd xvɒhm آvrd v ɒdvm mhl tʔd͡ʒb xvɒhd ɡʃt bh hdj kh hrkh ɒz آn ʔbvr nmɒjdmthjr ʃdh، bh‌sbb hmh sdmɒtʃ sfjr xvɒhdzd xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd t͡ʃnɒnkh sdvm v ʔmvrh v ʃhrhɒj md͡ʒɒvr آnhɒ vɒʒɡvn ʃdh ɒst، hmt͡ʃnɒn ksj dr آnd͡ʒɒ sɒkn nxvɒhd ʃd vɒhdj ɒz bnj آdm dr آn mɒvɒ nxvɒhd ɡzjd ɒjnk ɒv msl ʃjr ɒz tɣjɒn ɒrdn bh آn mskn mnjʔ brxvɒhd آmd، zjrɒ kh mn vj rɒ dr lhzh‌ɒj ɒz آnd͡ʒɒ xvɒhm rɒnd v kjst آn brɡzjdh‌ɒj kh ɒvrɒ br آn bɡmɒrm؟ zjrɒ kjst kh msl mn bɒʃd vkjst kh mrɒ bh mhɒkmh bjɒvrd v kjst آn ʃbɒnj kh bh hzvr mn tvɒnd ɒjstɒd؟» bnɒbrɒjn mʃvrt xdɒvnd rɒ kh drbɒrh ɒdvm nmvdh ɒst v tɣdjrhɒj ɒv rɒ kh drbɒrh sɒknɒn tjmɒn frmvdh ɒst bʃnvjd ɒlbth ɒjʃɒn sɣjrɒn ɡlh rɒ xvɒhnd rbvd v hr آjnh mskn ɒjʃɒn rɒbrɒj ɒjʃɒn xrɒb xvɒhd sɒxt ɒz sdɒj ɒftɒdn ɒjʃɒn zmjn mtzlzl ɡrdjd v آvɒz frjɒdɒjʃɒn tɒ bh bhr ɣlzm msmvʔ ʃd ɒjnk ɒv msl ʔɣɒb brآmdh، پrvɒz mj‌knd v bɒlhɒj xvjʃ rɒ brbsrh پhn mj‌nmɒjd v dl ʃd͡ʒɒʔɒn ɒdvm dr آn rvzmsl dl znj kh drd zh dɒʃth bɒʃd xvɒhd ʃd drbɒrh dmʃɣ «hmɒt v ɒrfɒd xd͡ʒl ɡrdjdh‌ɒnd zjrɒ kh xbr bd ʃnjdh، ɡdɒxth ʃdh‌ɒnd dmʃɣ zʔjf ʃdh، rvbh frɒr nhɒdh v lrzh ɒv rɒdrɡrfth ɒst آlɒm v drdhɒ ɒv rɒ msl znj kh mj‌zɒjd ɡrfth ɒst t͡ʃɡvnh ʃhr nɒmvr v ɣrjh ɒbthɒd͡ʒ mn mtrvk nʃdh ɒst؟ lhzɒ jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd d͡ʒvɒnɒn ɒv dr kvt͡ʃh hɒjʃ xvɒhnd ɒftɒd v hmh mrdɒn d͡ʒŋj ɒv dr آn rvzhlɒk xvɒhnd ʃd v mn آtʃ dr hsɒrhɒj dmʃɣ xvɒhm ɒfrvxt v ɣsrhɒj bnhdd rɒxvɒhd svzɒnjd» drbɒrh ɣjdɒr v mmɒlk hɒsvr kh nbvkdrsr پɒdʃɒh bɒbl آnhɒ rɒ mɣlvb sɒxt، xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «brxjzjd v brɣjdɒrhd͡ʒvm آvrjd v bnj mʃrɣ rɒ tɒrɒd͡ʒ nmɒjjd xjmh‌hɒ v ɡlh hɒj ɒjʃɒn rɒ xvɒhnd ɡrft پrdh‌hɒ v tmɒmj ɒsbɒb v ʃtrɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ brɒj xvjʃtn xvɒhnd brd v br ɒjʃɒn ndɒ xvɒhnd dɒdkh xvf ɒz hr trf bɡrjzjd v bh zvdj hrt͡ʃh tmɒmtr frɒr nmɒjjd ɒj sɒknɒn hɒsvr drd͡ʒɒjhɒj ʔmjɣ sɒkn ʃvjd» zjrɒ xdɒvndmj ɡvjd «nbvkdrsr پɒdʃɒh bɒbl bh zd ʃmɒmʃvrtj krdh v bh xlɒf ʃmɒ tdbjrj nmvdh ɒst xdɒvnd frmvdh ɒst kh brxjzjd v brɒmt mtmئn kh dr ɒmnjt sɒkn‌ɒnd hd͡ʒvm آvrjd ɒjʃɒn rɒ nh drvɒzh‌hɒ v nh پʃt bndhɒ ɒst v bh tnhɒjj sɒkn mj‌bɒʃnd xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh ʃtrɒn ɒjʃɒn tɒrɒd͡ʒ v ksrt mvɒʃj ɒjʃɒn ɣɒrt xvɒhd ʃd v آnɒnj rɒ kh ɡvʃh hɒj mvj xvd rɒ mj trɒʃnd bsvj hr bɒd پrɒkndh xvɒhm sɒxt vhlɒkt ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz hr trf ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm آvrd v hɒsvr mskn ʃɣɒlhɒ v vjrɒnh ɒbdj xvɒhdʃd bh hdj kh ksj dr آn sɒkn nxvɒhd ɡrdjdv ɒhdj ɒz bnj آdm dr آn mɒvɒ nxvɒhd ɡzjd» klɒm xdɒvnd drbɒrh ʔjlɒm kh br ɒrmjɒ nbj dr ɒbtdɒj sltnt sdɣjɒ پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnk mn kmɒn ʔjlɒm v mɒjh ɣvt ɒjʃɒn rɒ xvɒhm ʃkst v t͡ʃhɒr bɒd rɒ ɒz t͡ʃhɒr smt آsmɒn br ʔjlɒm xvɒhm vzɒnjd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ bsvj hmh ɒjn bɒdhɒپrɒkndh xvɒhm sɒxt bh hdj kh hjt͡ʃ ɒmtj nbɒʃd kh پrɒkndɡɒn ʔjlɒm nzd آnhɒ njɒjnd vɒhl ʔjlɒm rɒ bh hzvr dʃmnɒn ɒjʃɒn v bh hzvrآnɒnj kh ɣsd d͡ʒɒn ɒjʃɒn dɒrnd mʃvʃ xvɒhm sɒxt v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh br ɒjʃɒn blɒ jʔnj hdt xʃm xvjʃ rɒ vɒrd xvɒhm آvrd vʃmʃjr rɒ dr ʔɣb ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm frstɒd tɒ ɒjʃɒn rɒ bɒlkl hlɒk sɒzm v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd mn krsj xvd rɒ dr ʔjlɒm brپɒ xvɒhm nmvd vپɒdʃɒh v srvrɒn rɒ ɒz آnd͡ʒɒ nɒbvd xvɒhm sɒxtljkn xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd dr ɒjɒm آxr ɒsjrɒn ʔjlɒm rɒ bɒz xvɒhm آvrd» ljkn xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd dr ɒjɒm آxr ɒsjrɒn ʔjlɒm rɒ bɒz xvɒhm آvrd» klɒmj kh xdɒvnd drbɒrh bɒbl v zmjn kldɒnjɒn bh vɒsth ɒrmjɒ nbj ɡft «drmjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ ɒxbɒr v ɒʔlɒm nmɒjjd، ʔlmj brɒfrɒʃth، ɒʔlɒm nmɒjjd v mxfj mdɒrjd bɡvjjdkh bɒbl ɡrftɒr ʃdh، v bjl xd͡ʒl ɡrdjdh ɒst mrvdk xrd ʃdh v ɒsnɒm ɒv rsvɒ v bthɒjʃ ʃksth ɡrdjdh ɒst zjrɒ kh ɒmtj ɒz trf ʃmɒl br ɒv mj‌آjd v zmjnʃ rɒ vjrɒn xvɒhdsɒxt bh hdj kh ksj dr آn sɒkn nxvɒhd ʃdv hm ɒnsɒn v hm bhɒjm frɒr krdh، xvɒhnd rft xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh dr آn ɒjɒm v dr آn zmɒn bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl v bnj jhvdɒ bɒ hm xvɒhnd آmd ɒjʃɒn ɡrjh‌knɒn xvɒhnd آmd v jhvh xdɒj xvd rɒxvɒhnd tlbjd v rvjhɒj xvd rɒ bsvj shjvn nhɒdh، rɒh آn rɒ xvɒhnd پrsjd v xvɒhndɡft bjɒjjd v bh ʔhd ɒbdj kh frɒmvʃ nʃvd bh xdɒvnd mlsɣ ʃvjm «ɣvm mn ɡvsfndɒn ɡm ʃdh bvdnd v ʃbɒnɒn ɒjʃɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɡmrɒh krdh، br kvhhɒ آvɒrh sɒxtnd ɒz kvh bh tl rfth، آrɒmɡɒh xvd rɒfrɒmvʃ krdnd hr‌kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ mj‌jɒft ɒjʃɒn rɒ mj‌xvrd v dʃmnɒn ɒjʃɒn mj‌ɡftnd kh ɡnɒh ndɒrjm zjrɒ kh bh jhvh kh mskn ʔdɒlt ɒst v bh jhvh kh ɒmjd پdrɒn ɒjʃɒn bvd، ɡnɒh vrzjdnd ɒzmjɒn bɒbl frɒr knjd v ɒz zmjn kldɒnjɒn bjrvn آjjd v mɒnnd bzhɒj nr پjʃ rvj ɡlh rɒh rvjd zjrɒɒjnk mn d͡ʒmʔjt ɒmt hɒj ʔzjm rɒ ɒz zmjn ʃmɒl brmj ɒŋjzɒnm v ɒjʃɒn rɒ br bɒbl mj‌آvrm vɒjʃɒn dr brɒbr آn sf آrɒjj xvɒhnd nmvd v drآnvɣt ɡrftɒr xvɒhd ʃd tjrhɒj ɒjʃɒn msl tjrhɒj d͡ʒbɒr hlɒk knndh kh jkj ɒz آnhɒ xɒlj brŋrdd xvɒhd bvd xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh kldɒnjɒn tɒrɒd͡ʒ xvɒhnd ʃd v hr‌kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɣɒrt nmɒjd sjr xvɒhd ɡʃt zjrɒ ʃmɒ‌ɒj ɣɒrt knndɡɒn mjrɒs mn ʃɒdj v vd͡ʒd krdjd vmɒnnd ɡvsɒlh‌ɒj kh xrmn rɒ پɒjmɒl knd، d͡ʒst vxjz nmvdjd v mɒnnd ɒsbɒn zvrآvr ʃjhh zdjd mɒdr ʃmɒ bsjɒr xd͡ʒl xvɒhd ʃd v vɒldh ʃmɒrsvɒ xvɒhd ɡrdjd hɒn ɒv mvxr ɒmt‌hɒ v bjɒbɒn v zmjn xʃk v ʔrbh xvɒhd ʃd bh‌sbb xʃm xdɒvnd mskvn nxvɒhd ʃd blkh bɒlkl vjrɒn xvɒhd ɡʃt v hr‌kh ɒz bɒbl ʔbvr nmɒjdmthjr ʃdh، bh d͡ʒht tmɒm blɒjɒjʃ sfjr xvɒhdzd ‌ɒj d͡ʒmjʔ kmɒn dɒrɒn dr brɒbr bɒbl ɒz hrtrf sf آrɒjj nmɒjjd tjrhɒ br ɒv bjndɒzjd vdrjɣ mnmɒjjd zjrɒ bh xdɒvnd ɡnɒh vrzjdh ɒst ɒz hr trf br ɒv nʔrh znjd t͡ʃvnkh xvjʃtn rɒtsljm nmvdh ɒst hsɒrhɒjʃ ɒftɒdh vdjvɒrhɒjʃ mnhdm ʃdh ɒst zjrɒ kh ɒjn ɒntɣɒm xdɒvnd ɒst پs ɒz ɒv ɒntɣɒm bɡjrjd v btvrj kh ɒv ʔml nmvdh ɒst hmt͡ʃnɒn bɒ ɒv ʔml nmɒjjd v ɒz bɒbl، brzɡrɒn v آnɒnj rɒ kh dɒs rɒ dr zmɒn drv bkɒr mj‌brnd mnɣtʔ sɒzjd v ɒz trs ʃmʃjr brndh hrks bsvj ɣvm xvd tvd͡ʒh nmɒjd v hr ks bh zmjn xvjʃ bɡrjzd «ɒsrɒئjl msl ɡvsfnd، پrɒkndh ɡrdjd ʃjrɒn ɒv rɒ tʔɒɣb krdnd ɒvl پɒdʃɒh آʃvr ɒv rɒxvrd v آxr ɒjn nbvkdrsr پɒdʃɒh bɒbl ɒstxvɒnhɒj ɒv rɒ xrd krd» bnɒbrɒjn jhvh sbɒjvt xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «ɒjnk mn br پɒdʃɒh bɒbl v br zmjn ɒv ʔɣvbt xvɒhm rsɒnjd t͡ʃnɒnkh br پɒdʃɒh آʃvr ʔɣvbt rsɒnjdm v ɒsrɒئjl rɒ bh mrtʔ xvdʃ bɒz xvɒhm آvrd v dr krml v bɒʃɒn xvɒhd t͡ʃrjd v br kvhstɒn ɒfrɒjm v d͡ʒlʔɒd d͡ʒɒn ɒv sjr xvɒhd ʃd xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh dr آn ɒjɒm v dr آn zmɒn ʔsjɒn ɒsrɒئjl rɒ xvɒhnd d͡ʒst v nxvɒhd bvdv ɡnɒh jhvdɒ rɒ ɒmɒ پjdɒ nxvɒhd ʃd، zjrɒ آnɒnj rɒkh bɒɣj mj‌ɡzɒrm xvɒhm آmrzjd «br zmjn mrɒtɒjm brآj jʔnj br آn v brsɒknɒn fɣvd xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd bkʃ v ɒjʃɒn rɒtʔɒɣb nmvdh، bɒlkl hlɒk kn v mvɒfɣ hr‌آnt͡ʃh mn tv rɒ ɒmr frmɒjm ʔml nmɒ آvɒz d͡ʒŋ vʃkst ʔzjm dr zmjn ɒst kvپɒl tmɒm d͡ʒhɒn t͡ʃɡvnh brjdh v ʃksth ʃdh v bɒbl dr mjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ t͡ʃɡvnh vjrɒn ɡrdjdh ɒst ‌ɒj bɒbl ɒzbrɒj tv dɒm ɡstrdm v tv njz ɡrftɒr ʃdh، ɒtlɒʔ ndɒrj jɒft ʃdh، tsxjr ɡʃth‌ɒj t͡ʃvnkh bɒxdɒvnd mxɒsmh nmvdj xdɒvndɒslhh xɒnh xvd rɒ ɡʃvdh، ɒslhh xʃm xvjʃ rɒ bjrvn آvrdh ɒst zjrɒ xdɒvnd jhvh sbɒjvt bɒ zmjn kldɒnjɒn kɒrj dɒrd br ɒv ɒz hmh ɒtrɒf bjɒjjd v ɒnbɒrhɒj ɒv rɒ bɡʃɒjjd، ɒv rɒ msl tvdh hɒj ɒnbɒʃth bɒlkl hlɒk sɒzjd v t͡ʃjzj ɒzɒv bɒɣj nmɒnd hmh ɡɒvɒnʃ rɒ bh slɒx xɒnh frvd آvrdh، bkʃjd vɒj br ɒjʃɒn zjrɒ kh jvm ɒjʃɒn v zmɒn ʔɣvbt ɒjʃɒn rsjdh ɒst آvɒzfrɒrjɒn v nd͡ʒɒt‌jɒftɡɒn ɒz zmjn bɒbl msmvʔ mj‌ʃvd kh ɒz ɒntɣɒm jhvh xdɒj mɒ v ɒntɣɒm hjkl ɒv dr shjvn ɒxbɒr mj‌nmɒjnd tjrɒndɒzɒn rɒ bh zd bɒbl d͡ʒmʔ knjd ɒj hmɡɒnj kh kmɒn rɒ zh mj‌knjd، dr brɒbr ɒv ɒz hr trf ɒrdv znjd tɒɒhdj rhɒjj njɒbd v br vfɣ ɒʔmɒlʃ ɒv rɒ d͡ʒzɒ dhjd v mtɒbɣ hr‌آnt͡ʃh krdh ɒst bh ɒv ʔml nmɒjjd zjrɒ kh bh zd xdɒvnd v bh zd ɣdvs ɒsrɒئjl tkbr nmvdh ɒst lhzɒ xdɒvndmj ɡvjd kh d͡ʒvɒnɒnʃ dr kvt͡ʃh hɒjʃ xvɒhndɒftɒd v d͡ʒmjʔ mrdɒn d͡ʒŋjʃ dr آn rvz hlɒk xvɒhnd ʃd «ɒjnk xdɒvnd jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd ɒj mtkbr mn br‌zd tv hstm zjrɒ kh jvm tv v zmɒnj kh bh tv ʔɣvbt brsɒnm rsjdh ɒst v آn mtkbr lɣzʃ xvrdh، xvɒhd ɒftɒd v ksj ɒv rɒnxvɒhd brxjzɒnjd v آtʃ dr ʃhrhɒjʃ xvɒhm ɒfrvxt kh tmɒmj hvɒlj آnhɒ rɒ xvɒhdsvzɒnjd jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl v bnj jhvdɒ bɒ hm mzlvm ʃdnd v hmh آnɒnj kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒsjr krdnd ɒjʃɒn rɒ mhkm ŋɒh mj‌dɒrnd v ɒz rhɒ krdn ɒjʃɒn ɒbɒ mj‌nmɒjnd ɒmɒvlj ɒjʃɒn kh ɒsm ɒv jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌bɒʃdzvrآvr ɒst v dʔvj ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒlbth ɒnd͡ʒɒm xvɒhddɒd v zmjn rɒ آrɒmj xvɒhd bxʃjd v sɒknɒn bɒbl rɒ bj‌آrɒm xvɒhd sɒxt xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd ʃmʃjrj br kldɒnjɒn ɒst v br sɒknɒn bɒbl vsrvrɒnʃ v hkjmɒnʃ ʃmʃjrj br kɒzbɒn ɒst v ɒhmɣ xvɒhnd ɡrdjd ʃmʃjrj brd͡ʒbɒrɒn ɒst v mʃvʃ xvɒhnd ʃd ʃmʃjrj br ɒsbɒnʃ v br ɒrɒbh hɒjʃ mj‌bɒʃdv br tmɒmj mxlvɣ mxtlf kh dr mjɒnʃ hstnd vmsl znɒn xvɒhnd ʃd ʃmʃjrj br xzɒnh hɒjʃ ɒst v ɣɒrt xvɒhd ʃd xʃksɒlj brآbhɒjʃ mj‌bɒʃd v xʃk xvɒhd ʃd zjrɒ kh آn zmjn bthɒ ɒst v br ɒsnɒm djvɒnh ʃdh‌ɒnd bnɒbrɒjn vhvʃ shrɒ bɒ ɡrɡɒn sɒkn xvɒhndʃd v ʃtrmrɣ dr آn skvnt xvɒhd dɒʃt v bʔdɒz آn tɒ bh ɒbd mskvn nxvɒhd ʃd v nslɒ bʔdnsl mʔmvr nxvɒhd ɡrdjd» xdɒvndmj ɡvjd «t͡ʃnɒnkh xdɒ sdvm v ʔmvrh vʃhrhɒj md͡ʒɒvr آnhɒ rɒ vɒʒɡvn sɒxt، hmt͡ʃnɒn ksj آnd͡ʒɒ sɒkn nxvɒhd ʃd v ɒhdj ɒz bnj آdm dr آn mɒvɒ nxvɒhd ɡzjd ɒjnk ɣvmj ɒz trf ʃmɒl mj‌آjnd v ɒmtj ʔzjm v پɒdʃɒhɒn bsjɒr ɒzkrɒnh hɒj d͡ʒhɒn brɒŋjxth xvɒhnd ʃd ɒjʃɒn kmɒn v njzh xvɒhnd ɡrft ɒjʃɒn stm پjʃh hstnd v trhm nxvɒhnd nmvd آvɒz ɒjʃɒn msl ʃvrʃ drjɒ ɒst v br ɒsbɒn svɒr ʃdh، dr brɒbrtv‌ɒj dxtr bɒbl msl mrdɒn d͡ʒŋj sf آrɒjj xvɒhnd nmvd پɒdʃɒh bɒbl آvɒzh ɒjʃɒn rɒʃnjd v dsthɒjʃ sst ɡrdjd v ɒlm v drd ɒv rɒmsl znj kh mj‌zɒjd dr‌ɡrfth ɒst ɒjnk ɒvmsl ʃjr ɒz tɣjɒn ɒrdn bh آn mskn mnjʔ brxvɒhd آmd zjrɒ kh mn ɒjʃɒn rɒ dr lhzh‌ɒj ɒzآnd͡ʒɒ xvɒhm rɒnd v kjst آn brɡzjdh‌ɒj kh ɒv rɒbr آn bɡmɒrm؟ zjrɒ kjst kh msl mn bɒʃd vkjst kh mrɒ bh mhɒkmh bjɒvrd v kjst آn ʃbɒnj kh bh hzvr mn tvɒnd ɒjstɒd؟» bnɒbrɒjn mʃvrt xdɒvnd rɒ kh drbɒrh bɒbl nmvdh ɒst vtɣdjrhɒj ɒv rɒ kh drbɒrh zmjn kldɒnjɒn frmvdh ɒst bʃnvjd ɒlbth ɒjʃɒn sɣjrɒn ɡlh rɒ xvɒhndrbvd v hr آjnh mskn ɒjʃɒn rɒ brɒj ɒjʃɒn xrɒb xvɒhd sɒxtɒz sdɒj tsxjr bɒbl zmjn mtzlzl ʃd v آvɒz آn dr mjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ msmvʔ ɡrdjd ɒz sdɒj tsxjr bɒbl zmjn mtzlzl ʃd v آvɒz آn dr mjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ msmvʔ ɡrdjd «xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «ɒjnk mn brbɒbl v br sɒknɒn vstmɣɒvmt knndɡɒnm bɒdj mhlk brmj ɒŋjzɒnm vmn br bɒbl xrmn kvbɒn xvɒhm frstɒd v آn sdɣjɒ br پɒdʃɒh bɒbl ʔɒsj ɡʃt v vɒɣʔ ʃd kh nbvkdrsr پɒdʃɒh bɒbl bɒtmɒmj lʃkr xvd dr rvz dhm mɒh dhm sɒl nhm sltnt xvjʃ br ɒvrʃljm brآmd v dr mɣɒbl آn ɒrdv zdh، sŋrj ɡrdɒɡrdʃ bnɒ nmvdnd vʃhr tɒ sɒl krdh، ɒv rɒbdv znd͡ʒjr bst v پɒdʃɒh bɒbl ɒv rɒ bh bɒbl brdh، vj rɒ tɒ rvz vfɒtʃ dr zndɒn ɒndɒxt v dr rvz dhm mɒh پnd͡ʒm ɒz sɒl nvzdhm sltnt nbvkdrsr mlk پɒdʃɒh bɒbl، nbvzrdɒn rئjs d͡ʒlɒdɒn kh bh hzvr ɒvrʃljm rɒ bhr trf mnhdm sɒxtnd v nbvzrdɒn rئjs d͡ʒlɒdɒn bʔzj ɒz fɣjrɒn xlɣ v bɣjh ɣvm rɒ kh dr ʃhr bɒɣj‌mɒndh bvdnd vxɒrd͡ʒjn rɒ kh btrf پɒdʃɒh bɒbl ʃdh bvdnd v bɣjh d͡ʒmʔjt rɒ bh ɒsjrj brd ɒmɒnbvzrdɒn rئjs d͡ʒlɒdɒn bʔzj ɒz mskjnɒn zmjn rɒ brɒj bɒɣbɒnj vflɒhj vɒɡzɒʃt v kldɒnjɒn stvnhɒj brnd͡ʒjnj kh dr xɒnh xdɒvnd bvd v پɒjh‌hɒ vdrjɒt͡ʃh brnd͡ʒjnj kh dr xɒnh xdɒvnd bvd، ʃkstnd v tmɒmj brnd͡ʒ آnhɒ rɒ bh bɒbl brdnd vdjɡhɒ v xɒkndɒzhɒ v ɡlɡjrhɒ v kɒsh‌hɒ v ɣɒʃɣhɒv tmɒmj ɒsbɒb brnd͡ʒjnj rɒ kh bh آnhɒ xdmt mj krdnd brdnd v rئjs d͡ʒlɒdɒn پjɒlh‌hɒ vmd͡ʒmrhɒ v kɒsh‌hɒ v djɡhɒ v ʃmʔdɒnhɒ v ɣɒʃɣhɒv lɡnhɒ rɒ jʔnj tlɒj آnt͡ʃh rɒ kh ɒz tlɒ bvd vnɣrh آnt͡ʃh rɒ kh ɒz nɣrh bvd brd ɒmɒ dv stvn vjk drjɒt͡ʃh v dvɒzdh ɡɒv brnd͡ʒjnj rɒ kh zjrپɒjh‌hɒ bvd v sljmɒn پɒdʃɒh آnhɒ rɒ brɒj xɒnh xdɒvnd sɒxth bvd brnd͡ʒ hmh ɒjn ɒsbɒb bj‌ɒndɒzh bvd v ɒmɒ stvnhɒ، blndj jkstvn hd͡ʒdh zrɒʔ v rjsmɒn dvɒzdh zrɒʔj آnhɒ rɒɒhɒth dɒʃt v hd͡ʒm آn t͡ʃhɒr ɒŋʃt bvd v thj bvd v tɒd͡ʒ brnd͡ʒjn br srʃ v blndj jktɒd͡ʒ پnd͡ʒ zrɒʔ bvd v ʃbkh vɒnɒrhɒ ɡrdɒɡrd tɒd͡ʒ hmh ɒzbrnd͡ʒ bvd v stvn dvm msl ɒjnhɒ v ɒnɒrhɒ dɒʃt v bhr trf nvd v ʃʃ ɒnɒr bvd v tmɒm ɒnɒrhɒ bh ɒtrɒf ʃbkh jksd bvd v rئjs d͡ʒlɒdɒn، srɒjɒ rئjs khnh، v sfnjɒj kɒhn dvm v sh msthfz dr rɒ ɡrft v srdɒrj rɒ kh brmrdɒn d͡ʒŋj ɡmɒʃth ʃdh bvd v hft nfr ɒz آnɒnj rɒ kh rvj پɒdʃɒh rɒ mj‌djdnd v dr ʃhr jɒft ʃdnd v kɒtb srdɒr lʃkr rɒ kh ɒhl vlɒjt rɒsɒn jhvjɒɣjm پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒvɒɣʔ ʃd kh ɒvjl mrvdk پɒdʃɒh bɒbl dr sɒl ɒvl sltnt xvd sr jhvjɒɣjm پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ rɒ ɒzzndɒn brɒfrɒʃt v bɒ ɒv sxnɒn dlɒvjz ɡft vkrsj ɒv rɒ bɒlɒtr ɒz krsjhɒj sɒjr پɒdʃɒhɒnj kh bɒ ɒv dr bɒbl bvdnd ɡzɒʃtv lbɒs zndɒnj ɒv rɒtbdjl nmvd v ɒv dr tmɒmj rvzhɒj ʔmrʃ hmjʃh nzd vj nɒn mj‌xvrd v lbɒs zndɒnj ɒv rɒtbdjl nmvd v ɒv dr tmɒmj rvzhɒj ʔmrʃ hmjʃh nzd vj nɒn mj‌xvrd t͡ʃɡvnh ʃhrj kh پr drmjɒn d͡ʒɒjhɒj tŋ bh ɒv dr‌rsjdh‌ɒnd rɒhhɒj shjvn mɒtm mj‌ɡjrnd، t͡ʃvnkh ksj bh ʔjdhɒj ɒv nmj آjd hmh drvɒzh hɒjʃ xrɒb ʃdh، kɒhnɒnʃ آh mj‌kʃnd dvʃjzɡɒnʃ dr mrɒrt mj‌bɒʃnd v xvdʃ dr tlxj xsmɒnʃ sr v xvdʃ njz آh mj‌kʃd v bh ʔɣb brɡʃth ɒst nd͡ʒɒst ɒv dr dɒmnʃ mj‌bɒʃd v آxrt xvjʃ rɒ bh jɒd nmj آvrd v btvr ʔd͡ʒjb پst ɡrdjdh، brɒj vj tslj dhndh‌ɒj njst ɒj jhvh mzlt mrɒ bbjn zjrɒ kh dʃmn tkbr nmɒ zjrɒ kh nɒlh hɒj mn bsjɒr ɒst v dlm bjtɒb ʃdh ɒst shjvn rɒ bh zlmt پvʃɒnjdh v d͡ʒlɒl ɒsrɒئjl rɒ ɒz آsmɒn bh zmjn ɒfkndh ɒst vɣdmɡɒh xvjʃ rɒ dr rvz xʃm xvd bh jɒdnjɒvrdh ɒst xdɒvnd tmɒmj mskn hɒj shjvn njkv mnzrbvdnd bh ɣtl rsɒnjdh، ɣzb xvjʃ rɒ msl آtʃ rjxth ɒst xdɒvnd msl dʃmn ʃdh، ɒsrɒئjl rɒ hlɒk krdh v tmɒmj ɣsrhɒjʃ rɒ mnhdm sɒxth vɣlʔh hɒjʃ rɒ xrɒb nmvdh ɒst v brɒj dxtrjhvdɒ mɒtm v nɒlh v srvrɒnʃ dr mjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ mj‌bɒʃnd vhjt͡ʃ ʃrjʔtj njst v ɒnbjɒj ɒv njz rvjɒ ɒz d͡ʒɒnb jhvh nmj bjnnd mʃɒjx dxtr shjvn br zmjn nʃsth، xɒmvʃ mj‌bɒʃnd، v xɒk br sr ɒfʃɒndh، پlɒs mj‌پvʃnd v dvʃjzɡɒn ɒvrʃljm mɒdrɒn xvjʃ mj‌ɡvjnd ɡndm vʃrɒb kd͡ʒɒ ɒst؟ zjrɒ kh msl md͡ʒrvhɒn drkvt͡ʃh hɒj ʃhr bjhvʃ mj‌ɡrdnd، v d͡ʒɒnhɒj xvjʃ rɒ bh آɣvʃ mɒdrɒn xvd mj‌rjznd brɒj tv t͡ʃh ʃhɒdt tvɒnm آvrd v tv rɒ bh t͡ʃh t͡ʃjz tʃbjh tvɒnm nmvd‌ɒj dxtr ɒvrʃljm vt͡ʃh t͡ʃjz rɒ bh tv mɣɒblh nmvdh، tv rɒ‌ɒj dvʃjzh dxtr shjvn tslj dhm zjrɒ kh ʃkstɡj tvmsl drjɒ ʔzjm ɒst v kjst kh tv rɒ ʃfɒ tvɒnddɒd ɒnbjɒj tv rvjɒhɒj drvɣ v bɒtl brɒjt djdh‌ɒnd v ɡnɒhɒnt rɒ kʃf nkrdh‌ɒnd tɒ tv rɒ ɒzɒsjrj brɡrdɒnnd، blkh vhj kɒzb v ɒsbɒb پrɒkndɡj brɒj tv djdh‌ɒnd d͡ʒmjʔ rh ɡzrjɒn brtv dstk mj‌znnd vsxrjh nmvdh، srhɒj xvd rɒ br dxtr ɒvrʃljm mj‌d͡ʒnbɒnnd v mj‌ɡvjnd آjɒ ɒjn ɒst ʃhrj kh آn rɒ kmɒl zjbɒjj v ɒbthɒd͡ʒ tmɒm zmjn mj‌xvɒndnd؟ d͡ʒmjʔ dʃmnɒnt، dhɒn xvd rɒ br tvɡʃvdh ɒsthzɒ mj‌nmɒjnd v dndɒnhɒj xvd rɒ bh hm ɒfʃrdh، mj‌ɡvjnd kh آn rɒ hlɒk sɒxtjm ɒlbth ɒjn‌rvzj ɒst kh ɒntzɒr آn rɒ mj‌kʃjdjm، hɒl آn rɒ پjdɒ nmvdh v mʃɒhdh krdh‌ɒjm jhvh آnt͡ʃh rɒ kh ɣsd nmvdh ɒst bd͡ʒɒآvrdh v klɒmj rɒ kh ɒz ɒjɒm ɣdjm frmvdh bvd bh ɒnd͡ʒɒm rsɒnjdh، آn rɒ hlɒk krdh v ʃfɣt nnmvdh ɒst v dʃmnt rɒ brtv msrvr ɡrdɒnjdh، ʃɒx xsmɒnt rɒ brɒfrɒʃth ɒst dl ɒjʃɒn nzd xdɒvnd frjɒd brآvrdh، mj ɡvjd ɒj djvɒr dxtr shjvn، ʃbɒnh‌rvzmsl rvd ɒʃk brjz v xvd rɒ آrɒmj mdh vmrdmk t͡ʃʃmt rɒht nbjnd ʃbɒŋɒh dr ɒbtdɒj پɒshɒ brxɒsth، frjɒdbrآvr v dl xvd rɒ msl آb پjʃ rvj xdɒvndbrjz v dsthɒj xvd rɒ bh‌xɒtr d͡ʒɒn ɒtfɒlt kh ɒz ɡrsŋj bh‌sr hrkvt͡ʃh bjhvʃ mj‌ɡrdnd nzd ɒv brɒfrɒz، vbɡv ɒj jhvh bŋr v mlɒhzh frmɒ kh t͡ʃnjn ʔml rɒ bh t͡ʃh ks nmvdh‌ɒj آjɒ mj‌ʃvd kh znɒn mjvh rhm xvd v ɒtfɒlj rɒ kh bh nɒz پrvrdh bvdnd bxvrnd؟ v آjɒ mj‌ʃvd kh kɒhnɒn v ɒnbjɒ drmɣds xdɒvnd kʃth ʃvnd؟ d͡ʒvɒnɒn v پjrɒn dr kvt͡ʃh‌hɒ br zmjn mj‌xvɒbnd dvʃjzɡɒn v d͡ʒvɒnɒn mn bh ʃmʃjrɒftɒdh‌ɒnd dr rvz ɣzb xvd ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh ɣtl rsɒnjdh، kʃtj v ʃfɣt nnmvdjtrshɒj mrɒ ɒz hrtrf msl rvz ʔjdxvɒndj v ksj nbvd kh dr rvz ɣzb jhvh nd͡ʒɒt jɒbd jɒ bɒɣj mɒnd v آnɒnj rɒ kh bh nɒz پrvrdh v trbjt nmvdh bvdm dʃmn mn ɒjʃɒn rɒ tlf nmvdh ɒst trshɒj mrɒ ɒz hrtrf msl rvz ʔjdxvɒndj v ksj nbvd kh dr rvz ɣzb jhvh nd͡ʒɒt jɒbd jɒ bɒɣj mɒnd v آnɒnj rɒ kh bh nɒz پrvrdh v trbjt nmvdh bvdm dʃmn mn ɒjʃɒn rɒ tlf nmvdh ɒst mn آn mrd hstm kh ɒz ʔsɒj ɣzb vj mzlt djdh‌ɒm ɒv mrɒ rhbrj nmvdh، bh tɒrjkj dr‌آvrdh ɒst v nh bh rvʃnɒjj bh drstj kh dst xvjʃ rɒ tmɒmj rvz bh zd mn bɒrhɒ brɡrdɒnjdh ɒst ɡvʃt v پvst mrɒ mndrs sɒxth vɒstxvɒnhɒjm rɒ xrd krdh ɒst bh zd mn bnɒ nmvdh، mrɒ bh tlxj v mʃɣt ɒhɒth krdh ɒst mrɒ msl آnɒnj kh ɒz ɣdjm mrdh‌ɒnd dr tɒrjkj nʃɒnjdh ɒst ɡrd mn hsɒr kʃjdh kh ntvɒnm bjrvn آmd vznd͡ʒjr mrɒ sŋjn sɒxth ɒst v njz t͡ʃvn frjɒd v ɒstɣɒsh mj‌nmɒjm dʔɒj mrɒ mnʔ mj‌knd rɒhhɒj mrɒ bɒ sŋhɒj trɒʃjdh sd krdh ɒst v trjɣhɒjm rɒ kd͡ʒ nmvdh ɒst ɒv brɒj mn xrsj ɒst dr kmjn nʃsth vʃjrj kh dr bjʃh xvd mj‌bɒʃd rɒh mrɒ mnhrf sɒxth، mrɒ drjdh ɒst vmrɒ mbhvt ɡrdɒnjdh ɒst kmɒn xvd rɒ zh krdh، mrɒ brɒj tjrhɒj xvjʃ، hdf sɒxth ɒst v tjrhɒj trkʃ xvd rɒ bh ɡrdh hɒj mn frv brdh ɒst mn bh d͡ʒht tmɒmj ɣvm xvd mzhkh vtmɒmj rvz srvd ɒjʃɒn ʃdh‌ɒm mrɒ bh tlxjhɒ sjr krdh v mrɒ bh ɒfsntjn mst ɡrdɒnjdh ɒst dndɒnhɒjm rɒ bh sŋ rjzhɒ ʃksth v mrɒ bh xɒkstr پvʃɒnjdh ɒst tv d͡ʒɒn mrɒ ɒz slɒmtj dvr ɒndɒxtj v mn sʔɒdtmndj rɒ frɒmvʃ krdm، v ɡftm kh ɣvt v ɒmjd mn ɒz jhvh tlf ʃdh ɒst mzlt v ʃɣɒvt mrɒ ɒfsntjn v tlxj bh jɒdآvr tv ɒlbth bh jɒd xvɒhj آvrd zjrɒ kh d͡ʒɒn mn dr mn mnhnj ʃdh ɒst v mn آn rɒ dr dl xvd xvɒhm ɡzrɒnjd v ɒzɒjn sbb ɒmjdvɒr xvɒhm bvd ɒz rɒft hɒj xdɒvnd ɒst kh tlf nʃdjm zjrɒ kh rhmt hɒj ɒv bj‌zvɒl ɒst آnhɒ hr sbh tɒzh mj‌ʃvd v ɒmɒnt tv bsjɒrɒst v d͡ʒɒn mn mj‌ɡvjd kh xdɒvnd nsjb mn ɒst، bnɒbrɒjn br ɒv ɒmjdvɒrm xdɒvnd bh d͡ʒht ksɒnj kh br ɒv tvkl dɒrnd v brɒj آnɒnj kh ɒv rɒ mj‌tlbnd njkv ɒst xvb ɒst kh ɒnsɒn ɒmjdvɒr bɒʃd v bɒskvt ɒntzɒr nd͡ʒɒt xdɒvnd rɒ bkʃd brɒj ɒnsɒn njkv ɒst kh jvɣ rɒ dr d͡ʒvɒnj xvd brdɒrd bh tnhɒjj bnʃjnd v sɒkt bɒʃd zjrɒ kh ɒvآn rɒ br vj nhɒdh ɒst dhɒn xvd rɒ br xɒk bɡzɒrd kh ʃɒjd ɒmjdbɒʃd rxsɒr xvd rɒ bh znndɡɒn bsپɒrd v ɒzxd͡ʒɒlt sjr ʃvd zjrɒ xdɒvnd tɒ bh ɒbd ɒv rɒ trk nxvɒhdnmvd zjrɒ ɒɡr‌t͡ʃh ksj rɒ mhzvn sɒzd ljkn brhsb ksrt rɒft xvd rhmt xvɒhd frmvd t͡ʃvnkh bnj آdm rɒ ɒz dl xvd nmj rnd͡ʒɒnd vmhzvn nmj sɒzd tmɒmj ɒsjrɒn zmjn rɒ zjr پɒ پɒjmɒl krdn، v mnhrf sɒxtn hɣ ɒnsɒn bh hzvrhzrt ɒʔlj، v mnɣlb nmvdn آdmj dr dʔvjʃ mnzvrxdɒvnd njst kjst kh bɡvjd v vɒɣʔ ʃvd ɒɡr xdɒvndɒmr nfrmvdh bɒʃd آjɒ ɒz frmɒn hzrt ɒʔlj hm bdj v hm njkvjj sɒdr nmj ʃvd؟ پs t͡ʃrɒ ɒnsɒn tɒ zndh ɒst v آdmj bh‌sbb szɒj ɡnɒhɒn xvjʃ ʃkɒjt knd؟ rɒhhɒj xvd rɒ td͡ʒss v tfhs bnmɒjjm v bsvj xdɒvnd bɒzɡʃt knjm dlhɒ v dsthɒj xvjʃ rɒ bsvj xdɒjj kh dr آsmɒn ɒst brɒfrɒzjm، v bɡvjjm «mɒ ɡnɒh krdjm v ʔsjɒn vrzjdjm v tv ʔfv nfrmvdj xvjʃtn rɒ bh ɣzb پvʃɒnjdh، mɒ rɒ tʔɒɣb nmvdj v mɒ ʔɒrz ɡrdjdh ɒst bh‌sbb hlɒkt dxtr ɣvm mn، nhrhɒj آb ɒz t͡ʃʃmɒnm mj‌rjzd t͡ʃʃm mn blɒ ɒnɣtɒʔ d͡ʒɒrj ɒst v bɒznmj ɒjstd tɒ xdɒvnd ɒz آsmɒn mlɒhzh nmɒjd v bbjnd t͡ʃʃmɒnm bh d͡ʒht d͡ʒmjʔ dxtrɒn ʃhrm، d͡ʒɒn mrɒ mj‌rnd͡ʒɒnd آnɒnj kh bj‌sbb dʃmn mnnd mrɒ msl mrɣ bʃdt tʔɒɣb mj‌nmɒjnd d͡ʒɒn mrɒ dr sjɒh t͡ʃɒl mnɣtʔ sɒxtnd vsŋhɒ br mn‌ɒndɒxtnd آbhɒ ɒz sr mn ɡzʃt پs ɡftm mnɣtʔ ʃdm آŋɒh‌ɒj xdɒvnd، ɒz ʔmɣ hɒj sjɒh t͡ʃɒl ɒsm tv rɒ xvɒndm آvɒz mrɒ ʃnjdj، پs ɡvʃ xvd rɒ ɒz آh vɒstɣɒsh mn mپvʃɒn dr rvzj kh tv rɒ xvɒndm nzdjk ʃdh، frmvdj kh ntrs ‌ɒj xdɒvnd dʔvj d͡ʒɒn mrɒ ɒnd͡ʒɒm dɒdh v hjɒt mrɒ fdjh nmvdh‌ɒj ‌ɒj xdɒvnd zlmj rɒ kh bh mn nmvdh ɒnddjdh‌ɒj پs mrɒ dɒdrsj frmɒ tmɒmj kjnh ɒjʃɒn v hmh tdbjrhɒjj rɒ kh bh zd mn krdnd djdh‌ɒj ‌ɒj xdɒvnd mzmt ɒjʃɒn rɒ v hmh tdbjrhɒjj rɒ kh bh zd mn krdnd ʃnjdh‌ɒj sxnɒn mɣɒvmt knndɡɒnm rɒ v fkrhɒjj rɒkh tmɒmj rvz bh zd mn dɒrnd dɒnsth‌ɒj nʃstn v brxɒstn ɒjʃɒn rɒ mlɒhzh frmɒzjrɒ kh mn srvd ɒjʃɒn ʃdh‌ɒm ‌ɒj xdɒvnd mvɒfɣ ɒʔmɒl dsthɒj ɒjʃɒn mkɒfɒt bh ɒjʃɒn brsɒn ɣʃɒvh ɣlb bh ɒjʃɒn bdh v lʔnt tv brɒjʃɒn bɒdɒjʃɒn rɒ bh ɣzb tʔɒɣb nmvdh، ɒz zjrآsmɒnhɒj xdɒvnd hlɒk kn ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh ɣzb tʔɒɣb nmvdh، ɒz zjrآsmɒnhɒj xdɒvnd hlɒk kn t͡ʃɡvnh tlɒ zŋ ɡrfth v zr xɒls mnɣlb ɡrdjdh ɒst؟ sŋhɒj ɣds bh‌sr hrkvt͡ʃh rjxth ʃdh ɒst t͡ʃɡvnh پsrɒn ɡrɒnbhɒj shjvn kh bh zr nɒb brɒbr mj‌bvdnd msl zrvf sfɒljn kh ʔml dst kvzh‌ɡr bɒʃd ʃmrdh ʃdh‌ɒnd ʃɣɒlhɒ tjz پstɒnhɒj xvd rɒ bjrvn آvrdh، bt͡ʃh hɒj xvjʃ rɒ ʃjr mj‌dhnd ɒmɒ dxtr ɣvm mn mɒnnd ʃtr mrɣ brj، bjrhm ɡrdjdh ɒst zbɒn ɒtfɒl ʃjrxvɒrh ɒz tʃŋj bh kɒm ɒjʃɒn mj‌t͡ʃsbd، v kvdkɒn nɒn mj‌xvɒhnd vksj bh ɒjʃɒn nmj dhd آnɒnj kh xvrɒk lzjz mj‌xvrnd dr kvt͡ʃh hɒ bjnvɒ ɡʃth‌ɒnd آnɒnj kh dr lbɒs ɣrmz trbjt jɒfth‌ɒnd mzblh‌hɒ rɒ dr آɣvʃ mj‌kʃnd zjrɒ kh ʔsjɒn dxtr ɣvm mn ɒz ɡnɒh sdvm zjɒdh ɒst، kh dr lhzh‌ɒj vɒʒɡvn ʃd v ksj dst xvjʃ v آnhɒ dr hlɒkt dxtr ɣvm mn ɣzɒj ɒjʃɒn hstnd xdɒvnd ɣzb xvd rɒ bh ɒtmɒm rsɒnjdh، hdt xʃm xvjʃ rɒ rjxth ɒst، v آtʃj drshjvn ɒfrvxth kh ɒsɒs آn rɒ svzɒnjdh ɒst پɒdʃɒhɒn d͡ʒhɒn v d͡ʒmjʔ sknh rbʔ mskvn bɒvr nmj krdnd kh ʔdv v dʃmn bh drvɒzh hɒj ɒvrʃljm dɒxl ʃvd bh‌sbb ɡnɒh ɒnbjɒ v ɡnɒh kɒhnɒnʃ، kh xvn ʔɒdlɒn rɒ dr ɒndrvnʃ rjxtnd msl kvrɒn dr kvt͡ʃh‌hɒ nvɒn mj‌ʃvnd v ɒzxvn nd͡ʒs ʃdh‌ɒnd، kh lbɒs ɒjʃɒn rɒ lms nmj tvɒnnd krd v bh ɒjʃɒn ndɒ mj‌knnd kh dvr ʃvjd، nd͡ʒs hstjd dvr ʃvjd dvr ʃvjd v lms mnmɒjjd t͡ʃvn frɒr mj‌krdnd nvɒn mj‌ʃdnd v dr mjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ mj‌ɡftnd kh dr ɒjnd͡ʒɒ djɡr tvɣf nxvɒhnd krd xʃm xdɒvnd ɒjʃɒn rɒ پrɒkndh sɒxth vɒjʃɒn rɒ djɡr mnzvr nxvɒhd dɒʃt bh kɒhnɒn ɒjʃɒn ɒʔtnɒ nmj knnd v br mʃɒjx، rɒft ndɒrnd t͡ʃʃmɒn mɒ tɒ hɒl dr ɒntzɒr ɒʔɒnt bɒtl mɒkɒhjdh mj‌ʃvd br djdh bɒŋɒhhɒj xvd ɒntzɒrkʃjdjm، brɒj ɒmtj kh nd͡ʒɒt nmj tvɒnnd dɒd ɣdmhɒj mɒ rɒ tʔɒɣb nmvdnd bh hdj kh drkvt͡ʃh hɒj xvd rɒh nmj tvɒnjm rft آxrt mɒnzdjk ɒst v rvzhɒj mɒ tmɒm ʃdh zjrɒ kh ɒd͡ʒl mɒ rsjdh ɒst tʔɒɣb knndɡɒn mɒ ɒz ʔɣɒbhɒj hvɒtjzrvtrɒnd mɒ rɒ br kvhhɒ tʔɒɣb mj‌knnd v brɒj mɒ dr shrɒ kmjn mj‌ɡzɒrnd msjh xdɒvnd kh nfxh bjnj mɒ mj‌bvd drhfrh hɒj ɒjʃɒn ɡrftɒr ʃd، kh drbɒrh ɒvmj ɡftm zjr sɒjh ɒv dr mjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ، zjst xvɒhjm nmvd msrvr bɒʃ v ʃɒdj kn‌ɒj dxtr ɒdvm kh dr zmjn ʔvs sɒkn hstj br tv njz ɒjn‌d͡ʒɒm xvɒhd rsjd v mst ʃdh، ʔrjɒn xvɒhj ʃd‌ɒj dxtr shjvn szɒj ɡnɒh tv tmɒm ʃd vtv rɒ djɡr d͡ʒlɒj vtn nxvɒhd sɒxt ɒj dxtrɒdvm، ʔɣvbt ɡnɒh tv rɒ bh tv xvɒhd rsɒnjd vɡnɒhɒn tv rɒ kʃf xvɒhd nmvd ‌ɒj dxtr shjvn szɒj ɡnɒh tv tmɒm ʃd vtv rɒ djɡr d͡ʒlɒj vtn nxvɒhd sɒxt ɒj dxtrɒdvm، ʔɣvbt ɡnɒh tv rɒ bh tv xvɒhd rsɒnjd vɡnɒhɒn tv rɒ kʃf xvɒhd nmvd ɒj jhvh آnt͡ʃh br mɒ vɒɣʔ ʃd bh jɒd آvr vmlɒhzh frmvdh، ʔɒr mɒ rɒ bbjn mjrɒs mɒ ɒz آn ɣrjbɒn v xɒnh hɒj mɒ ɒz آn ɒd͡ʒnbjɒn ɡrdjdh ɒst mɒ jtjm v mj‌jɒbjm پvst mɒ bh‌sbb smvm ɣht msl tnvrsvxth ʃdh ɒst znɒn rɒ dr shjvn bj‌ʔsmt krdnd vdvʃjzɡɒn rɒ dr ʃhrhɒj jhvdɒ srvrɒn ɒz dst ɒjʃɒn bh dɒr kʃjdh ʃdh v bh mʃɒjx ɒʔtnɒ nnmvdnd d͡ʒvɒnɒn sŋhɒj آsjɒ rɒ brmj dɒrnd vkvdkɒn zjr bɒr hjzm mj‌ɒftnd mʃɒjx ɒz drvɒzh‌hɒ nɒbvd ʃdnd v d͡ʒvɒnɒn ɒznɣmh srɒjj xvjʃ ʃɒdj dl mɒ njst ʃd v rɣs mɒ bh mɒtm mbdl ɡrdjd tɒd͡ʒ ɒz sr mɒ ɒftɒd، vɒj br mɒ zjrɒ kh ɡnɒh krdjm ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht dl mɒ bjtɒb ʃdh ɒst v bh‌sbb ɒjn t͡ʃjzhɒ t͡ʃʃmɒn mɒ tɒr ɡrdjdh ɒst jʔnj bh‌xɒtr kvh shjvn kh vjrɒn ʃd vrvbɒhɒn dr آn ɡrdʃ mj‌knnd ɒmɒ tv‌ɒj jhvh tɒ ɒbdɒlɒbɒd d͡ʒlvs mj‌frmɒjj v krsj tv tɒ d͡ʒmjʔ dhrhɒ xvɒhdbvd پs brɒj t͡ʃh mɒ rɒ tɒ bh ɒbd frɒmvʃ krdh vmɒ rɒ mdt mdjdj trk nmvdh‌ɒj‌ɒj jhvh mɒ rɒ bsvj xvd brɡrdɒn vbɒzɡʃt xvɒhjm krd v ɒjɒm mɒ rɒ msl zmɒn slf tɒzh kn ‌ɒj jhvh mɒ rɒ bsvj xvd brɡrdɒn vbɒzɡʃt xvɒhjm krd v ɒjɒm mɒ rɒ msl zmɒn slf tɒzh kn v rvz پnd͡ʒm mɒh t͡ʃhɒrm sɒl sj‌ɒm، t͡ʃvn mn dr mjɒn ɒsjrɒn nzd nhr xɒbvr bvdm، vɒɣʔ ʃd kh آsmɒn ɡʃvdh ɡrdjd v rvjɒhɒj xdɒrɒ djdm dr dsthɒj ɒnsɒn bvd v آn t͡ʃhɒr rvjhɒ v bɒlhɒj xvd rɒ t͡ʃnjn dɒʃtnd v bɒlhɒj آnhɒ bh jkdjɡrپjvsth bvd v t͡ʃvn mj‌rftnd rv nmj tɒftnd، blkh hrjk bh rɒh mstɣjm mj‌rftnd v ɒmɒ ʃbɒht rvjhɒj آnhɒ ɒjn bvd kh آnhɒ rvj ɒnsɒn dɒʃtndv آn t͡ʃhɒr rvj ʃjr btrf rɒst dɒʃtnd v آn t͡ʃhɒr rvj ɡɒv btrf t͡ʃپ dɒʃtnd v آn t͡ʃhɒr rvj ʔɣɒb dɒʃtnd v rvjhɒ v bɒlhɒj آnhɒ ɒztrf bɒlɒ ɒz jkdjɡr d͡ʒdɒ bvd v dv bɒl hrjk bh hmdjɡr پjvsth v dv bɒl djɡr bdn آnhɒ rɒmj پvʃɒnjd v hr jk ɒz آnhɒ bh rɒh mstɣjm mj‌rftnd v bh hr d͡ʒɒjj kh rvh mj‌rft آnhɒmj rftnd v drhjn rftn rv nmj tɒftnd v ɒmɒ ʃbɒht ɒjn hjvɒnɒt ɒjn bvd kh svrt آnhɒ mɒnnd ʃʔlh hɒj ɒxɡrhɒj آtʃ ɒfrvxth ʃdh، msl svrt mʃʔlhɒ bvd v آn آtʃ dr mjɒn آn hjvɒnɒt ɡrdʃ mj‌krd vdrxʃɒn mj‌bvd v ɒz mjɒn آtʃ brɣ mj‌d͡ʒhjd v آn hjvɒnɒt msl svrt brɣ mj‌dvjdnd vbrmj dɒʃtnd vsvrt v snʔt آnhɒ msl t͡ʃrx dr mjɒn t͡ʃrx bvd v t͡ʃvn آnhɒ mj‌rftnd، br t͡ʃhɒr d͡ʒɒnb xvdmj rftnd v dr hjn rftn bh hjt͡ʃ trf mjl nmj krdnd v flkh hɒj آnhɒ blnd v mhjb bvd vflkh hɒj آn t͡ʃhɒr ɒz hr trf ɒz t͡ʃʃmhɒ پr bvd v t͡ʃvn آn hjvɒnɒt mj‌rftnd، t͡ʃrxhɒ drپhlvj آnhɒ mj‌rft v t͡ʃvn آn hjvɒnɒt ɒz zmjn blnd mj‌ʃdnd، t͡ʃrxhɒ blnd mj‌ʃd v hr d͡ʒɒjj kh rvh mj‌rft آnhɒ mj‌rftnd، bh hr d͡ʒɒ kh rvh sjr mj‌krd v t͡ʃrxhɒ پjʃ rvj آnhɒ blndmj ʃd، zjrɒ kh rvh hjvɒnɒt dr t͡ʃrxhɒ bvd v t͡ʃvn آnhɒ mj‌rftnd، ɒjnhɒ mj‌rft v t͡ʃvn آnhɒ mj‌ɒjstɒdnd، ɒjnhɒ mj‌ɒjstɒd v t͡ʃvn آnhɒ ɒzzmjn blnd mj‌ʃdnd، t͡ʃrxhɒ پjʃ rvj آnhɒ ɒzzmjn blnd mj‌ʃd، zjrɒ rvh hjvɒnɒt dr t͡ʃrxhɒbvd v ʃbɒht flkj kh bɒlɒj sr hjvɒnɒt bvdmsl mnzr blvr mhjb bvd v bɒlɒj sr آnhɒ پhn ʃdh bvd v bɒlhɒj آnhɒ zjr flk bsvj jkdjɡr mstɣjm bvd v dv bɒl hrjk ɒz ɒjn trf mj‌پvʃɒnjd v dv bɒl hr jk ɒz آn trf bdnhɒj آnhɒ rɒ mj‌پvʃɒnjd v t͡ʃvn mj‌rftnd، mn sdɒj bɒlhɒj آnhɒ rɒ mɒnnd sdɒj آbhɒj bsjɒr، msl آvɒz hzrt ɒʔlj v kh br sr آnhɒ bvdʃbɒht txtj msl svrt jɒɣvt kbvd bvd vbrآn ʃbɒht txt، ʃbɒhtj msl svrt ɒnsɒn brfvɣ آn bvd v ɒz mnzr kmr ɒv btrf bɒlɒ msl mnzr brnd͡ʒ tɒbɒn، mɒnnd nmɒjʃ آtʃ dr ɒndrvn آn v ɡrdɒɡrdʃ t͡ʃvn آn rɒ djdm، bh rvj xvd dr‌ɒftɒdm v آvɒzɣɒئlj rɒ ʃnjdm، mɒnnd nmɒjʃ ɣvs ɣzh kh dr rvzbɒrɒn dr ɒbr mj‌bɒʃd، hmt͡ʃnjn آn drxʃndɡj ɡrdɒɡrd آn bvd ɒjn mnzr ʃbɒht d͡ʒlɒl jhvh bvd v t͡ʃvn آn rɒ bɒlhɒj آn hjvɒnɒt rɒ kh bh hmdjɡr brmj xvrdnd v sdɒj t͡ʃrxhɒ rɒ kh پjʃ rvj آnhɒ bvd v sdɒj ɡlbɒŋ ʔzjmj rɒʃnjdm آŋɒh rvh mrɒ brdɒʃt v brd v bɒ tlxj dr hrɒrt rvh xvd rftm v dst xdɒvnd br mn sŋjn thdjd nknj v sxn ŋvjj tɒ آn ʃrjr rɒ ɒz trjɣ zʃt ɒvthdjd nmvdh، ɒv rɒ zndh sɒzj، آŋɒh آn ʃrjr drɡnɒhʃ xvɒhd mrd، ɒmɒ xvn ɒv rɒ ɒz dst tvxvɒhm tlbjd ljkn ɒɡr tv mrd ʃrjr rɒ thdjdknj v ɒv ɒz ʃrɒrt xvd v trjɣ bd xvjʃ bɒzɡʃt nknd ɒv dr ɡnɒh xvd xvɒhd mrd، ɒmɒ tvd͡ʒɒn xvd rɒ nd͡ʒɒt dɒdh‌ɒj v ɒɡr mrd ʔɒdl ɒzʔdɒlt xvd brɡrdd v ɡnɒh vrzd v mn sŋj msɒdm پjʃ vj bnhm tɒ bmjrd، t͡ʃvnkh tv ɒv rɒthdjd nnmvdj، xvɒhdmɒnd، t͡ʃvnkh thdjd پzjrfth ɒst v tv d͡ʒɒn xvdrɒ nd͡ʒɒt dɒdh‌ɒj» v dst xdɒvnd dr آnd͡ʒɒ br mn nhɒdh ʃd vɒv mrɒ ɡft «brxjz v bh hɒmvn bjrvn ʃv kh drآnd͡ʒɒ bɒ tv sxn xvɒhm ɡft» پs brxɒsth، bh hɒmvn bjrvn rftm v ɒjnk d͡ʒlɒl xdɒvnd msl d͡ʒlɒlj kh nzd nhr xɒbvr djdh bvdm، dr آnd͡ʒɒ brپɒʃd v mn bh rvj xvd drɒftɒdm v rvh dɒxl mn ʃdh، mrɒ br پɒjhɒjm brپɒ dɒʃt v ɒv mrɒ xtɒb krdh، ɡft «brv v xvjʃtn rɒ dr xɒnh xvd bbnd v ɒmɒ tv‌ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn ɒjnk bndhɒ br tvxvɒhnd nhɒd v tv rɒ bh آnhɒ xvɒhnd bst ɒmɒ drmjɒn ɒjʃɒn bjrvn mrv v mn zbɒn tv rɒ bh kɒmt xvɒhm t͡ʃsbɒnjd tɒ ɡŋ ʃdh، brɒj ɒjʃɒn nɒsh nbɒʃj zjrɒ kh ɒjʃɒn xɒndɒn ftnh ɒŋjz mj‌bɒʃndɒmɒ vɣtj kh mn bɒ tv tklm nmɒjm، آŋɒh dhɒn tvrɒ xvɒhm ɡʃvd v bh ɒjʃɒn xvɒhj ɡft xdɒvndjhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd آŋɒh آnkh ʃnvɒ bɒʃdbʃnvd v آnkh ɒbɒ nmɒjd
