dr mɣɒblʃ brپɒ nmɒ v bh ɒtrɒfʃ ɒrdv zdh، mnd͡ʒnjɣhɒ bh hr svj آn brپɒkn v tɒbh آhnjn brɒj xvd ɡrfth، آn rɒ dr mjɒn xvd v ʃhr، djvɒrj آhnjn bɡzɒr v rvj xvd rɒbr آn bdɒr v mhɒsrh xvɒhd ʃd v tv آn rɒmhɒsrh kn tɒ آjtj bh d͡ʒht xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl bʃvd پs tv br پhlvj t͡ʃپ xvd bxvɒb v ɡnɒh xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl rɒ br آn bɡzɒr mvɒfɣ ʃmɒrh rvzhɒjj kh br آn bxvɒbj، ɡnɒh ɒjʃɒn rɒ mthml xvɒhj ʃd v mn sɒlhɒj ɡnɒh ɒjʃɒn rɒ mtɒbɣ ʃmɒrh rvzhɒ jʔnj sjsd v nvd rvz br tvnhɒdh‌ɒm پs mthml ɡnɒh xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl xvɒhj ʃd v t͡ʃvn ɒjnhɒ rɒ bh ɒnd͡ʒɒm rsɒnjdh bɒʃj، bɒzbh پhlvj rɒst xvd bxvɒb v t͡ʃhl rvzmthml ɡnɒh xɒndɒn jhvdɒ xvɒhj ʃd hr rvzj rɒ bh d͡ʒht sɒlj brɒj tv ɣrɒr dɒdh‌ɒm v bɒzvj xvd rɒ brhnh krdh، rvj bh mhɒsrh ɒvrʃljm bdɒr v bh zd آn nbvt kn v ɒjnk bndhɒ br tvmj nhm v tɒ rvzhɒj mhɒsrh ɒt rɒ bh ɒtmɒm nrsɒnjdh bɒʃj ɒz پhlv bh پhlvj djɡrt nxvɒhj ɣltjd پs ɡndm v d͡ʒv v bɒɣlɒ v ʔds v ɒrzn vd͡ʒlbɒn brɒj xvd ɡrfth، آnhɒ rɒ dr jk zrf brjzv xvrɒkj ɒz آnhɒ brɒj xvd bپz v tmɒmj rvzhɒjj kh bh پhlvj xvd mj‌xvɒbj، jʔnj sjsd v nvd rvz آn rɒ xvɒhj xvrd vɣzɒjj kh mj‌xvrj bh vzn xvɒhd bvd، jʔnj bjst msɣɒl brɒj hr rvz vɣt bh vɣt آn rɒxvɒhj xvrd v آb rɒ bh پjmɒjʃ jʔnj sds jk hjn xvɒhj nvʃjd آn rɒ vɣt bh vɣt xvɒhj nvʃjd v ɣrshɒj nɒn d͡ʒv kh mj‌xvrj، آnhɒ rɒ br srɡjn ɒnsɒn dr nzr ɒjʃɒn xvɒhj پxt v xdɒvnd frmvd bh hmjn mnvɒl bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl nɒn nd͡ʒs dr mjɒn ɒmt hɒjj kh mn ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh mjɒn آnhɒ پrɒkndh mj‌sɒzm xvɒhndxvrd» پs ɡftm «آh‌ɒj xdɒvnd jhvh ɒjnk d͡ʒɒn mn nd͡ʒs nʃdh v ɒz tfvljt xvd tɒ bh hɒl mjth jɒdrjdh ʃdh rɒ nxvrdh‌ɒm v xvrɒk nd͡ʒs bh dhɒnm nrfth ɒst» آŋɒh bh mn ɡft «bdɒn kh srɡjn ɡɒv rɒ bh ʔvz srɡjn ɒnsɒn bh tv dɒdm، پs nɒn xvd rɒ br آn xvɒhj پxt» v mrɒ ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn ɒjnk mn ʔsɒj nɒn rɒ dr ɒvrʃljm xvɒhm ʃkst v nɒn rɒ bh vzn v ʔsrt xvɒhndxvrd v آb rɒ bh پjmɒjʃ v hjrt xvɒhndnvʃjdzjrɒ kh mhtɒd͡ʒ nɒn v آb xvɒhnd ʃd vbh hjrt br jkdjɡr nzr xvɒhnd ɒndɒxt v bh‌sbb ɡnɒhɒn xvd ɡdɒxth xvɒhnd ʃd zjrɒ kh mhtɒd͡ʒ nɒn v آb xvɒhnd ʃd vbh hjrt br jkdjɡr nzr xvɒhnd ɒndɒxt v bh‌sbb ɡnɒhɒn xvd ɡdɒxth xvɒhnd ʃd bɡjr v آn rɒ msl ɒstrh hd͡ʒɒm bh d͡ʒht xvd bkɒr brdh، آn rɒ br sr v rjʃ xvd bɡzrɒn vtrɒzvjj ɡrfth، mvjhɒ rɒ tɣsjm kn v t͡ʃvn rvzhɒj mhɒsrh rɒ bh ɒtmɒm rsɒnjdh bɒʃj، jk sls rɒ dr mjɒn ʃhr bh آtʃ bsvzɒn v jk sls rɒɡrfth، ɒtrɒf آn rɒ bɒ tjɣ bzn v sls djɡr rɒ bh bɒdhɒ bپɒʃ v mn dr ʔɣb آnhɒ ʃmʃjrj xvɒhm frstɒd v ɒndkj ɒz آn rɒ ɡrfth، آnhɒ rɒ dr dɒmn xvd bbnd v bɒz ɣdrj ɒz آnhɒ rɒ bɡjr v آnhɒ rɒ drmjɒn آtʃ ɒndɒxth، آnhɒ rɒ bh آtʃ bsvzɒn vآtʃj brɒj tmɒm xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl ɒz آn bjrvn xvɒhd آmd» xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «mn ɒjn ɒvrʃljm rɒ dr mjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ ɣrɒr dɒdm v kʃvrhɒ rɒbhr trf آn v ɒv ɒz ɒhkɒm mn bdtr ɒz ɒmt‌hɒ vɒz frɒjz mn bdtr ɒz kʃvrhɒjj kh ɡrdɒɡrd ɒvmj bɒʃd، ʔsjɒn vrzjdh ɒst zjrɒ kh ɒhl ɒv ɒhkɒm mrɒ trk krdh، bh frɒjz mn slvk nnmvdh‌ɒnd» bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «t͡ʃvnkh ʃmɒ zjɒdh ɒz ɒmt hɒjj kh ɡrdɒɡrd ʃmɒ mj‌bɒʃnd ɣvɣɒ nmvdjd v bh frɒjz mn slvk nkrdh، ɒhkɒm mrɒ bʔml njɒvrdjd، blkh mvɒfɣ ɒhkɒm ɒmt hɒjj kh ɡrdɒɡrd ʃmɒ mj‌bɒʃndnjz ʔml nnmvdjd، lhzɒ xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd mn ɒjnk mn bh zd tv hstm v dr mjɒn tv bh nzr ɒmt‌hɒ dɒvrjhɒ xvɒhm nmvd v bɒ tv bh‌sbb d͡ʒmjʔ rd͡ʒɒsɒtt kɒrhɒ xvɒhm krd kh ɣbl ɒz ɒjn nkrdh bɒʃm v msl آnhɒ hm djɡr nxvɒhm krd bnɒbrɒjn پdrɒn dr mjɒn tv پsrɒn rɒxvɒhnd xvrd v پsrɒn پdrɒn xvjʃ rɒ xvɒhndxvrd v br tv dɒvrjhɒ nmvdh، tmɒmj bɣjt tv rɒbsvj hr bɒd پrɒkndh xvɒhm sɒxt» lhzɒxdɒvnd jhvh mj‌ɡvjd «bh hjɒt xvdm ɣsm t͡ʃvnkh tv mɣds mrɒ btmɒmj rd͡ʒɒsɒt v d͡ʒmjʔ mkrvhɒt xvjʃ nd͡ʒs sɒxtj، mn njz ɒlbth tvrɒ mnɣtʔ xvɒhm sɒxt v t͡ʃʃm mn ʃfɣt nxvɒhd nmvd v mn njz rhmt nxvɒhm frmvd jk sls tv dr mjɒnt ɒz vbɒ xvɒhnd mrd v ɒzɡrsŋj tlf xvɒhnd ʃd v jk sls bh ɒtrɒft bh ʃmʃjr xvɒhnd ɒftɒd v sls djɡr rɒ bsvj hrbɒd پrɒkndh sɒxth، ʃmʃjr rɒ dr ʔɣb ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm frstɒd پs t͡ʃvn ɣzb mn bh ɒtmɒm rsjdh bɒʃd v hdt xʃm xvjʃ rɒ br ɒjʃɒn rjxth bɒʃm، آŋɒh پʃjmɒn xvɒhm ʃd v t͡ʃvn hdt xʃm xvjʃ rɒ br ɒjʃɒn bh ɒtmɒm rsɒndh bɒʃm، آŋɒh xvɒhnd dɒnst kh mn jhvh ɒjn rɒ drɣjrt xvjʃ ɡfth‌ɒm v tv rɒ dr dr nzr hmh rhɡzrjɒn dr mjɒn ɒmt hɒjj kh bh ɒtrɒf tvmj bɒʃnd، bh xrɒbj v rsvɒjj tsljm xvɒhm nmvd v t͡ʃvn br tv bh xʃm v ɣzb vsrznʃhɒj sxt dɒvrj krdh bɒʃm، آŋɒh ɒjn mvd͡ʒd ʔɒr v mzmt v ʔbrt v dhʃt brɒj ɒmt hɒjj kh bh ɒtrɒf tv mj‌bɒʃnd xvɒhd bvd mn kh jhvh hstm ɒjn rɒ ɡftm v t͡ʃvn tjrhɒj bd ɣhtj rɒ kh brɒj hlɒkt mj‌bɒʃd v mn آnhɒ rɒbh d͡ʒht xrɒbj ʃmɒ mj‌frstm dr mjɒn ʃmɒɒndɒxth bɒʃm، آŋɒh ɣht rɒ br ʃmɒ sxt‌trxvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd v ʔsɒj nɒn ʃmɒ rɒ xvɒhm ʃkstv ɣht v hjvɒnɒt drndh dr mjɒn tvxvɒhm frstɒd tɒ tv rɒ bj‌ɒvlɒd ɡrdɒnnd v vbɒ vxvn ɒz mjɒn tv ʔbvr xvɒhd krd v ʃmʃjrj brtv vɒrd xvɒhm آvrd mn kh jhvh hstm ɒjn rɒɡftm» v ɣht v hjvɒnɒt drndh dr mjɒn tvxvɒhm frstɒd tɒ tv rɒ bj‌ɒvlɒd ɡrdɒnnd v vbɒ vxvn ɒz mjɒn tv ʔbvr xvɒhd krd v ʃmʃjrj brtv vɒrd xvɒhm آvrd mn kh jhvh hstm ɒjn rɒɡftm» v klɒm xdɒvnd br mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn nzr xvd rɒ br kvhhɒj ɒsrɒئjl bdvz v drbɒrh آnhɒ nbvt kn v bɡv ɒj kvhhɒj ɒsrɒئjl klɒm xdɒvnd jhvh rɒ bʃnvjd xdɒvnd jhvh bh kvhhɒ v tlhɒ v vɒdjhɒ v drh hɒt͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd ɒjnk mn ʃmʃjrj br ʃmɒmj آvrm v mkɒn hɒj blnd ʃmɒ rɒ xrɒb xvɒhm krd v mzbh hɒj ʃmɒ mnhdm v tmsɒlhɒj ʃmsj ʃmɒ ʃksth xvɒhd ʃd v kʃtɡɒn ʃmɒrɒ پjʃ bthɒj ʃmɒ xvɒhm‌ɒndɒxt v lɒʃhɒj bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl rɒ پjʃ bthɒj ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm ɡzɒʃt v ɒstxvɒnhɒj ʃmɒ rɒ ɡrdɒɡrd mzbh hɒj ʃmɒ xvɒhm پɒʃjd v dr d͡ʒmjʔ msɒkn ʃmɒ ʃhrhɒxrɒb v mkɒn hɒj blnd vjrɒn xvɒhd ʃd tɒ آnkh mzbh hɒj ʃmɒ xrɒb v vjrɒn ʃvd v bthɒj ʃmɒʃksth v nɒbvd ɡrdd v tmsɒlhɒj ʃmsj ʃmɒmnhdm v ɒʔmɒl ʃmɒmhv ʃvd v t͡ʃvn kʃtɡɒn ʃmɒ dr mjɒn ʃmɒ bjftnd، آŋɒh xvɒhj dɒnst kh mn jhvh hstm ɒmɒ bɣjtj ŋɒh xvɒhm dɒʃt vt͡ʃvn dr mjɒn kʃvrhɒ پrɒkndh ʃvjd، bɣjh ɒlsjf ʃmɒ dr mjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ sɒkn xvɒhnd ʃd vnd͡ʒɒt‌jɒftɡɒn ʃmɒ dr mjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ dr d͡ʒɒjj kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh ɒsjrj brdh‌ɒnd mrɒ jɒd xvɒhnd dɒʃt t͡ʃvnkh dl znɒkɒr ɒjʃɒn rɒ kh ɒz mn dvr ʃdh ɒst xvɒhm ʃkst v t͡ʃʃmɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ kh dr ʔɣb bthɒj ɒjʃɒn znɒ krdh ɒst پs xvjʃtn rɒ bh‌sbb ɒʔmɒl zʃtj kh dr hmh rd͡ʒɒsɒt xvdnmvdh‌ɒnd mkrvh xvɒhnd dɒʃt v xvɒhnddɒnst kh mn jhvh hstm v ʔbs ŋftm kh ɒjn blɒrɒ br ɒjʃɒn vɒrd xvɒhm آvrd» xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «bh‌dst xvd bzn v پɒj xvd rɒ br zmjn bkvb v bɡv vɒj br tmɒmj rd͡ʒɒsɒt v ʃrjr xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl zjrɒkh bh ʃmʃjr v ɣht v vbɒxvɒhd ɒftɒd آnkh dvr bɒʃd bh vbɒ xvɒhd mrd v آnkh nzdjk ɒst bh ʃmʃjr xvɒhd ɒftɒdv آnkh bɒɣj‌mɒndh v drmhɒsrh bɒʃd ɒz ɡrsŋj xvɒhd mrd v mn hdt xʃm xvd rɒ br ɒjʃɒn bh ɒtmɒm xvɒhm rsɒnjd v xvɒhjd dɒnst kh mn jhvh hstm، hŋɒmj kh kʃtɡɒn ɒjʃɒn dr mjɒn bthɒj ɒjʃɒn bh ɒtrɒf mzbh hɒj ɒjʃɒn، br hr tl blnd v brɣlh hɒj tmɒm kvhhɒ v zjr hr drxt sbz v zjr hr blvt kʃn، dr d͡ʒɒjj kh hdɒjɒj xvʃbv brɒj hmh bthɒj xvd mj‌ɡzrɒnjdnd jɒft xvɒhnd ʃdv dst xvd rɒ br ɒjʃɒn drɒz krdh، zmjn rɒ drtmɒm mskn hɒj ɒjʃɒn xrɒbtr v vjrɒntr ɒz bjɒbɒn dblh xvɒhm sɒxt پs xvɒhnd dɒnst kh mn jhvh hstm» v dst xvd rɒ br ɒjʃɒn drɒz krdh، zmjn rɒ drtmɒm mskn hɒj ɒjʃɒn xrɒbtr v vjrɒntr ɒz bjɒbɒn dblh xvɒhm sɒxt پs xvɒhnd dɒnst kh mn jhvh hstm» v klɒm xdɒvnd br mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «vtv‌ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn bɡv xdɒvnd jhvh bh zmjn ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒnthɒjj br t͡ʃhɒrɡvʃh zmjn ɒnthɒ rsjdh ɒst ɒlɒn ɒnthɒ br tvrsjdh ɒst v mn xʃm xvd rɒ br tv vɒrdآvrdh‌ɒm v br vfɣ rɒhhɒjt trɒ dɒvrj nmvdh، tmɒmj rd͡ʒɒsɒtt rɒ br tv xvɒhm nhɒd v t͡ʃʃm mn brtv ʃfɣt nxvɒhd krd v rhmt nxvɒhm frmvd blkh rɒhhɒj tv rɒ br tv xvɒhm nhɒd vrd͡ʒɒsɒt tv dr mjɒnt xvɒhd bvd پs xvɒhj dɒnst kh mn jhvh hstm» xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «blɒ hɒn blɒj vɒhd mj‌آjd ɒnthɒjj mj‌آjd، ɒnthɒjj mj‌آjd vbh zd tv bjdɒr ʃdh ɒst hɒn mj‌آjd ‌ɒj sɒkn zmjn ɒd͡ʒl tv br tv mj‌آjd vɣt mʔjn mj‌آjd v آn rvz nzdjk ɒst rvz hŋɒmh xvɒhd ʃd v nh rvz آvɒz ʃɒdmɒnj br kvhhɒ ɒlɒn ʔnɣrjb ɣzb xvd rɒ br tv xvɒhm rjxt v xʃm xvjʃ rɒ br tv bh ɒtmɒm rsɒnjdh، tv rɒ mvɒfɣ rɒhhɒjt dɒvrj xvɒhm nmvd v d͡ʒmjʔ rd͡ʒɒsɒtt rɒ br tv xvɒhm nhɒd v t͡ʃʃm mn ʃfɣt nxvɒhdkrd v rhmt nxvɒhm frmvd، blkh mkɒfɒt rɒhhɒjt rɒ bh tv xvɒhm rsɒnjd v rd͡ʒɒsɒt tv drmjɒnt xvɒhd bvd v xvɒhjd dɒnst kh znndh tv mn jhvh hstm ɒjnk آnrvz hɒn mj‌آjd ɒd͡ʒl tv bjrvn آmdh v ʔsɒ ʃkvfh آvrdh v tkbr، ɡl krdh ɒst zlm ʔsɒj ʃrɒrt ɡʃth ɒst ɒzɒjʃɒn v ɒz d͡ʒmʔjt ɒjʃɒn v ɒz ɒzdhɒm ɒjʃɒn t͡ʃjzj bɒɣj njst v dr mjɒn ɒjʃɒn hʃmtj nmɒndh ɒst vɣt mj‌آjd v آnrvz nzdjk ɒst پs mʃtrj ʃɒdj nknd v frvʃndh mɒtm ŋjrd، zjrɒ kh xʃm br tmɒmj d͡ʒmʔjt ɒjʃɒn ɣrɒr ɡrfth ɒst zjrɒ kh frvʃndɡɒn ɒɡr‌t͡ʃh dr mjɒn zndɡɒn zndh mɒnnd، bh آnt͡ʃh frvxth bɒʃndnxvɒhnd brɡʃt، t͡ʃvnkh ɣzb br tmɒmj d͡ʒmʔjt ɒjʃɒn ɣrɒr ɡrfth ɒst ɒjʃɒn nxvɒhndbrɡʃt v hjt͡ʃks bh ɡnɒh xvjʃ zndɡj xvd rɒtɣvjt nxvɒhd dɒd krnɒ rɒ nvɒxth v hmh‌t͡ʃjzrɒ mhjɒ sɒxth‌ɒnd، ɒmɒ ksj bh d͡ʒŋ nmj rvd zjrɒkh ɣzb mn br tmɒmj d͡ʒmʔjt ɒjʃɒn ɣrɒr ɡrfth ɒst ʃmʃjr dr bjrvn ɒst v vbɒ v ɣht drɒndrvn آnkh dr shrɒ ɒst bh ʃmʃjr mj‌mjrd vآnkh dr ʃhr ɒst ɣht v vbɒ ɒv rɒ hlɒk mj‌sɒzd v rstɡɒrɒn ɒjʃɒn frɒr mj‌knnd vmsl fɒxth hɒj drh‌hɒ br kvhhɒ mj‌bɒʃnd v hrkdɒm ɒz ɒjʃɒn bh‌sbb ɡnɒh xvd nɒlh mj‌knnd hmh dsthɒ sst ʃdh v d͡ʒmjʔ zɒnvhɒ msl آb bjtɒb ɡrdjdh ɒst v پlɒs dr brmj knnd v vhʃt ɒjʃɒn rɒ mj‌پvʃɒnd v br hmh t͡ʃhrh‌hɒ xd͡ʒlt v br d͡ʒmjʔ srhɒ ɡrj mj‌bɒʃd nɣrh xvd rɒ dr kvt͡ʃh‌hɒ mj‌rjznd v tlɒj ɒjʃɒn msl t͡ʃjz nd͡ʒs mj‌bɒʃd nɣrh v tlɒj ɒjʃɒn dr rvz ɣzb xdɒvnd ɒjʃɒn rɒ ntvɒndrhɒnjd d͡ʒɒnhɒj xvd rɒ sjr nmj knnd v btnhɒj xvjʃ rɒ پr nmj sɒznd zjrɒ ɡnɒh ɒjʃɒn sŋ msɒdm آnhɒ ʃdh ɒst «v ɒv zjbɒjj zjnt xvd rɒ dr kbrjɒjj ɣrɒrdɒdh bvd، ɒmɒ ɒjʃɒn bthɒj mkrvhɒt v rd͡ʒɒsɒt xvjʃ rɒ dr آn sɒxtnd bnɒbrɒjn آn rɒ brɒj ɒjʃɒn msl t͡ʃjz nd͡ʒs xvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd v آn rɒbh‌dst ɣrjbɒn bh tɒrɒd͡ʒ v bh ʃrjrɒn d͡ʒhɒn bh ɣɒrt xvɒhm dɒd v آn rɒ bj‌ʔsmt xvɒhndsɒxt v rvj xvd rɒ ɒz ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm brɡrdɒnjd v mkɒn mstvr mrɒ bj‌ʔsmt xvɒhndnmvd v zɒlmɒn dɒxl آn ʃdh، آn rɒ bj‌ʔsmt xvɒhnd sɒxt znd͡ʒjr rɒ bsɒz، zjrɒ kh zmjn ɒz d͡ʒrmhɒj xvnrjzj پr ɒst v ʃhr ɒz zlm mmlv v ɒʃrɒr ɒmt‌hɒ rɒ xvɒhm آvrd v drxɒnh hɒj ɒjʃɒn tsrf xvɒhnd nmvd v tkbrzvrآvrɒn rɒ zɒjl xvɒhm sɒxt v آnhɒmkɒn hɒj mɣds ɒjʃɒn rɒ bj‌ʔsmt xvɒhndnmvd hlɒkt mj‌آjd v slɒmtj rɒ xvɒhndtlbjd، ɒmɒ jɒft nxvɒhd ʃd msjbt brmsjbt mj‌آjd v آvɒzh br آvɒzh msmvʔ mj‌ʃvd rvjɒ ɒz nbj mj‌tlbnd، ɒmɒ ʃrjʔt ɒz kɒhnɒn vmʃvrt ɒz mʃɒjx nɒbvd ʃdh ɒstپɒdʃɒh mɒtm mj‌ɡjrd v rئjs bh hjrt mlbs mj‌ʃvd vdsthɒj ɒhl zmjn mj‌lrzd v mvɒfɣ rɒhhɒj ɒjʃɒn bɒ ɒjʃɒn ʔml xvɒhm nmvd v br vfɣ ɒsthɣɒɣ ɒjʃɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ dɒvrj xvɒhm nmvd پs xvɒhnd dɒnst kh mn jhvh hstm؟ پɒdʃɒh mɒtm mj‌ɡjrd v rئjs bh hjrt mlbs mj‌ʃvd vdsthɒj ɒhl zmjn mj‌lrzd v mvɒfɣ rɒhhɒj ɒjʃɒn bɒ ɒjʃɒn ʔml xvɒhm nmvd v br vfɣ ɒsthɣɒɣ ɒjʃɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ dɒvrj xvɒhm nmvd پs xvɒhnd dɒnst kh mn jhvh hstm؟ v dr sɒl ʃʃm dr rvz پnd͡ʒm ɒz mɒh ʃʃm، t͡ʃvn mn dr xɒnh xvd nʃsth bvdm vmʃɒjx jhvdɒ پjʃ mn nʃsth bvdnd، آŋɒh dst xdɒvnd jhvh dr آnd͡ʒɒ br mn frvd آmd v djdm kh ɒjnk ʃbjhj msl svrt آtʃ bvd jʔnj ɒznmɒjʃ kmr ɒv tɒ پɒjjn آtʃ v ɒz kmr ɒv tɒ bɒlɒ msl mnzr drxʃndɡj mɒnnd svrt brnd͡ʒ lɒmʔ zɒhrʃd v ʃbjh dstj drɒz krdh، mvj پjʃɒnj mrɒbɡrft v rvh، mrɒ dr mjɒn zmjn v آsmɒn brdɒʃt v mrɒ dr rvjɒhɒj xdɒ bh ɒvrʃljm nzddhnh drvɒzh shn ɒndrvnj kh btrf ʃmɒl mtvd͡ʒh ɒst brd kh dr آnd͡ʒɒ nʃjmn tmsɒl ɣjrt ɣjrt ɒŋjz mj‌bɒʃd v ɒjnk d͡ʒlɒl xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl mɒnnd آn rvjɒjj kh dr hɒmvn djdh bvdm zɒhr ʃd v ɒvmrɒ ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn t͡ʃʃmɒn xvd rɒ bsvj rɒh ʃmɒl brɒfrɒz» v t͡ʃvn t͡ʃʃmɒn xvd rɒ bsvj rɒh ʃmɒl brɒfrɒʃtm، ɒjnk btrf ʃmɒlj drvɒzh mzbh ɒjn tmsɒl ɣjrt dr mdxl zɒhr ʃd v ɒvmrɒ ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn آjɒ tv آnt͡ʃh rɒ kh ɒjʃɒn mj‌knnd mj‌bjnj؟ jʔnj rd͡ʒɒsɒt ʔzjmj kh xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl dr ɒjnd͡ʒɒ mj‌knnd tɒ ɒz mɣds xvd dvr bʃvm؟ ɒmɒ bɒz rd͡ʒɒsɒt ʔzjm tr xvɒhj djd» پs mrɒ bh drvɒzh shn آvrd v djdm kh ɒjnk svrɒxj dr djvɒr ɒst v ɒv mrɒ ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn djvɒr rɒ bkn» v t͡ʃvn djvɒr rɒkndm، ɒjnk drvɒzh‌ɒj پdjd آmd v ɒv mrɒ ɡft «dɒxl ʃv v rd͡ʒɒsɒt ʃnjʔj rɒ kh ɒjʃɒn drɒjnd͡ʒɒ mj‌knnd mlɒhzh nmɒ» پs t͡ʃvn dɒxl ʃdm، djdm kh hrɡvnh hʃrɒt v hjvɒnɒt nd͡ʒs v d͡ʒmjʔ bthɒj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl br djvɒr ɒz hr trf nɣʃ ʃdh bvd v hftɒd nfr ɒz mʃɒjx xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl پjʃ آnhɒɒjstɒdh bvdnd v jɒznjɒ ɒbn ʃɒfɒn dr mjɒn ɒjʃɒn ɒjstɒdh bvd v hrks md͡ʒmrh‌ɒj dr dst xvddɒʃt v bvj ɒbr bxvr bɒlɒ mj‌rft v ɒv mrɒɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn آjɒ آnt͡ʃh rɒ kh mʃɒjx xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl dr tɒrjkj v hrks drhd͡ʒrh hɒj bthɒj xvjʃ mj‌knnd djdj؟ zjrɒmj ɡvjnd kh xdɒvnd mɒ rɒ nmj bjnd v xdɒvnd ɒjn zmjn rɒ trk krdh ɒst v bh mn ɡft kh bɒzrd͡ʒɒsɒt ʔzjm tr ɒz ɒjnhɒjj kh ɒjnɒn mj‌knndxvɒhj djd» پs mrɒ bh dhnh drvɒzh xɒnh xdɒvnd kh btrf ʃmɒl bvd آvrd v ɒjnk dr آnd͡ʒɒ bʔzj znɒn nʃsth، brɒj tmvz mj‌ɡrjstnd v ɒv mrɒɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn آjɒ ɒjn rɒ djdj؟ bɒzrd͡ʒɒsɒt ʔzjm tr ɒz ɒjnhɒ rɒ xvɒhj djd» پs mrɒ bh shn ɒndrvnj xɒnh xdɒvndآvrd v ɒjnk nzd drvɒzh hjkl xdɒvnd dr mjɒn rvɒɣ v mzbh bh ɣdr bjst v پnd͡ʒ mrd bvdnd kh پʃthɒj xvd rɒ bsvj hjkl xdɒvnd v rvjhɒj xvjʃ rɒ bsvj mʃrɣ dɒʃtnd v آftɒb rɒ btrf mʃrɣ sd͡ʒdh mj‌nmvdnd v bh mn ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn ɒjn rɒ djdj؟ آjɒ brɒj xɒndɒn jhvdɒbd͡ʒɒ آvrdn ɒjn rd͡ʒɒsɒt kh dr ɒjnd͡ʒɒ bd͡ʒɒmj آvrnd shl ɒst؟ zjrɒ kh zmjn rɒ ɒz zlm mmlv sɒxth‌ɒnd v brɒj hjd͡ʒɒn xʃm mn brmj ɡrdnd v hɒn ʃɒxh rɒ bh bjnj xvdmj ɡzɒrndbnɒbrɒjn mn njz dr ɣzb، ʔml xvɒhm nmvd v t͡ʃʃm mn ʃfɣt nxvɒhd krd vrhmt nxvɒhm frmvd v ɒɡrt͡ʃh bh آvɒz blnd bh ɡvʃ mn bxvɒnnd، ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒd͡ʒɒbt nxvɒhm nmvd» bnɒbrɒjn mn njz dr ɣzb، ʔml xvɒhm nmvd v t͡ʃʃm mn ʃfɣt nxvɒhd krd vrhmt nxvɒhm frmvd v ɒɡrt͡ʃh bh آvɒz blnd bh ɡvʃ mn bxvɒnnd، ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒd͡ʒɒbt nxvɒhm nmvd» v ɒv bh آvɒz blnd bh ɡvʃ mn ndɒ krdh، ɡft «vklɒj ʃhr rɒ nzdjk bjɒvr v hrks آlt xrɒb knndh xvd rɒ dr dst xvd bdɒrd» v ɒjnk ʃʃ mrd ɒz rɒh drvɒzh bɒlɒjj kh btrf ʃmɒl mtvd͡ʒh ɒst آmdnd v hrks tbrxvd rɒ dr dstʃ dɒʃt v dr mjɒn ɒjʃɒn jk mrd mlbs ʃdh bh ktɒn bvd v dvɒt kɒtb drkmrʃ v ɒjʃɒn dɒxl ʃdh، nzd mzbh brnd͡ʒjn ɒjstɒdnd v d͡ʒlɒl xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl ɒz rvj آn krvbj kh bɒlɒj آn bvd bh آstɒnh xɒnh brآmd v bh آn mrdj kh bh ktɒn mlbs bvd v dvɒt kɒtb rɒ drkmr dɒʃt xtɒb krd v xdɒvnd bh ɒv ɡft «ɒz mjɒn ʃhr jʔnj ɒz mjɒn ɒvrʃljm bɡzr v brپjʃɒnj ksɒnj kh bh‌sbb hmh rd͡ʒɒsɒtj kh dr آn krdh mj‌ʃvd آh v nɒlh mj‌knnd nʃɒnj bɡzɒr v bh آnɒn bh smʔ mn ɡft kh dr ʔɣb ɒv ɒz ʃhrbɡzrjd v hlɒk sɒzjd v t͡ʃʃmɒn ʃmɒ ʃfɣt nknd v trhm mnmɒjjd پjrɒn v d͡ʒvɒnɒn v dxtrɒn v ɒtfɒl v znɒn rɒ tmɒm bh ɣtl rsɒnjd، ɒmɒ bh hrksj‌kh ɒjn nʃɒn rɒ dɒrd nzdjk mʃvjd v ɒzɣds mn ʃrvʔ knjd» پs ɒz mrdɒn پjrj kh پjʃ xɒnh bvdnd ʃrvʔ krdnd v bh ɒjʃɒn frmvd «xɒnh rɒ nd͡ʒs sɒzjd vshnhɒ rɒ ɒz kʃtɡɒn پr sɒxth، bjrvn آjjd» پs bjrvn آmdnd v dr ʃhr bh kʃtn ʃrvʔ krdnd vt͡ʃvn ɒjʃɒn mj‌kʃtnd v mn bɒɣj‌mɒndh bvdm bh rvj xvd dr‌ɒftɒdh، ɒstɣɒsh nmvdm v ɡftm «آh‌ɒj xdɒvnd jhvh آjɒ t͡ʃvn ɣzb xvd rɒ brɒvrʃljm mj‌rjzj tmɒmj bɣjh ɒsrɒئjl rɒ hlɒk xvɒhj sɒxt؟» ɒv mrɒ d͡ʒvɒb dɒd «ɡnɒh xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl v jhvdɒ bj‌nhɒjt ʔzjm ɒst vzmjn ɒz xvn mmlv v ʃhr ɒz stm پr ɒst zjrɒmj ɡvjnd xdɒvnd zmjn rɒ trk krdh ɒst vxdɒvnd nmj bjnd پs t͡ʃʃm mn njz ʃfɣt nxvɒhd krd v mn rhmt nxvɒhm frmvd، blkh rftɒr ɒjʃɒn rɒ br sr ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm آvrd»vɒjnk آn mrdj kh bh ktɒn mlbs bvd v dvɒt rɒ drkmr dɒʃt، d͡ʒvɒb dɒd v ɡft «bh nhd͡ʒj kh mrɒɒmr frmvdj ʔml nmvdm» vɒjnk آn mrdj kh bh ktɒn mlbs bvd v dvɒt rɒ drkmr dɒʃt، d͡ʒvɒb dɒd v ɡft «bh nhd͡ʒj kh mrɒɒmr frmvdj ʔml nmvdm» پs ŋrjstm v ɒjnk br flkj kh bɒlɒj sr krvbjɒn bvd t͡ʃjzj msl sŋ jɒɣvt kbvd v msl nmɒjʃ ʃbjh txt br zbr آnhɒzɒhr ʃd v آn mrd rɒ kh bh ktɒn mlbs bvdxtɒb krdh ɡft «dr mjɒn t͡ʃrxhɒ dr zjrkrvbjɒn brv v dsthɒj xvd rɒ ɒz ɒxɡrhɒj آtʃj kh dr mjɒn krvbjɒn ɒst پr kn v br ʃhrbپɒʃ» v ɒv dr nzr mn dɒxl ʃd v t͡ʃvn آn mrddɒxl ʃd، krvbjɒn btrf rɒst xɒnh ɒjstɒdh bvdnd v ɒbr، shn ɒndrvnj rɒ پr krd v d͡ʒlɒl xdɒvnd ɒz rvj krvbjɒn bh آstɒnh xɒnh brآmd vxɒnh ɒz ɒbr پr ʃd v shn ɒz frvɣ d͡ʒlɒl xdɒvndmmlv ɡʃt v sdɒj bɒlhɒj krvbjɒn tɒ bh shn bjrvnj msl آvɒz xdɒj ɣɒdr mtlɣ hjnj kh tklm mj knd، msmvʔ ʃd v t͡ʃvn آn mrd rɒ kh mlbs bh ktɒn bvd ɒmrfrmvdh، ɡft kh «آtʃ rɒ ɒz mjɒn t͡ʃrxhɒ ɒz mjɒn krvbjɒn brdɒr» آŋɒh dɒxl ʃdh، nzd t͡ʃrxhɒɒjstɒd v jkj ɒz krvbjɒn dst xvd rɒ ɒz mjɒn krvbjɒn bh آtʃj kh dr mjɒn krvbjɒn bvd drɒzkrdh، آn rɒ brdɒʃt v bh‌dst آn mrdj kh bh ktɒn، mlbs bvd nhɒd v ɒv آn rɒ ɡrfth، bjrvn rft v dr krvbjɒn ʃbjh svrt dst ɒnsɒn zjrbɒlhɒj ɒjʃɒn zɒhr ʃd v ŋrjstm v ɒjnk t͡ʃhɒr t͡ʃrx bh پhlvj krvbjɒn jʔnj jk t͡ʃrx bh پhlvj jk krvbj vt͡ʃrx djɡr bh پhlvj krvbj djɡr zɒhr ʃd vnmɒjʃ t͡ʃrxhɒ msl svrt sŋ zbrd͡ʒd bvd v ɒmɒ nmɒjʃ ɒjʃɒn t͡ʃnjn bvd آn t͡ʃhɒr rɒ jk ʃbɒht bvd kh ɡvjɒ t͡ʃrx dr mjɒn t͡ʃrx bɒʃd vt͡ʃvn آnhɒ mj‌rft br t͡ʃhɒr d͡ʒɒnb xvd mj‌rft vhjnj kh mj‌rft bh hjt͡ʃ sv mjl nmj krd، blkh bh‌d͡ʒɒjj kh sr bh آn mtvd͡ʒh mj‌ʃd ɒz ʔɣb آn mj‌rft v t͡ʃvn mj‌rft bh hjt͡ʃ sv mjl nmj krd v tmɒmj bdn v پʃthɒ v dsthɒ vbɒlhɒj ɒjʃɒn v t͡ʃrxhɒ jʔnj t͡ʃrxhɒjj kh آn t͡ʃhɒr dɒʃtnd ɒz hr trf پr ɒz t͡ʃʃmhɒ bvd vbh smʔ mn bh آn t͡ʃrxhɒ ndɒ dr‌dɒdnd kh «ɒj t͡ʃrxhɒ» v hr jk rɒ t͡ʃhɒr rv bvd rvj ɒvl rvj krvbj bvd v rvj dvm rvj ɒnsɒn v svm rvj ʃjr v t͡ʃhɒrm rvj ʔɣɒb پs krvbjɒn sʔvd krdnd ɒjn hmɒn hjvɒn ɒst kh nzd nhr xɒbvr djdh bvdm v t͡ʃvn krvbjɒn mj‌rftnd، t͡ʃrxhɒ bh پhlvj ɒjʃɒn mj‌rft v t͡ʃvn krvbjɒn bɒlhɒj xvd rɒ brɒfrɒʃth، ɒz zmjn sʔvd mj‌krdnd، t͡ʃrxhɒ njz ɒz پhlvj ɒjʃɒn brnmj ɡʃt t͡ʃvn ɒjʃɒn mj‌ɒjstɒdndآnhɒ mj‌ɒjstɒd v t͡ʃvn ɒjʃɒn sʔvd mj‌nmvdnd، آnhɒ bɒ ɒjʃɒn sʔvd mj‌nmvd، zjrɒ kh rvh hjvɒn dr آnhɒ bvd v d͡ʒlɒl xdɒvnd ɒz bɒlɒj آstɒnh xɒnh bjrvn آmd v br zbr krvbjɒn ɣrɒr ɡrft vt͡ʃvn krvbjɒn bjrvn rftnd bɒlhɒj xvd rɒbrɒfrɒʃth، bh nzr mn ɒz zmjn sʔvd nmvdnd vt͡ʃrxhɒ پjʃ rvj ɒjʃɒn bvd v nzd dhnh drvɒzh ʃrɣj xɒnh xdɒvnd ɒjstɒdnd v d͡ʒlɒl xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl ɒz trf bɒlɒ br ɒjʃɒn ɣrɒr ɡrft ɒjn hmɒn hjvɒn ɒst kh zjr xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl nzd nhrxɒbvr djdh bvdm، پs fhmjdm kh ɒjnɒn krvbjɒnnd hr jk rɒ t͡ʃhɒr rvj v hr jk rɒ t͡ʃhɒr bɒl bvdv zjr bɒlhɒj ɒjʃɒn ʃbjh dsthɒj ɒnsɒn bvdvɒmɒ ʃbjh rvjhɒj ɒjʃɒn t͡ʃnjn bvd hmɒn rvjhɒ bvdkh nzd nhr xɒbvr djdh bvdm hm nmɒjʃ ɒjʃɒn vhm xvd ɒjʃɒn t͡ʃnɒn bvdnd v hr jk bh rɒh mstɣjm mj‌rft vɒmɒ ʃbjh rvjhɒj ɒjʃɒn t͡ʃnjn bvd hmɒn rvjhɒ bvdkh nzd nhr xɒbvr djdh bvdm hm nmɒjʃ ɒjʃɒn vhm xvd ɒjʃɒn t͡ʃnɒn bvdnd v hr jk bh rɒh mstɣjm mj‌rft v rvh mrɒ brdɒʃth، bh drvɒzh ʃrɣj xɒnh xdɒvnd kh bsvj mʃrɣ mtvd͡ʒh ɒst آvrd v ɒjnk nzd dhnh drvɒzh bjst v پnd͡ʒ mrd bvdnd v dr mjɒn ɒjʃɒn jɒznjɒ ɒbn ʔzvr v fltjɒɒbn bnɒjɒ rvsɒj ɣvm rɒ djdm v ɒv mrɒ ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn ɒjnhɒ آn ksɒnj mj‌bɒʃnd kh tdɒbjrfɒsd mj‌knnd v dr ɒjn ʃhr mʃvrthɒj ɣbjh mj‌dhnd v mj‌ɡvjnd vɣt nzdjk njst kh xɒnh‌hɒ rɒ bnɒ nmɒjjm، blkh ɒjn ʃhr djɡ ɒst v mɒ ɡvʃt mj‌bɒʃjm bnɒbrɒjn brɒj ɒjʃɒn nbvt kn ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn nbvt kn» آŋɒh rvh xdɒvnd br mn nɒzl ʃdh، mrɒfrmvd «bɡv kh xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd ɒj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl ʃmɒ bh ɒjntvr sxn mj‌ɡvjjd vɒmɒ mn xjɒlɒt dl ʃmɒ rɒ mj‌dɒnm bsjɒrj rɒ drɒjn ʃhr kʃth‌ɒjd v kvt͡ʃh hɒjʃ rɒ ɒz kʃtɡɒn پrkrdh‌ɒjd lhzɒ xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd kʃtɡɒn ʃmɒ kh dr mjɒnʃ ɡzɒʃth‌ɒjd، ɡvʃt mj‌bɒʃnd v ʃhr djɡ ɒst ljkn ʃmɒ rɒ ɒzmjɒnʃ bjrvn xvɒhm brd ʃmɒ ɒz ʃmʃjrmj trsjd، ɒmɒ xdɒvnd jhvh mj‌ɡvjd ʃmʃjr rɒ brʃmɒ xvɒhm آvrd v ʃmɒ rɒ ɒz mjɒn ʃhr bjrvn brdh، ʃmɒ rɒ bh‌dst ɣrjbɒn tsljm xvɒhm nmvdv br ʃmɒ dɒvrj xvɒhm krd bh ʃmʃjrxvɒhjd ɒftɒd v dr hdvd ɒsrɒئjl br ʃmɒ dɒvrj xvɒhm nmvd v xvɒhjd dɒnst kh mn jhvh hstm ɒjn ʃhr brɒj ʃmɒ djɡ nxvɒhd bvd v ʃmɒ drآn ɡvʃt nxvɒhjd bvd، blkh dr hdvd ɒsrɒئjl br ʃmɒ dɒvrj xvɒhm nmvd v xvɒhjd dɒnst kh mn آn jhvh hstm kh dr frɒjz mn slvk nnmvdjd v ɒhkɒm mrɒ bd͡ʒɒ njɒvrdjd، blkh brhsb ɒhkɒm ɒmt hɒjj kh bh ɒtrɒf ʃmɒmj bɒʃnd ʔml nmvdjd» v vɒɣʔ ʃd kh t͡ʃvn nbvt krdm، fltjɒ ɒbn bnɒjɒ mrd پs bh rvj xvddr‌ɒftɒdh، bh آvɒz blnd frjɒd nmvdm v ɡftm «آh‌ɒj xdɒvnd jhvh آjɒ tv bɣjh ɒsrɒئjl rɒ tmɒm hlɒk xvɒhj sɒxt؟» v klɒm xdɒvnd br mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn brɒdrɒn tv jʔnj brɒdrɒnt kh ɒz ɒhl xɒndɒn tv mj‌bɒʃnd v tmɒmj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl d͡ʒmjʔ ksɒnj mj‌bɒʃnd kh sknh ɒvrʃljm bh ɒjʃɒn mj‌ɡvjnd ʃmɒ ɒz xdɒvnd dvrʃvjd v ɒjn zmjn bh mɒ bh mlkjt dɒdh ʃdh ɒst bnɒbrɒjn bɡv xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒɡrt͡ʃh ɒjʃɒn rɒ dr mjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ dvr knm v ɒjʃɒn rɒ drmjɒn kʃvrhɒ پrɒkndh sɒzm، ɒmɒ mn brɒj ɒjʃɒn drآn kʃvrhɒjj kh bh آnhɒ rfth bɒʃnd ɒndk zmɒnj mɣds xvɒhm bvd پs bɡv xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd ʃmɒ rɒ ɒz mjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ d͡ʒmʔ xvɒhm krd v ʃmɒ rɒ ɒz kʃvrhɒjj kh dr آnhɒپrɒkndh ʃdh‌ɒjd frɒhm xvɒhm آvrd v zmjn ɒsrɒئjl rɒ bh ʃmɒ xvɒhm dɒd v bh آnd͡ʒɒ dɒxl ʃdh، tmɒmj mkrvhɒt v d͡ʒmjʔ rd͡ʒɒsɒt آn rɒɒz mjɒnʃ dvr xvɒhnd krd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ jkdl xvɒhm dɒd v dr ɒndrvn ɒjʃɒn rvh tɒzh xvɒhm nhɒd v dl sŋj rɒ ɒz d͡ʒsd ɒjʃɒn dvr krdh، dl ɡvʃtj bh ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm bxʃjd tɒ dr frɒjz mn slvk nmɒjnd v ɒhkɒm mrɒ ŋɒh dɒʃth، آnhɒ rɒbd͡ʒɒ آvrnd v ɒjʃɒn ɣvm mn xvɒhnd bvd v mn xdɒj ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm bvd ɒmɒ آnɒnj kh dl ɒjʃɒn ɒz ʔɣb mkrvhɒt v rd͡ʒɒsɒt ɒjʃɒn mj‌rvd، پs xdɒvnd jhvh mj‌ɡvjd mn rftɒrɒjʃɒn rɒ br sr ɒjʃɒn vɒrd xvɒhm آvrd» آŋɒh krvbjɒn bɒlhɒj xvd rɒ brɒfrɒʃtnd vt͡ʃrxhɒ bh پhlvj ɒjʃɒn bvd v d͡ʒlɒl xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl ɒz trf bɒlɒ br ɒjʃɒn ɣrɒr ɡrft vd͡ʒlɒl xdɒvnd ɒz bɒlɒj mjɒn ʃhr sʔvd nmvdh، brkvhj kh btrf ʃrɣj ʃhr ɒst ɣrɒr ɡrft v rvh mrɒ brdɒʃt v dr ʔɒlm rvjɒ mrɒ bh rvh xdɒ bh zmjn kldɒnjɒn nzd ɒsjrɒn brd v آn rvjɒjj kh djdh bvdm ɒz nzr mn mrtfʔ ʃdv tmɒmj klɒm xdɒvnd rɒ kh bh mn nʃɒn dɒdh bvd، brɒj ɒsjrɒn bjɒn krdm v tmɒmj klɒm xdɒvnd rɒ kh bh mn nʃɒn dɒdh bvd، brɒj ɒsjrɒn bjɒn krdm v klɒm xdɒvnd br mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn tv dr mjɒn xɒndɒn ftnh ɒŋjz sɒkn mj‌bɒʃj kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ t͡ʃʃmhɒ bh d͡ʒht djdn hst ɒmɒ nmj bjnnd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɡvʃhɒbh d͡ʒht ʃnjdn hst ɒmɒ nmj ʃnvnd، t͡ʃvnkh xɒndɒn ftnh ɒŋjz mj‌bɒʃnd ɒmɒ tv‌ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn ɒsbɒb d͡ʒlɒj vtn rɒ brɒj xvd mhjɒ sɒz v drnzr ɒjʃɒn dr vɣt rvz kvt͡ʃ kn v ɒz mkɒn xvd bh mkɒn djɡr bh hzvr ɒjʃɒn nɣl kn، ʃɒjdbfhmnd ɒɡrt͡ʃh xɒndɒn ftnh ɒŋjz mj‌bɒʃnd vɒsbɒb xvd rɒ msl ɒsbɒb d͡ʒlɒj vtn dr vɣt rvz bh nzr ɒjʃɒn bjrvn آvr v ʃɒmɡɒhɒn msl ksɒnj kh brɒj d͡ʒlɒj vtn bjrvn mj‌rvnd bjrvn ʃv v ʃkɒfj brɒj xvd dr djvɒr bh hzvrɒjʃɒn krdh، ɒz آn bjrvn bbr v dr hzvr ɒjʃɒn آn rɒ br dvʃ xvd bɡzɒr v dr tɒrjkj bjrvn bbr vrvj xvd rɒ bپvʃɒn tɒ zmjn rɒ nbjnj zjrɒ kh tv rɒʔlɒmtj brɒj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl ɣrɒr dɒdh‌ɒm» پs bh nhd͡ʒj kh mɒmvr ʃdm، ʔml nmvdm vɒsbɒb xvd rɒ msl ɒsbɒb d͡ʒlɒj vtn dr vɣt rvz bjrvn آvrdm v ʃbɒŋɒh ʃkɒfj brɒj xvd bh‌dst xvjʃ dr djvɒr krdm v آn rɒ dr tɒrjkj bjrvn brdh، bh hzvr ɒjʃɒn br dvʃ brdɒʃtm vbɒmdɒdɒn klɒm xdɒvnd br mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn، آjɒ xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl jʔnj‌ɒjn xɒndɒn ftnh ɒŋjz bh tv ŋftnd ɒjn t͡ʃh‌kɒr ɒst kh mj‌knj؟ پs bh ɒjʃɒn bɡv xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒjn vhj ɒʃɒrh bh rئjsj ɒst kh drɒvrʃljm mj‌bɒʃd v bh tmɒmj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl kh ɒjʃɒn dr mjɒn آnhɒ mj‌bɒʃnd bɡv mn ʔlɒmt brɒj ʃmɒ hstm bh nhd͡ʒj kh mn ʔml nmvdm، hmt͡ʃnɒn bh ɒjʃɒn krdh xvɒhd ʃd v d͡ʒlɒj vtn ʃdh، bh ɒsjrj xvɒhnd rft v rئjsj kh drmjɒn ɒjʃɒn ɒst ɒsbɒb xvd rɒ dr tɒrjkj brdvʃ nhɒdh، bjrvn xvɒhd rft v ʃkɒfj drdjvɒr xvɒhnd krd tɒ ɒz آn bjrvn bbrnd v ɒv rvj xvd rɒ xvɒhd پvʃɒnjd tɒ zmjn rɒ bh t͡ʃʃmɒn xvdnbjnd v mn dɒm xvd rɒ br ɒv xvɒhm ɡstrɒnjd vdr kmnd mn ɡrftɒr xvɒhd ʃd v ɒv rɒ bh bɒbl bh zmjn kldɒnjɒn xvɒhm brd v ɒɡrt͡ʃh dr آnd͡ʒɒxvɒhd mrd، vlj آn rɒ nxvɒhd djd v d͡ʒmjʔ md͡ʒɒvrɒn v mʔɒvnɒnʃ v tmɒmj lʃkr ɒv rɒ bsvj hr bɒd پrɒkndh sɒxth، ʃmʃjrj dr ʔɣb ɒjʃɒn brhnh xvɒhm sɒxt v t͡ʃvn ɒjʃɒn rɒ dr mjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ پrɒkndh sɒxth v ɒjʃɒn rɒ dr mjɒn kʃvrhɒmtfrɣ nmvdh bɒʃm، آŋɒh xvɒhnd dɒnst kh mn jhvh hstm ljkn ʔdd ɣljlj ɒz mjɒn ɒjʃɒn ɒzʃmʃjr v ɣht v vbɒ bɒɣj xvɒhm ɡzɒʃt tɒ hmh rd͡ʒɒsɒt xvd rɒ dr mjɒn ɒmt hɒjj kh bh آnhɒmj rvnd، bjɒn nmɒjnd پs xvɒhnd dɒnst kh mn jhvh hstm» v klɒm xdɒvnd br mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn nɒn xvd rɒ bɒ ɒrtʔɒʃ bxvr vآb xvjʃ rɒ bɒ lrzh v ɒztrɒb bnvʃ v bh ɒhl zmjn bɡv xdɒvnd jhvh drbɒrh sknh ɒvrʃljm v ɒhl zmjn ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd kh nɒn xvdrɒ bɒ ɒztrɒb xvɒhnd xvrd v آb xvd rɒ bɒhjrt xvɒhnd nvʃjd zjrɒ kh zmjn آnhɒ bh‌sbb zlm d͡ʒmjʔ sɒknɒnʃ ɒz hr‌t͡ʃh dr آn ɒst thj xvɒhd ʃd v ʃhrhɒj mskvn ɒjʃɒn xrɒb ʃdh، zmjn vjrɒn xvɒhd ʃd پs xvɒhjddɒnst kh mn jhvh hstm» v klɒm xdɒvnd br mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn ɒjn msl ʃmɒ t͡ʃjst kh drzmjn ɒsrɒئjl mj‌znjd v mj‌ɡvjjd ɒjɒm tvjl mj‌ʃvd v hr rvjɒ bɒtl mj‌ɡrdd lhzɒ bh ɒjʃɒn bɡv، xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒjn msl rɒ bɒtl xvɒhm sɒxt v آn rɒ bɒr djɡr drɒsrɒئjl nxvɒhnd‌آvrd blkh bh ɒjʃɒn bɡv ɒjɒm، nzdjk ɒst v ɒnd͡ʒɒm hr rvjɒ، ɣrjb zjrɒ kh hjt͡ʃ‌rvjɒj bɒtl v ɣjb ɡvjj tmlɣ‌آmjz dr mjɒn xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl bɒr djɡr nxvɒhd bvd zjrɒ mn kh jhvh hstm sxn xvɒhm ɡft v sxnj kh mn mj‌ɡvjm، vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd v bɒr djɡr tɒxjrnxvɒhd ɒftɒd zjrɒ xdɒvnd jhvh mj‌ɡvjd ɒj xɒndɒn ftnh ɒŋjz dr ɒjɒm ʃmɒ sxnj xvɒhm ɡft v آn rɒ bh ɒnd͡ʒɒm xvɒhm rsɒnjd» v klɒm xdɒvnd br mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn hɒn xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl mj‌ɡvjndrvjɒjj kh ɒv mj‌bjnd، bh d͡ʒht ɒjɒm tvjl ɒst vɒv brɒj zmɒnhɒj bʔjdh nbvt mj‌nmɒjdbnɒbrɒjn bh ɒjʃɒn bɡv xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd kh hjt͡ʃ klɒm mn bʔd ɒz ɒjn tɒxjrnxvɒhd ɒftɒd v xdɒvnd jhvh mj‌frmɒjd klɒmj kh mn mj‌ɡvjm vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd» bnɒbrɒjn bh ɒjʃɒn bɡv xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd kh hjt͡ʃ klɒm mn bʔd ɒz ɒjn tɒxjrnxvɒhd ɒftɒd v xdɒvnd jhvh mj‌frmɒjd klɒmj kh mn mj‌ɡvjm vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd» v klɒm xdɒvnd br mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn bh zd ɒnbjɒj ɒsrɒئjl kh nbvt mj‌nmɒjnd، nbvt nmɒ v bh آnɒnj kh ɒzɒfkɒr xvd nbvt mj‌knnd، bɡv klɒm xdɒvnd rɒbʃnvjd xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd vɒj brɒnbjɒء ɒhmɣ kh tɒbʔ rvh xvjʃ mj‌bɒʃnd v hjt͡ʃ ndjdh‌ɒnd ‌ɒj ɒsrɒئjl ɒnbjɒj tv mɒnnd rvbɒhɒn drxrɒbh‌hɒ bvdh‌ɒnd ʃmɒ bh rxnh‌hɒ brnjɒmdjd vdjvɒr rɒ brɒj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl tʔmjr nkrdjd tɒɒjʃɒn dr rvz xdɒvnd bh d͡ʒŋ btvɒnnd ɒjstɒd rvjɒj bɒtl v ɣjb ɡvjj kɒzb mj‌bjnnd vmj ɡvjnd xdɒvnd mj‌frmɒjd، bɒ آnkh xdɒvndɒjʃɒn rɒ nfrstɒdh ɒst v mrdmɒn rɒ ɒmjdvɒrmj sɒznd bh ɒjnkh klɒm sɒbt xvɒhd ʃd آjɒrvjɒj bɒtl ndjdjd v ɣjb ɡvjj kɒzb rɒ zkrnkrdjd t͡ʃvnkh ɡftjd xdɒvnd mj‌frmɒjd bɒ آnkh mn tklm nnmvdm؟» bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd «t͡ʃvnkh sxn bɒtl ɡftjd v rvjɒj kɒzb djdjd، ɒjnk xdɒvnd jhvh mj‌frmɒjd mn bh zd ʃmɒxvɒhm bvd پs dst mn br ɒnbjɒjj kh rvjɒj bɒtl djdnd v ɣjb ɡvjj kɒzb krdnd drɒzxvɒhd ʃd v ɒjʃɒn dr md͡ʒls ɣvm mn dɒxl nxvɒhnd ʃd v dr dftr xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl sbt nxvɒhnd ɡrdjd v bh zmjn ɒsrɒئjl vɒrd nxvɒhndɡʃt v ʃmɒ xvɒhjd dɒnst kh mn xdɒvnd jhvh mj bɒʃm v ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht kh ɣvm mrɒ ɡmrɒh krdh، ɡftnd kh slɒmtj ɒst dr hjnj kh slɒmtj nbvdv jkj ɒz ɒjʃɒn djvɒr rɒ bnɒ nmvd v sɒjrjn آn rɒbh ɡl mlɒt mɒljdnd پs bh آnɒnj kh ɡl mlɒtrɒ mɒljdnd bɡv kh آn xvɒhd ɒftɒd bɒrɒn sjɒl xvɒhd bɒrjd v ʃmɒ‌ɒj tɡrɡhɒj sxt xvɒhjdآmd v bɒd ʃdjd آn rɒ xvɒhd ʃkɒft v hɒn t͡ʃvn djvɒr bjftd، آjɒ ʃmɒ rɒ nxvɒhnd ɡft kd͡ʒɒɒst آn ɒndvdj kh bh آn ɒndvd ɡrdjd؟» lhzɒ xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «mn آn rɒ bh bɒd ʃdjd dr ɣzb xvd xvɒhm ʃkɒft vbɒrɒn sjɒl dr xʃm mn xvɒhd bɒrjd v tɡrɡhɒj sxt brɒj fɒnj sɒxtn آn dr ɣjz mn xvɒhdآmd v آn djvɒr rɒ kh ʃmɒ bh ɡl mlɒt ɒndvdkrdjd mnhdm nmvdh، bh zmjn jksɒn xvɒhm sɒxt v پj آn mnkʃf xvɒhd ʃd v t͡ʃvn آn bjftd ʃmɒ dr mjɒnʃ hlɒk xvɒhjd ʃd v xvɒhjddɒnst kh mn jhvh hstm پs t͡ʃvn xʃm xvd rɒ br djvɒr v br آnɒnj kh آn rɒ bh ɡl mlɒtɒndvd krdnd bh ɒtmɒm rsɒnjdh bɒʃm، آŋɒh bh ʃmɒxvɒhm ɡft djvɒr njst ʃdh v آnɒnj kh آn rɒɒndvd krdnd nɒbvd ɡʃth‌ɒnd jʔnj ɒnbjɒj ɒsrɒئjl kh drbɒrh ɒvrʃljm nbvt mj‌nmɒjnd vbrɒjʃ rvjɒj slɒmtj rɒ mj‌bjnnd bɒ آnkh xdɒvndjhvh mj‌ɡvjd kh slɒmtj njst v tv‌ɒj پsrɒnsɒn nzr xvd rɒ br dxtrɒn ɣvm xvjʃ kh ɒzɒfkɒr xvd nbvt mj‌nmɒjnd bdɒr v br ɒjʃɒn nbvt nmɒ، v bɡv xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd vɒj br آnɒnj kh bɒlʃhɒ brɒj mfsl hr bɒzvjj mj‌dvznd v mndjlhɒ brɒj sr hr ɣɒmtj mj‌sɒznd tɒ d͡ʒɒnhɒ rɒ sjd knnd آjɒ d͡ʒɒnhɒj ɣvm mrɒ sjdxvɒhjd krd v d͡ʒɒnhɒj xvd rɒ zndh ŋɒh xvɒhjddɒʃt؟ v mrɒ dr mjɒn ɣvm mn brɒj mʃt d͡ʒvjj v lɣmh nɒnj bj‌hrmt mj‌knjd t͡ʃvnkh bh ɣvm mn kh bh drvɣ ʃmɒ ɡvʃ mj‌ɡjrnd drvɣ ɡfth، d͡ʒɒnhɒjj rɒ kh mstvd͡ʒb mvt njstndmj kʃjd v d͡ʒɒnhɒjj rɒ kh msthɣ hjɒt nmj bɒʃnd zndh ŋɒh mj‌dɒrjd lhzɒ xdɒvndjhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnk mn bh zd bɒlʃhɒj ʃmɒ hstm kh bh vɒsth آnhɒ d͡ʒɒnhɒ rɒ msl mrɣɒn sjd mj‌knjd v آnhɒ rɒ ɒz bɒzvhɒj ʃmɒ xvɒhm drjd v ksɒnj rɒ kh d͡ʒɒnhɒj ɒjʃɒn rɒ msl mrɣɒn sjd mj‌knjd، rhɒjj xvɒhm dɒd v mndjlhɒj ʃmɒ rɒ xvɒhm drjd v ɣvm xvd rɒ ɒz dst ʃmɒxvɒhm rhɒnjd v djɡr dr dst ʃmɒ nxvɒhnd bvdtɒ ɒjʃɒn rɒ sjd knjd پs xvɒhjd dɒnst kh mn jhvh hstm t͡ʃvnkh ʃmɒ bh drvɣ xvd، dl mrd ʔɒdl rɒ kh mn mhzvn nsɒxtm، mhzvn sɒxth‌ɒjd v dsthɒj mrd ʃrjr rɒ tɣvjt dɒdh ɒjdtɒ ɒz rftɒr ɣbjh xvd bɒzɡʃt nnmɒjd v zndh nʃvdlhzɒ bɒr djɡr rvjɒj bɒtl nxvɒhjd djd vɣjb ɡvjj nxvɒhjd nmvd v t͡ʃvn ɣvm xvd rɒ ɒzdst ʃmɒ آjɒ ɒjʃɒn ɒz mn msɒlt nmɒjnd؟ lhzɒ ɒjʃɒn rɒ xtɒb kn v bh ɒjʃɒn bɡv xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd hrksj ɒzxɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl kh bthɒj xvjʃ rɒ dr dl xvdd͡ʒɒj dhd v sŋ msɒdm ɡnɒh xvjʃ rɒ پjʃ rvj xvd bnhd v mj‌bɒʃnd، xvɒhm dɒd v xvn ɣzb vɣjrt rɒ br tv vɒrd xvɒhm آvrd v tv rɒ bh‌dst ɒjʃɒn tsljm nmvdh، xrɒbɒthɒj tv rɒxrɒb v ʔmɒrɒt blnd tv rɒ mnhdm xvɒhndsɒxt v lbɒst rɒ ɒz tv xvɒhnd knd v zjvrhɒj ɣʃŋ tv rɒ tvʔɣvbt xvɒhnd rsɒnjd پs mn tv rɒ ɒz znɒ kɒrj bɒzxvɒhm dɒʃt v bɒr djɡr ɒd͡ʒrt nxvɒhj dɒd v hdt xʃm xvd rɒ br tv frv xvɒhm nʃɒnjdv ɣjrt mn ɒz tv xvɒhd brɡʃt v آrɒm ɡrfth، bɒr djɡr ɣzb nxvɒhm nmvd t͡ʃvnkh ɒjɒm d͡ʒvɒnj xvd rɒ bh jɒd njɒvrdh، mrɒ bh hmh ɒjnkɒrhɒrnd͡ʒɒnjdj، ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht xdɒvnd jhvh mj‌ɡvjd kh ɒjnk njz rftɒr tv rɒ br srt vɒrd xvɒhm آvrd vʔlɒvh br tmɒmj rd͡ʒɒsɒtt djɡr ɒjn ʔml ɣbjh rɒmrtkb nxvɒhj ʃd «ɒjnk hr‌kh msl mj‌آvrd ɒjn msl rɒ br tvآvrdh، xvɒhd ɡft kh msl mɒdr، msl dxtrʃ mj‌bɒʃd tv dxtr mɒdr xvd hstj kh ɒzʃvhr v پsrɒn xvd nfrt mj‌dɒʃt v xvɒhrxvɒhrɒn xvd hstj kh ɒz ʃvhrɒn v پsrɒn xvjʃ nfrt mj‌dɒrnd mɒdr ʃmɒ htj bvd v پdrʃmɒ ɒmvrj v xvɒhr bzrɡ tv sɒmrh ɒst kh bɒ dxtrɒn xvd btrf t͡ʃپ tv sɒkn mj‌bɒʃd vxvɒhr kvt͡ʃk tv sdvm ɒst kh bɒ dxtrɒn xvdbtrf rɒst tv sɒkn mj‌bɒʃd ɒmɒ tv drtrjɣ hɒj ɒjʃɒn slvk nkrdj v msl rd͡ʒɒsɒt ɒjʃɒn ʔml nnmvdj blkh ɡvjɒ ɒjn shl bvd kh tv dr hmh rftɒr xvd ɒz ɒjʃɒn zjɒdh fɒsd ʃdj» پs xdɒvnd jhvh mj‌ɡvjd «bh hjɒt xvdm ɣsm kh xvɒhr tv sdvm v dxtrɒnʃ mvɒfɣ ɒʔmɒl tv v dxtrɒnt ʔml nnmvdnd ɒjnk ɡnɒh xvɒhrt sdvm ɒjn bvd kh tkbr vfrɒvɒnj nɒn v sʔɒdtmndj rfɒhjt brɒj ɒv vdxtrɒnʃ bvd v fɣjrɒn v mskjnɒn rɒ dstɡjrj nnmvdnd v mɣrvr ʃdh، dr hzvr mn mrtkb rd͡ʒɒsɒt ɡrdjdnd lhzɒ t͡ʃnɒnkh slɒh djdm ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz mjɒn brdɒʃtm v sɒmrh nsf ɡnɒhɒnt rɒ mrtkb nʃd، blkh tv rd͡ʒɒsɒt xvdrɒ ɒz آnhɒ zjɒdh nmvdj v xvɒhrɒn xvd rɒ bh tmɒmj rd͡ʒɒsɒt xvjʃ kh bʔml آvrdj mbrj sɒxtj پs tv njz kh br xvɒhrɒn xvd hkm dɒdj xd͡ʒɒlt xvd rɒ mthml bʃv zjrɒ bh ɡnɒhɒnt kh dr آnhɒ bjʃtr ɒz ɒjʃɒn rd͡ʒɒsɒt nmvdj ɒjʃɒn ɒz tv ʔɒdltr ɡrdjdnd lhzɒ tv njzxd͡ʒl ʃv v rsvɒjj xvd rɒ mthml bɒʃ t͡ʃvnkh xvɒhrɒn xvd rɒ mbrj sɒxtj v mn ɒsjrj ɒjʃɒn jʔnj ɒsjrj sdvm v dxtrɒnʃ v ɒsjrj sɒmrh v dxtrɒnʃ v ɒsjrj ɒsjrɒn tv rɒ dr mjɒn ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm brɡrdɒnjd tɒ xd͡ʒɒlt xvd rɒmthml ʃdh، ɒz hr‌t͡ʃh krdh‌ɒj ʃrmndh ʃvj t͡ʃvnkh ɒjʃɒn rɒ tslj dɒdh‌ɒj v xvɒhrɒnt jʔnj sdvm v dxtrɒnʃ bh hɒlt nxstjn xvdxvɒhnd brɡʃt v sɒmrh v dxtrɒnʃ bh hɒlt nxstjn xvd xvɒhnd brɡʃt v tv v dxtrɒnt bh hɒlt nxstjn xvd xvɒhjd brɡʃt ɒmɒxvɒhr tv sdvm dr rvz tkbr tv bh zbɒnt آvrdh nʃd ɣbl ɒz آnkh ʃrɒrt tv mkʃvf bʃvd msl آn zmɒnj kh dxtrɒn ɒrɒm mzmt mj‌krdnd vd͡ʒmjʔ md͡ʒɒvrɒnʃ jʔnj dxtrɒn flstjnjɒn kh tvrɒ ɒz hr trf xvɒr mj‌ʃmrdnd» پs xdɒvnd mj‌frmɒjd kh «tv ɣbɒht vrd͡ʒɒsɒt xvd rɒ mthml xvɒhj ʃd zjrɒxdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd bh nhd͡ʒj kh tv ʔml nmvdj mn bɒ tv ʔml xvɒhm nmvd، zjrɒ kh ɣsm rɒ xvɒr ʃmrdh، ʔhd rɒ ʃkstj ljkn mn ʔhd xvd rɒ kh dr ɒjɒm d͡ʒvɒnjt bɒ tv bstm bh jɒdxvɒhm آvrd v ʔhd d͡ʒɒvdɒnj bɒ tv ɒstvɒr xvɒhm dɒʃt v hŋɒmj kh xvɒhrɒn bzrɡ v kvt͡ʃk xvd rɒ پzjrfth bɒʃj، آŋɒh rɒhhɒj xvd rɒ bh jɒd آvrdh، xd͡ʒl xvɒhj ʃd v mn ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh‌d͡ʒɒj dxtrɒn bh tv xvɒhm dɒd، ljkn nh ɒz ʔhd tv v mn ʔhd xvd rɒ bɒ tv ɒstvɒr xvɒhm sɒxt vxvɒhj dɒnst kh mn jhvh hstmtɒ آnkh bh jɒd آvrdh، xd͡ʒl ʃvj v xdɒvnd آmrzjdh bɒʃm، bɒr djɡr bh‌sbb rsvɒjj xvjʃ dhɒn xvd rɒ nxvɒhj ɡʃvd» v klɒm xdɒvnd br mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn، mʔmɒjj bjɒvr v mslj drbɒrh xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl bzn v bɡv xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd ʔɣɒb bzrɡ kh bɒlhɒj strɡ vnjhɒj drɒz پr ɒz پrhɒj rŋɒrŋ dɒrd bh lbnɒn آmd v sr srv آzɒd rɒ ɡrft v sr ʃɒxh hɒjʃ rɒ kndh، آn rɒ bh zmjn td͡ʒɒrt آvrdh، dr ʃhrsvdɒɡrɒn ɡzɒʃt v ɒz txm آn zmjn ɡrfth، آn rɒ dr zmjn bɒrvrj nhɒd v nzd آbhɒj bsjɒrɡzɒʃth، آn rɒ msl drxt bjd، ɣrs nmvd vآn nmv krdh، mv vsjʔ kvtɒh ɣd ɡrdjd kh ʃɒxh hɒjʃ bsvj ɒv mɒjl ʃd v rjʃh hɒjʃ drzjr vj mj‌bvd پs mvj ʃdh ʃɒxh‌hɒ rvjɒnjd vnhɒlhɒ آvrd v ʔɣɒb bzrɡ djɡrj bɒ bɒlhɒj strɡ v پrhɒj bsjɒr آmd v ɒjnk ɒjn mvrjʃh hɒj xvd rɒ bsvj ɒv brɡrdɒnjd vʃɒxh hɒj xvjʃ rɒ ɒz krth hɒj bstɒn xvdbtrf ɒv bjrvn krd tɒ ɒv vj rɒ sjrɒb nmɒjd drzmjn njkv nzd آbhɒj bsjɒr kɒʃth ʃd tɒ ʃɒxh hɒrvjɒnjdh، mjvh bjɒvrd v mv ɣʃŋ ɡrdd bɡv kh xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd پs آjɒ kɒmjɒb xvɒhd ʃd؟ آjɒ ɒv rjʃh hɒjʃ rɒ nxvɒhd knd vmjvh‌ɒʃ rɒ nxvɒhd t͡ʃjd tɒ xʃk ʃvd؟ tmɒmj brɡhɒj tɒzh‌ɒʃ xʃk xvɒhd ʃd v bdvn ɣvt ʔzjm v xlɣ bsjɒrj ɒz rjʃh‌hɒ kndh xvɒhd ʃd ɒjnk ɣrs ʃdh ɒst ɒmɒ kɒmjɒb nxvɒhdʃd blkh t͡ʃvn bɒd ʃrɣj br آn bvzd bɒlkl xʃk xvɒhd ʃd v dr bvstɒnj kh dr آn rvjjd پʒmrdh xvɒhd ɡrdjd» v klɒm xdɒvnd br mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «bh ɒjn xɒndɒn mtmrd bɡv kh آjɒ mʔnj‌ɒjn t͡ʃjzhɒ rɒ nmj dɒnjd؟ bɡv kh ɒjnk پɒdʃɒh bɒbl bh ɒvrʃljm آmdh، پɒdʃɒh v srvrɒnʃ rɒ ɡrft vɒjʃɒn rɒ nzd xvd bh bɒbl brd v ɒz zrjh mlvk ɡrfth، bɒ ɒv ʔhd bst v ɒv rɒ ɣsm dɒd v zvrآvrɒn zmjn rɒ brd tɒ آnkh mmlkt پst ʃdh، srblnd nknd ɒmɒ ʔhd ɒv rɒ ŋɒh dɒʃth، ɒstvɒrbmɒnd v ljkn ɒv ɒz vj ʔɒsj ʃdh، ɒjlt͡ʃjɒn xvd rɒ bh msr frstɒd tɒ ɒsbɒn v xlɣ bsjɒrj bh ɒv bdhnd آjɒ ksj‌kh ɒjnkɒrhɒ rɒ krdh bɒʃd، kɒmjɒb ʃvd jɒ rhɒjj jɒbd؟ v jɒ ksj‌kh ʔhd rɒʃksth ɒst xlɒsj xvɒhd jɒft؟» xdɒvnd jhvh mj‌ɡvjd «bh hjɒt xvdm ɣsm kh ɒlbth dr mkɒn آn پɒdʃɒh kh ɒv rɒ bh پɒdʃɒhj nsb krd v ɒv ɣsm vj rɒ xvɒrʃmrdh، ʔhd ɒv rɒ ʃkst jʔnj nzd vj dr mjɒn bɒbl xvɒhd mrd v t͡ʃvn sŋrhɒ br پɒ sɒznd vbrd͡ʒhɒ bnɒ nmɒjnd tɒ d͡ʒɒnhɒj bsjɒrj rɒ mnɣtʔ sɒznd، آŋɒh frʔvn bɒ lʃkr ʔzjm v ɡrvh ksjr ɒvrɒ dr d͡ʒŋ ɒʔɒnt nxvɒhd krd t͡ʃvnkh ɣsm rɒxvɒr ʃmrdh، ʔhd rɒ ʃkst v bʔd ɒz آnkh dst xvd rɒ dɒdh bvd hmh xvd rɒ br ɒv xvɒhm ɡstrɒnjd v ɒvdr kmnd mn ɡrftɒr xvɒhd ʃd v ɒv rɒ bh bɒbl آvrdh، dr آnd͡ʒɒ br vj drbɒrh xjɒntj kh bh mn vrzjdh ɒst mhɒkmh xvɒhm nmvd v tmɒmj frɒrjɒnʃ bɒ d͡ʒmjʔ ɒfvɒd͡ʒʃ ɒz ʃmʃjr xvɒhndɒftɒd v bɣjh ɒjʃɒn bsvj hr bɒd پrɒkndh xvɒhndʃd v xvɒhjd dɒnst kh mn kh jhvh mj‌bɒʃm ɒjn rɒ ɡfth‌ɒm» xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd «mn sr blndsrv آzɒd rɒ ɡrfth، آn rɒ xvɒhm kɒʃt v ɒz srɒɣsɒnʃ ʃɒxh tɒzh kndh، آn rɒ br kvh blnd v rfjʔ ɣrs xvɒhm nmvd آn rɒ br kvh blnd ɒsrɒئjl xvɒhm kɒʃt v آn ʃɒxh‌hɒ rvjɒnjdh، mjvh xvɒhd آvrd v srv آzɒd ɣʃŋ xvɒhd ʃd kh hr ɣsm mrɣɒn bɒldɒr zjr آn sɒkn mj‌ɡvjd «bh hjɒt xvdm ɣsm kh bʔd ɒz ɒjn ɒjn msl rɒ dr ɒsrɒئjl nxvɒhjdآvrd ɒjnk hmh d͡ʒɒnhɒ ɒz آn mnnd t͡ʃnɒnkh d͡ʒɒn پdr ɒst، hmt͡ʃnjn d͡ʒɒn پsr njz، hrdvj آnhɒ ɒzآn mn mj‌bɒʃnd hr ksj‌kh ɡnɒh vrzd ɒv xvɒhdmrd v ɒɡr ksj ʔɒdl bɒʃd v ɒnsɒf v ʔdɒlt rɒbʔml آvrd، v br kvhhɒ nxvrd v t͡ʃʃmɒn xvdrɒ bsvj bthɒj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl brnjfrɒzd v zn hmsɒjh xvd rɒ bj‌ʔsmt nknd v bh zn hɒjz nzdjkj nnmɒjd، v br ksj zlm nknd v ɡrvɣrzdɒr rɒ bh ɒv rd nmɒjd v mɒl ksj rɒ bh ɣsb nbrd، blkh nɒn xvd rɒ bh ɡrsŋɒn bdhd vbrhŋɒn rɒ bh‌d͡ʒɒmh bپvʃɒnd، v nɣd rɒ bh svdndhd v rbh ŋjrd، blkh dst xvd rɒ ɒz stm brdɒʃth، ɒnsɒf hɣjɣj rɒ dr mjɒn mrdmɒn ɒd͡ʒrɒdɒrd، v bh frɒjz mn slvk nmvdh v ɒhkɒm mrɒŋɒh dɒʃth، bh rɒstj ʔml nmɒjd xdɒvnd jhvh mj‌frmɒjd kh آn ʃxs ʔɒdl ɒst v ɒlbth zndh xvɒhd mɒnd «ɒmɒ ɒɡr ɒv پsrj stm پjʃh v xvnrjz tvljdnmɒjd kh jkj ɒz ɒjn kɒrhɒ rɒ bʔml آvrd، vhjt͡ʃkdɒm ɒz آn ɒʔmɒl njkv rɒ bʔml njɒvrd blkh brkvhhɒ njz bxvrd v zn hmsɒjh xvd rɒ bj‌ʔsmt sɒzd، v br fɣjrɒn v mskjnɒn zlm nmvdh، mɒl mrdm rɒ bh ɣsb bbrd v ɡrv rɒ پs ndhd، blkh t͡ʃʃmɒn xvd rɒ bsvj bthɒ brɒfrɒʃth، mrtkb rd͡ʒɒsɒt bʃvd، v nɣd rɒ bh svd dɒdh، rbh ɡjrd، آjɒ ɒv zndh xvɒhd mɒnd؟ ɒlbth ɒv zndh nxvɒhd mɒnd v bh‌sbb hmh rd͡ʒɒsɒtj kh bd͡ʒɒآvrdh ɒst xvɒhd mrd v xvnʃ br srʃ xvɒhd bvd «v ɒɡr پsrj tvljd nmɒjd kh tmɒmj ɡnɒhɒn rɒ kh پdrʃ bd͡ʒɒ mj‌آvrd djdh، btrsd v msl آnhɒʔml nnmɒjd، v br kvhhɒ nxvrd v t͡ʃʃmɒn xvd rɒ bsvj bthɒj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl brnjfrɒzd vzn hmsɒjh xvjʃ rɒ bj‌ʔsmt nknd، v brksj zlm nknd v ɡrv ŋjrd v mɒl ɒhdj rɒ bh ɣsb nbrd blkh nɒn xvd rɒ bh ɡrsŋɒn dhd vbrhŋɒn rɒ bh‌d͡ʒɒmh پvʃɒnd، v dst xvd rɒ ɒzfɣjrɒn brdɒʃth، svd v rbh ŋjrd v ɒhkɒm mrɒ bd͡ʒɒآvrdh، bh frɒjz mn slvk nmɒjd، ɒv bh‌sbb ɡnɒh پdrʃ nxvɒhd mrd blkh ɒlbth zndh xvɒhd mɒnd v ɒmɒ پdrʃ t͡ʃvnkh bɒ brɒdrɒn xvd bh ʃdt zlm nmvdh، mɒl ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɣsb nmvd v ɒʔmɒl ʃnjʔ rɒ dr mjɒn ɣvm xvd bʔml آvrd ɒv ɒlbth bh‌sbb ɡnɒhɒnʃ xvɒhd mrd «ljkn ʃmɒ mj‌ɡvjjd t͡ʃrɒ t͡ʃnjn ɒst؟ آjɒپsr mthml ɡnɒh پdrʃ nmj bɒʃd؟ ɒɡr پsrɒnsɒf v ʔdɒlt rɒ bd͡ʒɒ آvrdh، tmɒmj frɒjz mrɒŋɒh dɒrd v bh آnhɒ ʔml nmɒjd، ɒv ɒlbth zndh xvɒhd mɒnd hr‌kh ɡnɒh knd ɒv xvɒhd mrd پsr mthml ɡnɒh پdrʃ nxvɒhd bvd v پdrmthml ɡnɒh پsrʃ nxvɒhd bvd ʔdɒlt mrdʔɒdl br xvdʃ xvɒhd bvd v ʃrɒrt mrd ʃrjrbr xvdʃ xvɒhd bvd «v ɒɡr mrd ʃrjr ɒz hmh ɡnɒhɒnj kh vrzjdh bɒʃd bɒzɡʃt nmɒjd v d͡ʒmjʔ frɒjz mrɒ ŋɒh dɒʃth، ɒnsɒf v ʔdɒlt rɒ bd͡ʒɒ آvrd ɒv ɒlbth zndh mɒndh nxvɒhd mrd tmɒmj tɣsjrhɒjj kh krdh bɒʃd bh zd ɒv bh jɒd آvrdh nxvɒhd ʃd blkh dr ʔdɒltj kh krdh bɒʃd zndh xvɒhd mɒnd» xdɒvnd jhvh mj‌frmɒjd «آjɒ mn ɒz mrdn mrd ʃrjr msrvr mj‌bɒʃm؟ nj blkh ɒz ɒjnkh ɒzrftɒr xvd bɒzɡʃt nmvdh، zndh mɒnd v ɒɡrmrd ʔɒdl ɒz ʔdɒltʃ brɡrdd v zlm nmvdh، mvɒfɣ hmh rd͡ʒɒsɒtj kh ʃrjrɒn mj‌knnd ʔml nmɒjd آjɒɒv zndh xvɒhd mɒnd؟ nj blkh tmɒmj ʔdɒlt ɒv kh krdh ɒst bh jɒd آvrdh nxvɒhd ʃd v dr xjɒntj kh nmvdh v dr ɡnɒhj kh vrzjdh ɒst xvɒhdmrd «ɒmɒ ʃmɒ mj‌ɡvjjd kh trjɣ xdɒvndmvzvn njst پs hɒl‌ɒj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl bʃnvjd آjɒ trjɣ mn ɣjr mvzvn ɒst v آjɒtrjɣ ʃmɒ ɣjr mvzvn njst؟ t͡ʃvnkh mrdʔɒdl ɒz ʔdɒltʃ brɡrdd v zlm knd dr آn xvɒhdmrd bh‌sbb zlmj kh krdh ɒst xvɒhd mrd v t͡ʃvn mrd ʃrjr rɒ ɒz ʃrɒrtj kh krdh ɒst bɒzɡʃt nmɒjd v ɒnsɒf v ʔdɒlt rɒ bd͡ʒɒ آvrd، d͡ʒɒn xvd rɒ zndh ŋɒh xvɒhd dɒʃt t͡ʃvnkh tʔɣl nmvdh، ɒz tmɒmj tɣsjrhɒjj kh krdh bvdbɒzɡʃt krd ɒlbth zndh xvɒhd mɒnd v nxvɒhdmrd ljkn ʃmɒ‌ɒj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl mj‌ɡvjjdkh trjɣ xdɒvnd mvzvn njst ɒj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl آjɒ trjɣ mn ɣjr mvzvn ɒst v آjɒtrjɣ ʃmɒ ɣjr mvzvn njst؟» bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd jhvh mj‌ɡvjd «ɒj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl mn brhrjk ɒz ʃmɒ mvɒfɣ rftɒrʃ dɒvrj xvɒhm nmvd پs tvbh knjd v ɒz hmh tɣsjrhɒj xvdbɒzɡʃt nmɒjjd tɒ ɡnɒh mvd͡ʒb hlɒkt ʃmɒ nʃvd tmɒmj tɣsjrhɒj xvjʃ rɒ kh mrtkb آnhɒ ʃdh‌ɒjd ɒz xvd dvr ɒndɒzjd v dl tɒzh v rvh tɒzh‌ɒj brɒj xvd ɒjd͡ʒɒd knjd zjrɒ kh‌ɒj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl brɒj t͡ʃh bmjrjd؟zjrɒ xdɒvnd jhvh mj‌ɡvjd mn ɒz mrɡ آnks kh mj‌mjrd msrvrnmj bɒʃm پs bɒzɡʃt nmvdh، zndh mɒnjd» zjrɒ xdɒvnd jhvh mj‌ɡvjd mn ɒz mrɡ آnks kh mj‌mjrd msrvrnmj bɒʃm پs bɒzɡʃt nmvdh، zndh mɒnjd» «پs tv ɒjn mrsjh rɒ brɒj srvrɒn ɒsrɒئjl bxvɒn v bɡv mɒdr tv t͡ʃh bvd ɒv dr mjɒn ʃjrɒn ʃjr mɒdh mj‌xvɒbjd vbt͡ʃh hɒj xvd rɒ dr mjɒn ʃjrɒn ʒjɒn mj‌پrvrd v jkj ɒz bt͡ʃh hɒj xvd rɒ trbjt nmvd kh ʃjrʒjɒn ɡrdjd v bh drjdn ʃkɒr آmvxth ʃd vmrdmɒn rɒ xvrd v t͡ʃvn ɒmt‌hɒ xbr ɒv rɒʃnjdnd، dr hfrh ɒjʃɒn ɡrftɒr ɡrdjd v ɒv rɒ drɣlhɒ bh zmjn msr brdnd v t͡ʃvn mɒdrʃ djd kh bʔd ɒz ɒntzɒr kʃjdn ɒmjdʃ brjdh ʃd، پs ɒzbt͡ʃh hɒjʃ djɡrj rɒ ɡrfth، ɒv rɒ ʃjrj ʒjɒn sɒxt v ɒv dr mjɒn ʃjrɒn ɡrdʃ krdh، ʃjrʒjɒn ɡrdjd v bh drjdn ʃkɒr آmvxth ʃdh، mrdmɒn rɒ xvrd v ɣsrhɒj ɒjʃɒn rɒ vjrɒn vʃhrhɒj ɒjʃɒn rɒ xrɒb nmvd v zmjn v hrt͡ʃh drآn bvd ɒz آvɒz ɣrʃ ɒv thj ɡrdjd v ɒmt‌hɒ ɒzkʃvrhɒ ɒz hr trf br ɒv hd͡ʒvm آvrdh، dɒm xvdrɒ br ɒv ɡstrɒnjdnd kh bh hfrh ɒjʃɒn ɡrftɒr ʃd v ɒv rɒ dr ɣlhɒ kʃjdh، dr ɣfs ɡzɒʃtnd v nzdپɒdʃɒh bɒbl brdnd vɒv rɒ dr ɣlʔh‌ɒj nhɒdnd tɒ آvɒzɒv djɡr br kvhhɒj ɒsrɒئjl msmvʔ nʃvd «mɒdr tv msl drxt mv mɒnnd xvdt nzdآbhɒ ɣrs ʃdh، bh‌sbb آbhɒj bsjɒr mjvh آvrd v ʃɒxh bsjɒr dɒʃt v ʃɒxh hɒj ɣvj brɒj ʔsɒhɒj slɒtjn dɒʃt v ɣd آn dr mjɒn ʃɒxh hɒj پr brɡ bh hdj blnd ʃd kh ɒz ksrt ɒɣsɒnʃ ɒrtfɒʔʃ nmɒjɒn ɡrdjd ɒmɒ bh ɣzb kndh v bh zmjn ɒndɒxth ʃd v bɒd ʃrɣj mjvh‌ɒʃ rɒ xʃk sɒxt v ʃɒxh hɒj ɣvjʃ ʃksth vxʃk ɡrdjdh، آtʃ آnhɒ rɒ svzɒnjd v ɒlɒn dr bjɒbɒn dr zmjn xʃk v tʃnh mɣrvs ɒstv آtʃ ɒz ʔsɒhɒj ʃɒxh hɒjʃ bjrvn آmdh، mjvh‌ɒʃ rɒ svzɒnjd bh nvʔj kh jk ʃɒxh ɣvj brɒj ʔsɒj slɒtjn nmɒndh ɒst ɒjn mrsjh ɒst v mrsjh xvɒhd bvd» v آtʃ ɒz ʔsɒhɒj ʃɒxh hɒjʃ bjrvn آmdh، mjvh‌ɒʃ rɒ svzɒnjd bh nvʔj kh jk ʃɒxh ɣvj brɒj ʔsɒj slɒtjn nmɒndh ɒst ɒjn mrsjh ɒst v mrsjh xvɒhd bvd» v dr rvz dhm mɒh پnd͡ʒm ɒz sɒl hftm bʔzj ɒz mʃɒjx ɒsrɒئjl bh d͡ʒht tlbjdn xdɒvnd آmdnd v پjʃ mn nʃstnd آŋɒh klɒm xdɒvnd br mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn mʃɒjx ɒsrɒئjl rɒ xtɒb krdh، bh ɒjʃɒn bɡv xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd آjɒʃmɒ brɒj tlbjdn mn آmdjd؟ xdɒvnd jhvh mj‌ɡvjd bh hjɒt xvdm ɣsm kh ɒz ʃmɒ tlbjdh nxvɒhm ʃd ‌ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn آjɒ br ɒjʃɒn hkm xvɒhj krd؟ آjɒ br ɒjʃɒn hkm xvɒhj krd؟ پs rd͡ʒɒsɒt پdrɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ bdjʃɒn bfhmɒn vbh ɒjʃɒn bɡv xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd drrvzj kh ɒsrɒئjl rɒ brɡzjdm v dst xvd rɒbrɒj zrjt xɒndɒn jʔɣvb brɒfrɒʃtm v xvd rɒ bh ɒjʃɒn dr zmjn msr mʔrvf sɒxtm v dst xvdrɒ brɒj ɒjʃɒn brɒfrɒʃth، ɡftm mn jhvh xdɒj ʃmɒ hstm، dr hmɒn rvz dst xvd rɒ brɒj ɒjʃɒn brɒfrɒʃtm kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz zmjn msr bh zmjnj kh brɒj ɒjʃɒn bɒzdjd krdh bvdm bjrvn آvrm zmjnj kh bh ʃjr v ʃhd d͡ʒɒrj ɒst v fxrhmh zmjnhɒ mj‌bɒʃd v bh ɒjʃɒn ɡftm hr ks ɒzʃmɒ rd͡ʒɒsɒt t͡ʃʃmɒn xvd rɒ dvr knd vxvjʃtn rɒ bh bthɒj msr nd͡ʒs nsɒzd، zjrɒ kh mn jhvh xdɒj ʃmɒ hstm ɒmɒ ɒjʃɒn ɒz mn ʔɒsj ʃdh، nxvɒstnd kh bh mn ɡvʃ ɡjrnd vhr ks ɒz ɒjʃɒn rd͡ʒɒsɒt t͡ʃʃmɒn xvd rɒ dvrnkrd v bthɒj msr rɒ trk nnmvd آŋɒh ɡftm kh xʃm xvd rɒ br ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm rjxt v ɣzb xvjʃ rɒ dr mjɒn zmjn msr br ɒjʃɒn bh ɒtmɒm xvɒhm rsɒnjd ljkn mhz xɒtr ɒsm xvdʔml nmvdm tɒ آn dr nzr ɒmt hɒjj kh ɒjʃɒn drmjɒn آnhɒ bvdnd v dr nzr آnhɒ xvd rɒ bh bjrvn آvrdn ɒjʃɒn ɒz zmjn msr، bh ɒjʃɒn ʃnɒsɒnjdm، bj‌hrmt nʃvd پs ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz zmjn msrbjrvn آvrdh، bh bjɒbɒn rsɒnjdm v frɒjz xvjʃ rɒ bh ɒjʃɒn dɒdm v ɒhkɒm xvd rɒ kh hr‌kh bh آnhɒ ʔml nmɒjd bh آnhɒ zndh xvɒhd mɒnd، bh ɒjʃɒn tʔljm dɒdm v njz sbt hɒj xvd rɒ bh ɒjʃɒn ʔtɒ frmvdm tɒ ʔlɒmtj dr mjɒn mn v ɒjʃɒn bʃvd v bdɒnnd kh mn jhvh hstm kh ɒjʃɒn rɒtɣdjs mj‌nmɒjm «ljkn xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl dr bjɒbɒn ɒz mn ʔɒsj ʃdh، dr frɒjz mn slvk nnmvdnd vɒhkɒm mrɒ kh hr‌kh bh آnhɒ ʔml nmɒjd ɒz آnhɒ zndh mɒnd، xvɒr ʃmrdnd v sbt hɒjm rɒ bsjɒrbj hrmt nmvdnd آŋɒh ɡftm kh xʃm xvd rɒ br ɒjʃɒn rjxth، ɒjʃɒn rɒ dr bjɒbɒn hlɒk xvɒhm sɒxt ljkn mhz xɒtr ɒsm xvd ʔml nmvdm tɒ آn bh nzr ɒmt hɒjj kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh hzvr آnhɒ bjrvn آvrdm bj‌hrmt nʃvd vmn njz dst xvd rɒ brɒj ɒjʃɒn dr bjɒbɒn brɒfrɒʃtm kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh zmjnj kh bh ɒjʃɒn dɒdh bvdm، dɒxl nsɒzm zmjnj kh bh ʃjr v ʃhdd͡ʒɒrj ɒst v fxr tmɒmj zmjnhɒ mj‌bɒʃd zjrɒ kh ɒhkɒm mrɒ xvɒr ʃmrdnd vbh frɒjzm slvk nnmvdnd v sbt hɒj mrɒ bj‌hrmt sɒxtnd، t͡ʃvnkh dl ɒjʃɒn bh bthɒj xvd mɒjl mj‌bvd ljkn xʃm mn br ɒjʃɒn rɣt nmvdh، ɒjʃɒn rɒ hlɒk nsɒxtm v ɒjʃɒn rɒ dr bjɒbɒn، nɒbvdnnmvdm v bh پsrɒn ɒjʃɒn dr bjɒbɒn ɡftm bh frɒjz پdrɒn xvd slvk mnmɒjjd v ɒhkɒm ɒjʃɒn rɒ ŋɒh mdɒrjd v xvjʃtn rɒ bh bthɒj ɒjʃɒn nd͡ʒs msɒzjd mn jhvh xdɒj ʃmɒ hstm پs bh frɒjz mn slvk nmɒjjd v ɒhkɒm mrɒ ŋɒh dɒʃth، آnhɒ rɒ bd͡ʒɒ آvrjd v sbt hɒj mrɒtɣdjs nmɒjjd tɒ dr mjɒn mn v ʃmɒ ʔlɒmtj bɒʃdv bdɒnjd kh mn jhvh xdɒj ʃmɒ hstm «ljkn پsrɒn ɒz mn ʔɒsj ʃdh، bh frɒjz mn slvk nnmvdnd v ɒhkɒm mrɒ kh hr‌kh آnhɒ rɒbd͡ʒɒ آvrd ɒz آnhɒ zndh xvɒhd mɒnd، ŋɒh ndɒʃtnd vbh آnhɒ ʔml nnmvdnd v sbt hɒj mrɒ bj‌hrmt sɒxtnd آŋɒh ɡftm kh xʃm xvd rɒ br ɒjʃɒn rjxth، ɣzb xvjʃ rɒ br ɒjʃɒn dr bjɒbɒn bh ɒtmɒm xvɒhm rsɒnjd ljkn dst xvd rɒbrɡrdɒnjdh، mhz xɒtr ɒsm xvd ʔml nmvdm tɒ آn bh nzr ɒmt hɒjj kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh hzvr آnhɒ bjrvn آvrdm bj‌hrmt nʃvd v mn njz dst xvd rɒ brɒj ɒjʃɒn dr bjɒbɒn brɒfrɒʃtm kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ dr mjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ پrɒkndh nmɒjm v ɒjʃɒn rɒ drkʃvrhɒ mtfrɣ sɒzm zjrɒ kh ɒhkɒm mrɒ bd͡ʒɒnjɒvrdnd v frɒjz mrɒ xvɒr ʃmrdnd v sbt hɒj mrɒ bj‌hrmt sɒxtnd v t͡ʃʃmɒn ɒjʃɒn bsvj bthɒj پdrɒn ɒjʃɒn ŋrɒn mj‌bvd bnɒbrɒjn mn njz frɒjzj rɒ kh njkv nbvd v ɒhkɒmj rɒ kh ɒz آnhɒzndh nmɒnnd bh ɒjʃɒn dɒdm v ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh hdɒjɒj ɒjʃɒn kh hr ks rɒ kh rhm rɒ mj‌ɡʃvdɒz آtʃ mj‌ɡzrɒnjdnd، nd͡ʒs sɒxtm tɒ ɒjʃɒn rɒtbɒh sɒzm v bdɒnnd kh mn jhvh hstm «bnɒbrɒjn‌ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl rɒxtɒb krdh، bh ɒjʃɒn bɡv xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd dr ɒjn dfʔh njz پdrɒn ʃmɒ xjɒnt krdh، bh mn kfr vrzjdnd zjrɒ kh t͡ʃvn ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh zmjnj kh dst xvd rɒ brɒfrɒʃth bvdm kh آn rɒ bh ɒjʃɒn bdhm dr‌آvrdm، آŋɒh bh hr tl blnd vhr drxt kʃn nzr ɒndɒxtnd v zbɒjh xvd rɒ drآnd͡ʒɒ zbh nmvdnd v ɣrbɒnj hɒj ɣzb ɒŋjzxvjʃ rɒ ɡzrɒnjdnd v dr آnd͡ʒɒ hdɒjɒj xvʃbvj xvd rɒ آvrdnd v dr آnd͡ʒɒ hdɒjɒj rjxtnj xvd rɒ rjxtnd v bh ɒjʃɒn ɡftm ɒjn mkɒn blnd kh ʃmɒ bh آn mj‌rvjd t͡ʃjst؟ پs ɒsm آn tɒ ɒmrvz bɒmh xvɒndh mj‌ʃvd «bnɒbrɒjn bh xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl bɡv xdɒvndjhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd آjɒ ʃmɒ bh rftɒr پdrɒn xvd xvjʃtn rɒ nd͡ʒs mj‌sɒzjd v rd͡ʒɒsɒt ɒjʃɒn rɒ پjrvj nmvdh، znɒ mj‌knjd؟ v hdɒjɒj xvd rɒ آvrdh، پsrɒn xvjʃ rɒ ɒz آtʃ mj‌ɡzrɒnjd v xvjʃtn rɒ ɒz tmɒmj bthɒj xvd tɒɒmrvz nd͡ʒs mj‌sɒzjd؟ پs‌ɒj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl آjɒ mn ɒz ʃmɒ tlbjdh bʃvm؟ xdɒvnd jhvh mj‌frmɒjd bh hjɒt xvdm ɣsm kh ɒz ʃmɒ tlbjdh nxvɒhm ʃd v آnt͡ʃh bh‌xɒtr ʃmɒ xtvrmj knd hrɡz vɒɣʔ nxvɒhd ʃd kh xjɒl mj‌knjd msl ɒmt‌hɒ v mɒnnd ɣbɒjl kʃvrhɒ ɡrdjdh، bthɒj t͡ʃvb v sŋ rɒ ʔbɒdt xvɒhjd nmvd zjrɒ xdɒvnd jhvh mj‌frmɒjd bh hjɒt xvdm ɣsm kh hrآjnh bɒ dst ɣvj v bɒzvj brɒfrɒʃth vxʃm rjxth ʃdh br ʃmɒ sltnt xvɒhm nmvd v ʃmɒ rɒ ɒz mjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ bjrvn آvrdh، bh‌dst ɣvj v bɒzvj brɒfrɒʃth v xʃm rjxth ʃdh ɒzzmjnhɒjj kh dr آnhɒ پrɒkndh ʃdh‌ɒjd d͡ʒmʔ xvɒhm nmvd v ʃmɒ rɒ bh bjɒbɒn ɒmt‌hɒ dr‌آvrdh، drآnd͡ʒɒ br ʃmɒ rvbrv dɒvrj xvɒhm nmvd vxdɒvnd jhvh mj‌ɡvjd t͡ʃnɒnkh br پdrɒn ʃmɒ drbjɒbɒn zmjn msr dɒvrj nmvdm، hmt͡ʃnjn br ʃmɒdɒvrj xvɒhm nmvd v ʃmɒ rɒ zjr ʔsɒɡzrɒnjdh، bh bnd ʔhd drxvɒhm آvrd v آnɒnj rɒ kh mtmrd ʃdh v ɒz mn ʔɒsj ɡrdjdh‌ɒnd، ɒzmjɒn ʃmɒ d͡ʒdɒ xvɒhm nmvd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz zmjn ɣrbt ɒjʃɒn bjrvn xvɒhm آvrd ljkn bh zmjn ɒsrɒئjl dɒxl nxvɒhnd ʃd v xvɒhjd dɒnst kh mn jhvh hstm» ɒmɒ bh ʃmɒ‌ɒj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «hmh ʃmɒ nzdbthɒj xvd rfth، آnhɒ rɒ ʔbɒdt knjd ljkn bʔd ɒzɒjn ɒlbth mrɒ ɡvʃ xvɒhjd dɒd v ɒsm ɣdvs mrɒ djɡr bɒ hdɒjɒ v bthɒj xvd bj‌ʔsmt nxvɒhjdsɒxt zjrɒ xdɒvnd jhvh mj‌frmɒjd dr kvh mɣds mn br kvh blnd ɒsrɒئjl tmɒm xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl d͡ʒmjʔ dr آnd͡ʒɒ mrɒ ʔbɒdt xvɒhnd krdv dr آnd͡ʒɒ ɒz ɒjʃɒn rɒzj ʃdh، zbɒjh d͡ʒnbɒnjdnj ʃmɒ v nvbrhɒj hdɒjɒj ʃmɒ rɒ bɒ tmɒmj mvɣvfɒt ʃmɒ xvɒhm tlbjd v t͡ʃvn ʃmɒ rɒ ɒzɒmt‌hɒ bjrvn آvrm v ʃmɒ rɒ ɒz zmjnhɒjj kh drآnhɒ پrɒkndh ʃdh‌ɒjd d͡ʒmʔ nmɒjm، آŋɒh hdɒjɒj xvʃbvj ʃmɒ rɒ ɒz ʃmɒ ɣbvl xvɒhm krd v bh nzr ɒmt‌hɒ dr mjɒn ʃmɒ tɣdjs krdh xvɒhm ʃd v t͡ʃvn ʃmɒ rɒ bh zmjn ɒsrɒئjl jʔnj bh zmjnj kh drbɒrh‌ɒʃ dst xvd rɒ brɒfrɒʃtm kh آn rɒ bh پdrɒn ʃmɒ bdhm bjɒvrm، آŋɒh xvɒhjd dɒnst kh mn jhvh hstm v dr آnd͡ʒɒ trjɣ hɒj xvd vtmɒmj ɒʔmɒl xvjʃ rɒ kh xvjʃtn rɒ bh آnhɒnd͡ʒs sɒxth‌ɒjd، bh jɒd xvɒhjd آvrd v ɒz hmh ɒʔmɒl ɣbjh kh krdh‌ɒjd، xvjʃtn rɒ bh nzr xvdmkrvh xvɒhjd dɒʃt v‌ɒj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl xdɒvnd jhvh mj‌frmɒjd hŋɒmj kh bɒ ʃmɒmhz xɒtr ɒsm xvd v nh bh szɒj rftɒr ɣbjh ʃmɒ v nh mvɒfɣ ɒʔmɒl fɒsd ʃmɒ ʔml nmvdh bɒʃm، آŋɒh xvɒhjd dɒnst kh mn jhvh hstm» v klɒm xdɒvnd br mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn rvj xvd rɒ bsvj d͡ʒnvb mtvd͡ʒh sɒz v bh smt d͡ʒnvb tklm nmɒ v brd͡ʒŋl shrɒj d͡ʒnvb nbvt kn v bh آn d͡ʒŋl d͡ʒnvb bɡv klɒm xdɒvnd rɒ bʃnv xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd ɒjnk mn آtʃj drtv mj‌ɒfrvzm kh hr drxt sbz v hr drxt xʃk rɒ dr tv xvɒhd svzɒnjd v lhjb mlthb آn xɒmvʃ nxvɒhd ʃd v hmh rvjhɒ ɒz d͡ʒnvb tɒ ʃmɒl ɒz آn svxth xvɒhd ʃd v tmɒmj bʃrxvɒhnd fhmjd kh mn jhvh آn rɒ ɒfrvxth‌ɒm tɒxɒmvʃj nپzjrd»v mn ɡftm «آh‌ɒj xdɒvnd jhvh ɒjʃɒn drbɒrh mn mj‌ɡvjnd آjɒ ɒv mslhɒ nmj آvrd؟» v mn ɡftm «آh‌ɒj xdɒvnd jhvh ɒjʃɒn drbɒrh mn mj‌ɡvjnd آjɒ ɒv mslhɒ nmj آvrd؟» v klɒm xdɒvnd br mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn rvj xvd rɒ bsvj ɒvrʃljm bdɒr v bh mkɒn hɒj blnd mɣds tklm nmɒ v پsr ɒnsɒn آh bkʃ bɒʃkstɡj kmr v mrɒrt sxt bh nzr ɒjʃɒn آh bkʃ v ɒɡr bh tv ɡvjnd kh t͡ʃrɒ آh mj‌kʃj؟ bɡv bh‌sbb آvɒzh‌ɒj kh mj‌آjd zjrɒ kh hmh dlhɒɡdɒxth v tmɒmj dsthɒ sst ɡrdjdh v hmh d͡ʒɒnhɒ kɒhjdh v d͡ʒmjʔ zɒnvhɒ msl آb bjtɒb xvɒhd ʃd xdɒvnd jhvh mj‌ɡvjd hmɒnɒ آn mj‌آjd v bh vɣvʔ xvɒhd پjvst» v klɒm xdɒvnd br mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn nbvt krdh، bɡv xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd bɡv kh ʃmʃjr، ʃmʃjr tjz ʃdh v njzsjɣlj ɡrdjdh ɒst tjz ʃdh ɒst tɒ kʃtɒrnmɒjd v sjɣlj ɡrdjdh tɒ brɒɣ ʃvd پs آjɒ mɒ ʃɒdj nmɒjjm؟ ʔsɒj پsr mn hmh drxtɒn rɒxvɒr mj‌ʃmɒrd v آn brɒj sjɣlj ʃdn dɒdh ʃd tɒ آn rɒ ɣvm mn ʔɒrz ʃdh ɒst lhzɒ br rɒn xvd dst bzn zjrɒ kh ɒmthɒn ɒst v t͡ʃh xvɒhd bvd ɒɡr ʔsɒjj kh djɡrɒn rɒ xvɒr mj‌ʃmɒrd، djɡr nbɒʃd ɣvl xdɒvnd jhvh ɒjn ɒst v tv‌ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn nbvt kn v dsthɒj xvd rɒ bhm ɡrdjdh vbrɒj kʃtɒr tjz ʃdh ɒst d͡ʒmʔ ʃdh، bh‌d͡ʒɒnb rɒst brv v آrɒsth ɡrdjdh، bh‌d͡ʒɒnb t͡ʃپ tvd͡ʒh nmɒ bhr trf kh rxsɒrhɒjt mtvd͡ʒh mj‌bɒʃd v mn njz dsthɒj xvd rɒ bhm xvɒhm zd v hdt xʃm xvjʃ rɒ sɒkn ʔlɒmtj br پɒ kn آn rɒbr sr rɒh ʃhr br پɒ nmɒ rɒhj tʔjjn nmɒ tɒʃmʃjr bh rbh bnj ʔmvn v bh jhvdɒ dr ɒvrʃljm mnjʔ bjɒjd zjrɒ kh پɒdʃɒh bɒbl br ʃɒhrɒh، bh‌sr dv rɒh ɒjstɒdh ɒst tɒ tfɒl znd v tjrhɒ rɒ bhm zdh، ɒz trɒfjm svɒl mj‌knd v bh d͡ʒɡr mj‌ŋrd bh‌dst rɒstʃ tfɒl ɒvrʃljm ɒst tɒmnd͡ʒnjɣhɒ br پɒ knd v dhɒn rɒ brɒj kʃtɒr bɡʃɒjdv آvɒz rɒ bh ɡlbɒŋ blnd nmɒjd v mnd͡ʒnjɣhɒ brdrvɒzh‌hɒ br پɒ knd v sŋrhɒ bsɒzd v brd͡ʒhɒ bnɒnmɒjd ljkn dr nzr ɒjʃɒn kh ɣsm brɒj آnhɒxvrdh‌ɒnd، tfɒl bɒtl mj‌nmɒjd v ɒv ɡnɒh ɒjʃɒn rɒbh jɒd mj‌آvrd tɒ ɡrftɒr ʃvnd» bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «t͡ʃvnkh ʃmɒ tɣsjrhɒj xvjʃ rɒ mnkʃf sɒxth v xtɒjɒj xvd rɒ dr hmh ɒʔmɒl xvjʃ zɒhr nmvdh، ʔsjɒn xvd rɒ jɒd آvrɒnjdjd، پs t͡ʃvn bh jɒd آvrdh ʃdjd dstɡjr xvɒhjd ʃd v tv‌ɒj rئjs ʃrjr ɒsrɒئjl kh bh zxm mhlk md͡ʒrvh ʃdh‌ɒj v ɒd͡ʒl tv dr zmɒn ʔɣvbt آxrrsjdh ɒst، xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ʔmɒmh rɒ dvr kn v tɒd͡ʒ rɒ brdɒr t͡ʃnjn nxvɒhdmɒnd آnt͡ʃh rɒ kh پst ɒst blnd nmɒ v آnt͡ʃh rɒ kh blnd ɒst پst kn v mn آn rɒ srŋvn، srŋvn، srŋvn xvɒhm sɒxt v ɒjn djɡrvɒɣʔ nxvɒhd ʃd tɒ آnks bjɒjd kh hɣ ɒvmj bɒʃd v mn آn rɒ bh vj ʔtɒ xvɒhm nmvd «v tv‌ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn nbvt krdh، bɡv xdɒvnd jhvh drbɒrh bnj ʔmvn v srznʃ ɒjʃɒn t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd bɡv kh ʃmʃjr، ʃmʃjr brɒj kʃtɒr kʃjdh ʃdh ɒst v bh ɣɒjt sjɣlj ɡrdjdh tɒ brɒɣ bʃvd t͡ʃvnkh brɒj tv rvjɒj bɒtl djdh‌ɒnd v brɒj tv tfɒl drvɣ zdh‌ɒnd tɒ tv rɒbr ɡrdnhɒj mɣtvlɒn ʃrjr bɡzɒrnd kh ɒd͡ʒl ɒjʃɒn dr zmɒn ʔɣvbt آxr rsjdh ɒst lhzɒ آn rɒbh ɣlɒfʃ brɡrdɒn v br tv dr mkɒnj kh آfrjdh ʃdh‌ɒj v dr zmjnj kh tvld jɒfth‌ɒj dɒvrj xvɒhm nmvd v xʃm xvd rɒ br tv xvɒhm rjxt v آtʃ ɣjz xvd rɒ br tv xvɒhm dmjd vtv rɒ bh‌dst mrdɒn vhʃj kh brɒj hlɒk nmvdn t͡ʃɒlɒknd tsljm xvɒhm nmvdv tv brɒj آtʃ hjzm xvɒhj ʃd v xvnt dr آn zmjn xvɒhdmɒnd پs bh jɒd آvrdh nxvɒhj ʃd zjrɒ mn kh jhvh hstm tklm nmvdh‌ɒm» v tv brɒj آtʃ hjzm xvɒhj ʃd v xvnt dr آn zmjn xvɒhdmɒnd پs bh jɒd آvrdh nxvɒhj ʃd zjrɒ mn kh jhvh hstm tklm nmvdh‌ɒm» v klɒm xdɒvnd br mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn آjɒ dɒvrj xvɒhj nmvd؟ آjɒ br ʃhr xvnrjz dɒvrj xvɒhj nmvd؟ پs آn rɒ ɒz hmh rd͡ʒɒsɒtʃ آɡɒh sɒz v bɡvxdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd ɒj ʃhrj kh xvn rɒ dr mjɒn xvdt mj‌rjzj tɒ ɒd͡ʒl tvbrsd ɒj kh bthɒ rɒ bh zd xvd sɒxth، xvjʃtn rɒ nd͡ʒs nmvdh‌ɒj bh‌sbb xvnj kh rjxth‌ɒj md͡ʒrm ʃdh‌ɒj v bh‌sbb bthɒjj kh sɒxth‌ɒj nd͡ʒs ɡrdjdh‌ɒj lhzɒ ɒd͡ʒl xvjʃ rɒ nzdjk آvrdh، bh ɒnthɒj sɒlhɒj xvd rsjdh‌ɒj lhzɒ tvrɒ nzd ɒmt‌hɒ ʔɒr v nzd d͡ʒmjʔ kʃvrhɒ msxrh ɡrdɒnjdh‌ɒm ‌ɒj پljd nɒm v‌ɒj پr ftnh آnɒnj kh bh tv nzdjk v آnɒnj kh ɒz tv dvrnd br tv sxrjh xvɒhnd nmvd ɒjnk srvrɒn ɒsrɒئjl، hr ks bh ɣdr ɣvt xvjʃ mrtkb xvnrjzj dr mjɒn tvmj bvdnd پdr v mɒdr rɒ dr mjɒn tv ɒhɒnt nmvdnd v ɣrjbɒn rɒ dr mjɒn tv mzlvm sɒxtnd vbr jtjmɒn v bjvh‌znɒn dr mjɒn tv stm nmvdnd vtv mɣds hɒj mrɒ xvɒr ʃmrdh، sbt hɒj mrɒbj ʔsmt nmvdj v bʔzj dr mjɒn tv bh d͡ʒht rjxtn xvn، nmɒmj mj‌nmvdnd v br kvhhɒ drmjɒn tv ɣzɒ mj‌xvrdnd v dr mjɒn tv mrtkb ɣbɒht mj‌ʃdnd v ʔvrt پdrɒn rɒ dr mjɒn tv mnkʃf mj‌sɒxtnd v znɒn hɒjz rɒ dr mjɒn tvbj ʔsmt mj‌nmvdnd jkj dr mjɒn tv bɒ zn hmsɒjh xvd ʔml zʃt nmvd v djɡrj ʔrvs xvjʃ rɒ bh d͡ʒvr bj‌ʔsmt krd v djɡrj xvɒhrʃ، jʔnj dxtr پdr xvd rɒ zljl sɒxt v dr mjɒn tv bh d͡ʒht rjxtn xvn rʃvh xvrdnd v svd v rbh ɡrftnd v tv mɒl hmsɒjh xvd rɒ bh zvr ɣsb krdj v mrɒ frɒmvʃ nmvdj ɣvl xdɒvnd jhvh ɒjn ɒst lhzɒ hɒn mn bh‌sbb hrs tv kh mrtkb آn ʃdh‌ɒj v bh‌sbb xvnj kh dr mjɒn xvdt rjxth‌ɒj، dsthɒj xvd rɒ bhm mj‌znm پs dr ɒjɒmj kh mn bh tv mkɒfɒt rsɒnm آjɒ dlt ɣvj v dsthɒjt mhkm xvɒhd bvd؟ mn kh jhvh hstm tklm nmvdm v bʔml xvɒhm آvrd v tv rɒ dr mjɒn ɒmt hɒپrɒkndh v dr mjɒn kʃvrhɒ mtfrɣ sɒxth، nd͡ʒɒsɒt tv rɒ ɒz mjɒnt nɒbvd xvɒhm sɒxt vbh nzr ɒmt‌hɒ bj‌ʔsmt xvɒhj ʃd v xvɒhj dɒnst kh mn jhvh hstm» v klɒm xdɒvnd br mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl nzd mn drdʃdh‌ɒnd v d͡ʒmjʔ ɒjʃɒn ms v rvj v آhn v srb dr mjɒn kvrh v drd nɣrh ʃdh‌ɒnd bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd t͡ʃvnkh hmɡj ʃmɒdrd ʃdh‌ɒjd، lhzɒ mn ʃmɒ rɒ dr mjɒn ɒvrʃljm d͡ʒmʔ xvɒhm nmvd t͡ʃnɒnkh nɣrh v ms v آhn v srb v rvj rɒ dr mjɒn kvrh d͡ʒmʔ krdh، آtʃ br آnhɒ mj‌dmnd tɒ ɡdɒxth ʃvd، hmt͡ʃnɒn mn ʃmɒrɒ dr ɣzb v hdt xʃm xvjʃ d͡ʒmʔ krdh، dr آn xvɒhm nhɒd v ʃmɒ rɒ xvɒhm ɡdɒxt vʃmɒ rɒ d͡ʒmʔ krdh، آtʃ ɣzb xvd rɒ br ʃmɒxvɒhm dmjd kh dr mjɒnʃ ɡdɒxth ʃvjd t͡ʃnɒnkh nɣrh dr mjɒn kvrh ɡdɒxth mj‌ʃvd، hmt͡ʃnɒn ʃmɒ dr mjɒnʃ ɡdɒxth xvɒhjd ʃd vxvɒhjd dɒnst kh mn jhvh hdt xʃm xvjʃ rɒ br ʃmɒ rjxth‌ɒm» v klɒm xdɒvnd br mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn ɒv rɒ bɡv tv zmjnj hstj kh tɒhr nxvɒhj ʃd v bɒrɒn dr rvz ɣzb br tvnxvɒhd bɒrjd ftnh ɒnbjɒj آn dr mjɒnʃ mj‌bɒʃd ɒjʃɒn msl ʃjr ɣrɒn kh ʃkɒr rɒmj drd، d͡ʒɒnhɒ rɒ mj‌xvrnd v ɡnd͡ʒhɒ v nfɒjs rɒmj brnd v bjvh‌znɒn rɒ dr mjɒnʃ zjɒd mj‌sɒznd kɒhnɒnʃ bh ʃrjʔt mn mxɒlft vrzjdh، mvɣvfɒt mrɒ hlɒl mj‌sɒznd v dr mjɒn mɣds vɣjr mɣds tmjz nmj dhnd v dr mjɒn nd͡ʒs vtɒhr frɣ nmj ɡzɒrnd v t͡ʃʃmɒn xvd rɒ ɒzsbt hɒj mn mj‌پvʃɒnnd v mn dr mjɒn ɒjʃɒn bj‌hrmt ɡrdjdh‌ɒm srvrɒnʃ mɒnnd ɡrɡɒn drndh xvn mj‌rjznd v d͡ʒɒnhɒ rɒ hlɒk mj‌nmɒjndtɒ svd nɒhɣ bbrnd v ɒnbjɒjʃ ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh ɡl mlɒt ɒndvd nmvdh، rvjɒhɒj bɒtl mj‌bjnnd vbrɒj ɒjʃɒn tfɒl drvɣ zdh، mj‌ɡvjnd kh xdɒvndjhvh t͡ʃnjn ɡfth ɒst bɒ آnkh jhvh tklm nnmvdh v ɣvm zmjn bh ʃdt zlm nmvdh v mɒl jkdjɡrrɒ ɣsb krdh‌ɒnd v br fɣjrɒn v mskjnɒn d͡ʒfɒnmvdh، ɣrjbɒn rɒ bh bj‌ɒnsɒfj mzlvm sɒxth‌ɒnd v mn dr mjɒn ɒjʃɒn ksj rɒ tlbjdm kh djvɒr rɒbnɒ nmɒjd v brɒj zmjn bh hzvr mn dr ʃkɒf bɒjstd tɒ آn rɒ xrɒb nnmɒjm، ɒmɒ ksj rɒ njɒftmپs xdɒvnd jhvh mj‌ɡvjd xʃm xvd rɒ brɒjʃɒn rjxth‌ɒm v ɒjʃɒn brɡzjdɡɒn bnj آʃvr fɒhʃɡj xvd rɒ bzl nmvd v xvd rɒ ɒz d͡ʒmjʔ bthɒj آnɒnj kh br ɒjʃɒn ʔɒʃɣ mj‌bvd nd͡ʒs mj‌sɒxt vfɒhʃɡj xvd rɒ kh dr msr mj‌nmvd، trk nkrd zjrɒ kh ɒjʃɒn dr ɒjɒm d͡ʒvɒnjʃ bɒ ɒv hmxvɒb vdxtrɒnʃ rɒ ɡrftnd v ɒv rɒ bh ʃmʃjr kʃtnd kh dr mjɒn znɒn ʔbrt ɡrdjd v br vj dɒvrj nmvdnd «v t͡ʃvn xvɒhrʃ ɒhvljbh ɒjn rɒ djd، drʔʃɣbɒzj xvjʃ ɒz ɒv zjɒdtr fɒsd ɡrdjd vbjʃtr ɒz znɒkɒrj xvɒhrʃ znɒ nmvd v br bnj آʃvr ʔɒʃɣ ɡrdjd kh d͡ʒmjʔ ɒjʃɒn hɒkmɒn vsrdɒrɒn md͡ʒɒvr ɒv bvdnd v mlbs bh آsmɒnd͡ʒvnj v fɒrsɒn ɒsb‌svɒr v d͡ʒvɒnɒn dlپsnd bvdnd vdjdm kh ɒv njz nd͡ʒs ɡrdjdh v trjɣ hrdvj ɒjʃɒn jk bvdh ɒst پs znɒkɒrj xvd rɒzjɒd nmvd، zjrɒ svrthɒj mrdɒn kh br djvɒrhɒnɣʃ ʃdh bvd jʔnj tsvjrhɒj kldɒnjɒn rɒ kh bh ʃnd͡ʒrf kʃjdh ʃdh bvd، djd kh kmrhɒj ɒjʃɒn bh kmrbndhɒ bsth v ʔmɒmhɒj rŋɒrŋ brsr ɒjʃɒn پjt͡ʃjdh bvd tv rɒ ɒhɒth xvɒhnd nmvd v mn dɒvrj tv rɒ bh ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm sپrd tɒ tv rɒ brhsb ɒhkɒm xvd dɒvrj nmɒjnd v mn ɣjrt xvd rɒ bh zd tv xvɒhm brɒŋjxt tɒ bɒ tv bh ɣzb ʔml nmɒjnd v bjnj v ɡvʃhɒjt rɒxvɒhnd brjd v zjrɒ kh znɒ nmvdh‌ɒnd v dst ɒjʃɒn xvn آlvd ɒst v bɒbthɒj xvjʃ mrtkb znɒ ʃdh‌ɒnd v پsrɒn xvdrɒ njz kh brɒj mn zɒjjdh bvdnd، bh d͡ʒht آnhɒ ɒzآtʃ ɡzrɒnjdh‌ɒnd tɒ svxth ʃvnd v ʔlɒvh brآn ɒjn rɒ hm bh dhm mɒh dhm ɒz sɒl nhm klɒm xdɒvnd br mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn ɒsm ɒmrvz rɒ brɒj xvd bnvjs، ɒsm hmjn rvz rɒ، zjrɒ kh dr hmjn rvz پɒdʃɒh bɒbl brɒvrʃljm hd͡ʒvm آvrd v brɒj ɒjn xɒndɒn ftnh ɒŋjz mslj آvrdh، bh ɒjʃɒn bɡv xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd djɡ rɒ bɡzɒr آn rɒ bɡzɒr v آb njz dr آn brjz ɣtʔh hɒjʃ jʔnj hr ɣtʔh njkv v rɒn v dvʃ rɒ dr mjɒnʃ d͡ʒmʔ kn v ɒz bhtrjn ɒstxvɒnhɒ آn rɒ پr sɒz v bhtrjn ɡvsfndɒn rɒbɡjr v ɒstxvɒnhɒ rɒ zjrʃ dsth krdh، آn rɒxvb bd͡ʒvʃɒn tɒ ɒstxvɒnhɒjj kh dr ɒndrvnʃ hst پxth ʃvd bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd vɒj brآn ʃhr xvnrjz vɒj br آn djɡj kh zŋʃ dr mjɒnʃ ɒst v zŋʃ ɒzmjɒnʃ dr njɒmdh ɒst آn rɒ bh ɣtʔh hɒjʃ bjrvn آvr v ɣrʔh br آn ɒndɒxth nʃvd zjrɒ xvnj kh rjxt dr mjɒnʃ mj‌bɒʃd آn rɒ br sxrh sɒf nhɒd v br zmjn nrjxt tɒ ɒz xɒk پvʃɒnjdh ʃvd mn xvn ɒv rɒ br sxrh sɒf nhɒdm kh پnhɒn nʃvd tɒ آnkh hdt xʃm rɒ brɒŋjxth ɒntɣɒm bkʃm bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd vɒj br آn ʃhr xvnrjz mn njz tvdh hjzm rɒ bzrɡ xvɒhm sɒxt hjzm zjɒd bjɒvr v آtʃ bjfrvzv ɡvʃt rɒ mhjɒ sɒz v ɒdvjh d͡ʒɒt dr آn brjz vɒstxvɒnhɒ svxth bʃvd پs آn rɒ br ɒxɡrxɒlj bɡzɒr tɒ tɒbjdh ʃdh msʃ svxth ɡrdd vnd͡ʒɒstʃ dr آn ɡdɒxth ʃvd v zŋʃ nɒbvd ɡrdd ɒv ɒz mʃɣt‌hɒ xsth ɡrdjd، ɒmɒ zŋ bsjɒrʃ ɒz vj bjrvn njɒmd پs zŋʃ dr آtʃ bʃvd dr nd͡ʒɒsɒt tv ɣbɒht ɒst t͡ʃvnkh tv rɒtthjr nmvdm ɒmɒ tɒhr nʃdj lhzɒ tɒ ɣzb xvdrɒ br tv bh ɒtmɒm nrsɒnm، djɡr ɒz nd͡ʒɒst xvd tɒhr nxvɒhj ʃd mn kh jhvh hstm ɒjn rɒ ɡfth‌ɒm v bh vɣvʔ xvɒhd پjvst vآn rɒ bd͡ʒɒ xvɒhm آvrd پs xdɒvnd jhvh mj‌ɡvjd dst nxvɒhm brdɒʃt v ʃfɣt nxvɒhm nmvd v پʃjmɒn nxvɒhm ʃd v br‌hsb rftɒrt v br vfɣ ɒʔmɒlt br tv dɒvrj xvɒhndkrd» v klɒm xdɒvnd br mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn ɒjnk mn آrzvj t͡ʃʃmɒnt rɒbɣth ɒz tv xvɒhm ɡrft mɒtm v ɡrjh mnmɒ v ɒʃk ɒz t͡ʃʃmt d͡ʒɒrj nʃvd آh bkʃ v xɒmvʃ ʃv v brɒj mrdh mɒtm mɡjr blkh ʔmɒmh br srt bپjt͡ʃ v kfʃ bh پɒjt bkn v ʃɒrbhɒjt rɒ mپvʃɒn vtʔɒm mrdh rɒ mxvr» پs bɒmdɒdɒn bɒ ɣvm tklm nmvdm v vɣt ʔsr zn mn mrd v sbhɡɒhɒn bh nhd͡ʒj kh mɒmvrʃdh bvdm ʔml nmvdm v ɣvm bh mn ɡftnd «آjɒmɒ rɒ xbr nmj dhj kh ɒjn kɒrhɒjj kh mj‌knj bh mɒ t͡ʃh nsbt dɒrd؟» ɒjʃɒn rɒ d͡ʒvɒb dɒdm kh klɒm xdɒvnd br mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «bh xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl bɡv xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd kh hɒn mn mɣds xvd rɒ kh fxr d͡ʒlɒl ʃmɒ v آrzvj t͡ʃʃmɒn ʃmɒv lzt d͡ʒɒnhɒj ʃmɒ ɒst، bj‌ʔsmt xvɒhm nmvd v پsrɒn v dxtrɒn ʃmɒ kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ trk xvɒhjd krd، bh ʃmʃjr xvɒhnd ɒftɒd v bh nhd͡ʒj kh mn ʔml nmvdm، ʃmɒ ʔml mjɒn drjɒ xɒmvʃ ʃdh ɒst؟ hŋɒmj kh bzɒʔt tv ɒz drjɒ bjrvn mj‌آmd، ɣvmhɒj bsjɒrj rɒ sjr mj‌ɡrdɒnjdj v پɒdʃɒhɒn d͡ʒhɒn rɒ bh frɒvɒnj ɒmvɒl v mtɒʔ xvd tvɒŋrmj sɒxtj ɒmɒ t͡ʃvn ɒz drjɒ، dr ʔmɣ hɒj آbhɒʃksth ʃdj، mtɒʔ v tmɒmj d͡ʒmʔjt tv drmjɒnt tlf ʃd d͡ʒmjʔ sɒknɒn d͡ʒzɒjr bh‌sbb tv mthjr ɡʃth v پɒdʃɒhɒn ɒjʃɒn bh ʃdt dhʃt zdh v پrjʃɒn hɒl ɡrdjdh‌ɒndtd͡ʒɒrɣvm‌hɒ br tv sfjr mj‌znnd v tv mhl dhʃt ɡrdjdh، djɡr tɒ bh ɒbd nxvɒhj bvd» td͡ʒɒrɣvm‌hɒ br tv sfjr mj‌znnd v tv mhl dhʃt ɡrdjdh، djɡr tɒ bh ɒbd nxvɒhj bvd» v klɒm xdɒvnd br mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn bh rئjs svr bɡv xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn hjt͡ʃ srj ɒz tv mxfj njst؟ v bh hkmt v ftɒnt xvjʃ tvɒŋrj brɒj xvd ɒndvxth v tlɒ v nɣrh dr xzɒjn xvd d͡ʒmʔ nmvdh‌ɒj bh frɒvɒnj hkmt v td͡ʒɒrt xvjʃ dvlt xvd rɒ ɒfzvdh‌ɒj پs bh‌sbb tvɒŋrjt dlt mɣrvr d͡ʒmɒl tv rɒ mlvs sɒznd v tv rɒ bh hɒvjh frvd آvrnd پs bh mrɡ آnɒnj kh dr mjɒn drjɒ kʃth ʃvnd xvɒhj mrd آjɒ bh hzvrɣɒtlɒn xvd xvɒhj ɡft kh mn xdɒ hstm؟ nj blkh dr dst ɣɒtlɒnt ɒnsɒn xvɒhj bvd v nh آnd͡ʒɒ ʃksth bɒʃm v fxrɣvtʃ dr آn tlf ʃdh bɒʃd v ɒbrhɒ آn rɒ xvɒhdپvʃɒnjd v dxtrɒnʃ bh ɒsjrj xvɒhnd rft پs t͡ʃvn br msr dɒvrj krdh bɒʃm، آŋɒh xvɒhnd dɒnst kh mn jhvh hstm» v dr rvz hftm mɒh ɒvl ɒz sɒl jɒzdhm، klɒm xdɒvnd br mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn bɒzvj frʔvn پɒdʃɒh msr rɒ xvɒhm ʃkst vɒjnk ʃksth bndj nxvɒhd ʃd v br آn mrhm nxvɒhnd ɡzɒrd v krbɒs nxvɒhnd bst tɒ ɣɒdr brɡrftn ʃmʃjr bʃvd bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd hɒn mn bh zd frʔvn پɒdʃɒh msrhstm v hr dv bɒzvj ɒv hm drst v hm ʃksth rɒ xrd xvɒhm krd v ʃmʃjr rɒ ɒz dstʃ xvɒhm ɒndɒxt v msrjɒn rɒ dr mjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ پrɒkndh v dr mjɒn kʃvrhɒ mtfrɣ xvɒhm sɒxt vbɒzvhɒj پɒdʃɒh bɒbl rɒ tɣvjt nmvdh، ʃmʃjrxvd rɒ bh‌dst ɒv xvɒhm dɒd v bɒzvhɒj frʔvn rɒ xvɒhm ʃkst kh bh hzvr vj bh nɒlh kʃtɡɒn nɒlh xvɒhd krd پs bɒzvhɒj پɒdʃɒh bɒbl rɒ tɣvjt xvɒhm nmvd v bɒzvhɒj frʔvn xvɒhd ɒftɒd v t͡ʃvn ʃmʃjr xvd rɒ bh‌dst پɒdʃɒh bɒbl dɒdh bɒʃm v ɒv آn rɒ br zmjn msr drɒzkrdh bɒʃd، آŋɒh xvɒhnd dɒnst kh mn jhvh hstmv t͡ʃvn msrjɒn rɒ dr mjɒn ɒmt hɒپrɒkndh v ɒjʃɒn rɒ dr kʃvrhɒ mtfrɣ sɒxth bɒʃm، ɒjʃɒn xvɒhnd dɒnst kh mn jhvh hstm» v t͡ʃvn msrjɒn rɒ dr mjɒn ɒmt hɒپrɒkndh v ɒjʃɒn rɒ dr kʃvrhɒ mtfrɣ sɒxth bɒʃm، ɒjʃɒn xvɒhnd dɒnst kh mn jhvh hstm» v dr rvz ɒvl mɒh svm ɒz sɒl jɒzdhm، klɒm xdɒvnd br mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn bh frʔvn پɒdʃɒh msr v bh d͡ʒmʔjt ɒv bɡv kjst kh dr bzrɡjt bh ɒvʃbɒht dɒrj؟ ɒjnk آʃvr srv آzɒd lbnɒn bɒʃɒxh hɒj d͡ʒmjl v brɡhɒj sɒjh‌ɡstr v ɣd blndmj bvd v sr ɒv bh ɒbrhɒ mj‌bvd آbhɒ ɒv rɒ nmv dɒd v ld͡ʒh ɒv rɒ blnd sɒxt kh nhrhɒj آnhɒ bhr trf bvstɒn آn d͡ʒɒrj mj‌ʃd v d͡ʒvjhɒj xvjʃ rɒbtrf hmh drxtɒn shrɒ kh bɒ mɣtvlɒn frvd rftnd ɒz hjbtj kh bh d͡ʒbrvt xvjʃ bɒʔs آn bvdnd، xd͡ʒl xvɒhnd ʃd پs bɒ mɣtvlɒn ʃmʃjr nɒmxtvn xvɒhnd xvɒbjd v bɒآnɒnj kh bh hɒvjh frvd mj‌rvnd، mthml xd͡ʒɒlt xvd xvɒhnd ʃd v xdɒvnd ʃmʃjr dr mjɒn nɒmxtvnɒn xvɒhnd xvɒbɒnjd» v klɒm xdɒvnd br mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn پsrɒn ɣvm xvd rɒxtɒb krdh، bh ɒjʃɒn bɡv ɒɡr mn ʃmʃjrj brzmjnj آvrm v ɒhl آn zmjn ksj rɒ ɒz mjɒn xvdɡrfth، ɒv rɒ bh d͡ʒht xvd bh djdh bɒnj tʔjjn knnd، v ɒv ʃmʃjr rɒ bjnd kh br آn zmjn mj‌آjd vkrnɒrɒ nvɒxth، آn ɣvm rɒ mtnbh sɒzd، v ɒɡr ksj sdɒj krnɒ rɒ ʃnjdh، mtnbh nʃvd، آŋɒh ʃmʃjrآmdh، ɒv rɒ ɡrftɒr xvɒhd sɒxt v xvnʃ brɡrdnʃ xvɒhd bvd t͡ʃvnkh sdɒj krnɒ rɒ ʃnjdv mtnbh ŋrdjd، xvn ɒv br xvdʃ xvɒhd bvd vɒɡr mtnbh mj‌ʃd d͡ʒɒn xvd rɒ mj‌rhɒnjd v ɒɡrdjdh bɒn ʃmʃjr rɒ bjnd kh mj‌آjd v krnɒ rɒnnvɒxth ɣvm rɒ mtnbh nsɒzd v ʃmʃjr آmdh، ksj rɒ ɒz mjɒn ɒjʃɒn ɡrftɒr sɒzd، آn ʃxs dr ɡnɒh xvd ɡrftɒr ʃdh ɒst، ɒmɒ xvn ɒv rɒ ɒz dst djdh bɒn xvɒhm tlbjd v mn tv rɒ‌ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn brɒj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl bh djdh bɒnj tʔjjn nmvdh‌ɒm tɒ klɒm rɒ ɒz dhɒnm ʃnjdh، ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz d͡ʒɒnb mn mtnbh sɒzj hjnj kh mn bh mrd ʃrjr ɡvjm ɒj mrd ʃrjr ɒlbth xvɒhj mrd ɒɡr tv sxn ŋvjj tɒآn mrd ʃrjr rɒ ɒz trjɣʃ mtnbh sɒzj، آŋɒh آn mrd ʃrjr dr ɡnɒh xvd xvɒhd mrd، ɒmɒ xvn ɒv rɒɒz dst tv xvɒhm tlbjd ɒmɒ ɒɡr tv آn mrdʃrjr rɒ ɒz trjɣʃ mtnbh sɒzj tɒ ɒz آn bɒzɡʃt nmɒjd v ɒv ɒz trjɣ xvd bɒzɡʃt nknd، آŋɒh ɒvdr ɡnɒh xvd xvɒhd mrd، ɒmɒ tv d͡ʒɒn xvd rɒrstɡɒr sɒxth‌ɒj پs tv‌ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn bh xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl bɡv ʃmɒ bdjn mzmvn mj‌ɡvjjd t͡ʃvnkh ʔsjɒn v ɡnɒhɒn mɒ br ɡrdn mɒɒst v bh‌sbb آnhɒ kɒhjdh ʃdh‌ɒjm، پs t͡ʃɡvnh zndh xvɒhjm mɒnd؟ «bh ɒjʃɒn bɡv xdɒvnd jhvh mj‌frmɒjd bh hjɒt xvdm ɣsm kh mn ɒz mrdn mrd ʃrjrxvʃ njstm blkh xvʃ hstm kh ʃrjr ɒztrjɣ xvd bɒzɡʃt nmvdh، zndh mɒnd ɒj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl bɒzɡʃt nmɒjjd ɒz trjɣ hɒj bd xvjʃ bɒzɡʃt nmɒjjd zjrɒ t͡ʃrɒ bmjrjd؟ v tv‌ɒj پsrɒnsɒn bh پsrɒn ɣvm xvd bɡv ʔdɒlt mrd ʔɒdl dr rvzj kh mrtkb ɡnɒh ʃvd، ɒv rɒ nxvɒhdrhɒnjd v ʃrɒrt mrd ʃrjr dr rvzj kh ɒv ɒzʃrɒrt xvd bɒzɡʃt nmɒjd، bɒʔs hlɒkt vj nxvɒhd ʃd v mrd ʔɒdl dr rvzj kh ɡnɒh vrzd، bh ʔdɒlt xvd zndh ntvɒnd mɒnd hjnj kh bh mrd ʔɒdl ɡvjm kh ɒlbth zndh xvɒhj mɒnd، ɒɡr ɒvbh ʔdɒlt xvd ɒʔtmɒd nmvdh، ʔsjɒn vrzd، آŋɒh ʔdɒltʃ hrɡz bh jɒd آvrdh nxvɒhd ʃd blkh drʔsjɒnj kh vrzjdh ɒst xvɒhd mrd vhŋɒmj kh bh mrd ʃrjr ɡvjm ɒlbth xvɒhj mrd ɒɡr ɒv ɒz ɡnɒh xvd bɒzɡʃt nmvdh، ɒnsɒf v ʔdɒlt bd͡ʒɒ آvrd، v ɒɡr آn mrd ʃrjr rhn rɒپs dhd v آnt͡ʃh dzdjdh bvd rd nmɒjd v bh frɒjz hjɒt slvk nmvdh، mrtkb bj‌ɒnsɒfj nʃvd، ɒvɒlbth zndh xvɒhd mɒnd v nxvɒhd mrd tmɒm ɡnɒhj kh vrzjdh bvd br ɒv bh jɒd آvrdh nxvɒhdʃd t͡ʃvnkh ɒnsɒf v ʔdɒlt rɒ bd͡ʒɒ آvrdh ɒst، ɒlbth zndh xvɒhd mɒnd ɒmɒ پsrɒn ɣvm tvmj ɡvjnd kh trjɣ xdɒvnd mvzvn njst، blkh trjɣ xvd ɒjʃɒn ɒst kh mvzvn njst hŋɒmj kh mrd ʔɒdl ɒz ʔdɒlt xvd brɡʃth، ʔsjɒn vrzd، bh‌sbb آn xvɒhd mrd v t͡ʃvn mrd ʃrjr ɒz ʃrɒrt xvd bɒzɡʃt nmvdh، ɒnsɒf v ʔdɒlt rɒ bd͡ʒɒ آvrd bh‌sbb آn zndh xvɒhdmɒnd ɒmɒ ʃmɒ mj‌ɡvjjd kh trjɣ xdɒvndmvzvn njst ɒj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl mn br hr jkj ɒz ʃmɒ mvɒfɣ trjɣ hɒjʃ dɒvrj xvɒhm nmvd» v dr rvz پnd͡ʒm mɒh dhm ɒz sɒl dvɒzdhm ɒsjrj mɒ vɒɣʔ ʃd kh ksj‌kh ɒz ɒvrʃljm frɒrkrdh bvd nzd mn آmdh، xbr dɒd kh ʃhr tsxjrʃdh ɒst v dr vɣt ʃɒm ɣbl ɒz rsjdn آn frɒrj dst xdɒvnd br mn آmdh، dhɒn mrɒɡʃvd پs t͡ʃvn ɒv dr vɣt sbh nzd mn rsjd، dhɒnm ɡʃvdh ʃd v djɡr ɡŋ nbvdm v klɒm xdɒvnd br mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn sɒknɒn ɒjn xrɒbh hɒj zmjn ɒsrɒئjl mj‌ɡvjnd ɒbrɒhjm jk nfr bvd hjnj kh vɒrs ɒjn zmjn ʃd vmɒ bsjɒr hstjm kh zmjn bh ɒrs bh mɒ dɒdh ʃdh ɒst bnɒbrɒjn bh ɒjʃɒn bɡv xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd ɡvʃt rɒ bɒ xvnʃ mj‌xvrjd v t͡ʃʃmɒn xvd rɒ bsvj bthɒj xvjʃ brmj ɒfrɒzjd v xvn mj‌rjzjd پs آjɒʃmɒ vɒrs zmjn xvɒhjd ʃd؟ «br ʃmʃjrhɒj xvd tkjh mj‌knjd vmrtkb rd͡ʒɒsɒt ʃdh، hr kdɒm ɒz ʃmɒ zn hmsɒjh xvd rɒ nd͡ʒs mj‌sɒzjd پs آjɒ vɒrs ɒjn zmjn xvɒhjd ʃd؟ bdjntvr bh ɒjʃɒn bɡvkh xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd bh hjɒt xvdm ɣsm ɒlbth آnɒnj kh dr xrɒbh‌hɒ hstnd bh ʃmʃjrxvɒhnd ɒftɒd v آnɒnj kh br rvj shrɒɒnd brɒj xvrɒk bh hjvɒnɒt xvɒhm dɒd v آnɒnj kh drɣlʔh‌hɒ v mɣɒrhɒjnd ɒz vbɒ xvɒhnd mrd v ɒjn zmjn rɒ vjrɒn v mhl dhʃt xvɒhm sɒxt vɣrvr ɣvtʃ nɒbvd xvɒhd ʃd v kvhhɒj ɒsrɒئjl bh hdj vjrɒn xvɒhd ʃd kh rhɡzrj nbɒʃd v t͡ʃvn ɒjn zmjn rɒ bh‌sbb hmh rd͡ʒɒsɒtj kh ɒjʃɒn bʔml آvrdh‌ɒnd vjrɒn v mhl dhʃt sɒxth bɒʃm، آŋɒh xvɒhnd dɒnst kh mn jhvh hstm ɒmɒ tv‌ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn پsrɒn ɣvmt bh پhlvj djvɒrhɒ v nzd drhɒj xɒnh‌hɒ drbɒrh tvsxn mj‌ɡvjnd v hr jk bh djɡrj v hr ks bh brɒdrʃ xtɒb krdh، mj‌ɡvjd bjɒjjd v bʃnvjd t͡ʃh klɒm ɒst kh ɒz d͡ʒɒnb xdɒvnd sɒdrmj ʃvd v nzd tv mj‌آjnd btvrj kh ɣvm mn mj آjnd v mɒnnd ɣvm mn پjʃ tv nʃsth، sxnɒn tv rɒ mj‌ʃnvnd، ɒmɒ آnhɒ rɒ bd͡ʒɒ nmj آvrnd zjrɒ kh ɒjʃɒn bh dhɒn xvd sxnɒn ʃjrjn mj‌ɡvjnd ljkn dl ɒjʃɒn dr‌پj hrs ɒjʃɒn mj‌rvd vɒjnk tv brɒj ɒjʃɒn msl srvd ʃjrjn mtrb xvʃnvɒ v njk nvɒz hstj zjrɒ kh sxnɒn tv rɒmj ʃnvnd، ɒmɒ آnhɒ rɒ bd͡ʒɒ nmj آvrndv t͡ʃvn ɒjn vɒɣʔ mj‌ʃvd v ɒlbth vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd، آŋɒh xvɒhnd dɒnst kh nbj dr mjɒn ɒjʃɒn bvdh ɒst» v t͡ʃvn ɒjn vɒɣʔ mj‌ʃvd v ɒlbth vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd، آŋɒh xvɒhnd dɒnst kh nbj dr mjɒn ɒjʃɒn bvdh ɒst» v klɒm xdɒvnd br mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn bh zd ʃbɒnɒn ɒsrɒئjl nbvt nmɒ v nbvt krdh، bh ɒjʃɒn jʔnj bh ʃbɒnɒn bɡv xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd vɒj br ʃbɒnɒn ɒsrɒئjl kh xvjʃtn rɒ mj‌t͡ʃrɒnnd آjɒ nmj bɒjdʃbɒnɒn ɡlh rɒ bt͡ʃrɒnnd؟ ʃmɒ پjh rɒ mj‌xvrjd vپʃm rɒ mj‌پvʃjd v پrvɒrjhɒ rɒ mj‌kʃjd، ɒmɒ ɡlh rɒ nmj t͡ʃrɒnjd zʔjfɒn rɒ tɣvjt nmj dhjd vbjmɒrɒn rɒ mʔɒld͡ʒh nmj nmɒjjd v ʃksth‌hɒ rɒʃksth bndj nmj knjd v rɒndh ʃdɡɒn rɒ پs nmj آvrjd v ɡm ʃdɡɒn rɒ nmj tlbjd، blkh br آnhɒbɒ d͡ʒvr v stm hkmrɒnj mj‌nmɒjjd پs bdvn ʃbɒn پrɒkndh mj‌ʃvnd v xvrɒk hmh hjvɒnɒt shrɒ ɡrdjdh، آvɒrh mj‌ɡrdnd ɡvsfndɒn mn br d͡ʒmjʔ kvhhɒ v br hmh tlhɒj blnd آvɒrh ʃdh‌ɒnd v ɡlh mn br rvj tmɒmj zmjn پrɒkndh ɡʃth، ksj ɒjʃɒn rɒ nmj tlbd v brɒj ɒjʃɒn tfhs nmj nmɒjd پs‌ɒj ʃbɒnɒn klɒm xdɒvndrɒ bʃnvjd xdɒvnd jhvh mj‌frmɒjd bh hjɒt xvdm ɣsm hr آjnh t͡ʃvnkh ɡlh mn bh tɒrɒd͡ʒ rfth vɡvsfndɒnm xvrɒk hmh hjvɒnɒt shrɒ ɡrdjdh، ʃbɒnj ndɒrnd v ʃbɒnɒn mn ɡvsfndɒnm rɒntlbjdnd blkh ʃbɒnɒn xvjʃtn rɒ t͡ʃrɒnjdnd v ɡlh mrɒ rʔɒjt nnmvdnd «bnɒbrɒjn‌ɒj ʃbɒnɒn klɒm xdɒvnd rɒbʃnvjd xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd ɒjnk mn bh zd ʃbɒnɒn hstm v ɡvsfndɒn xvd rɒ ɒzdst ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm tlbjd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz t͡ʃrɒnjdn ɡlh mʔzvl xvɒhm sɒxt tɒ ʃbɒnɒn xvjʃtn rɒdjɡr nt͡ʃrɒnnd v ɡvsfndɒn xvd rɒ ɒz dhɒn ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm rhɒnjd tɒ xvrɒk ɒjʃɒn nbɒʃnd zjrɒxdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd hɒn mn xvdm ɡvsfndɒn xvjʃ rɒ tlbjdh، آnhɒ rɒ tfɣd xvɒhm nmvd t͡ʃnɒnkh ʃbɒn hjnj kh dr mjɒn ɡvsfndɒn پrɒkndh xvd mj‌bɒʃd، ɡlh xvjʃ rɒtfɣd mj‌nmɒjd، hmt͡ʃnɒn mn ɡvsfndɒn xvjʃ rɒtfɣd nmvdh، ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz hr d͡ʒɒjj kh dr rvz ɒbrhɒv tɒrjkj ɣljz پrɒkndh ʃdh bvdnd xvɒhm rhɒnjd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz mjɒn ɣvm‌hɒ bjrvn آvrdh، ɒz kʃvrhɒ d͡ʒmʔ xvɒhm nmvd v bh zmjn xvdʃɒn drآvrdh، br kvhhɒj ɒsrɒئjl v dr vɒdjhɒ vd͡ʒmjʔ mʔmvrɒt zmjn ɒjʃɒn rɒ xvɒhm t͡ʃrɒnjd ɒjʃɒn rɒ br mrtʔ njkv xvɒhm t͡ʃrɒnjd v آrɒm ɡɒh ɒjʃɒn br kvhhɒj blnd ɒsrɒئjl xvɒhd bvd vآnd͡ʒɒ dr آrɒm ɡɒh njkv v mrtʔ پrɡjɒh xvɒhndxvɒbjd v br kvhhɒj ɒsrɒئjl xvɒhnd t͡ʃrjd xdɒvnd jhvh mj‌ɡvjd kh mn ɡvsfndɒn xvdrɒ xvɒhm t͡ʃrɒnjd v mn ɒjʃɒn rɒ xvɒhm xvɒbɒnjd ɡm ʃdɡɒn rɒ xvɒhm tlbjd v rɒndh ʃdɡɒn rɒbɒz xvɒhm آvrd v ʃksth‌hɒ rɒ ʃksth bndj nmvdh، bjmɒrɒn rɒ ɣvt xvɒhm dɒd ljkn frbhɒn vzvrآvrɒn rɒ hlɒk sɒxth، br ɒjʃɒn bh ɒnsɒf rʔɒjt xvɒhm nmvd v ɒmɒ bh ʃmɒ‌ɒj ɡvsfndɒn mn، xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd hɒn mn dr mjɒn ɡvsfnd v ɡvsfnd v dr mjɒn ɣvt͡ʃhɒj v bzhɒj nr dɒvrj xvɒhm nmvd آjɒ brɒj ʃmɒ km bvd kh mrtʔ njkv rɒt͡ʃrɒnjdjd blkh bɣjh mrtʔ xvd rɒ njz bh پɒjhɒj xvjʃ پɒjmɒl sɒxtjd؟ v آb zlɒl rɒ nvʃjdjdblkh bɒɣj‌mɒndh rɒ bh پɒjhɒj xvjʃ ɡl آlvdsɒxtjd؟ v ɡvsfndɒn mn آnt͡ʃh rɒ kh ɒz پɒj ʃmɒ پɒjmɒl ʃdh ɒst، mj‌t͡ʃrnd v آnt͡ʃh rɒ kh bh پɒj ʃmɒ ɡl آlvd ɡʃth ɒst، mj‌nvʃnd bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd jhvh bh ɒjʃɒn t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd hɒn mn xvdm dr mjɒn ɡvsfndɒn frbh vɡvsfndɒn lɒɣr dɒvrj xvɒhm nmvd t͡ʃvnkh ʃmɒ bh پhlv v ktf xvd tnh mj‌znjd v hmh zʔjfɒn rɒ bh ʃɒxhɒj xvd mj‌znjd، htj ɒjnkh ɒjʃɒn rɒ bjrvn پrɒkndh sɒxth‌ɒjd، پs mn ɡlh xvd rɒ nd͡ʒɒt xvɒhm dɒd kh djɡr bh tɒrɒd͡ʒ brdh nʃvnd v dr mjɒn ɡvsfnd v ɡvsfnd dɒvrj xvɒhm nmvd v jk ʃbɒn br ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm ɡmɒʃt kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ bt͡ʃrɒnd jʔnj bndh xvd dɒvdrɒ kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ rʔɒjt bnmɒjd v ɒv ʃbɒn ɒjʃɒn xvɒhd bvd v mn jhvh xdɒj ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm bvd v bndh mn dɒvd dr mjɒn ɒjʃɒn rئjs xvɒhdbvd mn kh jhvh hstm ɡfth‌ɒm v ʔhd slɒmtj rɒ bɒ ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm bst v hjvɒnɒt mvzj rɒ ɒzzmjn nɒbvd xvɒhm sɒxt v ɒjʃɒn dr bjɒbɒn bh ɒmnjt sɒkn ʃdh، dr d͡ʒŋlhɒ xvɒhnd xvɒbjd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ v ɒtrɒf kvh xvd rɒ brkt xvɒhm sɒxt v bɒrɒn rɒ dr mvsmʃ xvɒhm bɒrɒnjd vbɒrʃhɒj brkt xvɒhd bvd v drxtɒn shrɒmjvh xvd rɒ xvɒhnd‌آvrd v zmjn hɒsl xvjʃ rɒ xvɒhd dɒd v ɒjʃɒn dr zmjn xvd bh ɒmnjt sɒkn xvɒhnd ʃd v hjnj kh t͡ʃvbhɒj jvɣ ɒjʃɒn rɒ ʃksth v ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz dst آnɒnj kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ mmlvk xvd sɒxth bvdnd rhɒnjdh bɒʃm، آŋɒh xvɒhnd dɒnst kh mn jhvh hstm vdjɡr dr mjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ bh tɒrɒd͡ʒ nxvɒhd rft vhjvɒnɒt shrɒ ɒjʃɒn rɒ nxvɒhnd xvrd blkh bh ɒmnjt، bdvn trsɒnndh‌ɒj sɒkn xvɒhnd ʃd vbrɒj ɒjʃɒn drxtstɒn nɒmvrj br پɒ xvɒhm dɒʃt v djɡr ɒz ɣht dr zmjn tlf nxvɒhndʃd v bɒr djɡr mthml srznʃ ɒmt‌hɒ nxvɒhndɡrdjd v xdɒvnd jhvh mj‌ɡvjd xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl xvɒhnd dɒnst kh mn jhvh xdɒj ɒjʃɒn bɒ ɒjʃɒn hstm v ɒjʃɒn ɣvm mn mj‌bɒʃndvxdɒvnd jhvh mj‌ɡvjd ʃmɒ‌ɒj ɡlh mn v‌ɒj ɡvsfndɒn mrtʔ mn، ɒnsɒn hstjd v mn xdɒj ʃmɒ mj‌bɒʃm» vxdɒvnd jhvh mj‌ɡvjd ʃmɒ‌ɒj ɡlh mn v‌ɒj ɡvsfndɒn mrtʔ mn، ɒnsɒn hstjd v mn xdɒj ʃmɒ mj‌bɒʃm» v klɒm xdɒvnd br mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn nzr xvd rɒ br kvh sʔjr bdɒr v bh zd آn nbvt nmɒ v آn rɒ bɡvxdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd ɒjnk‌ɒj kvh sʔjr mn bh zd tv hstm v dst xvd rɒ br tvdrɒz krdh، tv rɒ vjrɒn v mhl dhʃt xvɒhm sɒxt ʃhrhɒjt rɒ xrɒb xvɒhm nmvd tɒvjrɒn ʃdh، bdɒnj kh mn jhvh hstm t͡ʃvnkh ʔdɒvt dɒئmj dɒʃtj v bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl rɒ dr zmɒn msjbt ɒjʃɒn v hŋɒm ʔɣvbt آxr bh dm ʃmʃjrtsljm nmvdj، lhzɒ xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj ɡvjd bh hjɒt xvdm ɣsm kh tv rɒ bh xvn tsljm xvɒhm nmvd kh xvn tv rɒ tʔɒɣb nmɒjd t͡ʃvn ɒz xvn nfrt ndɒʃtj، xvn tv rɒ tʔɒɣb xvɒhd nmvd v kvh sʔjr rɒ mhl dhʃt vvjrɒn sɒxth، rvndɡɒn v آjndɡɒn rɒ ɒz آn mnɣtʔ xvɒhm sɒxt v kvhhɒjʃ rɒ ɒz kʃtɡɒnʃ mmlv mj‌knm kh mɣtvlɒn ʃmʃjr br tlhɒ v drh‌hɒ vhmh vɒdjhɒj tv bjftnd v tv rɒ xrɒbh hɒj dɒئmj mj‌sɒzm kh ʃhrhɒjt djɡr mskvn nʃvdv bdɒnjd kh mn jhvh hstm t͡ʃvnkh ɡftj ɒjn dvɒmt v ɒjn dv zmjn ɒz آn mn mj‌ʃvd v آn rɒ bh tsrf xvɒhjm آvrd bɒ آnkh jhvh dr آnd͡ʒɒ ɒst» bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «bh hjɒt xvdm ɣsm kh mvɒfɣ xʃm v hsdj kh bh ɒjʃɒn nmvdj، ɒz kjnh‌ɒj kh bɒ ɒjʃɒn dɒʃtj bɒ tvʔml xvɒhm nmvd v t͡ʃvn br tv dɒvrj krdh bɒʃm، xvjʃtn rɒ br tv dr mjɒn ɒjʃɒn mʔrvf xvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd v xvɒhj dɒnst kh mn jhvh tmɒmj sxnɒn kfrآmjz rɒ kh bh zd kvhhɒj ɒsrɒئjl ɡfth‌ɒj، ʃnjdh‌ɒm t͡ʃvnkh ɡftj xrɒb ɡrdjd v brɒj xvrɒk mɒ dɒdh ʃd v ʃmɒ bh dhɒn xvd bh zd mn tkbr nmvdh، sxnɒn xvjʃ rɒ br mn ɒfzvdjd v mn آnhɒ rɒ ʃnjdm xdɒvndjhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd hjnj kh tmɒmj d͡ʒhɒn ʃɒdj knnd mn tv rɒ vjrɒn xvɒhm sɒxtvt͡ʃnɒnkh br mjrɒs xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl hjnj kh vjrɒn ʃd ʃɒdj nmvdj، hmt͡ʃnɒn bɒ tv ʔml xvɒhm nmvd v tv‌ɒj kvh sʔjr v tmɒm ɒdvm d͡ʒmjʔ vjrɒn xvɒhjd ʃd پs xvɒhnd dɒnst kh mn jhvh hstm» vt͡ʃnɒnkh br mjrɒs xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl hjnj kh vjrɒn ʃd ʃɒdj nmvdj، hmt͡ʃnɒn bɒ tv ʔml xvɒhm nmvd v tv‌ɒj kvh sʔjr v tmɒm ɒdvm d͡ʒmjʔ vjrɒn xvɒhjd ʃd پs xvɒhnd dɒnst kh mn jhvh hstm» «v tv‌ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn bh kvhhɒj ɒsrɒئjl nbvt krdh، bɡv ɒj kvhhɒj ɒsrɒئjl klɒm xdɒvnd rɒ bʃnvjd xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd t͡ʃvnkh dʃmnɒn drbɒrh ʃmɒ ɡfth‌ɒnd hh ɒjn blndjhɒj djrjnh mjrɒs mɒ ʃdh ɒst، lhzɒnbvt krdh، bɡv kh xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd ɒz آn d͡ʒht kh ɒjʃɒn ʃmɒ rɒ ɒz hrtrf xrɒb krdh v blʔjdh‌ɒnd tɒ mjrɒs bɣjh ɒmt‌hɒ bʃvjd v br lbhɒj hrf ɡjrɒn brآmdh، mvrd mzmt tvɒjf ɡrdjdh‌ɒjd، lhzɒ‌ɒj kvhhɒj ɒsrɒئjl klɒm xdɒvnd jhvh rɒ bʃnvjd xdɒvnd jhvh bh kvhhɒ v tlhɒ v vɒdjhɒ v drh‌hɒ vxrɒbh hɒj vjrɒn v ʃhrhɒj mtrvkj kh tɒrɒd͡ʒ ʃdh v mvrd sxrjh bɣjh ɒmt hɒj md͡ʒɒvr ɡrdjdh ɒst، t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd hr آjnh bh آtʃ ɣjrt xvd bh zd bɣjh ɒmt‌hɒ v bh zd tmɒmj ɒdvm tklm nmvdh‌ɒm kh ɒjʃɒn zmjn mrɒ bh ʃɒdj tmɒm dl vkjnh ɣlb، mlk xvd sɒxth‌ɒnd tɒ آn rɒ bh tɒrɒd͡ʒ vɒɡzɒrnd پs drbɒrh zmjn ɒsrɒئjl nbvt nmɒvbh kvhhɒ v tlhɒ v vɒdjhɒ v drh‌hɒ bɡv kh xdɒvndjhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd t͡ʃvnkh ʃmɒ mthml srznʃ ɒmt‌hɒ ʃdh‌ɒjd، lhzɒ mn dr ɣjrt vxʃm xvd tklm nmvdm» v xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «mn dst xvd rɒ brɒfrɒʃth‌ɒm kh ɒmt hɒjj kh bh ɒtrɒf ʃmɒjnd ɒlbth srznʃ xvd rɒ mthml xvɒhndʃd v ʃmɒ‌ɒj kvhhɒj ɒsrɒئjl ʃɒxh hɒj xvd rɒ xvɒhjd rvjɒnjd v mjvh xvd rɒ brɒj ɣvm mn ɒsrɒئjl xvɒhjd آvrd zjrɒ kh ɒjʃɒn bh zvdj xvɒhnd آmd zjrɒ ɒjnk mn btrf ʃmɒ hstm v br ʃmɒ nzr xvɒhm dɒʃt v ʃjɒr ʃdh، kɒʃth xvɒhjd ʃd v br ʃmɒ mrdmɒn rɒ xvɒhm ɒfzvdjʔnj tmɒmj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl rɒ d͡ʒmjʔ v ʃhrhɒmskvn v xrɒbh‌hɒ mʔmvr xvɒhd ʃd v brʃmɒ ɒnsɒn v bhɒjm bsjɒr xvɒhm آvrd kh ɒjʃɒn ɒfzvdh ʃdh، bɒrvr xvɒhnd ʃd v ʃmɒ rɒ msl ɒjɒm ɣdjm mʔmvr xvɒhm sɒxt blkh br ʃmɒ bjʃtr ɒzɒvl ʃmɒ ɒhsɒn xvɒhm nmvd v xvɒhjd dɒnst kh mn jhvh hstm v mrdmɒn jʔnj ɣvm xvdɒsrɒئjl rɒ br ʃmɒ xrɒmɒn xvɒhm sɒxt tɒ tv rɒbh tsrf آvrnd v mjrɒs ɒjʃɒn bʃvj v ɒjʃɒn rɒdjɡr bj‌ɒvlɒd nsɒzj» v xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «t͡ʃvnkh ɒjʃɒn drbɒrh tv mj‌ɡvjnd kh mrdmɒn rɒ mj‌blʔj vɒmt hɒj xvjʃ rɒ bj‌ɒvlɒd mj‌ɡrdɒnj، پs xdɒvnd jhvh mj‌ɡvjd mrdmɒn rɒ djɡr nxvɒhj blʔjd v ɒmt hɒj xvjʃ rɒ djɡr bj‌ɒvlɒdnxvɒhj sɒxt v srznʃ ɒmt‌hɒ rɒ djɡr drtv msmvʔ nxvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd v djɡr mthml mzmt tvɒjf nxvɒhj ʃd v ɒmt hɒj xvjʃ rɒdjɡr nxvɒhj lɣzɒnjd xdɒvnd jhvh ɒjn rɒmj ɡvjd» v klɒm xdɒvnd br mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn، hŋɒmj kh xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl drzmjn xvd sɒkn mj‌bvdnd آn rɒ bh rɒhhɒ v bh ɒʔmɒl xvd nd͡ʒs nmvdnd v trjɣ ɒjʃɒn bh nzrmn msl nd͡ʒɒst zn hɒjz mj‌bvd lhzɒ bh‌sbb xvnj kh br zmjn rjxtnd v آn rɒ bh bthɒj xvd nd͡ʒs sɒxtnd، mn xʃm xvd rɒ br ɒjʃɒn rjxtm v ɒjʃɒn rɒ dr mjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ پrɒkndh sɒxtm v dr kʃvrhɒ mtfrɣ ɡʃtnd v mvɒfɣ rɒhhɒ v ɒʔmɒl ɒjʃɒn، br ɒjʃɒn dɒvrj nmvdm v t͡ʃvn bh ɒmt hɒjj kh btrf آnhɒ rftndrsjdnd، آŋɒh ɒsm ɣdvs mrɒ bj‌hrmt sɒxtnd zjrɒ drbɒrh ɒjʃɒn ɡftnd kh ɒjnɒn ɣvm jhvh mj‌bɒʃnd v ɒz zmjn ɒv bjrvn آmdh‌ɒnd ljkn mn br ɒsm ɣdvs xvd kh xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl آn rɒ dr mjɒn ɒmt hɒjj kh bsvj آnhɒrfth bvdnd bj‌hrmt sɒxtnd ʃfɣt nmvdm «bnɒbrɒjn bh xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl bɡv xdɒvndjhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd ɒj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl mn ɒjn rɒ nh bh‌xɒtr ʃmɒ blkh bxɒtr ɒsm ɣdvs xvdkh آn rɒ dr mjɒn ɒmt hɒjj kh bh آnhɒ rfth، bj‌hrmt nmvdh‌ɒjd bʔml mj‌آvrm v ɒsm ʔzjm xvd rɒ kh dr mjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ bj‌hrmt ʃdh ɒst v ʃmɒ آn rɒ dr mjɒn آnhɒ bj‌ʔsmt sɒxth‌ɒjd، tɣdjs xvɒhm nmvd v xdɒvnd jhvh mj‌ɡvjd hjnj kh bnzr ɒjʃɒn dr ʃmɒ tɣdjs krdh ʃvm، آŋɒh ɒmt‌hɒ xvɒhnd dɒnst kh mn jhvh hstm v ʃmɒ rɒ ɒz mjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ mj‌ɡjrm vɒz d͡ʒmjʔ kʃvrhɒ d͡ʒmʔ mj‌knm v ʃmɒ rɒ dr zmjn xvd dr xvɒhm آvrd v آb پɒk br ʃmɒxvɒhm پɒʃjd v tɒhr xvɒhjd ʃd v ʃmɒ rɒ ɒzhmh nd͡ʒɒsɒt vɒz hmh bthɒj ʃmɒ tɒhr xvɒhm sɒxt v dl tɒzh bh ʃmɒ xvɒhm dɒd v rvh tɒzh dr ɒndrvn ʃmɒ xvɒhm nhɒd v dl sŋj rɒ ɒzd͡ʒsd ʃmɒ dvr krdh، dl ɡvʃtjn bh ʃmɒ xvɒhm dɒd v rvh xvd rɒ dr ɒndrvn ʃmɒ xvɒhm nhɒd v ʃmɒ rɒ bh frɒjz xvd sɒlk xvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd tɒ ɒhkɒm mrɒ ŋɒh dɒʃth، آnhɒ rɒ bd͡ʒɒآvrjd v dr zmjnj kh bh پdrɒn ʃmɒ dɒdm sɒkn ʃdh، ɣvm mn xvɒhjd bvd v mn xdɒj ʃmɒ xvɒhm bvd v ʃmɒ rɒ ɒz hmh nd͡ʒɒsɒt ʃmɒnd͡ʒɒt xvɒhm dɒd v ɣlh rɒ xvɒndh، آn rɒ frɒvɒn xvɒhm sɒxt v djɡr ɣht br ʃmɒ nxvɒhm frstɒd v mjvh drxtɒn v hɒsl zmjn rɒfrɒvɒn xvɒhm sɒxt tɒ djɡr dr mjɒn ɒmt hɒmthml rsvɒjj ɣht nʃvjd v t͡ʃvn rɒhhɒj ɣbjh v ɒʔmɒl nɒپsnd xvd rɒ bh jɒd آvrjd، آŋɒh bh‌sbb ɡnɒhɒn v rd͡ʒɒsɒt xvd xvjʃtn rɒ drnzr xvd mkrvh xvɒhjd dɒʃt» v xdɒvndjhvh mj‌ɡvjd «bdɒnjd kh mn ɒjn rɒ bh‌xɒtr ʃmɒnkrdh‌ɒm پs‌ɒj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl bh‌sbb rɒhhɒj xvd xd͡ʒl v rsvɒ ʃvjd» xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd «dr rvzj kh ʃmɒ rɒ ɒz tmɒmj ɡnɒhɒntɒn tɒhr sɒzm، ʃhrhɒ rɒ mskvn xvɒhm sɒxt v xrɒbh‌hɒ mʔmvr xvɒhd ʃd v zmjn vjrɒn kh bh nzr d͡ʒmjʔ rhɡzrjɒn xrɒb mj‌bvd، ʃjɒr xvɒhd ʃd v xvɒhnd ɡft ɒjn zmjnj kh vjrɒn bvd، msl bɒɣ ʔdn ɡrdjdh ɒst v ʃhrhɒjj kh xrɒb v vjrɒn v mnhdm bvd، hsɒrdɒr vmskvn ʃdh ɒst v ɒmt hɒjj kh bh ɒtrɒf ʃmɒ bɒɣj‌mɒndh bɒʃnd، xvɒhnd dɒnst kh mn jhvh mxrvbɒt rɒ bnɒ krdh v vjrɒnh‌hɒ rɒ ɣrs nmvdh‌ɒm mn kh jhvh hstm tklm nmvdh v bʔml آvrdh‌ɒm» xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «brɒj ɒjn bɒrdjɡr xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl ɒz mn msɒlt xvɒhnd nmvdtɒ آn rɒ brɒj ɒjʃɒn bʔml آvrm mn ɒjʃɒn rɒ bɒmrdmɒn msl ɡlh ksjr xvɒhm ɡrdɒnjdmsl ɡlh hɒj ɣrbɒnj jʔnj ɡlh ɒvrʃljm dr mvsmhɒjʃ hmt͡ʃnɒn ʃhrhɒj mxrvb ɒz ɡlh hɒj mrdmɒn پr xvɒhd ʃd v ɒjʃɒn xvɒhnd dɒnst kh mn jhvh hstm» msl ɡlh hɒj ɣrbɒnj jʔnj ɡlh ɒvrʃljm dr mvsmhɒjʃ hmt͡ʃnɒn ʃhrhɒj mxrvb ɒz ɡlh hɒj mrdmɒn پr xvɒhd ʃd v ɒjʃɒn xvɒhnd dɒnst kh mn jhvh hstm» dst xdɒvnd br mn frvd آmdh، mrɒ drrvh xdɒvnd bjrvn brd v dr hmvɒrj ɣrɒr dɒd v آn ɒz ɒstxvɒnhɒ پr bvd v mrɒ bh hrtrf آnhɒ ɡrdɒnjd v ɒjnk آnhɒ br rvj hmvɒrj bj‌nhɒjt zjɒdh v bsjɒr xʃk bvd v ɒv mrɒɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn آjɒ mj‌ʃvd kh ɒjn ɒstxvɒnhɒ zndh ɡrdd؟» ɡftm «ɒj xdɒvnd jhvh tv mj‌dɒnj» پs mrɒ frmvd «brɒjn ɒstxvɒnhɒ nbvt nmvdh، bh ɒjnhɒ bɡv ɒj ɒstxvɒnhɒj xʃk klɒm xdɒvnd rɒ bʃnvjd xdɒvnd jhvh bh ɒjn ɒstxvɒnhɒ t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnk mn rvh bh ʃmɒdrmj آvrm tɒ zndh ʃvjd v پjh‌hɒ br ʃmɒ xvɒhm nhɒd v ɡvʃt br ʃmɒ xvɒhm آvrd v ʃmɒ rɒ bh پvst xvɒhm پvʃɒnjd v dr ʃmɒ rvh xvɒhm nhɒd tɒ zndh ʃvjd پs xvɒhjd dɒnst kh mn jhvh hstm» پs mn t͡ʃnɒnkh mɒmvr ʃdm nbvt krdm v t͡ʃvn nbvt nmvdm، آvɒzj msmvʔ ɡrdjd v ɒjnk tzlzlj vɒɣʔ ʃd v ɒstxvɒnhɒ bh jkdjɡr jʔnj hr ɒstxvɒnj bh ɒstxvɒnʃ nzdjk ʃd v ŋrjstm v ɒjnk پjh‌hɒ v ɡvʃt bh آnhɒ brآmd v پvst آnhɒ rɒ ɒz bɒlɒ پvʃɒnjd ɒmɒdr آnhɒ rvh nbvd پs ɒv mrɒ ɡft «br rvh nbvt nmɒ ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn br rvh nbvt krdh، bɡv xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd kh‌ɒj rvh ɒzbɒdhɒj ɒrbʔ bjɒ v bh ɒjn kʃtɡɒn bdm tɒ ɒjʃɒn zndh ʃvnd» پs t͡ʃnɒnkh mrɒ ɒmr frmvd، nbvt nmvdm vrvh bh آnhɒ dɒxl ʃd v آnhɒ zndh ɡʃth، br پɒjhɒj xvd lʃkr bj‌nhɒjt ʔzjmj ɒjstɒdnd v ɒvmrɒ ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn ɒjn ɒstxvɒnhɒ tmɒmj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl mj‌bɒʃnd ɒjnk ɒjʃɒn mj‌ɡvjnd ɒstxvɒnhɒj mɒ xʃk ʃd v ɒmjd mɒ zɒjʔ ɡrdjdv xvdmɒn mnɣtʔ ɡʃtjm lhzɒ nbvt krdh، bh ɒjʃɒn bɡv xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd ɒjnk mn ɣbrhɒj ʃmɒ rɒ mj‌ɡʃɒjm v ʃmɒ rɒ‌ɒj ɣvm mn ɒz ɣbrhɒj ʃmɒ drآvrdh، bh zmjn ɒsrɒئjl xvɒhm آvrd v‌ɒj ɣvm mn t͡ʃvn ɣbrhɒj ʃmɒ rɒbɡʃɒjm v ʃmɒ rɒ ɒz ɣbrhɒj ʃmɒ bjrvn آvrm، آŋɒh xvɒhjd dɒnst kh mn jhvh hstm vrvh xvd rɒ dr ʃmɒ xvɒhm nhɒd tɒ zndh ʃvjd vʃmɒ rɒ dr zmjn xvdtɒn mɣjm xvɒhm sɒxt پs xvɒhjd dɒnst kh mn jhvh tklm nmvdh v bʔml آvrdh‌ɒm ɣvl xdɒvnd ɒjn ɒst» v klɒm xdɒvnd br mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «vtv‌ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn jk ʔsɒ brɒj xvd bɡjr v br آn bnvjs brɒj jhvdɒ v brɒj bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl rfɣɒj vj پs ʔsɒj djɡr bɡjr v br آn bnvjs brɒj jvsf ʔsɒj ɒfrɒjm v tmɒmj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl rfɣɒj vj v آnhɒ rɒ brɒj xvdt bɒ jkdjɡrjk ʔsɒ sɒz tɒ dr dstt jk bɒʃd v t͡ʃvn ɒbnɒء ɣvmt tv rɒ xtɒb krdh، ɡvjnd آjɒ mɒ rɒxbr nmj dhj kh ɒz ɒjn kɒrhɒ mɣsvd tv t͡ʃjst؟ آŋɒh bh ɒjʃɒn bɡv xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd ɒjnk mn ʔsɒj jvsf rɒ kh dr dst ɒfrɒjm ɒst v ɒsbɒt ɒsrɒئjl rɒ kh rfɣɒj vj‌ɒnd، xvɒhm ɡrft v آnhɒ rɒ bɒ vj jʔnj bɒ ʔsɒj jhvdɒ xvɒhm پjvst v آnhɒ rɒ jk ʔsɒ xvɒhm sɒxt v dr dstm jk xvɒhd ʃd پs آn ʔsɒhɒ kh br آnhɒ nvʃtj dr dst tv dr nzr ɒjʃɒn bɒʃd v bh ɒjʃɒn bɡv xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd ɒjnk mn bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl rɒ ɒz mjɒn ɒmt hɒjj kh bh آnhɒ rfth‌ɒnd ɡrfth، ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz hrtrf d͡ʒmʔ xvɒhm krd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh zmjn xvdʃɒn xvɒhm آvrd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ dr آn zmjn br kvhhɒj ɒsrɒئjl jk ɒmt xvɒhm sɒxt vjk پɒdʃɒh br d͡ʒmjʔ ɒjʃɒn sltnt xvɒhd nmvdv djɡr dv ɒmt nxvɒhnd bvd v djɡr bh dvmmlkt tɣsjm nxvɒhnd ʃd v xvjʃtn rɒdjɡr bh bthɒ v rd͡ʒɒsɒt v hmh mʔsjt hɒj xvdnd͡ʒs nxvɒhnd sɒxt blkh ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz d͡ʒmjʔ msɒkn ɒjʃɒn kh dr آnhɒ ɡnɒh vrzjdh‌ɒnd nd͡ʒɒt dɒdh، ɒjʃɒn rɒ tɒhr xvɒhm sɒxt v ɒjʃɒn ɣvm mn xvɒhnd bvd v mn xdɒj ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm bvd v bndh mn dɒvd، پɒdʃɒh ɒjʃɒn xvɒhd bvd vjk ʃbɒn brɒj d͡ʒmjʔ ɒjʃɒn xvɒhd bvd v bh ɒhkɒm mn slvk nmvdh v frɒjz mrɒ ŋɒh dɒʃth، آnhɒ rɒ bd͡ʒɒ xvɒhnd‌آvrd v dr zmjnj kh bh bndh xvd jʔɣvb dɒdm v پdrɒn ɒjʃɒn dr آn sɒkn mj‌bvdnd، sɒkn xvɒhnd ʃd v ɒjʃɒn v پsrɒn ɒjʃɒn v پsrɒn پsrɒn ɒjʃɒn tɒ bh ɒbd dr آn skvnt xvɒhnd nmvd v bndh mn dɒvd tɒ پs t͡ʃvn mɣds mn dr mjɒn ɒjʃɒn tɒ bh ɒbd br ɣrɒr bvdh bɒʃd، آŋɒh ɒmt‌hɒ xvɒhnd dɒnst kh mn jhvh hstm kh ɒsrɒئjl rɒ tɣdjs mj‌nmɒjm» v klɒm xdɒvnd br mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn nzr xvd rɒ br nmvd v dr آn rvz mvzʔj brɒj ɣbrdr ɒsrɒئjl jʔnj vɒdj ʔɒbrjm rɒ btrf mʃrɣ drjɒ bh d͡ʒvd͡ʒ xvɒhm dɒd v rɒh ʔbvr knndɡɒn rɒmsdvd xvɒhd sɒxt v dr آnd͡ʒɒ d͡ʒvd͡ʒ v tmɒmj d͡ʒmʔjt، ɒv rɒ dfn xvɒhnd krd v xvɒhndsɒxt «v ɒmɒ tv‌ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd kh bhr d͡ʒns mrɣɒn v bh hmh hjvɒnɒt shrɒ bɡv d͡ʒmʔ ʃvjd v bjɒjjd v nzd ɣrbɒnj mn kh آn rɒ brɒj ʃmɒ zbh mj‌nmɒjm، frɒhm آjjd ɣrbɒnj xvɒhnddɒnst kh jhvh xdɒj ɒjʃɒn mn hstm vɒmt‌hɒ xvɒhnd dɒnst kh xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl bh‌sbb ɡnɒh xvdʃɒn d͡ʒlɒj vtn ɡrdjdnd zjrɒt͡ʃvnkh bh mn xjɒnt vrzjdnd، mn rvj xvd rɒ ɒzɒjʃɒn پvʃɒnjdm v ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh‌dst bɒz آvrdh، br tmɒmj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl rhmt xvɒhm frmvd v br ɒsm ɣdvs xvd ɣjrt xvɒhm nmvd v hjnj kh ɒjʃɒn drzmjn xvd bh ɒmnjt sɒkn ʃvnd v trsɒnndh‌ɒj nbɒʃd، آŋɒh xd͡ʒɒlt xvd rɒ v xjɒntj rɒ kh bh mn vrzjdh‌ɒnd mthml xvɒhnd ʃd v t͡ʃvn ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz mjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ brɡrdɒnm v ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz zmjn dʃmnɒnʃɒn d͡ʒmʔ nmɒjm، آŋɒh dr nzr ɒmt hɒj bsjɒr dr ɒjʃɒn tɣdjs xvɒhm ʃd v xvɒhnddɒnst kh mn jhvh xdɒj ɒjʃɒn nzddrvɒzh‌ɒj kh bsvj mʃrɣ mtvd͡ʒh bvd آmdh، bh پlh hɒjʃ brآmd v آstɒnh drvɒzh rɒ پjmvd kh ʔrzʃ jk nj bvd v ʔrz آstɒnh djɡr rɒ kh jk nj bvd v tvl hr ɣrfh jk nj bvd vʔrzʃ jk nj v mjɒn ɣrfh‌hɒ msɒft xɒnh bhr trf mj‌bvd t͡ʃhɒrzrɒʔ bvd v ɣrfh‌hɒ rvj hmdjɡr sh tbɣh bvdv dr hr rsth‌ɒj sj v dr djvɒrj kh bh d͡ʒht ɣrfh‌hɒ ɡrdɒɡrd xɒnh bvd، dɒxl mj‌ʃd tɒ drآn mtmkn ʃvd v dr djvɒr xɒnh mtmkn nʃvd v ɣrfh‌hɒ xɒnh rɒ bɒlɒtr v bɒlɒtr ɒhɒth krdh، vsjʔtr mj‌ʃd، zjrɒ kh xɒnh rɒ bɒlɒtr v bɒlɒtrɡrdɒɡrd xɒnh ɒhɒth mj‌krd v ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht xɒnh bsvj bɒlɒ vsjʔtr mj‌bvd، v hmt͡ʃnjn ɒz tbɣh thtɒnj bh tbɣh vstj
