v ɒjvɒnhɒ ɡrdɒɡrd dr sh tbɣh mɣɒbl آstɒnh ɒz zmjn tɒ پnd͡ʒrh‌hɒ ɒz hr trf t͡ʃvb پvʃ bvd v پnd͡ʒrh‌hɒ hm پvʃjdh bvd tɒbɒlɒj drhɒ v tɒ xɒnh ɒndrvnj v bjrvnj v br tmɒmj djvɒr ɡrdɒɡrd ɒz ɒndrvn v bjrvn v tvlʃ v djvɒrhɒjʃ ɒz t͡ʃvb bvd v ɒv mrɒ ɡft «mjzj kh dr hzvr xdɒvndmj bɒʃd ɒjn ɒst» v hjkl v ɣds rɒ dv dr bvd v hr dr rɒdv lŋh bvd v ɒjn dv lŋh tɒ mj‌ʃd jk dr rɒ dvlŋh v dr djɡr rɒ dv lŋh v br آnhɒ xɒnh v br آstɒnh‌hɒ br d͡ʒɒnb rvɒɣ پnd͡ʒrh hɒj mʃbk bh ɒjntrf v bh آntrf bvd vhmt͡ʃnjn br ɣrfh hɒj xɒnh v br آstɒnh‌hɒ v mrɒ bh shn bjrvnj ɒz rɒh smt ʃmɒlj bjrvn brd v mrɒ bh hd͡ʒrh‌ɒj kh mɣɒbl mkɒn mnfsl v rvbrvj bnjɒn btrf ʃmɒl bvd آvrd d͡ʒlv tvl sd zrɒʔj drʃmɒlj bvd v ʔrzʃ پnd͡ʒɒh zrɒʔ bvd mɣɒbl bjst zrɒʔ kh ɒz آn shn ɒndrvnj bvd v mɣɒbl sŋfrʃj kh ɒz shn bjrvnj bvd dhljzj rvbrvj dhljzj dr sh tbɣh bvd v پjʃ rvj hd͡ʒrh‌hɒ btrf ɒndrvn xrndj bh ʔrz dh zrɒʔ bvd v rɒhj jk zrɒʔ v drhɒj آnhɒ btrf ʃmɒl bvd v hd͡ʒrh hɒj fvɣɒnj kvtɒh bvd zjrɒ kh dhljzhɒ ɒz آnhɒ mj‌ɡrftnd bjʃtr ɒz آnt͡ʃh آnhɒ ɒzhd͡ʒrh hɒj thtɒnj v vstj bnjɒn mj‌ɡrftnd t͡ʃvnkh sh tbɣh bvd v stvnhɒ msl stvnhɒj shn‌hɒ ndɒʃt v ɒz ɒjn sbb، tbɣh fvɣɒnj ɒztbɣɒt thtɒnj v vstj ɒz zmjn tŋtr mj‌ʃd vtvl djvɒrj kh btrf bjrvn mɣɒbl hd͡ʒrh hɒbsvj shn bjrvnj rvbrvj hd͡ʒrh‌hɒ bvd پnd͡ʒɒh zrɒʔ bvd zjrɒ tvl hd͡ʒrh hɒjj kh dr shn bjrvnj bvd پnd͡ʒɒh zrɒʔ bvd v ɒjnk d͡ʒlv hjkl sdzrɒʔ bvd v zjr ɒjn hd͡ʒrh‌hɒ ɒz trf ʃrɣj mdxlj bvd kh ɒz آn bh آnhɒ ɒz shn bjrvnj dɒxl mj‌ʃdnd v dr hd͡ʒm djvɒr shn kh btrf mʃrɣ bvd پjʃ rvj mkɒn mnfsl v mɣɒbl bnjɒn hd͡ʒrh‌hɒ bvd v rɒh mɣɒbl آnhɒ msl nmɒjʃ rɒh hd͡ʒrh hɒj smt ʃmɒl bvd، ʔrz آnhɒ mtɒbɣ tvl آnhɒ bvd v tmɒmj mxrd͡ʒ hɒj ɒjnhɒ msl rsm آnhɒ v drhɒj آnhɒ v msl drhɒj hd͡ʒrh hɒj smt d͡ʒnvb drj br sr rɒh bvd jʔnj br rɒhj kh rɒst پjʃ rvj djvɒr mʃrɣj bvd d͡ʒɒjj kh bh آnhɒ dɒxl mj‌ʃdnd v mrɒ ɡft «hd͡ʒrh hɒj ʃmɒlj vhd͡ʒrh hɒj d͡ʒnvbj kh پjʃ rvj mkɒn mnfsl ɒst، hd͡ʒrh hɒj mɣds mj‌bɒʃd kh kɒhnɒnj kh bh xdɒvnd nzdjk mj‌آjnd ɣds ɒɣdɒs rɒ drآnhɒ mj‌xvrnd v ɣds ɒɣdɒs v hdɒjɒj آrdj vɣrbɒnj hɒj ɡnɒh v ɣrbɒnj hɒj d͡ʒrm rɒ dr آnhɒmj ɡzɒrnd zjrɒ kh ɒjn mkɒn mɣds ɒst vt͡ʃvn kɒhnɒn dɒxl آnhɒ mj‌ʃvnd djɡr ɒz ɣds bh shn bjrvnj bjrvn nmj آjnd blkh lbɒshɒj xvdrɒ kh dr آnhɒ xdmt mj‌knnd dr آnhɒ mj‌ɡzɒrndzjrɒ kh آnhɒ mɣds mj‌bɒʃd v lbɒs djɡrپvʃjdh، bh آnt͡ʃh bh ɣvm tʔlɣ dɒrd nzdjk mj‌آjnd» v t͡ʃvn پjmɒjʃhɒj xɒnh ɒndrvnj rɒ bh ɒtmɒm rsɒnjd، mrɒ bsvj drvɒzh‌ɒj kh rvjʃ bh smt mʃrɣ bvd bjrvn آvrd v آn rɒ ɒz hr trf پjmvd d͡ʒɒnb ʃrɣj آn rɒ bh nj پjmɒjʃ، پɒnsd nj پjmvd jʔnj bh nj پjmɒjʃ آn rɒ ɒz hrtrf پjmvd v d͡ʒɒnb ʃmɒlj rɒ bh nj پjmɒjʃ ɒz hr trf پɒnsd nj پjmvd v d͡ʒɒnb d͡ʒnvbj rɒ bh nj پjmɒjʃ، پɒnsd nj پjmvd پs bh svj d͡ʒɒnb ɣrbj brɡʃth، آn rɒ bh nj پjmɒjʃ پɒnsd nj پjmvdhr‌t͡ʃhɒr d͡ʒɒnb آn rɒ پjmvd vآn rɒ djvɒrj bvd kh tvlʃ پɒnsd v ʔrzʃ پɒnsd nj bvd tɒ dr mjɒn mɣds v ɣjrmɣds frɣ ɡzɒrd hr‌t͡ʃhɒr d͡ʒɒnb آn rɒ پjmvd vآn rɒ djvɒrj bvd kh tvlʃ پɒnsd v ʔrzʃ پɒnsd nj bvd tɒ dr mjɒn mɣds v ɣjrmɣds frɣ ɡzɒrd v mrɒ nzd drvɒzh آvrd، jʔnj bh drvɒzh‌ɒj kh bh smt mʃrɣ mtvd͡ʒh bvd vɒjnk d͡ʒlɒl xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl ɒz trf mʃrɣ آmd v آvɒz ɒv msl آbhɒj bsjɒr bvd v zmjn ɒz d͡ʒlɒl ɒv mnvr ɡrdjd v msl mnzr آn rvjɒjj bvd kh djdh bvdm jʔnj msl آn rvjɒ kh dr vɣt آmdn mn، brɒj txrjb ʃhr djdh bvdm v rvjɒhɒmsl آn rvjɒ bvd kh nzd nhr xɒbvr mʃɒhdh nmvdh bvdm پs bh rvj xvd dr‌ɒftɒdm پs d͡ʒlɒl xdɒvnd ɒz rɒh drvɒzh‌ɒj kh rvjʃ bh smt mʃrɣ bvd bh xɒnh drآmd vrvh mrɒ brdɒʃth، bh shn ɒndrvnj آvrd v ɒjnk d͡ʒlɒl xdɒvnd xɒnh rɒ mmlv sɒxt v hɒtfj rɒʃnjdm kh ɒz mjɒn xɒnh bh mn tklm mj‌nmɒjd vmrdj پhlvj mn ɒjstɒdh bvd v mrɒ ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn ɒjn ɒst mkɒn krsj mn v mkɒn kf پɒjhɒjm kh dr آn dr mjɒn bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl tɒ bh ɒbdsɒkn xvɒhm ʃd v xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl hm xvdɒjʃɒn v hm پɒdʃɒhɒn ɒjʃɒn bɒr djɡr bh znɒhɒ vlɒʃhɒj پɒdʃɒhɒn xvd dr mkɒn hɒj blnd xvjʃ nɒm ɣdvs mrɒ bj‌hrmt nxvɒhnd sɒxt sɒxth‌ɒnd، lhzɒ mn dr xʃm xvd ɒjʃɒn rɒ tlf nmvdh‌ɒm hɒl znɒhɒj xvd v lɒʃhɒj پɒdʃɒhɒn xvjʃ rɒ ɒz mn dvr bnmɒjnd v mn dr mjɒn ɒjʃɒn tɒ bh ɒbd skvnt xvɒhm nmvd v tv‌ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl rɒ ɒz ɒjn xɒnh mtlʔ sɒz tɒ ɒz ɡnɒhɒn xvdxd͡ʒl ʃvnd v ɒjʃɒn nmvnh آn rɒ bپjmɒjnd vɒɡr ɒz hr‌t͡ʃh bʔml آvrdh‌ɒnd xd͡ʒl ʃvnd، آŋɒh svrt xɒnh rɒ v nmvnh v mxrd͡ʒhɒ v mdxlhɒ v tmɒmj ʃklhɒ v hmh frɒjz v d͡ʒmjʔ svrthɒ vtmɒmj ɣɒnvnhɒjʃ rɒ brɒj ɒjʃɒn ɒʔlɒm nmɒ v bh nzr ɒjʃɒn bnvjs tɒ tmɒmj svrtʃ v hmh frɒjzʃ rɒ ŋɒh dɒʃth، bh آnhɒ ʔml nmɒjnd vɣɒnvn xɒnh ɒjn ɒst kh tmɒmj hdvdʃ br srkvh ɒz hmh ɒtrɒfʃ ɣds ɒɣdɒs sjnh rvj zmjn tɒ xrvd͡ʒ پɒjjnj dv zrɒʔ v ʔrzʃ jk zrɒʔ v ɒz xrvd͡ʒ kvt͡ʃk tɒ xrvd͡ʒ bzrɡ t͡ʃhɒr zrɒʔ v ʔrzʃ jk zrɒʔ v آtʃ dɒnʃ t͡ʃhɒr zrɒʔ v ɒz آtʃ dɒn t͡ʃhɒr ʃɒx brآmdh bvd v tvl آtʃ dɒn dvɒzdh v ʔrzʃ dvɒzdh v ɒz hr‌t͡ʃhɒr trf mrbʔ bvd v tvl xrvd͡ʒ t͡ʃhɒrdh v ʔrzʃ t͡ʃhɒrdh brt͡ʃhɒr trfʃ bvd v hɒʃjh‌ɒj kh ɡrdɒɡrdʃ bvdnjm zrɒʔ v dɒjrh sjnh‌ɒʃ jk zrɒʔ v پlh hɒjʃ bh smt mʃrɣ mtvd͡ʒh bvd v ɒv mrɒ ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd ɒjn ɒst ɣɒnvn hɒj mzbh drrvzj kh آn rɒ bsɒznd tɒ ɣrbɒnj hɒj svxtj brآn bɡzrɒnnd v xvn br آn bپɒʃnd v xdɒvndjhvh mj‌frmɒjd kh bh lɒvjɒn khnh kh ɒz zrjt sɒdvɣ mj‌bɒʃnd v bh d͡ʒht xdmt mn bh mn nzdjk mj‌آjnd jk ɡvsɒlh bh d͡ʒht ɣrbɒnj ɡnɒh bdh v ɒz xvnʃ ɡrfth، br t͡ʃhɒr ʃɒxʃ v brt͡ʃhɒr ɡvʃh xrvd͡ʒ v br hɒʃjh‌ɒj kh ɡrdɒɡrdʃ ɒst bپɒʃ v آn rɒ tɒhr sɒxth، brɒjʃ kfɒrh kn ɡvsɒlh ɣrbɒnj ɡnɒh rɒ bɡjr v آn rɒ dr mkɒn mʔjn xɒnh bjrvn ɒz mɣds bsvzɒnnd v dr rvzdvm bz nr bj‌ʔjbj brɒj ɣrbɒnj ɡnɒh bɡzrɒn tɒmzbh rɒ bh آn tɒhr sɒznd t͡ʃnɒnkh آn rɒ bh ɡvsɒlh tɒhr sɒxtnd v t͡ʃvn ɒz tɒhr sɒxtn آn fɒrɣ ʃdj ɡvsɒlh bj‌ʔjb v ɣvt͡ʃj bj‌ʔjb ɒz ɡlh bɡzrɒn tv آn rɒ bh hzvr xdɒvnd nzdjk bjɒvr v kɒhnɒn nmk br آnhɒ پɒʃjdh، آnhɒ rɒ bh d͡ʒht ɣrbɒnj svxtnj brɒj xdɒvnd bɡzrɒnnd hr rvz ɒz hft rvz tv bz nrj brɒj ɣrbɒnj ɡnɒh bɡzrɒn v ɒjʃɒn ɡvsɒlh‌ɒj v ɣvt͡ʃj ɒz ɡlh hr dvbj ʔjb bɡzrɒnnd hft rvz ɒjʃɒn kfɒrh brɒj mzbh nmvdh، آn rɒ tɒhr sɒznd v txsjs knndv t͡ʃvn ɒjn‌rvzhɒ rɒ bh ɒtmɒm rsɒnjdnd، پs drrvz hʃtm v bʔd ɒz آn kɒhnɒn ɣrbɒnj hɒj svxtnj v zbɒjh slɒmtj ʃmɒ rɒ br mzbh bɡzrɒnnd v mn ʃmɒ rɒ ɣbvl xvɒhm krd ɣvl xdɒvnd jhvh ɒjn ɒst» v t͡ʃvn ɒjn‌rvzhɒ rɒ bh ɒtmɒm rsɒnjdnd، پs drrvz hʃtm v bʔd ɒz آn kɒhnɒn ɣrbɒnj hɒj svxtnj v zbɒjh slɒmtj ʃmɒ rɒ br mzbh bɡzrɒnnd v mn ʃmɒ rɒ ɣbvl xvɒhm krd ɣvl xdɒvnd jhvh ɒjn ɒst» v mrɒ bh rɒh drvɒzh mɣds bjrvnj kh bh smt mʃrɣ mtvd͡ʒh bvd، bɒz آvrd v آn bsth ʃdh bvd v xdɒvnd mrɒ ɡft «ɒjn drvɒzh bsth bmɒnd v ɡʃvdh nʃvd vhjt͡ʃ‌ks ɒz آn dɒxl nʃvd zjrɒ kh jhvh xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl ɒz آn dɒxl ʃdh، lhzɒ bsth bmɒnd v ɒmɒ rئjs، t͡ʃvnkh ɒvrئjs ɒst dr آn bh d͡ʒht xvrdn ɣzɒ bh hzvr xdɒvnd bnʃjnd v ɒz rɒh rvɒɣ drvɒzh dɒxl ʃvdv ɒz hmɒn rɒh bjrvn rvd» پs mrɒ ɒz rɒh drvɒzh ʃmɒlj پjʃ rvj xɒnh آvrd v ŋrjstm v ɒjnk d͡ʒlɒl xdɒvnd xɒnh xdɒvnd rɒ mmlv sɒxth bvd v brvj xvddrɒftɒdm v xdɒvnd mrɒ ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn dl xvd rɒ bh hrt͡ʃh tv rɒ ɡvjm drbɒrh tmɒmj ɣɒnvn hɒj xɒnh xdɒvnd v hmh ɣvɒʔdʃ mʃɣvl sɒz v bh t͡ʃʃmɒn xvd bbjn v bh zjrɒ kh ʃmɒ ɒd͡ʒnbjɒn nɒmxtvn dl v nɒmxtvn ɡvʃt rɒdɒxl sɒxtjd tɒ dr mɣds mn bvdh، xɒnh mrɒmlvs sɒznd v t͡ʃvn ʃmɒ ɣzɒj mn jʔnj پjh vxvn rɒ ɡzrɒnjdjd، ɒjʃɒn ʔlɒvh br hmh rd͡ʒɒsɒt ʃmɒ ʔhd mrɒ ʃkstnd v ʃmɒ vdjʔt ɒɣdɒs mrɒ ŋɒh ndɒʃtjd، blkh ksɒn bh d͡ʒht xvjʃtn tʔjjn nmvdjd tɒ vdjʔt mrɒ dr mɣds mn ŋɒh dɒrnd «xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd hjt͡ʃ ʃxs ɣrjb nɒmxtvn dl v nɒmxtvn ɡvʃt ɒz hmh ɣrjbɒnj kh dr mjɒn bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl bɒʃnd bh mɣds mn dɒxl nxvɒhd ʃd blkh آn lɒvjɒn njz kh dr hjn آvɒrh ʃdn bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl ɒz mn dvrj vrzjdh، ɒz ʔɣb bthɒj xvjʃ آvɒrh ɡrdjdnd، mthml ɡnɒh xvd xvɒhnd ʃd، zjrɒ xɒdmɒn mɣds mn v msthfzɒn drvɒzh hɒj xɒnh v mlɒzmɒn xɒnh hstnd v ɒjʃɒn ɣrbɒnj hɒj svxtnj v zbɒjh ɣvm rɒ zbh mj‌nmɒjnd v bh hzvr ɒjʃɒn brɒj xdmt ɒjʃɒn mj‌ɒjstnd vɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht kh bh hzvr bthɒj xvjʃ ɒjʃɒn rɒxdmt nmvdnd v brɒj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl sŋ msɒdm ɡnɒh ʃdnd bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd jhvh mj‌ɡvjd dst xvd rɒ bh zd ɒjʃɒn brɒfrɒʃtm kh mthml ɡnɒh xvd xvɒhnd ʃd v bh mn nzdjk nxvɒhnd آmd v bh khɒnt mn nxvɒhnd پrdɒxt vbh hjt͡ʃ‌t͡ʃjz mɣds dr ɣds‌ɒlɒɣdɒs nzdjk nxvɒhnd آmd، blkh xd͡ʒɒlt xvjʃ v rd͡ʒɒsɒt xvd rɒ kh bʔml آvrdnd mthml xvɒhnd ʃd ljkn ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh d͡ʒht tmɒmj xdmt xɒnh vbrɒj hr kɒrj kh dr آn krdh mj‌ʃvd، msthfzɒn vdjʔt آn xvɒhm sɒxt «ljkn lɒvjɒn khnh ɒz bnj sɒdvɣ kh drhjnj kh bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl ɒz mn آvɒrh ʃdnd vdjʔt mɣds mrɒ ŋɒh dɒʃtnd، xdɒvnd jhvh mj‌ɡvjd kh ɒjʃɒn bh d͡ʒht xdmt mn nzdjk xvɒhnd آmd vbh hzvr mn ɒjstɒdh پjh v xvn rɒ brɒj mn xvɒhnd ɡzrɒnjd v ɒjʃɒn bh mɣds mn dɒxl xvɒhnd ʃd v bh d͡ʒht xdmt mn bh xvɒn mn nzdjk xvɒhnd آmd v vdjʔt mrɒ ŋɒh xvɒhnddɒʃt v hŋɒmj kh bh drvɒzh hɒj shn ɒndrvnj dɒxl ʃvnd lbɒs ktɒnj xvɒhnd پvʃjdv t͡ʃvn dr drvɒzh hɒj shn ɒndrvnj v dr xɒnh mʃɣvl xdmt bɒʃnd، hjt͡ʃ lbɒs پʃmjn nپvʃnd ʔmɒmh hɒj ktɒnj br sr ɒjʃɒn vzjrd͡ʒɒmh ktɒnj br kmrhɒj ɒjʃɒn bɒʃd v hjt͡ʃ t͡ʃjzj kh ʔrɣ آvrd dr br nknnd v t͡ʃvn bh shn bjrvnj jʔnj bh shn bjrvnj nzd ɣvm bjrvn rvnd، آŋɒh lbɒs xvjʃ rɒ kh dr آn xdmt mj‌knnd bjrvn krdh، آn rɒ dr hd͡ʒrh hɒj mɣds bɡzɒrnd v bh lbɒs djɡr mlbs ʃvnd vɣvm rɒ dr lbɒs xvjʃ tɣdjs nnmɒjnd vɒjʃɒn sr xvd rɒ ntrɒʃnd v ɡjsvhɒj blndŋzɒrnd blkh mvj sr xvd rɒ bt͡ʃjnnd v kɒhn vɣt drآmdnʃ dr shn ɒndrvnj ʃrɒb nnvʃd v zn bjvh jɒ mtlɣh rɒ bh znj ŋjrnd، blkh bɒkrh‌ɒj kh ɒz zrjt xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl bɒʃd jɒbjvh‌ɒj rɒ kh bjvh kɒhn bɒʃd bɡjrnd v frɣ mjɒn mɣds v ɣjrmɣds rɒ bh ɣvm mn tʔljm dhndv tʃxjs mjɒn tɒhr v ɣjrtɒhr rɒ bh ɒjʃɒn ɒʔlɒm nmɒjnd v t͡ʃvn dr mrɒ ɡft «ɒjn ɒst mkɒnj kh kɒhnɒn، ɣrbɒnj d͡ʒrm v ɣrbɒnj ɡnɒh rɒ tbx mj‌nmɒjnd vhdjh آrdj rɒ mj‌پznd tɒ آnhɒ rɒ bh shn bjrvnj bh d͡ʒht tɣdjs nmvdn ɣvm bjrvn njɒvrnd» پs mrɒ bh shn bjrvnj آvrd v mrɒ xɒdmɒ� xɒnh dr آnhɒzbɒjh ɣvm rɒ tbx mj‌nmɒjnd» v mrɒ nzd drvɒzh xɒnh آvrd v ɒjnk آbhɒɒz zjr آstɒnh xɒnh bsvj mʃrɣ d͡ʒɒrj bvd، zjrɒ kh rvj xɒnh bh smt mʃrɣ bvd vآn آbhɒ ɒzzjr d͡ʒɒnb rɒst xɒnh ɒz trf d͡ʒnvb mzbh d͡ʒɒrj bvd پs mrɒ ɒz rɒh drvɒzh ʃmɒlj bjrvn brdh، ɒz rɒh xɒrd͡ʒ bh drvɒzh bjrvnj bh rɒhj kh bh smt mʃrɣ mtvd͡ʒh ɒst ɡrdɒnjd v ɒjnk آbhɒ ɒz d͡ʒɒnb rɒst d͡ʒɒrj bvd v t͡ʃvn آn mrdbsvj dɒd v آb bh kmrmj rsjd پs hzɒr zrɒʔ پjmvd v nhrj bvd kh ɒz آn ntvɒn ʔbvr krd zjrɒ kh آb zjɒdh ʃdh bvd، آbj kh dr آn mj‌ʃvd ʃnɒ krd nhrj kh ɒz آn ʔbvr ntvɒn krd v mrɒ ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn آjɒɒjn rɒ djdj؟» پs mrɒ ɒz آnd͡ʒɒ brdh، bh knɒr nhrbrɡrdɒnjd v t͡ʃvn brɡʃtm ɒjnk br knɒr nhr ɒz ɒjntrf v ɒz آntrf drxtɒn bj‌nhɒjt bsjɒr bvd v mrɒɡft «ɒjn آbhɒ bsvj vlɒjt ʃrɣj d͡ʒɒrj mj‌ʃvd v bh ʔrbh frvd ʃdh، bh drjɒ mj‌rvd vt͡ʃvn bh drjɒ dɒxl mj‌ʃvd آbhɒjʃ ʃfɒ mj‌jɒbd v vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd kh hr zj hjɒt xzndh‌ɒj dr hr d͡ʒɒjj kh آn nhr dɒxl ʃvd، zndh xvɒhdɡʃt v mɒhjɒn ɒz hd zjɒdh پjdɒ xvɒhd ʃd، zjrɒt͡ʃvn bvd v mɒhjɒn آnhɒ bh hsb d͡ʒnshɒ، msl mɒhjɒn drjɒj bzrɡ ɒz hdzjɒdh xvɒhnd bvd ɒmɒ xlɒbhɒ v tɒlɒbhɒjʃ ʃfɒnxvɒhd jɒft blkh bh nmk tsljm xvɒhd ʃd v br knɒr nhr bh ɒjntrf v آntrf hr ɣsm drxt xvrɒkj xvɒhd rvjjd kh brɡhɒj آnhɒپʒmrdh nʃvd v mjvh hɒj آnhɒ lɒjnɣtʔ xvɒhd bvdv hr mɒh mjvh tɒzh xvɒhd آvrd zjrɒ kh آbʃ ɒz mɣds d͡ʒɒrj mj‌ʃvd v mjvh آnhɒ brɒj xvrɒk vbrɡhɒj آnhɒ bh d͡ʒht ʔlɒd͡ʒ xvɒhd bvd» xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «ɒjn ɒst hdvdj kh zmjn rɒ brɒj dvɒzdh sbt ɒsrɒئjl bh آnhɒ tɣsjm xvɒhjd nmvd brɒj jvsf dvɣsmt v ʃmɒ hr ks msl djɡrj آn rɒ bh tsrf xvɒhjd آvrd zjrɒ kh mn dst xvd rɒbrɒfrɒʃtm kh آn rɒ bh پdrɒn ʃmɒ bdhm پs ɒjn zmjn bh ɣrʔh bh ʃmɒ bh mlkjt dɒdh xvɒhd ʃd v hdvd zmjn ɒjn ɒst btrf ʃmɒl ɒz drjɒj bzrɡ btrf htlvn tɒ mdxl sdd hmɒt vbjrvth v sbrɒjm kh dr mjɒn srhd dmʃɣ vsrhd hmɒt ɒst v hsr vstj kh nzdsrhd hvrɒn ɒst v hd ɒz drjɒ hsr ʔjnɒn nzd srhd dmʃɣ v btrf srhd hmɒt xvɒhdbvd v ɒjn ɒst d͡ʒɒnb ʃmɒlj v btrf ʃrɣj dr mjɒn hvrɒn v dmʃɣ v dr mjɒn d͡ʒlʔɒd v zmjn ɒsrɒئjl ɒrdn xvɒhd bvd v ɒz ɒjn hd tɒ drjɒj ʃrɣj xvɒhj پjmvd v ɒjn hd ʃrɣj mj‌bɒʃd v trf d͡ʒnvbj bh‌d͡ʒɒnb rɒst ɒz tɒmɒr tɒ آb mrjbvt ɣɒdʃ v nhr msr v drjɒj bzrɡ v ɒjn trf d͡ʒnvbj bh‌d͡ʒɒnb rɒst xvɒhd bvd vtrf ɣrbj drjɒj bzrɡ ɒzhdj kh mɣɒbl mdxl hmɒt ɒst xvɒhd bvd v ɒjn‌d͡ʒɒnb ɣrbj bɒʃd پs ɒjn zmjn rɒ brɒj xvd brhsb ɒsbɒt ɒsrɒئjl tɣsjm xvɒhjd nmvd vآn rɒ brɒj xvd v brɒj ɣrjbɒnj kh dr mjɒn ʃmɒmɒvɒ ɡzjnnd v dr mjɒn ʃmɒ ɒvlɒd bhm rsɒnnd bh ɣrʔh tɣsjm xvɒhjd krd v ɒjʃɒn nzd ʃmɒ msl mtvtnɒn bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl xvɒhnd bvd v bɒ ʃmɒ drmjɒn ɒsbɒt ɒsrɒئjl mjrɒs xvɒhnd jɒftvxdɒvnd jhvh mj‌frmɒjd dr hr sbt kh ʃxsj ɣrjb dr آn sɒkn bɒʃd، dr hmɒn mlk xvd rɒxvɒhd jɒft vxdɒvnd jhvh mj‌frmɒjd dr hr sbt kh ʃxsj ɣrjb dr آn sɒkn bɒʃd، dr hmɒn mlk xvd rɒxvɒhd jɒft «v ɒjn ɒst nɒmhɒj ɒsbɒt ɒz trf ʃmɒl tɒ d͡ʒɒnb htlvn v mdxl hmɒt v hsr ʔjnɒn nzd srhd ʃmɒlj dmʃɣ tɒ d͡ʒɒnb hmɒt hd آnhɒ ɒz mʃrɣ tɒ mɣrb brɒj dɒn jk ɣsmt v nzd hd dɒn ɒz trf mʃrɣ tɒ trf mɣrb brɒj ɒʃjr jk ɣsmt v nzd hd ɒʃjr ɒztrf mʃrɣ tɒ trf mɣrb brɒj nftɒlj jk ɣsmt v nzd hd nftɒlj ɒz trf mʃrɣ tɒtrf mɣrb brɒj mnsj jk ɣsmt v nzd hdmnsj ɒz trf mʃrɣ tɒ trf mɣrb brɒj ɒfrɒjm jk ɣsmt v nzd hd ɒfrɒjm ɒz trf mʃrɣ tɒtrf mɣrb brɒj rئvbjn jk ɣsmt v nzd hdrئvbjn ɒz trf mʃrɣ tɒ trf mɣrb brɒj jhvdɒjk ɣsmt v nzd hd jhvdɒ ɒz trf mʃrɣ tɒtrf mɣrb hdjh‌ɒj kh mj‌ɡzrɒnjd xvɒhd bvdkh ʔrzʃ bjst v پnd͡ʒhzɒr nj v tvlʃ ɒzd͡ʒɒnb mʃrɣ tɒ d͡ʒɒnb mɣrb mvɒfɣ jkj ɒz ɒjn ɣsmt‌hɒ bɒʃd v mɣds dr mjɒnʃ xvɒhd bvd v tvl ɒjn hdjh‌ɒj kh brɒj xdɒvnd mj‌ɡzrɒnjdbjst v پnd͡ʒ hzɒrnj v ʔrzʃ dh hzɒr nj xvɒhd bvd v ɒjn hdjh mɣds brɒj ɒjnɒn jʔnj brɒj kɒhnɒn mj‌bɒʃd v tvlʃ btrf ʃmɒl bjst v پnd͡ʒhzɒr v ʔrzʃ btrf mɣrb dh hzɒrv ʔrzʃ btrf mʃrɣ dh hzɒr v tvlʃ btrf d͡ʒnvb bjst v پnd͡ʒhzɒr nj mj‌bɒʃd v mɣds xdɒvnd dr mjɒnʃ xvɒhd bvd v ɒjn brɒj kɒhnɒn mɣds ɒz bnj sɒdvɣ kh vdjʔt mrɒ ŋɒh dɒʃth‌ɒnd xvɒhd bvd، zjrɒ ɒjʃɒn hŋɒmj kh bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl ɡmrɒh ʃdnd v lɒvjɒn njz zlɒlt vrzjdnd، ɡmrɒh ŋrdjdnd lhzɒ ɒjn brɒj ɒjʃɒn ɒz hdjh zmjn، hdjh ɣds ɒɣdɒs bh پhlvj srhd lɒvjɒn xvɒhd bvd v mɣɒbl hd kɒhnɒn hsh‌ɒj kh tvlʃ bjst v پnd͡ʒhzɒr v ʔrzʃ dh hzɒr nj bɒʃd brɒj lɒvjɒn xvɒhd bvd، پs tvl tmɒmʃ bjst v پnd͡ʒhzɒr v ʔrzʃ dh hzɒrnj xvɒhd bvd v ɒz آn t͡ʃjzj nxvɒhndfrvxt v mbɒdlh nxvɒhnd nmvd v nvbrhɒj zmjn srf djɡrɒn nxvɒhd ʃd zjrɒ kh brɒj xdɒvndmɣds mj‌bɒʃd v پnd͡ʒhzɒr nj kh ɒzʔrzʃ mɣɒbl آn bjst v پnd͡ʒhzɒr nj bɒɣj mj‌mɒnd ʔɒm xvɒhd bvd، bh d͡ʒht ʃhr v mskn hɒv nvɒhj ʃhr v ʃhr dr vstʃ xvɒhd bvd v پjmɒjʃhɒj آn ɒjn ɒst btrf ʃmɒl t͡ʃhɒrhzɒr v پɒnsd v btrf d͡ʒnvb t͡ʃhɒr hzɒr v پɒnsdv bh trf mʃrɣ t͡ʃhɒr hzɒr v پɒnsd v bh trf mɣrb t͡ʃhɒr hzɒr v پɒnsd zrɒʔ v nvɒhj ʃhr btrf ʃmɒl dvjst v پnd͡ʒɒh v btrf d͡ʒnvb dvjst v پnd͡ʒɒh v btrf mʃrɣ dvjst v پnd͡ʒɒh v btrf mɣrb dvjst v پnd͡ʒɒh xvɒhdbvd v آnt͡ʃh ɒz tvlʃ mɣɒbl hdjh mɣds bɒɣj mj‌mɒnd btrf mʃrɣ dh hzɒr v btrf mɣrb dh hzɒr nj xvɒhd bvd v ɒjn mɣɒbl hdjh mɣds bɒʃd v mhsvlʃ xvrɒk آnɒnj kh dr ʃhr kɒrmj knnd xvɒhd bvd v kɒrknɒn ʃhr ɒz hmh ɒsbɒt ɒsrɒئjl آn rɒ kʃt xvɒhnd krd پs tmɒmj hdjh bjst v پnd͡ʒhzɒr dr bjst v پnd͡ʒhzɒr nj bɒʃd ɒjn hdjh mɣds rɒ bɒ mlk ʃhr mrbʔ xvɒhjd ɡzrɒnjd v bɣjh آn bhr dvtrf hdjh mɣds v mlk ʃhr ɒz آn rئjs xvɒhd bvd؛ v ɒjn hsh rئjs nzd hd ʃrɣj drbrɒbr آn bjst v پnd͡ʒhzɒr nj hdjh v nzd hdɣrbj hm brɒbr bjst v پnd͡ʒhzɒr nj hdjh xvɒhd bvd؛ v hdjh mɣds v mɣds xɒnh drmjɒnʃ xvɒhd bvd v ɒz mlk lɒvjɒn v ɒz mlk ʃhr‌kh dr mjɒn mlk rئjs ɒst، hsh‌ɒj drmjɒn hd jhvdɒ v hd bnjɒmjn ɒz آn rئjs xvɒhdbvd v ɒmɒ brɒj bɣjh ɒsbɒt ɒz trf mʃrɣ tɒtrf mɣrb brɒj bnjɒmjn jk ɣsmt v nzdhd bnjɒmjn ɒz trf mʃrɣ tɒ trf mɣrb brɒj ʃmʔvn jk ɣsmt v nzd hd ʃmʔvn ɒztrf mʃrɣ tɒ trf mɣrb brɒj jsɒkɒr jk ɣsmt v nzd hd jsɒkɒr ɒz trf mʃrɣ tɒtrf mɣrb brɒj zbvlvn jk ɣsmt v nzdhd zbvlvn ɒz trf mʃrɣ tɒ trf mɣrb brɒj d͡ʒɒd jk ɣsmt v nzd hd d͡ʒɒd btrf d͡ʒnvb bh‌d͡ʒɒnb rɒst hd zmjn ɒz tɒmɒr tɒ آb mrjbh ɣɒdʃ v nhr msr v drjɒj bzrɡ xvɒhdbvd» xdɒvnd jhvh mj‌ɡvjd «ɒjn ɒst zmjnj kh brɒj ɒsbɒt ɒsrɒئjl bh mlkjt tɣsjm xvɒhjdkrd v ɣsmt hɒj ɒjʃɒn ɒjn mj‌bɒʃd v ɒjn ɒst mxrd͡ʒ hɒj ʃhr btrf ʃmɒl t͡ʃhɒr hzɒr vپɒnsd پjmɒjʃ v drvɒzh hɒj ʃhr mvɒfɣ nɒmhɒj ɒsbɒt ɒsrɒئjl bɒʃd jʔnj sh drvɒzh btrf ʃmɒl drvɒzh rئvbjn jk v drvɒzh jhvdɒjk v drvɒzh lɒvj jk v btrf mʃrɣ t͡ʃhɒrhzɒr v پɒnsd nj v sh drvɒzh jʔnj drvɒzh jvsf jk v drvɒzh bnjɒmjn jk v drvɒzh dɒn jk v btrf d͡ʒnvb t͡ʃhɒr hzɒr v پɒnsdپjmɒjʃ v sh drvɒzh jʔnj drvɒzh ʃmʔvn jk vdrvɒzh jsɒkɒr jk v drvɒzh zbvlvn jkvbtrf mɣrb t͡ʃhɒr hzɒr v پɒnsd nj v sh drvɒzh jʔnj drvɒzh d͡ʒɒd jk v drvɒzh ɒʃjr jk vdrvɒzh nftɒlj jk vbtrf mɣrb t͡ʃhɒr hzɒr v پɒnsd nj v sh drvɒzh jʔnj drvɒzh d͡ʒɒd jk v drvɒzh ɒʃjr jk vdrvɒzh nftɒlj jk dr sɒl svm sltnt jhvjɒɣjm پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ، nbvkdnsr پɒdʃɒh bɒbl bh ɒvrʃljm آmdh، آn rɒ mhɒsrh nmvd v xdɒvnd jhvjɒɣjm پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ rɒ bɒ bʔzj ɒz zrvf xɒnh xdɒ bh‌dst ɒv tsljm nmvd v ɒv آnhɒ rɒ bh zmjn ʃnʔɒr bh xɒnh xdɒj xvd آvrd v zrvf rɒ bh bjt‌ɒlmɒl xdɒj xvjʃ ɡzɒʃt v پɒdʃɒh ɒʃfnɒz rئjs xvɒd͡ʒh‌srɒjɒn xvjʃ rɒ ɒmr frmvd kh bʔzj ɒzbnj‌ɒsrɒئjl v ɒz ɒvlɒd پɒdʃɒhɒn v ɒz ʃrfɒ rɒbjɒvrd d͡ʒvɒnɒnj kh hjt͡ʃ ʔjbj ndɒʃth bɒʃnd vnjkvmnzr v dr hrɡvnh hkmt mɒhr v bh ʔlm dɒnɒv bh fnvn fhjm bɒʃnd kh ɣɒbljt brɒj ɒjstɒdn drɣsr پɒdʃɒh dɒʃth bɒʃnd v ʔlm v zbɒn kldɒnjɒn rɒbh ɒjʃɒn tʔljm dhnd v پɒdʃɒh vzjfh rvzjnh ɒztʔɒm پɒdʃɒh v ɒz ʃrɒbj kh ɒv mj‌nvʃjd tʔjjn nmvd v ɒmr frmvd kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ sh sɒl trbjt nmɒjnd v bʔd ɒz ɒnɣzɒj آn mdt dr hzvrپɒdʃɒh hɒzr ʃvnd v dr mjɒn ɒjʃɒn dɒnjɒl vhnnjɒ v mjʃɒئjl v ʔzrjɒ ɒz bnj jhvdɒ bvdnd vrئjs xvɒd͡ʒh‌srɒjɒn nɒmhɒ bh ɒjʃɒn nhɒd، ɒmɒdɒnjɒl rɒ bh bltʃsr v hnnjɒ rɒ bh ʃdrk vmjʃɒئjl rɒ bh mjʃk v ʔzrjɒ rɒ bh ʔbdnɣv msmj sɒxt ɒmɒ dɒnjɒl dr dl xvd ɣsd nmvd kh xvjʃtn rɒ ɒz tʔɒm پɒdʃɒh v ɒz ʃrɒbj kh ɒv mj‌nvʃjd nd͡ʒs nsɒzd پs ɒz rئjs xvɒd͡ʒh‌srɒjɒn drxvɒst nmvd kh xvjʃtn rɒ nd͡ʒs nsɒzd vxdɒ dɒnjɒl rɒ nzd rئjs xvɒd͡ʒh‌srɒjɒn mhtrm vmkrm sɒxt پs rئjs xvɒd͡ʒh‌srɒjɒn bh dɒnjɒl ɡft «mn ɒz آɣɒj xvd پɒdʃɒh kh xvrɒk v mʃrvbɒt ʃmɒ rɒ tʔjjn nmvdh ɒst mj‌trsm t͡ʃrɒ t͡ʃhrh hɒj ʃmɒ rɒ ɒz sɒjr d͡ʒvɒnɒnj kh ɒbnɒj d͡ʒns ʃmɒ mj‌bɒʃnd، zʃttr bjnd v hmt͡ʃnjn srmrɒ nzd پɒdʃɒh dr xtr xvɒhjd ɒndɒxt» پs dɒnjɒl bh rئjs sɒɣjɒn kh rئjs xvɒd͡ʒh‌srɒjɒn ɒvrɒ br dɒnjɒl v hnnjɒ v mjʃɒئjl v ʔzrjɒ ɡmɒʃth bvdɡft «mstdʔj آnkh bndɡɒn xvd rɒ dh rvztd͡ʒrbh nmɒjj v bh mɒ bɣvl brɒj xvrdn bdhnd vآb bh d͡ʒht nvʃjdn v t͡ʃhrh hɒj mɒ vt͡ʃhrh hɒj sɒjr d͡ʒvɒnɒnj rɒ kh tʔɒm پɒdʃɒh rɒmj xvrnd bh hzvr tv mlɒhzh nmɒjnd v bh nhd͡ʒj kh xvɒhj djd bɒ bndɡɒnt ʔml nmɒj» v ɒv ɒjʃɒn rɒ dr ɒjn ɒmr ɒd͡ʒɒbt nmvdh، dh rvzɒjʃɒn rɒ td͡ʒrbh krd v bʔd ɒz ɒnɣzɒj dh rvzmʔlvm ʃd kh t͡ʃhrh hɒj ɒjʃɒn ɒz sɒjr d͡ʒvɒnɒnj kh tʔɒm پɒdʃɒh rɒ mj‌xvrdnd njkvtr v frbh trbvd پs rئjs sɒɣjɒn tʔɒm ɒjʃɒn v ʃrɒb rɒkh bɒjd bnvʃnd brdɒʃt v bɣvl bh ɒjʃɒn dɒd ɒmɒ xdɒ bh ɒjn t͡ʃhɒr d͡ʒvɒn mʔrft v ɒdrɒk dr hr ɡvnh ʔlm v hkmt ʔtɒ frmvd v dɒnjɒl drhmh rvjɒhɒ v xvɒbhɒ fhjm ɡrdjd v bʔd ɒz ɒnɣzɒj rvzhɒjj kh پɒdʃɒh ɒmr frmvdh bvd kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ bjɒvrnd، rئjs xvɒd͡ʒh‌srɒjɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒbh hzvr nbvkdnsr آvrd v پɒdʃɒh bɒ ɒjʃɒn ɡftɡv krd v ɒz d͡ʒmjʔ ɒjʃɒn ksj msl dɒnjɒl vhnnjɒ v mjʃɒئjl v ʔzrjɒ jɒft nʃd پs drhzvr پɒdʃɒh ɒjstɒdnd v dr hr msئlh hkmt v ftɒnt kh پɒdʃɒh ɒz ɒjʃɒn ɒstfsɒrkrd، ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz d͡ʒmjʔ md͡ʒvsjɒn v d͡ʒɒdvɡrɒnj kh dr tmɒm mmlkt ɒv bvdnd dh mrtbh bhtr jɒftvdɒnjɒl bvd tɒ sɒl ɒvl kvrʃ پɒdʃɒh vdɒnjɒl bvd tɒ sɒl ɒvl kvrʃ پɒdʃɒh v dr sɒl dvm sltnt nbvkdnsr، nbvkdnsr xvɒbj djd v rvhʃ mztrb ʃdh، xvɒb ɒz vj dvr ʃd پs پɒdʃɒh ɒmrfrmvd kh md͡ʒvsjɒn v d͡ʒɒdvɡrɒn v fɒlɡjrɒn vkldɒnjɒn rɒ bxvɒnnd tɒ xvɒb پɒdʃɒh rɒ brɒj ɒvtʔbjr nmɒjnd v ɒjʃɒn آmdh، bh hzvr پɒdʃɒh ɒjstɒdnd v پɒdʃɒh bh ɒjʃɒn ɡft «xvɒbj djdh‌ɒm vrvhm brɒj fhmjdn xvɒb mztrb ɒst» kldɒnjɒn bh zbɒn ɒrɒmj bh پɒdʃɒh ʔrz krdnd kh «پɒdʃɒh tɒ bh ɒbd zndh bmɒnd xvɒb rɒ brɒj bndɡɒnt bjɒn kn v tʔbjr آn rɒ xvɒhjm ɡft» پɒdʃɒh dr d͡ʒvɒb kldɒnjɒn frmvd «frmɒn ɒzmn sɒdr ʃd kh ɒɡr xvɒb v tʔbjr آn rɒ brɒj mn bjɒn nknjd پɒrh پɒrh xvɒhjd ʃd v xɒnh hɒj ʃmɒrɒ mzblh xvɒhnd sɒxt v ɒɡr xvɒb vtʔbjrʃ rɒ bjɒn knjd، bxʃʃhɒ v ɒnʔɒmhɒ v ɒkrɒm ʔzjmj ɒz hzvr mn xvɒhjd jɒft پs xvɒb v tʔbjrʃ rɒ bh mn ɒʔlɒm nmɒjjd» ɒjʃɒn bɒrdjɡr d͡ʒvɒb dɒdh، ɡftnd kh «پɒdʃɒh bndɡɒn xvdrɒ ɒz xvɒb ɒtlɒʔ dhd v آn rɒ tʔbjr xvɒhjm krd» پɒdʃɒh dr d͡ʒvɒb ɡft «jɣjn mj‌dɒnm kh ʃmɒ frst mj‌d͡ʒvjjd، t͡ʃvn mj‌bjnjd kh frmɒn ɒzmn sɒdr ʃdh ɒst ljkn ɒɡr xvɒb rɒ bh mn ɒʔlɒm nnmɒjjd brɒj ʃmɒ fɣt jk hkm ɒst zjrɒkh sxnɒn drvɣ v bɒtl rɒ trtjb dɒdh‌ɒjd kh bh hzvr mn bɡvjjd tɒ vɣt tbdjl ʃvd پs xvɒb rɒ bh mn bɡvjjd v xvɒhm dɒnst kh آn rɒtʔbjr tvɒnjd nmvd» kldɒnjɒn bh hzvr پɒdʃɒh d͡ʒvɒb dɒdh، ɡftnd، kh «ksj br rvj zmjn njst kh mtlb پɒdʃɒh rɒ bjɒn tvɒnd nmvd، lhzɒ hjt͡ʃ پɒdʃɒh jɒhɒkm jɒ sltɒnj njst kh t͡ʃnjn ɒmrj rɒ ɒz hrmd͡ʒvsj jɒ d͡ʒɒdvɡr jɒ kldɒnj bپrsd v mtlbj kh پɒdʃɒh mj‌پrsd، t͡ʃnɒn bdjʔ ɒst kh ɒhdj ɣjrɒz xdɒjɒnj kh mskn ɒjʃɒn bɒ ɒnsɒn njst، nmj tvɒnd آn rɒ brɒj پɒdʃɒh bjɒn nmɒjd» ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht پɒdʃɒh xʃm nmvd v bh ʃdt ɣzbnɒk ɡrdjdh، ɒmr frmvd kh d͡ʒmjʔ hkjmɒn bɒbl rɒ hlɒk knnd پs frmɒn sɒdr ʃd v bh sdd kʃtn hkjmɒn brآmdnd v dɒnjɒl v rfjɣɒnʃ rɒ mj‌tlbjdnd tɒ ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh ɣtl rsɒnnd آŋɒh dɒnjɒl bɒ hkmt v ʔɣl bh ɒrjvk rئjs d͡ʒlɒdɒn پɒdʃɒh kh brɒj kʃtn hkjmɒn bɒbl bjrvn mj‌rft، sxn ɡft v ɒrjvk srdɒr پɒdʃɒh rɒxtɒb krdh، ɡft «t͡ʃrɒ frmɒn ɒz hzvr پɒdʃɒh t͡ʃnjn sxt ɒst؟» آŋɒh ɒrjvk dɒnjɒl rɒ ɒz kjfjt ɒmr mtlʔ sɒxt v dɒnjɒl dɒxl ʃdh، ɒz پɒdʃɒh drxvɒst nmvd kh mhlt bh vj dɒdh ʃvd tɒ tʔbjr rɒ brɒj پɒdʃɒh ɒʔlɒm nmɒjd پs dɒnjɒl bh xɒnh xvdrfth، rfɣɒj xvjʃ hnnjɒ v mjʃɒئjl v ʔzrjɒ rɒɒz ɒjn ɒmr ɒtlɒʔ dɒd، tɒ drbɒrh ɒjn rɒz ɒz xdɒj آsmɒnhɒ rhmt btlbnd mbɒdɒ kh dɒnjɒl v rfɣɒjʃ bɒ sɒjr hkjmɒn bɒbl hlɒk ʃvnd آŋɒh آn rɒzbh dɒnjɒl dr rvjɒj ʃb kʃf ʃd پs dɒnjɒl xdɒj آsmɒnhɒ rɒ mtbɒrk xvɒnd v dɒnjɒl mtklm ʃdh، ɡft «ɒsm xdɒ tɒ ɒbdlɒbɒd mtbɒrk bɒdzjrɒ kh hkmt v tvɒnɒjj ɒz آn vj ɒst v ɒvvɣthɒ v zmɒnhɒ rɒ tbdjl mj‌knd پɒdʃɒhɒn rɒmʔzvl mj‌nmɒjd v پɒdʃɒhɒn rɒ nsb mj‌knd hkmt rɒ bh hkjmɒn mj‌bxʃd vftɒnt پjʃh ɡɒn rɒ tʔljm mj‌dhd ɒvst kh t͡ʃjzhɒj ʔmjɣ v پnhɒn rɒ kʃf mj‌nmɒjd bh آnt͡ʃh dr zlmt ɒst ʔɒrf mj‌bɒʃd v nvr nzdvj sɒkn ɒst ‌ɒj xdɒj پdrɒn mn tv rɒʃkr mj‌ɡvjm v tsbjh mj‌xvɒnm zjrɒ kh hkmt v tvɒnɒjj rɒ bh mn ʔtɒ frmvdj v ɒlɒn آnt͡ʃh rɒ kh ɒz tv drxvɒst krdh‌ɒjm bh mn ɒʔlɒm nmvdj t͡ʃvnkh mɒ rɒ ɒz mɣsvd پɒdʃɒh ɒtlɒʔ dɒdj» v ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht dɒnjɒl nzd ɒrjvk kh پɒdʃɒh ɒv rɒ bh d͡ʒht hlɒk sɒxtn hkmɒj bɒbl mɒmvrkrdh bvd rft، v bh vj rsjdh، t͡ʃnjn ɡft kh «hkmɒj bɒbl rɒ hlɒk msɒz mrɒ bh hzvrپɒdʃɒh bbr v tʔbjr rɒ brɒj پɒdʃɒh bjɒn xvɒhm nmvd» آŋɒh ɒrjvk dɒnjɒl rɒ bzvdj bh hzvrپɒdʃɒh rsɒnjd v vj rɒ t͡ʃnjn ɡft kh «ʃxsj rɒ ɒz ɒsjrɒn jhvdɒ jɒfth‌ɒm kh tʔbjr rɒ brɒj پɒdʃɒh bjɒn tvɒnd nmvd» پɒdʃɒh dɒnjɒl rɒ kh bh bltʃsr msmj bvd xtɒb krdh، ɡft «آjɒ tvmj tvɒnj xvɒbj rɒ kh djdh‌ɒm v tʔbjrʃ rɒ brɒj mn bjɒn nmɒjj؟» dɒnjɒl bh hzvr پɒdʃɒh d͡ʒvɒb dɒd v ɡft «rɒzj rɒ kh پɒdʃɒh mj‌tlbd، nh hkjmɒn v nh d͡ʒɒdvɡrɒn v nh md͡ʒvsjɒn v nh mnd͡ʒmɒn mj‌tvɒnndآn rɒ brɒj پɒdʃɒh hl knnd ljkn xdɒjj dr آsmɒn hst kh kɒʃf ɒsrɒrmj bɒʃd v ɒv nbvkdnsr پɒdʃɒh rɒ ɒz آnt͡ʃh dr ɒjɒm آxr vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd ɒʔlɒm nmvdh ɒst xvɒb tv v rvjɒj srt kh dr bstrt djdh‌ɒj ɒjn ɒst ‌ɒj پɒdʃɒh fkrhɒj tv br bstrt drbɒrh آnt͡ʃh bʔd ɒz ɒjn vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd bh‌xɒtrt آmd vkɒʃf ɒlɒsrɒr، tv rɒ ɒz آnt͡ʃh vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃdmxbr sɒxth ɒst v ɒmɒ ɒjn rɒz br mn ɒzhkmtj kh mn bjʃtr ɒz sɒjr zndɡɒn dɒrm mkʃvf nʃdh ɒst، blkh tɒ tʔbjr br پɒdʃɒh mʔlvm ʃvd v fkrhɒj xɒtr xvd rɒ bdɒnj tvɒj پɒdʃɒh mj‌djdj v ɒjnk tmsɒl ʔzjmj bvd vɒjn tmsɒl bzrɡ kh drxʃndɡj آn bj‌nhɒjt vmnzr آn hvlnɒk bvd پjʃ rvj tv brپɒ ʃd srɒjn tmsɒl ɒz tlɒj xɒls v sjnh v bɒzvhɒjʃ ɒznɣrh v ʃkm v rɒnhɒjʃ ɒz brnd͡ʒ bvd vsɒɣhɒjʃ ɒz آhn v پɒjhɒjʃ ɣdrj ɒz آhn vɣdrj ɒz ɡl bvd v mʃɒhdh mj‌nmvdj tɒsŋj bdvn dsthɒ d͡ʒdɒ ʃdh، پɒjhɒj آhnjn vɡljn آn tmsɒl rɒ zd v آnhɒ rɒ xrd sɒxt آŋɒh آhn v ɡl v brnd͡ʒ v nɣrh v tlɒ bɒ hm xrdʃd v msl kɒh xrmn tɒbstɒnj ɡrdjdh، bɒd آnhɒ rɒt͡ʃnɒn brd kh d͡ʒɒjj bh d͡ʒht آnhɒ jɒft nʃd v آn sŋ kh tmsɒl rɒ zdh bvd kvh ʔzjmj ɡrdjd vtmɒmj d͡ʒhɒn rɒ پr sɒxt xvɒb hmjn ɒst v tʔbjrʃ rɒ brɒj پɒdʃɒh bjɒn xvɒhjm nmvd ‌ɒj پɒdʃɒh، tv پɒdʃɒh پɒdʃɒhɒn hstj zjrɒxdɒj آsmɒnhɒ sltnt v ɒɣtdɒr v ɣvt vhʃmt bh tv dɒdh ɒst v dr hr d͡ʒɒjj kh bnj آdm skvnt dɒrnd hjvɒnɒt shrɒ v mrɣɒn hvɒ rɒ bh‌dst tv tsljm nmvdh v tv rɒ br d͡ʒmjʔ آnhɒ mslt ɡrdɒnjdh ɒst آn sr tlɒ tv hstj v bʔd ɒz tv sltntj djɡr پst‌tr ɒz tv xvɒhdbrxɒst v sltnt svmj djɡr ɒz brnd͡ʒ kh brtmɒmj d͡ʒhɒn sltnt xvɒhd nmvd v sltnt t͡ʃhɒrm msl آhn ɣvj xvɒhd bvd zjrɒ آhn hmh‌t͡ʃjz rɒ xrd v nrm mj‌sɒzd پs t͡ʃnɒnkh آhn hmh‌t͡ʃjz rɒ nrm mj‌knd، hmt͡ʃnɒn آn njz xrd v nrm xvɒhd sɒxt v t͡ʃnɒnkh پɒjhɒ v ɒŋʃthɒ rɒdjdj kh ɣdrj ɒz ɡl kvzh‌ɡr v ɣdrj ɒz آhn bvd، hmt͡ʃnɒn ɒjn sltnt mnɣsm xvɒhd ʃd vɣdrj ɒz ɣvt آhn dr آn xvɒhd mɒnd mvɒfɣ آnt͡ʃh djdj kh آhn bɒ ɡl sfɒljn آmjxth ʃdh bvd v ɒmɒ ɒŋʃthɒj پɒjhɒjʃ ɣdrj ɒz آhn vɣdrj ɒz ɡl bvd، hmt͡ʃnɒn ɒjn sltnt ɣdrj ɣvj v ɣdrj zvdʃkn xvɒhd bvd v t͡ʃnɒnkh djdj kh آhn bɒ ɡl sfɒljn آmjxth ʃdh bvd، hmt͡ʃnjn ɒjnhɒ xvjʃtn rɒ bɒ zrjt ɒnsɒn آmjxth xvɒhnd krd ɒmɒ bh nhvj kh آhn bɒ ɡl mmzvd͡ʒ nmj ʃvd، hmt͡ʃnjn ɒjnhɒ bɒ jkdjɡr mlsɣ nxvɒhnd ʃd v dr ɒjɒm ɒjn پɒdʃɒhɒn xdɒj آsmɒnhɒ sltntj rɒ kh tɒ ɒbdɒlɒbɒd zɒjl nʃvd، brپɒxvɒhd nmvd v ɒjn sltnt bh ɣvmj djɡr mntɣl nxvɒhd ʃd، blkh tmɒmj آn sltnthɒ rɒ xrdkrdh، mɣlvb xvɒhd sɒxt v xvdʃ tɒ ɒbdɒlɒbɒd ɒstvɒr xvɒhd mɒnd v t͡ʃnɒnkh sŋ rɒ djdj kh bdvn dsthɒ ɒz kvh d͡ʒdɒ ʃdh، آhn vbrnd͡ʒ v ɡl v nɣrh v tlɒ rɒ xrd krd، hmt͡ʃnjn xdɒj ʔzjm پɒdʃɒh rɒ ɒz آnt͡ʃh bʔd ɒz ɒjn vɒɣʔ mj‌ʃvd mxbr sɒxth ɒst پs xvɒb shjh vtʔbjrʃ jɣjn ɒst» آŋɒh nbvkdnsr پɒdʃɒh bh rvj xvddrɒftɒdh، dɒnjɒl rɒ sd͡ʒdh nmvd v ɒmr frmvd kh hdɒjɒ v ʔtrjɒt brɒj ɒv bɡzrɒnnd v پɒdʃɒh dɒnjɒl rɒ xtɒb krdh، ɡft «bh drstj kh xdɒj ʃmɒ xdɒj xdɒjɒn v xdɒvnd پɒdʃɒhɒn v kɒʃf ɒsrɒr ɒst، t͡ʃvnkh tv ɣɒdr br kʃf ɒjn rɒzʃdh‌ɒj» پs پɒdʃɒh dɒnjɒl rɒ mʔzm sɒxt vhdɒjɒj bsjɒr v ʔzjm bh ɒv dɒd v ɒv rɒ br tmɒmj vlɒjt bɒbl hkvmt dɒd v rئjs rvsɒ br d͡ʒmjʔ hkmɒj bɒbl sɒxtv dɒnjɒl ɒz پɒdʃɒh drxvɒst nmvd tɒ ʃdrk v mjʃk v ʔbdnɣv rɒbr kɒrhɒj vlɒjt bɒbl nsb krd v ɒmɒ dɒnjɒl drdrvɒzh پɒdʃɒh mj‌bvd v dɒnjɒl ɒz پɒdʃɒh drxvɒst nmvd tɒ ʃdrk v mjʃk v ʔbdnɣv rɒbr kɒrhɒj vlɒjt bɒbl nsb krd v ɒmɒ dɒnjɒl drdrvɒzh پɒdʃɒh mj‌bvd nbvkdnsr پɒdʃɒh tmsɒlj ɒz tlɒ kh ɒrtfɒʔʃ ʃst zrɒʔ v ʔrzʃ ʃʃ zrɒʔ bvd sɒxt v آn rɒ dr hmvɒrj dvrɒ drvlɒjt bɒbl nsb krd v nbvkdnsr پɒdʃɒh frstɒd kh ɒmrɒ v rvsɒ v vɒljɒn v dɒvrɒn vxzɒnh‌dɒrɒn v mʃjrɒn v vkjlɒn v d͡ʒmjʔ srvrɒn vlɒjthɒ rɒ d͡ʒmʔ knnd tɒ bh d͡ʒht tbrk tmsɒlj kh nbvkdnsr پɒdʃɒh nsb nmvdh bvd bjɒjnd پs ɒmrɒ v rvsɒ v vɒljɒn v dɒvrɒn v xzɒnh‌dɒrɒn vmʃjrɒn v vkjlɒn v d͡ʒmjʔ srvrɒn vlɒjthɒ bh d͡ʒht tbrk tmsɒlj kh nbvkdnsr پɒdʃɒh nsb nmvdh bvd d͡ʒmʔ ʃdh، پjʃ tmsɒlj kh nbvkdnsrnsb krdh bvd ɒjstɒdnd v mnɒdj bh آvɒz blndndɒ krdh، mj‌ɡft «ɒj ɣvmhɒ v ɒmt‌hɒ v zbɒnhɒbrɒj ʃmɒ hkm ɒst؛ kh t͡ʃvn آvɒz krnɒ v srnɒv ʔvd v brbt v sntvr v kmɒnt͡ʃh v hr ɣsm آlɒt mvsjɣj rɒ bʃnvjd، آŋɒh bh rv ɒftɒdh، tmsɒl tlɒrɒ kh nbvkdnsr پɒdʃɒh nsb krdh ɒst sd͡ʒdh nmɒjjd v hr‌kh bh rv njftd v sd͡ʒdh nnmɒjd drhmɒn sɒʔt dr mjɒn tvn آtʃ mlthb ɒfkndh xvɒhd ʃd» lhzɒ t͡ʃvn hmh ɣvmhɒ آvɒz krnɒ v srnɒ v ʔvdv brbt v sntvr v hr ɣsm آlɒt mvsjɣj rɒʃnjdnd، hmh ɣvmhɒ v ɒmt‌hɒ v zbɒnhɒ bh rv ɒftɒdh، tmsɒl tlɒ rɒ kh nbvkdnsr پɒdʃɒh nsb krdh bvdsd͡ʒdh nmvdnd ɒmɒ dr آnvɣt bʔzj kldɒnjɒn nzdjk آmdh، br jhvdjɒn ʃkɒjt آvrdnd، v bh nbvkdnsr پɒdʃɒh ʔrz krdh، ɡftnd «ɒj پɒdʃɒh tɒ bh ɒbd zndh bɒʃ tv‌ɒj پɒdʃɒh frmɒnj sɒdrnmvdj kh hr‌kh آvɒz krnɒ v srnɒ v ʔvd v brbt vsntvr v kmɒnt͡ʃh v hr ɣsm آlɒt mvsjɣj rɒbʃnvd bh rv ɒftɒdh، tmsɒl tlɒ rɒ sd͡ʒdh nmɒjd v hr‌kh bh rv njftd v sd͡ʒdh nnmɒjd dr mjɒn tvn آtʃ mlthb ɒfkndh ʃvd پs t͡ʃnd nfr jhvdkh ɒjʃɒn rɒ br kɒrhɒj vlɒjt bɒbl ɡmɒʃth‌ɒj hstnd، jʔnj ʃdrk v mjʃk v ʔbdnɣv ɒjn ɒʃxɒs‌ɒj پɒdʃɒh، tv rɒ ɒhtrɒm nmj nmɒjnd vxdɒjɒn tv rɒ ʔbɒdt nmj knnd v tmsɒl tlɒ rɒ kh nsb nmvdh‌ɒj sd͡ʒdh nmj nmɒjnd» آŋɒh nbvkdnsr bɒ xʃm v ɣzb frmvd tɒʃdrk v mjʃk v ʔbdnɣv rɒ hɒzr knnd پs ɒjn ɒʃxɒs rɒ dr hzvr پɒdʃɒh آvrdnd پs nbvkdnsr ɒjʃɒn rɒ xtɒb krdh، ɡft «ɒj ʃdrk v mjʃk v ʔbdnɣv آjɒ ʃmɒ ʔmd xdɒjɒn mrɒ nmj پrstjd vtmsɒl tlɒ rɒ kh nsb nmvdh‌ɒm sd͡ʒdh nmj knjd؟ ɒlɒn ɒɡr mstʔd bʃvjd kh t͡ʃvn آvɒz krnɒ v srnɒ v ʔvd v brbt v sntvr vkmɒnt͡ʃh v hr ɣsm آlɒt mvsjɣj rɒ bʃnvjd bh rvɒftɒdh، tmsɒlj rɒ kh sɒxth‌ɒm sd͡ʒdh nmɒjjd، fbhɒ v ɒmɒ ɒɡr sd͡ʒdh nnmɒjjd، dr hmɒn sɒʔt dr mjɒn tvn آtʃ mlthb ɒndɒxth xvɒhjd ʃd vkdɒm xdɒjj ɒst kh ʃmɒ rɒ ɒz dst mn rhɒjj dhd» ʃdrk v mjʃk v ʔbdnɣv dr d͡ʒvɒb پɒdʃɒh ɡftnd «ɒj nbvkdnsr drbɒrh ɒjn ɒmr mɒ rɒbɒkj njst kh tv rɒ d͡ʒvɒb dhjm ɒɡr t͡ʃnjn ɒst، xdɒj mɒ kh ɒv rɒ mj‌پrstjm ɣɒdr ɒst kh mɒ rɒ ɒz tvn آtʃ mlthb brhɒnd v ɒv mɒ rɒ ɒz dst tv‌ɒj پɒdʃɒh xvɒhd rhɒnjd v ɒɡr nh، ɒj پɒdʃɒh tv rɒ mʔlvm bɒd kh xdɒjɒn tv rɒ ʔbɒdt nxvɒhjm krd v tmsɒl tlɒ rɒ kh nsb nmvdh‌ɒj sd͡ʒdh nxvɒhjm nmvd» آŋɒh nbvkdnsr ɒz xʃm mmlv ɡrdjd vhjئt t͡ʃhrh‌ɒʃ br ʃdrk v mjʃk v ʔbdnɣvmtɣjr ɡʃt v mtklm ʃdh، frmvd tɒ tvn rɒ hft t͡ʃndɒn zjɒdh tr ɒz ʔɒdtʃ btɒbnd v bh ɣvjtrjn ʃd͡ʒɒʔɒn lʃkr xvd frmvd kh ʃdrk v mjʃk vʔbdnɣv rɒ bbndnd v dr tvn آtʃ mlthb bjndɒznd پs ɒjn ɒʃxɒs rɒ dr rdɒhɒ v d͡ʒbh‌hɒ vʔmɒmh‌hɒ v sɒjr lbɒshɒj ɒjʃɒn bstnd v dr mjɒn tvn آtʃ mlthb ɒfkndnd v t͡ʃvnkh frmɒn پɒdʃɒh sxt bvd v tvn bj‌nhɒjt tɒbjdh ʃdh، ʃʔlh آtʃ آn ksɒn rɒ kh ʃdrk v mjʃk vʔbdnɣv rɒ brdɒʃth bvdnd kʃt v ɒjn sh mrdjʔnj ʃdrk v mjʃk v ʔbdnɣv dr mjɒn tvn آtʃ mlthb bsth ɒftɒdnd آŋɒh nbvkdnsr پɒdʃɒh dr hjrt ɒftɒd vbzvdj hr‌t͡ʃh tmɒmtr brxɒst v mʃjrɒn xvd rɒxtɒb krdh، ɡft «آjɒ sh ʃxs nbstjm v drmjɒn آtʃ njndɒxtjm؟» ɒjʃɒn dr d͡ʒvɒb پɒdʃɒh ʔrz krdnd kh «shjh ɒst‌ɒj پɒdʃɒh» ɒvdr d͡ʒvɒb ɡft «ɒjnk mn t͡ʃhɒr mrd mj‌bjnm kh ɡʃɒdh dr mjɒn آtʃ mj‌xrɒmnd v zrrj bh ɒjʃɒn nrsjdh ɒst v mnzr t͡ʃhɒrmjn ʃbjh پsrxdɒ ɒst» پs nbvkdnsr bh dhnh tvn آtʃ mlthb nzdjk آmd v xtɒb krdh، ɡft «ɒj ʃdrk v mjʃk v ʔbdnɣv ɒj bndɡɒn xdɒj tʔɒlj bjrvn ʃvjd v bjɒjjd» پs ʃdrk v mjʃk v ʔbdnɣv ɒz mjɒn آtʃ bjrvn آmdnd v ɒmrɒ vrvsɒ v vɒljɒn v mʃjrɒn پɒdʃɒh d͡ʒmʔ ʃdh، آn mrdɒn rɒ djdnd kh آtʃ bh bdnhɒj ɒjʃɒn ɒsrj nkrdh v mvjj ɒz sr ɒjʃɒn nsvxth v rŋ rdɒj ɒjʃɒn tbdjl nʃdh، blkh bvj آtʃ bh ɒjʃɒn nrsjdh ɒst آŋɒh nbvkdnsr mtklm ʃdh، ɡft «mtbɒrk bɒd xdɒj ʃdrk v mjʃk v ʔbdnɣv kh frʃth xvd rɒ frstɒd v bndɡɒn xvjʃ rɒ kh br ɒvtvkl dɒʃtnd v bh frmɒn پɒdʃɒh mxɒlft vrzjdndv bdnhɒj xvd rɒ tsljm nmvdnd tɒ xdɒj djɡrj svɒj xdɒj xvjʃ rɒ ʔbɒdt v sd͡ʒdh nnmɒjnd، rhɒjj dɒdh ɒst bnɒbrɒjn frmɒnj ɒz mn sɒdrʃd kh hr ɣvm v ɒmt v zbɒn kh hrf nɒʃɒjsth‌ɒj bh zd xdɒj ʃdrk v mjʃk v ʔbdnɣv bɡvjnd، پɒrh پɒrh ʃvnd v xɒnh hɒj ɒjʃɒn bh mzblh mbdl ɡrdd، zjrɒ xdɒjj djɡr njst kh bdjn mnvɒl rhɒjj tvɒnd dɒd»آŋɒh پɒdʃɒh mnsb ʃdrk v mjʃk v ʔbdnɣv rɒ dr vlɒjt bɒbl brtrj dɒd آŋɒh پɒdʃɒh mnsb ʃdrk v mjʃk v ʔbdnɣv rɒ dr vlɒjt bɒbl brtrj dɒd ɒz nbvkdnsr پɒdʃɒh، bh tmɒmj ɣvmhɒ v ɒmt‌hɒ v zbɒnhɒ kh br tmɒmj zmjn sɒknndslɒmtj ʃmɒ ɒfzvn bɒd mn mslht dɒnstm kh آjɒt v ʔd͡ʒɒjbj rɒ kh xdɒj tʔɒlj bh mn nmvdh ɒst bjɒn nmɒjm آjɒt ɒv t͡ʃh ɣdr bzrɡ vʔd͡ʒɒjb ɒv t͡ʃh ɣdr ʔzjm ɒst mlkvt ɒvmlkvt d͡ʒɒvdɒnj ɒst v sltnt ɒv tɒ ɒbdɒlɒbɒd mn kh nbvkdnsr hstm dr xɒnh xvd mtmئn vdr ɣsr xvjʃ xrm mj‌bvdm xvɒbj djdm kh mrɒ trsɒnjd v fkrhɒjm dr bstrm v rvjɒhɒj srm mrɒ mztrb sɒxt پs frmɒnj ɒz mn sɒdrɡrdjd kh d͡ʒmjʔ hkjmɒn bɒbl rɒ bh hzvrm bjɒvrnd tɒ tʔbjr xvɒb rɒ brɒj mn bjɒn nmɒjnd آŋɒh md͡ʒvsjɒn v d͡ʒɒdvɡrɒn v kldɒnjɒn vmnd͡ʒmɒn hɒzr ʃdnd v mn xvɒb rɒ brɒj ɒjʃɒn bɒzɡftm ljkn tʔbjrʃ rɒ brɒj mn bjɒn ntvɒnstndnmvd bɒlɒxrh dɒnjɒl kh mvɒfɣ ɒsm xdɒj mn bh bltʃsr msmj ɒst v rvh xdɒjɒn ɣdvs drɒv mj‌bɒʃd، drآmd v xvɒb rɒ bh ɒv bɒz‌ɡftm kh «ɒj bltʃsr، rئjs md͡ʒvsjɒn، t͡ʃvn mj‌dɒnm kh rvh xdɒjɒn ɣdvs dr tv mj‌bɒʃd v hjt͡ʃ srj brɒj tv mʃkl njst، پs xvɒbj kh djdh‌ɒm vtʔbjrʃ rɒ bh mn bɡv rvjɒhɒj srm dr bstrm ɒjn bvd kh nzrkrdm v ɒjnk drxtj dr vst zmjn kh ɒrtfɒʔʃ ʔzjm bvd ɒjn drxt bzrɡ v ɣvj ɡrdjd vblndjʃ tɒ bh آsmɒn rsjd v mnzrʃ tɒ ɒɣsɒj tmɒmj zmjn bvd brɡhɒjʃ d͡ʒmjl v mjvh‌ɒʃ bsjɒr v آzvɣh brɒj hmh dr آn bvd hjvɒnɒt shrɒ dr zjr آn sɒjh ɡrftnd v mrɣɒn hvɒ brʃɒxh hɒjʃ mɒvɒ ɡzjdnd v tmɒmj bʃr ɒz آn پrvrʃ jɒftnd dr rvjɒhɒj srm dr bstrm nzr krdm v ɒjnk پɒsbɒnj v mɣdsj ɒz آsmɒn nɒzl ʃd، kh bh آvɒz blnd ndɒ drdɒd v t͡ʃnjn ɡft drxt rɒ bbrjd v ʃɒxh hɒjʃ rɒ ɣtʔ nmɒjjd v brɡhɒjʃ rɒ bjfʃɒnjd v mjvh hɒjʃ rɒپrɒkndh sɒzjd tɒ hjvɒnɒt ɒz zjrʃ v mrɣɒn ɒzʃɒxh hɒjʃ آvɒrh ɡrdnd ljkn kndh rjʃh hɒjʃ rɒ bɒ bnd آhn v brnd͡ʒ dr zmjn dr mjɒn sbzh hɒj shrɒ vɒɡzɒrjd v ɒz ʃbnm آsmɒn trʃvd v nsjb ɒv ɒz ʔlf zmjn bɒ hjvɒnɒt bɒʃd dl ɒv ɒz ɒnsɒnjt tbdjl ʃvd v dl hjvɒn rɒ bh ɒv bdhnd v hft zmɒn brɒv bɡzrd ɒjn ɒmr ɒzfrmɒn پɒsbɒnɒn ʃdh v ɒjn hkm ɒz klɒm mɣdsjn ɡrdjdh ɒst tɒ zndɡɒn bdɒnnd kh hzrt mtʔɒl br mmɒlk آdmjɒn hkmrɒnj mj‌knd v آn rɒ bhrkh mj‌xvɒhd mj‌dhd v پst‌trjn mrdmɒn rɒ br آn nsb mj‌nmɒjd ɒjn xvɒb rɒ mn kh nbvkdnsrپɒdʃɒh hstm djdm v tv‌ɒj bltʃsr tʔbjrʃ rɒbjɒn kn zjrɒ kh tmɒmj hkjmɒn mmlktm ntvɒnstndmrɒ ɒz tʔbjrʃ ɒtlɒʔ dhnd، ɒmɒ tv mj‌tvɒnj t͡ʃvnkh rvh xdɒjɒn ɣdvs dr tv mj‌bɒʃd» آŋɒh dɒnjɒl kh bh bltʃsr msmj mj‌bɒʃd، sɒʔtj mthjr mɒnd v fkrhɒjʃ ɒv rɒmztrb sɒxt پs پɒdʃɒh mtklm ʃdh، ɡft «ɒj bltʃsr xvɒb v tʔbjrʃ tv rɒ mztrb nsɒzd» bltʃsr dr d͡ʒvɒb ɡft «ɒj آɣɒj mn xvɒb ɒz brɒj dʃmnɒnt v tʔbjrʃ ɒz brɒj xsmɒnt bɒʃd drxtj kh djdj kh bzrɡ vɣvj ɡrdjd v ɒrtfɒʔʃ tɒ bh آsmɒn rsjd vmnzrʃ bh tmɒmj zmjn v brɡhɒjʃ d͡ʒmjl v mjvh‌ɒʃ bsjɒr v آzvɣh brɒj hmh dr آn bvd vhjvɒnɒt shrɒ zjrʃ sɒkn bvdnd v mrɣɒn hvɒdr ʃɒxh hɒjʃ mɒvɒ ɡzjdnd، ‌ɒj پɒdʃɒh آn drxt tv hstj zjrɒ kh tv bzrɡ v ɣvj ɡrdjdh‌ɒj v ʔzmt tv t͡ʃnɒn ɒfzvdh ʃdh ɒst kh bh آsmɒn rsjdh v sltnt tv tɒ bh ɒɣsɒj zmjn v t͡ʃvnkh پɒdʃɒh پɒsbɒnj v mɣdsj rɒ djd kh ɒzآsmɒn nzvl nmvdh، ɡft drxt rɒ bbrjd v آn rɒtlf sɒzjd، ljkn kndh rjʃh hɒjʃ rɒ bɒ bnd آhn v brnd͡ʒ dr zmjn dr mjɒn sbzh hɒj shrɒvɒɡzɒrjd v ɒz ʃbnm آsmɒn tr ʃvd v nsjbʃ bɒhjvɒnɒt shrɒ bɒʃd tɒ hft zmɒn br آn bɡzrd، ‌ɒj پɒdʃɒh tʔbjr ɒjn ɒst v frmɒn hzrt mtʔɒl kh br آɣɒjm پɒdʃɒh vɒrd ʃdh ɒst hmjn ɒst، kh tv rɒ ɒz mjɒn mrdmɒn xvɒhnd rɒnd vmskn tv bɒ hjvɒnɒt shrɒ xvɒhd bvd v tv rɒmsl ɡɒvɒn ʔlf xvɒhnd xvrɒnjd v tv rɒ ɒz ʃbnm آsmɒn tr xvɒhnd sɒxt v hft zmɒn br tvxvɒhd ɡzʃt tɒ bdɒnj kh hzrt mtʔɒl brmmɒlk آdmjɒn hkmrɒnj mj‌knd v آn rɒ bhr‌kh mj‌xvɒhd ʔtɒ mj‌frmɒjd v t͡ʃvn ɡftnd kh kndh rjʃh hɒj drxt rɒ vɒɡzɒrjd، پs sltnt tv brɒjt brɣrɒr xvɒhd mɒnd bʔd ɒz آnkh dɒnsth bɒʃj kh آsmɒnhɒ hkmrɒnj mj‌knnd lhzɒ‌ɒj پɒdʃɒh nsjht mn tv rɒ پsnd آjd v ɡnɒhɒn xvdrɒ bh ʔdɒlt v xtɒjɒj xvjʃ rɒ bh ɒhsɒn nmvdn br fɣjrɒn fdjh bdh kh ʃɒjd bɒʔs tvl ɒtmjnɒn tv bɒʃd» ɒjn hmh br nbvkdnsrپɒdʃɒh vɒɣʔ ʃd bʔd ɒz ɒnɣzɒj dvɒzdh mɒh ɒv bɒlɒj ɣsrxsrvj dr bɒbl mj‌xrɒmjd v پɒdʃɒh mtklm ʃdh، ɡft «آjɒ ɒjn bɒbl ʔzjm njst kh mn آn rɒ brɒj xɒnh sltnt bh tvɒnɒjj ɣvt v hʃmt d͡ʒlɒl xvd bnɒ nmvdh‌ɒm؟» ɒjn sxn hnvz brzbɒn پɒdʃɒh bvd kh آvɒzj ɒz آsmɒn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «ɒj پɒdʃɒh nbvkdnsr bh tv ɡfth mj‌ʃvd kh sltnt ɒz tv ɡzʃth ɒst v tv rɒ ɒz mjɒn mrdm xvɒhnd rɒnd v mskn tv bɒ hjvɒnɒt shrɒxvɒhd bvd v tv rɒ msl ɡɒvɒn ʔlf xvɒhndxvrɒnjd v hft zmɒn br tv xvɒhd ɡzʃt tɒbdɒnj kh hzrt mtʔɒl br mmɒlk آdmjɒn hkmrɒnj mj‌knd v آn rɒ bhr‌kh mj‌xvɒhdmj dhd» dr hmɒn sɒʔt ɒjn ɒmr br nbvkdnsr vɒɣʔ ʃd v ɒz mjɒn mrdmɒn rɒndh ʃdh، msl ɡɒvɒn ʔlf mj‌xvrd v bdnʃ ɒz ʃbnm آsmɒn tr mj‌ʃd tɒmvjhɒjʃ msl پrhɒj ʔɣɒb blnd ʃd vnɒxnhɒjʃ msl t͡ʃŋɒlhɒj mrɣɒn ɡrdjd v bʔd ɒz ɒnɣzɒj آn ɒjɒm mn kh nbvkdnsrhstm، t͡ʃʃmɒn xvd rɒ bsvj آsmɒn brɒfrɒʃtm v ʔɣl mn bh mn brɡʃt v hzrt mtʔɒl rɒmtbɒrk xvɒndm v hj srmdj rɒ tsbjh v hmdɡftm zjrɒ kh sltnt ɒv sltnt d͡ʒɒvdɒnj vmlkvt ɒv tɒ ɒbdɒlɒbɒd ɒst v d͡ʒmjʔ sɒknɒn d͡ʒhɒn hjt͡ʃ ʃmrdh mj‌ʃvnd v bɒ d͡ʒnvd آsmɒn vsknh d͡ʒhɒn br vfɣ ɒrɒdh xvd ʔml mj‌nmɒjd vksj njst kh dst ɒv rɒ bɒz‌dɒrd jɒ ɒv rɒ bɡvjdkh t͡ʃh mj‌knj dr hmɒn zmɒn ʔɣl mn bh mn brɡʃt v bh d͡ʒht d͡ʒlɒl sltnt mn hʃmt vzjntm bh mn bɒz dɒdh ʃd v mʃjrɒnm v ɒmrɒjm mrɒtlbjdnd v br sltnt xvd ɒstvɒr ɡrdjdm vʔzmt ʔzjmj br mn ɒfzvdh ʃdɒlɒn mn kh nbvkdnsr hstm پɒdʃɒh آsmɒnhɒ rɒ tsbjh vtkbjr v hmd mj‌ɡvjm kh tmɒm kɒrhɒj ɒv hɣ v trjɣ hɒj vj ʔdl ɒst v ksɒnj kh bɒ tkbr rɒh mj‌rvnd، ɒv ɣɒdr ɒst kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ پst nmɒjd ɒlɒn mn kh nbvkdnsr hstm پɒdʃɒh آsmɒnhɒ rɒ tsbjh vtkbjr v hmd mj‌ɡvjm kh tmɒm kɒrhɒj ɒv hɣ v trjɣ hɒj vj ʔdl ɒst v ksɒnj kh bɒ tkbr rɒh mj‌rvnd، ɒv ɣɒdr ɒst kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ پst nmɒjd blʃsr پɒdʃɒh zjɒft ʔzjmj brɒj hzɒrnfr ɒz ɒmrɒj xvd brپɒ dɒʃt v dr hzvrآn hzɒr nfr ʃrɒb nvʃjd blʃsr dr kjf ʃrɒb ɒmr frmvd kh zrvf tlɒ v nɣrh rɒ kh d͡ʒdʃ nbvkdnsr ɒz hjkl ɒvrʃljm brdh bvdbjɒvrnd tɒ پɒdʃɒh v ɒmrɒjʃ v zvd͡ʒh‌hɒ vmtʔh hɒjʃ ɒz آnhɒ bnvʃnd آŋɒh zrvf tlɒ rɒkh ɒz hjkl xɒnh xdɒ kh dr ɒvrʃljm ɒst ɡrfth ʃdh bvd آvrdnd v پɒdʃɒh v ɒmrɒjʃ v zvd͡ʒh‌hɒ vmtʔh hɒjʃ ɒz آnhɒ nvʃjdnd ʃrɒb mj‌nvʃjdndv xdɒjɒn tlɒ v nɣrh v brnd͡ʒ v آhn v t͡ʃvb vsŋ rɒ tsbjh mj‌xvɒndnd dr hmɒn sɒʔt ɒŋʃthɒj dst ɒnsɒnj bjrvn آmd v dr brɒbr ʃmʔdɒn br ɡt͡ʃ djvɒr ɣsrپɒdʃɒh nvʃt v پɒdʃɒh kf dst rɒ kh mj‌nvʃt djd آŋɒh hjئt پɒdʃɒh mtɣjr ʃd v fkrhɒjʃ ɒv rɒ mztrb sɒxt v bndhɒj kmrʃ sst ʃdh، zɒnvhɒjʃ bhm mj‌xvrd پɒdʃɒh bh آvɒzblnd sdɒ zd kh d͡ʒɒdvɡrɒn v kldɒnjɒn v mnd͡ʒmɒn rɒɒhzɒr nmɒjnd پs پɒdʃɒh hkjmɒn bɒbl rɒxtɒb krdh، ɡft «hr‌kh ɒjn nvʃth rɒ bxvɒnd vtfsjrʃ rɒ brɒj mn bjɒn nmɒjd bh ɒrɣvɒn mlbs xvɒhd ʃd v tvɣ zrjn br ɡrdnʃ nhɒdh xvɒhdʃd v hɒkm svm dr mmlkt xvɒhd bvd» آŋɒh d͡ʒmjʔ hkmɒj پɒdʃɒh dɒxl ʃdnd ɒmɒntvɒnstnd nvʃth rɒ bxvɒnnd jɒ tfsjrʃ rɒ brɒj پɒdʃɒh bjɒn nmɒjnd پs blʃsr پɒdʃɒh، bsjɒrmztrb ʃd v hjئtʃ dr ɒv mtɣjr ɡrdjd v ɒmrɒjʃ mztrb ʃdnd ɒmɒ mlkh bh‌sbb sxnɒn پɒdʃɒh v ɒmrɒjʃ bh mhmɒnxɒnh drآmd vmlkh mtklm ʃdh، ɡft «ɒj پɒdʃɒh tɒ bh ɒbd zndh bɒʃ fkrhɒjt tv rɒ mztrb nsɒzd v hjئt tvmtɣjr nʃvd ʃxsj dr mmlkt tv hst kh rvh xdɒjɒn ɣdvs dɒrd v dr ɒjɒm پdrt rvʃnɒjj v ftɒnt v hkmt msl hkmt xdɒjɒn drɒv پjdɒ ʃd v پdrt nbvkdnsr پɒdʃɒh jʔnj پdr tv‌ɒj پɒdʃɒh ɒv rɒ rئjs md͡ʒvsjɒn vd͡ʒɒdvɡrɒn v kldɒnjɒn v mnd͡ʒmɒn sɒxt t͡ʃvnkh rvh fɒzl v mʔrft v ftɒnt v tʔbjrxvɒbhɒ v hl mʔmɒhɒ v ɡʃvdn ʔɣdh‌hɒ dr ɒjn dɒnjɒl kh پɒdʃɒh ɒv rɒ bh bltʃsr msmj nmvdjɒft ʃd پs hɒl dɒnjɒl tlbjdh ʃvd v tfsjr rɒbjɒn xvɒhd nmvd» آŋɒh dɒnjɒl rɒ bh hzvr پɒdʃɒh آvrdnd vپɒdʃɒh dɒnjɒl rɒ xtɒb krdh، frmvd «آjɒ tvhmɒn dɒnjɒl ɒz ɒsjrɒn jhvd hstj kh پdrm پɒdʃɒh ɒz jhvdɒ آvrd؟ v drbɒrh tv ʃnjdh‌ɒm kh rvh xdɒjɒn dr tv ɒst v rvʃnɒjj v ftɒnt vhkmt fɒzl dr tv پjdɒ ʃdh ɒst v ɒlɒn hkjmɒn v mnd͡ʒmɒn rɒ bh hzvr mn آvrdnd tɒ ɒjn nvʃth rɒ bxvɒnnd v tfsjrʃ rɒ brɒj mn bjɒn knndɒmɒ ntvɒnstnd tfsjr klɒm rɒ bjɒn knnd v mn drbɒrh tv ʃnjdh‌ɒm kh bh nmvdn tʔbjrhɒ v ɡʃvdn ʔɣdh‌hɒ ɣɒdr mj‌bɒʃj پs ɒɡr btvɒnj ɒlɒn nvʃth rɒ bxvɒnj v tfsjrʃ rɒ brɒj mn bjɒn knj bh ɒrɣvɒn mlbs xvɒhj ʃd v tvɣ zrjn br ɡrdnt nhɒdh xvɒhd ʃd v dr mmlkt hɒkm svm xvɒhj bvd» پs dɒnjɒl bh hzvr پɒdʃɒh d͡ʒvɒb dɒd vɡft «ʔtɒjɒj tv ɒz آn tv bɒʃd v ɒnʔɒm xvd rɒ bh djɡrj bdh، lkn nvʃth rɒ brɒj پɒdʃɒh xvɒhm xvɒnd v tfsjrʃ rɒ brɒj ɒv bjɒn xvɒhm nmvd ɒmɒ tv‌ɒj پɒdʃɒh، xdɒj tʔɒlj bh پdrt nbvkdnsr sltnt v ʔzmt v d͡ʒlɒl v hʃmt ʔtɒ frmvd v bh‌sbb ʔzmtj kh bh ɒv dɒdh bvdd͡ʒmjʔ ɣvmhɒ v ɒmt‌hɒ v zbɒnhɒ ɒz ɒv lrzɒn v trsɒn mj‌bvdnd hr‌kh rɒ mj‌xvɒst mj‌kʃt v hr‌kh rɒ mj‌xvɒst zndh ŋɒh mj‌dɒʃt v hr‌kh rɒmj xvɒst blnd mj‌nmvd v hr‌kh rɒ mj‌xvɒst پst mj‌sɒxt ljkn t͡ʃvn dlʃ mɣrvr vrvhʃ sxt ɡrdjdh، tkbr nmvd آŋɒh ɒzkrsj sltnt xvjʃ bh zjr ɒfkndh ʃd vhʃmt ɒv rɒ ɒz ɒv ɡrftnd v ɒz mjɒn bnj آdm rɒndh ʃdh، dlʃ msl dl hjvɒnɒt ɡrdjd vmsknʃ bɒ ɡvrxrɒn ʃdh، ɒv rɒ msl ɡɒvɒn ʔlf mj‌xvrɒnjdnd v d͡ʒsdʃ ɒz ʃbnm آsmɒn trmj ʃd tɒ fhmjd kh xdɒj tʔɒlj br mmɒlk آdmjɒn hkmrɒnj mj‌knd v hr‌kh rɒ mj‌xvɒhd br آn nsb mj‌nmɒjd v tv‌ɒj پsrʃ blʃsr ɒɡrt͡ʃh ɒjn hmh rɒ dɒnstj lkn dl xvd rɒ mtvɒzʔ nnmvdj blkh xvjʃtn rɒ bh zd xdɒvndآsmɒnhɒ blnd sɒxtj v zrvf xɒnh ɒv rɒ bh hzvr tv آvrdnd v tv v ɒmrɒjt v zvd͡ʒh‌hɒ vmtʔh hɒjt ɒz آnhɒ ʃrɒb nvʃjdjd v xdɒjɒn nɣrh v tlɒ v brnd͡ʒ v آhn v t͡ʃvb v sŋ rɒ kh nmj bjnnd v nmj ʃnvnd v hjt͡ʃ nmj dɒnnd tsbjh xvɒndj، ɒmɒ آn xdɒjj rɒ kh rvɒnt dr dst ɒv vtmɒmj rɒhhɒjt ɒz ɒv mj‌bɒʃd، tmd͡ʒjd nnmvdj پs ɒjn kf dst ɒz d͡ʒɒnb ɒv frstɒdh ʃd vɒjn nvʃth mktvb ɡrdjd v ɒjn nvʃth‌ɒj kh mktvb ʃdh ɒst ɒjn ɒst mnɒmnɒ sɣjl v frsjn v tfsjr klɒm ɒjn ɒst mnɒ؛ xdɒ sltnt tv rɒ ʃmrdh v آn rɒ bh ɒnthɒ rsɒnjdh ɒst sɣjl؛ drmjzɒn snd͡ʒjdh ʃdh v nɒɣs drآmdh‌ɒj frs؛ sltnt tv tɣsjm ɡʃth v bh mɒdjɒn v fɒrsjɒn bxʃjdh ʃdh ɒst» آŋɒh blʃsr ɒmr frmvd tɒ dɒnjɒl rɒ bh ɒrɣvɒn mlbs sɒxtnd v tvɣ zrjn br ɡrdnʃ nhɒdnd v drbɒrh‌ɒʃ ndɒ krdnd kh dr mmlkt hɒkm svm mj‌bɒʃddr hmɒn ʃb blʃsrپɒdʃɒh kldɒnjɒn kʃth ʃd dr hmɒn ʃb blʃsrپɒdʃɒh kldɒnjɒn kʃth ʃd v dɒrjvʃ mɒdj dr hɒlj kh ʃst v dvsɒlh bvd sltnt rɒ jɒft v dɒrjvʃ mslht dɒnst kh sd v bjst vɒlj br mmlkt nsb nmɒjd tɒ br tmɒmj mmlkt bɒʃnd v br آnhɒsh vzjr kh jkj ɒz ɒjʃɒn dɒnjɒl bvd tɒ آn vɒljɒn bh ɒjʃɒn hsɒb dhnd v hjt͡ʃ zrrj bh پɒdʃɒh nrsd پs ɒjn dɒnjɒl br sɒjr vzrɒء v vɒljɒn tfvɣ d͡ʒst zjrɒ kh rvh fɒzl drɒv bvd vپɒdʃɒh ɒrɒdh dɒʃt kh ɒv rɒ br tmɒmj mmlkt nsb nmɒjd پs vzjrɒn v vɒljɒn bhɒnh mj‌d͡ʒstnd tɒ ʃkɒjtj dr ɒmvr sltnt br dɒnjɒl bjɒvrnd ɒmɒ ntvɒnstnd kh hjt͡ʃ ʔltj jɒ tɣsjrj bjɒbnd، t͡ʃvnkh ɒv ɒmjn bvd v xtɒjj jɒ tɣsjrj drɒv hrɡz jɒft nʃd پs آn ɒʃxɒs ɡftnd kh «dr ɒjn dɒnjɒl hjt͡ʃ ʔltj پjdɒ nxvɒhjm krd mɡrɒjnkh آn rɒ drbɒrh ʃrjʔt xdɒjʃ dr ɒv bjɒbjm» آŋɒh ɒjn vzrɒء v vɒljɒn nzd پɒdʃɒh d͡ʒmʔ ʃdnd v ɒv rɒ t͡ʃnjn ɡftnd «ɒj dɒrjvʃ پɒdʃɒh tɒbh ɒbd zndh bɒʃ d͡ʒmjʔ vzrɒj mmlkt v rvsɒ v vɒljɒn v mʃjrɒn v hɒkmɒn bɒ hm mʃvrt krdh‌ɒnd kh پɒdʃɒh hkmj ɒstvɒr knd v ɣdɣn bljɣj nmɒjd kh hr ksj‌kh tɒ sj rvz ɒz xdɒjj jɒ ɒnsɒnj svɒj tv‌ɒj پɒdʃɒh msɒltj nmɒjd drt͡ʃɒh ʃjrɒn ɒfkndh ʃvd پs‌ɒj پɒdʃɒh frmɒn rɒɒstvɒr kn v nvʃth rɒ ɒmzɒ frmɒ tɒ mvɒfɣ ʃrjʔt mɒdjɒn v fɒrsjɒn kh mnsvx nmj ʃvd tbdjl ŋrdd» bnɒbrɒjn dɒrjvʃ پɒdʃɒh nvʃth vfrmɒn rɒ ɒmzɒ nmvd ɒmɒ t͡ʃvn dɒnjɒl dɒnst kh nvʃth ɒmzɒ ʃdh ɒst bh xɒnh xvd drآmd v پnd͡ʒrh hɒj bɒlɒxɒnh xvd rɒ bh smt ɒvrʃljm bɒz nmvdh، hr rvz sh mrtbh zɒnv mj‌zd v dʔɒ mj‌nmvd v t͡ʃnɒnkh ɣbl ɒzآn ʔɒdt mj‌dɒʃt nzd xdɒj xvjʃ dʔɒmj krd v tsbjh mj‌xvɒnd پs آn ɒʃxɒs d͡ʒmʔ ʃdh، dɒnjɒl rɒ jɒftnd kh nzd xdɒj xvdmsɒlt v tzrʔ mj‌nmɒjd آŋɒh bh hzvr پɒdʃɒh nzdjk ʃdh، drbɒrh frmɒn پɒdʃɒh ʔrz krdnd kh «ɒj پɒdʃɒh آjɒfrmɒnj ɒmzɒ nnmvdj kh hr‌kh tɒ sj rvz nzdxdɒjj jɒ ɒnsɒnj svɒj tv‌ɒj پɒdʃɒh msɒltj nmɒjd dr t͡ʃɒh ʃjrɒn ɒfkndh ʃvd؟» پɒdʃɒh drd͡ʒvɒb ɡft «ɒjn ɒmr mvɒfɣ ʃrjʔt mɒdjɒn vfɒrsjɒn kh mnsvx nmj ʃvd shjh ɒst» پs ɒjʃɒn dr hzvr پɒdʃɒh d͡ʒvɒb dɒdnd vɡftnd kh «ɒjn dɒnjɒl kh ɒz ɒsjrɒn jhvdɒ mj‌bɒʃd bh tv‌ɒj پɒdʃɒh v bh frmɒnj kh ɒmzɒ nmvdh‌ɒj ɒʔtnɒnmj nmɒjd، blkh hr rvz sh mrtbh msɒlt xvd rɒmj nmɒjd» آŋɒh پɒdʃɒh t͡ʃvn ɒjn sxn rɒʃnjd br xvjʃtn bsjɒr xʃmɡjn ɡrdjd v dl xvd rɒ bh rhɒnjdn dɒnjɒl mʃɣvl sɒxt v tɒɣrvb آftɒb brɒj ɒstxlɒs ɒv sʔj mj‌nmvd آŋɒh آn ɒʃxɒs nzd پɒdʃɒh d͡ʒmʔ ʃdnd v bh پɒdʃɒh ʔrz krdnd kh «ɒj پɒdʃɒh bdɒn kh ɣɒnvn mɒdjɒn v fɒrsjɒn ɒjn ɒst kh hjt͡ʃ frmɒn jɒhkmj kh پɒdʃɒh آn rɒ ɒstvɒr nmɒjd tbdjl nʃvd» پs پɒdʃɒh ɒmr frmvd tɒ dɒnjɒl rɒ bjɒvrnd vɒv rɒ dr t͡ʃɒh ʃjrɒn bjndɒznd v پɒdʃɒh dɒnjɒl rɒxtɒb krdh، ɡft «xdɒj tv kh ɒv rɒ پjvsth ʔbɒdt mj‌nmɒjj tv rɒ rhɒjj xvɒhd dɒd» vsŋj آvrdh، آn rɒ br dhnh t͡ʃɒh nhɒdnd v پɒdʃɒh آn rɒ bh mhr xvd v mhr ɒmrɒj xvjʃ mxtvm sɒxt tɒ ɒmr drbɒrh dɒnjɒl tbdjl nʃvd آŋɒh پɒdʃɒh bh ɣsr xvjʃ rfth، ʃb rɒ bh rvzh bsrbrd v bh hzvr vj ɒsbɒb ʔjʃ ɒv rɒ njɒvrdnd vxvɒbʃ ɒz ɒv rft پs پɒdʃɒh sbh zvd vɣt tlvʔ fd͡ʒr brxɒst v bh tʔd͡ʒjl bh t͡ʃɒh ʃjrɒn rft v t͡ʃvn nzd t͡ʃɒh ʃjrɒn rsjd bh آvɒzhzjn dɒnjɒl rɒ sdɒ zd v پɒdʃɒh dɒnjɒl rɒ xtɒb krdh، ɡft «ɒj dɒnjɒl bndh xdɒj hj آjɒxdɒjt kh ɒv rɒ پjvsth ʔbɒdt mj‌nmɒjj bh rhɒnjdnt ɒz ʃjrɒn ɣɒdr bvdh ɒst؟» آŋɒh dɒnjɒl bh پɒdʃɒh d͡ʒvɒb dɒd kh «ɒj پɒdʃɒh tɒ bh ɒbd zndh bɒʃ xdɒj mn frʃth xvd rɒ frstɒdh، dhɒn ʃjrɒn rɒ bst tɒ bh mn zrrj nrsɒnnd t͡ʃvnkh bh hzvr vj dr mn ɡnɒhj jɒft nʃd v hm drhzvr tv‌ɒj پɒdʃɒh tɣsjrj nvrzjdh bvdm» آŋɒh پɒdʃɒh bj‌nhɒjt ʃɒdmɒn ʃdh، ɒmr frmvd kh dɒnjɒl rɒ ɒz t͡ʃɒh brآvrnd v dɒnjɒl rɒ ɒz t͡ʃɒh brآvrdnd v ɒz آn d͡ʒht kh br xdɒj xvd tvkl nmvdh bvd dr ɒvhjt͡ʃ zrrj jɒft nʃd v پɒdʃɒh ɒmr frmvd tɒآn ɒʃxɒs rɒ kh br dɒnjɒl ʃkɒjt آvrdh bvdndhɒzr sɒxtnd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ bɒ پsrɒn v znɒn ɒjʃɒn dr t͡ʃɒh ʃjrɒn ɒndɒxtnd v hnvz bh th t͡ʃɒh nrsjdh bvdnd kh ʃjrɒn br ɒjʃɒn hmlh آvrdh، hmh ɒstxvɒnhɒj ɒjʃɒn rɒ xrd krdnd bʔd ɒz آn dɒrjvʃ پɒdʃɒh bh d͡ʒmjʔ ɣvmhɒ v ɒmt‌hɒ vzbɒnhɒjj kh dr tmɒmj d͡ʒhɒn sɒkn bvdnd nvʃt kh «slɒmtj ʃmɒ ɒfzvn bɒd ɒz hzvr mn frmɒnj sɒdr ʃdh ɒst kh dr hr sltntj ɒzmmɒlk mn mrdmɒn bh hzvr xdɒj dɒnjɒl lrzɒn v trsɒn bɒʃnd zjrɒ kh ɒv xdɒj hj v tɒɒbdɒlɒbɒd ɣjvm ɒst v mlkvt ɒv bj‌zvɒl vsltnt ɒv ɣjrmtnɒhj ɒstɒv ɒst kh nd͡ʒɒt mj‌dhd v mj‌rhɒnd v آjɒt v ʔd͡ʒɒjb rɒ drآsmɒn v dr zmjn zɒhr mj‌sɒzd v ɒvst kh dɒnjɒl rɒ ɒz t͡ʃŋ ʃjrɒn rhɒjj dɒdh ɒst» پs ɒjn dɒnjɒl dr sltnt dɒrjvʃ v drsltnt kvrʃ fɒrsj fjrvz mj‌bvd ɒv ɒst kh nd͡ʒɒt mj‌dhd v mj‌rhɒnd v آjɒt v ʔd͡ʒɒjb rɒ drآsmɒn v dr zmjn zɒhr mj‌sɒzd v ɒvst kh dɒnjɒl rɒ ɒz t͡ʃŋ ʃjrɒn rhɒjj dɒdh ɒst» پs ɒjn dɒnjɒl dr sltnt dɒrjvʃ v drsltnt kvrʃ fɒrsj fjrvz mj‌bvd dr sɒl ɒvl blʃsr پɒdʃɒh bɒbl، dɒnjɒl drbstrʃ xvɒbj v rvjɒhɒj srʃ rɒ djd پs xvɒb rɒ nvʃt v kljh mtɒlb rɒ bjɒn nmvd پs dɒnjɒl mtklm ʃdh، ɡft «ʃbɡɒhɒn dr ʔɒlm rvjɒ ʃdh، djdm kh nɒɡɒh t͡ʃhɒr bɒd آsmɒn br rvj drjɒj ʔzjm tɒxtnd v t͡ʃhɒr vhʃ bzrɡ kh mxɒlf jkdjɡr bvdnd ɒz drjɒ bjrvn آmdnd ɒvl آnhɒ msl ʃjr bvd v bɒlhɒj ʔɣɒb dɒʃt v mn nzrkrdm tɒ bɒlhɒjʃ kndh ɡrdjd v ɒv ɒz zmjn brdɒʃth ʃdh، br پɒjhɒj xvd msl ɒnsɒn ɣrɒr dɒdh ɡʃt vdl ɒnsɒn bh ɒv dɒdh ʃd v ɒjnk vhʃ dvm djɡr msl xrs bvd v br jk trf xvd blnd ʃdv dr dhɒnʃ dr mjɒn dndɒnhɒjʃ sh dndh bvd vvj rɒ t͡ʃnjn ɡftnd brxjz v ɡvʃt bsjɒr bxvr bʔd ɒz آn ŋrjstm v ɒjnk djɡrj msl پlŋ bvd kh br پʃtʃ t͡ʃhɒr bɒl mrɣ dɒʃt v ɒjn vhʃ t͡ʃhɒr sr dɒʃt v sltnt bh ɒv dɒdh ʃd bʔd ɒzآn dr rvjɒhɒj ʃb nzr krdm v ɒjnk vhʃ t͡ʃhɒrm kh hvlnɒk v mhjb v bsjɒr zvrآvr bvd vdndɒnhɒj bzrɡ آhnjn dɒʃt v bɒɣj‌mɒndh rɒmj xvrd v پɒrh پɒrh mj‌krd v bh پɒjhɒj xvjʃ پɒjmɒl mj‌nmvd v mxɒlf hmh vhvʃj kh ɣbl ɒzɒv bvdnd bvd v dh ʃɒx dɒʃt پs dr ɒjn ʃɒxhɒtɒml mj‌nmvdm kh ɒjnk ɒz mjɒn آnhɒ ʃɒx kvt͡ʃk djɡrj brآmd v پjʃ rvjʃ sh ʃɒx ɒz آn ʃɒxhɒj ɒvl ɒz rjʃh‌kndh ʃd v ɒjnk ɒjn ʃɒx t͡ʃʃmɒnj mɒnnd t͡ʃʃm ɒnsɒn v dhɒnj kh bh sxnɒn tkbrآmjz mtklm bvd dɒʃt «v nzr mj‌krdm tɒ krsjhɒ brɣrɒr ʃd vɣdjm ɒlɒjɒm d͡ʒlvs frmvd v lbɒs ɒv msl brf sfjd v mvj srʃ msl پʃm پɒk v ʔrʃ ɒvʃʔlh hɒj آtʃ v t͡ʃrxhɒj آn آtʃ mlthb bvd nhrj ɒz آtʃ d͡ʒɒrj ʃdh، ɒz پjʃ rvj ɒvbjrvn آmd hzɒrɒn hzɒr ɒv rɒ xdmt mj‌krdnd vkrvrhɒ krvr bh hzvr vj ɒjstɒdh bvdnd djvɒn brپɒ ʃd v dftrhɒ ɡʃvdh ɡrdjd آŋɒh nzr krdm bh‌sbb sxnɒn tkbrآmjzj kh آn ʃɒx mj‌ɡft پs ŋrjstm tɒ آn vhʃ kʃth ʃd vd͡ʒsd ɒv hlɒk ɡrdjdh، bh آtʃ mʃtʔl tsljm ʃd ɒmɒ sɒjr vhvʃ sltnt rɒ ɒz ɒjʃɒn ɡrftnd، lkn drɒzj ʔmr tɒ zmɒnj v vɣtj bh ɒjʃɒn dɒdh ʃd v dr rvjɒj ʃb ŋrjstm v ɒjnk msl پsr ɒnsɒn bɒ ɒbrhɒj آsmɒn آmd v nzdɣdjm ɒlɒjɒm rsjd v ɒv rɒ bh hzvr vj آvrdnd v sltnt v d͡ʒlɒl v mlkvt bh ɒv dɒdh ʃd tɒd͡ʒmjʔ ɣvm‌hɒ v ɒmt‌hɒ v zbɒnhɒ ɒv rɒ xdmt nmɒjnd sltnt ɒv sltnt d͡ʒɒvdɒnj v bj‌zvɒl ɒst v mlkvt ɒv zɒjl nxvɒhd ʃd «ɒmɒ rvh mn dɒnjɒl dr d͡ʒsdm mdhvʃ ʃdv rvjɒhɒj srm mrɒ mztrb sɒxt v bh jkj ɒz hɒzrjn nzdjk ʃdh، hɣjɣt ɒjn hmh ɒmvr rɒ ɒz vj پrsjdm v ɒv bh mn tklm nmvdh، tfsjr ɒmvr rɒ brɒj mn bjɒn krd، kh ɒjn vhvʃ ʔzjmj kh ʔdd ɒjʃɒn t͡ʃhɒr ɒst t͡ʃhɒr پɒdʃɒh mj‌bɒʃnd kh ɒz zmjn xvɒhnd brxɒst ɒmɒmɣdsɒn hzrt ɒʔlj sltnt rɒ xvɒhnd jɒft v mmlkt rɒ tɒ bh ɒbd v tɒ ɒbdɒlɒbɒd mtsrf xvɒhnd bvd آŋɒh آrzv dɒʃtm kh hɣjɣt ɒmrrɒ drbɒrh vhʃ t͡ʃhɒrm kh mxɒlf hmh djɡrɒn vbsjɒr hvlnɒk bvd v dndɒnhɒj آhnjn v t͡ʃŋɒlhɒj brnd͡ʒjn dɒʃt v sɒjrjn rɒ mj‌xvrd v پɒrh پɒrh mj‌krd v bh پɒjhɒj xvd پɒjmɒl mj‌nmvd bdɒnm v kjfjt dh ʃɒx rɒ kh br sr ɒv bvd v آn djɡrj rɒ kh brآmd v پjʃ rvj ɒv sh ʃɒx ɒftɒdjʔnj آn ʃɒxj kh t͡ʃʃmɒn v dhɒnj rɒ kh sxnɒn tkbrآmjz mj‌ɡft dɒʃt v nmɒjʃ ɒv ɒz rfɣɒjʃ sxttr bvd پs mlɒhzh krdm v ɒjn ʃɒx bɒmɣdsɒn d͡ʒŋ krdh، br ɒjʃɒn ɒstjlɒ jɒft tɒhjnj kh ɣdjm ɒlɒjɒm آmd v dɒvrj bh mɣdsɒn hzrt ɒʔlj tsljm ʃd v zmɒnj rsjd kh mɣdsɒn mlkvt rɒ bh tsrf آvrdnd پs ɒvt͡ʃnjn ɡft vhʃ t͡ʃhɒrm sltnt t͡ʃhɒrmjn brzmjn xvɒhd bvd v mxɒlf hmh sltnthɒ xvɒhdbvd v tmɒmj d͡ʒhɒn rɒ xvɒhd xvrd v آn rɒپɒjmɒl nmvdh، پɒrh پɒrh xvɒhd krd v dh ʃɒx ɒz ɒjn mmlkt، dh پɒdʃɒh mj‌bɒʃnd kh xvɒhndbrxɒst v djɡrj bʔd ɒz ɒjʃɒn xvɒhdbrxɒst v ɒv mxɒlf ɒvljn xvɒhd bvd v sh پɒdʃɒh rɒ bh zjr xvɒhd ɒfknd v sxnɒn bh zdhzrt ɒʔlj xvɒhd ɡft v mɣdsɒn hzrt ɒʔlj rɒ zljl xvɒhd sɒxt v ɣsd tbdjl nmvdn zmɒnhɒ v ʃrɒjʔ xvɒhd nmvd v ɒjʃɒn tɒ zmɒnj vdv zmɒn v nsf zmɒn bh‌dst ɒv tsljm xvɒhndʃd پs djvɒn brپɒ xvɒhd ʃd v sltnt ɒv rɒɒz ɒv ɡrfth، آn rɒ tɒ bh ɒnthɒ tɒbh ɒjnd͡ʒɒ ɒst fkrhɒj mn dɒnjɒl mrɒ bsjɒrmztrb nmvd v hjئtm dr mn mtɣjr ɡʃt، ljkn ɒjn ɒmr rɒ dr dl xvd ŋɒh dɒʃtm» ɒnthɒj ɒmr tɒbh ɒjnd͡ʒɒ ɒst fkrhɒj mn dɒnjɒl mrɒ bsjɒrmztrb nmvd v hjئtm dr mn mtɣjr ɡʃt، ljkn ɒjn ɒmr rɒ dr dl xvd ŋɒh dɒʃtm» dr sɒl svm sltnt blʃsr پɒdʃɒh، rvjɒjj br mn dɒnjɒl zɒhr ʃd bʔd ɒz آnkh ɒvl bh mn zɒhr ʃdh bvd v dr rvjɒ nzr krdm vmj djdm kh mn dr dɒrɒlsltnh ʃvʃn kh drvlɒjt ʔjlɒm mj‌bɒʃd bvdm v dr ʔɒlm rvjɒ djdm kh nzd nhr ɒvlɒj mj‌bɒʃm پs t͡ʃʃmɒn xvd rɒbrɒfrɒʃth، djdm kh nɒɡɒh ɣvt͡ʃj nzd nhr ɒjstɒdh bvd kh dv ʃɒx dɒʃt v ʃɒxhɒjʃ blnd bvd vjkj ɒz djɡrj blndtr v blndtrjn آnhɒ آxrbrآmd v ɣvt͡ʃ rɒ djdm kh bh smt mɣrb vʃmɒl v d͡ʒnvb ʃɒx mj‌zd v hjt͡ʃ vhʃj bɒ ɒvmɣɒvmt ntvɒnst krd v ksj nbvd kh ɒz dstʃ rhɒjj dhd v brhsb rɒj xvd ʔml nmvdh، bzrɡ mj‌ʃd v hjnj kh mtfkr mj‌bvdm ɒjnk bz nrj ɒztrf mɣrb br rvj tmɒmj zmjn mj‌آmd v zmjn rɒ lms nmj krd v dr mjɒn t͡ʃʃmɒn bz nr ʃɒxj mʔtbr bvd v bh svj آn ɣvt͡ʃ sɒhb dv ʃɒx kh آn rɒ nzd nhr ɒjstɒdh djdm آmd v bʃdt ɣvt xvjʃ nzd ɒv dvjd v ɒv rɒ djdm kh t͡ʃvn nzdɣvt͡ʃ rsjd bɒ ɒv bʃdt ɣzbnɒk ʃdh، ɣvt͡ʃ rɒ zd vhr dv ʃɒx ɒv rɒ ʃkst v ɣvt͡ʃ rɒ jɒrɒj mɣɒvmt bɒ vj nbvd پs vj rɒ bh zmjn ɒndɒxth، پɒjmɒl krdv ksj nbvd kh ɣvt͡ʃ rɒ ɒz dstʃ rhɒjj dhd vbz nr bj‌nhɒjt bzrɡ ʃd v t͡ʃvn ɣvj ɡʃt آn ʃɒx bzrɡ ʃksth ʃd v dr d͡ʒɒjʃ t͡ʃhɒr ʃɒx mʔtbr bsvj bɒdhɒj ɒrbʔh آsmɒn brآmd v ɒzjkj ɒz آnhɒ jk ʃɒx kvt͡ʃk brآmd v bh smt d͡ʒnvb v mʃrɣ v fxr zmjnhɒ bsjɒr bzrɡ ʃd v bh zd lʃkr آsmɒnhɒ ɣvj ʃdh، bʔzj ɒzlʃkr v stɒrɡɒn rɒ bh zmjn ɒndɒxth، پɒjmɒl nmvd v bh zd srdɒr lʃkr bzrɡ ʃd v ɣrbɒnj dɒjmj ɒz ɒv ɡrfth ʃd v mkɒn mɣds ɒv mnhdm ɡrdjd v lʃkrj bh zd ɣrbɒnj dɒjmj، bh‌sbb ʔsjɒn ɣvm bh vj dɒdh ʃd v آn lʃkrrɒstj rɒ bh zmjn ɒndɒxtnd v ɒv mvɒfɣ rɒj xvd ʔml nmvdh، kɒmjɒb ɡrdjd v mɣdsj rɒ ʃnjdm kh sxn mj‌ɡft v mɣds djɡrj ɒz آn jk kh sxn mj‌ɡft، پrsjd kh rvjɒ drbɒrh ɣrbɒnj dɒjmj v mʔsjt mhlk kh ɣds v lʃkrrɒ bh پɒjmɒl ʃdn tsljm mj‌knd tɒ bkj xvɒhdbvd v ɒv bh mn ɡft «tɒ dv hzɒr v sjsd ʃɒm vsbh، آŋɒh mɣds tthjr xvɒhd ʃd» v t͡ʃvn mn dɒnjɒl rvjɒ rɒ djdm v mʔnj آn rɒtlbjdm، nɒɡɒh ʃbjh mrdj nzd mn bɒjstɒd vآvɒz آdmj rɒ ɒz mjɒn nhr ɒvlɒj ʃnjdm kh ndɒkrdh، mj‌ɡft «ɒj d͡ʒbrɒئjl ɒjn mrd rɒ ɒz mʔnj‌ɒjn‌rvjɒ mtlʔ sɒz» پs ɒv nzd d͡ʒɒjj kh ɒjstɒdh bvdm آmd v t͡ʃvn آmd mn trsɒn ʃdh، bh rvj xvd drɒftɒdm v ɒv mrɒ ɡft «ɒj پsr ɒnsɒn bdɒnkh ɒjn‌rvjɒ brɒj zmɒn آxr mj‌bɒʃd» v hjnj kh ɒv bɒ mn sxn mj‌ɡft، mn brrvj xvd br zmjn dr xvɒb sŋjn mj‌bvdm v ɒvmrɒ lms nmvdh، dr d͡ʒɒjj kh bvdm brپɒ dɒʃt v ɡft «ɒjnk mn tv rɒ ɒz آnt͡ʃh dr آxr ɣzb vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd ɒtlɒʔ mj‌dhm zjrɒ kh ɒnthɒ drzmɒn mʔjn vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd ɒmɒ آn ɣvt͡ʃ sɒhb dv ʃɒx kh آn rɒ djdj پɒdʃɒhɒn mɒdjɒn v fɒrsjɒn mj‌bɒʃd v آn bz nr stbr پɒdʃɒh jvnɒn mj‌bɒʃd v آn ʃɒx bzrɡj kh dr mjɒn dvt͡ʃʃmʃ bvd پɒdʃɒh ɒvl ɒst v ɒmɒ آn ʃksth ʃdn v t͡ʃhɒr dr d͡ʒɒjʃ brآmdn، t͡ʃhɒrsltnt ɒz ɣvm ɒv ɒmɒ nh ɒz ɣvt ɒv brپɒ xvɒhndʃd v dr آxr sltnt ɒjʃɒn t͡ʃvn ɡnɒh ʔɒsjɒn bh ɒtmɒm rsjdh bɒʃd، آŋɒh پɒdʃɒhj sxt rvj v dr mkrhɒ mɒhr، xvɒhd brxɒst v ɣvt ɒv ʔzjm xvɒhd ʃd، ljkn nh ɒz tvɒnɒjj xvdʃ v xrɒbjhɒj ʔd͡ʒjb xvɒhd nmvd vkɒmjɒb ʃdh، mvɒfɣ rɒj xvd ʔml xvɒhdnmvd v ʔzmɒ v ɣvm mɣdsɒn rɒ hlɒk xvɒhdnmvd v ɒz mhɒrt ɒv mkr dr dstʃ پjʃ xvɒhd rft v dr dl xvd mɣrvr ʃdh، bsjɒrj rɒ bɣth hlɒk xvɒhd sɒxt v bɒ ɒmjr ɒmjrɒn mɣɒvmt xvɒhd nmvd، ɒmɒ bdvn dst، ʃksth xvɒhd ʃd پs rvjɒjj kh drbɒrh ʃɒm v sbh ɡfth ʃd jɣjn ɒst ɒmɒ tv rvjɒ rɒ br hm nh zjrɒ kh bʔd ɒz ɒjɒm bsjɒr vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd»آŋɒh mn dɒnjɒl tɒ ɒndk zmɒnj zʔjf vbjmɒr ʃdm پs brxɒsth، bh‌kɒrhɒj پɒdʃɒh mʃɣvl ɡrdjdm، ɒmɒ drbɒrh rvjɒ mthjr mɒndm vɒhdj mʔnj آn rɒ nfhmjd آŋɒh mn dɒnjɒl tɒ ɒndk zmɒnj zʔjf vbjmɒr ʃdm پs brxɒsth، bh‌kɒrhɒj پɒdʃɒh mʃɣvl ɡrdjdm، ɒmɒ drbɒrh rvjɒ mthjr mɒndm vɒhdj mʔnj آn rɒ nfhmjd dr sɒl ɒvl dɒrjvʃ bn ɒxʃvrʃ kh ɒznsl mɒdjɒn v br mmlkt kldɒnjɒn پɒdʃɒh ʃdh bvd dr sɒl ɒvl sltnt ɒv، mn dɒnjɒl، ʔdd sɒlhɒjj rɒ kh klɒm xdɒvnd drbɒrh آnhɒ bh ɒrmjɒj nbj nɒzl ʃdh bvd ɒz ktb fhmjdm kh hftɒdsɒl dr xrɒbj ɒvrʃljm tmɒm xvɒhd ʃd پs rvj xvd rɒ bsvj xdɒvnd xdɒ mtvd͡ʒh sɒxtm tɒ bɒ dʔɒ v tzrʔɒt v rvzh v پlɒs v xɒkstrmsɒlt nmɒjm؛ v nzd jhvh xdɒj xvd dʔɒ krdm v ɒʔtrɒf nmvdh، ɡftm «ɒj xdɒvnd xdɒj ʔzjm v mhjb kh ʔhd v rhmt rɒ bɒ mhbɒn xvjʃ vآnɒnj kh frɒjz tv rɒ hfz mj‌nmɒjnd ŋɒh mj‌dɒrj mɒ ɡnɒh v ʔsjɒn v ʃrɒrt vrzjdh vtmrd nmvdh v ɒz ɒvɒmr v ɒhkɒm tv td͡ʒɒvz krdh‌ɒjm v bh bndɡɒnt ɒnbjɒjj kh bh ɒsm tv bh پɒdʃɒhɒn vsrvrɒn v پdrɒn mɒ v bh tmɒmj ɣvm zmjn sxn‌ɡftnd ɡvʃ ŋrfth‌ɒjm ‌ɒj xdɒvnd ʔdɒlt ɒzآn tv ɒst v rsvɒjj ɒz آn mɒ ɒst t͡ʃnɒnkh ɒmrvz ʃdh ɒst ɒz mrdɒn jhvdɒ v sɒknɒn ɒvrʃljm v hmh ɒsrɒئjljɒn t͡ʃh nzdjk v t͡ʃh dvrdr hmh zmjnhɒjj kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh‌sbb xjɒntj kh bh tv vrzjdh‌ɒnd dr آnhɒ پrɒkndh sɒxth‌ɒj ‌ɒj xdɒvnd rsvɒjj ɒz آn mɒ v پɒdʃɒhɒn v srvrɒn vپdrɒn mɒ ɒst zjrɒ kh bh tv ɡnɒh vrzjdh‌ɒjm xdɒvnd xdɒj mɒ rɒ rhmthɒ v mɣfrthɒ ɒst hrt͡ʃnd bdv ɡnɒh vrzjdh‌ɒjm v klɒm jhvh xdɒj xvd rɒ nʃnjdh‌ɒjm tɒ dr ʃrjʔt ɒv kh bh vsjlh bndɡɒnʃ ɒnbjɒ پjʃ mɒ ɡzɒrd slvk nmɒjjm v tmɒmj ɒsrɒئjl ɒz ʃrjʔt tvtd͡ʒɒvz nmvdh v rvɡrdɒn ʃdh، bh آvɒz tv ɡvʃ ŋrfth‌ɒnd bnɒbrɒjn lʔnt v svɡndj kh dr tvrɒt mvsj bndh xdɒ mktvb ɒst br mɒ mstvlj ɡrdjdh، t͡ʃvnkh bh ɒv ɡnɒh vrzjdh‌ɒjm v ɒvklɒm xvd rɒ kh bh zd mɒ v bh zd dɒvrɒn mɒ kh brmɒ dɒvrj mj‌nmvdnd ɡfth bvd ɒstvɒr nmvdh vblɒj ʔzjmj br mɒ vɒrd آvrdh ɒst zjrɒ kh zjr tmɒmj آsmɒn hɒdsh‌ɒj vɒɣʔ nʃdh، msl آnkh br ɒvrʃljm vɒɣʔ ʃdh ɒst tmɒmj ɒjn blɒ br vfɣ آnt͡ʃh dr tvrɒt mvsj mktvb ɒst brmɒ vɒrd ʃdh ɒst، mʔhzɒ nzd jhvh xdɒj xvd msɒlt nnmvdjm tɒ ɒz mʔsjt xvdbɒzɡʃt nmvdh، rɒstj tv rɒ bfhmjm bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd br ɒjn blɒ mrɒɣb bvdh، آn rɒ br mɒ vɒrdآvrd zjrɒ kh jhvh xdɒj mɒ dr hmh kɒrhɒjj kh mj‌knd ʔɒdl ɒst ɒmɒ mɒ bh آvɒz ɒv ɡvʃ ŋrftjm «پs ɒlɒn‌ɒj xdɒvnd xdɒj mɒ kh ɣvm xvd rɒ bh‌dst ɣvj ɒz zmjn msr bjrvn آvrdh، ɒsmj brɒj xvd پjdɒ krdh‌ɒj، t͡ʃnɒnkh ɒmrvzʃdh ɒst، mɒ ɡnɒh vrzjdh v ʃrɒrt nmvdh‌ɒjm ‌ɒj xdɒvnd msɒlt آnkh brhsb tmɒmj ʔdɒlt xvd xʃm v ɣzb xvjʃ rɒ ɒz ʃhrxvd ɒvrʃljm v ɒz kvh mɣds xvd brɡrdɒnj zjrɒbh‌sbb ɡnɒhɒn mɒ v mʔsjthɒj پdrɒn mɒ ɒvrʃljm v ɣvm tv nzd hmh md͡ʒɒvrɒn mɒ rsvɒ ʃdh ɒst پs hɒl‌ɒj xdɒj mɒ dʔɒ v tzrʔɒt bndh xvd rɒ ɒd͡ʒɒbt frmɒ v rvj xvd rɒ br mɣds xvjʃ kh xrɒb ʃdh ɒst bh‌xɒtr xdɒvndjt mtd͡ʒlj frmɒ ‌ɒj xdɒjm ɡvʃ xvd rɒ frɒɡjr vbʃnv v t͡ʃʃmɒn xvd rɒ bɒz kn v bh xrɒbjhɒj mɒ vʃhrj kh bh ɒsm tv msmj ɒst nzr frmɒ، zjrɒkh mɒ tzrʔɒt xvd rɒ nh brɒj ʔdɒlt xvjʃ blkh brɒj rhmthɒj ʔzjm tv bh hzvr tvmj nmɒjjm ‌ɒj xdɒvnd bʃnv ɒj xdɒvndbjɒmrz ɒj xdɒvnd ɒstmɒʔ nmvdh، bh ʔml آvr ɒj xdɒj mn bh‌xɒtr xvdt tɒxjr mnmɒzjrɒ kh ʃhr tv v ɣvm tv bh ɒsm tv msmj mj‌bɒʃnd» v t͡ʃvn mn hnvz sxn mj‌ɡftm v dʔɒmj nmvdm v bh ɡnɒhɒn xvd v ɡnɒhɒn ɣvm xvjʃ ɒsrɒئjl ɒʔtrɒf mj‌krdm v tzrʔɒt xvd rɒbrɒj kvh mɣds xdɒjm bh hzvr jhvh xdɒj xvjʃ mʔrvz mj‌dɒʃtm، t͡ʃvn hnvz dr dʔɒmtklm mj‌bvdm، آn mrd d͡ʒbrɒئjl kh ɒv rɒ drrvjɒj ɒvl djdh bvdm bsrʔt پrvɒz nmvdh، bh vɣt hdjh ʃɒm nzd mn rsjd، v mrɒ ɒʔlɒm nmvdv bɒ mn mtklm ʃdh، ɡft «ɒj dɒnjɒl ɒlɒn mn bjrvn آmdh‌ɒm tɒ tv rɒ ftɒnt v fhm bxʃm drɒbtdɒj tzrʔɒt tv ɒmr sɒdr ɡrdjd v mn آmdm tɒtv rɒ xbr dhm zjrɒ kh tv bsjɒr mhbvb hstj، پs dr ɒjn klɒm tɒml kn v rvjɒ rɒ fhm nmɒ hftɒd hfth brɒj ɣvm tv v brɒj ʃhr mɣdst mɣrr mj‌bɒʃd tɒ tɣsjrhɒj آnhɒ tmɒm ʃvd vɡnɒhɒn آnhɒ bh ɒnd͡ʒɒm rsd v kfɒrh bh d͡ʒht ʔsjɒn krdh ʃvd v ʔdɒlt d͡ʒɒvdɒnj آvrdh ʃvd v rvjɒ vnbvt mxtvm ɡrdd v ɣds‌ɒlɒɣdɒs msh ʃvd پs bdɒn v bfhm kh ɒz sdvr frmɒn bh d͡ʒht tʔmjr nmvdn v bnɒkrdn ɒvrʃljm tɒ zhvr msjh rئjs، hft hfth v ʃst v dv hfth xvɒhd bvdv ɒvrʃljm bɒ kvt͡ʃh‌hɒ v hsɒr dr zmɒnhɒj tŋj tʔmjr v bnɒ xvɒhd ʃd v bʔd ɒz آn ʃst v dv hfth، msjh mnɣtʔ xvɒhd ɡrdjd vɒz آn ɒv nxvɒhd bvd، blkh ɣvm آn rئjs kh mj‌آjd ʃhr v ɣds rɒ xrɒb xvɒhnd sɒxt vآxr ɒv dr آn sjlɒb xvɒhd bvd v tɒ آxr d͡ʒŋ xrɒbjhɒ mʔjn ɒstv ɒv bɒ ɒʃxɒs bsjɒr drjk hfth ʔhd rɒ ɒstvɒr xvɒhd sɒxt v dr nsf آn hfth ɣrbɒnj v hdjh rɒ mvɣvf xvɒhdkrd v br kŋrh rd͡ʒɒsɒt xrɒb knndh‌ɒj xvɒhdآmd vɒlj ɒlnhɒjt آnt͡ʃh mɣdr ɒst br xrɒb knndh rjxth xvɒhd ʃd» v ɒv bɒ ɒʃxɒs bsjɒr drjk hfth ʔhd rɒ ɒstvɒr xvɒhd sɒxt v dr nsf آn hfth ɣrbɒnj v hdjh rɒ mvɣvf xvɒhdkrd v br kŋrh rd͡ʒɒsɒt xrɒb knndh‌ɒj xvɒhdآmd vɒlj ɒlnhɒjt آnt͡ʃh mɣdr ɒst br xrɒb knndh rjxth xvɒhd ʃd» dr sɒl svm kvrʃ پɒdʃɒh fɒrs، ɒmrj br dɒnjɒl kh bh bltʃsr msmj bvd kʃf ɡrdjd v آn ɒmr shjh v mʃɣt ʔzjmj bvd پs ɒmr rɒ fhmjd v rvjɒ rɒ dɒnst dr آn ɒjɒm mn dɒnjɒl sh hfth tmɒm mɒtm ɡrftm xvrɒk lzjz nxvrdm v ɡvʃt v ʃrɒb bh dhɒnm dɒxl nʃd v tɒ ɒnɣzɒj آn sh hfth xvjʃtn rɒ tdhjn nnmvdm v dr rvz bjst vt͡ʃhɒrm mɒh ɒvl mn br knɒr nhr ʔzjm jʔnj dd͡ʒlh bvdm v t͡ʃʃmɒn xvd rɒ brɒfrɒʃth djdm kh nɒɡɒh mrdj mlbs bh ktɒn kh kmrbndj ɒz tlɒj ɒv fɒz br kmr xvd dɒʃt، v d͡ʒsd ɒv msl zbrd͡ʒd vrvj vj mɒnnd brɣ v t͡ʃʃmɒnʃ msl ʃʔlh hɒj آtʃ v bɒzvhɒ v پɒjhɒjʃ mɒnnd rŋ brnd͡ʒ sjɣlj v آvɒz klɒm ɒv msl sdɒj ɡrvh ɒd͡ʒl xvd xvɒhd rsjd v mʔjnj nxvɒhd dɒʃt «v dr آn zmɒn mjkɒئjl، ɒmjr ʔzjmj kh brɒj پsrɒn ɣvm tv ɒjstɒdh ɒst xvɒhd brxɒst v t͡ʃnɒn zmɒn tŋj xvɒhd ʃdkh ɒz hjnj kh ɒmtj bh vd͡ʒvd آmdh ɒst tɒ ɒmrvznbvdh v dr آnzmɒn hr jk ɒz ɣvm tv kh dr dftrmktvb jɒft ʃvd rstɡɒr xvɒhd ʃd vbsjɒrj ɒz آnɒnj kh dr xɒk zmjn xvɒbjdh ɒndbjdɒr xvɒhnd ʃd، ɒmɒ ɒjnɒn bh d͡ʒht hjɒt d͡ʒɒvdɒnj v آnɒn bh d͡ʒht xd͡ʒɒlt v hɣɒrt d͡ʒɒvdɒnj v hkjmɒn msl rvʃnɒjj ɒflɒk xvɒhnd drxʃjd v آnɒnj kh bsjɒrj rɒ bh rɒh ʔdɒlt rhbrj mj‌nmɒjnd mɒnnd stɒrɡɒn xvɒhndbvd tɒ ɒbdɒlɒbɒd ɒmɒ tv‌ɒj dɒnjɒl klɒm rɒ mxfj dɒr v ktɒb rɒ tɒ zmɒn آxr mhr kn bsjɒrj bsrʔt trdd xvɒhnd nmvd v ʔlm ɒfzvdh xvɒhdɡrdjd» پs mn dɒnjɒl nzr krdm v ɒjnk dv nfr djɡrjkj bh ɒjntrf v djɡrj bh آntrf nhr ɒjstɒdh bvdnd v jkj ɒz ɒjʃɒn bh آn mrd mlbs bh ktɒn kh bɒlɒj آbhɒj nhr ɒjstɒdh bvd ɡft «ɒnthɒj ɒjn ʔd͡ʒɒjb tɒ bkj xvɒhd bvd؟» v آn mrd mlbs bh ktɒn rɒ kh bɒlɒj آbhɒj nhr ɒjstɒdh bvd ʃnjdm kh dst rɒst v dst t͡ʃپ xvd rɒ bsvj آsmɒn brɒfrɒʃth، bh hj ɒbdj ɣsm xvrd kh brɒj zmɒnj v dv zmɒn v nsf zmɒn xvɒhd bvd v t͡ʃvn پrɒkndɡj ɣvt ɣvm mɣds bh ɒnd͡ʒɒm rsd، آŋɒh hmh ɒjn ɒmvr bh ɒtmɒm xvɒhd rsjd v mn ʃnjdm ɒmɒ drk nkrdm پs ɡftm «ɒj آɣɒjm آxr ɒjn ɒmvr t͡ʃh xvɒhd bvd؟» ɒv d͡ʒvɒb dɒd kh «ɒj dɒnjɒl brv zjrɒ ɒjn klɒm tɒ zmɒn آxrmxfj v mxtvm ʃdh ɒst bsjɒrj tɒhr vsfjd v msfj xvɒhnd ɡrdjd v ʃrjrɒn ʃrɒrt xvɒhnd vrzjd v hjt͡ʃ kdɒm ɒz ʃrjrɒn nxvɒhndfhmjd ljkn hkjmɒn xvɒhnd fhmjd v ɒzhŋɒm mvɣvf ʃdn ɣrbɒnj dɒjmj v nsb nmvdn rd͡ʒɒst vjrɒnj، hzɒr v dvjst v nvd rvzxvɒhd bvdxvʃɒbh‌hɒl آnkh ɒntzɒr kʃd v bh hzɒr v sjsd v sj v پnd͡ʒ rvz brsd xvʃɒbh‌hɒl آnkh ɒntzɒr kʃd v bh hzɒr v sjsd v sj v پnd͡ʒ rvz brsd آhɒz v hzɣjɒ پɒdʃɒhɒn jhvdɒ v dr ɒjɒm jrbʔɒm bn jvآʃ پɒdʃɒh ɒsrɒئjl، br hvʃʔ bn bئjrj nɒzl ʃd ɒbtdɒj klɒm xdɒvnd bh hvʃʔ xdɒvnd bh hvʃʔ ɡft «brv v znj zɒnjh v ɒvlɒd znɒkɒr brɒj xvd bɡjr zjrɒ kh ɒjn zmjn ɒz xdɒvnd brɡʃth، sxt znɒkɒr ʃdh‌ɒnd» پs rft v d͡ʒvmr dxtrdblɒjm rɒ ɡrft v ɒv hɒmlh ʃdh، پsrj brɒjʃ zɒjjd v xdɒvnd vj rɒ ɡft «ɒv rɒ jzrʔjl nɒm bnh zjrɒ kh bʔd ɒz ɒndk zmɒnj ɒntɣɒm xvn jzrʔjl rɒ ɒz xɒndɒn jjhv xvɒhm ɡrft v mmlkt xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl rɒ tlf xvɒhm sɒxt v dr آn rvzkmɒn ɒsrɒئjl rɒ dr vɒdj jzrʔjl xvɒhm ʃkst» پs bɒr djɡr hɒmlh ʃdh، dxtrj zɒjjd v ɒvvj rɒ ɡft «ɒv rɒ lvrvhɒmh nɒm bɡzɒr، zjrɒ bɒrdjɡr br xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl rhmt nxvɒhm frmvd، blkh ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz mjɒn bɒlkl xvɒhm brdɒʃt ljkn br xɒndɒn jhvdɒ rhmt xvɒhm frmvd vɒjʃɒn rɒ bh jhvh xdɒj ɒjʃɒn nd͡ʒɒt xvɒhm dɒd vɒjʃɒn rɒ bh kmɒn v ʃmʃjr v d͡ʒŋ v ɒsbɒn vsvɒrɒn nxvɒhm rhɒnjd» v t͡ʃvn lvrvhɒmh rɒ ɒz ʃjr bɒzdɒʃth bvd، hɒmlh ʃdh، پsrj zɒjjd v ɒv ɡft «nɒm ɒv rɒlvʔmj bxvɒn zjrɒ kh ʃmɒ ɣvm mn njstjd v mn xdɒj ʃmɒ njstm ljkn ʃmɒrh bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl msl rjɡ drjɒ xvɒhd bvd kh ntvɒn پjmvd v ntvɒn ʃmrd v dr mkɒnj kh bh ɒjʃɒn ɡfth mj‌ʃd ʃmɒɣvm mn njstjd، dr آnd͡ʒɒ ɡfth xvɒhd ʃd پsrɒn xdɒj hj mj‌bɒʃjdv bnj jhvdɒ vbnj‌ɒsrɒئjl bɒ hm d͡ʒmʔ xvɒhnd ʃd v jk rئjs bh d͡ʒht xvd nsb nmvdh، ɒz آn zmjn brxvɒhndآmd zjrɒ kh rvz jzrʔjl، rvz ʔzjmj xvɒhdbvd» v bnj jhvdɒ vbnj‌ɒsrɒئjl bɒ hm d͡ʒmʔ xvɒhnd ʃd v jk rئjs bh d͡ʒht xvd nsb nmvdh، ɒz آn zmjn brxvɒhndآmd zjrɒ kh rvz jzrʔjl، rvz ʔzjmj xvɒhdbvd» bh brɒdrɒn xvd ʔmj bɡvjjd v bh xvɒhrɒn xvjʃ rvhɒmh mhɒd͡ʒh nmɒjjd bɒ mɒdrxvd mhɒd͡ʒh nmɒjjd zjrɒ kh ɒv zn mn njst v mn ʃvhr ɒv njstm lhzɒ znɒj xvd rɒ ɒz پjʃ rvjʃ v fɒhʃɡj xvjʃ rɒ ɒz mjɒn پstɒnhɒjʃ rfʔ bnmɒjd mbɒdɒ rxt ɒv rɒ kndh، vj rɒ brhnh nmɒjm v ɒv rɒ msl rvz vlɒdtʃ ɡrdɒnjdh، mɒnndbjɒbɒn vɒɡzɒrm v msl zmjn xʃk ɡrdɒnjdh، bh tʃŋj bkʃm v br پsrɒnʃ rhmt nxvɒhm frmvd t͡ʃvnkh frzndɒn znɒ mj‌bɒʃnd zjrɒ mɒdrɒjʃɒn znɒ nmvdh v vɒldh ɒjʃɒn bj‌ʃrmj krdh ɒst kh ɡft «dr ʔɣb ʔɒʃɣɒn xvd kh nɒn vآb v پʃm v ktɒn v rvɣn v ʃrbt bh mn dɒdh ɒndxvɒhm rft» bnɒbrɒjn، rɒh tv rɒ bh xɒrhɒxvɒhm bst v ɡrd ɒv djvɒrj bnɒ xvɒhm nmvd tɒrɒhhɒj xvd rɒ njɒbd v hr‌t͡ʃnd ʔɒʃɣɒn xvd rɒtʔɒɣb nmɒjd bh ɒjʃɒn nxvɒhd rsjd v hr‌t͡ʃndɒjʃɒn rɒ btlbd nxvɒhd jɒft پs xvɒhd ɡft «mj‌rvm v nzd ʃvhr nxstjn xvd brmj ɡrdm zjrɒ dr آnvɣt ɒz knvn mrɒ xvʃtr mj‌ɡzʃt» ɒmɒ ɒv nmj dɒnst kh mn bvdm kh ɡndm v ʃjrh v rvɣn rɒ bh ɒv mj‌dɒdm v nɣrh v tlɒjj rɒ kh brɒj bʔl srf mj‌krdnd brɒjʃ mj‌ɒfzvdm پs mn ɡndm xvd rɒ dr fslʃ v ʃjrh xvjʃ rɒ drmvsmʃ bɒz xvɒhm ɡrft v پʃm v ktɒn xvd rɒkh mj‌bɒjst brhŋj ɒv rɒ bپvʃɒnd brxvɒhm dɒʃt v ɒlɒn ɣbɒht ɒv rɒ bh nzr ʔɒʃɣɒnʃ mnkʃf xvɒhm sɒxt v ɒhdj ɒv rɒ ɒz dst mn nxvɒhd rhɒnjd v tmɒmj ʃɒdj ɒv v ʔjdhɒv hlɒlhɒ v sbt‌hɒ v d͡ʒmjʔ mvɒsmʃ rɒ mvɣvf xvɒhm sɒxt v mvhɒ v ɒnd͡ʒjrhɒjʃ rɒ kh ɡfth bvd ɒjnhɒ ɒd͡ʒrt mn mj‌bɒʃd kh ʔɒʃɣɒnm bh mn dɒdh‌ɒnd، vjrɒn xvɒhm sɒxt v آnhɒ rɒ d͡ʒŋl xvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd tɒ hjvɒnɒt shrɒ آnhɒ rɒ bxvrnd v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh ɒntɣɒm rvzhɒj bʔljm rɒ ɒz ɒv xvɒhm kʃjd kh brɒj آnhɒ bxvrmj svzɒnjd v xvjʃtn rɒ bh ɡvʃvɒrhɒ vzjvrhɒj xvd آrɒjʃ dɒdh، ɒz ʔɣb ʔɒʃɣɒn xvdmj rft v mrɒ frɒmvʃ krdh bvd bnɒbrɒjn ɒjnk ɒv rɒ frjfth، bh bjɒbɒn xvɒhm آvrd v sxnɒn dlɒvjz bh ɒv xvɒhm ɡft v tɒkstɒnhɒjʃ rɒ ɒz آnd͡ʒɒ bh vj xvɒhm dɒd v vɒdj ʔxvr rɒ bh drvɒzh ɒmjd mbdl xvɒhm sɒxt v dr آnd͡ʒɒ mɒnnd ɒjɒm d͡ʒvɒnj‌ɒʃ v msl rvz bjrvn آmdnʃ ɒz zmjn msrxvɒhd srɒjjd v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh «dr آn rvz mrɒɒjʃj jʔnj ʃvhr mn xvɒhd xvɒnd v djɡr mrɒbʔlj nxvɒhd ɡft، zjrɒ kh nɒmhɒj bʔljm rɒ ɒzdhɒnʃ dvr xvɒhm krd kh bɒr djɡr bh nɒmhɒj xvd mzkvr nʃvnd v dr آn rvz bh d͡ʒht ɒjʃɒn bɒ hjvɒnɒt shrɒ v mrɣɒn hvɒ v hʃrɒt zmjn ʔhd xvɒhm bst v kmɒn v ʃmʃjr v d͡ʒŋ rɒ ɒz zmjn xvɒhm ʃkst v ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh ɒmnjt xvɒhm xvɒbɒnjd v tv rɒ tɒ bh ɒbd nɒmzd xvdxvɒhm sɒxt v tv rɒ bh ʔdɒlt v ɒnsɒf v rɒft v rhmɒnjt nɒmzd xvd xvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd vt͡ʃvn tv rɒ bh ɒmɒnt nɒmzd xvd sɒxtm آŋɒh jhvh rɒ xvɒhj ʃnɒxt» v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd «mn xtɒb xvɒhm krd، آsmɒnhɒ rɒ xtɒb xvɒhm krd v آnhɒ zmjn rɒxtɒb xvɒhnd krd v zmjn ɡndm v ʃjrh vrvɣn rɒ xtɒb xvɒhd krd v آnhɒ jzrʔjl rɒxtɒb xvɒhnd krdv ɒv rɒ brɒj xvd drzmjn xvɒhm kʃt v br lvrvhɒmh rhmt xvɒhm frmvd v bh lvʔmj xvɒhm ɡft tv ɣvm mn hstj v ɒv d͡ʒvɒb xvɒhd dɒd tv xdɒj mn mj‌bɒʃj» v ɒv rɒ brɒj xvd drzmjn xvɒhm kʃt v br lvrvhɒmh rhmt xvɒhm frmvd v bh lvʔmj xvɒhm ɡft tv ɣvm mn hstj v ɒv d͡ʒvɒb xvɒhd dɒd tv xdɒj mn mj‌bɒʃj» v xdɒvnd mrɒ ɡft «bɒr djɡr brv v znj rɒkh mhbvbh ʃvhr xvd v zɒnjh mj‌bɒʃd dvst bdɒr، t͡ʃnɒnkh xdɒvnd bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl rɒdvst mj‌dɒrd bɒ آnkh ɒjʃɒn bh xdɒjɒn ɣjr mɒjl mj‌bɒʃnd v ɣrshɒj kʃmʃ rɒ dvst mj‌dɒrnd» پs ɒv rɒ brɒj xvd bh پɒnzdh msɣɒl nɣrh v jk hvmr v nsf hvmr d͡ʒv xrjdm، vɒv rɒ ɡftm «brɒj mn rvzhɒj bsjɒr tvɣf xvɒhj nmvd v znɒ mkn v ɒz آn mrd djɡr mbɒʃ vmn njz ɒz آn tv xvɒhm bvd» zjrɒ kh bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl ɒjɒm bsjɒrj bdvn پɒdʃɒh v bdvn rئjs v bdvn ɣrbɒnj v bdvn tmsɒl v bdvn ɒjfvd v trɒfjm xvɒhnd mɒndv bʔd ɒz آn bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl bɒzɡʃt nmvdh، jhvh xdɒj xvjʃ v پɒdʃɒh xvd dɒvd rɒ xvɒhnd tlbjd v dr ɒjɒm bɒzپsjn bsvj xdɒvnd v ɒhsɒn ɒv bɒ trs xvɒhnd آmd v bʔd ɒz آn bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl bɒzɡʃt nmvdh، jhvh xdɒj xvjʃ v پɒdʃɒh xvd dɒvd rɒ xvɒhnd tlbjd v dr ɒjɒm bɒzپsjn bsvj xdɒvnd v ɒhsɒn ɒv bɒ trs xvɒhnd آmd ɒj bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl klɒm xdɒvnd rɒ bʃnvjdzjrɒ xdɒvnd rɒ bɒ sɒknɒn zmjn mhɒkmh‌ɒj ɒst t͡ʃvnkh nh rɒstj v nh rɒft v nh mʔrft xdɒdr zmjn mj‌bɒʃd blkh lʔnt v drvɣ v ɣtl vdzdj v znɒkɒrj v tʔdj mj‌nmɒjnd v xvnrjzj bh xvnrjzj mlhɣ mj‌ʃvd bnɒbrɒjn، zmjn mɒtm mj‌knd v hmh sɒknɒnʃ bɒ hjvɒnɒt shrɒ vmrɣɒn hvɒ kɒhjdh mj‌ʃvnd v mɒhjɒn drjɒ njz tlf mj‌ɡrdnd ɒmɒ ɒhdj md͡ʒɒdlh nnmɒjd v ɒhdj tvbjx nknd، zjrɒ kh ɣvm tv msl md͡ʒɒdlh knndɡɒn bɒkɒhnɒn mj‌bɒʃnd v tv dr vɣt rvz xvɒhj lɣzjd v nbj njz bɒ tv dr vɣt ʃb xvɒhd lɣzjd vmn mɒdr tv rɒ hlɒk xvɒhm sɒxt ɣvm mn ɒz ʔdm mʔrft hlɒk ʃdh‌ɒnd t͡ʃvnkh tv mʔrft rɒ trk nmvdj mn njz tv rɒ trk nmvdm kh brɒj mn kɒhn nʃvj v t͡ʃvnkh ʃrjʔt xdɒj xvd rɒ frɒmvʃ krdj mn njz frzndɒn tvrɒ frɒmvʃ xvɒhm nmvd hr ɣdr kh ɒjʃɒn ɒfzvdh ʃdnd، hmɒn ɣdr bh mn ɡnɒh vrzjdnd پs d͡ʒlɒl ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh rsvɒjj mbdl xvɒhm sɒxt ɡnɒh ɣvm mrɒ xvrɒk xvd sɒxtnd v dl xvjʃ rɒ bh ʔsjɒn ɒjʃɒn mʃɣvl nmvdnd v kɒhnɒn msl ɣvm xvɒhnd bvd v ʔɣvbt rɒhhɒj ɒjʃɒn rɒbr ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm rsɒnjd v d͡ʒzɒj ɒʔmɒl ɒjʃɒn rɒbh ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm dɒd v xvɒhnd xvrd ɒmɒ sjrnxvɒhd ʃd v znɒ xvɒhnd krd، ɒmɒ ɒfzvdh nxvɒhnd ɡrdjd zjrɒ kh ʔbɒdt xdɒvnd rɒ trk nmvdh‌ɒnd znɒ v ʃrɒb v ʃjrh dl ɒjʃɒn rɒmj rbɒjd ɣvm mn ɒz t͡ʃvb xvd msئlt mj‌knnd vʔsɒj ɒjʃɒn bdjʃɒn xbr mj‌dhd zjrɒ kh rvh znɒkɒrj ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɡmrɒh krdh ɒst v ɒz ɒtɒʔt xdɒj xvd znɒ krdh‌ɒnd br ɣlh hɒj kvhhɒɣrbɒnj mj‌ɡzrɒnnd v br tlhɒ zjr drxtɒn blvt vsfjddɒr v vn، t͡ʃvnkh sɒjh xvb dɒrd، bxvrmj svzɒnnd ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht dxtrɒn ʃmɒ znɒmj knnd v ʔrvshɒj ʃmɒ fɒhʃh ɡrj mj‌nmɒjnd v mn dxtrɒn ʃmɒ rɒ hjnj kh znɒ mj‌knnd vʔrvshɒj ʃmɒ rɒ hjnj kh fɒhʃh ɡrj mj‌nmɒjnd szɒ nxvɒhm dɒd zjrɒ kh xvd ɒjʃɒn bɒzɒnjh‌hɒ ʔzlt mj‌ɡzjnnd v bɒ fɒhʃh‌hɒ ɣrbɒnj mj‌ɡzrɒnnd پs ɣvmj kh fhm ndɒrnd xvɒhndɒftɒd ‌ɒj ɒsrɒئjl ɒɡr tv znɒ mj‌knj، jhvdɒmrtkb d͡ʒrm nʃvd پs bh d͡ʒld͡ʒɒl nrvjd v bh bjt آvn brnjɒjjd v bh hjɒt jhvh ɣsm nxvrjd bh drstj kh ɒsrɒئjl msl ɡɒv srkʃ، srkʃj nmvdh ɒst ɒlɒn xdɒvnd ɒjʃɒn rɒ msl brh‌hɒ drmrtʔ vsjʔ xvɒhd t͡ʃrɒnjd ɒfrɒjm bh bthɒmlsɣ ʃdh ɒst؛ پs ɒv rɒ vɒɡzɒrjd hjnj kh bzm ɒjʃɒn tmɒm ʃvd mrtkb znɒ mj‌ʃvnd vhɒkmɒn ɒjʃɒn ɒftzɒh rɒ bsjɒr dvst mj‌dɒrndbɒd ɒjʃɒn rɒ dr bɒlhɒj xvd frv xvɒhd پjt͡ʃjdv ɒjʃɒn ɒz ɣrbɒnj hɒj xvjʃ xd͡ʒl xvɒhndʃd bɒd ɒjʃɒn rɒ dr bɒlhɒj xvd frv xvɒhd پjt͡ʃjdv ɒjʃɒn ɒz ɣrbɒnj hɒj xvjʃ xd͡ʒl xvɒhndʃd ɒj kɒhnɒn ɒjn rɒ bʃnvjd v‌ɒj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl ɒsɣɒ nmɒjjd v‌ɒj xɒndɒn پɒdʃɒhɒn ɡvʃ ɡjrjd، zjrɒ kh ɒjn ftvj brɒj ʃmɒst t͡ʃvnkh ʃmɒ dr msfh dɒm ʃdjd v tvrj ɡstrdh ʃdh، br tɒbvr ʔɒsjɒn dr kʃtɒr mbɒlɣh nmvdh‌ɒnd؛ پs mn hmɡj ɒjʃɒn rɒ tɒdjb xvɒhm nmvd mn ɒfrɒjm rɒ mj‌ʃnɒsm v ɒsrɒئjl ɒz mn mxfj njst zjrɒ kh hɒl، tv‌ɒj ɒfrɒjm mrtkb znɒ ʃdh‌ɒj v ɒsrɒئjl xvjʃtn rɒ nd͡ʒs sɒxth ɒst kɒrhɒj ɒjʃɒn mɒnʔ mj‌ʃvd kh bsvj xdɒ bɒzɡʃt nmɒjnd t͡ʃvnkh rvh znɒkɒrj drɣlb ɒjʃɒn ɒst v xdɒvnd rɒ nmj ʃnɒsnd vfxr ɒsrɒئjl پjʃ rvj ɒjʃɒn ʃhɒdt mj‌dhd ɒsrɒئjl v ɒfrɒjm dr ɡnɒh xvd mj‌lɣznd v jhvdɒnjz hmrɒh ɒjʃɒn xvɒhd lɣzjd ɡvsfndɒn vɡɒvɒn xvd rɒ mj‌آvrnd tɒ xdɒvnd rɒ btlbnd، ɒmɒ ɒvrɒ nxvɒhnd jɒft t͡ʃvnkh xvd rɒ ɒz ɒjʃɒn dvrsɒxth ɒst bh xdɒvnd xjɒnt vrzjdh‌ɒnd zjrɒfrzndɒn ɒd͡ʒnbj tvljd nmvdh‌ɒnd ɒlɒn hlɒlhɒ ɒjʃɒn rɒ bɒ mlkhɒj ɒjʃɒn xvɒhd blʔjd dr d͡ʒbʔh krnɒ v dr rɒmh srnɒ bnvɒzjd v drbjt آvn sdɒ bznjd dr ʔɣb tv‌ɒj bnjɒmjn ɒfrɒjm dr rvz ʔtɒb xrɒb xvɒhd ʃd dr mjɒn ɒsbɒt ɒsrɒئjl bh jɣjn ɒʔlɒm nmvdm srvrɒn ɒsrɒئjl msl nɣl knndɡɒn hdvd mj‌bɒʃnd پs xʃm xvjʃ rɒ msl آb br ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm rjxt ɒfrɒjm mɣhvr ʃdh v dr dɒvrj kvfth ɡrdjdh ɒst zjrɒ kh bh پjrvj tɣɒljd xrsndmj bɒʃd bnɒbrɒjn mn brɒj ɒfrɒjm msl bjdʃdh‌ɒm v brɒj xɒndɒn jhvdɒ mɒnnd پvsjdɡj t͡ʃvn ɒfrɒjm bjmɒrj xvd rɒ v jhvdɒ d͡ʒrɒht xvjʃ rɒ djdnd، ɒfrɒjm bh آʃvr rfth v nzdپɒdʃɒhj kh dʃmn bvd frstɒdh ɒst ɒmɒ ɒv ʃmɒrɒ ʃfɒ nmj tvɒnd dɒd v d͡ʒrɒht ʃmɒ rɒ ɒltjɒm ntvɒnd nmvd v mn brɒj ɒfrɒjm msl ʃjr v brɒj xɒndɒn jhvdɒ mɒnnd ʃjr ʒjɒn xvɒhm bvd mn xvdm xvɒhm drjd v rfth xvɒhm rbvd vrhɒnndh‌ɒj nxvɒhd bvdmn rvɒnh ʃdh، bh mkɒn xvd xvɒhm brɡʃt tɒ ɒjʃɒn bh ʔsjɒn xvdɒʔtrɒf nmvdh، rvj mrɒ btlbnd dr tŋj xvdsbh zvd mrɒ xvɒhnd tlbjd mn rvɒnh ʃdh، bh mkɒn xvd xvɒhm brɡʃt tɒ ɒjʃɒn bh ʔsjɒn xvdɒʔtrɒf nmvdh، rvj mrɒ btlbnd dr tŋj xvdsbh zvd mrɒ xvɒhnd tlbjd bjɒjjd nzd xdɒvnd bɒzɡʃt nmɒjjm zjrɒ kh ɒv drjdh ɒst v mɒ rɒ ʃfɒ xvɒhd dɒd؛ ɒvzdh ɒst v mɒ rɒ ʃksth bndj xvɒhd nmvd bʔdɒz dv rvz mɒ rɒ zndh xvɒhd krd dr rvz svm mɒ rɒxvɒhd brxjzɒnjd v dr hzvr ɒv zjst xvɒhjm nmvd پs xdɒvnd rɒ bʃnɒsjm v bh d͡ʒd v d͡ʒhdmʔrft ɒv rɒ tʔɒɣb nmɒjjm tlvʔ ɒv msl fd͡ʒrjɣjn ɒst v br mɒ msl bɒrɒn v mɒnnd bɒrɒn آxr kh zmjn rɒ sjrɒb mj‌knd xvɒhd آmd ‌ɒj ɒfrɒjm bɒ tv t͡ʃh knm؟ ɒj jhvdɒ bɒ tv t͡ʃh knm؟ zjrɒ njkvjj tv msl ɒbrhɒj sbh v mɒnnd ʃbnm ɒst kh bzvdj mj‌ɡzrd bnɒbrɒjn mn ɒjʃɒn rɒ bvsjlh ɒnbjɒ ɣtʔ nmvdm v bh sxnɒn dhɒn xvd ɒjʃɒn rɒ kʃtm v dɒvrj mn msl nvr sɒtʔ mj‌ʃvd zjrɒ kh rhmt rɒ پsnd krdm v nh ɣrbɒnj rɒ v mʔrft xdɒ rɒ bjʃtr ɒz ɣrbɒnj hɒj svxtnj ɒmɒ ɒjʃɒn msl آdm ɒz ʔhd td͡ʒɒvznmvdnd v drآnd͡ʒɒ bh mn xjɒnt vrzjdnd d͡ʒlʔɒdʃhr ɡnɒhkɒrɒn v xvn آlvd ɒst v t͡ʃnɒnkh rhznɒn brɒj mrdm dr kmjn mj‌bɒʃnd، hmt͡ʃnɒn d͡ʒmʔjt kɒhnɒn dr rɒh ʃkjm mj‌kʃnd zjrɒ kh ɒjʃɒn mrtkb ɣbɒht ʃdh‌ɒnd dr xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl ʔmlj hvlnɒk djdm ɒfrɒjm dr آnd͡ʒɒmrtkb znɒ ʃdh، ɒsrɒئjl xvjʃtn rɒ nd͡ʒs sɒxth ɒstv brɒj tv njz‌ɒj jhvdɒ hsɒdj mʔjn ʃdh ɒst hŋɒmj kh ɒsjrj ɣvm xvd rɒxvɒhm brɡrdɒnjd v brɒj tv njz‌ɒj jhvdɒ hsɒdj mʔjn ʃdh ɒst hŋɒmj kh ɒsjrj ɣvm xvd rɒxvɒhm brɡrdɒnjd t͡ʃvn ɒsrɒئjl rɒ ʃfɒ mj‌dɒdm، آŋɒh ɡnɒh ɒfrɒjm v ʃrɒrt sɒmrh mnkʃf ɡrdjd، zjrɒ kh mrtkb frjb ʃdh‌ɒnd dzdɒn dɒxl mj‌ʃvnd v rhznɒn dr bjrvn tɒrɒd͡ʒ mj‌nmɒjnd vdr dl xvd tfkr nmj knnd kh mn tmɒmj ʃrɒrt ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh jɒd آvrdh‌ɒm ɒlɒn ɒʔmɒlʃɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒɒhɒth mj‌nmɒjd v آnhɒ dr nzr mn vɒɣʔ ʃdh ɒst پɒdʃɒh rɒ bʃrɒrt xvjʃ v srvrɒn rɒ bh drvɣhɒj xvd ʃɒdmɒn mj‌sɒznd d͡ʒmjʔ ɒjʃɒn znɒkɒrnd msl tnvrj kh xbɒz آn rɒ mʃtʔl sɒzdkh bʔd ɒz srʃtn xmjr tɒ mxmr ʃdnʃ ɒzbrɒŋjxtn آtʃ bɒz mj‌ɒjstd dr jvm پɒdʃɒh mɒ، srvrɒn ɒz ɡrmj ʃrɒb، xvd rɒ bjmɒr sɒxtnd vɒv dst xvd rɒ bh ɒsthzɒknndɡɒn drɒz krd zjrɒ kh dl xvd rɒ bh mkɒjd xvjʃ msl tnvrnzdjk آvrdnd؛ v tmɒmj ʃb xbɒz ɒjʃɒn mj‌xvɒbd v sbhɡɒhɒn آn msl آtʃ mlthb mʃtʔl mj‌ʃvd d͡ʒmjʔ ɒjʃɒn msl tnvr ɡrm ʃdh، dɒvrɒn xvjʃ rɒ mj‌blʔnd v hmh پɒdʃɒhɒn ɒjʃɒn mj‌ɒftnd v dr mjɒn ɒjʃɒn ksj njst kh mrɒbxvɒnd ɒfrɒjm bɒ ɣvmhɒ mxlvt ʃdh ɒst ɒfrɒjm ɣrs nɒnj ɒst kh brɡrdɒnjdh nʃdh ɒst ɣrjbɒn ɣvtʃ rɒ xvrdh‌ɒnd v ɒv nmj dɒnd sfjdj br mvjhɒj ɒv پɒʃjdh ʃdh ɒst v ɒvnmj dɒnd fxr ɒsrɒئjl پjʃ rvjʃ ʃhɒdt mj‌dhd ɒmɒ ɒjʃɒn bh jhvh xdɒj xvd bɒzɡʃt nmj nmɒjnd v bɒ vd͡ʒvd ɒjn hmh ɒv rɒ nmj tlbnd ɒfrɒjm mɒnnd kbvtr sɒdh dl، bj‌fhm ɒst msr rɒ mj‌xvɒnnd v bsvj آʃvr mj‌rvnd vt͡ʃvn mj‌rvnd mn dɒm xvd rɒ br ɒjʃɒn mj‌ɡstrɒnm v ɒjʃɒn rɒ msl mrɣɒn hvɒ bh zjr mj‌ɒndɒzm vɒjʃɒn rɒ br vfɣ ɒxbɒrj kh bh d͡ʒmɒʔt ɒjʃɒn rsjdh ɒst، tɒdjb mj‌nmɒjm vɒj br ɒjʃɒn zjrɒ kh ɒz mn frɒr krdnd hlɒkt br ɒjʃɒn bɒd zjrɒkh bh mn ʔsjɒn vrzjdnd ɒɡr‌t͡ʃh mn ɒjʃɒn rɒfdjh dɒdm، lkn bh zd mn drvɣ ɡftnd v ɒz dl xvd nzd mn ɒstɣɒsh nmj nmɒjnd blkh br bstrhɒj xvd vlvlh mj‌knnd brɒj rvɣn v ʃrɒb d͡ʒmʔ ʃdh، br mn ftnh mj‌ɒŋjznd v ɒɡr‌t͡ʃh mn bɒzvhɒj ɒjʃɒn rɒ tʔljm dɒdm v tɣvjt nmvdm ljkn bɒ mn bdɒndjʃj nmvdndɒjʃɒn rd͡ʒvʔ mj‌knnd ɒmɒ nh bh hzrt ɒʔlj msl kmɒn xtɒknndh ʃdh‌ɒnd srvrɒn ɒjʃɒn bh‌sbb ɣjzzbɒn xvjʃ bh ʃmʃjr mj‌ɒftnd v bh‌sbb hmjn dr zmjn msr ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒsthzɒ xvɒhnd nmvd ɒjʃɒn rd͡ʒvʔ mj‌knnd ɒmɒ nh bh hzrt ɒʔlj msl kmɒn xtɒknndh ʃdh‌ɒnd srvrɒn ɒjʃɒn bh‌sbb ɣjzzbɒn xvjʃ bh ʃmʃjr mj‌ɒftnd v bh‌sbb hmjn dr zmjn msr ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒsthzɒ xvɒhnd nmvd krnɒ rɒ bh dhɒn xvd bɡzɒr ɒv msl ʔɣɒb bh zd xɒnh xdɒvnd mj‌آjd، zjrɒ kh ɒz ʔhdmn td͡ʒɒvz nmvdnd v bh ʃrjʔt mn ʔsjɒn vrzjdnd ɒsrɒئjl nzd mn frjɒd mj‌nmɒjnd kh‌ɒj xdɒj mɒ tv rɒ mj‌ʃnɒsjm ɒsrɒئjl njkvjj rɒtrk krdh ɒst پs dʃmn ɒv rɒ tʔɒɣb xvɒhdnmvd ɒjʃɒn پɒdʃɒhɒn nsb nmvdnd، ɒmɒ nh ɒzd͡ʒɒnb mn srvrɒn tʔjjn krdnd، ɒmɒ ɒjʃɒn rɒnʃnɒxtm ɒz nɣrh v tlɒj xvjʃ bthɒ brɒj xvdsɒxtnd tɒ mnɣtʔ bʃvnd ‌ɒj sɒmrh ɒv ɡvsɒlh tvrɒ rd nmvdh ɒst xʃm mn br ɒjʃɒn ɒfrvxth ʃd tɒ bh kj nmj tvɒnnd tɒhr bʃvnd؟ zjrɒ kh ɒjn njzɒz ɒsrɒئjl ɒst v snʔtɡr آn rɒ sɒxth ɒst، lhzɒ xdɒ njst ɒlbth ɡvsɒlh sɒmrh xrd xvɒhdʃd bh drstj kh bɒd rɒ kɒʃtnd، پs ɡrdbɒd rɒxvɒhnd drvjd آn rɒ mhsvl njst vxvʃh hɒjʃ آrd nxvɒhd dɒd v ɒɡr hm bdhd، ɣrjbɒn آn rɒ xvɒhnd blʔjd ɒsrɒئjl blʔjdh xvɒhd ʃd v ɒlɒn dr mjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ msl zrf nɒپsndjdh mj‌bɒʃnd zjrɒ kh ɒjʃɒn msl ɡvrxrtnhɒ v mnfrd bh آʃvr rfth‌ɒnd v ɒfrɒjm ʔɒʃɣɒn ɒd͡ʒjr krdh ɒst ɒɡr‌t͡ʃh ɒjʃɒn dr mjɒn ɒmt hɒɒd͡ʒrt mj‌dhnd، mn ɒlɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ d͡ʒmʔ xvɒhm krd v bh‌sbb stm پɒdʃɒh v srvrɒn rv bh tnɒɣz xvɒhnd nhɒd t͡ʃvnkh ɒfrɒjm mzbh hɒj bsjɒr brɒj ɡnɒh sɒxt پs mzbh‌hɒ brɒjʃ bɒʔs ɡnɒh ʃd ɒhkɒm bsjɒr ʃrjʔt xvd rɒ brɒj ɒv nvʃtm ɒmɒ آnhɒ rɒ msl t͡ʃjz ɣrjb ʃmrdnd ɣrbɒnj hɒj svxtnj mrɒ zbh krdnd tɒ ɡvʃt bxvrnd vxdɒvnd آnhɒ rɒ ɣbvl nkrd ɒlɒn ʔsjɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh jɒd mj‌آvrd v ʔɣvbt ɡnɒh rɒ br ɒjʃɒn mj‌rsɒnd vɒjʃɒn bh msr xvɒhnd brɡʃtɒsrɒئjl xɒlɣ xvd rɒ frɒmvʃ krdh، ɣsrhɒ bnɒ mj‌knd v jhvdɒʃhrhɒj hsɒrdɒr bsjɒr mj‌sɒzd ɒmɒ mn آtʃ bh ʃhrhɒjʃ xvɒhm frstɒd kh ɣsrhɒjʃ rɒbsvzɒnd ɒsrɒئjl xɒlɣ xvd rɒ frɒmvʃ krdh، ɣsrhɒ bnɒ mj‌knd v jhvdɒʃhrhɒj hsɒrdɒr bsjɒr mj‌sɒzd ɒmɒ mn آtʃ bh ʃhrhɒjʃ xvɒhm frstɒd kh ɣsrhɒjʃ rɒbsvzɒnd ɒj ɒsrɒئjl msl ɣvm‌hɒ ʃɒdj v vd͡ʒd mnmɒzjrɒ ɒz xdɒj xvd znɒ nmvdj v dr hmh xrmnhɒ ɒd͡ʒrt rɒ dvst dɒʃtj xrmnhɒ vt͡ʃrxʃthɒ ɒjʃɒn rɒ پrvrʃ nxvɒhd dɒd v ʃjrh dr آn zɒjʔ xvɒhd ʃd dr zmjn xdɒvnd sɒkn nxvɒhnd ʃd blkh ɒfrɒjm bh msr xvɒhd brɡʃt v ɒjʃɒn dr آʃvr t͡ʃjzhɒj nd͡ʒs xvɒhnd xvrd brɒj xdɒvnd ʃrɒb nxvɒhnd rjxt v mɣbvl ɒv nxvɒhnd ʃd ɣrbɒnj hɒj ɒjʃɒn msl xvrɒk mɒtmjɒn xvɒhd bvd v hrkh ɒz آnhɒ bxvrd nd͡ʒs xvɒhd ʃd، zjrɒ xvrɒk ɒjʃɒn brɒj ɒʃthɒj ɒjʃɒn ɒst پs آn dr xɒnh xdɒvnd dɒxl nxvɒhd ʃd پs dr ɒjɒm mvɒsm v dr ɒjɒm ʔjdhɒj xdɒvnd t͡ʃh xvɒhjd krd؟ zjrɒ ɒjnk ɒz trs hlɒkt rfth‌ɒnd، ɒmɒ msr ɒjʃɒn rɒ d͡ʒmʔ xvɒhdkrd v mvf ɒjʃɒn rɒ dfn xvɒhd nmvd mkɒnhɒj nfjsh nɣrh ɒjʃɒn rɒ xɒrhɒ bh tsrf xvɒhndɡrft v dr mnɒzl ɒjʃɒn ʃvkhɒ xvɒhd bvd ɒjɒm ʔɣvbt mj‌آjd ɒjɒm mkɒfɒt mj‌rsd v ɒsrɒئjl ɒjn rɒ xvɒhnd dɒnst nbj ɒhmɣ ɡrdjd v sɒhb rvh djvɒnh ʃd bh‌sbb ksrt ɡnɒh vfrɒvɒnj bɣz tv ɒfrɒjm ɒz d͡ʒɒnb xdɒj mn djdh bɒn bvd dɒm sjɒd br tmɒmj trjɣhɒj ɒnbjɒɡstrdh ʃd dr xɒnh xdɒj ɒjʃɒn ʔdɒvt ɒst msl ɒjɒm d͡ʒbʔh fsɒd rɒ bh nhɒjt rsɒnjdh‌ɒnd، پs ʔsjɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ bjɒd mj‌آvrd v ɡnɒh ɒjʃɒn rɒmkɒfɒt xvɒhd dɒd ɒsrɒئjl rɒ msl ɒŋvrhɒ dr bjɒbɒn jɒftm پdrɒn ʃmɒ rɒ msl nvbr ɒnd͡ʒjr dr ɒbtdɒj mvsmʃ djdm ɒmɒ ɒjʃɒn bh bʔl fɣvr rftnd v xvjʃtn rɒbrɒj rsvɒjj nzjrh sɒxtnd v mɒnnd mʔʃvɣh xvd mkrvh ʃdnd d͡ʒlɒl ɒfrɒjm msl mrɣ mj‌پrd zɒjjdn v hɒmlh ʃdn v dr rhm ɣrɒrɡrftn nxvɒhd ʃd v ɒɡr frzndɒn rɒ bپrvrɒnndɒjʃɒn rɒ bj‌ɒvlɒd xvɒhm sɒxt bh hdj kh ɒnsɒnj nxvɒhd mɒnd vɒj br ɒjʃɒn hjnj kh mn njz ɒz ɒjʃɒn dvr ʃvm ɒfrɒjm hjnj kh ɒv rɒbrɡzjdm msl svr dr mrtʔ njkv mɣrvs bvd، ɒmɒɒfrɒjm پsrɒn xvd rɒ brɒj ɣɒtl bjrvn xvɒhdآvrd ‌ɒj xdɒvnd bh ɒjʃɒn bdh t͡ʃh bdhj؟ rhm sɣt knndh v پstɒnhɒj xʃk bh ɒjʃɒn bdh tmɒmj ʃrɒrt ɒjʃɒn dr d͡ʒld͡ʒɒl ɒst zjrɒkh dr آnd͡ʒɒ ɒz ɒjʃɒn nfrt dɒʃtm پs ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh‌sbb ɒʔmɒl zʃt ɒjʃɒn ɒz xɒnh xvd xvɒhm rɒnd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ djɡr dvst nxvɒhm dɒʃt t͡ʃvnkh d͡ʒmjʔ srvrɒn ɒjʃɒn ftnh ɒŋjznd ɒfrɒjm xʃk ʃdh ɒst v rjʃh ɒjʃɒn xʃk ɡrdjdh، mjvh nmj آvrnd v ɒɡr njz bzɒjnd ntɒjd͡ʒ mrɣvb rhm ɒjʃɒn rɒ xvɒhm kʃtxdɒj mn ɒjʃɒn rɒ trk xvɒhd nmvd t͡ʃvnkh ɒv rɒ nʃnjdnd، پs dr mjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ آvɒrh xvɒhnd ʃd xdɒj mn ɒjʃɒn rɒ trk xvɒhd nmvd t͡ʃvnkh ɒv rɒ nʃnjdnd، پs dr mjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ آvɒrh xvɒhnd ʃd ɒsrɒئjl mv brvmnd ɒst kh mjvh brɒj xvd mj‌آvrd hr‌t͡ʃh mjvh zjɒdmj آvrd، mzbh‌hɒ rɒ zjɒd mj‌sɒzd v hr‌t͡ʃh zmjnʃ njkvtr mj‌ʃvd، tmɒsjl rɒ njkvtr bnɒmj knd dl ɒjʃɒn پr ɒz nfɒɣ ɒst ɒlɒn md͡ʒrm mj‌ʃvnd v ɒv mzbh hɒj ɒjʃɒn rɒ xrɒb v tmɒsjl ɒjʃɒn rɒ mnhdm xvɒhd sɒxt zjrɒ kh ɒlhɒl mj‌ɡvjnd «پɒdʃɒh ndɒrjm t͡ʃvnkh ɒz xdɒvndnmj trsjm، پs پɒdʃɒh brɒj mɒ t͡ʃh tvɒnd krd؟» ɒjʃɒn ɣsm hɒj drvɣ xvrdh v ʔhdhɒ bsth، sxnɒn bɒtl mj‌ɡvjnd v ʔdɒlt msl hnzl drʃjɒrhɒj zmjn mj‌rvjd sɒknɒn sɒmrh brɒj ɡvsɒlh hɒj bjt آvn mj‌trsnd zjrɒ kh ɣvmʃ brɒj آn mɒtm mj‌ɡjrnd v sɒmrh msl kf br rvj آb nɒbvdmj ʃvd v mkɒnhɒj blnd آvn kh ɡnɒh ɒsrɒئjl mj‌bɒʃd vjrɒn xvɒhd ʃd v xɒr v xs brmzbh hɒj ɒjʃɒn xvɒhd rvjjd v bh kvhhɒ xvɒhdɡft kh mɒ rɒ bپvʃɒnjd v bh tlhɒ kh br mɒ bjftjd xvɒhd krd v msl lbnɒn rjʃh hɒj xvd rɒ xvɒhd dvɒnjd ʃɒxh hɒjʃ mntʃr ʃdh، zjbɒjj ɒv msl drxt zjtvn vʔtrʃ mɒnnd lbnɒn xvɒhd bvd آnɒnj kh zjrsɒjh‌ɒʃ sɒkn mj‌bɒʃnd، msl ɡndm zjst xvɒhnd krd v mɒnnd mvhɒ ɒfrɒjm xvɒhd ɡft mrɒ djɡr bɒ bthɒ t͡ʃh‌kɒr ɒst؟ v mn ɒv rɒ ɒd͡ʒɒbt krdh، mnzvr xvɒhm dɒʃt mn msl snvbr tr v tɒzh mj‌bɒʃm mjvh tv ɒz mn jɒft mj‌ʃvd nɒzl ʃd ‌ɒj mʃɒjx ɒjn rɒ bʃnvjd v‌ɒj d͡ʒmjʔ sɒknɒn zmjn ɒjn rɒ ɡvʃ ɡjrjd آjɒ msl ɒjn drɒjɒm ʃmɒ jɒ dr ɒjɒm پdrɒn ʃmɒ vɒɣʔ ʃdh ɒst؟ ʃmɒ ɒz ɒjn bh پsrɒn xvd v پsrɒn ʃmɒ bh پsrɒn xvjʃ v پsrɒn ɒjʃɒn bh tbɣh bʔd xbr bdhjd آnt͡ʃh ɒz sn bɒɣj mɒnd، mlx mj‌xvrd v آnt͡ʃh ɒzmlx bɒɣj mɒnd، lnbh mj‌xvrd v آnt͡ʃh ɒz lnbh bɒɣj mɒnd، svs mj‌xvrd ‌ɒj mstɒn bjdɒr ʃdh، ɡrjh knjd v‌ɒj hmh mjɡsɒrɒn bh d͡ʒht ʔsjrɒŋvr vlvlh nmɒjjd zjrɒ kh ɒz dhɒn ʃmɒ mnɣtʔ ʃdh ɒst zjrɒ kh ɒmtj ɣvj v bjʃmɒr bh zmjn mn hd͡ʒvm mj‌آvrnd dndɒnhɒj ɒjʃɒn dndɒnhɒj ʃjr ɒst v ɒzrɒs ɒjʃɒn ɒzrɒs hʒbr ɒst tɒkstɒn mrɒ vjrɒn v ɒnd͡ʒjrhɒj mrɒ xrɒb krdh v پvst آnhɒ rɒ bɒlkl kndh، bjrvn ɒndɒxth‌ɒnd vʃɒxh hɒj آnhɒ sfjd ʃdh ɒst msl dxtrj kh brɒj ʃvhr d͡ʒvɒnj xvd پlɒs mj‌پvʃd، mɒtm bɡjr hdjh آrdj v hdjh rjxtnj ɒz xɒnh xdɒvnd mnɣtʔ ʃdh ɒst kɒhnɒnj kh xdɒm xdɒvnd hstnd mɒtm mj‌ɡjrnd shrɒ xʃk ʃdh v zmjn mɒtm mj‌ɡjrd zjrɒ ɡndm tlf ʃdh vʃjrh xʃk ɡrdjdh v rvɣn zɒjʔ ʃdh ɒst ‌ɒj flɒhɒn xd͡ʒl ʃvjd v‌ɒj bɒɣbɒnɒn vlvlh nmɒjjd bh d͡ʒht ɡndm v d͡ʒv zjrɒ mhsvl zmjn tlf ʃdh ɒst mvhɒ xʃk v ɒnd͡ʒjrhɒ zɒjʔ ʃdh؛ ɒnɒr v xrmɒ v sjb v hmh drxtɒn shrɒxʃk ɡrdjdh، zjrɒ xvʃj ɒz bnj آdm rfʔ ʃdh ɒst ‌ɒj kɒhnɒn پlɒs dr br krdh، nvhh ɡrj nmɒjjd v‌ɒj xɒdmɒn mzbh vlvlh knjd v‌ɒj xɒdmɒn xdɒj mn dɒxl ʃdh، dr پlɒs ʃb rɒbsr brjd، zjrɒ kh hdjh آrdj v hdjh rjxtnj ɒzxɒnh xdɒj ʃmɒ bɒz dɒʃth ʃdh ɒst rvzh rɒtʔjjn nmɒjjd v mhfl mɣds rɒ ndɒ knjd mʃɒjx vtmɒmj sɒknɒn zmjn rɒ bh xɒnh jhvh xdɒj xvdd͡ʒmʔ nmvdh، nzd xdɒvnd tzrʔ nmɒjjd vɒj brآn rvz zjrɒ rvz xdɒvnd nzdjk ɒst v msl hlɒktj ɒz ɣɒdr mtlɣ mj‌آjd آjɒ mɒkvlɒt drnzr mɒ mnɣtʔ nʃd v srvr v ʃɒdmɒnj ɒz xɒnh xdɒj mɒ dɒnh‌hɒ zjr klvxhɒ پvsjd mxznhɒvjrɒn v ɒnbɒrhɒ xrɒb ʃd zjrɒ ɡndm tlf ɡrdjd bhɒjm t͡ʃh ɣdr nɒlh mj‌knnd v rmh hɒj ɡɒvɒn ʃvrjdh ɒhvɒlnd، t͡ʃvnkh mrtʔj ndɒrnd vɡlh hɒj ɡvsfnd njz tlf ʃdh‌ɒnd ‌ɒj xdɒvndnzd tv tzrʔ mj‌nmɒjm zjrɒ kh آtʃ mrtʔ hɒj shrɒ rɒ svzɒnjdh v ʃʔlh hmh drxtɒn shrɒ rɒ ɒfrvxth ɒstbhɒjm shrɒ bsvj tv sjhh mj‌znnd zjrɒ kh d͡ʒvjhɒj آb xʃk ʃdh v آtʃ mrtʔhɒj shrɒ rɒ svzɒnjdh ɒst bhɒjm shrɒ bsvj tv sjhh mj‌znnd zjrɒ kh d͡ʒvjhɒj آb xʃk ʃdh v آtʃ mrtʔhɒj shrɒ rɒ svzɒnjdh ɒst dr shjvn krnɒ bnvɒzjd v dr kvh mɣds mn sdɒ blnd knjd tmɒmj sɒknɒn zmjn blrzndzjrɒ rvz xdɒvnd mj‌آjd v nzdjk ɒst rvztɒrjkj v zlmt، rvz ɒbrhɒ v zlmt ɣljz msl fd͡ʒr mnbst br kvhhɒ ɒmtj ʔzjm v ɣvj kh mɒnndآn ɒz ɒzl nbvdh v bʔd ɒz ɒjn tɒ sɒlhɒ v dhrhɒj bsjɒr nxvɒhd bvd پjʃ rvj ɒjʃɒn آtʃ mj‌svzɒnd v dr ʔɣb ɒjʃɒn ʃʔlh mlthb mj‌ɡrdd پjʃ rvj ɒjʃɒn، zmjn msl bɒɣ ʔdn vdr ʔɣb ɒjʃɒn، bjɒbɒn bɒjr ɒst v njz ɒz ɒjʃɒn ɒhdj rhɒjj nmj jɒbd mnzr ɒjʃɒn msl mnzrɒsbɒn ɒst v mɒnnd ɒsb‌svɒrɒn mj‌tɒznd msl sdɒj ɒrɒbh‌hɒ br ɣlh kvhhɒ d͡ʒst v xjzmj knnd؛ msl sdɒj ʃʔlh آtʃ kh kɒh rɒmj svzɒnd؛ mɒnnd ɒmt ʔzjmj kh brɒj d͡ʒŋ sf bsth bɒʃnd ɒz hzvr ɒjʃɒn ɣvm hɒmj lrznd tmɒmj rvjhɒ rŋ پrjdh mj‌ʃvd msl d͡ʒbɒrɒn mj‌dvnd، msl mrdɒn d͡ʒŋj br hsɒrhɒbrmj آjnd v hr kdɒm bh rɒh xvd mj‌آjnd vtrjɣhɒj xvd rɒ tbdjl nmj knnd br jkdjɡrɒzdhɒm nmj knnd، zjrɒ hrks bh rɒh xvdmj xrɒmd ɒz mjɒn hrbh‌hɒ hd͡ʒvm mj‌آvrnd vsf hɒj xvd rɒ nmj ʃknnd br ʃhrmj d͡ʒhnd، bh rvj hsɒrhɒ mj‌dvnd، bh xɒnh hɒbrmj آjnd msl dzdɒn ɒz پnd͡ʒrh‌hɒ dɒxl mj ʃvnd ɒz hzvr ɒjʃɒn zmjn mtzlzl vآsmɒnhɒ mrtʔʃ mj‌ʃvd؛ آftɒb v mɒh sjɒh mj‌ʃvnd v stɒrɡɒn nvr xvjʃ rɒ bɒz mj‌dɒrnd v xdɒvnd آvɒz xvd rɒ پjʃ lʃkr xvjʃ blnd mj‌knd، zjrɒ ɒrdvj ɒv bsjɒr ʔzjm ɒst v آnkh sxn xvd rɒ bd͡ʒɒ mj‌آvrd، ɣdjrɒst zjrɒ rvz xdɒvnd ʔzjm v bj‌nhɒjt mhjb ɒst v kjst kh tɒɣt آn rɒ dɒʃth bɒʃd v lkn ɒlɒn xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd bɒ tmɒmj dl vbɒ rvzh v ɡrjh v mɒtm bsvj mn bɒzɡʃt nmɒjjd v dl xvd rɒ t͡ʃɒk knjd nh rxt xvjʃ rɒ vbh jhvh xdɒj xvd bɒzɡʃt nmɒjjd zjrɒ kh ɒvrئvf v rhjm ɒst v djrxʃm v ksjrɒhsɒn v ɒzblɒ پʃjmɒn mj‌ʃvd kh mj‌dɒnd kh ʃɒjdbrɡrdd v پʃjmɒn ʃvd v dr ʔɣb xvd brktj vɒɡzɒrd، jʔnj hdjh آrdj v hdjh rjxtnj brɒj jhvh xdɒj ʃmɒ dr shjvn krnɒ bnvɒzjd vrvzh rɒ tʔjjn krdh، mhfl mɣds rɒ ndɒ knjd ɣvm rɒ d͡ʒmʔ knjd، d͡ʒmɒʔt rɒ tɣdjs nmɒjjd، پjrɒn v kvdkɒn v ʃjrxvɒrɡɒn rɒ frɒhm آvrjd dɒmɒd ɒz hd͡ʒrh xvd v ʔrvs ɒz hd͡ʒlh xvjʃ bjrvn آjnd kɒhnɒnj kh xdɒm xdɒvnd hstnddr mjɒn rvɒɣ v mzbh ɡrjh knnd v bɡvjnd «ɒj xdɒvnd br ɣvm xvjʃ ʃfɣt frmɒ v mjrɒs xvjʃ rɒ bh ʔɒr msپɒr، mbɒdɒ ɒmt‌hɒ br ɒjʃɒn hkmrɒnj nmɒjnd t͡ʃrɒ dr mjɒn ɣvmhɒ bɡvjnd kh xdɒj ɒjʃɒn kd͡ʒɒ ɒst؟» پs xdɒvnd brɒj zmjn xvd bh ɣjrt xvɒhd آmd v br ɣvm xvjʃ ʃfɣt xvɒhd nmvd v xdɒvnd ɣvm xvd rɒ ɒd͡ʒɒbt nmvdh، xvɒhdɡft «ɒjnk mn ɡndm v ʃjrh v rvɣn rɒ brɒj ʃmɒmj frstm tɒ ɒz آnhɒ sjr ʃvjd v ʃmɒ rɒ bɒr djɡrdr mjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ ʔɒr nxvɒhm sɒxt v lʃkrʃmɒlj rɒ ɒz ʃmɒ dvr krdh، bh zmjn xʃk vjrɒn xvɒhm rɒnd kh mɣdmh آn br drjɒj ʃrɣj vsɒɣh‌ɒʃ br drjɒj ɣrbj xvɒhd bvd v bvj bdʃ blnd xvɒhd ʃd v ʔfvntʃ brxvɒhd آmd zjrɒkɒrhɒj ʔzjm krdh ɒst» ‌ɒj zmjn mtrs vd͡ʒd v ʃɒdj bnmɒ zjrɒjhvh kɒrhɒj ʔzjm krdh ɒst ‌ɒj bhɒjm shrɒ mtrsjd zjrɒ kh mrtʔ hɒj bjɒbɒn sbz ʃd vdrxtɒn mjvh xvd rɒ آvrd v ɒnd͡ʒjr v mv ɣvt xvjʃ rɒ dɒdnd ‌ɒj پsrɒn shjvn dr jhvh xdɒj xvjʃ vd͡ʒd v ʃɒdj nmɒjjd، zjrɒ kh bɒrɒn ɒvljn rɒ bh ɒndɒzh‌ɒʃ bh ʃmɒ dɒdh ɒst vbɒrɒn ɒvl v آxr rɒ dr vɣt brɒj ʃmɒ bɒrɒnjdh ɒst پs xrmn ɒz ɡndm پr xvɒhd ʃd vmʔsrh‌hɒ ɒz ʃjrh v rvɣn lbrjz xvɒhd ɡrdjd v sɒlhɒjj rɒ kh mlx v lnbh v svs v sn jʔnj lʃkr ʔzjm mn kh br ʃmɒ frstɒdh bvdm xvrdndbh ʃmɒ rd xvɒhm nmvd v ɣzɒj bsjɒrxvrdh، sjr xvɒhjd ʃd v ɒsm jhvh xdɒj xvdrɒ kh brɒj ʃmɒ kɒrhɒj ʔd͡ʒjb krdh ɒst، tsbjh xvɒhjd xvɒnd v
