v پsrɒn v dxtrɒn ʃmɒ nbvt xvɒhndnmvd v پjrɒn ʃmɒ v d͡ʒvɒnɒn ʃmɒ rvjɒhɒ xvɒhnddjd v dr آn ɒjɒm rvh xvd rɒ br ɣlɒmɒn vknjzɒn njz xvɒhm rjxt v آjɒt rɒ ɒz xvn vآtʃ v stvnhɒj dvd dr آsmɒn v zmjn zɒhrxvɒhm sɒxt آftɒb bh tɒrjkj v mɒh bh xvn mbdl xvɒhnd ʃd، پjʃ ɒz zhvr jvm ʔzjm vmhjb xdɒvndv vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd hr‌kh nɒm xdɒvnd rɒ bxvɒnd nd͡ʒɒt jɒbd zjrɒ dr kvh shjvn v dr ɒvrʃljm t͡ʃnɒnkh xdɒvnd ɡfth ɒst bɣjtj xvɒhd bvd v dr mjɒn bɒɣj mɒndɡɒn آnɒnj kh xdɒvnd ɒjʃɒn rɒ xvɒndh ɒst v vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd hr‌kh nɒm xdɒvnd rɒ bxvɒnd nd͡ʒɒt jɒbd zjrɒ dr kvh shjvn v dr ɒvrʃljm t͡ʃnɒnkh xdɒvnd ɡfth ɒst bɣjtj xvɒhd bvd v dr mjɒn bɒɣj mɒndɡɒn آnɒnj kh xdɒvnd ɒjʃɒn rɒ xvɒndh ɒst zjrɒ ɒjnk dr آn ɒjɒm v dr آn zmɒn t͡ʃvn ɒsjrj jhvdɒ v ɒvrʃljm rɒ brɡrdɒnjdh bɒʃm، آŋɒh d͡ʒmjʔ ɒmt‌hɒ rɒ d͡ʒmʔ krdh، bh vɒdj jhvʃɒfɒt frvd xvɒhm آvrd v dr آnd͡ʒɒ bɒɒjʃɒn drbɒrh ɣvm xvd v mjrɒs xvjʃ ɒsrɒئjl mhɒkmh xvɒhm nmvd zjrɒ kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ dr mjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ پrɒkndh sɒxth v zmjn mrɒ tɣsjm nmvdh‌ɒnd v br ɣvm mn ɣrʔh ɒndɒxth v پsrj drʔvz fɒhʃh‌ɒj dɒdh v dxtrj bh ʃrɒb frvxth‌ɒnd tɒ bnvʃnd v hɒl‌ɒj svr v sjdvn v tmɒmj djɒr flstjnjɒn ʃmɒ rɒ bɒ mn t͡ʃh‌kɒr ɒst؟ آjɒ ʃmɒ bh mn d͡ʒzɒ mj‌rsɒnjd؟ v ɒɡr bh mn d͡ʒzɒ brsɒnjd mn d͡ʒzɒj ʃmɒ rɒ bzvdj hr‌t͡ʃh tmɒm tr bh‌sr ʃmɒ rd xvɒhm nmvd t͡ʃvnkh nɣrh v tlɒ v nfɒjs zjbɒj mrɒ ɡrfth، آnhɒ rɒ bh hjkl hɒj xvd drآvrdjd v پsrɒn jhvdɒ vپsrɒn ɒvrʃljm rɒ bh پsrɒn jvnɒnjɒn frvxtjd tɒɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz hdvd ɒjʃɒn dvr knjd ɒjnk mn ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz mkɒnj kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh آn frvxtjd، xvɒhm brɒŋjzɒnjd v ɒʔmɒl ʃmɒ rɒ bh‌sr ʃmɒxvɒhm brɡrdɒnjd v پsrɒn v dxtrɒn ʃmɒ rɒ bh‌dst bnj jhvdɒ xvɒhm frvxt tɒ ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh sbɒئjɒn kh ɒmtj bʔjd mj‌bɒʃnd bfrvʃnd zjrɒxdɒvnd ɒjn rɒ ɡfth ɒst ɒjn rɒ dr mjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ ndɒ knjd tdɒrk d͡ʒŋ bjnjd v d͡ʒbɒrɒn rɒ brɒŋjzɒnjd tmɒmj mrdɒn d͡ʒŋj nzdjk ʃdh، brآjnd ɡɒvآhnhɒj xvd rɒ brɒj ʃmʃjrhɒ v ɒrh hɒj xvjʃ rɒ brɒj njzh‌hɒ xrdknjd v mrd zʔjf bɡvjd mn ɣvj hstm ‌ɒj hmh ɒmt‌hɒ bʃtɒbjd v bjɒjjd v ɒz hr trf d͡ʒmʔ ʃvjd ɒj xdɒvnd ʃd͡ʒɒʔɒn xvd rɒ bh آnd͡ʒɒ frvdآvr ɒmt‌hɒ brɒŋjxth ʃvnd v bh vɒdj jhvʃɒfɒt brآjnd zjrɒ kh mn dr آnd͡ʒɒ xvɒhm nʃst tɒ br hmh ɒmt hɒjj kh bh ɒtrɒf آn hstnd dɒvrj nmɒjm dɒs rɒ پjʃ آvrjd zjrɒkh hɒsl rsjdh ɒst bjɒjjd پɒjmɒl knjd zjrɒkh mʔsrh‌hɒ پr ʃdh v t͡ʃrxʃthɒ lbrjz ɡrdjdh ɒst t͡ʃvnkh ʃrɒrt ʃmɒ ʔzjm ɒst d͡ʒmɒʔthɒ، d͡ʒmɒʔthɒ dr vɒdj ɣzɒ zjrɒ rvzxdɒvnd dr vɒdj ɣzɒ nzdjk ɒst آftɒb vmɒh sjɒh mj‌ʃvnd v stɒrɡɒn tɒbʃ xvd rɒbɒzmj dɒrnd v xdɒvnd ɒz shjvn nʔrh mj‌zndv آvɒz xvd rɒ ɒz ɒvrʃljm blnd mj‌knd v آsmɒn vzmjn mtzlzl mj‌ʃvd، ɒmɒ xdɒvnd mld͡ʒɒj ɣvm xvd v mlɒz bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl xvɒhd bvd پs xvɒhjd dɒnst kh mn jhvh xdɒj ʃmɒ dr kvh mɣds xvjʃ shjvn sɒkn mj‌bɒʃm v ɒvrʃljm mɣds xvɒhd bvd v bjɡɒŋɒn djɡr ɒz آn ʔbvr nxvɒhnd nmvd v dr آn rvzkvhhɒ ʔsjr ɒŋvr rɒ xvɒhnd t͡ʃkɒnjd v kvhhɒ bh ʃjr d͡ʒɒrj xvɒhd ʃd v tmɒmj vɒdjhɒj jhvdɒ bh آb d͡ʒɒrj xvɒhd ɡrdjd v t͡ʃʃmh‌ɒj ɒz xɒnh xdɒvnd bjrvn آmdh، vɒdj ʃtjm rɒ sjrɒb xvɒhd sɒxt msr vjrɒn xvɒhd ʃd v ɒdvm bh bjɒbɒn bɒjr mbdl xvɒhd ɡrdjd، bh‌sbb zlmj kh br bnj jhvdɒ nmvdnd v xvn bj‌ɡnɒhɒn rɒ drzmjn ɒjʃɒn rjxtndv jhvdɒ tɒ ɒbdɒlɒbɒdmskvn xvɒhd ʃd v ɒvrʃljm tɒ dhrhɒj bsjɒr v jhvdɒ tɒ ɒbdɒlɒbɒdmskvn xvɒhd ʃd v ɒvrʃljm tɒ dhrhɒj bsjɒr آnhɒ rɒ dr ɒjɒm ʔzjɒ، پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ v ɒjɒm jrbʔɒm bn jvآʃ، پɒdʃɒh ɒsrɒئjl dr sɒl ɣbl ɒzzlzlh drbɒrh ɒsrɒئjl djd پs ɡft xdɒvnd ɒzshjvn nʔrh mj‌znd v آvɒz xvd rɒ ɒz ɒvrʃljm blnd mj‌knd v mrtʔ hɒj ʃbɒnɒn mɒtm mj‌ɡjrnd vɣlh krml xʃk mj‌ɡrdd xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd bh‌sbb sh v t͡ʃhɒrtɣsjr dmʃɣ ʔɣvbtʃ rɒ nxvɒhm brɡrdɒnjd zjrɒkh d͡ʒlʔɒd rɒ bh t͡ʃvmhɒj آhnjn kvftnd پs آtʃ dr xɒndɒn hzɒئjl xvɒhm frstɒd tɒɣsrhɒj bnhdd rɒ bsvzɒnd v پʃt bndhɒj dmʃɣ rɒ xvɒhm ʃkst v sɒknɒn rɒ ɒz hmvɒrj آvn v sɒhb ʔsɒ rɒ ɒz bjt ʔdn mnɣtʔ xvɒhm sɒxt v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh ɣvm ɒrɒm bh ɣjr bh ɒsjrj xvɒhnd rft xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd bh‌sbb sh v t͡ʃhɒrtɣsjr ɣzh ʔɣvbtʃ rɒ nxvɒhm brɡrdɒnjd zjrɒ kh tmɒmj ɣvm rɒ bh ɒsjrj brdnd tɒ ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh ɒdvm tsljm nmɒjnd پs آtʃ bh hsɒrhɒj ɣzh xvɒhm frstɒd tɒ ɣsrhɒjʃ rɒ bsvzɒnd vsɒknɒn rɒ ɒz ɒʃdvd v sɒhb ʔsɒ rɒ ɒz ɒʃɣlvn mnɣtʔ sɒxth، dst xvd rɒ bh ʔɣrvn frvdxvɒhm آvrd v xdɒvnd jhvh mj‌ɡvjd kh bɒɣj mɒndɡɒn flstjnjɒn hlɒk xvɒhnd ʃd xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd bh‌sbb sh v t͡ʃhɒrtɣsjr svr ʔɣvbtʃ rɒ nxvɒhm brɡrdɒnjd zjrɒ kh tmɒmj ɣvm rɒ bh ɒsjrj brdh، ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh ɒdvm tsljm nmvdnd v ʔhd brɒdrɒn rɒ bh jɒd njɒvrdnd پs آtʃ br hsɒrhɒj svr xvɒhm frstɒd tɒɣsrhɒjʃ rɒ bsvzɒnd xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd bh‌sbb sh vt͡ʃhɒr tɣsjr ɒdvm ʔɣvbtʃ rɒ nxvɒhm brɡrdɒnjdzjrɒ kh brɒdr xvd rɒ bh ʃmʃjr tʔɒɣb nmvd vrhmhɒj xvjʃ rɒ tbɒh sɒxt v xʃm ɒvپjvsth mj‌drjd v ɣzb xvd rɒ dɒjm ŋɒh mj‌dɒʃt پs آtʃ br tjmɒn xvɒhm frstɒdtɒ ɣsrhɒj bsrh rɒ bsvzɒnd xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd bh‌sbb sh vt͡ʃhɒr tɣsjr bnj ʔmvn ʔɣvbtʃ rɒ nxvɒhm brɡrdɒnjd zjrɒ kh znɒn hɒmlh d͡ʒlʔɒd rɒ ʃkm پɒrh krdnd tɒ hdvd xvjʃ rɒ vsjʔ ɡrdɒnnd پs آtʃ dr hsɒrhɒj rbh mʃtʔl xvɒhm sɒxt tɒɣsrhɒjʃ rɒ bɒ sdɒj ʔzjmj dr rvz d͡ʒŋ v bɒtndbɒdj dr rvz tvfɒn bsvzɒndv xdɒvndmj ɡvjd kh پɒdʃɒh ɒjʃɒn bh ɒsjrj xvɒhd rft ɒv v srvrɒnʃ d͡ʒmjʔ v xdɒvndmj ɡvjd kh پɒdʃɒh ɒjʃɒn bh ɒsjrj xvɒhd rft ɒv v srvrɒnʃ d͡ʒmjʔ t͡ʃhɒr tɣsjr mvآb ʔɣvbtʃ rɒ nxvɒhm brɡrdɒnjd zjrɒ kh ɒstxvɒnhɒj پɒdʃɒh ɒdvm rɒآhk پxtnd پs آtʃ br mvآb mj‌frstm tɒɣsrhɒj ɣrjvt rɒ bsvzɒnd v mvآb bɒ hŋɒmh vxrvʃ v sdɒj krnɒ xvɒhd mrd v xdɒvndmj ɡvjd kh dɒvr rɒ ɒz mjɒnʃ mnɣtʔ xvɒhm sɒxt v hmh srvrɒnʃ rɒ bɒ vj xvɒhm kʃt xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd bh‌sbb sh v t͡ʃhɒrtɣsjr jhvdɒ ʔɣvbtʃ rɒ nxvɒhm brɡrdɒnjd zjrɒkh ʃrjʔt xdɒvnd rɒ trk nmvdh، frɒjz ɒv rɒŋɒh ndɒʃtnd v drvɣhɒj ɒjʃɒn kh پdrɒnʃɒn آnhɒrɒ پjrvj nmvdnd ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɡmrɒh krd پs آtʃ br jhvdɒ xvɒhm frstɒd tɒ ɣsrhɒj ɒvrʃljm rɒbsvzɒnd xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd bh‌sbb sh v t͡ʃhɒrtɣsjr ɒsrɒئjl ʔɣvbtʃ rɒ nxvɒhm brɡrdɒnjdzjrɒ kh mrd ʔɒdl rɒ bh nɣrh v mskjn rɒ bh zvd͡ʒ nʔljn frvxtnd v bh ɣbɒr zmjn kh br srmskjnɒn ɒst hrs dɒrnd v rɒh hljmɒn rɒmnhrf mj‌sɒznd v پsr v پdr bh jk dxtrdrآmdh، ɒsm ɣdvs mrɒ bj‌hrmt mj‌knnd vbr rxtj kh ɡrv mj‌ɡjrnd، nzd hr mzbh mj‌xvɒbnd v ʃrɒb d͡ʒrjmh ʃdɡɒn rɒ dr xɒnh xdɒj xvd mj‌nvʃnd v hɒl آnkh mn ɒmvrjɒn rɒ kh ɣɒmt ɒjʃɒn mɒnnd ɣd srv آzɒd bvd v ɒjʃɒn msl blvt tnvmndbvdnd، پjʃ rvj ɒjʃɒn hlɒk sɒxtm v mjvh ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz bɒlɒ v rjʃh hɒj ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz پɒjjn tlf nmvdm v mn ʃmɒ rɒ ɒz zmjn msr brآvrdh، t͡ʃhl sɒl dr bjɒbɒn ɡrdʃ dɒdm tɒ zmjn ɒmvrjɒn rɒbh tsrf آvrjd v bʔzj ɒz پsrɒn ʃmɒ rɒ ɒnbjɒv bʔzj ɒz d͡ʒvɒnɒn ʃmɒ rɒ nzjrh ɣrɒr dɒdm xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd ɒj bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl آjɒ t͡ʃnjn njst؟ ɒmɒ ʃmɒ nzjrh‌hɒ rɒ ʃrɒb nvʃɒnjdjd vɒnbjɒ rɒ nhj nmvdh، ɡftjd kh nbvt mknjd ɒjnk mn ʃmɒ rɒ tŋ xvɒhm ɡzɒrd t͡ʃnɒnkh ɒrɒbh‌ɒj kh ɒz bɒfh‌hɒ پr bɒʃd، tŋ ɡzɒrdh mj‌ʃvd v mfr brɒj tndrv fvt xvɒhd ʃd v tnvmnd bh tvɒnɒjj xvjʃ ɣɒlb nxvɒhd آmd v d͡ʒbɒr d͡ʒɒn xvd rɒ nxvɒhd rhɒnjd v tjrɒndɒz nxvɒhdɒjstɒd v tjzپɒ xvd rɒ nxvɒhd rhɒnjd v ɒsb‌svɒrd͡ʒɒn xvd rɒ xlɒsj nxvɒhd dɒdv xdɒvndmj ɡvjd kh ʃd͡ʒɒʔ trjn d͡ʒbɒrɒn dr آn rvz ʔrjɒn xvɒhnd ɡrjxt v xdɒvndmj ɡvjd kh ʃd͡ʒɒʔ trjn d͡ʒbɒrɒn dr آn rvz ʔrjɒn xvɒhnd ɡrjxt ɒjn klɒm rɒ bʃnvjd kh xdɒvnd آn rɒ bh zdʃmɒ‌ɒj bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl v bh zd tmɒmj xɒndɒnj kh ɒz zmjn msr bjrvn آvrdm، tntɣ nmvdh v ɡfth ɒst mn ʃmɒ rɒ fɣt ɒz tmɒmj ɣbɒjl zmjn ʃnɒxtm پs ʔɣvbt tmɒm ɡnɒhɒn ʃmɒ rɒ br ʃmɒ xvɒhm rsɒnjd آjɒ dv nfr bɒ hm rɒh mj‌rvnd d͡ʒz آnkh mtfɣ ʃdh bɒʃnd؟ آjɒ ʃjr dr d͡ʒŋl ɣrʃ mj‌knd hjnj kh ʃkɒr ndɒʃth bɒʃd؟ آjɒ ʃjr ʒjɒn آvɒz xvd rɒ ɒz bjʃh‌ɒʃ mj‌dhd hjnj kh t͡ʃjzj ŋrfth bɒʃd؟ آjɒ mrɣ bh dɒm zmjn mj‌ɒftd، d͡ʒɒjj kh tlh brɒj ɒv nbɒʃd؟ آjɒ dɒm ɒz zmjn brdɒʃth mj‌ʃvd، hjnj kh t͡ʃjzj ŋrfth bɒʃd؟ آjɒ krnɒdr ʃhr nvɒxth mj‌ʃvd v xlɣ ntrsnd؟ آjɒ blɒbr ʃhr vɒrd bjɒjd v xdɒvnd آn rɒ nfrmvdh bɒʃd؟ zjrɒ xdɒvnd jhvh kɒrj nmj knd d͡ʒz ɒjnkh srxvjʃ rɒ bh bndɡɒn xvd ɒnbjɒ mkʃvf mj‌sɒzd ʃjr ɣrʃ krdh ɒst، kjst kh ntrsd؟ xdɒvnd jhvh tklm nmvdh ɒst kjst kh nbvt nnmɒjd؟ br ɣsrhɒj ɒʃdvd v br ɣsrhɒj zmjn msrndɒ knjd v bɡvjjd br kvhhɒj sɒmrh d͡ʒmʔ ʃvjd v mlɒhzh nmɒjjd kh t͡ʃh hŋɒmh hɒj ʔzjm drvst آn v t͡ʃh zlmhɒ dr mjɒnʃ vɒɣʔ ʃdh ɒst zjrɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd آnɒnj kh zlm v ɣɒrt rɒ dr ɣsrhɒj xvd zxjrh mj‌knndrɒst krdɒrj rɒ nmj dɒnnd bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvndjhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd dʃmn bh hr trf zmjn xvɒhd bvd v ɣvt tv rɒ ɒz tv bh zjr xvɒhd آvrdv ɣsrhɒjt tɒrɒd͡ʒ xvɒhd ʃd xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd t͡ʃnɒnkh ʃbɒn dvsɒɣ jɒ nrmh ɡvʃ rɒ ɒz dhɒn ʃjr rhɒ mj‌knd، hmt͡ʃnɒn bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl kh dr sɒmrh dr ɡvʃh‌ɒj bstrj v dr dmʃɣ dr frɒʃj sɒknnd rhɒjj xvɒhnd jɒft xdɒvnd jhvh xdɒj lʃkrhɒmj ɡvjd bʃnvjd v bh xɒndɒn jʔɣvb ʃhɒdt dhjd zjrɒ dr rvzj kh ʔɣvbt tɣsjrhɒj ɒsrɒئjl rɒ bh vj rsɒnm br mzbh hɒj bjt ئjl njzʔɣvbt xvɒhm rsɒnjd v ʃɒxhɒj mzbh ɣtʔ ʃdh، bh zmjn xvɒhd ɒftɒdv xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh xɒnh zmstɒnj rɒ bɒxɒnh tɒbstɒnj xrɒb xvɒhm krd v xɒnh hɒj ʔɒd͡ʒ tlf xvɒhd ʃd v xɒnh hɒj ʔzjm mnhdm xvɒhdɡrdjd» v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh xɒnh zmstɒnj rɒ bɒxɒnh tɒbstɒnj xrɒb xvɒhm krd v xɒnh hɒj ʔɒd͡ʒ tlf xvɒhd ʃd v xɒnh hɒj ʔzjm mnhdm xvɒhdɡrdjd» ɒj ɡɒvɒn bɒʃɒn kh br kvhhɒj sɒmrh mj bɒʃjd v br mskjnɒn zlm nmvdh، fɣjrɒn rɒ stm mj‌knjd v bh آɣɒjɒn ɒjʃɒn mj‌ɡvjjdbjɒvrjd tɒ bnvʃjm، ɒjn klɒm rɒ bʃnvjd xdɒvndjhvh bh ɣdvsjt xvd ɣsm xvrdh ɒst kh ɒjnk ɒjɒmj br ʃmɒ mj‌آjd kh ʃmɒ rɒ bɒ ɣlhɒ xvɒhndkʃjd v bɒɣj mɒndɡɒn ʃmɒ rɒ bɒ ɣlɒbhɒj mɒhj vxdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh hr jk ɒz ʃmɒ ɒz ʃkɒfhɒj rvbrvj xvd bjrvn xvɒhd rft v ʃmɒ bh hrmvn ɒfkndh xvɒhjd ʃd bh bjt ئjl bjɒjjd v ʔsjɒn bvzrjd v bh d͡ʒld͡ʒɒl آmdh، ʔsjɒn rɒ zjɒd knjd v hr bɒmdɒdɣrbɒnj hɒj xvd rɒ bjɒvrjd v hr sh rvzʔʃrhɒj xvd rɒ v ɣrbɒnj hɒj tʃkr bɒxmjrmɒjh bɡzrɒnjd v hdɒjɒj tbrʔj rɒ ndɒ krdh، ɒʔlɒn nmɒjjd zjrɒ‌ɒj bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl hmjn پsndjdh ʃmɒ ɒst ɣvl xdɒvnd jhvh ɒjn ɒst v mn njznzɒft dndɒn rɒ dr d͡ʒmjʔ ʃhrhɒj ʃmɒ v ɒhtjɒd͡ʒ nɒn rɒ dr d͡ʒmjʔ mkɒnhɒj ʃmɒ bh ʃmɒ dɒdm mʔhzɒxdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd bsvj mn bɒzɡʃt nnmvdjd v mn njz hjnj kh sh mɒh tɒ drv mɒndh bvd، bɒrɒn rɒ ɒz ʃmɒ mnʔ nmvdm v br jk ʃhr bɒrɒnjdm vbr ʃhr djɡr nbɒrɒnjdm v br jk ɣtʔh bɒrɒn آmd vɣtʔh djɡr kh bɒrɒn njɒft xʃk ʃd پs ɒhl dv jɒ sh ʃhr bsvj jk ʃhr brɒj nvʃjdn آb آvɒrh ʃdnd، ɒmɒ sjrɒb ŋʃtnd v xdɒvndmj ɡvjd kh bsvj mn bɒzɡʃt nnmvdjd v ʃmɒrɒ bh bɒd smvm v jrɣɒn mbtlɒ sɒxtm v mlx bsjɒrj ɒz bɒɣhɒ v tɒkstɒnhɒ v ɒnd͡ʒjrhɒ v zjtvnhɒj ʃmɒ rɒ xvrd mʔhzɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd bsvj mn bɒzɡʃt nnmvdjd v vbɒ rɒ bh rsm msr br ʃmɒfrstɒdm v d͡ʒvɒnɒn ʃmɒ rɒ bh ʃmʃjr kʃtm vɒsbɒn ʃmɒ rɒ brdnd v ʔfvnt ɒrdvhɒj ʃmɒ bh bjnj ʃmɒ brآmd mʔhzɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd bsvj mn bɒzɡʃt nnmvdjd v bʔzj ɒz ʃmɒ rɒ bh nhd͡ʒj kh xdɒ sdvm v ʔmvrh rɒ vɒʒɡvn sɒxt srŋvn nmvdm v mɒnnd mʃʔlj kh ɒz mjɒn آtʃ ɡrfth ʃvd bvdjd mʔhzɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd bsvj mn bɒzɡʃt nnmvdjd bnɒbrɒjn‌ɒj ɒsrɒئjl bh ɒjntvr bɒ tv ʔml xvɒhm nmvd v t͡ʃvnkh bh ɒjntvr bɒ tv ʔml xvɒhm nmvd، پs‌ɒj ɒsrɒئjl xvjʃtn rɒ mhjɒsɒz tɒ bɒ xdɒj xvd mlɒɣɒt nmɒjjzjrɒ ɒjnk آn kh kvhhɒ rɒ sɒxth v bɒd rɒ آfrjdh ɒst vɒnsɒn rɒ ɒz fkrhɒj xvdʃ ɒtlɒʔ mj‌dhd v fd͡ʒrrɒ bh tɒrjkj mbdl mj‌sɒzd v br blndjhɒj zmjn mj‌xrɒmd، jhvh xdɒj lʃkrhɒ ɒsm ɒv mj‌bɒʃd zjrɒ ɒjnk آn kh kvhhɒ rɒ sɒxth v bɒd rɒ آfrjdh ɒst vɒnsɒn rɒ ɒz fkrhɒj xvdʃ ɒtlɒʔ mj‌dhd v fd͡ʒrrɒ bh tɒrjkj mbdl mj‌sɒzd v br blndjhɒj zmjn mj‌xrɒmd، jhvh xdɒj lʃkrhɒ ɒsm ɒv mj‌bɒʃd ɒj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl ɒjn klɒm rɒ kh brɒj mrsjh br ʃmɒ mj‌xvɒnm bʃnvjd dxtrbɒkrh ɒsrɒئjl ɒftɒdh ɒst v djɡr nxvɒhdbrxɒst br zmjn xvd ɒndɒxth ʃdh، v ɒhdj njst kh ɒv rɒ brxjzɒnd zjrɒ xdɒvnd jhvh t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ʃhrj kh bɒ hzɒr nfr bjrvn rft، sd nfr rɒ brɒj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl bɒɣj xvɒhddɒʃt v ʃhrj kh bɒ sd nfr bjrvn rft، dh nfr rɒbɒɣj xvɒhd dɒʃt zjrɒ xdɒvnd bh xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd mrɒ btlbjd v zndh bmɒnjd ɒmɒ bjt ئjl rɒ mtlbjd v bh d͡ʒld͡ʒɒl dɒxl mʃvjdv bh bئrʃbʔ mrvjd، zjrɒ d͡ʒld͡ʒɒl ɒlbth bh ɒsjrj xvɒhd rft v bjt ئjl njst xvɒhd ʃd xdɒvnd rɒ btlbjd v zndh mɒnjd، mbɒdɒ ɒv msl آtʃ dr xɒndɒn jvsf ɒfrvxth ʃdh، bsvzɒnd vksj dr bjt ئjl nbɒʃd kh آn rɒ xɒmvʃ knd ‌ɒj ʃmɒ kh ɒnsɒf rɒ bh ɒfsntjn mbdl mj‌sɒzjd v ʔdɒlt rɒ bh zmjn mj‌ɒndɒzjd، آn kh srjɒ v d͡ʒbɒr rɒ آfrjd v fd͡ʒr rɒ bh sɒjh mvt mbdl sɒxt v rvz rɒ msl ʃb tɒrjk ɡrdɒnjd vآbhɒj drjɒ rɒ xvɒndh، آnhɒ rɒ br rvj zmjn rjxt، jhvh ɒsm ɒv mj‌bɒʃd؛ آnkh xrɒbj rɒ brzvrآvrɒn mj‌rsɒnd t͡ʃnɒnkh xrɒbj br ɣlʔh hɒ vɒrd mj‌آjd؛ ɒjʃɒn ɒz آnɒnj kh dr mhkmh hkm mj‌knnd، nfrt dɒrnd v rɒstɡvjɒn rɒmkrvh mj‌dɒrnd bnɒbrɒjn t͡ʃvnkh mskjnɒn rɒپɒjmɒl krdjd v hdɒjɒj ɡndm ɒz ɒjʃɒn ɡrftjd، xɒnh‌hɒ rɒ ɒz sŋhɒj trɒʃjdh bnɒ xvɒhjd nmvdɒmɒ dr آnhɒ sɒkn nxvɒhjd ʃd v tɒkstɒnhɒj dlپsnd ɣrs xvɒhjd nmvd v ljkn ʃrɒb آnhɒ rɒnxvɒhjd nvʃjd zjrɒ tɣsjrhɒj ʃmɒ rɒmj dɒnm kh bsjɒr ɒst v ɡnɒhɒn ʃmɒ rɒ kh ʔzjm mj‌bɒʃd، zjrɒ ʔɒdlɒn rɒ bh tŋ mj‌آvrjd v rʃvh mj‌ɡjrjd v fɣjrɒn rɒ dr mhkmh ɒz hɣ ɒjʃɒn mnhrf mj‌sɒzjd lhzɒ hr‌kh ʔɒɣl bɒʃd dr آn zmɒn xɒmvʃ xvɒhd mɒnd zjrɒ kh zmɒn bd xvɒhd bvd njkvjj rɒ btlbjd v nh bdj rɒ tɒ zndh bmɒnjd vbdjn mnvɒl jhvh xdɒj lʃkrhɒ bɒ ʃmɒ xvɒhdbvd، t͡ʃnɒnkh mj‌ɡvjjd ɒz bdj nfrt knjd vnjkvjj rɒ dvst dɒrjd v ɒnsɒf rɒ dr mhkmh sɒbt nmɒjjd، ʃɒjd kh jhvh xdɒj lʃkrhɒ br bɣjh jvsf rhmt nmɒjd bnɒbrɒjn، xdɒvnd jhvh xdɒj lʃkrhɒt͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd dr hmh t͡ʃhɒrsvhɒ nvhh ɡrj xvɒhd bvd v dr hmh kvt͡ʃh‌hɒ vɒj vɒj xvɒhndɡft v flɒhɒn rɒ brɒj mɒtm v آnɒnj rɒ kh mrsjh xvɒnj آmvxth ʃdh‌ɒnd، brɒj nvhh ɡrj xvɒhnd xvɒnd v dr hmh tɒkstɒnhɒ nvhh ɡrj xvɒhd bvd، zjrɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh mn dr mjɒn tv ʔbvr xvɒhm krd vɒj br ʃmɒ kh mʃtɒɣ rvz xdɒvnd mj‌bɒʃjd rvz xdɒvnd brɒj ʃmɒt͡ʃh xvɒhd bvd؟ tɒrjkj v nh rvʃnɒjj msl ksj‌kh ɒz ʃjrj frɒr knd v xrsj bdv brxvrd، jɒ ksj‌kh bh xɒnh dɒxl ʃdh، dst xvd rɒ brdjvɒr bnhd v mɒrj ɒv rɒ bɡzd آjɒ rvz xdɒvndtɒrjkj nxvɒhd bvd v nh rvʃnɒjj v zlmt ɣljzj kh dr آn hjt͡ʃ drxʃndɡj nbɒʃd؟ mn ɒz ʔjdhɒj ʃmɒ nfrt v krɒht dɒrm vʔtr mhfl hɒj mɣds ʃmɒ rɒ ɒstʃmɒm nxvɒhm krd v ɒɡr‌t͡ʃh ɣrbɒnj hɒj svxtnj vhdɒjɒj آrdj xvd rɒ brɒj mn bɡzrɒnjd، آn rɒɣbvl nxvɒhm krd v zbɒjh slɒmtj پrvɒrjhɒj ʃmɒ rɒ mnzvr nxvɒhm dɒʃt آhŋ srvdhɒj xvd rɒ ɒz mn dvr kn zjrɒ nɣmh brbthɒj tv rɒ ɡvʃ nxvɒhm krd v ɒnsɒf msl آb v ʔdɒlt mɒnnd nhr dɒjmj d͡ʒɒrj bʃvd ‌ɒj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl آjɒ ʃmɒ ɣrbɒnj‌hɒ v hdɒjɒbrɒj mn mdt t͡ʃhl sɒl dr bjɒbɒn ɡzrɒnjdjd؟ nj blkh xjmh mlkvm xvd v tmsɒl ɒsnɒm xvjʃ v kvkb xdɒjɒn xvd rɒ kh bh d͡ʒht xvjʃtn sɒxth bvdjd brdɒʃtjdپs jhvh kh nɒm ɒv xdɒj lʃkrhɒ mj‌bɒʃd، mj‌frmɒjd kh mn ʃmɒ rɒ bh آn trf dmʃɣ d͡ʒlɒj vtn xvɒhm sɒxt پs jhvh kh nɒm ɒv xdɒj lʃkrhɒ mj‌bɒʃd، mj‌frmɒjd kh mn ʃmɒ rɒ bh آn trf dmʃɣ d͡ʒlɒj vtn xvɒhm sɒxt vɒj br آnɒnj kh dr shjvn ɒjmn v drkvhstɒn sɒmrh mtmئn hstnd kh nɣbɒj ɒmt hɒj ɒvlj kh xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl nzd آnhɒ آmdndmj bɒʃnd bh klnh ʔbvr knjd v mlɒhzh nmɒjjd vɒz آnd͡ʒɒ bh hmɒt bzrɡ brvjd v bh d͡ʒt flstjnjɒn frvd آjjd؛ آjɒ آnhɒ ɒz ɒjn mmɒlk njkvtr ɒst jɒ hdvd ɒjʃɒn ɒz hdvd ʃmɒbzrɡtr؟ ʃmɒ kh rvz blɒ rɒ dvr mj‌knjd v msnd zlm rɒ nzdjk mj‌آvrjd kh br txthɒj ʔɒd͡ʒ mj‌xvɒbjd v br bstrhɒ drɒz mj‌ʃvjd v brh‌hɒ rɒ ɒzɡlh v ɡvsɒlh‌hɒ rɒ ɒz mjɒn hzjrh‌hɒ mj‌xvrjd kh bɒ nɣmh brbt mj‌srɒjjd v آlɒt mvsjɣj rɒmsl dɒvd brɒj xvd ɒxtrɒʔ mj‌knjd v ʃrɒb rɒɒz kɒsh‌hɒ mj‌nvʃjd v xvjʃtn rɒ bh bhtrjn ʔtrjɒt tdhjn mj‌nmɒjjd ɒmɒ bh d͡ʒht msjbt jvsf ɣmɡjn nmj ʃvjd bnɒbrɒjn ɒjʃɒn ɒlɒn bɒɒsjrɒn ɒvl bh ɒsjrj xvɒhnd rft v sdɒj ʔjʃ knndɡɒn dvr xvɒhd ʃd xdɒvnd jhvh bh zɒt xvd ɣsm xvrdh vjhvh xdɒj lʃkrhɒ frmvdh ɒst kh mn ɒzhʃmt jʔɣvb nfrt dɒrm v ɣsrhɒjʃ nzd mn mkrvh ɒst پs ʃhr rɒ bɒ hr‌t͡ʃh dr آn ɒst tsljm xvɒhm nmvd v ɒɡr dh nfr dr jk ʃhrbɒɣj‌mɒndh bɒʃnd ɒjʃɒn xvɒhnd mrd v t͡ʃvn xvjʃɒvndɒn v dfn knndɡɒn ksj rɒ brdɒrnd tɒɒstxvɒnhɒ rɒ ɒz xɒnh bjrvn brnd آŋɒh bh ksj‌kh dr ɒndrvn xɒnh bɒʃd xvɒhnd ɡft آjɒ djɡrj nzd tv hst؟ ɒv d͡ʒvɒb xvɒhd dɒd kh njst پs xvɒhnd ɡft sɒkt bɒʃ zjrɒ nɒm jhvh nbɒjdzkr ʃvd zjrɒ ɒjnk xdɒvnd ɒmr mj‌frmɒjd vxɒnh bzrɡ bh xrɒbjhɒ v xɒnh kvt͡ʃk bh ʃkɒfhɒtlf mj‌ʃvd آjɒ ɒsbɒn br sxrh mj‌dvnd jɒآn rɒ bɒ ɡɒvɒn ʃjɒr mj‌knnd؟ zjrɒ kh ʃmɒ ɒnsɒf rɒ bh hnzl v smrh ʔdɒlt rɒ bh ɒfsntjn mbdl sɒxth‌ɒjd v bh nɒt͡ʃjz ʃɒdj mj‌knjd vmj ɡvjjd آjɒ bɒ ɣvt xvjʃ ʃɒxhɒ brɒj xvdپjdɒ nkrdjm؟zjrɒ jhvh xdɒj lʃkrhɒmj ɡvjd ɒjnk‌ɒj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl mn bh zdʃmɒ ɒmtj brmj ɒŋjzɒnm kh ʃmɒ rɒ ɒz mdxl hmɒt tɒ nhr ʔrbh bh tŋ xvɒhnd‌آvrd zjrɒ jhvh xdɒj lʃkrhɒmj ɡvjd ɒjnk‌ɒj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl mn bh zdʃmɒ ɒmtj brmj ɒŋjzɒnm kh ʃmɒ rɒ ɒz mdxl hmɒt tɒ nhr ʔrbh bh tŋ xvɒhnd‌آvrd xdɒvnd jhvh bh mn t͡ʃnjn nmvdɒr sɒxt kh ɒjnk dr ɒbtdɒj rvjjdn hɒsl rʃ dvm mlxhɒ آfrjd v hɒn hɒsl rʃ dvm bʔd ɒz t͡ʃjdn پɒdʃɒh bvd v t͡ʃvn tmɒmj ɡjɒh zmjn rɒ xvrdh bvdnd، ɡftm «ɒj xdɒvnd jhvh mstdʔj آnkh ʔfv frmɒjj t͡ʃɡvnh bʔɣvb brxjzd t͡ʃvnkh kvt͡ʃk ɒst؟» v xdɒvnd ɒz ɒjn پʃjmɒn ʃd vxdɒvnd ɡft «nxvɒhd ʃd» xdɒvnd jhvh bh mn t͡ʃnjn nmvdɒr sɒxt v ɒjnk xdɒvnd jhvh آtʃ rɒ xvɒnd kh mhɒkmh bknd پs ld͡ʒh ʔzjm rɒblʔjd v zmjn rɒ svzɒnjd پs ɡftm «ɒj xdɒvndjhvh ɒz ɒjn bɒz ɒjst jʔɣvb t͡ʃɡvnh brxjzdt͡ʃvnkh kvt͡ʃk ɒst؟» v xdɒvnd ɒz ɒjn پʃjmɒn ʃd v xdɒvnd jhvh ɡft «ɒjn njz nxvɒhd ʃd» v bh mn t͡ʃnjn nmvdɒr sɒxt kh xdɒvnd br djvɒrɣɒjmj ɒjstɒdh bvd v ʃɒɣvlj dr dstʃ bvd v xdɒvnd mrɒ ɡft «ɒj ʔɒmvs t͡ʃh mj‌bjnj؟» ɡftm «ʃɒɣvlj» xdɒvnd frmvd «ɒjnk mn ʃɒɣvlj dr mjɒn ɣvm xvd ɒsrɒئjl mj‌ɡzɒrm v bɒr djɡr ɒz ɒjʃɒn drnxvɒhm ɡzʃt v mkɒnhɒj blnd ɒshɒɣ vjrɒn v mɣds hɒj ɒsrɒئjl xrɒb xvɒhd ʃd v bh zd xɒndɒn jrbʔɒm bɒ ʃmʃjr xvɒhm brxɒst» v ɒmsjɒj kɒhn bjt ئjl nzd jrbʔɒm پɒdʃɒh ɒsrɒئjl frstɒdh، ɡft «ʔɒmvs dr mjɒn xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl br tv ftnh mj‌ɒŋjzd v zmjn sxnɒn ɒv rɒmthml ntvɒnd ʃd zjrɒ ʔɒmvs t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd jrbʔɒm bh ʃmʃjr xvɒhd mrd v ɒsrɒئjl ɒz zmjn xvd ɒlbth bh ɒsjrj xvɒhd rft» v ɒmsjɒ bh ʔɒmvs ɡft «ɒj rɒjj brv v bh zmjn jhvdɒ frɒr kn v dr آnd͡ʒɒ nɒn bxvr v dr آnd͡ʒɒ nbvt kn ɒmɒ dr bjt ئjl bɒr djɡr nbvt mnmɒt͡ʃvnkh آn mɣds پɒdʃɒh v xɒnh sltnt mj‌bɒʃd» ʔɒmvs dr d͡ʒvɒb ɒmsjɒ ɡft «mn nh nbj hstm v nh پsr nbj blkh rmh bɒn bvdm v ɒnd͡ʒjrhɒj brj rɒ mj‌t͡ʃjdm v xdɒvnd mrɒ ɒz ʔɣb ɡvsfndɒn ɡrft v xdɒvnd mrɒ ɡft brv v br ɣvm mn ɒsrɒئjl nbvt nmɒ پs hɒl klɒm xdɒvndrɒ bʃnv tv mj‌ɡvjj bh zd ɒsrɒئjl nbvt mkn vbh zd xɒndɒn ɒshɒɣ tklm mnmɒlhzɒxdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd zn tv dr ʃhr mrtkb znɒxvɒhd ʃd v پsrɒn v dxtrɒnt bh ʃmʃjrxvɒhnd ɒftɒd v zmjnt bh rjsmɒn tɣsjm xvɒhdʃd v tv dr zmjn nd͡ʒs xvɒhj mrd v ɒsrɒئjl ɒzzmjn xvd ɒlbth bh ɒsjrj xvɒhd rft» lhzɒxdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd zn tv dr ʃhr mrtkb znɒxvɒhd ʃd v پsrɒn v dxtrɒnt bh ʃmʃjrxvɒhnd ɒftɒd v zmjnt bh rjsmɒn tɣsjm xvɒhdʃd v tv dr zmjn nd͡ʒs xvɒhj mrd v ɒsrɒئjl ɒzzmjn xvd ɒlbth bh ɒsjrj xvɒhd rft» xdɒvnd jhvh bh mn t͡ʃnjn nmvdɒr sɒxt vɒjnk sbdj پr ɒz mjvh‌hɒ v ɡft «ɒj ʔɒmvs t͡ʃh mj‌bjnj؟» mn d͡ʒvɒb dɒdm kh «sbdj ɒz mjvh» v xdɒvnd bh mn ɡft «ɒnthɒ br ɣvm mn ɒsrɒئjl rsjdh ɒst v ɒz ɒjʃɒn djɡr drnxvɒhm ɡzʃt» xdɒvnd jhvh mj‌ɡvjd kh dr آn rvzsrvdhɒj hjkl bh vlvlh mbdl xvɒhd ʃd vlɒʃhɒj bsjɒr xvɒhd bvd v آnhɒ rɒ dr hr d͡ʒɒ bh xɒmvʃj bjrvn xvɒhnd ɒndɒxt ‌ɒj ʃmɒ kh mj‌xvɒhjd fɣjrɒn rɒ bblʔjd vmskjnɒn zmjn rɒ hlɒk knjd ɒjn rɒ bʃnvjd vmj ɡvjjd kh ɣrh mɒh kj xvɒhd ɡzʃt tɒ ɣlh rɒbfrvʃjm v rvz sbt tɒ ɒnbɒrhɒj ɡndm rɒ bɡʃɒjjm v ɒjfɒ rɒ kvt͡ʃk v msɣɒl rɒ bzrɡ sɒxth، mjzɒnhɒrɒ ɣlb v mʔvd͡ʒ nmɒjjm v mskjnɒn rɒ bh nɣrh v fɣjrɒn rɒ bh nʔljn bxrjm v پs mɒndh ɡndm rɒbfrvʃjm xdɒvnd bh d͡ʒlɒl jʔɣvb ɣsm xvrdh ɒst kh hjt͡ʃkdɒm ɒz ɒʔmɒl ɒjʃɒn rɒ hrɡzfrɒmvʃ nxvɒhm krd آjɒ bh ɒjn sbb zmjn mtzlzl nxvɒhd ʃd v hmh sɒknɒnʃ mɒtm nxvɒhnd ɡrft v tmɒmʃ msl nhr brnxvɒhd آmdv msl njl msr sjlɒn nxvɒhd krd v frv nxvɒhdnʃst v xdɒvnd jhvh mj‌ɡvjd «kh dr آn rvzآftɒb rɒ dr vɣt zhr frv xvɒhm brd v zmjn rɒdr rvz rvʃn tɒrjk xvɒhm nmvd v ʔjdhɒj ʃmɒ rɒ bh mɒtm v hmh srvdhɒj ʃmɒ rɒ bh mrsjh hɒmbdl xvɒhm sɒxt v br hr kmr پlɒs v br hrsr ɡrj brxvɒhm آvrd v آn rɒ msl mɒtm پsrjɡɒnh v آxrʃ rɒ mɒnnd rvz tlxj xvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd» ɒjnk xdɒvnd jhvh mj‌ɡvjd «ɒjɒmj mj‌آjd kh ɡrsŋj br zmjn xvɒhm frstɒd nh ɡrsŋj ɒz nɒn v nh tʃŋj ɒz آb blkh ɒz ʃnjdn klɒm xdɒvnd v ɒjʃɒn ɒz drjɒ tɒ drjɒ v ɒzʃmɒl tɒ mʃrɣ پrɒkndh xvɒhnd ʃd v ɡrdʃ xvɒhnd krd tɒ klɒm xdɒvnd rɒ btlbnd ɒmɒ آn rɒnxvɒhnd jɒft dr آn rvz dvʃjzɡɒn d͡ʒmjl vd͡ʒvɒnɒn ɒz tʃŋj zʔf xvɒhnd krdآnɒnj kh bh ɡnɒh sɒmrh ɣsm xvrdh، mj‌ɡvjnd kh «ɒj dɒn bh hjɒt xdɒj tv v bh trjɣt bئrʃbʔ ɣsm mj‌xvrjm»، xvɒhnd ɒftɒd v bɒr djɡr nxvɒhndbrxɒst آnɒnj kh bh ɡnɒh sɒmrh ɣsm xvrdh، mj‌ɡvjnd kh «ɒj dɒn bh hjɒt xdɒj tv v bh trjɣt bئrʃbʔ ɣsm mj‌xvrjm»، xvɒhnd ɒftɒd v bɒr djɡr nxvɒhndbrxɒst xdɒvnd rɒ djdm kh nzd mzbh ɒjstɒdh bvd vɡft «tɒd͡ʒhɒj stvnhɒ rɒ bzn tɒ آstɒnh hɒ blrzd v آnhɒ rɒ br sr hmh mrdm bjndɒz vbɒɣj mɒndɡɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh ʃmʃjr xvɒhm kʃt vfrɒrj‌ɒj ɒz ɒjʃɒn nxvɒhd ɡrjxt vbɒɣj‌mɒndh‌ɒj ɒz ɒjʃɒn nxvɒhd rst ɒɡr bh hɒvjh frv rvnd، dst mn ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz آnd͡ʒɒxvɒhd ɡrft v ɒɡr bh آsmɒn sʔvd nmɒjnd، ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz آnd͡ʒɒ frvd xvɒhm آvrd v ɒɡr bh ɣlh krml پnhɒn ʃvnd ɒjʃɒn rɒ tftjʃ krdh، ɒz آnd͡ʒɒxvɒhm ɡrft v ɒɡr ɒz nzr mn dr ɣʔr drjɒxvjʃtn rɒ mxfj nmɒjnd، dr آnd͡ʒɒ mɒr rɒ ɒmrxvɒhm frmvd kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ bɡzd v ɒɡr پjʃ dʃmnɒn xvd bh ɒsjrj rvnd ʃmʃjr rɒ dr آnd͡ʒɒɒmr xvɒhm frmvd tɒ ɒjʃɒn rɒ bkʃd v nzr xvd rɒbr ɒjʃɒn brɒj bdj xvɒhm dɒʃt v nh brɒj njkvjj xdɒvnd jhvh sbɒjvt kh zmjn rɒ lms mj‌knd v آn ɡdɒxth mj‌ɡrdd v hmh sɒknɒnʃ mɒtm mj‌ɡjrnd v tmɒmʃ msl nhr brmj آjd v mɒnndnjl msr frv mj‌nʃjnd؛ آn kh ɣrfh hɒj xvd rɒdr آsmɒn bnɒ mj‌knd v tɒɣhɒj xvd rɒ br zmjn bnjɒd mj‌nhd v آbhɒj drjɒ rɒ ndɒ dr‌dɒdh، آnhɒ rɒ bh rvj zmjn mj‌rjzd nɒm ɒv jhvh mj‌bɒʃd xdɒvndmj ɡvjd «ɒj bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl آjɒ ʃmɒ brɒj mn msl پsrɒn hbʃjɒn njstjd؟ آjɒ ɒsrɒئjl rɒ ɒz zmjn msr v flstjnjɒn rɒ ɒz kftvr v ɒrɒmjɒn rɒ ɒz ɣjrbrnjɒvrdm؟» ɒjnk t͡ʃʃmɒn xdɒvnd jhvh br mmlkt ɡnɒhkɒr mj‌bɒʃd v mn آn rɒ ɒz rvj zmjn hlɒk xvɒhm sɒxt ljkn xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh «xɒndɒn jʔɣvb rɒ bɒlkl hlɒk nxvɒhm sɒxt zjrɒ ɒjnk mn ɒmr frmvdh، xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl rɒ drmjɒn hmh ɒmt‌hɒ xvɒhm bjxt، t͡ʃnɒnkh ɣlh dr ɣrbɒl bjxth mj‌ʃvd v dɒnh‌ɒj br zmjn nxvɒhdɒftɒd d͡ʒmjʔ ɡnɒhkɒrɒn ɣvm mn kh mj‌ɡvjnd blɒbh mɒ nxvɒhd rsjd v mɒ rɒ drnxvɒhd ɡrft، bh ʃmʃjr xvɒhnd mrd dr آn rvz xjmh dɒvd rɒkh ɒftɒdh ɒst brپɒ xvɒhm nmvd v ʃkɒfhɒjʃ rɒmrmt xvɒhm krd v xrɒbjhɒjʃ rɒ brپɒ nmvdh، آn rɒ msl ɒjɒm slf bnɒ xvɒhm krd tɒ ɒjʃɒn bɣjh ɒdvm v hmh ɒmt‌hɒ rɒ kh ɒsm mn br ɒjʃɒn nhɒdh ʃdh ɒst، bh tsrf آvrnd» xdɒvnd kh ɒjn rɒbd͡ʒɒ mj‌آvrd tklm nmvdh ɒst ɒjnk xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd «ɒjɒmj mj‌آjd kh ʃjɒrknndh bh drvknndh xvɒhd rsjd vپɒjmɒl knndh ɒŋvr bh‌kɒrndh txm v kvhhɒ ʔsjrɒŋvr rɒ xvɒhd t͡ʃkɒnjd v tmɒmj tlhɒ bh sjlɒn xvɒhd آmdv ɒsjrj ɣvm xvd ɒsrɒئjl rɒxvɒhm brɡrdɒnjd v ʃhrhɒj mxrvb rɒ bnɒnmvdh، dr آnhɒ sɒkn xvɒhnd ʃd v tɒkstɒnhɒɣrs krdh، ʃrɒb آnhɒ rɒ xvɒhnd nvʃjd v bɒɣhɒsɒxth، mjvh آnhɒ rɒ xvɒhnd xvrd» v ɒsjrj ɣvm xvd ɒsrɒئjl rɒxvɒhm brɡrdɒnjd v ʃhrhɒj mxrvb rɒ bnɒnmvdh، dr آnhɒ sɒkn xvɒhnd ʃd v tɒkstɒnhɒɣrs krdh، ʃrɒb آnhɒ rɒ xvɒhnd nvʃjd v bɒɣhɒsɒxth، mjvh آnhɒ rɒ xvɒhnd xvrd» rvjɒj ʔvbdjɒ hɒn mn tv rɒkvt͡ʃktrjn ɒmt‌hɒ ɡrdɒnjdm v tv bsjɒr xvɒrhstj ‌ɒj kh dr ʃkɒfhɒj sxrh sɒkn hstj v mskn tv blnd mj‌bɒʃd v dr dl xvd mj‌ɡvjj kjst kh mrɒ bh zmjn frvd bjɒvrd، tkbr dlt، tvrɒ frjb dɒdh ɒst xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd ɒɡrt͡ʃh xvjʃtn rɒ msl ʔɣɒb blnd sɒzj v آʃjɒnh xvdrɒ dr mjɒn stɒrɡɒn bɡzɒrj mn tv rɒ ɒz آnd͡ʒɒ frvdxvɒhm آvrd ɒɡr dzdɒn jɒ ɣɒrt knndɡɒn ʃb nzd tv آjnd، t͡ʃɡvnh hlɒk ʃdj آjɒ bɣdrkfɒjt ɣɒrt nmj knnd؟ v ɒɡr ɒŋvrt͡ʃjnɒn nzd tvآjnd آjɒ bʔzj xvʃh‌hɒ rɒ nmj ɡzɒrnd؟ t͡ʃjzhɒj ʔjsv t͡ʃɡvnh tftjʃ ʃdh v t͡ʃjzhɒj mxfj ɒv t͡ʃɡvnh tfhs ɡrdjdh ɒst؟ hmh آnɒnj kh bɒ tv hmʔhd bvdnd tv rɒ bsrhdfrstɒdnd v slh ɒndjʃɒn tv، tv rɒ frjb dɒdh، brtv ɣɒlb آmdnd v xvrndɡɒn nɒn tv dɒmj zjr tvɡstrdnd dr ɒjʃɒn ftɒntj njst xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd آjɒ dr آn rvz hkjmɒn ɒdvm rɒ v ftɒnt rɒ ɒz kvh ʔjsv nɒbvd nxvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd؟ v d͡ʒbɒrɒn tv‌ɒj tjmɒn hrɒsɒn xvɒhndʃd tɒ hr ks ɒz kvh ʔjsv bh ɣtl mnɣtʔ ʃvd bh‌sbb zlmj kh br brɒdrt jʔɣvb nmvdj، xd͡ʒɒlt tv rɒ xvɒhd پvʃɒnjd v tɒ bh ɒbd mnɣtʔ xvɒhj ʃd dr rvzj kh bh mɣɒbl vj ɒjstɒdh bvdj، hŋɒmj kh ɣrjbɒn ɒmvɒl ɒv rɒ ɣɒrt nmvdnd vbjɡɒŋɒn bh drvɒzh hɒjʃ dɒxl ʃdnd v brɒvrʃljm ɣrʔh ɒndɒxtnd، tv njz msl jkj ɒz آnhɒbvdj br rvz brɒdr xvd hŋɒm msjbtʃ ŋɒh mkn v br bnj jhvdɒ dr rvz hlɒkt ɒjʃɒn ʃɒdj mnmɒ v dr rvz tŋj ɒjʃɒn lɒf mzn v bh drvɒzh hɒj ɣvm mn dr rvz blɒj ɒjʃɒn dɒxl mʃv v tv njz br bdj ɒjʃɒn dr rvz blɒj ɒjʃɒn mŋr v dst xvd rɒ br ɒmvɒl ɒjʃɒn dr rvz blɒj ɒjʃɒn drɒz mkn v br sr dv rɒh mɒjst tɒfrɒrjɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ mnɣtʔ sɒzj v bɒɣj mɒndɡɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ dr rvz tŋj tsljm mnmɒ zjrɒ kh rvzxdɒvnd br d͡ʒmjʔ ɒmt‌hɒ nzdjk ɒst v t͡ʃnɒnkh ʔml nmvdj hmt͡ʃnɒn bh tv ʔml krdh xvɒhdʃd v ɒʔmɒlt br srt xvɒhd brɡʃt zjrɒt͡ʃnɒnkh br kvh mɣds mn nvʃjdjd، hmt͡ʃnɒn d͡ʒmjʔ ɒmt‌hɒ xvɒhnd nvʃjd v آʃɒmjdh، xvɒhndblʔjd v t͡ʃnɒn xvɒhnd ʃd kh ɡvjɒ nbvdh‌ɒnd ɒmɒ br kvh shjvn nd͡ʒɒt xvɒhd bvd vmɣds xvɒhd ʃd v xɒndɒn jʔɣvb mjrɒs xvdrɒ bh tsrf xvɒhnd‌آvrd v xɒndɒn jʔɣvb آtʃ v xɒndɒn jvsf ʃʔlh v xɒndɒn ʔjsv kɒh ʔvbdjɒ xvɒhnd bvd v dr mjɒn ɒjʃɒn mʃtʔl ʃdh، ɒjʃɒn rɒ xvɒhd svzɒnjd v brɒj xɒndɒn ʔjsv bɣjtj nxvɒhd mɒnd zjrɒ xdɒvnd tklm nmvdh ɒst vɒhl d͡ʒnvb kvh ʔjsv rɒ v ɒhl hɒmvn flstjnjɒn rɒ bh tsrf xvɒhnd‌آvrd v shrɒj ɒfrɒjm vshrɒj sɒmrh rɒ bh tsrf xvɒhnd‌آvrd vbnjɒmjn d͡ʒlʔɒd rɒ mtsrf xvɒhd ʃdv ɒsjrɒn ɒjn lʃkr bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl mlk knʔɒnjɒn rɒtɒ srfh bh tsrf xvɒhnd‌آvrd v ɒsjrɒn ɒvrʃljm kh dr sfɒrd hstnd ʃhrhɒj d͡ʒnvb rɒ bh tsrf xvɒhnd‌آvrd v ɒsjrɒn ɒjn lʃkr bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl mlk knʔɒnjɒn rɒtɒ srfh bh tsrf xvɒhnd‌آvrd v ɒsjrɒn ɒvrʃljm kh dr sfɒrd hstnd ʃhrhɒj d͡ʒnvb rɒ bh tsrf xvɒhnd‌آvrd v klɒm xdɒvnd br jvns bn ɒmtɒj nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «brxjz v bh njnvɒ ʃhr bzrɡ brv v br آn ndɒ kn zjrɒ kh ʃrɒrt ɒjʃɒn bh hzvrmn brآmdh ɒst» ɒmɒ jvns brxɒst tɒ ɒz hzvr xdɒvnd bh trʃjʃ frɒr knd v bh jɒfɒ frvd آmdh، kʃtj‌ɒj jɒft kh ʔɒzm trʃjʃ bvd پs krɒjh‌ɒʃ rɒ dɒdh، svɒr ʃd tɒ hmrɒh ɒjʃɒn ɒz hzvr xdɒvnd bh trʃjʃ brvd v xdɒvnd bɒd ʃdjdj br drjɒvzɒnjd kh tlɒtm ʔzjmj dr drjɒ پdjd آmdt͡ʃnɒnkh nzdjk bvd kh kʃtj ʃksth ʃvd vmlɒhɒn trsɒn ʃdh، hr kdɒm nzd xdɒj xvdɒstɣɒsh nmvdnd v ɒsbɒb rɒ kh dr kʃtj bvd bh drjɒ rjxtnd tɒ آn rɒ brɒj xvd sbk sɒznd ɒmɒjvns dr ɒndrvn kʃtj frvd ʃdh، drɒz ʃd vxvɒb sŋjnj ɒv rɒ dr rbvd v nɒxdɒj kʃtj nzd ɒv آmdh، vj rɒ ɡft «ɒj kh xfth‌ɒj tv rɒ t͡ʃh ʃdh ɒst؟ brxjz vxdɒj xvd rɒ bxvɒn ʃɒjd kh xdɒ mɒ rɒ bxɒtrآvrd tɒ hlɒk nʃvjm» v bh jkdjɡr ɡftnd «bjɒjjd ɣrʔh bjndɒzjm tɒ bdɒnjm kh ɒjn blɒ bh‌sbb t͡ʃh ks br mɒ vɒrd ʃdh ɒst؟» پs t͡ʃvn ɣrʔh ɒndɒxtnd، ɣrʔh bh nɒm jvns drآmd پs ɒv rɒɡftnd «mɒ rɒ ɒtlɒʔ dh kh ɒjn blɒ bh‌sbb t͡ʃh ks br mɒ ʔɒrz ʃdh؟ ʃɣl tv t͡ʃjst v ɒz kd͡ʒɒ آmdh‌ɒj v vtnt kdɒm ɒst v ɒz t͡ʃh ɣvm hstj؟» ɒv ɒjʃɒn rɒ d͡ʒvɒb dɒd kh «mn ʔbrɒnj hstm v ɒzjhvh xdɒj آsmɒn kh drjɒ v xʃkj rɒ آfrjdh ɒst trsɒn mj‌bɒʃm» پs آn mrdmɒn sxt‌trsɒn ʃdnd v ɒv rɒ ɡftnd «t͡ʃh krdh‌ɒj؟» zjrɒ kh ɒjʃɒn mj‌dɒnstnd kh ɒz hzvr xdɒvnd frɒr krdh ɒst t͡ʃvnkh ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒtlɒʔ dɒdh bvd v ɒv rɒɡftnd «bɒ tv t͡ʃh knjm tɒ drjɒ brɒj mɒ sɒkn ʃvd؟» zjrɒ drjɒ dr tlɒtm hmj ɒfzvd ɒv bh ɒjʃɒn ɡft «mrɒ brdɒʃth، bh drjɒ bjndɒzjd vdrjɒ brɒj ʃmɒ sɒkn xvɒhd ʃd، zjrɒ mj‌dɒnm ɒjn tlɒtm ʔzjm bh‌sbb mn br ʃmɒ vɒrd آmdh ɒst ɒmɒ آn mrdmɒn sʔj nmvdnd tɒ kʃtj rɒ bh xʃkj brsɒnnd ɒmɒ ntvɒnstnd zjrɒ kh drjɒ bh zdɒjʃɒn zjɒdh v zjɒdh tlɒtm mj‌nmvd پs nzdjhvh dʔɒ krdh، ɡftnd «آh‌ɒj xdɒvnd bh‌xɒtrd͡ʒɒn ɒjn ʃxs hlɒk nʃvjm v xvn bj‌ɡnɒh rɒ brmɒ mɡzɒr zjrɒ tv‌ɒj xdɒvnd hr‌t͡ʃh mj‌xvɒhj mj‌knj» پs jvns rɒ brdɒʃth، dr drjɒɒndɒxtnd v drjɒ ɒz tlɒtmʃ آrɒm ʃd v آn mrdmɒn ɒz xdɒvnd sxt‌trsɒn ʃdnd v brɒj xdɒvnd ɣrbɒnj‌hɒ ɡzrɒnjdnd v nzrhɒ nmvdndvɒmɒ xdɒvnd mɒhj bzrɡj پjdɒ krd kh jvns rɒ frvbrd v jvns sh rvz v sh ʃb dr ʃkm mɒhj mɒnd vɒmɒ xdɒvnd mɒhj bzrɡj پjdɒ krd kh jvns rɒ frvbrd v jvns sh rvz v sh ʃb dr ʃkm mɒhj mɒnd v jvns ɒz ʃkm mɒhj nzd jhvh xdɒj xvd dʔɒ nmvd v ɡft «dr tŋj xvdxdɒvnd rɒ xvɒndm v mrɒ mstd͡ʒɒb frmvd ɒzʃkm hɒvjh tzrʔ nmvdm v آvɒz mrɒ ʃnjdj zjrɒ kh mrɒ bh ʒrfj dr dl drjɒhɒ ɒndɒxtj vsjlhɒ mrɒ ɒhɒth nmvd d͡ʒmjʔ xjzɒbhɒ v mvd͡ʒhɒj tv br mn ɡzʃt v mn ɡftm ɒz پjʃ t͡ʃʃm tvɒndɒxth ʃdm ljkn hjkl ɣds tv rɒ bɒz xvɒhm djd آbhɒ mrɒ tɒ bh‌d͡ʒɒn ɒhɒth nmvd v ld͡ʒh dvrmrɒ ɡrft v ʔlf drjɒ bsr mn پjt͡ʃjdh ʃd bh bnjɒn kvhhɒ frvd rftm v zmjn bh bndhɒj xvd tɒ bh ɒbd mrɒ dr‌ɡrft ɒmɒ tv‌ɒj jhvh xdɒjm hjɒt mrɒɒz hfrh brآvrdj t͡ʃvn d͡ʒɒn mn dr ɒndrvnm bj‌tɒb ʃd، xdɒvnd rɒ bjɒd آvrdm v dʔɒj mn nzdtv bh hjkl ɣdst rsjd آnɒnj kh ɒbɒtjl drvɣ rɒ mnzvr mj‌dɒrnd، ɒhsɒn hɒj xvjʃ rɒ trk mj‌nmɒjnd ɒmɒ mn bh آvɒz tʃkr brɒj tv ɣrbɒnj xvɒhm ɡzrɒnjd، v bh آnt͡ʃh nzr krdm vfɒ xvɒhm nmvd nd͡ʒɒt ɒz آn xdɒvnd ɒst»پs xdɒvnd mɒhj rɒ ɒmr frmvd v jvns rɒ br xʃkj ɣj krd پs xdɒvnd mɒhj rɒ ɒmr frmvd v jvns rɒ br xʃkj ɣj krd پs klɒm xdɒvnd bɒr dvm br jvns nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «brxjz v bh njnvɒ ʃhr bzrɡ brv v آn vʔz rɒ kh mn bh tv xvɒhm ɡft bh ɒjʃɒn ndɒ kn» آŋɒh jvns brxɒsth، brhsb frmɒn xdɒvnd bh njnvɒ rft v njnvɒ ʃhr bzrɡ bvd kh msɒft sh rvz dɒʃt v jvns bh msɒft jk rvz dɒxl ʃhr ʃdh، bh ndɒ krdn ʃrvʔ nmvd vɡft bʔd ɒz t͡ʃhl rvz njnvɒ srŋvn xvɒhd ʃd v mrdmɒn njnvɒ bh xdɒ ɒjmɒn آvrdnd v rvzh rɒndɒ krdh، ɒz bzrɡ tɒ kvt͡ʃk پlɒs پvʃjdnd v t͡ʃvn پɒdʃɒh njnvɒ ɒz ɒjn ɒmr ɒtlɒʔ jɒft، ɒzkrsj xvd brxɒsth، rdɒj xvd rɒ ɒz brknd vپlɒs پvʃjdh، br xɒkstr nʃst v پɒdʃɒh vɒkɒbrʃ frmɒn dɒdnd tɒ dr njnvɒ ndɒ dr‌dɒdnd vɒmrfrmvdh، ɡftnd kh «mrdmɒn v bhɒjm v ɡɒvɒn vɡvsfndɒn t͡ʃjzj nxvrnd v nt͡ʃrnd v آb nnvʃnd v mrdmɒn v bhɒjm bh پlɒs پvʃjdh ʃvnd v nzdxdɒ bʃdt ɒstɣɒsh nmɒjnd v hrks ɒz rɒh bdxvd v ɒz zlmj kh dr dst ɒv ɒst bɒzɡʃt nmɒjd kjst bdɒnd kh ʃɒjd xdɒ brɡʃth، پʃjmɒn ʃvd v ɒz hdt xʃm xvd rd͡ʒvʔ nmɒjdtɒ hlɒk nʃvjm»پs t͡ʃvn xdɒ ɒʔmɒl ɒjʃɒn rɒ djd kh ɒz rɒh zʃt xvd bɒzɡʃt nmvdnd، آŋɒh xdɒ ɒz blɒjj kh ɡfth bvd kh bh ɒjʃɒn brsɒnd پʃjmɒn ɡrdjd vآn rɒ bʔml njɒvrd پs t͡ʃvn xdɒ ɒʔmɒl ɒjʃɒn rɒ djd kh ɒz rɒh zʃt xvd bɒzɡʃt nmvdnd، آŋɒh xdɒ ɒz blɒjj kh ɡfth bvd kh bh ɒjʃɒn brsɒnd پʃjmɒn ɡrdjd vآn rɒ bʔml njɒvrd ɒmɒ ɒjn ɒmr jvns rɒ bh ɣɒjt nɒپsnd آmd vɣjzʃ ɒfrvxth ʃd، v nzd xdɒvnd dʔɒnmvdh، ɡft «آh‌ɒj xdɒvnd، آjɒ ɒjn sxn mn nbvd hjnj kh dr vlɒjt xvd bvdm v ɒz ɒjn sbb bh frɒr krdn bh trʃjʃ mbɒdrt nmvdm zjrɒmj dɒnstm kh tv xdɒj krjm v rhjm v djr ɣzb v ksjr ɒhsɒn hstj v ɒz blɒ پʃjmɒn mj‌ʃvj؟ پs hɒl‌ɒj xdɒvnd d͡ʒɒnm rɒ ɒz mn bɡjr zjrɒ kh mrdn ɒz zndh mɒndn brɒj mn bhtr ɒst» xdɒvndɡft «آjɒ svɒb ɒst kh xʃmnɒk ʃvj؟» v jvns ɒz ʃhr bjrvn rfth، btrf ʃrɣj ʃhr nʃst v dr آnd͡ʒɒ sɒjh bɒnj brɒj xvdsɒxth zjr sɒjh‌ɒʃ nʃst tɒ bbjnd br ʃhr‌t͡ʃh vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd v jhvh xdɒ kdvjj rvjɒnjd vآn rɒ bɒlɒj jvns nmv dɒd tɒ br sr vj sɒjh ɒfkndh، ɒv rɒ ɒz hznʃ آsɒjʃ dhd v jvns ɒzkdv bj‌nhɒjt ʃɒdmɒn ʃd ɒmɒ dr frdɒj آn rvzdr vɣt tlvʔ fd͡ʒr xdɒ krmj پjdɒ krd kh kdv rɒzd v xʃk ʃd v t͡ʃvn آftɒb brآmd xdɒ bɒdʃrɣj ɡrm vzɒnjd v آftɒb br sr jvns tɒbjd bh hdj kh bjtɒb ʃdh، brɒj xvd msɒlt nmvd kh bmjrd v ɡft «mrdn ɒz zndh mɒndn brɒj mn bhtrɒst» xdɒ bh jvns d͡ʒvɒb dɒd «آjɒ svɒb ɒst kh bh d͡ʒht kdv ɣzbnɒk ʃvj؟» ɒv ɡft «svɒb ɒst kh tɒ bh mrɡ ɣzbnɒk ʃvm»xdɒvnd ɡft «dl tv brɒj kdv bsvxt kh brɒj آn zhmt nkʃjdj v آn rɒ nmv ndɒdj kh dr jk ʃb bvd͡ʒvd آmd v dr jk ʃb zɒjʔ ɡrdjd xdɒvnd ɡft «dl tv brɒj kdv bsvxt kh brɒj آn zhmt nkʃjdj v آn rɒ nmv ndɒdj kh dr jk ʃb bvd͡ʒvd آmd v dr jk ʃb zɒjʔ ɡrdjd klɒm xdɒvnd kh br mjkɒh mvrʃtj dr ɒjɒm jvtɒm v آhɒz v hzɣjɒ، پɒdʃɒhɒn jhvdɒnɒzl ʃd v آn rɒ drbɒrh sɒmrh v ɒvrʃljm djd ‌ɒj d͡ʒmjʔ ɣvm‌hɒ bʃnvjd v‌ɒj zmjn v hr‌t͡ʃh dr آn ɒst ɡvʃ bdhjd، v xdɒvnd jhvh jʔnj xdɒvnd ɒz hjkl ɣdsʃ br ʃmɒ ʃɒhd bɒʃd zjrɒ ɒjnk xdɒvnd ɒz mkɒn xvd bjrvn mj‌آjd vnzvl nmvdh، br mkɒn hɒj blnd zmjn mj‌xrɒmd v kvhhɒ zjr ɒv ɡdɒxth mj‌ʃvd v vɒdjhɒ mnʃɣ mj‌ɡrdd، msl mvm پjʃ آtʃ v msl آb kh bh nʃjb rjxth ʃvd ɒjn hmh bh‌sbb ʔsjɒn jʔɣvb v ɡnɒh xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl ɒst ʔsjɒn jʔɣvb t͡ʃjst؟ آjɒ sɒmrh njst؟ v mkɒn hɒj blnd jhvdɒ t͡ʃjst؟ آjɒ ɒvrʃljm nmj bɒʃd؟ پs sɒmrh rɒ bh tvdh sŋ shrɒ v mkɒn ɣrs nmvdn mvhɒ mbdl xvɒhm sɒxt v sŋhɒjʃ rɒbh drh rjxth، bnjɒdʃ rɒ mnkʃf xvɒhm nmvd v hmh bthɒj trɒʃjdh ʃdh آn xrd v hmh mzdhɒjʃ bh آtʃ svxth xvɒhd ʃd v hmh tmɒsjlʃ rɒ xrɒb xvɒhm krd zjrɒ kh ɒz mzdfɒhʃh آnhɒ rɒ d͡ʒmʔ krd v bh mzd fɒhʃh xvɒhdbrɡʃt bh ɒjn sbb mɒtm ɡrfth، vlvlh xvɒhm nmvd v brhnh v ʔrjɒn rɒh xvɒhm rft v msl ʃɣɒlhɒ mɒtm xvɒhm ɡrft v mɒnnd ʃtr mrɣhɒ nvhh ɡrj xvɒhm nmvd zjrɒ kh d͡ʒrɒht hɒj vj ʔlɒd͡ʒ پzjr njst t͡ʃvnkh bh jhvdɒ rsjdh v bh drvɒzh hɒj ɣvm mn jʔnj bh ɒvrʃljm dɒxl ɡrdjdh ɒst dr d͡ʒt xbr mrsɒnjd v hrɡz ɡrjh mnmɒjjd dr xɒnh ʔfrh، dr ɣbɒr xvjʃtn rɒɣltɒnjdm ‌ɒj sɒknh ʃɒfjr ʔrjɒn v xd͡ʒl ʃdh، bɡzr sɒknh sɒnɒn bjrvn nmj آjd mɒtm bjt ɒjsl mkɒnʃ rɒ ɒz ʃmɒ mj‌ɡjrd zjrɒ kh sɒknh mɒrvt bh d͡ʒht njkvjj drd zh mj‌kʃd، t͡ʃvnkh blɒ ɒz d͡ʒɒnb xdɒvnd bh drvɒzh ɒvrʃljm frvd آmdh ɒst ‌ɒj sɒknh lɒkjʃ ɒsb tndrvrɒ bh ɒrɒbh bbnd ɒv ɒbtdɒj ɡnɒh dxtr shjvn bvd، t͡ʃvnkh ʔsjɒn ɒsrɒئjl dr tv jɒft ʃdh ɒst bnɒbrɒjn tlɒɣ nɒmh‌ɒj bh mvrʃt d͡ʒt xvɒhj dɒd xɒnh hɒj ɒkzjb، t͡ʃʃmh frjbndh brɒj پɒdʃɒhɒn ɒsrɒئjl xvɒhd bvd ‌ɒj sɒknh mrjʃh bɒr djɡr mɒlkj br tv xvɒhm آvrd d͡ʒlɒl ɒsrɒئjl tɒ bh ʔdlɒm xvɒhd آmdxvjʃtn rɒ brɒj frzndɒn nɒznjn xvd ɡr sɒz vmvj xvd rɒ btrɒʃ ɡrj sr xvd rɒ msl krks zjɒd kn zjrɒ kh ɒjʃɒn ɒz nzd tv bh ɒsjrj rfth‌ɒnd xvjʃtn rɒ brɒj frzndɒn nɒznjn xvd ɡr sɒz vmvj xvd rɒ btrɒʃ ɡrj sr xvd rɒ msl krks zjɒd kn zjrɒ kh ɒjʃɒn ɒz nzd tv bh ɒsjrj rfth‌ɒnd vɒj br آnɒnj kh br bstrhɒj xvd zlm rɒtdbjr mj‌nmɒjnd v mrtkb ʃrɒrt mj ʃvnd dr rvʃnɒjj sbh آn rɒ bd͡ʒɒ mj‌آvrnd، t͡ʃvnkh dr ɣvt dst ɒjʃɒn ɒst br zmjnhɒtmʔ mj‌vrznd v آnhɒ rɒ ɣsb mj‌nmɒjnd v brxɒnh‌hɒ njz v آnhɒ rɒ mj‌ɡjrnd v br mrd v xɒnh‌ɒʃ vʃxs v mjrɒsʃ zlm mj‌nmɒjnd bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd hɒn mn br ɒjn ɣbjlh blɒjj rɒ tdbjr mj‌nmɒjm kh ʃmɒ ɡrdn xvd rɒ ɒz آn ntvɒnjd bjrvn آvrd v mtkbrɒnh nxvɒhjd xrɒmjdzjrɒ kh آn zmɒn zmɒn bd ɒst dr آn rvz br ʃmɒmsl xvɒhnd zd v mrsjh svznɒk xvɒhnd xvɒndv xvɒhnd ɡft bɒlkl hlɒk ʃdh‌ɒjm nsjb ɣvm mrɒ bh djɡrɒn dɒdh ɒst t͡ʃɡvnh آn rɒ ɒz mn dvrmj knd v zmjnhɒj mrɒ bh mrtdɒn tɣsjm mj‌nmɒjd bnɒbrɒjn brɒj tv ksj nxvɒhd bvd kh rjsmɒn rɒbh ɣrʔh dr d͡ʒmɒʔt xdɒvnd bkʃd ɒjʃɒn nbvt krdh، mj‌ɡvjnd nbvt mknjd ɒɡr bh ɒjnhɒ nbvt nnmɒjnd rsvɒjj dvr nxvɒhdʃd ‌ɒj kh bh xɒndɒn jʔɣvb msmj hstj آjɒrvh xdɒvnd ɣɒsr ʃdh ɒst v آjɒ ɒjnhɒ ɒʔmɒl ɒvmj bɒʃd؟ آjɒ klɒm mn brɒj hr‌kh bh ɒstɣɒmt sɒlk mj‌bɒʃd njkv njst؟ lkn ɣvm mn dr ɒjn‌rvzhɒ bh dʃmnj brxɒsth‌ɒnd ʃmɒ rdɒ rɒ ɒz rxt آnɒnj kh bh ɒtmjnɒn mj‌ɡzrnd v ɒz d͡ʒŋ rvɡrdɒnnd mj‌knjd v znɒn ɣvm mrɒ ɒz xɒnh hɒj mrɣvb ɒjʃɒn bjrvn mj‌knjd v zjnt mrɒ ɒzɒtfɒl ɒjʃɒn tɒ bh ɒbd mj‌ɡjrjd brxjzjd vbrvjd zjrɒ kh ɒjn آrɒmɡɒh ʃmɒ njst t͡ʃvnkh nd͡ʒs ʃdh ɒst rɒ d͡ʒmʔ xvɒhm nmvd v bɣjh ɒsrɒئjl rɒ frɒhm آvrdh، ɒjʃɒn rɒ msl ɡvsfndɒn bsrh dr jk d͡ʒɒ xvɒhm ɡzɒʃt ɒjʃɒn msl ɡlh‌ɒj kh dr آɣl xvd bɒʃd، bh‌sbb ksrt mrdmɒn ɣvɣɒ xvɒhnd krdrxnh knndh پjʃ rvj ɒjʃɒn brآmdh ɒst ɒjʃɒn rxnh nmvdh v ɒz drvɒzh ʔbvr krdh، ɒz آn bjrvn rfth‌ɒnd v پɒdʃɒh ɒjʃɒn پjʃ rvj ɒjʃɒn vxdɒvnd br sr ɒjʃɒn پjʃ rfth ɒst rxnh knndh پjʃ rvj ɒjʃɒn brآmdh ɒst ɒjʃɒn rxnh nmvdh v ɒz drvɒzh ʔbvr krdh، ɒz آn bjrvn rfth‌ɒnd v پɒdʃɒh ɒjʃɒn پjʃ rvj ɒjʃɒn vxdɒvnd br sr ɒjʃɒn پjʃ rfth ɒst v ɡftm ɒj rvsɒj jʔɣvb v‌ɒj dɒvrɒn xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl bʃnvjd آjɒ br ʃmɒ njst kh ɒnsɒf rɒ bdɒnjd؟ آnɒnj kh ɒz njkvjj nfrt dɒrnd v br bdj mɒjl mj‌bɒʃnd v پvst rɒ ɒz tn mrdm v ɡvʃt rɒ ɒz ɒstxvɒnhɒj ɒjʃɒn mj‌knnd، v ksɒnj kh ɡvʃt ɣvm mrɒ mj‌xvrnd v پvst ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz tn ɒjʃɒn mj‌knnd v ɒstxvɒnhɒj ɒʔmɒl zʃt ʃdh‌ɒnd xdɒvnd drbɒrh ɒnbjɒjj kh ɣvm mrɒ ɡmrɒh mj‌knnd v bh dndɒnhɒj xvd mj‌ɡznd v slɒmtj rɒndɒ mj‌knnd v ɒɡr ksj t͡ʃjzj bh dhɒn ɒjʃɒn ŋzɒrd bɒ ɒv tdɒrk d͡ʒŋ mj‌bjnnd، t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒz ɒjn v dr ɒjɒm آxr، kvh xɒnh xdɒvnd br ɣlh kvhɒ sɒbt xvɒhd ʃd v br fvɣ tlhɒbrɒfrɒʃth xvɒhd ɡrdjd v ɣvm‌hɒ br آn rvɒn xvɒhnd ʃd v ɒmt hɒj bsjɒr ʔzjmt krdh، xvɒhnd ɡft bjɒjjd tɒ bh kvh xdɒvnd v bh xɒnh tv t͡ʃh krdh‌ɒm v bh t͡ʃh t͡ʃjz tv rɒ xsth sɒxth‌ɒm؟ bh zd mn ʃhɒdt bdh zjrɒ kh tv rɒ ɒz zmjn msr brآvrdm v tv rɒ ɒzxɒnh bndɡj fdjh dɒdm v mvsj v hɒrvn v mrjm rɒپjʃ rvj tv ɒrsɒl nmvdm ‌ɒj ɣvm mn آnt͡ʃh rɒkh bɒlɒɣ پɒdʃɒh mvآb mʃvrt dɒd v آnt͡ʃh blʔɒm bn bʔvr ɒv rɒ d͡ʒvɒb frstɒd bjɒd آvr v آnt͡ʃh rɒ kh ɒz ʃtjm tɒ d͡ʒld͡ʒɒl vɒɣʔ ʃd bh‌xɒtr dɒr tɒʔdɒlt xdɒvnd rɒ bdɒnj bɒ t͡ʃh t͡ʃjz bh hzvrxdɒvnd bjɒjm v nzd xdɒj tʔɒlj rkvʔ nmɒjm؟ آjɒbɒ ɣrbɒnj hɒj svxtnj v bɒ ɡvsɒlh hɒj jk sɒlh bh hzvr vj bjɒjm؟ آjɒ xdɒvnd ɒz hzɒrhɒ ɣvt͡ʃ v ɒz dh hzɒrhɒ nhr rvɣn rɒzj xvɒhd ʃd؟ آjɒnxst zɒdh xvd rɒ bh ʔvz mʔsjtm v smrh bdn xvjʃ rɒ bh ʔvz ɡnɒh d͡ʒɒnm bdhm؟ ‌ɒj mrd ɒzآnt͡ʃh njkv ɒst tv rɒ ɒxbɒr nmvdh ɒst؛ vxdɒvnd ɒz tv t͡ʃh t͡ʃjz rɒ mj‌tlbd ɣjr ɒz ɒjnkh ɒnsɒf rɒ bd͡ʒɒ آvrj v rhmt rɒ dvst bdɒrj vdr hzvr xdɒj xvjʃ bɒ frvtnj slvk nmɒjj؟ آvɒz xdɒvnd bh ʃhr ndɒ mj‌dhd v hkmt ɒsm ɒv rɒ mʃɒhdh mj‌nmɒjd ʔsɒ v tʔjjn knndh آn rɒ bʃnvjd آjɒ tɒ bh hɒl ɡnd͡ʒhɒj ʃrɒrt vɒjfɒj nɒɣs mlʔvn dr xɒnh ʃrjrɒn mj‌bɒʃd؟ آjɒ mn bɒ mjzɒnhɒj ʃrɒrt v bɒ kjsh sŋhɒj nɒrɒst brj xvɒhm ʃd؟ zjrɒ kh dvltmndɒn ɒv ɒz zlm mmlvɒnd v sɒknɒnʃ drvɣ mj‌ɡvjnd vzbɒn ɒjʃɒn dr dhɒnʃɒn frjb mhz ɒst پs mn njz tv rɒ bh‌sbb ɡnɒhɒnt bh d͡ʒrɒhɒt mhlk md͡ʒrvh sɒxth، xrɒb xvɒhm nmvd tv xvɒhj xvrd ɒmɒ sjr nxvɒhj ʃd vɡrsŋj tv dr ɒndrvnt xvɒhd mɒnd v bjrvn xvɒhj brd ɒmɒ rstɡɒr nxvɒhj sɒxt v آnt͡ʃh rɒkh rstɡɒr nmɒjj mn bh ʃmʃjr tsljm xvɒhm nmvd tv xvɒhj kɒʃt ɒmɒ nxvɒhj drvjd؛ tvzjtvn rɒ bh پɒ xvɒhj fʃrd ɒmɒ xvjʃtn rɒ bh rvɣn tdhjn nxvɒhj nmvd؛ v ʔsjr ɒŋvr rɒ ɒmɒʃrɒb nxvɒhj nvʃjdzjrɒ kh ɣvɒnjn ʔmrj vd͡ʒmjʔ ɒʔmɒl xɒndɒn ɒxɒb ŋɒh dɒʃth mj‌ʃvd vbh mʃvrt hɒj ɒjʃɒn slvk mj‌nmɒjjd tɒ tv rɒ bh vjrɒnj v sɒknɒnʃ rɒ bh sxrjh tsljm nmɒjm، پs ʔɒr ɣvm mrɒ mthml xvɒhjd ʃd zjrɒ kh ɣvɒnjn ʔmrj vd͡ʒmjʔ ɒʔmɒl xɒndɒn ɒxɒb ŋɒh dɒʃth mj‌ʃvd vbh mʃvrt hɒj ɒjʃɒn slvk mj‌nmɒjjd tɒ tv rɒ bh vjrɒnj v sɒknɒnʃ rɒ bh sxrjh tsljm nmɒjm، پs ʔɒr ɣvm mrɒ mthml xvɒhjd ʃd vɒj br mn zjrɒ kh msl d͡ʒmʔ krdn mjvh‌hɒ vmɒnnd t͡ʃjdn ɒŋvrhɒjj ʃdh‌ɒm kh nh xvʃh‌ɒj brɒj xvrɒk dɒrd v nh nvbr ɒnd͡ʒjrj kh d͡ʒɒn mn آn rɒ mj‌xvɒhd mrd mtɣj ɒz d͡ʒhɒn nɒbvd ʃdh، v rɒst krdɒr ɒz mjɒn آdmjɒn mʔdvm ɡrdjdh ɒst d͡ʒmʔ ɒjʃɒn brɒj xvn kmjn mj‌ɡzɒrnd v jkdjɡr rɒ bh dɒm sjd mj‌nmɒjnd dsthɒj ɒjʃɒn brɒj ʃrɒrt t͡ʃɒlɒk ɒst، rئjs tlb mj‌knd v dɒvr rʃvh mj‌xvɒhd v mrd bzrɡ bh hvɒj nfs xvd tklm mj‌nmɒjd؛ پs ɒjʃɒn آn rɒ bh hm mj‌bɒfnd njkvtrjn ɒjʃɒn msl xɒr mj‌bɒʃd v rɒst krdɒr ɒjʃɒn ɒz xɒrbst bdtr rvz پɒsbɒnɒnt v rvz ʔɣvbt tv rsjdh ɒst، ɒlɒn ɒztrɒb ɒjʃɒn xvɒhd bvd br jɒrxvd ɒʔtmɒd mdɒr v br dvst xɒls xvjʃ tvkl mnmɒ v dr dhɒn xvd rɒ ɒz hm آɣvʃ xvdŋɒh dɒr zjrɒ kh پsr، پdr rɒ ɒftzɒh mj‌knd vdxtr bɒ mɒdr xvd v ʔrvs bɒ xɒrsvj xvjʃ mɣɒvmt mj‌nmɒjnd v dʃmnɒn ʃxs ɒhl xɒnh ɒvmj bɒʃnd ɒmɒ mn bsvj xdɒvnd ŋrɒnm v brɒj xdɒj nd͡ʒɒt xvd ɒntzɒr mj‌kʃm v xdɒj mn mrɒɒd͡ʒɒbt xvɒhd nmvd ‌ɒj dʃmn mn br mn ʃɒdj mnmɒ zjrɒ ɒɡr‌t͡ʃh bjftm xvɒhm brxɒst v ɒɡrt͡ʃh dr tɒrjkj bnʃjnm xdɒvnd nvr mn xvɒhd bvd ɣzb xdɒvnd rɒ mthml xvɒhm ʃd zjrɒ bh ɒv ɡnɒh vrzjdh‌ɒm tɒ ɒv dʔvj mrɒ fjsl knd v dɒvrj mrɒbd͡ʒɒ آvrd پs mrɒ bh rvʃnɒjj bjrvn xvɒhdآvrd v ʔdɒlt ɒv rɒ mʃɒhdh xvɒhm nmvd dʃmnm ɒjn rɒ xvɒhd djd v xd͡ʒɒlt ɒv rɒxvɒhd پvʃɒnjd zjrɒ bh mn mj‌ɡvjd jhvh xdɒj tv kd͡ʒɒ ɒst؟ t͡ʃʃmɒnm br ɒv xvɒhd ŋrjst vɒv ɒlɒn msl ɡl kvt͡ʃh‌hɒ پɒjmɒl xvɒhd ʃd drrvz bnɒ nmvdn djvɒrhɒjt dr آn rvz ʃrjʔt dvr xvɒhd ʃd dr آn rvz ɒz آʃvr v ɒzʃhrhɒj msr v ɒz msr tɒ nhr frɒt v ɒz drjɒ tɒdrjɒ v ɒz kvh tɒ kvh nzd tv xvɒhnd آmd v zmjn bh‌sbb sɒknɒnʃ، bh d͡ʒht ntjd͡ʒh ɒʔmɒlʃɒn vjrɒn xvɒhd ʃd ɣvm xvd rɒ bh ʔsɒj xvjʃ ʃbɒnj kn vɡvsfndɒn mjrɒs xvd rɒ kh dr d͡ʒŋl v dr mjɒn krml bh tnhɒjj sɒkn mj‌bɒʃnd ɒjʃɒn msl ɒjɒm sɒbɣ dr bɒʃɒn v d͡ʒlʔɒd bt͡ʃrnd msl ɒjɒmj kh ɒzmsr bjrvn آmdj kɒrhɒj ʔd͡ʒjb bh ɒv nʃɒn xvɒhm dɒd ɒmt‌hɒ t͡ʃvn ɒjn rɒ bjnnd، ɒz tmɒmj tvɒnɒjj xvjʃ xd͡ʒl xvɒhnd ʃd v dst brdhɒn xvɒhnd ɡzɒʃt v ɡvʃhɒj ɒjʃɒn krxvɒhd ʃd msl mɒr xɒk rɒ xvɒhnd ljsjd vmɒnnd hʃrɒt zmjn ɒz svrɒxhɒj xvd bɒ lrzh bjrvn xvɒhnd آmd v bsvj jhvh xdɒj mɒ bɒxvf xvɒhnd آmd v ɒz tv xvɒhnd trsjd kjst xdɒjj msl tv kh ʔsjɒn rɒ mj‌آmrzdv ɒz tɣsjr bɣjh mjrɒs xvjʃ drmj ɡzrd ɒvxʃm xvd rɒ tɒ bh ɒbd ŋɒh nmj dɒrd zjrɒ rhmt rɒ dvst mj‌dɒrdɒv bɒz rd͡ʒvʔ krdh، br mɒrhmt xvɒhd nmvd v ʔsjɒn mɒ rɒ پɒjmɒl xvɒhd krd v tv d͡ʒmjʔ ɡnɒhɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh ʔmɣ hɒj drjɒ xvɒhj ɒndɒxt ɒv bɒz rd͡ʒvʔ krdh، br mɒrhmt xvɒhd nmvd v ʔsjɒn mɒ rɒ پɒjmɒl xvɒhd krd v tv d͡ʒmjʔ ɡnɒhɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh ʔmɣ hɒj drjɒ xvɒhj ɒndɒxt ɒlɣvʃj jhvh xdɒj ɣjvr v ɒntɣɒm ɡjrndh ɒst xdɒvnd ɒntɣɒm ɡjrndh v sɒhb ɣzb ɒst xdɒvnd ɒz dʃmnɒn xvjʃ ɒntɣɒm mj‌ɡjrd v brɒj xsmɒn xvd xʃm rɒ ŋɒh mj‌dɒrd xdɒvnddjrɣzb v ʔzjm ɒlɣvt ɒst v ɡnɒh rɒ hrɡzbj szɒ nmj ɡzɒrd rɒh xdɒvnd dr tnd bɒd v tvfɒn ɒst v ɒbrhɒ xɒk پɒj ɒv mj‌bɒʃd drjɒ rɒ ʔtɒb mj‌knd v آn rɒ mj‌xʃkɒnd v d͡ʒmjʔ nhrhɒ rɒxʃk mj‌sɒzd bɒʃɒn v krml kɒhjdh mj‌ʃvnd vɡl lbnɒn پʒmrdh mj‌ɡrdd kvhhɒ ɒz ɒv mtzlzl vtlhɒ ɡdɒxth mj‌ʃvnd v d͡ʒhɒn ɒz hzvr vj mthrk mj‌ɡrdd v rbʔ mskvn v d͡ʒmjʔ sɒknɒnʃ پjʃ xʃm vj kh tvɒnd ɒjstɒd؟ v drhdt ɣzb ɒv kh tvɒnd brxɒst؟ ɣzb ɒv msl آtʃ rjxth mj‌ʃvd v sxrh‌hɒ ɒz ɒv xrdmj ɡrdd xdɒvnd njkv ɒst v dr rvz tŋj mld͡ʒɒ mj‌bɒʃd v mtvklɒn xvd rɒ mj‌ʃnɒsd v bh sjl srʃɒr، mkɒn آn rɒ bɒlkl xrɒb xvɒhdsɒxt v tɒrjkj dʃmnɒn ɒv rɒ tʔɒɣb xvɒhdnmvd kdɒm tdbjr rɒ bh zd xdɒvnd tvɒnjd nmvd؟ ɒv dfʔh hlɒk xvɒhd krd v msjbt dfʔh djɡr brپɒ nxvɒhd ʃd zjrɒ ɒɡrt͡ʃh msl xɒrhɒ bhm پjt͡ʃjdh v mɒnnd mj‌ɡsɒrɒn mst bʃvnd، ljkn t͡ʃvn kɒh xʃk bɒlkl svxth xvɒhnd ʃd mʃjr bljʔɒl kh bh zd xdɒvnd bd mj‌ɒndjʃd، ɒz tv bjrvn آmdh ɒst xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd «ɒɡrt͡ʃh ɒjʃɒn drɣvt sɒlm v dr ʃmɒrh njz bsjɒr bɒʃnd ljkn mnɣtʔ ʃdh، dr xvɒhnd ɡzʃt v ɒɡr‌t͡ʃh tv rɒzljl sɒxtm، ljkn bɒr djɡr tv rɒ zljl nxvɒhm nmvd v ɒlɒn jvɣ ɒv rɒ ɒz ɡrdn tv xvɒhm ʃkst v bndhɒj tv rɒ xvɒhm ɡsjxt» vxdɒvnd drbɒrh tv ɒmr frmvdh ɒst kh bɒr djɡrzrjtj bh nɒm tv nxvɒhd bvd v ɒz xɒnh xdɒjɒnt bthɒj trɒʃjdh v ɒsnɒm rjxth ʃdh rɒ mnɣtʔ xvɒhm nmvd v ɣbr tv rɒ xvɒhm sɒxt zjrɒ xvɒrʃdh‌ɒjɒjnk br kvhhɒ پɒjhɒj mbʃr kh slɒmtj rɒ ndɒ mj‌knd ɒj jhvdɒ ʔjdhɒj xvd rɒŋɒh dɒr v nzrhɒj xvd rɒ vfɒ kn zjrɒ kh mrdbljʔɒl bɒr djɡr ɒz tv nxvɒhd ɡzʃt blkh bɒlkl mnɣtʔ xvɒhd ʃd ɒjnk br kvhhɒ پɒjhɒj mbʃr kh slɒmtj rɒ ndɒ mj‌knd ɒj jhvdɒ ʔjdhɒj xvd rɒŋɒh dɒr v nzrhɒj xvd rɒ vfɒ kn zjrɒ kh mrdbljʔɒl bɒr djɡr ɒz tv nxvɒhd ɡzʃt blkh bɒlkl mnɣtʔ xvɒhd ʃd xrɒb knndh dr mɣɒbl tv brmj آjd hsɒrrɒ hfz kn، rɒh rɒ djdbɒnj nmɒ، kmr xvd rɒɣvj ɡrdɒn v ɣvt xvjʃ rɒ bsjɒr zjɒd kn zjrɒ xdɒvnd ʔzmt jʔɣvb rɒ msl ʔzmt ɒsrɒئjl bɒz mj‌آvrd v tɒrɒd͡ʒ knndɡɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ tɒrɒd͡ʒ mj‌knnd v ʃɒxh hɒj mvhɒj ɒjʃɒn rɒ tlf mj‌nmɒjnd sپr d͡ʒbɒrɒn ɒv srx ʃdh v mrdɒn d͡ʒŋj bh ɣrmz mlbs v ɒrɒbh‌hɒ dr rvz thjh ɒv ɒzfvlɒd lɒmʔ ɒst v njzh‌hɒ mthrk mj‌bɒʃd ɒrɒbh‌hɒ rɒ dr kvt͡ʃh‌hɒ btndj mj‌rɒnnd، drt͡ʃhɒrsvhɒ bhm brmj xvrnd nmɒjʃ آnhɒ msl mʃʔlhɒ ɒst v mɒnnd brɣhɒ mj‌dvnd ɒv bzrɡɒn xvd rɒ bh jɒd mj‌آvrd v ɒjʃɒn dr rɒh rftn lɣzʃ mj‌xvrnd dvɒn dvɒn bh hsɒr mj‌آjnd vmnd͡ʒnjɣ rɒ hɒzr mj‌sɒznd drvɒzh hɒj nhrhɒɡʃɒdh ɒst v ɣsr ɡdɒxth mj‌ɡrdd v hsb brhnh ʃdh، bh ɒsjrj brdh mj‌ʃvd v knjzɒnʃ msl nɒlh fɒxth‌hɒ sjnh znɒn nɒlh mj‌knnd v njnvɒɒz rvzj kh bh vd͡ʒvd آmd، mɒnnd brkh آb mj‌bvd ɒmɒ ɒhlʃ frɒr mj‌knnd، v ɒɡr‌t͡ʃh sdɒ mj‌znndkh «bɒjstjd bɒjstjd»، ljkn ɒhdj mltft nmj ʃvd nɣrh rɒ ɣɒrt knjd v tlɒ rɒ bh jɣmɒ brjd zjrɒkh ɒndvxth hɒj ɒv rɒ v ksrt hrɡvnh mtɒʔ nfjsh‌ɒʃ rɒ ɒnthɒjj njst ɒv xɒlj v vjrɒn vxrɒb ɒst v dlʃ ɡdɒxth v zɒnvhɒjʃ lrzɒn vdr hmh kmrhɒ drd ʃdjd mj‌bɒʃd v rŋ rvjhɒj hmh پrjdh ɒst bjʃh ʃjrɒn v mrtʔ ʃjrɒn ʒjɒn kd͡ʒɒ ɒst kh dr آn ʃjr nr v ʃjr mɒdh v ʃjr bt͡ʃh mj‌xrɒmjdnd v trsɒnndh‌ɒj nbvd؟ ʃjr nr brɒj hɒd͡ʒt bt͡ʃh hɒj xvd mj‌drjd vbh d͡ʒht ʃjrhɒj mɒdh‌ɒʃ xfh mj‌krd vmɣɒrh hɒj xvd rɒ ɒz ʃkɒr v bjʃh hɒj xvjʃ rɒɒz sjd پr mj‌sɒxtɒmɒ ɒlɒn jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd «mn bh zdtv hstm v ɒrɒbh hɒjʃ rɒ bh dvd xvɒhm svzɒnjd vʃmʃjr، ʃjrɒn ʒjɒn tv rɒ hlɒk xvɒhd sɒxt v ʃkɒr tv rɒ ɒz zmjn mnɣtʔ xvɒhm nmvd v آvɒzɒjlt͡ʃjɒnt djɡr msmvʔ nxvɒhd ʃd» ɒmɒ ɒlɒn jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd «mn bh zdtv hstm v ɒrɒbh hɒjʃ rɒ bh dvd xvɒhm svzɒnjd vʃmʃjr، ʃjrɒn ʒjɒn tv rɒ hlɒk xvɒhd sɒxt v ʃkɒr tv rɒ ɒz zmjn mnɣtʔ xvɒhm nmvd v آvɒzɒjlt͡ʃjɒnt djɡr msmvʔ nxvɒhd ʃd» vɒj br ʃhr xvn rjz kh tmɒmʃ ɒz drvɣ vɣtl mmlv ɒst v ɣɒrt ɒz آn dvrnmj ʃvd آvɒz tɒzjɒnh‌hɒ v sdɒj ɣrɣr t͡ʃrxhɒv d͡ʒhjdn ɒsbɒn v d͡ʒstn ɒrɒbh‌hɒ svɒrɒn hd͡ʒvm mj‌آvrnd v ʃmʃjrhɒ brɒɣ v njzh‌hɒ lɒmʔ mj‌bɒʃdv ksrt md͡ʒrvhɒn v frɒvɒnj mɣtvlɒn v lɒʃhɒ rɒɒnthɒ njst br lɒʃhɒj jkdjɡr mj‌ɒftnd ɒzksrt znɒj zɒnjh xvʃ mnzr kh sɒhb shrhɒɒst v ɒmt‌hɒ rɒ bh znɒhɒj xvd v ɣbɒjl rɒ bh‌d͡ʒɒdvɡrjhɒj xvjʃ mj‌frvʃd ɒjnk jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd «mn bh zd tv hstm vdɒmnhɒjt rɒ br rvj tv mnkʃf sɒxth، ʔvrt tv rɒ br ɒmt‌hɒ v rsvɒjj tv rɒ br mmlkt‌hɒ zɒhrxvɒhm sɒxt v nd͡ʒɒsɒt br tv rjxth tv rɒzljl xvɒhm sɒxt v tv rɒ ʔbrt xvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd v vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd kh hr‌kh tv rɒ bjnd ɒztv frɒr krdh، xvɒhd ɡft njnvɒ vjrɒn ʃdh ɒst kjst kh brɒj vj mɒtm ɡjrd v ɒz kd͡ʒɒ brɒj tvtʔzjh knndɡɒn btlbm؟» آjɒ tv ɒz nvآmvn bhtr hstj kh dr mjɒn nhrhɒsɒkn bvdh، آbhɒ ɒv rɒ ɒhɒth mj‌dɒʃt kh drjɒhsɒr ɒv v bhrhɒ djvɒr ɒv mj‌bvd؟ hbʃ vmsr ɣvtʃ mj‌bvdnd v آn ɒnthɒ ndɒʃt، fvt vlvbjm ɒz mʔɒvnt knndɡɒn tv mj‌bvdnd mʔhzɒd͡ʒlɒj vtn ʃdh v bh ɒsjrj rfth ɒst v ɒtfɒlʃ njz br sr hr kvt͡ʃh kvbjdh ʃdh‌ɒnd v br ʃrfɒjʃ ɣrʔh ɒndɒxth‌ɒnd v d͡ʒmjʔ bzrɡɒnʃ bh znd͡ʒjrhɒbsth ʃdh‌ɒnd پs tv njz mst ʃdh، xvjʃtn rɒ پnhɒn xvɒhj krd v mld͡ʒɒjj bh‌sbb dʃmn xvɒhj d͡ʒst d͡ʒmjʔ ɣlʔh hɒjt bh drxtɒn ɒnd͡ʒjr bɒ nvbrhɒ mʃɒbh xvɒhd bvd kh t͡ʃvn tkɒnjdh ʃvd bh dhɒn xvrndh mj‌ɒftd ɒjnk ɒhl tv drɒndrvnt znɒn mj‌bɒʃnd drvɒzh hɒj zmjnt brɒj dʃmnɒnt bɒlkl ɡʃɒdh ʃdh، آtʃ پʃt bndhɒjt rɒ mj‌svzɒnd brɒj mhɒsrh ɒt آb bjɒvr ɣlʔh hɒj xvdrɒ msthkm sɒz bh ɡl dɒxl ʃv v mlɒt rɒ پɒ bzn v kvrh آd͡ʒr پzj rɒ mrmt nmɒ dr آnd͡ʒɒ آtʃ tv rɒ xvɒhd svzɒnjd v ʃmʃjr tv rɒ mnɣtʔ sɒxth، tv rɒ msl krm xvɒhd xvrd، xvjʃtn rɒmsl krm ksjr kn v msl mlx bj‌ʃmɒr ɡrdɒn tɒd͡ʒrɒnt rɒ ɒz stɒrɡɒn آsmɒn zjɒdtr krdj msl krmhɒ tɒrɒd͡ʒ mj‌knnd v mj‌پrnd tɒd͡ʒdɒrɒn tv mɒnnd mlxhɒjnd v srdɒrɒnt mɒnnd ɒnbvh d͡ʒrɒdɒnd kh dr rvz srd br djvɒrhɒ frvd mj‌آjnd، ɒmɒt͡ʃvn آftɒb ɡrm ʃvd mj‌پrnd v d͡ʒɒj ɒjʃɒn mʔlvm njst kh kd͡ʒɒst‌ɒj پɒdʃɒh آʃvrʃbɒnɒnt bh xvɒb rfth v ʃrfɒjt xvɒbjdh‌ɒnd vɣvm tv br kvhhɒ پrɒkndh ʃdh، ksj njst kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ d͡ʒmʔ knd ‌ɒj پɒdʃɒh آʃvrʃbɒnɒnt bh xvɒb rfth v ʃrfɒjt xvɒbjdh‌ɒnd vɣvm tv br kvhhɒ پrɒkndh ʃdh، ksj njst kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ d͡ʒmʔ knd vhj kh hbɣvɣ nbj آn rɒ djd ‌ɒj xdɒvnd tɒ bh kj frjɒd brmj آvrm vnmj ʃnvj؟ tɒ bh kj nzd tv ɒz zlm frjɒdbrmj آvrm v nd͡ʒɒt nmj dhj؟ t͡ʃrɒ bj‌ɒnsɒfj rɒbh mn nʃɒn mj‌dhj v br stm nzr mj‌nmɒjj vɣzb v zlm پjʃ rvj mn mj‌bɒʃd؟ mnɒzʔh پdjd mj‌آjd v mxɒsmt sr xvd rɒ blndmj knd ɒz ɒjn sbb، ʃrjʔt sst ʃdh ɒst v ʔdɒlt hrɡz sɒdr nmj ʃvd t͡ʃvnkh ʃrjrɒn ʔɒdlɒn rɒ ɒhɒth mj‌nmɒjnd bnɒbrɒjn ʔdɒlt mʔvd͡ʒ ʃdh sɒdr mj‌ɡrdd dr mjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ nzr svɒrɒn ɒjʃɒn d͡ʒst v xjz mj‌knnd v svɒrɒn ɒjʃɒn ɒzd͡ʒɒj dvr آmdh، msl ʔɣɒbj kh brɒj xvrɒk bʃtɒbd mj‌پrnd d͡ʒmjʔ ɒjʃɒn brɒj zlm mj‌آjnd ʔzjmt rvj ɒjʃɒn btrf پjʃ ɒst v ɒsjrɒn rɒmsl rjɡ d͡ʒmʔ mj‌knnd v xdɒj ɒjʃɒn ɒst ‌ɒj jhvh xdɒj mn ɒj ɣdvs mn آjɒ tv ɒzɒzl njstj؟ پs nxvɒhjm mrd ɒj xdɒvnd ɒjʃɒn rɒ brɒj dɒvrj mʔjn krdh‌ɒj v‌ɒj sxrh، ɒjʃɒn rɒ brɒj tɒdjb tɒsjs nmvdh‌ɒj t͡ʃʃmɒn tvپɒktr ɒst ɒz ɒjnkh bh v ɒzپjvsth kʃtn ɒmt‌hɒ drjɣ nxvɒhd nmvd؟ br djdh bɒŋɒh xvd mj‌ɒjstm v br brd͡ʒ brپɒmj ʃvm v mrɒɣb xvɒhm ʃd tɒ bbjnm kh ɒvbh mn t͡ʃh xvɒhd ɡft v drbɒrh ʃkɒjtm t͡ʃh d͡ʒvɒb xvɒhd dɒd پs xdɒvnd mrɒ d͡ʒvɒb rɒtɒrɒd͡ʒ nxvɒhnd nmvd؟ t͡ʃvnkh tv ɒmt hɒj bsjɒrj rɒ ɣɒrt krdh‌ɒj، tmɒmj bɣjh ɣvm‌hɒ tv rɒɣɒrt xvɒhnd nmvd، bh‌sbb xvn mrdmɒn vzlmj kh br zmjn v ʃhr v d͡ʒmjʔ sɒknɒnʃ nmvdh‌ɒj vɒj br ksj‌kh brɒj xɒnh xvd bdj rɒksb nmvdh ɒst tɒ آʃjɒnh xvd rɒ br d͡ʒɒj blndsɒxth، xvjʃtn rɒ ɒz dst blɒ brhɒnd rsvɒjj rɒ bh d͡ʒht xɒnh xvjʃ tdbjrkrdh‌ɒj bh ɒjnkh ɣvm hɒj bsjɒr rɒ ɣtʔ nmvdh v brzd d͡ʒɒn xvjʃ ɡnɒh vrzjdh‌ɒj zjrɒkh sŋ ɒz djvɒr frjɒd brxvɒhd آvrd v tjr ɒz mjɒn t͡ʃvbhɒ آn rɒ d͡ʒvɒb xvɒhd dɒd vɒj br ksj‌kh ʃhrj bh xvn bnɒ mj‌knd v ɣrjh‌ɒj bh bj‌ɒnsɒfj ɒstvɒr mj‌nmɒjd آjɒ ɒjn ɒz d͡ʒɒnb jhvh sbɒjvt njst kh ɣvm‌hɒ brɒj آtʃ mʃɣt mj‌kʃnd v tvɒjf brɒj btɒlt xvjʃtn rɒxsth mj‌nmɒjnd؟ zjrɒ kh d͡ʒhɒn ɒz mʔrft d͡ʒlɒl xdɒvnd mmlv xvɒhd ʃd bh nhvj kh آbhɒdrjɒ rɒ mstvr mj‌sɒzd vɒj br ksj‌kh hmsɒjh xvd rɒ trɒʃjdh t͡ʃh fɒjdh ɒst kh sɒzndh آn، آn rɒ btrɒʃd jɒ ɒz bt rjxth ʃdh v mʔlm drvɣ، kh sɒzndh آn br snʔt xvdtvkl bnmɒjd v bthɒj ɡŋ rɒ bsɒzd vɒj brksj‌kh bh t͡ʃvb bɡvjd bjdɒr ʃv v bh sŋ ɡŋ kh brxjz آjɒ mj‌ʃvd kh آn tʔljm dhd؟ ɒjnk bh tlɒ v nɣrh پvʃjdh mj‌ʃvd lkn dr ɒndrvnʃ mtlɣ rvh njstɒmɒ xdɒvnd dr hjkl ɣds xvjʃ ɒst پs tmɒmj d͡ʒhɒn bh hzvr vj xɒmvʃ bɒʃd ɒmɒ xdɒvnd dr hjkl ɣds xvjʃ ɒst پs rɒ bjɒd آvr xdɒ ɒz tjmɒn آmd v ɣdvs ɒz d͡ʒbl fɒrɒn، slɒh d͡ʒlɒl ɒvآsmɒnhɒ rɒ پvʃɒnjd v zmjn ɒz tsbjh ɒv mmlvɡrdjd پrtv ɒv msl nvr bvd v ɒz dst vj ʃʔɒʔ sɒtʔ ɡrdjd v str ɣvt ɒv dr آnd͡ʒɒ bvd پjʃ rvj blɒdjdm v t͡ʃɒdrhɒj zmjn mdjɒn lrzɒn ʃd ‌ɒj xdɒvnd آjɒ br nhrhɒ ɣzb tv ɒfrvxth ʃd jɒ xʃm tv br nhrhɒ v ɣjz tv br drjɒ vɒrdآmd، kh br ɒsbɒn xvd v ɒrɒbh hɒj fth mndj xvjʃ svɒr ʃdj؟ kmɒn tv tmɒm brhnh ʃd، mvɒfɣ ɣsmhɒjj kh dr klɒm xvd brɒj ɒsbɒt xvrdh‌ɒj، slɒh zmjn rɒ bh nhrhɒ mnʃɣ sɒxtj kvhhɒ tv rɒ djdnd v lrzɒn ɡʃtnd v sjlɒb hɒd͡ʒɒrj ʃd ld͡ʒh آvɒz xvd rɒ dɒd v dsthɒj xvjʃ rɒ bh bɒlɒ brɒfrɒʃt آftɒb v mɒh dr brd͡ʒhɒj xvd ɒjstɒdnd ɒznvr tjrhɒjt v ɒz پrtv njzh brɒɣ tv brftnd bɒɣzb dr d͡ʒhɒn xrɒmjdj، v bɒ xʃm ɒmt‌hɒ rɒپɒjmɒl nmvdj brɒj nd͡ʒɒt ɣvm xvjʃ vxlɒsj msjh xvd bjrvn آmdj sr rɒ xfjh bblʔnd bɒ ɒsbɒn xvd brdrjɒ v br ɒnbvh آbhɒj bsjɒr xrɒmjdj t͡ʃvn ʃnjdm ɒhʃɒjm blrzjd v ɒz آvɒz آn lbhɒjm bd͡ʒnbjd، v پvsjdɡj bh ɒstxvɒnhɒjm dɒxl ʃdh، dr d͡ʒɒj xvd lrzjdm، kh dr rvz tŋj ɒstrɒht tvjlh‌hɒ nbɒʃd،ljkn mn drxdɒvnd ʃɒdmɒn xvɒhm ʃd v dr xdɒj nd͡ʒɒt xvjʃ vd͡ʒd xvɒhm nmvd ljkn mn drxdɒvnd ʃɒdmɒn xvɒhm ʃd v dr xdɒj nd͡ʒɒt xvjʃ vd͡ʒd xvɒhm nmvd پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ، br sfnjɒ ɒbn kvʃj ɒbn d͡ʒdljɒɒbn ɒmrjɒ ɒbn hzɣjɒ nɒzl ʃd xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh hmh‌t͡ʃjzhɒ rɒ ɒz rvj zmjn bɒlkl hlɒk xvɒhm sɒxt ɒnsɒn v bhɒjm rɒ hlɒk mj‌sɒzm mrɣɒn hvɒ v mɒhjɒn drjɒ vsŋhɒj msɒdm rɒ bɒ ʃrjrɒn hlɒk mj‌sɒzm vɒnsɒn rɒ ɒz rvj zmjn mnɣtʔ mj‌nmɒjm ɣvl xdɒvnd ɒjn ɒst v dst xvd rɒ br jhvdɒ v brd͡ʒmjʔ sknh ɒvrʃljm drɒz mj‌nmɒjm v bɣjh bʔl vɒsmhɒj mvbdɒn v kɒhnɒn rɒ ɒz ɒjn mkɒn mnɣtʔ mj‌sɒzm v آnɒnj rɒ kh lʃkr آsmɒn rɒ br bɒmhɒmj پrstnd، v آn پrstndɡɒn rɒ kh bh jhvh ɣsm mj‌xvrnd v آnɒnj rɒ kh bh mlkvm svɡndmj xvrnd، v آnɒnj rɒ kh ɒz پjrvj jhvh mrtdʃdh‌ɒnd، v آnɒnj rɒ kh xdɒvnd rɒ nmj tlbnd v ɒz ɒvmsɒlt nmj nmɒjnd bh hzvr xdɒvnd jhvh xɒmvʃ bɒʃ، zjrɒkh rvz xdɒvnd nzdjk ɒst، t͡ʃvnkh xdɒvndɣrbɒnj‌ɒj mhjɒ krdh ɒst v dʔvt‌ʃdɡɒn xvd rɒtɣdjs nmvdh ɒst v dr rvz ɣrbɒnj xdɒvndvɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd kh mn br srvrɒn v پsrɒn پɒdʃɒh v hmh آnɒnj kh lbɒs bjɡɒnh mj‌پvʃnd ʔɣvbt xvɒhm rsɒnjd v dr آn rvz br hmh آnɒnj kh br آstɒnh mj‌d͡ʒhnd ʔɣvbt xvɒhm rsɒnjd v br آnɒnj kh xɒnh xdɒvnd xvd rɒ ɒz zlm v frjb پrmj sɒznd v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh dr آn rvzsdɒj nʔrh‌ɒj ɒz drvɒzh mɒhj v vlvlh‌ɒj ɒz mhlh dvm v ʃkstɡj ʔzjmj ɒz tlhɒ msmvʔ xvɒhdʃd ‌ɒj sɒknɒn mktjʃ vlvlh nmɒjjd zjrɒ kh tmɒmj ɣvm knʔɒn tlf ʃdh v hmh آnɒnj kh nɣrh rɒbrmj dɒrnd mnɣtʔ ɡrdjdh‌ɒnd v dr آnvɣt ɒvrʃljm rɒ bh t͡ʃrɒɣhɒ tftjʃ xvɒhm nmvd v brآnɒnj kh br drdhɒj xvd nʃsth‌ɒnd v dr dlhɒj xvd mj‌ɡvjnd xdɒvnd nh njkvjj mj‌knd v nh bdj، ʔɣvbt xvɒhm rsɒnjd bnɒbrɒjn، dvlt ɒjʃɒn tɒrɒd͡ʒ v xɒnh hɒj ɒjʃɒn xrɒb xvɒhdʃd؛ v xɒnh‌hɒ bnɒ xvɒhnd nmvd، ɒmɒ dr آnhɒ sɒkn nxvɒhnd ʃd v tɒkstɒnhɒ ɣrs xvɒhnd krd، ɒmɒʃrɒb آnhɒ rɒ nxvɒhnd nvʃjd rvz ʔzjm xdɒvnd nzdjk ɒst، nzdjk ɒst v bzvdj hrt͡ʃh tmɒm tr mj‌rsd آvɒz rvzxdɒvnd msmvʔ ɒst v mrd zvrآvr dr آn bh tlxj frjɒd brxvɒhd آvrd آn rvz، rvzɣzb ɒst، rvz tŋj v ɒztrɒb، rvz xrɒbj vvjrɒnj، rvz tɒrjkj v zlmt، rvz ɒbrhɒ v zlmt ɣljz، rvz krnɒ v hŋɒmh d͡ʒŋ bh zdʃhrhɒj hsɒrdɒr v bh zd brd͡ʒhɒj blnd v mrdmɒn rɒ t͡ʃnɒn bh tŋ mj‌آvrm kh kvrɒnh rɒh xvɒhnd rft zjrɒ kh bh xdɒvnd ɡnɒh vrzjdh‌ɒnd پs xvn ɒjʃɒn msl ɣbɒr v ɡvʃt ɒjʃɒn mɒnndsrɡjn rjxth xvɒhd ʃddr rvz ɣzb xdɒvnd nh nɣrh v nh tlɒj ɒjʃɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ tvɒndrhɒnjd v tmɒmj d͡ʒhɒn ɒz آtʃ ɣjrt ɒv svxth xvɒhdʃd، zjrɒ kh br tmɒmj sɒknɒn d͡ʒhɒn hlɒktj hvlnɒk vɒrd xvɒhd آvrd dr rvz ɣzb xdɒvnd nh nɣrh v nh tlɒj ɒjʃɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ tvɒndrhɒnjd v tmɒmj d͡ʒhɒn ɒz آtʃ ɣjrt ɒv svxth xvɒhdʃd، zjrɒ kh br tmɒmj sɒknɒn d͡ʒhɒn hlɒktj hvlnɒk vɒrd xvɒhd آvrd ɒj ɒmtj kh hjɒ ndɒrjd frɒhm آjjd v d͡ʒmʔ bʃvjd ɣbl ɒz آnkh hkm ntɒd͡ʒ bjɒvrd vآn rvz msl kɒh bɡzrd؛ ɣbl ɒz آnkh hdt xʃm xdɒvnd br ʃmɒ vɒrd آjd؛ ɣbl ɒz آnkh rvz xʃm xdɒvnd br ʃmɒ brsd ‌ɒj d͡ʒmjʔ hljmɒn zmjn kh ɒhkɒm ɒv rɒ bd͡ʒɒ mj‌آvrjd، ʔdɒlt rɒ btlbjd vtvɒzʔ rɒ bd͡ʒvjjd، ʃɒjd kh dr rvz xʃm xdɒvndmstvr ʃvjd zjrɒ kh ɣzh mtrvk mj‌ʃvd v ɒʃɣlvn vjrɒn mj‌ɡrdd v ɒhl ɒʃdvd rɒ dr vɣt zhr ɒxrɒd͡ʒ mj‌nmɒjnd v ʔɣrvn ɒz rjʃh‌kndh mj‌ʃvd vɒj br ɒmt krjtjɒn kh br sɒhl drjɒ sɒknnd ɒj knʔɒn‌ɒj zmjn flstjnjɒn klɒm xdɒvnd bh zdʃmɒ ɒst v mn tv rɒ t͡ʃnɒn hlɒk mj‌knm kh ksj dr tv sɒkn nxvɒhd bvd، v sɒhl drjɒ mvzʔ mrtʔ hɒj xvɒhd krdɒjn ɒst ʃhr frhnɒk kh dr ɒtmjnɒn sɒkn mj‌bvd v dr dl xvd mj‌ɡft «mn hstm v ɣjr ɒz mn djɡrj njst؛ mn hstm v ɣjr ɒz mn djɡrj njst» t͡ʃɡvnh xrɒb ʃd xvɒbɡɒh hjvɒnɒt ɡrdjdh ɒst hr‌kh ɒz آn ʔbvr knd br آn sxrjh krdh، dst xvd rɒ xvɒhd d͡ʒnbɒnjd ɒjn ɒst ʃhr frhnɒk kh dr ɒtmjnɒn sɒkn mj‌bvd v dr dl xvd mj‌ɡft «mn hstm v ɣjr ɒz mn djɡrj njst؛ mn hstm v ɣjr ɒz mn djɡrj njst» t͡ʃɡvnh xrɒb ʃd xvɒbɡɒh hjvɒnɒt ɡrdjdh ɒst hr‌kh ɒz آn ʔbvr knd br آn sxrjh krdh، dst xvd rɒ xvɒhd d͡ʒnbɒnjd vɒj br ʃhr ftnh ɒŋjz nd͡ʒs zlm knndh آvɒz rɒ nmj ʃnvd v tɒdjb rɒ nmj پzjrdv br xdɒvnd tvkl nmj nmɒjd v nxvɒhj ʃd zjrɒ kh dr آn zmɒn آnɒnj rɒ kh ɒz tkbr tv msrvrnd، ɒz mjɒnt dvrxvɒhm krd v bɒr djɡr dr kvh mɣds mn tkbrnxvɒhj nmvd ɒmɒ dr mjɒn tv ɣvmj zljl vmskjn bɒɣj xvɒhm ɡzɒʃt v ɒjʃɒn br ɒsm xdɒvnd tvkl xvɒhnd nmvd v bɣjh ɒsrɒئjl bj‌ɒnsɒfj nxvɒhnd nmvd v drvɣ nxvɒhnd ɡft vdr dhɒn ɒjʃɒn zbɒn frjbndh jɒft nxvɒhd ʃdzjrɒ kh ɒjʃɒn t͡ʃrɒ krdh، bh آrɒmj xvɒhndxvɒbjd v trsɒnndh‌ɒj nxvɒhd bvd ‌ɒj dxtr shjvn trnm nmɒ ɒj ɒsrɒئjl آvɒz ʃɒdmɒnj bdh ɒj dxtr ɒvrʃljm bh tmɒmj dl‌ʃɒdmɒn ʃv v vd͡ʒd nmɒ xdɒvnd ʔɣvbt hɒj tv rɒ brdɒʃth v dʃmnɒnt rɒ dvr krdh ɒst jhvh پɒdʃɒh ɒsrɒئjl dr mjɒn tv ɒst پs bɒr djɡr xvɒhm rsɒnjd v lŋɒn rɒ xvɒhm rhɒnjd v rɒndh ʃdɡɒn rɒ d͡ʒmʔ xvɒhm krd v آnɒnj rɒ kh ʔɒrɒjʃɒn dr tmɒmj zmjn mj‌bvd mhl tsbjh v ɒsm xvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd ɒjnk dr آn zmɒn br hmh آnɒnj kh br tv zlm mj‌krdnd، mkɒfɒt xvɒhm rsɒnjd v lŋɒn rɒ xvɒhm rhɒnjd v rɒndh ʃdɡɒn rɒ d͡ʒmʔ xvɒhm krd v آnɒnj rɒ kh ʔɒrɒjʃɒn dr tmɒmj zmjn mj‌bvd mhl tsbjh v ɒsm xvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd dr rvz ɒvl mɒh ʃʃm ɒz sɒl dvm dɒrjvʃ پɒdʃɒh، klɒm xdɒvnd bh vɒsth hd͡ʒj nbj vbh zrbɒbl bn ʃɒltjئjl vɒlj jhvdɒ v bh jhvʃʔ bn jhvsɒdɣ rئjs khnh rsjdh، ɡft jhvh sbɒjvt tklm nmvdh، t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd ɒjn ɣvm mj‌ɡvjnd vɣt آmdn mɒ jʔnj vɣt bnɒ nmvdn xɒnh xdɒvnd nrsjdh ɒst پs klɒm xdɒvnd bh vɒsth hd͡ʒj nbj nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft آjɒ vɣt ʃmɒst kh ʃmɒ dr xɒnh hɒj msɣf xvd sɒkn ʃvjd v ɒjn xɒnh xrɒb bmɒnd؟ پs hɒl jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd dl xvd rɒ bh rɒhhɒj xvjʃ mʃɣvl sɒzjd bsjɒr kɒʃth‌ɒjd v ɒndk hɒsl mj‌knjd mj‌xvrjd ɒmɒ sjr nmj ʃvjd vmj nvʃjd ljkn sjrɒb nmj ɡrdjd rxt mj پvʃjd ɒmɒ ɡrm nmj ʃvjd v آnkh mzd mj‌ɡjrd، mzd xvjʃ rɒ dr kjsh svrɒx dɒr mj‌ɡzɒrd پs jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd dl xvd rɒ bh rɒhhɒj xvd mʃɣvl sɒzjd bh kvh brآmdh vt͡ʃvb آvrdh، xɒnh rɒ bnɒ nmɒjjd v xdɒvndmj ɡvjd ɒz آn rɒzj ʃdh، d͡ʒlɒl xvɒhm jɒft mntzr bsjɒr bvdjd v ɒjnk km ʃd v t͡ʃvn آn rɒbh xɒnh آvrdjd mn br آn dmjdm jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌پrsd kh sbb ɒjn t͡ʃjst؟ sbb ɒjn ɒst kh xɒnh mn xrɒb mj‌mɒnd v hrkdɒm ɒz ʃmɒ bh xɒnh xvjʃ mj‌ʃtɒbjd ɒz ɒjn sbb، آsmɒnhɒ bxɒtr ʃmɒ ɒz ʃbnm bɒz dɒʃth mj‌ʃvd v zmjn ɒzmhsvlʃ bɒzdɒʃth mj‌ɡrdd v mn br zmjn vbr kvhhɒ v br ɣlh v ʔsjr ɒŋvr v rvɣn zjtvn vbr hr‌آnt͡ʃh zmjn mj‌rvjɒnd v br ɒnsɒn v bhɒjm vtmɒmj mʃɣt hɒj dsthɒ xʃksɒlj rɒ xvɒndm» آŋɒh zrbɒbl bn ʃɒltjئjl v jhvʃʔ bn jhvsɒdɣ rئjs khnh v tmɒmj bɣjh ɣvm bh ɣvl jhvh xdɒj xvd v bh klɒm hd͡ʒj nbj t͡ʃnɒnkh jhvh xdɒj ɒjʃɒn ɒv rɒ frstɒdh bvd ɡvʃ dɒdnd، v ɣvm ɒz xdɒvnd trsjdnd v hd͡ʒj، rsvl xdɒvnd، پjɣɒm xdɒvnd rɒ brɒj ɣvm bjɒn krdh، ɡft xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh mn bɒ ʃmɒ hstm vxdɒvnd rvh zrbɒbl bn ʃɒltjئjl vɒlj jhvdɒ vrvh jhvʃʔ bn jhvsɒdɣ، rئjs khnh، v rvh tmɒmj bɣjh ɣvm rɒ brɒŋjzɒnjd tɒ brvnd v dr xɒnh jhvh sbɒjvt xdɒj xvd bh‌kɒr پrdɒznddrrvz bjst v t͡ʃhɒrm mɒh ʃʃm ɒz sɒl dvm dɒrjvʃ پɒdʃɒh، ɒjn vɒɣʔ ʃd drrvz bjst v t͡ʃhɒrm mɒh ʃʃm ɒz sɒl dvm dɒrjvʃ پɒdʃɒh، ɒjn vɒɣʔ ʃd dr rvz bjst v jkm mɒh hftm، klɒm xdɒvnd bvɒsth hd͡ʒj nbj nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft zrbɒbl bn ʃɒltjئjl vɒlj jhvdɒ v jhvʃʔ bn jhvsɒdɣ rئjs khnh، v bɣjh ɣvm rɒ xtɒb krdh، bɡv kjst dr mjɒn ʃmɒ kh bɒɣj‌mɒndh vɒjn xɒnh rɒ dr d͡ʒlɒl nxstjnʃ djdh bɒʃd؟ پs ɒlɒn dr nzr ʃmɒ t͡ʃɡvnh mj‌nmɒjd؟ آjɒ dr nzr ʃmɒnɒt͡ʃjz nmj nmɒjd؟ ɒmɒ ɒlɒn xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd ɒj zrbɒbl ɣvj‌dl bɒʃ v‌ɒj jhvʃʔ bn jhvsɒdɣ rئjs khnh ɣvj‌dl bɒʃ v‌ɒj tmɒmj ɣvm zmjn ɣvj‌dl bɒʃjd v xdɒvnd mj‌frmɒjd kh mʃɣvl bʃvjd zjrɒ kh mn bɒ ʃmɒ hstm ɣvl jhvh sbɒjvt ɒjn ɒst brhsb klɒm آn ʔhdj kh dr hjn bjrvn آvrdn ʃmɒ ɒz msr bɒ ʃmɒ bstm vt͡ʃvnkh rvh mn dr mjɒn ʃmɒ ɣɒjm mj‌bɒʃd، trsɒn mbɒʃjd zjrɒ kh jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd jk dfʔh djɡr v آn njz bʔd ɒz ɒndk zmɒnj، آsmɒnhɒ v zmjn v drjɒ v xʃkj rɒ mtzlzl xvɒhm sɒxt v tmɒmj ɒmt‌hɒ rɒ mtzlzl xvɒhm sɒxt v fzjlt d͡ʒmjʔ ɒmt‌hɒ xvɒhndآmd v jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd kh ɒjn xɒnh rɒ ɒzd͡ʒlɒl پr xvɒhm sɒxt jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd nɣrh ɒz آn mn v tlɒ ɒz آn mn ɒst jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd d͡ʒlɒl آxr ɒjn xɒnh ɒzd͡ʒlɒl nxstjnʃ ʔzjm tr xvɒhd bvd v dr ɒjn mkɒn، slɒmtj rɒ xvɒhm bxʃjd ɣvl jhvh sbɒjvt ɒjn ɒst dr rvz bjst v t͡ʃhɒrm mɒh nhm ɒz sɒl dvm dɒrjvʃ، klɒm xdɒvnd bvɒsth hd͡ʒj nbj nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒzkɒhnɒn drbɒrh ʃrjʔt svɒl kn v bپrs ɒɡrksj ɡvʃt mɣds rɒ dr dɒmn d͡ʒɒmh xvd brdɒrdv dɒmnʃ bh nɒn jɒ آʃ jɒ ʃrɒb jɒ rvɣn jɒ bh hrɣsm xvrɒk djɡr brxvrd، آjɒ آn mɣds xvɒhd ʃd؟ v kɒhnɒn d͡ʒvɒb dɒdnd kh nj پs hd͡ʒj پrsjd ɒɡr ksj‌kh ɒz mjtj nd͡ʒs ʃdh bɒʃd jkj ɒz ɒjnhɒ rɒ lms nmɒjd آjɒ آn nd͡ʒs xvɒhd ʃd؟ v kɒhnɒn dr d͡ʒvɒb ɡftnd kh nd͡ʒs xvɒhd ʃd پs hd͡ʒj tklm nmvdh، ɡft xdɒvnd mj‌frmɒjd ɒjn ɣvm hmt͡ʃnjn hstnd v ɒjn ɒmt bh nzr mn hmt͡ʃnjn mj‌bɒʃnd v hmh ɒʔmɒl dsthɒj ɒjʃɒn t͡ʃnjn ɒst v hr hdjh‌ɒj kh drآnd͡ʒɒ mj‌brnd nd͡ʒs mj‌bɒʃd v ɒlɒn dl xvd rɒmʃɣvl sɒzjd ɒz ɒjn‌rvz v ɣbl ɒz ɒjn، پjʃ ɒzآnkh sŋj brsŋj dr hjkl xdɒvnd ɡzɒʃth ʃvd dr tmɒmj ɒjn ɒjɒm t͡ʃvn ksj bh tvdh bjst mn mj‌آmd fɣt dh mn bvd v t͡ʃvn ksj bh mjxɒnh mj‌آmd tɒ پnd͡ʒɒh rtl ɒz آn bkʃd، fɣtbjst rtl bvd v ʃmɒ rɒ v tmɒmj ɒʔmɒl dsthɒj ʃmɒ rɒ bh bɒd smvm v jrɣɒn v tɡrɡ zdm ljkn xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd bsvj mn bɒzɡʃt nnmvdjd ɒlɒn dl xvd rɒ mʃɣvl sɒzjd ɒz ɒjn‌rvz bh bʔd، jʔnj ɒz rvz bjst v t͡ʃhɒrm mɒh nhm، ɒz rvzj kh bnjɒd hjkl xdɒvnd nhɒdh ʃd، dl xvd rɒ mʃɣvl sɒzjd آjɒ txm hnvz dr ɒnbɒrɒst v mv v ɒnd͡ʒjr v ɒnɒr v drxt zjtvn hnvzmjvh xvd rɒ njɒvrdh‌ɒnd؟ ɒz ɒjn‌rvz brkt xvɒhm dɒd v klɒm xdɒvnd bɒr dvm dr bjst v t͡ʃhɒrm mɒh br hd͡ʒj nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft zrbɒbl vɒlj jhvdɒ rɒ xtɒb krdh، bɡv mn آsmɒnhɒ v zmjn rɒmtzlzl xvɒhm sɒxtv krsj mmɒlk rɒ vɒʒɡvn xvɒhm nmvd v ɣvt mmɒlk ɒmt‌hɒ rɒhlɒk xvɒhm sɒxt v ɒrɒbh‌hɒ v svɒrɒn آnhɒ rɒsrŋvn xvɒhm krd v ɒsbhɒ v svɒrɒn آnhɒ bh ʃmʃjr jkdjɡr xvɒhnd ɒftɒd v krsj mmɒlk rɒ vɒʒɡvn xvɒhm nmvd v ɣvt mmɒlk ɒmt‌hɒ rɒhlɒk xvɒhm sɒxt v ɒrɒbh‌hɒ v svɒrɒn آnhɒ rɒsrŋvn xvɒhm krd v ɒsbhɒ v svɒrɒn آnhɒ bh ʃmʃjr jkdjɡr xvɒhnd ɒftɒd dr mɒh hʃtm ɒz sɒl dvm dɒrjvʃ، klɒm xdɒvnd br zkrjɒ ɒbn brkjɒ ɒbn ʔdvj nbj nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «xdɒvnd br پdrɒn ʃmɒ bsjɒrɣzbnɒk bvd پs bh ɒjʃɒn bɡv jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd bsvj mn bɒzɡʃt knjd ɣvl jhvh sbɒjvt ɒjn ɒst v jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd mn bh svj ʃmɒ rd͡ʒvʔ xvɒhm nmvd ʃmɒ msl پdrɒn xvd mbɒʃjd kh ɒnbjɒ slf ɒjʃɒn rɒ ndɒkrdh، ɡftnd jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒzrɒhhɒj zʃt xvd v ɒz ɒʔmɒl bd xvjʃ bɒzɡʃt nmɒjjd، ɒmɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh ɒjʃɒn nʃnjdnd v bh mn ɡvʃ ndɒdnd پdrɒn ʃmɒ kd͡ʒɒhstnd v آjɒ ɒnbjɒ hmjʃh zndh mj‌mɒnnd؟ ljkn klɒm v frɒjz mn kh bh bndɡɒn xvd ɒnbjɒɒmrfrmvdh bvdm، آjɒ پdrɒn ʃmɒ rɒ dr ŋrft؟ vt͡ʃvn ɒjʃɒn bɒzɡʃt nmvdnd، ɡftnd t͡ʃnɒnkh jhvh sbɒjvt ɣsd nmvd kh mvɒfɣ rɒhhɒ v ɒʔmɒl mɒ bh mɒ ʔml nmɒjd hmt͡ʃnɒn bh mɒ ʔml nmvdh ɒst» dr rvz bjst v t͡ʃhɒrm mɒh jɒzdhm kh mɒh ʃbɒt bɒʃd، ɒz sɒl dvm dɒrjvʃ، klɒm xdɒvndbr zkrjɒ ɒbn brkjɒ ɒbn ʔdvj nbj nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft dr vɣt ʃb djdm kh ɒjnk mrdj br ɒsb srx svɒr bvd v dr mjɒn drxtɒn آs kh dr vɒdj bvd ɒjstɒdh v dr ʔɣb ɒv ɒsbɒn srx v zrd v sfjdbvd v ɡftm «ɒj آɣɒjm ɒjnhɒ t͡ʃjstnd؟» vfrʃth‌ɒj kh bɒ mn tklm mj‌nmvd، mrɒ ɡft «mn tvrɒ nʃɒn mj‌dhm kh ɒjnhɒ t͡ʃjstnd» پs آn mrd kh dr mjɒn drxtɒn آs ɒjstɒdh bvd، d͡ʒvɒb dɒd v ɡft «ɒjnhɒ ksɒnj mj‌bɒʃnd kh xdɒvnd ɒjʃɒn rɒ brɒj trdd nmvdn dr d͡ʒhɒn frstɒdh ɒst» v ɒjʃɒn bh frʃth xdɒvnd kh dr mjɒn drxtɒn آs ɒjstɒdh bvdd͡ʒvɒb dɒdh، ɡftnd «mɒ dr d͡ʒhɒn trdd nmvdh‌ɒjm vɒjnk tmɒmj d͡ʒhɒn mstrjh v آrɒm ɒst» vfrʃth xdɒvnd d͡ʒvɒb dɒdh، ɡft «ɒj jhvh sbɒjvt tɒ bh kj br ɒvrʃljm v ʃhrhɒj jhvdɒ kh dr ɒjn hftɒd sɒl ɣzbnɒk mj‌bvdj rhmt nxvɒhj nmvd؟» v xdɒvnd bɒ sxnɒn njkv vklɒm tslj آmjz آn frʃth‌ɒj rɒ kh bɒ mn tklm mj‌nmvd d͡ʒvɒb dɒd پs frʃth‌ɒj kh bɒ mn tklm mj‌nmvd mrɒɡft «ndɒ krdh bɡv jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd dr bɒrh ɒvrʃljm v shjvn ɣjrt ʔzjmj dɒʃtm v brɒmt hɒj mtmئn sxt ɣzbnɒk ʃdm zjrɒ kh ɒndk ɣzbnɒk mj‌bvdm ljkn ɒjʃɒn blɒ rɒ zjɒdh krdnd bnɒbrɒjn xdɒvndt͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd bh ɒvrʃljm bɒ rhmt‌hɒ rd͡ʒvʔ xvɒhm nmvd v xɒnh mn dr آn bnɒ xvɒhd ʃd ɣvl jhvh sbɒjvt ɒjn ɒst v rjsmɒnkɒrj br ɒvrʃljm kʃjdh xvɒhd ʃd bɒr djɡr ndɒkrdh، bɡv kh jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ʃhrhɒj mn bɒr djɡr bh sʔɒdtmndj lbrjzxvɒhd ʃd v xdɒvnd shjvn rɒ bɒz tslj xvɒhd dɒd v ɒvrʃljm rɒ bɒr djɡr xvɒhdbrɡzjd» پs t͡ʃʃmɒn xvd rɒ brɒfrɒʃth، ŋrjstm vɒjnk t͡ʃhɒr ʃɒx bvd v bh frʃth‌ɒj kh bɒ mn tklm mj‌nmvd ɡftm «ɒjnhɒ t͡ʃjstnd؟» ɒv mrɒ ɡft «ɒjnhɒ ʃɒxhɒ mj‌bɒʃnd kh jhvdɒ v ɒsrɒئjl vɒvrʃljm rɒ پrɒkndh sɒxth‌ɒnd» v xdɒvndt͡ʃhɒr آhŋr bh mn nʃɒn dɒdv ɡftm «ɒjnɒn brɒj t͡ʃh‌kɒr mj‌آjnd؟» ɒv dr d͡ʒvɒb ɡft «آnhɒʃɒxhɒ mj‌bɒʃnd kh jhvdɒ rɒ t͡ʃnɒn پrɒkndh nmvdh‌ɒnd kh ɒhdj sr xvd rɒ blnd nmj tvɒnd krdv ɒjnhɒ mj‌آjnd tɒ آnhɒ rɒ btrsɒnnd v ʃɒxhɒj ɒmt hɒjj rɒ kh ʃɒx xvd rɒ br zmjn jhvdɒbrɒfrɒʃth، آn rɒ پrɒkndh sɒxth‌ɒnd bjrvn ɒfknnd» v ɡftm «ɒjnɒn brɒj t͡ʃh‌kɒr mj‌آjnd؟» ɒv dr d͡ʒvɒb ɡft «آnhɒʃɒxhɒ mj‌bɒʃnd kh jhvdɒ rɒ t͡ʃnɒn پrɒkndh nmvdh‌ɒnd kh ɒhdj sr xvd rɒ blnd nmj tvɒnd krdv ɒjnhɒ mj‌آjnd tɒ آnhɒ rɒ btrsɒnnd v ʃɒxhɒj ɒmt hɒjj rɒ kh ʃɒx xvd rɒ br zmjn jhvdɒbrɒfrɒʃth، آn rɒ پrɒkndh sɒxth‌ɒnd bjrvn ɒfknnd» v t͡ʃʃmɒn xvd rɒ brɒfrɒʃth، ŋrjstm vmrdj kh rjsmɒnkɒrj bh‌dst xvddɒʃt djdm v ɡftm kh «kd͡ʒɒ mj‌rvj؟» ɒv mrɒɡft «bh d͡ʒht پjmvdn ɒvrʃljm tɒ bbjnm ʔrzʃ t͡ʃh v tvlʃ t͡ʃh mj‌bɒʃd» v ɒjnk frʃth‌ɒj kh bɒ mn tklm mj‌nmvdbjrvn rft v frʃth djɡr brɒj mlɒɣɒt vj bjrvn آmdh، vj rɒ ɡft «bʃtɒb v ɒjn d͡ʒvɒn rɒxtɒb krdh، bɡv ɒvrʃljm bh‌sbb ksrt mrdmɒn v bhɒjmj kh dr ɒndrvnʃ xvɒhnd bvd، msl dhɒt bj‌hsɒr mskvn xvɒhd ʃd vxdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh mn bh ɒtrɒfʃ djvɒrj آtʃjn xvɒhm bvd v dr ɒndrvnʃ d͡ʒlɒl xvɒhm bvd hɒn hɒn xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd ɒz zmjn ʃmɒl bɡrjzjd zjrɒ kh ʃmɒ rɒ msl t͡ʃhɒr bɒd آsmɒn پrɒkndh sɒxth‌ɒm ɣvl xdɒvnd ɒjn ɒst hɒn‌ɒj shjvn kh bɒ dxtr bɒbl sɒkn hstj، xvjʃtn rɒ rstɡɒr sɒz zjrɒ jhvh sbɒjvt kh mrɒ bʔd ɒzd͡ʒlɒl nzd ɒmt hɒjj kh ʃmɒ rɒ ɣɒrt krdndfrstɒdh ɒst، t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd kh hr‌kh ʃmɒ rɒlms nmɒjd mrdmk t͡ʃʃm ɒv rɒ lms nmvdh ɒst «zjrɒ ɒjnk mn dst xvd rɒ br ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm ɒfʃɒnd v ɒjʃɒn ɣɒrt bndɡɒn xvdʃɒn xvɒhnd ʃd v ʃmɒ xvɒhjd dɒnst kh jhvh sbɒjvt mrɒ frstɒdh ɒst ‌ɒj dxtr shjvn trnm nmɒ v ʃɒdj kn zjrɒ xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh ɒjnk mj‌آjm v dr mjɒn tv sɒkn xvɒhm ʃd vdr آn rvz ɒmt hɒj bsjɒr bh xdɒvnd mlsɣ ʃdh، ɣvm mn xvɒhnd ʃd v mn dr mjɒn tv sknj xvɒhm ɡrft v xvɒhj dɒnst kh jhvh sbɒjvt mrɒ nzd tv frstɒdh ɒst v xdɒvnd jhvdɒ rɒ drzmjn mɣds brɒj mlk xvd bh tsrf xvɒhdآvrd v ɒvrʃljm rɒ bɒr djɡr xvɒhd brɡzjd‌ɒj tmɒmj bʃr bh hzvr xdɒvnd xɒmvʃ bɒʃjd zjrɒ kh ɒv ɒz mskn mɣds xvd brxɒsth ɒst» ‌ɒj tmɒmj bʃr bh hzvr xdɒvnd xɒmvʃ bɒʃjd zjrɒ kh ɒv ɒz mskn mɣds xvd brxɒsth ɒst» v jhvʃʔ rئjs khnh rɒ bh mn nʃɒn dɒd kh bh hzvr frʃth xdɒvnd ɒjstɒdh bvd v ʃjtɒn bh‌dst rɒst vj ɒjstɒdh، tɒ bɒ ɒvmxɒsmh nmɒjd v xdɒvnd bh ʃjtɒn ɡft «ɒj ʃjtɒn xdɒvnd tv rɒ nhjb nmɒjd xdɒvnd kh ɒvrʃljm rɒ brɡzjdh ɒst tv rɒ nhjb nmɒjd آjɒɒjn njm svzj njst kh ɒz mjɒn آtʃ rbvdh ʃdh ɒst؟» v jhvʃʔ bh lbɒs پljd mlbs bvd v bh hzvr frʃth ɒjstɒdh bvd v آnɒnj rɒ kh bh hzvr vj ɒjstɒdh bvdnd xtɒb krdh، ɡft «lbɒs پljd rɒ ɒz brʃ bjrvn knjd» v ɒv rɒ ɡft «bbjn ʔsjɒnt rɒ ɒz tv bjrvn krdm v lbɒs fɒxr bh tv پvʃɒnjdm» v mn ɡftm kh ʔmɒmh tɒhr brsrʃ bɡzɒrnd پs ʔmɒmh tɒhr br srʃ ɡzɒrdnd v ɒv rɒ bh lbɒs پvʃɒnjdnd v frʃth xdɒvnd ɒjstɒdh bvd v frʃth xdɒvnd jhvʃʔ rɒ ɒʔlɒm nmvdh، ɡft «jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd ɒɡr bh trjɣ hɒj mn slvk nmɒjj v vdjʔt mrɒ ŋɒh dɒrj tv njz xɒnh mrɒ dɒvrj xvɒhj nmvd vshn hɒj mrɒ mhɒfzt xvɒhj krd v tv rɒ drmjɒn آnɒnj kh nzd mn mj‌ɒjstnd bɒr xvɒhm dɒd پs‌ɒj jhvʃʔ rئjs khnh bʃnv tv v rfɣɒjt kh bh hzvr tv mj‌nʃjnnd، zjrɒ kh ɒjʃɒn mrdɒn ʔlɒmt hstnd bʃnvjd zjrɒ kh ɒjnk mn bndh xvd ʃɒxh rɒ xvɒhm آvrd v hmɒnɒ آn sŋj kh bh hzvr jhvʃʔ mj‌ɡzɒrm، br jk sŋ hft t͡ʃʃm mj‌bɒʃd ɒjnk jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd kh mn nɣʃ آn rɒ rɣm xvɒhm krd v ʔsjɒn ɒjn zmjn rɒ dr jk rvz rfʔ xvɒhm nmvdv jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd kh hr kdɒm ɒz ʃmɒ hmsɒjh xvd rɒ zjr mv v zjr ɒnd͡ʒjr xvjʃ dʔvt xvɒhjd nmvd» v jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd kh hr kdɒm ɒz ʃmɒ hmsɒjh xvd rɒ zjr mv v zjr ɒnd͡ʒjr xvjʃ dʔvt xvɒhjd nmvd» v frʃth‌ɒj kh bɒ mn tklm mj‌nmvd، brɡʃth، mrɒ msl ʃxsj kh ɒz xvɒb bjdɒr ʃvdbjdɒr krd، v bh mn ɡft «t͡ʃh t͡ʃjz mj‌bjnj؟» ɡftm «nzr krdm v ɒjnk ʃmʔdɒnj kh tmɒmʃ tlɒst v rvɣndɒnʃ br srʃ v hft t͡ʃrɒɣʃ br آn ɒst v hr t͡ʃrɒɣ kh br srʃ mj‌bɒʃd hft lvlh dɒrd v bh پhlvj آn dv drxt zjtvn kh jkj btrf rɒst rvɣndɒn v djɡrj btrf t͡ʃپʃ mj‌bɒʃd» v mn tvd͡ʒh nmvdh، frʃth‌ɒj rɒ kh bɒ mn tklm mj‌nmvd xtɒb krdh، ɡftm «ɒj آɣɒjm ɒjnhɒ t͡ʃh mj‌bɒʃd؟» v frʃth‌ɒj kh bɒ mn tklm mj‌nmvdmrɒ d͡ʒvɒb dɒd v ɡft «آjɒ nmj dɒnj kh ɒjnhɒt͡ʃjst؟» ɡftm «nh‌ɒj آɣɒjm» ɒv dr d͡ʒvɒb mn ɡft «ɒjn ɒst klɒmj kh xdɒvnd bh zrbɒbl mj‌ɡvjd nh bh ɣdrt v nh bh ɣvt blkh bh rvh mn ɣvl jhvh sbɒjvt ɒjn ɒst ‌ɒj kvh bzrɡ tv t͡ʃjstj؟ dr hzvrzrbɒbl bh hmvɒrj mbdl xvɒhj ʃd v sŋ srآn rɒ bjrvn xvɒhd آvrd v sdɒ xvɒhnd zd fjz fjz br آn bɒʃd» v klɒm xdɒvnd br mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «dsthɒj zrbɒbl ɒjn xɒnh rɒ bnjɒd nhɒd v dsthɒj vj آn rɒ tmɒm xvɒhd krd v xvɒhj dɒnst kh jhvh sbɒjvt mrɒ nzd ʃmɒ frstɒdh ɒst zjrɒ kjst kh rvz ɒmvr kvt͡ʃk rɒ xvɒr ʃmɒrd zjrɒkh ɒjn hft msrvr xvɒhnd ʃd hjnj kh ʃɒɣvl rɒ dr dst zrbɒbl mj‌bjnnd v ɒjnhɒ t͡ʃʃmɒn xdɒvnd hstnd kh dr tmɒmj d͡ʒhɒn trddmj nmɒjnd» پs mn ɒv rɒ xtɒb krdh، ɡftm «ɒjn dvdrxt zjtvn kh btrf rɒst v btrf t͡ʃپ ʃmʔdɒn hstnd t͡ʃh mj‌bɒʃnd؟» v bɒr djɡr ɒv rɒ xtɒb krdh، ɡftm kh «ɒjn dv ʃɒxh zjtvn bh پhlvj dv lvlh zrjnj kh rvɣn tlɒ rɒ ɒz xvd mj‌rjzd t͡ʃjstnd؟» ɒv mrɒ d͡ʒvɒb dɒdh، ɡft «آjɒ nmj dɒnj kh ɒjnhɒ t͡ʃjstnd؟» ɡftm «nh‌ɒj آɣɒjm»ɡft «ɒjnhɒ پsrɒn rvɣn zjt mj‌bɒʃnd kh nzd mɒlk tmɒmj d͡ʒhɒn mj‌ɒjstnd» ɡft «ɒjnhɒ پsrɒn rvɣn zjt mj‌bɒʃnd kh nzd mɒlk tmɒmj d͡ʒhɒn mj‌ɒjstnd» v bɒz t͡ʃʃmɒn xvd rɒ brɒfrɒʃth، ŋrjstm v tvmɒrj پrɒn djdm v ɒv mrɒ ɡft «t͡ʃh t͡ʃjz mj‌bjnj؟» ɡftm «tvmɒrj پrɒn mj‌bjnm kh tvlʃ bjst zrɒʔ v ʔrzʃ dh zrɒʔ mj‌bɒʃd» ɒv mrɒ ɡft «ɒjn ɒst آn lʔntj kh br rvj tmɒmj d͡ʒhɒn bjrvn mj‌rvd zjrɒ kh ɒz ɒjn trf hrdzd mvɒfɣ آn mnɣtʔ xvɒhd ʃd v ɒz آn trf hrkh svɡnd xvrd mvɒfɣ آn mnɣtʔ xvɒhd ɡrdjd jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd mn آn rɒ bjrvn xvɒhm frstɒd v bh xɒnh dzd v bh xɒnh hr‌kh bh ɒsm mn ɣsm drvɣ xvrd dɒxl xvɒhd ʃd v dr mjɒn xɒnh‌ɒʃ nzjl ʃdh، آn rɒ bɒ t͡ʃvbhɒjʃ vsŋhɒjʃ mnhdm xvɒhd sɒxt» پs frʃth‌ɒj kh bɒ mn tklm mj‌nmvd bjrvn آmdh، mrɒ ɡft «t͡ʃʃmɒn xvd rɒ brɒfrɒʃth bbjn kh ɒjnkh bjrvn mj‌rvd t͡ʃjst؟» ɡftm «ɒjn t͡ʃjst؟» ɒv d͡ʒvɒb dɒd «ɒjn ɒst آn ɒjfɒjj kh bjrvn mj‌rvd v ɡft nmɒjʃ ɒjʃɒn dr tmɒmj d͡ʒhɒn ɒjn ɒst» v ɒjnk vznh‌ɒj ɒz srb brdɒʃth ʃd v znj dr mjɒn ɒjfɒ nʃsth bvd v ɒv ɡft «ɒjn ʃrɒrt ɒst» پs vj rɒ dr mjɒn ɒjfɒ ɒndɒxt v آn sŋ srb rɒ br dhnh‌ɒʃ nhɒd پs t͡ʃʃmɒn xvd rɒbrɒfrɒʃth، ŋrjstm v ɒjnk dv zn bjrvn آmdnd vbɒd dr bɒlhɒj ɒjʃɒn bvd v bɒlhɒj ɒjʃɒn msl bɒlhɒj lɣ lɣ bvd v ɒjfɒ rɒ bh mjɒn zmjn v آsmɒn brdɒʃtnd پs bh frʃth‌ɒj kh bɒ mn tklm mj‌nmvdɡftm «ɒjnhɒ ɒjfɒ rɒ kd͡ʒɒ mj‌brnd؟»ɒv mrɒ d͡ʒvɒb dɒd «tɒ xɒnh‌ɒj dr zmjn ʃnʔɒr brɒj vj bnɒ nmɒjnd v t͡ʃvn آn mhjɒ ʃvdآŋɒh ɒv dr آnd͡ʒɒ br پɒjh xvd br ɣrɒr xvɒhd ʃd» ɒv mrɒ d͡ʒvɒb dɒd «tɒ xɒnh‌ɒj dr zmjn ʃnʔɒr brɒj vj bnɒ nmɒjnd v t͡ʃvn آn mhjɒ ʃvdآŋɒh ɒv dr آnd͡ʒɒ br پɒjh xvd br ɣrɒr xvɒhd ʃd» v bɒr djɡr t͡ʃʃmɒn xvd rɒ brɒfrɒʃth، ŋrjstm v ɒjnk t͡ʃhɒr ɒrɒbh ɒz mjɒn dv kvh bjrvn mj‌rft v kvhhɒ kvhhɒj msjn bvd drɒrɒbh ɒvl ɒsbɒn srx v dr ɒrɒbh dvm ɒsbɒn sjɒh، v dr ɒrɒbh svm ɒsbɒn sfjd v dr ɒrɒbh t͡ʃhɒrm ɒsbɒn ɒblɣ ɣvj bvd v frʃth rɒ kh bɒ mn tklm mj‌nmvd xtɒb krdh، ɡftm «ɒj آɣɒjm ɒjnhɒt͡ʃjstnd؟» frʃth dr d͡ʒvɒb mn ɡft «ɒjnhɒ t͡ʃhɒr rvh ɒflɒk mj‌bɒʃnd kh ɒz ɒjstɒdn bh hzvr mɒlk tmɒmj d͡ʒhɒn bjrvn mj‌rvnd ɒmɒآnkh ɒsbɒn sjɒh rɒ dɒrd، ɒjnhɒ bsvj zmjn ʃmɒl bjrvn mj‌rvnd v ɒsbɒn sfjd dr ʔɣb آnhɒbjrvn mj‌rvnd v ɒblɣhɒ bh zmjn d͡ʒnvb bjrvn mj‌rvnd» v آn ɒsbɒn ɣvj bjrvn rfth، آrzv dɒrnd kh brvnd v dr d͡ʒhɒn ɡrdʃ nmɒjnd؛ v ɒv ɡft «brvjd v dr d͡ʒhɒn ɡrdʃ nmɒjjd» پs dr d͡ʒhɒn ɡrdʃ krdnd v ɒv bh mn ndɒ dr‌dɒd v mrɒ xtɒb krdh، ɡft «bbjn آnhɒjj kh bh zmjn ʃmɒl bjrvn rfth‌ɒnd، xʃm mrɒ dr zmjn ʃmɒl frv nʃɒnjdnd» v klɒm xdɒvnd bh mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «ɒzɒsjrɒn jʔnj ɒz hldɒj v tvbjɒ v jdʔjɒ kh ɒz bɒbl آmdh‌ɒnd bɡjr v dr hmɒn rvz bjɒ v bh xɒnh jvʃjɒɒbn sfjɒ dɒxl ʃv پs nɣrh v tlɒ bɡjr vtɒd͡ʒj sɒxth، آn rɒ br sr jhvʃʔ bn jhvsɒdɣ rئjs khnh bɡzɒr v ɒv rɒ xtɒb krdh، bɡv jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd v mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnk mrdj kh bh ʃɒxh msmj ɒst v ɒz mkɒn xvdxvɒhd rvjjd v hjkl xdɒvnd rɒ bnɒ xvɒhdnmvd پs ɒv hjkl xdɒvnd rɒ bnɒ xvɒhd nmvdv d͡ʒlɒl rɒ mthml xvɒhd ʃd v br krsj ɒvd͡ʒlvs nmvdh، hkmrɒnj xvɒhd krd vbr krsj ɒv kɒhn xvɒhd bvd v mʃvrt slɒmtj dr mjɒn hr dvj ɒjʃɒn xvɒhd bvd v آn tɒd͡ʒ brɒj hɒlm v tvbjɒ v jdʔjɒ v hjn bn sfnjɒ bh d͡ʒht jɒdɡɒrj dr hjkl xdɒvnd xvɒhd bvdvآnɒnj kh dvrnd xvɒhnd آmd v dr hjkl xdɒvnd bnɒ xvɒhnd nmvd v xvɒhjd dɒnst kh jhvh sbɒjvt mrɒ nzd ʃmɒ frstɒdh ɒst v ɒɡr ɣvl jhvh xdɒj xvjʃ rɒ bklj ɒtɒʔt nmɒjjd ɒjn vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd» vآnɒnj kh dvrnd xvɒhnd آmd v dr hjkl xdɒvnd bnɒ xvɒhnd nmvd v xvɒhjd dɒnst kh jhvh sbɒjvt mrɒ nzd ʃmɒ frstɒdh ɒst v ɒɡr ɣvl jhvh xdɒj xvjʃ rɒ bklj ɒtɒʔt nmɒjjd ɒjn vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd» v dr sɒl t͡ʃhɒrm dɒrjvʃ پɒdʃɒh vɒɣʔ ʃdkh klɒm xdɒvnd dr rvz t͡ʃhɒrm mɒh nhm kh mɒh kslv bɒʃd br zkrjɒ nɒzl ʃd v ɒhl bjt ئjl jʔnj ʃrɒsr v rd͡ʒm mlk v ksɒn ɒjʃɒn frstɒdh bvdnd tɒ ɒz xdɒvnd msɒlt nmɒjnd v bh kɒhnɒnj kh dr xɒnh jhvh sbɒjvt bvdnd v bh ɒnbjɒ tklm nmvdh، ɡftnd «آjɒ dr mɒh پnd͡ʒm mj‌bɒjd kh mn ɡrjh knm v zhd vrzm t͡ʃnɒnkh dr ɒjn sɒlhɒ krdm؟» پs jhvh sbɒjvt bh mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «tmɒmj ɣvm zmjn v kɒhnɒn rɒ xtɒb krdh، bɡv t͡ʃvn dr ɒjn hftɒd sɒl dr mɒh پnd͡ʒm v mɒh hftm rvzh dɒʃtjd v nvhh ɡrj nmvdjd، آjɒ brɒj mn hrɡz rvzh mj‌dɒʃtjd؟ v t͡ʃvn mj‌xvrjd vt͡ʃvn mj‌nvʃjd، آjɒ bh d͡ʒht xvd nmj xvrjd vbrɒj xvd nmj nvʃjd؟ آjɒ klɒmj rɒ kh xdɒvndbh vɒsth ɒnbjɒj slf ndɒ krd، hŋɒmj kh ɒvrʃljm mskvn v ɒmn mj‌bvd v ʃhrhɒj md͡ʒɒvrʃ v d͡ʒnvb v hɒmvn mskvn mj‌bvdnmj dɒnjd؟» v klɒm xdɒvnd br zkrjɒ nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «jhvh sbɒjvt ɒmr frmvdh، t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd brɒstj dɒvrj nmɒjjd v bɒ jkdjɡr ɒhsɒn v ltf mʔmvl dɒrjd v br bjvh‌znɒn v jtjmɒn v ɣrjbɒn v fɣjrɒn zlm mnmɒjjd v dr dlhɒj xvd br jkdjɡr bdj mjndjʃjd ɒmɒ ɒjʃɒn ɒz ɡvʃ ɡrftn ɒbɒ nmvdnd v srkʃj krdh، ɡvʃhɒj xvdrɒ ɒz ʃnjdn sŋjn sɒxtnd blkh dlhɒj xvjʃ rɒ msl ɒlmɒs sxt nmvdnd tɒʃrjʔt v klɒmj rɒ kh jhvh sbɒjvt bh rvh xvd bh vɒsth ɒnbjɒj slf frstɒdh bvd nʃnvnd، bnɒbrɒjn xʃm ʔzjmj ɒz d͡ʒɒnb jhvh sbɒjvt sɒdr ʃd پs vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd t͡ʃnɒnkh ɒv ndɒkrd v ɒjʃɒn nʃnjdnd، hmt͡ʃnɒn jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd ɒjʃɒn frjɒd xvɒhnd brآvrd v mn nxvɒhm ʃnjdv ɒjʃɒn rɒ br rvj tmɒmj ɒmt hɒjj kh nʃnɒxth bvdnd، bh ɡrdbɒd پrɒkndh xvɒhm sɒxt v zmjn dr ʔɣb ɒjʃɒn t͡ʃnɒn vjrɒn xvɒhd ʃd kh ksj dr آn ʔbvr v trddnxvɒhd krd پs zmjn mrɣvb rɒ vjrɒn sɒxth‌ɒnd» v ɒjʃɒn rɒ br rvj tmɒmj ɒmt hɒjj kh nʃnɒxth bvdnd، bh ɡrdbɒd پrɒkndh xvɒhm sɒxt v zmjn dr ʔɣb ɒjʃɒn t͡ʃnɒn vjrɒn xvɒhd ʃd kh ksj dr آn ʔbvr v trddnxvɒhd krd پs zmjn mrɣvb rɒ vjrɒn sɒxth‌ɒnd» v klɒm jhvh sbɒjvt br mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd brɒj shjvn ɣjrt ʔzjmj dɒrm v bɒ ɣzb sxt brɒjʃ ɣjvr hstm xdɒvnd t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd bh shjvn mrɒd͡ʒʔt nmvdh‌ɒm v dr mjɒn ɒvrʃljm sɒkn xvɒhm ʃd v ɒvrʃljm bh ʃhr hɣ v kvh jhvh sbɒjvt bh kvh mɣds msmj xvɒhdʃd jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd mrdɒn پjr vznɒn پjr bɒz dr kvt͡ʃh hɒj ɒvrʃljm xvɒhndnʃst v hr jkj ɒz ɒjʃɒn bh‌sbb zjɒdtj ʔmrʔsɒj xvd rɒ dr dst xvd xvɒhd dɒʃt vkvt͡ʃh hɒj ʃhr ɒz پsrɒn v dxtrɒn kh drkvt͡ʃh hɒjʃ bɒzj mj‌knnd پr xvɒhd ʃd jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒɡr ɒjn ɒmr dr ɒjn‌rvzhɒ bh nzr bɣjh ɒjn ɣvm ʔd͡ʒjb nmɒjd آjɒ dr nzr mn ʔd͡ʒjb xvɒhd nmvd؟ ɣvl jhvh sbɒjvt ɒjn ɒst «jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnk mn ɣvm xvd rɒ ɒz zmjn mʃrɣ v ɒz zmjn mɣrb آftɒb xvɒhm rhɒnjd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ xvɒhm آvrd kh drɒvrʃljm skvnt nmɒjnd v ɒjʃɒn ɣvm mn xvɒhndbvd v mn brɒstj v ʔdɒlt xdɒj ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm bvd jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd dsthɒj ʃmɒ ɣvj ʃvd‌ɒj ksɒnj kh dr ɒjn ɒjɒm ɒjn klɒm rɒ ɒz zbɒn ɒnbjɒ ʃnjdjd kh آn dr rvzj kh bnjɒdxɒnh jhvh sbɒjvt rɒ brɒj bnɒ nmvdn hjkl nhɒdnd vɒɣʔ ʃd zjrɒ ɣbl ɒz ɒjn ɒjɒm mzdj brɒj ɒnsɒn nbvd v nh mzdj bh d͡ʒht hjvɒn؛ v bh‌sbb dʃmn brɒj hr‌kh xrvd͡ʒ v dxvl mj‌krdhjt͡ʃ slɒmtj nbvd v mn hmh ksɒn rɒ bh zdjkdjɡr vɒdɒʃtm ɒmɒ ɒlɒn jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd mn brɒj bɣjh ɒjn ɣvm msl ɒjɒm sɒbɣ nxvɒhm bvd zjrɒ kh zrʔ slɒmtj xvɒhd bvdv mv mjvh xvd rɒ xvɒhd dɒd v zmjn mhsvl xvd rɒ xvɒhd آvrd v آsmɒn ʃbnm xvjʃ rɒxvɒhd bxʃjd v mn bɣjh ɒjn ɣvm rɒ mɒlk d͡ʒmjʔ ɒjn t͡ʃjzhɒ xvɒhm ɡrdɒnjd v vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd t͡ʃnɒnkh ʃmɒ‌ɒj xɒndɒn jhvdɒ vɒj xɒndɒn ɒsrɒئjl dr mjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ mvrdlʔnt ʃdh‌ɒjd، hmt͡ʃnɒn ʃmɒ rɒ nd͡ʒɒt xvɒhm dɒd tɒ mvrd brkt bʃvjd؛ پs mtrsjd vdsthɒj ʃmɒ ɣvj bɒʃd zjrɒ kh jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd t͡ʃnɒnkh ɣsd nmvdm kh bh ʃmɒ bdj brsɒnm hjnj kh پdrɒn ʃmɒxʃm mrɒ bh hjd͡ʒɒn آvrdnd v jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd kh ɒz آn پʃjmɒn nʃdm hmt͡ʃnjn dr ɒjn‌rvzhɒ rd͡ʒvʔ nmvdh، ɣsd xvɒhm nmvd kh bh ɒvrʃljm v xɒndɒn jhvdɒ ɒhsɒn nmɒjm پs trsɒn mbɒʃjd v ɒjn ɒst kɒrhɒjj kh bɒjdbknjd bɒ jkdjɡr rɒst ɡvjjd v dr drvɒzh hɒj xvd ɒnsɒf v dɒvrj slɒmtj rɒ ɒd͡ʒrɒ dɒrjd v dr dlhɒj xvd brɒj jkdjɡr bdj mjndjʃjd v ɣsm drvɣ rɒ dvst mdɒrjd، zjrɒxdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd ɒz hmh ɒjn kɒrhɒ nfrt dɒrm» v klɒm jhvh sbɒjvt br mn nɒzl ʃdh، ɡft «jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd rvzh mɒh t͡ʃhɒrm v rvzh mɒh پnd͡ʒm v rvzh mɒh hftm v rvzh mɒh dhm brɒj xɒndɒn jhvdɒ bh ʃɒdmɒnj v srvr vʔjdhɒj xvʃ mbdl xvɒhd ʃd پs rɒstj vslɒmtj rɒ dvst bdɒrjd jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd bɒr djɡr vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd kh ɣvm‌hɒ v sɒknɒn ʃhrhɒj bsjɒr xvɒhnd آmd v sɒknɒn jk ʃhr bh ʃhr djɡr rfth، xvɒhndɡft bjɒjjd brvjm tɒ ɒz xdɒvnd msɒlt nmɒjjm vjhvh sbɒjvt rɒ btlbjm v mn njz xvɒhm آmd v ɣvm hɒj bsjɒr v ɒmt hɒj ʔzjm xvɒhndآmd tɒ jhvh sbɒjvt rɒ dr ɒvrʃljm btlbnd v ɒzxdɒvnd msɒlt nmɒjndjhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd dr آn rvzhɒ dh nfr ɒz hmh zbɒnhɒj ɒmt‌hɒ bh dɒmn ʃxs jhvdj t͡ʃŋ zdh، mtmsk xvɒhnd ʃd v xvɒhnd ɡft hmrɒh ʃmɒ mj‌آjjm zjrɒ ʃnjdh‌ɒjm kh xdɒ bɒ ʃmɒɒst» jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjd dr آn rvzhɒ dh nfr ɒz hmh zbɒnhɒj ɒmt‌hɒ bh dɒmn ʃxs jhvdj t͡ʃŋ zdh، mtmsk xvɒhnd ʃd v xvɒhnd ɡft hmrɒh ʃmɒ mj‌آjjm zjrɒ ʃnjdh‌ɒjm kh xdɒ bɒ ʃmɒɒst» vhj klɒm xdɒvnd br zmjn hdrɒx nɒzl mj ʃvd v dmʃɣ mhl آn mj‌bɒʃd، zjrɒkh nzr ɒnsɒn v nzr tmɒmj ɒsbɒt ɒsrɒئjl bsvj xdɒvnd ɒst v br hmɒt njz kh md͡ʒɒvr آn ɒst v br svr v sjdvn ɒɡr‌t͡ʃh bsjɒr dɒnʃmndmj bɒʃd v svr brɒj xvd mlɒzj mnjʔ sɒxt v nɣrh rɒ msl ɣbɒr v tlɒ rɒ mɒnnd ɡl kvt͡ʃh hɒɒnbɒʃt ɒjnk xdɒvnd ɒv rɒ ɒxrɒd͡ʒ xvɒhd krdv ɣvtʃ rɒ kh dr drjɒ mj‌bɒʃd، tlf xvɒhdsɒxt v xvdʃ bh آtʃ svxth xvɒhd ʃd ɒʃɣlvn t͡ʃvn ɒjn rɒ bjnd xvɒhd trsjd v ɣzh bsjɒr drdnɒk xvɒhd ʃd v ʔɣrvn njz zjrɒ kh ɒʔtmɒd ɒv xd͡ʒl xvɒhd ɡrdjd v پɒdʃɒh ɒz ɣzh hlɒk xvɒhd ʃd v ɒʃɣlvn mskvn nxvɒhdɡʃt v hrɒm zɒdh‌ɒj dr ɒʃdvd d͡ʒlvs xvɒhdnmvd v hʃmt flstjnjɒn rɒ mnɣtʔ xvɒhm sɒxt v xvn ɒv rɒ ɒz dhɒnʃ bjrvn xvɒhm آvrd v rd͡ʒɒsɒtʃ rɒ ɒz mjɒn dndɒnhɒjʃ؛ v bɣjh ɒvnjz bh d͡ʒht xdɒj mɒ xvɒhd bvd v xvdʃ msl ɒmjrj dr jhvdɒ v ʔɣrvn mɒnnd jbvsj xvɒhdʃd v mn ɡrdɒɡrd xɒnh xvd bh zd lʃkr ɒrdvxvɒhm zd tɒ ksj ɒz آn ʔbvr v mrvr nknd v zɒlm bɒr djɡr ɒz mjɒn آnhɒ ɡzr nxvɒhd krd zjrɒ kh hɒl bh t͡ʃʃmɒn xvd mʃɒhdh nmvdh‌ɒm ‌ɒj dxtr shjvn bsjɒr vd͡ʒd bnmɒ v ɒj dxtr ɒvrʃljm آvɒz ʃɒdmɒnj bdh ɒjnk پɒdʃɒh tvnzd tv mj‌آjd ɒv ʔɒdl v sɒhb nd͡ʒɒt v hljm mj‌bɒʃd v br ɒlɒɣ v br krh bt͡ʃh ɒlɒɣ svɒr ɒst v mn ɒrɒbh rɒ ɒz ɒfrɒjm v ɒsb rɒ ɒz ɒvrʃljm mnɣtʔ xvɒhm sɒxt v kmɒn d͡ʒŋj ʃksth xvɒhd ʃd v ɒv bɒ ɣvm xvdxvɒhd rhɒnjd zjrɒ kh mɒnnd d͡ʒvɒhr tɒd͡ʒ br zmjn ɒvxvɒhnd drxʃjdzjrɒ kh hsn v zjbɒjj ɒvt͡ʃh ɣdr ʔzjm ɒst ɡndm d͡ʒvɒnɒn rɒ v ʔsjr ɒŋvr dvʃjzɡɒn rɒ xrm xvɒhd sɒxt zjrɒ kh hsn v zjbɒjj ɒvt͡ʃh ɣdr ʔzjm ɒst ɡndm d͡ʒvɒnɒn rɒ v ʔsjr ɒŋvr dvʃjzɡɒn rɒ xrm xvɒhd sɒxt bɒrɒn rɒ dr mvsm bɒrɒn آxr ɒz xdɒvndbtlbjd ɒz xdɒvnd kh brɣhɒ rɒ mj‌sɒzdv ɒv bh ɒjʃɒn bɒrɒn frɒvɒn hrks dr zmjnʃ ɡjɒh xvɒhd bxʃjd zjrɒ bɒپsrɒn xvd zjst nmvdh، mrɒd͡ʒʔt xvɒhndkrd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz zmjn msr bɒz xvɒhm آvrd vɒz ɒʃvr d͡ʒmʔ xvɒhm nmvd v bh zmjn d͡ʒlʔɒd vlbnɒn dɒxl xvɒhm sɒxt v آn ɡnd͡ʒɒjʃ ɒjʃɒn rɒ nxvɒhd dɒʃt v ɒv ɒz drjɒj msjbt ʔbvrnmvdh، ɒmvɒd͡ʒ drjɒ rɒ xvɒhd zd v hmh ʒrfjhɒj nhr xʃk xvɒhd ʃd v hʃmt ɒʃvr zɒjl xvɒhd ɡrdjd v ʔsɒj msr njst xvɒhd ʃdv ɒjʃɒn rɒ dr xdɒvnd ɣvj xvɒhm sɒxt vdr nɒm ɒv sɒlk xvɒhnd ʃd ɣvl xdɒvnd ʔsɒj xvd nʔmh rɒ ɡrfth، آn rɒʃkstm tɒ ʔhdj rɒ kh bɒ tmɒmj ɣvm‌hɒ bsth bvdm ʃksth bɒʃm پs dr آn rvz ʃksth ʃd v آn zʔjf trjn ɡlh kh mntzr mn mj‌bvdnd fhmjdndkh ɒjn klɒm xdɒvnd ɒst v bh ɒjʃɒn ɡftm ɒɡrdr nzr ʃmɒ پsnd آjd mzd mrɒ bdhjd vɒlɒ ndhjd پs bh d͡ʒht mzd mn، sj پɒrh nɣrh vzn krdnd v xdɒvnd mrɒ ɡft آn rɒ nzd kvzh‌ɡr bjndɒz، ɒjn ɣjmt ɡrɒn rɒ kh mrɒ bh آn ɣjmt krdnd پs sj پɒrh nɣrh rɒ ɡrfth، آn rɒ dr xɒnh xdɒvnd nzdkvzh‌ɡr ɒndɒxtm v ʔsɒj djɡr xvd hbɒl rɒʃkstm tɒ brɒdrj rɒ kh dr mjɒn jhvdɒ v ɒsrɒئjl bvd ʃksth bɒʃm v xdɒvnd mrɒ ɡft «bɒr djɡr آlɒt ʃbɒn ɒhmɣ rɒ brɒj xvd bɡjr zjrɒ ɒjnk mn ʃbɒnj rɒ dr ɒjn zmjn xvɒhm brɒŋjxt kh ɒz hɒlkɒn tfɣd nxvɒhd nmvd v ɡm ʃdɡɒn rɒ nxvɒhd tlbjdv md͡ʒrvhɒn rɒ mʔɒld͡ʒh nxvɒhd krd v ɒjstɒdɡɒn rɒ nxvɒhd پrvrd blkh ɡvʃt frbhɒn rɒ xvɒhdxvrd v smhɒj آnhɒ rɒ xvɒhd kndvɒj brʃbɒn bɒtl kh ɡlh rɒ trk mj‌nmɒjd ʃmʃjr brbɒzvjʃ v br t͡ʃʃm rɒstʃ frvd xvɒhd آmd vbɒzvjʃ bɒlkl xʃk xvɒhd ʃd v t͡ʃʃm rɒstʃ bklj tɒr xvɒhd ɡrdjd» vɒj brʃbɒn bɒtl kh ɡlh rɒ trk zmjn rɒ nhɒd v rvh ɒnsɒn rɒ drɒndrvn ɒv sɒxt ɒjnk mn ɒvrʃljm rɒ brɒj d͡ʒmjʔ ɣvm hɒj md͡ʒɒvrʃ kɒsh srɡjd͡ʒʃ xvɒhm sɒxt v ɒjn br jhvdɒ njz hjnj kh ɒvrʃljm rɒ mhɒsrh mj‌knnd xvɒhd ʃd v drآn rvz، ɒvrʃljm rɒ brɒj d͡ʒmjʔ ɣvm‌hɒ sŋj ɡrɒn bɒr xvɒhm sɒxt v hmh ksɒnj kh آn rɒ brxvd bɒr knnd، sxt md͡ʒrvh xvɒhnd ʃd vd͡ʒmjʔ ɒmt hɒj d͡ʒhɒn bh zd ɒv d͡ʒmʔ xvɒhndɡrdjd xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd dr آn rvz mn hmh ɒsbɒn rɒ bh xvɒhm nmvd v br xɒndɒn dɒvd v br sɒknɒn ɒvrʃljm rvh fjz v tzrʔɒt rɒ xvɒhm rjxt v br mn kh njzh zdh‌ɒnd xvɒhnd ŋrjst vbrɒj mn msl nvhh ɡrj brɒj پsr jɡɒnh xvd، nvhh ɡrj xvɒhnd nmvd v mɒnnd ksj‌kh brɒj
