ʔljhdh، vznɒn ɒjʃɒn ʔljhdh، ɣbjlh xɒndɒn nɒtɒn ʔljhdh، vznɒn ɒjʃɒn ʔljhdh ɣbjlh xɒndɒn lɒvj ʔljhdh، v znɒn ɒjʃɒn ʔljhdh، ɣbjlh ʃmʔj ʔljhdh، v znɒn ɒjʃɒn ʔljhdh،v d͡ʒmjʔ ɣbɒjlj kh bɒɣj‌mɒndh bɒʃnd hr ɣbjlh ʔljhdh، v znɒn ɒjʃɒn ʔljhdh v d͡ʒmjʔ ɣbɒjlj kh bɒɣj‌mɒndh bɒʃnd hr ɣbjlh ʔljhdh، v znɒn ɒjʃɒn ʔljhdh dr آn rvz brɒj xɒndɒn dɒvd v sɒknɒn ɒvrʃljm t͡ʃʃmh‌ɒj bh d͡ʒht ɡnɒh vnd͡ʒɒst mftvh xvɒhd ʃd v jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd dr آn rvz nɒmhɒj bthɒ rɒ ɒz rvj zmjn mnɣtʔ xvɒhm sɒxt kh bɒr djɡr آnhɒ rɒbjɒdnxvɒhnd‌آvrd v ɒnbjɒ v rvh پljd rɒ njz ɒz zmjn dvr xvɒhm krd v hr‌kh bɒr djɡr nbvt nmɒjdپdr v mɒdrʃ kh ɒv rɒ tvljd nmvdh‌ɒnd، vj rɒxvɒhnd ɡft kh zndh nxvɒhj mɒnd zjrɒ kh bh ɒsm jhvh drvɣ mj‌ɡvjj v t͡ʃvn nbvt nmɒjd پdr vmɒdrʃ kh ɒv rɒ tvljd nmvdh‌ɒnd، vj rɒ ʔrzh tjɣ xvɒhnd sɒxt v dr آn rvz hr kdɒm ɒz آn ɒnbjɒt͡ʃvn nbvt mj‌knnd، ɒz rvjɒhɒj xvjʃ xd͡ʒl xvɒhnd ʃd v d͡ʒɒmh پʃmjn bh d͡ʒht frjb dɒdn nxvɒhnd پvʃjd v hr jk xvɒhd ɡft mn nbj njstm blkh zrʔ knndh zmjn mj‌bɒʃm zjrɒ kh ɒztfvljt xvd bh ɣlɒmj frvxth ʃdh‌ɒm v ɒv rɒxvɒhnd ɡft ɒjn d͡ʒrɒhɒt kh dr dsthɒj tvmj bɒʃd t͡ʃjst؟ v ɒv d͡ʒvɒb xvɒhd dɒd آnhɒjj ɒst kh dr xɒnh dvstɒn xvjʃ bh آnhɒ md͡ʒrvh ʃdh‌ɒm jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd «ɒj ʃmʃjr bh zdʃbɒn mn v bh zd آn mrdj kh hmdvʃ mn ɒst brxjz ʃbɒn rɒ bzn v ɡvsfndɒn پrɒkndh xvɒhndʃd v mn dst xvd rɒ br kvt͡ʃkɒn xvɒhm brɡrdɒnjd» v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh «dr tmɒmj zmjn dvhsh mnɣtʔ ʃdh xvɒhnd mrd v hsh svm drآn bɒɣj xvɒhd mɒndv hsh svm rɒ ɒz mjɒn آtʃ xvɒhm ɡzrɒnjd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ msl ɣɒl ɡzɒʃtn nɣrh ɣɒl xvɒhm ɡzɒʃt v msl msfj sɒxtn tlɒ ɒjʃɒn rɒ msfj xvɒhm nmvd v ɒsm mrɒxvɒhnd xvɒnd v mn ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒd͡ʒɒbt nmvdh، xvɒhm ɡft kh ɒjʃɒn ɣvm mn hstnd v ɒjʃɒn xvɒhnd ɡft kh jhvh xdɒj mɒ mj‌bɒʃd» v hsh svm rɒ ɒz mjɒn آtʃ xvɒhm ɡzrɒnjd v ɒjʃɒn rɒ msl ɣɒl ɡzɒʃtn nɣrh ɣɒl xvɒhm ɡzɒʃt v msl msfj sɒxtn tlɒ ɒjʃɒn rɒ msfj xvɒhm nmvd v ɒsm mrɒxvɒhnd xvɒnd v mn ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒd͡ʒɒbt nmvdh، xvɒhm ɡft kh ɒjʃɒn ɣvm mn hstnd v ɒjʃɒn xvɒhnd ɡft kh jhvh xdɒj mɒ mj‌bɒʃd» ɒjnk rvz xdɒvnd mj‌آjd v ɣnjmt tvdr mjɒnt tɣsjm xvɒhd ʃd v d͡ʒmjʔ ɒmt‌hɒ rɒ bh zd ɒvrʃljm brɒj d͡ʒŋ d͡ʒmʔ xvɒhm krd v ʃhr rɒ xvɒhnd ɡrft v xɒnh‌hɒ rɒtɒrɒd͡ʒ xvɒhnd nmvd v znɒn rɒ bj‌ʔsmt xvɒhndkrd v nsf ɒhl ʃhr bh ɒsjrj xvɒhnd rft vbɣjh ɣvm ɒz ʃhr mnɣtʔ nxvɒhnd ʃd v xdɒvndbjrvn آmdh، bɒ آn ɣvm‌hɒ mɣɒtlh xvɒhd nmvdt͡ʃnɒnkh dr rvz d͡ʒŋ mɣɒtlh nmvd v dr آn rvzپɒjhɒj ɒv br kvh zjtvn kh ɒz trf mʃrɣ bh mɣɒbl ɒvrʃljm ɒst xvɒhd ɒjstɒd v kvh zjtvn drmjɒnʃ ɒz mʃrɣ tɒ mɣrb mnʃɣ ʃdh، drh bsjɒrʔzjmj xvɒhd ʃd v nsf kvh btrf ʃmɒl vnsf djɡrʃ btrf d͡ʒnvb mntɣl xvɒhdɡrdjd v bsvj drh kvhhɒj mn frɒr xvɒhjdkrd zjrɒ kh drh kvhhɒ tɒ bh آsl xvɒhd rsjd vʃmɒ xvɒhjd ɡrjxt t͡ʃnɒnkh dr ɒjɒm ʔzjɒ پɒdʃɒh jhvdɒ ɒz zlzlh frɒr krdjd v jhvh xdɒj mn xvɒhd آmd v d͡ʒmjʔ mɣdsɒn hmrɒh tv xvɒhndآmd v dr آn rvz nvr آftɒb nxvɒhd bvd vkvɒkb drxʃndh، ɡrfth xvɒhnd ʃd v آn jk rvz mʔrvf xdɒvnd xvɒhd bvd nh rvz v nh ʃb، ɒmɒ dr vɣt ʃɒm rvʃnɒjj xvɒhd bvd vdr آn rvz، آbhɒj zndh ɒz ɒvrʃljm d͡ʒɒrj xvɒhdʃd kh nsf آnhɒbsvj drjɒj ʃrɣj v nsf djɡr آnhɒ bsvj drjɒj ɣrbj xvɒhd rft drtɒbstɒn v dr zmstɒn t͡ʃnjn vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd vjhvh br tmɒmj zmjn پɒdʃɒh xvɒhd bvd dr آn rvzjhvh vɒhd xvɒhd bvd v ɒsm ɒv vɒhd vtmɒmj zmjn ɒz d͡ʒbʔ tɒ rmvn kh btrf d͡ʒnvb ɒvrʃljm ɒst mtbdl ʃdh، msl ʔrbh xvɒhdɡrdjd v ɒvrʃljm mrtfʔ ʃdh، dr mkɒn xvd ɒzdrvɒzh bnjɒmjn tɒ d͡ʒɒj drvɒzh ɒvl v tɒ drvɒzh zɒvjh v ɒz brd͡ʒ hnnئjl tɒ t͡ʃrxʃt پɒdʃɒh mskvn xvɒhd ʃd v dr آn sɒkn xvɒhndʃd v djɡr lʔnt nxvɒhd bvd v ɒvrʃljm bh ɒmnjt mskvn xvɒhd ʃd v ɒjn blɒjj xvɒhd bvd kh xdɒvnd br hmh ɣvm hɒjj kh bɒ ɒvrʃljm d͡ʒŋ knnd vɒrd xvɒhdآvrd ɡvʃt ɒjʃɒn dr hɒltj kh br پɒjhɒj xvdɒjstɒdh bɒʃnd kɒhjdh xvɒhd ʃd v t͡ʃʃmɒnʃɒn dr hdɣh ɡdɒxth xvɒhd ɡrdjd v zbɒn ɒjʃɒn drdhɒnʃɒn kɒhjdh xvɒhd ɡʃt v dr آn rvzɒztrɒb ʔzjmj ɒz d͡ʒɒnb xdɒvnd dr mjɒn ɒjʃɒn xvɒhd bvd v dst jkdjɡr rɒ xvɒhnd ɡrft v dst hr ks bh zd dst djɡrj blnd xvɒhdʃd v jhvdɒ njz nzd ɒvrʃljm d͡ʒŋ xvɒhdnmvd v dvlt d͡ʒmjʔ ɒmt hɒj md͡ʒɒvr آn ɒz tlɒ vnɣrh v lbɒs ɒz hd zjɒdh d͡ʒmʔ xvɒhd ʃd vblɒj ɒsbɒn v ɣɒtrɒn v ʃtrɒn v ɒlɒɣhɒ v tmɒmj hjvɒnɒtj kh dr آn ɒrdvhɒ bɒʃnd hmt͡ʃnɒn mɒnndɒjn blɒ xvɒhd bvd v vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd kh hmh bɒɣj mɒndɡɒn ɒz d͡ʒmjʔ ɒmt hɒjj kh bh zdɒvrʃljm آjnd، hr sɒl brxvɒhnd آmd tɒ jhvh sbɒjvt پɒdʃɒh rɒ ʔbɒdt nmɒjnd v ʔjd xjmh hɒrɒ ŋɒh dɒrnd v hrkdɒm ɒz ɣbɒjl zmjn kh bh d͡ʒht ʔbɒdt jhvh sbɒjvt پɒdʃɒh brnjɒjnd، brɒjʃɒn bɒrɒn nxvɒhd ʃd v ɒɡr ɣbjlh msrbrnjɒjnd v hɒzr nʃvnd br ɒjʃɒn njz bɒrɒn nxvɒhd ʃd ɒjn ɒst blɒjj kh xdɒvnd vɒrdxvɒhd آvrd br ɒmt hɒjj kh bh d͡ʒht ŋɒh dɒʃtn ʔjd xjmh‌hɒ brnjɒjnd ɒjn ɒst ɣsɒs msr vɣsɒs hmh ɒmt hɒjj kh bh d͡ʒht ŋɒh dɒʃtn ʔjd xjmh‌hɒ brnjɒjndv dr آn rvz br zŋhɒj ɒsbɒn «mɣds xdɒvnd» mnɣvʃ xvɒhd ʃd v djɡhɒ dr xɒnh xdɒvnd msl kɒsh hɒj پjʃ mzbh xvɒhd bvd v dr آn rvz br zŋhɒj ɒsbɒn «mɣds xdɒvnd» mnɣvʃ xvɒhd ʃd v djɡhɒ dr xɒnh xdɒvnd msl kɒsh hɒj پjʃ mzbh xvɒhd bvd vɒsth mlɒkj xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh ʃmɒ rɒ dvst dɒʃth‌ɒm ɒmɒ ʃmɒ mj‌ɡvjjd t͡ʃɡvnh mɒ rɒ dvst dɒʃth‌ɒj؟ آjɒ ʔjsv brɒdr jʔɣvb nbvd v xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjdkh jʔɣvb rɒ dvst dɒʃtm، v ɒz ʔjsv nfrt nmvdm v kvhhɒj ɒv rɒ vjrɒn v mjrɒs vj rɒnsjb ʃɣɒlhɒj bjɒbɒn ɡrdɒnjdm t͡ʃvnkh ɒdvm mj‌ɡvjd mnhdm ʃdh‌ɒjm ɒmɒ xvɒhjm brɡʃt vmxrvbh‌hɒ rɒ bnɒ xvɒhjm nmvd jhvh sbɒjvt t͡ʃnjn mj‌frmɒjd ɒjʃɒn bnɒ xvɒhnd nmvd ɒmɒ mn mnhdm xvɒhm sɒxt v ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh‌srhdʃrɒrt v bh ɣvmj kh xdɒvnd br ɒjʃɒn tɒ bh ɒbdɣzbnɒk mj‌bɒʃd msmj xvɒhnd sɒxt vt͡ʃvn t͡ʃʃmɒn ʃmɒ ɒjn rɒ bjnd xvɒhjd ɡft xdɒvnd ɒz hdvd ɒsrɒئjl mtʔzm bɒd پsr، پdr xvd v ɣlɒm، آɣɒj xvjʃ rɒɒhtrɒm mj‌nmɒjd پs ɒɡr mn پdr hstm ɒhtrɒm mn kd͡ʒɒ ɒst؟ v ɒɡr mn آɣɒ hstm hjbt mn kd͡ʒɒɒst؟ jhvh sbɒjvt bh ʃmɒ tklm mj‌knd ɒj kɒhnɒnj kh ɒsm mrɒ hɣjr mj‌ʃmɒrjd v mj‌ɡvjjd t͡ʃɡvnh ɒsm tv rɒ hɣjr ʃmrdh‌ɒjm؟ nɒn nd͡ʒs brmzbh mn mj‌ɡzrɒnjd v mj‌ɡvjjd t͡ʃɡvnh tv rɒbj hrmt nmvdh‌ɒjm؟ ɒz ɒjnkh mj‌ɡvjjd xvɒn xdɒvnd mhɣr ɒst v t͡ʃvn kvr rɒ brɒj ɣrbɒnj mj‌ɡzrɒnjd، آjɒ ɣbjh njst؟ v t͡ʃvn lŋ jɒ bjmɒrrɒ mj‌ɡzrɒnjd، آjɒ ɣbjh njst؟ آn rɒ bh hɒkm xvd hdjh bɡzrɒn v آjɒ ɒv ɒz tv rɒzj xvɒhdʃd jɒ tv rɒ mɣbvl xvɒhd dɒʃt؟ ɣvl jhvh sbɒjvt ɒjn ɒst v ɒlɒn ɒz xdɒ msɒlt nmɒ tɒbr mɒ trhm nmɒjd jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd ɒjn ɒzdst ʃmɒ vɒɣʔ ʃdh ɒst، پs آjɒ hjt͡ʃ kdɒm ɒzʃmɒ rɒ mstd͡ʒɒb xvɒhd frmvd؟ kɒʃ kh jkj ɒz ʃmɒ mj‌bvd kh drhɒ rɒbbndd tɒ آtʃ br mzbh mn bjd͡ʒɒ njfrvzjd jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd dr ʃmɒ hjt͡ʃ xvʃj ndɒrm vhjt͡ʃ hdjh ɒz dst ʃmɒ ɣbvl nxvɒhm krd zjrɒ kh ɒz mtlʔ آftɒb tɒ mɣrbʃ ɒsm mn drmjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ ʔzjm xvɒhd bvd؛ v bxvr v hdjh tɒhr dr hr d͡ʒɒ bh ɒsm mn ɡzrɒnjdh xvɒhd ʃd، zjrɒ jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd kh ɒsm mn dr mjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ ʔzjm xvɒhd bvd v bxvr v hdjh tɒhr drhr d͡ʒɒ bh ɒsm mn ɡzrɒnjdh xvɒhd ʃd، zjrɒ jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd kh ɒsm mn dr mjɒn ɒmt hɒʔzjm xvɒhd bvd ɒmɒ ʃmɒ آn rɒ bj‌hrmt mj‌sɒzjd t͡ʃvnkh mj‌ɡvjjd kh xvɒn xdɒvnd nd͡ʒs ɒst v smrh آn jʔnj tʔɒmʃ mhɣr ɒst v jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌frmɒjd kh ʃmɒ mj‌ɡvjjdɒjnk ɒjn t͡ʃh zhmt ɒst v آn rɒ ɒhɒnt mj‌knjdv t͡ʃvn hjvɒnɒt drjdh ʃdh v lŋ v bjmɒr rɒآvrdh، آnhɒ rɒ brɒj hdjh mj‌ɡzrɒnjd آjɒ mn آnhɒrɒ ɒz dst ʃmɒ ɣbvl xvɒhm krd؟ ɣvl xdɒvndɒjn ɒstپs mlʔvn bɒd hr‌kh frjb dhd v bɒآnkh nrjnh‌ɒj dr ɡlh xvd dɒrd mʔjvbj brɒj xdɒvnd nzr krdh، آn rɒ zbh nmɒjd zjrɒ kh jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd mn پɒdʃɒh ʔzjm mj‌bɒʃm vɒsm mn dr mjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ mhjb xvɒhd bvd پs mlʔvn bɒd hr‌kh frjb dhd v bɒآnkh nrjnh‌ɒj dr ɡlh xvd dɒrd mʔjvbj brɒj xdɒvnd nzr krdh، آn rɒ zbh nmɒjd zjrɒ kh jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd mn پɒdʃɒh ʔzjm mj‌bɒʃm vɒsm mn dr mjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ mhjb xvɒhd bvd v ɒlɒn‌ɒj kɒhnɒn ɒjn vsjt brɒj ʃmɒ ɒst jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd kh ɒɡrnʃnvjd v آn rɒ dr dl xvd d͡ʒɒ ndhjd tɒ ɒsm mrɒtmd͡ʒjd nmɒjjd، mn br ʃmɒ lʔn xvɒhm frstɒd v brbrkɒt ʃmɒ lʔn xvɒhm krd، blkh آnhɒ rɒ lʔn krdh‌ɒm t͡ʃvnkh آn rɒ dr dl xvd d͡ʒɒ ndɒdjd ɒjnk mn zrɒʔt rɒ bh‌sbb ʃmɒ nhjb xvɒhm nmvd v br rvjhɒj ʃmɒ srɡjn jʔnj srɡjn ʔjdhɒj ʃmɒ rɒ xvɒhm پɒʃjd v ʃmɒ rɒ bɒ آn xvɒhnd brdɒʃt v xvɒhjd dɒnst kh mn ɒjn vsjt rɒ br ʃmɒ frstɒdh‌ɒm tɒ ʔhd mn bɒ lɒvj bɒʃd ɣvl jhvh sbɒjvt ɒjn ɒst ʔhd mn bɒvj ʔhd hjɒt v slɒmtj mj‌bvd v آnhɒ rɒ bh‌sbb trsj kh ɒz mn mj‌dɒʃt bh vj dɒdm v bh‌sbb آnkh ɒz ɒsm mn hrɒsɒn mj‌bvd ʃrjʔt hɣ dr dhɒn ɒv mj‌bvd v bj‌ɒnsɒfj br lbhɒjʃ jɒft nmj ʃd blkh dr slɒmtj v ɒstɣɒmt bɒ mn slvk mj‌nmvd v bsjɒrj rɒ ɒz ɡnɒh brmj ɡrdɒnjd zjrɒ kh lbhɒj kɒhn mj‌bɒjd mʔrft rɒ hfznmɒjd tɒ ʃrjʔt rɒ ɒz dhɒnʃ btlbnd t͡ʃvnkh ɒvrsvl jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌bɒʃd ɒmɒ jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd kh ʃmɒ ɒz trjɣ td͡ʒɒvz nmvdh، bsjɒrj rɒ dr ʃrjʔt lɣzʃ dɒdjd v ʔhd lɒvj rɒ ʃkstjd bnɒbrɒjn mn njz ʃmɒ rɒ nzd tmɒmj ɒjn ɣvm xvɒr v پst xvɒhm sɒxt zjrɒ kh trjɣ mrɒ ŋɒh ndɒʃth v dr ɒd͡ʒrɒj ʃrjʔt trfdɒrj nmvdh‌ɒjd آjɒ d͡ʒmjʔ mɒ rɒ jk پdr njst v آjɒ jk xdɒ mɒ rɒ njɒfrjdh ɒst؟ پs t͡ʃrɒ ʔhd پdrɒn xvd rɒ bj‌hrmt nmvdh، bɒ jkdjɡr xjɒnt mj‌vrzjm؟ jhvdɒ xjɒnt vrzjdh ɒst vrd͡ʒɒsɒt rɒ dr ɒsrɒئjl v ɒvrʃljm bʔml آvrdh‌ɒnd zjrɒ kh jhvdɒ mɣds xdɒvnd rɒ kh ɒv آn rɒ dvst mj‌dɒʃt bj‌hrmt nmvdh، dxtrxdɒj bjɡɒnh rɒ bh znj ɡrfth ɒst پs xdɒvnd hr ks rɒ kh t͡ʃnjn ʔml nmɒjd، hm xvɒnndh v hm d͡ʒvɒb dhndh rɒ ɒz xjmh hɒj jʔɣvb mnɣtʔ xvɒhd sɒxt v hr ks rɒ njz kh brɒj jhvh sbɒjvt hdjh bɡzrɒnd v ɒjn rɒ njzbɒr djɡr bʔml آvrdh‌ɒjd kh mzbh xdɒvnd rɒ bɒɒʃkhɒ v ɡrjh v nɒlh پvʃɒnjdh‌ɒjd v ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht hdjh rɒ bɒz mnzvr nmj dɒrd v آn rɒ ɒz dst ʃmɒmɣbvl nmj frmɒjd ɒmɒ ʃmɒ mj‌ɡvjjd sbb ɒjn t͡ʃjst؟ sbb ɒjn ɒst kh xdɒvnd dr mjɒn tv vzvd͡ʒh d͡ʒvɒnj ɒt ʃɒhd bvdh ɒst v tv bh vj xjɒnt vrzjdh‌ɒj، bɒ آnkh ɒv jɒr tv v zvd͡ʒh hm ʔhd tv mj‌bvd v آjɒ ɒv jkj rɒ njɒfrjd bɒ آnkh bɣjh rvh rɒ mj‌dɒʃt v ɒzt͡ʃh sbb jk rɒ fɣtآfrjd؟ ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht kh zrjt ɒlhj rɒ tlb mj‌krd پs ɒz rvhhɒj xvd bɒhzr bɒʃjd vznhɒr ɒhdj bh zvd͡ʒh d͡ʒvɒnj xvd xjɒnt nvrzd zjrɒ jhvh xdɒj ɒsrɒئjl mj‌ɡvjd kh ɒz tlɒɣ nfrt dɒrm v njz ɒz ɒjnkh ksj zlm rɒ bh lbɒs xvd bپvʃɒnd ɣvl jhvh sbɒjvt ɒjn ɒst پs ɒzrvhhɒj xvd bɒ hzr bvdh، znhɒr xjɒnt nvrzjdʃmɒ xdɒvnd rɒ bh sxnɒn xvd xsth nmvdh‌ɒjd v mj‌ɡvjjd t͡ʃɡvnh ɒv rɒ xsth nmvdh‌ɒjm؟ ɒz ɒjnkh ɡfth‌ɒjd hmh bdkɒrɒn bh nzrxdɒvnd پsndjdh mj‌bɒʃnd vɒv ɒz ɒjʃɒn msrvrɒst jɒ ɒjnkh xdɒjj kh dɒvrj knd kd͡ʒɒ ɒst؟ ʃmɒ xdɒvnd rɒ bh sxnɒn xvd xsth nmvdh‌ɒjd v mj‌ɡvjjd t͡ʃɡvnh ɒv rɒ xsth nmvdh‌ɒjm؟ ɒz ɒjnkh ɡfth‌ɒjd hmh bdkɒrɒn bh nzrxdɒvnd پsndjdh mj‌bɒʃnd vɒv ɒz ɒjʃɒn msrvrɒst jɒ ɒjnkh xdɒjj kh dɒvrj knd kd͡ʒɒ ɒst؟ ɒjnk mn rsvl xvd rɒ xvɒhm frstɒd v ɒvtrjɣ rɒ پjʃ rvj mn mhjɒ xvɒhd sɒxt v xdɒvndj kh ʃmɒ tɒlb ɒv mj‌bɒʃjd، nɒɡhɒn bh hjkl xvd xvɒhd آmd، jʔnj آn rsvl ʔhdj kh ʃmɒ ɒz ɒv msrvr mj‌bɒʃjd hɒn ɒv mj‌آjd ɣvl jhvh sbɒjvt ɒjn ɒst ɒmɒ kjst kh rvzآmdn ɒv rɒ mthml tvɒnd ʃd؟ v kjst kh dr hjn zhvr vj tvɒnd ɒjstɒd؟ zjrɒ kh ɒv msl آtʃ ɣɒlɡr v mɒnnd sɒbvn ɡɒzrɒn xvɒhd bvd v msl ɣɒlɡr v msfj knndh nɣrh xvɒhd nʃst vbnj lɒvj rɒ tɒhr sɒxth، ɒjʃɒn rɒ mɒnnd tlɒ vnɣrh msfj xvɒhd ɡrdɒnjd tɒ ɒjʃɒn hdjh‌ɒj brɒj xdɒvnd bh ʔdɒlt bɡzrɒnnd آŋɒh hdjh jhvdɒ vɒvrʃljm پsndjdh xdɒvnd xvɒhd ʃd t͡ʃnɒnkh drɒjɒm ɣdjm v sɒlhɒj پjʃjn mj‌bvd v mn brɒj dɒvrj nzd ʃmɒ xvɒhm آmd v bh zd d͡ʒɒdvɡrɒn vznɒkɒrɒn v آnɒnj kh ɣsm drvɣ mj‌xvrnd v ksɒnj kh br mzdvr dr mzdʃ v bjvh‌znɒn v jtjmɒn zlm mj‌nmɒjnd v ɣrjb rɒ ɒz hɣ xvdʃ dvrmj sɒznd v ɒz mn nmj trsnd، bzvdj ʃhɒdt xvɒhm dɒd ɣvl jhvh sbɒjvt ɒjn ɒst zjrɒmn kh jhvh mj‌bɒʃm، tbdjl nmj پzjrm v ɒz ɒjn sbb ʃmɒ‌ɒj پsrɒn jʔɣvb hlɒk nmj ʃvjd ʃmɒ ɒz ɒjɒm پdrɒn xvd ɒz frɒjz mn td͡ʒɒvznmvdh، آnhɒ rɒ ŋɒh ndɒʃth‌ɒjd ɒmɒ jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd bsvj mn bɒzɡʃt nmɒjjd v mn bsvj ʃmɒ bɒzɡʃt xvɒhm krd، ɒmɒ ʃmɒ mj‌ɡvjjd bh t͡ʃh t͡ʃjz bɒzɡʃt nmɒjjm آjɒ ɒnsɒn xdɒ rɒ ɡvl znd؟ ɒmɒ ʃmɒ mrɒ ɡvl zdh‌ɒjd v mj‌ɡvjjd dr t͡ʃh t͡ʃjz tv rɒ ɡvl zdh‌ɒjm؟ dr ʔʃrhɒ v hdɒjɒ ʃmɒsxt mlʔvn ʃdh‌ɒjd zjrɒ kh ʃmɒ jʔnj tmɒmj ɒjn ɒmt mrɒ ɡvl zdh‌ɒjd tmɒmj ʔʃrhɒ rɒ bh mxznhɒj mn bjɒvrjd tɒ dr xɒnh mn xvrɒk bɒʃdv jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd mrɒ bh ɒjntvr ɒmthɒn nmɒjjd kh آjɒ rvznh hɒj آsmɒn rɒ brɒj ʃmɒnxvɒhm ɡʃɒd v t͡ʃnɒn brktj br ʃmɒ nxvɒhm rjxt kh ɡnd͡ʒɒjʃ آn nxvɒhd bvd؟ v jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd xvrndh rɒ bh d͡ʒht ʃmɒ mnʔ xvɒhm nmvd tɒ smrɒt zmjn ʃmɒ rɒ zɒjʔ nsɒzd v mv ʃmɒ dr shrɒ bj‌bɒr nʃvd v hmh ɒmt hɒʃmɒ rɒ xvʃhɒl xvɒhnd xvɒnd zjrɒ jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd kh ʃmɒ zmjn mrɣvb xvɒhjdbvd xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd bh zd mn sxnɒn sxt ɡfth‌ɒjd v mj‌ɡvjjd bh zd tv t͡ʃh ɡfth‌ɒjm؟ ɡfth‌ɒjd bj‌fɒjdh ɒst kh xdɒ rɒ ʔbɒdt nmɒjjm v t͡ʃh svd ɒz ɒjnkh ɒvɒmr ɒv rɒ ŋɒh dɒrjm vbhzvr jhvh sbɒjvt bɒ hzn slvk nmɒjjm؟ v hɒl mtkbrɒn rɒ sʔɒdtmnd mj‌xvɒnjm vbdkɒrɒn njz fjrvz mj‌ʃvnd v ɒjʃɒn xdɒ rɒɒmthɒn mj‌knnd v mʔhzɒ nɒd͡ʒj mj‌ɡrdnd آŋɒh trsndɡɒn xdɒvnd bɒ jkdjɡr mkɒlmh krdnd v xdɒvnd ɡvʃ ɡrfth، ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒstmɒʔ nmvd v ktɒb jɒdɡɒrj bh d͡ʒht trsndɡɒn xdɒvnd v bh d͡ʒht آnɒnj kh ɒsm ɒv rɒ ʔzjzdɒʃtnd mktvb ʃd v jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjdkh ɒjʃɒn dr آn rvzj kh mn tʔjjn nmvdh‌ɒm، mlk xɒs mn xvɒhnd bvd v br ɒjʃɒn trhm xvɒhm nmvd، t͡ʃnɒnkh ksj br پsrʃ kh ɒv rɒxdmt mj‌knd trhm mj‌nmɒjdv ʃmɒbrɡʃth، dr mjɒn ʔɒdlɒn v ʃrjrɒn v dr mjɒn ksɒnj kh xdɒ rɒ xdmt mj‌nmɒjnd v ksɒnj kh ɒv rɒ xdmt nmj nmɒjnd، tʃxjs xvɒhjd nmvd v ʃmɒbrɡʃth، dr mjɒn ʔɒdlɒn v ʃrjrɒn v dr mjɒn ksɒnj kh xdɒ rɒ xdmt mj‌nmɒjnd v ksɒnj kh ɒv rɒ xdmt nmj nmɒjnd، tʃxjs xvɒhjd nmvd zjrɒ ɒjnk آn rvzj kh msl tnvr mʃtʔl mj bɒʃd، xvɒhd آmd v d͡ʒmjʔ mtkbrɒn vd͡ʒmjʔ bdkɒrɒn kɒh xvɒhnd bvd v jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd آn rvz kh mj‌آjd ɒjʃɒn rɒ t͡ʃnɒn xvɒhdsvzɒnjd kh nh rjʃh v nh ʃɒxh‌ɒj brɒj ɒjʃɒn bɒɣj xvɒhd ɡzɒʃt ɒmɒ brɒj ʃmɒ kh ɒz ɒsm mn mj‌trsjd آftɒb ʔdɒlt tlvʔ xvɒhd krd v brbɒlhɒj vj ʃfɒ xvɒhd bvd v ʃmɒ bjrvn آmdh، mɒnnd ɡvsɒlh hɒj پrvɒrj d͡ʒst v xjz xvɒhjdkrd v jhvh sbɒjvt mj‌ɡvjd ʃrjrɒn rɒپɒjmɒl xvɒhjd nmvd zjrɒ dr آn rvzj kh mn tʔjjn nmvdh‌ɒm، ɒjʃɒn zjr kf پɒjhɒj ʃmɒxɒkstr xvɒhnd bvd tvrɒt bndh mn mvsj rɒkh آn rɒ bɒ frɒjz v ɒhkɒm bh d͡ʒht tmɒmj ɒsrɒئjl dr hvrjb ɒmr frmvdm bjɒd آvrjdɒjnk mn ɒjljɒj nbj rɒ ɣbl ɒz rsjdn rvz ʔzjm v mhjb xdɒvnd nzd ʃmɒ xvɒhm frstɒd ɒjnk mn ɒjljɒj nbj rɒ ɣbl ɒz rsjdn rvz ʔzjm v mhjb xdɒvnd nzd ʃmɒ xvɒhm frstɒd ktɒb nsb nɒmh ʔjsj msjh bn dɒvd bn ɒbrɒhjm ɒbrɒhjm ɒshɒɣ rɒ آvrd v ɒshɒɣ jʔɣvb rɒ آvrd v jʔɣvb jhvdɒ v brɒdrɒn ɒv rɒآvrd v jhvdɒ، fɒrs v zɒrh rɒ ɒz tɒmɒr آvrd vfɒrs، hsrvn rɒ آvrd v hsrvn، ɒrɒm rɒ آvrd v ɒrɒm، ʔmjnɒdɒb rɒ آvrd v ʔmjnɒdɒb، nhʃvn rɒ آvrd v nhʃvn، ʃlmvn rɒ آvrd vʃlmvn، bvʔz rɒ ɒz rɒhɒb آvrd v bvʔz، ʔvbjdrɒ ɒz rɒʔvt آvrd v ʔvbjd، jsɒ rɒ آvrd vjsɒ dɒvd پɒdʃɒh rɒ آvrd v dɒvd پɒdʃɒh، sljmɒn rɒ ɒz zn ɒvrjɒ آvrd v sljmɒn، rhbʔɒm rɒ آvrd v rhbʔɒm، ɒbjɒ rɒ آvrd v ɒbjɒ، آsɒ rɒآvrd v آsɒ، jhvʃɒfɒt rɒ آvrd v jhvʃɒfɒt، jvrɒm rɒ آvrd v jvrɒm، ʔzjɒ rɒ آvrd v ʔzjɒ، jvtɒm rɒ آvrd v jvtɒm، ɒhɒz rɒ آvrd v ɒhɒz، hzɣjɒ rɒ آvrd v hzɣjɒ، mnsj rɒ آvrd vmnsj، آmvn rɒ آvrd v آmvn، jvʃjɒ rɒ آvrd vjvʃjɒ، jknjɒ v brɒdrɒnʃ rɒ dr zmɒn d͡ʒlɒj bɒbl آvrd v bʔd ɒz d͡ʒlɒj bɒbl، jknjɒ، sɒltjئl rɒ آvrd v sɒltjئjl، zrvbɒbl rɒ آvrd zrvbɒbl، ɒbjhvd rɒ آvrd v ɒbjhvd، ɒjljɣɒjm rɒ آvrd v ɒjljɣɒjm، ʔɒzvr rɒ آvrd v ʔɒzvr، sɒdvɣ rɒ آvrd v sɒdvɣ، jɒkjn rɒ آvrd v jɒkjn، ɒjljhvd rɒ آvrd v ɒjljhvd، ɒjlʔɒzr rɒ آvrdv ɒjlʔɒzr، mtɒn rɒ آvrd v mtɒn، jʔɣvb rɒآvrd v jʔɣvb، jvsf ʃvhr mrjm rɒآvrd kh ʔjsj msmj bh msjh ɒz ɒv mtvldʃd پs tmɒm tbɣɒt، ɒz ɒbrɒhjm tɒ dɒvdt͡ʃhɒrdh tbɣh ɒst، v ɒz dɒvd tɒ d͡ʒlɒj bɒbl t͡ʃhɒrdh tbɣh، v ɒz d͡ʒlɒj bɒbl tɒ msjh t͡ʃhɒrdh tbɣh ɒmɒ vlɒdt ʔjsj msjh t͡ʃnjn bvd kh t͡ʃvn mɒdrʃ mrjm bh jvsf nɒmzd ʃdh bvd، ɣbl ɒzآnkh bɒ hm آjnd، ɒv rɒ ɒz rvh‌ɒlɣds hɒmlh jɒftnd v ʃvhrʃ jvsf t͡ʃvnkh mrd sɒlh bvd vnxvɒst ɒv rɒ ʔbrt nmɒjd، پs ɒrɒdh nmvd ɒv rɒbh پnhɒnj rhɒ knd ɒmɒ t͡ʃvn ɒv dr ɒjn t͡ʃjzhɒtfkr mj‌krd، nɒɡɒh frʃth xdɒvnd dr xvɒb brvj zɒhr ʃdh، ɡft «ɒj jvsf پsr dɒvd، ɒzɡrftn zn xvjʃ mrjm mtrs، zjrɒ kh آnt͡ʃh drvj ɣrɒr ɡrfth ɒst، ɒz rvh‌ɒlɣds ɒst، v ɒvپsrj xvɒhd zɒjjd v nɒm ɒv rɒ ʔjsj xvɒhj nhɒd، zjrɒ kh ɒv ɒmt xvjʃ rɒ ɒz ɡnɒhɒnʃɒn xvɒhd rhɒnjd» v ɒjn hmh brɒj آn vɒɣʔ ʃd tɒklɒmj kh xdɒvnd bh zbɒn nbj ɡfth bvd، tmɒm ɡrdd «kh ɒjnk bɒkrh آbstn ʃdh پsrj xvɒhdzɒjjd v nɒm ɒv rɒ ʔmɒnvئjl xvɒhnd xvɒnd kh tfsjrʃ ɒjn ɒst xdɒ bɒ mɒ» پs t͡ʃvn jvsf ɒz xvɒb bjdɒr ʃd، t͡ʃnɒnkh frʃth xdɒvnd bdv ɒmr krdh bvd، bʔml آvrd v zn xvjʃ rɒ ɡrftv tɒ پsr nxstjn xvd rɒnzɒjjd، ɒv rɒ nʃnɒxt؛ v ɒv rɒ ʔjsj nɒm nhɒd v tɒ پsr nxstjn xvd rɒnzɒjjd، ɒv rɒ nʃnɒxt؛ v ɒv rɒ ʔjsj nɒm nhɒd v t͡ʃvn ʔjsj dr ɒjɒm hjrvdjs پɒdʃɒh drbjt lhm jhvdjh tvld jɒft، nɒɡɒh md͡ʒvsj t͡ʃnd ɒz mʃrɣ bh ɒvrʃljm آmdh، ɡftnd «kd͡ʒɒst آn mvlvd kh پɒdʃɒh jhvd ɒst zjrɒkh stɒrh ɒv rɒ dr mʃrɣ djdh‌ɒjm v brɒj پrstʃ ɒv آmdh‌ɒjm؟» ɒmɒ hjrvdjs پɒdʃɒh t͡ʃvn ɒjn rɒʃnjd، mztrb ʃd v tmɒm ɒvrʃljm bɒ vj پs hmh rvsɒj khnh v kɒtbɒn ɣvm rɒ d͡ʒmʔ krdh، ɒzɒjʃɒn پrsjd kh «msjh kd͡ʒɒ bɒjd mtvld ʃvd؟» bdv ɡftnd «dr bjt lhm jhvdjh zjrɒ kh ɒz nbj t͡ʃnjn mktvb ɒst v tv‌ɒj bjt lhm، dr zmjn jhvdɒ ɒz sɒjr srdɒrɒn jhvdɒ hrɡz kvt͡ʃktrnjstj، zjrɒ kh ɒz tv پjʃvɒjj bh zhvr xvɒhdآmd kh ɣvm mn ɒsrɒئjl rɒ rʔɒjt xvɒhd nmvd» آŋɒh hjrvdjs md͡ʒvsjɒn rɒ dr xlvt xvɒndh، vɣt zhvr stɒrh rɒ ɒz ɒjʃɒn thɣjɣ krd پs ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh bjt lhm rvɒnh nmvdh، ɡft «brvjd v ɒz ɒhvɒl آn tfl btdɣjɣ tfhs knjd v t͡ʃvn jɒftjd mrɒ xbr dhjd tɒ mn njz آmdh، ɒv rɒ پrstʃ nmɒjm» t͡ʃvn sxn پɒdʃɒh rɒʃnjdnd، rvɒnh ʃdnd kh nɒɡɒh آn stɒrh‌ɒj kh dr mʃrɣ djdh bvdnd، پjʃ rvj ɒjʃɒn mj‌rft tɒfvɣ آnd͡ʒɒjj kh tfl bvd rsjdh، bɒjstɒd vt͡ʃvn stɒrh rɒ djdnd، bj‌nhɒjt ʃɒd v xvʃhɒl ɡʃtnd v bh xɒnh drآmdh، tfl rɒ bɒ mɒdrʃ mrjm jɒftnd v bh rvj dr‌ɒftɒdh، ɒv rɒ پrstʃ krdnd v zxɒjr xvd rɒ ɡʃvdh، hdɒjɒj tlɒ vkndr v mr bh vj ɡzrɒnjdnd v t͡ʃvn dr xvɒb vhj bdjʃɒn dr‌rsjd kh bh nzd hjrvdjs bɒzɡʃt nknnd، پs ɒz rɒh djɡr bh vtn xvjʃ mrɒd͡ʒʔt krdnd v t͡ʃvn ɒjʃɒn rvɒnh ʃdnd، nɒɡɒh frʃth xdɒvnd dr xvɒb bh jvsf zɒhr ʃdh، ɡft «brxjz v tfl v mɒdrʃ rɒ brdɒʃth bh msr frɒrkn v dr آnd͡ʒɒ bɒʃ tɒ bh tv xbr dhm، zjrɒ kh hjrvdjs tfl rɒ d͡ʒstd͡ʒv xvɒhd krd tɒ ɒv rɒhlɒk nmɒjd» پs ʃbɒŋɒh brxɒsth، tfl vmɒdr ɒv rɒ brdɒʃth، bsvj msr rvɒnh ʃd v tɒvfɒt hjrvdjs dr آnd͡ʒɒ bmɒnd، tɒ klɒmj kh xdɒvnd bh zbɒn nbj ɡfth bvd tmɒm ɡrdd kh «ɒzmsr پsr xvd rɒ xvɒndm» t͡ʃvn hjrvdjs djd kh md͡ʒvsjɒn ɒv rɒ sxrjh nmvdh‌ɒnd، bsjɒrɣzbnɒk ʃdh، frstɒd v d͡ʒmjʔ ɒtfɒlj rɒ kh drbjt lhm v tmɒm nvɒhj آn bvdnd، ɒz dv sɒlh vkmtr mvɒfɣ vɣtj kh ɒz md͡ʒvsjɒn thɣjɣ nmvdh bvd، bh ɣtl rsɒnjd آŋɒh klɒmj kh bh zbɒn ɒrmjɒj nbj ɡfth ʃdh bvd، tmɒm ʃd «آvɒzj drrɒmh ʃnjdh ʃd، ɡrjh v zɒrj v mɒtm ʔzjm kh rɒhjl brɒj frzndɒn xvd ɡrjh mj‌knd v tslj nmj پzjrd zjrɒ kh njstnd» ɒmɒ t͡ʃvn hjrvdjs vfɒt jɒft، nɒɡɒh frʃth xdɒvnd dr msr bh jvsf dr xvɒb zɒhrʃdh، ɡft «brxjz v tfl v mɒdrʃ rɒbrdɒʃth، bh zmjn ɒsrɒئjl rvɒnh ʃv zjrɒ آnɒnj kh ɣsd d͡ʒɒn tfl dɒʃtnd fvt ʃdnd» پs brxɒsth، tfl v mɒdr ɒv rɒ brdɒʃt v bh zmjn ɒsrɒئjl آmd ɒmɒ t͡ʃvn ʃnjd kh ɒrklɒvs bh‌d͡ʒɒj پdr xvd hjrvdjs br jhvdjh پɒdʃɒhj mj‌knd، ɒz rftn bdɒn smt trsjd v dr xvɒb vhj jɒfth، bh nvɒhj d͡ʒljl brɡʃtv آmdh dr bldh‌ɒj msmj bh nɒsrh sɒkn ʃd، tɒ آnt͡ʃh bh zbɒn ɒnbjɒ ɡfth ʃdh bvd tmɒm ʃvd kh «bh nɒsrj xvɒndh xvɒhd ʃd» v آmdh dr bldh‌ɒj msmj bh nɒsrh sɒkn ʃd، tɒ آnt͡ʃh bh zbɒn ɒnbjɒ ɡfth ʃdh bvd tmɒm ʃvd kh «bh nɒsrj xvɒndh xvɒhd ʃd» v dr آn ɒjɒm، jhjj tʔmjd‌dhndh dr bjɒbɒn jhvdjh zɒhr ʃd v mvʔzh krdh، mj‌ɡft «tvbh knjd، zjrɒ mlkvt آsmɒn nzdjk ɒst» zjrɒ hmjn ɒst آnkh ɒʃʔjɒj nbj ɒz ɒv xbrdɒdh، mj‌ɡvjd «sdɒj ndɒ knndh‌ɒj dr bjɒbɒn kh rɒh xdɒvnd rɒ mhjɒ sɒzjd v trɣ ɒv rɒ rɒst nmɒjjd» v ɒjn jhjj lbɒs ɒz پʃm ʃtrmj dɒʃt، v kmrbnd t͡ʃrmj br kmr v xvrɒk ɒv ɒzmlx v ʔsl brj mj‌bvd dr ɒjn vɣt، ɒvrʃljm v tmɒm jhvdjh vd͡ʒmjʔ hvɒlj ɒrdn nzd ɒv bjrvn mj‌آmdnd، v bh ɡnɒhɒn xvd ɒʔtrɒf krdh، dr ɒrdn ɒz vj tʔmjdmj jɒftnd پs t͡ʃvn bsjɒrj ɒz frjsjɒn v sdvɣjɒn rɒdjd kh bd͡ʒht tʔmjd vj mj‌آjnd، bdjʃɒn ɡft «ɒj ɒfʔj‌zɒdɡɒn، kh ʃmɒ rɒ ɒʔlɒm krd kh ɒz ɣzb آjndh bɡrjzjd؟ ɒknvn smrh ʃɒjsth tvbh bjɒvrjd، v ɒjn sxn rɒ bh‌xɒtr xvd rɒh mdhjdkh پdr mɒ ɒbrɒhjm ɒst، zjrɒ bh ʃmɒ mj‌ɡvjm xdɒɣɒdr ɒst kh ɒz ɒjn sŋhɒ frzndɒn brɒj ɒbrɒhjm brɒŋjzɒnd v ɒlhɒl tjʃh br rjʃh drxtɒn nhɒdh ʃdh ɒst، پs hr drxtj kh smrh njkvnjɒvrd، brjdh v dr آtʃ ɒfkndh ʃvd mn ʃmɒrɒ bh آb bh d͡ʒht tvbh tʔmjd mj‌dhm lkn ɒv kh bʔd ɒz mn mj‌آjd ɒz mn tvɒnɒtr ɒst kh lɒjɣ brdɒʃtn nʔljn ɒv njstm؛ ɒv ʃmɒ rɒ bh rvh‌ɒlɣds v آtʃ tʔmjd xvɒhd dɒd ɒv ɣrbɒl xvd rɒ drdst dɒrd v xrmn xvd rɒ njkv پɒk krdh، ɡndm xvjʃ rɒ dr ɒnbɒr zxjrh xvɒhd nmvd، vlj kɒh rɒdr آtʃj kh xɒmvʃj nmj پzjrd xvɒhdsvzɒnjd» آŋɒh ʔjsj ɒz d͡ʒljl bh ɒrdn nzd jhjj آmdtɒ ɒz ɒv tʔmjd jɒbd ɒmɒ jhjj ɒv rɒ mnʔ nmvdh، ɡft «mn ɒhtjɒd͡ʒ dɒrm kh ɒz tv tʔmjd jɒbm v tvnzd mn mj‌آjj؟» ʔjsj dr d͡ʒvɒb vj ɡft «ɒlɒn bɡzɒrzjrɒ kh mɒ rɒ hmt͡ʃnjn mnɒsb ɒst tɒ tmɒm ʔdɒlt rɒ bh‌kmɒl rsɒnjm» ɒmɒ ʔjsj t͡ʃvn tʔmjdjɒft، fvr ɒz آb brآmd kh dr sɒʔt آsmɒn brvj ɡʃɒdh ʃd v rvh xdɒ rɒ djd kh msl kbvtrj nzvl krdh، br vj mj‌آjdآŋɒh xtɒbj ɒzآsmɒn dr‌rsjd kh «ɒjn ɒst پsr hbjb mn kh ɒzɒv xʃnvdm» آŋɒh xtɒbj ɒzآsmɒn dr‌rsjd kh «ɒjn ɒst پsr hbjb mn kh ɒzɒv xʃnvdm» آŋɒh ʔjsj bh‌dst rvh bh bjɒbɒn brdh ʃdtɒ ɒbljs ɒv rɒ td͡ʒrbh nmɒjd v t͡ʃvn t͡ʃhl ʃbɒnh‌rvz rvzh dɒʃt، آxr ɡrsnh ɡrdjd پs td͡ʒrbh knndh nzd ɒv آmdh، ɡft «ɒɡr پsr xdɒhstj، bɡv tɒ ɒjn sŋhɒ nɒn ʃvd» dr d͡ʒvɒb ɡft «mktvb ɒst ɒnsɒn nh mhz nɒn zjst tv frmɒn dhd tɒtv rɒ bh‌dsthɒj xvd brɡjrnd، mbɒdɒ پɒjt bh sŋj xvrd» ʔjsj vj rɒ ɡft «v njzmktvb ɒst xdɒvnd xdɒj xvd rɒ td͡ʒrbh mkn» پs ɒbljs ɒv rɒ bh kvhj bsjɒr blnd brd vhmh mmɒlk d͡ʒhɒn v d͡ʒlɒl آnhɒ rɒ bdv nʃɒn dɒdh، bh vj ɡft «ɒɡr ɒftɒdh mrɒ sd͡ʒdh knj، hmɒnɒ ɒjn hmh rɒ bh tv bxʃm» آŋɒh ʔjsj vj rɒɡft «dvr ʃv‌ɒj ʃjtɒn، zjrɒ mktvb ɒst kh xdɒvnd xdɒj xvd rɒ sd͡ʒdh kn v ɒv rɒ fɣtʔbɒdt nmɒ» dr sɒʔt ɒbljs ɒv rɒ rhɒ krd vɒjnk frʃtɡɒn آmdh، ɒv rɒ پrstɒrj mj‌nmvdnd v t͡ʃvn ʔjsj ʃnjd kh jhjj ɡrftɒr ʃdh ɒst، bh d͡ʒljl rvɒnh ʃd، v nɒsrh rɒ trk krdh، آmd v bh kfrnɒhvm، bh knɒrh drjɒ dr hdvdzbvlvn v nftɒljm sɒkn ʃd tɒ tmɒm ɡrdd آnt͡ʃh bh zbɒn ɒʃʔjɒj nbj ɡfth ʃdh bvd kh «zmjn zbvlvn v zmjn nftɒljm، rɒh drjɒ آn trf ɒrdn، d͡ʒljl ɒmt‌hɒ؛ ɣvmj kh dr zlmt sɒkn bvdnd، nvrj ʔzjm djdnd v brnʃjnndɡɒn ɒndrjɒs rɒ djd kh dɒmj drdrjɒ mj‌ɒndɒznd، zjrɒ sjɒd bvdnd bdjʃɒn ɡft «ɒz ʔɣb mn آjjd tɒ ʃmɒ rɒ sjɒd mrdm ɡrdɒnm» dr sɒʔt dɒmhɒ rɒ ɡzɒrdh، ɒz ʔɣb ɒv rvɒnh ʃdnd v t͡ʃvn ɒz آnd͡ʒɒ ɡzʃt dv brɒdrdjɡr d͡ʒljl mj‌ɡʃt v drknɒjs ɒjʃɒn tʔljm dɒdh، bh bʃɒrt mlkvt mvʔzh hmj nmvd v hr mrz v hr drd ɣvm rɒʃfɒ mj‌dɒd v ɒsm ɒv dr tmɒm svrjh ʃhrt jɒft، v d͡ʒmjʔ mrjzɒnj kh bh ɒnvɒʔ ɒmrɒz vdrdhɒ mbtlɒ bvdnd v v jhvdjh v آn trf ɒrdn dr ʔɣb ɒvrvɒnh ʃdnd xvʃɒbhɒlhɒ v ɡrvhj bsjɒr djdh، br frɒz kvh آmd v vɣtj kh ɒv bnʃst ʃɒɡrdɒnʃ nzd ɒvhɒzr ʃdnd آŋɒh dhɒn xvd rɒ ɡʃvdh، ɒjʃɒn rɒ tʔljm dɒd v ɡft «xvʃɒbhɒl mskjnɒn dr rvh، zjrɒ mlkvt آsmɒn ɒz آn ɒjʃɒn ɒst xvʃɒbhɒl mɒtmjɒn، zjrɒ ɒjʃɒn tslj xvɒhnd jɒft xvʃɒbhɒl hljmɒn، zjrɒ ɒjʃɒn vɒrs zmjn xvɒhnd ʃd xvʃɒbhɒl ɡrsŋɒn v tʃŋɒn ʔdɒlt، zjrɒɒjʃɒn sjr xvɒhndʃd t͡ʃnɒnkh dr آsmɒn ɒst، br zmjn njz krdh ʃvd nɒn kfɒf mɒ rɒ ɒmrvz bh mɒ bdh v ɣrz hɒj mɒ rɒ bbxʃ t͡ʃnɒnkh mɒ njzɣrzdɒrɒn xvd rɒ mj‌bxʃjm v mɒ rɒ dr آzmɒjʃ mjɒvr، blkh ɒz ʃrjr mɒ rɒrhɒjj dh «zjrɒ
