ɒfʃɒndh، ɡft «xvn ʃmɒ br srʃmɒ ɒst mn brj hstm bʔd ɒz ɒjn bh nzd ɒmt hɒmj rvm» پs ɒz آnd͡ʒɒ nɣl krdh، bh xɒnh ʃxsj jvsts nɒm xdɒپrst آmd kh xɒnh ɒv mtsl bh knjsh bvd ɒmɒ krsپs، rئjs knjsh bɒ tmɒmj ɒhl bjtʃ bh xdɒvnd ɒjmɒn آvrdnd v bsjɒrj ɒzɒhl ɣrnts t͡ʃvn ʃnjdnd، ɒjmɒn آvrdh، tʔmjdjɒftnd ʃbj xdɒvnd dr rvjɒ bh پvls ɡft «trsɒn mbɒʃ، blkh sxn bɡv v xɒmvʃ mbɒʃ zjrɒ kh mn bɒ tv hstm v hjt͡ʃ‌ks tv rɒ ɒzjt nxvɒhd rsɒnjd zjrɒ kh mrɒ dr ɒjn ʃhr xlɣ bsjɒr ɒst» پs mdt jk sɒl v ʃʃ mɒh tvɣf nmvdh، ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh klɒm xdɒ tʔljm mj‌dɒd ɒmɒt͡ʃvn ɣɒljvn vɒlj ɒxɒئjh bvd، jhvdjɒn jkdl ʃdh، br sr پvls tɒxth، ɒv rɒ پjʃ msnd hɒkm brdnd v ɡftnd «ɒjn ʃxs mrdm rɒ ɒɣvɒmj knd kh xdɒ rɒ brxlɒf ʃrjʔt ʔbɒdt knnd» t͡ʃvn پvls xvɒst hrf znd، ɣɒljvn ɡft «ɒj jhvdjɒn ɒɡr zlmj jɒ fsɣj fɒhʃ mj‌bvd، hr آjnh ʃrt ʔɣl mj‌bvd kh mthml ʃmɒ bʃvm vlj t͡ʃvn msɒlh‌ɒj ɒst drbɒrh sxnɒn vnɒmhɒ v ʃrjʔt ʃmɒ، پs xvd bfhmjd mn drt͡ʃnjn ɒmvr nmj xvɒhm dɒvrj knm» پs ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz پjʃ msnd brɒnd v hmh svstɒnjs rئjs knsjh rɒ ɡrfth ɒv rɒ dr mɣɒbl msnd vɒlj bzdnd v ɣɒljvn rɒ ɒz ɒjn ɒmvr hjt͡ʃ پrvɒnbvd ɒmɒ پvls bʔd ɒz آn rvzhɒj bsjɒr dr آnd͡ʒɒtvɣf nmvd پs brɒdrɒn rɒ vdɒʔ nmvdh، bh svrjh ɒz rɒh drjɒ rft v پrsklh v ɒkjlɒ hmrɒh ɒv rftnd v drknxrjh mvj xvd rɒ t͡ʃjd t͡ʃvnkh nzr krdh bvd v t͡ʃvn bh ɒfss rsjd آn dv nfr rɒ drآnd͡ʒɒ rhɒ krdh، xvd bh knjsh drآmdh، bɒ jhvdjɒn mbɒhsh nmvd v t͡ʃvn ɒjʃɒn xvɒhʃ nmvdndkh mdtj bɒ ɒjʃɒn bmɒnd، ɣbvl nkrd blkh ɒjʃɒn rɒ vdɒʔ krdh، ɡft kh «mrɒ bh hr svrt bɒjd ʔjdآjndh rɒ dr ɒvrʃljm srf knm ljkn ɒɡr xdɒbxvɒhd، bɒz bh nzd ʃmɒ xvɒhm brɡʃt» پs ɒzɒfss rvɒnh ʃd v bh ɣjsrjh frvd آmdh bh ɒvrʃljm rft v kljsɒ rɒ thjt nmvdh، bh ɒntɒkjh آmd v mdtj dr آnd͡ʒɒ mɒndh، bɒz bh sfr tvd͡ʒh nmvd v dr mlk ɣlɒtjh v frjd͡ʒjh d͡ʒɒbd͡ʒɒ mj‌ɡʃt v hmh ʃɒɡrdɒn rɒ ɒstvɒr mj‌nmvd ɒmɒ ʃxsj jhvd ɒپls nɒm ɒz ɒhl ɒskndrjh kh mrdj fsjh v dr ktɒb tvɒnɒ bvd، bh ɒfss rsjd ɒv drtrjɣ xdɒvnd trbjt jɒfth v dr rvh srɡrm bvdh، drbɒrh xdɒvnd bh dɣt tklm v tʔljm mj‌nmvd hr‌t͡ʃnd t͡ʃz ɒz tʔmjd jhjj ɒtlɒʔj ndɒʃt hmɒn ʃxs dr knjsh bh dljrj sxn آɣɒz krd ɒmɒ t͡ʃvn پrsklh v ɒkjlɒ ɒv rɒʃnjdnd، nzd xvd آvrdnd v bh dɣt tmɒm trjɣ xdɒ rɒ bdv آmvxtnd پs t͡ʃvn ɒvʔzjmt sfr ɒxɒئjh krd، brɒdrɒn ɒv rɒtrɣjb nmvdh، bh ʃɒɡrdɒn sfɒrʃ nɒmh‌ɒj nvʃtnd kh ɒv rɒ bپzjrnd v t͡ʃvn bdɒnd͡ʒɒ rsjdآnɒnj rɒ kh bh vsjlh fjz ɒjmɒn آvrdh bvdnd، ɒʔɒnt bsjɒr nmvd،zjrɒ bh ɣvt tmɒm br jhvdɒɣɒmh hd͡ʒt mj‌krd v ɒz ktb sɒbt mj‌nmvd kh ʔjsj، msjh ɒst zjrɒ bh ɣvt tmɒm br jhvdɒɣɒmh hd͡ʒt mj‌krd v ɒz ktb sɒbt mj‌nmvd kh ʔjsj، msjh ɒst v t͡ʃvn ɒپls dr ɣrnts bvd، پvls drnvɒhj bɒlɒ ɡrdʃ krdh، bh ɒfss rsjd v dr آnd͡ʒɒ ʃɒɡrd t͡ʃnd jɒfth، bdjʃɒn ɡft «آjɒ hŋɒmj kh ɒjmɒn آvrdjd، rvh‌ɒlɣds rɒ jɒftjd؟» bh vj ɡftnd «blkh nʃnjdjm kh rvh‌ɒlɣds hst» bdjʃɒn ɡft «پs bh t͡ʃh t͡ʃjz tʔmjd jɒftjd؟» ɡftnd «bh tʔmjd jhjj» پvls ɡft «jhjj ɒlbth tʔmjd tvbh mj‌dɒd v bh ɣvm mj‌ɡft bh آn ksj‌kh bʔd ɒz mn mj‌آjd ɒjmɒn bjɒvrjd jʔnj bh msjh ʔjsj» t͡ʃvn ɒjn rɒʃnjdnd bh nɒm xdɒvnd ʔjsj tʔmjd ɡrftnd، vt͡ʃvn پvls dst br ɒjʃɒn nhɒd، rvh‌ɒlɣds brɒjʃɒn nɒzl ʃd v bh zbɒnhɒ mtklm ɡʃth، nbvt krdnd v d͡ʒmlh آn mrdmɒn txmjn dvɒzdh nfrbvdnd پs bh knjsh drآmdh، mdt sh mɒh bh dljrj sxn mj‌rɒnd v dr ɒmvr mlkvt xdɒ mbɒhsh mj‌nmvd v brhɒn ɣɒtʔ mj‌آvrd ɒmɒ t͡ʃvn bʔzj sxt dl ɡʃth، ɒjmɒn njɒvrdnd v پjʃ rvj xlɣ، trjɣt rɒ bd mj‌ɡftnd، ɒz ɒjʃɒn knɒrh ɡzjdh، ʃɒɡrdɒn rɒ d͡ʒdɒ sɒxt v hr rvzh drmdrsh ʃxsj tjrɒns nɒm mbɒhsh mj‌nmvd v bdjntvr dv sɒl ɡzʃt bɣsmj kh tmɒmj ɒhl آsjɒ t͡ʃh jhvd v t͡ʃh jvnɒnj klɒm xdɒvndʔjsj rɒ ʃnjdnd v xdɒvnd ɒz dst پvls mʔd͡ʒzɒt ɣjrmʔtɒd bh zhvr mj‌rsɒnjd، btvrj kh ɒz bdn ɒv dstmɒlhɒ v fvth‌hɒ brdh، br mrjzɒn mj‌ɡzɒrdnd v ɒmrɒz ɒz ɒjʃɒn zɒjl mj ʃd v ɒrvɒh پljd ɒz ɒjʃɒn ɒxrɒd͡ʒ mj‌ʃdnd ljkn tnj t͡ʃnd ɒz jhvdjɒn sjɒh ʔzjmh xvɒn br آnɒnj kh ɒrvɒh پljd dɒʃtnd، nɒm xdɒvnd ʔjsj rɒ xvɒndn ɡrftnd v mj‌ɡftnd «ʃmɒ rɒ bh آn ʔjsj kh پvls bh ɒv mvʔzh mj‌kndɣsm mj‌dhjm» v hft nfr پsrɒn ɒskjvɒrئjs khnh jhvd ɒjn kɒr mj‌krdnd ɒmɒ rvh xbjs dr d͡ʒvɒb ɒjʃɒn ɡft «ʔjsj rɒmj ʃnɒsm v پvls rɒ mj‌dɒnm ljkn ʃmɒkjstjd؟» v آn mrd kh rvh پljd dɒʃt brɒjʃɒn d͡ʒst v br ɒjʃɒn zvrآvr ʃdh، ɣlbh jɒft bhdj kh ɒz آn xɒnh ʔrjɒn v md͡ʒrvh frɒr krdnd t͡ʃvn ɒjn vɒɣʔh br d͡ʒmjʔ jhvdjɒn v jvnɒnjɒn sɒkn ɒfss mʃhvr ɡrdjd، xvf br hmh ɒjʃɒn tɒrj ɡʃth، nɒm xdɒvnd ʔjsj rɒ mkrm mj‌dɒʃtnd v bsjɒrj ɒz آnɒnj kh ɒjmɒn آvrdh bvdnd آmdnd v bh ɒʔmɒl xvd ɒʔtrɒf krdh، آnhɒ rɒfɒʃ mj‌nmvdnd v d͡ʒmʔj ɒz ʃʔbdh bɒzɒn ktb xvjʃ rɒ آvrdh، dr hzvr xlɣ svzɒnjdnd vt͡ʃvn ɣjmt آnhɒ rɒ hsɒb krdnd، پnd͡ʒɒh hzɒrdrhm bvd bdjntvr klɒm xdɒvnd trɣj krdh ɣvt mj‌ɡrft v bʔd ɒz tmɒm ʃdn ɒjn mɣdmɒt، پvls drrvh ʔzjmt krd kh ɒz mkɒdvnjh v ɒxɒئjh ɡzʃth، bh ɒvrʃljm brvd v ɡft «bʔd ɒz rftnm bh آnd͡ʒɒ rvm rɒ njz bɒjd djd» پs dv nfr ɒz mlɒzmɒn xvdjʔnj tjmvtɒvs v ɒrstvs rɒ bh mkɒdvnjh rvɒnh krd v xvd dr آsjɒ t͡ʃndj tvɣf nmvd dr آn zmɒn hŋɒmh‌ɒj ʔzjm drbɒrh trjɣt br پɒ ʃd zjrɒ ʃxsj djmjtrjvs nɒm zrɡr kh tsɒvjrbtkdh ɒrtɒmjs ɒz nɣrh mj‌sɒxt v bd͡ʒht snʔtɡrɒn nfʔ xtjr پjdɒ mj‌nmvd، ɒjʃɒn rɒ v djɡrɒnj kh dr t͡ʃnjn پjʃh ɒʃtɣɒl mj‌dɒʃtnd، frɒhm آvrdh، ɡft «ɒj mrdmɒn ʃmɒ آɡɒh hstjd kh ɒz ɒjn ʃɣl، frɒxj rzɣ mɒ ɒst vdjdh v ʃnjdh‌ɒjd kh nh‌tnhɒ dr ɒfss، blkh tɣrjb dr tmɒm آsjɒ ɒjn پvls xlɣ bsjɒrj rɒ ɒɣvɒnmvdh، mnhrf sɒxth ɒst v mj‌ɡvjd ɒjnhɒjj kh bh‌dsthɒ sɒxth mj‌ʃvnd، xdɒjɒn njstnd پs xtr ɒst kh nh fɣt ksb mɒ ɒz mjɒn rvdblkh ɒjn hjkl xdɒj ʔzjm ɒrtɒmjs njz hɣjrʃmrdh ʃvd v ʔzmt vj kh tmɒm آsjɒ v rbʔ mskvn ɒv rɒ mj‌پrstnd brtrf ʃvd» t͡ʃvn ɒjn rɒ ʃnjdnd، ɒz xʃm پr ɡʃth، frjɒd krdh، mj‌ɡftnd kh «bzrɡ ɒst ɒrtɒmjs ɒfssjɒn» v tmɒmj ʃhr bh ʃvrʃ آmdh، hmh mtfɣ bh tmɒʃɒxɒnh tɒxtnd v ɣɒjvs v ɒrstrxs rɒ kh ɒz ɒhl mkɒdvnjh v hmrɒhɒn پvls bvdnd bɒ xvdmj kʃjdnd ɒmɒ t͡ʃvn پvls ɒrɒdh nmvd kh bh mjɒn mrdm drآjd، ʃɒɡrdɒn ɒv rɒ ŋzɒʃtnd vbʔzj ɒz rvsɒj آsjɒ kh ɒv rɒ dvst mj‌dɒʃtnd، nzd ɒv frstɒdh، xvɒhʃ nmvdnd kh xvd rɒ bh tmɒʃɒxɒnh nsپɒrd v hr jkj sdɒjj ʔljhdh mj‌krdnd zjrɒ kh d͡ʒmɒʔt آʃfth bvd v ɒksrnmj dɒnstnd kh brɒj t͡ʃh d͡ʒmʔ ʃdh‌ɒnd پs ɒskndr rɒ ɒz mjɒn xlɣ kʃjdnd kh jhvdjɒn ɒv rɒپjʃ ɒndɒxtnd v ɒskndr bh‌dst xvd ɒʃɒrh krdh، xvɒst brɒj xvd پjʃ mrdm hd͡ʒt bjɒvrd ljkn t͡ʃvn dɒnstnd kh jhvdj ɒst hmh bh jk آvɒz ɣrjb bh dv sɒʔt ndɒ mj‌krdndkh «bzrɡ ɒst ɒrtɒmjs ɒfssjɒn» پs ɒz آn mstvfj ʃhr xlɣ rɒ sɒkt ɡrdɒnjdh، ɡft «ɒj mrdɒn ɒfssj، kjst kh nmj dɒnd kh ʃhr ɒfssjɒn ɒrtɒmjs xdɒj ʔzjm v آn snmj rɒ kh ɒz mʃtrj nɒzl ʃd پrstʃ mj‌knd؟ پs t͡ʃvn ɒjn ɒmvr rɒ ntvɒn ɒnkɒr krd، ʃmɒ mj‌bɒjd آrɒm bɒʃjd v hjt͡ʃ kɒrj bh tʔd͡ʒjl nknjd zjrɒ kh ɒjn ɒʃxɒs rɒ آvrdjd kh nh tɒrɒd͡ʒ knndɡɒn hjkl‌ɒnd v nh bh xdɒj ʃmɒ bdɡfth‌ɒnd پs hr ɡɒh djmjtrjvs v hmkɒrɒn vj ɒdʔɒjj br ksj dɒrnd، ɒjɒm ɣzɒ mɣrr ɒst vdɒvrɒn mʔjn hstnd bɒ hmdjɡr mrɒfʔh bɒjd krd v ɒɡr dr ɒmrj djɡr tɒlb t͡ʃjzj bɒʃjd، drmhkmh ʃrʔj fjsl xvɒhd پzjrft zjrɒdr xtrjm kh dr xsvs ftnh ɒmrvz ɒz mɒbɒzxvɒst ʃvd t͡ʃvnkh hjt͡ʃ ʔltj njst kh drbɒrh آn ʔzrj brɒj ɒjn ɒzdhɒm tvɒnjm آvrd»ɒjn rɒ ɡfth، d͡ʒmɒʔt rɒ mtfrɣ sɒxt ɒjn rɒ ɡfth، d͡ʒmɒʔt rɒ mtfrɣ sɒxt v bʔd ɒz tmɒm ʃdn ɒjn hŋɒmh، پvls ʃɒɡrdɒn rɒ tlbjdh، ɒjʃɒn rɒ vdɒʔ nmvdv bh smt mkɒdvnjh rvɒnh ʃd v dr آn nvɒhj sjr krdh، ɒhl آnd͡ʒɒ rɒ nsjht bsjɒr nmvd v bh jvnɒnstɒn آmd v sh mɒh tvɣf nmvd v t͡ʃvn ʔzm sfr svrjh krd v jhvdjɒn dr kmjn vj bvdnd، ɒrɒdh nmvd kh ɒz rɒh mkɒdvnjh mrɒd͡ʒʔt knd v svپɒtrs ɒz ɒhl bjrjh v ɒrstrxs vsknds ɒz ɒhl tsɒlvnjkj v ɣɒjvs ɒz drbh vtjmvtɒvs v ɒz mrdm آsjɒ tjxjks v trvfjms tɒ bh آsjɒ hmrɒh ɒv rftnd v ɒjʃɒn پjʃ rfth، drtrvɒs mntzr mɒ ʃdnd v ɒmɒ mɒ bʔd ɒz ɒjɒm ftjrɒz fjlپj bh kʃtj svɒr ʃdjm v bʔd ɒz پnd͡ʒ rvz bh trvɒs nzd ɒjʃɒn rsjdh، dr آnd͡ʒɒ hft rvzmɒndjm v dr ɒvl hfth t͡ʃvn ʃɒɡrdɒn bd͡ʒht ʃkstn nɒn d͡ʒmʔ ʃdnd v پvls dr frdɒj آn rvz ʔɒzm sfr bvd، brɒj ɒjʃɒn mvʔzh mj‌krd v sxn ɒv tɒnsf ʃb tvl kʃjd v dr bɒlɒxɒnh‌ɒj kh d͡ʒmʔ bvdjm t͡ʃrɒɣ bsjɒr bvd nɒɡɒh d͡ʒvɒnj kh ɒftjxs nɒm dɒʃt، nzd drjt͡ʃh nʃsth bvd kh xvɒb sŋjn ɒv rɒ drrbvd v t͡ʃvn پvls klɒm rɒtvl mj‌dɒd، xvɒb br ɒv mstvlj ɡʃth، ɒz tbɣh svm bh zjr ɒftɒd v ɒv rɒ mrdh brdɒʃtnd آŋɒh پvls bh zjr آmdh، br ɒv ɒftɒd v vj rɒ dr آɣvʃ kʃjdh، ɡft «mztrb mbɒʃjd zjrɒ kh d͡ʒɒn ɒvdr ɒvst» پs bɒlɒ rfth v nɒn rɒ ʃksth، xvrd v tɒ tlvʔ fd͡ʒr ɡftɡvj bsjɒr krdh، hmt͡ʃnjn rvɒnh ʃd v آn d͡ʒvɒn rɒ zndh brdnd vtslj ʔzjm پzjrftnd ɒmɒ mɒ bh kʃtj svɒr ʃdh، bh ɒsvs پjʃ rftjm kh ɒz آnd͡ʒɒ mj‌bɒjst پvls rɒ brdɒrjm kh bdjntvr ɣrɒr dɒd zjrɒ xvɒst tɒ آnd͡ʒɒ پjɒdh rvd پs t͡ʃvn dr ɒsvs ɒv rɒ mlɒɣɒt krdjm، ɒv rɒbrdɒʃth، bh mtjljnj آmdjm v ɒz آnd͡ʒɒ bh drjɒkvt͡ʃ krdh، rvz djɡr bh mɣɒbl xjvs rsjdjm vrvz svm bh sɒmvs vɒrd ʃdjm v dr trvd͡ʒjljvn tvɣf nmvdh، rvz djɡr vɒrd mjljts ʃdjm zjrɒ kh پvls ʔzjmt dɒʃt kh ɒz mhɒzj ɒfss bɡzrd، mbɒdɒ ɒv rɒ dr آsjɒ drŋj پjdɒʃvd، t͡ʃvnkh tʔd͡ʒjl mj‌krd kh ɒɡr mmkn ʃvd tɒrvz پntjkɒst bh ɒvrʃljm brsd پs ɒz mjljts bh ɒfss frstɒdh، kʃjʃɒn kljsɒ rɒ tlbjd v t͡ʃvn bh nzdʃ hɒzr ʃdnd، ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɡft «br ʃmɒ mʔlvm ɒst kh ɒz rvz ɒvl kh vɒrd آsjɒ ʃdm، t͡ʃtvr hr vɣt bɒ ʃmɒ bsrmj brdm؛ kh bɒ kmɒl frvtnj v ɒʃkhɒj bsjɒr vɒmthɒnhɒjj kh ɒz mkɒjd jhvd br mn ʔɒrz mj‌ʃd، bh xdmt xdɒvnd mʃɣvl mj‌bvdm vt͡ʃɡvnh t͡ʃjzj rɒ ɒz آnt͡ʃh brɒj ʃmɒ mfjd bɒʃd، drjɣ ndɒʃtm blkh آʃkɒrɒ v xɒnh bh xɒnh ʃmɒ rɒɒxbɒr v tʔljm mj‌nmvdm v bh jhvdjɒn vjvnɒnjɒn njz ɒz tvbh bh svj xdɒ v ɒjmɒn bh xdɒvnd mɒ ʔjsj msjh ʃhɒdt mj‌dɒdm vɒjnk ɒlɒn dr rvh bsth ʃdh، bh ɒvrʃljm mj‌rvm v ɒz آnt͡ʃh dr آnd͡ʒɒ br mn vɒɣʔ xvɒhd ʃd، ɒtlɒʔj ndɒrm d͡ʒz ɒjnkh rvh‌ɒlɣds dr hr ʃhrʃhɒdt dɒdh، mj‌ɡvjd kh bndhɒ v zhmɒt brɒjm mhjɒ ɒst ljkn ɒjn t͡ʃjzhɒ rɒ bh hjt͡ʃ mj‌ʃmɒrm، blkh d͡ʒɒn xvd rɒ ʔzjz nmj dɒrm tɒdvr xvd rɒ bh xvʃj bh ɒnd͡ʒɒm rsɒnm v آn xdmtj rɒ kh ɒz xdɒvnd ʔjsj jɒfth‌ɒm kh bh bʃɒrt fjz xdɒ ʃhɒdt dhm v ɒlhɒl ɒjn rɒmj dɒnm kh d͡ʒmjʔ ʃmɒ kh dr mjɒn ʃmɒ ɡʃth v bh mlkvt xdɒ mvʔzh krdh‌ɒm، djɡr rvj mrɒnxvɒhjd djd پs ɒmrvz ɒz ʃmɒ ɡvɒhj mj‌tlbm kh mn ɒz xvn hmh brj hstm، zjrɒkh ɒz ɒʔlɒm nmvdn ʃmɒ bh tmɒmj ɒrɒdh xdɒkvtɒhj nkrdm پs ŋɒh dɒrjd xvjʃtn vtmɒmj آn ɡlh rɒ kh rvh‌ɒlɣds ʃmɒ rɒ br آn ɒsɣf mɣrr frmvd tɒ kljsɒj xdɒ rɒ rʔɒjt knjdkh آn rɒ bh xvn xvd xrjdh ɒst zjrɒ mn mj‌dɒnm kh bʔd ɒz rhlt mn، ɡrɡɒn drndh bh mjɒn ʃmɒ drxvɒhnd آmd kh br ɡlh trhm nxvɒhnd nmvd، v ɒz mjɒn xvd ʃmɒ mrdmɒnj xvɒhndbrxɒst kh sxnɒn kd͡ʒ xvɒhnd ɡft tɒ ʃɒɡrdɒn rɒ dr ʔɣb xvd bkʃnd lhzɒ bjdɒr bɒʃjd v bh jɒd آvrjd kh mdt sh sɒl ʃbɒnh‌rvz ɒz tnbjh nmvdn hr jkj ɒz ʃmɒ bɒ ɒʃkhɒ bɒz nɒjstɒdm vɒlhɒl‌ɒj brɒdrɒn ʃmɒ rɒ bh xdɒ v bh klɒm fjz ɒvmj sپɒrm kh ɣɒdr ɒst ʃmɒ rɒ bnɒ knd v dr mjɒn d͡ʒmjʔ mɣdsjn ʃmɒ rɒ mjrɒs bxʃd nɣrh jɒtlɒ jɒ lbɒs ksj rɒ tmʔ nvrzjdm، blkh xvdmj dɒnjd kh hmjn dsthɒ dr rfʔ ɒhtjɒd͡ʒ xvd vrfɣɒjm xdmt mj‌krd ɒjn hmh rɒ bh ʃmɒnmvdm kh mj‌bɒjd t͡ʃnjn mʃɣt kʃjdh، zʔfɒ rɒdstɡjrj nmɒjjd v klɒm xdɒvnd ʔjsj rɒ bh‌xɒtr dɒrjd kh ɒv ɡft dɒdn ɒz ɡrftn frxndh‌trɒst» ɒjn bɡft v zɒnv zdh، bɒ hmɡj ɒjʃɒn dʔɒkrd v hmh ɡrjh bsjɒr krdnd v br ɡrdn پvls آvjxth، ɒv rɒ mj‌bvsjdndv bsjɒr mtɒlm ʃdndxsvs bd͡ʒht آn sxnj kh ɡft «bʔd ɒz ɒjn‌rvj mrɒ nxvɒhjd djd» پs ɒv rɒ tɒ bh kʃtj mʃɒjʔt nmvdnd v bsjɒr mtɒlm ʃdndxsvs bd͡ʒht آn sxnj kh ɡft «bʔd ɒz ɒjn‌rvj mrɒ nxvɒhjd djd» پs ɒv rɒ tɒ bh kʃtj mʃɒjʔt nmvdnd v t͡ʃvn ɒz ɒjʃɒn hd͡ʒrt nmvdjm، sfrdrjɒ krdjm v bh rɒh rɒst bh kvs آmdjm v rvz djɡr bh rvds v ɒz آnd͡ʒɒ bh پɒtrɒ vt͡ʃvn kʃtj‌ɒj jɒftjm kh ʔɒzm fjnjɣjh bvd، br آn svɒr ʃdh، kvt͡ʃ krdjm v ɣپrs rɒ bh nzrآvrdh، آn rɒ bh trf t͡ʃپ rhɒ krdh، bh svj svrjh rftjm v dr svr frvd آmdjm zjrɒ kh dr آnd͡ʒɒ mj‌bɒjst bɒr kʃtj rɒ frvd آvrnd پs ʃɒɡrdj t͡ʃnd پjdɒ krdh، hft rvz dr آnd͡ʒɒmɒndjm v ɒjʃɒn bh ɒlhɒm rvh bh پvls ɡftnd kh bh ɒvrʃljm nrvd v t͡ʃvn آn rvzhɒ rɒ bsr brdjm، rvɒnh ɡʃtjm v hmh bɒ znɒn v ɒtfɒl tɒ bjrvn ʃhr mɒrɒ mʃɒjʔt nmvdnd v bh knɒrh drjɒ zɒnv zdh، dʔɒkrdjm پs jkdjɡr rɒ vdɒʔ krdh، bh kʃtj svɒr ʃdjm v ɒjʃɒn bh xɒnh hɒj xvd brɡʃtnd v mɒ sfr drjɒ rɒ bh ɒnd͡ʒɒm rsɒnjdh، ɒz svr bh پtvlɒmjs rsjdjm v brɒdrɒn rɒ slɒm krdh، bɒɒjʃɒn jk rvz mɒndjm dr frdɒj آn rvz، ɒzآnd͡ʒɒ rvɒnh ʃdh، bh ɣjsrjh آmdjm v bh xɒnh fjlپs mbʃr kh jkj ɒz آn hft bvd drآmdh، nzdɒv mɒndjm v ɒv rɒ t͡ʃhɒr dxtr bɒkrh bvd kh nbvt mj‌krdnd v t͡ʃvn rvz t͡ʃnd dr آnd͡ʒɒ mɒndjm، nbj‌ɒj آɣɒbvs nɒm ɒz jhvdjh rsjd، v nzd mɒ آmdh، kmrbnd پvls rɒ ɡrfth v dsthɒ v پɒjhɒj xvd rɒbsth، ɡft «rvh‌ɒlɣds mj‌ɡvjd kh jhvdjɒn drɒvrʃljm sɒhb ɒjn kmrbnd rɒ bh hmjntvr bsth، ɒv rɒ bh‌dsthɒj ɒmt‌hɒ xvɒhnd sپrd» پs t͡ʃvn ɒjn rɒ ʃnjdjm، mɒ v ɒhl آnd͡ʒɒ ɒltmɒs nmvdjm kh bh ɒvrʃljm nrvd پvls d͡ʒvɒb dɒd «t͡ʃh mj‌knjd kh ɡrjɒn ʃdh، dl mrɒ mj‌ʃknjdzjrɒ mn mstʔdm kh nh fɣt ɣjd ʃvm blkh tɒ drɒvrʃljm bmjrm bh‌xɒtr nɒm xdɒvnd ʔjsj» t͡ʃvn ɒv nʃnjd xɒmvʃ ʃdh، ɡftjm «آnt͡ʃh ɒrɒdh xdɒvnd ɒst bʃvd» v bʔd ɒz آn ɒjɒm tdɒrk sfr djdh، mtvd͡ʒh ɒvrʃljm ʃdjm v tnj t͡ʃnd ɒz ʃɒɡrdɒn ɣjsrjh hmrɒh آmdh، mɒ rɒ nzd ʃxsj mnɒsvn nɒm kh ɒz ɒhl ɣپrs v ʃɒɡrd ɣdjmj bvd، آvrdnd tɒnzd ɒv mnzl nmɒjjm v t͡ʃvn vɒrd ɒvrʃljm ɡʃtjm، brɒdrɒn mɒ rɒbh xʃnvdj پzjrftnd v dr rvz djɡr، پvls mɒ rɒ brdɒʃth، nzd jʔɣvb rft v hmh kʃjʃɒn hɒzr ʃdnd پs ɒjʃɒn rɒ slɒm krdh، آnt͡ʃh xdɒ bvsjlh xdmt ɒv dr mjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ bh ʔml آvrdh bvd، mfslɒ ɡft ɒjʃɒn t͡ʃvn ɒjn rɒʃnjdnd، xdɒ rɒ tmd͡ʒjd nmvdh، bh vj ɡftnd «ɒj brɒdr، آɡɒh hstj kh t͡ʃnd hzɒrhɒ ɒz jhvdjɒn ɒjmɒn آvrdh‌ɒnd v d͡ʒmjʔ dr ʃrjʔt ɣjvrnd vdrbɒrh tv ʃnjdh‌ɒnd kh hmh jhvdjɒn rɒ kh dr mjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ mj‌bɒʃnd، tʔljm mj‌dhj kh ɒz mvsj ɒnhrɒf nmɒjnd v mj‌ɡvjj nbɒjd ɒvlɒd xvd rɒmxtvn sɒxt v bh snn rftɒr nmvd پs t͡ʃh bɒjd krd؟ ɒlbth d͡ʒmɒʔt d͡ʒmʔ xvɒhnd ʃd zjrɒxvɒhnd ʃnjd kh tv آmdh‌ɒj پs آnt͡ʃh bh tvɡvjjm bh ʔml آvr t͡ʃhɒr mrd nzd mɒ hstnd kh brɒjʃɒn nzrj hst پs ɒjʃɒn rɒ brdɒʃth، xvd rɒ bɒ ɒjʃɒn tthjr nmɒ v xrd͡ʒ ɒjʃɒn rɒ bdh kh sr xvd rɒ btrɒʃnd tɒ hmh bdɒnnd kh آnt͡ʃh drbɒrh tv ʃnjdh‌ɒnd ɒslj ndɒrd blkh xvd njz drmhɒfzt ʃrjʔt slvk mj‌nmɒjj ljkn drbɒrh آnɒnj kh ɒz ɒmt‌hɒ ɒjmɒn آvrdh‌ɒnd، mɒfrstɒdjm v hkm krdjm kh ɒz ɣrbɒnj hɒj bt vxvn v hjvɒnɒt xfh ʃdh v znɒ پrhjz nmɒjnd پs پvls آn ɒʃxɒs rɒ brdɒʃth، rvz djɡr bɒ ɒjʃɒn thɒrt krdh، bh hjkl drآmd v ɒz tkmjl ɒjɒm thɒrt ɒtlɒʔ dɒd tɒ hdjh‌ɒj brɒj hr jk ɒzɒjʃɒn bɡzrɒnnd v t͡ʃvn hft rvz nzdjk bh ɒnd͡ʒɒm rsjd، jhvdj‌ɒj t͡ʃnd ɒz آsjɒ ɒv rɒ dr hjkl djdh، tmɒmj ɣvm rɒ bh ʃvrʃ آvrdnd v dst br ɒvɒndɒxth، frjɒd brآvrdnd kh «ɒj mrdɒn ɒsrɒئjlj، ɒmdɒd knjd ɒjn ɒst آn ks kh brxlɒf ɒmt v ʃrjʔt v ɒjn mkɒn dr hr d͡ʒɒhmh rɒ tʔljm mj‌dhd blkh jvnɒnj‌ɒj t͡ʃnd rɒ njz bh hjkl drآvrdh، ɒjn mkɒn mɣds rɒ mlvs nmvdh ɒst» zjrɒ ɣbl ɒz آn trvfjms ɒfssj rɒ bɒvj dr ʃhr djdh bvdnd v mznh dɒʃtnd kh پvls ɒv rɒ bh hjkl آvrdh bvd پs tmɒmj ʃhr bh hrkt آmd v xlɣ ɒzdhɒm krdh، پvls rɒ ɡrftnd v ɒz hjkl bjrvn kʃjdnd v fj ɒlfvr drhɒ rɒ bstnd v t͡ʃvn ɣsdɣtl ɒv mj‌krdnd، xbr bh mjn bɒʃj sپɒh rsjd kh «tmɒmj ɒvrʃljm bh ʃvrʃ آmdh ɒst» ɒvbj drŋ sپɒh v jvzbɒʃj‌hɒ rɒ brdɒʃth، br srɒjʃɒn tɒxt پs ɒjʃɒn bh md͡ʒrd djdn mjn bɒʃj v sپɒhjɒn، ɒz zdn پvls dst brdɒʃtnd t͡ʃvn mjn bɒʃj rsjd، ɒv rɒ ɡrfth، frmɒn dɒd tɒ ɒv rɒ bdv znd͡ʒjr bbndnd v پrsjd kh «ɒjn kjst v t͡ʃh krdh ɒst؟» ɒmɒ bʔzj ɒz آn ɡrvh bh sxnj v bʔzj bh sxnj djɡr sdɒ mj‌krdnd v t͡ʃvn ɒv bh‌sbb ʃvrʃ، hɣjɣt ɒmr rɒntvɒnst fhmjd، frmvd tɒ ɒv rɒ bh ɣlʔh bjɒvrnd v t͡ʃvn bh zjnh rsjd، ɒtfɒɣ ɒftɒd kh lʃkrjɒn bh‌sbb ɒzdhɒm mrdm ɒv rɒ brɡrftnd، zjrɒ ɡrvhj ksjr ɒz xlɣ ɒz ʔɣb ɒv ɒftɒdh، sdɒ mj‌zdnd kh «ɒvrɒ hlɒk kn» t͡ʃvn nzdjk ʃd kh پvls rɒ bh ɣlʔh drآvrnd، ɒv bh mjn bɒʃj ɡft آjɒ ɒd͡ʒɒzt ɒst kh bh tv t͡ʃjzj ɡvjm؟ ɡft «آjɒ zbɒn jvnɒnj rɒmj dɒnj؟ mɡr tv آn msrj njstj kh t͡ʃndj پjʃ ɒz ɒjn ftnh brɒŋjxth، t͡ʃhɒr hzɒr mrd ɣtɒl rɒbh bjɒbɒn brd؟» پvls ɡft «mn mrd jhvdj hstm ɒz trsvs ɣjljɣjh، ʃhrj kh bj‌nɒm vnʃɒn njst v xvɒhʃ آn dɒrm kh mrɒ ɒzn frmɒjj tɒ bh mrdm sxn ɡvjm»t͡ʃvn ɒzn jɒft، br zjnh ɒjstɒdh، bh‌dst xvd bh mrdm ɒʃɒrh krd؛ v t͡ʃvn آrɒmj kɒml پjdɒ ʃd، ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh zbɒn ʔbrɒnj mxɒtb sɒxth، ɡft t͡ʃvn ɒzn jɒft، br zjnh ɒjstɒdh، bh‌dst xvd bh mrdm ɒʃɒrh krd؛ v t͡ʃvn آrɒmj kɒml پjdɒ ʃd، ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh zbɒn ʔbrɒnj mxɒtb sɒxth، ɡft «ɒj brɒdrɒn ʔzjz v پdrɒn، hd͡ʒtj rɒ kh ɒlɒn پjʃ ʃmɒ mj‌آvrm bʃnvjd» t͡ʃvn ʃnjdnd kh bh zbɒn ʔbrɒnj bɒ ɒjʃɒn tklm mj‌knd، bjʃtr xɒmvʃ ʃdnd پs ɡft «mn mrd jhvdj hstm، mtvld trsvs ɣjljɣjh، ɒmɒ trbjt jɒfth bvdm dr ɒjn ʃhr drxdmt ɣmɒlɒئjl v dr dɣɒjɣ ʃrjʔt ɒd͡ʒdɒdmtʔlm ʃdh، drbɒrh xdɒ ɣjvr mj‌bvdm، t͡ʃnɒnkh hmɡj ʃmɒ ɒmrvz mj‌bɒʃjd v ɒjn trjɣt rɒ tɒbh ɣtl mzɒhm mj‌bvdm bh nvʔj kh mrdɒn v znɒn rɒbnd nhɒdh، bh zndɒn mj‌ɒndɒxtm، t͡ʃnɒnkh rئjs khnh v tmɒm ɒhl ʃvrɒ bh mn ʃhɒdt mj‌dhnd kh ɒz ɒjʃɒn nɒmh‌hɒ brɒj brɒdrɒn ɡrfth، ʔɒzm dmʃɣ ʃdm tɒ آnɒnj rɒ njz kh dr آnd͡ʒɒ bɒʃnd ɣjd krdh، bh ɒvrʃljm آvrm tɒ szɒ jɒbnd v dr ɒsnɒj rɒh، t͡ʃvn nzdjk bh dmʃɣ rsjdm، ɣrjb bh zhr nɒɡɒh nvrj ʔzjm ɒz آsmɒn ɡrd mn drxʃjd پs br zmjn ɒftɒdh، hɒtfj rɒ ʃnjdm kh bh mn mj‌ɡvjd ɒj ʃɒvl، ɒj ʃɒvl، t͡ʃrɒ br mn d͡ʒfɒ mj‌knj؟ mn d͡ʒvɒb dɒdm xdɒvndɒ tv kjstj؟ ɒv mrɒ ɡft mn آn ʔjsj nɒsrj hstm kh tv br vj d͡ʒfɒmj knj v hmrɒhɒn mn nvr rɒ djdh، trsɒn ɡʃtnd vlj آvɒz آn ks rɒ kh bɒ mn sxn ɡft nʃnjdnd ɡftm xdɒvndɒ t͡ʃh knm؟ xdɒvndmrɒ ɡft brxɒsth، bh dmʃɣ brv kh dr آnd͡ʒɒ tv rɒmtlʔ xvɒhnd sɒxt ɒz آnt͡ʃh brɒjt mɣrr ɒst kh bknj پs t͡ʃvn ɒz stvt آn nvr nɒbjnɒɡʃtm، rfɣɒjm dst mrɒ ɡrfth، bh dmʃɣ rsɒnjdnd آŋɒh ʃxsj mtɣj bhsb ʃrjʔt، hnɒnjɒ nɒm kh nzd hmh jhvdjɒn sɒkn آnd͡ʒɒ njknɒm bvd، bh nzd mn آmdh v ɒjstɒdh، bh mn ɡft ɒj brɒdr ʃɒvl، bjnɒ ʃv kh dr hmɒn sɒʔt br vj ŋrjstm ɒv ɡft xdɒj پdrɒn mɒ tv rɒ brɡzjd tɒ ɒrɒdh ɒv rɒ bdɒnj v آn ʔɒdl rɒ bbjnj v ɒz zbɒnʃ sxnj bʃnvj zjrɒɒz آnt͡ʃh djdh v ʃnjdh‌ɒj nzd d͡ʒmjʔ mrdm ʃɒhd brɒv xvɒhj ʃd v hɒl t͡ʃrɒ tɒxjr mj‌nmɒjj؟ brxjz v tʔmjd bɡjr v nɒm xdɒvnd rɒ xvɒndh، xvd rɒ ɒz ɡnɒhɒnt ɣsl dh v t͡ʃvn bh ɒvrʃljm brɡʃth، dr hjkl dʔɒ mj‌krdm، bjxvdʃdm پs ɒv rɒ djdm kh bh mn mj‌ɡvjd bʃtɒb v ɒz ɒvrʃljm bh zvdj rvɒnh ʃv zjrɒ kh ʃhɒdt tv rɒ dr hɣ mn nxvɒhnd پzjrft mn ɡftm xdɒvndɒ، ɒjʃɒn mj‌dɒnnd kh mn dr hrknjsh mvmnjn tv rɒ hbs krdh، mj‌zdm؛ vhŋɒmj kh xvn ʃhjd tv ɒstjfɒn rɒ mj‌rjxtnd، mn njz ɒjstɒdh، rzɒ bdɒn dɒdm v d͡ʒɒmh hɒj ɣɒtlɒn ɒv rɒ ŋɒh mj‌dɒʃtm ɒv bh mn ɡft rvɒnh ʃvzjrɒ kh mn tv rɒ bh svj ɒmt hɒj bʔjdmj frstm» پs tɒ ɒjn sxn bdv ɡvʃ ɡrftnd؛ آŋɒh آvɒz xvd rɒ blnd krdh، ɡftnd «t͡ʃnjn ʃxs rɒ ɒzrvj zmjn brdɒr kh zndh mɒndn ɒv d͡ʒɒjz njst» v t͡ʃvn ɣvɣɒ nmvdh v d͡ʒɒmh hɒj xvd rɒɒfʃɒndh، xɒk bh hvɒ mj‌rjxtnd، mjn bɒʃj frmɒn dɒd tɒ ɒv rɒ bh ɣlʔh drآvrdnd v frmvd kh ɒvrɒ bh tɒzjɒnh ɒmthɒn knnd tɒ bfhmd kh bh t͡ʃh sbb ɒjnɣdr br ɒv frjɒd mj‌krdnd v vɣtj kh ɒv rɒ bh rjsmɒnhɒ mj‌bstnd، پvls bh jvzbɒʃj‌ɒj kh hɒzr bvd ɡft «آjɒ br ʃmɒ d͡ʒɒjz ɒst kh mrdj rvmj rɒ bj‌hd͡ʒt hm tɒzjɒnh znjd؟» t͡ʃvn jvzbɒʃj ɒjn rɒ ʃnjd، nzd mjn bɒʃj rfth، ɒv rɒxbr dɒdh، ɡft «t͡ʃh mj‌xvɒhj bknj zjrɒ ɒjn ʃxs rvmj ɒst؟» پs mjn bɒʃj آmdh، bh vj ɡft «mrɒ bɡv kh tv rvmj hstj؟» ɡft «blj» mjn bɒʃj d͡ʒvɒb dɒd «mn ɒjn hɣvɣ rɒbh mblɣj xtjr thsjl krdm» پvls ɡft «ɒmɒmn dr آn mvlvd ʃdm» dr sɒʔt آnɒnj kh ɣsd tftjʃ ɒv dɒʃtnd، dst ɒz ɒv brdɒʃtnd vmjn bɒʃj trsɒn ɡʃt t͡ʃvn fhmjd kh rvmj ɒst ɒz آn sbb kh ɒv rɒ bsth bvdbɒmdɒdɒn t͡ʃvn xvɒst drst bfhmd kh jhvdjɒn bh t͡ʃh ʔlt mdʔj ɒv mj‌bɒʃnd، ɒv rɒ ɒz zndɒn bjrvn آvrdh، frmvd tɒ rvsɒj khnh v tmɒmj ɒhl ʃvrɒhɒzr ʃvnd v پvls rɒ پɒjjn آvrdh، dr mjɒn ɒjʃɒn brپɒ dɒʃt bɒmdɒdɒn t͡ʃvn xvɒst drst bfhmd kh jhvdjɒn bh t͡ʃh ʔlt mdʔj ɒv mj‌bɒʃnd، ɒv rɒ ɒz zndɒn bjrvn آvrdh، frmvd tɒ rvsɒj khnh v tmɒmj ɒhl ʃvrɒhɒzr ʃvnd v پvls rɒ پɒjjn آvrdh، dr mjɒn ɒjʃɒn brپɒ dɒʃt پs پvls bh ɒhl ʃvrɒ njk ŋrjsth، ɡft «ɒj brɒdrɒn، mn tɒ ɒmrvz bɒ kmɒl zmjr sɒlh dr xdmt xdɒ rftɒr krdh‌ɒm» آŋɒh hnɒnjɒ، rئjs khnh، hɒzrɒn rɒ frmvdtɒ bh dhɒnʃ znnd پvls bdv ɡft «xdɒ tv rɒxvɒhd zd، ɒj djvɒr sfjdʃdh tv nʃsth‌ɒj tɒmrɒ brhsb ʃrjʔt dɒvrj knj v bh zdʃrjʔt hkm bh zdnm mj‌knj؟» hɒzrɒn ɡftnd «آjɒ rئjs khnh xdɒ rɒ dʃnɒm mj‌dhj؟» پvls ɡft «ɒj brɒdrɒn، ndɒnstm kh rئjs khnh ɒst، zjrɒ mktvb ɒst hɒkm ɣvm xvd rɒbd mɡvj» t͡ʃvn پvls fhmjd kh bʔzj ɒz sdvɣjɒn vbʔzj ɒz frjsjɒnnd، dr md͡ʒls ndɒ dr‌dɒd kh «ɒj brɒdrɒn، mn frjsj، پsr frjsj hstm v brɒj ɒmjd v ɣjɒmt mrdɡɒn ɒz mn bɒzپrs mj‌ʃvd» t͡ʃvn ɒjn rɒ ɡft، dr mjɒn frjsjɒn v sdvɣjɒn mnɒzʔh brپɒ ʃd v d͡ʒmɒʔt dv frɣh ʃdnd، zjrɒkh sdvɣjɒn mnkr ɣjɒmt v mlɒئkh v ɒrvɒh hstnd ljkn frjsjɒn ɣɒئl bh hr dv پs ɣvɣɒj ʔzjm brپɒ ʃd v kɒtbɒn ɒz frɣh frjsjɒn brxɒsth mxɒsmh nmvdh، mj‌ɡftnd kh «dr ɒjn ʃxs hjt͡ʃ bdj njɒfth‌ɒjm v ɒɡr rvhj jɒ frʃth‌ɒj bɒ ɒv sxn ɡfth bɒʃd bɒ xdɒ d͡ʒŋ nbɒjdnmvd» v t͡ʃvn mnɒzʔh zjɒdtr mj‌ʃd، mjn bɒʃj trsjd kh mbɒdɒ پvls rɒ bdrnd پs frmvd tɒsپɒhjɒn پɒjjn آmdh، ɒv rɒ ɒz mjɒnʃɒn brdɒʃth، bh ɣlʔh drآvrdnd v dr ʃb hmɒn rvz xdɒvnd nzd ɒv آmdh، ɡft «ɒj پvls xɒtr d͡ʒmʔ bɒʃ zjrɒ t͡ʃnɒnkh drɒvrʃljm dr hɣ mn ʃhɒdt dɒdj، hmt͡ʃnjn bɒjddr rvm njz ʃhɒdt dhj» v t͡ʃvn rvz ʃd، jhvdjɒn bɒ jkdjɡr ʔhdbsth، br xvjʃtn lʔn krdnd kh tɒ پvls rɒnkʃnd، nxvrnd v nnvʃnd v آnɒnj kh drbɒrh ɒjn، hmɣsm ʃdnd، zjɒdh ɒz t͡ʃhl nfr bvdnd ɒjnhɒ nzd rvsɒj khnh v mʃɒjx rfth، ɡftnd «br xvjʃtn lʔnt sxt krdjm kh tɒ پvls rɒnkʃjm t͡ʃjzj nt͡ʃʃjm پs ɒlɒn ʃmɒ bɒ ɒhl ʃvrɒ، mjn bɒʃj rɒ ɒʔlɒm knjd kh ɒv rɒ nzd ʃmɒbjɒvrd kh ɡvjɒ ɒrɒdh dɒrjd dr ɒhvɒl ɒv njkvtrthɣjɣ nmɒjjd؛ v mɒ hɒzr hstjm kh ɣbl ɒzrsjdnʃ ɒv rɒ bkʃjm» ɒmɒ xvɒhrzɒdh پvls ɒz kmjn ɒjʃɒn ɒtlɒʔ jɒfth، rft v bh ɣlʔh drآmdh، پvls rɒ آɡɒhɒnjd پvls jkj ɒzjvzbɒʃjɒn rɒ tlbjdh، ɡft «ɒjn d͡ʒvɒn rɒ nzdmjn bɒʃj bbr zjrɒ xbrj dɒrd kh bh ɒv bɡvjd» پs ɒv rɒ brdɒʃth، bh hzvr mjn bɒʃj rsɒnjdh، ɡft «پvls zndɒnj mrɒ tlbjdh، xvɒhʃ krd kh ɒjn d͡ʒvɒn rɒ bh xdmt tv bjɒvrm، zjrɒ t͡ʃjzj dɒrdkh bh tv ʔrz knd» پs mjn bɒʃj dstʃ rɒɡrfth، bh xlvt brd v پrsjd «t͡ʃh t͡ʃjz ɒst kh mj xvɒhj bh mn xbr dhj؟» ʔrz krd «jhvdjɒn mtfɣ ʃdh‌ɒnd kh ɒz tv xvɒhʃ knnd tɒپvls rɒ frdɒ bh md͡ʒls ʃvrɒ drآvrj kh ɡvjɒɒrɒdh dɒrnd dr hɣ ɒv zjɒdtr tftjʃ nmɒjnd پs xvɒhʃ ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒd͡ʒɒbt mfrmɒ zjrɒ kh bjʃtr ɒz t͡ʃhl nfr ɒz ɒjʃɒn dr kmjn vj‌ɒnd v bh svɡnd ʔhd bsth‌ɒnd kh tɒ ɒv rɒ nkʃnd t͡ʃjzj nxvrnd v njɒʃɒmnd v ɒlɒn mstʔd v mntzr vʔdh tv mj‌bɒʃnd» mjn bɒʃj آn d͡ʒvɒn rɒ mrxs frmvdh، ɣdɣn nmvd kh «bh hjt͡ʃ‌ks mɡv kh mrɒ ɒzɒjn rɒz mtlʔ sɒxtj» پs dv nfr ɒz jvzbɒʃjɒn rɒ tlbjdh، frmvdkh «dvjst sپɒhj v hftɒd svɒr v dvjst njzh‌dɒr dr sɒʔt svm ɒz ʃb hɒzr sɒzjd tɒ bh ɣjsrjh brvnd؛ v mrkbj hɒzr knjd tɒ پvls rɒ svɒr krdh، ɒv rɒ bh slɒmtj bh nzd fjlks vɒlj brsɒnnd» v nɒmh‌ɒj bdjn mzmvn nvʃt «klvdjvs ljsjɒs، bh vɒlj ɡrɒmj fjlks slɒm mj‌rsɒnd jhvdjɒn ɒjn ʃxs rɒ ɡrfth، ɣsd ɣtl ɒv dɒʃtnd پs bɒ sپɒh rfth، ɒv rɒ ɒzɒjʃɒn ɡrftm، t͡ʃvn drjɒft krdh bvdm kh rvmj ɒst v t͡ʃvn xvɒstm bfhmm kh bh t͡ʃh sbb brvj ʃkɒjt mj‌knnd، ɒv rɒ bh md͡ʒls ɒjʃɒn drآvrdm پs jɒftm kh dr msɒئl ʃrjʔt xvd ɒz ɒv ʃkɒjt mj‌dɒrnd، vlj hjt͡ʃ ʃkvh‌ɒj mstvd͡ʒb ɣtl jɒ bnd nmj dɒrnd v t͡ʃvn xbrjɒftm kh jhvdjɒn ɣsd kmjn sɒzj brɒj ɒv dɒrnd، bj‌drŋ ɒv rɒ nzd tv frstɒdm v mdʔjɒn ɒv rɒ njzfrmvdm tɒ dr hzvr tv br ɒv ɒdʔɒ nmɒjndvɒlslɒm» پs sپɒhjɒn t͡ʃnɒnkh mɒmvr ʃdnd، پvls rɒ dr ʃb brdɒʃth، bh ɒntjپɒtrjs rsɒnjdnd v bɒmdɒdɒn svɒrɒn rɒ ɡzɒʃth kh bɒ ɒv brvnd، xvd bh ɣlʔh brɡʃtnd v t͡ʃvn ɒjʃɒn vɒrd ɣjsrjh ʃdnd، nɒmh rɒ bh vɒlj sپrdnd v پvls rɒ njz nzd ɒvhɒzr sɒxtnd پs vɒlj nɒmh rɒ mlɒhzh frmvdh، پrsjd kh ɒz kdɒm vlɒjt ɒst t͡ʃvn dɒnst kh ɒz ɣjljɣjh ɒst،ɡft «t͡ʃvn mdʔjɒn tv hɒzr ʃvnd، sxn tv rɒ xvɒhm ʃnjd» v frmvd tɒ ɒv rɒ dr srɒj hjrvdjs ŋɒh dɒrnd ɡft «t͡ʃvn mdʔjɒn tv hɒzr ʃvnd، sxn tv rɒ xvɒhm ʃnjd» v frmvd tɒ ɒv rɒ dr srɒj hjrvdjs ŋɒh dɒrnd v bʔd ɒz پnd͡ʒ rvz، hnɒnjɒj rئjs khnh bɒ mʃɒjx v xtjbj trtls nɒm rsjdndv ʃkɒjt ɒz پvls nzd vɒlj آvrdnd v t͡ʃvn ɒvrɒ ɒhzɒr frmvd، trtls آɣɒz ɒdʔɒ nmvdh، ɡft t͡ʃvn ɒz vd͡ʒvd tv dr آsɒjʃ kɒml hstjm vɒhsɒnɒt ʔzjmh ɒz tdɒbjr tv bdjn ɣvm rsjdh ɒst، ɒj fjlks ɡrɒmj، dr hr d͡ʒɒ v dr hrvɣt ɒjn rɒ dr kmɒl ʃkrɡzɒrj mj‌پzjrjm vljkn tɒ tv rɒ zjɒdh msdʔ nʃvm، mstdʔj hstm kh ɒz rɒh nvɒzʃ mxtsr ʔrz mɒ rɒ bʃnvj zjrɒ kh ɒjn ʃxs rɒ mfsd v ftnh ɒŋjz jɒfth‌ɒjm dr mjɒn hmh jhvdjɒn sɒkn rbʔ mskvn v ɒzپjʃvɒjɒn bdʔt nsɒrj v t͡ʃvn ɒv xvɒst hjkl rɒ mlvs sɒzd، ɒv rɒ ɡrfth، ɒrɒdh dɒʃtjm kh bh ɣɒnvn ʃrjʔt xvd br ɒv dɒvrj nmɒjjm vlj ljsjɒs mjn bɒʃj آmdh، ɒv rɒ bh zvr bsjɒr ɒzdsthɒj mɒ bjrvn آvrd، v frmvd tɒ mdʔjɒnʃ nzd tv hɒzr ʃvnd؛ v ɒz ɒv bʔd ɒz ɒmthɒn mj‌tvɒnj dɒnst hɣjɣt hmh ɒjn ɒmvrj kh mɒ brɒv ɒdʔɒ mj‌knjm» v jhvdjɒn njz bɒ ɒv mtfɣ ʃdh ɡftnd kh t͡ʃnjn ɒst t͡ʃvn vɒlj bh پvls ɒʃɒrh nmvd kh sxn bɡvjd، ɒv d͡ʒvɒb dɒd «ɒz آn rv kh mj‌dɒnm sɒlhɒj bsjɒr ɒst kh tv hɒkm ɒjn ɣvm mj‌bɒʃj، bh xʃnvdj vɒfr hd͡ʒt drbɒrh xvd mj‌آvrm zjrɒ tv mj‌tvɒnj dɒnst kh zjɒdh ɒz dvɒzdh rvz njst kh mn brɒj ʔbɒdt bh ɒvrʃljm rftm، v mrɒ njɒftnd kh dr hjkl bɒ ksj mbɒhsh knm vnh dr knɒjs jɒ ʃhr‌kh xlɣ rɒ bh ʃvrʃ آvrm v hm آnt͡ʃh ɒlɒn br mn ɒdʔɒ mj‌knnd، nmj tvɒnndɒsbɒt nmɒjnd ljkn ɒjn rɒ nzd tv ɒɣrɒr mj‌knm kh bh trjɣtj kh bdʔt mj‌ɡvjnd، xdɒj پdrɒn rɒ ʔbɒdt mj‌knm v bh آnt͡ʃh dr tvrɒt v ɒnbjɒmktvb ɒst mʔtɣdm، v bh xdɒ ɒmjdvɒrm t͡ʃnɒnkh ɒjʃɒn njz ɣbvl dɒrnd kh ɣjɒmt mrdɡɒn ɒzʔɒdlɒn v zɒlmɒn njz xvɒhd ʃd v xvd rɒ drɒjn ɒmr rjɒzt mj‌dhm tɒ پjvsth zmjr xvd rɒbh svj xdɒ v mrdm bj‌lɣzʃ ŋɒh dɒrm v bʔdɒz sɒlhɒj bsjɒr آmdm tɒ sdɣɒt v hdɒjɒ brɒj ɣvm xvd bjɒvrm v dr ɒjn ɒmvr t͡ʃnd nfr ɒzjhvdjɒn آsjɒ mrɒ dr hjkl mthr jɒftnd bdvn hŋɒmh jɒ ʃvrʃj v ɒjʃɒn mj‌bɒjst njz drɒjnd͡ʒɒ nzd tv hɒzr ʃvnd tɒ ɒɡr hrfj br mn dɒrndɒdʔɒ knnd jɒ ɒjnɒn xvd bɡvjnd ɒɡr ɡnɒhj ɒzmn jɒftnd vɣtj kh dr hzvr ɒhl ʃvrɒ ɒjstɒdh bvdm، mɡr آn jk sxn kh dr mjɒn ɒjʃɒn ɒjstɒdh، bdɒn ndɒ krdm kh drbɒrh ɣjɒmt mrdɡɒn ɒzmn ɒmrvz پjʃ ʃmɒ bɒzپrs mj‌ʃvd» آŋɒh fjlks t͡ʃvn ɒz trjɣt njkvtrآɡɒhj dɒʃt، ɒmr ɒjʃɒn rɒ tɒxjr ɒndɒxth، ɡft «t͡ʃvn ljsjɒs mjn bɒʃj آjd، hɣjɣt ɒmr ʃmɒ rɒ drjɒft xvɒhm krd» پs jvzbɒʃj rɒ frmɒn dɒd tɒ پvls rɒ ŋɒh dɒrd v ɒv rɒ آzɒdj dhd vɒhdj ɒz xvjʃɒnʃ rɒ ɒz xdmt v mlɒɣɒt ɒvmnʔ nknd v bʔd ɒz rvzj t͡ʃnd fjlks bɒ zvd͡ʒh xvd drslɒ kh znj jhvdj bvd، آmdh پvls rɒtlbjdh، sxn ɒv rɒ drbɒrh ɒjmɒn msjh ʃnjd vt͡ʃvn ɒv drbɒrh ʔdɒlt v پrhjzkɒrj vdɒvrj آjndh xtɒb mj‌krd، fjlks trsɒn ɡʃth، d͡ʒvɒb dɒd kh «ɒlhɒl brv t͡ʃvn frst knm tv rɒbɒz xvɒhm xvɒnd» v njz ɒmjd mj‌dɒʃt kh پvls ɒv rɒ nɣdj bdhd tɒ ɒv rɒ آzɒd sɒzd v ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht mkrr vj rɒ xvɒsth، bɒ ɒv ɡftɡv mj‌krdɒmɒ bʔd ɒz ɒnɣzɒj dv sɒl، پvrkjvs fstvs، xljfh vlɒjt fjlks ʃd v fjlks t͡ʃvn xvɒst br jhvd mnt nhd، پvls rɒ dr zndɒn ɡzɒʃt ɒmɒ bʔd ɒz ɒnɣzɒj dv sɒl، پvrkjvs fstvs، xljfh vlɒjt fjlks ʃd v fjlks t͡ʃvn xvɒst br jhvd mnt nhd، پvls rɒ dr zndɒn ɡzɒʃt پs t͡ʃvn fstvs bh vlɒjt xvdrsjd، bʔd ɒz sh rvz ɒz ɣjsrjh bh ɒvrʃljm rft v rئjs khnh v ɒkɒbr jhvd nzd ɒvbr پvls ɒdʔɒ krdnd v bdv ɒltmɒs nmvdh، mntj br vj xvɒstnd tɒ ɒv rɒ bh ɒvrʃljm bfrstd v drkmjn bvdnd kh ɒv rɒ dr rɒh bkʃnd ɒmɒ fstvs d͡ʒvɒb dɒd kh «پvls rɒ bɒjd dr ɣjsrjh ŋɒh dɒʃt»، zjrɒ xvd ɒrɒdh dɒʃt bh zvdj آnd͡ʒɒbrvd v ɡft «پs ksɒnj ɒz ʃmɒ kh mj‌tvɒnndhmrɒh bjɒjnd tɒ ɒɡr t͡ʃjzj dr ɒjn ʃxs jɒft ʃvd، br ɒv ɒdʔɒ nmɒjnd» v t͡ʃvn bjʃtr ɒz dh rvz dr mjɒn ɒjʃɒn tvɣf krdh bvd، bh ɣjsrjh آmd v bɒmdɒdɒn br msndhkvmt brآmdh، frmvd tɒ پvls rɒ hɒzr sɒznd t͡ʃvn ɒv hɒzr ʃd، jhvdjɒnj kh ɒz ɒvrʃljm آmdh bvdnd، bh ɡrd ɒv ɒjstɒdh، ʃkɒjthɒj bsjɒr vɡrɒn br پvls آvrdnd vlj ɒsbɒt ntvɒnstnd krd ɒv d͡ʒvɒb dɒd kh «nh bh ʃrjʔt jhvd v nh bh hjkl v nh bh ɣjsr hjt͡ʃ ɡnɒh krdh‌ɒm» ɒmɒ t͡ʃvn fstvs xvɒst br jhvd mnt nhd، dr d͡ʒvɒb پvls ɡft «آjɒ mj‌xvɒhj bh ɒvrʃljm آjj tɒ drآnd͡ʒɒ dr ɒjn ɒmvr bh hzvr mn hkm ʃvd؟» پvls ɡft «dr mhkmh ɣjsr ɒjstɒdh‌ɒm kh drآnd͡ʒɒ mj‌bɒjd mhɒkmh mn bʃvd bh jhvd hjt͡ʃ zlmj nkrdh‌ɒm، t͡ʃnɒnkh tv njz njkv mj‌dɒnj پs hr ɡɒh zlmj jɒ ʔmlj mstvd͡ʒb ɣtl krdh bɒʃm، ɒz mrdn drjɣ ndɒrm ljkn ɒɡr hjt͡ʃ‌jk ɒzɒjn ʃkɒjthɒjj kh ɒjnhɒ br mn mj‌آvrnd ɒslj ndɒrd، ksj nmj tvɒnd mrɒ bh ɒjʃɒn sپɒrd bh ɣjsr rfʔ dʔvj mj‌knm» آŋɒh fstvs bʔdɒz mkɒlmh bɒ ɒhl ʃvrɒ d͡ʒvɒb dɒd «آjɒ bh ɣjsrrfʔ dʔvj krdj؟ bh hzvr ɣjsr xvɒhj rft» v bʔd ɒz mrvr ɒjɒm t͡ʃnd، ɒɣrjپɒs پɒdʃɒh vbrnjkj brɒj thjt fstvs bh ɣjsrjh آmdnd v t͡ʃvn rvzj bsjɒr dr آnd͡ʒɒ tvɣf nmvdnd، fstvs brɒj پɒdʃɒh، mɣdmh پvls rɒ bjɒn krdh، ɡft «mrdj ɒst kh fjlks ɒv rɒ dr bnd ɡzɒʃth ɒst، kh drbɒrh ɒv vɣtj kh bh ɒvrʃljm آmdm، rvsɒj khnh v mʃɒjx jhvd mrɒ xbr dɒdnd vxvɒhʃ nmvdnd kh br ɒv dɒvrj ʃvd drd͡ʒvɒb ɒjʃɒn ɡftm kh rvmjɒn rɒ rsm njst kh ɒhdj rɒ bsپɒrnd ɣbl ɒz آnkh mdʔj ʔljh mdʔjɒn xvd rɒ rvbrv ʃvd v ɒv rɒ frst dhnd kh njɒvrdnd blkh msɒlh‌ɒj t͡ʃnd br ɒv ɒjrɒd krdnd drbɒrh mzhb xvd v dr hɣ ʔjsj nɒmj kh mrdh ɒst v پvls mj‌ɡvjd kh ɒv zndh ɒst v t͡ʃvn mn dr ɒjn‌ɡvnh msɒjl ʃk dɒʃtm، ɒz ɒv پrsjdm kh آjɒmj xvɒhj bh ɒvrʃljm brvj tɒ dr آnd͡ʒɒ ɒjn mɣdmh fjsl پzjrd؟ vlj t͡ʃvn پvls rfʔ dʔvj krd kh brɒj mhɒkmh ɒvɣsts mhfvz mɒnd، frmɒn dɒdm kh ɒv rɒ ŋɒh bdɒrnd tɒ ɒv rɒ bh hzvrɣjsr rvɒnh nmɒjm» ɒɣrjپɒs bh fstvs ɡft «mn njzmj xvɒhm ɒjn ʃxs rɒ bʃnvm» ɡft «frdɒ ɒvrɒ xvɒhj ʃnjd» پs bɒmdɒdɒn t͡ʃvn ɒɣrjپɒs v brnjkj bɒhʃmtj ʔzjm آmdnd v bh dɒrɒlɒstmɒʔ bɒmjn bɒʃjɒn v bzrɡɒn ʃhr dɒxl ʃdnd، bh frmɒn fstvs پvls rɒ hɒzr sɒxtnd آŋɒh fstvs ɡft «ɒj ɒɣrjپɒs پɒdʃɒh، v‌ɒj hmh mrdmɒnj kh nzd mɒ hzvr dɒrjd، ɒjn ʃxs rɒmj bjnjd kh drbɒrh ɒv tmɒmj d͡ʒmɒʔt jhvd t͡ʃh drɒvrʃljm v t͡ʃh dr ɒjnd͡ʒɒ frjɒd krdh، ɒz mn xvɒhʃ nmvdnd kh djɡr nbɒjd zjst knd vljkn t͡ʃvn mn drjɒftm kh ɒv hjt͡ʃ ʔmlj mstvd͡ʒb ɣtl nkrdh ɒst v xvd bh ɒvɣsts rfʔ dʔvj krd، ɒrɒdh krdm kh ɒv rɒ bfrstm v t͡ʃvn t͡ʃjzj drst ndɒrm kh drbɒrh ɒv bh xdɒvndɡɒr mrɣvm dɒrm، ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht ɒv rɒ nzd ʃmɒ v ʔlj ɒlxsvs dr hzvr tv‌ɒj ɒɣrjپɒs پɒdʃɒh آvrdm tɒ bʔd ɒz tfhs ʃɒjd t͡ʃjzj jɒfth bŋɒrmzjrɒ mrɒxlɒf ʔɣl mj‌nmɒjd kh ɒsjrj rɒ bfrstm vʃkɒjthɒjj kh br ɒvst mʔrvz ndɒrm» zjrɒ mrɒxlɒf ʔɣl mj‌nmɒjd kh ɒsjrj rɒ bfrstm vʃkɒjthɒjj kh br ɒvst mʔrvz ndɒrm» ɒɣrjپɒs bh پvls ɡft «mrxsj kh kjfjt xvd rɒ bɡvjj» kh «ɒj ɒɣrjپɒs پɒdʃɒh، sʔɒdt xvd rɒ dr ɒjn mj‌dɒnm kh ɒmrvz drhzvr tv hd͡ʒt bjɒvrm، drbɒrh hmh ʃkɒjthɒjj kh jhvd ɒz mn mj‌dɒrnd xsvs t͡ʃvn tv drhmh rsvm v msɒjl jhvd ʔɒlm hstj، پs ɒz tvmstdʔj آnm kh thml frmvdh، mrɒ bʃnvj rftɒr mrɒ ɒz d͡ʒvɒnj t͡ʃvnkh ɒz ɒbtdɒ dr mjɒn ɣvm xvd dr ɒvrʃljm bsr mj‌brdm، tmɒmj jhvdmj dɒnnd v mrɒ ɒz ɒvl mj‌ʃnɒsnd hr ɡɒh bxvɒhnd ʃhɒdt dhnd kh bh ɣɒnvn پɒrsɒtrjn frɣh djn xvd frjsj mj‌bvdm vɒlhɒl bh‌sbb ɒmjd آn vʔdh‌ɒj kh xdɒ bh ɒd͡ʒdɒd mɒ dɒd، br mn ɒdʔɒ mj‌knnd v hɒl آnkh dvɒzdh sbt mɒʃbɒnh‌rvz bd͡ʒd v d͡ʒhd ʔbɒdt mj‌knnd mhz ɒmjd thsjl hmjn vʔdh kh bd͡ʒht hmjn ɒmjd، ɒj ɒɣrjپɒs پɒdʃɒh، jhvd br mn ɒdʔɒ mj‌knnd «ʃmɒ t͡ʃrɒ mhɒl mj‌پndɒrjd kh xdɒ mrdɡɒn rɒ brxjzɒnd؟ mn hm dr xɒtr xvd mj‌پndɒʃtm kh bh nɒm ʔjsj nɒsrj mxɒlft bsjɒr krdn vɒd͡ʒb ɒst، t͡ʃnɒnkh dr ɒvrʃljm hm krdm vɒz rvsɒj khnh ɣdrt jɒfth، bsjɒrj ɒz mɣdsjn rɒ dr zndɒn hbs mj‌krdm v t͡ʃvn ɒjʃɒn rɒ mj kʃtnd، dr ftvɒ ʃrjk mj‌bvdm v dr hmh knɒjs bɒrhɒ ɒjʃɒn rɒ zhmt rsɒnjdh، md͡ʒbvrmj sɒxtm kh kfr ɡvjnd v br ɒjʃɒn bh ʃdt djvɒnh ɡʃth tɒ ʃhrhɒj bʔjd tʔɒɣb mj‌krdm dr ɒjn mjɒn hŋɒmj kh bɒ ɣdrt v ɒd͡ʒɒzt ɒzrvsɒj khnh bh dmʃɣ mj‌rftm، dr rɒh، ɒj پɒdʃɒh، dr vɣt zhr nvrj rɒ ɒz آsmɒn djdm، drxʃndh tr ɒz xvrʃjd kh dr dvr mn v rfɣɒjm tɒbjd v t͡ʃvn hmh br zmjn ɒftɒdjm، hɒtfj rɒʃnjdm kh mrɒ bh zbɒn ʔbrɒnj mxɒtb sɒxth، ɡft ɒj ʃɒvl، ʃɒvl، t͡ʃrɒ br mn d͡ʒfɒ mj‌knj؟ tv rɒ br mjxhɒ lɡd zdn dʃvɒr ɒst mn ɡftm xdɒvndɒ tv kjstj؟ ɡft mn ʔjsj hstm kh tv br mn d͡ʒfɒ mj‌knj v ljkn brxɒsth، br پɒbɒjst zjrɒ kh br tv zɒhr ʃdm tɒ tv rɒ xɒdm vʃɒhd mɣrr ɡrdɒnm br آn t͡ʃjzhɒjj kh mrɒ dr آnhɒdjdh‌ɒj v br آnt͡ʃh bh tv dr آn zɒhr xvɒhm ʃd v tv rɒ rhɒjj xvɒhm dɒd ɒz ɣvm v ɒz ɒmt hɒjj kh tv rɒ bh nzd آnhɒ xvɒhm frstɒd، tɒ t͡ʃʃmɒn ɒjʃɒn rɒ bɒz knj tɒ ɒz zlmt bh svj nvr v ɒzɣdrt ʃjtɒn bh‌d͡ʒɒnb xdɒ brɡrdnd tɒ آmrzʃ ɡnɒhɒn v mjrɒsj dr mjɒn mɣdsjn bvsjlh ɒjmɒnj kh br mn ɒst bjɒbnd آn vɣt‌ɒj ɒɣrjپɒs پɒdʃɒh، rvjɒj آsmɒnj rɒ nɒfrmɒnj nvrzjdm blkh nxst آnɒnj rɒ kh dr dmʃɣ bvdnd v dr ɒvrʃljm v drtmɒmj mrz v bvm jhvdjh v ɒmt‌hɒ rɒ njz ɒʔlɒm mj‌nmvdm kh tvbh knnd v bh svj xdɒ bɒzɡʃt nmɒjnd v ɒʔmɒl lɒjɣh tvbh rɒ bh‌d͡ʒɒ آvrnd bh‌sbb hmjn ɒmvr jhvd mrɒ dr hjkl ɡrfth، ɣsd ɣtl mn krdnd ɒmɒ ɒz xdɒ ɒʔɒnt jɒfth، tɒ ɒmrvzbɒɣj mɒndm v xrd v bzrɡ rɒ ɒʔlɒm mj‌nmɒjm vhrfj nmj ɡvjm، d͡ʒz آnt͡ʃh ɒnbjɒ v mvsj ɡftnd kh mj‌bɒjst vɒɣʔ ʃvd، kh msjh mj‌bɒjst zhmt bjnd v nvbr ɣjɒmt mrdɡɒn ɡʃth، ɣvm vɒmt‌hɒ rɒ bh nvr ɒʔlɒm nmɒjd» t͡ʃvn ɒv bdjn sxnɒn، hd͡ʒt xvd rɒmj آvrd، fstvs bh آvɒz blnd ɡft «ɒj پvls djvɒnh hstj ksrt ʔlm tv rɒ djvɒnh krdh ɒst» ɡft «ɒj fstvs ɡrɒmj، djvɒnh njstm blkh sxnɒn rɒstj v hvʃjɒrj rɒ mj‌ɡvjm zjrɒپɒdʃɒhj kh dr hzvr ɒv bh dljrj sxn mj‌ɡvjm، ɒz ɒjn ɒmvr mtlʔ ɒst، t͡ʃvnkh mrɒ jɣjn ɒst kh hjt͡ʃ‌jk ɒz ɒjn mɣdmɒt br ɒv mxfj njst، zjrɒ kh ɒjn ɒmvr dr xlvt vɒɣʔ nʃd ‌ɒj ɒɣrjپɒs پɒdʃɒh، آjɒ bh ɒnbjɒ ɒjmɒn آvrdh‌ɒj؟ mj‌dɒnm kh ɒjmɒn dɒrj» ɒɣrjپɒs bh پvls ɡft «bh ɣljl trɣjb mj‌knj kh mn msjhj bɡrdm؟» پvls ɡft «ɒz xdɒxvɒhʃ mj‌dɒʃtm jɒ bh ɣljl jɒ bh ksjr، nh‌tnhɒ tvblkh d͡ʒmjʔ ɒjn ɒʃxɒsj kh ɒmrvz sxn mrɒmj ʃnvnd msl mn ɡrdnd، d͡ʒz ɒjn znd͡ʒjrhɒ» t͡ʃvn ɒjn rɒ ɡft، پɒdʃɒh v vɒlj v brnjkj vsɒjr md͡ʒlsjɒn brxɒsth، rftnd v bɒ jkdjɡrɡftɡv krdh، ɡftnd «ɒjn ʃxs hjt͡ʃ ʔmlj mstvd͡ʒb ɣtl jɒ hbs nkrdh ɒst»vɒɣrjپɒs bh fstvs ɡft «ɒɡr ɒjn mrd bh ɣjsrrfʔ dʔvj xvd nmj krd، ɒv rɒ آzɒd krdn mmkn mj‌bvd» vɒɣrjپɒs bh fstvs ɡft «ɒɡr ɒjn mrd bh ɣjsrrfʔ dʔvj xvd nmj krd، ɒv rɒ آzɒd krdn mmkn mj‌bvd» t͡ʃvn mɣrr ʃd kh bh ɒjtɒljɒ brvjm، پvls v t͡ʃnd zndɒnj djɡr rɒ bh jvzbɒʃj ɒz sپɒh ɒɣsts kh jvljvs nɒm dɒʃt، sپrdnd v bh kʃtj ɒdrɒmjtjnj kh ʔɒzm bnɒdrآsjɒ bvd، svɒr ʃdh، kvt͡ʃ krdjm v ɒrstrxs ɒzɒhl mkɒdvnjh ɒz tsɒlvnjkj hmrɒh mɒ bvd rvzdjɡr bh sjdvn frvd آmdjm v jvljvs bɒ پvls mlɒtft nmvdh، ɒv rɒ ɒd͡ʒɒzt dɒd kh nzd dvstɒn xvd rfth، ɒz ɒjʃɒn nvɒzʃ jɒbd v ɒz آnd͡ʒɒ rvɒnh ʃdh، zjr ɣپrs ɡzʃtjm zjrɒ kh bɒd mxɒlf bvd v ɒz drjɒj knɒr ɣjljɣjh v پmfljh ɡzʃth، bh mjrɒj ljkjh rsjdjm dr آnd͡ʒɒ jvzbɒʃj kʃtj ɒskndrjh rɒ jɒft kh bh ɒjtɒljɒ mj‌rft v mɒ rɒ brآn svɒr krd v t͡ʃnd rvz bh آhstɡj rfth، bh ɣnjds bh mʃɣt rsjdjm v t͡ʃvn bɒd mxɒlf mɒmj bvd، dr zjr krjt nzdjk slmvnj rɒndjm، vbh dʃvɒrj ɒz آnd͡ʒɒ ɡzʃth، bh mvzʔj kh bh bnɒdrhsnh msmj v ɣrjb bh ʃhr lsɒئjh ɒst rsjdjm v t͡ʃvn zmɒn mnɣzj ʃd v dr ɒjn vɣt sfrdrjɒ xtrnɒk bvd، zjrɒ kh ɒjɒm rvzh ɡzʃth bvd، پvls ɒjʃɒn rɒ nsjht krdh، ɡft «ɒj mrdmɒn، mj‌bjnm kh dr ɒjn sfr zrr v xsrɒn bsjɒr پjdɒ xvɒhd ʃd، nh fɣt bɒr v kʃtj rɒ blkh d͡ʒɒnhɒj mɒ rɒ njz» vlj jvzbɒʃj nɒxdɒ vsɒhb kʃtj rɒ bjʃtr ɒz ɣvl پvls ɒʔtnɒ nmvd v t͡ʃvn آn bndr njkv nbvd kh zmstɒn rɒ dr آn bsr brnd، ɒksr t͡ʃnɒn mslht dɒnstnd kh ɒz آnd͡ʒɒ nɣl knnd tɒ ɒɡr mmkn ʃvd xvd rɒ bh fjnjkss rsɒnjdh، zmstɒn rɒ dr آnd͡ʒɒ bsr brnd kh آn bndrj ɒst ɒz krjt mvɒd͡ʒh mɣrb d͡ʒnvbj vmɣrb ʃmɒlj v t͡ʃvn nsjm d͡ʒnvbj vzjdn ɡrft، ɡmɒn brdnd kh bh mɣsd xvjʃ rsjdnd پs lŋr brdɒʃtjm v ɒz knɒrh krjt ɡzʃtjm ljkn t͡ʃjzj ŋzʃt kh bɒdj ʃdjd kh آn rɒɒvrkljdvn mj‌nɒmnd ɒz bɒlɒj آn zdn ɡrft drsɒʔt kʃtj rbvdh ʃdh، rv bh svj bɒd ntvɒnst nhɒd پs آn rɒ ɒz dst dɒdh، bj‌ɒxtjɒr rɒndh ʃdjm پs dr zjr d͡ʒzjrh‌ɒj kh klvdj nɒm dɒʃt، dvɒn dvɒn rftjm v bh dʃvɒrj zvrɣ rɒ drɣbz xvd آvrdjm v آn rɒ brdɒʃth v mʔvnɒt rɒ ɒstʔmɒl nmvdh، kmr kʃtj rɒ bstnd v t͡ʃvn trsjdnd kh bh rjɡzɒr sjrts frv rvnd، hbɒl kʃtj rɒ frv kʃjdnd v hmt͡ʃnɒn rɒndh ʃdnd vt͡ʃvn tvfɒn br mɒ ɣlbh mj‌nmvd، rvz djɡr، bɒrkʃtj rɒ bjrvn ɒndɒxtnd v rvz svm bh‌dsthɒj xvd آlɒt kʃtj rɒ bh drjɒ ɒndɒxtjm v t͡ʃvn rvzhɒj bsjɒr آftɒb v stɒrɡɒn rɒndjdnd v tvfɒnj ʃdjd br mɒ mj‌ɒftɒd، djɡr hjt͡ʃ ɒmjd nd͡ʒɒt brɒj mɒ nmɒnd v bʔd ɒz ɡrsŋj bsjɒr، پvls dr mjɒn ɒjʃɒn ɒjstɒdh، ɡft «ɒj mrdmɒn، nxst mj‌bɒjst sxn mrɒ پzjrfth، ɒz krjt nɣl nkrdh bɒʃjd tɒ ɒjn zrr v xsrɒn rɒ nbjnjd ɒknvn njzʃmɒ rɒ nsjht mj‌knm kh xɒtrd͡ʒmʔ bɒʃjd zjrɒkh hjt͡ʃ zrrj bh‌d͡ʒɒn jkj ɒz ʃmɒ nxvɒhd rsjdmɡr bh kʃtj zjrɒ kh dvʃ، frʃth آn xdɒjj kh ɒz آn ɒv hstm v xdmt ɒv rɒ mj‌knm، bh mn zɒhr ʃdh، ɡft ɒj پvls trsɒn mbɒʃ zjrɒbɒjd tv dr hzvr ɣjsr hɒzr ʃvj v ɒjnk xdɒ hmh hmsfrɒn tv rɒ bh tv bxʃjdh ɒst پs‌ɒj mrdmɒn xvʃhɒl bɒʃjd zjrɒ ɒjmɒn dɒrm kh bh hmɒntvr kh bh mn ɡft، vɒɣʔ xvɒhdʃd ljkn bɒjd dr d͡ʒzjrh‌ɒj bjftjm» v t͡ʃvn ʃb t͡ʃhɒrdhm ʃd v hnvz drdrjɒj ɒdrjɒ bh hr sv rɒndh mj‌ʃdjm، dr nsf ʃb mlɒhɒn ɡmɒn brdnd kh xʃkj nzdjk ɒst پs پjmɒjʃ krdh، bjst ɣɒmt jɒftnd vɣdrj پjʃtr rfth، bɒz پjmɒjʃ krdh، پɒnzdh ɣɒmt jɒftnd v t͡ʃvn trsjdnd kh bh sxrh‌hɒ bjftjm، ɒz پʃt kʃtj t͡ʃhɒr lŋr ɒndɒxth، tmnɒ mj‌krdndkh rvz ʃvd ɒmɒ t͡ʃvn mlɒhɒn ɣsd dɒʃtnd kh ɒz kʃtj frɒr knnd v zvrɣ rɒ bh drjɒ ɒndɒxtnd bh bhɒnh‌ɒj kh lŋrhɒ rɒ ɒz پjʃ kʃtj bkʃnd، پvls jvzbɒʃj v sپɒhjɒn rɒ ɡft «ɒɡr ɒjnhɒdr kʃtj nmɒnnd، nd͡ʒɒt ʃmɒ mmkn nbɒʃd» آŋɒh sپɒhjɒn rjsmɒnhɒj zvrɣ rɒ brjdh، ɡzɒʃtnd kh bjftd t͡ʃvn rvz nzdjk ʃd، پvls ɒz hmh xvɒhʃ nmvd kh t͡ʃjzj bxvrnd پs ɡft «ɒmrvz rvz t͡ʃhɒrdhm ɒst kh ɒntzɒr kʃjdh vt͡ʃjzj nxvrdh، ɡrsnh mɒndh‌ɒjd پs ɒstdʔɒj mn ɒjn ɒst kh ɣzɒ bxvrjd kh ʔɒfjt brɒj ʃmɒ xvɒhd bvd، zjrɒ kh mvjj ɒz sr hjt͡ʃ‌jk ɒz ʃmɒ nxvɒhd ɒftɒd» ɒjn bɡft v drhzvr hmh nɒn ɡrfth، xdɒ rɒ ʃkr ɡft v پɒrh krdh، xvrdn ɡrft پs hmh ɣvj‌dl ɡʃth njz ɣzɒ xvrdnd v d͡ʒmlh nfvs dr kʃtj dvjst v hftɒd v ʃʃ bvdjm t͡ʃvn ɒz ɣzɒsjr ʃdnd، ɡndm rɒ bh drjɒ rjxth، kʃtj rɒ sbk krdnd ɒmɒ t͡ʃvn rvz، rvʃn ʃd، zmjn rɒ nʃnɒxtnd؛ ljkn xljd͡ʒj djdnd kh ʃɒtj‌ɒj dɒʃt پs rɒj zdnd kh ɒɡr mmkn ʃvd، kʃtj rɒ br آn brɒnnd v bnd lŋrhɒ rɒ brjdh، آnhɒ rɒ drdrjɒ ɡzɒʃtnd v bndhɒj skɒn rɒ bɒz krdh، vbɒdbɒn rɒ brɒj bɒd ɡʃɒdh، rɒh sɒhl rɒ پjʃ ɡrftnd ɒmɒ kʃtj rɒ drmd͡ʒmʔ bhrjn bh پɒjɒb rɒndh، mɣdm آn frv ʃdh، bj‌hrkt mɒnd vlj mvxrʃ ɒz ltmh ɒmvɒd͡ʒ drhm ʃkst آŋɒh sپɒhjɒn ɣsd ɣtl zndɒnjɒn krdnd kh mbɒdɒ ksj ʃnɒ krdh، bɡrjzd ljkn jvzbɒʃj t͡ʃvn xvɒst پvls rɒ brhɒnd، ɒjʃɒn rɒ ɒz ɒjn ɒrɒdh bɒzdɒʃt v frmvd tɒ hr‌kh ʃnɒvrj dɒnd، nxst xvjʃtn rɒ bh drjɒ ɒndɒxth bh sɒhl rsɒndvbʔzj br txthɒ v bʔzj br t͡ʃjzhɒj kʃtj vhmt͡ʃnjn hmh bh slɒmtj bh xʃkj rsjdnd vbʔzj br txthɒ v bʔzj br t͡ʃjzhɒj kʃtj vhmt͡ʃnjn hmh bh slɒmtj bh xʃkj rsjdnd v t͡ʃvn rstɡɒr ʃdnd، jɒftnd kh d͡ʒzjrh mljth nɒm dɒrd v آn mrdmɒn brbrj bɒmɒ kmɒl mlɒtft nmvdnd، zjrɒ bh‌sbb bɒrɒn kh mj‌bɒrjd v srmɒ آtʃ ɒfrvxth، hmh mɒ rɒپzjrftnd t͡ʃvn پvls mɣdɒrj hjzm frɒhm krdh، br آtʃ mj‌nhɒd، bh‌sbb hrɒrt، ɒfʔj‌ɒj bjrvn آmdh، br dstʃ t͡ʃsپjd t͡ʃvn brbrjɒn d͡ʒɒnvr rɒ ɒz dstʃ آvjxth djdnd، bɒ jkdjɡrmj ɡftnd «blɒʃk ɒjn ʃxs، xvnj ɒst kh bɒɒjnkh ɒz drjɒ rst، ʔdl nmj ɡzɒrd kh zjst knd» ɒmɒ آn d͡ʒɒnvr rɒ dr آtʃ ɒfkndh، hjt͡ʃ zrr njɒft پs mntzr bvdnd kh ɒv آmɒs knd jɒbɣth ɒftɒdh، bmjrd vlj t͡ʃvn ɒntzɒr bsjɒr kʃjdndv djdnd kh hjt͡ʃ zrrj bdv nrsjd، brɡʃth ɡftndkh xdɒjj ɒst v dr آn nvɒhj، ɒmlɒk rئjs d͡ʒzjrh kh پvbljvs nɒm dɒʃt bvd kh ɒv mɒ rɒ bh xɒnh xvdtlbjdh، sh rvz bh mhrbɒnj mhmɒnj nmvd ɒzɣzɒ پdr پvbljvs rɒ rnd͡ʒ tb v ɒshɒl ʔɒrz ʃdh، xfth bvd پs پvls nzd vj آmdh v dʔɒkrdh vdst br ɒv ɡzɒrdh، ɒv rɒ ʃfɒ dɒd v t͡ʃvn ɒjn ɒmr vɒɣʔ ʃd، sɒjr mrjzɒnj kh dr d͡ʒzjrh bvdnd آmdh، ʃfɒ jɒftnd v ɒjʃɒn mɒ rɒ ɒkrɒm bsjɒr nmvdnd v t͡ʃvn rvɒnh mj‌ʃdjm، آnt͡ʃh lɒzm bvd brɒj mɒ hɒzr sɒxtnd v bʔd ɒz sh mɒh bh kʃtj ɒskndrjh kh ʔlɒmt d͡ʒvzɒ dɒʃt v zmstɒn rɒ dr d͡ʒzjrh bsrbrdh bvd، svɒr ʃdjm v bh‌srɒkvs frvdآmdh، sh rvz tvɣf nmvdjm v ɒz آnd͡ʒɒ dvrzdh، bh rjɣjvn rsjdjm v bʔd ɒz jk rvz bɒdd͡ʒnvbj vzjdh، rvz dvm vɒrd پvtjvlj ʃdjm v dr آnd͡ʒɒ brɒdrɒn jɒfth، hsb xvɒhʃ ɒjʃɒn hft rvz mɒndjm v hmt͡ʃnjn bh rvm آmdjm vbrɒdrɒn آnd͡ʒɒ t͡ʃvn ɒz ɒhvɒl mɒ mtlʔ ʃdnd، bh ɒstɣbɒl mɒ bjrvn آmdnd tɒ fvrn ɒپjvs v sh dkɒn v پvls t͡ʃvn ɒjʃɒn rɒ djd، xdɒ rɒ ʃkr nmvdh، ɣvj‌dl ɡʃt v t͡ʃvn bh rvm rsjdjm، jvzbɒʃj zndɒnjɒn rɒ bh‌srdɒr ɒfvɒd͡ʒ xɒsh sپrd ɒmɒ پvls rɒ ɒd͡ʒɒzt dɒdnd kh bɒ jk sپɒhj kh mhɒfzt ɒv mj‌krd، dr mnzl xvdbmɒnd v bʔd ɒz sh rvz، پvls bzrɡɒn jhvd rɒtlbjd v t͡ʃvn d͡ʒmʔ ʃdnd bh ɒjʃɒn ɡft «ɒj brɒdrɒn ʔzjz، bɒ vd͡ʒvdj kh mn hjt͡ʃ ʔmlj xlɒf ɣvm v rsvm ɒd͡ʒdɒd nkrdh bvdm، hmɒnɒ mrɒ dr ɒvrʃljm bsth، bh‌dsthɒj rvmjɒn sپrdnd ɒjʃɒn bʔd ɒz tfhs t͡ʃvn dr mn hjt͡ʃ ʔlt ɣtl njɒftnd، ɒrɒdh krdnd kh mrɒ rhɒ knnd vlj t͡ʃvn jhvd mxɒlft nmvdnd، nɒt͡ʃɒr ʃdh bh ɣjsrrfʔ dʔvj krdm، nh tɒ آnkh ɒz ɒmt xvd ʃkɒjt knm ɒknvn bdjn d͡ʒht xvɒstm ʃmɒ rɒmlɒɣɒt knm v sxn ɡvjm zjrɒ kh bd͡ʒht ɒmjdɒsrɒئjl، bdjn znd͡ʒjr bsth ʃdm» vj rɒɡftnd «mɒ hjt͡ʃ nvʃth dr hɣ tv ɒz jhvdjh njɒfth‌ɒjm v nh ksj ɒz brɒdrɒnj kh ɒz آnd͡ʒɒ آmdnd، xbrj jɒ sxn bdj drbɒrh tv ɡfth ɒst ljkn mslht dɒnstjm ɒz tv mɣsvd tv rɒ bʃnvjm zjrɒmɒ rɒ mʔlvm ɒst kh ɒjn frɣh rɒ dr hr d͡ʒɒ bdmj ɡvjnd» پs t͡ʃvn rvzj brɒj vj mʔjn krdnd، bsjɒrj nzd ɒv bh mnzlʃ آmdnd kh brɒj ɒjʃɒn bh mlkvt xdɒ ʃhɒdt dɒdh، ʃrh mj‌nmvd v ɒztvrɒt mvsj v ɒnbjɒ ɒz sbh tɒ ʃɒm drbɒrh ʔjsj ɒɣɒmh hd͡ʒt mj‌krd پs bʔzj bh sxnɒn ɒvɒjmɒn آvrdnd v bʔzj ɒjmɒn njɒvrdnd v t͡ʃvn bɒ jkdjɡr mʔɒrzh mj‌krdnd، ɒz ɒv d͡ʒdɒ ʃdnd bʔdɒz آnkh پvls ɒjn jk sxn rɒ ɡfth bvd kh «rvh‌ɒlɣds bh vsɒtt ɒʃʔjɒj nbj bh ɒd͡ʒdɒd mɒnjkv xtɒb krdh، ɡfth ɒst kh nzd ɒjn ɣvm rfth bdjʃɒn bɡv bh ɡvʃ xvɒhjd ʃnjd vnxvɒhjd fhmjd v nzr krdh xvɒhjd ŋrjst vnxvɒhjd djd؛ zjrɒ dl ɒjn ɣvm ɣljz ʃdh v bh ɡvʃhɒj sŋjn mj‌ʃnvnd v t͡ʃʃmɒn xvd rɒ brhm nhɒdh‌ɒnd، mbɒdɒ bh t͡ʃʃmɒn bbjnnd v bh ɡvʃhɒbʃnvnd v bh dl bfhmnd v bɒzɡʃt knnd tɒ ɒjʃɒn rɒʃfɒ bxʃm پs br ʃmɒ mʔlvm bɒd kh nd͡ʒɒt xdɒ nzd ɒmt‌hɒ frstɒdh mj‌ʃvd v ɒjʃɒn xvɒhndʃnjd» t͡ʃvn ɒjn rɒ ɡft jhvdjɒn rftnd v bɒjkdjɡr mbɒhsh bsjɒr mj‌krdndɒmɒ پvls dvsɒl tmɒm dr xɒnh ɒd͡ʒɒrh‌ɒj xvd sɒkn bvd v hrkh bh nzd vj mj‌آmd، mj‌پzjrft ɒmɒ پvls dvsɒl tmɒm dr xɒnh ɒd͡ʒɒrh‌ɒj xvd sɒkn bvd v hrkh bh nzd vj mj‌آmd، mj‌پzjrft پvls، ɣlɒm ʔjsj msjh v rsvl xvɒndh ʃdh v d͡ʒdɒ nmvdh ʃdh brɒj ɒnd͡ʒjl xdɒ، kh sɒbɣ vʔdh آn rɒ dɒdh bvd bh vsɒtt ɒnbjɒj xvd dr ktb mɣdsh، drbɒrh پsr xvd kh bhsb d͡ʒsm ɒz nsl dɒvd mtvld ʃd، v bhsb rvh ɣdvsjt پsr xdɒ bh ɣvt mʔrvf ɡrdjd ɒzɣjɒmt mrdɡɒn jʔnj xdɒvnd mɒ ʔjsj msjh، kh bh ɒv fjz v rsɒlt rɒ jɒftjm brɒj ɒtɒʔt ɒjmɒn dr d͡ʒmjʔ ɒmt‌hɒ bh‌xɒtr ɒsm ɒv، kh drmjɒn ɒjʃɒn ʃmɒ njz xvɒndh ʃdh ʔjsj msjh hstjd bh hmh kh dr rvm mhbvb xdɒ v xvɒndh ʃdh v mɣdsjd، fjz v slɒmtj ɒz d͡ʒɒnb پdr mɒ xdɒ v ʔjsj msjh xdɒvnd br ʃmɒ bɒd ɒvl ʃkr mj‌knm xdɒj xvd rɒ bh vsɒtt ʔjsj msjh drbɒrh hmɡj ʃmɒ kh ɒjmɒn ʃmɒ drtmɒm ʔɒlm ʃhrt jɒfth ɒst؛ zjrɒ xdɒjj kh ɒvrɒ bh rvh xvd dr ɒnd͡ʒjl پsrʃ xdmt mj‌knm، mrɒ ʃɒhd ɒst kh t͡ʃɡvnh پjvsth ʃmɒ rɒ jɒdmj knm، v dɒئm dr dʔɒhɒj xvd msɒlt mj‌knm kh ʃɒjd ɒlɒn آxr bh ɒrɒdh xdɒ sʔɒdt jɒfth، nzd ʃmɒ bjɒjm zjrɒ bsjɒr ɒʃtjɒɣ dɒrm kh ʃmɒ rɒ bbjnm tɒ nʔmtj rvhɒnj bh ʃmɒ brsɒnm kh ʃmɒ ɒstvɒr bɡrdjd، jʔnj tɒ dr mjɒn ʃmɒtslj jɒbjm ɒz ɒjmɒn jkdjɡr، ɒjmɒn mn v ɒjmɒn ʃmɒ lkn‌ɒj brɒdrɒn، nmj xvɒhm kh ʃmɒbj xbr bɒʃjd ɒz ɒjnkh mkrr ɒrɒdh آmdn nzd ʃmɒkrdm v tɒ bh hɒl mmnvʔ ʃdm tɒ smrj hɒsl knm dr mjɒn ʃmɒ njz t͡ʃnɒnkh dr sɒjr ɒmt‌hɒ zjrɒ kh jvnɒnjɒn v brbrjɒn v hkmɒ v d͡ʒhlɒ rɒhm mdjvnm پs hmt͡ʃnjn bɣdr tɒɣt xvdmstʔdm kh ʃmɒ rɒ njz kh dr rvm hstjd bʃɒrt dhm zjrɒ kh ɒz ɒnd͡ʒjl msjh ʔɒr ndɒrm t͡ʃvnkh ɣvt xdɒst، brɒj nd͡ʒɒt hr ks kh ɒjmɒn آvrd، ɒvl jhvd v پs jvnɒnj، kh dr آn ʔdɒlt xdɒ mkʃvf mj‌ʃvd، ɒz ɒjmɒn tɒ ɒjmɒn، t͡ʃnɒnkh mktvb ɒst kh ʔɒdl bh ɒjmɒn zjst xvɒhd nmvd zjrɒ ɣzb xdɒ ɒz آsmɒn mkʃvf mj‌ʃvd br hr bj‌djnj v nɒrɒstj mrdmɒnj kh rɒstj rɒ dr nɒrɒstj bɒz mj‌dɒrnd t͡ʃvnkh آnt͡ʃh ɒz xdɒ mj‌tvɒn ʃnɒxt، dr ɒjʃɒn zɒhrɒst zjrɒ xdɒ آn rɒ br ɒjʃɒn zɒhr krdh ɒst zjrɒ kh t͡ʃjzhɒj nɒdjdh ɒv jʔnj ɣvt srmdj v ɒlvhjtʃ ɒz hjn آfrjnʃ ʔɒlm bvsjlh kɒrhɒj ɒv fhmjdh v djdh mj‌ʃvd tɒ ɒjʃɒn rɒ ʔzrj nbɒʃd zjrɒ hr‌t͡ʃnd xdɒ rɒ ʃnɒxtnd، vlj ɒvrɒ t͡ʃvn xdɒ tmd͡ʒjd v ʃkr nkrdnd blkh drxjɒlɒt xvd bɒtl ɡrdjdh، dl bj‌fhm ɒjʃɒn tɒrjk ɡʃt ɒdʔɒj hkmt mj‌krdnd vɒhmɣ ɡrdjdnd v d͡ʒlɒl xdɒj ɣjrfɒnj rɒ bh ʃbjh svrt ɒnsɒn fɒnj v tjvr v bhɒjm vhʃrɒt tbdjl nmvdnd lhzɒ xdɒ njz ɒjʃɒn rɒdr ʃhvɒt dl xvdʃɒn bh nɒپɒkj tsljm frmvd tɒdr mjɒn xvd bdnhɒj xvjʃ rɒ xvɒr sɒznd، kh ɒjʃɒn hɣ xdɒ rɒ bh drvɣ mbdl krdnd vʔbɒdt v xdmt nmvdnd mxlvɣ rɒ bh ʔvz xɒlɣj kh tɒ ɒbdɒlɒbɒd mtbɒrk ɒst آmjn ɒz ɒjn sbb xdɒ ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh hvshɒj xbɒst tsljm nmvd، bh nvʔj kh znɒnʃɒn njz ʔml tbjʔj rɒ bh آnt͡ʃh xlɒf tbjʔt ɒst tbdjl nmvdnd v hmt͡ʃnjn mrdɒn hm ɒstʔmɒl tbjʔj znɒn rɒ trk krdh، ɒz ʃhvɒt xvd bɒ jkdjɡrsvxtnd mrd bɒ mrd mrtkb ɒʔmɒl zʃt ʃdh، ʔɣvbt szɒvɒr tɣsjr xvd rɒ dr xvd jɒftnd v t͡ʃvn rvɒ ndɒʃtnd kh xdɒ rɒ dr dɒnʃ xvdŋɒh dɒrnd، xdɒ ɒjʃɒn rɒ bh zhn mrdvd vɒɡzɒʃt tɒ kɒrhɒj nɒʃɒjsth bh‌d͡ʒɒ آvrnd mmlv ɒz hrnvʔ nɒrɒstj v ʃrɒrt v tmʔ v xbɒst؛ پr ɒzhsd v ɣtl v d͡ʒdɒl v mkr v bdxvjj؛ ɣmɒzɒn v ɣjbt knndɡɒn v dʃmnɒn xdɒ v ɒhɒnt knndɡɒn v mtkbrɒn v lɒfznɒn v mbdʔɒn ʃr v nɒmtjʔɒn vɒldjn؛ bj‌fhm v bj‌vfɒ v bj‌ɒlft v bj‌rhmzjrɒ hr‌t͡ʃnd ɒnsɒf xdɒ rɒ mj‌dɒnnd kh knndɡɒn t͡ʃnjn kɒrhɒ mstvd͡ʒb mvt hstnd، nh fɣt آnhɒ rɒ mj‌knnd blkh knndɡɒn rɒ njz xvʃ mj‌dɒrnd zjrɒ hr‌t͡ʃnd ɒnsɒf xdɒ rɒ mj‌dɒnnd kh knndɡɒn t͡ʃnjn kɒrhɒ mstvd͡ʒb mvt hstnd، nh fɣt آnhɒ rɒ mj‌knnd blkh knndɡɒn rɒ njz xvʃ mj‌dɒrnd lhzɒ‌ɒj آdmj kh hkm mj‌knj، hr‌kh bɒʃj ʔzrj ndɒrj zjrɒ kh bh آnt͡ʃh brdjɡrj hkm mj‌knj، ftvɒ br xvd mj‌dhj، zjrɒtv kh hkm mj‌knj، hmɒn kɒrhɒ rɒ bh ʔml mj‌آvrj v mj‌dɒnjm kh hkm xdɒ br knndɡɒn t͡ʃnjn ɒʔmɒl br‌hɣ ɒst پs‌ɒj آdmj kh brknndɡɒn t͡ʃnjn ɒʔmɒl hkm mj‌knj v xvd hmɒn rɒ mj‌knj، آjɒ ɡmɒn mj‌brj kh tv ɒz hkm xdɒxvɒhj rst؟ jɒ آnkh dvlt mhrbɒnj v sbr vhlm ɒv rɒ nɒt͡ʃjz mj‌ʃmɒrj v nmj dɒnj kh mhrbɒnj xdɒ tv rɒ bh tvbh mj‌kʃd؟ v bh‌sbb ɣsɒvt v dl nɒtvbh‌kɒr xvd، ɣzb rɒ zxjrh mj‌knj brɒj xvd dr rvz ɣzb v zhvr dɒvrj ʔɒdlh xdɒ kh bh hr ks brhsb ɒʔmɒlʃ d͡ʒzɒxvɒhd dɒd ɒmɒ bh آnɒnj kh bɒ sbr dr ɒʔmɒl njkvtɒlb d͡ʒlɒl v ɒkrɒm v bɣɒjnd، hjɒt d͡ʒɒvdɒnj rɒ؛ v ɒmɒ bh ɒhl tʔsb kh ɒtɒʔt rɒstj nmj knndblkh mtjʔ nɒrɒstj mj‌bɒʃnd، xʃm v ɣzb vʔzɒb v zjɣ br hr nfs bʃrj kh mrtkb bdj mj‌ʃvd، ɒvl br jhvd v پs br jvnɒnj؛ lkn d͡ʒlɒl v ɒkrɒm v slɒmtj br hr njkvkɒr، nxst brjhvd v br jvnɒnj njz zjrɒ nzd xdɒ trfdɒrj njst، zjrɒآnɒnj kh bdvn ʃrjʔt ɡnɒh knnd، bj‌ʃrjʔt njzhlɒk ʃvnd v آnɒnj kh bɒ ʃrjʔt ɡnɒh knnd، ɒzʃrjʔt br ɒjʃɒn hkm xvɒhd ʃd ɒz آn d͡ʒht kh ʃnvndɡɒn ʃrjʔt dr hzvr xdɒ ʔɒdl njstnd blkh knndɡɒn ʃrjʔt ʔɒdl ʃmrdh xvɒhnd ʃd zjrɒ hrɡɒh ɒmt hɒjj kh ʃrjʔt ndɒrnd kɒrhɒj ʃrjʔt rɒ bh tbjʔt bh‌d͡ʒɒ آrnd، ɒjnɒn hrt͡ʃnd ʃrjʔt ndɒrnd، brɒj xvd ʃrjʔt hstnd، t͡ʃvnkh ɒz ɒjʃɒn zɒhr mj‌ʃvd kh ʔml ʃrjʔt br dl ɒjʃɒn mktvb ɒst v zmjrɒjʃɒn njz ɡvɒhj mj‌dhd v ɒfkɒr ɒjʃɒn bɒ jkdjɡrjɒ mzmt mj‌knnd jɒ ʔzr mj‌آvrnd، dr rvzj kh xdɒ rɒzhɒj mrdm rɒ dɒvrj xvɒhd nmvd bh vsɒtt ʔjsj msjh brhsb bʃɒrt mn پs ɒɡr tv msmj bh jhvd hstj v brʃrjʔt tkjh mj‌knj v bh xdɒ fxr mj‌nmɒjj، v ɒrɒdh ɒv rɒ mj‌dɒnj v ɒz ʃrjʔt trbjt jɒfth، t͡ʃjzhɒj ɒfzl rɒ mj‌ɡzjnj، v jɣjn dɒrj kh xvd hɒdj kvrɒn v nvr zlmtjɒn v mvdb d͡ʒɒhlɒn v mʔlm ɒtfɒl hstj v dr ʃrjʔt svrt mʔrft v rɒstj rɒ dɒrj، پs‌ɒj ksj‌kh djɡrɒn rɒ tʔljm mj‌dhj، t͡ʃrɒ xvd rɒnmj آmvzj؟ v vʔz mj‌knj kh dzdj nbɒjd krd، آjɒ xvd dzdj mj‌knj؟ v ɒz znɒ krdn nhj mj‌knj، آjɒ xvd zɒnj njstj؟ v ɒz bthɒ nfrt dɒrj، آjɒ xvd mʔbdhɒ rɒ ɣɒrt nmj knj؟ v bh ʃrjʔt fxr mj‌knj، آjɒ bh td͡ʒɒvz ɒz ʃrjʔt xdɒ rɒ ɒhɒnt nmj knj؟ zjrɒ kh bh‌sbb ʃmɒdr mjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ ɒsm xdɒ rɒ kfr mj‌ɡvjnd، t͡ʃnɒnkh mktvb ɒst zjrɒ xtnh svdmnd ɒst hrɡɒh bh ʃrjʔt ʔml nmɒjj ɒmɒ ɒɡr ɒz ʃrjʔt td͡ʒɒvznmɒjj، xtnh tv nɒmxtvnj ɡʃth ɒst پs ɒɡrnɒmxtvnj، ɒhkɒm ʃrjʔt rɒ ŋɒh dɒrd، آjɒnɒmxtvnj ɒv xtnh ʃmrdh nmj ʃvd؟ vnɒmxtvnj tbjʔj hrɡɒh ʃrjʔt rɒ bh‌d͡ʒɒ آrd، hkm xvɒhd krd br tv kh bɒ vd͡ʒvd ktb v xtnh ɒzʃrjʔt td͡ʒɒvz mj‌knj zjrɒ آnkh dr zɒhrɒst، jhvdj njst v آnt͡ʃh dr zɒhr dr d͡ʒsm ɒst، xtnh njblkh jhvd آn ɒst kh dr bɒtn bɒʃd v xtnh آnkh ɣlbj bɒʃd، dr rvh nh dr hrf kh mdh آn nh ɒz ɒnsɒn blkh ɒz xdɒst blkh jhvd آn ɒst kh dr bɒtn bɒʃd v xtnh آnkh ɣlbj bɒʃd، dr rvh nh dr hrf kh mdh آn nh ɒz ɒnsɒn blkh ɒz xdɒst پs brtrj jhvd t͡ʃjst؟ v jɒ ɒz xtnh t͡ʃh fɒjdh؟ bsjɒr ɒz hr d͡ʒht؛ ɒvl آnkh bdjʃɒn klɒm xdɒ ɒmɒnt dɒdh ʃdh ɒst zjrɒ kh t͡ʃh bɡvjjm ɒɡr bʔzj ɒjmɒn ndɒʃtnd؟ آjɒbj ɒjmɒnj‌ɒjʃɒn ɒmɒnt xdɒ rɒ bɒtl mj‌sɒzd؟ hɒʃɒ blkh xdɒ rɒstɡv bɒʃd v hr ɒnsɒn drvɣɡv، t͡ʃnɒnkh mktvb ɒst «tɒ ɒjnkh drsxnɒn xvd msdɣ ʃvj v dr dɒvrj xvdɣɒlb آjj» lkn ɒɡr nɒrɒstj mɒ ʔdɒlt xdɒ rɒ sɒbt mj‌knd، t͡ʃh ɡvjjm؟ آjɒ xdɒ zɒlm ɒst vɣtj kh ɣzb mj‌nmɒjd؟ btvr ɒnsɒn sxn mj‌ɡvjm hɒʃɒ dr ɒjn svrt xdɒ t͡ʃɡvnh ʔɒlm rɒdɒvrj xvɒhd krd؟ zjrɒ ɒɡr bh drvɣ mn، rɒstj xdɒ brɒj d͡ʒlɒl ɒv ɒfzvn ʃvd، پs t͡ʃrɒ brmn njz t͡ʃvn ɡnɒhkɒr hkm ʃvd؟ v t͡ʃrɒ ŋvjjm، t͡ʃnɒnkh bʔzj br mɒ ɒftrɒ mj‌znnd v ɡmɒn mj‌brndkh mɒ t͡ʃnjn mj‌ɡvjjm، bdj bknjm tɒ njkvjj hɒsl ʃvd؟ kh ɣsɒs ɒjʃɒn bh ɒnsɒf ɒst پs t͡ʃh ɡvjjm؟ آjɒ brtrj dɒrjm؟ nh bh hjt͡ʃ vd͡ʒh zjrɒ پjʃ ɒdʔɒ vɒrd آvrdjm kh jhvd vjvnɒnjɒn hr dv bh ɡnɒh ɡrftɒrnd t͡ʃnɒnkh mktvb ɒst kh «ksj ʔɒdl njst، jkj hm nj ksj fhjm njst، ksj tɒlb xdɒ njst hmh ɡmrɒh v d͡ʒmjʔ bɒtl ɡrdjdh‌ɒnd njkvkɒrj njst jkj hm nj ɡlvj ɒjʃɒn ɡvr ɡʃɒdh ɒst v bh zbɒnhɒj xvd frjb mj‌dhnd zhr mɒr dr zjr lb ɒjʃɒn ɒst، vdhɒn ɒjʃɒn پr ɒz lʔnt v tlxj ɒst پɒjhɒj ɒjʃɒn brɒj xvn rjxtn ʃtɒbɒn ɒst hlɒkt v پrjʃɒnj dr trjɣhɒj ɒjʃɒn ɒst، v trjɣ slɒmtj rɒ ndɒnsth‌ɒnd xdɒ trsj drt͡ʃʃmɒnʃɒn njst» ɒlɒn آɡɒh hstjm kh آnt͡ʃh ʃrjʔt mj‌ɡvjd، bh ɒhl ʃrjʔt xtɒb mj‌knd tɒ hr dhɒnj bsth ʃvd v tmɒm ʔɒlm zjr ɣsɒs xdɒ آjnd ɒzآnd͡ʒɒ kh bh ɒʔmɒl ʃrjʔt hjt͡ʃ bʃrj dr hzvrɒv ʔɒdl ʃmrdh nxvɒhd ʃd، t͡ʃvnkh ɒz ʃrjʔt dɒnstn ɡnɒh ɒst lkn ɒlhɒl bdvn ʃrjʔt، ʔdɒlt xdɒzɒhr ʃdh ɒst، t͡ʃnɒnkh tvrɒt v ɒnbjɒ br آn ʃhɒdt mj‌dhnd؛ jʔnj ʔdɒlt xdɒ kh bvsjlh ɒjmɒn bh ʔjsj msjh ɒst، bh hmh v kl آnɒnj kh ɒjmɒn آvrnd zjrɒ kh hjt͡ʃ tfɒvtj njst، zjrɒhmh ɡnɒh krdh‌ɒnd vɒz d͡ʒlɒl xdɒ ɣɒsr mj‌bɒʃnd، v bh fjz ɒv md͡ʒɒn ʔɒdl ʃmrdh mj‌ʃvnd bh vsɒtt آn fdjh‌ɒj kh dr ʔjsj msjh ɒst kh xdɒ ɒv rɒ ɒz ɣbl mʔjn krd tɒ kfɒrh bɒʃd bh vɒsth ɒjmɒn bh vsjlh xvn ɒv tɒ آnkh ʔdɒlt xvd rɒ zɒhr sɒzd، bh‌sbb frv ɡzɒʃtn xtɒjɒj sɒbɣ dr hjn thml xdɒ، brɒj ɒzhɒr ʔdɒlt xvd dr zmɒn hɒzr، tɒ ɒv ʔɒdl ʃvd v ʔɒdl ʃmɒrd hrksj rɒ kh bh ʔjsj ɒjmɒn آvrd پs d͡ʒɒj fxr kd͡ʒɒ ɒst؟ brdɒʃth ʃdh ɒst bh kdɒm ʃrjʔt؟ آjɒ bh ʃrjʔt ɒʔmɒl؟ nj blkh bh ʃrjʔt ɒjmɒn zjrɒ jɣjn mj‌dɒnjm kh ɒnsɒn bdvn ɒʔmɒl ʃrjʔt، mhz ɒjmɒn ʔɒdl ʃmrdh mj‌ʃvd آjɒ ɒv xdɒj jhvd ɒst fɣt؟ mɡr xdɒj ɒmt‌hɒ hm njst؟ ɒlbth xdɒj ɒmt‌hɒ njz ɒst zjrɒ vɒhd ɒst xdɒjj kh ɒhl xtnh rɒ ɒz ɒjmɒn، v nɒmxtvnɒn rɒ bh ɒjmɒn ʔɒdl xvɒhd ʃmrdپs آjɒ ʃrjʔt rɒ bh ɒjmɒn bɒtl mj‌sɒzjm؟ hɒʃɒ blkh ʃrjʔt rɒɒstvɒr mj‌dɒrjm پs آjɒ ʃrjʔt rɒ bh ɒjmɒn bɒtl mj‌sɒzjm؟ hɒʃɒ blkh ʃrjʔt rɒɒstvɒr mj‌dɒrjm پs t͡ʃh t͡ʃjz rɒ bɡvjjm kh پdr mɒ ɒbrɒhjm bhsb d͡ʒsm jɒft؟ zjrɒ ɒɡr ɒbrɒhjm bh ɒʔmɒl ʔɒdl ʃmrdh ʃd، d͡ʒɒj fxr dɒrd ɒmɒ nh drnzd xdɒ zjrɒ ktɒb t͡ʃh mj‌ɡvjd؟ «ɒbrɒhjm bh xdɒ ɒjmɒn آvrd v آn brɒj ɒv ʔdɒlt mhsvb ʃd» lkn brɒj ksj‌kh ʔml mj‌knd، mzdʃ nh ɒzrɒh fjz blkh ɒz rɒh tlb mhsvb mj‌ʃvd vɒmɒ ksj‌kh ʔml nknd، blkh ɒjmɒn آvrd bh ɒv kh bj‌djnɒn rɒ ʔɒdl mj‌ʃmɒrd، ɒjmɒn ɒv ʔdɒlt mhsvb mj‌ʃvd t͡ʃnɒnkh dɒvd njz xvʃ hɒlj آn ks rɒ zkr mj‌knd kh xdɒ brɒj ɒv ʔdɒlt mhsvb mj‌dɒrd، bdvn ɒʔmɒl «xvʃɒbhɒl ksɒnj kh xtɒjɒj ɒjʃɒn آmrzjdh ʃd vɡnɒhɒnʃɒn mstvr ɡrdjd؛ xvʃɒbhɒl ksj‌kh xdɒvnd ɡnɒh rɒ bh vj mhsvb nfrmɒjd» پs آjɒ ɒjn xvʃhɒlj br ɒhl xtnh ɡfth ʃdjɒ brɒj nɒmxtvnɒn njz؟ zjrɒ mj‌ɡvjjm ɒjmɒn ɒbrɒhjm bh ʔdɒlt mhsvb ɡʃt پs dr t͡ʃh hɒlt mhsvb ʃd، vɣtj kh ɒv dr xtnh bvd jɒdr nɒmxtvnj؟ dr xtnh nj، blkh dr nɒmxtvnj؛ v ʔlɒmt xtnh rɒ jɒft tɒ mhr bɒʃd br آn ʔdɒlt ɒjmɒnj kh dr nɒmxtvnj dɒʃt، tɒ ɒv hmh nɒmxtvnɒn rɒ kh ɒjmɒn آvrnd پdr bɒʃd tɒ ʔdɒlt brɒj ɒjʃɒn hm mhsvb ʃvd؛ v پdr ɒhl xtnh njz jʔnj آnɒnj rɒ kh nh fɣt mxtvnnd blkh sɒlk hm mj‌bɒʃnd br آsɒr ɒjmɒnj kh پdr mɒɒbrɒhjm dr nɒmxtvnj dɒʃt zjrɒ bh ɒbrɒhjm v zrjt ɒv، vʔdh‌ɒj kh ɒvvɒrs d͡ʒhɒn xvɒhd bvd، ɒz d͡ʒht ʃrjʔt dɒdh nʃd blkh ɒz ʔdɒlt ɒjmɒn zjrɒ ɒɡr ɒhl ʃrjʔt vɒrs bɒʃnd، ɒjmɒn ʔɒtl ʃd v vʔdh bɒtl zjrɒ kh ʃrjʔt bɒʔs ɣzb ɒst، zjrɒ d͡ʒɒjj kh ʃrjʔt njst td͡ʒɒvz hm njst v ɒzɒjn d͡ʒht ɒz ɒjmɒn ʃd tɒ mhz fjz bɒʃd tɒvʔdh brɒj hmɡj zrjt ɒstvɒr ʃvd nh mxts bh zrjt ʃrʔj blkh bh zrjt ɒjmɒnj ɒbrɒhjm njzkh پdr d͡ʒmjʔ mɒ ɒst، t͡ʃnɒnkh mktvb ɒst kh tv rɒ پdr ɒmt hɒj bsjɒr sɒxth‌ɒm dr hzvrآn xdɒjj kh bh ɒv ɒjmɒn آvrd kh mrdɡɒn rɒ zndh mj‌knd v nɒmvd͡ʒvdɒt rɒ bh vd͡ʒvd mj‌xvɒnd؛ kh ɒv dr nɒɒmjdj bh ɒmjd ɒjmɒn آvrd tɒ پdrɒmt hɒj bsjɒr ʃvd، brhsb آnt͡ʃh ɡfth ʃd kh «zrjt tv t͡ʃnjn xvɒhnd bvd» v dr ɒjmɒn km ɣvt nʃdh، nzr krd bh bdn xvd kh dr آn vɣt mrdh bvd، t͡ʃvnkh ɣrjb bh sd sɒlh bvd v bh rhm mrdh sɒrh v dr vʔdh xdɒ ɒz bj‌ɒjmɒnj ʃk nnmvd، blkh ɣvj ɒlɒjmɒn ɡʃth، xdɒ rɒ tmd͡ʒjdnmvd، v jɣjn dɒnst kh bh vfɒj vʔdh xvd njzɣɒdr ɒst v ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht brɒj ɒv ʔdɒlt mhsvb ʃd vlkn ɒjnkh brɒj vj mhsvb ʃd، nh brɒj ɒv fɣt nvʃth ʃd، blkh brɒj mɒ njzkh bh mɒ mhsvb xvɒhd ʃd، t͡ʃvn ɒjmɒn آvrjm bh ɒv kh xdɒvnd mɒ ʔjsj rɒ ɒz mrdɡɒn brxjzɒnjd،kh bh‌sbb ɡnɒhɒn mɒ tsljm ɡrdjd v bh‌sbb ʔɒdl ʃdn mɒ brxjzɒnjdh ʃd kh bh‌sbb ɡnɒhɒn mɒ tsljm ɡrdjd v bh‌sbb ʔɒdl ʃdn mɒ brxjzɒnjdh ʃd پs t͡ʃvnkh bh ɒjmɒn ʔɒdl ʃmrdh ʃdjm، nzd xdɒ slɒmtj dɒrjm bvsɒtt xdɒvndmɒ ʔjsj msjh، kh bh vsɒtt ɒv dxvl njzjɒfth‌ɒjm bvsjlh ɒjmɒn dr آn fjzj kh dr آn پɒjdɒrjm v bh ɒmjd d͡ʒlɒl xdɒ fxr mj‌nmɒjjm vnh ɒjn tnhɒ blkh dr msjbthɒ hm fxr mj‌knjm، t͡ʃvnkh mj‌dɒnjm kh msjbt sbr rɒ پjdɒ mj‌knd، v sbr ɒmthɒn rɒ v ɒmthɒn ɒmjd rɒ v ɒmjd bɒʔs ʃrmsɒrj nmj ʃvd zjrɒ kh mhbt xdɒ drdlhɒj mɒ bh rvh‌ɒlɣds kh bh mɒ ʔtɒ ʃd rjxth ʃdh ɒst zjrɒ hŋɒmj kh mɒ hnvz zʔjf bvdjm، dr zmɒn mʔjn، msjh brɒj bjdjnɒn vfɒt jɒft zjrɒ bʔjd ɒst kh brɒj ʃxs ʔɒdl ksj bmjrd، hrt͡ʃnd dr rɒh mrd njkv mmkn ɒst ksj njz d͡ʒrɒt knd kh bmjrd lkn xdɒ mhbt xvd rɒ dr mɒ sɒbt mj‌knd ɒz ɒjnkh hŋɒmj kh mɒhnvz ɡnɒhkɒr bvdjm، msjh dr rɒh mɒ mrd پs t͡ʃɣdr bjʃtr ɒlɒn kh bh xvn ɒv ʔɒdl ʃmrdh ʃdjm، bvsjlh ɒv ɒz ɣzb nd͡ʒɒt xvɒhjm jɒft zjrɒ ɒɡr dr hɒltj kh dʃmn bvdjm، bvsɒtt mrɡ پsrʃ bɒ xdɒ slh dɒdh ʃdjm، پs t͡ʃɣdrbjʃtr bʔd ɒz slh jɒftn bvsɒtt hjɒt ɒv nd͡ʒɒt xvɒhjm jɒft v nh hmjn fɣt blkh dr xdɒ hm fxr mj‌knjm bvsjlh xdɒvnd mɒ ʔjsj msjh kh bvsɒtt ɒv ɒlɒn slh jɒfth‌ɒjm lhzɒ hmt͡ʃnɒn‌kh bvsɒtt jk آdm ɡnɒh dɒxl d͡ʒhɒn ɡrdjd v bh ɡnɒh mvt؛ v bh ɒjŋvnh mvt br hmh mrdm tɒrj ɡʃt، ɒz آnd͡ʒɒ kh hmh ɡnɒh krdnd zjrɒ ɣbl ɒz ʃrjʔt، ɡnɒh dr d͡ʒhɒn mj‌bvd، lkn ɡnɒh mhsvb nmj ʃvd dr d͡ʒɒjj kh ʃrjʔt njst blkh ɒz آdm tɒ mvsj mvt tslt mj‌dɒʃt br آnɒnj njz kh br msɒl td͡ʒɒvz آdm kh nmvnh آn آjndh ɒst، ɡnɒh nkrdh bvdnd v nh‌t͡ʃnɒnkh xtɒ bvd، hmt͡ʃnɒn nʔmt njz bɒʃd zjrɒɒɡr bh xtɒj jk ʃxs bsjɒrj mrdnd، t͡ʃɣdrzjɒdh fjz xdɒ v آn bxʃʃj kh bh fjz jk ɒnsɒn، jʔnj ʔjsj msjh ɒst، brɒj bsjɒrj ɒfzvn ɡrdjd v nh ɒjnkh msl آnt͡ʃh ɒz jk ɡnɒhkɒr sr zd، hmt͡ʃnɒn bxʃʃ bɒʃd؛ zjrɒhkm ʃd ɒz jk brɒj ɣsɒs lkn nʔmt ɒzxtɒjɒj bsjɒr brɒj ʔdɒlt rsjd zjrɒ ɒɡr bh‌sbb xtɒj jk nfr v bvɒsth آn jk mvt sltnt krd، t͡ʃɣdr bjʃtr آnɒnj kh ɒfzvnj fjz v bxʃʃ ʔdɒlt rɒ mj‌پzjrnd، dr hjɒt sltnt xvɒhnd krd bvsjlh jk jʔnj ʔjsj msjh پs hmt͡ʃnɒn‌kh bh jk xtɒ hkm ʃd brd͡ʒmjʔ mrdmɒn brɒj ɣsɒs، hmt͡ʃnjn bh jk ʔml sɒlh bxʃʃ ʃd br d͡ʒmjʔ mrdmɒn brɒj ʔdɒlt hjɒt zjrɒ bh hmjn ɣsmj kh ɒznɒfrmɒnj jk ʃxs bsjɒrj ɡnɒhkɒr ʃdnd، hmt͡ʃnjn njz bh ɒtɒʔt jk ʃxs bsjɒrj ʔɒdl xvɒhnd ɡrdjd ɒmɒ ʃrjʔt dr mjɒn آmd tɒxtɒ zjɒdh ʃvd lkn d͡ʒɒjj kh ɡnɒh zjɒdh ɡʃt، fjz bjnhɒjt ɒfzvn ɡrdjdtɒ آnkh t͡ʃnɒnkh ɡnɒh dr mvt sltnt krd، hmt͡ʃnjn fjz njzsltnt nmɒjd bh ʔdɒlt brɒj hjɒt d͡ʒɒvdɒnj bvsɒtt xdɒvnd mɒ ʔjsj msjh tɒ آnkh t͡ʃnɒnkh ɡnɒh dr mvt sltnt krd، hmt͡ʃnjn fjz njzsltnt nmɒjd bh ʔdɒlt brɒj hjɒt d͡ʒɒvdɒnj bvsɒtt xdɒvnd mɒ ʔjsj msjh پs t͡ʃh ɡvjjm؟ آjɒ dr ɡnɒh bmɒnjm tɒ fjz ɒfzvn ɡrdd؟ hɒʃɒ mɒjɒnj kh ɒz ɡnɒh mrdjm، t͡ʃɡvnh djɡr dr آn zjst knjm؟ jɒnmj dɒnjd kh d͡ʒmjʔ mɒ kh dr msjh ʔjsj tʔmjdjɒftjm، dr mvt ɒv tʔmjd jɒftjm؟ پs t͡ʃvnkh dr mvt ɒv tʔmjd jɒftjm، bɒ ɒv dfn ʃdjm tɒ آnkh bh hmjn ɣsmj kh msjh bh d͡ʒlɒl پdr ɒz mrdɡɒn brxɒst، mɒ njz dr tɒzɡj hjɒt rftɒr nmɒjjm zjrɒ ɒɡr br msɒl mvt ɒv mthd ɡʃtjm، hrآjnh dr ɣjɒmt vj njz t͡ʃnjn xvɒhjm ʃd zjrɒ ɒjn rɒmj dɒnjm kh ɒnsɒnjt khnh mɒ bɒ ɒv mslvb ʃd tɒd͡ʒsd ɡnɒh mʔdvm ɡʃth، djɡr ɡnɒh rɒ bndɡj nknjm zjrɒ hr‌kh mrd، ɒz ɡnɒh mbrɒ ʃdh ɒst پs hrɡɒh bɒ msjh mrdjm، jɣjn mj‌dɒnjm kh bɒ ɒvzjst hm xvɒhjm krd zjrɒ mj‌dɒnjm kh t͡ʃvn msjh ɒz mrdɡɒn brxɒst، djɡr nmj mjrd v bʔdɒz ɒjn mvt br ɒv tsltj ndɒrd zjrɒ bh آnt͡ʃh mrd jk mrtbh brɒj ɡnɒh mrd v bh آnt͡ʃh zndɡj mj‌knd، brɒj xdɒ zjst mj‌knd hmt͡ʃnjn ʃmɒ njz xvd rɒ brɒj ɡnɒh mrdh ɒŋɒrjd، ɒmɒ brɒj xdɒ dr msjh ʔjsj zndh پs ɡnɒh dr d͡ʒsm fɒnj ʃmɒ hkmrɒnj nknd tɒ hvshɒj آn rɒ ɒtɒʔt nmɒjjd، vɒʔzɒj xvd rɒ bh ɡnɒh msپɒrjd tɒ آlɒt nɒrɒstj ʃvnd، blkh xvd rɒ ɒz mrdɡɒn zndh ʃdh bh xdɒtsljm knjd v ɒʔzɒj xvd rɒ tɒ آlɒt ʔdɒlt brɒj xdɒ bɒʃnd zjrɒ ɡnɒh br ʃmɒ sltnt nxvɒhd krd، t͡ʃvnkh zjr ʃrjʔt njstjd blkh zjrfjz پs t͡ʃh ɡvjjm؟ آjɒ ɡnɒh bknjm ɒz آnrv kh zjr ʃrjʔt njstjm blkh zjr fjz؟ hɒʃɒ آjɒnmj dɒnjd kh ɒɡr xvjʃtn rɒ bh bndɡj ksj tsljm krdh، ɒv rɒ ɒtɒʔt nmɒjjd، ʃmɒ آnks rɒ kh ɒv rɒɒtɒʔt mj‌knjd bndh hstjd، xvɒh ɡnɒh rɒ brɒj mrɡ، xvɒh ɒtɒʔt rɒ brɒj ʔdɒlt ɒmɒ ʃkrxdɒ rɒ kh hrt͡ʃnd ɣlɒmɒn ɡnɒh mj‌bvdjd، ljkn ɒlɒn ɒz dl، mtjʔ آn svrt tʔljm ɡrdjdh‌ɒjd kh bh آn sپrdh ʃdh‌ɒjd v ɒz ɡnɒh آzɒd ʃdh، ɣlɒmɒn ʔdɒlt ɡʃth‌ɒjd btvr ɒnsɒn، bh‌sbb zʔf d͡ʒsm ʃmɒ sxn mj‌ɡvjm، zjrɒ hmt͡ʃnɒn‌kh ɒʔzɒj xvd rɒ bndɡj nd͡ʒɒst v ɡnɒh brɒj ɡnɒh sپrdjd، hmt͡ʃnjn ɒlɒn njz ɒʔzɒj xvd rɒ bh bndɡj ʔdɒlt brɒj ɣdvsjt bsپɒrjd zjrɒhŋɒmj kh ɣlɒmɒn ɡnɒh mj‌bvdjd ɒz ʔdɒlt آzɒdmj bvdjd پs آn vɣt t͡ʃh smr dɒʃtjd ɒz آn kɒrhɒjj kh ɒlɒn ɒz آnhɒ ʃrmndh‌ɒjd kh ɒnd͡ʒɒm آnhɒmvt ɒst؟ ɒmɒ ɒlhɒl t͡ʃvnkh ɒz ɡnɒh آzɒd ʃdh v ɣlɒmɒn xdɒ ɡʃth‌ɒjd، smr xvd rɒ brɒj ɣdvsjt mj‌آvrjd kh ʔɒɣbt آn، hjɒt d͡ʒɒvdɒnj ɒstzjrɒ kh mzd ɡnɒh mvt ɒst، ɒmɒ nʔmt xdɒ hjɒt d͡ʒɒvdɒnj dr xdɒvnd mɒʔjsj msjh zjrɒ kh mzd ɡnɒh mvt ɒst، ɒmɒ nʔmt xdɒ hjɒt d͡ʒɒvdɒnj dr xdɒvnd mɒʔjsj msjh ɒj brɒdrɒn آjɒ nmj dɒnjd zjrɒ kh bɒ ʔɒrfjn ʃrjʔt sxn mj‌ɡvjm kh mɒdɒmj kh ɒnsɒn zndh ɒst، ʃrjʔt br vj hkmrɒnj dɒrd؟ zjrɒ zn mnkvhh brhsb ʃrjʔt bh ʃvhrzndh bsth ɒst، ɒmɒ hrɡɒh ʃvhrʃ bmjrd، ɒzʃrjʔt ʃvhrʃ آzɒd ʃvd پs mɒdɒmj kh ʃvhrʃ hjɒt dɒrd، ɒɡr bh mrd djɡr پjvndd، zɒnjh xvɒndh mj‌ʃvd lkn hrɡɒh ʃvhrʃ bmjrd، ɒz آn ʃrjʔt آzɒd ɒst kh ɒɡr bh ʃvhrj djɡrdɒdh ʃvd، zɒnjh nbɒʃd bnɒbrɒjn، ɒj brɒdrɒn mn، ʃmɒ njz bvsɒtt d͡ʒsd msjh brɒj ʃrjʔt mrdh ʃdjd tɒ xvd rɒbh djɡrj پjvndjd، jʔnj bɒ ɒv kh ɒz mrdɡɒn brxɒst، tɒ bd͡ʒht xdɒ smr آvrjm zjrɒ vɣtj kh dr d͡ʒsm bvdjm، hvshɒj ɡnɒhɒnj kh ɒzʃrjʔt bvd، dr ɒʔzɒj mɒ ʔml mj‌krd tɒ bd͡ʒht mvt smr آvrjm ɒmɒ ɒlhɒl t͡ʃvn brɒj آn t͡ʃjzj kh dr آn bsth bvdjm mrdjm، ɒz ʃrjʔt آzɒd ʃdjm، bhdj kh dr tɒzɡj rvh bndɡj mj‌knjm nh dr khŋj hrf پs t͡ʃh ɡvjjm؟ آjɒ ʃrjʔt ɡnɒh ɒst؟ hɒʃɒ blkh ɡnɒh rɒ d͡ʒz bh ʃrjʔt ndɒnstjm zjrɒkh ʃhvt rɒ nmj dɒnstm، ɒɡr ʃrjʔt nmj ɡft kh tmʔ mvrz lkn ɡnɒh ɒz hkm frst d͡ʒsth، hr ɣsm tmʔ rɒ dr mn پdjd آvrd، zjrɒ bdvn ʃrjʔt ɡnɒh mrdh ɒst v mn ɒz ɣbl bdvn ʃrjʔt zndh mj‌bvdm؛ lkn t͡ʃvn hkm آmd، ɡnɒh zndh ɡʃt v mn mrdm v آn hkmj kh brɒj hjɒt bvd، hmɒn mrɒ bɒʔs mvt ɡrdjd zjrɒɡnɒh ɒz hkm frst jɒfth، mrɒ frjb dɒd v bh آn mrɒ kʃt xlɒsh ʃrjʔt mɣds ɒst v hkm mɣds v ʔɒdl v njkv پs آjɒ njkvjj brɒj mn mvt ɡrdjd؟ hɒʃɒ blkh ɡnɒh، tɒ ɡnɒh bvdnʃ zɒhr ʃvd bvsjlh njkvjj brɒj mn bɒʔs mrɡ ʃd tɒ آnkh ɡnɒh bh‌sbb hkm bɣɒjt xbjs ʃvd zjrɒ mj‌dɒnjm kh ʃrjʔt rvhɒnj ɒst، lkn mn d͡ʒsmɒnj v zjr ɡnɒh frvxth ʃdh hstm، kh آnt͡ʃh mj‌knm nmj dɒnm zjrɒ آnt͡ʃh mj‌xvɒhm nmj knm blkh kɒrj rɒ kh ɒz آn nfrt dɒrm bd͡ʒɒmj آvrm پs hrɡɒh kɒrj rɒ kh nmj xvɒhm bh‌d͡ʒɒ mj‌آvrm، ʃrjʔt rɒ tsdjɣ mj‌knm kh njkvst v ɒlhɒl mn djɡr fɒʔl آn njstm blkh آn ɡnɒhj kh dr mn sɒkn ɒst zjrɒmj dɒnm kh dr mn jʔnj dr d͡ʒsdm hjt͡ʃ njkvjj sɒkn njst، zjrɒ kh ɒrɒdh dr mn hɒzr ɒst ɒmɒsvrt njkv krdn nj zjrɒ آn njkvjj rɒ kh mj‌xvɒhm nmj knm، blkh bdj rɒ kh nmj xvɒhm mj‌knm پs t͡ʃvn آnt͡ʃh rɒ nmj xvɒhm mj‌knm، mn djɡr fɒʔl آn njstm blkh ɡnɒh kh dr mn sɒkn ɒst lhzɒ ɒjn ʃrjʔt rɒ mj‌jɒbm kh vɣtj kh mj‌xvɒhm njkvjj knm bdj nzd mn hɒzr ɒst zjrɒ brhsb ɒnsɒnjt bɒtnj bh ʃrjʔt xdɒxʃnvdm lkn ʃrjʔtj djɡr dr ɒʔzɒj xvdmj bjnm kh bɒ ʃrjʔt zhn mn mnɒzʔh mj‌knd v mrɒɒsjr mj‌sɒzd bh آn ʃrjʔt ɡnɒh kh dr ɒʔzɒj mn ɒst vɒj br mn kh mrd ʃɣj‌ɒj hstm kjst kh mrɒ ɒz d͡ʒsm ɒjn mvt rhɒjj bxʃd؟xdɒ rɒʃkr mj‌knm bvsɒtt xdɒvnd mɒ ʔjsj msjh xlɒsh ɒjnkh mn bh zhn xvd ʃrjʔt xdɒ rɒbndɡj mj‌knm v ɒmɒ bh d͡ʒsm xvd ʃrjʔt ɡnɒh rɒ xdɒ rɒʃkr mj‌knm bvsɒtt xdɒvnd mɒ ʔjsj msjh xlɒsh ɒjnkh mn bh zhn xvd ʃrjʔt xdɒ rɒbndɡj mj‌knm v ɒmɒ bh d͡ʒsm xvd ʃrjʔt ɡnɒh rɒ پs hjt͡ʃ ɣsɒs njst br آnɒnj kh drmsjh ʔjsj hstnd zjrɒ kh ʃrjʔt rvh hjɒt dr msjh ʔjsj mrɒ ɒz ʃrjʔt ɡnɒh vmvt آzɒd ɡrdɒnjd zjrɒ آnt͡ʃh ɒz ʃrjʔt mhɒl bvd، t͡ʃvnkh bh‌sbb d͡ʒsm zʔjf bvd، xdɒ پsrxvd rɒ dr ʃbjh d͡ʒsm ɡnɒh v brɒj ɡnɒh frstɒdh، brɡnɒh dr d͡ʒsm ftvɒ dɒd، tɒ ʔdɒlt ʃrjʔt kɒml ɡrdd dr mɒjɒnj kh nh bhsb d͡ʒsm blkh brhsb rvh rftɒr mj‌knjm zjrɒ آnɒnj kh brhsb d͡ʒsm hstnd، drt͡ʃjzhɒj d͡ʒsm tfkr mj‌knnd v ɒmɒ آnɒnj kh brhsb rvh hstnd dr t͡ʃjzhɒj rvh ɒz آn d͡ʒht kh tfkr d͡ʒsm mvt ɒst، lkn tfkr rvh hjɒt v slɒmtj ɒst zɒnrv kh tfkr d͡ʒsm dʃmnj xdɒ ɒst، t͡ʃvnkh ʃrjʔt xdɒ rɒɒtɒʔt nmj knd، zjrɒ nmj tvɒnd hm bknd vksɒnj kh d͡ʒsmɒnj hstnd، nmj tvɒnnd xdɒ rɒxʃnvd sɒznd lkn ʃmɒ dr d͡ʒsm njstjd blkh dr rvh، hrɡɒh rvh xdɒ dr ʃmɒ sɒkn bɒʃd؛ vhrɡɒh ksj rvh msjh rɒ ndɒrd vj ɒz آn ɒvnjst v ɒɡr msjh dr ʃmɒ ɒst، d͡ʒsm bh‌sbb ɡnɒh mrdh ɒst v ɒmɒ rvh، bh‌sbb ʔdɒlt، hjɒt‌ɒst v ɒɡr rvh ɒv kh ʔjsj rɒ ɒzmrdɡɒn brxjzɒnjd dr ʃmɒ sɒkn bɒʃd، ɒv kh msjh rɒ ɒz mrdɡɒn brxjzɒnjd، bdnhɒj fɒnj ʃmɒrɒ njz zndh xvɒhd sɒxt bh rvh xvd kh dr ʃmɒsɒkn ɒst bnɒbrɒjn‌ɒj brɒdrɒn، mdjvn d͡ʒsm njstjm tɒbrhsb d͡ʒsm zjst nmɒjjm zjrɒ ɒɡrbrhsb d͡ʒsm zjst knjd، hrآjnh xvɒhjd mrd lkn ɒɡr ɒfʔɒl bdn rɒ bvsjlh rvh bkʃjd، hmɒnɒ xvɒhjd zjst zjrɒ hmh ksɒnj kh ɒz rvh xdɒ hdɒjt mj‌ʃvnd، ɒjʃɒn پsrɒn xdɒjnd ɒz آnrv kh rvh bndɡj rɒ njɒfth‌ɒjd tɒ bɒz trsɒn ʃvjd blkh rvh پsr‌xvɒndɡj rɒ jɒfth‌ɒjd kh bh آn ɒbɒ jʔnj‌ɒj پdr ndɒ mj‌knjm hmɒn rvh brrvhhɒj mɒ ʃhɒdt mj‌dhd kh frzndɒn xdɒhstjm v hrɡɒh frzndɒnjm، vɒrsɒn hm hstjm jʔnj vrsh xdɒ v hm‌ɒrs bɒ msjh، ɒɡr ʃrjk msjbthɒj ɒv hstjm tɒ dr d͡ʒlɒl vj njz ʃrjk bɒʃjm zjrɒ jɣjn mj‌dɒnm kh drdhɒj zmɒn hɒzrnsbt bh آn d͡ʒlɒlj kh dr mɒ zɒhr xvɒhd ʃd hjt͡ʃ ɒst zjrɒ kh ɒntzɒr xlɣt، mntzr zhvrپsrɒn xdɒ mj‌bɒʃd، zjrɒ xlɣt، mtjʔ btɒlt ʃd، nh bh ɒrɒdh xvd، blkh bxɒtr ɒv kh آn rɒ mtjʔ ɡrdɒnjd، dr ɒmjd kh xvd xlɣt njz ɒz ɣjdfsɒd xlɒsj xvɒhd jɒft tɒ dr آzɒdj d͡ʒlɒl frzndɒn xdɒ ʃrjk ʃvd zjrɒ mj‌dɒnjm kh tmɒm xlɣt tɒ ɒlɒn bɒ hm dr آh kʃjdn v drd zh mj‌bɒʃnd v nh ɒjn fɣt، blkh mɒ njz kh nvbr rvh rɒ jɒfth‌ɒjm، dr xvd آh mj‌kʃjm dr ɒntzɒrپsrxvɒndɡj jʔnj xlɒsj d͡ʒsm xvd zjrɒkh bh ɒmjd nd͡ʒɒt jɒftjm، lkn t͡ʃvn ɒmjd djdh ʃd، djɡr ɒmjd njst، zjrɒ آnt͡ʃh ksj bjnd t͡ʃrɒ djɡrdr ɒmjd آn bɒʃd؟ ɒmɒ ɒɡr ɒmjd t͡ʃjzj rɒ dɒrjm kh nmj bjnjm، bɒ sbr ɒntzɒr آn mj‌kʃjm v hmt͡ʃnjn rvh njz zʔf mɒ rɒ mddmj knd، zjrɒ kh آnt͡ʃh dʔɒ knjm btvrj kh mj‌bɒjdnmj dɒnjm، lkn xvd rvh brɒj mɒ ʃfɒʔt mj‌knd bh nɒlh hɒjj kh nmj ʃvd bjɒn krd v ɒv kh tfhs knndh dlhɒst، fkr rvh rɒ mj‌dɒnd zjrɒkh ɒv brɒj mɣdsjn brhsb ɒrɒdh xdɒ ʃfɒʔt mj‌knd v mj‌dɒnjm kh bd͡ʒht آnɒnj kh xdɒ rɒdvst mj‌dɒrnd v bhsb ɒrɒdh ɒv xvɒndh ʃdh‌ɒnd، hmh‌t͡ʃjzhɒ brɒj xjrjt ɒjʃɒn bɒ hm dr kɒr mj‌bɒʃnd zjrɒ آnɒnj rɒ kh ɒz ɣbl ʃnɒxt، ɒjʃɒn rɒ njz پjʃ mʔjn frmvd tɒ bh svrt پsrʃ mtʃkl ʃvnd tɒ ɒv nxst zɒdh ɒzbrɒdrɒn bsjɒr bɒʃd v آnɒnj rɒ kh ɒz ɣbl mʔjn frmvd، ɒjʃɒn rɒ hm xvɒnd v آnɒnj rɒ kh xvɒndɒjʃɒn rɒ njz ʔɒdl ɡrdɒnjd v آnɒnj rɒ kh ʔɒdl ɡrdɒnjd، ɒjʃɒn rɒ njz d͡ʒlɒl dɒd پs bh ɒjn t͡ʃjzhɒ t͡ʃh ɡvjjm؟ hrɡɒh xdɒ bɒmɒ ɒst kjst bh zd mɒ؟ ɒv kh پsr xvd rɒdrjɣ ndɒʃt، blkh ɒv rɒ dr rɒh d͡ʒmjʔ mɒ tsljm nmvd، t͡ʃɡvnh bɒ vj hmh‌t͡ʃjz rɒ bh mɒ nxvɒhdbxʃjd؟ kjst kh br brɡzjdɡɒn xdɒ mdʔj ʃvd؟ آjɒ xdɒ kh ʔɒdl knndh ɒst؟ kjst kh br ɒjʃɒn ftvɒ dhd؟ آjɒ msjh kh mrd blkh njzbrxɒst، آnkh bh‌dst rɒst xdɒ hm hst vmɒ rɒ njz ʃfɒʔt mj‌knd؟ kjst kh mɒ zjɒdh nsrt jɒftjm، bvsjlh ɒv kh mɒ rɒ mhbt nmvd zjrɒjɣjn mj‌dɒnm kh nh mvt v nh hjɒt v nh frʃtɡɒn v nh rvsɒ v nh ɣdrthɒ v nh t͡ʃjzhɒj hɒl v nh t͡ʃjzhɒj آjndhv nh blndj v nh پstj v nh hjt͡ʃ mxlvɣ djɡr ɣdrt xvɒhd dɒʃt kh mɒ rɒ ɒzmhbt xdɒ kh dr xdɒvnd mɒ msjh ʔjsj ɒst d͡ʒdɒ sɒzd v nh blndj v nh پstj v nh hjt͡ʃ mxlvɣ djɡr ɣdrt xvɒhd dɒʃt kh mɒ rɒ ɒzmhbt xdɒ kh dr xdɒvnd mɒ msjh ʔjsj ɒst d͡ʒdɒ sɒzd dr msjh rɒst mj‌ɡvjm v drvɣ nj v zmjr mn dr rvh‌ɒlɣds mrɒ ʃɒhd ɒst، kh mrɒ ɣmj ʔzjm v dr dlm vd͡ʒʔ dɒئmj ɒst zjrɒ rɒzj hm mj‌bvdm kh xvd ɒz msjh mhrvm ʃvm dr rɒh brɒdrɒnm kh bhsb d͡ʒsm xvjʃɒn mnnd، kh ɒjʃɒn ɒsrɒئjlj‌ɒnd v پsrxvɒndɡj vd͡ʒlɒl v ʔhdhɒ v ɒmɒnt ʃrjʔt v ʔbɒdt vvʔdh‌hɒ ɒz آn ɒjʃɒn ɒst؛ kh پdrɒn ɒz آn ɒjʃɒnnd v ɒz ɒjʃɒn msjh bhsb d͡ʒsm ʃd kh fvɣ ɒz hmh ɒst، xdɒj mtbɒrk tɒ ɒbdɒlɒbɒd، آmjn vlkn t͡ʃnjn njst kh klɒm xdɒ sɒɣt ʃdh bɒʃd؛ zjrɒ hmh kh ɒz ɒsrɒئjl‌ɒnd، ɒsrɒئjlj njstnd، v nh nsl ɒbrɒhjm tmɒm frznd hstnd؛ blkh nsl tv dr ɒshɒɣ xvɒndh xvɒhnd ʃd jʔnj frzndɒn d͡ʒsm، frzndɒn xdɒ njstnd، blkh frzndɒn vʔdh ɒz nsl mhsvb mj‌ʃvnd zjrɒklɒm vʔdh ɒjn ɒst kh mvɒfɣ t͡ʃnjn vɣt xvɒhm آmd v sɒrh rɒ پsrj xvɒhd bvd v nh ɒjn fɣt، blkh rfɣh �jz t͡ʃvn ɒz jk ʃxs jʔnj ɒz پdr mɒɒshɒɣ hɒmlh ʃd، zjrɒ hŋɒmj kh hnvz tvldnjɒfth bvdnd v ʔmlj njk jɒ bd nkrdh، tɒ ɒrɒdh xdɒbrhsb ɒxtjɒr sɒbt ʃvd nh ɒz ɒʔmɒl blkh ɒzdʔvt knndh bdv ɡfth ʃd kh «bzrɡtr kvt͡ʃktr rɒ bndɡj xvɒhd nmvd» t͡ʃnɒnkh mktvb ɒst «jʔɣvb rɒ dvst dɒʃtm ɒmɒ ʔjsv rɒ dʃmn» پs t͡ʃh ɡvjjm؟ آjɒ nzd xdɒ bj‌ɒnsɒfj ɒst؟ hɒʃɒ zjrɒ bh mvsj mj‌ɡvjd «rhm xvɒhm frmvd br hr‌kh rhm knm v rɒft xvɒhm nmvd br hr‌kh rɒft nmɒjm» lɒd͡ʒrm nh ɒzxvɒhʃ knndh v nh ɒz ʃtɒbndh ɒst، blkh ɒzxdɒj rhm knndh zjrɒ ktɒb bh frʔvn mj‌ɡvjd «brɒj hmjn tv rɒ brɒŋjxtm tɒ ɣvt xvd rɒ dr tv zɒhr sɒzm v tɒ nɒm mn dr tmɒm d͡ʒhɒn ndɒ ʃvd» bnɒbrɒjn hr‌kh rɒ mj‌xvɒhd rhm mj‌ɡvjd kh t͡ʃrɒ mrɒt͡ʃnjn sɒxtj؟ jɒ kvzh‌ɡr ɒxtjɒr br ɡl ndɒrdkh ɒz jk xmjrh zrfj ʔzjz v zrfj zljl bsɒzd؟ v ɒɡr xdɒ t͡ʃvn ɒrɒdh nmvd kh ɣzb xvd rɒ zɒhr sɒzd v ɣdrt xvjʃ rɒ bʃnɒsɒnd، zrvf ɣzb rɒ kh brɒj hlɒkt آmɒdh‌ʃdh bvd، bh hlm bsjɒr mthml ɡrdjd، v tɒ dvlt d͡ʒlɒl xvd rɒ bʃnɒsɒnd br zrvf rhmtj kh آnhɒ rɒ ɒzɣbl brɒj d͡ʒlɒl mstʔd nmvd، v آnhɒ rɒ njzdʔvt frmvd jʔnj mɒ nh ɒz jhvd fɣt blkh ɒzɒmt‌hɒ njz t͡ʃnɒnkh dr hvʃʔ hm mj‌ɡvjd «آnɒnj rɒ kh ɣvm mn nbvdnd، ɣvm xvd xvɒhm xvɒnd v ɒv rɒ kh dvst ndɒʃtm mhbvbh xvd v d͡ʒɒjj kh bh ɒjʃɒn ɡfth ʃd kh ʃmɒ ɣvm mn njstjd، dr آnd͡ʒɒ پsrɒn xdɒj hj xvɒndh xvɒhnd ʃd» v ɒʃʔjɒ njz dr hɣ ɒsrɒئjl ndɒmj knd kh «hrt͡ʃnd ʔdd bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl mɒnnd rjɡ drjɒ bɒʃd، lkn bɣjh nd͡ʒɒt xvɒhnd jɒft؛ zjrɒxdɒvnd klɒm xvd rɒ tmɒm v mnɣtʔ sɒxth، brzmjn bh ʔml xvɒhd آvrd» v t͡ʃnɒnkh ɒʃʔjɒپjʃ ɒxbɒr nmvd kh «ɒɡr rb ɒld͡ʒnvd brɒj mɒ nslj nmj ɡzɒrd، hrآjnh msl sdvm mj‌ʃdjm v mɒnndɣmvrh mj‌ɡʃtjm» پs t͡ʃh ɡvjjm؟ ɒmt hɒjj kh dr‌پj ʔdɒlt nrftnd، ʔdɒlt rɒ hɒsl nmvdnd، jʔnj ʔdɒltj kh ɒz ɒjmɒn ɒst lkn ɒsrɒئjl kh dr‌پj ʃrjʔt ʔdɒlt mj‌rftnd، bh ʃrjʔt ʔdɒlt nrsjdnd ɒz t͡ʃh sbb؟ ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht kh nh ɒz rɒh ɒjmɒn blkh ɒz rɒh ɒʔmɒl ʃrjʔt آn rɒ tlbjdnd، zjrɒ kh bh sŋ msɒdm lɣzʃ xvrdndt͡ʃnɒnkh mktvb ɒst kh «ɒjnk dr shjvn sŋj msɒdm v sxrh lɣzʃ mj‌nhm v hr‌kh brɒv ɒjmɒn آvrd، xd͡ʒl nxvɒhd ɡrdjd» t͡ʃnɒnkh mktvb ɒst kh «ɒjnk dr shjvn sŋj msɒdm v sxrh lɣzʃ mj‌nhm v hr‌kh brɒv ɒjmɒn آvrd، xd͡ʒl nxvɒhd ɡrdjd» ɒj brɒdrɒn xvʃj dl mn v dʔɒj mn nzd xdɒ bd͡ʒht ɒsrɒئjl brɒj nd͡ʒɒt ɒjʃɒn ɒst zjrɒ bd͡ʒht ɒjʃɒn ʃhɒdt mj‌dhm kh brɒj xdɒ ɣjrt dɒrnd lkn nh ɒz rvj mʔrft zjrɒ kh brآvrd» lkn t͡ʃh mj‌ɡvjd؟ ɒjnkh «klɒm nzd tv v dr dhɒnt v dr ɣlb tv ɒst jʔnj‌ɒjn klɒm ɒjmɒn kh bh آn vʔz mj‌knjm» zjrɒ ɒɡrbh zbɒn xvd ʔjsj xdɒvnd rɒ ɒʔtrɒf knj v drdl xvd ɒjmɒn آvrj kh xdɒ ɒv rɒ ɒz mrdɡɒn brxjzɒnjd، nd͡ʒɒt xvɒhj jɒft t͡ʃvnkh bh dl ɒjmɒn آvrdh mj‌ʃvd brɒj ʔdɒlt v bh zbɒn ɒʔtrɒf mj‌ʃvd bd͡ʒht nd͡ʒɒt v ktɒb mj‌ɡvjd «hr‌kh bh ɒv ɒjmɒn آvrd xd͡ʒl nxvɒhdʃd» zjrɒ kh dr jhvd v jvnɒnj tfɒvtj njst kh hmɒn xdɒvnd، xdɒvnd hmh ɒst v dvltmndɒst brɒj hmh kh nɒm ɒv rɒ mj‌xvɒnnd zjrɒ hrkh nɒm xdɒvnd rɒ bxvɒnd nd͡ʒɒt xvɒhd jɒft پs t͡ʃɡvnh bxvɒnnd ksj rɒ kh bh ɒv ɒjmɒn njɒvrdh‌ɒnd؟ v t͡ʃɡvnh ɒjmɒn آvrnd bh ksj‌kh xbrɒv rɒ nʃnjdh‌ɒnd؟ v t͡ʃɡvnh bʃnvnd bdvn vɒʔz؟ v t͡ʃɡvnh vʔz knnd d͡ʒz ɒjnkh frstɒdh ʃvnd؟ t͡ʃnɒnkh mktvb ɒst kh «t͡ʃh zjbɒ ɒst پɒjhɒj آnɒnj kh bh slɒmtj bʃɒrt mj‌dhnd v bh t͡ʃjzhɒj njkv mʒdh mj‌dhnd» lkn hmh bʃɒrt rɒ ɡvʃ ŋrftnd zjrɒ ɒʃʔjɒ mj‌ɡvjd «xdɒvndɒ kjst kh ɒxbɒr mɒ rɒ bɒvr krd؟» lhzɒ ɒjmɒn ɒz ʃnjdn ɒst v ʃnjdn ɒz klɒm xdɒ lkn mj‌ɡvjm آjɒnʃnjdnd؟ ɒlbth ʃnjdnd «svt ɒjʃɒn dr tmɒm d͡ʒhɒn mntʃr ɡrdjd v klɒm ɒjʃɒn tɒ ɒɣsɒj rbʔ mskvn rsjd» v mj‌ɡvjm آjɒ ɒsrɒئjl ndɒnsth‌ɒnd؟ ɒvl mvsj mj‌ɡvjd «mn ʃmɒ rɒ bh ɣjrt mj‌آvrm bh آn kh ɒmtj njst v br ɣvm bj‌fhm ʃmɒ rɒ xʃmɡjn xvɒhm sɒxt» vɒʃʔjɒ njz d͡ʒrɒt krdh، mj‌ɡvjd آnɒnj kh tɒlb mn nbvdnd mrɒ jɒftnd v bh ksɒnj kh mrɒ ntlbjdndzɒhr ɡrdjdm»ɒmɒ dr hɣ ɒsrɒئjl mj‌ɡvjd «tmɒm rvz dsthɒj xvd rɒ drɒz krdm bh svj ɣvmj nɒmtjʔ v mxɒlf» ɒmɒ dr hɣ ɒsrɒئjl mj‌ɡvjd «tmɒm rvz dsthɒj xvd rɒ drɒz krdm bh svj ɣvmj nɒmtjʔ v mxɒlf» پs mj‌ɡvjm آjɒ xdɒ ɣvm xvd rɒ rdkrd؟ hɒʃɒ zjrɒ kh mn njz ɒsrɒئjlj ɒzɒvlɒd ɒbrɒhjm ɒz sbt bnjɒmjn hstm xdɒ ɣvm xvd rɒ kh ɒz ɣbl ʃnɒxth bvd، rd nfrmvdh ɒst آjɒ nmj dɒnjd kh ktɒb dr ɒljɒs t͡ʃh mj‌ɡvjd، t͡ʃɡvnh br ɒsrɒئjl ɒz xdɒ ɒstɣɒsh mj‌knd kh «xdɒvndɒ ɒnbjɒj tv rɒ kʃth v mzbhhɒj tv rɒkndh‌ɒnd v mn bh tnhɒjj mɒndh‌ɒm v dr ɣsd d͡ʒɒn mn njz mj‌bɒʃnd»؟ lkn vhj bdv t͡ʃh mj‌ɡvjd؟ ɒjnkh «hft hzɒr mrd bd͡ʒht xvd ŋɒh dɒʃtm kh bh nzd bʔl zɒnv nzdh‌ɒnd» پs hmt͡ʃnjn dr zmɒn hɒzr njz bɣjtj bhsb ɒxtjɒr fjz mɒndh ɒst v ɒɡr ɒz rɒh fjz ɒst djɡr ɒz ɒʔmɒl njst vɡrnh fjz djɡr fjz njst ɒmɒ ɒɡr ɒz ɒʔmɒl ɒst djɡr ɒz fjz njst vɒlɒ ʔml djɡr ʔml njst پs mɣsvd t͡ʃjst؟ ɒjnkh ɒsrɒئjl آnt͡ʃh rɒkh mj‌tlbd njɒfth ɒst، lkn brɡzjdɡɒn jɒftnd vbɒɣj mɒndɡɒn sxtdl ɡrdjdnd؛ t͡ʃnɒnkh mktvb ɒst kh «xdɒ bdjʃɒn rvh xvɒb‌آlvd dɒdt͡ʃʃmɒnj kh nbjnd v ɡvʃhɒjj kh nʃnvd tɒ ɒmrvz» v dɒvd mj‌ɡvjd kh «mɒئdh ɒjʃɒn brɒj ɒjʃɒn tlh v dɒm v sŋ msɒdm v ʔɣvbt bɒd؛ t͡ʃʃmɒn ɒjʃɒn tɒr ʃvd tɒ nbjnnd v پʃt ɒjʃɒn rɒ dɒئm xm ɡrdɒn» پs mj‌ɡvjm آjɒ lɣzʃ xvrdnd tɒ bjftnd؟ hɒʃɒ blkh ɒz lɣzʃ ɒjʃɒn nd͡ʒɒt bh ɒmt‌hɒ rsjdtɒ dr ɒjʃɒn ɣjrt پdjd آvrd پs t͡ʃvn lɣzʃ ɒjʃɒn dvltmndj d͡ʒhɒn ɡrdjd v nɣsɒn ɒjʃɒn dvltmndj ɒmt‌hɒ، bh t͡ʃnd mrtbh zjɒdtrپrj ɒjʃɒn xvɒhd bvd zjrɒ bh ʃmɒ‌ɒj ɒmt hɒsxn mj‌ɡvjm پs ɒz ɒjn‌rvj kh rsvl ɒmt hɒmj bɒʃm xdmt xvd rɒ tmd͡ʒjd mj‌nmɒjm، tɒʃɒjd ɒbnɒj d͡ʒns xvd rɒ bh ɣjrt آvrm v bʔzj ɒz ɒjʃɒn rɒ brhɒnm zjrɒ ɒɡr rd ʃdn ɒjʃɒn msɒlht ʔɒlm ʃd، bɒz‌jɒftn ɒjʃɒn t͡ʃh xvɒhdʃd؟ d͡ʒz hjɒt ɒz mrdɡɒn v t͡ʃvn nvbr mɣds ɒst، hmt͡ʃnɒn xmjrh v hrɡɒh rjʃh mɣds ɒst، hmt͡ʃnɒn ʃɒxh‌hɒ v t͡ʃvn bʔzj ɒz ʃɒxh‌hɒ brjdh ʃdnd v tv kh zjtvn brj bvdj dr آnhɒ پjvnd ɡʃtj v dr rjʃh vt͡ʃrbj zjtvn ʃrjk ʃdj، br ʃɒxh‌hɒ fxrmkn v ɒɡr fxr knj tv hɒml rjʃh njstj blkh rjʃh hɒml tv ɒst پs mj‌ɡvjj kh «ʃɒxh‌hɒ brjdh ʃdnd tɒ mn پjvnd ʃvm؟» آfrjn bd͡ʒht bj‌ɒjmɒnj brjdh ʃdnd v tvmhz ɒjmɒn پɒjdɒr hstj mɣrvr mbɒʃ blkh btrs zjrɒ ɒɡr xdɒ br ʃɒxh hɒj tbjʔj ʃfɣt nfrmvd، br tv njz ʃfɣt nxvɒhd krd پs mhrbɒnj v sxtj xdɒ rɒ mlɒhzh nmɒ؛ ɒmɒsxtj br آnɒnj kh ɒftɒdnd، ɒmɒ mhrbɒnj brtv ɒɡr drmhrbɒnj sɒbt bɒʃj vɒlɒ tv njz brjdh xvɒhj ʃd v ɒɡr ɒjʃɒn njz dr bj‌ɒjmɒnj nmɒnnd bɒz پjvndxvɒhnd ʃd، zjrɒ xdɒ ɣɒdr ɒst kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ bɒrdjɡr bپjvndd zjrɒ ɒɡr tv ɒz zjtvn tbjʔj brj brjdh ʃdh، brxlɒf tbʔ bh zjtvn njkv پjvndɡʃtj، bh t͡ʃnd mrtbh zjɒdtr آnɒnj kh tbjʔj‌ɒnd drzjtvn xvjʃ پjvnd xvɒhnd ʃd zjrɒ‌ɒj brɒdrɒn nmj xvɒhm ʃmɒ ɒz ɒjn srbj xbr bɒʃjd kh mbɒdɒ xvd rɒ dɒnɒ ɒŋɒrjd kh mɒdɒmj kh پrj ɒmt‌hɒ drnjɒjd، sxtdlj brbʔzj ɒz ɒsrɒئjl tɒrj ɡʃth ɒst vhmt͡ʃnjn hmɡj ɒsrɒئjl nd͡ʒɒt xvɒhnd jɒft، t͡ʃnɒnkh mktvb ɒst kh «ɒz shjvn nd͡ʒɒt‌dhndh‌ɒj zɒhr xvɒhd ʃd v bj‌djnj rɒ ɒzjʔɣvb xvɒhd brdɒʃt؛ v ɒjn ɒst ʔhd mn bɒɒjʃɒn dr zmɒnj kh ɡnɒhɒnʃɒn rɒ brdɒrm» nzr bh ɒnd͡ʒjl bd͡ʒht ʃmɒ dʃmnɒn‌ɒnd، lkn nzr bh ɒxtjɒrbh‌xɒtr ɒd͡ʒdɒd mhbvbnd zjrɒ kh dr nʔmthɒvdʔvt xdɒ bɒzɡʃtn njst zjrɒ hmt͡ʃnɒn‌kh ʃmɒ dr sɒbɣ mtjʔ xdɒ nbvdjd v ɒlɒn bh‌sbb nɒfrmɒnj‌ɒjʃɒn rhmt jɒftjd، hmt͡ʃnjn ɒjʃɒn njz ɒlɒn nɒfrmɒn ʃdnd tɒ bd͡ʒht rhmtj kh br ʃmɒ ɒst br ɒjʃɒn njz rhm ʃvd zjrɒ xdɒ hmh rɒdr nɒfrmɒnj bsth ɒst tɒ br hmh rhm frmɒjd zhj ʔmɣ dvltmndj v hkmt v ʔlm xdɒ t͡ʃɣdr bʔjd ɒz ɣvrrsj ɒst ɒhkɒm ɒv vfvɣ ɒz kɒvʃ ɒst trjɣhɒj vj zjrɒ kjst kh rɒj xdɒvnd rɒ dɒnsth bɒʃd؟ jɒ kh mʃjr ɒvʃdh؟ jɒ kh sbɣt d͡ʒsth t͡ʃjzj bdv dɒdh tɒ bh ɒv bɒz dɒdh ʃvd؟zjrɒ kh ɒz ɒv v bh ɒv v tɒ ɒv hmh‌t͡ʃjz ɒst؛ v ɒv rɒ tɒ ɒbdɒlɒbɒd d͡ʒlɒl bɒd، آmjn zjrɒ kh ɒz ɒv v bh ɒv v tɒ ɒv hmh‌t͡ʃjz ɒst؛ v ɒv rɒ tɒ ɒbdɒlɒbɒd d͡ʒlɒl bɒd، آmjn zndɡj msjhj lhzɒ‌ɒj brɒdrɒn ʃmɒ rɒ bh rhmthɒj xdɒ ɒstdʔɒ mj‌knm kh bdnhɒj xvd rɒɣrbɒnj zndh mɣds پsndjdh xdɒ bɡzrɒnjd kh ʔbɒdt mʔɣvl ʃmɒ ɒst v hmʃkl ɒjn d͡ʒhɒn mʃvjd blkh bh tɒzɡj zhn xvd svrt xvd rɒtbdjl dhjd tɒ ʃmɒ drjɒft knjd kh ɒrɒdh njkvj پsndjdh kɒml xdɒ t͡ʃjst zjrɒ bh آn fjzj kh bh mn ʔtɒ ʃdh ɒst، hrjkj ɒz ʃmɒ rɒ mj‌ɡvjm kh fkrhɒj blndtr ɒzآnt͡ʃh ʃɒjsth ɒst mknjd blkh bh ɒʔtdɒl fkrnmɒjjd، bh ɒndɒzh آn bhrh ɒjmɒn kh xdɒ bh hr ks ɣsmt frmvdh ɒst zjrɒ hmt͡ʃnɒn‌kh dr jk bdn ɒʔzɒj bsjɒr dɒrjm v hr ʔzvj rɒ jk kɒrnjst، hmt͡ʃnjn mɒ kh bsjɒrjm، jk d͡ʒsdhstjm dr msjh، ɒmɒ frd ɒʔzɒj jkdjɡr پs t͡ʃvn nʔmthɒj mxtlf dɒrjm bhsb fjzj kh bh mɒ dɒdh ʃd، xvɒh nbvt brhsb mvɒfɣt ɒjmɒn، jɒ xdmt dr xdmt ɡzɒrj، jɒ mʔlm dr tʔljm، jɒ vɒʔz dr mvʔzh، jɒ bxʃndh bh sxɒvt، jɒپjʃvɒ bh ɒd͡ʒthɒd، jɒ rhm knndh bh‌srvr mhbt bj‌rjɒ bɒʃd ɒz bdj nfrt knjd v bh njkvjj bپjvndjd bɒ mhbt brɒdrɒnh jkdjɡr rɒdvst dɒrjd v hr jk djɡrj rɒ bjʃtr ɒz xvdɒkrɒm bnmɒjd dr ɒd͡ʒthɒd kɒhlj nvrzjd v drrvh srɡrm ʃdh، xdɒvnd rɒ xdmt nmɒjjd dr ɒmjd msrvr v dr msjbt sɒbr v dr dʔɒmvɒzb bɒʃjd mʃɒrkt dr ɒhtjɒd͡ʒɒt mɣdsjn knjd v dr mhmɒndɒrj sɒʔj bɒʃjd brkt btlbjd br آnɒnj kh br ʃmɒ d͡ʒfɒ knnd؛ brkt btlbjd v lʔn mknjd xvʃj knjd bɒxvʃhɒlɒn v mɒtm nmɒjjd bɒ mɒtmjɒn brɒj jkdjɡr hmɒn fkr dɒʃth bɒʃjd v dr t͡ʃjzhɒj blnd fkr mknjd blkh bɒ zljlɒn mdɒrɒ nmɒjjd v xvdrɒ dɒnɒ mʃmɒrjd hjt͡ʃ‌ks rɒ bh ʔvz bdj bdj mrsɒnjd پjʃ d͡ʒmjʔ mrdm tdɒrk kɒrhɒj njkv bjnjd ɒɡr mmkn ɒst bɣdr ɣvh xvd bɒd͡ʒmjʔ xlɣ bh slh bkvʃjd ‌ɒj mhbvbɒn ɒntɣɒm xvd rɒ mkʃjd blkh xʃm rɒ mhlt dhjd، zjrɒ mktvb ɒst «xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd kh ɒntɣɒm ɒzآn mn ɒst mn d͡ʒzɒ xvɒhm dɒd» پs «ɒɡrdʃmn tv ɡrsnh bɒʃd، ɒv rɒ sjr kn v ɒɡr tʃnh ɒst، sjrɒbʃ nmɒ zjrɒ ɒɡr t͡ʃnjn knj ɒxɡrhɒj آtʃ br srʃ xvɒhj ɒnbɒʃt»mɣlvb bdj mʃv blkh bdj rɒ bh njkvjj mɣlvb sɒz mɣlvb bdj mʃv blkh bdj rɒ bh njkvjj mɣlvb sɒz hr ʃxs mtjʔ ɣdrthɒj brtr bʃvd، zjrɒ kh ɣdrtj d͡ʒz ɒz xdɒ njst v آnhɒjj kh hst ɒz d͡ʒɒnb xdɒ mrtb ʃdh ɒst htj hr‌kh bɒ ɣdrt mɣɒvmt nmɒjd، mɣɒvmt bɒtrtjb xdɒ nmvdh bɒʃd v hr‌kh mɣɒvmt knd، hkm br xvd آvrd zjrɒ ɒz hkɒm ʔml njkv rɒxvfj njst blkh ʔml bd rɒ پs ɒɡr mj‌xvɒhj kh ɒz آn ɣdrt trsɒn nʃvj، njkvjj kn kh ɒz ɒvthsjn xvɒhj jɒft zjrɒ xɒdm xdɒst brɒj tv bh njkvjj؛ lkn hrɡɒh bdj knj، btrs t͡ʃvnkh ʃmʃjr rɒ ʔbs brnmj dɒrd، zjrɒ ɒv xɒdm xdɒst v bɒ ɣzb ɒntɣɒm ɒz bdkɒrɒn mj‌kʃd lhzɒ lɒzm ɒst kh mtjʔ ɒv ʃvj nh bh‌sbb ɣzb fɣt blkh bh‌sbb zmjr xvd njz zjrɒ kh bh ɒjn sbb bɒd͡ʒ njz mj‌dhjd، t͡ʃvnkh xdɒm xdɒ vmvɒzb dr hmjn ɒmr hstnd پs hɣ hrks rɒbh ɒv ɒdɒ knjd bɒd͡ʒ rɒ bh msthɣ bɒd͡ʒ v d͡ʒzjh rɒ bh msthɣ d͡ʒzjh v trs rɒ bh msthɣ trs v ʔzt rɒ bh msthɣ ʔzt mdjvn ɒhdj bh t͡ʃjzj mʃvjd d͡ʒz bh mhbt nmvdn bɒ jkdjɡr، zjrɒ ksj‌kh djɡrj rɒmhbt nmɒjd ʃrjʔt rɒ bh‌d͡ʒɒ آvrdh bɒʃd zjrɒkh znɒ mkn، ɣtl mkn، dzdj mkn، ʃhɒdt drvɣ mdh، tmʔ mvrz v hr hkmj djɡr kh hst، hmh ʃɒml ɒst dr ɒjn klɒm kh hmsɒjh xvd rɒt͡ʃvn xvd mhbt nmɒ mhbt bh hmsɒjh xvdbdj nmj knd پs mhbt tkmjl ʃrjʔt ɒst v xsvs t͡ʃvn vɣt rɒ mj‌dɒnjd kh ɒlhɒl sɒʔt rsjdh ɒst kh mɒ rɒ bɒjd ɒz xvɒb bjdɒrʃvjm zjrɒ kh ɒlɒn nd͡ʒɒt mɒ nzdjk tr ɒst ɒz آn vɣtj kh ɒjmɒn آvrdjm ʃb mnɣzj ʃd v rvz nzdjk آmd پs ɒʔmɒl tɒrjkj rɒ bjrvn krdh، ɒslhh nvr rɒ bپvʃjm v bɒ ʃɒjstɡj rftɒr knjm t͡ʃnɒnkh dr rvz، nh dr bzmhɒ v skrhɒ vfsɣ v fd͡ʒvr v nzɒʔ v hsd؛blkh ʔjsj msjh xdɒvnd rɒ bپvʃjd v brɒj ʃhvɒt d͡ʒsmɒnj tdɒrk nbjnjd blkh ʔjsj msjh xdɒvnd rɒ bپvʃjd v brɒj ʃhvɒt d͡ʒsmɒnj tdɒrk nbjnjd v ksj rɒ kh dr ɒjmɒn zʔjf bɒʃdbپzjrjd، lkn nh brɒj mhɒd͡ʒh drmbɒhsɒt jkj ɒjmɒn dɒrd kh hmh‌t͡ʃjz rɒ bɒjdxvrd ɒmɒ آnkh zʔjf ɒst bɣvl mj‌xvrd پs xvrndh nɒxvrndh rɒ hɣjr nʃmɒrd vnɒxvrndh br xvrndh hkm nknd zjrɒ xdɒ ɒv rɒپzjrfth ɒst tv kjstj kh br bndh ksj djɡrhkm mj‌knj؟ ɒv nzd آɣɒj xvd sɒbt jɒ sɒɣtmj ʃvd ljkn ɒstvɒr xvɒhd ʃd zjrɒ xdɒ ɣɒdrɒst kh ɒv rɒ sɒbt nmɒjd jkj jk rvz rɒ ɒz djɡrj bhtr mj‌dɒnd vdjɡrj hr rvz rɒ brɒbr mj‌ʃmɒrd پs hr ks drzhn xvd mtjɣn bʃvd آnkh rvz rɒ ʔzjz mj‌dɒndbxɒtr xdɒvnd ʔzjzʃ mj‌dɒrd v آnkh rvz rɒʔzjz nmj dɒrd hm brɒj xdɒvnd nmj dɒrd؛ v hrkh mj‌xvrd brɒj xdɒvnd mj‌xvrd zjrɒ xdɒ rɒʃkr mj‌ɡvjd، v آnkh nmj xvrd brɒj xdɒvndnmj xvrd v xdɒ rɒ ʃkr mj‌ɡvjd zjrɒ ɒhdj ɒz mɒ bh xvd zjst nmj knd v hjt͡ʃ‌ks bh xvdnmj mjrd zjrɒ ɒɡr zjst knjm brɒj xdɒvndzjst mj‌knjm v ɒɡr bmjrjm brɒj xdɒvnd mj mjrjm پs xvɒh zndh bɒʃjm، xvɒh bmjrjm، ɒzآn xdɒvndjm zjrɒ brɒj hmjn msjh mrd vzndh ɡʃt tɒ br zndɡɒn v mrdɡɒn sltnt knd lkn tv t͡ʃrɒ br brɒdr xvd hkm mj‌knj؟ jɒ tvnjz t͡ʃrɒ brɒdr xvd rɒ hɣjr mj‌ʃmɒrj؟ zɒnrv kh hmh پjʃ msnd msjh hɒzr xvɒhjm ʃd zjrɒ mktvb ɒst «xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd bh hjɒt xvdm ɣsm kh hr zɒnvjj nzd mn xm xvɒhd ʃd vhr zbɒnj bh xdɒ ɒɣrɒr xvɒhd nmvd» پs hrjkj ɒz mɒ hsɒb xvd rɒ bh xdɒ xvɒhd dɒd bnɒbrɒjn br jkdjɡr hkm nknjm blkh hkm knjd bh ɒjnkh ksj sŋj msɒdm jɒ lɣzʃj dr rɒh brɒdr xvd nnhd mj‌dɒnm v dr ʔjsj xdɒvndjɣjn mj‌dɒrm kh hjt͡ʃ‌t͡ʃjz dr zɒt xvd nd͡ʒs njst d͡ʒz brɒj آn ksj‌kh آn rɒ nd͡ʒs پndɒrd؛ brɒj ɒv nd͡ʒs ɒst zjrɒ hrɡɒh brɒdrt bh xvrɒk آzrdh ʃvd، djɡr bh mhbt rftɒrnmj knj bh xvrɒk xvd hlɒk msɒz ksj rɒ kh msjh dr rɒh ɒv bmrd پs mɡzɒrjd kh njkvjj ʃmɒ rɒ bd ɡvjnd zjrɒ mlkvt xdɒ ɒkl vʃrb njst blkh ʔdɒlt v slɒmtj v xvʃj drrvh‌ɒlɣds zjrɒ hr‌kh dr ɒjn ɒmvr xdmt msjh rɒ knd، پsndjdh xdɒ v mɣbvl mrdm ɒst پs آn ɒmvrj rɒ kh mnʃɒ slɒmtj v bnɒj jkdjɡr ɒst پjrvj nmɒjjd bd͡ʒht xvrɒk kɒr xdɒ rɒ xrɒb msɒz ɒlbth hmh‌t͡ʃjz پɒk ɒst، ljkn bd ɒst brɒj آn ʃxs kh brɒj lɣzʃ mj‌xvrd ɡvʃt nxvrdn v ʃrɒb nnvʃjdn v kɒrj nkrdn kh bɒʔs ɒjzɒ jɒ lɣzʃ jɒ zʔf brɒdrt bɒʃd njkvɒst آjɒ tv ɒjmɒn dɒrj؟ پs brɒj xvdt drhzvr xdɒ آn rɒ bdɒr، zjrɒ xvʃɒbhɒl ksj‌kh br xvd hkm nknd dr آnt͡ʃh njkv mj‌ʃmɒrdlkn آnkh ʃk dɒrd ɒɡr bxvrd mlzm mj‌ʃvd، zjrɒ bh ɒjmɒn nmj xvrd؛ v hr‌t͡ʃh ɒz ɒjmɒn njst ɡnɒh ɒst lkn آnkh ʃk dɒrd ɒɡr bxvrd mlzm mj‌ʃvd، zjrɒ bh ɒjmɒn nmj xvrd؛ v hr‌t͡ʃh ɒz ɒjmɒn njst ɡnɒh ɒst v mɒ kh tvɒnɒ hstjm، zʔfhɒj nɒtvɒnɒn rɒmthml bʃvjm v xvʃj xvd rɒ tɒlb nbɒʃjm hr jkj ɒz mɒ hmsɒjh xvd rɒ xvʃ bsɒzd dr آnt͡ʃh brɒj bnɒ njkv ɒst zjrɒ msjh njz xvʃj xvd rɒ tɒlb nmj bvd، blkh t͡ʃnɒnkh mktvb ɒst «mlɒmthɒj mlɒmt knndɡɒn tv brmn tɒrj ɡrdjd» zjrɒ hmh‌t͡ʃjzhɒjj kh ɒz ɣbl mktvb ʃd، brɒj tʔljm mɒ nvʃth ʃd tɒ bh sbr vtslj ktɒb ɒmjdvɒr bɒʃjm ɒlɒn xdɒj sbr v tslj ʃmɒ rɒ fjz ʔtɒknɒd tɒ mvɒfɣ msjh ʔjsj bɒ jkdjɡr jkrɒj bɒʃjd tɒ jkdl v jkzbɒn ʃdh، xdɒ v پdrxdɒvnd mɒ ʔjsj msjh rɒ tmd͡ʒjd nmɒjjd پs jkdjɡr rɒ bپzjrjd، t͡ʃnɒnkh msjh njz mɒrɒ پzjrft brɒj d͡ʒlɒl xdɒ zjrɒ mj‌ɡvjm ʔjsj msjh xɒdm xtnh ɡrdjd bd͡ʒht rɒstj xdɒ tɒ vʔdh hɒj ɒd͡ʒdɒd rɒ sɒbt ɡrdɒnd، v tɒɒmt‌hɒ xdɒ rɒ tmd͡ʒjd nmɒjnd bh‌sbb rhmt ɒvt͡ʃnɒnkh mktvb ɒst kh «ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht tv rɒ drmjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ ɒɣrɒr xvɒhm krd v bh nɒm tv tsbjh xvɒhm xvɒnd» v njz mj‌ɡvjd «ɒj ɒmt‌hɒ bɒɣvm ɒv ʃɒdmɒn ʃvjd» v ɒjz «ɒj d͡ʒmjʔ ɒmt‌hɒ xdɒvnd rɒ hmd ɡvjjd v‌ɒj tmɒmj ɣvmhɒɒv rɒ mdh nmɒjjd» v ɒʃʔjɒ njz mj‌ɡvjd kh «rjʃh jsɒ xvɒhd bvd v آnkh brɒj hkmrɒnj ɒmt‌hɒ mbʔvs ʃvd، ɒmjd ɒmt‌hɒ br vj xvɒhdbvd» ɒlɒn xdɒj ɒmjd، ʃmɒ rɒ ɒz kmɒl xvʃj vslɒmtj dr ɒjmɒn پr sɒzd tɒ bh ɣvt rvh‌ɒlɣds dr ɒmjd ɒfzvdh ɡrdjd lkn‌ɒj brɒdrɒn mn، xvd njz drbɒrh ʃmɒjɣjn mj‌dɒnm kh xvd ɒz njkvjj mmlv v پr ɒz kmɒl mʔrft v ɣɒdr br nsjht nmvdn jkdjɡr hstjd ljkn‌ɒj brɒdrɒn bsjɒr d͡ʒsɒrt vrzjdh، mn xvd njz bh ʃmɒ d͡ʒzئj nvʃtm tɒ ʃmɒ rɒ jɒdآvrj nmɒjm bh‌sbb آn fjzj kh xdɒ bh mn bxʃjdh ɒst، tɒ xɒdm ʔjsj msjh ʃvm brɒj ɒmt hɒv khɒnt ɒnd͡ʒjl xdɒ rɒ bh‌d͡ʒɒ آvrm tɒ hdjh ɒmt hɒmɣbvl ɒftd، mɣds ʃdh bh rvh‌ɒlɣds پs bh msjh ʔjsj dr kɒrhɒj xdɒ fxr dɒrm zjrɒd͡ʒrɒt nmj knm kh sxnj bɡvjm d͡ʒz dr آn ɒmvrj kh msjh bvɒsth mn bh ʔml آvrd، brɒj ɒtɒʔt ɒmt‌hɒ dr ɣvl v fʔl، bh ɣvt آjɒt vmʔd͡ʒzɒt v bh ɣvt rvh xdɒ bhdj kh ɒzɒvrʃljm dvr zdh tɒ bh ɒljrkvn bʃɒrt msjh rɒtkmjl nmvdm ɒmɒ hrjs bvdm kh bʃɒrt t͡ʃnɒn bdhm، nh dr d͡ʒɒjj kh ɒsm msjh ʃhrt jɒfth bvd، mbɒdɒ br bnjɒd ɣjrj bnɒ nmɒjm blkh t͡ʃnɒnkh mktvb ɒst «آnɒnj kh xbr ɒv rɒ njɒftnd، xvɒhnd djd v ksɒnj kh nʃnjdnd، xvɒhndfhmjd» bnɒbrɒjn‌bɒrhɒ ɒz آmdn nzd ʃmɒ mmnvʔ ʃdm lkn t͡ʃvn ɒlɒn mrɒ dr ɒjn mmɒlk djɡrd͡ʒɒjj njst v sɒlhɒj bsjɒr ɒst kh mʃtɒɣ آmdn nzd ʃmɒ bvdh‌ɒm، hrɡɒh bh ɒsپɒnjɒ sfrknm، bh nzd ʃmɒ xvɒhm آmd zjrɒ ɒmjdvɒr hstm kh ʃmɒ rɒ dr ʔbvr mlɒɣɒt knm v ʃmɒ mrɒ bh آn svj mʃɒjʔt nmɒjjd، bʔd ɒz آnkh ɒz mlɒɣɒt ʃmɒ ɒndkj sjr ʃvm lkn ɒlɒn ʔɒzm ɒvrʃljm hstm tɒ mɣdsjn rɒ xdmt knm zjrɒ kh ɒhl mkɒdvnjh v ɒxɒئjh mslht djdnd kh zkɒtj brɒj mflsjn mɣdsjn ɒvrʃljm bfrstnd، bdjn rzɒdɒdnd v bdrstj kh mdjvn ɒjʃɒn hstnd zjrɒ kh t͡ʃvn ɒmt‌hɒ ɒz rvhɒnjɒt ɒjʃɒn bhrh‌mndɡrdjdnd، lɒzm ʃd kh dr d͡ʒsmɒnjɒt njz xdmt ɒjʃɒn rɒ bknnd پs t͡ʃvn ɒjn rɒ ɒnd͡ʒɒm dhm vɒjn smr rɒ nzd ɒjʃɒn xtm knm، ɒz rɒh ʃmɒ bh ɒsپɒnjɒ xvɒhm آmd v mj‌dɒnm vɣtj kh bh nzdʃmɒ آjm، dr kmɒl brkt ɒnd͡ʒjl msjh xvɒhm آmd lkn‌ɒj brɒdrɒn، ɒz ʃmɒ ɒltmɒs dɒrm kh bxɒtr xdɒvnd mɒ ʔjsj msjh v bh mhbt rvh ɒlɣds brɒj mn nzd xdɒ dr dʔɒhɒ d͡ʒd vd͡ʒhdknjd، tɒ ɒz nɒfrmɒnɒn jhvdjh rstɡɒr ʃvm vxdmt mn dr ɒvrʃljm mɣbvl mɣdsjn ɒftd، tɒbrhsb ɒrɒdh xdɒ bɒ xvʃj nzd ʃmɒ brsm v bɒʃmɒ ɒstrɒht jɒbmv xdɒj slɒmtj bɒ hmh ʃmɒ bɒd، آmjn v xdɒj slɒmtj bɒ hmh ʃmɒ bɒd، آmjn v xvɒhr mɒ fjbj rɒ kh xɒdmh kljsɒj dr knxrjɒ ɒst، bh ʃmɒ mj‌sپɒrm tɒɒv rɒ dr xdɒvnd btvr ʃɒjsth mɣdsjn bپzjrjd vdr hr t͡ʃjzj kh bh ʃmɒ mhtɒd͡ʒ bɒʃd ɒv rɒ ɒʔɒnt knjd، zjrɒ kh ɒv bsjɒrj rɒ v xvd mrɒ njz mʔɒvnt mj‌nmvd slɒm brsɒnjd bh پrsklɒ v ɒkjlɒ، hmkɒrɒn mn dr msjh ʔjsj kh dr rɒh d͡ʒɒn mn ɡrdnhɒj xvd rɒ nhɒdnd v nh mn bh tnhɒjj mmnvn ɒjʃɒn hstm، blkh hmh kljsɒhɒj ɒmt‌hɒ kljsɒ rɒ kh dr xɒnh ɒjʃɒn ɒst v hbjb mn ɒپjnts rɒ kh brɒj msjh nvbr آsjɒst slɒm rsɒnjd v mrjm rɒ kh brɒj ʃmɒ zhmt bsjɒr kʃjd، slɒm ɡvjjd v ɒndrvnjkvs v jvnjɒs xvjʃɒn mrɒ kh bɒ mn ɒsjr mj‌bvdnd slɒm nmɒjjd kh mʃhvr dr mjɒn rsvlɒn hstnd v ɣbl ɒz mn dr msjh ʃdnd vɒmپljɒs rɒ kh dr xdɒvnd hbjb mn ɒst، slɒm rsɒnjd v ɒvrbɒns kh bɒ mɒ dr kɒr msjh rfjɣ ɒst v ɒstɒxjs hbjb mrɒ slɒm nmɒjjd v ɒپljs آzmvdh ʃdh dr msjh rɒ slɒm brsɒnjd v ɒhl xɒnh ɒrstbvls rɒ slɒm brsɒnjd v xvjʃ mn hjrdjvn rɒ slɒm dhjdv آnɒnj rɒ ɒz ɒhl xɒnh nrɡsvs kh dr xdɒvndhstnd slɒm rsɒnjd trjfjnɒ v trjfvsɒ rɒ kh dr xdɒvnd zhmt kʃjdh‌ɒnd slɒm ɡvjjd؛ vپrsjs mhbvbh rɒ kh dr xdɒvnd zhmt bsjɒrkʃjd slɒm dhjd v rvfs brɡzjdh drxdɒvnd v mɒdr ɒv v mrɒ slɒm bɡvjjd ɒsnkrjts rɒ v fljkvn v hrmɒs vپtrvbɒs v hrmjs v brɒdrɒnj kh bɒɒjʃɒnnd slɒm nmɒjjd fjlvlks rɒ v d͡ʒvljh v njrjɒs v xvɒhrʃ v ɒvlmپɒs v hmh mɣdsɒnj kh bɒ ɒjʃɒnnd slɒm brsɒnjd vjkdjɡr rɒ bh bvsh mɣdsɒnh slɒm nmɒjjd vd͡ʒmjʔ kljsɒhɒj msjh ʃmɒ rɒ slɒm mj‌frstnd lkn‌ɒj brɒdrɒn ɒz ʃmɒ ɒstdʔɒ mj‌knm آn ksɒnj rɒ kh mnʃɒ tfɒrjɣ v lɣzʃhɒj mxɒlf آn tʔljmj kh ʃmɒ jɒfth‌ɒjd mj‌bɒʃnd، mlɒhzh knjdv ɒz ɒjʃɒn ɒd͡ʒtnɒb nmɒjjd zjrɒ kh t͡ʃnjn ɒʃxɒs xdɒvnd mɒ ʔjsj msjh rɒ xdmt nmj knnd blkh ʃkm xvd rɒ v bh ɒlfɒz njkv vsxnɒn ʃjrjn dlhɒj sɒdh dlɒn rɒ mj‌frjbnd zjrɒ kh ɒtɒʔt ʃmɒ dr d͡ʒmjʔ mrdm ʃhrt jɒfth ɒst پs drbɒrh ʃmɒ msrvr ʃdm ɒmɒآrzvj ɒjn dɒrm kh dr njkvjj dɒnɒ v dr bdj sɒdh dl bɒʃjd v xdɒj slɒmtj bzvdj ʃjtɒn rɒ zjrپɒjhɒj ʃmɒ xvɒhd sɒjjdfjz xdɒvnd mɒ ʔjsj msjh bɒ ʃmɒ bɒd tjmvtɒvs hmkɒr mn v lvɣɒ v jɒsvn vsvsjپɒtrs kh xvjʃɒn mnnd ʃmɒ rɒ slɒm mj‌frstnd mn trtjvs، kɒtb rsɒlh، ʃmɒ rɒdr xdɒvnd slɒm mj‌ɡvjm ɣɒjvs kh mrɒ vtmɒm kljsɒ rɒ mjzbɒn ɒst، ʃmɒ rɒ slɒm mj‌frstd v ɒrsts xzjnh dɒr ʃhr v kvɒrts brɒdr bh ʃmɒ slɒm mj‌frstnd ɒlɒn ɒv rɒ kh ɣɒdr ɒst kh ʃmɒ rɒ ɒstvɒr sɒzd، brhsb bʃɒrt mn v mvʔzh ʔjsj msjh، mtɒbɣ kʃf آn srj kh ɒz zmɒnhɒj ɒzlj mxfj bvd،lkn drhɒl mkʃvf ʃd v bvsjlh ktb ɒnbjɒ
