brhsb frmvdh xdɒj srmdj bh d͡ʒmjʔ ɒmt‌hɒ bd͡ʒht ɒtɒʔt ɒjmɒn آʃkɒrɒ ɡrdjd، lkn drhɒl mkʃvf ʃd v bvsjlh ktb ɒnbjɒ brhsb frmvdh xdɒj srmdj bh d͡ʒmjʔ ɒmt‌hɒ bd͡ʒht ɒtɒʔt ɒjmɒn آʃkɒrɒ ɡrdjd، پvls bh ɒrɒdh xdɒ rsvl xvɒndh ʃdh ʔjsj msjh v svstɒnjs brɒdr، bh kljsɒj xdɒ kh dr ɣrnts ɒst، ɒzmɣdsjn dr msjh ʔjsj kh brɒj tɣds xvɒndh ʃdh‌ɒnd، bɒ hmh ksɒnj kh dr hrd͡ʒɒ nɒm xdɒvnd mɒʔjsj msjh rɒ mj‌xvɒnnd kh xdɒvnd mɒ vxdɒvnd ɒjʃɒn ɒst fjz v slɒmtj ɒzd͡ʒɒnb پdr mɒ xdɒ v ʔjsj msjh xdɒvnd br ʃmɒbɒd xdɒj xvd rɒ پjvsth ʃkr mj‌knm drbɒrh ʃmɒ brɒj آn fjz xdɒ kh dr msjh ʔjsj bh ʃmɒ ʔtɒ ʃdh ɒst، zjrɒ ʃmɒ ɒz hrt͡ʃjz drvj dvltmnd ʃdh‌ɒjd، dr hr klɒm v dr hrmʔrft t͡ʃnɒnkh ʃhɒdt msjh dr ʃmɒ ɒstvɒrɡrdjd، bhdj kh dr hjt͡ʃ bxʃʃ nɒɣs njstjdv mntzr mkɒʃfh xdɒvnd mɒ ʔjsj msjh mj‌bɒʃjd kh ɒv njz ʃmɒ rɒ tɒ آxr ɒstvɒr xvɒhdfrmvd tɒ dr rvz xdɒvnd mɒ ʔjsj msjh bj‌mlɒmt bɒʃjd ɒmjn ɒst xdɒjj kh ʃmɒ rɒ bh ʃrɒkt پsr xvd ʔjsj msjh xdɒvnd mɒxvɒndh ɒst lkn‌ɒj brɒdrɒn ɒz ʃmɒ ɒstdʔɒ dɒrm bh nɒm xdɒvnd mɒ ʔjsj msjh kh hmh jk sxn ɡvjjdv ʃɣɒɣ dr mjɒn ʃmɒ nbɒʃd، blkh dr jk fkr vjk rɒj kɒml ʃvjd zjrɒ kh‌ɒj brɒdrɒn mn، ɒz ɒhl xɒnh xlvئj drbɒrh ʃmɒ xbr bh mn rsjdkh nzɒʔhɒ dr mjɒn ʃmɒ پjdɒ ʃdh ɒst ɣrz ɒjnkh hrjkj ɒz ʃmɒ mj‌ɡvjd kh mn ɒz پvls hstm، v mn ɒz ɒپls، v mn ɒz kjfɒ، v mn ɒz msjh آjɒ msjh mnɣsm ʃd؟ jɒ پvls dr rɒh ʃmɒmslvb ɡrdjd؟ jɒ bh nɒm پvls tʔmjd jɒftjd؟ xdɒ rɒ ʃkr mj‌knm kh hjt͡ʃ‌jkj ɒz ʃmɒ rɒtʔmjd ndɒdm d͡ʒz krsپs v ɣɒjvs، kh mbɒdɒksj ɡvjd kh bh nɒm xvd tʔmjd dɒdm vxɒndɒn ɒstjfɒn rɒ njz tʔmjd dɒdm v djɡr jɒdndɒrm kh ksj rɒ tʔmjd dɒdh bɒʃm zjrɒ kh msjh mrɒ frstɒd، nh tɒ tʔmjd dhm blkh tɒ bʃɒrt rsɒnm، nh bh hkmt klɒm mbɒdɒ sljb msjh bɒtl ʃvd zjrɒ zkr sljb brɒj hɒlkɒn hmɒɣt ɒst، lkn nzd mɒ kh nɒd͡ʒjɒn hstjm ɣvt xdɒst zjrɒ mktvb ɒst «hkmt hkmɒ rɒ bɒtl sɒzm v fhm fhjmɒn rɒ nɒbvd ɡrdɒnm» kd͡ʒɒ ɒst hkjm؟ kd͡ʒɒ kɒtb؟ kd͡ʒɒ mbɒhs ɒjn dnjɒ؟ mɡrxdɒ hkmt d͡ʒhɒn rɒ d͡ʒhɒlt ŋrdɒnjdh ɒst؟ zjrɒ kh t͡ʃvn brhsb hkmt xdɒ، d͡ʒhɒn ɒzhkmt xvd bh mʔrft xdɒ nrsjd، xdɒ bdjn rzɒ dɒd kh bvsjlh d͡ʒhɒlt mvʔzh، ɒjmɒndɒrɒn rɒnd͡ʒɒt‌bxʃd t͡ʃvnkh jhvd آjtj mj‌xvɒhnd vjvnɒnjɒn tɒlb hkmt hstnd lkn mɒ bh msjh mslvb vʔz mj‌knjm kh jhvd rɒ lɣzʃ v ɒmt hɒrɒ d͡ʒhɒlt ɒst lkn dʔvt‌ʃdɡɒn rɒ xvɒh jhvd v xvɒh jvnɒnj msjh ɣvt xdɒ v hkmt xdɒ ɒst zjrɒ kh d͡ʒhɒlt xdɒ ɒz ɒnsɒn hkjmtr ɒst v nɒtvɒnj xdɒ ɒz mrdm، tvɒnɒtr zjrɒ‌ɒj brɒdrɒn dʔvt xvd rɒ mlɒhzh nmɒjjd kh bsjɒrj bhsb d͡ʒsm hkjm njstnd vbsjɒrj tvɒnɒ nj v bsjɒrj ʃrjf nj blkh xdɒ d͡ʒhɒl d͡ʒhɒn rɒ brɡzjd tɒ hkmɒ rɒ rsvɒ sɒzdv xdɒ nɒtvɒnɒn ʔɒlm rɒ brɡzjd tɒ tvɒnɒjɒn rɒ rsvɒsɒzd، v xsjsɒn dnjɒ v mhɣrɒn rɒ xdɒbrɡzjd، blkh njstjhɒ rɒ tɒ hstjhɒ rɒ bɒtl ɡrdɒnd tɒ hjt͡ʃ bʃrj dr hzvr ɒv fxr nknd lkn ɒz ɒv ʃmɒ hstjd dr ʔjsj msjh kh ɒz d͡ʒɒnb xdɒbrɒj ʃmɒ hkmt ʃdh ɒst v ʔdɒlt ɣdvsjt v fdɒtɒ t͡ʃnɒnkh mktvb ɒst hr‌kh fxr knddr xdɒvnd fxr nmɒjd tɒ t͡ʃnɒnkh mktvb ɒst hr‌kh fxr knddr xdɒvnd fxr nmɒjd v mn‌ɒj brɒdrɒn، t͡ʃvn bh nzd ʃmɒ آmdm، bɒ fzjlt klɒm jɒ hkmt njɒmdm t͡ʃvn ʃmɒrɒ bh‌sr xdɒ ɒʔlɒm mj‌nmvdm zjrɒ ʔzjmt nkrdm kh t͡ʃjzj dr mjɒn ʃmɒ dɒnsth bɒʃm d͡ʒzʔjsj msjh v ɒv rɒ mslvb v mn dr zʔf vtrs v lrzʃ bsjɒr nzd ʃmɒ ʃdm، v klɒm vvʔz mn bh sxnɒn mɣnʔ hkmt nbvd، blkh bh brhɒn rvh v ɣvt، tɒ ɒjmɒn ʃmɒ dr hkmt ɒnsɒn nbɒʃd blkh dr ɣvt xdɒ lkn hkmtj bjɒn mj‌knjm nzd kɒmljn، ɒmɒhkmtj kh ɒz ɒjn ʔɒlm njst v nh ɒz rvsɒj ɒjn ʔɒlm kh zɒjl mj‌ɡrdnd blkh hkmt xdɒ rɒ drsrj bjɒn mj‌knjm، jʔnj آn hkmt mxfj rɒ kh xdɒ پjʃ ɒz dhrhɒ brɒj d͡ʒlɒl mɒ mɣdr frmvd، kh ɒhdj ɒz rvsɒj ɒjn ʔɒlm آn rɒ ndɒnst zjrɒ ɒɡr mj‌dɒnstnd xdɒvnd d͡ʒlɒl rɒ mslvb nmj krdnd blkh t͡ʃnɒnkh mktvb ɒst «t͡ʃjzhɒjj rɒ kh t͡ʃʃmj ndjd v ɡvʃj nʃnjd v bh‌xɒtr ɒnsɒnj xtvr nkrd، jʔnj آnt͡ʃh xdɒ brɒj dvstdɒrɒn xvd mhjɒ krdh ɒst» ɒmɒ xdɒ آnhɒrɒ bh rvh xvd br mɒ kʃf nmvdh ɒst، zjrɒ kh rvh hmh‌t͡ʃjz htj ʔmɣhɒj xdɒ rɒ njz tfhs mj‌knd zjrɒ kjst ɒz mrdmɒn kh ɒmvr ɒnsɒn rɒbdɒnd d͡ʒz rvh ɒnsɒn kh dr vj mj‌bɒʃd hmt͡ʃnjn njz ɒmvr xdɒ rɒ hjt͡ʃ‌ks ndɒnsth ɒst، d͡ʒz rvh xdɒ ljkn mɒ rvh d͡ʒhɒn rɒ njɒfth‌ɒjm، blkh آn rvh kh ɒz xdɒst tɒ آnt͡ʃh xdɒ bh mɒ ʔtɒ frmvdh ɒst bdɒnjm kh آnhɒ rɒ njz bjɒn mj‌knjm nh bh sxnɒn آmvxth ʃdh ɒz hkmt ɒnsɒn، blkh bh آnt͡ʃh rvh‌ɒlɣds mj‌آmvzd v rvhɒnjhɒ rɒ bɒrvhɒnjhɒ d͡ʒmʔ mj‌nmɒjjm ɒmɒ ɒnsɒn nfsɒnj‌ɒmvr rvh xdɒ rɒ nmj پzjrd zjrɒ kh nzd ɒv d͡ʒhɒlt ɒst v آnhɒ rɒ nmj tvɒnd fhmjd zjrɒ hkm آnhɒ ɒzrvh mj‌ʃvd lkn ʃxs rvhɒnj dr hmh‌t͡ʃjz hkm mj‌knd v ksj rɒ dr ɒv hkm njst«zjrɒ kjst kh fkr xdɒvnd rɒ dɒnsth bɒʃd tɒɒv rɒ tʔljm dhd؟» lkn mɒ fkr msjh rɒ dɒrjm «zjrɒ kjst kh fkr xdɒvnd rɒ dɒnsth bɒʃd tɒɒv rɒ tʔljm dhd؟» lkn mɒ fkr msjh rɒ dɒrjm v mn‌ɒj brɒdrɒn ntvɒnstm bh ʃmɒ sxn ɡvjm t͡ʃvn rvhɒnjɒn، blkh t͡ʃvn d͡ʒsmɒnjɒn v t͡ʃvn ɒtfɒl dr msjh v ʃmɒ rɒ bh ʃjr xvrɒk dɒdm nh bh ɡvʃt zjrɒ kh hnvzɒsttɒʔt آn ndɒʃtjd blkh ɒlhɒl njz ndɒrjd، zjrɒ kh tɒ bh hɒl d͡ʒsmɒnj hstjd، t͡ʃvn dr mjɒn ʃmɒ hsd v nzɒʔ v d͡ʒdɒjj‌hɒ ɒst آjɒ d͡ʒsmɒnj njstjd v bh trjɣ ɒnsɒn rftɒr nmj nmɒjjd؟ zjrɒt͡ʃvn jkj ɡvjd mn ɒz پvls v djɡrj mn ɒz ɒپls hstm، آjɒ ɒnsɒn njstjd؟ پs kjst پvls v kjst ɒپls؟ d͡ʒzxɒdmɒnj kh bvɒsth ɒjʃɒn ɒjmɒn آvrdjd v bh ɒndɒzh‌ɒj kh xdɒvnd bh hrks dɒd mn kɒʃtm vɒپls آbjɒrj krd lkn xdɒ nmv mj‌bxʃjd lhzɒnh kɒrndh t͡ʃjzj ɒst v nh آb dhndh blkh xdɒj rvjɒnndh v kɒrndh v sjrآb knndh‌jk hstnd، lkn hr jk ɒd͡ʒrt xvd rɒ bhsb mʃɣt xvdxvɒhnd jɒft zjrɒ bɒ xdɒ hmkɒrɒn hstjm vʃmɒ zrɒʔt xdɒ v ʔmɒrt xdɒ hstjd bhsb fjz xdɒ kh bh mn ʔtɒ ʃd، t͡ʃvn mʔmɒr dɒnɒ bnjɒd nhɒdm v djɡrj br آn ʔmɒrt mj‌sɒzd؛ lkn hrks bɒ‌xbr bɒʃd kh t͡ʃɡvnh ʔmɒrt mj‌knd zjrɒ bnjɒdj djɡr hjt͡ʃ‌ks nmj tvɒnd nhɒd d͡ʒz آnkh nhɒdh ʃdh ɒst، jʔnj ʔjsj msjh lkn ɒɡr ksj br آn bnjɒd، ʔmɒrtj ɒz tlɒ jɒ nɣrh jɒ d͡ʒvɒhr jɒ t͡ʃvb jɒ ɡjɒh jɒkɒh bnɒ knd، kɒr hrks آʃkɒr xvɒhd ʃd، zjrɒ kh آn rvz آn rɒ zɒhr xvɒhd nmvd، t͡ʃvnkh آn bh آtʃ bh zhvr xvɒhd rsjd v xvd آtʃ، ʔml hrks rɒ xvɒhd آzmvd kh t͡ʃɡvnh ɒst ɒɡr kɒrj kh ksj br آn ɡzɒrdh bɒʃd bmɒnd، ɒd͡ʒr xvɒhd jɒft v ɒɡr ʔml ksj svxth ʃvd، zjɒn bdv vɒrd آjd، hrt͡ʃnd xvd nd͡ʒɒt jɒbdɒmɒ t͡ʃnɒnkh ɒz mjɒn آtʃ آjɒ nmj dɒnjd kh hjkl xdɒ hstjd v rvh xdɒ dr ʃmɒ sɒkn ɒst؟ ɒɡr ksj hjkl xdɒrɒ xrɒb knd، xdɒ ɒv rɒ hlɒk sɒzd zjrɒ hjkl xdɒ mɣds ɒst v ʃmɒ آn hstjd znhɒrksj xvd rɒ frjb ndhd ɒɡr ksj ɒz ʃmɒ xvdrɒ dr ɒjn d͡ʒhɒn hkjm پndɒrd، d͡ʒɒhl bʃvd tɒhkjm ɡrdd zjrɒ hkmt ɒjn d͡ʒhɒn nzd xdɒd͡ʒhɒlt ɒst، t͡ʃnɒnkh mktvb ɒst «hkmɒ rɒ bh mkr xvdʃɒn ɡrftɒr mj‌sɒzd» v ɒjz «xdɒvnd ɒfkɒr hkmɒ rɒ mj‌dɒnd kh bɒtl ɒst» پs hjt͡ʃ‌ks dr ɒnsɒn fxr nknd، zjrɒhmh‌t͡ʃjz ɒz آn ʃmɒ ɒst xvɒh پvls، xvɒh ɒپls، xvɒh kjfɒ، xvɒh dnjɒ، xvɒh zndɡj، xvɒh mvt، xvɒh t͡ʃjzhɒj hɒl، xvɒh t͡ʃjzhɒj آjndh، hmh ɒz آn ʃmɒ ɒst،v ʃmɒ ɒz msjh v msjh ɒz xdɒ mj‌bɒʃd v ʃmɒ ɒz msjh v msjh ɒz xdɒ mj‌bɒʃd hrks mɒ rɒ t͡ʃvn xdɒm msjh v vklɒj ɒsrɒr xdɒ bʃmɒrd v djɡr dr vklɒbɒzپrs mj‌ʃvd kh hr jkj ɒmjn bɒʃd ɒmɒbd͡ʒht mn kmtr t͡ʃjzj ɒst kh ɒz ʃmɒ jɒ ɒz jvm bʃr hkm krdh ʃvm، blkh brxvd njz hkm nmj knm zjrɒ kh dr xvd ʔjbj nmj bjnm، lkn ɒzɒjn ʔɒdl ʃmrdh nmj ʃvm، blkh hkm knndh mn xdɒvnd ɒst lhzɒ پjʃ ɒz vɣt bh t͡ʃjzj hkm mknjd tɒ xdɒvnd bjɒjd kh xfɒjɒj zlmt rɒrvʃn xvɒhd krd v njthɒj dlhɒ rɒ bh zhvrxvɒhd آvrd؛ آŋɒh hrks rɒ mdh ɒz xdɒ xvɒhdbvd ɒmɒ‌ɒj brɒdrɒn، ɒjn t͡ʃjzhɒ rɒ btvr msl bh xvd v ɒپls nsbt dɒdm bh‌xɒtr ʃmɒ tɒ drbɒrh mɒآmvxth ʃvjd kh ɒz آnt͡ʃh mktvb ɒst td͡ʒɒvznknjd v tɒ hjt͡ʃ‌jkj ɒz ʃmɒ tkbr nknd brɒj jkj br djɡrj zjrɒ kjst kh tv rɒ brtrj dɒd vt͡ʃh t͡ʃjz dɒrj kh njɒftj؟ پs t͡ʃvn jɒftj، t͡ʃrɒfxr mj‌knj kh ɡvjɒ njɒftj ɒlhɒl sjr ʃdh v dvltmnd ɡʃth‌ɒjd v bdvn mɒ sltnt mj‌knjd؛ v kɒʃkh sltnt mj‌krdjdtɒ mɒ njz bɒ ʃmɒ sltnt mj‌krdjm zjrɒ ɡmɒn mj‌brm kh xdɒ mɒ rsvlɒn rɒ آxr hmh ʔrzh dɒʃt msl آnɒnj kh ftvɒj mvt br ɒjʃɒn ʃdh ɒst، zjrɒ kh d͡ʒhɒn v frʃtɡɒn v mrdm rɒtmɒʃɒɡɒh ʃdh‌ɒjm mɒ bh‌xɒtr msjh d͡ʒɒhl hstjm، lkn ʃmɒ dr msjh dɒnɒ hstjd؛ mɒ zʔjf lkn ʃmɒ tvɒnɒ؛ ʃmɒ ʔzjz ɒmɒ mɒ zljl tɒ bh hmjn sɒʔt ɡrsnh v tʃnh v ʔrjɒn v kvbjdh vآvɒrh hstjm، v bh‌dsthɒj xvd kɒr krdh، mʃɣt mj‌kʃjm v dʃnɒm ʃnjdh، brkt mj‌tlbjm v mzlvm ɡrdjdh، sbr mj‌knjm t͡ʃvn ɒftrɒ br mɒmj znnd، nsjht mj‌knjm v msl ɣɒzvrɒt dnjɒ vfzlɒt hmh‌t͡ʃjz ʃdh‌ɒjm tɒ bh hɒl v ɒjn rɒ nmj nvjsm tɒ ʃmɒ rɒ ʃrmndh sɒzm blkh t͡ʃvn frzndɒn mhbvb xvd tnbjh mj‌knm zjrɒ hrt͡ʃnd hzɒrɒn ɒstɒd dr msjh dɒʃth bɒʃjd، lkn پdrɒn bsjɒr ndɒrjd، zjrɒ kh mn ʃmɒ rɒdr msjh ʔjsj bh ɒnd͡ʒjl tvljd nmvdm، پs ɒzʃmɒ ɒltmɒs mj‌knm kh bh mn ɒɣtdɒ nmɒjjd brɒj hmjn tjmvtɒvs rɒ nzd ʃmɒ frstɒdm kh ɒvst frznd mhbvb mn v ɒmjn dr xdɒvnd tɒ rɒhhɒj mrɒ dr msjh bh jɒd ʃmɒ bjɒvrd، t͡ʃnɒnkh dr hrd͡ʒɒv dr hrkljsɒ tʔljm mj‌dhm ɒmɒ bʔzj tkbrmj knnd bh ɡmɒn آnkh mn nzd ʃmɒ nmj آjm lkn bh zvdj nzd ʃmɒ xvɒhm آmd، ɒɡrxdɒvnd bxvɒhd v xvɒhm dɒnst nh sxn mtkbrɒn rɒ blkh ɣvt ɒjʃɒn rɒ zjrɒ mlkvt xdɒ bh zbɒn njst blkh dr ɣvt ɒstt͡ʃh xvɒhʃ dɒrjd آjɒ bɒ t͡ʃvb nzd ʃmɒ bjɒjm jɒ bɒmhbt v rvh hlm؟ t͡ʃh xvɒhʃ dɒrjd آjɒ bɒ t͡ʃvb nzd ʃmɒ bjɒjm jɒ bɒmhbt v rvh hlm؟ fj ɒlhɣjɣh ʃnjdh mj‌ʃvd kh dr mjɒn ʃmɒznɒ پjdɒ ʃdh ɒst، v t͡ʃnɒn znɒjj kh drmjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ hm njst؛ kh ʃxsj zn پdr xvd rɒ dɒʃth bɒʃd v ʃmɒ fxr mj‌knjd blkh mɒtm hm ndɒrjd، t͡ʃnɒnkh bɒjd tɒ آn ksj‌kh ɒjn ʔml rɒ krdɒz mjɒn ʃmɒ bjrvn ʃvd zjrɒ kh mn hrt͡ʃnd drd͡ʒsm ɣɒjbm، ɒmɒ dr rvh hɒzrm؛ v ɒlɒn t͡ʃvn hɒzr، hkm krdm dr hɣ ksj‌kh ɒjn rɒ t͡ʃnjn krdh ɒst bh nɒm xdɒvnd mɒ ʔjsj msjh، hŋɒmj kh ʃmɒ bɒ rvh mn bɒ ɣvt xdɒvnd mɒʔjsj msjh d͡ʒmʔ ʃvjd، kh t͡ʃnjn ʃxs bh ʃjtɒn sپrdh ʃvd bd͡ʒht hlɒkt d͡ʒsm tɒ rvh dr rvz xdɒvnd ʔjsj nd͡ʒɒt jɒbd fxr ʃmɒ njkv njst آjɒ آɡɒh njstjd kh ɒndk xmjrmɒjh، tmɒm xmjr rɒ mxmr mj‌sɒzd؟ پs xvd rɒ ɒz xmjrmɒjh khnh پɒk sɒzjd tɒftjr tɒzh bɒʃjd، t͡ʃnɒnkh bj‌xmjrmɒjh hstjd zjrɒkh fsh mɒ msjh dr rɒh mɒ zbh ʃdh ɒst پs ʔjd rɒ ŋɒh dɒrjm nh bh xmjrmɒjh khnh v nh bh xmjrmɒjh bdj v ʃrɒrt، blkh bh ftjr sɒdh dlj v rɒstj dr آn rsɒlh bh ʃmɒ nvʃtm kh bɒ zɒnjɒn mʔɒʃrt nknjd lkn nh mtlɣ bɒ zɒnjɒn ɒjn d͡ʒhɒn jɒ tmʔkɒrɒn v jɒ stmkɒrɒn jɒ bt‌پrstɒn، kh dr ɒjn svrt mj‌bɒjd ɒz dnjɒ bjrvn ʃvjd lkn ɒlɒn bh ʃmɒ mj‌nvjsm kh ɒɡr ksj‌kh bh brɒdr nɒmjdh mj‌ʃvd، zɒnj jɒ tmɒʔ jɒ bt‌پrst jɒfhɒʃ jɒ mjɡsɒr jɒ stmɡr bɒʃd، bɒ t͡ʃnjn ʃxs mʔɒʃrt mknjd blkh ɣzɒ hm mxvrjd zjrɒ mrɒ t͡ʃh‌kɒr ɒst kh br آnɒnj kh xɒrd͡ʒ ɒnddɒvrj knm آjɒ ʃmɒ br ɒhl dɒxl dɒvrj nmj knjd؟lkn آnɒnj rɒ kh xɒrd͡ʒ‌ɒnd xdɒ dɒvrj xvɒhd krd پs آn ʃrjr rɒ ɒz mjɒn xvdbrɒnjd lkn آnɒnj rɒ kh xɒrd͡ʒ‌ɒnd xdɒ dɒvrj xvɒhd krd پs آn ʃrjr rɒ ɒz mjɒn xvdbrɒnjd آjɒ ksj ɒz ʃmɒ t͡ʃvn br djɡrj mdʔj bɒʃd، d͡ʒrɒt dɒrd kh mrɒfʔh brd پjʃ zɒlmɒn nh nzd mɣdsɒn؟ jɒ nmj dɒnjd kh mɣdsɒn، dnjɒ rɒ dɒvrj xvɒhnd krd؛ v ɒɡr dnjɒ ɒz ʃmɒ hkm jɒbd، آjɒ ɣɒbl mɣdmɒt kmtr njstjd؟ آjɒnmj dɒnjd kh frʃtɡɒn rɒ dɒvrj xvɒhjm krd tɒt͡ʃh rsd bh ɒmvr rvzɡɒr؟ پs t͡ʃvn dr mɣdmɒt rvzɡɒr mrɒfʔh dɒrjd، آjɒ آnɒnj rɒ kh dr kljsɒhɣjr ʃmrdh mj‌ʃvnd، mj‌nʃɒnjd؟ bd͡ʒht ɒnfʔɒl ʃmɒ mj‌ɡvjm، آjɒ dr mjɒn ʃmɒ jk nfr dɒnɒnjst kh btvɒnd dr mjɒn brɒdrɒn xvd hkm knd؟ blkh brɒdr bɒ brɒdr bh mhɒkmh mj‌rvd v آn hm nzd bj‌ɒjmɒnɒn blkh ɒlɒn ʃmɒ rɒ bɒlkljh ɣsvrj ɒst kh bɒjkdjɡr mrɒfʔh dɒrjd t͡ʃrɒ bjʃtr mzlvm nmj ʃvjd v t͡ʃrɒ bjʃtr mɣbvn nmj ʃvjd؟ blkh ʃmɒ zlm mj‌knjd v mɣbvn mj‌sɒzjd v ɒjn rɒ njzbh brɒdrɒn xvd آjɒ nmj dɒnjd kh zɒlmɒn vɒrs mlkvt xdɒ nmj ʃvnd؟ frjb mxvrjd، zjrɒfɒsɣɒn v bt‌پrstɒn v zɒnjɒn v mtnʔmɒn v lvɒt v dzdɒn v tmʔkɒrɒn v mjɡsɒrɒn v fhɒʃɒn vstmɡrɒn vɒrs mlkvt xdɒ nxvɒhnd ʃd vbʔzj ɒz ʃmɒ t͡ʃnjn mj‌bvdjd lkn ɣsl jɒfth vmɣds ɡrdjdh v ʔɒdl krdh ʃdh‌ɒjd bh nɒm ʔjsj xdɒvnd v bh rvh xdɒj mɒ hmh‌t͡ʃjz brɒj mn d͡ʒɒjz ɒst lkn hrt͡ʃjzmfjd njst hmh‌t͡ʃjz brɒj mn rvɒst، ljkn nmj ɡzɒrm kh t͡ʃjzj br mn tslt jɒbd xvrɒk brɒj ʃkm ɒst v ʃkm brɒj xvrɒk، lkn xdɒɒjn v آn rɒ fɒnj xvɒhd sɒxt ɒmɒ d͡ʒsm brɒj znɒnjst، blkh brɒj xdɒvnd ɒst v xdɒvnd brɒj d͡ʒsm v xdɒ xdɒvnd rɒ brxjzɒnjd v mɒ rɒ njz bh ɣvt xvd xvɒhd brxjzɒnjd آjɒ nmj dɒnjd kh bdnhɒj ʃmɒ ɒʔzɒj msjh ɒst؟ پs آjɒɒʔzɒj msjh rɒ brdɒʃth، ɒʔzɒj fɒhʃh ɡrdɒnm؟ hɒʃɒ آjɒ nmj dɒnjd kh hrkh bɒ fɒhʃh پjvndd، bɒ vj jktn bɒʃd؟ zjrɒ mj‌ɡvjd «hrdvjk tn xvɒhnd bvd» lkn ksj‌kh bɒ xdɒvndپjvndd jkrvh ɒst ɒz znɒ bɡrjzjd hr ɡnɒhj kh آdmj mj‌knd bjrvn ɒz bdn ɒst، lkn zɒnj brbdn xvd ɡnɒh mj‌vrzd jɒ nmj dɒnjd kh bdn ʃmɒ hjkl rvh‌ɒlɣds ɒst kh dr ʃmɒ ɒst kh ɒz xdɒ jɒfth‌ɒjd v ɒz آn xvd njstjd؟zjrɒ kh bh ɣjmtj xrjdh ʃdjd، پs xdɒ rɒ bh bdn xvdtmd͡ʒjd nmɒjjd zjrɒ kh bh ɣjmtj xrjdh ʃdjd، پs xdɒ rɒ bh bdn xvdtmd͡ʒjd nmɒjjd ɒmɒ drbɒrh آnt͡ʃh bh mn nvʃth bvdjd mrd rɒnjkv آn ɒst kh zn rɒ lms nknd lkn bsbb znɒ، hr mrd zvd͡ʒh xvd rɒ bdɒrd v hr zn ʃvhr xvd rɒ bdɒrd v ʃvhr hɣ zn rɒ ɒdɒnmɒjd v hmt͡ʃnjn zn hɣ ʃvhr rɒ zn br bdn xvd mxtɒr njst blkh ʃvhrʃ، v hmt͡ʃnjn mrd njz ɒxtjɒr bdn xvd ndɒrd blkh znʃ، ɒz jkdjɡrd͡ʒdɒjj mɡzjnjd mɡr mdtj bh rzɒj trfjn tɒbrɒj rvzh v ʔbɒdt fɒrɣ bɒʃjd؛ v bɒz bɒ hm پjvndjd mbɒdɒ ʃjtɒn ʃmɒ rɒ bh‌sbb nɒپrhjzj ʃmɒ dr td͡ʒrbh ɒndɒzd، lkn ɒjn rɒ mj‌ɡvjm bh trjɣ ɒd͡ʒɒzh nh bh trjɣ hkm ɒmɒ mj‌xvɒhm kh hmh mrdm msl xvdm bɒʃnd lkn hrks nʔmtj xɒs ɒz xdɒ dɒrd، jkj t͡ʃnjn v djɡrj t͡ʃnɒn lkn bh md͡ʒrdjn v bjvh‌znɒn mj‌ɡvjm kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ njkv ɒst kh msl mn bmɒnnd lkn ɒɡr پrhjzndɒrnd، nkɒh bknnd zjrɒ kh nkɒh ɒz آtʃ hvs bhtr ɒst ɒmɒ mnkvhɒn rɒ hkm mj‌knm v nh mn blkh xdɒvnd kh zn ɒz ʃvhr xvd d͡ʒdɒ nʃvd؛ v ɒɡr d͡ʒdɒ ʃvd، md͡ʒrd bmɒnd jɒ bɒ ʃvhr xvdslh knd؛ v mrd njz zn xvd rɒ d͡ʒdɒ nsɒzd v djɡrɒn rɒ mn mj‌ɡvjm nh xdɒvnd kh ɒɡrksj ɒz brɒdrɒn znj bj‌ɒjmɒn dɒʃth bɒʃd v آn zn rɒzj bɒʃd kh bɒ vj bmɒnd، ɒv rɒ d͡ʒdɒ nsɒzd vznj kh ʃvhr bj‌ɒjmɒn dɒʃth bɒʃd v ɒv rɒzj bɒʃd kh bɒ vj bmɒnd، ɒz ʃvhr xvd d͡ʒdɒ nʃvd zjrɒ kh ʃvhr bj‌ɒjmɒn ɒz zn xvd mɣds mj‌ʃvd v zn bj‌ɒjmɒn ɒz brɒdr mɣds mj‌ɡrdd vɒɡrnh ɒvlɒd ʃmɒ nɒپɒk mj‌bvdnd، lkn ɒlhɒl mɣdsnd ɒmɒ ɒɡr bj‌ɒjmɒn d͡ʒdɒjj nmɒjd، bɡzɒrʃ kh bʃvd zjrɒ brɒdr jɒ xvɒhr dr ɒjn svrt mɣjd njst v xdɒ mɒ rɒ bh slɒmtj xvɒndh ɒst zjrɒ kh tv t͡ʃh dɒnj‌ɒj zn kh ʃvhrt rɒ nd͡ʒɒt xvɒhj dɒd؟ jɒ t͡ʃh dɒnj‌ɒj mrd kh zn xvd rɒ nd͡ʒɒt xvɒhj dɒd؟ mɡr ɒjnkh bh hrtvr kh xdɒvnd bh hrks ɣsmt frmvdh v bh hmɒn hɒlt kh xdɒ hrks rɒxvɒndh bɒʃd، bdjntvr rftɒr bknd؛ v hmt͡ʃnjn drhmh kljsɒhɒ ɒmr mj‌knm ɒɡr ksj dr mxtvnj xvɒndh ʃvd، nɒmxtvn ŋrdd v ɒɡr ksj drnɒmxtvnj xvɒndh ʃvd، mxtvn nʃvd xtnh t͡ʃjzj njst v nɒmxtvnj hjt͡ʃ، blkh ŋɒh dɒʃtn ɒmrhɒj xdɒ hrks dr hr hɒltj kh xvɒndh ʃdh bɒʃd، dr hmɒn bmɒnd ɒɡr dr ɣlɒmj xvɒndh ʃdj tv rɒ bɒkj nbɒʃd، blkh ɒɡr hm mj‌tvɒnj آzɒd ʃvj، آn rɒ ɒvlj tr ɒstʔmɒl kn zjrɒ ɣlɒmj kh dr xdɒvnd xvɒndh ʃdh bɒʃd، آzɒd xdɒvnd ɒst؛ v hmt͡ʃnjn ʃxsj آzɒd kh xvɒndh ʃd، ɣlɒm msjh ɒst bh ɣjmtj xrjdh ʃdjd، ɣlɒm ɒnsɒn nʃvjd ‌ɒj brɒdrɒn hrks dr hrhɒltj kh xvɒndh ʃdh bɒʃd، dr آn nzd xdɒ bmɒnd ɒmɒ drbɒrh bɒkrh‌hɒ hkmj ɒz xdɒvnd ndɒrm lkn t͡ʃvn ɒz xdɒvnd rhmt jɒftm kh ɒmjn bɒʃm، rɒj mj‌dhm پs ɡmɒn mj‌knm kh bd͡ʒht tŋj ɒjn zmɒn، ɒnsɒn rɒ njkv آn ɒst kh hmt͡ʃnɒn bmɒnd ɒɡr bɒ zn bsth ʃdj، d͡ʒdɒjj md͡ʒvj vɒɡr ɒz zn d͡ʒdɒ hstj djɡr zn mxvɒh lkn hrɡɒh nkɒh krdj، ɡnɒh nvrzjdj v hrɡɒh bɒkrh mnkvhh ɡrdjd، ɡnɒh nkrd vlj t͡ʃnjn dr d͡ʒsm zhmt xvɒhnd kʃjd، ljkn mn br ʃmɒ ʃfɣt dɒrm ɒmɒ‌ɒj brɒdrɒn، ɒjn rɒ mj‌ɡvjm vɣt tŋ ɒst tɒ bʔd ɒz ɒjn آnɒnj kh zn dɒrnd msl bj‌zn bɒʃnd v ɡrjɒnɒn t͡ʃvn nɒɡrjɒnɒn v xvʃhɒlɒn msl nɒxvʃhɒlɒn v xrjdɒrn t͡ʃvn ɣjrmɒlkɒn bɒʃnd، v ɒstʔmɒl knndɡɒn ɒjn d͡ʒhɒn msl ɒstʔmɒl knndɡɒn nbɒʃnd، zjrɒ kh svrt ɒjn d͡ʒhɒn drɡzr ɒst ɒmɒ xvɒhʃ ɒjn dɒrm kh ʃmɒ bj‌ɒndjʃh bɒʃjd ʃxs md͡ʒrd dr ɒmvr xdɒvnd mj‌ɒndjʃdkh t͡ʃɡvnh rzɒmndj xdɒvnd rɒ bd͡ʒvjd؛ vsɒhb zn dr ɒmvr dnjɒ mj‌ɒndjʃd kh t͡ʃɡvnh zn xvd rɒ xvʃ bsɒzd dr mjɒn zn mnkvhh vbɒkrh njz tfɒvtj ɒst، zjrɒ bɒkrh dr ɒmvr xdɒvndmj ɒndjʃd tɒ hm dr tn v hm dr rvh mɣds bɒʃd؛ ɒmɒ mnkvhh dr ɒmvr dnjɒ mj‌ɒndjʃd tɒ ʃvhr xvdrɒ xvʃ sɒzd ɒmɒ ɒjn rɒ brɒj nfʔ ʃmɒmj ɡvjm nh آnkh dɒmj br ʃmɒ bnhm blkh nzr bh ʃɒjstɡj v mlɒzmt xdɒvnd، bj‌tʃvjʃ lkn hrɡɒh ksj ɡmɒn brd kh bɒ bɒkrh xvdnɒʃɒjstɡj mj‌knd، ɒɡr bh hd blvɣ rsjd v nɒt͡ʃɒrɒst ɒz t͡ʃnjn ʃdn، آnt͡ʃh xvɒhd bknd؛ ɡnɒhj njst؛ bɡzɒr kh nkɒh knnd ɒmɒ ksj‌kh dr dl xvd پɒjdɒr ɒst v ɒhtjɒd͡ʒ ndɒrd blkh dr ɒrɒdh xvd mxtɒr ɒst v dr dl xvd d͡ʒɒzm ɒst kh bɒkrh xvd rɒ ŋɒh dɒrd، njkv mj‌knd پs hm ksj‌kh bh nkɒh dhd، njkv mj‌knd v ksj‌kh bh nkɒh ndhd، njkvtr mj‌nmɒjd zn mɒdɒmj kh ʃvhrʃ zndh ɒst، bsth ɒst ɒmɒ hrɡɒh ʃvhrʃ mrd آzɒd ɡrdjd tɒ bh hrkh bxvɒhd mnkvhh ʃvd، ljkn dr xdɒvndfɣtɒmɒ bhsb rɒj mn xvʃhɒl tr ɒst، ɒɡr t͡ʃnjn bmɒnd v mn njz ɡmɒn mj‌brm kh rvh xdɒrɒ dɒrm ɒmɒ bhsb rɒj mn xvʃhɒl tr ɒst، ɒɡr t͡ʃnjn bmɒnd v mn njz ɡmɒn mj‌brm kh rvh xdɒrɒ dɒrm ɒmɒ drbɒrh ɣrbɒnj hɒj bthɒ mj‌dɒnjm kh hmh ʔlm dɒrjm ʔlm bɒʔs tkbr ɒst، lkn mhbt bnɒ mj‌knd ɒɡr ksj ɡmɒn brd kh t͡ʃjzj mj‌dɒnd، hnvz hjt͡ʃ nmj dɒnd، btvrj kh bɒjddɒnst ɒmɒ ɒɡr ksj xdɒ rɒ mhbt nmɒjd، nzd ɒvmʔrvf mj‌bɒʃd پs drbɒrh xvrdn ɣrbɒnj hɒj bthɒ، mj‌dɒnjm kh bt dr d͡ʒhɒn t͡ʃjzj njst v ɒjnkh xdɒjj djɡr d͡ʒz jkj njst zjrɒ hrt͡ʃnd hstnd kh bh xdɒjɒn xvɒndh mj‌ʃvnd، t͡ʃh dr آsmɒn v t͡ʃh drzmjn، t͡ʃnɒnkh xdɒjɒn bsjɒr v xdɒvndɒn bsjɒrmj bɒʃnd، lkn mɒ rɒ jk xdɒst jʔnj پdr kh hmh‌t͡ʃjz ɒz ɒvst v mɒ brɒj ɒv hstjm، v jk xdɒvnd jʔnj ʔjsj msjh kh hmh‌t͡ʃjz ɒz ɒvst v mɒ ɒz ɒv hstjm vlj hmh rɒ ɒjn mʔrft njst، zjrɒ bʔzj tɒbh hɒl bh ɒʔtɣɒd ɒjnkh bt hst، آn rɒ t͡ʃvn ɣrbɒnj bt mj‌xvrnd v zmjr ɒjʃɒn t͡ʃvn zʔjf ɒst nd͡ʒs mj‌ʃvd ɒmɒ xvrɒk، mɒ rɒmɣbvl xdɒ nmj sɒzd zjrɒ kh nh bh xvrdn bhtrjm v nh bh nɒxvrdn bdtr lkn ɒhtjɒt knjd mbɒdɒɒxtjɒr ʃmɒ bɒʔs lɣzʃ zʔfɒ ɡrdd zjrɒ ɒɡrksj tv rɒ kh sɒhb ʔlm hstj bjnd kh dr btkdh nʃsth‌ɒj، آjɒ zmjr آn ks kh zʔjf ɒst bh xvrdn ɣrbɒnj hɒj bthɒ bnɒ nmj ʃvd؟ v ɒz ʔlm tv آn brɒdr zʔjf kh msjh brɒj ɒv mrd hlɒk xvɒhd ʃd v hmt͡ʃnjn t͡ʃvn bh brɒdrɒn ɡnɒh vrzjdjd v zmɒjr zʔjfʃɒn rɒ sdmh rsɒnjdjd، hmɒnɒ bh msjh xtɒ nmvdjdbnɒbrɒjn، ɒɡrxvrɒk bɒʔs lɣzʃ brɒdr mn bɒʃd، tɒ bh ɒbdɡvʃt nxvɒhm xvrd tɒ brɒdr xvd rɒ lɣzʃ ndhm bnɒbrɒjn، ɒɡrxvrɒk bɒʔs lɣzʃ brɒdr mn bɒʃd، tɒ bh ɒbdɡvʃt nxvɒhm xvrd tɒ brɒdr xvd rɒ lɣzʃ ndhm آjɒ rsvl njstm؟ آjɒ آzɒd njstm؟ آjɒ ʔjsj msjh xdɒvnd mɒ rɒ ndjdm؟ آjɒ ʃmɒʔml mn dr xdɒvnd njstjd؟ hrɡɒh djɡrɒn rɒrsvl nbɒʃm، ɒlbth ʃmɒ rɒ hstm zjrɒ kh mhrrsɒlt mn dr xdɒvnd ʃmɒ hstjd hd͡ʒt mn bd͡ʒht آnɒnj kh mrɒ ɒmthɒn mj‌knnd ɒjn ɒst kh آjɒ ɒxtjɒr xvrdn v آʃɒmjdn ndɒrjm؟ آjɒɒxtjɒr ndɒrjm kh xvɒhr djnj rɒ bh znj ɡrfth، hmrɒh xvd bbrjm، msl sɒjr rsvlɒn v brɒdrɒn xdɒvnd v kjfɒ؟ jɒ mn v brnɒbɒ bh tnhɒjj mxtɒrnjstjm kh kɒr nknjm؟ kjst kh hrɡz ɒz xrd͡ʒj xvd d͡ʒŋ knd؟ jɒ kjst kh tɒkstɒnj ɣrs nmvdh، ɒz mjvh‌ɒʃ nxvrd؟ jɒ kjst kh ɡlh‌ɒj bt͡ʃrɒnd v ɒz ʃjr ɡlh nnvʃd؟ آjɒ ɒjn rɒ btvr ɒnsɒn mj‌ɡvjm jɒʃrjʔt njz ɒjn rɒ nmj ɡvjd؟ zjrɒ kh dr tvrɒt mvsj mktvb ɒst kh «ɡɒv rɒ hŋɒmj kh xrmn rɒ xrd mj‌knd، dhɒn mbnd» آjɒ xdɒ dr fkr ɡɒvɒn mj‌bɒʃd؟ آjɒ mhz xɒtr mɒ ɒjn rɒnmj ɡvjd؟ blj brɒj mɒ mktvb ɒst kh ʃxm knndh mj‌bɒjd bh ɒmjd، ʃxm nmɒjd v xrdknndh xrmn dr ɒmjd jɒftn ɣsmt xvd bɒʃd t͡ʃvn mɒ rvhɒnjhɒ rɒ brɒj ʃmɒ kɒʃtjm، آjɒ ɒmrbzrɡj ɒst kh mɒ d͡ʒsmɒnjhɒj ʃmɒ rɒ drv knjm؟ ɒɡr djɡrɒn dr ɒjn ɒxtjɒr br ʃmɒ ʃrjknd آjɒnh mɒh bjʃtr؟ ljkn ɒjn ɒxtjɒr rɒ ɒstʔmɒl nkrdjm، blkh hrt͡ʃjz rɒ mthml mj‌ʃvjm، mbɒdɒ ɒnd͡ʒjl msjh rɒ tʔvjɣ ɒndɒzjm آjɒ nmj dɒnjd kh hrkh dr ɒmvr mɣds mʃɣvl bɒʃd، ɒz hjkl mj‌xvrd v hrkh xdmt mzbh knd، ɒz mzbh nsjbj mj‌dɒrd v hmt͡ʃnjn xdɒvnd frmvd kh «hrkh bh ɒnd͡ʒjl ɒʔlɒm nmɒjd، ɒzɒnd͡ʒjl mʔjʃt jɒbd» ljkn mn hjt͡ʃjk ɒz ɒjnhɒrɒ ɒstʔmɒl nkrdm v ɒjn rɒ bh ɒjn ɣsd nnvʃtm tɒ bɒmn t͡ʃnjn ʃvd، zjrɒ kh mrɒ mrdn bhtr ɒst ɒz آnkh ksj fxr mrɒ bɒtl ɡrdɒnd zjrɒ hrɡɒh bʃɒrt dhm، mrɒ fxr njst t͡ʃvnkh mrɒ zrvrt ɒftɒdh ɒst، blkh vɒj br mn ɒɡr bʃɒrt ndhm zjrɒhrɡɒh ɒjn rɒ tvʔ knm ɒd͡ʒrt dɒrm، lkn ɒɡr krh bɒʃd vkɒltj bh mn sپrdh ʃd dr ɒjn svrt، mrɒ t͡ʃh ɒd͡ʒrt ɒst tɒ آnkh t͡ʃvn bʃɒrt mj‌dhm، ɒnd͡ʒjl msjh rɒ bj‌xrd͡ʒ sɒzm v ɒxtjɒr xvd rɒ drɒnd͡ʒjl ɒstʔmɒl nknm؟ zjrɒ bɒ ɒjnkh ɒz hmh ksj آzɒd bvdm، xvdrɒ ɣlɒm hmh ɡrdɒnjdm tɒ bsjɒrj rɒ svd brm vjhvd rɒ t͡ʃvn jhvd ɡʃtm tɒ jhvd rɒ svd brm vɒhl ʃrjʔt rɒ msl ɒhl ʃrjʔt tɒ ɒhl ʃrjʔt rɒ svd brm؛ v bj‌ʃrjʔtɒn rɒ t͡ʃvn bj‌ʃrjʔtɒn ʃdm، hrt͡ʃnd nzd xdɒ bj‌ʃrjʔt njstm، blkh ʃrjʔt msjh dr mn ɒst، tɒ bj‌ʃrjʔtɒn rɒ svdbrm؛ zʔfɒ rɒ zʔjf ʃdm tɒ zʔfɒ rɒ svd brm؛ hmh ks rɒ hmh‌t͡ʃjz ɡrdjdm tɒ bh hrnvʔj bʔzj rɒ brhɒnm ɒmɒ hmh kɒr rɒ bd͡ʒht ɒnd͡ʒjl mj‌knm tɒ dr آn ʃrjk ɡrdm آjɒ nmj dɒnjd آnɒnj kh dr mjdɒn mj‌dvnd، hmh mj‌dvnd lkn jk nfr ɒnʔɒm rɒ mj‌brd bh ɒjntvr ʃmɒ bdvjd tɒ bh‌kmɒl bbrjd v hrkh vrzʃ knd dr hrt͡ʃjz rjɒzt mj‌kʃd؛ ɒmɒ ɒjʃɒn tɒ tɒd͡ʒ fɒnj rɒ bjɒbnd lkn mɒ tɒd͡ʒ ɣjrfɒnj rɒ پs mn t͡ʃnjn mj‌dvm، nh t͡ʃvn ksj‌kh ʃk dɒrd؛ vmʃt mj‌znm nh آnkh hvɒ rɒ bznmblkh tn xvdrɒ zbvn mj‌sɒzm v آn rɒ dr bndɡj mj‌dɒrm، mbɒdɒt͡ʃvn djɡrɒn rɒ vʔz nmvdm، xvd mhrvm ʃvm blkh tn xvdrɒ zbvn mj‌sɒzm v آn rɒ dr bndɡj mj‌dɒrm، mbɒdɒt͡ʃvn djɡrɒn rɒ vʔz nmvdm، xvd mhrvm ʃvm zjrɒ‌ɒj brɒdrɒn nmj xvɒhm ʃmɒ bj xbr bɒʃjd ɒz ɒjnkh پdrɒn mɒ hmh zjrɒbr bvdnd v hmh ɒz drjɒ ʔbvr nmvdnd v hmh bh mvsj tʔmjd jɒftnd، dr ɒbr v dr drjɒ؛ v hmh hmɒn xvrɒk rvhɒnj rɒ xvrdnd v hmh hmɒn ʃrb rvhɒnj rɒ nvʃjdnd، zjrɒ kh mj‌آʃɒmjdndɒz sxrh rvhɒnj kh ɒz ʔɣb ɒjʃɒn mj‌آmd v آn sxrh msjh bvd ljkn ɒz ɒksr ɒjʃɒn xdɒrɒzj nbvd، zjrɒ kh dr bjɒbɒn ɒndɒxth ʃdnd v ɒjn ɒmvr nmvnh‌hɒ brɒj mɒ ʃd tɒ mɒxvɒhʃmnd bdj nbɒʃjm، t͡ʃnɒnkh ɒjʃɒn bvdnd؛ vnh bt‌پrst ʃvjd، msl bʔzj ɒz ɒjʃɒn، t͡ʃnɒnkh mktvb ɒst «ɣvm bh ɒkl v ʃrb nʃstnd vbrɒj lhv v lʔb brپɒ ʃdnd» v nh znɒ knjm t͡ʃnɒnkh bʔzj ɒz ɒjʃɒn krdnd v dr jk rvzbjst v sh hzɒr nfr hlɒk ɡʃtnd v nh msjh rɒtd͡ʒrbh knjm، t͡ʃnɒnkh bʔzj ɒz ɒjʃɒn krdnd v ɒzmɒrhɒ hlɒk ɡrdjdnd v nh hmhmh knjd، t͡ʃnɒnkh bʔzj ɒz ɒjʃɒn krdnd v hlɒk knndh ɒjʃɒn rɒ hlɒk krd v ɒjn hmh btvr msl bdjʃɒn vɒɣʔ ʃd vbrɒj tnbjh mɒ mktvb ɡrdjd kh ɒvɒxr ʔɒlm bh mɒ rsjdh ɒst پs آnkh ɡmɒn brd kh ɣɒjm ɒst، bɒxbr bɒʃd kh njftd hjt͡ʃ td͡ʒrbh d͡ʒz آnkh mnɒsb bʃr bɒʃd، ʃmɒ rɒ frv ŋrft ɒmɒ xdɒɒmjn ɒst kh nmj ɡzɒrd ʃmɒ fvɣ tɒɣt xvdآzmvdh ʃvjd، blkh bɒtd͡ʒrbh mfrj njz mj‌sɒzd tɒjɒrɒj thml آn rɒ dɒʃth bɒʃjd lhzɒ‌ɒj ʔzjzɒn mn ɒz bt‌پrstj bɡrjzjd bh xrdmndɒn sxn mj‌ɡvjm xvd hkm knjdbrآnt͡ʃh mj‌ɡvjm پjɒlh brkt kh آn rɒ tbrk mj‌xvɒnjm، آjɒ ʃrɒkt dr xvn msjh njst؟ vnɒnj rɒ kh پɒrh mj‌knjm، آjɒ ʃrɒkt dr bdn msjh nj؟ zjrɒ mɒ kh bsjɒrjm، jk nɒn v jktn mj‌bɒʃjm t͡ʃvnkh hmh ɒz jk nɒn ɣsmt mj‌jɒbjm ɒsrɒئjl d͡ʒsmɒnj rɒ mlɒhzh knjd آjɒxvrndɡɒn ɣrbɒnj‌hɒ ʃrjk ɣrbɒŋɒh njstnd؟ پs t͡ʃh ɡvjm؟ آjɒ bt t͡ʃjzj mj‌bɒʃd؟ jɒ kh ɣrbɒnj bt t͡ʃjzj ɒst؟ nj blkh آnt͡ʃh ɒmt hɒɣrbɒnj mj‌knnd، brɒj djvhɒ mj‌ɡzrɒnnd nh brɒj xdɒ؛ v nmj xvɒhm ʃmɒ ʃrjk djvhɒ bɒʃjd mhɒl ɒst kh hm ɒz پjɒlh xdɒvnd v hm ɒz پjɒlh djvhɒ bnvʃjd؛ v hm ɒz mɒjdh xdɒvnd v hm ɒzmɒjdh djvhɒ nmj tvɒnjd ɣsmt brd آjɒxdɒvnd rɒ bh ɣjrt mj‌آvrjm jɒ ɒz ɒv tvɒnɒtrmj bɒʃjm؟ hmh‌t͡ʃjz d͡ʒɒjz ɒst، ljkn hmh mfjdnjst؛ hmh rvɒst، ljkn hmh bnɒ nmj knd hrks nfʔ xvd rɒ nd͡ʒvjd، blkh nfʔ djɡrj rɒ hrآnt͡ʃh rɒ dr ɣsɒbxɒnh mj‌frvʃnd، bxvrjdv hjt͡ʃ mپrsjd bh‌xɒtr zmjr zjrɒ kh d͡ʒhɒn v پrj آn ɒz آn xdɒvnd ɒst hrɡɒh ksj ɒzbj ɒjmɒnɒn ɒz ʃmɒ vʔdh xvɒhd v mj‌xvɒhjdbrvjd، آnt͡ʃh nzd ʃmɒ ɡzɒrnd bxvrjd v hjt͡ʃ mپrsjd bd͡ʒht zmjr ɒmɒ ɒɡr ksj bh ʃmɒɡvjd «ɒjn ɣrbɒnj bt ɒst»، mxvrjd bh‌xɒtr آn ks kh xbr dɒd v bd͡ʒht zmjr، zjrɒ kh d͡ʒhɒn vپrj آn ɒz آn xdɒvnd ɒst ɒmɒ zmjrmj ɡvjm nh ɒz xvdt blkh zmjr آn djɡr؛ zjrɒt͡ʃrɒ zmjr djɡrj br آzɒdj mn hkm knd؟ vɒɡr mn bh ʃkr bxvrm، t͡ʃrɒ br mn ɒftrɒ znnd bh‌sbb آn t͡ʃjzj kh mn brɒj آn ʃkr mj‌knm؟ پs xvɒh bxvrjd، xvɒh bnvʃjd، xvɒh hrt͡ʃh knjd، hmh rɒ brɒj d͡ʒlɒl xdɒ bknjd jhvdjɒn v jvnɒnjɒn v kljsɒj xdɒ rɒ lɣzʃ mdhjdt͡ʃnɒnkh mn njz dr hrkɒrj hmh rɒ xvʃ mj‌sɒzm v nfʔ xvd rɒ tɒlb njstm، blkh nfʔ bsjɒrj rɒ tɒ nd͡ʒɒt jɒbnd t͡ʃnɒnkh mn njz dr hrkɒrj hmh rɒ xvʃ mj‌sɒzm v nfʔ xvd rɒ tɒlb njstm، blkh nfʔ bsjɒrj rɒ tɒ nd͡ʒɒt jɒbnd پs ɒɣtdɒ bh mn nmɒjjd t͡ʃnɒnkh mn njz bh msjh mj‌knm ɒmɒ‌ɒj brɒdrɒn ʃmɒ rɒ thsjn mj‌nmɒjm ɒzɒjn d͡ʒht kh dr hrt͡ʃjz mrɒ jɒd mj‌dɒrjd v ɒxbɒr rɒbtvrj kh bh ʃmɒ sپrdm، hfz mj‌nmɒjjd ɒmɒ mj‌xvɒhm ʃmɒ bdɒnjd kh sr hr mrd، msjh ɒst v sr zn، mrd v sr msjh، xdɒ hrmrdj kh srپvʃjdh dʔɒ jɒ nbvt knd، sr xvd rɒrsvɒ mj‌nmɒjd ɒmɒ hr znj kh sr brhnh dʔɒ jɒnbvt knd، sr xvd rɒ rsvɒ mj‌sɒzd، zjrɒ ɒjn t͡ʃnɒn ɒst kh trɒʃjdh ʃvd zjrɒ ɒɡr zn nmj پvʃd، mvj rɒ njz bbrd؛ v ɒɡr zn rɒ mvj brjdn jɒ trɒʃjdn ɣbjh ɒst، bɒjd bپvʃd zjrɒkh mrd rɒ nbɒjd sr xvd bپvʃd t͡ʃvnkh ɒv svrt v d͡ʒlɒl xdɒst، ɒmɒ zn d͡ʒlɒl mrd ɒst zjrɒkh mrd ɒz zn njst blkh zn ɒz mrd ɒst v njzmrd bd͡ʒht zn آfrjdh nʃd، blkh zn brɒj mrd ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht zn mj‌bɒjd ʔztj br sr dɒʃth bɒʃd bh‌sbb frʃtɡɒn ljkn zn ɒz mrd d͡ʒdɒnjst v mrd hm d͡ʒdɒ ɒz zn njst dr xdɒvnd zjrɒ t͡ʃnɒnkh zn ɒz mrd ɒst، hmt͡ʃnjn mrd njzbvsjlh zn، ljkn hmh‌t͡ʃjz ɒz xdɒ dr dl xvd ɒnsɒf dhjd آjɒ ʃɒjsth ɒst kh zn nɒپvʃjdh nzd xdɒ dʔɒ knd؟ آjɒ xvdtbjʔt ʃmɒ rɒ nmj آmvzd kh ɒɡr mrd mvj drɒzdɒrd، ɒv rɒ ʔɒr mj‌bɒʃd؟ v ɒɡr zn mvj drɒzdɒrd، ɒv rɒ fxr ɒst، zjrɒ kh mvj bd͡ʒht پrdh bdv dɒdh ʃd؟ v ɒɡr ksj stjzh ɡr bɒʃd، mɒ vkljsɒhɒj xdɒ rɒ t͡ʃnjn ʔɒdtj njst ljkn t͡ʃvn ɒjn hkm rɒ bh ʃmɒ mj‌knm، ʃmɒrɒ thsjn nmj knm، zjrɒ kh ʃmɒ nh ɒz brɒj bhtrj blkh brɒj bdtrj d͡ʒmʔ mj‌ʃvjd zjrɒ ɒvlɒhŋɒmj kh ʃmɒ dr kljsɒ d͡ʒmʔ mj‌ʃvjd، mj‌ʃnvm kh dr mjɒn ʃmɒ ʃɣɒɣhɒ rvj mj‌dhd vɣdrj ɒz آn rɒ bɒvr mj‌knm ɒz آn d͡ʒht kh lɒzm ɒst dr mjɒn ʃmɒ bdʔthɒ njz bɒʃd tɒ kh mɣbvlɒn ɒz ʃmɒ zɒhr ɡrdnd پs t͡ʃvn ʃmɒ drjk d͡ʒɒ d͡ʒmʔ mj‌ʃvjd، mmkn njst kh ʃɒm xdɒvnd xvrdh ʃvd، zjrɒ dr vɣt xvrdn hrks ʃɒm xvd rɒ پjʃtr mj‌ɡjrd v jkj ɡrsnh v djɡrj mst mj‌ʃvd mɡr xɒnh‌hɒ brɒj xvrdn v آʃɒmjdn ndɒrjd؟ jɒ kljsɒj xdɒ rɒthɣjr mj‌nmɒjjd v آnɒnj rɒ kh ndɒrnd ʃrmndh mj‌sɒzjd؟ bh ʃmɒ t͡ʃh bɡvjm؟ آjɒ dr ɒjn ɒmr ʃmɒrɒ thsjn nmɒjm؟ thsjn nmj nmɒjm zjrɒ mn ɒz xdɒvnd jɒftm، آnt͡ʃh bh ʃmɒ njzsپrdm kh ʔjsj xdɒvnd dr ʃbj kh ɒv rɒ tsljm krdnd، nɒn rɒ ɡrft v ʃkr nmvdh، پɒrh krd vɡft «bɡjrjd bxvrjd ɒjn ɒst bdn mn kh brɒj ʃmɒ پɒrh mj‌ʃvd ɒjn rɒ bh jɒdɡɒrj mn bh‌d͡ʒɒآrjd» v hmt͡ʃnjn پjɒlh rɒ njz bʔd ɒz ʃɒm vɡft «ɒjn پjɒlh ʔhd d͡ʒdjd ɒst dr xvn mn hrɡɒh ɒjn rɒ bnvʃjd، bh jɒdɡɒrj mn bknjd» zjrɒ hrɡɒh ɒjn nɒn rɒ bxvrjd v ɒjn پjɒlh rɒbnvʃjd، mvt xdɒvnd rɒ zɒhr mj‌nmɒjjd tɒhŋɒmj kh bɒzآjd پs hrkh btvr nɒʃɒjsth nɒn rɒ bxvrd vپjɒlh xdɒvnd rɒ bnvʃd، md͡ʒrm bdn v xvn xdɒvnd xvɒhd bvd ɒmɒ hr ʃxs xvd rɒɒmthɒn knd v bdjntrz ɒz آn nɒn bxvrd v ɒz آn پjɒlh bnvʃd zjrɒ hrkh mj‌xvrd v mj‌nvʃd، ftvɒj xvd rɒ mj‌xvrd v mj‌nvʃd ɒɡr bdn xdɒvnd rɒ tmjjz nmj knd ɒz ɒjn sbb bsjɒrj ɒz ʃmɒ zʔjf v mrjz‌ɒnd v bsjɒrj xvɒbjdh‌ɒnd ɒmɒ ɒɡr brxvd hkm mj‌krdjm، hkm br mɒnmj ʃd lkn hŋɒmj kh br mɒ hkm mj‌ʃvd، ɒz xdɒvnd tɒdjb mj‌ʃvjm mbɒdɒ bɒ ɒhl dnjɒ br mɒhkm ʃvd lhzɒ‌ɒj brɒdrɒn mn، t͡ʃvn bd͡ʒht xvrdn d͡ʒmʔ mj‌ʃvjd، mntzr jkdjɡr bɒʃjdv ɒɡrksj ɡrsnh bɒʃd، dr xɒnh bxvrd، mbɒdɒ bd͡ʒht ʔɣvbt d͡ʒmʔ ʃvjd v t͡ʃvn bjɒjm، mɒbɣj rɒ mntzm xvɒhm nmvd v ɒɡrksj ɡrsnh bɒʃd، dr xɒnh bxvrd، mbɒdɒ bd͡ʒht ʔɣvbt d͡ʒmʔ ʃvjd v t͡ʃvn bjɒjm، mɒbɣj rɒ mntzm xvɒhm nmvd ɒmɒ drbɒrh ʔtɒjɒj rvhɒnj، ɒj brɒdrɒn nmj xvɒhm ʃmɒ bj‌xbr bɒʃjd mj dɒnjd hŋɒmj kh ɒmt‌hɒ mj‌bvdjd، bh svj bthɒj ɡŋ brdh mj‌ʃdjd btvrj kh ʃmɒ rɒmj brdnd پs ʃmɒ rɒ xbr mj‌dhm kh hrkh mtklm bh rvh xdɒ bɒʃd، ʔjsj rɒ ɒnɒtjmɒnmj ɡvjd v ɒhdj d͡ʒzjh rvh‌ɒlɣds ʔjsj rɒxdɒvnd nmj tvɒnd ɡft v nʔmthɒ ɒnvɒʔ ɒst vlj rvh hmɒn vxdmthɒ ɒnvɒʔ ɒst ɒmɒ xdɒvnd hmɒn v ʔmlhɒɒnvɒʔ ɒst lkn hmɒn xdɒ hmh rɒ dr hmh ʔml mj‌knd vlj hrks rɒ zhvr rvh bd͡ʒht mnfʔt ʔtɒ mj‌ʃvd zjrɒ jkj rɒ bvsɒtt rvh، klɒm hkmt dɒdh mj‌ʃvd v djɡrj rɒ klɒm ʔlm، bhsb hmɒn rvh v jkj rɒ ɒjmɒn bh hmɒn rvh v djɡrj rɒ nʔmthɒj ʃfɒ dɒdn bh hmɒn rvh v jkj rɒ ɣvt mʔd͡ʒzɒt vdjɡrj rɒ nbvt v jkj rɒ tmjjz ɒrvɒh v djɡrj rɒ ɒɣsɒm zbɒnhɒ v djɡrj rɒ trd͡ʒmh zbɒnhɒ lkn dr d͡ʒmjʔ ɒjnhɒ hmɒn jk rvh fɒʔl ɒst kh hrks rɒ frd bhsb ɒrɒdh xvd tɣsjm mj‌knd zjrɒ t͡ʃnɒnkh bdn jk ɒst v ɒʔzɒj mtʔdddɒrd v tmɒmj ɒʔzɒj bdn ɒɡrt͡ʃh bsjɒr ɒst jktn mj‌bɒʃd، hmt͡ʃnjn msjh njz mj‌bɒʃd zjrɒ kh d͡ʒmjʔ mɒ bh jk rvh dr jk bdn tʔmjdjɒftm، xvɒh jhvd، xvɒh jvnɒnj، xvɒh ɣlɒm، xvɒh آzɒd v hmh ɒz jk rvh nvʃɒnjdh ʃdjm zjrɒbdn jk ʔzv njst blkh bsjɒr ɒst ɒɡr پɒɡvjd t͡ʃvnkh dst njstm ɒz bdn nmj bɒʃm، آjɒbdjn sbb ɒz bdn njst؟ v ɒɡr ɡvʃ ɡvjdt͡ʃvnkh t͡ʃʃm njm ɒz bdn njstm، آjɒ bdjn sbb ɒzbdn njst؟ ɒɡr tmɒm bdn t͡ʃʃm bvdj، kd͡ʒɒmj bvd ʃnjdn v ɒɡr hmh ʃnjdn bvdj kd͡ʒɒ mj‌bvdbvjjdn؟ lkn ɒlhɒl xdɒ hrjk ɒz ɒʔzɒ rɒ drbdn nhɒd brhsb ɒrɒdh xvd v ɒɡr hmh jk ʔzv bvdj bdn kd͡ʒɒ mj‌bvd؟ ɒmɒ ɒlɒn ɒʔzɒbsjɒr ɒst ljkn bdn jk v t͡ʃʃm dst rɒnmj tvɒnd ɡft kh mhtɒd͡ʒ tv njstm jɒ sr پɒjhɒ rɒnjz kh ɒhtjɒd͡ʒ bh ʃmɒ ndɒrm blkh ʔlɒvh br ɒjn، آn ɒʔzɒj bdn kh zʔjftr mj‌nmɒjnd، lɒzm trmj bɒʃnd v آnhɒ rɒ kh پst‌tr ɒd͡ʒzɒj bdn mj‌پndɒrm، ʔzjztr mj‌dɒrjm v ɒd͡ʒzɒj ɣbjh mɒd͡ʒmɒl ɒfzl dɒrd lkn ɒʔzɒj d͡ʒmjlh mɒ rɒɒhtjɒd͡ʒj njst، blkh xdɒ bdn rɒ mrtb sɒxt bɣsmj kh nɒɣs rɒ bjʃtr hrmt dɒd، tɒ kh d͡ʒdɒjj dr bdn njftd، blkh ɒʔzɒ bh brɒbrj dr fkrjkdjɡr bɒʃnd v ɒɡr jk ʔzv drdmnd ɡrdd، sɒjr ɒʔzɒ bɒ آn hmdrd bɒʃnd v ɒɡr ʔzvj ʔzt jɒbd، bɒɣj ɒʔzɒ bɒ ɒv bh xvʃj آjnd ɒmɒ ʃmɒ bdn msjh hstjd v frd ɒʔzɒj آn mj‌bɒʃjd v xdɒ ɣrɒrdɒd bʔzj rɒ drkljsɒ ɒvl rsvlɒn، dvm ɒnbjɒ، svm mʔlmɒn، bʔdɣvɒt، پs nʔmthɒj ʃfɒ dɒdn v ɒʔɒnɒt v tdɒbjr vɒɣsɒm zbɒnhɒ آjɒ hmh rsvl hstnd، jɒ hmh ɒnbjɒ، jɒ hmh mʔlmɒn، jɒ hmh ɣvɒt؟ jɒ hmh nʔmthɒj ʃfɒ dɒrnd، jɒ hmh bh zbɒnhɒ mtklm hstnd، jɒ hmh trd͡ʒmh mj‌knnd؟lkn nʔmthɒj bhtr rɒ bh ɣjrt btlbjd v trjɣ ɒfzltr njz bh ʃmɒnʃɒn mj‌dhm lkn nʔmthɒj bhtr rɒ bh ɣjrt btlbjd v trjɣ ɒfzltr njz bh ʃmɒnʃɒn mj‌dhm ɒɡr bh zbɒnhɒj mrdm v frʃtɡɒn sxn ɡvjm v mhbt ndɒʃth bɒʃm، msl nhɒs sdɒdhndh v snd͡ʒ fɣɒn knndh ʃdh‌ɒm v ɒɡrnbvt dɒʃth bɒʃm v d͡ʒmjʔ ɒsrɒr v hmh ʔlm rɒbdɒnm v ɒjmɒn kɒml dɒʃth bɒʃm bhdj kh kvhhɒ rɒnɣl knm v mhbt ndɒʃth bɒʃm، hjt͡ʃ hstm vɒɡr d͡ʒmjʔ ɒmvɒl xvd rɒ sdɣh dhm v bdn xvd rɒbsپɒrm tɒ svxth ʃvd v mhbt ndɒʃth bɒʃm، hjt͡ʃ svd nmj brm mhbt hljm v mhrbɒn ɒst؛ mhbt hsd nmj brd؛ mhbt kbr v ɣrvr ndɒrd؛ ɒtvɒr nɒپsndjdh ndɒrd v nfʔ xvd rɒ tɒlb nmj ʃvd؛ xʃm nmj ɡjrd v svءzn ndɒrd؛ ɒznɒrɒstj xvʃvɣt nmj ɡrdd، vlj bɒ rɒstj ʃɒdj mj‌knd؛ dr hmh‌t͡ʃjz sbr mj‌knd v hmh rɒ bɒvr mj‌nmɒjd؛ dr hmh hɒl ɒmjdvɒr mj‌bɒʃd vhr t͡ʃjz rɒ mthml mj‌bɒʃd mhbt hrɡz sɒɣt nmj ʃvd v ɒmɒ ɒɡr nbvthɒbɒʃd، njst xvɒhd ʃd v ɒɡr zbɒnhɒ، ɒnthɒ xvɒhd پzjrft v ɒɡr ʔlm، zɒjl xvɒhd ɡrdjd zjrɒd͡ʒzئj ʔlmj dɒrjm v d͡ʒzئj nbvt mj‌nmɒjjm، lkn hŋɒmj kh kɒml آjd، d͡ʒzئj njst xvɒhd ɡrdjd zmɒnj kh tfl bvdm، t͡ʃvn tfl hrf mj‌zdm v t͡ʃvn tfl fkr mj‌krdm v mɒnndtfl tʔɣl mj‌nmvdm ɒmɒ t͡ʃvn mrd ʃdm، kɒrhɒj tflɒnh rɒ trk krdm zjrɒ kh ɒlhɒl dr آjnh btvr mʔmɒ mj‌bjnm، lkn آn vɣt rvbrv؛ ɒlɒn d͡ʒzئj mʔrftj dɒrm، lkn آn vɣt xvɒhm ʃnɒxt، t͡ʃnɒnkh njz ʃnɒxth ʃdmv ɒlhɒl ɒjn sh t͡ʃjz bɒɣj ɒst jʔnj‌ɒjmɒn v ɒmjd vmhbt ɒmɒ bzrɡtr ɒz ɒjnhɒ mhbt ɒst v ɒlhɒl ɒjn sh t͡ʃjz bɒɣj ɒst jʔnj‌ɒjmɒn v ɒmjd vmhbt ɒmɒ bzrɡtr ɒz ɒjnhɒ mhbt ɒst dr‌پj mhbt bkvʃjd v ʔtɒjɒj rvhɒnj rɒ bh ɣjrt btlbjd، xsvs ɒjnkh nbvt knjd zjrɒ ksj‌kh bh zbɒnj sxn mj‌ɡvjd، nh bh mrdm blkh bh xdɒ mj‌ɡvjd، zjrɒhjt͡ʃ‌ks nmj fhmd ljkn dr rvh bh ɒsrɒr tklm mj‌nmɒjd ɒmɒ آnkh nbvt mj‌knd، mrdm rɒ brɒj bnɒ v nsjht v tslj mj‌ɡvjd hrkh bh zbɒnj mj‌ɡvjd، xvd rɒ bnɒ mj‌knd، ɒmɒ آnkh nbvt mj‌nmɒjd، kljsɒ rɒ bnɒ mj‌knd v xvɒhʃ dɒrm kh hmh ʃmɒ bh zbɒnhɒ tklm knjd، lkn bjʃtr ɒjnkh nbvt nmɒjjd zjrɒ ksj‌kh nbvt knd bhtr ɒst ɒzksj‌kh bh zbɒnhɒ hrf znd، mɡr آnkh trd͡ʒmh kndtɒ kljsɒ bnɒ ʃvd ɒmɒ ɒlhɒl‌ɒj brɒdrɒn ɒɡr nzd ʃmɒ آjm v bh zbɒnhɒ sxn rɒnm، ʃmɒ rɒ t͡ʃh svd mj‌bxʃm؟ mɡrآnkh ʃmɒ rɒ bh mkɒʃfh jɒ bh mʔrft jɒ bh nbvt jɒ bh tʔljm ɡvjm v hmt͡ʃnjn t͡ʃjzhɒj bjd͡ʒɒn kh sdɒ mj‌dhd t͡ʃvn nj jɒ brbt ɒɡr dr sdɒhɒ frɣ nknd، t͡ʃɡvnh آvɒz nj jɒ brbt fhmjdh mj‌ʃvd؟ zjr ɒɡr krnɒ njz sdɒj nɒmʔlvm dhd kh xvd rɒmhjɒj d͡ʒŋ mj‌sɒzd؟ hmt͡ʃnjn ʃmɒ njz bh zbɒn، sxn mfhvm ŋvjjd، t͡ʃɡvnh mʔlvm mj‌ʃvdآn t͡ʃjzj kh ɡfth ʃd zjrɒ kh bh hvɒ sxn xvɒhjd ɡft؟ zjrɒ kh ɒnvɒʔ zbɒnhɒj dnjɒhrɣdr zjɒdh bɒʃd، vlj jkj bj‌mʔnj njst پs hrɡɒh ɣvt zbɒn rɒ nmj dɒnm، nzd mtklm brbrj mj‌bɒʃm v آnkh sxn ɡvjd nzd mn brbrj mj‌bɒʃd hmt͡ʃnn ʃmɒ njz t͡ʃvnkh ɣjvrʔtɒjɒj rvhɒnj hstjd btlbjd ɒjnkh brɒj bnɒj kljsɒ ɒfzvdh ʃvjd bnɒbrɒjn ksj‌kh bh zbɒnj sxn mj‌ɡvjd، dʔɒ bknd tɒ trd͡ʒmh nmɒjd zjrɒ ɒɡr bh zbɒnj dʔɒknm، rvh mn dʔɒ mj‌knd lkn ʔɣl mn brxvrdɒrnmj ʃvd پs mɣsvd t͡ʃjst؟ bh rvh dʔɒxvɒhm krd v bh ʔɣl njz dʔɒ xvɒhm nmvd؛ bh rvh srvd xvɒhm xvɒnd v bh ʔɣl njz xvɒhm xvɒnd zjrɒ ɒɡr dr rvh tbrk mj‌xvɒnj، t͡ʃɡvnh آn ksj‌kh bh mnzlt ɒmj ɒst، bh ʃkr tv آmjn ɡvjd v hɒl آnkh nmj fhmd t͡ʃh mj‌ɡvjj؟ zjrɒ tv ɒlbth xvb ʃkr mj‌knj، lkn آn djɡrbnɒ nmj ʃvd xdɒ rɒ ʃkr mj‌knm kh zjɒdtr ɒzhmh ʃmɒ bh zbɒnhɒ hrf mj‌znm lkn dr kljsɒbjʃtr mj‌پsndm kh پnd͡ʒ klmh bh ʔɣl xvd ɡvjm tɒdjɡrɒn rɒ njz tʔljm dhm ɒz آnkh hzɒrɒn klmh bh zbɒn bɡvjm ‌ɒj brɒdrɒn، dr fhm ɒtfɒl mbɒʃjd blkh dr bdxvjj ɒtfɒl bɒʃjd v dr fhm rʃjd drtvrɒt mktvb ɒst kh «xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd bh zbɒnhɒj bjɡɒnh v lbhɒj ɣjr bh ɒjn ɣvm sxn xvɒhm ɡft v bɒ ɒjn hmh mrɒ nxvɒhnd ʃnjd» پs zbɒnhɒ nʃɒnj ɒst nh brɒj ɒjmɒn dɒrɒn blkh brɒj bj‌ɒjmɒnɒn؛ ɒmɒ nbvt brɒj bj‌ɒjmɒn njst blkh brɒj ɒjmɒndɒrɒn ɒst پs ɒɡr tmɒm kljsɒdr d͡ʒɒjj d͡ʒmʔ ʃvnd v hmh bh zbɒnhɒ hrf znnd vɒmjɒn jɒ bj‌ɒjmɒnɒn dɒxl ʃvnd، آjɒ nmj ɡvjnd kh djvɒnh‌ɒjd؟ vlj ɒɡr hmh nbvt knnd v ksj ɒzbj ɒjmɒnɒn jɒ ɒmjɒn drآjd، ɒz hmh tvbjx mj‌jɒbd vɒz hmh mlzm mj‌ɡrdd، v xfɒjɒj ɣlb ɒv zɒhrmj ʃvd v hmt͡ʃnjn bh rvj drɒftɒdh، xdɒ rɒʔbɒdt xvɒhd krd v ndɒ xvɒhd dɒd kh «fj ɒlhɣjɣh xdɒ dr mjɒn ʃmɒ ɒst» پs‌ɒj brɒdrɒn mɣsvd ɒjn ɒst kh vɣtj kh d͡ʒmʔ ʃvjd، hrjkj ɒz ʃmɒ srvdj dɒrd، tʔljmj dɒrd، zbɒnj dɒrd، mkɒʃfh‌ɒj dɒrd، trd͡ʒmh‌ɒj dɒrd، bɒjd hmh bd͡ʒht bnɒ bʃvd ɒɡrksj bh zbɒnj sxn ɡvjd، dv dv jɒ nhɒjt sh sh bɒʃnd، bh trtjb v ksj trd͡ʒmh knd ɒmɒ ɒɡrmtrd͡ʒmj nbɒʃd، dr kljsɒ xɒmvʃ bɒʃd v bɒ xvdv bɒ xdɒ sxn ɡvjd v ɒz ɒnbjɒ dv jɒ sh sxn bɡvjnd v djɡrɒn tmjz dhnd v ɒɡr t͡ʃjzj bh djɡrj ɒz ɒhl md͡ʒls mkʃvf ʃvd، آn ɒvl sɒkt ʃvd zjrɒ kh hmh mj‌tvɒnjd jk jk nbvt knjd tɒ hmh tʔljm jɒbnd v hmh nsjht‌پzjrnd v ɒrvɒh ɒnbjɒ mtjʔ ɒnbjɒ mj‌bɒʃnd zjrɒ kh ɒv xdɒj tʃvjʃ njst blkh xdɒj slɒmtj، t͡ʃnɒnkh dr hmh kljsɒhɒj mɣdsɒn v znɒn ʃmɒ dr kljsɒhɒ xɒmvʃ bɒʃnd zjrɒ kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ hrf zdn d͡ʒɒjz njst blkh ɒtɒʔt nmvdn، t͡ʃnɒnkh tvrɒt njz mj‌ɡvjd ɒmɒ ɒɡrmj xvɒhnd t͡ʃjzj bjɒmvznd، dr xɒnh ɒz ʃvhrɒn xvd bپrsnd، t͡ʃvn znɒn rɒ dr kljsɒ hrf zdn ɣbjh ɒst آjɒ klɒm xdɒ ɒz ʃmɒ sɒdr ʃd jɒ bh ʃmɒ bh tnhɒjj rsjd؟ ɒɡr ksj xvd rɒ nbj jɒrvhɒnj پndɒrd، ɒɣrɒr bknd kh آnt͡ʃh bh ʃmɒmj nvjsm، ɒhkɒm xdɒvnd ɒst ɒmɒ ɒɡr ksj d͡ʒɒhl ɒst، d͡ʒɒhl bɒʃd پs‌ɒj brɒdrɒn، nbvt rɒ bh ɣjrt btlbjd v ɒz tklm nmvdn bh zbɒnhɒmnʔ mknjdlkn hmh‌t͡ʃjz bh ʃɒjstɡj v ɒntzɒm bɒʃd lkn hmh‌t͡ʃjz bh ʃɒjstɡj v ɒntzɒm bɒʃd ɒlɒn‌ɒj brɒdrɒn، ʃmɒ rɒ ɒz ɒnd͡ʒjlj kh bh ʃmɒ bʃɒrt dɒdm ɒʔlɒm mj‌nmɒjm kh آn rɒ hm پzjrftjd v dr آn hm ɣɒjm mj‌bɒʃjd، vbvsjlh آn njz nd͡ʒɒt mj‌jɒbjd، bh ʃrtj kh آn klɒmj rɒ kh bh ʃmɒ bʃɒrt dɒdm، mhkm ŋɒh dɒrjd vɒlɒ ʔbs ɒjmɒn آvrdjd zjrɒ kh ɒvl bh ʃmɒ sپrdm، آnt͡ʃh njz jɒftm kh msjh brhsb ktb dr rɒh ɡnɒhɒn mɒ mrd، v ɒjnkh mdfvn ʃd vdr rvz svm brhsb ktb brxɒst؛ v ɒjnkh bh kjfɒ zɒhr ʃd v bʔd ɒz آn bh آn dvɒzdh، v پs ɒzآn bh zjɒdh ɒz پɒnsd brɒdr jk bɒr zɒhr ʃd kh bjʃtr ɒz ɒjʃɒn tɒ ɒmrvz bɒɣj hstnd ɒmɒ bʔzj xvɒbjdh‌ɒnd ɒz آn پs bh jʔɣvb zɒhr ʃd v bʔdbh d͡ʒmjʔ rsvlɒn v آxr hmh br mn msl tfl sɣtʃdh zɒhr ɡrdjd zjrɒ mn khtrjn rsvlɒn hstm v lɒjɣ njstm kh bh rsvl xvɒndh ʃvm، t͡ʃvnkh brkljsɒj xdɒ d͡ʒfɒ mj‌rsɒnjdm ljkn bh fjz xdɒ آnt͡ʃh hstm hstm v fjz ɒv kh br mn bvd bɒtl ŋʃt، blkh bjʃ ɒz hmh ɒjʃɒn mʃɣt kʃjdm، ɒmɒ nh mn blkh fjz xdɒ kh bɒ mn bvd پs xvɒh mn v xvɒh ɒjʃɒn bdjn trjɣ vʔzmj knjm v bh ɒjntvr ɒjmɒn آvrdjd ljkn ɒɡr bh msjh vʔz mj‌ʃvd kh ɒzmrdɡɒn brxɒst، t͡ʃvn ɒst kh bʔzj ɒz ʃmɒmj ɡvjnd kh ɣjɒmt mrdɡɒn njst؟ ɒmɒ ɒɡrmrdɡɒn rɒ ɣjɒmt njst، msjh njz brnxɒsth ɒst v ɒɡr msjh brnxɒst، bɒtl ɒst vʔzmɒ v bɒtl ɒst njz ɒjmɒn ʃmɒ v ʃhvd kzbh njz brɒj xdɒ ʃdjm، zjrɒ drbɒrh xdɒ ʃhɒdt dɒdjm kh msjh rɒ brxjzɒnjd، v hɒl آnkh ɒv rɒbrnxjzɒnjd dr svrtj kh mrdɡɒn brnmj xjznd zjrɒ hrɡɒh mrdɡɒn brnmj xjznd، msjh njzbrnxɒsth ɒst ɒmɒ hrɡɒh msjh brnxɒsth ɒst، ɒjmɒn ʃmɒ bɒtl ɒst v ʃmɒ tɒknvn drɡnɒhɒn xvd hstjd، blkh آnɒnj hm kh drmsjh xvɒbjdh‌ɒnd hlɒk ʃdnd ɒɡr fɣt dr ɒjn d͡ʒhɒn dr msjh ɒmjdvɒrjm، ɒz d͡ʒmjʔ mrdm bdbxt trjm ljkn bɒlfʔl msjh ɒz mrdɡɒn brxɒsth vnvbr xvɒbjdɡɒn ʃdh ɒst zjrɒ t͡ʃnɒnkh bh ɒnsɒn mvt آmd، bh ɒnsɒn njz ɣjɒmt mrdɡɒn ʃd v t͡ʃnɒnkh dr آdm hmh mj‌mjrnd dr msjh njzhmh zndh xvɒhnd ɡʃt ljkn hrks bh rtbh xvd؛ msjh nvbr ɒst v bʔd آnɒnj kh dr vɣt آmdn ɒv ɒz آn msjh mj‌bɒʃnd v bʔd ɒz آn ɒnthɒ ɒst vɣtj kh mlkvt rɒ bh xdɒ v پdr sپɒrd v dr آn zmɒn tmɒm rjɒst v tmɒm ɣdrt v ɣvt rɒ nɒbvd xvɒhd ɡrdɒnjd zjrɒ mɒdɒmj kh hmh dʃmnɒn rɒ zjr پɒjhɒj xvd nnhd، mj‌bɒjd ɒvsltnt bnmɒjd dʃmn آxr kh nɒbvd mj‌ʃvd، mvt ɒst zjrɒ «hmh‌t͡ʃjz rɒ zjr پɒjhɒj vj ɒndɒxth ɒst» ɒmɒ t͡ʃvn mj‌ɡvjd kh «hmh‌t͡ʃjz rɒzjr ɒndɒxth ɒst»، vɒzh ɒst kh ɒv kh hmh rɒzjr ɒv ɒndɒxt mstsnj ɒst ɒmɒ zmɒnj kh hmh mtjʔ vj ʃdh bɒʃnd، آŋɒh xvd پsr hm mtjʔ xvɒhd ʃd ɒv rɒ kh hmh‌t͡ʃjz rɒ mtjʔ vj ɡrdɒnjd، tɒ آnkh xdɒ kl dr kl bɒʃd vɒlɒ آnɒnj kh brɒj mrdɡɒn tʔmjd mj‌jɒbndt͡ʃknnd؟ hrɡɒh mrdɡɒn mtlɣ brnmj xjznd، پs t͡ʃrɒ brɒj ɒjʃɒn tʔmjd mj‌ɡjrnd؟ v mɒ njz t͡ʃrɒhr sɒʔt xvd rɒ dr xtr mj‌ɒndɒzjm؟ bh آn fxrj drbɒrh ʃmɒ kh mrɒ dr xdɒvnd mɒ msjh ʔjsj hst ɣsm، kh hrrvzh mrɒ mrdnj ɒst t͡ʃvn btvr ɒnsɒn dr ɒfss bɒ vhvʃ d͡ʒŋ krdm، mrɒ t͡ʃh svd ɒst؟ ɒɡr mrdɡɒn brnmj xjznd، bxvrjm v bjɒʃɒmjm t͡ʃvn frdɒmj mjrjm frjfth mʃvjd mʔɒʃrɒt bd، ɒxlɒɣ hsnh rɒ fɒsd mj‌sɒzd brɒj ʔdɒlt bjdɒrʃdh، ɡnɒh mknjd zjrɒ bʔzj mʔrft xdɒ rɒndɒrnd brɒj ɒnfʔɒl ʃmɒ mj‌ɡvjm ɒmɒ ɒɡr ksj ɡvjd «mrdɡɒn t͡ʃɡvnh brmj xjznd v bh kdɒm bdn mj‌آjnd؟»، ‌ɒj ɒhmɣ آnt͡ʃh tv mj‌kɒrj zndh nmj ɡrdd d͡ʒz آnkh bmjrd v آnt͡ʃh mj‌kɒrj، nh آn d͡ʒsmj rɒ kh xvɒhd ʃd mj‌kɒrj، blkh dɒnh‌ɒj md͡ʒrd xvɒh ɒzɡndm v jɒ ɒz dɒnh hɒj djɡr ljkn xdɒ brhsb ɒrɒdh xvd، آn rɒ d͡ʒsmj mj‌dhd v bh hr jkj ɒztxmhɒ d͡ʒsm xvdʃ rɒ hr ɡvʃt ɒz jk nvʔ ɡvʃt njst، blkh ɡvʃt ɒnsɒn، djɡr ɒst vɡvʃt bhɒjm، djɡr v ɡvʃt mrɣɒn، djɡr vɡvʃt mɒhjɒn، djɡr v d͡ʒsmhɒj آsmɒnj hst v d͡ʒsmhɒj zmjnj njz، ljkn‌ʃɒn آsmɒnj‌hɒ، djɡr v‌ʃɒn zmjnj‌hɒ، djɡr ɒst، v‌ʃɒn آftɒb djɡr v‌ʃɒn mɒh djɡr v‌ʃɒn stɒrɡɒn، djɡr، zjrɒ kh stɒrh ɒz stɒrh dr‌ʃɒn، frɣ dɒrd bh hmjn nhd͡ʒ ɒst njz ɣjɒmt mrdɡɒn drfsɒd kɒʃth mj‌ʃvd، v dr bj‌fsɒdj brmj xjzd؛ dr zlt kɒʃth mj‌ɡrdd v dr d͡ʒlɒl brmj xjzd؛ dr zʔf kɒʃth mj‌ʃvd v dr ɣvt brmj xjzd؛ d͡ʒsm nfsɒnj kɒʃth mj‌ʃvd v d͡ʒsm rvhɒnj brmj xjzd ɒɡr d͡ʒsm nfsɒnj hst، hrآjnh rvhɒnj njz hst v hmt͡ʃnjn njz mktvb ɒst kh ɒnsɒn ɒvl jʔnj آdm nfs zndh ɡʃt، ɒmɒآdm آxr rvh hjɒt‌bxʃ ʃd ljkn rvhɒnj mɣdm nbvd blkh nfsɒnj v bʔd ɒz آn rvhɒnj ɒnsɒn ɒvl ɒz zmjn ɒst xɒkj؛ ɒnsɒn dvm xdɒvnd ɒst ɒz آsmɒn t͡ʃnɒnkh xɒkj ɒst، xɒkjɒn njz t͡ʃnɒn hstnd v t͡ʃnɒnkh آsmɒnj ɒst آsmɒnj‌hɒ hmt͡ʃnɒn mj‌bɒʃnd v t͡ʃnɒnkh svrt xɒkj rɒ ɡrftjm، svrt آsmɒnj rɒ njzxvɒhjm ɡrft ljkn‌ɒj brɒdrɒn ɒjn rɒ mj‌ɡvjm kh ɡvʃt v xvn nmj tvɒnd vɒrs mlkvt xdɒ ʃvd v fɒsdvɒrs bj‌fsɒdj njz nmj ʃvd hmɒnɒ bh ʃmɒsrj mj‌ɡvjm kh hmh nxvɒhjm xvɒbjd، ljkn hmh mtbdl xvɒhjm ʃd dr lhzh‌ɒj، drtrfh ɒlʔjnj، bh md͡ʒrd nvɒxtn svr ɒxjr، zjrɒkrnɒ sdɒ xvɒhd dɒd، v mrdɡɒn، bj‌fsɒd xvɒhndbrxɒst v mɒ mtbdl xvɒhjm ʃd zjrɒ kh mj‌bɒjd ɒjn fɒsd bj‌fsɒdj rɒ bپvʃd v ɒjn fɒnj bh bɣɒ آrɒsth ɡrdd ɒmɒ t͡ʃvn ɒjn fɒsd bj‌fsɒdj rɒ پvʃjd v ɒjn fɒnj bh bɣɒ آrɒsth ʃd، آŋɒh ɒjn klɒmj kh mktvb ɒst bh ɒnd͡ʒɒm xvɒhd rsjd kh «mrɡ dr zfr blʔjdh ʃdh ɒst ‌ɒj mvt njʃ tv kd͡ʒɒ ɒst v‌ɒj ɡvr zfr tv kd͡ʒɒ؟» njʃ mvt ɡnɒh ɒst v ɣvt ɡnɒh، ʃrjʔt ljkn ʃkr xdɒ rɒst kh mɒ rɒ bvɒsth xdɒvnd mɒʔjsj msjh zfr mj‌dhdbnɒbrɒjn‌ɒj brɒdrɒn hbjb mn پɒjdɒr vbj tʃvjʃ ʃdh، پjvsth dr ʔml xdɒvndbjfzɒjjd، t͡ʃvn mj‌dɒnjd kh zhmt ʃmɒ drxdɒvnd bɒtl njst bnɒbrɒjn‌ɒj brɒdrɒn hbjb mn پɒjdɒr vbj tʃvjʃ ʃdh، پjvsth dr ʔml xdɒvndbjfzɒjjd، t͡ʃvn mj‌dɒnjd kh zhmt ʃmɒ drxdɒvnd bɒtl njst ɒmɒ drbɒrh d͡ʒmʔ krdn zkɒt brɒj mɣdsjn، t͡ʃnɒnkh bh kljsɒhɒj ɣlɒtjh frmvdm، ʃmɒ njz hmt͡ʃnjn knjd dr rvz ɒvl hfth، hr jkj ɒz ʃmɒ bhsb nʔmtj kh jɒfth bɒʃd، nzd xvd zxjrh krdh، bɡzɒrd tɒ dr vɣt آmdn mn zhmt d͡ʒmʔ krdn nbɒʃd v t͡ʃvn brsm، آnɒnj rɒ kh ɒxtjɒr knjd bɒ mktvbhɒ xvɒhm frstɒd tɒ ɒhsɒn ʃmɒ rɒ bh ɒvrʃljm bbrnd v ɒɡrmslht bɒʃd kh mn njz brvm، hmrɒh mn xvɒhndآmd v t͡ʃvn ɒz mkɒdvnjh ʔbvr knm، bh nzd ʃmɒxvɒhm آmd، zjrɒ kh ɒz mkɒdnjh ʔbvr mj‌knm، vɒhtmɒl dɒrd kh nzd ʃmɒ bmɒnm blkh zmstɒn rɒ njzbsr brm tɒ hrd͡ʒɒjj kh brvm، ʃmɒ mrɒ mʃɒjʔt knjd zjrɒ kh ɒlɒn ɒrɒdh ndɒrm dr bjn rɒh ʃmɒ rɒmlɒɣɒt knm، t͡ʃvnkh ɒmjdvɒrm mdtj bɒ ʃmɒ tvɣf nmɒjm، ɒɡr xdɒvnd ɒd͡ʒɒzt dhd ljkn mn tɒپntjkɒst dr ɒfss xvɒhm mɒnd، zjrɒ kh drvɒzh bzrɡ v kɒrsɒz brɒj mn bɒz ʃd v mʔɒndjn، bsjɒrnd ljkn ɒɡr tjmvtɒvs آjd، آɡɒh bɒʃjdkh nzd ʃmɒ bj‌trs bɒʃd، zjrɒ kh dr kɒr xdɒvndmʃɣvl ɒst t͡ʃnɒnkh mn njz hstm lhzɒhjt͡ʃ‌ks ɒv rɒ hɣjr nʃmɒrd، blkh ɒv rɒ bh slɒmtj mʃɒjʔt knjd tɒ nzd mn آjd zjrɒ kh ɒv rɒ bɒ brɒdrɒn ɒntzɒr mj‌kʃm ɒmɒ drbɒrh ɒپls brɒdr، ɒz ɒvbsjɒr drxvɒst nmvdm kh bɒ brɒdrɒn bh nzd ʃmɒbjɒjd، ljkn hrɡz rzɒ ndɒd kh ɒlhɒl bjɒjd vlj t͡ʃvn frst jɒbd xvɒhd آmd bjdɒr ʃvjd، dr ɒjmɒn ɒstvɒr bɒʃjd v mrdɒn bɒʃjd v zvrآvr ʃvjd d͡ʒmjʔ kɒrhɒj ʃmɒ bɒ mhbt bɒʃd v‌ɒj brɒdrɒn bh ʃmɒɒltmɒs dɒrm ʃmɒ xɒnvɒdh ɒstjfɒn rɒ mj‌ʃnɒsjdkh nvbr ɒxɒئjh hstnd v xvjʃtn rɒ bh xdmt mɣdsjn sپrdh ɒnd، tɒ ʃmɒ njz t͡ʃnjn ɒʃxɒs rɒ ɒtɒʔt knjd v hrks rɒ kh dr kɒr v zhmt ʃrjk bɒʃd v ɒz آmdn ɒstfɒn v frtvnɒts vɒxɒئjkvs mrɒ ʃɒdj rx nmvd zjrɒ kh آnt͡ʃh ɒzd͡ʒɒnb ʃmɒ nɒtmɒm bvd، ɒjʃɒn tmɒm krdnd t͡ʃvnkh rvh mn v ʃmɒ rɒ tɒzh krdnd پs t͡ʃnjn ɒʃxɒs rɒ bʃnɒsjd kljsɒhɒj آsjɒ bh ʃmɒ slɒm mj‌rsɒnnd vɒkjlɒ v پrsklɒ bɒ kljsɒjj kh dr xɒnh ɒjʃɒnnd، bh ʃmɒ slɒm bsjɒr dr xdɒvnd mj‌rsɒnnd hmh brɒdrɒn ʃmɒ rɒ slɒm mj‌rsɒnnd jkdjɡr rɒ bh bvsh mɣdsɒnh slɒm rsɒnjd mn پvls ɒzdst xvd slɒm mj‌rsɒnm ɒɡr ksj ʔjsj msjh xdɒvnd rɒ dvst ndɒrd، ɒnɒtjmɒ bɒd mɒrɒn ɒtɒfjz ʔjsj msjh xdɒvnd bɒ ʃmɒ bɒd fjz ʔjsj msjh xdɒvnd bɒ ʃmɒ bɒd پvls bh ɒrɒdh xdɒ rsvl ʔjsj msjh vtjmvtɒvs brɒdr، bh kljsɒj xdɒ kh dr ɣrnts mj‌bɒʃd bɒ hmh mɣdsjnj kh dr tmɒm ɒxɒئjh hstnd، fjz v slɒmtj ɒz پdr mɒ xdɒ v ʔjsj msjh xdɒvnd bh ʃmɒ bɒd mtbɒrk bɒd xdɒ v پdr xdɒvnd mɒ ʔjsj msjh kh پdr rhmthɒ v xdɒj d͡ʒmjʔ tsljɒt ɒst، kh mɒ rɒ dr hr tŋj mɒ tslj mj‌dhd tɒ mɒbtvɒnjm djɡrɒn rɒ dr hr msjbtj kh bɒʃd tslj nmɒjjm، bh آn tslj kh xvd ɒz xdɒ jɒfth‌ɒjm zjrɒ bh ɒndɒzh‌ɒj kh drdhɒj msjh dr mɒ zjɒdh ʃvd، bh hmjn ɣsm tslj mɒ njz bvsjlh msjh mj‌ɒfzɒjd ɒmɒ xvɒh zhmt kʃjm، ɒjn ɒst brɒj tslj v nd͡ʒɒt ʃmɒ، v xvɒh tslj پzjrjm ɒjn hm bd͡ʒht tslj v nd͡ʒɒt ʃmɒ ɒst kh mjsrmj ʃvd ɒz sbr dɒʃtn dr hmjn drdhɒjj kh mɒ hm mj‌bjnjm v ɒmjd mɒ brɒj ʃmɒ ɒstvɒr mj‌ʃvdzjrɒ mj‌dɒnjm kh t͡ʃnɒnkh ʃmɒ ʃrjk drdhɒhstjd، hmt͡ʃnjn ʃrjk tslj njz xvɒhjd bvd zjrɒ‌ɒj brɒdrɒn nmj xvɒhjm ʃmɒ bj‌xbrbɒʃjd ɒz tŋj‌ɒj kh dr آsjɒ bh mɒ ʔɒrz ɡrdjd kh bjnhɒjt v fvɣ ɒz tɒɣt bɒr kʃjdjm، bhdj kh ɒz d͡ʒɒn hm mɒjvs ʃdjm lkn dr xvd ftvɒj mvt dɒʃtjm tɒ br xvd tvkl nknjm، blkh br xdɒkh mrdɡɒn rɒ brmj xjzɒnd، kh mɒ rɒ ɒz t͡ʃnjn mvt rhɒnjd v mj‌rhɒnd v bh ɒv ɒmjdvɒrjm kh bʔdɒz ɒjn hm xvɒhd rhɒnjd v ʃmɒ njz bh dʔɒ drhɣ mɒ ɒʔɒnt mj‌knjd tɒ آnkh brɒj آn nʔmtj kh ɒzɒʃxɒs bsjɒrj bh mɒ rsjd، ʃkrɡzɒrj hm bd͡ʒht mɒ ɒz bsjɒrj bh‌d͡ʒɒ آvrdh ʃvd zjrɒ kh fxr mɒ ɒjn ɒst jʔnj ʃhɒdt zmjr mɒ kh bh ɣdvsjt v ɒxlɒs xdɒjj، nh bh hkmt d͡ʒsmɒnj، blkh bh fjz ɒlhj dr d͡ʒhɒn rftɒr nmvdjm v xsvs nsbt bh ʃmɒ zjrɒt͡ʃjzj bh ʃmɒ nmj nvjsjm mɡr آnt͡ʃh mj‌xvɒnjd vbh آn ɒʔtrɒf mj‌knjd v ɒmjdvɒrm kh tɒ bh آxrɒʔtrɒf hm xvɒhjd krd t͡ʃnɒnkh bh mɒfj ɒld͡ʒmlh ɒʔtrɒf ɡrdjd kh mhl fxr ʃmɒhstjm، t͡ʃnɒnkh ʃmɒ njz mɒ rɒ mj‌bɒʃjd dr rvzʔjsj xdɒvnd v bdjn ɒʔtmɒd ɣbl ɒz ɒjn xvɒstm bh nzdʃmɒ آjm tɒ nʔmtj djɡr bjɒbjd، v ɒz rɒh ʃmɒ bh mkɒdvnjh brvm v bɒz ɒz mkɒdvnjh nzd ʃmɒ bjɒjm v ʃmɒ mrɒ bh svj jhvdjh mʃɒjʔt knjd پs t͡ʃvn ɒjn rɒ xvɒstm، آjɒ shl ɒŋɒrj krdm jɒʔzjmt mn ʔzjmt bʃrj bɒʃd tɒ آnkh bh nzd mn blj blj v nj nj bɒʃd ljkn xdɒ ɒmjn ɒst kh sxn mɒ bɒ ʃmɒ blj v nj njst zjrɒ kh پsrxdɒ ʔjsj msjh kh mɒ jʔnj mn v slvɒns vtjmvtɒvs dr mjɒn ʃmɒ bh vj mvʔzh krdjm، blj v nj nʃd blkh dr ɒv blj ʃdh ɒst zjrɒt͡ʃndɒn‌kh vʔdh hɒj xdɒ ɒst، hmh dr ɒv blj vɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht dr ɒv ɒmjn ɒst tɒ xdɒ ɒz mɒ tmd͡ʒjdjɒbd ɒmɒ ɒv kh mɒ rɒ bɒ ʃmɒ dr msjh ɒstvɒrmj ɡrdɒnd v mɒ rɒ msh nmvdh ɒst، xdɒst kh ɒv njz mɒ rɒ mhr nmvdh v bjʔɒnh rvh rɒ drdlhɒj mɒ ʔtɒ krdh ɒst ljkn mn xdɒ rɒ br d͡ʒɒn xvd ʃɒhdmj xvɒnm kh brɒj ʃfɣt br ʃmɒ tɒ bhɒl bh ɣrnts njɒmdm،nh آnkh br ɒjmɒn ʃmɒ hkm krdh bɒʃjm blkh ʃɒdj ʃmɒ rɒ mddkɒr hstjm zjrɒ kh bh ɒjmɒn ɣɒjm hstjd nh آnkh br ɒjmɒn ʃmɒ hkm krdh bɒʃjm blkh ʃɒdj ʃmɒ rɒ mddkɒr hstjm zjrɒ kh bh ɒjmɒn ɣɒjm hstjd ɒmɒ dr dl xvd ʔzjmt dɒʃtm kh djɡr bɒhzn bh nzd ʃmɒ njɒjm، zjrɒ ɒɡr mn ʃmɒ rɒmhzvn sɒzm، kjst kh mrɒ ʃɒdj dhd d͡ʒz ɒv kh ɒz mn mhzvn ɡʃt؟ v hmjn rɒ nvʃtm kh mbɒdɒvɣtj kh bjɒjm mhzvn ʃvm ɒz آnɒnj kh mj‌bɒjst sbb xvʃj mn bʃvnd، t͡ʃvnkh br hmh ʃmɒɒʔtmɒd mj‌dɒrm kh ʃɒdj mn، ʃɒdj d͡ʒmjʔ ʃmɒɒst zjrɒ kh ɒz hzn v dltŋj sxt v bɒɒʃkhɒj bsjɒr bh ʃmɒ nvʃtm، nh tɒ mhzvn ʃvjdblkh tɒ bfhmjd t͡ʃh mhbt bjnhɒjtj bɒ ʃmɒ dɒrm v ɒɡr ksj bɒʔs ɣm ʃd، mrɒ mhzvn nsɒxt blkh fj ɒld͡ʒmlh d͡ʒmjʔ ʃmɒ rɒ tɒ bɒr zjɒdh nnhɒdh bɒʃm kɒfj ɒst آn ks rɒ ɒjn sjɒstj kh ɒz ɒksr ʃmɒ bdv rsjdh ɒst پs brʔks ʃmɒ bɒjd ɒv rɒ ʔfv nmvdh، tslj dhjd kh mbɒdɒɒfzvnj ɣm t͡ʃnjn ʃxs rɒ frv brd bnɒbrɒjn، bh ʃmɒ ɒltmɒs mj‌dɒrm kh bɒ ɒv mhbt xvd rɒɒstvɒr nmɒjjd zjrɒ kh brɒj hmjn njz nvʃtm tɒdljl ʃmɒ rɒ bdɒnm kh dr hmh‌t͡ʃjz mtjʔ mj‌bɒʃjd ɒmɒ hrkh rɒ t͡ʃjzj ʔfv nmɒjjd، mn njz mj‌knm zjrɒ kh آnt͡ʃh mn ʔfv krdh‌ɒm، hrɡɒh t͡ʃjzj rɒ ʔfvkrdh bɒʃm، bh‌xɒtr ʃmɒ bh hzvr msjh krdh‌ɒm، tɒ ʃjtɒn br mɒ brtrj njɒbd، zjrɒ kh ɒz mkɒjd ɒvbj xbr njstjm ɒmɒ t͡ʃvn bh trvآs bd͡ʒht bʃɒrt msjh آmdm v drvɒzh‌ɒj brɒj mn dr xdɒvnd bɒz ʃd، dr rvh xvd آrɒmj ndɒʃtm، ɒz آn rv kh brɒdrxvd tjts rɒ njɒftm، blkh ɒjʃɒn rɒ vdɒʔ nmvdh، bh mkɒdvnjh آmdm ljkn ʃkr xdɒ rɒst kh mɒrɒ dr msjh، dɒئm dr mvkb zfr xvd mj‌brd vʔtr mʔrft xvd rɒ dr hrd͡ʒɒ bvsjlh mɒ zɒhrmj knd zjrɒ xdɒ rɒ ʔtr xvʃbvj msjh mj‌bɒʃjm hm dr nɒd͡ʒjɒn v hm dr hɒlkɒn ɒmɒɒjnhɒ rɒ ʔtr mvt، ɒlj mvt v آnhɒ rɒ ʔtr hjɒt ɒlj hjɒt v brɒj ɒjn ɒmvr kjst kh kɒfj bɒʃd؟zjrɒ msl bsjɒrj njstjm kh klɒm xdɒ rɒ mɣʃvʃ sɒzjm، blkh ɒz sɒdh dlj v ɒz d͡ʒɒnb xdɒ dr hzvr xdɒ dr msjh sxn mj‌ɡvjjm zjrɒ msl bsjɒrj njstjm kh klɒm xdɒ rɒ mɣʃvʃ sɒzjm، blkh ɒz sɒdh dlj v ɒz d͡ʒɒnb xdɒ dr hzvr xdɒ dr msjh sxn mj‌ɡvjjm آjɒ bɒz bh sfɒrʃ xvd ʃrvʔ mj‌knjm؟ vآjɒ msl bʔzj ɒhtjɒd͡ʒ bh sfɒrʃ nɒmh d͡ʒɒt bh ʃmɒ jɒ ɒz ʃmɒ dɒʃth bɒʃjm؟ ʃmɒ rsɒlh mɒhstjd، nvʃth ʃdh dr dlhɒj mɒ، mʔrvf vxvɒndh ʃdh d͡ʒmjʔ آdmjɒn t͡ʃvnkh zɒhrʃdh‌ɒjd kh rsɒlh msjh mj‌bɒʃjd، xdmt krdh ʃdh ɒz mɒ v nvʃth ʃdh nh bh mrkb blkh bh rvh xdɒj hj، nh br ɒlvɒh sŋ، blkh br ɒlvɒh ɡvʃtj dl ɒmɒ bvsjlh msjh t͡ʃnjn ɒʔtmɒd bh xdɒ dɒrjm nh آnkh kɒfj bɒʃjm kh t͡ʃjzj rɒ bh xvd tfkr knjm kh ɡvjɒ ɒz mɒ bɒʃd، blkh kfɒjt mɒɒz xdɒst kh ɒv mɒ rɒ hm kfɒjt dɒd tɒ ʔhdd͡ʒdjd rɒ xɒdm ʃvjm، nh hrf rɒ blkh rvh rɒzjrɒ kh hrf mj‌kʃd ljkn rvh zndh mj‌knd ɒmɒ ɒɡr xdmt mvt kh dr hrf bvd v brsŋhɒ trɒʃjdh ʃdh bɒ d͡ʒlɒl mj‌bvd، bhdj kh bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl nmj tvɒnstnd svrt mvsj rɒ nzɒrh knnd bh‌sbb d͡ʒlɒl t͡ʃhrh ɒv kh fɒnj bvd، t͡ʃɡvnh xdmt rvh bjʃtr bɒ d͡ʒlɒl nxvɒhd bvd؟ zjrɒhrɡɒh xdmt ɣsɒs bɒ d͡ʒlɒl bɒʃd، t͡ʃnd mrtbh zjɒdtr xdmt ʔdɒlt dr d͡ʒlɒl xvɒhd ɒfzvd zjrɒ kh آnt͡ʃh d͡ʒlɒl dɒdh ʃdh bvd njz bdjn nsbt d͡ʒlɒlj ndɒʃt bh‌sbb ɒjn d͡ʒlɒl fɒjɣ zjrɒ ɒɡr آn fɒnj bɒ d͡ʒlɒl bvdj، hrآjnh ɒjn bɒɣj ɒz trjɣ ɒvlj dr d͡ʒlɒl xvɒhd bvd پs t͡ʃvn t͡ʃnjn ɒmjd dɒrjm، bɒ kmɒl dljrj sxn mj‌ɡvjjm v nh mɒnnd mvsj kh nɣɒbj brt͡ʃhrh xvd kʃjd tɒ bnj‌ɒsrɒئjl، tmɒm ʃdn ɒjn fɒnj rɒ nzr nknnd، blkh zhn ɒjʃɒn ɣljz ʃdzjrɒ kh tɒ ɒmrvz hmɒn nɣɒb dr xvɒndn ʔhd ʔtjɣ bɒɣj ɒst v kʃf nʃdh ɒst، zjrɒ kh fɣt drmsjh bɒtl mj‌ɡrdd blkh tɒ ɒmrvz vɣtj kh mvsj rɒ mj‌xvɒnnd، nɣɒb br dl ɒjʃɒn brɣrɒrmj mɒnd ljkn hrɡɒh bh svj xdɒvnd rd͡ʒvʔ knd، nɣɒb brdɒʃth mj‌ʃvd ɒmɒ xdɒvnd rvh ɒst v d͡ʒɒjj kh rvh xdɒvnd ɒst، آnd͡ʒɒ آzɒdj ɒstljkn hmh mɒ t͡ʃvn bɒ t͡ʃhrh bj‌nɣɒb d͡ʒlɒl xdɒvnd rɒ dr آjnh mj‌ŋrjm، ɒz d͡ʒlɒl tɒd͡ʒlɒl bh hmɒn svrt mtbdl mj‌ʃvjm، t͡ʃnɒnkh ɒz xdɒvnd kh rvh ɒst ljkn hmh mɒ t͡ʃvn bɒ t͡ʃhrh bj‌nɣɒb d͡ʒlɒl xdɒvnd rɒ dr آjnh mj‌ŋrjm، ɒz d͡ʒlɒl tɒd͡ʒlɒl bh hmɒn svrt mtbdl mj‌ʃvjm، t͡ʃnɒnkh ɒz xdɒvnd kh rvh ɒst bnɒbrɒjn t͡ʃvn ɒjn xdmt rɒ dɒrjm، t͡ʃnɒnkh rhmt jɒfth‌ɒjm، xsth xɒtr nmj ʃvjm blkh xfɒjɒj rsvɒjj rɒ trk krdh، bh mkr rftɒrnmj knjm v klɒm xdɒ rɒ mɣʃvʃ nmj sɒzjm، blkh bh ɒzhɒr rɒstj، xvd rɒ bh zmjr hrks drhzvr xdɒ mɣbvl mj‌sɒzjm ljkn ɒɡr bʃɒrt mɒ mxfj ɒst، br hɒlkɒn mxfj ɒst، kh drɒjʃɒn xdɒj ɒjn d͡ʒhɒn fhm hɒj bj‌ɒjmɒnʃɒn rɒkvr ɡrdɒnjdh ɒst kh mbɒdɒ td͡ʒlj bʃɒrt d͡ʒlɒl msjh kh svrt xdɒst، ɒjʃɒn rɒ rvʃn sɒzd zjrɒ bh xvjʃtn mvʔzh nmj knjm blkh bh msjh ʔjsj xdɒvnd، ɒmɒ bh xvjʃtn kh ɣlɒm ʃmɒ hstjm bxɒtr ʔjsj zjrɒ xdɒjj kh ɡft tɒnvr ɒz zlmt drxʃjd، hmɒn ɒst kh dr dlhɒj mɒ drxʃjd tɒ nvr mʔrft d͡ʒlɒl xdɒ dr t͡ʃhrh ʔjsj msjh ɒz mɒ bdrxʃd ljkn ɒjn xzjnh rɒ dr zrvf xɒkj dɒrjm tɒbrtrj ɣvt ɒz آn xdɒ bɒʃd nh ɒz d͡ʒɒnb mɒ drhrt͡ʃjz zhmt kʃjdh، vlj dr ʃknd͡ʒh njstjm؛ mthjr vlj mɒjvs nj؛ tʔɒɣb krdh ʃdh، ljkn nh mtrvk؛ ɒfkndh ʃdh، vlj hlɒk ʃdh nj؛ پjvsth ɣtl ʔjsj xdɒvnd rɒ dr d͡ʒsd xvdhml mj‌knjm tɒ hjɒt ʔjsj hm dr bdn mɒ zɒhrʃvd zjrɒ mɒ kh zndh‌ɒjm، dɒئm bxɒtr ʔjsj bh mvt sپrdh mj‌ʃvjm tɒ hjɒt ʔjsj njz drd͡ʒsd fɒnj mɒ پdjd آjd پs mvt dr mɒ kɒrmj knd vlj hjɒt dr ʃmɒ ɒmɒ t͡ʃvn hmɒn rvh ɒjmɒn rɒ dɒrjm، bhsb آnt͡ʃh mktvb ɒst «ɒjmɒn آvrdm پs sxn ɡftm»، mɒ njz t͡ʃvn ɒjmɒn dɒrjm، ɒz ɒjnrv sxn mj‌ɡvjjm t͡ʃvn mj‌dɒnjm ɒv kh ʔjsj xdɒvndrɒ brxjzɒnjd، mɒ rɒ njz bɒ ʔjsj xvɒhd brxjzɒnjdv bɒ ʃmɒ hɒzr xvɒhd sɒxt zjrɒ kh hmh‌t͡ʃjz brɒj ʃmɒ ɒst tɒ آn fjzj kh bvsjlh bsjɒrj ɒfzvdh ʃdh ɒst، ʃkrɡzɒrj rɒ brɒj tmd͡ʒjd xdɒ bjfzɒjd ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht xsth xɒtrnmj ʃvjm، blkh hrt͡ʃnd ɒnsɒnjt zɒhrj mɒ fɒnj mj‌ʃvd، ljkn bɒtn rvz brvz tɒzh mj‌ɡrdd zjrɒ kh ɒjn zhmt sbk mɒ kh brɒj lhzh‌ɒj ɒst، bɒr d͡ʒɒvdɒnj d͡ʒlɒl rɒ brɒj mɒ zjɒdh v zjɒdh پjdɒ mj‌knddr hɒlj kh mɒ nzr nmj knjm bh t͡ʃjzhɒj djdnj، blkh bh t͡ʃjzhɒj nɒdjdnj، zjrɒ kh آnt͡ʃh djdnj ɒst، zmɒnj ɒst v nɒdjdnj d͡ʒɒvdɒnj dr hɒlj kh mɒ nzr nmj knjm bh t͡ʃjzhɒj djdnj، blkh bh t͡ʃjzhɒj nɒdjdnj، zjrɒ kh آnt͡ʃh djdnj ɒst، zmɒnj ɒst v nɒdjdnj d͡ʒɒvdɒnj zjrɒ mj‌dɒnjm kh hrɡɒh ɒjn xɒnh zmjnj xjmh mɒ rjxth ʃvd، ʔmɒrtj ɒz xdɒdɒrjm، xɒnh‌ɒj nɒsɒxth ʃdh bh‌dsthɒ v d͡ʒɒvdɒnj dr آsmɒnhɒ zjrɒ kh dr ɒjn hm آh mj‌kʃjm، t͡ʃvnkh mʃtɒɣ hstjm kh xɒnh xvd rɒ kh ɒzآsmɒn ɒst bپvʃjm، ɒɡr fj ɒlvɒɣʔ پvʃjdh v nh ʔrjɒn jɒft ʃvjm ɒz آnrv kh mɒ njz kh dr ɒjn xjmh hstjm، ɡrɒnbɒr ʃdh، آh mj‌kʃjm، ɒz آn d͡ʒht kh nmj xvɒhjm ɒjn rɒ bjrvn knjm، blkh آn rɒ bپvʃjm tɒ fɒnj dr hjɒt ɣrɣ ʃvd ɒmɒ ɒv kh mɒ rɒ brɒj ɒjn drst sɒxt xdɒ ɒst kh bjʔɒnh rvh rɒ bh mɒ mj‌dhd پs dɒئm xɒtrd͡ʒmʔ hstjm v mj‌dɒnjm kh mɒdɒmj kh dr bdn mtvtnjm، ɒz xdɒvnd ɣrjb mj‌bɒʃjm zjrɒ kh bh ɒjmɒn rftɒr mj‌knjm nh bh djdɒr پs xɒtrd͡ʒmʔ hstjm v ɒjn rɒ bjʃtrmj پsndjm kh ɒz bdn ɣrbt knjm v bh nzd xdɒvndmtvtn ʃvjm lhzɒ hrjs hstjm br ɒjnkh xvɒh mtvtn v xvɒh ɣrjb، پsndjdh ɒv bɒʃjm zjrɒ lɒzm ɒst kh hmh mɒ پjʃ msnd msjh hɒzr ʃvjm tɒ hrks ɒʔmɒl bdnj xvd rɒ bjɒbd، bhsb آnt͡ʃh krdh bɒʃd، t͡ʃh njk t͡ʃh bd پs t͡ʃvn trs xdɒ rɒ dɒnsth‌ɒjm، mrdm rɒdʔvt mj‌knjm ɒmɒ bh xdɒ zɒhr ʃdh‌ɒjm v ɒmjdvɒrm bh zmɒjr ʃmɒ hm zɒhr xvɒhjm ʃd zjrɒ bɒr djɡr brɒj xvd bh ʃmɒ sfɒrʃ nmj knjm، blkh sbb ɒftxɒr drbɒrh xvd bh ʃmɒmj dhjm tɒ ʃmɒ rɒ d͡ʒvɒbj bɒʃd brɒj آnɒnj kh drzɒhr nh dr dl fxr mj‌knnd zjrɒ ɒɡr bj‌xvdhstjm brɒj xdɒst v ɒɡr hʃjɒrjm brɒj ʃmɒɒst zjrɒ mhbt msjh mɒ rɒ frv ɡrfth ɒst، t͡ʃvnkh ɒjn rɒ drjɒftjm kh jk nfr brɒj hmh mrdپs hmh mrdnd v brɒj hmh mrd tɒ آnɒnj kh zndh‌ɒnd، ɒz ɒjn bh bʔd brɒj xvjʃtn zjst nknndblkh brɒj ɒv kh brɒj ɒjʃɒn mrd v brxɒst bnɒbrɒjn، mɒ bʔd ɒz ɒjn hjt͡ʃ‌ks rɒ bhsb d͡ʒsm nmj ʃnɒsjm، blkh hrɡɒh msjh rɒ hm bhsb d͡ʒsm ʃnɒxth bvdjm، ɒlɒn djɡr ɒv rɒnmj ʃnɒsjm پs ɒɡr ksj dr msjh bɒʃd، xlɣt tɒzh‌ɒj ɒst؛ t͡ʃjzhɒj khnh drɡzʃt، ɒjnk hmh‌t͡ʃjz tɒzh ʃdh ɒst v hmh‌t͡ʃjz ɒzxdɒ kh mɒ rɒ bvɒsth ʔjsj msjh bɒ xvd msɒlhh dɒdh v xdmt msɒlhh rɒ bh mɒ sپrdh ɒst jʔnj‌ɒjnkh xdɒ dr msjh bvd v d͡ʒhɒn rɒ bɒxvd msɒlhh mj‌dɒd v xtɒjɒj ɒjʃɒn rɒ bdjʃɒn mhsvb ndɒʃt v klɒm msɒlhh rɒ bh mɒ sپrd پs brɒj msjh ɒjlt͡ʃj hstjm kh ɡvjɒ xdɒ bh zbɒn mɒ vʔz mj‌knd پs bxɒtr msjh ɒstdʔɒmj knjm kh bɒ xdɒ msɒlhh knjdzjrɒ ɒv rɒ kh ɡnɒh nʃnɒxt dr rɒh mɒ ɡnɒh sɒxt tɒ mɒ dr vj ʔdɒlt xdɒ ʃvjm zjrɒ ɒv rɒ kh ɡnɒh nʃnɒxt dr rɒh mɒ ɡnɒh sɒxt tɒ mɒ dr vj ʔdɒlt xdɒ ʃvjm پs t͡ʃvn hmkɒrɒn ɒv hstjm، ɒltmɒs mj nmɒjjm kh fjz xdɒ rɒ bj‌fɒjdh njɒfth bɒʃjd zjrɒ mj‌ɡvjd «dr vɣt mɣbvl tv rɒ mstd͡ʒɒb frmvdm v dr rvz nd͡ʒɒt tv rɒ ɒʔɒnt krdm» ɒjnk ɒlhɒl zmɒn mɣbvl ɒst؛ ɒjnk ɒlɒn rvz nd͡ʒɒt ɒst dr hjt͡ʃ‌t͡ʃjz lɣzʃ nmj dhjm kh mbɒdɒxdmt mɒ mlɒmt krdh ʃvd، blkh dr hr ɒmrj xvd rɒ sɒbt mj‌knjm kh xdɒm xdɒ hstjm drsbr bsjɒr، dr zhmɒt، dr hɒd͡ʒɒt dr tŋjhɒ، dr tɒzjɒnh‌hɒ، dr zndɒnhɒ، dr ftnh‌hɒ، dr mhnthɒ، dr bj‌xvɒbjhɒ، dr ɡrsŋjhɒ، dr thɒrt، drmʔrft، dr hlm، dr mhrbɒnj، dr rvh‌ɒlɣds، drmhbt bj‌rjɒ، dr klɒm hɣ، dr ɣvt xdɒ bɒɒslhh ʔdɒlt br trf rɒst v t͡ʃپ، bh ʔzt vzlt v bdnɒmj v njknɒmj t͡ʃvn ɡmrɒh knndɡɒn vɒjnk rɒstɡv hstjm؛ t͡ʃvn md͡ʒhvl v ɒjnk mʔrvf؛ t͡ʃvn dr hɒlt mvt v ɒjnk zndh hstjm؛ t͡ʃvn sjɒst krdh ʃdh، ɒmɒ mɣtvl nj؛ t͡ʃvn mhzvn، vlj dɒئm ʃɒdmɒn؛ t͡ʃvn fɣjr vɒjnk bsjɒrj rɒ dvltmnd mj‌sɒzjm؛ t͡ʃvn bj‌t͡ʃjz، ɒmɒ mɒlk hmh‌t͡ʃjz ‌ɒj ɣrntjɒn، dhɒn mɒ bh svj ʃmɒ ɡʃɒdh vdl mɒ vsjʔ ʃdh ɒst dr mɒ tŋ njstjd ljkn dr ɒhʃɒj xvd tŋ hstjd پs dr d͡ʒzɒj ɒjn، zjrɒ kh bh frzndɒn xvd sxn mj‌ɡvjm، ʃmɒnjz ɡʃɒdh ʃvjd zjr jvɣ nɒmvɒfɣ bɒ bj‌ɒjmɒnɒn mʃvjd، zjrɒ ʔdɒlt rɒ bɒ ɡnɒh t͡ʃh rfɒɣt v nvr rɒ bɒzlmt t͡ʃh ʃrɒkt ɒst؟ v msjh rɒ bɒ bljʔɒl t͡ʃh mnɒsbt v mvmn rɒ bɒ kɒfr t͡ʃh nsjb ɒst؟ v hjkl xdɒ rɒ bɒ bthɒ t͡ʃh mvɒfɣt؟ zjrɒ ʃmɒhjkl xdɒj hj mj‌bɒʃjd، t͡ʃnɒnkh xdɒ ɡft kh «dr ɒjʃɒn sɒkn xvɒhm bvd v dr ɒjʃɒn rɒh xvɒhm rft v xdɒj ɒjʃɒn xvɒhm bvd، v ɒjʃɒn ɣvm mn xvɒhnd bvd» پs xdɒvnd mj‌ɡvjd «ɒz mjɒn ɒjʃɒn bjrvn آjjd v d͡ʒdɒ ʃvjd v t͡ʃjznɒپɒk rɒ lms mknjd tɒ mn ʃmɒ rɒ mɣbvl bdɒrm،v ʃmɒ rɒ پdr xvɒhm bvd v ʃmɒ mrɒ پsrɒn vdxtrɒn xvɒhjd bvd؛ xdɒvnd ɣɒdr mtlɣ mj‌ɡvjd» v ʃmɒ rɒ پdr xvɒhm bvd v ʃmɒ mrɒ پsrɒn vdxtrɒn xvɒhjd bvd؛ xdɒvnd ɣɒdr mtlɣ mj‌ɡvjd» پs‌ɒj ʔzjzɒn، t͡ʃvn ɒjn vʔdh‌hɒ rɒdɒrjm، xvjʃtn rɒ ɒz hr nd͡ʒɒst d͡ʒsm vrvh tɒhr bsɒzjm v ɣdvsjt rɒ dr xdɒ trsj bh‌kmɒl rsɒnjm mɒ rɒ dr dlhɒj xvd d͡ʒɒ dhjd br hjt͡ʃ‌ks zlm nkrdjm v hjt͡ʃ‌ks rɒ fɒsd nsɒxtjm vhjt͡ʃ‌ks rɒ mɣbvn nnmvdjm ɒjn rɒ ɒz rvj mzmt nmj ɡvjm، zjrɒ پjʃ ɡftm kh dr dl mɒhstjd tɒ dr mvt v hjɒt bɒ hm bɒʃjm mrɒ brʃmɒ ɒʔtmɒd klj v drbɒrh ʃmɒ fxr kɒml ɒst ɒztslj sjr ɡʃth‌ɒm v dr hr zhmtj kh br mɒmj آjd، ʃɒdj vɒfr mj‌knm zjrɒ t͡ʃvn bh mkɒdvnjh hm rsjdjm، d͡ʒsm mɒآrɒmj njɒft، blkh dr hrt͡ʃjz zhmt kʃjdjm؛ dr zɒhr، nzɒʔhɒ v dr bɒtn، trshɒ bvd ljkn xdɒjj kh tslj dhndh ɒftɒdɡɒn ɒst، mɒ rɒ bh آmdn tjts tslj bxʃjd v nh ɒz آmdn ɒv tnhɒblkh bh آn tslj njz kh ɒv dr ʃmɒ jɒfth bvd، t͡ʃvn mɒ rɒ mtlʔ sɒxt ɒz ʃvɣ ʃmɒ v nvhh ɡrj ʃmɒv ɣjrtj kh drbɒrh mn dɒʃtjd، bh nvʔj kh bjʃtrʃɒdmɒn ɡrdjdm zjrɒ kh hrt͡ʃnd ʃmɒ rɒ bh آn rsɒlh mhzvn sɒxtm، پʃjmɒn njstm، ɒɡrt͡ʃh پʃjmɒn hm bvdm zjrɒ jɒftm kh آn rsɒlh ʃmɒ rɒɒɡr hm bh sɒʔtj، ɣmɡjn sɒxt ɒlhɒl ʃɒdmɒnm، nh ɒz آnkh ɣm xvrdjd blkh ɒz ɒjnkh ɣm ʃmɒ bh tvbh ɒnd͡ʒɒmjd، zjrɒ kh ɣm ʃmɒ brɒj xdɒbvd tɒ bh hjt͡ʃ vd͡ʒh zjɒnj ɒz mɒ bh ʃmɒ nrsd zjrɒ ɣmj kh brɒj xdɒst mnʃɒ tvbh mj‌bɒʃd bh d͡ʒht nd͡ʒɒt kh ɒz آn پʃjmɒnj njst؛ ɒmɒ ɣm dnjvj mnʃɒ mvt ɒst zjrɒ ɒjnk hmjn‌kh ɣm ʃmɒ brɒj xdɒ bvd، t͡ʃɡvnh kvʃʃ، bl ɒhtd͡ʒɒd͡ʒ، bl xʃm، bl trs، bl ɒʃtjɒɣ، bl ɣjrt، bl ɒntɣɒm rɒ dr ʃmɒ پdjd آvrd dr hr t͡ʃjzxvd rɒ sɒbt krdjd kh dr ɒjn ɒmr mbrɒ hstjd bɒrj hrɡɒh bh ʃmɒ nvʃtm، bd͡ʒht آn zɒlm jɒ mzlvm nbvd، blkh tɒ ɣjrt mɒ drbɒrh ʃmɒ bh ʃmɒdr hzvr xdɒ zɒhr ʃvd v ɒz ɒjn d͡ʒht tslj jɒftjm ljkn dr tslj xvd ʃɒdj mɒ ɒzxvʃj tjts bjnhɒjt zjɒdh ɡrdjd t͡ʃvnkh rvh ɒv ɒz d͡ʒmjʔ ʃmɒ آrɒmj jɒfth bvd zjrɒ ɒɡrdrbɒrh ʃmɒ bdv fxr krdm، xd͡ʒl nʃdm blkh t͡ʃnɒnkh hmh sxnɒn rɒ bh ʃmɒ bh rɒstj ɡftjm، hmt͡ʃnjn fxr mɒ bh tjts rɒst ʃd v xɒtrɒv bh svj ʃmɒ zjɒdtr mɒjl ɡrdjd، t͡ʃvnkh ɒtɒʔt d͡ʒmjʔ ʃmɒ rɒ bh jɒd mj‌آvrd kh t͡ʃɡvnh bh trs v lrz ɒv rɒ پzjrftjdʃɒdmɒnm kh drhrt͡ʃjz br ʃmɒ ɒʔtmɒd dɒrm ʃɒdmɒnm kh drhrt͡ʃjz br ʃmɒ ɒʔtmɒd dɒrm ljkn‌ɒj brɒdrɒn ʃmɒ rɒ mtlʔ mj‌sɒzjm ɒzfjz xdɒ kh bh kljsɒhɒj mkɒdvnjh ʔtɒʃdh ɒst zjrɒ dr ɒmthɒn ʃdjd zhmt، frɒvɒnj xvʃj ɒjʃɒn zɒhr ɡrdjd v ɒz zjɒdtj fɣr ɒjʃɒn، dvlt sxɒvt ɒjʃɒn ɒfzvdh ʃd zjrɒ kh ʃɒhd hstm kh bhsb tɒɣt blkh fvɣ ɒz tɒɣt xvjʃ bh rzɒmndj tmɒm، ɒltmɒs bsjɒr nmvdh، ɒjn nʔmt v ʃrɒkt dr xdmt mɣdsjn rɒ ɒz mɒ tlbjdnd v nh‌t͡ʃnɒnkh ɒmjddɒʃtjm، blkh ɒvl xvjʃtn rɒ bh xdɒvnd v bh mɒbrhsb ɒrɒdh xdɒ dɒdnd v ɒz ɒjn sbb ɒz tjts ɒstdʔɒ nmvdjm kh hmt͡ʃnɒnkh ʃrvʔ ɒjn nʔmt rɒ dr mjɒn ʃmɒ krd، آn rɒ bh ɒnd͡ʒɒm hm brsɒnd blkh t͡ʃnɒnkh drhrt͡ʃjz ɒfzvnj dɒrjd، dr ɒjmɒn v klɒm v mʔrft vkmɒl ɒd͡ʒthɒd v mhbtj kh bɒ mɒ mj‌dɒrjd، dr ɒjn nʔmt njz bjfzɒjjd ɒjn rɒ bh trjɣ hkm nmj ɡvjm blkh bh‌sbb ɒd͡ʒthɒd djɡrɒn v tɒɒxlɒs mhbt ʃmɒ rɒ bjɒzmɒjm zjrɒ kh fjz xdɒvnd mɒ ʔjsj msjh rɒ mj‌dɒnjd kh hrt͡ʃnddvltmnd bvd، brɒj ʃmɒ fɣjr ʃd tɒ ʃmɒ ɒz fɣr ɒvdvltmnd ʃvjd v dr ɒjn، rɒj mj‌dhm zjrɒ kh ɒjn ʃmɒ rɒ ʃɒjsth ɒst، t͡ʃvnkh ʃmɒ dr sɒl ɡzʃth، nh dr ʔml fɣt blkh dr ɒrɒdh njz ɒvl ɒzhmh ʃrvʔ krdjd ɒmɒ ɒlhɒl ʔml rɒ bh ɒnd͡ʒɒm rsɒnjd tɒ t͡ʃnɒnkh dlɡrmj dr ɒrɒdh bvd، ɒnd͡ʒɒm ʔml njz brhsb آnt͡ʃh dɒrjd bʃvd zjrɒhrɡɒh dlɡrmj bɒʃd، mɣbvl mj‌ɒftd، bhsb آnt͡ʃh ksj dɒrd nh bhsb آnt͡ʃh ndɒrd v nh ɒjnkh djɡrɒn rɒ rɒht v ʃmɒ rɒ zhmt bɒʃd، blkh bh trjɣ msɒvɒt tɒ dr hɒl، zjɒdtj ʃmɒbrɒj kmj ɒjʃɒn bkɒr آjd؛ v tɒ zjɒdtj ɒjʃɒn bd͡ʒht kmj ʃmɒ bɒʃd v msɒvɒt bʃvd t͡ʃnɒnkh mktvb ɒst «آnkh bsjɒr d͡ʒmʔ krd، zjɒdtj ndɒʃt v آnkh ɒndkj d͡ʒmʔ krd، kmj ndɒʃt ɒmɒ ʃkr xdɒrɒst kh ɒjn ɒd͡ʒthɒd rɒ brɒj ʃmɒ dr dl tjts nhɒd zjrɒ ɒv xvɒhʃ mɒ rɒɒd͡ʒɒbt nmvd، blkh bjʃtr bɒ ɒd͡ʒthɒd bvdh، bh rzɒmndj tmɒm bh svj ʃmɒ rvɒnh ʃd v bɒvj آn brɒdrj rɒ frstɒdjm kh mdh ɒv dr ɒnd͡ʒjl dr tmɒmj kljsɒhɒ ɒst v nh hmjn fɣt blkh kljsɒhɒ njz ɒv rɒ ɒxtjɒr krdnd tɒ dr ɒjn nʔmtj kh xdmt آn rɒ brɒj tmd͡ʒjd xdɒvnd v dlɡrmj ʃmɒ mj‌knjm، hm‌sfr mɒbʃvd t͡ʃvnkh ɒd͡ʒtnɒb mj‌knjm kh mbɒdɒ ksj mɒ rɒ mlɒmt knd drbɒrh ɒjn sxɒvtj kh xɒdmɒn آn hstjm zjrɒ kh nh drhzvr xdɒvnd fɣt، blkh dr nzr mrdm njzt͡ʃjzhɒj njkv rɒ tdɒrk mj‌bjnjm v bɒ ɒjʃɒn brɒdr xvd rɒ njz frstɒdjm kh mkrr dr ɒmvrbsjɒr ɒv rɒ bɒ ɒd͡ʒthɒd jɒftjm v ɒlhɒl bh‌sbb ɒʔtmɒd klj kh br ʃmɒ mj‌dɒrd، bjʃtr bɒ ɒd͡ʒthɒdɒst hrɡɒh drbɒrh tjts bپrsnd، ɒv drxdmt ʃmɒ rfjɣ v hmkɒr mn ɒst؛ v ɒɡr drbɒrh brɒdrɒn mɒ، ɒjʃɒn rsl kljsɒhɒ v d͡ʒlɒl msjh mj‌bɒʃndپs dljl mhbt xvd v fxr mɒ rɒ drbɒrh ʃmɒ dr hzvr kljsɒhɒ bh ɒjʃɒn zɒhrnmɒjjd پs dljl mhbt xvd v fxr mɒ rɒ drbɒrh ʃmɒ dr hzvr kljsɒhɒ bh ɒjʃɒn zɒhrnmɒjjd zjrɒ kh dr xsvs ɒjn xdmt mɣdsjn، zjɒdtj mj‌bɒʃd kh bh ʃmɒ bnvjsm t͡ʃvnkh dlɡrmj ʃmɒ rɒ mj‌dɒnm kh drbɒrh آn bd͡ʒht ʃmɒ bh ɒhl mkɒdvnjh fxr mj‌knm kh ɒzsɒl ɡdʃth ɒhl ɒxɒئjh mstʔd ʃdh‌ɒnd v ɣjrt ʃmɒ ɒksr ɒjʃɒn rɒ thrjz nmvdh ɒst ɒmɒbrɒdrɒn rɒ frstɒdm kh mbɒdɒ fxr mɒ drbɒrh ʃmɒ drɒjn xsvs bɒtl ʃvd tɒ t͡ʃnɒnkh ɡfth‌ɒm، mstʔdʃvjd mbɒdɒ ɒɡr ɒhl mkɒdvnjh bɒ mn آjnd v ʃmɒrɒ nɒmstʔd jɒbnd، nmj ɡvjm ʃmɒ blkh mɒ ɒz ɒjn ɒʔtmɒdj kh bh آn fxr krdjm، xd͡ʒl ʃvjm، پs lɒzm dɒnstm kh brɒdrɒn rɒ nsjht knm tɒɣbl ɒz mɒ nzd ʃmɒ آjnd v brkt mvʔvd ʃmɒ rɒ mhjɒsɒznd tɒ hɒzr bɒʃd، ɒz rɒh brkt nh ɒz rɒh tmʔ ɒmɒ xlɒsh ɒjn ɒst، hrkh bɒ bxjlj kɒrd، bɒbxjlj hm drv knd v hrkh bɒ brkt kɒrd، bɒ brkt njz drv knd ɒmɒ hrks btvrj kh dr dl xvdɒrɒdh nmvdh ɒst bknd، nh bh hzn v ɒztrɒr، zjrɒxdɒ bxʃndh xvʃ rɒ dvst mj‌dɒrd vlj xdɒ ɣɒdr ɒst kh hr nʔmtj rɒ brɒj ʃmɒ bjfzɒjdtɒ hmjʃh dr hr ɒmrj kfɒjt kɒml dɒʃth، brɒj hr ʔml njkv ɒfzvdh ʃvjd t͡ʃnɒnkh mktvb ɒst kh «پɒʃjd v bh fɣrɒ dɒd v ʔdɒltʃ tɒ bh ɒbdbɒɣj mj‌mɒnd» ɒmɒ ɒv kh brɒj brzɡr bzr v brɒj xvrndh nɒn rɒ آmɒdh mj‌knd، bzr ʃmɒ rɒ آmɒdh krdh، xvɒhd ɒfzvd v smrɒt ʔdɒlt ʃmɒ rɒ mzjd xvɒhd krd tɒ آnkh dr hrt͡ʃjz dvltmnd ʃdh، kmɒl sxɒvt rɒ bnmɒjjd kh آn mnʃɒ ʃkr xdɒbvsjlh mɒ mj‌bɒʃd zjrɒ kh bh‌d͡ʒɒ آvrdn ɒjn xdmt، nh fɣt hɒd͡ʒɒt mɣdsjn rɒ rfʔ mj‌knd، blkh sپɒs xdɒ rɒ njz bsjɒr mj‌ɒfzɒjd v ɒzdljl ɒjn xdmt، xdɒ rɒ tmd͡ʒjd mj‌knnd bh‌sbb ɒtɒʔt ʃmɒ dr ɒʔtrɒf ɒnd͡ʒjl msjh v sxɒvt bxʃʃ ʃmɒ brɒj ɒjʃɒn v hmɡɒn v ɒjʃɒn bh‌sbb ɒfzvnj fjz xdɒjj kh br ʃmɒst، drdʔɒj xvd mʃtɒɣ ʃmɒ mj‌bɒʃndxdɒ rɒ brɒj ʔtɒj mɒ lɒklɒm ɒv ʃkr bɒd xdɒ rɒ brɒj ʔtɒj mɒ lɒklɒm ɒv ʃkr bɒd ɒmɒ mn xvd، پvls، kh t͡ʃvn dr mjɒn ʃmɒ hɒzr bvdm، frvtn bvdm، ljkn vɣtj kh ɣɒjb hstm، bɒ ʃmɒ d͡ʒsɒrt mj‌knm، ɒzʃmɒ bh hlm v rɒft msjh ɒstdʔɒ dɒrm vɒltmɒs mj‌knm kh t͡ʃvn hɒzr ʃvm، d͡ʒsɒrt nknm bdɒn ɒʔtmɒdj kh ɡmɒn mj‌brm kh d͡ʒrɒt xvɒhm krd bɒ آnɒnj kh mj‌پndɒrnd kh mɒ bh trjɣ d͡ʒsm rftɒr mj‌knjm zjrɒ hrt͡ʃnd dr d͡ʒsm rftɒr mj‌knjm، vlj bh ɣɒnvn d͡ʒsmj d͡ʒŋ nmj nmɒjjm zjrɒ ɒslhh d͡ʒŋ mɒ d͡ʒsmɒnj njst blkh nzd xdɒ ɣɒdr ɒst brɒj ɒnhdɒm ɣlʔh‌hɒ، kh xjɒlɒt v hr blndj rɒ kh xvd rɒ bh xlɒf mʔrft xdɒ mj‌ɒfrɒzd، bh zjr mj‌ɒfknjm vhr fkrj rɒ bh ɒtɒʔt msjh ɒsjr mj‌sɒzjm vmstʔd hstjm kh ɒz hr mʔsjt ɒntɣɒm d͡ʒvjjm vɣtj kh ɒtɒʔt ʃmɒ kɒml ʃvd آjɒ bh svrt zɒhrj nzr mj‌knjd؟ ɒɡr ksj br xvd ɒʔtmɒd dɒrd kh ɒz آn msjh ɒst، ɒjn rɒ njz ɒz xvd bdɒnd kh t͡ʃnɒnkh ɒv ɒz آn msjh ɒst، mɒ njz hmt͡ʃnɒn ɒz آn msjh hstjm zjrɒhrt͡ʃnd zjɒdh hm fxr bknm drbɒrh ɒɣtdɒr xvd kh xdɒvnd آn rɒ brɒj bnɒ nh brɒj xrɒbj ʃmɒ bh mɒdɒdh ɒst، xd͡ʒl nxvɒhm ʃd، kh mbɒdɒ mʔlvm ʃvd kh ʃmɒ rɒ bh rsɒlh‌hɒ mj‌trsɒnm zjrɒmj ɡvjnd «rsɒlh hɒj ɒv ɡrɒn v zvrآvr ɒst، ljkn hzvr d͡ʒsmj ɒv zʔjf v sxnʃ hɣjr» t͡ʃnjn ʃxs bdɒnd kh t͡ʃnɒnkh dr klɒm bh rsɒlh‌hɒ dr ɣjɒb hstjm، hmt͡ʃnjn njz dr fʔl drhzvr xvɒhjm bvd zjrɒ d͡ʒrɒt ndɒrjm kh xvd rɒ ɒz ksɒnj kh xvjʃtn rɒ mdh mj‌knnd bʃmɒrjm، jɒ xvd rɒ bɒɒjʃɒn mɣɒblh nmɒjjm؛ blkh ɒjʃɒn t͡ʃvn xvd rɒ bɒxvd mj‌پjmɒjnd v xvd rɒ bh xvd mɣɒblh mj‌nmɒjnd، dɒnɒ njstnd ɒmɒ mɒ zjɒdh ɒz ɒndɒzh fxr nmj knjm، blkh bhsb ɒndɒzh آn ɣɒnvnj kh xdɒ brɒj mɒ پjmvd، v آn ɒndɒzh‌ɒj ɒst kh bh ʃmɒnjz mj‌rsd zjrɒ ɒz hd xvd td͡ʒɒvz nmj knjm kh ɡvjɒ bh ʃmɒ nrsjdh bɒʃjm، t͡ʃvnkh dr ɒnd͡ʒjl msjh bh ʃmɒ hm rsjdh‌ɒjm v ɒz ɒndɒzh xvdŋzʃth dr mhnthɒj djɡrɒn fxr nmj nmɒjjm، vlj ɒmjd dɒrjm kh t͡ʃvn ɒjmɒn ʃmɒ ɒfzvn ʃvd، dr mjɒn ʃmɒ bhsb ɣɒnvn xvd bɣɒjt ɒfzvdh xvɒhjm ʃd tɒ ɒjnkh dr mkɒnhɒj dvrtr ɒzʃmɒ hm bʃɒrt dhjm v dr ɒmvr mhjɒ ʃdh bh ɣɒnvn djɡrɒn fxr nknjm ɒmɒ hrkh fxr nmɒjd، bh xdɒvnd fxr bnmɒjdzjrɒ nh آnkh xvd rɒ mdh knd mɣbvl ɒftd blkh آn rɒ kh xdɒvnd mdh nmɒjd zjrɒ nh آnkh xvd rɒ mdh knd mɣbvl ɒftd blkh آn rɒ kh xdɒvnd mdh nmɒjd kɒʃkh mrɒ dr ɒndk d͡ʒhɒltj mthml ʃvjd v mthml mn hm mj‌bɒʃjd zjrɒkh mn br ʃmɒ ɣjvr hstm bh ɣjrt ɒlhj؛ zjrɒ kh ʃmɒ rɒ bh jk ʃvhr nɒmzd sɒxtm tɒ bɒkrh‌ɒj ʔfjfh bh msjh sپɒrm ljkn mj‌trsm kh t͡ʃnɒnkh mɒr bh mkr xvd hvɒ rɒ frjft، hmt͡ʃnjn xɒtrʃmɒ hm ɒz sɒdɡj‌ɒj kh dr msjh ɒst، fɒsdɡrdd zjrɒ hrɡɒh آnkh آmd، vʔz mj‌krd bh ʔjsɒj djɡr، ɣjr ɒz آnkh mɒ bdv mvʔzh krdjm، jɒ ʃmɒ rvhj djɡr rɒ d͡ʒz آnkh jɒfth bvdjd، jɒɒnd͡ʒjlj djɡr rɒ svɒj آnt͡ʃh ɣbvl krdh bvdjdmj پzjrftjd، njkv mj‌krdjd kh mthml mj‌ʃdjd zjrɒ mrɒ jɣjn ɒst kh ɒz bzrɡtrjn rsvlɒn hrɡz kmtr njstm ɒmɒ hrt͡ʃnd dr klɒm njz ɒmj bɒʃm، ljkn dr mʔrft nj blkh dr hr ɒmrj nzdhmh ks bh ʃmɒ آʃkɒr ɡrdjdjm آjɒ ɡnɒh krdm kh xvd rɒ zljl sɒxtm tɒ ʃmɒ srɒfrɒz ʃvjd drɒjnkh bh ɒnd͡ʒjl xdɒ ʃmɒ rɒ mft bʃɒrt dɒdm؟ kljsɒhɒj djɡr rɒ ɣɒrt nmvdh، ɒd͡ʒrt ɡrftm tɒ ʃmɒ rɒ xdmt nmɒjm v t͡ʃvn bh nzd ʃmɒ hɒzrbvdh، mhtɒd͡ʒ ʃdm، br hjt͡ʃ‌ks bɒr nnhɒdm zjrɒbrɒdrɒnj kh ɒz mkɒdvnjh آmdnd، rfʔ hɒd͡ʒt mrɒnmvdnd v dr hrt͡ʃjz ɒz bɒr nhɒdn br ʃmɒ xvd rɒŋɒh dɒʃth v xvɒhm dɒʃt bh rɒstj msjh kh dr mn ɒst ɣsm kh ɒjn fxr dr nvɒhj ɒxɒئjh ɒz mn ɡrfth nxvɒhd ʃd ɒz t͡ʃh sbb؟ آjɒ ɒzɒjnkh ʃmɒ rɒ dvst nmj dɒrm؟ xdɒ mj‌dɒnd ljkn آnt͡ʃh mj‌knm hm xvɒhm krd tɒ ɒz d͡ʒvjndɡɒn frst، frst rɒ mnɣtʔ sɒzm tɒ drآnt͡ʃh fxr mj‌knnd، msl mɒ njz jɒft ʃvnd zjrɒ kh t͡ʃnjn ɒʃxɒs rsvlɒn kzbh v ʔmlh mkɒr hstnd kh xvjʃtn rɒ bh rsvlɒn msjh mʃɒbh mj‌sɒznd v ʔd͡ʒb njst، t͡ʃvnkh xvdʃjtɒn hm xvjʃtn rɒ bh frʃth nvr mʃɒbh mj‌sɒzd پs ɒmr bzrɡ njst kh xdɒm vj xvjʃtn rɒ bh xdɒm ʔdɒlt mʃɒbh sɒznd kh ʔɒɣbt ɒjʃɒn brhsb ɒʔmɒlʃɒn xvɒhd bvd bɒz mj‌ɡvjm، ksj mrɒ bj‌fhm ndɒnd vɒlɒ mrɒt͡ʃvn bj‌fhmj bپzjrjd tɒ mn njz ɒndkj ɒftxɒrknm آnt͡ʃh mj‌ɡvjm ɒz d͡ʒɒnb xdɒvndnmj ɡvjm، blkh ɒz rɒh bj‌fhmj dr ɒjn ɒʔtmɒdj kh fxr mɒ ɒst t͡ʃvnkh bsjɒrj ɒz trjɣ d͡ʒsmɒnj fxr mj‌knnd، mn hm fxr mj‌nmɒjm zjrɒ t͡ʃvnkh xvd fhjm hstjd، bj‌fhmɒn rɒ bh xvʃj mthml mj‌bɒʃjd zjrɒ mthml mj‌ʃvjd hrɡɒh ksj ʃmɒ rɒ ɣlɒm sɒzd، jɒ ksj ʃmɒ rɒ frv xvrd، jɒ ksj ʃmɒ rɒ ɡrftɒr knd، jɒksj xvd rɒ blnd sɒzd، jɒ ksj ʃmɒ rɒ br rxsɒrtپɒnt͡ʃh znd ɒz rvj ɒsthɣɒr mj‌ɡvjm kh ɡvjɒmɒ zʔjf bvdh‌ɒjm آjɒʔbrɒnj hstnd؟ mn njz hstm ɒsrɒئjlj hstnd؟ mn njz hstm ɒz zrjt ɒbrɒhjm hstnd؟ mn njzmj bɒʃm آjɒ xdɒm msjh hstnd؟ t͡ʃvn djvɒnh hrf mj‌znm، mn bjʃtr hstm dr mhnthɒɒfzvntr، dr tɒzjɒnh‌hɒ zjɒdtr، dr zndɒnhɒ bjʃtr، dr mrɡhɒ mkrr ɒz jhvdjɒn پnd͡ʒ mrtbh ɒz t͡ʃhl jk km tɒzjɒnh xvrdm sh mrtbh mrɒ t͡ʃvb zdnd؛ jk dfʔh sŋsɒr ʃdm؛ sh krt ʃksth kʃtj ʃdm؛ ʃbɒnh‌rvzj dr drjɒ bsr brdm؛ drsfrhɒ bɒrhɒ؛ dr xtrhɒj nhrhɒ؛ dr xtrhɒj dzdɒn؛ dr xtrhɒ ɒz ɣvm xvd v dr xtrhɒ ɒzɒmt‌hɒ؛ dr xtrhɒ dr ʃhr؛ dr xtrhɒ drbjɒbɒn؛ dr xtrhɒ dr drjɒ؛ dr xtrhɒ dr mjɒn brɒdrɒn kzbh؛ dr mhnt v mʃɣt، dr bj‌xvɒbjhɒ bɒrhɒ؛ dr ɡrsŋj v tʃŋj، dr rvzh‌hɒ bɒrhɒ؛ dr srmɒv ʔrjɒnj bdvn آnt͡ʃh ʔlɒvh br ɒjnhɒ ɒst، آn bɒrj kh hr rvzh br mn ɒst، jʔnj ɒndjʃh brɒj hmh kljsɒhɒ kjst zʔjf kh mn zʔjf nmj ʃvm؟ kh lɣzʃ mj‌xvrd kh mn nmj svzm؟ ɒɡr fxr mj‌bɒjd krd ɒz آnt͡ʃh bh zʔf mn tʔlɣ dɒrd، fxr mj‌knm xdɒ v پdr ʔjsj msjh xdɒvnd kh tɒ bh ɒbd mtbɒrk ɒst، mj‌dɒnd kh drvɣ nmj ɡvjm dr dmʃɣ، vɒlj hɒrs پɒdʃɒh، ʃhr dmʃɣjɒn rɒ brɒj ɡrftn mn mhɒfzt mj‌nmvdv mrɒ ɒz drjt͡ʃh‌ɒj dr znbjlj ɒz bɒrh ɣlʔh پɒjjn krdnd v ɒz dsthɒj vj rstm v mrɒ ɒz drjt͡ʃh‌ɒj dr znbjlj ɒz bɒrh ɣlʔh پɒjjn krdnd v ɒz dsthɒj vj rstm lɒbd ɒst kh fxr knm، hrt͡ʃnd ʃɒjsth mn njst ljkn bh rvjɒhɒ v mkɒʃfɒt xdɒvnd mj‌آjm ʃxsj rɒ dr msjh mj‌ʃnɒsm، t͡ʃhɒrdh sɒl ɣbl ɒz ɒjn آjɒ dr d͡ʒsm؟ nmj dɒnm v آjɒ bjrvn ɒz d͡ʒsm؟ nmj dɒnm xdɒmj dɒnd t͡ʃnjn ʃxsj kh tɒ آsmɒn svm rbvdh ʃd v t͡ʃnjn ʃxs rɒ mj‌ʃnɒsm، xvɒh drd͡ʒsm v xvɒh d͡ʒdɒ ɒz d͡ʒsm، nmj dɒnm، xdɒmj dɒnd، kh bh frdvs rbvdh ʃd v sxnɒn nɒɡftnj ʃnjd kh ɒnsɒn rɒ d͡ʒɒjz njst bh آnhɒ tklm knd ɒz t͡ʃnjn ʃxs fxr xvɒhm krd، ljkn ɒzxvd d͡ʒz ɒz zʔfhɒj xvjʃ fxr nmj knm zjrɒɒɡr bxvɒhm fxr bknm، bj‌fhm nmj bɒʃm t͡ʃvnkh rɒst mj‌ɡvjm ljkn ɒd͡ʒtnɒb mj‌knm mbɒdɒ ksj dr hɣ mn ɡmɒnj brd fvɣ ɒz آnt͡ʃh dr mn bjnd jɒ ɒzmn ʃnvd v tɒ آnkh ɒz zjɒdtj mkɒʃfɒt zjɒdh srɒfrɒzj nnmɒjm، xɒrj dr d͡ʒsm mn dɒdh ʃd، frʃth ʃjtɒn، tɒ mrɒ ltmh znd، mbɒdɒ zjɒdh srɒfrɒzj nmɒjm v drbɒrh آn ɒz xdɒvnd sh dfʔh ɒstdʔɒ nmvdm tɒ ɒz mn brvd mrɒ ɡft «fjz mn tv rɒ kɒfj ɒst، zjrɒ kh ɣvt mn drzʔf kɒml mj‌ɡrdd» پs bh ʃɒdj bsjɒr ɒzzʔfhɒj xvd bjʃtr fxr xvɒhm nmvd tɒ ɣvt msjh dr mn sɒkn ʃvd bnɒbrɒjn، ɒz zʔfhɒ vrsvɒjj‌hɒ v ɒhtjɒd͡ʒɒt v zhmɒt v tŋjhɒbxɒtr msjh ʃɒdmɒnm، zjrɒ kh t͡ʃvn nɒtvɒnm، آŋɒh tvɒnɒ hstm bj‌fhm ʃdh‌ɒm ʃmɒ mrɒ md͡ʒbvr sɒxtjd zjrɒ mj‌bɒjst ʃmɒ mrɒ mdh krdh bɒʃjd، ɒz آnrvkh mn ɒz bzrɡtrjn rsvlɒn bh hjt͡ʃ vd͡ʒh kmtrnjstm، hrt͡ʃnd hjt͡ʃ hstm bdrstj kh ʔlɒmɒt rsvl dr mjɒn ʃmɒ bɒ kmɒl sbr ɒz آjɒt v mʔd͡ʒzɒt v ɣvɒt پdjd ɡʃt zjrɒ kdɒm t͡ʃjzɒst kh dr آn ɒz sɒjr kljsɒhɒ ɣɒsr bvdjd؟ mɡrɒjnkh mn br ʃmɒ bɒr nnhɒdm ɒjn bj‌ɒnsɒfj rɒ ɒz mn bbxʃjd ɒjnk mrtbh svm mhjɒ hstm kh nzd ʃmɒbjɒjm v br ʃmɒ bɒr nxvɒhm nhɒd ɒz آnrv kh nh mɒl ʃmɒ blkh xvd ʃmɒ rɒ tɒlbm، zjrɒ kh nmj bɒjdfrzndɒn brɒj vɒldjn zxjrh knnd، blkh vɒldjn brɒj frzndɒn ɒmɒ mn bh‌kmɒl xvʃj brɒj d͡ʒɒnhɒj ʃmɒ srf mj‌knm v srf krdh xvɒhm ʃd v ɒɡr ʃmɒ rɒ bjʃtr mhbt nmɒjm، آjɒ kmtrmhbt bjnm؟ ɒmɒ bɒʃd، mn br ʃmɒ bɒr nnhɒdm blkh t͡ʃvn hjlh ɡr bvdm، ʃmɒ rɒ bh mkr bh t͡ʃŋ آvrdm آjɒ bh jkj ɒz آnɒnj kh nzd ʃmɒfrstɒdm، nfʔ ɒz ʃmɒ brdm؟ bh tjts ɒltmɒs nmvdm v bɒ vj brɒdr rɒ frstɒdm آjɒ tjts ɒz ʃmɒnfʔ brd؟ mɡr bh jk rvh v jk rvʃ rftɒrnnmvdjm؟ آjɒ bʔd ɒz ɒjn mdt، ɡmɒn mj‌knjd kh nzdʃmɒ hd͡ʒt mj‌آvrjm؟ bh hzvr xdɒ dr msjh sxn mj‌ɡvjjm ljkn hmh‌t͡ʃjz‌ɒj ʔzjzɒn brɒj bnɒj ʃmɒ ɒst zjrɒ mj‌trsm kh t͡ʃvn آjm ʃmɒ rɒ nh‌t͡ʃnɒnkh mj‌xvɒhm bjɒbm v ʃmɒ mrɒ bjɒbjdt͡ʃnɒnkh nmj xvɒhjd kh mbɒdɒ nzɒʔ v hsd vxʃmhɒ v tʔsb v bhtɒn v nmɒmj v ɣrvr vftnh‌hɒ bɒʃdv t͡ʃvn bɒzآjm، xdɒj mn mrɒ nzdʃmɒ frvtn sɒzd v mɒtm knm brɒj bsjɒrj ɒz آnɒnj kh پjʃtr ɡnɒh krdnd v ɒz nɒپɒkj v znɒ v fd͡ʒvrj kh krdh bvdnd، tvbh nnmvdnd v t͡ʃvn bɒzآjm، xdɒj mn mrɒ nzdʃmɒ frvtn sɒzd v mɒtm knm brɒj bsjɒrj ɒz آnɒnj kh پjʃtr ɡnɒh krdnd v ɒz nɒپɒkj v znɒ v fd͡ʒvrj kh krdh bvdnd، tvbh nnmvdnd ɒjn mrtbh svm nzd ʃmɒ mj‌آjm bh ɡvɒhj dv sh ʃɒhd، hr sxn sɒbt xvɒhd ʃd پjʃ ɡftm v پjʃ mj‌ɡvjm kh ɡvjɒdfʔh dvm hɒzr bvdh‌ɒm، hrt͡ʃnd ɒlɒn ɣɒjb hstm، آnɒnj rɒ kh ɣbl ɒz ɒjn ɡnɒh krdnd v hmh djɡrɒn rɒ kh ɒɡr bɒzآjm، msɒmhh nxvɒhm nmvd t͡ʃvnkh dljl msjh rɒ kh dr mn sxn mj‌ɡvjdmj d͡ʒvjjd kh ɒv nzd ʃmɒ zʔjf njst blkh drʃmɒ tvɒnɒst zjrɒ hrɡɒh ɒz zʔf mslvb ɡʃt، ljkn ɒz ɣvt xdɒ zjst mj‌knd t͡ʃvnkh mɒ njz dr vj zʔjf hstjm، ljkn bɒ ɒv ɒz ɣvt xdɒ kh bh svj ʃmɒ ɒst، zjst xvɒhjm krd xvd rɒ ɒmthɒn knjd kh dr ɒjmɒn hstjd jɒ nh xvd rɒ bɒz‌jɒft knjd آjɒ xvd rɒ nmj ʃnɒsjd kh ʔjsj msjh dr ʃmɒ ɒst ɒɡr mrdvd njstjd؟ ɒmɒ ɒmjdvɒrm kh xvɒhjd dɒnst kh mɒ mrdvdnjstjm v ɒz xdɒ msɒlt mj‌knm kh ʃmɒ hjt͡ʃ bdj nknjd، nh tɒ zɒhr ʃvd kh mɒ mɣbvl hstjm، blkh tɒ ʃmɒ njkvjj krdh bɒʃjd، hrt͡ʃnd mɒ ɡvjɒmrdvd bɒʃjm zjrɒ kh hjt͡ʃ nmj tvɒnjm bh xlɒf rɒstj ʔml nmɒjjm blkh brɒj rɒstj vʃɒdmɒnjm vɣtj kh mɒ nɒtvɒnjm v ʃmɒ tvɒnɒjjd v njzbrɒj ɒjn dʔɒ mj‌knjm kh ʃmɒ kɒml ʃvjd ɒzɒjnd͡ʒht ɒjn rɒ dr ɣjɒb mj‌nvjsm tɒ hŋɒmj kh hɒzr ʃvm، sxtj nknm bhsb آn ɣdrtj kh xdɒvnd bd͡ʒht bnɒ nh brɒj xrɒbj bh mn dɒdh ɒst xlɒsh‌ɒj brɒdrɒn ʃɒd bɒʃjd؛ kɒml ʃvjd؛ tslj پzjrjd؛ jk rɒj v bɒ slɒmtj bvdh bɒʃjd v xdɒj mhbt v slɒmtj bɒ ʃmɒ xvɒhdbvd jkdjɡr rɒ bh bvsh mɣdsɒnh thjt nmɒjjdd͡ʒmjʔ mɣdsɒn bh ʃmɒ slɒm mj‌rsɒnnd d͡ʒmjʔ mɣdsɒn bh ʃmɒ slɒm mj‌rsɒnnd پvls، rsvl nh ɒz d͡ʒɒnb ɒnsɒn v nh bvsjlh ɒnsɒn blkh bh ʔjsj msjh v xdɒj پdr kh ɒv rɒ ɒz mrdɡɒn brxjzɒnjd، v hmh brɒdrɒnj kh bɒmn mj‌bɒʃnd، bh kljsɒhɒj ɣlɒtjh، fjz v slɒmtj ɒz d͡ʒɒnb xdɒj پdr vxdɒvnd mɒ ʔjsj msjh bɒ ʃmɒ bɒd؛ kh xvd rɒbrɒj ɡnɒhɒn mɒ dɒd tɒ mɒ rɒ ɒz ɒjn ʔɒlm hɒzr ʃrjrbhsb ɒrɒdh xdɒ v پdr mɒ xlɒsj bxʃd، kh ɒv rɒ tɒ ɒbdɒlɒbɒd d͡ʒlɒl bɒd آmjn tʔd͡ʒb mj‌knm kh bdjn zvdj ɒz آn ks kh ʃmɒ rɒ bh fjz msjh xvɒndh ɒst، brmj ɡrdjdbh svj ɒnd͡ʒjlj djɡr، kh ɒnd͡ʒjl djɡr njst lkn bʔzj hstnd kh ʃmɒ rɒ mztrb mj‌sɒzndv mj‌xvɒhnd ɒnd͡ʒjl msjh rɒ tbdjl nmɒjnd blkh hrɡɒh mɒ hm jɒ frʃth‌ɒj ɒz آsmɒn، ɒnd͡ʒjlj ɣjr ɒz آnkh mɒ bh آn bʃɒrt dɒdjm bh ʃmɒ rsɒnd، ɒnɒtjmɒ bɒd t͡ʃnɒnkh پjʃ ɡftjm، ɒlɒn hm bɒzmj ɡvjm ɒɡr ksj ɒnd͡ʒjlj ɣjr ɒz آnkh پzjrftjdbjɒvrd، ɒnɒtjmɒ bɒd آjɒ ɒlhɒl mrdm rɒ dr rɒj xvd mj‌آvrm؟ jɒ xdɒ rɒ jɒ rzɒmndj mrdm rɒ mj tlbm؟ ɒɡr tɒbhɒl rzɒmndj mrdm rɒmj xvɒstm، ɣlɒm msjh nmj bvdm ɒmɒ‌ɒj brɒdrɒn ʃmɒ rɒ ɒʔlɒm mj‌knm ɒzɒnd͡ʒjlj kh mn bdɒn bʃɒrt dɒdm kh bh trjɣ ɒnsɒn njst zjrɒ kh mn آn rɒ ɒz ɒnsɒn njɒftm vnjɒmvxtm، mɡr bh kʃf ʔjsj msjh zjrɒsrɡzʃt sɒbɣ mrɒ dr djn jhvd ʃnjdh‌ɒjd kh brkljsɒj xdɒ bjnhɒjt d͡ʒfɒ mj‌nmvdm v آn rɒvjrɒn mj‌sɒxtm، v dr djn jhvd ɒz ɒksrhmsɒlɒn ɣvm xvd sbɣt mj‌d͡ʒstm v dr tɣɒljdɒd͡ʒdɒd xvd bɣɒjt ɣjvr mj‌bvdm ɒmɒ t͡ʃvn xdɒkh mrɒ ɒz ʃkm mɒdrm brɡzjd v bh fjz xvd mrɒxvɒnd، rzɒ bdjn dɒd kh پsr xvd rɒ dr mn آʃkɒr sɒzd tɒ dr mjɒn ɒmt‌hɒ bdv bʃɒrt dhm، dr آnvɣt bɒ d͡ʒsm v xvn mʃvrt nkrdm، v bh ɒvrʃljm hm nzd آnɒnj kh ɣbl ɒz mn rsvl bvdndnrftm، blkh bh ʔrb ʃdm v bɒz bh dmʃɣ mrɒd͡ʒʔt krdm پs bʔd ɒz sh sɒl، brɒj mlɒɣɒt پtrs bh ɒvrʃljm rftm v پɒnzdh rvz bɒ vj bsr brdm ɒmɒ ɒz sɒjr rsvlɒn d͡ʒz jʔɣvb brɒdr xdɒvndrɒ ndjdm ɒmɒ drbɒrh آnt͡ʃh bh ʃmɒ mj‌nvjsm، ɒjnk dr hzvr xdɒ drvɣ nmj ɡvjm bʔd ɒz آn bh nvɒhj svrjh v ɣjljɣjh آmdm v bh kljsɒhɒj jhvdjh kh dr msjh bvdnd svrt ɣjrmʔrvf bvdm، d͡ʒz ɒjnkh ʃnjdh bvdnd kh «آnkh پjʃtr br mɒ d͡ʒfɒ mj‌nmvd، ɒlhɒl bʃɒrt mj‌dhd bh hmɒn ɒjmɒnj kh ɣbl ɒz ɒjn vjrɒn mj‌sɒxt»v xdɒ rɒ dr mn tmd͡ʒjd nmvdnd v xdɒ rɒ dr mn tmd͡ʒjd nmvdnd پs bʔd ɒz t͡ʃhɒrdh sɒl bɒ brnɒbɒ bɒz bh ɒvrʃljm rftm v tjts rɒ hmrɒh xvd brdm vlj bh ɒlhɒm rftm v ɒnd͡ʒjlj rɒ kh dr mjɒn ɒmt hɒbdɒn mvʔzh mj‌knm، bh ɒjʃɒn ʔrzh dɒʃtm، ɒmɒdr xlvt bh mʔtbrjn، mbɒdɒ ʔbs bdvm jɒ dvjdh bɒʃm ljkn tjts njz kh hmrɒh mn v jvnɒnj bvd، md͡ʒbvr nʃd kh mxtvn ʃvd v ɒjn bh‌sbb brɒdrɒn kzbh bvd kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ xfjh drآvrdnd vxfjh drآmdnd tɒ آzɒdj mɒ rɒ kh dr msjh ʔjsj dɒrjm، d͡ʒɒsvsj knnd v tɒ mɒ rɒ bh bndɡj drآvrdnd kh ɒjʃɒn rɒ jk sɒʔt hm bh ɒtɒʔt dr ɒjn ɒmr tɒbʔ nʃdjm tɒ rɒstj ɒnd͡ʒjl dr ʃmɒsɒbt mɒnd ɒmɒ ɒz آnɒnj kh mʔtbrɒnd kh t͡ʃjzj mj‌bɒʃnd hrt͡ʃh bvdnd mrɒ tfɒvtj njst، xdɒ br svrt ɒnsɒn ŋɒh nmj knd zjrɒ آnɒnj kh mʔtbrɒnd، bh mn hjt͡ʃ nfʔ nrsɒnjdnd blkh bh xlɒf آn، t͡ʃvn djdnd kh bʃɒrt nɒmxtvnɒn bh mn sپrdh ʃd، t͡ʃnɒnkh bʃɒrt mxtvnɒn bh پtrs، zjrɒ ɒv kh brɒj rsɒlt mxtvnɒn dr پtrs ʔml krd، dr mn hm brɒj ɒmt‌hɒ ʔml krd پs t͡ʃvn jʔɣvb vkjfɒ v jvhnɒ kh mʔtbr bh ɒrkɒn bvdnd، آn fjzj rɒ kh bh mn ʔtɒ ʃdh bvd djdnd، dst rfɒɣt bh mn vbrnɒbɒ dɒdnd tɒ mɒ bh svj ɒmt‌hɒ brvjm، t͡ʃnɒnkh ɒjʃɒn bh svj mxtvnɒn؛ d͡ʒz آnkh fɣrɒ rɒ jɒdbdɒrjm v xvd njz ɣjvr bh krdn ɒjn kɒr bvdm ɒmɒ t͡ʃvn پtrs bh ɒntɒkjh آmd، ɒv rɒ rvbrvmxɒlft nmvdm zjrɒ kh mstvd͡ʒb mlɒmt bvd، t͡ʃvnkh ɣbl ɒz آmdn bʔzj ɒz d͡ʒɒnb jʔɣvb، bɒɒmt‌hɒ ɣzɒ mj‌xvrd؛ vlj t͡ʃvn آmdnd، ɒz آnɒnj kh ɒhl xtnh bvdnd trsjdh، bɒz ɒjstɒd v xvjʃtn rɒ d͡ʒdɒ sɒxt v sɒjr jhvdjɒn hm bɒ vj nfɒɣ krdnd، bhdj kh brnɒbɒ njz dr nfɒɣ ɒjʃɒn ɡrftɒrʃd vlj t͡ʃvn djdm kh bh rɒstj ɒnd͡ʒjl bh ɒstɣɒmt rftɒr nmj knnd، پjʃ rvj hmh پtrs rɒ ɡftm «ɒɡr tv kh jhvd hstj، bh trjɣ ɒmt‌hɒ vnh bh trjɣ jhvd zjst mj‌knj، t͡ʃvn ɒst kh ɒmt‌hɒ rɒ md͡ʒbvr mj‌sɒzj kh bh trjɣ jhvd rftɒrknnd؟» mɒ kh tbʔ jhvd hstjm v nh ɡnɒhkɒrɒn ɒz ɒmt‌hɒ، ɒmɒ t͡ʃvnkh jɒftjm kh hjt͡ʃ‌ks ɒzɒʔmɒl ʃrjʔt ʔɒdl ʃmrdh nmj ʃvd، blkh bh ɒjmɒn bh ʔjsj msjh، mɒ hm bh msjh ʔjsj ɒjmɒn آvrdjm tɒ ɒz ɒjmɒn bh msjh v nh ɒz ɒʔmɒl ʃrjʔt ʔɒdl ʃmrdh ʃvjm، zjrɒ kh ɒz ɒʔmɒl ʃrjʔt hjt͡ʃ bʃrj ʔɒdl ʃmrdh nxvɒhd ʃd ɒmɒ ɒɡr t͡ʃvn ʔdɒlt dr msjh rɒ mj‌tlbm، xvd hm ɡnɒhkɒr jɒft ʃvjm، آjɒ msjh xɒdm ɡnɒh ɒst؟ hɒʃɒ zjrɒ ɒɡr bɒz bnɒ knm آnt͡ʃh rɒkh xrɒb sɒxtm، hrآjnh sɒbt mj‌knm kh xvd mtʔdj hstm zɒnrv kh mn bvɒsth ʃrjʔt nsbt bh ʃrjʔt mrdm tɒ nsbt bh xdɒ zjst knm bɒ msjh mslvb ʃdh‌ɒm vlj zndɡj mj‌knm ljkn nh mn bʔd ɒz ɒjn، blkh msjh dr mn zndɡj mj‌knd v zndɡɒnj kh ɒlhɒl dr d͡ʒsm mj‌knm، bh ɒjmɒn br پsr xdɒ mj‌knm kh mrɒ mhbt nmvd v xvd rɒ brɒj mn dɒdfjz xdɒ rɒ bɒtl nmj sɒzm، zjrɒ ɒɡr ʔdɒlt bh ʃrjʔt mj‌bvd، hrآjnh msjh ʔbs mrd fjz xdɒ rɒ bɒtl nmj sɒzm، zjrɒ ɒɡr ʔdɒlt bh ʃrjʔt mj‌bvd، hrآjnh msjh ʔbs mrd ɒj ɣlɒtjɒn bj‌fhm، kjst kh ʃmɒ rɒɒfsvn krd tɒ rɒstj rɒ ɒtɒʔt nknjd kh پjʃ t͡ʃʃmɒn ʃmɒ ʔjsj msjh mslvb ʃdh mbjn ɡrdjd؟ fɣt ɒjn rɒ mj‌xvɒhm ɒz ʃmɒbfhmm kh rvh rɒ ɒz ɒʔmɒl ʃrjʔt jɒfth‌ɒjd jɒ ɒzxbr ɒjmɒn؟ آjɒ ɒjnɣdr bj‌fhm hstjd kh bh rvh ʃrvʔ krdh، ɒlɒn bh d͡ʒsm kɒml mj‌ʃvjd؟ آjɒɒjnɣdr zhmɒt rɒ ʔbs kʃjdjd ɒɡr fj ɒlhɣjɣh ʔbs bɒʃd؟ پs آnkh rvh rɒ bh ʃmɒ ʔtɒmj knd v ɣvɒt dr mjɒn ʃmɒ bh zhvr mj‌آvrd، آjɒɒz ɒʔmɒl ʃrjʔt jɒ ɒz xbr ɒjmɒn mj‌knd؟ t͡ʃnɒnkh ɒbrɒhjm bh xdɒ ɒjmɒn آvrd v brɒj ɒvʔdɒlt mhsvb ʃd پs آɡɒhjd kh ɒhl ɒjmɒn frzndɒn ɒbrɒhjm hstnd v ktɒb t͡ʃvn پjʃ djdkh xdɒ ɒmt‌hɒ rɒ ɒz ɒjmɒn ʔɒdl xvɒhd ʃmrd bh ɒbrɒhjm bʃɒrt dɒd kh «d͡ʒmjʔ ɒmt‌hɒ ɒz tv brkt xvɒhnd jɒft» bnɒbrɒjn ɒhl ɒjmɒn bɒ ɒbrɒhjm ɒjmɒn dɒr brkt mj‌jɒbnd zjrɒ d͡ʒmjʔ آnɒnj kh ɒz ɒʔmɒl ʃrjʔt hstnd، zjr lʔnt mj‌bɒʃnd zjrɒ mktvb ɒst «mlʔvn ɒst hr‌kh sɒbt nmɒnd dr tmɒm nvʃth hɒj ktɒb ʃrjʔt tɒ آnhɒ rɒ bh‌d͡ʒɒ آrd» ɒmɒ vɒzh ɒst kh hjt͡ʃ‌ks dr hzvr xdɒ ɒzʃrjʔt ʔɒdl ʃmrdh nmj ʃvd، zjrɒ kh «ʔɒdl bh ɒjmɒn zjst xvɒhd nmvd» ɒmɒ ʃrjʔt ɒzɒjmɒn njst blkh «آnkh bh آnhɒ ʔml mj‌knd، drآnhɒ zjst xvɒhd nmvd» msjh، mɒ rɒ ɒzlʔnt ʃrjʔt fdɒ krd t͡ʃvnkh dr rɒh mɒ lʔnt ʃd، t͡ʃnɒnkh mktvb ɒst «mlʔvn ɒst hrkh br dɒrآvjxth ʃvd» tɒ brkt ɒbrɒhjm dr msjh ʔjsj br ɒmt‌hɒ آjd v tɒ vʔdh rvh rɒ bh vsjlh ɒjmɒn hɒsl knjm ‌ɒj brɒdrɒn، bh trjɣ ɒnsɒn sxn mj‌ɡvjm، zjrɒ ʔhdj rɒ kh ɒz ɒnsɒn njz ɒstvɒr mj‌ʃvd، hjt͡ʃ‌ks bɒtl nmj sɒzd v nmj ɒfzɒjd ɒmɒvʔdh‌hɒ bh ɒbrɒhjm v bh nsl ɒv ɡfth ʃd vnmj ɡvjd «bh nslhɒ» kh ɡvjɒ drbɒrh bsjɒrj bɒʃd، blkh drbɒrh jkj v «bh nsl tv» kh msjh ɒst v mɣsvd ɒjn ɒst ʔhdj rɒ kh ɒz xdɒ bh msjh bsth ʃdh bvd، ʃrjʔtj kh t͡ʃhɒrsd v sj sɒl bʔd ɒz آn nɒzl ʃd، bɒtl nmj sɒzd btvrj kh vʔdh njst ʃvd zjrɒ ɒɡr mjrɒs ɒz ʃrjʔt bvdj، djɡr ɒz vʔdh nbvdj ljkn xdɒ آn rɒ bh ɒbrɒhjm ɒz vʔdh dɒd پs ʃrjʔt t͡ʃjst؟ brɒj tɣsjrhɒ br آn ɒfzvdh ʃd tɒ hŋɒm آmdn آn nslj kh vʔdh bdvdɒdh ʃd v bvsjlh frʃtɡɒn bh‌dst mtvstj mrtb ɡrdjd ɒmɒ mtvst ɒz jk njst، ɒmɒxdɒ jk ɒst پs آjɒ ʃrjʔt bh xlɒf vʔdh hɒj xdɒst؟ hɒʃɒ zjrɒ ɒɡr ʃrjʔtj dɒdh mj‌ʃd kh tvɒnd hjɒt‌bxʃd، hrآjnh ʔdɒlt ɒz ʃrjʔt hɒsl mj‌ʃd blkh ktɒb hmh‌t͡ʃjz rɒ zjr ɡnɒh bst tɒ vʔdh‌ɒj kh ɒz ɒjmɒn bh ʔjsj msjh ɒst، ɒjmɒndɒrɒn rɒ ʔtɒ ʃvd ɒmɒ ɣbl ɒz آmdn ɒjmɒn، zjr ʃrjʔt ŋɒh dɒʃth bvdjm v brɒj آn ɒjmɒnj kh mj‌bɒjst mkʃvf ʃvd، bsth ʃdh bvdjm پs ʃrjʔt lɒlɒj mɒʃd tɒ bh msjh brsɒnd tɒ ɒz ɒjmɒn ʔɒdl ʃmrdh ʃvjm ljkn t͡ʃvn ɒjmɒn آmd، djɡr zjr dst lɒlɒ njstjm zjrɒ hmɡj ʃmɒ bvsjlh ɒjmɒn dr msjh ʔjsj، پsrɒn xdɒ mj‌bɒʃjd zjrɒ hmh ʃmɒ kh dr msjh tʔmjd jɒftjd، msjh rɒ dr br‌ɡrftjd hjt͡ʃ mmkn njst kh jhvd bɒʃd jɒ jvnɒnj v nh ɣlɒm v nh آzɒd v nh mrd v nh zn، zjrɒ kh hmh ʃmɒdr msjh ʔjsj jk mj‌bɒʃjdɒmɒ ɒɡr ʃmɒ ɒzآn msjh mj‌bɒʃjd، hrآjnh nsl ɒbrɒhjm vbrhsb vʔdh، vɒrs hstjd ɒmɒ ɒɡr ʃmɒ ɒzآn msjh mj‌bɒʃjd، hrآjnh nsl ɒbrɒhjm vbrhsb vʔdh، vɒrs hstjd ɒst، ɒz ɣlɒm hjt͡ʃ frɣ ndɒrd، hrt͡ʃndmɒlk hmh bɒʃd blkh zjrdst nɒzrɒn v vklɒmj bɒʃd tɒ rvzj kh پdrʃ tʔjjn krdh bɒʃd hmt͡ʃnjn mɒ njz t͡ʃvn sɣjr mj‌bvdjm، zjr ɒsvl dnjvj ɣlɒm mj‌bvdjm ljkn t͡ʃvn zmɒn bh‌kmɒl rsjd، xdɒ پsr xvd rɒ frstɒd kh ɒz zn zɒjjdh ʃd v zjr ʃrjʔt mtvld، tɒ آnɒnj rɒ kh zjrʃrjʔt bɒʃnd fdjh knd tɒ آnkh پsrxvɒndɡj rɒbjɒbjm ɒmɒ t͡ʃvnkh پsr hstjd، xdɒ rvh پsrxvd rɒ dr dlhɒj ʃmɒ frstɒd kh ndɒ mj‌knd «jɒɒbɒ» jʔnj «ɒj پdr» lhzɒ djɡr ɣlɒm njstj blkh پsr، v t͡ʃvn پsr hstj، vɒrs xdɒ njz bvsjlh msjh ljkn dr آn zmɒn t͡ʃvn xdɒ rɒ nmj ʃnɒxtjd، آnɒnj rɒ kh tbjʔt xdɒjɒn nbvdnd، bndɡj mj‌krdjd ɒmɒ ɒlhɒl kh xdɒ rɒ mj‌ʃnɒsjd blkh xdɒ ʃmɒ rɒ mj‌ʃnɒsd، t͡ʃɡvnh bɒz mj‌ɡrdjd bh svj آn ɒsvl zʔjf v fɣjr kh djɡrmj xvɒhjd ɒz sr nv آnhɒ rɒ bndɡj knjd؟ rvzhɒv mɒhhɒ v fsl‌hɒ v sɒlhɒ rɒ ŋɒh mj‌dɒrjd drbɒrh ʃmɒ trs dɒrm kh mbɒdɒ brɒj ʃmɒ ʔbs zhmt kʃjdh bɒʃm ‌ɒj brɒdrɒn، ɒz ʃmɒ ɒstdʔɒ dɒrm kh msl mn bʃvjd، t͡ʃnɒnkh mn hm msl ʃmɒ ʃdh‌ɒm bh mn hjt͡ʃ zlm nkrdjd ɒmɒ آɡɒhjd kh bh‌sbb zʔf bdnj، ɒvl bh ʃmɒ bʃɒrt dɒdm v آn ɒmthɒn mrɒ kh dr d͡ʒsm mn bvd، xvɒr nʃmrdjd v mkrvh ndɒʃtjd، blkh mrɒ t͡ʃvn frʃth xdɒ v msl msjh ʔjsj پzjrftjd پs kd͡ʒɒ ɒst آn mbɒrk bɒdj ʃmɒ؟ zjrɒ bh ʃmɒ ʃɒhdm kh ɒɡrmmkn bvdj، t͡ʃʃmɒn xvd rɒ bjrvn آvrdh، bh mn mj‌dɒdjd پs t͡ʃvn bh ʃmɒ rɒst mj‌ɡvjm، آjɒ dʃmn ʃmɒ ʃdh‌ɒm؟ ʃmɒ rɒ bh ɣjrt mj‌tlbnd، ljkn nh bh xjr، blkh mj‌xvɒhnd dr rɒ br rvj ʃmɒ bbndnd tɒ ʃmɒ ɒjʃɒn rɒ bɣjrt btlbjd ljkn ɣjrt dr ɒmr njkv dr hr zmɒn njkv ɒst، nh‌tnhɒ t͡ʃvn mn nzd ʃmɒ hɒzr bɒʃm ‌ɒj frzndɒn mn kh brɒj ʃmɒ bɒz drd zh dɒrm tɒsvrt msjh dr ʃmɒ bsth ʃvd bɒrj xvɒhʃ mj‌krdm kh ɒlɒn nzd ʃmɒ hɒzr mj‌bvdm tɒ sxn xvd rɒ tbdjl knm، zjrɒ kh drbɒrh ʃmɒmthjr ʃdh‌ɒm ʃmɒ kh mj‌xvɒhjd zjr ʃrjʔt bɒʃjd، mrɒbɡvjjd آjɒ ʃrjʔt rɒ nmj ʃnvjd؟ zjrɒmktvb ɒst ɒbrɒhjm rɒ dv پsr bvd، jkj ɒz knjzv djɡrj ɒz آzɒd ljkn پsr knjz، bhsb d͡ʒsm tvld jɒft v پsr آzɒd، brhsb vʔdh vɒjn ɒmvr btvr msl ɡfth ʃd zjrɒ kh ɒjn dv zn، dvʔhd mj‌bɒʃnd، jkj ɒz kvh sjnɒ brɒj bndɡj mj‌zɒjd v آn hɒd͡ʒr ɒst zjrɒ kh hɒd͡ʒr kvh sjnɒ ɒst dr ʔrb، v mtɒbɣ ɒst bɒ ɒvrʃljmj kh mvd͡ʒvd ɒst، zjrɒ kh bɒ frzndɒnʃ dr bndɡj mj‌bɒʃd ljkn ɒvrʃljm bɒlɒ آzɒd ɒst kh mɒdrd͡ʒmjʔ mɒ mj‌bɒʃd zjrɒ mktvb ɒst «ɒj nɒzɒd kh nzɒjjdh‌ɒj، ʃɒd bɒʃ sdɒ kn v frjɒdbrآvr‌ɒj tv kh drd zh ndjdh‌ɒj، zjrɒ kh frzndɒn zn bj‌ks ɒz ɒvlɒd ʃvhrdɒr bjʃtrɒnd» ljkn mɒ‌ɒj brɒdrɒn، t͡ʃvn ɒshɒɣ frzndɒn vʔdh mj‌bɒʃjm blkh t͡ʃnɒnkh آnvɣt آnkh brhsb d͡ʒsm tvld jɒft، br vj kh brhsb rvh bvd d͡ʒfɒmj krd، hmt͡ʃnjn ɒlɒn njz hst ljkn ktɒb t͡ʃh mj‌ɡvjd؟ «knjz v پsr ɒv rɒ bjrvn kn zjrɒ پsrknjz bɒ پsr آzɒd mjrɒs nxvɒhd jɒft»xlɒsh‌ɒj brɒdrɒn، frzndɒn knjz njstjm blkh ɒz zn آzɒdjm xlɒsh‌ɒj brɒdrɒn، frzndɒn knjz njstjm blkh ɒz zn آzɒdjm پs bh آn آzɒdj kh msjh mɒ rɒ bh آn آzɒdkrd ɒstvɒr bɒʃjd v bɒz dr jvɣ bndɡj ɡrftɒr mʃvjd ɒjnk mn پvls bh ʃmɒ mj‌ɡvjm kh ɒɡr mxtvn ʃvjd، msjh brɒj ʃmɒ hjt͡ʃ nfʔ ndɒrd blj bɒz bh hrks kh mxtvn ʃvd ʃhɒdt mj‌dhm kh mdjvn ɒst kh tmɒmj ʃrjʔt rɒ bh‌d͡ʒɒ آvrd hmh ʃmɒ kh ɒz ʃrjʔt ʔɒdl mj‌ʃvjd، ɒz msjh bɒtl v ɒz fjz sɒɣtɡʃth‌ɒjd zjrɒ kh mɒ bvɒsth rvh ɒz ɒjmɒn mtrɣb ɒmjd ʔdɒlt hstjm v dr msjh ʔjsj nh xtnh fɒjdh dɒrd v nh nɒmxtvnj blkh ɒjmɒnj kh bh mhbt ʔml mj‌knd xvb mj‌dvjdjd پs kjst kh ʃmɒ rɒ ɒzɒtɒʔt rɒstj mnhrf sɒxth ɒst؟ ɒjn trɣjb ɒz ɒv kh ʃmɒ rɒ xvɒndh ɒst njst xmjrmɒjh ɒndk tmɒm xmjr rɒ mxmr mj‌sɒzd mn dr xdɒvnd br ʃmɒ ɒʔtmɒd dɒrm kh hjt͡ʃ rɒj djɡr nxvɒhjd dɒʃt، ljkn آnkh ʃmɒ rɒmztrb sɒzd hrkh bɒʃd ɣsɒs xvd rɒxvɒhd jɒft ɒmɒ‌ɒj brɒdrɒn ɒɡr mn tɒ bh hɒl bh xtnh mvʔzh mj‌krdm، t͡ʃrɒ d͡ʒfɒ mj‌djdm؟ zjrɒkh dr ɒjn svrt lɣzʃ sljb brdɒʃth mj‌ʃd kɒʃ آnɒnj kh ʃmɒ rɒ mztrb mj‌sɒznd xvjʃtn rɒ mnɣtʔ mj‌sɒxtnd zjrɒ kh ʃmɒ‌ɒj brɒdrɒn bh آzɒdj xvɒndh ʃdh‌ɒjd؛ ɒmɒ znhɒr آzɒdj xvd rɒ frst d͡ʒsm mɡrdɒnjd، blkh bh mhbt، jkdjɡr rɒ xdmt knjd zjrɒ kh tmɒmj ʃrjʔt dr jk klmh kɒml mj‌ʃvd jʔnj dr ɒjnkh hmsɒjh xvd rɒt͡ʃvn xvjʃtn mhbt nmɒ ɒmɒ ɒɡr hmdjɡr rɒbɡzjd v bxvrjd، bɒhzr bɒʃjd kh mbɒdɒ ɒzjkdjɡr hlɒk ʃvjd ɒmɒ mj‌ɡvjm bh rvh rftɒr knjd پs ʃhvɒt d͡ʒsm rɒ bh‌d͡ʒɒ nxvɒhjd آvrd zjrɒ xvɒhʃ d͡ʒsm bh xlɒf rvh ɒst v xvɒhʃ rvh bh xlɒf d͡ʒsm v ɒjn dv bɒ jkdjɡr mnɒzʔh mj‌knndbtvrj kh آnt͡ʃh mj‌xvɒhjd nmj knjd ɒmɒ ɒɡrɒz rvh hdɒjt ʃdjd، zjr ʃrjʔt njstjd v ɒʔmɒl d͡ʒsm آʃkɒr ɒst، jʔnj znɒ vfsɣ v nɒپɒkj v fd͡ʒvr، v bt‌پrstj vd͡ʒɒdvɡrj v dʃmnj v nzɒʔ v kjnh v xʃm vtʔsb v ʃɣɒɣ v bdʔthɒ، v hsd v ɣtl vmstj v lhv v lʔb v ɒmsɒl ɒjnhɒ kh ʃmɒ rɒ xbrmj dhm t͡ʃnɒnkh ɣbl ɒz ɒjn dɒdm، kh knndɡɒn t͡ʃnjn kɒrhɒ vɒrs mlkvt xdɒ nmj ʃvnd ljkn smrh rvh، mhbt v xvʃj vslɒmtj v hlm v mhrbɒnj v njkvjj v ɒjmɒn vtvɒzʔ v پrhjzkɒrj ɒst، kh hjt͡ʃ ʃrjʔt mɒnʔ t͡ʃnjn kɒrhɒ njst v آnɒnj kh ɒz آn msjh mj‌bɒʃnd، d͡ʒsm rɒ bɒ hvshɒ v ʃhvɒtʃ mslvb sɒxth‌ɒnd ɒɡr bh rvh zjst knjm، bh rvh hm rftɒr bknjmlɒf‌zn mʃvjm tɒ jkdjɡr rɒ bh xʃm آvrjm v br jkdjɡr hsd brjm lɒf‌zn mʃvjm tɒ jkdjɡr rɒ bh xʃm آvrjm v br jkdjɡr hsd brjm ɒmɒ‌ɒj brɒdrɒn، ɒɡr ksj bh xtɒjj ɡrftɒrʃvd، ʃmɒ kh rvhɒnj hstjd t͡ʃnjn ʃxs rɒ bh rvh tvɒzʔ ɒslɒh knjd v xvd rɒmlɒhzh kn kh mbɒdɒ tv njz dr td͡ʒrbh ɒftj bɒrhɒj sŋjn jkdjɡr rɒ mthml ʃvjd v bdjn nvʔ ʃrjʔt msjh rɒ bh‌d͡ʒɒ آrjd zjrɒ ɒɡr ksj xvd rɒ ʃxs ɡmɒn brd v hɒl آnkh t͡ʃjzj nbɒʃd، xvd rɒ mj‌frjbd ɒmɒ hrks ʔml xvdrɒ ɒmthɒn bknd، آŋɒh fxr dr xvd bh tnhɒjj xvɒhd dɒʃt nh dr djɡrj، zjrɒ hrks hɒml bɒr xvd xvɒhd ʃd ɒmɒ hrkh dr klɒm tʔljm jɒfth bɒʃd، mʔlm xvd rɒ dr hmh‌t͡ʃjzhɒj xvb mʃɒrk bsɒzd xvd rɒ frjb mdhjd، xdɒ rɒɒsthzɒء nmj tvɒn krd zjrɒ kh آnt͡ʃh آdmj bkɒrd، hmɒn rɒ drv xvɒhd krd zjrɒ hr‌kh brɒj d͡ʒsm xvd kɒrd، ɒz d͡ʒsm fsɒd rɒ drv knd v hrkh brɒj rvh kɒrd ɒz rvh hjɒt d͡ʒɒvdɒnj xvɒhd drvjd ljkn ɒz njkvkɒrj xsth nʃvjm zjrɒ kh drmvsm آn drv xvɒhjm krd ɒɡr mlvl nʃvjm xlɒsh bɣdrj kh frst dɒrjm bɒ d͡ʒmjʔ mrdm ɒhsɒn bnmɒjjm، ʔlj ɒlxsvs bɒ ɒhl bjt ɒjmɒn mlɒhzh knjd t͡ʃh hrvf d͡ʒlj bdst xvd bh ʃmɒ nvʃtm آnɒnj kh mj‌xvɒhnd svrtj njkv dr d͡ʒsm nmɒjɒn sɒznd، ɒjʃɒn ʃmɒrɒ md͡ʒbvr mj‌sɒznd kh mxtvn ʃvjd، mhz ɒjnkh brɒj sljb msjh d͡ʒfɒ nbjnnd
